Incha tru Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai perep putrentrai neereppe, setemisra srape kasrak pelwei, perel kualemwei 1990wei wesrua neerik kѳn.

Treek trempeik temallip pasraik kutre, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ waacha misakmera kepen, kusrep putrap, urekte misakmera kepen misra, perá mayaelan waminchip kutrá, trawakuchip trawakuchip purukupen, Nu pirau maya misak warapelepe mú manchintrai kaík kutrá pentramisrá nemun, mayaelan pure waminchapele, metrapsre pѳrik tsupikwan, isua tamará yunemartrapteelan wesrua pensrentrap isuik kѳn. Kaakѳn tru metrapsrenkutre Nu wamwan tѳka amtruikpe yante chiwei purukumiik kepen.
Trúnne Nu pirau mayá misak warapelane chiyútekucha pure trempeik nepup atrik kѳn .

Treek kutre, katekate metrap treek kѳntrai pѳrik Nu wamwan, nuketraksre tulampa treek kѳntrai wamwan perep putrapelelata, kate netre watsam kusrepele tulampa putrapelelata, nemte yunemara tamarép mere inchá chinchakucha kaimaik kѳn.

Múkepen tappaik isupikkua, tamártrap tapmai wam lap, sel isua tápik mártrap waminchip amtrupelane pellák wamap, pinishintrap cha kuarésrep, treek taik wamtekeme, keepapiniship, kueechip kepen. Inchen, mukucha mur pasrená, tapikwan perá martraptiik kaakepen. Nu pirau, karupik nete pasrena, chi kalѳ pentrapelan tamártrap inchá, netré waminchá, perá wará, chinchá kaimapen intan, kaakѳn manakutre kalé marielepe memaykucha tamarámkaik kѳnamisrep atrik kѳn, i “Nu pirau mayaelai kapyu.”

I Nu pirau misakmerá mei eyampalasre ketré murik nepuinap waramik nepupen, chi chakepen kuayam lap, chinéte kalé pup atrupen, netrѳé puleelante tulampa trek kѳntrai wamwan perep putrentrai wesrua putrennielekucha keke chi tap martrap kemete, anmeran kalѳ marѳp, misakwan chi purukup puremisramelan ashmete, ka mayaelan nemuinkatete srua kѳntrap, chine upenanep perkuchipkepa isua marѳp kepaampen.

Mánte kemik Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikpe yanakatikweiasik tamará pѳrik ketremisrik kѳn. Chinchákepen wente sreik tamará yunemarámnekatik. Trek kepikkua tru ishik lesrel lepinsh parelweisre (1886) mánte kemik, Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikma mei eyampalasrenkatik, puleelai asikte pure waminchipik pѳrik kepik kuik kѳn, kaakѳn métrapsrempe pekmay kepikkua, kate misak kutre puné pekmay kuik kutre, meimpe nupirau mayá misak warapelai asik pѳrik kѳn.

Trúkutre, misakteweimpe katekánelan tap esik llirap kѳmikwan, chi teka kem srelmerankucha pѳrikwane, pinepunamik kaakѳntrun, trek kalѳ marѳp kualempe, tru Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳriktekatewei mur watsamik nepuntrun, kaakѳn nѳtewei múnkucha puremisrep, kalѳ maren wachip inchapik tekaik kua.
Trek chippe Nupirau asha karupele latá, trek kѳntrai tulampa perep putrapele latá, mú mentaik múkucha katekanpe purepunamik, kape kalѳkѳn cha sreik pera martrap chip kѳntrai kemén.

Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai pѳrikpe, Nu pirau mayaele misak warapele trunun mertrai kѳn, trúnun mermiikwane netewei wachipik kѳn, kaakѳn mayaelai keppe pure nuik wamincha pѳrik kѳn, pure tap wamwan puleelaiwan mayaelaiasik kѳntrai pѳrik kѳn, inchawei pip temyu trenchipik pasrán Ik Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai pѳrikwane mú itepunemewei, katekan sreik itepasrtrai kemewei kѳn cha.

Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai isua pѳrikpe, misakmera setemisra putrѳna mánte esik lincha warámikwan, mánte kѳmikwan, mánte karup aship kѳmikwan ketrikú isua wamincha ketremarik, trúnun pѳrik kѳn. Nupirau aship karup putrapele chi kalѳ mármentrai aship kѳmikwan, mayaelan tap kѳntrai, kate chikepikte mayaelai purap asamik kepen, tap lliramikwanpa.

Trektewei munáwansre pulemisakmera netre warapele, netre pirѳmera tamará pensrar, ik nam waraik piaraulatawei, manakutre mayá misak pasrapikwan nemui munáwansre mánte linchip tapmay kѳmikwan, kape nemui, nemui karup aship, mayaelan teka kѳmikwan asha tekarkua, treek kutre chiyutekucha mayaele misra tap aship, tap marѳp purukup kѳmikwan pera tekar kѳn, treek kutre mánte kѳmikwan pѳrikpe, “Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik” taik kѳn
SRθSRθ CHIKUTRÉ MARTRAP ISUPELAI WAM
CHIKUTRÉ NU WAMWAN ISUA PθRIK
pa palѳpe pulѳtrikmai
kan palѳpe namtrikmai
Mú purѳmisrimѳra isupelѳ kuikwan ilѳsrkaikmik kѳmik.
Treetewei chí kusrémikwan, múnkucha pinap kusrentrai kemewei, shush urekmeran mánte aship teká kѳmikwan, katѳ chutekucha kusréntrap pelpasreppe treek tѳwei patsekamne katik ashá purukumik kѳntrún.

Truik wane yauele kepen, mayá misak kepen, Nu pirau asip karup putrapelepa misra urekwane pure tap aship kemik kѳn, chishtik nѳtrerantrai nѳm mánte kѳntrai wamintielan wentѳwei asik, tap ashaá chiyu kepen purukup marѳpelѳ kѳntrai. ѳyeklan maikkѳn ashmé, urekwan kalé marѳpelane, Táta karupelan, puleele ahsip karup putrapelankui eshkamik kѳntrun, meik kepen trek kalѳ máren ashape. Kaakѳnte urekwanwei pure tap aship netreranámik kѳn.

44 Tѳm: Shush urekmeran tѳkakuik srelmerape: ѳsik kal lawa netrerawa ameñintrai, ásr tapik tekar, tap mámik tekar, munchi mariele, chuik kuik asiele, meskai, usrí tѳkarkѳntrai kѳn. Meskalѳ, shush urekwan taremármete tapmai lincha putrap, tapmai wamap, tap aship untaarap, urek nepua maramteѳelantѳ mártrai asha karup, esheepaship, urek wamintiealan kucha tapmai kѳn,kasraktѳelѳ nѳtrerantrai. Mѳskalѳ keppe, urekwan chinchainte petemewei, mentrá trepeik wamap kemerá ichápetemeei, ásrwan maik kepen inchip ketre-ínchimewei, mek unan kuikui, ishuk une kuikui, chikui mermé urekcheelan,. kaik misakmera misrá, kemerá,metrep chip kemewei,ulep chip kѳmewei, urek kuik ashá nemui ásrwan trempeik kalѳ marѳp kemik kemen, mentrá urekpate linchá kasháramentrai aship puremisrep kemik kѳn.
XIII. METRAP NU WAMWAN TREK KѳNTRAI ISUA PѳRIKWAN YUNѳMARIK
11 Rat Tѳm: ѳsik kѳmikwane múkucha purepunap, itepuniamewei kѳntrún, kueetsamikpe kaatrún.
TѳKA KѳM SRѳLMERA

Pѳn tratrayupe, seteelai pѳtekatan chikepen kepelan meiktekucha latá palapik kui ashá, tap ashá untaaramikwan pѳrik tekaik kѳn. ѳyek chine tapik teka kѳmikwan isuik tap puntraimpe aship karup putrapelelata, nupirau kal-lawar misak warapelelatá, ampekutre ikutre isua waminchatewei maramik kѳntrun. Treek kѳntraimpe, misakmera pure nu isua purukup, puremisrep kemik kѳntrún, seteelai kui merá teka kѳn, iklema: Chikepen penapiklata, yanepiklata, selwan tap yanep tap penap selwan marѳp kѳntrai. Chikepik, nemuikatan kepikwan, pirѳmeran, pimeran, kaumeran, isik isrikwan mintishimewei, patsѳkemewei tap teka kémikwan, chikepen marѳp ampeppe, yanaweiasik isua, patsekemúmikwan chi yellwantekucha puremisrep kemik, chikepen keramteelane ashipte kateramik, chikepik mayaele llirap kuiklan tap aship teka kemik kѳntrun.

Pa tratrayupe mayaele linchá kémikwan, chi teka kѳmikwan, manakutré teka kuiklan waminchipik kѳn. ѳyek tekape mutekucha mánte linchá misaataik warámikwan waminchip lliramikwan, eshkapik kѳn. Ik tratrayupe: Kuallip, chine tap marѳp, mayá misak chí isume tap warámikwan tasik traniap, chine sreik nepua asam kusremikwan, wam purekutsiap tap ellmarѳp teka kѳmikwan waminchipik kѳn.
ѳsik kemik kepen, misaataik chi ilesrkaimiik kѳmik kepen, chiyútekucha mépa kepen latá lintamik, chí isuiklan waminchip, eshkámik kepen, teka kemelepe.

Kan tratrayu: waminchippe chiné teká kem srelmerá waminchipik kѳn, kaakѳn trek kemupene, lata lincha esik waramikpe kaakѳntrap Kuimpa. ѳyek chiné teká kem srelmerane mukucha kal-laptѳweikѳn tѳka kal-lawarkѳn, trek kuik keppe áshme, merme kemete mei meinte aship marámik kѳn.
II. CHI TѳKAKUIKLAN, CHI MARAMELAN, CHI PURѳMISRѳP TASIK TRANAMELAN
Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai cha pѳrik pure nuik metrap pasrepen, mu itepunam kaik kuik asamik. ѳyamay tamarik kѳn.
Mupakucha kan ketѳte puraasiap kѳmik.
MANTѳ KѳMIKWAN PѳLPASRA PѳRIK SRѳLMERA
NUPIRAU WAMWAN TREEK KѳNTRAI ISUA PѳRIK KѳN
PѳLPASRѳPTѳ
NU WAMWAN TREK KѳNTRAI ISUA PѳRIKWAN, MISKAI WANPA MAMTѳ NAMTRIKMAI PѳRIK

ѳyek wan maramikpe, kaka chinchainte ka pa wam waminchipik kepte wanena maramtik kemete, murik kepen, misak trikmai pure eram purukuntrapele, pule wamwan nu ashipele, incha misakmerai wamwan kucha nu asha purepele lawa pensram misran, kante kemete yamele tulampa isua memay mante puntrap kui ashá isua tamara pera pure ertrai. Truiklepe, wamwan tsalla ashipele, kusrenanepele, memarѳpele, kape metrap pentrena isum purukupele, mukepen puleelai wamwan nu nepua ashipele, misakwei wamwan kucha nu ashipele chi yu kepen, e peksre misak kusrepele mames taiklѳ, kellielѳ, merepele, taitamera, pishimarѳpele pek pek chikepen nu isupelepamisra martrap isuikѳn
PEK PEK WAMMAI PURѳRTRAI, TASIK KEPASRѳPIK PѳRIK

ѳyek pѳrikwan nam misakmeran mayaele chull asam kusreimpe ketan, tsentate kucha, kanchik kanchik perep, aship mentappe kilka perielan ashipikte misrtrap mayampá, urekmera mey kutrapteele, misak isuikwan nepua aship kusrepele misrimpe mayakѳn tap kѳntrun wetesrempe nam misak nuik isuikwan ka palapaláte untaarameté purekѳn nu isupele kѳntrap. Namun, aship wapik srempalásrikwan kuchá, unkua chikún, kaakѳn newei eyek, isup waminchip, esik kѳntrai ellmará pensraikle ker.
PѳRѳPELѳ ISUIK

ѳyektewei kѳn, chi misakmera tekucha, pekmaiele kep ,isup waminchipele, Nupirau pule misakmera lataiktѳwei chi teka kѳmikwan aship, chi maramikwan kante isupele nemuipurap tѳkar kѳmikwane ashá untaarapele kѳntrai.

ѳyekle pup mentepen, misakmerá, meikle isupele kepikkua, lincha kante isua, yante kan ishik perel srel perel pinsh kan pila pupen, mánte kemik sreik tamártrap waminchip kutra, sreik marik kѳn, treencha chikepen kalѳ pentrapelan tamarѳp, katekuchí chi isumѳ maramtik kep atrún, yante marikle chitekѳn sreite lataik kѳntrai, metrap pilámerawantaik .
NU KARUPIK WAIKNUK KUTRE PѳRIK

ѳyeek kui kutre maya misak yu nupirau warapelѳ nepua ashá kemik kѳn, mánte kѳmik, mánte esik waramik kѳn cha, netre pera warielan. Kaakѳn tru perieleteka námtewei ashíppate melepen kѳntrún, keepa tápikwan marép kѳmikwane.

Pek, pek misakmera ik Nupirau esik warapelepe, munáwansre pulemisakmera warapele latawei, memay mánte tap linchá kualmap, tap lincha mawap, latá pureasiap llirap, ampukutre ikutre purukuyap, chi marámikupe tasik pepiap, mánte maramteik ketaship waminchip, srena trumar chí marámelan latá isup, misak sun waramikwan waminchip manakutre nemui nemui tátamerakucha chi marámelan isup, karup, aship, pera marѳpele tѳkar, mánte misakta puraampep warámikwan wachip, kerésrep mayaelai metrap pasrená, chiyu kalé pumentrai, mánte tamarѳp ampámikwan isupele, manakatik trente treek marѳpesik warentrai kua.

Cristѳ nѳ maig kusrenaniilan unamig
srѳmpalasrei mai kuipe tretѳwei warap
isuin pasramig
kѳrik
Cristѳ nѳ maig chiben treeg megamig
chikѳpentѳ murelѳ pupik
Tiusbe managuen nuyelane elachimíig kѳn
srabe kwalѳmmera lutaurab kui asamig kѳnrrai mana asiimíig chigѳben kѳnrrabig
Señѳr Jesucristѳ katѳle yu piraumay arrumig
sѳlik
chiyutѳgucha purѳ tab isua
chigѳben nѳrrѳ tѳgagúilѳ
kaik puntrapik
kwabelѳ katѳle ѳsiirawa kurramig
namunma maig palѳben katѳganelan treetѳwei tab indamig
chigucha chi kaig mariiba lindiimíig
chine nebuinab melab
Cristѳimburab chitѳ nebunrrabelѳ kuigwan manasrѳwei eshkawa pѳnsrailѳ Cristѳ nѳ arruben kerrigu nun treeg nebuig kѳn
Cristѳn kѳrebelѳ kѳmibe chine tabig truba maramig, katѳ Tiusweinukkurri tabig arrubigwan utamig arrub
Cristѳn kuikkurri chigѳben kaig marinab melab
kalѳ marilan yunѳ marik
kaig marig pasrabig
Tiuswei wamwan maya misagwei pѳrig
Tiusba waminchib
Tiusweyasig keta tranikpurѳ tapmai merѳ kѳmik
Tiusweyasig keta tranik
Cristѳn nebua asha srѳig kal lawa pasraiba
tru kaigwan trendѳ tѳga kal laig kѳllig pasrabiiba
incha kelѳ
yau putrapelѳ ketrikuilѳ
Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ ker chibendѳ, isapteelѳ
isa peemaytѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ
Cristѳn kan ashibig Tiuswei chi maramelan iglesiayu pera marѳb pasrabig
Señѳr Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳbe maig kѳnrrabigwan asha mariilѳ kua, nѳmui ketig utamigwan utab
Cristѳn kѳrebelѳ Tiuswan mѳrmub kalѳ marene mѳrshey waminchip kѳn
Tiuswei wamwane Tius ѳyamay chinrrai isungaruben treeg pѳriilѳ kѳn
chigѳben trѳmbѳig kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig mariilѳ
Tius wami misaamera Cristѳn kѳrebelѳ nui asr kѳb lataig kѳn
kaigwan tѳga kal laig kaig marѳb pasrabig
Tiuswei ureemera
nui ureebañau
sralѳ
kelѳ
Tiuskurri chiwan kѳben ke trunundѳ isua muniirab
Tius nѳ keta traniilѳ
srawan kui kewan kui kucha yandѳ tarѳmisrѳb
Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Mѳikkѳben truba nuig kѳmmѳrѳ inchib waminchib pasrag kѳbene, Señѳrweimburappe mѳg inchib waminchib pasrѳbash cha.
mugucha Tiuswei merrab nѳrreelѳ misrѳb mѳg inchib pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai.

Yu pirau chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lataig tѳgagúigwan Tiusbe truigwan wesrawa basrig kѳn, tru purѳ nѳrrѳ kusrebelan kѳrig mara gѳrrѳmartrab. Katѳ yu pirau kwa gaizheelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagúilan Tiusbe truigwan wesrawa basrig kѳn, nѳrreelan kѳrig mara gѳrrѳmartrab.

Kaguende Tiuswei tru chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lataig asѳnabiibe mѳguelѳ purѳ may isua wamindi lataig kѳmѳtѳ, mas purab nuig kѳben, katѳ Tius tru itѳnaptiig lataig kuibe, kan mѳwei fuerzas lataikken gѳmѳtѳ, purab murikken gѳn.
Trune nambe Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ guer. Truibe judíѳsmeraimbe ke ka srurrengwangarubig kѳben, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraimbe ke chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindig, treeg kѳn.

Kaguende Tiusbe, tru nui muguen nebua kusremgaig kusrebig kuigu, yu pirau misaamerabe nѳmui tru purѳ nѳrrѳ kusrewa tѳgagúitѳgabe nun nebua ashmѳnrrai indig kѳn. Pѳs tru chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindig mara tѳgagúigwan eshkab kusrenaniitѳga nun kѳrebelane kaigyugurri wesramig, Tiuswane tabig asѳnaig kѳn.

Kaguende trenchibig pѳrig pasran: Purѳ gusreb mѳguelѳ chigurrimbunѳ nebua kusrewa tѳgagúilane pinisamѳnrrun cha. Kusrebelѳ nѳm chigúi mѳra tѳgagúilane chigucha gѳmíig mara kaasha kѳrrѳmaramѳnrrun chibig

Kaguende nane Cristѳbe misagwan piu umbu ulsrѳb uñchai ѳrmѳtѳ, Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanrrai ѳrig kѳn. Incha nabe waminchibgucha, nѳrrѳ wammeratѳga purѳ may waminchimur, Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwane chigucha gѳmíig kui lataig marig kѳmѳnrrai.
nai munchiyu piu umbu ulsrailѳ guer chib mugucha trenchib gѳmѳnrrai.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿Cristѳbe nuin gúi, nuin gúi misra basra chindah? Kabe ñimuyasig kurusyu kwanrrai mesrѳppe, ¿na Pablѳn mesraig kѳ chindah? Kabe ñimun piu umbu ulsrѳbgucha ¿nai munchiyu piu umbu ulsraig kѳ chindah?
Nai nunelѳ, mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Clѳéwei yauelѳbe nane eshkatan, ñimbe kwayam labrre waran cha.
Tiusbe nѳbe maig martrab chippe, treegwan marѳbig kѳn. Ñimbe nѳgurri wamiilѳ gúig kѳn, nui Nusrkai Jesucristѳ namui Señѳrba lincha bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Katѳgucha srabegatig ñim kѳrrѳmѳ mur bѳnrrѳnrrai nѳbe tѳga basrѳnrrun, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳ gatѳ arrub gwalѳm chi kaig mariilѳ chigar bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Trumay Cristѳi tru srѳig tabigwan wamindiibe ka wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, ñimuinuube ciertѳn kѳrrѳmisrin gѳn,
Kaguende chiyutѳgucha ñimbe nuinug purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai traniilѳ gѳn, kerrigu wamindigu lata, kerrigu nebua ashib ambigu lata.
Chu urastѳgucha nabe Tiuswane ñimuimburab ungwa, ungwa chibig kur, Cristѳ Jesúskurri ñimun Tius ka yandѳ tab indigwan tranikkurri.

Cѳrintѳsrѳ iglesiayuelan, Cristѳ Jesúskurri tru Tiusweyasig tarѳmariilѳ, nuyasiitѳ newan tabelѳ gѳnrrai wamiilanba, katѳ tru mayeelѳ chutѳgucha namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchiwan wamabelanba, truibe namuimba, nѳmuimba Señѳrwan.
Indiibe yandѳ pѳn bila puraiben, Jerusalénsrѳ nabe Pedrѳba waminchab ya, trusrѳ nѳba parru kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kur.
nui Nusrkawan na nebua ashchai kenamarig kѳn, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utu nuimburabigwan na eshkab kusrenanamig kѳnrrai. Inchen nabe tru urastѳ mu mѳwan paya mѳrmѳwei,

Namui misag utu, naba guetѳtѳ nѳrrѳrawarwei utu mѳilan gѳben nabe kanab gusrebig kѳbig kur, judíѳsmera Tiusweyasig maig maramelѳyube, kaguende nabe merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamera maig marѳb amrruigwane maikken purѳbuniimíig kѳnrrai inchibig kѳbig kua.
Iigwan ñim, nai nunelan, wammѳrѳsrkѳnrrab inchar, tru tabig srѳ wamwan na eshkab kusrenaniibe mѳguelѳ nѳmdѳ isua wesruigwan wamindikkucha gѳmѳn.
Pѳs nabe, kan mѳwan utig kѳmѳwei, katѳ kan mѳg kusrenanig kѳmѳwein gur. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nan Jesucristѳ ashchai kenamaren, treeg utig kѳbig kѳn.

Namdѳwein gúi lata, kabe kan ángel srѳmbalasriig kui lata, tru tabig srѳ wamwan nam ñimun eshkab kusrenani lataig kѳmѳtѳ, katѳgan peemaytѳ yunѳmara waminchibiibe, managatig trѳmbѳig nebuig pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳbash.
Tabig srѳ wam katѳgan peg kuimba gѳmѳtѳ, mѳilѳgѳben ñimune ke ka ilѳsrkѳb, Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwane ke kan mumaygucha gѳmíig kѳnrrai mindisha bѳnsrѳg kѳb indan.
Truigwan tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun managatig. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Truibe nam kaig mariilaimburab nѳashib kwanrrab pasramisrig kѳn, nam warain gwalѳm larrѳ gaig pasrabigugurri namun wesraig kѳnrrai, tru namui Tius Mѳskai maig kѳnrrain gѳben, trumay.
Namui nunelѳ mayeelѳ naba warabelѳba Galacia birausrѳ iglesiameran i kilgawan na pѳrar.
Pѳs ñimwein gѳn tru nam maya nuguen tab gúi mѳrѳb pѳnrramiba, nam kasrag kui pѳnrramibabe.
Pѳs tru nam tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua munig melamiba, namui kasrag kѳbiiba, katѳ Señѳr Jesucristѳ arruben, nui merrab nam kan cѳrѳna lataig kanawa nam uta, purѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb pѳnrramibe ¿ñimwein gѳmѳtirru?

Namui nunelѳ, nam ñimba maya yana gѳsrѳn tarѳmisra, ashippe, ashmubendѳ, namui manrraube chu uraskucha ñimune pesannamѳ tѳga bѳnrrѳwa, ñimun malaugue ashchab amrrug kѳbiitѳ truba rruba inchib melaig kѳn.

Tru judíѳsmerabe Señѳr Jesúswan kweetsamba, tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kweetsamba, namune nѳmuinukkurri webetamba indig kѳbig kѳn. Incha truilѳbe Tiuswane tab gúi wanrrai marmeelѳ, maya misaameran ashig kѳmuingѳba inchibelѳ gѳn,

Inchawei nambe chu urastѳgucha Tiuswan ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ guer. Kaguen tru Tiuswei wamwan nam waminchen ñim mѳrѳb uras, ka mѳguelѳ wamindig kui lataitѳ mara utѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei wam ciertѳnig kuitamab isua utig kѳn ñimbe. Truibe tru ñim kѳrebelainuube ka basrѳmѳtѳ, marig misrѳb pasran.
Pѳs ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, nambe ñimun mѳigwandѳgucha kan mѳskai nui uregwan waminchib lataitѳwei,
Tru estrellabe Ajenjѳ munchi gѳbig kѳn. Inchen pimera tru pѳnyu kanun itѳbenimburappe, larrѳ rrѳmbѳ mѳbgѳlig misren, misaamerabe tru mѳb pimeragurri truba rruba nѳrrѳ gwabelѳ gѳn.
truyu ѳsig purrabelѳbe tѳbѳtag lutau chab gwaben, katѳ tru maryu barcѳmera maya kѳbiibe tѳbѳtag lutau chab pinabig kѳn.
Inchen tru ángel pagatѳ gѳnrrabyuig nui trѳmpetan urrѳbene, kan purѳ nu tun ѳrѳba naarab lataigwan maryu keguchene, marbe tѳbѳtag lutau ani misren,
Inchen tru ángelesmera sieteelѳ tru siete trѳmpetameran sruarbe urrѳnrrab yandѳ tamara pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru may irrabig patig naguishba, Tiuswei misaamera tru nѳba wamindiilѳbabe Tiuswei merrab nebibig kѳn tru ángelwei tasigugurri.
Inchene ángelesmera sieteelѳ Tiuswei merrab pѳnrrai ashibig kur. Inchen nѳmune siete trѳmpetas tranѳbig kѳn.

Señѳr namui Tius, ñibe maya nuguen tabigwanba, tabig kui asha tab indigwanba, maramburab maramigwanba utambuawei utѳnrrabiibe ñi gѳn chib, kaguende chiwandѳgucha kerrigu ñi marig kuimba, Ñi treeg kѳnrrai isuikkurri treeg mariilѳ, treeg pѳnrran chib.
Tru managatig ѳsig wanrrabig, tru karub wainug wabigwan, tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳ maya nuguen tab gѳnrrun chib, tabig kui asha tab inchib, ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru ѳsiguig srѳsriibe kan león lataig kѳben, tru wendauibe kan tѳrѳ lataig kѳben, katѳ tru wendauibe kan mѳwei malѳ lataig kѳben, tru pib gѳnrrabyuibe kan wasrѳ pala uñib lataig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru nѳ wamisra karub wainug truyugurrimbe sre bilabelѳ gѳben, wammera gѳben, palaig rrashibelѳ gѳben webambubig kѳn. Katѳ tru karub waig merrappe lámparamera nag bilabelѳ siete pilab pѳnrrabig kѳn, truilѳbe tru Tiuswei siete espíritumera gѳn.
Inchen truyu wabiibe kan jaspe sruuba, cѳrnalina sruuba lataig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru nѳ waim bѳtѳgatanbe kan kѳshѳmbѳtѳ kan esmeralda srug latazhig pasrabig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ Espíritu nѳ nan tѳga basramisren, srѳmbalasrѳmbe tru karub wamisra wamig kan pasrig pasrai nabe ashibig kur. Inchen truyube kan mugѳsrѳn wabig kѳn.
Truilai utube, Himeneѳba, Alejandrѳba treeg melan. Inchawei nabe truilane Satanás nѳ asha martrai nui tasku pѳnsrar, Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamumum gusrenrrai.

Timѳteѳ, nai nusrkai lataig, i maramigwan martrunrrig cha na ñun karua basrar. Tru ñi maig kѳnrrabig kuigwan merrabsrѳwei ñuimburab Tius maig karuben eshkailan, truilan isua basramisra, Señѳrweimburabelan elatchab gѳmѳ, may gwayanrrig,

Incha Tiusbe treeg kѳptѳwei nane lastima asig kѳn, tru kaig marѳbelai utu na mas larrѳ gaigwan Jesucristѳbe chugatikkucha nѳ nan tammay ka awentab wabig kuin gúi kenamartrab, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrab, tru wendѳsrѳ nun kѳrenrrabelѳ nan ѳyeeg marigwan asha gѳnrrai.
Inchendѳ namui Señѳrwei tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe naim bala purab nuikken arrig kѳn, tru isubigwan nuinuutѳ pasra tѳgagѳmiba, undag kѳbiiba kanbalatѳ Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabig.
Cristѳ Jesús namui Señѳrwan na mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab, muraaramѳ marѳb megamig kѳnrrai tranѳbigwan, kaguende tru nui maramelѳyu chi isumgaig marѳb meganrraptiig kui asha nan pasrigwan.

mѳguelѳ ishumburba nѳmui asrtѳga trѳmbѳig marѳbelaimba, katѳ mѳguelѳbe mѳguelѳasiyaitѳ trѳmbѳig marѳbelaimba, misagwan karuindiig melѳnrrai nila yanѳbelaimba, isa waminchipteelaimba: nabe si, isatѳ waminchimur chibendѳ, isapteelaimba, tru tabig sѳlwan gusrenanigwan chigurrimbunѳ kaitѳga itѳѳra bѳnsrѳbelaimba gѳn,
Pѳs tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe tabigwein gúi ashibwei inchibelѳ guer, tru chiyuwei maramigwan treegweyasig merrarrawa marene.
Inchawei mѳilѳgѳben truilѳma ѳyeeg kѳmigwan yandѳ pella tarѳmisra, nѳmuimburab ke ka chine wamincha mѳrѳb gúilѳyutѳ chab tarѳmisrin gѳn.

katѳ chi treeg kѳmubendѳ nѳmdѳ isua wamindiilanba, katѳ nѳmbe i misaamerainukkurri amrrubelѳ guer chib, tru munchimera kan managuen patsѳnrrabgaig arrubigwanba, tru gúindѳ mѳrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai ashib pasrѳnrraimba. Treelѳbe ka kwayab waramigweindѳ gѳn, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tru Tiusweimburabelan marѳbig marѳb ambamigwan purugunrrab gѳmѳtѳ.

nui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgaig, tru ciertѳn nai nusrkai lataig ñi Timѳteѳwan i kilgawan pѳrar. Tius Mѳskaimba, Cristѳ Jesús namui Señѳrba nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, lastima asigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ѳrtraimab isua inchar.

katѳ Tius tru kwailai utugurri ѳsiirangaruig tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri nui Nusrkai arrumigwan muniiranrrab pѳnrramisrigwanba, tru Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbig attrab pasrabigwan Jesús namun chi treeg kѳmѳnrrai marѳbigwan.

Tru Señѳrwei wam ñimuinukkurri larrѳbichib ibiibe, Macedѳnia birautѳ gѳmѳwei, Acaya birautѳ gѳmѳwei, chusrѳndѳgucha larrѳbitsin gѳn. Katѳ trutѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñim isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigwan chigucha nebua asig misrin gѳn. Treekkurri namune yandѳ mas chi tamig palѳnrrabga lataig kѳtan.

Ñimbe ñimuimburappe nam lataitѳwei, katѳ Señѳr lataitѳwei mandѳ amѳnamigwan treeg amѳñibelѳ misrin gѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri Tiuswei wamwan tranigwan truba kasraatѳ utab, chine purѳ rrѳmbѳig isuig melamig nebuingucha.
Namui nunelѳ, Tiuswei undaarailѳ, ñimune Tius lawa wesruilѳ gúin gúi aser.
Chu uraskucha nambe Tiuswan ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ guer ñim mayeelayasig. Katѳ chu uraskucha nam Tiusba wamindigube ñimuimburab tѳga isuppatѳ melabelѳ guer.
Inchen truibe Cristѳi asr kѳn, Cristѳ nѳtѳwei tru chigucha chi palѳmíig netsiig pasraig. Cristѳbe treetѳwei chi kѳbigu mumaytѳgucha nѳtѳ netsiig pasrabig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwanguen Cristѳ nѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsra, iglesiaimbe chiyutѳgucha nѳ tur gѳnrrai pasrig kѳn.
Tius tru Cristѳn kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiirangarua, tru srѳmbalasrѳ nѳ wainug nui kusrmay wamisrtrai maramburab mariitѳgatѳwei marѳb pasran.

Katѳ chigúi mѳrѳb nebua asamig ñimui isubigu tѳrgandѳ kebiliilѳ gua, tru ñim tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua muniirab melѳnrrai ñimun wamigwan, ѳyeeg kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba, tru nui misaameran keta trannrrab misrig chigucha palѳmíig purѳ nuig purѳ tabigwan ѳyeeg kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba,
chu urastѳgucha na Tiusba wamindigu tѳgatѳ isub palѳmѳ, ñimuimburab ungwa chibig kur.
Inchawei treekkurri tru ñimui isubigwan Señѳr Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, katѳ Tiuswei misaameran mayeelanba ñim truba undaguelѳ gѳn daig na wammѳrabe,

Katѳ treetѳwei ñimbe nuinug tru wam newan ciertѳnig, tru tabig srѳ wam kaigyugurri wesrabigwan ñim mѳra, nun kѳreben, tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrig Espíritu Santѳtѳga Tiusweyelѳ gúin gúi asiilѳ gѳnrrai ñimbe sellailѳ gúig kѳn.

Tiuswei
chigѳben ambumay imay srua irramamѳ tab isua pasrab

Yu pirau misagwein gabyu larrѳ gaizheelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagúilanba, katѳ kaashib indiilanba, tru chigucha gѳmѳzheelѳ gúi asiilan, Tiusbe truilan lawa wesraig kѳn, tru nѳrreelan chigucha gѳmeelѳ mara gѳrrѳmartrab,

Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, tru ñimun wamab uras ñim mailѳ gѳbelѳ gúigwan isua asamig kѳn. Misaamerain gabyu kusrebelѳbe ñimbe ke kan gandѳwein gѳben, katѳ ashib karub purrabelѳ nѳrreelѳbe mamdѳ gѳben, katѳ tab misagugurri amrrub misaamerabe mamdѳ gѳn.
Trune Tius tru wamiilayasiibe, judíѳsmerai lata, griegѳsmerai lata, Cristѳbe tru Tiuswei maramburab mariiba katѳ Tiuswei tru muguen nebua kusremgaig kusreiba, truig kѳn.
Kaguende judíѳsmerabe kan mѳg Tius nѳba pasrain gúi ashchai mariilan miaben, griegѳsmerabe tru purѳ nѳrrѳ gusreeg wamindiilan mѳrѳg kui inchibelѳ gѳn.

¿Pѳs, tru purѳ gusrebiiba, katѳ kusrennѳbiiba, katѳ mѳi i gwalѳm nѳrrѳ kusrewa treeg, rreeg kѳn chibelѳbabe chu bѳnrrah? ¿yu pirau chine purѳ nѳrrѳ kusreegwane chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ marig, Tiusbe treeg mara tѳgagѳmuitarru?

Cristѳ tru kurusyu kwaigweimburab tru eshkab kusrenaniibe yandѳ tru kaigyu kegѳrra pѳnrrabelaimbe chigucha gѳmíig, ke chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lataig kѳn. Inchen nam yandѳ kaigyugurri wesrailaimbe tru wamindiibe Tiuswei tru maramburab marig, truig kѳn.
Katѳ Estéfanaswei yauelandѳbe piu umbu ulsrѳbwei indig kѳn. Inchendѳ katѳgan mas mungucha piu umbu ulsraibe nane isumѳtan
Namui Mѳskai Tiusweimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳimba tru ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ñim tѳgagѳnrrai inchar.
Na Pablѳ, Tius nan trendѳ treeg kѳnrrain gѳben, Cristѳ Jesús nѳashib karua ѳrig kѳnrrai wamig, nai nuneg Sóstenesba misra, i kilgawan pѳrar,

katѳ naguen treeg kѳmѳwatѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan payrrab Jerusalénsrѳmay nebimѳwei indig kѳn. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Arabia birausrѳmay ya, trugurrimbe katѳle Damascѳsrѳmay arrig kѳbig kѳn.Indiibe yandѳ pѳn bila puraiben, Jerusalénsrѳ nabe Pedrѳba waminchab ya, trusrѳ nѳba parru kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kur.
katѳ naguen treeg kѳmѳwatѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan payrrab Jerusalénsrѳmay nebimѳwei indig kѳn. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Arabia birausrѳmay ya, trugurrimbe katѳle Damascѳsrѳmay arrig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchendѳ Tiusbe nane nai usrai patsѳ umbu wabenbatѳsrѳwei nane tarѳmara, nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ nane wamig kѳn. Incha nun tabig asѳnaben,

Kaguende ñimbe manawei nane wammѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun, judíѳsmera Tiusweyasig maig maramelѳyu, na trunun marѳb uñib uras na merrabsrѳ maig inchib uñibig kuigwan: kan namig kѳbiitѳ ¡gatѳ! chindinrrabna gúi inchib, Tiuswei iglesian kaig martrab wendautѳ llirab, nѳm tru treeg marѳb tѳgagúigwan kerriguwan pinishinrrab truba rruba inchib unig kѳbigwan.

Nam ñimun eshkaigwan, mѳi katѳle katѳ nabe eshkanrrab inchar: tru ñim uti lataig kѳmѳtѳ, mѳikkѳben tru tabig srѳ wamwan yunѳmara peemaytѳ eshkab kusrenanѳbiibe, managatig trѳmbѳig nebuig pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳbash cha.
Namui Tius Mѳskaimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳba nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ñimun tranrrun.
Ñimbe ñimashib ashibelѳ gѳben, katѳ Tiuskucha asha basran, nambe chishig newan tabig, sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, katѳ muguen chi tamgaig amѳnaig kѳbigwan, ñim Cristѳn kѳrebelai utu.

Inchen tru ángel pѳn gѳnrrabyuig nui trѳmpetan urrѳbene, kan truba nu estrella srѳmbalasrѳngurri nu nag tulu lataig naarab peñippe, pimera kuimѳrig nѳrrѳ bimeran gѳben, katѳ kѳlѳmѳ bi gallabzheelan gѳben, mayamba pѳngatѳyu partѳ, partѳ ka gѳrrѳmisren, kane itѳbenig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Ubishaunѳ tru siete gѳnrrabyu sellѳn kѳlsra kurene, srѳmbalasrѳmbe kan media ura wasrѳnzhig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Incha trendaimѳrig tru kѳlli misaamera veinticuatrѳelѳbe nui merrab tѳmbѳnsrѳb sralѳptѳ sralѳbelѳ gѳn kѳriibala tabig waminchab tru managatig ѳsig wabigwan. Incha nѳmui cѳrѳnameran tru nѳ karub wainug merrab trenchib petabelѳ gѳn:

Inchen tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳbe mѳitѳgucha kwaldzariimera seisbatѳ tѳgar, truilѳbe wambiimay, umbumay kabmeratѳ netseelѳ, yem gwalѳm ѳyah tamigwane pinѳmѳ, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Newan tabig, newan tabig, newan tabig Señѳr Tius Newan Maramburab Marѳbig, tru kѳbig, mѳi ya wabig, tru attrabig chib.

Inchen tru karub waig merrappe kan mar wabig kѳn, bigriu tѳrguelarrѳzhig lataig. Tru karub wainug pѳtѳgatanbe merrabmayba, wendaumayba, pinrrѳ mendamayba pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳ pѳnrrabelѳ gѳn, truilѳbe merrabmayba, wendaumayba kabmeratѳ netseelѳ.

Tru wamisra karub waim bѳtѳgatanbe wamisra karub purrailѳ katѳgan veinticuatrѳ pѳnrrai ashibig kur. Truilѳyube kѳlli misaamera veinticuatrѳ purrabelѳ gѳn, pulѳzheelѳ kewar, nѳmui turyube cѳrѳna ѳrѳtѳga mariilѳ petsargue.

Inchen na iigwan martrai karua basriibe iig kѳn: tru manrrau chishchigugurrimba, isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigaig, tabigugurrimba, katѳ isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ ka inchib gѳmѳ, ciertѳn basra tѳgagúigugurrimba undag kѳbig arrubiitѳga undaaramig.

Na Macedѳnia birausrѳmay inrrab pasramisra, tiusmanda ñune Efesѳ kѳrrѳmisrtra cha eshkaig kѳbig kuig kѳn, tru mѳilѳgѳsrѳn sѳlwan gѳmѳ, ke peemaytѳ gusrenaniilѳtѳga kusrenanѳbelan treegwan kusrenanmѳnrrai merab ashib pasrѳnrraimba,
Na Pablѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabiiba, Cristѳ Jesús, tru nam nundѳ isua munig melaig truiba karua basrig,

Inchawei trusreelѳtѳweinguen nam ñimuinug kebamben, mandѳ tab wamab utig kѳbigwan waminchibelѳ gѳn, katѳ tru ѳsig wab Tius ciertѳnigweiwan marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrab, tru taska mari tiusmeran wendѳbasra, Tiusweimay ñim mandѳ lliraigwanba,
ѳyamay ñimbe Macedѳnia birauba, Acaya birauba mayeelѳ Cristѳn kѳrebelaimbe, truilѳguen asha kusremdiig ñimbe treelѳ misrin gѳn.
katѳ tru nam nun kѳrebelainug maramburab marѳbiibe, purѳ nuig kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba, miabig kur. Inchen tru nui purѳ nuig maramburab marѳb pasrabiibe,

Nabe tru namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi Tius tru tѳrguegwalmab Mѳskawan miabig kur, ñimun Espíritu Santѳgurri ѳyeegwan trannrrai, kusrebelѳ gѳmigwanba, katѳ nebua asiimíigwan tѳrgandѳ tab chigúi nebua ashchaimba, newan nun tab nebua asamig kѳnrrai.

Truibe tru namuimburabig kѳnrrabigwan ketig utamig kѳnrrai katsiibasra tranѳbguen indig truig kѳn, tru Tius nuyasig tѳgagѳnrrab wesrailan ke tab webamba pѳnrramnegatig, nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan maya nuguen tabig wamindamig kѳnrrai.

Mayeelaim bala nѳm asha garubelaim bala gѳben, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karubelaim bala gѳben, katѳ maramburab marѳbelaim bala gѳben, katѳ maya misagwan nѳm asha garubelaim bala gѳben, nѳrrѳ gusrebelѳ gúikkurri nѳrrѳ munchimera tѳgagѳnrrai traniilaim bala gѳben, kerrigu iilaim bala nun wannig kѳn, mѳi i gwalѳmweindѳ gѳmѳtѳ, katѳ wendѳsrѳ attrabiguwein chigucha.
¿Chintermapene?
Tun, Tun, Tun,

Señѳr Jesucristѳi usri
Tiusweimburabelѳyu chigúingucha tarѳmisrmѳ, melabig melab
Tius nѳ chi martrai karua pѳnsrailan mѳra marѳb
Cristѳn ashibiibe yu pirau nun ashmѳ misaaba mandѳ pasramig
sralѳ
Señѳr Jesucristѳn kѳremeelan mѳra pѳnrrѳnrrai chu pѳnsrailѳ kѳmig
Tiuswei Espíritu Santѳ
kwanrrѳmera

Pѳs nabe trenchinrrab inchar, mѳilѳgѳsrѳn ñimbe trenchibrren gѳn dan cha: Nabe Pablѳingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Apѳlѳsweingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Nabe Cefasweingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Cristѳingatiig kur chib. Treeg inchib gѳn dan cha.
Tiusweiwan marѳbelѳ gѳmigwan keta tranig chigucha chi palѳmeelѳ gѳmnegatikke, Jesucristѳ kenamisramigwan ñim munig melappe.

Na Pablѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, mu mѳguelѳ nѳmuimburab karua ѳrig kѳmѳwei, mu katѳgan inrraincha karua basrig kѳmѳwein gur. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Jesucristѳba, katѳ Tius Mѳskai Jesucristѳn kwailai utugurri ѳsiirangarubiiba karua ѳrig kur.
Incha nambe amrrunrrab inchib melaig kѳn. Na Pablѳbe, katѳ gatѳ attrab inchib megaben, Satanásbe namun chigѳben ilѳsrka bѳnsrѳbig kѳn.

tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrai waminchab inchen, waminchamamѳnrrab namun merab. ѳyamay nѳmui kaig mariilane katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nemarѳb ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ Tiuswei namig kѳbig arruppe, nѳmuim bala purab nuig attrab gѳn.

Kaguende ñim, nai nunelѳ, tru Judea birausrѳ Tiuswei iglesiamera tru Cristѳ Jesúsweinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelѳ lataitѳwei nebuinab melaig kѳn. Ñimungucha ñimuim birau misaameratѳwei truba rruba kaig indinab melamig nebuig kѳn, tru Judea birauelan nѳm judíѳsmera kaig indinab melab lataitѳweingue.

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwane ke nѳm gusrenanѳbelѳ gѳg kui inchibelѳ gѳn, nѳm wamindigwane nѳmdѳweinguen ni chigúinguen mѳrmѳwei, katѳ iibe treeg kѳmѳnrrab gѳmѳ, treeg kѳn chib wamindiilan chigucha chigúinguen mѳrmѳwei inchendѳ.
Tru srѳsrѳ ke nammerrig Cristѳn muniirab melabelѳ gúikkurri, tru nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan namgurri maya nuguen tabig wamindig kѳnrrai.

tru treeg maram gwalѳmmera pubene, trunun treeg maramig pasrѳnrrai: tru srѳmbalasrѳ chi pѳnrrabigwan lata, katѳ pirauigwan lata kanbalatѳ mara, maig maramigwan Cristѳ kerriguwan nѳ asha martrai pѳnsrѳnrrab.
Tru ka yandѳ tab indigwan tranѳppe, Tius namun tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai tranig kѳn, tru chiwandѳgucha nam purѳ tab asha maram gusrebelѳ gѳmigwanba, katѳ tѳrgandѳ chigúi mѳrѳbelѳ gѳmigwanba.
Nuinug nambe nui aningurri nuielѳ gѳnrrai kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guer, namui kaig mariilan ulѳ bayimeelѳ, Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indig tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagúig truig maig kѳben treeg.
tru nui ka yandѳ tab indig purѳ nuig purѳ tabigwan maya nuguen tabig wamindamig kѳnrrai, tru nui truba undaaraig Nusrkaingurri namun ke ka yandѳ tab indig tranigwan.

Pѳs Tiusbe tru chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabigwan nѳ mara pѳnsrѳmѳwatѳ manasrѳwei namune Cristѳgurri tarѳmara wesraig kѳbig kѳn, tabigweindѳ tarѳmariilѳ, kaig mariitѳga chillig inchar gѳmeelѳ, nui merrab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Tius namui Mѳskaimba, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳba tru ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben katѳ chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben, ñimun tranrrun.

Incha nane kѳrig isutan na ñimun gatѳ ashchab puben, Tiusbe ñimui merrab nan kѳrig burѳѳren, truba yamelaimburѳ nan kisamig nebunrraitamab isua, tru merrabwan nѳmui kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig mariilanba, mѳguelѳba, ishumburmeraba trѳmbѳig mariilanba, mu mandiimíig chi marѳg kѳben trѳmbѳig maramitѳ srua ambiilanba isua mѳrmuin gѳben.

Nambe ñimui merrab ka tab wegѳrrag kѳptѳrre inchib pѳnrrabelѳ gúi, ¿ñimbe katѳgucha mѳi ѳyangatig kabe treeg asѳnain bѳnrrѳgueh? Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nambe waminchippe, Cristѳinug pѳnrrabelѳ gúi asamdiig Tiuswei merrab waminchib pѳnrrer. Inchen nam kerrigu mariilѳbe, ñim, nai undaarailѳ, Tiusweimburab ñim nѳrrѳrab amrrain gѳn.
¿Kabe na tru mѳilan gѳsrѳn na ñimuisrѳmay karua ѳriilѳtѳga chi isa gѳben, kabe ñimun chi wesrabraig kѳ chindah?

Pѳs trube, naimburappe ñimbe ashibelѳguen na ñimun trannrrai miamuigwan. Inchendѳ nabe ke chi maramdiig kѳtashib ashib megabig kѳndainabig kuig kѳppe, trube, ¿ke chi isa gѳben kabe ñimun chi wesrabraig kѳppeendi?

¡Au! Nabe katѳguen chab tamaraguen megar ñimun ashchab attrab, mѳimbabe chabguen pѳnmayguen gѳnrrab gѳben. Treetѳwei katѳ na ñimun mianrrab gѳmѳ arrumѳnrrun. Kaguende nabe ñim chi tѳgagúigwan isua lamѳtѳ, ñimun isur. Pѳs kaguende ureemera mѳskalayasig esegab tulisamig kѳmѳtѳ, uregweyasig esegab tulishib melamibe mѳskalainguen gѳn.

Cristѳ nan nѳashib karua ѳrig kuin gúi asamig, maig kuindѳgucha tammay nabe ñimui utu kenamarig kѳn: Tius naba pasrain gúi ashchai mariilѳ marѳb, kwaara asamdeelѳ marѳb, maramburab mariilѳ marѳb, treeg.

Inchawei nabe na truburab gѳmíig kullaguig kuigu lata, nan tsalѳ waminab pasraigu lata, nan chi palabigu lata, Cristѳgurri nan kaig martrabgѳba indinab megaigu lata, nabe truba tab gúi mѳrѳb kasraarar.
Inchen nabe iigwan Señѳrwan pѳnmay tiusmanda kerrarra cha miaben,

ѳyeeg chigѳben purѳ nѳrreelѳ nan kenamarig, truilѳ nan purab nuig kurmab isub pasramig marmѳnrrai, nane nai asru chu uragucha kan kal lataig kebuchib pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳn, Satanás ѳrig, ni mandѳguen gѳmui pasramig kѳnrrai martrabig, na purab nuig misrѳb pasramig kѳmѳnrrai.

Pѳs nabe tru mѳweimburappe si mѳg inchib waminchib pasrabwei indamѳnrrun, pѳs truibe nawein gúinaben. Inchendѳ nabe naasiitѳ mѳg inchib waminchib pasrѳmѳtѳ, na trengatig kѳmíig kullaguig kuinaigube mѳg inchib pasramѳnrrun.
tru mѳwane tru srѳbala tius wei purѳ tabzhiirѳmay srua yaiwane nabe asha kur .

Nabe gatѳgucha naasiitѳ mѳg inchib waminchib pasramig kѳtan, treeg mariibe chi purugumíig kuindѳgucha. Nabe piab lataigu na chigѳben asiilanba, Señѳr nuimburabelan nan kenamariilanba, trunun waminchab.
¿Kabe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, ñimui asrbe Espíritu Santѳ nѳ kebya basraig tab ya gúi, ñimuinug pasrabig tru ñim Tiuswan uti Espíritu? Ñimbe ñimdѳwei ñimuyasig kѳmѳn.
Inchen mѳikkѳben Señѳrba kandѳ misriibe, nѳba kan espíritutѳ gѳn.
¿Kabe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, tru treeg kaig ishuuba kandѳ misra kaig mariibe, yandѳ kan asrtѳ lataig kѳrrѳmisrig kui? Kaguende trenchibig pѳrig basran: Tru pailѳbe kan asrtѳ gѳnrrun cha.
Pѳs Tiusbe Señѳrwanma katѳle ѳsig kѳnrrai kusraig kѳppe, namungucha gatѳ treetѳwei ѳsig kѳmig kѳnrrai nui maramburab mariitѳga kusranrrun.

Chiwandѳgucha nan meriimíig, na ka maramdiig kѳbendѳ, kerrigubabe chi purugunrrabgailѳ gѳn. Chiwandѳgucha nan meriimíig, na ka maramdiig kѳbendѳ, na treeg marѳb megamig kѳnrrai na ѳyeeg maramelѳyu ni mѳyutѳgucha truig srua yaig pasrѳnrrabgucha gѳmur.
nileelѳba, larrѳ pareelѳba, mutsiirapteelѳba, isa waminchib wam gusrupteelѳba, purѳ may isa an nila wesrapteelѳba, tru Tius nѳ ashib karub waigwan truilѳbe ketig utѳmѳnrrab gúi.
Treeg inchibelѳ gúi urasbe sѳlwan marmѳ ñimguen galѳ marѳb, isa wamincha nilamba inchibelѳ gѳn, kan trutѳgucha nunelandѳwei.
Inchen kan treeg martrab isui urasbe kan nuneebe katѳgan nuneeba kwayam lawabe, juezmeran tamara guettra chib, eshkab ambubelѳ gѳn Tiuswan kѳremѳ misaameran.
Inchawei tru kwayam lailѳ yu pirau chigѳben pub arrubigwane iglesiayuelѳ gѳmeelan ¿mandѳgurri truilan asha martrai pѳnsrѳbelѳ gѳh?

¿Ñimgan ashmeelѳ gѳtirru Tiuswei misaamerabe yu pirau misagwan maig asha maramigwan nѳmguen asha martrabelѳ gúi? ¿Inchen yu pirau misaameran treegwan ñimguen asha martrabelѳ gѳbendѳbe, trube, chigѳben kwayam lailѳ yandѳzhig pub arrubigwane treetѳwei asha martrab gaimabelѳ gѳ chindah?

Kaguende Tiuswei misaamera gѳmeelѳ nѳѳreelane maig kѳnrrabigwan Tius nѳ asha martrab gúinrrun. Inchendѳ: Tru ñimui utu tru larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳbigwane ñimbe wegutsamig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube.
¿Pѳs nagan Tiuswei misaamera gѳmeelѳ nѳѳreelan kabe na asha marѳb pasramig kuitarru? ¿Tru iglesiayuelan asha maramigwane ñim maramig kѳmuitarru?

Inchendѳ nabe iigwan trenchippe, yu pirau tru Tiuswan ashmѳ misaameran truilaimburab waminchimur, tru ishumburmera lata mѳguelѳ lata trѳmbѳig marѳbelan, tru larrѳ pareelan, chi isa gѳben an nila wesrabelan, katѳ chiwangѳben kan tius kui lataig inchibelan. Pѳs treeg misaameraba kerriguwan linchimumig kuimbe, trube, ñimbe yu piraugurrimbe webambam nebubsruinrrun.

Inchawei nambe tru Pascua Fiestan marѳppe, tru kѳlli levadura lataigwan tѳga marѳb gѳmѳgun, tru kaig martrabgѳba isub, chine trѳmbѳig maramigwangѳba isub indi levaduran. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru pirri chi levadura chigaig lataitѳga fiesta margun, tru pirriyu chi lindisaimíig chi sѳrig chigaig, ciertѳngue.
Ñim nѳrreelѳ misrѳb waminchib pѳnrraibe chi tabig kѳmѳn. ¿Ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, harinayu levaduran lamѳtѳ pusriitѳ maya sѳmarigwan larrѳb pulingarubig kui?
tru larrѳ kaig marѳb mѳwane Satanás nѳ tѳgagѳnrrai pasrtrigay, nui asrwan pinisaig kѳnrrai, Señѳr arrub gwalѳm nui espíritune kaigyugurri wesraig kѳnrrai.

Pѳs nabe ñimba gѳmѳtѳ, nai asr pasraigube yabsrѳ nѳѳrѳ basraindѳgucha, nai isuigube ñimba basrѳwa, tru treeg kaig marѳb mѳwane nun maig itѳ attrabigwan treeg kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmara pasrѳbguen inchar, na ñimui utu basrѳwa lataitѳwei.

¡Trune treeg kѳmnebe ñimbe chi gѳmui lataig nѳrreelѳ misrѳb ka mѳg inchippe bѳnrran! ¿Ashene, ѳyeeg bubene, ñimbe isuig kishibguen bѳnrrѳmѳ, chindah? Tru ѳyeeg kaig marѳb mѳwane ñimui utugurrimbe wegutchai inday.
¡Tius tru nѳtѳ kandѳ wabig, tru muguen nebua kusremgaig newan kusrebigwan managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun Jesucristѳgurri! Treeg kѳnrrun.

Inchendѳ mѳimbe Tius tru maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ pѳriilѳgurri tru mu asiimíig pasrabigwane kenamaran judíѳs kѳmeelѳ chu birausrѳ misaamerandѳgucha, Tius tru manasrѳngurri managatig wabig nѳ maig maramigwan martrain basrig, treeg, nѳmui isubigwan Cristѳinug pѳnsra tѳgagúigu maig taigwan mѳra marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai.
Namui Señѳr Jesúswei ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba gѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Na, Terciѳ, Pablѳi kilga bѳrѳbikkucha ka amѳñigueh cha ѳrar, Señѳrwei munchiyu.
Inchen Tius tru chi isumgaig tab gѳbiibe kan maya yanayutѳ Satanáswane nѳbe tambalѳrtrun ñim itѳbuna bѳnrrѳnrrai. Namui Señѳr Jesúswei ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñimba gѳnrrun.

Kaguende treeg misaamerabe namui Señѳr Cristѳiwan marmeelѳ gѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ka nѳmuimburaptѳ tab gѳnrrai labelѳ gua, waminchibgucha purѳ tabzhig wamincha, mѳrѳptѳ wamdiig tabzhig wamincha, chigucha trunun nebua ashmѳ misaazheelan kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳn.
Katѳ ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay Filólѳgѳn gѳben, Julian gѳben, Nereѳwan gѳben, katѳ nui nuchawan gѳben, ѳlimpaswan gѳben, katѳ tru nѳmba warabelѳ mayeelѳ Tiuswei misaameran gѳbengue.
Asíncritѳn gѳben, Flegѳnten gѳben, Hermeswan gѳben, Patrѳbaswan gѳben, Hermaswan gѳben, katѳ nunelѳ nѳmba warabelan gѳben ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay.
Señѳrwei maramigu truba marѳb melabelѳ Trifenanba, Trifѳsanba ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay, katѳ Pérsida, truba undaaraig, tru Señѳrwei maramigu truba rruba marѳb megabigwanba.
Katѳ Cristѳi maramigu namun lincha marѳb megabig Urbanѳnba, katѳ nai undaaraig Estaquiswanba ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay.
Señѳrweimburab nai undaaraig Ampliaswan ka uñgu tan chirrunrrigay.
Katѳ ñimuyasig truba rruba marѳb megabig Maríangucha tab ka uñgu tan chirrunrrigay.

Katѳ iglesia tru nѳmui yau tulundzunabelangucha ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay. Katѳ tru Epenetѳ, nai undaaraig, Asia birausrѳ ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ Cristѳn nѳmerrig kѳrewa pasramisrѳbigwangucha ka uñgu tan chirrunrrigay.
Cristѳ Jesúswei maramigu lincha marѳb melabelѳ, Priscilanba, Aquilanba tab ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay.
Cristѳgurri tru namui nuchag Feben tabig ashib tѳgagѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar, tru Cencrea iglesiayu chi maramigu purugubigwan.

¿Chindimba? Kaguende tru isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigu lamѳtѳ, chigѳben tabig mariitѳga nebunrrab inchibelѳ gѳn. Incha tru srurrengwam srugu srurrengwaig kѳbig kѳn. Tru sruube Cristѳ nѳm kaasig, truig kѳn.

¿ѳyeeg kѳbene, trube, nambe mandѳ chinrrab gѳh? Judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera tru chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig Tiusba tab pѳnrramigwan nebunrrab chi tranrrѳmeelѳguen treeg Tiusba tabig pѳnrramigwan nebuig kѳn, tru isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri.
kaguende Señѳrbe yu pirau ѳyeeg nebuilѳgucha warѳbash cha, nѳ trencha pasrigwane petѳ kanmaytѳ newanig martrun chib.
Katѳ tru: Ñimbe nai misaamera gѳmѳn chib pasrainuutѳwei: Ñimbe: ѳsig Wab Tiuswei nusrkalѳ gѳn chib, wamiilѳ gѳnrrun daig kѳn.
Katѳ ѳseaswei pѳrigu Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai misag sѳtѳ gѳmeelan: Nai misaamera gѳn damѳnrrun cha. Undaaraimíig kѳbigwan: Undaaraig cha, wamamѳnrrun cha.
Inchen tru wamiilѳbe namgucha guer. Pѳs tru nam wamiilѳbe, judíѳsmerai utugurrindѳ wamiilѳ gѳmѳtѳ, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utugurringucha wamiilѳ guer.

Inchippa Tiusbe nui namig kѳbigwanba, katѳ nui maramburab marigwanba kenamartrab inchib weig kѳppeendi, tru manasrѳwei kaigu pѳnrrѳnrrab amrrai tamariilѳ nun yeeg namig kѳmdѳ misaameran yeeg tammay awentab.
Pѳs ñimui utu mѳibe nane trenchinrraabe: Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿katѳgucha Tiusbe namune chindimbarre kailѳ gѳn dah? cha. Kaguende ¿nѳ martrab indigwane mu gúi treeg marmѳnrrai indiasamѳrra?
Inchawei Tiusbe mun lastima ashig kѳben, truigwan lastima ashib, mѳigwei manrrѳwan gѳben murig marѳg kѳbene, murig marѳb inchibig kѳn.
Kaguen Tiusbe Mѳiséswane trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Nan mun lastima ashig kѳben, truigwan lastima ashib, nan mun tab inchig kѳben, truigwan tab indamѳnrrun cha.
Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿mandѳ chinrrab? ¿Tiusbe sѳlgandѳ tabig marmíig kѳn, chinrrab gѳ chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳmѳn.
Tru Tiuswei wamwam pѳrigu maig taimbala: Jacѳbwane nabe undaarappe, Esaúwane tsalѳ indig kѳbig kѳn daig.
Katѳ treetѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Rebeca ureg tѳgagúilѳma kan mѳskaindѳ tѳgarmera gѳbig kѳn, tru merrabsrѳ namui mѳskai Isaacwei.
Kaguende Tius tru trannrrab kѳrrѳmisriibe Abramwan ѳyeeg taig kuig kѳn: ѳyan gwalѳmmerawan na arruben, Sarabe kan nusrkai tѳgagѳnrrun cha.

Maya Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera guagucha, mayambagucha nui ureemera gѳmѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiusbe Abrahamwan trendaig kѳn: Ñuinukkurri karrab misaamerai utu Isaackurri larrѳbichib ambubelandѳ Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera cha, wamiilѳ gѳnrrun cha.

Tru merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera nѳrreelѳbe nѳmuin gѳben, katѳ Cristѳ mѳg lataig misra arriibe tru misaamerayugurri arrig kѳben, Cristѳbe, nѳ Tius chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigweim bala pasrabig, ¡managurri managatig mayanguen tab indig kѳn! Treeg kѳnrrun.
tru nai manrraube truba nu isui basrab chu uraskucha nabe pusrkwai isuin basrabig kui.
Na Cristѳinug pasrawa ciertѳn waminchar. Nabe isa waminchimur. Tru nai isub kebachib pasrabiibe Espíritu Santѳgurri isa gѳmѳ, treegwein gúi eshkatan,
larrѳ chugúi mѳrmeelѳ, chi martrab waminchendѳ ka wamdѳ waminchibelѳ, manrrѳga latailѳ, mungucha lastima ashmeelѳ, treelѳ gѳn.

Nѳmbe kalѳ marѳb amrruilѳtѳ netsailѳ, purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳbelѳ, pareelѳ, trurrigu yandѳ larrѳ gailѳ, treelѳ gѳn. Nѳmbe chigurrin gѳben pusrkwai asamig kѳben, misagwan kweecha betamelѳ gѳben, kwayam lamelѳ gѳben, isatѳ may wamincha kegѳrrѳsrkamelѳ gѳben, katѳganun kaig martrab isumelѳ gѳben, trutѳ netsailѳ gѳn.

Katѳ mѳguelѳbe treetѳwei nѳmui asrtѳga ishumburba trendѳ treeg marigwan elacha, kanikkurri kanikkurri trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbiitѳ kan chinsraatѳ inchib, mѳguelѳbe nѳm mѳguelѳasiyaitѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrikken gѳnrraptiig marѳb guebambig kѳbig kѳn. Nѳm treeg trѳmbѳig marѳb pѳnrraimburѳ nѳmui asrutѳwei nѳm mѳra melamigwan utig kѳbig kѳn.

Nѳmbe Tiuswei tru newan ciertѳnig kѳreigwane lelacha, isa wamindigwan kѳrewa, Tius tru mara pѳnsrailan kѳriibala tabig waminchib, truilayasig marѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn, tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳnrrai Tius mara pѳnsrѳbig, Tius tru managatig mayanguen tabig wamindigwan tabig wamindi urasbe. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Nѳmbe truba rruba kusrebelѳ guermab inchendѳ, chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn.

Kaguende nѳmbe Tiuswan nebua ashippe ashendѳ, Tius kui ashabe, Tiuswan lataig tabig inchib tѳgagѳmѳwei, mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chimѳwei inchibelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nѳmui isubigube chi purugunrrabgailѳ isumguengailan isuben, nѳmui chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ isub manrrѳbe lѳstѳraig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende Tiusweimburabig kui asamigwane nѳmbe tѳrgandѳ ashibelѳ gѳn, pѳs Tiusbe nѳashib trunun nѳmun kenamarig kua.

Kaguende tru tabig srѳ wamyu kenamisran tru chi kaig marmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmisra pѳnrramig Tiusweinukkurri arrubig, truibe isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ pasra pѳnrraikkurrimba, katѳ isubigwan nuinuutѳ pasra pѳnrramig kѳnrraimba. Tru Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu maig taimbala: Tiusba tru mandѳ basramigwan sѳlgandѳ treeg tabig basrabiibe nui isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúitѳgatѳ uñchun daig.
Inchawei treekkurri ñim Rѳmasrѳ warabelangucha nabe Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan truba rruba eshkab kusrenanѳg kuim basrar.
Nabe griegѳsmeran lata, griegѳs kѳmѳ misaameran lata, kusreb misaameran lata, chi kusremѳ misaameran lata ulѳ basrar Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanamig.
Kaguende nane ñimun asinrrabna gѳtan, Tiusweimburabelѳyuigwan chitѳguen ñimun pirishinrrab, ñim mas mur pѳnrramig kѳnrrai,
Nabe nai Tiuswan purugurra cha, miabig kur, Tius nan inrrain gѳben, yandѳ na chinchagѳben ñimun ashchab arrumig may gurtrai.
Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri nai Tiuswanmerrig ungwa, ungwa chinrrab inchar ñim mayeelaimburab. Kaguende ñim ñimui isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwane chutѳgucha tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru maig taigwan mѳrѳbelai utu Jesucristѳielѳ gѳnrrai wamiilѳba ñimgucha truyu tѳga bѳnrran.
tru nui Nusrkaweimburab. Tru Nusrkai nѳ misag kuigweimburappe, nѳbe Davidwei misagugurri arrubig kѳben,
Iig tru tabig srѳ wambe Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳgurri nui newan tab wam pѳriilѳyu tru merrabsrѳwei Tius trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisri wam gѳn
Inchen Pablѳbe tru an bagarawa pebi yau pa bila ѳrѳba kѳrrѳmisra, nun ashchab ambubelane mundѳgucha wamab utab wabig kѳn truyu.
Inchen Pablѳ ѳyeeg chibene, judíѳsmerabe nѳmdѳ truba rruba payiyab waminchib ambubelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs ѳyeeg kѳbene, ñimbe isua guy cha. Judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran tru kaigyugurri wesrabig Tiusweiwane wammѳrѳsrailѳ gѳben, truilѳbe mѳrtrun chibig kѳn.
I misaameran iigwan waminchab inrrѳ cha: Ñimbe mѳrѳppe, mѳrendѳ, managuen chigúi mѳrmѳnrrun chib. Ashippe ashendѳ, chigúinguen nebua ashchaamѳn chib.
Inchen kan utuelѳbe Pablѳ wamindigwan treegwein gѳbig kuin gúi isuben, trune kan utuelѳbe kѳremeelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ ñi maig isuigwan wamindi mѳrinrrabna gúin guer cha. Kaguende tru i sѳtѳ Tiusweiwan srѳig peemay kusrenanѳb marigwane chutѳgucha kaig kѳn chib, wamindi ashibelѳ guer cha.
Inchawei ѳyeeg buikkurri ñimun ashchappa, waminchappa nabe wamig kѳn cha. Nam israelitasmera muniiraigwan muniirabikkurri mѳi yu i cadenastѳga merrarraig pasrar chibig kѳn.
Inchen truilѳbe nan maig kuigwan tab ashabe, elatchab inchibelѳ gѳn cha, kwanrrai maramdiig nainug chigucha chi kalѳ marig kaaben.
Incha nam Rѳma chab pubene, Pablѳne trusrѳmbe nuin gúi nѳѳrѳ yau tsubashibig kѳn, kan suldauwan nun ashchai pasra.
Incha trusrѳmbe nunelѳ warabelѳ gúin gúi wetѳrrabelѳ guer. Inchen nѳmbe namun truyu kѳrrѳmisray chiben nambe kan trune lincha gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer. Incha ѳyeeg amba Rѳmasrѳ pubelѳ guer.
Incha barcѳs buinug Siracusasrѳ puabe, truyu pѳn gwalѳm warabelѳ guer.
Incha chigѳben truba ketiilѳtѳga namun truba rruba tab incha, nam amrrab barcѳyu nebammѳwatѳ, ambamig chi palѳnrrabigwan nѳmbe chishtѳ rranѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen trugurrimbe katѳgan gwanrreelѳgucha tru pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabigu warabelѳbe Pablѳimay amrrua, tamariilѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru warainug trugatanbe Publiѳ taigweim birѳmera gѳbig kѳn, tru pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabigu misagwan ashib karubigwei. Truibe namun truba tab wamab uta, pѳn gwalѳm ѳrѳba truba tab inchib kѳrrѳmisringarubig kѳn.
Inchen Pablѳbe ulwan nagu pabѳrrgѳbene, chigucha inchimíig kѳn.
Inchene Pablѳbe trar mul nu tulisha, nagu kebusrene, mѳimbe kan ul nag bachiiraben truyugurri webarruppe, Pablѳi tasku tsacha megambuben,

Inchen yandѳ pa bila buraiben, Félixbe webiben, Pѳrciѳ Festѳ truigwan purѳ wamisrtrab kubenadur kebibig kѳn. Incha Félixbe judíѳsmeraba ka tab gѳrrѳmisrѳg kѳptѳ Pablѳne kailan keeri yau ka wabashippa, webibig kѳn.
Inchagucha Pablѳ nun elatchai kabe kan maya an tranrrua chinrraitamabrre muniirabig kѳn Félixbe. Incha treeg isua, Félixbe nuimay Pablѳne katѳ gatѳ wamabig kѳn waminchab.
Mam gwalѳm wendau gѳsrѳn Félixbe nui srai judía Drusilaba gatѳ pua, Pablѳn pertrab ѳrabe, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwan waminchen mѳrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Félixbe tru srѳ maywan tab wammѳraig kuabe: Maya suldaumeran nѳ garubig Lisias arruben, iigwan na maig kѳtashchab gatѳwan ashchab chippa, patsѳgѳbig kѳn.
Kabe katѳ tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab na kemalla pasrab uras nan chi kalѳ marig wetѳrraig kѳbene, trube, truburappe nѳmdѳwei yu tѳrmarbash cha.
Inchawei mѳimbe, truilѳ nѳmwei amrrumig kѳn cha, yu ñui merrab nan ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib nan tsalѳ gѳb chigѳben tamig tѳgaguabe.
Nabe truba yam bila peesrѳ llirab uñabe, ketamig tulisaigwan naim birau misaameran kettrappa, katѳ Tiuswan keta trannrrappa arrubig kur cha.

Nabe Tius mandѳ taigwane treeg kѳnrraitamab isua munig megabig kur cha, tru nѳm muniirab gúigwandѳwei, tru kwabelѳ sѳlgandѳ tabelѳ lata, katѳ tru sѳlgandѳ tabelѳ gѳmeelѳ lata katѳle ѳsiirawa kurramigwan.
Inchawei i misaamerabe mѳi nan ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chibelѳbe ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib gúigwane treeg kѳn chinrrappe gaimanrrun cha.
Ñitѳweinguen asiinrrun cha, na Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchab arriibe kwalѳmmera dѳcetѳwei purayan cha.
Inchen judíѳsmera truyu pѳnrrabelѳgucha: Iibe kerriguba isa gѳmѳ, treegwein gѳn chib truba inchibelѳ gѳn.

tru ѳyeeg mara basѳmѳtirru chib srua gѳbelane ñuisrѳmay ambay chib amrrai ѳrѳppa. Trube, ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib gúigwan, ñiashib iigwan kerrigu tab ashabe, maig kuigwan tab ashchabguen chibig kѳn.

Katѳ Tiuswei yawan chigucha, Tiuswei yaambu gѳmui lataig kaig trѳmbѳig martrab indamba inchen, nambe nun kemѳrig kѳn cha. Incha nambe tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, treeg martrab inchen,
Inchendѳ ñun menrra rrѳmbѳ inchib menrra waminchimѳnrrab, kan petѳzhiitѳ tiusmanda kalu bebѳbsrumugu chinrrab inder cha, ñibe chiwandѳgucha yan dammay mara rranѳb wabig kѳbene.

Inchen yandѳ Pablѳn wamѳben, Tértulѳbe Pablѳne ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib menda, Félixwane trenchibig kѳn: Namui purѳ tab kubenadur Félix, kan nambe ñigurri ambumay imay tab warer cha, ñun mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab inchar cha. Incha ñibe purѳ tab asha marѳbig kuikkurri, nam i birau mayeelѳ warabelayasiibe, srѳitѳ, srѳitѳ yunѳmarѳb tammisrѳb arrun cha.
Kan ñi namui Félix purѳ tabig, chusrѳndѳgucha katѳ chu uratѳgucha, ñune kashmѳ mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ guer cha.
Incha nѳbe ѳyeeg taitѳga misag tru tulya basrabigwane chab tarѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende mѳi ѳyeeg puigwane namune ka kailѳ gѳptѳrre, ѳyeeg martrab gurrig kui inchaptiikken gѳn cha, kan chigurri nambe ѳyeeg inchib gurrig kѳn cha eshkab pѳnrramig chigaabendѳbe.

Inchawei Demetriѳba, katѳ tru nѳba treetѳwei marѳb pѳnrrabelѳba muba gѳben aleguiyaig tѳgaguabe, truweiwei maig kuigwan nѳm asha martrai truyu purѳѳra bѳnsramelѳ bѳnrrab, katѳ maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marѳbelѳ purrab indan cha. Mѳitѳgucha truyube kangurrin gangurri ñimun maig punrrabigwan treeg asha martra tay, chibig kѳn.
Inchawei treeg kѳmubendѳ chib kan mugucha isan damgaig kѳbene, ñimbe yandѳ wasrѳramdiig kѳn chibig kѳn, chiwandѳgucha ke kan chinchaptѳ inchib marmѳtѳ.
Inchendѳ judíѳ gúi wetѳgѳrrappe, katѳle sѳtѳbah, sѳtѳbah rrashibelѳ gѳn, kan pa ura burab trenchib: ¡Efesѳsmerai Dianabe purѳ nuig kѳn! chib.

Inchen misaamera truyu tulundzuna basrabiibe ke chindinguen asamgaig inchib gúig kѳppe, kanelѳbe peg chib rrashiben, katѳganelѳbe katѳ peg chib rrashiben, tru mayeelѳ lutau tѳbѳ pasrabiibe chinchab tulundzunin gúinguen mѳrmѳwa gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Pablѳbe truyu misagwan waminchab kebinrrab inchen, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe kebibashmeelѳ gѳn.
Inchen ѳyeeg wamindiilan mѳrabe, purѳ rrѳmbѳig nama, trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡Efesѳsmerai Dianabe purѳ nuig kѳn! chib.

Katѳ ñimbe ashib, mѳrѳb indiinrrun cha, Efesѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Asia birau kerrigu lutau Pablѳbe: Mѳguelѳ taska mariilѳbe tiusmera gѳmѳn chib, ke treeg kuitamab isumne inchib wamincha, misagwan truba nѳrrѳ tarѳmarin gѳn cha.
Tru gwalѳmmerawan tru srѳ mayweimburappe truba namig waminchib kurrabelѳ gѳn.
Incha Macedѳniamaybe nui pagatѳ purugubelan Timѳteѳwanba, Erastѳnba ѳra, nѳbe Asia birau gatѳ kan maya yana gѳsrѳn kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Incha ѳyamay Señѳrwei wambe larrѳbichib nurab, mu chindamgaig kѳrrѳmisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen tru kaig librѳn kusrewa, kwaimandzigweimburabelan marѳbelѳbe truba yamelѳ truilѳgucha treetѳwei tru nѳmui kaig librѳmeran srua amrrua, mayeelai merrab chab parrѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchen tru librѳ beni anmeran mayan gѳtashchab ashene, cincuenta mil gѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru ѳyeeg purayaigwane tru Efesѳ warab misaamera mayeelѳba wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn, judíѳsmera lata, griegѳsmera lata. Inchen mayeelѳba truba rruba kѳriimatѳben, Señѳr Jesúswei munchibe masken, masken wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen mѳ judíѳsmera gѳsrѳn kwaimandziimeran tru misaamerainukkurri webusrѳb truѳrѳ, truѳrѳ amѳñibelѳgucha tru treeg maramig Señѳr Jesúswei munchitѳga mara ashchab inchibelѳ gѳn, tru kwaimandziimeran trenchib: ¡Tru Pablѳ eshkab kusrenanig Jesúswei munchiyu, nabe webambay tamѳnrrun! chib.Inchen tru iigwan marѳbelѳbe kan judíѳ Esceva taig, tru sacerdѳtesmeran karubigwei nusrkalѳ siete gѳbig kѳn.

Inchen mѳ judíѳsmera gѳsrѳn kwaimandziimeran tru misaamerainukkurri webusrѳb truѳrѳ, truѳrѳ amѳñibelѳgucha tru treeg maramig Señѳr Jesúswei munchitѳga mara ashchab inchibelѳ gѳn, tru kwaimandziimeran trenchib: ¡Tru Pablѳ eshkab kusrenanig Jesúswei munchiyu, nabe webambay tamѳnrrun! chib.
Incha Tiusbe Pablѳi tasikkurri maramburab mariilѳ purѳ nѳrreelѳ marѳbig kѳn.
Treetѳ pa bila ѳrѳba maren, trugurri Asia birau warab misaamerabe mayeelѳba, judíѳsmera lata, griegѳsmera lata Señѳrwei wamwan mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Incha Pablѳbe pѳn bѳl ѳrѳba judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau nѳbe chigucha kѳrmѳ kusrenanѳb ѳyeeg kѳmѳn chib, ѳyamay gѳn chib waminchibig kѳn, maig kuigwan nebua asamne inchib Tius nѳ ashib karub pasraigweimburab.
Truilѳbe kerrigube mѳguelѳ dѳceburab gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe ѳyeegwan mѳrabe, Señѳr Jesúswei munchiyu piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Juanbe nѳm mas kaig marmѳnrrab isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirain gѳnmab asamig piu umbu nѳmun ulsrailѳ gúig kѳn cha, tru nui wendau attrabig Jesúswan nѳ gúitamab isua, misaamerabe nun kѳreinrrain chib.
Inchabe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ñimbe Cristѳn kѳreb uras Espíritu Santѳn utѳgueh? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Espíritu Santѳ kѳbig kuin gúi nambe wammѳrѳbguen wammѳrmeelѳ guer cha trenchibelѳ gѳn.
Apѳlѳs Cѳrintѳ tsumne, Pablѳbe tru birauwandѳwei pureb ya, Efesѳsrѳ kѳrraarrua, kan mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan wetѳrrabig kѳn.
Inchen ke mumayguen gѳmíig peemaytѳ buptinchen, mѳikkurrindѳgucha tarѳmisra, Bernabébe Marcѳswan pera barcѳyu Chipresrѳmay ibig kѳn.
trune Pablѳbe pera ambamgaig kui ashibig kѳn, kaguende tru srѳsrѳ ambenma Marcѳsbe Panfiliatѳ nѳmun tarѳmisra, nѳmba tru maramigwan martrab imuinukkurri.
Inchen Bernabébe Juanwan, katѳ nundѳwei Marcѳs taigwan, pera inrrab inchen,
Inchen Pablѳba, Bernabébabe Antiѳquíasrѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn, trusreelѳ truba yamelѳba Señѳrwei wamwan kusrennѳb, katѳ trunun wammѳrѳsrѳb.
Inchen Judasba, Silasba nѳmgucha Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳtѳwein gua, tru tabig purugub wam nu wamincha guetiitѳga trusrѳ nunelan kullaaramѳ ambub melamig kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha trunun nѳm lewabe, truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn ѳyeeg purugub wam tabig wamindigwan mѳra.

tru taska mari tiusmeran animal gweecha pѳnsrai yaumeran mamѳwei, katѳ aniwan mamѳwei, kweetsig kѳmѳtѳ ka melamisratѳ kwaig animalmerai yauwan mamѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ lata ishumbur lata larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marmѳwei indamigwan. Ñim ѳyeelan marѳb pѳnrrѳmuikkurrimbe, sѳl marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrabguen. Trube, ungwa, mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳnrrigay, chib pѳrig kѳn.
Tru Pablѳba, Bernabébabe Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchigurri ke kwamig nebuinanrraptiikken inchib melѳwar gѳn.
Incha treekkurri nam mayeelѳba kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, namui utuelan mѳ mѳguelan gѳsrѳn lawa wesrua, namui undaaraig nunelѳ Bernabéba, Pablѳba kegѳtѳ nѳmun ñimuimay ѳrtrab inder.

Incha nѳmune ѳrѳppe, kan kilga ѳyeeg chibig pѳra, trana ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn: Nam Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ, nam ñimui nunelѳ ñim judíѳs kѳmeelѳ Antiѳquíasrѳmba, Siriasrѳmba, Ciliciasrѳmba warabelѳ nunelan ka amѳñigueh chinrrab inder.

Kaguende merrab manasrѳngurri Mѳiséswei pѳriilan ciudamѳrig judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayube eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ tѳgagѳben, truilѳbe isrin gwalѳmmѳrig tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigwane lebelѳ gѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchawei nabe, ke treeg maramne inchib pѳnrramgaig kui ashar cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳmui merrabsrѳ marѳb gúilan elacha, Tiusweinug pѳnrrѳnrrab llirawa amrrubelan.
Tru Señѳr iilan marѳbig ѳyeeg tan daig, tru manasrѳngurri ѳyeeg martrab isua tѳgaguen waig kѳbigwan.
Pѳs mѳi ѳyeeg pubiibe, tru merrabsrѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ maig pѳriiba ke kandѳ gѳn cha. Tru ѳyeeg pѳrig pasraimbala:
Simónbe wamindan cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran srѳtѳgurri nѳmungucha isua basranmab ashchai, truilai utugurri nui ureg sѳtѳmera gѳnrrai mara, nui munchin nѳmuinug tѳgagѳnrrai marigwan.

Inchen truyu maya misag tulundzuna basrabiibe nilѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisra, mѳrѳb purrabelѳ gѳn, Bernabéba, Pablѳba tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utusrѳ, Tiusbe nѳmba pasrain gúi ashchai nѳmgurri mariilanba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai mariilanba waminchen.
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Señѳr Jesús tru ka yandѳ tab incha ketiitѳgatѳ nambe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guermab kѳrewa bѳnrrer cha, nѳm lataitѳwei.
Tiusbe nѳmun nѳѳrѳ mara namuingatѳtѳ inchib pasrѳmuig kѳn cha, nѳmui isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúitѳgatѳ nѳmui manrrѳmeran chishmarig kѳbig kua.

Inchen purѳ rrѳmbѳig mur aleguiyab gѳmig puben, Pedrѳbe kurra basramisra, trenchibig kѳn: Nai nunelѳ, ñimbe srѳsrѳ gwalѳmmerawangurri ashibelѳ gúinrrun cha, Tiusbe ñimui utugurri nan lawa wesruig kѳn cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera tru tabig srѳ wamwan na waminchen mѳra, kѳrenrrai.

Inchene mѳilѳgѳsrѳn merrappe fariseѳsmeraingateelѳ gѳbelѳ gua, mѳimbe Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Jesucristѳn kѳrebelane tru circuncidamigwan maringarub, katѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriilan maringarumig balan cha.

Inchen tru iglesiayuelѳ tru amrrai karua ѳriilѳbe Fenicia birѳwanba, Samaria birѳwanba puraambub ambubelѳ gѳn, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳmui trendѳ marѳb gúilan elacha, Tiuswei maywan amѳñinrrab nѳm mandѳ pѳnrramisrigwan eshkab. Treekkurri trusrѳ tru mayeelѳ nunelѳbe truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru uras mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Judeagurri Antiѳquíasrѳmay amba, nunelan treeg kusrenanin gѳbig kѳn: Mѳisés kusrennig tru circuncisiѳn maramigwan marmѳwabe, kaigyugurrimbe wesrailѳ gѳnrraamѳn chib.

Inchen tru urastѳ Señѳrwei kan ángel Herѳdeswane kwanrrѳ benѳsrkѳbig kѳn, kaguende tru maya nuguen tab gѳnrrai indigwan Tiuswein gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, nuyasig kѳnrrai inchib wabenba. Incha nѳbe pѳlѳmmera maig kwabig kѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe trashib mendappe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Iigwan waminchibiibe mѳg kѳmѳtѳ, kan tius kѳn! chib.
Inchen Herѳdesbe kan gwalѳm treeg martrab cha wesrua basra, tru gwalѳmbe Herѳdesbe tru keilѳ purѳ tabelan kewa, tru wamisra ashib karub wainug wamisra chull mѳramdiig purѳ may waminchibig kѳn.

Inchen Herѳdesbe langarua, wetѳrranrrab gaimappe, tru suldau ashib pѳnrrabelan maig purayaigwan nѳmun paya ashib srua guabe, kweetsingaruig kѳbig kѳn. Incha Herѳdesbe Judeagurri webya, Cesareasrѳmay ya, trusrѳ tsubig kѳn.

Inchen nѳbe nilѳtѳ gѳnrray siñal mara, tru kailan keeri yaugurri Señѳr mandѳ wesraigwan eshkawabe, trenchibig kѳn: Jacѳbѳnba, nunelѳ katѳganelanba iigwan wammѳrѳsrkѳnrrigay cha. Incha webyabe, peesrѳmay ibig kѳn.
Pedrѳi wam gúi mѳrѳppe, kasrag kѳbiitѳ yaskabwanguen kurmѳtѳ, katѳle umbusrѳ kelula: ¡Pedrѳ yaskabu pasrѳtan! cha, eshkabig kѳn.
Incha Pedrѳbe yagueta pua, yaskabwan pinrrѳgѳbene, kan srusrѳunѳ truyu mendig mendabig, Rѳde taibe, mu gѳtashchab arruabe,

Inchen Pedrѳbe yandѳ chigúi mѳra trenchibig kѳn: Mѳimbeguende, Señѳr nui ángelwan ѳra, Herѳdeswei taskugurrimba, katѳ maya judíѳsmera nan maig martashchab ashig kui inchib pѳnrraigugurrimba wesratan cha.
Inchen webyabe ángelwei wendautѳ ibendѳ, tru ángel ѳyeeg punrraig marigwane ka inditamaptѳ isub, nѳbe tab chigúi nebua ashmíig kѳn, pѳs ѳyeebe nune kan piaig lataitѳ gѳben.

Inchen mѳi mѳi kan Señѳrwei ángel kenamisren, tru kailan keeri yaube kan tѳrguegwalmabig kebilѳben, ángelbe Pedrѳn tѳmbulyu kѳnѳga kasrѳnanabe, trenchibig kѳn: ¡Mallatѳ kurrѳ! cha. Inchen cadenasmerabe Pedrѳi taskugurri kѳrraptinchibig kѳn.
Inchawei Pedrѳbe kailan tru keeri yaugurri webimѳnrrai truba may ashib tѳgagúig waben, iglesiabe nuyasig ¡gatѳ! elachimѳ, Tiusba waminchib miab gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Juanwei nuneg Jacѳbѳne espadatѳga kweetsingarubig kѳn.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan rey Herѳdesbe mѳilan gѳsrѳn iglesiayuelan kemѳrѳbig kѳn, kaig inchib srua gѳnrrab.
Inchawei Antiѳquíasrѳ Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe nѳmun kanun ganun maig tranamdiig kѳben an treeg purugua trana, ѳrtrab chibelѳ gѳn, nunelѳ tru Judeasrѳ warabelayasig.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ Jerusaléngurri Antiѳquíamay kѳrrѳrrubelѳ gѳn.

Incha nѳmbe trusrѳ pila ѳrѳba iglesiayuelѳba tulundzunab gua, misagwan nѳrrѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn. Tru Antiѳquíasrѳn gúig kѳn, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ pѳlbasra Cristѳielѳ cha munchi basra wamig.
Inchen Bernabé trusrѳ puabe, Tius ka yandѳ tab indin gua asha, nѳbe truba kasraarawa, Señѳrwei mayu pѳnrrappe nѳmui manrrau tab isua mur bѳnrrѳnrrai mayeelan waminchibig kѳn.
Inchen Jerusalénsrѳ iglesiayuelѳbe trunun wammѳra, nѳmbe Bernabéwane Antiѳquíasrѳngatig ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ nѳmui utuelѳ mѳilѳgѳsrѳn, chipresreelѳba, cirenesreelѳba Antiѳquía ciudayu puabe, griegѳsmerangucha waminchibelѳ gѳn, Señѳr Jesúsweimburab eshkab kusrenanѳb.

Inchen Tiuswei misaamera jerusalénsreelѳ iilan mѳrabe, yandѳ chi chimѳtѳ, Tiuswan truba tabig waminchib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Trube, Tiusbe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerangucha ѳsig kѳmigwan nebua tѳgagѳnrrai kaig marigwan isua mѳra, nuimay lliranrrai marin gѳn chib.
Inchen na pua, truyu waminchib mendѳbene, tru srѳsrѳzhiitѳ Espíritu Santѳ namuim bala kѳrraarrub lataitѳwei nѳmuim bala kѳrraarruptinchibig kѳn cha.
Truibe ñiba, ñui yauelanba kaigyugurri mandѳ incha ñimun wesrailѳ gѳm wammeran waminchun chitan, chibig kѳn.
Inchen trunetѳ pѳn mѳguelѳ Cesareasrѳngurri nan lanrrab ѳriilѳ nam purrai yau puptinchibelѳ gѳn cha.
Truibe pѳnmay treetѳ rreetѳ incha, katѳ kerriguba srѳmbalasrѳmay nebibig kѳn cha.
Katѳ kan wamgucha trendai mѳrinabig kѳn cha: Pedrѳ, kurrab kweecha, ma cha.
Inchen umbu chi tѳgaig kѳtashchab na tab ashene, animalmera pib srѳb tѳgailѳ gѳben, namiguelѳ gѳben, pirau srala ambubelѳ gѳben, pala amѳñib illimera gѳben tѳgaig asinabig kѳn cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe lutѳgurri maig purayaigwan eshkab, trenchibig kѳn:
Incha Pedrѳ Jerusalénsrѳ katѳ nebibene, tru asru circuncidawar kѳrewarbe nune ѳyeebe maig marѳb pasrѳgu chib,
Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, nunelѳ Judeasrѳ warabelѳba tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameragucha Tiuswei wamwan utin gúi wammѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pedrѳbe Jesucristѳi munchiyu nѳmun piu umbu ulsrѳngarubig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe Pedrѳn: Katѳgan mam gwalѳm gѳsrѳn tiusmanda namba kѳrrѳmisr chibelѳ gѳn.
Kaguende nѳmbe mѳriimíig peg wam wamindi mѳramba, Tiuswan tabig wamindamba indi ashibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳ ѳyeeg waminchib pasramnetѳ, Espíritu Santѳbe kѳrraarrubig kѳn, tru mayeelѳ Tiuswei wamwan wamindi mѳrѳb pѳnrrabelaim bala.
Incha Tiusbe namune misaameran eshkab kusrenanrrai karuig kѳn cha, tru ѳsiguelan lata, kwabelan lata maig kѳnrrabigwan asha martrai Tius pasriibe nѳ gѳn chib, nam waminchib eshkanrrai.
Inchendѳ Tiusbe pѳn gwalѳmyube gatѳle kusrua, nune kenamisringaruig kѳn cha.

Nabe tru Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsweimburab truigwan waminchar cha, Tiusbe nune Espíritu Santѳtѳgaba, nui maramburab mariitѳgaba itѳlushen, nѳbe tabig marѳb, nugwaimandzig mandѳguen gѳmui melѳnrrai srua gúilan tamarѳb unig kѳbig kѳn cha, Tius nѳba basraikkurri.
Tiusbe Israelweinukkurri amrrub misaameran chi isumѳ tab amѳnamig kѳnrrai marѳbig tabig srѳ wamwan Jesucristѳgurri eshkab kusrenananig kѳn cha. Nѳbe Mayeelaim Bala Nѳ Garub Nѳ Ashib Pasrabig kѳn cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe waminchib pѳlbasra, trenchibig kѳn: Mѳimbe ciertѳnwei wetѳbeñar cha, Tiusbe mѳilane ѳrѳmara gatѳganelandѳ tab inchimѳtѳ lata isubig kuin gúi.
trenchitan cha: Cѳrneliѳ, Tiusbe ñi nun wamindiilan mѳrѳb, katѳ chigѳben palai melabelan isua ashib purugub indiilan chigucha, Tiusbe pesannamѳ, isua gѳn cha.

Inchawei Jѳpe ciudasrѳmay karua ѳr chibig kѳn, Simónwan wamѳnrrab, katѳgan munchibe truigwane Pedrѳgucha taig. Truibe tru Simón kalusmeran tabzhig kullaarana tamarѳbig mar bulu ya basraigweinug ya beba tsun cha.
Inchawei treekkurri nan wamѳben latatѳ, chi chib pasrѳmѳtѳ, arrur cha. Inchawei ñimun payrrab inchar chibig kѳn. ¿Chigurri nan wama ѳrig kuin gúi?
Incha Pedrѳbe Cѳrneliѳba waminchib, waminchib kebyabe, truba nu misag tulundzuna pasrain gúi ashibig kѳn.
trune Pedrѳbe nun trenchib kusrabig kѳn: ¡Kurra, pasramisr! cha. Nagucha ñi lataitѳwei ka mѳѳtѳ gur cha.
Inchen Pedrѳ yau pubene, Cѳrneliѳbe wamѳnrrab webarrua, nui merrab tѳmbѳnsrѳb, kѳriibala tabig waminchen,
Inchen Pedrѳbe kebera, ya beba gѳrrѳmara, katѳ gwalѳmbe nѳbe truilѳba kurra iben, nunelѳ tru Jѳpesrѳ warabelѳgucha Pedrѳn lincha ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tru Cѳrneliѳ ѳri mѳguelan wamѳnrrab ashchab kѳrraarruabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tru ñim lab gúibe, na gur cha. ¿Kan chindamig lataig balai amrrugue? cha.
Inchabe: Kuaje chabe, payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kan Simón, katѳ nundѳwei Pedrѳgucha taig, yu ya beba tsuita? cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tru nѳ piab lataig asiibe chi chibig kѳnrrabgѳmab isub, nuinetѳ mumayguen gѳmui wamnetѳ, Cѳrneliѳ ѳrig mѳguelѳbe Simónwei ya chugúin gúi paya, yaskabu chabguen pubguen inchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen kan wam trendai mѳrѳbig kѳn: ¡Pedrѳ kurrab, kweecha, ma! cha.
Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, paare, kan treekkucha mana maramѳ! cha. Kan nabe managuen maimíig mamѳnrrai merigwan ma gѳmѳwei, chish mariimíigwan ma gѳmѳwein gur cha.
Inchen tru llensuyube chi animalgurrimbunѳ tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn, pib srѳppar gѳben, pirau srala amѳñibelѳ gѳben, pala amѳñib illimera gѳben gue.
Srѳmbalabe kurim basrѳben, kan nu llensu lataig pib tsѳmmerayu litsig piraumay kѳrraarri ashibig kѳn.
Inchen nune truba mag isub parѳgwaben, nuyasig mamig nenѳb gѳmne, kan piab lataig tѳgagѳbig kѳn.
Indiibe katѳ gwalѳm Cѳrneliѳ ѳriilѳ maywan ambub gua, yandѳ Jѳpesrѳ pub ambub gѳben, Pedrѳbe kwalѳm dѳbѳtag lutau gѳsrѳn wambig yabala Tiusba waminchab nebibig kѳn.
Truibe gatѳgan Simónwei yau, ya beba tsun cha, Simónbe tru kalusmeran kullaarana tabzhig tamarѳbig mar bulu ya basraig kѳn cha.
Mѳimbe Jѳpe ciudasrѳmay mѳguelѳ ѳr cha, Simón daigwan wamѳnrrab, katѳ nѳbe Pedrѳgucha munchi gѳn cha.

Truibe Tiuswan truba isua basrabig Tiuswan kѳriibala marѳb megabig kѳbig kѳn, mayeelѳ nui yauelѳba kerrigu. Katѳ misaameran chugurrin gѳmuielan isua asha purugub tabig marѳb, katѳ managucha Tiusba wamindamigwane pesannamѳ, marѳb megabig kѳbig kѳn.
Cesarea ciudayu kan mѳg Cѳrneliѳ taig tsubig kѳn, suldau Sѳtѳwan Italianѳ cha wamig sѳtѳyu, tru suldau cienelan nѳ garub pera basrabig.
Inchen ѳyeeg marigwane Jѳpe ciuda ѳrѳba wammѳra, mѳilѳgѳben Señѳrwan truba nu gѳrebelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tasigu kemѳra, kusrua, Tiuswei misaameranba, tru kelѳ peta gwailanba wama, ѳsiguig nѳmun kenamarѳbig kѳn.

Inchen Pedrѳbe truilѳba kurrab ya, trusrѳ pubene, tru kwabig tsuisrѳmay pera amben, mayeelѳ kelѳ peta gwailѳbe Pedrѳim bulu tulundzuna, tru Dѳrcas ѳsig uña, kewa amѳnamelѳ gѳben, katѳ pala itѳgueelѳ gѳben mariilan eshkab truba rruba kishibelѳ gѳn.
Indiibe tru gwalѳmmerawan Dѳrcasbe kwanrrѳ beñippa, kwaptinchen, yandѳ asrwan chab pirabe, pala katѳgan pisѳsrѳ kan salayu trarrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Eneas ¡Jesucristѳbe ñune tamaran! cha. Kurrab, ñui tsuigwan kusru cha. Inchen Eneasbe tru urastѳ kurrѳben,
Inchen trusrѳmbe kan mѳg Eneas taig kѳnѳnrrab gaimabig kua, ѳchѳ añѳs ѳrѳba camayu kwanrrѳ tsuben, Pedrѳbe pubig kѳn.

Inchen Judea birau kerrigu, katѳ Galilea birausrѳ, Samaria birausrѳ kerrigu iglesiabe ambumay imay tab gѳbigwan tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳn. Incha nѳmbe Tiusweimburabelѳyu nѳrrѳrab, Señѳrwei merrab kѳriibala amѳñib inchibelѳ gѳn. Inchen Espíritu Santѳ purugub waminchib pasraitѳgabe purѳ nѳrrѳ nemisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen Señѳrwei munchiyu chigucha kѳrmѳ, Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb, katѳ judíѳsmera griegѳsmerai wamwan waminchibelѳba waminchib, ѳyeebe maig kѳ chib payib inchen, trune nѳmbe nune kwetchabgѳba larabelѳ gѳn.
ѳyamay Saulѳbe nѳmba Jerusalénsrѳ kebib, katѳ webarrub llirab uñibig kѳn.
Incha Saulѳbe Jerusalénsrѳ puabe, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba linchab inchen, mayeelѳba kѳrig kui inchibelѳ gѳn. Kaguende nѳmbe kѳremeelѳ gѳn Saulѳbe Jesucristѳn kѳrewa unitamappe.
Inchen yandѳ yam gwalѳmyu judíѳsmera Saulѳn kwetchab wamincha gѳben,

Inchen Saulѳbe kusrenanѳb eshkaimѳrig katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen mur basramisrѳb ya, judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelane, ¡kan paare! ѳyeebe mandѳ gúinguen mѳrmѳwa gѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn, Jesúsbe tru Cristѳ muniirab gúig, tru gѳn chib kenamarѳb.
Incha Saulѳbe maben, katѳle nui asrbe tammisrѳbig kѳn. Incha Damascѳsrѳ Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba mam gwalѳm gѳsrѳn tsubig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ Saulѳi kabmerayugurrimbe kalus bitis latailѳ kѳrrѳben, katѳ ashibig misrig kѳn. Incha kurrѳben, Saulѳne piu umbu ulsraig kѳn.
Kaguende nabe nun kenamaramѳnrrun cha, nai munchigurri chugatig kaig nebuig megamigwan.
Mѳima yusrѳnguen mayeelѳ, ñui munchiwan wamab tѳga bѳnrrabelane merrarranrrab sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳ nun treeg martrai ѳrig arrin gѳn cha.
Inchene Ananías iigwan mѳrѳppe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, i mѳweimburappe, mugѳben wamindi wammѳra gur cha, ñui misaameran Jerusalénsrѳ chitѳ, chitѳ kaig marѳb uniilan.
Señѳrbe nune trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, ѳlgandѳ cha wamin callewan pureb inrrѳ cha. Incha Judaswei yau puabe: ¿Kan mѳg tarsѳsriig Saulѳ taig wah? cha, payrrig chibig kѳn, truibe Tiusba waminchib wan cha.
Inchen yandѳ Saulѳne piraugurri kusraben, kabwane kurendѳ, chigucha ashchab gaimabig kѳn. Inchen kwalyu kemѳra, srua Damascѳsrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen mѳguelѳ Saulѳba ambubelѳbe truyutѳ pѳnrrambua, ¡gatѳ! wamguen biniilѳ bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn, mungucha ashmubendѳ, wamindigwan mѳra.
Saulѳbe pirau peña tsua, kan wam trendaig mѳrѳbig kѳn: ¿Saulѳ, Saulѳ chindimbarre nane kaig marѳb lliragu? cha trenchibig.
Incha ib menda yandѳ Damascѳ pub lutausrѳ ibene, ¡gatѳ! mѳi mѳi nuingatanbe srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe kan tѳrgwalmabig arrua, nuin bѳtѳgatan pilѳben,

Trune Saulѳbe tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelane kaig maramigwanba, kweecha betamigwanbabe namig kѳbiitѳ ke chinchibmѳrѳ inchib uña, treekkurri maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳten ashchab yaig kѳn.
Incha Felipebe Azѳtѳ ciudasrѳ pasraptindinaben, trusrѳ Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan ciudamѳrig eshkab kusrenanѳb pureb ya, Cesarea ciudasrѳ pubig kѳn.
Inchen Felipebe trenchibig kѳn: Ñi ñui manrrau newan kѳrebene, treeg marig kѳnrrun cha: Inchen mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn Jesucristѳbe Tiuswei Nusrkain gúi isua basrar cha.
Incha maywan ambub gua kan pi wabnug puabe, tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Yube pi wan cha. ¿Na piu umbu ulsraig kѳbsrutah? cha.
Inchen Felipebe tru nѳ Tiuswei wam pѳrigwan leb yaigwan truyugurri pѳlbasra, Jesúswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru eunucѳbe Felipen payibig kѳn: Tiusmanda eshkarra cha, ¿Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig nѳasiitѳwein rrenda chindah, kabe mu gatѳganun rrenda chindah? cha.

Tru Tiuswei wam pѳrigwan nѳ leb arriibe iig kѳbig kѳn: Kan ubishawan latawei kwetchab srua ambig kѳn cha. Inchen isig barѳb gѳmne, kan ubishaunѳ nilѳtѳ tsub lataitѳwei, nѳgucha manchibgucha inchimuig kѳn cha.
Inchen Espíritu Santѳbe Felipene trenchibig kѳn: Wetѳga ѳ carrѳyu kemalla linchi cha.
trusrѳngurri gatѳle arrub pasrappe, kaullimera sruin carruyu Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Isaíaswei pѳrigwan leb arrub pasrabig kѳn.
Inchen Felipeimburappe kan Señѳrwei ángel Felipene trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Kurra, Jerusaléngurri Gazamay gѳrreb maywan tru pѳrr bineppurab inrrѳ cha. Truibe tru mu misag warab waraimѳ may gѳn.
Inchene Simónbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Señѳrwan nayasig ñim miarray cha. Ñi mѳi ѳyeeg chib pasrailѳbe mѳikken nan treeg nebumѳnrrain cha.
Inchawei iig ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig isuigwan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirau cha. Incha ñui manrrau ѳyeeg isuigwan Tius ñun ulѳ bayiimíig kѳnrrai treeg mara kѳrrѳmartashchab Tiuswan miau chibig kѳn.
Nangucha ѳyeeg maramburab maramigwan trannrra cha, nagucha mѳigweim bala gѳben nai tasigwan estsarene, truibe Espíritu Santѳn utѳnrrain chib.
Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ tasigwan truilaim bala estsara, Espíritu Santѳn kanelan trani ashabe, Simónbe an bagararruah chibig kѳn:
Inchen nѳmbe trusrѳ puabe, tru kѳrebelѳ Espíritu Santѳn utѳnrrai, Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ Jerusalénsrѳ warabelѳ tru samariasreelѳ Tiuswei wamwan uta bѳnrramisrin gѳn dai wammѳrabe, Juanwanba, Pedrѳnba trusrѳmay ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Tius nѳ ashib garub wainuguig tru tabig srѳ wamwanba, Jesucristѳi munchiwanba Felipebe eshkab kusrennen, trunun kѳrewabe, ishumbur lata, mѳguelѳ lata piu umbu ulsrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen nune mu amrrubiitѳgucha, kusrebelѳ lata, chi treeg kѳmeelѳ lata nѳ chi martashchab ke nundѳ ashibelѳ gua, trenchibelѳ gѳn: I mѳѳbeguende Tiuswei tru maramburab marig truig kѳn cha, tru Purѳ Nuig, kui asig.
Trugurri misaabe tru ciudayube truba rruba kasraarabelѳ kѳn.
Kaguende truba yam misaamerainukkurri trѳmbѳig maringarub kwaimandziimera purѳ rrѳmbѳig trashib webamben, katѳ truba yam kѳnѳnrrab gaima warabelѳ gѳben, cѳjѳsmera gѳben, tamariilѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru Jerusaléngurri webamba ke kan ѳrѳtѳ chab ambubelѳbe chu ambatѳgucha Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Saulѳbe iglesiayuelan purѳ rrѳmbѳig inchib, pinishinrrab inchib, yamѳrig kebya, ishumburwan lata, mѳguelan lata kemѳra, unchib warambatѳ srua webya, kailan keeri yausrѳ pѳnsrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mѳ mѳguelѳ gѳsrѳn Tiusweimburabelan maizhikken elachimѳ marѳbelѳ Estebanwan isub truba kishib sѳrabelѳ gѳn.
Incha yandѳ tѳmbѳnsra mur trashib wamab trenchibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, nѳm ѳyeeg kaig marigwan chi treeg marmuig kui lataig kѳrrѳmar! cha. Yandѳ chab rrenchabe, kwaptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen tru nѳm sruutѳga petab gѳmne, Estebanbe Tiuswan trenchib wamab miabig kѳn: Señѳr Jesús, nai espíritun utѳrra chib.
Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Asay! cha. ¡Srѳmbalamerabe kurin bѳnrrѳben, Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe Tiuswei kusrmay pasrai ashar! cha.
Trune Estebanbe Espíritu Santѳtѳ netsaig srѳmbalaneb neeshabe, Tiuswei tѳrguegwalmabigwan ashib, katѳ Jesúswane Tiuswei kusrmaygatѳ pasramisra pasrai ashib inchibig kѳn.
Inchen ѳyeeg tailan mѳrѳppe, nѳmui manrraube ke kan chinchibmѳrѳ inchib purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kuilѳ, ke trugulwandѳ tsacha mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, Estebanwan namig kѳbiitѳ.

¿Ñimui kѳlli misaamerama Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kabe kanundѳguen chi kaig marmeelѳ tabelѳ gѳbig kuitarru? cha. Tru Kerriguwan Sѳlgandiig attrabigweimburab manawei eshkab amrrubelane nѳmbe kweetsig kѳbig kѳn cha. Inchen mѳi truig arrubene, ñimbe kailѳ gѳptѳ tsaleelaingatѳ pѳnrramisra, kweetsan cha.
¿Kerrigu iilane nai tasiitѳga marig kѳmuitarru? cha trendaig.
Inchendѳ Tiuswei yawan marѳppe, Salѳmón marig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Tiuswein gabyu Davidbe tabig kui asig kua, nѳbe Jacѳbwei Tius truyu pasrѳnrrai kan ya tranѳbsrumugu cha, miaig kѳbig kѳn cha.

Merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamerabe mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ amѳñib uras, Tius nѳ pasrai carpa ya tabzhigwan tѳgar gѳbig kѳn cha, Tius tru Mѳiséswan maig karuig kѳben treekke, Mѳisés maig asigwan tru treezhigwei maringaruigwan.

Treeg inchen, Tiusbe nѳmuinukkurri tarѳmisrѳppa, chigѳben srѳmbalasrѳ chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabelan tius kui lataig kѳriibala tabig waminchib warѳnrraindѳ elachiptindig kѳn cha, Tiusbe. Inchawei Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelai pѳriilѳyu maig taigbe treeg kѳn cha: Israel misaamera ¿ñim mu misag warab waraimѳnug cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba ambub gua, animal gweetsiilan tranѳb, katѳ chigѳben nayasig kabe nan rranig kѳ chindah? taig.
Incha Aarónwane trenchibelѳ gѳn cha: Namui merrab amrrabelѳ namuyasig tiusmera mar cha. Kaguende Egiptѳ biraugurri namun wesrabig Mѳiséswane chindinguen mѳrmer cha.
Inchen namui kѳlli misaamerabe mѳrѳg kѳmui inchib, kaasha, nѳmui manrrѳwane ke Egiptѳsrѳndѳ basra gѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn cha.
Mu peg kѳmѳtѳ, iibe tru Mѳiséstѳwein gѳn cha israelitasmeran ѳyah chibig: Tius maig karuigwan kan eshkabig nan gusrub lataitѳwei, Tiusbe ñimui misag utugurrindѳwei kusrunrrun cha trenchibig.
Inchen nѳbe Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi ashchai maramburab mariilan marѳb Egiptѳsrѳngurri wesruig kѳbig kѳn cha, mar Rѳjѳyu lata, mu misag warab waraimѳnug lata cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba treeg marѳb.
Inchene Señѳrbe trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Ñui srѳbyu alpargatiswan wesru cha. Kaguende ñi pasraig pirѳbe Tiusweindѳ tarѳmarig kѳn cha.
Inchen Mѳisés trunun mѳrabe, Madian birausrѳmay trubab ya, trusrѳmbe kan peg birausriig lataig tsubig kѳn. Incha trusrѳ pagatѳ nusrkalѳ tѳgagúig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Mѳisésbe tru treeg kenamisrigwan ashabe, truba kwaara, ashchab gatѳguchi kemallene, Señѳrwei wam trenchib mѳrѳ waminchibig kѳn cha:
Indig truig yandѳ cuarenta añѳs puraiben, Sinaí Tun bulu mu misag warab waraimѳnug Mѳiséswan kan ángel kaldusr naarabigyu kenamisrig kѳn cha.
¿Kabe nangucha marig kwalѳm egipciѳn latawei ñune kweechig kѳtah? cha.
