Inchen gatѳ gwalѳmbe pailѳ israelitasmera kwayab gúin gѳben, Mѳisésbe tammay kѳrrѳmartrab isua, trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au ñimbe! ¿Mu peguelѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñimmisaatѳwein gѳn cha, kangurrin gangurri chindimbarre ѳyeeg kaig inchib gѳgue? cha.
Incha yandѳ cuarenta añѳs tѳgaig misra, Mѳisésbe nui manrraube nui misag israelitasmeran ashchab inrrab isuig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen Mѳisésbe tru Egiptѳ misaamera maig kusrebelѳ gѳben, treeg kusrenanig kusreweig kѳbig kѳn cha, trurrigu wamindiilѳyu lata nui chi mariilѳyu lata purѳ nuikke.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan Mѳisés kallabig kѳn cha, tru unѳbe Tiuswein gabyu larrѳ tab unѳzhig. Inchen mѳskalѳbe nѳmui yau pѳn bѳlgatig nurana,
tru reybe sѳratѳ purѳ mѳg isua, namui misaameratѳga mѳg inchib pasrѳwa, namui kѳlli misaamerane maig kѳbash indig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru nѳmui srѳ gallaig mѳgureezheelan kweetsingarub.
Inchen Egiptѳsrѳmbe kan rey Jѳséwan ashmíig ashib karunrrab pѳlbasra,
Inchen nѳmui asrmerane Siquemsrѳmay srua ambig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru merrabsrѳ Abraham Hamѳrwei nusrkalan sѳramig anwei penig basrabigu, Siquem birausrѳ sѳrѳnrrab.
Pѳs ѳyamay Jacѳbpe Egiptѳmay yaig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru nѳ lata namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera lata chab gwaisrѳmay.
Incha gatѳ wendѳ ambene, Jѳsébe nui nunelane nѳbe tru nѳmui nuneg kuin gúi asingaruben, ѳyamay tru Egiptѳ rey Faraonbe Jѳséwei misagwane mumera gúi nebua asig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru urassrѳ parѳ arrubig kѳn, purѳ rrѳmbѳig isuig melamig Egiptѳ birau ѳrѳba, katѳ Canaan birausrѳn chigucha. Inchen namui kѳlli misaamerabe chigucha mamig kalawa gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Tru Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳ namui merrabsreelѳbe nѳmui nuneg Jѳséwan pusrkwai ashib tsalѳ gѳptѳ, Egiptѳ birausrѳmay srua amrrai yanѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe Jѳséba basrѳwa,

Inchendѳ Tiusbe: Tru nѳmun karua srua gúindiig melѳnrrai marѳb misaameran nѳmune maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maramѳnrrun cha. Inchen trugurrimbe yandѳ tru birausrѳngurri webamba, nѳmbe i birautѳwei nane kѳriibala tabig waminchib gѳnrrun cha.

Inchendѳ nune i pirѳwan nui srѳb rrarramikken, nuyasiibe keta tranmuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ nune i pirѳwane tranrrumѳn cha gѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn cha, katѳ nuinukkurri karrab misaameraimba. Tru urasbe Abrahambe nusrkainguen chigaig kѳbenbatѳsrѳwein gѳbig kѳn.
Inchabe trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Ñui pirѳwan elachib, ñui yauelan elachib, na eshkam birѳsrѳmay inrrѳ cha.

Inchen nѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Nai misaamera, nai kѳlli misaamera, nan mѳrtray cha: Tius tѳrguegwalmabiibe namui kѳlli misag Abrahamwan Harán birausrѳ tsunrrab imѳwatѳ, Mesѳpѳtamia birau kenamisrig kѳn cha.
Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrigwei maramigwan uta basramisra martrabiibe mu gúin gúi. Kaguende Judasbe nui yamsrѳmay inrrab, tru maramigugurrimbe tarѳmisra pella, peg maywan yaig kѳn cha.
Inchabe ѳyeeg chib Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, ñibe mayeelai manrrѳmeran ashibiibe, i pailan ñi mѳnun lawa wesrua tѳga basraigwan eshkarra chib,

tru Juan Jesúswan piu umbu nun ulsraikkurrimbunѳ, katѳ nun namuinukkurri kusraben, nun srѳmbalasrѳ utig kѳmnegatig namba managucha tin lincha amѳñibelѳ yu mѳguelѳ kѳn cha. Incha kan treeg lincha uñibigwan, tru Jesús kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiraigwan treeg kѳn chib waminchib, namba tѳgatѳ pasrѳnrrai maramibe ke sѳldѳwein gѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchen Jerusalén mayeelѳ warabelѳ wammѳrabe, tru pirѳwane, Acéldama cha wamabelѳ gѳn, nѳmuin rrikkabe, Ani Lusin Dul chibig.)
Indiibe tru nѳ kaig marimburѳ an utiitѳga kan tul penig kѳn cha. Inchabe ippa, turmay peñippe, patsѳwan srurram beñen, pѳitsimerabe kerrigu webѳlabig kѳn cha.
Pѳs Judasbe namui utuitѳwei, katѳ namui maramelѳyu maramig tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan Jesucristѳ kusrenanigwan marѳbelѳ kan cientѳ veinte gѳsrѳn tulundzuna gѳben, Pedrѳbe truilai utu pasramisra trenchibig kѳn:

Jerusalén ciudayu puabe, tru nѳm pui yau, pala pisusrѳ nebambubelѳ gѳn, truyube Pedrѳ gѳben, Juan gѳben, Jacѳbѳ gѳben, Andrés kѳben, Felipe gѳben, Tѳmás kѳben, Bartѳlѳmé gѳben, Mateѳ gѳben, Alfeѳwei nusrkai Jacѳbѳ gѳben, Simón Zelѳte gѳben, Jacѳbѳi nusrkai Judas kѳben, tru iilѳ ya beba warainug.

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Galileasrѳ mѳguelѳ, chindimba srѳmbalaneb neeshib kѳrrѳmisrke? cha. I Jesústѳwei ñimui utugurri srѳmbalasrѳmay srua yainabiibe, ñim maig yai asig katѳ nѳbe treetѳweih attrun chibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Jesús iben, nѳm srѳmbalaneb neeshib pѳnrramnetѳ, mѳimbe pagatѳ mѳguelѳ pulѳzheelѳ kewar nѳmuim bulu kenamisrabe,
Incha yandѳ iigwan chab waminchene, nѳm ashib pѳnrramne, Jesúswane pala kusruben, kan wañi arrua, nun pinѳbulen, yandѳ mas ashchab gaimabelѳ gѳn.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Treeg maramibe mana bunrrabigwanba, Mѳskai nѳashib nui maram burab mariitѳgatѳwei chi gwalѳm treeg punrrai mara kѳrrѳmaramigwanbabe, ñimbe wammѳra gѳmig chi palѳmѳn cha.
tru ñim nan ѳyah taig mѳrig kѳbigwan. Pѳs Juanbe isa gѳmѳtѳ, pitѳga pinѳbuliilѳ gѳnrrai ulsrain gѳn cha. Trune ñimbe mam gwalѳmyutѳ Espíritu Santѳtѳga pinѳbuliilѳ gѳnrrun chibig kѳn.

Incha nѳbe kwaig tsua, ѳsiirawa, nѳmune ѳsiguig kenamisrѳbig kѳn, nѳ gúin gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai chine marѳb. Incha nѳbe kwalѳmmera cuarenta nemisramne nѳmun kenamisrѳb uña, Tius nѳ karub waigweimburabigwan waminchibig kѳn.
Inchen kwalѳmmѳrig ke lѳtsѳzhig maya misaamerabe Tiuswei yau nun mѳrtrab pubelѳ gѳn.
Incha Jesúsbe kwalѳmmerawane Tiuswei yau kusrenana, yembe ѳlivѳs taig tunsrѳ kѳrrѳmisrtrab ibig kѳn.
Kaguen tru gwalѳmbe yu pirau muba kuimburab mayeelaim bala treeg attrun chibig kѳn.
Judea birau warabelѳbe tunmerasrѳmay wegѳrra lulay. Inchen ciudayu warabelѳbe truyugurri webambamig kѳn. Inchen ciudayugurri yabsrѳ warabelѳbe ciudayumay katѳ ammѳtay.
ѳyeetѳwei ñim iilan purayai ashabe, Tius nѳ ashib karub pasraibe yandѳ lutau gúitamab isua guy cha.
ishiimera weguchib mendѳbene, ñimbe pachig kwalѳmmera arrumig lutau gúi asan cha.
Ñim chi arringucha melabig melѳwabe, ñimasiitѳwei ñimui mѳsiimerane ѳsiguig wesranrrabguen cha trenchibig kѳn.
Inchendѳ ñimui turyu kan busruuzhikken chi indiimíig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Jerusalén ciudawan bѳtѳburab suldautѳ tulsruig kui ashabe, petѳ pinisaig kѳnrraitamab isua,
Incha gatѳ ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn cha, kemesra trenchibig kѳn: Higueranma asay cha, katѳ mayan tusrmeranba,
Katѳ misaamerabe yu pirau maig purainrrabelan isubiibah kѳrig kѳbiibatѳ pesannanrrun, kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ purѳ nѳrreelѳ pѳnrrabelan kѳnѳgѳb sruagutsiilѳ gѳben.
Maya misaabe ñimune nagurrindѳ tsalѳ indiilѳ gѳnrrabguen cha.
Inchen ñimui mѳskalѳ gѳben, nunelѳ gѳben, ñimui ñimmisaamera gѳben, ñimui trendѳ linchibelѳ gѳben, ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelan tranen, ñimun mѳilane kwetchun cha.

Kaguen ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ mayeelѳ, nѳm manchaguen lѳtѳnrrain gѳmѳwei, nѳm ñimun purab waminchib kasrѳnrrain gѳmѳwei, nabe ñimun muguen ѳyeeg waminchimuinrrunig wamindamig tranamѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Ñimui manrrѳyube ѳyeegwan isua bѳnrrѳnrrigay chibig kѳn, mandѳ lѳtamigwan ke kanmaytѳ isua tѳga bѳnrrѳnrrab inchimѳnrrab.
naimburab ñim wamindamig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.

Inchendѳ ѳyeelѳ arrumѳwatѳ, ñimune kemѳrѳb, larrѳ gaig marѳb inchun cha. Katѳ ñimune judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayumay payib sruagѳnrrab srua ambamba, kailan keeri yau keera pѳnsramba inchun cha. Incha nagurrindѳ reymerai merrab gѳben, karubelai merrab gѳben srua amben,
Kaguende trѳmbѳig mѳra melѳnrrai maram gwalѳmmera kѳnrrun, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu maig taig kerrigu treeg nebunrrai.
Inchabe gatѳ trenchibig kѳn: Peg misaamerabe katѳgan peg misaameraba kwayaben, katѳ rey karumburab ashib karuim birauelѳbe katѳgan reywei misaameraba kwayanrrun cha.

Trune pirѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳnabelѳ arrumba, chu birausrѳn gѳben parѳ amrrumba, kaig kwanrrѳmera amrrumba inchen, kѳrig kѳmdiig chigѳben arrumba, katѳ srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe chigѳben truba nѳrreelѳ kenamisrѳb inchun cha.
Incha Pilatѳbe kurusyu kan pѳrig mesrѳnrrai karubig kѳn: scJESUS NAZARETSRIIG, JUDIѳSMERAI TRU REY GѳNd chibig.
Incha truyu kurusyu mesrѳbelѳ gѳn, katѳ pailan pinrrѳmenda kan gan, Jesúswane tru tѳbѳtakke.
Inchen yandѳ Pilatѳbe Jesúswan kurusyu mesrѳnrrai nѳmun tranѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe Jesúswan kemѳra, srua amben,
Pascua Fiesta maramig kan gwalѳmdѳ balѳben, kwalѳm dѳbѳtag kѳsrѳn gѳbig kѳn. Inchen Pilatѳbe judíѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au, ñimui rey yu pasran! cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Nan ѳyeeg punrrai ñi marѳb wamigwane chigaig kѳbsruinrrun cha, ñun srѳmbalasrѳngurri treeg marѳb wanrrai tranmuig kuimbe. Inchawei tru nan ñui tasku tranѳbiibe purab gaikken mara basran cha.Trugurrimbe Pilatѳbe Jesúswan mandѳ incha elatsamdiig kѳtashchab labig kѳn. Trune judíѳsmerabe trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: Ñi nun elachabe, Rѳma maya misagwan karub wabig Césarweingatiig kѳmѳn kѳn chib. Kaguende mѳikkѳben: Rey gur chib pasrabiibe Rѳma maya misagwan karub wabig Césarweingatiig kѳmѳn chib.
Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Nanguen lѳtѳmѳnrrapteh? cha. Nabe ñun elatsamdiig kѳbene, elachib, kurusyu mesramdiig kѳbene, mesrѳb indamig mu mandamgaig maramigwane na asha marѳbig kui ¿ashmѳtirru? cha.
Inchen Pilatѳbe tru trendaigwan mѳrabe, mas kѳrig kui inchibig kѳn.

Inchen tru sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, tru pѳlicíameraba Jesúswan ashippe, trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡Kurusyu mesrѳ! ¡Kurusyu mesrѳ! chib. Inchen Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Treeg kѳbene, trube, ñimdѳwei srua amba, kurusyu mesray cha. Pѳs, nabe naimburappe, nuinuube chigucha chi kalѳ mariibe wetѳrramur cha.
Inchene Pilatѳbe katѳyug webya, misaamerane trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au! Nun wambiisrѳ pera arrumѳnrrun cha, nuinuube chigucha chi kalѳ marig nabe wetѳrramuin gúi ñim ashchai.
Inchabe nuim bulu kemallabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Judíѳsmerai rey, viva! chib. Incha malѳbѳtѳ pashagutsamba inchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Pilatѳbe Jesúswan merrarrawa, itsingarubig kѳn.
Jesúsbe truilѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, katѳgan Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳmig mariilѳ truba kenamarѳbig kѳn nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilai merrab. Truilѳbe i kilgamerayube pѳrig kaagѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Tѳmás ¿mѳi ke nan ashagan kѳretirru? cha. Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, ashmѳwagucha, kѳrebelѳbe.

Inchabe Tѳmáswane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Ñui tasigunan yu kegwanѳb, nai tasiimeran ash cha. Incha ñui kwalwan larrѳbicha, yu nai tѳmbulyu tasigwan kegwan cha. Ke truig kѳmuitamaptѳ isub uñmѳtѳ, ñiguen kѳrebig ku cha.

Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kanelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nambe Señѳrwan aser cha. Inchene Tѳmásbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe nui tasku kѳlabus larrѳѳriilan ashmѳwei, katѳ tru kѳlabus larrѳѳriilѳyu tasigunan kegwanmѳwei, katѳ tru nui tѳmbulyu nai tasigwan kegwanmѳwei inchimuppe, nabe kѳremumѳnrrun cha.

Ñim mѳilan gѳben nѳmui kaig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ kagѳbashene, truilai kaig mariilѳbe ulѳ bayamig kѳmíig kѳrrѳmisran cha. Inchen ñim truilai kaig mariilan pesannamѳ ulѳ bayene, nѳmune pesannamѳ ulѳ bayamig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Incha iigwan chab rrenchabe, Jesúsbe nѳmuim bala urra, trenchibig kѳn: Espíritu Santѳn utay cha.
Incha chab rrenchabe tasiimeranba, nui tѳmbulwanba kenamarene, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe Señѳrwan ashippe, truba rruba kasraarabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen María Magdalenabe yabe, tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilan: ¡Nabe Señѳrwan ashar! chibig kѳn. Incha Señѳr nun maig tailangucha nѳmun eshkabig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¡María! cha. Inchene nѳbe keesha ashabe, hebreѳmay: ¡Rabuni! chibig kѳn, (trenchippe, Kusrennѳbig chib.
Iigwan chab rrencha, nѳ keesha ashene, truyu Jesúsbe pasraptinchibig kѳn. Inchendѳ, nѳbe Jesús kuitamappe isumíig kѳn.

pagatѳ ángelesmera puliig kѳrrabig kewar, tru Jesúswei asrwan wayig kѳbigube kane turgabѳryu, kane katsigu purrai ashiptinchibig kѳn.Inchen ángelesmerabe payibelѳ gѳn: Ishug, ¿chindimba guishku? cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Pѳs nai Señѳrwan srua ambin gѳn cha. Incha chu wayig mѳrmur cha.
Incha tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe nѳmui yamay katѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs katѳgucha nѳmbe tru Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu Jesúsbe kwabelai utugurri katѳle ѳsiiramig palѳnrrab gѳn daigwane chigúi mѳrmuin gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera unig tru sѳrinug nѳmerrig merrab pubikkucha, yandѳ umbѳsrѳngatig kebya, ashabe, kѳrebig kѳn.
Inchagucha tru Jesúswei turwan pinѳbulig llensugucha, tru kirri llensumeraba trubalatѳ gѳmѳ, nѳѳrѳ kurisaig trarrig tsubig kѳn.
Inchen nui wendautѳ Simón Pedrѳbe pua, sѳrin rrabyu kebyabe, tru llensumerane truyu warai ashibig kѳn.
Pailѳba kegѳtѳ lulѳb ambendѳ, kane Pedrѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, katѳguchinguen mur lula, tru sѳriisrѳ nѳmerrig lulѳb pubig kѳn.
Inchene Pedrѳba, tru katѳgan kusrenanѳb pera uniibabe webamba, sѳriisrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha tru srѳ rrune pѳlbasrѳb gwalѳm María Magdalenabe lѳtsѳzhig sѳriisrѳmay ullarbatѳ ibene, tru sѳrin rrabyu nu srug kasraibe kusruim basraptindi ashibig kѳn.
Katѳ chigѳben Jesúsbe truba rruba marig kѳbig kѳn. Lutѳgurrih trumѳrig pѳrimbe, tru pѳrig kilgamerabe yu pirau ѳrѳbaguen kemubsruitamab isur.
Tru kusrenanѳb pera unig trendainabig nѳtѳwei iilane maig kuigwan eshkab wamincha, katѳ nѳtѳwei pѳrѳb indig kѳn. Incha maig kuigwan nѳ eshkab wamindiibe isatѳ gѳmѳ, ciertѳn gúi asha bѳnrrer.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¿Na arrumnegatig nune ka uñchai indingucha, ñuimburappe treegwane chi asamig kaagѳn cha? Ñibe nai mendig amѳ chibig kѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe truigwan ashabe, Jesúswan payibig kѳn: Señѳr ¿inchen ѳigwane ñibe mandѳ inchainchigu? cha.
ѳyan chippe, Pedrѳ nѳ mandѳ kwamig nebuben, treeg kwaitѳga Tiuswan maya nuguen tabig indig kѳnrrai martrab gѳn cha, trendaig kѳn Jesúsbe. Inchabe Pedrѳne trenchibig kѳn: Nai mendig amѳ cha.

Pѳnmay gѳnrrabyu katѳle payibig kѳn: Simón, Juanwei nusrkai, ¿nan undaguig kuguh? cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe kullaarab isui inchibig kѳn, kaguende chabguen pѳnmayguen: ¿Nan undaguig kuguh? chib payen. Inchen nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, ñibe chiwandѳgucha kerrigu ashibig kѳn cha. Nabe ñun undaguig kui ñibe ashibig kѳn cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai ubishameran mannѳb ashib tѳgagѳrrunrrig cha.

Yandѳ chab mabe, Jesúsbe Simón Pedrѳn payibig kѳn: Simón, Juanwei nusrkai, ¿iilѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, nan mas undaguig kuguh? cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ѳѳ, Señѳr, nabe ñun undaguig kui ñibe ashibig kѳn cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai ubishaureemeran mannѳb ashib tѳgagѳrrunrrig cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe kemalla, pirriwan nui tasku srua basramisrabe, nѳmun srѳrrѳbig kѳn, katѳ peskauwan chigucha.
Inchen Simón Pedrѳbe barcѳyu nebya, atarrayan nѳrrѳ peskaumeratѳ cientѳ cincuenta y tres netsiig tѳgaigwan pi mendagatig keetab srua ibig kѳn. Inchen maya nu gúingucha, atarrayabe kѳlsrѳmíig kѳn.

Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kanelѳbe barcѳn srua bubelѳ gѳn, atarrayan peskautѳ netsiig keetab sruar. Kaguende nѳmbe pi mendagurri cien metrѳs kѳsrѳndѳ waraig kѳbig kѳn.Incha nѳmbe pirau pinaambabe, kan trѳsr nag pasrai ashibelѳ gѳn, tru balabe peskauba, pirrimba warig.

Inchene tru kusrenanѳb pera unig Jesúswei undaaraibe Pedrѳne trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au, Señѳr gѳn! cha. Inchene Pedrѳbe: Señѳr gѳn daig mѳrѳppe, nui pala itѳgueigwan wesrawa tsuig kѳppe, truigwan kewa, pѳrѳnab, piyu pѳrsraptinchibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Au, nai ureezheelѳ, ¿chigucha chi peskau kemѳrtrab gaimatirru? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Kah chibelѳ gѳn.

Incha Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe peskanrrab inrrainchar cha. Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Namgucha ñiba amrrunrrab cha. Incha ambabe, kan barcѳyu nebamba, tru yembe chigucha wesrunrrab gaimabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen treeg chab puraiben, Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan katѳle kenamisrѳbig kѳn Tiberias nu bisu menda. Nѳbe ѳyamay kenamisrig kѳn:

Incha kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Tiuswei yau sѳteelѳba tulundzunabelѳ gѳn. Incha mamigwan nѳmui yamѳrig truba rruba kasrag, kanbalatѳ lata pirisha mabelѳ gѳn, tabig isua, ka treeg maranmab ashchaindѳ gѳmѳ,
Incha nѳmui pirѳmeran, yameran, katѳ chi tѳgagúilan gѳben yana, sѳteelan pirishibelѳ gѳn, mѳitѳgucha maig palain gѳben, treetѳ.
Inchen nѳmune mѳnundѳgucha ka nѳs nѳstѳ gѳbig kѳn, tru Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳgurri kwaara asha gѳnrrai marѳb, katѳ Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi asha gѳnrrai truba rruba marѳb inchen.
Inchen tru nѳ wamindigwan mѳra utabelane piu umbu ulsrailѳ kѳrrѳmisren, tru gwalѳmbe Jesucristѳn kѳrewa pѳnrramisrѳbelѳbe kan pѳn mil gѳsrѳn nemisrig kѳbig kѳn.

Kaguende i tranamigwan nѳ trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriibe, ñimuyasig kѳb, ñimui ureemerayasig kѳb, katѳ mayeelѳ chu uras tsѳndatѳsrѳ kѳnrrabelayasig kѳb, katѳ mayeelѳ namui Tius nun mun wamag kѳben wamamelai, truilayasig kѳb gѳn chibig kѳn.

Incha ѳyeeg tailan mѳrѳppe, truba kullaarab isui inchibelѳ gѳn nѳmui manrrau kebachen. Inchabe Pedrѳnba, trugurri Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig katѳganelanba payibelѳ gѳn: Ñim nai misaamera, ¿nambe chi maramig kѳnrrerah? cha.

Kaguende Davidbe srѳmbalasrѳmaybe nebimuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ Davidbe trendaig kѳn cha: Señѳr Tiusbe nai Señѳrwane trendan cha: Nai kusrmaygatѳ wamisr cha, ñun ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ inchibelan ñi ñui srѳbmeran truilaim bala nebuna wamig kѳnrrai na pѳnsramnegatig.

Incha nune Tiusweim bulu kusrmay wanrrab attrai kusraben, Mѳskai trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrig tru Espíritu Santѳn uta, uncha tѳgagѳnrrai trunun tranan chibig kѳn. Inchen ñim mѳi ashib, mѳrѳb inchib gúibe, tru gѳn cha.

Davidbe manawei Cristѳ ѳsiiramigwane chab asha gua, tru Cristѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramigwan trencha wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha kwabelѳ pѳnrrainug truyutѳ pasrѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳmѳwei, katѳ nui asrbe treraig kѳmѳwein gѳnrrai indig kѳnrrun cha.
Nai misaamera, nabe maig kuigwan tѳrgandѳ kelarrab ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misag Davidbe kwaben, sѳrig kѳn cha. Inchen tru nui sѳriibe mѳin gwalѳmgatig namui utu pasran cha.
Ñibe nan ѳsig kѳm maymeran nebua asingarua, ñi naba waikkurri nane truba rruba kasraarangarunrrautan daig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.
Treekkurri nai manrrѳbe truba kasraaraben, nai nilѳbe truba rruba tabig waminchib kasraaran cha. Inchen nai asrken, chi isumѳ muniiramigwan muniirab isrѳnrrun cha.

Inchen nune kwailai utugurri Tiusbe kusraig kѳn cha, ѳyeeg purѳ rrѳmbѳig indinawa kwaig tsuigugurri. Kaguende tru kwab gwanrrai marѳb pasrabiibe nune chinchagucha nѳ merrarrawa tѳgagѳnrrab gaimaig kѳn cha.

Ñim Israel misaamera, na wamindigwan mѳray chibig kѳn: Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsbe Tius nѳ garua ѳri mѳg kui ashchai, nѳ treeg trani mѳg kѳbig kѳn cha, nѳgurri ñimui merrab maramburab mariitѳgaba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai mariitѳgaba, Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳmig mariilѳtѳgaba. Pѳs ñimdѳweinguen ashibelѳ gѳn cha.
Nѳsiibe larrѳ lѳstiig misren, pѳlbe ani lataig misrtrun cha. Señѳr arrum gwalѳm truba nuig purѳ tab gwalѳm pumѳwatѳ, treeg kѳnrrun cha.
Tru gwalѳmmerawane katѳ ishumbur lata, mѳguelѳ lata, nai karuindiig melabelaim bala nai Espíritun uncha tѳgagѳnrrai tranen, nѳmbe na nѳmun chi eshkaigwan eshkanrrun cha.
treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jѳelgurri Tius tru ѳyeeg taig kѳbig, iibe tru gѳn cha:
Ya lѳtsѳ las nuevetѳ gѳben, i mѳguelan ñimbe mutsiguelѳ gѳnmab isuinrrun cha,
Trune kanelѳbe indzatѳ ashib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Mutsiguelѳrre inchib waran cha.
katѳ cretasreelѳ gѳben, arabiasreelѳ gѳben, treeg yam balѳsreelѳ gѳbendѳ, nambe mayeelѳba Tius truba nѳrreelѳ mariilan namuin rriimay, namuin rriimay wamindi mѳrer chibelѳ gѳn.
Yube Partѳ birausreelѳ gѳben, medѳsmera gѳben, elamsreelѳ gѳben, mesѳpѳtamiasreelѳ gѳben, judeasreelѳ gѳben, capadѳciasreelѳ gѳben, pѳntѳsreelѳ gѳben, Asia birausreelѳ gѳben,
Inchen nѳmbe truba kѳrrѳ kwaariilѳ, kangurrin gangurri ¡paare! kan mandѳ guermab isub, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿I mayamba waminchib pѳnrrabelѳbe Galileasrѳ misaamera gѳmuitarru? chib.
Inchen Jerusalénsrѳmbe judíѳs misaamera warabelѳ gѳn, Tiusweimburabelan maizhikken elachimѳ marѳbelѳ, chu birausrѳngurringuen palѳmíikke.
Inchene nѳmbe mayeelѳba Espíritu Santѳtѳ netsailѳ gѳrrѳmisra, peg, peg wammera waminchib mendabelѳ gѳn, Espíritu nѳmun maig wamindingaruben.
mѳimbe ¡gatѳ! srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe wanrrabig kan truba mur isig ichibig lataig arrubig kѳn, tru purrainuube ¡gatѳ! ya ѳrѳ tru wanrrabiitѳ kasramgue.

Inchawei Tius nui Marѳb Megabigwan kusrua, trugurri Tiusbe ñimuimaymerrig ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, ñim mѳitѳgucha tru kaigwan marmѳnrrab llirawa bѳnrramisren, mayanguen tab indiilѳ gѳnrrain chibig kѳn, Pedrѳbe.
Inchawei Samuel tsub uraskurrimbunѳ mayeelѳba Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ truilѳ chigucha mѳin gwalѳmmera ѳyeeg punrrabigwan wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Kaguende mѳikkѳben Tius maig karuigwan tru eshkabigwan mѳrmíigwane, Israel misaamerainukkurri kanguen gaagѳm, binisaig kѳnrrun daig kѳn cha.

Inchendѳ nѳbe mѳimbatѳbe srѳmbalasrѳ ka wamig kѳn cha, Tius tru chiwandѳgucha lutѳgurri tamara pѳnsramnegatig, tru Tius nuindѳ tarѳmariilѳ nѳ maig karuigwan eshkabelѳgurri nѳ manasrѳwei maig taig, treeg.

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, nimui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliray chibig kѳn, ñimui tru kaig mariilan chi kaig mariimíig lataig kѳrrѳmisrtraimbe. Trumaybe Señѳrbe chi isumѳ, tabig pishindѳ waram gwalѳmmera ѳrѳb,
Pѳs, trube, mѳimbe ñim nai misaamera, ñimbe chugúi mѳrmѳwa, ѳyeeg marѳb pѳnrrain gúin gúi ashar chibig kѳn, katѳ ñimun ashib karub purrabelѳ chigucha.
Incha tru ѳsig kѳmigwan nѳ tѳga basrabigwane ñimbe kweechen, truigwan Tiusbe kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiirangaruben, nambe tru treeg purayaigwane namashib ashibelѳ guer chibig kѳn.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Abrahamwei, Isaacwei, Jacѳbwei Tius namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerai Tiusbe tru nui marѳb megabig Jesúswane tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrai maran cha. Truigwane tru misagwan ashib karub purrabelan ñimbe kemѳra, tranѳb, katѳ Pilatѳbe nune elatchab inchen, ñimbe elachibashmub indig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru uñchab gaimabig kѳbiibe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba kemѳra basramnebe, misaabe mayamba kwariilѳ lulѳbelѳ gѳn Pedrѳmeraimay, tru Tiuswei yau Salѳmónwei Yaskabumay.
Inchen maya misaamerabe nune uñibig misrin gúi ashib, katѳ Tiuswan Tabiibe ñitѳ gѳn chib, truba tabig wamindi ashib inchibelѳ gѳn.

Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Angawei, ѳrѳgawein gur cha. Inchendѳ na tѳgagúigwaneguende tranrrumѳn cha. Nazaretsrѳ Jesucristѳi munchiyu kurrab, inrrѳ chibig kѳn.Incha Pedrѳbe kusrmay tasigu kemѳra kusrabene, tru urastѳ nui srѳbmeraba, nui yetѳlѳmeraba mur misren,
nѳmbe nun ashabe, Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Namun ash cha.
Inchen tru uñchab gaimabiibe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba Tiuswei yau kebamrrab inchen ashabe an guettra cha miaben,
Kan gwalѳm Pedrѳba, Juanba, maaben las tres pailѳba kegѳtѳ Tiuswei yaumay nebambubelѳ gѳn, Tiusba wamindam uras kѳbene.

Inchen kan levita Jѳsé taig pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabig Chipre birausriig, Cristѳ tru nѳashib karua ѳriilѳbe truigwane Bernabé cha wamig (trenchippe, Isui melѳben, isui inchimѳnrrai tabig waminchib nusrkain gѳn daig.
Inchawei nѳmui utube chigѳben palai inchibiibe muguen kaabig kѳn. Kaguende mѳilѳgѳben pirѳmera, yamera tѳgarbe yana, maig yanigwan anwane srua amrrua,

Incha tru nu misag sѳtѳmera mayeelѳba tru Jesúswan kѳrebelѳbe mѳitѳgucha lata kan manrrѳtѳ lataig lincha bѳnrrab, kandѳ isubelѳ gѳn. Mѳitѳgucha nѳmui chi tѳgagúigwane nain gѳn chimѳtѳ, chi kѳbigwane kanguelarrѳtѳ tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳn.

Ñui tasigwan larrѳbichi cha, tru ñui newan tabig marѳb megabig, Jesúswei munchiyu kwanrreelan tamarѳb, ñi namba pasrain gúi ashchai mara gѳrrѳmarѳb, katѳ kwaara asha kѳrrѳmistrai marѳb inchi cha, trenchibelѳ gѳn.
ñi Tius manasrѳwei ѳyeelѳ purainrrai maig martrab isua tѳgagúilan treeg nebunrrai, martrab.
Pirau reymerabe yandѳ kwayanrrab lutѳmaytѳ pѳnrramisren, katѳ tru ashib karubelѳgucha wamincha kanbalatѳ misra, Señѳr Tiuswanba, nui Cristѳnba kaig martrab namig kurran cha.

tru lincha amѳñibelѳ nѳm iigwan mѳrabe, sѳteelѳba ke kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, Tiusba trenchib waminchibelѳ gѳn: Ñi mayeelaim bala ñi ashib pasrabig srѳmbalawan lata, pirѳwan lata, marwan lata, chigurrimbunѳ truyu chi purrabelan chigucha marѳbig,
Pѳs tru purѳ nuig tabig marѳb, tamarinab mѳѳbe cuarenta añѳs menrra tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende nam ashib, nam mѳrѳb indigwane nambe elachimѳ, wamindamѳnrrun chibelѳ gѳn.
Trune Pedrѳba, Juanbabe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Ñimguen tab isuy cha, Tiuswei merrab sѳl gѳbig kuitashchab nun mѳrmѳtѳ, ñimun mѳrѳb pѳnrramig.
Inchendѳ tru treeg marigwan misag utu mas mas wam larrѳbichimѳnrraimbe, mѳingurrimbunѳbe mungucha Jesúswei munchiyube waminchimѳnrrai chigѳben ñimune maramѳnrrun chinrrab cha, nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha nѳmune tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelѳ purrainukkurri webambingarua, nѳmdѳ kangurrin gangurri payiyab waminchib gѳrrѳmisrabe,

Pѳs nam kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmibe mu gatѳgan pegwei munchiyube chi gaagѳn cha, kaguende kaigyugurri wesramigwane yu piraube mungucha treeg martrai tranig kaagѳn chibig kѳn.Inchen tru payibelѳbe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanbabe chigucha chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳ, lѳtab pѳnrrai ashib, katѳ mana chu kusreb purrѳmeelѳ, chigucha gѳmeelѳ gúin gúi ashib inchabe, truba kwaara asha, nѳmune Jesúswei mendig amѳñibelѳ gúin gúi nebua ashibelѳ gѳn.
Jesúsbe ñim ya marѳbelѳ tru kaasig srug kѳn cha. Inchendѳ tru katsiisrѳmbe pѳlbasra wayig mas purѳ tab srukken misrin gѳn cha.
kan mѳg kwanrriigwan nam tabig marigwan chi wetѳgѳrramdiig kѳtashchappa, i mѳwan mandѳ incha tamarig kuitashchappa, ñim namun payib srua gúig kѳbene,
Incha Juanwanba, Pedrѳnba nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pѳnsrabe payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Ñimbe iigwane maramburab marig muindѳgarre margue? cha. ¿Iilane mui munchiyurre margue? cha.
Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe tru nѳmun ashib karub purrabelѳ gѳben, misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaamera gѳben, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳben, Jerusalén tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ mѳilѳgѳben Tiuswei wamwan wamindi mѳrѳbelѳbe Cristѳn kѳreben, mѳguelandѳ munchen trattrѳ milburab nemisrig kѳbig kѳn.
kaguende Pedrѳba, Juanba misaameran kusrenanѳb, katѳ tru kwabelѳbe katѳyug kwailai utugurri ѳsiiramibe Jesucristѳinug kѳn chib, eshkab kusrennimba.
Incha nѳmbe kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Tiuswei yau kusrenanѳb, katѳ yamѳrig kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn, tru tabig srѳ wambe, Jesúsbe tru Cristѳ gѳn chib, maikken elachimѳgue.
Gamaliel wamindiibe treegwein gúitamab isua, Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan wama, ichabetabe, Jesúswei munchiyube mas waminchimѳnrrai mera, yandѳ elachibelѳ gѳn.

Inchawei mѳi ѳyeeg puim basrѳbene, nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun cha: Tru mѳguelane kagѳbashippa, ñimguen ka ambasay cha. Kaguende tru nѳm chi martrab isua tѳgagúig nѳm chi marѳb amѳnaibe, ka mѳguelaindѳ gúisruandѳbe, patsѳnrrun cha.

Ñimguen isuy cha, mana gѳsrѳn kan Teudas taig kan truba nu gusreb mѳg kur chibig kurrѳben, truigwanma mѳguelѳ cuatrѳcientѳs mendig amѳnaig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ nune kweechen, mayeelѳba mendig amѳñibelѳbe chab tarѳmisren, chab pinig kѳn cha.
Inchen iigwan mѳrѳbelѳbe, truba trѳmbѳig nama, kwetchab inchibelѳ gѳn.
Nambe ѳyeeg purayaigwane namashib asha bѳnrrer cha. Inchen nun tru mѳrѳbelan Tius tranig Espíritu Santѳ chigucha asha basrainrrun cha.
Ñim kurusyu mesra kweetsig tru Jesúswandѳwei namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerai Tiusbe katѳ ѳsiirangaruig kѳn cha.
Inchen Pedrѳba, katѳgan Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba lѳtappe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Namuimbe Tiuswanmerrig mѳramig kѳn cha, mѳguelѳ taigwan gѳmѳtѳ.
Incha merrana amrruabe, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab pѳnsrѳben, maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtebe, trenchib payibig kѳn:

Inchene Tiuswei yau pѳlicíameran ashib pera basrabiibe, nui pѳlicíameraba ya, Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba katѳ merrana ambendѳ, maig kѳbash tsag inchimѳtѳ merranѳbelѳ gѳn, kaguen misaamera nѳmun srug muta petamigwan kѳriimata.
Trunetѳ mѳikkѳsrѳn trenchib puptinchibig kѳn: Ñim tru merrarrawa keerig mѳguelѳbe Tiuswei yau misagwan kusrenanѳb purran cha.
Inchen iigwan mѳrabe, tru Tiuswei yau pѳlicíameran ashib pera basrabiiba, sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, ¡kan paare! ѳyeebe mandѳ guermab isubelѳ gѳn, kan ѳyeebe chugatig bunrrai indamab isubgue.
Inchen pѳlicíamerabe amba, tru kailan keeri yausrѳmbe muganug bua, katѳle amrruppe, treeg wam srua amrrubelѳ gѳn:

Inchen nѳmbe iigwan mѳrabe, yandѳ tѳrrrabene, Tiuswei yau kebamba, kusrenanѳb mendabelѳ gѳn. Tru inchib gѳmnetѳ tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳteba, truyu nѳba purrabelѳ gatѳganelѳba amba, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelan tulundzuningarubelѳ gѳn, katѳ tru maig maramigwan ashibelѳ israelitasmerai kѳlli misaameran mayamba. Inchabe tru kailan keeri yau purrabelan nѳmuimay merrana, amrrunrrabelѳ ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Cristѳ nѳ ashib karua ѳriilane merrarrawa tru kailan keeri yau keerѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳteba, saduceѳsmeraingateelѳ truyu nѳba purrabelѳba purѳ busrkwai ashiptѳ namig kurra,

Inchen Jerusalén ciuda buluwansreelѳ misag truba nѳrrѳ amrrubelѳ gѳn, kwanrreelѳ gѳben, trѳmbѳig maringarub kwaimandziimera tѳgar kan mandѳguen gѳmui inchibelѳ, treelѳ gѳben sruar. Inchen mayeelѳba tamariilѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen misaamera Señѳrwan kѳrebelѳbe mѳguelѳ lata, ishumbur lata katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nemisrѳb ambubelѳ gѳn.

Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳbe misaamerai utu chine Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi ashchai mariilan maramba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai maramba inchibelѳ gѳn. Inchen Tiuswei ureemerabe Salѳmónwei Yaskabyu mayeelѳba maig isuppe, treeg kandѳ isua tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru iglesian kerriguelanba, katѳ mayeelѳ tru treeg purayaigwan wammѳrѳbelanbabe purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kui indamig arrubig gѳn.

Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¿Ñim pailѳmisra chindimbarre treeg martrab isua bѳnrramisrke? cha, Señѳrwei Espíritun ke maig inchibig kѳtashchab ashchab inchib. ¡Ñiguen mѳr! cha, ñui kewan sѳrѳnrrab srua ambubelѳbe chabguen yaskabyuguen amrrutan cha, mѳimbe ñungucha sѳrѳnrrab srua amrrun cha.
Indiibe pѳn ura wendau gѳsrѳnyu Ananíaswei srai tru treeg purayaigwan chi wammѳrmѳ, kebarrubenba,
Inchen matsѳrelѳbe amrrua, asrwan tamara pula, sѳrѳnrrab srua ambubelѳ gѳn.
¿Pirѳbe ñuiwein gѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Katѳ yanen, tru angucha ñi asamig kѳmuitarru? cha ¿Ñui manrrau chindimba ѳyeeg martrab isua basramisrku? cha. Ñibe mѳguelan isab pasrѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswan isan chibig kѳn.
Inchabe i mѳѳbe nui sraimba misra, tru anwane tѳbѳtѳ rrannrrab cha, wamincha, tѳbѳwane kѳrrѳmara, Cristѳ tru nѳashib karua ѳriilaimay tѳbѳwandѳ nѳm ashchai trannrrab srua ibig kѳn.
Inchen kan mѳg Ananías taiba, srai Safiraba kan pirѳ tѳgagúigwan yanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Kaguende nambe trendai mѳrer chib: Tru Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsbe i Tiuswei yawane pinishib, Mѳisés namun maig martrai karua gѳrrѳmariilane chishtѳ yunѳmarѳb inchun tan mѳrѳb inder chibelѳ gѳn.

Inchabe truilѳbe misaameran gѳben, katѳ misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaameran gѳben, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrebelan gѳben, ke nѳm isuigwan marѳb gѳnrrai inchen, truilѳbe namig amrrua, kemѳra, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelaimay srua ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ Esteban kusremburab kusrebig kuigwanba, Espíritu nun wamindingaruitѳga wamindigwanbabe, muguen kanab waminchab gaimabelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Esteban Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indigwanba, katѳ maramburab maramigwanba newan tѳgaig, truibe kwaara asha gѳnrrai maramba, Tius nѳba pasrain gúi ashchai purѳ nѳrreelѳ mariilѳ maramba inchibig kѳn, tru misaamerai utu.
Incha yandѳ tru Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ dѳcelaimay pera amrruben, nѳmbe Tiusba wamincha, nѳmui tasiimeran truilaim bala nѳmun tabig kѳnrrai estsarѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nambe namuimburappe Tiusba wamindamigwan elachimѳ marѳb, katѳ Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb amѳñibig amѳñinrrab cha trenchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ tru dѳceelѳbe, tru nu misag Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan tulundzuningarua trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nam Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanamigwan elacha, mishatsigu tru mamig birisamigu ashib pѳnrramibe sѳl gѳmѳn cha.
Trube, ñun ѳyeeg puigwane tru ñun ѳyeekkurrin gúig kѳn chibelѳ amrruben, trunun ashchab cha. Inchabe Herѳdeswei purѳ tab yau Pablѳne keera wanna, tab ashib tѳgagѳnrrai karubig kѳn.
Inchen kubenadurbe tru kilga ѳrigwan ashabe, Pablѳne: ¿Chu birausriig kugu? cha payibig kѳn. Incha ciliciasriig kuin gúi ashabe, trenchibig kѳn:
Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳne kaulli bala ambubelѳtѳ lincha amrrai, suldaumera katsikkateelѳbe tru nѳm waraig mu chindamga yaumay gatѳle legucha amrrubelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru mѳwan sѳratѳ kaig martrab inchib gѳn daig nane wammѳrѳsrѳben, nabe tru urastѳ ñuisrѳmay ѳrar cha, katѳ tru nun ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib payib srua gѳbelan chigucha chigѳben tamig tѳgaguabe, trube, ñui merrab tѳrgandѳ eshkanrrigay cha, nѳmune trenchar cha nabe.
Incha nabe chi charre payib srua gúitashchab ashchab isua, Pablѳne judíѳsmerai tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab pera gѳrrayar.
Na Claudiѳ Lisias, ñi nai purѳ tab kubenadur Félixwan ka uñgu chinrrab inchar.
Incha ѳyeeg chibig kilgagucha pѳra trana ѳrѳbig kѳn:

Inchen maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳm garub pera bѳnrrabelan pailan wama, trenchibig kѳn: Yem las nueve webambamig katsikka amrrabelѳ suldau dѳscientѳsba, kaulli balar setentaba, lanza sruar dѳscientѳsba Cesareamay amrrai tamaray cha.
Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru matsinane trenchib ungwa cha, ѳrѳbig kѳn: Ñi nan eshkaigwane nan eshkar cha, mungucha eshkanrrab gѳmѳ cha.

Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru matsinan tasku kemѳra srua ya, nѳѳrѳ pera yabe nundѳ mara payibig kѳn: ¿Nan chi eshkamig tѳgagugu? chaInchen matsinѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Judíѳsmerabe Pablѳn srѳna tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab ke tiusmanda ñun wesrabsrumugu chinrrab, ke kandѳ isua bѳnrramisrin gѳn cha, nuimburab maig kurrin gúitashchab ke tab paya ashchab chibelѳ misrѳb.

Inchen truibe maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigweimay, pera yabe, trenchibig kѳn: Pablѳ kailan keeri yau keerig wabiibe nan wama tiusmanda i matsinan ñuimay pera irra chitan cha, ñun kan chigѳsrѳn eshkamig tѳgagѳn cha.
Pablѳbe tru suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳm garub pѳnrrabelan kan mѳigwan gѳsrѳn wamabe, trenchibig kѳn: I matsinan maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigweimay pera inrrѳ cha. Kaguende chigѳsrѳn eshkamig tѳgagѳn cha.
Inchen Pablѳi nuchawei nusrkaimbe tru chi isumѳ amrrub gѳben, larab warѳwa, tru kaig martrab inchib gúigwan wamindi, tru suldaumera waraig mugucha chindamga yausrѳ nѳbe kebya, Pablѳn eshkaben,

Incha truilѳbe sacerdѳtesmeran karubelainuumayba, katѳ misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaamerainuumayba ambabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nam martrab taigwan nam marmubene, namundѳwei trѳmbѳig nebubash chib pѳnrramisrer cha. ¡Gatѳ! Pablѳn kweechimuppe, nambe chigucha mamѳnrrab ter cha.

Katѳ lѳtsѳ judíѳsmerabe kaig martrab nѳmdѳ nilѳ wamincha: Nam treeg martrab taigwan marmubene, namundѳwei trѳmbѳig nebubash chib pѳnrramisra, ¡gatѳ! Pablѳn kweechimuppe, mamѳwei, muchimѳwei inchab chibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen ambumay imay ke nѳmdѳ aleguiyab gurra nѳѳrѳtѳ misren, maya suldaumeran nѳ garub pasrabiibe Pablѳne ke pitis marѳbgunmab isua kѳriimata, suldaumeran kѳrraambingarubig kѳn, nѳmui utugurri mallatѳ merrarrawa wesrawa, suldaumera waraig mu chindamga yaumay gatѳ pera amrrai.
Kaguende saduceѳsmerabe tru kwabelѳbe katѳlebe ѳsiiramѳwei, ángelesmera gawei, mѳsiimera gawein gѳn chibelѳ gѳben, trune fariseѳsmerabe treelane kerriguh treeg kѳbig kuitamab isubelѳ gѳbig kѳn.

Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai nunelѳ, maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte gѳben, nabe ashmѳ inchibrain gѳn cha. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Ñui misaameran ashib karub wabigwane kaig nebubash chib trѳmbѳig wamamig kѳmѳn cha.
Inchen truyu purrabelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte Tiusweiwan marѳb pasrabigwan, ñigan ѳyeeg tsalѳ wamѳtirru? cha.
Inchene tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte Ananíasbe Pablѳim bulu purrabelane triibѳtѳ Pablѳn pashagutsingarubig kѳn.

Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garub pasrabiibe tru judíѳsmera chigurrinrre ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib gúigwan ke tab ashchab isua, Pablѳn elacha, sacerdѳtesmeran karubelanba, katѳ tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelan mayamba tulundzunѳnrrai karua, yandѳ Pablѳn wesrua, truilai merrab pasrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe trenchibig kѳn: Nama kan Rѳma birau kallawei kѳb lataitѳwei misrtrappe, tsabѳtѳ nu an betabe treeg misrar cha. Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe treeg mara gѳmѳtѳ, kallainukkurri trendѳ truig kur cha.

Inchen truigwan mѳrabe, tru suldau cienwan nѳ garub pera basrabiibe tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigwan trenchib eshkabig kѳn: ¿Ñi chi marѳb pasraigwan ñigan maig kui asha basrѳtirru? cha. ¡Kan! i mѳѳbe Rѳma birauig kuin gѳn cha.

Inchen maya suldaumeran ashib nѳ garub wabiibe, tru suldaumera waraig muguen chindamga yau Pablѳn keeringarua, ichaguchib maig kuigwan payingarubig kѳn, misaamerabe chindimbagurrinrre nun tsalѳ gѳb ѳyeeg trashib gúigwan ashchab.

Inchen judíѳsmerabe tru iig srabe trendaigwan ke chab rrendamnegatiitѳ mѳrabe, trenchib trashib mendabelѳ gѳn: ¡ѳyeeg mѳwane yu pirau uñmѳnrrai kweetsay! chib. ¡Kaguende ѳyeegwane chinchibguen uñbasamgaig kѳn! chib.

Katѳ ñuimburab maig kuigwan waminchibig Estebanwan kweechib ani lushen, tru uraskucha nabe ka kweetsay chib truyu pasrѳwa, kweechibelѳ nѳmui kewagúilan wesra waren, nabe truilanguen ashib pasrabig kui nѳmbe ashibelѳ gѳn cha.
Incha truyu na Señѳrwan ashen, nѳbe nan trenchibig kѳn cha: Mallatѳ incha, mѳi mѳi Jerusaléngurri webinrrѳ cha. Kaguende yube ñi naimburab maig kuigwan waminchen mѳrtraamѳn cha.
Treeg kѳbene, ¿chi munig tsunrragu? cha. Kurrѳ, chibig kѳn. Incha piu umbu ulsrѳ cha. Katѳ ñibe Señѳrwei munchin wamab ñui kaig mariilan chish misr chibig kѳn nane.

Inchen Ananíasbe nane trenchibig kѳn: Namui merrabsrѳ mѳskalai Tiusbe, nѳ maig marѳg kuig waigwan ñi nebua ashchai ñune manasrѳwei kanmaytѳ wesrawa basrig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru Kerrigu Sѳlgandiigwan nebua ashib, katѳ nui triitѳga wamindigwan mѳrѳb inchai.

Inchen truyube kan mѳg Ananías taig, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, Tiuswan purѳ isua marѳb megabig, judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelaimbe nѳbe chiyuguen chi tamga tab uñib mѳg,
Inchen nabe trenchibig kur cha: ¿Señѳr chi maramѳh? cha. Inchen Señѳrbe nane trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, Damascѳsrѳmay inrrѳ cha. Truyube chi maramigwan karua pasrigwan kerriguh eshkanrrun cha.
Inchene nabe trencha lѳtabig kur: ¿Señѳr ñibe mu gugu? cha. Incha nѳbe nan lѳtappe: Nabe Nazaretsrѳ Jesús ñi kaig martrabgѳba inchib arrig, truig kur chibig kѳn.
Inchen nabe pirausrѳ peñabe, kan wam trendaig mѳrinabig kѳn: Saulѳ, Saulѳ ¿nane chindimbarre kaig martrabgѳba inchib arrugu? chib.

maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte lata, katѳ mayeelѳ misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaamera lata treegwein gúig kѳn chib nѳm eshkanrrab gúinrrun cha. Inchen nѳmbe nane kilga bѳriilѳ tranѳbelѳ gѳn cha, tru nammisag judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelan tru na chi martrab isuigwan martrai. Inchen Damascѳsrѳmay ibig kur cha, Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳ trusrѳ warabelan merrarrawa, yu Jerusalénsrѳmay sruattrab, ichabetiilѳ gѳnrrai.

Nabe judíѳ gur cha, Cilicia birau Tarsѳ ciudayu kallaweig. Inchendѳ nurappe, yu Jerusalén nurawa, katѳ nabe kusrebgucha Gamaliel maig kusrenanigwan kusreweig, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriilan merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamera kan maizhikken pinab marmѳ, marѳb tѳgagúigu treegwan kusrenanig kur cha. Tiusweimburabigwan kalѳ marmѳnrrab ñim mѳin gwalѳm mayeelѳ ke chinsraatѳ inchib pѳnrrab lataitѳweingue.
Ñim, nai nunelѳ, nai mѳskalѳ, na treeg mara basrѳmuigwan waminchab inchar cha, ¡Mѳrtray! chib.
Inchen Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Isa gѳmѳtѳ, nabe judíѳ gur cha, Cilicia birau Tarsѳ ciudayu kallaweig, chigucha gѳmѳ ciudazhigu gѳmѳtѳ. Tiusmanda misagwan ka waminchibashcha chibig kѳn.

Incha Pablѳn tru suldaumera waraig muguen chindamga yau yandѳ ke kertrab inchen, tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigwan Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Na chigѳsrѳn chinrrab, waminchibashchunrraguh? cha. Inchen tru nѳ garubiibe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñibe griegѳ wamwan waminchibig kѳtirru? cha.
Incha tru nebunab nebambiisrѳngatig srua pubene, tru nu misag sѳtѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig inchen, treekkurri yandѳ truyugurrimbe suldaumerabe Pablѳne pala muta ambam nebubig kѳn.
Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubig puabe, Pablѳn merrarrawa, pagatѳ cadenastѳga lusringarubig kѳn. Incha nѳbe mu gúin gúi, chi marѳb unig kuin gúi payibig kѳn.
Incha yandѳ kwetchab inchib gѳben, Rѳmasrѳ maya suldau sѳtѳmeran ashib karub wabigwan, yu Jerusalén maya misag chindi asamgaig inchib namig kurrin gѳn chib eshkab wam puben,
Nѳm ѳyeeg chib gѳppe, kaguende mana gѳsrѳn Jerusalén ciudayu kan efesѳsriig Trófimѳba lincha uni ashibelѳ gua, trunun Tiuswei yau Pablѳbe kertrab arritamab isuarre inchibelѳ gѳn.
Tru treeg marѳb gúin rrune patsѳnrrab gwalѳmbe, Asia birausrѳ warab judíѳsmerabe Pablѳn Tiuswei yau ashabe, maya misag ke chindi asamgaig namig kurrѳnrrai mara, Pablѳn kemѳrabe,

Inchendѳ tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Cristѳn kѳrebelaimburappe tru nam isua treeg martrab cha gѳrrѳmisrig, trunundѳ nambe nѳmun pѳrig kuig kѳn cha: tru animal gweecha taska mari tiusmeran pѳnsrai yaumeran mamѳwei, katѳ aniwan mamѳwei, urcawa gweetsi yauwan mamѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ lata, ishumbur lata trѳmbѳig marmѳwei indamig kѳn chib.
Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳbene, nam maig taigwan mar cha. Yu namui utu pibgatѳ mѳguelѳ kѳn cha, Tiuswei merrab maig martrab taigwane treeg martrab kѳrrѳmisrar.

Pѳs nѳmune ñuimburab treeg wammѳrѳsrkain basran cha, ñibe tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utusrѳ maya judíѳsmera warabelane Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenaniilѳyugurri tarѳmisrѳb amrrai treeg kusrenana, nѳmui ureemerane asru circuncidamѳtay chib, katѳ namui trendѳ marѳb amѳnailan treeg marѳb amѳñimѳtay chib kusrenanin gúi.
Inchen Pablѳbe ka lincha warѳgue chabe, lutѳgurrih waminchibig kѳn, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utu nui maramelan marѳb uniilѳtѳga Tius chitѳ mariilan.
Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳbe namba Jacѳbѳn ashchab amben, truyu tru Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳgucha kerrigu tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.
Incha nam Jerusalénsrѳ pubene, nunelѳbe namune truba tab wamab kasrag utabelѳ gѳn.
Incha yandѳ truyu treeg warѳwa, maig palѳnrrabigwan srua ambamig chab tamarabe, Jerusalénsrѳmay nebamben,
Inchen nambe imѳnrrai maya, maya inchib melѳwa kaimappe, trenchibelѳ guer: Trube, Señѳr maig kѳnrrain gѳben, treeg kѳnrrain cha.
Inchen trunun mѳrabe, nambe truyuelѳba misra, Pablѳn Jerusalénsrѳmay imѳta chib truba inchibelѳ guer.
Nam truyu yam gwalѳm warѳbene, Judeagurri kan mѳg, Agabѳ taig, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kѳrraarrubig kѳn.

Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe, truyugurri webamba amba, Cesarea ciudasrѳ puabe, Felipe tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab uñibigwei yau pubelѳ guer. Truibe tru srѳsrѳ siete wesrawa pѳnsrailai utuig kѳbig kѳn. Incha nambe truigwei yau kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer.
Incha nambe kangurrin gangurri ungwa chabe, barcѳyu nebamben, nѳmbe nѳmui yamay katѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha nambe truyu trune kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳ truyu warain gѳben. Inchen nѳmbe Espíritu Santѳgurri eshkailѳ gua, Pablѳne Jerusalénsrѳmay imѳnrrain chibelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pátarabe kan barcѳ Feniciasrѳmay inrrabig pasrain gѳben, truyu nebamba ambubelѳ guer.
Inchen sѳteelѳba truba rruba isub kishib, Pablѳn irab, muchabelѳ gѳn.
Incha iigwan chab rrenchabe, Pablѳbe tѳmbѳnsra, sѳteelѳbamisra Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Ñimbe ashibelѳ gúinrrun cha, naimburab chi palabelanba, yu purrabelai chi palabigwanba tѳgagѳnrrai, marѳbiibe i nai tasiimera gúi.

Trube, mѳimbe ѳyeeg kѳbene, Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri nunelѳ, ñimun Tius nѳ ashib tѳgagѳnrraimba, katѳ nui tru ka yandѳ tab indig wamyuba pѳnsrar cha. Truibe tabig nѳrrѳrab amrrai maramburab marѳbig kѳb, katѳ tru keta trannrrab gѳrrѳmisrigwan, nuyasiitѳ tarѳmariilѳ mayamba trunun utamig kѳnrrai marѳb inchibig kѳn cha.
Inchen ñimui utuelѳtѳweinguen nѳmui kaig kusrenaniilѳtѳga, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan pelѳsrka nѳmui mendig amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai martrabelѳ kurrѳnrrun cha.

Inchawei ñimbe ñimasiitѳwei tab ashiptѳ guy cha, katѳ ñim ashib tѳgagúig Tiuswei iglesia mayeelan chigucha. Truilan ñim Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera bѳnrrѳnrrai Espíritu Santѳ pѳnsraig kѳbene, mayeelѳ Señѳrwei iglesiayuelan maig ashib tѳgagѳmigwan treeg ashib tѳgaguy cha. Kaguende truilѳbe nuyasig nui anindѳga peniilѳ gѳn cha.
Inchawei mѳimbe kanmaytѳ nabe kelarrab trendamѳnrrun cha: Mayeelai ani naim bala attrain gѳmѳ, naimburappe yandѳ chi isumikkaig chish basrar cha.
Inchawei mayeelѳba mѳimbe ñim Tius nѳ ashib karub pasrainuguigwan na eshkab kusrenanѳb pureb yaisreelѳbe nai malѳwane katѳlebe managuen ashchaamѳn cha.

Ciudamѳrig na yaisrѳmbe nane chi peg bunrrabig bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, ka kailan keeri yau pasramibah, kaig nebuben isuig megamibatѳ treeg nebunrrab gѳn cha. Espíritu Santѳ eshkaigwan trunundѳwei nabe asha basrar chibig kѳn.
Incha mѳimbe nabe Jerusalénsrѳmay inrrab inchar cha, ¡gatѳ! nan trusrѳmay Espíritu ke inrrai inchen, trusrѳ nan chi burainrrab gúinguen mѳrmubendѳ.
Treeg kuingucha, ñimuyasig chigѳben tabig kѳnrrabigwane nabe kѳrig kui inchib sѳrab pasrѳmѳ, maya misagwei merrab lata, truѳrѳ yamѳrig eshkab kusrenanig kѳbig kѳn cha,
Incha amrrubene, trenchibig kѳn: Ñimbe na srѳsrѳ gwalѳm Asiasrѳ puinukkurrimbunѳ, nabe chu urastѳgucha ñimui utu na maig uñibig kuigwan ñimbe tab ashibelѳ gѳn cha.

Incha Pablѳbe Efesѳ ciudasrѳmbe barcѳyu purab inrrab isuig kѳn, kaguende Asia birau menrra yana gѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrab isua. Pѳs treeg nebubene, Pentecѳstés kwalѳmbe Jerusalénsrѳ wanrrab isuig kua, mallatѳ inchib megaig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha Pablѳbe namba Asónsrѳ asiyaben, nambe barcѳyu nun nebera, Mitilene ciudasrѳmay ambubelѳ guer.
Inchen tru matsinane ѳsiguig pera amben, mayeelѳba truba isuin gua, kasrag kuilѳ gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pablѳbe gatѳle palasrѳ nebarrua, tru pirriwan pirisha mab gua, katѳ nѳmui mamigwan chab mabe, tѳrrramnegatig wamincha, yandѳ ibig kѳn.

kan matsinѳ, Euticѳ taig, pendana bala wabigwane yandѳ ki ganab arruben, Pablѳbe ¡gatѳ! waminchibig waminchen, tru matsinѳwane yandѳ ke kigѳbiitѳ kamarig kib wawa, tru pѳn bisusrѳngurri kebinabya, kwabeñen, kwaig kusrabelѳ gѳn.

Incha nambe truaalѳmbe tru pirriwan pirishinrra manrrab tulundzuna gѳben, Pablѳbe waminchab pѳlbasrѳbig kѳn. Kaguende katѳ gwalѳmdѳ nuimbe webyamig kѳben, nui wamindamigwan waminchippe, yem dѳbѳtakkatig waminchibig kѳn.
Incha nѳmbe namui merrabguen webamba, Trѳas ciudasrѳ namun muniirain gѳbig kѳn.

Incha nѳ trusrѳ pѳn bѳl kѳrrѳmisra, yandѳ gatѳguen Siriamay barcѳyu ke inrrabguen incha, judíѳsmerabe nilѳ trubatѳ nun kaig martrab inchib gúi wammѳrѳbig kѳn. Incha treekkurri katѳyug Macedѳniawandѳwei purainrrab ibig kѳn.

Yandѳ tru ѳyeeg chindinguen asamgaig marѳb gúig wasrѳraben, Pablѳbe Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan wamingarua, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melѳnrrigay chib wamincha, trugurrimbe nѳmun ungwa cha, Macedѳniasrѳmay inrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen Apѳlѳs Acaya birausrѳmay inrrab inchen, nunelѳbe masken ka martrai inchib, trusrѳ tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan kan kilga pѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, Apѳlѳswan nѳm tabig wamab utѳnrrai. Inchen nѳbe Acayasrѳ puben, Tius tru nѳ ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ Tiuswan kѳrebelayasiibe kan maya nuguen tab gѳbig kѳn.

Nѳbe Señѳrwei maywan muba amѳnamigwan kusrenanigwan kusreweig kua, nѳbe ¡gatѳ! treegwan martrab isua marѳb, Jesúsweimburab waminchib kusrennѳppe, maig kuigwan treeg kusrenanѳbig kѳn. Juan tru misaameran piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳmig kusrennigwandѳ nebua ashibig kuagucha.

Incha Cesarea ciudasrѳ puabe, tru iglesian ka warѳgueh chinrrab nebya, trugurrimbe Antiѳquíamay kѳrraarrubig kѳn.Incha truyu kan maya yana gѳsrѳn tsuabe, Galacia birauba, Frigia birauba, trusrѳ lutѳgurri llirab inrrab webibig kѳn, mayeelѳba tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan kullaaramѳ, mur bѳnrrѳnrrai purugub waminchib.
nѳbe yandѳ: Ka inrrab inchar cha ungwa chabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tius nan gatѳ yusrѳmay attrain gѳbene, katѳ arrumѳnrrun cha. Incha barcѳyu nebya, Efesѳgurri ibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe katѳguchi nѳmba truyu kѳrrѳmisrtrai tiusmanda chib gúingucha, nѳbe kѳrrѳmisrmѳtѳ,

Inchen gѳben Pablѳbe katѳgucha truyu yam gwalѳm kѳrrѳmisra, nunelan yandѳ ungwa chibig kѳn. Incha yandѳ Siria birausrѳmay barcѳyu iben, Priscilaba, Aquilasba nѳba ambubelѳ gѳn. Incha Cencreasrѳmbe Pablѳbe pusrugwan chishchig parѳbig kѳn, Tiuswan nѳ maig martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrigwan treeg maramѳnrrun chib.
Incha tru maig maramigwan asha marѳb purrainukkurri wambig weguchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchendѳ iibe chi treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ka wamindiilanbah, katѳ tru munchimera chabah, tru ñimui maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wariilѳ chabatѳrre inchib gúig kѳbene, uyube ñim asay cha, ѳyeegwane nabe asha rranrrabgucha wamur chibig kѳn.
trenchib: Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig wamindamig tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maringaruimay gѳmѳtѳ, nѳbe misaameran ke peemay maramne inchib unan chib.
Inchen Pablѳbe Cѳrintѳsrѳ pila y tѳbѳ bila kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn, Tiuswei wamwan kusrenanѳb.
Kaguende nabe ñiba basrar cha, ñune mugucha kaig martrab kebatchab gaimanrrun cha. Kaguende i ciudayube nabe misag truba nu tѳga basrar cha.
Inchen Señѳrbe Pablѳn yem kan piab lataigu trenchibig kѳn: Kѳrig kui inchimѳta cha, waminchibig waminchi cha, ka gѳbashiptinchimѳtѳ.
Incha truyugurri webya, kan mѳg Titѳ Justѳ taigwei yamay ibig kѳn. Truibe Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nui yabe tru judíѳsmera tulundzuni ya mendatѳweim basrabig kѳn.
Inchen Silasba, Timѳteѳba Macedѳniagurri pubene, Pablѳbe Jesúsweimburab eshkab kusrenanamigutѳ kebya basramisrѳbig kѳn, tru judíѳsmeran: Jesúsbe tru ñim muniirab gúig tru Cristѳ gѳn cha eshkab.
Inchen Aquilasba, Priscilababe Pablѳ nѳ marigwandѳwei tru carpas yaureg marѳb tsushibelѳ gѳbene, nѳmba kѳrrѳmisra tru marѳb warabelѳ gѳn. Pѳs nѳbe carpas yaureg marѳb tsushibiitѳwein gѳbig kua.
Inchen treeg puraiben, Atenaskurri Pablѳbe Cѳrintѳ ciudasrѳmay webibig kѳn.
Inchen yandѳ Pablѳbe nѳmui utugurri webya ibig kѳn.
Inchen tru mѳrѳbelѳbe, tru kwailѳ gatѳle ѳsiiranrrun daigwan mѳrѳppe, kan utuelѳbe ke ka indzatѳ mѳren, katѳganelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: I wamindigwane katѳwan chi mѳrtrumѳn cha.

Chigucha nebua ashmeelѳ gѳb urassrѳ ѳyeeg waraig kѳbigwane, Tiusbe ka treeg purainrraindѳ kagѳbashippa, mѳi yan gwalѳmmerawane maya misaameran chuelandѳgucha nѳmui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliranrrai karua basran cha.

Kaguende nambe Tiusweinug ѳsig bѳnrrab, nѳgurri llirab amѳñib, nѳgurri misag bѳnrrer cha. Katѳ kan ñimui utuitѳwei, chiwan gѳben purѳ tabzhig isua waminchibiima trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Nambe Tiusweinukkurri larrѳbicha amrrub misaamera guer cha.

Kan mѳkkurrindѳ truyugurri chi misaatѳ larrѳbichib inrrabigwan nѳbe marig kѳbig kѳn cha, pirѳ muba kuimburab warѳnrrai. Incha merrabsrѳwei nѳm maya yana waramigwanba, chutѳ, chutѳ waramigwanba kanmaytѳ chab asha bѳnsraig kѳbig kѳn cha.

I Tius kѳn cha, tru pirѳwan marѳbig, katѳ truyu chine kѳbelan chigucha. Inchawei srѳmbalawan lata, pirѳwan lata, nѳwei ashib pasrabig kuig kѳppe, nѳbe mѳguelai taska marig tab yamerayu wamíig kѳn cha.

Inchen Pablѳbe Areópagѳ taig tru kusrebelѳ tulundzuninug nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pasramisra, trenchibig kѳn: Atenas misaamera, ñimbe chiyutѳgucha Tiuswan isuer taigu ke maizhikken pinab marmѳnrrab inchibelѳ gúin gúi ashar cha.
Pѳs namui kalumerayube ñibe chigѳben ke ka peesrѳtiitѳ waminndan cha. Inchawei trunun tab chi chibig kui wetѳgѳrrag kuin guer cha.

Inchen nѳrrѳ gusreb mѳguelѳ, tru filósѳfѳs epicúreѳsmera tailѳ, nѳmui nѳrrѳ isuigu asrwan ka tab gѳnrrai marѳb tѳgagúinuutѳ tabig kѳn chibelѳba, katѳ tru filósѳfѳs estѳicѳsmera tailѳ nѳrrѳ isuigwan kusrebelѳba iibe ѳyeeg kѳn chib, iibe ѳyamay gѳn chib, Pablѳba waminchibelѳ gѳn. Inchabe kan utuelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿I mѳg ya wamdѳ nigaibe namune chi wamincherah? cha. Inchen kanelѳbe: Katѳgan peg birausrѳ tiusmeraiwan eshkab kusrennѳbig kѳb asѳnan chibelѳ gѳn, kaguende Pablѳbe Jesúswei tru tabig srѳ wamwanba, kwawa gatѳ ѳsiiraigwanba eshkab kusrenanen.
Incha Pablѳbe Silaswanba, Timѳteѳwanba Atenassrѳ muniirab uña, ke taska mari tiusmeratѳ netsaig ciuda gúi ashabe, nuinetѳ chiguen tab gѳmui inchibig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ nunelѳbe Pablѳne mar bulusrѳnmay ѳren, Silasba, Timѳteѳbatѳ Berea kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchawei treekkurri truilѳbe Cristѳn truba nu kѳreben, kusreb ishumburmera griegasmera gѳben, katѳ mѳguelѳ truba yamelѳba kѳrebelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nunelѳbe ke pillirabendѳ Pablѳnba, Silaswanbabe Bereasrѳmay webambingaruben, trusrѳ puabe, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau kebambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ Jasónwanba, tru kanelanba elatsamig kѳnrrai truburѳ an utabe, elachibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Jasónbe nui yau wama pera wain gѳn cha. Iilѳbe tru Rѳma maya misagwan ashib karub wabig César tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wariilane, mѳrѳg kѳmub utsѳbetab ka nѳmuimburaptѳ marѳbelѳ gѳn cha, katѳgan rey kѳn chib, kan Jesús taig.

Inchen judíѳsmerabe truba pusrkwai namig kui asha, larrѳ gaig mѳguelѳ ka lliraptѳ bѳnrrabelan wama, kan nu sѳtѳ trubalatѳmisra, ciudayu misaameran chinetѳ isunrrai trѳmbѳig inchib gurrabelѳ gѳn. Incha Jasónwei yau kegѳrrabelѳ gѳn, Pablѳnba, Silaswanba merrarrawa, misaamerai merrab wesrunrrab.

ѳyeeg kuig kѳn cha, tab eshkab: Tru Cristѳ ñim muniirab gúibe truba kaig indinab megawa, kwawa, katѳ kwailai utugurri kurrab indamig, trendѳ treeg purayamig palѳnrrabig kuig kѳn chib. Incha nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: I Jesús na ñimun eshkab wamindiibe, Cristѳ truitѳwein gѳn cha, tru ñim muniirab gúig.
Pablѳba, Silasba ambuppe, Anfípѳliswanba, Apѳlѳniawanba puraambub amba, Tesalónica ciudasrѳ judíѳsmerai kan tulundzuni ya pasrabnug pubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe Pablѳnba, Silaswanba kan nambe treeg kѳmui tamab isua indig kѳn chib amba, kailan keeri yaugurri wesrawabe, ciudayugurri ke tiusmanda amrray chibelѳ gѳn.

Trune Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nam ya Rѳma birausrѳ kallawar gѳb lataitѳwei kallawarwan, namun maig kuitashchab payaguen ashmubendѳ, maya misagwei merrab namun ichabeta, namun kailan keeri yau kebusra ¿mѳingan mugucha wammѳriimѳzhig namun nilѳ wertrab inditarru? cha. ¡Pѳs chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn! chibig kѳn. Pѳs truilѳtѳwei namun wesrunrrab amrrubash cha.
Indiibe tѳrrrabene, tru maig maramigwan asha marѳb purrabelѳbe tru pѳlicíameran karua ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, tru kailan keeri yawan ashib pasrabigwan, trenchinrrai: Pablѳnba, Silaswanbabe elatchain cha.
Incha nѳmun ichabeta tru pisrѳ mariilan tru yemdѳwei tre uras pillmawa, tru urastѳ nѳba, nui yauelѳ kerriguelѳba piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe Señѳrwei wamwan nunba, nui yau purrabelѳ sѳtѳelanba waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha wambig pera webyabe, payibig kѳn: ¡Au kasukumera! ¿na kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmibe chi maramig balѳnrrerah? cha.
Inchene tru kailan keeri yawan ashib pasrabiibe kan pela bilѳgaig miawa, umbusrѳ lulѳb guebya, Pablѳimba, Silasweimba merrab itѳnab tѳmbѳnsrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen truyu keeriilan ashib pasrabig kiagasrѳbene, mѳimbe tru kailan keeri yau yaskabmerabe kurim bѳnrraptindi ashabe, nui espadan wesrawa, ¡gatѳ! nѳasiitѳ ke yandѳ kwanrrab inchibig gѳn, kaguende truyu pѳnrrabelѳ chab wegѳrra chab lulitamab isua.
Inchen yem dѳbѳtasrѳmbe Pablѳba, Silasbabe Tiusba waminchib, Tiusweyasig cantab gѳben, katѳganelѳ truyu keerig pѳnrrabelѳbe mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha nѳmune truba yam ichabeta, kailan keeri yau kebusra, truyu ashib pasrabigwane webamrraingaig purѳ may ashib tѳgagungarubelѳ gѳn.
Nѳm waminchib kusrenanѳppe ke peemaytѳ mariilѳ nam uta tѳgagѳmig kѳmѳwei, katѳ treegwan marѳb gѳmig kѳmѳwei inchai namune meriilan kusrenanan cha, nam ya rѳmanѳsmeran.

Inchen tru karub pera gѳbelѳ tru treeg an marѳb pѳnrramibe yandѳ patsi asha, Pablѳnba, Silaswanba kemѳra, misag tulundzuninuumay ke paluunchib waram srua ambubelѳ gѳn, tru misagwan ashib karubelaisrѳmay.

Incha tru srusrѳbe Pablѳnba, namunba wendautѳ trenchib trashib arrubig kѳn: ¡I mѳguelѳbe Tius Mayeelaim Bala Pasrabigwei karuindiig melabelѳ, kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳm maywan ñimun eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn! chib.

Incha nѳba, nui yauelѳba piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳrrѳmisra, ke tiusmanda chib namune trenchibig kѳn: Na, Señѳrwan ciertѳn kѳrein gúi ashabe, trube, ñim nai yamay amrrua, kѳrrѳmisrtrigay cha. Incha namune ke kѳrrѳmisramne inchibig kѳn.

Inchen kan isrin gwalѳm tru ciudayu nu yaskabu wambiisrѳ webambubelѳ guer kan pi mendasrѳmay, truyube judíѳsmera Tiusba waminchab tulundzuninug kuitamab isua. Incha nambe truyu purramisra, ishumburmera tulaamba purrabelan waminchibelѳ guer.
Indiibe Trѳaskurri barcѳyu nebamba, Samѳtraciasrѳmay kanmaytѳ ke purab amba, katѳ gwalѳmbe Neápѳlissrѳ pua,
Indig trusrѳ Pablѳbe yem kan piab lataig asig tѳgagúig kѳn. Truyube kan mѳg Macedѳnia birausriig pasramisra trenchib miab pasrai ashibig kѳn: Macedѳniasrѳmay larraamѳ cha, namun purugunrrab.
Misia birѳ buluwan yabwandѳ puraamba, Trѳassrѳ kѳrraambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha nѳmbe Frigia birѳwanba, Galacia birѳwanbabe ka purab ambubelѳ gѳn, kaguende Asia birausrѳmbe Espíritu Santѳ Tiuswei wamwan waminchibashmuben.

Incha nѳmbe tru pueblѳmerawan puraambub ambimѳrig, Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ tru Jerusalénsrѳ purrabelѳ, maig marѳb gѳnrrai karuilane isua mѳrѳb gѳnrrai eshkab ambubelѳ gѳn trusrѳ Tiuswei ureemeran.
Inchen Timѳteѳbe tru Listrasrѳ, Icѳniѳsrѳ nunelai utu, chigucha tamgaig tabig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha Pablѳba, Bernabéba Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba truyu truba yana kѳrrѳmisra waraig kѳbig gѳn.
Incha Perge ciudayu Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenana, trugurrimbe Ataliasrѳmay amrrubelѳ gѳn.

Incha truyugurrimbe barcѳyu nebamba, Siria birau Antiѳquíasrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn. Tru nѳm mѳi ya patsѳga bѳnrraigwan martrab amrrai Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indiitѳga tabig ashib tѳgagúilѳ gѳnrrigay chib, tru nѳmun pѳnsraig kѳbiisrѳmay.
Incha iglesiamѳrig nѳmbe Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ wesrawa bѳnsra, Tiusba waminchib, ayunab guabe, nѳmune tru nѳm kѳrewa bѳnrraig Señѳr nѳ ashchai pѳnsrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Incha Derbesrѳ Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenana, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳ nѳrrѳ nemisrtrai mara, trugurrimbe Listramayba, Icѳniѳmayba, Antiѳquíamayba katѳ amrruig kѳbig kѳn.
Trune Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe nuin bѳtѳgatan tulundzunѳben, nѳbe kurra, katѳ ciudayu kebibig kѳn. Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳba, Bernabéba Derbesrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳm ѳyeeg chib waminchagucha, nѳmbe misaameran ke trendѳ merѳnrrab gaimabsrubelѳ gѳn, tru nѳmun tiusmera gúi mara tѳrѳmeran kweecha tranmѳnrrai.

Inchen gѳben managucha nuimburabigwane maig kuigwan eshkab wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha, tabig marѳb. Srѳmbalasrѳngurri srewan ѳrѳb, ellmariilѳ misram bѳlmera pubene, tru gúindѳ, tru gúindѳ misringarunrrun cha, chi palѳmѳ unchaguen mamig tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳb, ñimui manrrѳmeran truba kasraaranѳb.

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Au, yu mayeelѳ pѳnrrabelѳ! ¿Chindimba ѳyeeg martrab inchigue? cha. Nambe ñim latailѳtѳwei ka mѳguelѳtѳ guer cha. Ke ka treeg maranmab ashchaindѳ mariilan elacha, ѳsig wab Tius srѳmbalawan gѳben, tru pirѳwan gѳben, marwan gѳben, chigurrimbunѳ truyu pѳnrrabelan marѳbigweimay llirawa bѳnrramisrtrai, tru tabig srѳ wamwan nambe ñimun waminchab amrruer chib.

Inchen tru tius Zeuswei tab ya, tru ciudayu kebambinuutѳ pasrabigu ashib wab sacerdѳtebe, tѳrѳmera gѳben, umera purѳ tabzheelѳ tamariilѳ gѳben, tru ciudayu kebambi yaskabmerasrѳ srua arrua, tru tѳrѳmeran kweecha, misaamerabamisra, Pablѳnba, Bernabéwanba, nѳmune tiusmera gúi mara trannrrab mendabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe Pablѳ chi marigwan ashippe, nѳmui Licaѳnia rriimay trenchib trashib mendabelѳ gѳn: ¡Mѳguelѳ lataig, tiusmera namuinug kѳrrѳrruin gѳn! chib.
Inchabe tru mѳѳbe Pablѳ waminchen mѳrѳb wabig kѳn. Inchen Pablѳbe nun ke tab asha, ke tamarig kѳmuitamab isub wai ashabe,
Incha trusrѳ tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Pablѳba, Bernabébabe trunun wammѳra Licaѳnia birau tru Listraba, Derbeba, pueblѳmerasrѳmayba, katѳ tru buluwan gatѳganbalѳmerasrѳmayba trubab ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru ciudayu misaamerabe kan utuelѳbe judíѳsmeraingatѳ gѳben, mѳilѳbe Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilaingatѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Trune judíѳsmera Jesucristѳn kѳremeelѳbe tru judíѳs kѳmeelane ke kaig isumne inchibelѳ gѳn tru Pablѳimburappa, Bernabéweimburappa.
Inchen gatѳganelane: Tablamerayu gúi, kabe tru barcѳ nѳѳrѳtiig misra wegѳrriilѳyu gúi ambay chibig kѳn. ѳyeeg inchib melѳwa mayeelѳba pirausrѳ ѳsig pubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen suldaumerabe tru kailan keeri yau bѳnrrabelan srua amrruilan kwetchab isubelѳ gѳn, wegѳrra amba mѳikkucha lulmѳnrrai.

Incha barcѳn imѳnrrai merrarrabig tru kuatsig tsandzѳn piu kegutsigwan piu wamnetѳ tsimeran parѳppa, trugurrimbe tru barcѳn muba inrrai lliskaigwan lusrig pasrabigwan alaaranѳb, tru isig utabig vela taigwan kusrubene, tru barcѳbe pisrum chaasrѳmay ib mendabig kѳn.
Inchen tru barcѳyu nam mayeelѳ amrrubelѳbe dѳscientѳs setenta y seis kѳbelѳ guer.
mayeelѳba ka mamѳtѳmab isua, nѳmgucha mabelѳ gѳn.
Trunun chab waminchabe, Pablѳbe nui tasku pirriwan muta, mayeelai merrab Tiuswan mayanguen pay cha, pirisha, trugurrimbe mab pѳlbasren,
Inchawei nabe tiusmanda ka may tamѳnrrun cha, pѳs ñimui asr tabig chishtѳ gѳnrrai. Kaguende ñimune mѳigwandѳgucha kan pusruutѳguen mindisaig kѳnrraamѳn cha.
Inchene suldaumerabe tru ѳsig webambam barcѳunan merrarrab tsimeran para, piyu ibashiptinchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru barcѳ srubelѳ barcѳyugurri wegѳrra amrrab isua, tru merrabmay piu kebusriilѳ tru kuatsig tsandzѳnmeran merrarrab tsimeran yabranѳbelѳ misrѳb, tru kwamѳ ѳsig webambam barcѳunan piu kebenѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳn.
piwan maya umbuig kѳtashchab tsiwan kegucha ashene, treinta y seis metrѳs kѳben, katѳguchi ambuurѳsrѳ katѳ kegucha unaashene, veintisiete metrѳs kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen gѳben, kan pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabiisrѳ barcѳ namunbañau srua ya trusrѳ kebusriilѳ gѳmig nebunrrun chibig kѳn.

Incha nane tru ángelbe trenchitan cha: Pablѳ, chi kѳrig kui inchimѳta cha. Kaguende ñibe Rѳma maya misagwan karub ashib wabig César purѳ nuigwei merrab pasramig palѳnrrab gúimba, barcѳyu ñiba amrrub gѳbelan Tiusbe mayeelanba ѳsig webambamig kѳnrrai martrun chitan cha.
Treeg kuindѳgucha tru isuptѳ chi kullaaramugun chinrrab inchar cha, kaguende barcѳbe chab pinindѳgucha, ñimbe mѳikkucha kwanrraamѳn cha.
Inchen truba yam gwalѳm kan pѳrr guenamisrmѳweih, estrellamera kenamisrmѳwei inchen, purѳ rrѳmbѳig isig ichib pi welarmera namab gurrѳben, yandѳ ѳsig webammumuitamaptѳwei isub melabelѳ guer.
pѳn gwalѳmyube tru barcѳyu chi palabelan trendѳ truyu tѳgagúilan nѳmashib pinѳbusrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Indig katѳ gwalѳm purѳ rrѳmbѳig namab isig ichib kurrѳben, barcѳ niga arrigwan pinѳbusrѳb menda,
Incha kan pirѳ, pi tѳbѳtag pasrabig Cauda tainug isig srѳrrѳgatѳmay purѳrrub amrrua, truba rruba inchib melѳwa, tru kwamѳnrrab webambig tru kan lamѳ barcѳzhigwan nemѳrѳbelѳ guer.
yandѳ barcѳbe isig ichibig srua yaig kuig kѳppe, tru isig ichibigwane kamara ambamgaig kѳben, yandѳ isig ichibig srua inrraindѳ ka burrabelѳ guer.

Inchen sursrѳngurri kan kaizhig isig ichibig webarruben, chu bunrrab isuigwan yandѳ ke nebuermab isua, barcѳ imѳnrrai merrarrabig kuatsig tsandzѳnwan piugurri wesrawa, yandѳ tru Creta birѳ bulusrѳ kemallib ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳ garub pera basrabiibe ѳyeeg maramdiig kѳn cha Pablѳ wamindigwane mѳrmѳtѳ, tru barcѳ srubigwanba, barcѳ buaigwanba, truilangѳba mѳrѳppe, Pablѳne mѳrmíig kѳn.

Nai lincha amrrubelѳ, i barcѳyu ambamibe barcѳn mindisainab, katѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ ka yandѳ pinѳnrrab gúi ashar cha, barcѳ chigѳben niga arriilѳ lata, barcѳ lata yandѳ ka pinѳben, katѳ namdѳweinguen kwamigwan lanrrun chib.
Incha mendawandѳ ke trendѳ chab gaimab purѳrrub amrrua, kanbalѳ Buenѳs Puertѳs taisrѳ pubelѳ guer, Lasea ciuda bulusrѳ.
Incha truyu suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳ garub pera basrabiibe kan barcѳ Alejandría birausriig Italiamay inrrabig pasrain gúi wetѳrrawa, truyu amrrab, namun nebambingarubig kѳn.
Incha Sidóngurri webambabe, Chipre birѳ pi tѳbѳtag pasrabiisrѳ isig srѳrrѳ guetawan puraambub ambubelѳ guer, kaguende isig ichibiibe ambamgaig merrammay megambub ichen.

Incha adramitiѳsriig kan barcѳ Asia birau, tru barcѳs buisrѳmay webinrrab inchib pasrѳben, nambe truyu nebambubelѳ guer. Inchen nambabe Aristarcѳ kan Macedѳnia birausriig Tesalónica ciudayuikkucha arrubig kѳn.
Incha Agripabe Festѳn trenchibig kѳn: Pablѳ nѳashib César asha marig kѳnrrab chib miamuig kuimbe, pѳs nѳbe elatsikken gѳbsruinrrun cha.
Inchen rey kurra pasramisren, kubenadurgucha, Bereniceba kurrѳben, truyu nѳmba purrabelѳgucha kurra, yandѳ webamba,
Inchene Agripabe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Ke yandiitѳgatѳ Tiuswei mayu puraarrua pasramisrtrai indiibe! cha.
¿Nai rey Agripa, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ maig taigwan ñigan treeg kuitamab kѳretirru? cha. Ñibe kѳrewa wain gúi nabe asha basrar cha trenchibig kѳn Pablѳbe.

Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai purѳ tab Festѳ, nabe chugúinguen mѳrmíig kѳmѳtѳ basrar cha. Na waminchippe, ka isatѳ waminchib pasrѳmѳwei, katѳ chiwan waminchib pasrarmab isua waminchib pasrar cha.

Tru Cristѳbe truba rruba kaig nebuinab megawa, trugurrimbe kwawa, nѳmerrig katѳ ѳsiirawa, namui judíѳsmeran lata, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran lata kaigyugurri webambamig tѳrwan eshkab kusrennrrun chib trendailan.
Incha na ѳyeegwan marikkurri judíѳsmerabe Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswei yau nane merrarrawa, kwetchab indig kѳn cha.
Inchawei, nai rey Agripa, tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri piab lataigu kenamisren asigwan nabe mѳrmѳnrrab inchimѳtѳ,

Inchendѳ kurra, pasramisr chibig kѳn. Kaguende nabe ñun kenamisrѳppe, naiwan marѳb megabig kѳnrrai wesrawa basrtrappa, katѳ mѳi naimburab ñui kaptѳga ñi asigwan waminchibig kѳnrraimba, katѳ wendѳsrѳ naimburab maig kuigwan kenamaramigwan eshkabig kѳnrraimba treeg martrab kenamisrar cha.Inchawei nabe ñui misaamerai taskugurri kaig marmѳnrrai wesrab, katѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai taskugurri kaig marmѳnrrai wesrab indamѳnrrun chibig kѳn. Pѳs nabe mѳi trú misaamerayasigwei ѳrar cha,
Inchene nabe: ¿Señѳr mu gugu? chiben, nane Señѳrbe trenchibig kѳn cha: Nabe Jesús, ñi mѳi kaig martrabgѳba indig, nabe truig kur cha.
¡Nai tab rey! mayu kwalѳm dѳbѳtaabe srѳmbalasrѳngurri kan tѳrbilabig pѳrr lataguen gѳmѳ, purѳ tѳrig naingatanba, tru naba ambubelaingatanba pilѳben,

Incha gatѳ, gatѳ judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamѳrig truilane ichabetab ibig kur cha, Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig nѳmun wamingarummѳrѳ inchib. Incha ¡gatѳ! kan nѳmun namig kѳbiitѳ ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib, nabe peg birau ciudamerasrѳnguen kaig martrab wendautѳ ibig kѳbig kur cha.
Pѳs isa gѳmѳ, naguen Nazaretsrѳ Jesúswei munchiwane tsalѳ gѳb chinetѳ martrab isua,
¿Tiusbe kwabelan kwailai utugurri kusrumibe kaimanrretamab isubelѳ gѳ chindah ñimui utube?
Incha mѳimbe tru merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaameran Tius tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan muniirabig kuikkurri, mѳimbe ѳyeeg paya ashib srua gúinab pasrar chibig kѳn.

Inchagucha ñibe judíѳsmera chitѳ, chitѳ marѳbelѳ gúigwan kerrigu ashib, katѳ nam judíѳsmera mandѳ melambuyab amrruigwan chigucha ñibe tab nebua ashibig kuig kѳbene, trube, tiusmanda tammay mѳrtra chinrrab inchar cha.Maya judíѳsmera na matsinѳunѳgurri nabe nai misaamerai utu Jerusalénsrѳ maig tsubig kuigwan ashibelѳ gѳn cha.
Mѳi na naimburab treeg mara basrѳmur chib waminchib pasramig mayaguen tab gúim basrar cha, nai rey Agripai merrab, nan judíѳsmera chigurrimbunѳ ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib gúigwan.
Pѳs kan kailan keeri yau keerig wabigwan chiburѳgurri ѳyeeg kuig kѳn chib gúigwan chi cha eshkamubendѳ, na ѳramibe ke kan ka wainguenig marig lataig bunrrautan chibig kѳn Festѳbe.

Inchendѳ nabe nun kwanrrai maramdiig chigucha chi kaig marmuin gúi wetѳrrab, katѳ tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marig kѳmigwan Augustѳ nѳ asha martrai nѳtѳwei miaig kuig kѳbene, trusrѳmay nabe ѳrtrab isuig kѳn cha.

Indiibe katѳ gwalѳm Agripaba, Bereniceba puppe, purѳ tabig tamarar ke kan chull asamdiig amrruabe, tru chigѳben waminchappa, katѳ wamindiilan mѳrtrappa tru tulundzuniisrѳ kebambambubelѳ gѳn, tru suldaumeran karubelѳ nѳrreelѳ gѳben, katѳ nѳrreelѳ ashib karubelѳ ciudayuelѳ gѳbengue. Inchen Festѳbe Pablѳn pera amrrungaruben, pera bubelѳ gѳn.

Inchendѳ Pablѳbe tru maig kѳnrrabigwan Augustѳ César asha marig kѳnrrab cha, ka ashib tѳgagúig wanrrab cha nѳ miaig kѳbene, treekkurri Césarweisrѳmay na ѳramnegatig nune tab ashib tѳgagѳnrrai karuig kѳbig kѳn cha.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru nuimburab waminchib gúibe, tru Tiusweimburabigwan nѳ marѳb unigwan truikkurrin chabah, katѳ kan mѳg, Jesús taig, kwaig kѳbigwan, Pablѳbe trunun kwaig kѳmѳtѳ, ka ѳsig wan cha, trenchibrre inchen, trugurrimbatѳrre inchib gúin gѳn chibig kѳn.
Incha truilѳ nѳm yusrѳmay naba amrruben, chi srarrѳmѳtѳ, katѳ gwalѳmdѳ, nabe tru maig maramigwan asha marѳb wainug wamisra, tru mѳwan pera amrrunrrai karuig kѳn cha.

Na Jerusalénsrѳmay ya wabene, truigweimburappe sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, judíѳsmeran karubelѳ kѳlli misaameraba, ke chinetѳ gѳn chib nan eshkab amrrubelѳ gѳn cha, Pablѳn truyu mѳra pasrѳnrrai kѳrrѳmara pasramdiig kѳn chib.
Inchen yandѳ mam gwalѳm gѳsrѳn puraiben, rey Agripaba, Bereniceba Festѳn ka uñgu chib tabig wamab punrrab, Cesareasrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.

Kabe na chigѳben kalѳ mara basrain gúi, ñim nan kwanrrai maramdiig na treekkatig kaig mara basrѳbene, nabe kwanrraptѳweim basrar cha. Inchendѳ nѳm ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib gúig ka isiitѳ webibene, mugucha nane truilane trannrrappe kaimanrrun cha. Nabe Rѳmasrѳ tru maya misagweim bala ashib karub wabig César maig maramigwan nѳ asha martrai miamѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Inchendѳ Festѳbe judíѳsmeraba ka tab gѳrrѳmisrѳg kѳptѳ, Pablѳne trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Jerusalénmay attragu? cha, tru ѳyeeg wamindiilan ñuimburabigwan maig kѳnrrabigwan trusrѳ ashchab cha.

Inchen Pablѳ trusrѳ pua kebarrubene, tru judíѳsmera Jerusalénsrѳngurri amrrubelѳbe tulsrua, nune chigѳben truba rruba trѳmbѳig marѳbig kѳn chibendѳ, chigucha ke treeg mariilѳbe, wetѳrranrrab gaimabelѳ gѳn.
Inchawei ñimui utu maig maramigwan ñim asha marѳb pѳnrrabelѳbe Cesareasrѳmay naba kѳrrѳrruy chibig kѳn. I mѳweinug chigѳben kalѳ marig pѳnrrѳbene, trube ѳyeeg mara basran chib truyu waminchab.
Inchen Festѳbe lѳtappe trenchibig kѳn: Pablѳne Cesareasrѳ ashib tѳgagúig wan cha. Naashib trusrѳmay menrra yana gѳmѳwatѳ inrrab isur cha.
maya sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, katѳ judíѳsmeran ashib karubelѳba Pablѳimburab tru treeg puigwan gatѳle kѳnѳgѳnrrab Festѳimay ambubelѳ gѳn,

purѳ balasriig lata, purѳ umbusriig lata, chigurrimbunѳ Tius mara pѳnsrailѳyu kѳbelѳbe mѳikkucha namune chinchagucha tarѳmartrab gaimanrrun tru Tiuswei undag kѳbig namui Señѳr Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabigugurrimbe.
Inchendѳ chigurrimbunѳ ѳyeeg pub arrubigu chinchaingaig kanawa webamba bѳnrrer, tru namun undaarabikkurri.

¿Cristѳi undag kѳbigugurri namune mu gúi tarѳmartrab gѳ? ¿Chine isui melamig pub arrubiiteh, kabe chigѳben murig pui melamig arrubiiteh, kabe kaig indinab melamig arrubiiteh, kabe mamig kaagѳbig parѳ arrubiiteh, kabe asru kemig chigucha kaagѳb arrubiiteh, kabe chigѳben kѳrig kѳmdiig pub arrubiiteh, kabe kweecha betiilѳ gѳmig arrubiiteh?
¿Tius nѳ lawa wesruilane mu gúi ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg kaig marѳbelѳ gѳn chinrrautah? Pѳs, chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnsrѳbiibe, Tius, nѳ gѳn.
¿Trube, iibe ѳyeeg kѳbene, nambe mandѳ chinrrab gѳh? Tiusbe namuingatѳ basrѳbene ¿namune mugѳben sѳtѳbasramisrѳb gurringucha, chigúin gѳnrrautah?
Tius tru manasrѳwei nѳ asiilane manasrѳwei kanmaytѳ lawa wesrabgucha wesraig kuig kѳn, nui Nusrkai maig kѳben, treelѳtѳwei misrtrai, Nusrkaimbe truba nѳrrѳ nunelѳ mayeelai utu nѳmerrig kѳnrrai.

Inchen Tius namui manrrѳmeran maig kѳtashchab umbusrѳngue tab ashibiibe, Espíritu Santѳ nѳ maig isua basraigwan ashibig kѳn. Kaguende Espíritube Tius maig kѳnrrain gѳben, trumay Tiuswei misaamerai purѳwaminchib miabig kѳn.
Inchen nam chi nebua asiimíigwan ke tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua muniirab melѳwabe, munig melabiitѳ munig meler.

Pѳs tru treeg tab gѳmui pѳnrrappe, tru chigurrimbunѳ mara pѳnsrailѳ truilѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Espíritu Santѳn namun pѳlbasra tranigwan uta tѳgarmera namdѳweinguen namui umbu truba rruba mullib pusrkwai inchib lataitѳweim bѳnrrer, Tius tru namun nui trag ureg lataig mariilѳ gѳmigwan truba rruba muniirab, tru namui pirau asrmeran kaigyugurri wesruilѳ gѳmigwan.

tru chigurrimbunѳ mara pѳnsrailѳtѳweinguen minchib trerab inrrai marigugurri mas treramѳnrrai wesrailѳ gѳnrrun, tru Tiuswei ureemera purѳ nuig purѳ tabigu webamba pѳnrraigu truilѳgucha pѳnsrailѳ gѳnrrab.
Tius chigurrimbunѳ mara pѳnsrailѳbe truba rruba ashig kui muniirab gѳn Tiuswei ureemera tѳrguegwalmabelѳ kenamisramigwan.

Trube, nam nui ureemera gúig kѳppe, nѳ keta tranamig tѳgagúigwangucha utѳnrrabelѳ guer, Tius tru keta tranamigwan nam utѳnrrabelѳ gѳb, katѳ Cristѳ utigwan namgucha kanguelarrѳtѳ utѳnrrabelѳ gѳbgue. Pѳs ka yandѳ gѳmѳ, ciertѳn nun chine nebuinab megaigwan namgucha chine puraambub melѳwabe gѳn, nѳba kanbalatѳ tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳ purramig kѳnrraimbe.

Pѳs ñim Espíritu Santѳn utiibe ke larrѳ gwaarѳsra srua gúilѳ lataig kѳrig kuindѳ katѳle treeg melѳnrrai marѳbigwan uta bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, kan trag ureemera lataig kѳnrrai marѳb Espíritu Santѳn utig kѳn. Incha nambe nѳgurri Tiuswan: Abba, nai Mѳskain chib wamabelѳ guer.

kaguende tru trendѳ kaig kuinaigu isubig maig karuben treegwan marѳb amѳñabe, ñimbe kwanrrun Tius malѳ asamikkaig. Inchendѳ tru ñim asru kaig marѳb tѳga bѳnrraigwan Espíritu Santѳtѳga kwai lataig kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarabe, ñimbe managatig Tiusba ѳsig kѳnrrun.

Inchen Tiuswei Espíritu Jesúswan kwailai utugurri katѳle ѳsiirangarubig ñimuinug pasrѳbene, Cristѳn kwailai utugurri tru katѳle kusrubiibe ñimui ka pinѳnrrab asrmerangucha tru nui Espíritu Santѳ ñimuinug pasrabiitѳga ѳsig kѳmigwan tranrrun.

Inchen ñimbe tru ñimui trendѳ kaig kuinaigu isubig maig karuben treegwan mѳra marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Espíritu Santѳ maig amѳñinrrain garuben treeg amѳñibelѳ gѳn. Treetѳgucha Tiuswei Espíritu ñimuinug pasrѳbene gѳnrrun. Pѳs mѳikkѳben Cristѳi Espíritun chigaibe, Cristѳin gѳmѳn.

Pѳs tru trendѳ kaig kuinaigu treeg isub tѳga basraibe Tiuswan tsalѳ isub pasran, kaguende Tiuswei tru maig maramigwan martrai karuilan mѳra martrab inchimѳwei, katѳ truilan martrab gaimabwei indig kua.
Tru trendѳ kaig kuinaigu treegwan marѳb amѳñibelѳbe, ka truburabigwandѳ isuben, trune tru Espíritu Santѳ maig amѳñinrrai inchen treegwan marѳb amѳñibelѳbe, Espíritu Santѳimburabigwan isubelѳ gѳn.

Kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe truburab martrab gaimaigwan Tiusbe marig kѳn, pѳs tru pѳriibe yandѳ truburab martrabgaig kѳben, tru namui trendѳ kaig kuinaigu truikkurri. Inchen Tiusbe nui trag Nusrkai managuen kaig marmíigwan kan kaig marѳb mѳg kui lataig, kaig mariilaimburѳ kwanrrai ѳra, ѳyamay tru kaig marѳb gѳmig namuinug maringarub pasrabigwane chinchaingaig kѳrrѳmara basran,
Inchawei mѳimbe Cristѳ Jesúsba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelaimbe mѳra melѳnrrai maramibe yandѳ chigaagѳn.

¡Pѳs Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa char, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri nan wesranrrab gúi! Inchawei natѳweinguen nai turyu isuitѳgabe Tius martrai karua pasrigu isub megainabendѳ, tru na trendѳ kaig kuinaitѳgabe kaig martrai karua basrigu marѳb megainatan.

Inchendѳ nai asru tasiimera, srѳbmera ѳyeeg chine pѳnrrabigu ѳyeegwan martrai inchibig katѳgan nuin gúi nainug kaig maringarub pasrabig kuin gúi ashar, tru nai turtrawa isuigu maringarub pasrabig tabig karuigwane marmѳnrraingѳba inchib pasrabiiba kwayab, tru nai asru chine pѳnrrabigu kaig maringarub pasrabig, truig kѳn, tru nan ilѳsrka meganrrai nѳ merrarrawa srua ibig.
Inchawei nainug kaig martrai inchib pasrabig kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashar, nabe tabigwan martrab indingucha, tru kaig maramibe nainuube nѳmerrig, nѳmerrig basrabig kuin gúi.
Pѳs tru na mariibe tru tabig martrab isuigwan marmѳtѳ, tru kaigwan marmѳnrrurmab isuigwane marѳptѳ marinatan.
Pѳs treeg kѳbene, tru treeg kaig marigwane yandѳ narre marѳb pasrѳmѳtѳ, tru nainug kaig martrai inchib pasrabig, truirre marѳb pasran.
Pѳs natѳweinguen na marѳb pasraigwane ni mandѳ gúinguen mѳrmuinatan. Kaguende na marinrrabna indigwane marmubendѳ, tru tsalѳ gѳmdiig na marmѳnrrab isuigwane, trube, marѳptѳ marinabig kѳn.

¿Trube, tru treeg tabig kѳbendѳbe nane kwamig kѳnrrai marѳb pasra chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳmѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru kaig mariibe tru tabig martrai pѳrigwan nѳ merrarrawa marѳb pasraitѳga nane kwanrrai mara, ѳyamay kaig mariibe kaig marigwein gѳbig kuin gúi ashchai kenamarig kѳn. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai pasriibe tru kaig marigwane newan kaig kѳbig kui kenamaran.
Inchen kaig maramibe tru maig maramigwan martrai pasrinug nѳ guelula, basramisra, nane purѳ may guebenѳsrka, tru karua basriitѳga nane kwaig lataig mara, Tiusweinukkurri tarѳmartan.

Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig maig maringaruigwan merrabsrѳ chigaig kѳppatѳbe, nabe ѳsiguig kѳbig kur. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai pasrig arrubene, tru kaig maramibe nainuube ke ѳsiirab lata inchen, nabe kwai lataig kѳrrѳmisrinabig kѳn.

¿Trube, treeg kѳbene, mandѳ chinrrab? ¿Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳriibe kaig marѳbig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn. Kaguende tru martrai pѳrig kѳmuimbe, kaig mariibe maig kѳbig kuin gúi nabe nebua ashmubsrubrainrrun. Pѳs tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig: Mendaigweiwane chull asamig kѳmѳn cha, trenchimuig kuimbe, trube, tru mendaigweiwan chull asamibe kalѳ gѳbig kuig nabe nebua ashmubsrubrainrrun.

Katѳ treetѳwei ñim, nai nunelѳgucha, Cristѳi asruelѳ gúikkurri tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigweimburappe ñimbe yandѳ kwai latailѳ kѳrrѳmisrig kuig kѳn, tru katѳganwei misra pѳnrrѳnrrab, Cristѳ tru kwailai utugurri ѳsiirabigwei, nam ѳyamay Tiusweyasig tabig marѳbelѳ gѳnrrab.Kaguende trendѳ kaig marѳb asr namun nѳ garuim bѳnrrab urasbe, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu kaigwan marmѳnrrai tru mera basriibe namune kaigwan martrab isunrrai masken kiagasrѳnanen, tru kaig marѳg kѳbiibe namui asru marѳb pasrabig kѳn, namun ѳyamay kwamigumay srua inrrabigweyasig marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb.

Kaguen kan kasharawa ishuwanma tru maig maramigwan martrai pasriibe keeba nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, kandѳ mara tѳgagѳn keg ѳsig wamnegatiibe. Inchendѳ yandѳ keg kwabene, tru pѳrig nui keeba nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, mara kѳrrѳmarig kѳbigwane nѳbe yandѳ truburappe chi asamikkaig kѳrrѳmisran.Inchawei keg ѳsig wamne, katѳgan mѳѳba kasharabene, truigwane kewan itѳlulѳptѳ ishug kѳn cha, nune treeg wamig kѳrrѳmisrtrun. Inchen nui keg kwabeneguende, tru maig maramigwan pasrig nui keeba nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, kѳrrѳmarig kѳbigwane, yandѳ nѳbe truburappe, chi asamikkaig kѳrrѳmisran. Katѳgan mѳѳba ya, kasharaingucha, yandѳ kewan itѳlulѳptѳ ishug kѳnrraamѳn.
Nai nunelѳ, tru maig maramigwan martrai karuigwan ashibelan nabe waminchar. ¿Ñimbe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, tru maig maramigwan martrai karuibe kan mѳwane ѳsig unamnegatiitѳ nѳ tѳga basrabig kui?

Trune mѳimbe ñimun kaig marѳb melaigugurri yandѳ wesrailѳ, Tius karuindѳ melabelѳ misrikkurrimbe, Tiusweyasiitѳ tarѳmarig bѳnrramig tѳgagѳn. Inchen truikkurri arrubiibe tru managatig ѳsig kѳmig, truig kѳn.
Pѳs tru ñim kaig maramigu trutѳ rrutѳ marѳb gѳb urasma tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maramig ñimun truig nѳ garuimíig amѳñibelѳ gúig kѳn.
Ñimbe kaig marigugurri yandѳ wesrailѳ gua, mѳimbe ñimbe tru sѳlgandѳ tabigweyasig karuindѳ melѳnrrabelѳ misrin gѳn.

¿Ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, ñimma mungѳben nѳ maig karuben treeg karui mѳrѳb melѳrrumѳn cha melamisrabe, nѳ maig karuben ñim mѳra marѳb melai mѳwaimbe nѳ karuindiig melamig kѳbig kuin gúi? Pѳs, tru kaig maramig nѳ garub tѳga basraibe kwamigumay srua iben, Tius maig karuigwan mѳra marig truig karub tѳga basraibe Tiusba tab pѳnrramigumay srua ibig kѳn.
Pѳs tru kaig mariibe ñimune yandѳ nѳ garub pasrѳmѳnrrun. Kaguende yandѳ ñimbe tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig truig karuig melѳmѳtѳ, Tius nѳ ka yandѳ tab indig truig karuin bѳnrran.
Trube, treeg kѳbene, tru kaig maringarub pasrabig tru ñimui patsѳnrrab asru nѳ garub pasrѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ gúig, tru kaig marѳg kѳbig arrubigwan ñim tru gúindѳ maramig kѳmѳnrrai.
Inchawei treetѳwei ñimbe kaig maramigweimburappe yandѳ kaig marmѳnrrab kwailѳ guermab isua bѳnrray. Inchendѳ Tiusweyasiibe Cristѳ Jesúsba kanbalatѳ pѳnrraikkurri ѳsiguelѳ guermab isuague.

Kaguende nambe ashibelѳ guer, Cristѳbe kwabelai utugurri katѳle ѳsiirawa, yandѳ kurrikkurrimbe katѳbe yandѳ mana kwamѳnrrabig kѳben, tru kwangarub pasrabiibe yandѳ nune katѳbe chigucha martrab gaimanrrab gúi.
Kaguende yandѳ kwabiibe, treeg kaig marѳb megamigugurrimbe treeg marmѳnrrab webya basran.
Cristѳ kwaiguma trakkandѳ kanbalatѳ nam nѳba pѳnrrain guabe, treetѳwei nѳ ѳsiirawa kurrigugucha nambe ѳsiirawa pѳnrramig kѳnrrun.
¿Kabe ñimbe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, nam mayeelѳ Cristѳ Jesúswei munchiyu piu umbu ulsrѳbelѳbe, tru nѳ kwaigu namgucha nѳba kanguegѳtѳ nѳ gwab lataitѳwei mara bѳnrrain gúi?
Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿mandѳ chinrrab? ¿Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indig mas nurab larrѳbichib attraimbe, trube, kabe kaig maramigwan marѳbig martrab gѳh?

Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳriibe tabigwane tabig kui ashchaimba, kaig marigwane kaig kui ashchaimba asѳskѳnrrab kebarrubene, tru kaig marѳb itѳbunab gѳmibe masken nurab larrѳbitsig kѳn. Tru kaig marig mas larrѳbichib nurabene, Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe treetѳguen gѳmѳ, purab nuikken nurab larrѳbitsig kѳn.
