Inchen Jѳsébe mѳskawan sѳrѳnrrab nebiben, Faraѳnwan tru nѳ karub waigu purugub purabelѳ nѳrrѳ kѳlli misaameraba, katѳ Egiptѳ pirau nѳrrѳ kѳlli misaameraba, nune linchibelѳ kѳn.

“Nai mѳskaimbe nѳ kwamѳwatѳ, ѳyeegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, ¡katѳ! nane maramѳnrrun tingaruig kѳn cha: ‘Canaan pirausrѳ sѳramig nѳ ashib tamarig pasrabigu, nun trusrѳ sѳramig kѳnrrai.’ Inchawei nai mѳskawan trusrѳ sѳrѳnrrab ibashcha” tan chinrrigay cha, nabe katѳ arrumѳnrrun— cha.
Incha Jѳsébe tru mѳ marѳbelѳ nun purugub pѳnrrabelan nui mѳskawei asrwan minchib irrѳramѳnrrai mѳ marѳb tamarѳngarubig kѳn. Inchen tru mѳ marѳbelѳbe treeg marѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe nui mѳskawei asrwan ira, kishib muchabig kѳn.
Pѳs tru pirѳwanba tru peña trab lalig pasrabigwanbabe, Hititasmeran penig kuig kѳn.—
Truyube Abrahamwanba, nui srai Saranba sѳrab, katѳ Isaacwanba nui srai Rebecanba sѳrab indig kѳn. Katѳ nagucha Lean truyu sѳrig kuig kѳn.

Incha katѳ Jacѳbpe ѳya eshkawa pasrѳbig kѳn: —Nabe nai misaameraba tsunrrab yamig yandѳ lutau kѳtan cha, nai kѳlli misaameraimbulu sѳrѳrrunrrig chibig cha, tru heteѳ Efrѳnwein pirau peña trab pasrabigu,
Inchen Benjamínbe kan larrѳ namig lѳbѳ lataig kѳn, lѳtsѳbe nui kemѳra mamigwan ma, maabene unchibelan pirishibig.”

Ñui mѳskaimbe tru maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan ñun tranѳppe, nai mѳskalѳ tru maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nan trani lataitѳguen kѳmѳ tranig kѳn, managatig tru pѳnrrab tunmerasrѳngatig. Tru iig mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai traniilѳbe, Jѳséwei turbala kѳnrrain kѳn, nui nunelai utugurri tru lawa wesruigweinug.

nѳ srua pasrai arcѳne chigucha kullaaramѳ srua pasraig kѳn, tru Jacѳbwei maramburab marѳb kwalmeragurri. ¡Mayanguen ungua ungua tru Jacѳbwei Mugucha Chindamga Tiuswan. Truikkurrin kѳn, tru Ubisha Ashibig, tru Israelwei kan peña lataig.
“Inchen Jѳsébe kan larrѳ may utiguitsin tusr lataig kѳn, may utiguichib pi menda pasrab lataig. Tsiurѳzheelѳ nebib ibiibe tru pirѳbanrrimerasrѳ nebib ib lataig.
Neftalíbe kan ishug panzhig chi ilѳsrkaimíig uñibig lataig kѳn, larrѳ tab pan-ureezheelѳ peraig.
“Aserbe larrѳ may mamiimera mabig kѳnrrun. Incha nѳbe reywei mamiimera lataig manrrai pѳnsrѳnrrun.
“¡Jehѳvá, ñi kaiyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan muniirar!”
Danbe kan may menda tsub ul lataig kѳn, tsachippe kwetchab tsachib ul may menda tsubig lataig, kaullin chiñimerayu tsacha, itѳguana wabigwan wendѳmay palasig kebinab kutsingarubig.”
Tru muba webya yamga tul-unѳbe larrѳ tabig, pirѳbe larrѳ chull asamdѳ pirѳ kѳb, katѳ pishindѳ tab tsumdiig kѳb kѳben, nѳbe karga niga inrrab lligwan kegucha, ka karuindѳ megabig misrig kѳn.
Inchen Zabulónweinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe mar mendawan warѳnrrabelѳ kѳben, truyube barcѳsmera chi isumgaig pub lliramig kѳnrrabig kѳn. Inchen nui linderѳsmerabe Sidѳnsrѳngatig lulrrabelѳ kѳn.
Judabe nui burrune uvas tusryu lichippe, lluig lamѳ burru unѳzhigwane purѳ tab tusr srѳlyu licha pasran. Nui kewa kuigwane vinѳtѳga tsarѳppe, nui pala itѳ kewa kuigwane uvas anim piyu tsaran.
Inchen ñi, nai nusrkai Judábe, kan matsinѳ leѳn lataig, nѳ kemѳrigwan chab mabe, kan kѳli leѳn lataig pirau purѳ mѳg ashib tsumisrѳptinchibig lataig kѳn. ¿Nune mugui kebacha ashchautah?

Larrѳ tsag inchib namig kurriiba, nѳmui namikkѳbigu lastimagaig trѳmbѳig mariibabe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuig kѳbash cha.Nabe Jacѳbwei piraugurrimbe ke nuinguindѳ misrtrai mara, Israel pirau ke truѳrѳ amba warѳnrrai maramѳnrrun.
Simeónba Levíbabe nunelѳ kѳben, nѳmui espadamerabe ka kwayab misag kweechib tѳgagѳmiitѳ kѳn cha.
Ñi, Ruben, nai mayur nusrkai, na unѳtѳ misag larrѳ chishig kua ke srѳtѳ tѳgaguig unѳ, tabig kui asig kѳmiguba, katѳ chi maramig nuig kѳmiguba ñimerrig kѳn cha.
Kemalay cha, mѳrtrab, Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳ. Mѳray cha, ñimui mѳskai Israel wamindigwan.
Génesis 49
Incha nabe ñui nunelan lataguen kѳmѳ, ñibe purab nuig kuikkurri Siquén pirѳwan, amѳrreѳsmeraba na truba truba nai espadatѳgaba, nai arcѳtѳgaba kwayawa tѳgaguim pirѳwan tranar— cha.

Incha tru kwalѳm Jacѳbpe mayanguen tabiitѳ nebuig kѳmigwan ѳyah chib tranѳbig kѳn: —Israel misaamera mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nѳm tranѳppe, ñimui munchiwan wamab tѳga pѳnrrѳnrrun cha: “Efraínwanba, Manaséswanba lataitѳwei, Tius ñimun treeg martrain”— chib. Incha Manaséswan wendau pasra, Efraínwan merrab pasrig kѳn.
Incha Jѳsébe mѳskawane trenchibig kѳn: —ѳyan kѳmѳtѳ cha, iig kѳn cha, mayurbe iigweimbala ñui kusrmay tasigwan estsar— cha.

tru nan chine kaig pubigugurri wesrub Ángel i pagatѳ matsѳreg-ureemeran maya nuguen tabiitѳ nebuig kѳnrrai martrunrrig chib. Incha iilѳgurri nai munchiba, nai mѳskalѳ Abrahamweimba Isaacweimba munchimerabe pѳnrrabig pѳnrrѳnrrun cha. Nѳmbe pirau nѳrrѳ karrab purѳ nѳrrѳ larrѳbitchai.

Treeg pѳnsraindѳgucha Israelbe nui kwalmeran ambumay imay yunѳmarѳppa nui kusrmay tasigwane Efrainwei turbala estsarѳbig kѳn, wendѳ nusrkain kuindѳgucha. Nui atsimay tasigwane Manaseswei turbala estsarѳbig kѳn, truibe mayur nusrkain kuindѳgucha.
Inchen Jѳsébe uregwan nui mѳskawei srѳb utѳyugurri tarѳmarѳppa, kappalѳwan pirausrѳ kebatamnegatig utsѳbasrѳbig kѳn

Israelbe yandѳ purѳ kѳlliizhig kuig kua, yandѳ nui kabzheelѳbe tѳr pilѳmuben, tab ashchab kaimabig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsebe nui ureemeran nui mѳskaweim pulu kemalsrѳben, nѳbe muchab, irab inchibig kѳn.
Incha Israelbe Jѳséwei nusrkalan ashiptinchabe, payibig kѳn: —¿Iilѳbe mumera kѳh?— cha.
Inchen ñi tru wendau ureemera tѳgagui nusrkalѳbe ñuielѳ kѳnrrun cha. Incha nѳmbe Efraínweimba, Manasesweimba nunelѳ kuig kѳppe, truilai munchiyu pirѳ ketig utѳnrrun cha

ѳyeeg cha kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn cha: “Nabe ñune ureg purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai marѳb, misag sѳtѳmera purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Incha nabe ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane i pirѳwan tranen, managatig i pirѳbe nѳmuin kѳnrrun” taig kѳn cha.
Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Maramburab Marѳb Tiusbe Canaán pirau Luz ciudayu kenamisra, nane mayanguen tabigwan trana,
Inchen Jacѳbwane eshkabelѳ kѳn: —Ñui nusrkai Jѳsé ñun ashchab pun— cha. Inchen nѳbe ke kaimatѳzhig kѳbendѳ, truba tranrra, camayu kurra, wamisra,
Génesis 48

Inchen Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —‘¡Katѳ! Marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun’ chirra— cha. Inchen Jѳsébe: —¡Katѳ! Marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun— chibig kѳn. Inchen Israelbe nui pѳtѳnaig tsig pala utsѳbasrѳptinchibig kѳn.

Israel ѳsig tsum kwalѳmmera yandѳ patsѳnrrab kѳben, nui nusrkai Jѳséwan wamѳnrrab ѳrabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Na ñuin kabyu tabig asѳnaig kuinabene, tiusmanda ñui tasigwan nai srѳptsim umbu estsar cha. Treeg marѳppe na maig miaigwane trunune martrunrrig cha undaatѳga. Incha nan purѳ nu lastima ashib, martrab kѳrrѳmisrigwane martrunrrig chibig kѳn. Tiusmanda nane Egiptѳsrѳmbe sѳrѳmѳrrunrrig chibig kѳn.
ѳyamay israelitasmerabe Egiptѳ pirau warѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisrig kuig kѳn, Gѳsén pirau. Incha nѳmbe truyu pirѳmera merrarrawa waramisra, nѳmbe truyube wereg nѳrrѳ tѳgagua, larrѳ nu misrig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñibe nam ѳsig warѳnrrai martan cha. Nѳ yangucha tab indigwan nambe uta tѳga pѳnrrer cha. Nambe Faraón karuindѳ melabelѳ kѳmѳnrrun— chibelѳ kѳn.
Incha Jѳsébe misaameran trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳimbe ñimba ñimui pirѳmerababe Faraónweyelѳ kѳn cha, nabe nuyasig penig kѳn cha. Ñimbe yu yellmera tѳgagѳn cha, pirѳmeran ellmaray chibig kѳn.
Incha egipciѳsmerabe Egiptѳ pirau muba kuimburab nѳmbe ka karuindeelѳ melѳnrrab melamisrig kѳbig kѳn.

Namui pirѳmerabañau ¿ñigan nam kwanrrai kѳnrraindeh? cha. Ñi namunba, namui pirѳmeranba penѳrray cha, mamiiba yunѳmariilѳ kѳnrrai. Trumaybe nambe namui pirѳmerabañau nambe Faraónwei misra karuindeelѳ melamѳnrrun cha. Inchendѳ yellmera nam mamig kѳben, ellguamelѳ kѳben, trannrra cha, nam ѳsig waramig kѳnrraimbe, katѳ pirѳmeragucha lelatsiilѳ pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai.—

Inchen egipciѳsmerabe nѳmui ushameran srua amrrubelѳ kѳn, kaullimera kѳben, ubishamera kѳben, cabrasmera kѳben, burrumera kѳben, waramera kѳben. Incha tru ushameraba yunѳmara, tru pilawan mamiimera tranѳbig kѳn.

Inchen yandѳ Egiptѳ pirau lata, Canaán pirau lata chigucha anga patsѳben, maya egipciѳmerabe Jѳséweimay amrrua trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Namun ñi mamiimera pѳnsrѳrra cha. ¿Namgan ñui merrab kwamig kuitarru? cha, namun kerrigu an patsinukkurrindѳ.
Yandѳ muba pirѳ kuimburab chigucha mamig chigaaben, trune parѳbe chindamdiig kѳben, Egiptѳ pirau lata, Canaán pirau lata parѳ arrubigu yandѳ misaamerabe kwamitѳ palabig kѳn.

Inchen Jacѳbpe Faraónwan trenchibig kѳn: —Na amburab, iburab llirab uniibe pilamera cientѳ treinta kѳn cha. Na ѳsig uniibe menrra yam pilamera kѳmѳwei, katѳ murig kuig kѳn cha. Tru nai kѳlli misaamera nѳm llirab amѳnain pilamerababe trugatig nebumum kѳtan. —cha.
Incha Jacѳbpe Faraónwan mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrig chib, truyugurri ungua cha ibig kѳn.
Trugurri Jѳsébe nui mѳskai Jacѳbwangucha pera ya, Faraónwan, ‘iibe nai mѳskain kѳn’ cha eshkabig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe Faraónwan ‘mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrig’ chibig kѳn.
Inchene Faraonbe Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskaimba, ñui nunelѳba ñiba warѳnrrab amrruin kѳn cha.

Incha katѳ trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe i pirau kan maya yanatѳ warѳnrrab amrruer cha, kaguende nam ñui karuig melabelai ubishameraimbe Canaán pirau nam waraisrѳmbe chi pu kaagѳn cha. Trusrѳmbe parѳbe ni chindamguchagaig pasran cha. Inchagurri nam ñui karuig melabelan tiusmanda Gѳsén pirau namun warѳbashibsrumѳgue chinrrab inder— cha.
Incha Gѳséngurri attraptѳ trattrѳgatѳ nui nunelan lawa wesrua, Faraónwei merrab pera arrubig kѳn, ‘nai nunelѳ kѳn’ cha eshkanrrab.
Génesis 47
Inchawei Faraón ñimun wama: “¿Ñimbe chi marѳbelѳ kѳgue?” cha payene,
Pѳs nѳmbe ubisha ashibelѳ waara karrѳgѳbelѳ treelѳ kѳn chinrrab. Incha nѳmui ubishameran kѳben, waarameran kѳben chigurrimbunѳ nѳm tѳgaguilan kѳben srua amrrun” cha.
Inchen Israelbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳimbe ñun na ashib asha, ñi ѳsig ka wabig kuin kui wetѳrrawabe, nabe chi isumѳ, ka kwamѳnrrun— cha.
Inchen Jѳséwei ureemerabe pagatѳ kuig kѳn, Egiptѳ pirau kal-lawar. Inchawei Jacѳbwei yau misaamerabe Egiptѳsrѳmbe setenta puig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mayeelѳ Jacѳbpa Egiptѳ pirau nuikkurri amrrub misaamerabe pubelѳbe sesenta y seis kuig kѳn, nui aniyugurri ureemera nusrkalai sralan munchimuben.
Inchen Neftaliwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Jahzeel kѳben, Guni kѳben, Jezer kѳben, Silem kѳbengue.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Jacѳbweimba Raquelweinukkurrimba amrrub ureemera kerrigube catѳrcegue.
Inchen Benjamínwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Bela kѳben, Bequer kѳben, Asbel kѳben, Gera kѳben, Naamán kѳben, Ehi kѳben, Rѳs kѳben, Mupim kѳben, Hupim kѳben, Ard kѳbengue.
Inchen Jacѳbwei srai Raquelwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Jѳséba, Benjamínba.

Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Zilpa Jacѳbwei tѳgagui nusrkalѳ. Tru Zilpabe karuindiig mendig megabig kuig kѳn, tru Laban nui nimbasr Lean keta trani ishug. Tru Zilpainukkurri amrrub ureemerabe kerrigube dieciséis kuig kѳn.
Inchen Gadwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Zifión kѳben, Hagui kѳben, Ezbón kѳben, Suni kѳben, Eri kѳben, Arѳdi kѳben, Areli kѳbengue.

Truilѳ kuig kѳn tru Padan-aramsrѳ warab uras Lea Jacѳbwei tѳgagui nusrkalѳ, katѳ tru Dina nui nimbasrba. Inchawei truyugurri amrrub misaamera mѳguelan kѳben, ishumburmeran kѳben munchene kerrigube treinta y tres kuig kѳn.
Inchen Zabulónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Sered kѳben, Elón kѳben, Jahleel kѳbengue.
Inchen Leviwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Gersón kѳben, Cѳat kѳben, Merari kѳbengue.
Inchen Simeónwei nusrkalѳbe Jemuel kѳben, Jamin kѳben, ѳhad kѳben, Jaquin kѳben, Zѳhar kѳben, katѳ kan Canaánsrѳ ishuwei nusrkai Saúl kѳbengue.
Katѳ trugurri Rubenwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Hanѳc kѳben, Falu kѳben, Hezrón kѳben, Carmí kѳbengue.
Tru israelitasmera Egiptѳ pirau kebambubelai munchimerabe iilѳ kѳn, tru Jacѳb nuinukkurri amrrub misameraba: Rubén Jacѳbwei mayur nusrkai.
Nui nusrkalѳ kѳben, nui nimbasrmera kѳben, nui awelu ureemera kѳben, nui awela ureemera kѳben mayeelѳ nuinukkurri amrrub misaamera nѳba ambig kѳn.

Incha yandѳ Jacѳb Beersebagurri webibene, Israelwei nusrkalѳbe nѳmui mѳskai Jacѳbwan kѳben, nѳmui ureemeran kѳben, nѳmui sralan kѳben, tru Faraón amrrunrrai carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilѳ trana ѳriilѳyu amrrab nebambingarubelѳ kѳn.
Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe Tius kur cha, tru ñui mѳskawei. Tius. Egiptѳ pirausrѳmay kѳrrayamig chi kѳrig isumѳta cha. Nabe ñune ñigurri purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha trusrѳ.
Incha Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai Jѳsé katѳgucha ѳsig wabig kuin kui yandѳ tsabѳ ashar cha. Na kwamѳwatѳ nabe ashchab yamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.Génesis 46
Incha Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai Jѳsé katѳgucha ѳsig wabig kuin kui yandѳ tsabѳ ashar cha. Na kwamѳwatѳ nabe ashchab yamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.

Incha trusrѳ puabe, trenchiptinchibelѳ kѳn: —Jѳsébe ka ѳsig wan cha. Egiptѳ pirau muba kuimburab nѳ karub ashib wabig kuin kѳmѳh— cha. Inchen Jacѳbwei manrrѳbe pasram kwarѳptinchibig kѳn, kaguen nѳbe kѳremuig kua.
Inchen nѳmbe Egiptѳ piraugurri nebambub amba, Canaán pirausrѳ pubelѳ kѳn, nѳmui mѳskai Jacѳb waisrѳ.

Incha nui mѳskaweyasiibe iilan trana ѳrѳbig kѳn: Egiptѳ pirau purѳ tabelѳ tѳgaguilan pa trattrѳ burrusmerayu niisra ѳriilѳba, katѳ pa trattrѳ cargas burramerayu tirigu niisra ѳriilѳba, katѳ pirrimera kѳben, mamiimera kѳben niisra ѳrѳbig kѳn, mѳskai maywan mab arrumig.
Inchen Israelwei nusrkalѳbe treeg marѳbelѳ kѳn. Pѳs Faraón maig karuben Jѳsébe carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilan pѳnsrѳb, mayuwei ishiimera tranѳb inchibig kѳn.
Katѳ ñibe nѳmune treeg karunrrig cha: “Yu Egiptѳ pirau carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilan srua ambingaru cha, nѳmui sralan kѳben, ureemeran kѳben ñui mѳskawan kѳben pera amrrumig.
Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nunelan Canaán pirausrѳmay nѳmui ushamerayu niisra amrrai karu cha.
Inchen Faraón nѳ waig yausrѳmbe wam pubig kѳn: “Jѳsewei nunelѳ chab puin kѳn” tan chib. Inchen Faraónba tru nui maramigwan marѳb purrabelѳ nѳrreelѳbabe kasraarabelѳ kѳn.
Incha Jѳsébe nunelan muchawa, truba truba kishib irabig kѳn. Inchen nunelane wamindamig wam larraibig kѳn.

Nai papáwan eshkanrrigay cha Egiptѳ pirau kerriguwan ashib na karub waigube chigurrimbunѳ kѳn cha katѳ ñim kerrigu chi asiilanba. ¡Ñimbe mallatѳ amba!, yusrѳmay nai papáwan pera amrrunrrigay— chibig kѳn.

Nabe ñun truyu ashib tѳgagѳrrumѳn cha, kaguen katѳgucha trattrѳ pila ѳrѳba tru parѳbe arrubig attrab kѳn cha. Trengѳmuisruandѳbe ñiba, ñui ureemeraba, ñui kerrigu chi tѳgaguilѳbañau larrѳ lastimailѳ misra kѳrrѳmisrtrabguen’ cha.

Inchawei ñimbe mallatѳ incha, nai mѳskawei yamay amba, trenchinrrigay cha: “Ñui nusrkai Jѳsébe ѳyah tan cha: ‘Tiusbe nane Egiptѳ pirau kerriguba na karub wanrrai wandan’ cha. Incha ‘nan ashchab ‘pebatѳ’ amѳ’ tan chinrrigay cha.
Incha Tiusbe manawei nanmerrig ѳrig kѳbig kѳn cha, ñim pirau ka ѳsig warѳwa, larrѳ tab webamba pѳnrramig puben, trumay misaamera larrѳbichibig larrѳbichib kѳnrrai.

Inchendѳ ñimbe chi kullaarab isui inchimѳtay cha. Ñim nan yusrѳmay yanig kѳbigwan karrengucha ѳyeeg marѳbraitamab isumѳtay cha. Nane Tius ѳrig kѳn cha, manawei nanmerrig inrrai, misaameran kwamѳ ka ѳsig puramrrai martrab.

Incha Jѳsébe nui nunelane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Nabe Jѳsé kur cha. ¿Nai mѳskaingan tab ka wabig kuitarru?— cha. Inchen nunelѳbe larrѳ kѳrrѳ kwaara, ni chigucha lѳtѳnrrab kaimaptinchibelѳ kѳn, nѳmbe nui merrab ni mumayguen kѳmuilѳ pѳnrrѳwa.
Incha nѳbe trasha, trasha kishen, egipciѳsmerabe wammѳren, katѳ Faraónwei yau misaameragucha wammѳren inchibelѳ kѳn.
Génesis 45
Inchawei tiusmanda, nabe ñun treeg marѳbsrumu chinrrab cha, matsinaimburѳ na purѳbasramisrtrur cha, na ñui karuindiig meganrrab, matsinѳ-unѳbe nui nunelѳba katѳ inrrai.

Incha na ñui karuig megabiibe matsinan na purѳbasramisrѳb na ashchab misrig kѳn cha, nai mѳskawei merrab. Incha nabe nai mѳskawane trendaig kѳn cha: “Na katѳle ñuimay pera arrumuinabene, trube, nagurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, na chu uraskatig nai ѳsig tsuigu” cha.
namui mѳskaimbe nun ashmuppe, kwanrrun cha. Inchen nam kѳmѳnrrun cha, namui mѳskai kѳlli misagwan isubiitѳgatѳ kwamig kѳnrrai marѳbelѳbe.
Katѳ iigwangucha pera amben, katѳ chigѳben kѳptinchene, na kѳllig waachawan isubiitѳgatѳ kwamig kѳnrrai marѳbelѳbe ñim kѳnrrabguen” cha, nane trendaig kѳn cha.
Indig kane nainukkurri ya yandѳ pinѳben, katѳbe managuen ashmur cha. Namig ushamera pitis marig kuitamab isur tan cha.
Inchen nambe namui mѳskawane trendaig kѳn cha: “Namui wendѳ nuneg arrumuingatiibe nambe chincha ambamgaig kѳn cha. Namun nѳ linchimubene, tru karubigwane asamig kaagѳn” cha.
Inchene nam ñui karuig melabelane ñibe trendaig kѳn cha: “Ñimui wendѳ nuneg ñimba arrumuingatiibe, trube, kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay” cha.
Inchen nambe namui karubigwan yamba trendaig kѳppeh cha: “Matsinѳbe mѳskawane chincha elatchaamѳn cha, kaguende nѳ elachene, mѳskaimbe kwanrrun” cha.
Inchene ñi maig chiben nam treeg pѳnrrabelane ñibe trendaig kѳmѳh cha: “Na ashchab tru wendѳ nunewane pera amrrunrrigay” cha.
Ñi namui karubiibe namune ѳyeeg chib payig kѳbig kѳn cha: “¿Ñimbe katѳgucha mѳskawan ka wannar kѳgueh, kabe katѳgan nuneg kui tѳgar kѳgueh?” chib.

Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Kan nabe treebe mana marѳb pasramѳ cha. Tru cѳpan nuinug wetѳrrainabiitѳh nai karuindiig meganrrab kѳrrѳmisrtrun cha. Ñimbe chi isumѳ, ñimui mѳskaweisrѳmay ka ambay— chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Ñimbe ѳyeebe mumay marѳb pѳnrrѳngue? cha. Kan mѳg chi chippe treegwan kѳnrrai inchibig na lataibe ñim chi kalѳ martrab indigwan kabe wetѳbeñmѳnrraitamagueh— cha.
Inchen nunelѳbe nѳmui kewa pѳnrraigwan larrѳ isuin pѳnrrai ashchai kenamartrab kѳlsrѳptinchibelѳ kѳn. Incha nѳm mѳitѳgucha nѳmui burrumeran katѳ niisra, ciudasrѳmay katѳle chab llirabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe mallazhiitѳ niisraigwan chab pinѳsrua, mѳitѳgucha kustalmeran pirau pѳnsra tsusaigwan pichibelѳ kѳn.
Inchen nam ñui karuig melabelainug mѳigweinug kѳben, tru cѳpan wetѳrrainabiibe, truibe kwamig kѳnrrain cha. Inchen namguen ñui karuindiig melabelѳ kѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisramѳnrrun— chibelѳ kѳn.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ kѳn: —¿Tru namun ashib karubiibe namune chindimbarre ѳyeeg chinetѳ tah? cha. ¡Kan! nambe managuen treekkѳliibe mara kѳmer cha.
Inchen tru yau ashib wab mѳѳbe wetѳgabe, Jѳsé maig taigwan treetѳweih chibig kѳn.
Nan karub pera pasrabig truyu muchib, chi purainrrabigwan truyu nebua ashib indin cѳpan. Ñimgui purѳ kalѳ marin kѳn”— cha.
Inchen yandѳ ke chab tѳr-rrabendѳ tru mѳguelane Jѳsebe ambasingarubig kѳn, nѳmui burrumeranba.
Incha tru wendѳ nunewei tirigu kustal trigube nai cѳpa andѳga marigwan wayrrig cha tru tiriguburѳ nѳ an pagaraigwanba kanbalatѳ.—Inchen tru yau ashib wabiibe Jѳsé maig karuigwan marѳbig kѳn.
Génesis 44

Inchen Jѳséwei nunelѳbe nui merrab purrabelѳ kѳn, Jѳsé maig purramisringaruben, treekke. Kerrigu mayurmerrig, trugurrimbe tru wendauig treetѳ, treetѳ nѳm maya yanailѳ kѳben, trumay treeg purrѳnnѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe truba kwaariilѳ purrabelѳ kѳn, nѳmbe ¡katѳ! kangurri, kangurri asiyab.
Incha yandѳ awentawa, nui malѳwan kwalla, webarruabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Mamiimera nѳm manrrai pѳnsray— cha.

Inchen Jѳsébe nuin pѳtѳgatan ashabe, tru kan mѳskaindѳ, kan usrindѳ kuikkurri nuimbe trag nuneg Benjamín pasrai ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: —¿I tru ñimui wendѳ nuneg kuitarru cha, tru ñim nan wamindig?—Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: —Tius maya nuguen ñun tab indig kѳnrrain cha, nai nusrkai.—
Inchen yandѳ Jѳsé yau pubene, nѳmbe tru ketamelѳ srua amrruilan keta, nѳmbe Jѳséwei merrab pirausrѳngatig malѳwan trarrѳb utsѳbasrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe ketamelan tamara, Jѳsé israyu pumnegatig muniirabelѳ kѳn, kaguen mamiibe truyu kѳnrrabig kui nѳmbe wammѳra purrѳwa.
trugurrimbe Jѳsé waisrѳmay pera ya, nѳmui srѳmmeran kwalamig pi tranѳb, burrumeran mannamig pѳnsrѳb inchibig kѳn.
Incha tirigu penamig anbe katѳ srѳig sruamrruer cha. Inchendѳ nambe tru srѳsrѳ srua amrrui anwane kustalmerayu mu kebusri mѳrmer— cha.
trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Tiusmanda, namui karubig, nambe tru srѳtѳ kѳrrѳrruppe tirigu penѳnrraptѳ kѳrrѳrruig kѳn cha.
Incha yandѳ kebambi yaskabu puabe, tru Jѳséwei yawan ashibigwan nѳmbe waminchab kemallabe,
Inchen tru mѳѳbe Jѳsé maig taigwan mara, Jѳséwei yamay nѳmune pera ibig kѳn.

Inchen Jѳsébe Benjamín nѳmba arrin kui ashabe, tru nui yau ashibigwane trenchibig kѳn: —I mѳguelan nai yamay pera ya, kan waara kweecha tamaray cha, kaguen i mѳguelѳbe kwalѳm tѳbѳtaabe naba manrrab kѳn— cha.
Incha ñimui wendѳ nunewan pera, tru Egiptѳ pirau nѳ karub wabigweimay katѳ ambay chibig kѳn.

Angucha srua ambuppe, maya srua ambig kѳmnetѳ katѳ treetѳweih srua ambay cha. Ñimui tirigu kustalyu tru anmeran katѳle pusrig kѳbigwane trannrrab katѳle srua ambay cha. Inchippa pella treenchib kuin kѳbgun cha.
Chi kѳmѳnrrai nune na asamѳnrrun cha. Na yumay nun katѳle pera arrumuinabene, trube, nagurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, na chu uraskatig nai ѳsig tsuigu.
Inchene Judábe mѳskai Israelwane trenchibig kѳn: —Matsinane na asamѳnrrun cha. Matsinane naba ka ingaru cha, nambe yandѳ ambamѳnrrun cha, ñi lata, nam lata, namui ureemera lata kwamѳnrrappe.
Inchene Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimgui nane purѳ trѳmbѳig kalѳ mariitan cha. ¿Tru mѳwane katѳgan nuneg tѳgaguer chabe, chinchabrre eshkainguaasamѳrra?— cha.
Ñí namui nunewan ka pera ambasheneh, trube, nambe ñuyasig mamig penѳnrrab kѳrraambamѳnrrun cha.
Inchene Judábe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru mѳѳbe namune ¡katѳ! ke kandѳ cha pasrig kuig kѳn cha: “Tru ñimui wendѳ nunewan ñim pera amrrumuingatiibe trube, nan kuimbe kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay” cha.

Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkaimbe ñimba inrraamѳn cha. Jѳsé nuneebe yandѳ kwaig mugaaben, mѳimbe nѳtѳwein kѳrrѳmisra megan cha. Mayu chigѳben kaig nebubene, chi martrague cha, trube, ñimgurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, kѳllig waacha isubigutѳ kuabene.—Génesis 43

Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkaimbe ñimba inrraamѳn cha. Jѳsé nuneebe yandѳ kwaig mugaaben, mѳimbe nѳtѳwein kѳrrѳmisra megan cha. Mayu chigѳben kaig nebubene, chi martrague cha, trube, ñimgurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, kѳllig waacha isubigutѳ kuabene.—

Inchene mѳskai Jacѳbpe nѳmune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimbe nane yandѳ chi nusrkalѳgaig kѳrrѳmarѳb amrrutan cha. Jѳsébe yandѳ pinig mugaaben, Simeóngucha mugaaben, mѳimbe Benjaminwan pera amrrab indan cha. Iibe kerriguba naimbalatѳ pureb attan— cha.

Inchendѳ katѳ amrruppe, wendѳ nunewan pera amrrunrrigay chitan cha. Trumaybe ñim isa kѳmѳ chigѳben kalѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera, ka maig kѳtashchab ashib ka larѳnrraptѳ amrrumuin kui asamѳnrrun cha. Trugurrimbe ñui katѳgan nunewan elachen, ñimbe i pirau mu chi taimíig yanѳb, penab amѳnamig kѳnrrun” chitan— cha.
Inchen: “Nambe chigѳben kalѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera, managuen maig kѳtashib larab amѳñimeelѳ ker cha, nambe trender cha.
—Tru pirausrѳ karub wab mѳѳbe namune purѳ tsag wamincha, nui pirѳwan maig kѳtashib namune larab amrruig treeg kemesrѳtan cha.
Incha nѳmbe tru kѳrrѳmisra kiamsrѳ puabe, mѳikkѳsrѳn nui burrun tirigu mannrrab kustalwan pichene, mѳimbe nui anbe kustalrrigu ka wai ashiptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe nѳmui tirigumeran burrumerayu niisra truyugurri ambubelѳ kѳn.

Incha trugurrimbe Jѳsébe nѳmui kustalmerayu tirigu netsѳganingarua, katѳle tru nѳmui tiriguburѳ pagarai anmerane kanun, kanun tru nѳmui tirigu kustalyu pusringarub, katѳ mayuwei ishin tamara traningarub inchibig kѳn. Inchen treeg marig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe nѳ wamindi wamwan nui nunelan katѳburѳ lliska waminchabig katѳgan pera pasrabig kѳn. Inchagurri nunelѳbe nѳm chi chib pѳnrrailane Jѳsébe mѳrѳb pasraitamappe isumeelѳ kѳn.

Inchabe kangurri kangurri trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Isa kѳmѳ, nambe namui nuneweimburab larrѳ trѳmbѳig kalѳ marig kѳn cha. Pѳs ѳyeekkatiibe marmѳrrunrrigay chib nѳ namun truba truba trenchib megaben, nambe trendaigwane ni mѳrѳkkuinguen kѳmuin pѳnrraig kѳbig kѳn cha, yeeg lastima isui indi ashatѳgucha. Truburѳ mѳimbe ѳyeeg isuin pѳnrramig namuimbala itѳarrin pѳnrrer— cha.

Ñim isa kѳmѳ, chigѳben kalѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera kuabe, mѳikkѳben ñimui kan nunewan keera awannig kѳrrѳmisra wanrrain cha. Inchen kanelѳbe ñim ñimui yau misaameran parѳ purѳrmѳnrrab mamiimera srua ambay cha.
Incha tru nѳm pa trattreelane Jѳsébe pѳn kwalѳm ѳrѳba keerig purrѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn.

Incha isa kѳmѳ, ñimui wamindig ciertѳ kuitashchab Faraónwei merrab, ¡katѳ! nabe ѳyeeg maramѳnrrun cha, trendamѳnrrun chibig kѳn, ñimui wendѳ nuneg-unan yumay pera amrrumuingatiibe ñimbe yugurrimbe webamrraamѳn cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe katѳle trenchibig kѳn: —Na maig taig ñimbe maisrѳn kѳtashchab nilѳ ka larѳnrraptѳrre amrrun cha.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Kah cha, ñimbe i pirau kwayanrrab mubѳrab mas may kegѳrramdiig kѳtashib trunun ashchaptѳwei amrruin kѳn— cha.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñi, namui karubig, chi treeg kѳmѳn cha, nam ñui karuig melabelѳbe tirigu penѳnrrab amrruig kѳn cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe nui nunelѳ kui ashen, nѳmgurrimbe ashmeelѳ kѳn.

Inchen Jѳsébe tru pirau nѳ ashib karubig kѳbig kѳn, katѳ chu pirausreelan kѳben maya misaameran tirigu yanѳbig. Inchen Jѳséwei nunelѳ trusrѳ puabe, nѳmui kappalѳmeran pirausrѳngatig kebachib utsѳbasrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Israelwei nusrkalѳbe mamig penѳnrrab ambubelѳ kѳn, tru katѳganelѳ penѳnrrab ambubelѳba, kaguende Canaán piraube parѳ purѳ trѳmbѳig pasrѳben.
Egiptѳsrѳmbe mamig kѳn tai wammѳrar cha. Trusrѳmay kѳrraamba, namuyasig mamig penay cha, kwamѳ, ѳsig waramig kѳnrraimbe.—
Inchen Jacѳbpe Egiptѳsrѳmbe mamiimera kѳn tai wammѳrabe, nui nusrkalane trenchibig kѳn: —Mailѳ kѳh cha, kangurri kangurri asiyab purrѳnrrappe.
Génesis 42
Inchen chu pirausrѳ misaameratѳgucha Jѳséwan tirigu penѳnrrab amrrubelѳ kѳn, kaguen tru parѳ arrubiibe yandѳ munaѳrѳba arrub pasrѳben.

Inchen Egiptѳ pirau kerrigu misaabe parѳ arrub mendi mѳrabe, misaamerabe Faraónwan mamig kaatan cha, miab mendaptinchen, Faraonbe maya egipciѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: —Jѳséweimay amba, nѳ maig taigwan maray— cha.
Inchen tru Egiptѳ pirau mamig larrѳ misrѳb pilamera trattrѳ y par chab puraiben,

Incha mayur nusrkawane Manasés munchi pasrig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: “Nai mѳskawei yaugurri webya iben, chine chine nebuinab unig kѳbigwan Tiusbe trunun isubguengaig pishindѳ unamig kѳnrrai martan” cha.

Jѳsébe tirigumera nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ kan maryu pisrum lataig nѳrrѳ tulishibig kѳn. Tirigu purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ yandѳ mayan kѳn tamgaig kѳben, ka kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn, nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ ѳyan kѳn chib eshkab tѳgagѳmgaig kuikkurri.
Tru trattrѳ y par misrѳb pilamerawane pirѳbe truba truba misren,

Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane munchin yunѳmara Zafenat Panea cha wamababig kѳn. Incha Asenatwan nui srain kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn, truibe ѳn ciudasrѳ sacerdѳte lataig Pѳtifera taigwei nimbasrwan. ѳyamay Jѳsébe Egiptѳ pirѳwan ashchab pasramisrig kѳn.
Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe ñune Egiptѳ pirau kerriguba ñi asha karub wanrrai neera wannar cha, naimburѳ ashib wanrrai.—
Incha Faraonbe surtigas sellѳbañauigwan nui taskugurri wesrawa, Jѳséwan pasrѳbig kѳn. Incha trugurrimbe keilѳ linѳtѳga marig purѳ tabig kenanѳb, katѳ kan ѳrѳ naashigu ilѳsrѳb inchibig kѳn.
Faraonbe tru nui karuilane trenchibig kѳn: —¿Tiuswei espíritu nuinug arrua pasrainabig, katѳgan ѳyeeg mѳg wetѳrranrrautah?— cha.
Inchen tru ѳyeebe Faraónwanba tru nѳ karuigwan marѳbelanbabe truba tabig mѳrѳraben,
Tru mamig misrѳbig larrѳ tab pilamera amrruben, tru Faraón maig chiben trumay tru ellmarig misrigwan ashibelѳbe mamigwan kanbalatѳ tulisha, ciudamѳrig esegamig kѳnrrun, misaamerayasig mamig kѳnrrai.
Incha treekkurri ñi Faraonbe kan larrѳ kusreb mѳg, chigui asha tab marѳb mѳg lanrrain cha, Egiptѳ pirau kerrigu chi maramigwan nѳ karub ashib tѳga pasramisrtrai.
Pѳs, ñi Faraonbe pamay treetѳ, treetѳ piaig mѳrig kѳn cha, kaguen Tiusbe iigwan ñi asha kѳnrrai ¡katѳ! martrab pasran cha, trurrigu chi srarrѳmѳtѳ.

Inchen katѳ tru wendaube pilamera trattrѳ y par purѳ trѳmbѳig parѳ attrabig kѳn cha, truba truba mamiimera misrig kѳbelanguen chi misrmuig kui lataig pesannawa kѳmgue, kaguende tru parѳ arrubiibe tru Egiptѳ pirѳwane purѳ lastimaig mara kѳrrѳmartrun cha.
Nabe ñi Faraónwan ѳyeeg eshkar cha, Tiusbe nѳ maig maramigwan ñune kenamarѳb pasran cha.
Tru truba tab waaramera trattrѳ y par, katѳ tru larrѳ tab tirigu turmera tru trattrѳ y parbabe pilamera trattrѳ y parwan eshkan cha. Tru piaibe trutѳwei kandѳ eshkabig kѳn cha.

Inchen tru larrѳ pѳndѳ tirigube tru larrѳ tab tirigu turmeran kebinab, kebinab piñbashib piabig kѳn cha. Inchen nabe tru magia kusrebelѳ mu mana mariimíigwan marѳbelan payen, muguen truilѳbe tru piaibe ѳyeeg chibig kѳn chabe eshkamѳtan— chibig kѳn.
Inchen tru wendaube tru tsutsigutѳwei katѳgan trattrѳ y par weguchibelѳ kѳn, larrѳ pѳndѳzhig, tru kurag isig arrubig tustam itsiilѳ.
Inchendѳ truilan mappe, mabendѳ, kan chigucha mamѳwa lataitѳweih pѳnrrabelѳ kѳn cha. Kaguende maig kѳbelѳbe treeg trѳmbѳig kalargѳleetѳweih pѳnrrabelѳ kѳn. Inchen nabe kasraptindinabig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru waaramera larrѳ trѳmbѳgѳleelѳ kalargѳleelѳbe tru srѳtѳ trattrѳ y par tsal waaramera pѳnrrabelan maptinchibelѳ kѳn cha.

Inchene Jѳsébe Faraónwane trenchibig kѳn: —Tru treeg maramibe nainug pasrѳmѳn cha. Faraón chi isumѳ pishindѳ tab wanrrai wam tranѳb lѳtѳnrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳn cha.—17 Inchen Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nan piappe, nabe Nilѳ nu pi menda pasrѳbene,
Inchene Jѳsébe Faraónwane trenchibig kѳn: —Tru treeg maramibe nainug pasrѳmѳn cha. Faraón chi isumѳ pishindѳ tab wanrrai wam tranѳb lѳtѳnrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳn cha.—
Inchen Faraonbe Jѳsewan attrai wamѳnrrab ѳren, tru urastѳ Jѳséwane kalѳ marѳbelan merrarrawa keeriinukkurri wesraben, Jѳsébe milisigwan mullib, kewaguilan yunѳmarѳb, Faraónweimay arrubig kѳn.

Inchen truyube kan hebreѳ matsinan merrarrawa keerig namba waig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru suldaumeran nѳ karub tѳga pasrabigwei karuig megabig. Inchen nambe namui piailan nun eshkabene, nѳbe namui piailan ѳyeeg kѳnrrabig kѳn cha eshkabig kѳn mѳ piaitѳgucha maig kѳnrrabigwan.

Pѳs yanaguen kѳn cha nam ñui karui melabelan ñi namun nama, nanba tru pirri marѳbelan ashib karub pasrabigwanba, tru suldaumeran nѳ karub ashibigwei yau, nѳ ashib tѳgaguilѳ purrѳnrrai namune keeringaruig kѳbig kѳn cha.

Inchen nѳbe lѳtsѳ kia kasrappe, larrѳ isuig kia kurra, tru Egiptѳsrѳ mayeelѳ magia kusrebelѳ mu mana mariimíigwan marѳbelanba, larrѳ kusrebelanba amrrunrrai wamabe nui piagwan eshkabig kѳn. Inchendѳ truilѳbe tru piaigwane ni mѳikken ‘ѳyeeg kѳn’ cha Faraѳnwane eshkanrrab kaimabelѳ kѳn.
Incha nѳbe katѳ kibene, katѳgan piaig mѳrѳbig kѳn: Mѳimbe tirigu turmera larrѳ tabelѳ, larrѳ may nigar, kan tsutsiizhigutѳ trattrѳ y par weguchar, treeg nѳrrѳrailѳ pѳnrrѳbashibgue.
tru larrѳ trѳmbѳilѳ, kalar waaramerabe katѳ tru trattrѳ y par larrѳ tab waaramera tsalelane mabashibgue. Inchen tru treeg piab tsuppa, Faraonbe kasraptindinabig kѳn.
Indig yandѳ katѳle srѳrrѳb pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrai pa ila puraiben, Faraonbe kan piaig tѳgagѳbig kѳn: Nune Nilѳ nu pi menda papsrѳbashib.
Génesis 41
Inchen kѳben, tru cѳpayu srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan ashibiibe Jѳséwane isumѳ, kerrigu pesannaptindig kѳn.
Inchen tru pirri marѳbelan asha karub pasrabigwane Jѳsé maig purainrrun taimbala naashigu tsibasra mesrѳngaruig kѳn.

Indiibe pѳn kwalѳmyu Faraonbe nui tru kal-lain kwalѳmgurri mam pila nemisrigwan trunun isunrrab marѳbig kѳn. Incha nѳ lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelayasig truba truba kasrag waramig mara, truilai merrab tru cѳpasyu vinѳ srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan nѳ karub pasrabigwanba, tru pirri marѳbelan nѳ karub pasrabigwanba tru keera purrѳnninukkurri wesrangarubig kѳn.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Iibe ѳyeeg cha eshkabig kѳn cha: Pѳngatѳ tasin ureemerabe pѳn kwalѳm kѳn cha.
Inchen ke pala srabesrѳ pasrab tasinyube, Faraónweyasig chine larrѳ may pirrimera sulu tѳgaig pasrѳbendѳ, illimera tru nai turbala tasin pasrabiguigwan mabashib.—
Kaguende nane hebreѳsmerai pirausrѳngurri nane namiimay merrarrawa, srua amrruig kѳn cha. Nabe yu Egiptѳ pirau chigѳben kalѳ mara kѳmur cha, na yu merrarrawa keerig wamig.—
Inchen ñun treeg tab kѳrrѳmarene, trube, nan isurrunrrig chibig kѳn. Tiusmanda nan lastima tѳgagua, Faraónwan waminchunrrig cha, nan yugurri wesranrrai.

Incha truibe ishiizheelѳ wegucha, uzheelѳ niga tru lusrѳmerayube uvasmera srѳnan cha. Inchen nabe Faráѳnwei cѳpan nai tasku muta, tru uvasmerane tru cѳpayu sunna, trugurrimbe natѳwei Faraónwei tasku tranѳb piatan— cha.
srarmera pѳn kwaliimera tѳgaig pasraptindan cha.

Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe pailѳba piailѳ tѳgagѳbendѳ, muguen kan ѳyeeg kѳn cha eshkanrrabiibe mugaagѳn— cha. Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Piailan ‘ѳyeeg kѳn’ chinrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳmuitarru? cha. Er eshkarra pѳs— chibig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe lѳtsѳ nѳmun ashchab ibene, nѳmbe truba truba isuilѳ purraptinchen,
Inchen Faraónwan chigѳben kѳmѳnrrrai ashib suldaumerai nѳ karubiibe tru pagatѳ nѳrreelan keerilane Jѳsé nѳ asha purugub pasrѳbig kѳn. Inchen truilѳbe kan maya yanagѳsrѳn truyu keeriilѳ purrѳwabe,
Inchen Faraonbe tru i pagatѳ nѳrreelan nѳ lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelan namabig kѳn, tru vinѳ srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan nѳ asha karubigwanba, tru pirri marѳbelan nѳ asha karubigwanba.
Génesis 40

Inchen tru keerin pѳnrrabelan nѳ karubiibe chi isua asamikken palѳmíig kѳn, Jѳsé nѳ asha marѳb pasraigwane. Kaguende Jehѳvábe Jѳséba pasrѳwa, nѳ chi mariilane merraptѳ, merraptѳ webinrrai marѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru Jѳséwan penabiibe reyweimburab kalѳ marѳbelan kemѳra keeriilѳ purramnug, Jѳséwan truyu keera wannѳbig kѳn.
Tru “ñi karub tѳgagѳmig peniibe nan ѳyeeg martan” chib, sraimbe Pѳtifarwan ѳyeeg chib eshkaben, nѳbe truba trѳmbѳig namabig kѳn.
Incha tru ishuube tru Jѳsé kewaguigwane nui keg yau pumnegatig trarra wawa,
na truba mur trasai ashippe, nui kewaguigwan naimbulu tsumnetѳ, lulѳptindan— cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe tru nui kewa pasraigwane nui tasku kѳrrѳmisrtraindѳ welula yai ashippe,
ishuube nui kewa pasraigu kemѳrѳppa trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Naba waramisrkun— cha. Inchene Jѳsébe tru nui kewa pasraigwane nui tasku srua pasrѳnrraindѳ yaugurri welulѳppa iptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen ishuube kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Jѳséwane ‘naba waramisrkun’ chib, nuimbulu lincha wanrrai inchib maya, maya treendingucha, Jѳsébe treegwane kandѳ, kandѳ ka chib, webib, webig ibig kѳn.

Inchen nѳbe treegwane marmѳtѳ, tru nun karub tѳgagѳbigwei srawane trenchibig kѳn: —Pѳs, nai karubiibe yu yau chi kѳbigwane nababe chi isumikkaig pasrѳwa, treekkurri chi kѳbigwan kerriguba nai tasku ashchai pѳnsraig kѳn cha.

Inchagurri Pѳtifarbe kerriguba Jѳséwei tasku ashchaim pasra, nune chi isumig chigaabig kѳn. Isumig kѳppe, nѳ mab mutsamigwan trunundѳh isumig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsébe larrѳ tab asr tѳgaig trurrigu larrѳ tab mѳg kѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru nun karub pera pasrabiibe Jehѳvá Jѳséwane chi mariilѳyutѳgucha merraptѳ webinrrai mari ashibig kѳn.
Jehѳvábe Jѳséwane tarѳmisrmѳ nѳba pasrѳben, chi mariilѳtѳgucha tabiitѳ, tabiitѳ pub iben, nѳbe tru egipciѳ tru nun penabigwei yau wabig kѳn.
Génesis 39
Inchen unѳbe tasiizhigwan katѳ kesruben, kanzhiimerrig kal-laptinchibig kѳn. Inchen tru patsѳ kѳrrѳѳrѳbiibe trenchibig kѳn: ‘¡Mandѳ incharre puraarruh!’ cha. Inchagurri unane Fares cha wamig kѳn.
Inchen tru yandѳ kal-lanrrab inchen tru parcheelѳyu kane tasiizhiimerrig kal-laptinchen, patsѳ kѳrrѳѳrѳbiibe unai tasiizhigu pigѳ tsizhig lichiptinchibig kѳn trenchib: ‘Iimerrig webarrig kѳn’ chib.
Indiibe yandѳ Tamarwan unѳ tѳgamisramig puben, mѳimbe parchig tѳgaig kѳbrain kui wetѳbeñibig kѳn.

Inchen yandѳ tru mѳguelѳbe nun pattrab wesranrrab amben, nѳbe nui sueerune trencha ѳrѳbig kѳn: “Nabe kwanrriig misra pasrappe, tru na i srua pasrailan nan tranѳbigwei kwanrriig misra pasrar” cha. Inchabe katѳ trenchibig kѳn: “I sellѳn tru ilintsiwanbañau, i tsigwanba, muin kѳtashchab ash” cha.

Inchen Judábe trenchibig kѳn: —Kerriguba ka tѳga kѳrrѳmisrbashshu cha, namun ke chinetѳ chib indza asiinab pѳnrramig kѳmѳnrraimbe. Inchendѳ tѳr kѳnrrain cha, nabe cabrѳ unane tru ishuwan trana ѳren, tru ishuwane ñibe wetѳrramuigwan— cha.

Inchen nѳbe truyu warab misaameran trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Peg mѳguelѳba kaig marѳb ishug tru Enaim may menda wabiibe chu wah?— cha Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Peg mѳguelѳba kaig marѳb ishuuma yube mumaganug kѳn— cha.
Incha nѳbe kurra, truyugurri yabe, tru malѳ kasraigwane pinѳsrua, tru keg kaig kѳrrѳmisra kewa unigwan katѳ kebig kѳn.
—Nai ubisha sѳtѳmerayugurri kan cabrѳ-unѳzhig trana ѳramѳnrrun— cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Kan chigѳsrѳn ñuiwan kѳrrѳmartra cha, ñi tru trannrrab misrigwan na utamnegatig.—
Inchen Judá truigwan ashabe, nѳbe kaig maramig asrwan anwei yanѳb ishug kuitamab isubig kѳn, kaguen nѳbe malѳwan pinab kasraig waben.
Inchen Tamarbe tru nui sueeru Timnatsrѳ nui ubishameran isig partrab yan taig wammѳrabe,

Indig yandѳ yana puraiben, tru Súai nimbasr tru Judáwei sraimbe kwabig kѳn. Inchen nѳbe yandѳ tru isubig puraiben, Timnat pueblѳsrѳmay ibig kѳn, tru nui ubisha isig parѳbelѳ waraisrѳmay. Inchen tru adulamita Hira taig tru nun linchibiibe nune lincha ibig kѳn.
Inchen Jehѳváwane treebe chigucha tabig asѳnamuben, truigwangucha ѳsig kuigwan kerraptindig kѳn.
Inchene Judábe tru ѳnánwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneg kwabigwei srawan kasharamѳ kѳmѳ, kasharau cha, ñui nuneg kwabig ñigurri ureg tѳgaig kѳnrrain— cha.
Inchendѳ tru Er Judáwei mayur nusrkaimbe Jehѳváwein kabyu larrѳ kaig kuig kѳn. Inchen Jehѳvábe nui ѳsig unigwan kerraptindig kѳn.
Incha katѳ maya yanayu kѳsrѳn katѳgan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane Sela cha wamig kѳn. Truibe tru unan tѳgagѳb urasbe Kezibsrѳ tsuig kuig kѳn.
Incha katѳ wendѳ kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳgan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane ѳnán cha wamig kѳn.
Inchen tru ishuube kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, truigwei kan nusrkai tѳgagua, truigwane Er cha wamig kѳn.
Génesis 38

Inchen Egiptѳsrѳmbe tru madianitasmerabe tru Jѳsewane Pѳtifarwan yanѳbelѳ kѳn, tru Faraѳn lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pasrabig, tru suldaumera reywan chigѳben kѳmѳnrrai ashib pѳnrrabelan nѳ asha karub pasrabigwan.
Incha Jacѳbpe nui kewa kuigwan kѳlsra, trѳsrkѳlig kewa, nui unѳ pinigwan purѳ yanasrѳngatig isub kѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha nѳmbe kan cabrѳ unѳ kweecha, Jѳsé pala itѳguewa unigwane tru aniyu kebisha,
Incha nunelan trenchinrrab ibig kѳn: —Yandѳ matsinube mugaagѳn cha. ¿Nabe mѳimbe chindamer?— cha.

Inchen tru madianitasmera chine penab, yanѳb inchibelѳ amrruben, Jѳséwei nunelѳbe tru aljibe trab lalig pasrabigugurri wesrawa, pib tratrѳ an pitiswei yanѳbelѳ kѳn. ѳyamay Jѳséwane Egiptѳsrѳmay srua ambig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Judábe nui nunelan trenchibig kѳn: —Namui nunewan kweechabe, chi mariasamѳ cha, kweecha tre marigwan sѳratѳ tѳgaguabe.

Inchabe yandѳ nѳmbe manrrab purramisrѳbelѳ kѳn. Inchen nѳm ashene, Galaadsrѳngurri kan sѳtѳ ismaelitasmera amrruptinchibelѳ kѳn, camellѳsmerayu niisrar larrѳ may irrabzheelѳ, balsamѳ kѳben, mirra kѳben tru Egiptѳsrѳmay.
nune kemѳra, tru pi wesramig trab lalig pasrabigu keguchibelѳ kѳn. Inchendѳ tru trab laliibe chi pigaig pur pasrabig kѳn.

Ñimbe ani lushmѳtѳ, mu misag warab waraimѳnug aljibe lalig pasrabnug kegutsay chibig kѳn. Inchendѳ ñimui taskabe chi marmѳtay— cha. Rubénbe ѳyeeg chippe, Jѳséwane katѳle wesrawa, mѳskaweisrѳ pegutchab isuig kѳn.
Mѳimbe amrrui chibelѳ kѳn, kweecha, kan aljibe laligu kegutchab cha. Incha: “kan namig usha kweecha, main kѳn chinrrab” cha. Er nui piailѳbe maig indashchab— chibelѳ kѳn.

tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Yugurrimbe chab ambubguen indig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ: “Dѳtánsrѳmay amrrab” taig nabe mѳrig kѳn— cha. Inchen Jѳsébe nunelan lab ya, Dѳtán tru misag sѳtѳmera warainug kѳmѳtѳ, wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ wetѳrrabig kѳn.
Inchene Jѳsébe: —Nabe nai nunelan lab uñar cha. Chu ubisha ashib warai ñibe tiusmanda eshkabsrumuguh— chiben,
Indiibe Jѳsébe trusrѳ pua, truba lab llirab uña, pella pasrѳbene, kan mѳg katabe, payibig kѳn: —¿Chi lagu?— cha.
Indiibe yandѳ treeg purayai wendѳ Siquémsrѳ nui nunelѳbe mѳskawei ubishameranba, cabrameranba pu lawa mannrrab amben,
Inchen nunelѳbe larrѳ pusrkwai inchibelѳ kѳn. Trune mѳskaimbe ѳyeeg piaibe chiguermab wetѳbeñimmѳrѳ chu uragucha isub sulu uñibig kѳn.
Incha Jѳsébe katѳgan piaig tѳgagua nunelan katѳ treeg eshkabig kѳn: —Mѳimbe katѳ nan piappe, pѳrrba, pѳlba pa trattrѳ y kan kѳnchabiimeraba nan tab inchib utsѳbasrѳb piatan— cha.
kaguen nѳbe trenchib eshkabig kѳn: —Nan piaigwan ñimun eshkanrrab inchar cha, mѳrtray cha:
Indiibe Jѳsébe kan piji kan piaig tѳgagua, nunelan waminchen, trugurrimbe nunelѳbe masken tsalѳ ashibelѳ kѳn

Incha kerrigu maya nusrkalan lataguen kѳmѳtѳ, tru Israel Jacѳb taig kѳbiibe Jѳséwane truba undaguig kѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳ kѳllimbala tѳgagui unѳ kuimba. Inchagurri pala itѳ kemig larrѳ tab tsurѳzhig maringarubig kѳn.
Jacѳbpe nui mѳskai kѳrrѳmisra tsui pirau truyu kѳrrѳmisra tsuig kѳbig kѳn, tru Canaán pirau.
Génesis 37
Ahѳlibama kѳben, Elá kѳben, Pinón kѳben,
Iilѳ kѳn tru Esaúwei karub pѳnrrab mѳguelai munchimera, mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, trumѳrig truilainukkurri amrrubelѳ, nѳm waraigwan nѳmui munchitѳgatѳwei wamiilѳ: Timná kѳben, Alvá kѳben, Jetet kѳben,
Inchen Saúl kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Acѳbѳrwei nusrkai Baal-Janán karunrrab nebyaig kѳn.
Inchen Samla kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Rejѳbѳtsrѳ Saúl karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, tru Eufrates pi menda.
Inchen Jѳbab kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Jusán karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, Temán pirausriig.
Inchen Bela kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Zerai nusrkai Jѳbab karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, Bѳsra pirausriig.
Beѳrwei nusrkai Belabe Edѳmsrѳ rey kuig kѳn, nѳbe tru Dinába taig ciudayugurri arrubig.
Inchen hѳreѳsmeran nѳm asha karubelѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Lѳtán kѳben, Sѳbal kѳben, Zibeón kѳben, Aná kѳben,
Inchen Disánwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Uzba, Aránba.
Inchen Ezerwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Bilán kѳben, Zaván kѳben, Acán kѳbengue
Inchen Disónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Hemdán kѳben, Esbán kѳben, Itrán kѳben, Kerán kѳbengue.
Inchen Zibeónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Ayába, Anába. Tru Aná kuig kѳn, tru misag warab waraimѳ pirѳmerasrѳ kuaalab pigammeran wetѳrrabig nui mѳskai Zibeónwei burrumeran ashib uña.
Inchen Sѳbalwei nusrkalѳbe Alván kѳben, Manajat kѳben, Ebal kѳben, Sefó kѳben, ѳnam kѳben kuig kѳn.
Disón kѳben, Ezer kѳben, Disán kѳbengue. Iig tru Seirweinukkurri amrrub misaamera, Edѳm pirau hѳreѳsmeran nѳm asha karubelѳ nѳrreelѳ kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru hѳreѳ Seirweinukkurri amrrub misaamera tru pirausrѳ warabelѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Lѳtán kѳben, Sѳbal kѳben, Zibeón kѳben, Aná kѳben,
Inchen tru Anai nimbasr tru Esaúwei srai Ahѳlibamai nusrkalѳ nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha karubelѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Jeús kѳben, Jalán kѳben, Cѳré kѳbengue.
Cѳré kѳben, Gatán kѳben, Amalec kѳbengue. Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Edѳm pirau Elifazweinukkurri amrrub misaamera nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha karubelѳ, truilѳbe kerriguba Adai awelumera.
Inchen Reuelwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Najat kѳben, Zera kѳben, Sama kѳben, Mizá kѳbengue, truilѳbe tru Esaúwei srai Basematwei awelumera kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Timná ka linchatѳ ishug tru Esaúwei nusrkai Elifazwei kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn, tru Amalecwan. Iilѳbe kerriguba Esaúwei srai Adai awelumera kuin kѳn.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Esaúweinukkurri amrrub misaamera: edѳmitasmerai mѳskai tru Seir tunmeragѳba tѳga pirѳmerasrѳ warab misaamera.
Treekkurri Esaú tru Edѳm taibe Seir pirau tunmeragѳba tѳgasrѳ tsunrrab yaig kѳn.
Ahѳlibamababe Jeúswan kѳben, Jalánwan kѳben, Cѳréwan kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn. Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Esaú Canaán pirau tsub uras tѳgagui ureemera.
Esaúbe i ureemeran tѳgaguig kѳn: Adababe Elifazwan Basematbabe Reuelwan
Katѳ Basematwangucha nui srain kѳnrrai marig kѳn, truibe Ismaelwei nimbasr Nebaiѳtwei nuchawan
Génesis 36
Inchen Isaacbe yandѳ larrѳ kѳlliizhig, larrѳ yana ѳsig tsua, yandѳ nui israbig luchen, nui nusrkalѳ Esaúba Jacѳbpa misra kusra sѳrѳben, nui kѳlli misaameraba isrѳnrrab tsumisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Leai tru karuig mendig megabig Zilpai nusrkalѳbe: Gadba, Azerba. Iilѳ kѳn tru Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳ Padan Aramsrѳ kal-lawar.
Inchen Raquelwei tru karuig mendig megabig Bilhai nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Danba, Neftaliba.
Raquelwei nusrkalѳbe: Jѳséba, Benjaminba.

Indiibe Israelbe tru pirausrѳ kѳrrѳmisra tsubene, Rubénbe ya, Bilhaba kiain kѳbig kѳn, tru nui mѳskawan lincha tsub ishuuba. Inchen Israelbe ѳyeeg marigwan wammѳrѳbig kѳn. Israelwei nuskalѳbe pa trattrѳ y par kѳbig kѳn.
Tru kwabigwan sѳrimbalabe kan srug nemѳra ѳlneb pasrig kѳn. Incha tru treeg tamara kusrua pasrig kѳbiibe tru Raquelwan sѳrig kѳbig kui ashchai pasran mѳingatig.
Incha Raquelbe ѳyeeg kwamig nebuig kwaben, Efratamay amrrab ambi maysrѳ sѳrig kѳn, tru Belén.
Incha Betelgurri amba, katѳgucha Efratasrѳ pumibe yab palѳben, mѳimbe Raquelbe unѳzhigwan ke tammisrtrab kaimabsrua tammisrig kѳn.
Incha Tius tru nun wamindinuube Betel cha wamabig kѳn.
Betelsrѳmay amun cha, tru nan chine kaig nebuinab arrubengurri purugub Tiusweyasig trusrѳ kan altar kusrunrrab cha, tru na chu unindѳgucha nan lincha pasrabigwan.—
Incha Tiusbe nuimbulugurri ibig kѳn, tru nѳba waminchib pasrainukkurri.
Incha Abrahamwanba, Isaacwanba tranin pirѳwane ñun tranamѳnrrun cha. Incha ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameran tranamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.
Génesis 35
Incha Jacѳb Padan Aramsrѳngurri katѳle arrubene, Tiusbe nune katѳle kenamisra, maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai trannrrab misrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen katѳ truyuh kwaig kѳbig kѳn, Debѳra tru Rebeca lamíig kѳben asam purugubig kѳbig. Truigwane kan encina tusr katsiizhigu sѳrig kѳn, Betel pulu. Incha Jacѳbpe truyube Elѳn Bacut cha wamig kѳn.
Incha nѳbe trusrѳ kan altar kusrua, El Betel cha wamig kѳn truyube, kaguende Tius trusrѳ kenamisrig kuig kua, tru nui nunewan trubab welula ib uras.

Inchen nѳm truyugurri webamba ambene, tru puluwan warab misaamerabe mayeelѳba purѳ trѳmbѳig kѳrig kui inchai Tiusbe treeg marѳbig kѳn. Inchagurri Jacѳbwei misaamerane nѳmbe chi kaig martrab inchimeelѳ kѳn.

Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui yaambuelanba, nun lincha amrrubelanba trenchibig kѳn: —Tru katѳgan peg tiusmera ñim tѳgaguilan ñimbe chishtѳ webetab, ñimui kalѳ mariilan chish misrѳb, ñimui kewaguilan yunѳmarѳb inday cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ kѳn: —¿Nѳ isuppe, kabe namui nuchawane trѳmbѳig martrab nui asrwan anwei yanѳb ishug kui lataig mara kutchain kuitarru?— cha.
Incha yaambumerayu chi kѳbelane chishtѳ wesrawa, katѳ chigurrimbunѳ chi tѳgaguilan kѳben, mѳg-uregwan kѳben, ishumburmeran kѳben merrarrawa, srua ambubelѳ kѳn.

Incha tru Jacѳbwei katѳgan nusrkalѳbe amrrua, kwabelaim palawan itѳbunab puraamba, ciudayu kegѳrra chi kѳbigwan chishtѳ wesrabelѳ kѳn, tru nui nuchawan ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig mara mindisha kѳrrѳmarigwan trunun ulѳ payib.
Incha Hamѳrwanba nui nusrkai Siquémwanba espadatѳga kweecha peta, Dinane Siquémwei yaugurri wesrawa, pera ambubelѳ kѳn.

Inchen tru chi maramigwan nѳm ashibelѳ maya mѳguelѳ tru ciudayu kebambi yaskabu tuluntsunabelѳbe tru Hamѳrba, tru nusrkai Siquémba treegwan martrab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ kѳn. Incha tru maya mѳguelѳbe circuncidailѳ kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.

Inchendѳ namui utu nѳm kѳrrѳmisra, kan misag sѳtѳtѳ misra waramibe nam ѳyamay kѳnrrab kѳbendѳwein kѳnrrun cha, namui utu mѳguelѳbe mayeelѳba circuncidawar kѳnrrai, nѳm mailѳ kѳben, nam treelѳtѳweingue.
Incha Hamѳrba Siquémba nѳmui ciudayu kebambi yaskabumay amba, truyu warab misaameran trenchibelѳ kѳn:
Inchen tru circuncidamigwan ‘ka’ taingatiibe nambe namui nuchawane perѳb, yu ñimui piraugurri ambuptindamѳnrrun— cha.
Trumaybe si namui nimbasrmerabe ñimba kasharab, ñimui nimbasrmerabe namba kasharab, nambe ñimui utu warab, kan sѳtѳ misaameratѳ kѳnrrab cha.
Incha nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe namui nuchawane kan mѳg circuncidamíigwane trannrrab kaimamѳnrrun cha. Kaguen namuiwan purѳ trѳmbѳig mindishib kѳrig marinab pѳnrramig kѳn cha.
Tru srusran srain kѳnrai tranamwei maya nu kuindѳgucha, ñim maya miamigwan eshkab, maya ketig tranamelan eshkab inchay chibig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru srusrane naba ka kasharabashchunrrigay— cha.
Trumaybe ñimbe namui utu warѳben, yu nam waraig pirѳbe ñim chu warag kѳben waramig pasrѳnrrun cha. Ñimbe truyu warab, penab, yanѳb, katѳ pirѳmera penab inchigay— cha.
Inchen Hamѳrbe tru mѳskawanba nusrkalanba trenchib waminchib kѳn: —Nai nusrkai Siquémbe ñui nimbasrwan purѳ chull asan cha, ishug-unѳ nѳba kasharanrrai treegwan isubsrumѳgue chinrrab inchar cha.
Incha pumѳwatѳ, tru Siquémwei mѳskai Hamѳrbe nui nusrkai pa misrtrab isuigwan Jacѳbpa waminchab arrubig kѳn.
Incha Siquémbe nui mѳskai Hamѳrwan trenchibig kѳn: —I srusran nai srain kѳnrrai mѳskalѳba waminchay— cha.
Incha nѳbe Dinan purѳ chull ashipptѳ, tabzhib waminchibig kѳn, Dina undaaraig kѳnrrab.
Génesis 34
truyube kan altar mara, truigwane El Elѳhe Israel cha wamig kѳn.
Jacѳbpe Padan-Aramsrѳngurri chigucha kѳmѳ, katѳ tab ka pubig kѳn, Canaán pirau Siquén ciudasrѳ. Incha tru ciuda pinrrѳguesrѳ kѳrrѳmisra warѳwa,
Incha tru kwalѳm Esaúbe Seirsrѳmay inrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen Esaúbe trenchibig kѳn: —Trube, treeg ka amrrab cha. Inchendѳ tru naba lincha amrrub mѳguelan mѳilan kѳsrѳn ñiba lincha amrrunrrai kѳrrѳmartrab— chibig kѳn. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Truburappe chi isumѳta cha. Ñuin kabyu na tab kui asig kuinaig kѳbene, truig mas purѳ nuig kѳtan— cha.

Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg, ñibe asiinrrabguen cha, nai ureemerabe kullaguelѳ srѳ kѳn cha. Katѳ ubishamera kѳben, waaramera kѳben, ureezheelѳ perartѳ kѳn cha. Na menrra trѳmbѳig malla merranene, nai ubishamerabe kan kwalѳmyutѳ kerriguba chab kwanrrun cha.
Na ñun ketamig srua arrigwan ka utѳrra cha. Tiusbe nane ѳyeeg nѳrrѳ tѳgaig kѳnrrai maren, nabe menrrazhikken tѳgagur— cha. Incha Jacѳbpe utѳnrrai truba inchen, Esaúbe tru ketiilan ka utabig kѳn.
Inchene Esaúbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg, nabe tsabѳtѳ tѳgaig kur cha. Ñuimbe ñuin kѳnrrain— cha.

Inchen Esaúbe trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Tru na katab arrigu ѳyeeg nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ, merrana amrruilѳtѳgabe nan chi chinrrab treenchigu?— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nane kan chigucha inchimѳ, ñuin kabyu tab kui asig kѳnrrab ѳyeeg marar— cha.
Trugurrimbe Lea nui ureezheelѳba utsѳbasren, tru wendaube Raquel nui Jѳséba arrua, utsѳbasrѳbig kѳn.

Incha mѳimbe Esaú kurraashabe ishumburmeranba, ureezheelanba ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Iilѳ ñiba pѳnrrabelѳbe ¿mumeragѳh?— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Na, ñi maig chiben marѳb megabigwan, iilѳbe Tius nan trani ureezheelѳ kѳn— cha.
Trune Esaúbe nunewan katѳnrrab lulѳb ya, naashiburab ira, muchabig kѳn. Incha pailѳba kishibelѳ kѳn.
Incha tru nui pagatѳ karub tѳgagui ishumburmeran tru nѳmui ureemeran ke merrabsrѳ pѳnsra, tru wendaube Lean tru nui ureemeranba, tru wendaube Raquelwan tru nui Jѳséwanba pѳnsrѳbig kѳn.
Génesis 33
Inchen Jacѳb Penielsrѳngurri puraiben, pѳrrbe neeshib arrubig kѳn. Inchen nui pѳytañig safaig pusrkwaben, Jacѳbpe kebeñiptѳ, kebeñib arrubig kѳn.
Incha Jacѳbpe truyube Peniel cha wamabig kѳn, kaguen nѳbe trendaig kѳn: “Nabe Tiuswan malaugue ashendѳ, katѳgucha ka ѳsig pasrainatan” cha.

Inchene tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe yandѳ Jacѳb cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳmѳtѳ, Israel cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳn cha. Kaguende ñibe Tiusba, mѳguelѳba truba melambuyab tranrriyaigu, ñibe kullaaramѳn— cha.
Inchen tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Yandѳ chab tѳr-rrab kѳn cha. ¡Elatcha!— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nan maya nuguen tabig nebunrrabigwan tranmubene, nabe lelachimumѳnrrun— cha.
Incha yandѳ truilan chab larrѳѳrabe, katѳ chine kѳbigwan kerrigu larrѳѳrѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru yemdѳwei Jacѳbpe kurra, nui pagatѳ sralanba, nui pagatѳ linchatѳ melab ishumburmeranba, pa trattrѳ y kan tru nui nusrkalanba, Jabѳc taig nu piyu larraambubelѳ kѳn.
Inchen tru keta tranamelѳbe merrab chab amben, Jacѳbpe tru nui misaameraba, nui ushamerabañau kѳrrѳmisra tsuinug kinrrab kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru srѳsriigwei wendau ibigwan lata, pѳn kѳnrrabyu ibigwan lata, tru wendau ambubelan mѳilandѳgucha treetѳ, treetѳ chinrrai karua pasrig kѳn. Esaúwan katabe, ѳyeetѳh chinrrigay cha.

Incha Jacѳbpe tru ke srѳsrѳ merrana ibigwane trencha karua ѳrѳbig kѳn: —Nai nuneg Esaú ñun kata: “¿Ñibe muinukkurriig kugu chib, chumay inrrab arrugu? chib. ¿Ñi merrana yaig ushamerabe muielѳ kѳ?” chib payene,
Cabramera dѳscientas, pib trattrѳ turmѳg cabramera, ubishamera dѳscientas, turmѳg ubishamera pib trattrѳ,
Incha tru yembe Jacѳbpe truyu kia, nѳ truyu chi tѳgaguigwan nui nuneg Esaúwan ketamig lawa wesrabig kѳn.
Nai nuneg Esaúwei taskugurri chi kѳmѳnrrai marѳbsrumuguh cha. Nane kѳrig kѳtan cha, inchippa nanba, usralmeranba, ureemeranba kweecha petѳnrraitamab.

Incha Jacѳbpe Tiuswan trenchib miabig kѳn: —Nai mѳskai Abrahamwei Tius, nai mѳskai Isaacwei Tius: “Tru nai pirausrѳmay, nai yau misaameraisrѳmay katѳle nan inrrѳ cha. Ñune truba truba tѳgaig misrѳb inrrai maramѳnrrun” cha, ñi nan trendaig kuig kѳn cha.

Inchen Jacѳb ѳyeeg taigwan mѳrabe, truba kѳrig kui inchib, truba isuin kѳrrѳmisra, nѳbe tru nui misag lincha perayailan pa sѳtѳ pirishibig kѳn, tru ubishameran, cabramera kѳben, waarameran, camellѳmeran chigucha.

mѳimbe waaramera kѳben, burrumera kѳben, ubishamera kѳben, cabramera kѳben, karuig melabelѳ mѳguelѳ kѳben ishumburmera kѳben, tѳgaig kur’ tan chinrrai. Pѳs ñi nai mayur nunewan nabe ñun ѳyeeg eshkawa ѳrar cha, ñi nan truba tabig utig pasramig kѳnrrai.”—
Incha Jacѳbpe tru Edѳm pirau tru Seirsrѳmay wan sruar merrab amrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn, Esaúwan katѳnrrabelѳ tru nabe punrrab arrumѳnrrun cha, nui nuneg eshkanrrabelѳ.
Génesis 32
Incha katѳ lѳtsѳ Labanbe kia kurra, nui awelu ureemeran, nui nimbasrmeran muchawa, trugurrimbe mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrigay cha. Yandѳ nui pirausrѳmay katѳle inrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen ñui awelu Abrahamwei Tiusba, katѳ ñui awelu Nacѳrwei Tiusba maig maramigwan namun nѳ asha martrain— chibig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui mѳskai Isaac kѳrig tѳga pasraig Tiuswei merrab: “¡Katѳ! marmѳ kѳmѳ, nabe treeg maramѳnrrun” chibig kѳn.
Incha katѳgucha Labanbe Jacѳbwan trenchibig kѳn: —Ash cha, i tru srug tun pasrigwanba, katѳ tru srug ѳlneb pasrigwanba, na tru naimba, ñuimba tѳbѳtag pasrigwan.

Incha katѳ Mizpagucha taig kѳbig kѳn, kaguen Labanbe trendaig kѳbig kѳn: —Nam ñiba kanikkurri, kanikkurri yandѳ katѳbe asiyamig nebumuben, nam maig inchibelѳ kѳtashchab Jehѳvá nѳ ashib pasrѳnrrain cha.
Inchen Labanbe truyu nuin triimaybe ‘Jegar Sahaduta’ cha wamѳbene, Jacѳbpe nui triimaybe ‘Galaad’ cha wamig kѳn.
Inchabe Jacѳbpe kan nu srugwan malsra, ѳlneb kusrua pasrabe,

Inchen Labanbe Jacѳbwan trenchibig kѳn: —I ishumburmerabe nai nimbasrmera kѳben, nѳm tѳgaguig ureemerabe nai awelumera kѳben, ubishamerabe nai ubishamera kѳben, cabramerabe, nain cabramera kѳben chigurrimbunѳ yu kena kѳbiibe nayelѳ kѳn cha. Treeg kuindѳgucha nabe nai nimbasrmeranba, katѳ nѳm tѳgagui nusrkalanbabe nabe katѳle nayelѳ kѳnrraimbe yandѳ chi maramgaig kѳtan chibig kѳn.

Pilamera pib trattrѳh nabe ñui yau megaig kѳn cha. Ñui pa nimbasrmeran nan tranamweimbe pilamera pa trattrѳ y pib pilaba mara tranѳb megaig kѳn cha. Inchen trattrѳ y kanbabe ñui ushameraimburѳ megaig kѳbig kѳn cha. Inchen nan pagaramigwane katѳ, katѳ peemayh, peemayh ñibe yunѳmarѳbig kѳn cha, pa trattrѳ piejes yunѳmarig kѳn cha.

Nabe managuen kan kaambu namig usha kwabasiilanguen ñune srua arrumíig kur cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, truburѳbe naguen ñun pagaramig kѳbig kѳn cha. Kan trutѳ kѳnrrab kuindѳ ¿kwalѳm niligwan lata, yem niligwan lata ñibe nan, nan ulѳ payibig kѳmѳtirru? cha.

Ñibe nai chi kѳbelѳyu chishtѳ lawa, ¿ñui yau pѳnrrabelan chi wetѳrragu? cha. Inchawei ñi chi wetѳrrawabe, yu nai yauelai merrappa, ñui yauelai merrappa pѳnsrѳ chibig kѳn, nam pailainug mѳig sѳl pasrai kui nѳm ashchai.

Raquelbe mѳskawane trenchibig kѳn: —Nai mѳskai, na ñui merrab kurrѳmubene, ñi nan namѳmѳrrunrrig cha, kaguen nabe chillig misraig war cha. Inchen Labanbe tru taska marig tiusmeran wetѳrranrrab kaima lab uñen,

Inchen Labanbe Jacѳbwei carpa yasrѳ kebya, trugurrimbe Leain carpa yasrѳ, katѳ tru pailѳ karui mѳrѳb melab ishumburmeraisrѳ lab kebya, kalawa, tru Leai carpayugurri webarruabe, yandѳ Raquel waisrѳ lab kebig kѳn.
Inchene Jacѳbpe Labanwane trenchibig kѳn: —Kaguen nane kѳrig kuig kѳn cha, inchippa ñi ñui nimbasrmeran nan namiimay kebya kerraptinchaitamab.
Ñui mѳskawei yauwan truba isub pesrѳgѳben inrrab yabe, trube, ¿nai tiusmerane chinchab nila sruaigu?— chibig kѳn.
Pѳs nabe ñun chi marѳg kѳben maramigwan tѳga pasrar cha. Inchendѳ ñui mѳskawei Tiusbe mira yem ѳyah chitan cha: “Jacѳbwane isuptѳ mar cha. Chigѳben martrumѳn chib tsag, tsag waminchab kѳmѳ”.
Ñibe nai awelu ureemeran nai nimbasrmeran ungua cha muchanrrainguengaig maritan cha. Ñibe mѳimbe ni kan chuguinguen mѳrmíig lataig marin kѳn cha.
Jacѳbwane trenchibig kѳn: —¿Chi mara pasrѳgu? cha. ¿Nane chindimbarre ѳyeeg may kebenѳsrkѳgu? cha. Kan ñigui nai nimbasrmerane kwayabyu kemѳri ishumburmeran kui lataig srua yaitan cha.
Indig Labanbe Galaad tunmerasrѳ wetѳgѳbig kѳn, tru Jacѳb nui yauelѳba kѳrrѳmisriisrѳ. Incha Labangucha trusrѳndѳwei nui nam misaameraba kѳrrѳmisrabe,
Indig Labanbe nui nammisaameran lincha pera, Jacѳbwan wetѳgѳnrrab pasreb mendabig kѳn. Indigbe trattrѳ y pa kwalѳm puraiben tru Gaalad pirau tunmerasrѳ chab wetѳgѳb ibig kѳn.
ѳyamay Jacѳbpe tru Laban arameѳwane tru webya yamigwane chigucha mѳrѳ waminchimѳtѳ, nilѳ purѳ may welula ibig kѳn.
Inchen tru Labanbe nѳѳrѳsrѳ ubisha isig partrab yaig mugaabenbatѳ Raquelbe tru yau yau tѳgagui tiusmeran sѳra wesrain kѳbig kѳn.
Inchawei nѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgaguilan Tius namui mѳskawan kerrawa ñun traniilѳbe, kerriguba namuimba, namui nusrkalaimba kuig kѳbene, mѳimbeTius nѳ maig mar taigwane ñibe kerrigu treeg mar— chibelѳ kѳn.
¿Pѳs, namune ka mendailѳ kui lataig indig kѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Namune nѳbe yana, truburѳ mara tranѳb megaigwane nѳ chishtѳ maig kѳmuitarru? cha.

Nabe ñi tru srugwan aceite itѳlusha katѳ ñi ñuinetѳ ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrinug tru Betelsrѳ kenamisrѳb Tius kur cha. Mѳimbe kurra, i piraugurrimbe webya, ñi kal-lain pirausrѳmay katѳ inrrѳ” cha, nane trenchitan— cha.
Inchen tru piabyube Tiuswei ángelbe nane trenchitan cha: “Jacѳb” cha. Inchen nabe trendainatan cha: “Nabe yu war” cha.
ѳyamay Tiusbe ñimui mѳskawei ubishameran lata cabrameran lata nѳrrѳ kerrawa, nan tranig kѳn cha.

Inchen kѳben ñui mѳskaimbe, treeg martrab chib treeg martrab chib marmuig kѳn cha nai pagarwan ke pa tratrѳ piejes yunѳmarѳb. Inchen kѳben Tiusbe na chi tѳgaguigwan Laban kaig marmѳnrrai nan sѳtѳ pasraig kѳn cha.
Inchabe nѳmune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskaimbe nan merrabwan lataig kѳmѳtѳ, malѳbe ke mindindѳ, mindindѳ uni ashar cha. Inchendѳ nai mѳskawei Tiusbe naba pasraig kѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jehѳvábe Jacѳbwane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Merrabsrѳ ñui kѳlli misamerai pirausrѳmay katѳ inrrѳ cha. Ñui nammisaamera waraisrѳmay, nabe ñiba pasramѳnrrun— cha.
Inchagucha Jacѳb Labanwei malѳwan ashene, malѳbe ke mindiitѳ uñibig kѳn, merrabwan lataig kѳmѳtѳgue.
Génesis 31
Inchen tru tre asrka ushamera wambiimisra amrrubene, tru tsiimeran pѳnsrѳmíig kѳn. Inchagurri tru Labanweimbe tre asrkazheelѳ kѳben, tru mas werus asr tѳgarmera larrѳ chishelѳbe Jacѳbwein kѳbig kѳn.

Incha Jacѳbpe tru ubisha-ureemerane nѳrѳmara, Labanwei ubishamerayu rayas tѳgarmeranba yaleelanba Jacѳbpe nui ubisha sѳtѳmerayu keerѳb ibig kѳn. Incha yandѳ nuyasig ubisha sѳtѳmera kѳnrrai marѳb ibig kѳn. Labanweimba kanbalatѳ kѳmѳtѳ.
Inchabe tru tsig karriilane tru ubishamera pi muchig kemalinug pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Incha ubishamera wambiimisrar tru pi mutsinug pubene,
Incha tru ubisha sѳtѳmerane Jacѳb tsuisrѳngurri pѳn kwalѳm ambiisrѳ srua ambubelѳ kѳn, nѳm waraisrѳ. Trune Jacѳbpe nuimburappe Labanwei katѳgan ubisha sѳtѳmeran ashib tsubig kѳn.
Inchene Labanbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi trendaig tab kѳn— cha. Labanbe treeg kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Pѳs Srѳna trumarsrѳ tru na kanab megaigwan ñi ashchab arruben, tab marigwan kenamartrabibe truig kѳnrrun cha. Kabe kan ubisha kui, kabe kan cabra-unѳ kui rayas tѳgar kѳmѳwei, tsureelѳ kѳmѳwei, kabe kan ubisha-unѳ yalig kѳmѳwei, tru utu ñi treelѳ wetѳrrappe, trube, nabe ñuyelan nilab megaig kѳnrrun— cha.

Inchene Labanbe trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Ñun chi tranamѳ?— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Chigucha tranmѳrrunrrig cha. Na ñun ѳyeeg martra taigwan ñi tregwan martrab misrene si, nabe ñui ubishameran ashibig asamѳnrrun cha.
Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe ashibig kѳn cha, nabe ñuyasig yeeg marѳb megaigwan. Incha ñui ushameran nabe yeeg tab ashib tѳgaguigwan.
Incha eshkarra chibig kѳn: ñi maya pagar utѳnrrab isuigwan, nabe treegwan pagaramѳnrrun— cha.
Nai sralan trannrra cha, na truilaimburab mara tranѳb megailan, nai nusrkalanba, nan yandѳ ibashcha chibig kѳn, kaguende nabe ñuyasig yeeg marѳb megaigwan ñibe asha kѳn— cha.
Yandѳ Raquel Jѳséwan tѳgamisren, Jacѳbpe Labanwan trenchibig kѳn: —Na tsuig kѳbig tru pirausrѳmay inrrab, ibashcha cha.
Inchendѳ Tiusbe Raquelwan isub tѳga wawa, nѳ miab megaigwan mѳra, ureg kѳnrrai tranig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Leabe kan nimbasr tѳgagua, truigwane Dina munchi pasrig kѳn.
Incha Leabe trenchibig kѳn: “Tiusbe tru na pagaraikkurri nan keta trandan cha, kaguende nabe nai karuig mendig megabigwan nai kewan tranig kua” Incha treekkurri unane Isacar munchi pasrig kѳn.
Inchen tru Lea miab megaigwan Tius mѳren, Leabe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, trattrѳgatѳ kѳnrrabyu nusrkawan Jacѳbwei tѳgaguig kѳn.

Inchene Leabe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: —¿Ñibe nai kewan yeeg kerrawa pasraptѳga ñungan chigucha kѳmui lataig mѳrѳraitarru? cha. ¿Mѳimbe nai nusrkai mandrágѳras srua arriilangucha nan kerranrrab indirru?— cha. Inchene Raquelbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Tru ñui nusrkai mandrágѳras srua arriilan na merrarranrrur cha, truburѳ mѳi yem Jacѳbpa ñi ki pѳs— cha.
Inchen Leai karuig mendig megabig tru Zilpabe Jacѳbwei katѳgan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchen Leabe trenchibig kѳn: “Yangucha tabig pub attrabigwan tѳgaguinatan” cha. Incha treekkurri Gad munchi pasrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Leagucha yandѳ mas ureg tѳgagѳnrrab kaimappe, nui karuig mendig megabig Zilpan pera arrua, Jacѳbwan tranѳbig kѳn, nui srain kѳnrrai.
Incha Raquelbe trenchibig kѳn: “Tius namun ѳyeeg kѳnrrain kuikkurri nabe nai numѳsraimba purѳ murtѳ melambuyab megawa, na kanar” cha. Treekkurri Raquelbe tru unane Neftalí munchi pasrig kѳn.
Inchen Bilhabe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, Jacѳbwei kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn.
ѳyamay Raquelbe tru nui karui megabig Bilhan Jacѳbwan srai lataig kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe tru Bilhaba kibig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳbpe truba nama, trenchibig kѳn: —¿Nagan Tius kuitarru cha, ñun chi ureg chigaig kѳnrrai marѳbiibe?—
Génesis 30

Incha katѳle kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳ kan nusrkai tѳgagua trenchibig kѳn: “Mѳimbe nai keebe naba mas trakkandѳ linchautan cha, kaguen nabe nune chabguen pѳn nusrkalѳguen tranar” cha. Inchagurri truigwane Leví munchi pasrѳbig kѳn.

Incha Leabe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, kan nusrkai tѳgagua, truigwane Rubén munchi pasrѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: “Na yeekkucha isui megaben, Jehѳvá nan isua ashtan cha. Mѳimbeguende nai keebe nan undaaranrrautan” cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe Raquelbagucha kibig kѳn. Incha truigwane Lean lataguen kѳmѳ, masken undaarabig kѳn. Incha Labanweyasig katѳgucha srѳig trattrѳ y pa pila mara tranѳb megaig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳbpe treeg marѳbig kѳn. Incha tru Leaba tru kasharabyu tabig mab kasrag waramigwan tru trune neig maramigwan chab nemarene, Labanbe Raquel nui nimbasrwan srain kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Labanbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nam waraim piraube kasharanrrai wendiigwanmerrig tranamig kѳmѳn cha, mayurguen ka tsumnetѳbe.
Inchagucha Labanbe kan karuig mendig megabig Zilpa taigwane Lean purugub meganrrai tranѳbig kѳn.
Indiibe yandѳ yem misren Labanbe nui nimbasr Lean pera arrua, Jacѳbwane truigwan tranѳptinchen, Jacѳbpe pera kibig kѳn.
Inchene Labanbe truyu maya misaameran tulamrrai wama larrѳ tab fiesta marѳbig kѳn.
ѳyamay Jacѳbpe trattrѳ y pabila Raquelwan tranamwei mara tranѳb megabig kѳn. Nѳbe Raquelwane purѳ chull asha, megaig kѳppe, nune ni kan maya yanaguen kѳmub lata inchibig kѳn.
Leabe kammera larrѳ tabzhig ashibig kѳbene, trune Raquelbe larrѳ tab malѳ pasraig, larrѳ tab ishuuzhig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru Labanbe nimbasrmera pagatѳ tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn, mayurbe Lea kѳbene, wendiibe Raquel.
Labanbe nune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nai yauig kuimburѳtѳ chi pagaraimíig ka mara tranѳptѳ megamig kѳmѳn cha. ¿Mayanzhig pagaramѳ?— cha.
Inchen Labanbe tru nui nuchawei nusrkai Jacѳbweimburab wamindi mѳrѳppe, katѳnrrab lulѳb ya, ira, muchawa, nui yamay pera ibig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe nun chitѳ purayaigwan kerriguh eshkabig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Raquelwan muchawabe, truba truba kishibig kѳn.

Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui usraimbe nuchag Labanwei nimbasr Raquelwanba, katѳ tru Labanwei ubishameraba arri ashabe, kemalla, tru pisuyu srug kasraig tsubigwan malsra, nui kuchimѳskai Labanwei ubishameran pi mutsѳsrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen truilѳbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Treeg maramgaig kѳn cha, maya ubisha sѳtѳmera kerrigu kanbalatѳ misramne, tru ubisha ashibelѳ, tru pisu pala srug trarrig tsubigwan malsramne. Malsrѳbendѳwei ubishameran nambe pi mutsѳsramig kѳn— cha.

Inchen Jacѳbpe: —¿Kwanrrѳ kѳmѳ, tab ka tsubig kuitarru?— cha katѳyug payibig kѳn. Inchen tru ubisha ashibelѳbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nѳbe tab ka tsubig kѳn cha. Au, ñiguen ash cha, mѳskawei ubishameran merrana nimbasr Raquelbe uyu arrun— cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe tru ubisha ashibelan: —¡Nai nunelѳ! ¿Ñimbe chuelѳ kѳgue?— cha payene: —Nambe Haransreelѳ ker— chiben,

Jacѳbpe nѳ chu yamsrѳmay ib ya, pѳrr kal-labgatѳmaywan misaamerain pirausrѳ pubig kѳn.2 Incha trusrѳ pua ashene, tru wambigwansrѳmbe kan pisu wabig kѳn. Inchen tru pisu pulube ubishamera pѳn sѳtѳ israb warabelѳ kѳn, kaguen truilѳbe tru piwan muchibelѳ kua. Inchen tru pisube larrѳ nu sruutѳga kasraig pasrabig kѳn.
Inchen i srugwan kan pilar lataig ѳlgandѳ na kusrua pasriibe, Tiuswei ya kѳnrrun cha. Inchen Tius nan chigurrimbunѳ tranigugurri nabe cienyu diezbatѳ, diezbatѳ nun tranamѳnrrun” chibig kѳn, Jacѳbpe.
katѳ na nai mѳskawei yausrѳ chigucha kѳmѳ, katѳle pishindѳ tab ka puinabene, Jehѳvábe nai Tius kѳnrrun cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe lѳtsѳzhig kurrabe, tru nѳ kuña mari srugwan kusrua, kan pilar lataig ѳlneb pasra, truyu ѳyeeg puigwan aschai trubala aceite itѳlushibig kѳn.
Incha truba kѳrig kui inchabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Yube si, purѳ kѳrig kѳmdiig kѳtan cha. Chi peg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei yaba, srѳmbalasrѳ yaskappa kѳn” cha.
Inchen Jacѳb tru piab tsuigugurri kiagasrabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Isa kѳmѳ, Jehѳvábe yu pasrѳben, nabe treeg kuitamappe isumubrain kѳn” cha.

Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ, pirau kan usrѳ tui lataig kѳnrrun cha, pѳrr pinebgatѳmaywansrѳ, pѳrr neeshibgatѳmaywansrѳ, walliguebwansrѳ, waguebwansrѳ, misag larrѳbicha warѳnrrun cha. Ñui yellyugurri pirau muba kuimburab maya misaabe, ñigurri mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun cha.

Inchen truyu nun piappe treeg piabig kѳn: Kan escalera, srѳmbalasrѳngurri pirausrѳ punѳsrkain pasrappe, tru kappe srѳmbalasrѳ kebacha pasrѳben, mѳimbe truwane angelesmera nebambamba, kѳrrѳrrumba inchib kѳben,
Inchen yandѳ kanbalѳ puabe, pѳrr pinaiben, truyu yem kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn. Incha truyu kan srug tsubigwan kuña mara trarra, truyu kinrrab tsumisrѳbig kѳn.
Incha treekkurri nui mѳskai Isaacbe tru Canaánsrѳ ishumburmerane chigucha tab kѳmui ashibig kuin kui wetѳbeña,
Inchen Jacѳbpe mѳskawanba usranba mѳra, Padan-Aramsrѳmay yai ashibig kѳn Esaúbe.
ѳyamay Isaacbe Jacѳbwan Padan-Aramsrѳmay inrrai ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, tru Betuel arameѳwei nusrkai tru Labanwei yausrѳmay. Truibe Rebecaimbe nuchag kѳbig kѳn, Jacѳbweimba Esaúweimbabe usrin kѳben.
Inchen Maramburab Marѳb Tiusbe ñune mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai mara, ñune ureg larrѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳb, ñuinukkurri purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera nemisramnegatig martrun cha.
Génesis 28

Incha Rebecabe Isaacwan trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe nai ѳsig unigu larrѳ trѳmbѳig kui uñar cha, tru hititas ishumburmeragurrindѳ. Jacѳb yu Canaán pirau hititasmeraba kasharabene, chinchib ѳsig tsumuinguen kѳnrrautan— chibig kѳn.
Trusrѳ kan maya yana kѳsrѳn tsunrrig cha, ñui nunewan namig kѳbig purayamne.
Inchen Rebecabe tru Esaú ѳyeeg martrab isub unigwan wammѳrabe, Jacѳbwan wamѳnrrab ѳra, trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneg Esaúbe ñun nѳgucha lata martrab ñune kwetchab tan cha.
Ñibe ñui espadatѳga kwayawatѳwei ѳsig tsunrrabguen cha. Incha ñibe ñui nuneg karuindiig megamig nebunrrun cha. Inchendѳ ñun megamgaig misrѳb arruben, ñibe truyugurri welulrrabguen— cha.
Inchene Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe misrѳb pirѳmerasrѳngurri purѳ yabsrѳ tsunrrabguen cha, katѳ srѳmbalasrѳngurri serenu peñibig nebumѳsrѳ.

Inchen Isaacbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: —Nabe ñune Jacѳb karub tѳgagѳnrrai Tiuswan miar cha. Incha katѳ nui misaamerabe Jacѳb manchiben marѳb melabelѳ kѳnrrai miar cha. Trurrigu nѳbe tirigumera nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳb, vinѳmera tѳgagѳb inchai miar cha. Nai nusrkai, ¡Mѳimbe yandѳ ñuyasiibe chi maramig kaatan!— cha.
Inchen Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneebe arrua, nane purѳ may isa, tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmig ñuin kѳnrrabigwan nѳ uta, tѳga, yan— cha.

Isaacbe itѳnab menda, purѳ kѳrrѳ kwaarig, trenchibig kѳn: —¡Paare! ¿Trube muguig kѳh? cha, tru usha kemѳra srua arrubiibe. Pѳs, ñi arrumѳwatѳ, srua arruben, nabe kerrigu chab maig kѳn cha. Incha nabe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nun chab tranig kѳn cha. Pѳs, tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranigwane nѳbe tѳga kѳrrѳmisrtrun— cha.

Incha nѳgucha kan mamig mayzhig tamara, nui mѳskaweimay srua arruabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Nai papá, wamisr cha. Na ñui nusrkai kemѳra srua arrigwan manrrig cha, ñi nan mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nayasig Tius nan trannrrai miarrunrrig— cha.

Tru misag sѳtѳmera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳbe ñun utsѳbasrtrun cha. Inchen ñibe ñui nunelane ñi karubig kѳnrrig cha. Inchen truilѳbe ñui merrab utsѳbasrtrun cha. Ñun ‘trѳmbѳig nebunrrain’ chib pѳnrrabelѳbe, nѳm trѳmbѳig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun cha. Inchen ñun ‘tabig nebunrrain’ chib pѳnrrabelѳbe, nѳm tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun— chib.

Inchen Jacѳbpe kemalla, muchaben, Isaacbe tru nui nusrkai kewa pasrailan irrѳmѳrabe, mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranѳb trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkaimbe wambigwansrѳ chi kѳbigwan Jehѳvá mayanguen tabig kѳnrrai mari lataig irrabig kѳtan cha.

Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi kemѳra srua arrigwan na manrrab srua attra cha, na ñun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranrrumѳn— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe mamigwan srua kemallen, Isaacbe mabig kѳn. Incha katѳ vinѳgucha srua arruben, trunungucha muchibig kѳn.
Pѳs nѳbe mѳig kui mѳrtrab kaimabig kѳn, kaguende tasiimerabe Esaúwei tasiimera lataig isiiteelѳ kѳben. Incha mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan yandѳ ke tranntrab inchabe,
Inchen mѳskai Isaacwan Jacѳbpe kemallen, nѳbe katѳrawabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Wambe Jacѳbwein kѳbendѳ, tasiimerabe Esaúwein kѳbwain inndan— cha.
Inchen Isaacbe nui nusrkawan trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai, ¿Mandѳ incharre malla wetѳrragu?— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Jehѳvá ñui Tiusbe nan petѳ wetѳrramig purugutan— cha.
trugurrimbe tru may mamiizhig tamarigwanba, tru pirrin tamarigwanba Jacѳbwan tranѳbig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe tru usrimbe Jacѳbwane tasiguba, katѳ nukaburab chi isikkayube tru cabrѳ ureezhelai kalusmeratѳga pinѳbula,
Inchen nѳbe ya srua arrua, usran tranen, usrimbe mѳskai maig chullig kuaasha, treeg tamarѳbig kѳn.

Inchippa nai mѳskaimbe nan katѳrawa, nan mugui mѳrabe, nane isa purѳ may kebenѳsrkѳptiig kui martrautan cha. Trubeguende nane mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai nayasig Tiuswan miai urasbe nane masken larrѳ kaig nebuig pasramigwanguen miawa pasrtrautan— cha.
Inchene Jacѳbpe usri Rebecane trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg Esaúbe ya isiitѳ mѳg kѳben, nabe ya chigucha isikkaibe cha.
Mѳimbe ubishameraba cabrameraba purrabsrѳmay ya, pagatѳ purѳ tab cabrѳ ureemeran sruattra cha. Pѳs, nabe ñui mѳskai maig mabig kui asha truilan larrѳ may mamiizhig tamaramѳnrrun cha.
Inchawei nai nusrkai na mandѳ cha karuben, trunun tab mѳrtra chibig kѳn.

Inchen Rebecabe nui nusrkai Jacѳbwane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —¡Au! nabe ñui mѳskai Isaacbe ñui nuneg Esaúba: “Kan usha kemѳra larrѳ may mamiizhig tamara, srua attrig” chib ѳyeeg waminchen trunun mѳrar cha.
Trugurrimbe, na maig chullig kuaasha, kan mamig larrѳ mayzhig tamara, srua attra chibig kѳn, na manrrur cha. Trugurrimbe na kwamѳwatѳ mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai ñuyasig na Tiuswan mianrrab— cha.
Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe yandѳ kѳllig kur cha. Nabe chi kwalѳm kwam kui mѳrmur cha.
Génesis 27
Inchen Isaacweimba, Rebecaimbabe tru i pagatѳ ishumburmerabe larrѳ trѳmbѳig isuindѳ, isuindѳ melѳnrrai marѳbelѳ kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Isaacbe i pisuwane “Seba” cha munchi pasrig kѳn trenchippe: ¡Katѳ! marmѳgѳmѳ maramѳnrrun tain pisu cha. Inchawei tru ciudawane mѳin kwalѳmgatig “Beerseba” cha wamig kѳn.

Incha katѳ kwalѳmbe lѳtsѳzhig kurra mѳingurrimbunѳbe ambugurri igurri kwayab kѳmѳnrrab cha nѳmbe treeg kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn, Inchen Isaacbe yandѳ ungua chiben, nѳmbe chi isumѳ, tab webamba ambubelѳ kѳn.

Pѳs ñibe namun chigucha kaig marmumig kѳnrrain cha. Pѳs namma ñune chigucha chi kaig incha ashmѳtѳ, nambe ñune tab tѳgagua, ñune chigucha kѳmѳ tab webya inrrai marig kuig kѳn cha. Pѳs mѳimbe ¡Jehѳvá mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai indiibe ñi kѳn!— cha
Inchen Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Ñimbe naimaybe chinchab amrrugue? cha. Ñimbe nane tsalѳ kѳptѳ, ñimui piraugurringuen nan wegucha pѳnrrѳbendѳbe?—

Inchen Isaacbe truyu kan altar kusrua, Jehѳváwei munchiwan wamab tabig waminchibig kѳn. Incha tru nui tsumig carpa yawan truyu tamara, pasrѳbig kѳn. Inchen Isaacwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe katѳ truyu lalla, pi wesrubelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Isaacbe truyugurri Beersebamay ibig kѳn.
Inchen katѳgan pisu lalla wesruben, katѳ truikkurri treetѳwei mur aleguiyabelѳ kѳn. Incha truigwane “Sitna” (‘Ashig Kѳmui Indiyab Kѳrrѳmisrin Pi’) cha munchi pasrig kѳn.
Indig kan kwalѳm Isaacwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe tru chaasrѳ lallib kuabe, lulѳb pizheelѳ wetѳrrabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Isaacbe truyugurri ya, Gerar chag pirѳmerasrѳ tsumisrig kѳn.
Incha nui mѳskai Abraham ѳsig wab urassrѳ, Abrahamwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe aljibesmera lalla, pi wesruilan, truilan filisteѳsmerabe pirѳtѳga netsѳ kasra pѳnsrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Incha nѳbe maskken maskken pua misrѳb, larrѳ nui misrѳb ya, muguen treeg tѳgagѳmuinrrunig puaig misrig kѳn.
Indiibe Isaac tru pirau ellmara, tru pilawan kan yellzhikkurrindѳ cien menrrabatѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ tulishibig kѳn, kaguende Jehѳvá nun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai inchen.

Inchene Abimelecbe trenchibig kѳn:—Ñibe namune ¿chindimbarre ѳyeeg margu? cha. Katѳguchimbe namui misagu mѳig kѳben, ñui sraimba kaig marѳb waramisrig kuimasrtѳ cha. Incha treeg kaig mariitѳga kangurrindѳ ñibe namune mayeelan kegѳrrѳsrka pѳnsrѳbsrutan— cha!.
Incha kan maya yana kѳsrѳn Isaacbe trusrѳ tsuben, tru Abimelec filisteѳsmerai reybe kan pendanayu ashib pasrѳbene, mѳimbe Isaacbe nui srai Rebecane truba tabzhig undaarab pasrai ashiptinchabe.
Incha Isaacbe Gerar pirau kѳrrѳmisra tsuig kѳbig kѳn.

Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane kan srѳmbalasrѳ kѳnchabiimera lataig nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai mara, i pirѳmeran kerriguh tranamѳnrrun. Incha chu pirausrѳn kѳben misaamera nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ warabelѳbe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai marig kѳnrrun cha tru ñui misaamera amrrubelѳyugurri.
Incha truyu Jehѳvábe Isaacwan kenamisra, trenchibig kѳn: —Egiptѳsrѳmaybe imѳta cha. Na chu tsunrrain chiben tru pirau kѳrrѳmisr cha.
Génesis 26

Jacѳbpe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Mѳin kwalѳm ¡katѳ! treegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun chirra— cha. Inchen nѳbe: —¡Katѳ! treegwan maramѳnrrun— cha kѳrrѳmisra, nѳ mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguigwan Jacѳbpa yunѳmariyabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Esaube: —Pѳs, nane parѳgwabiitѳ ke kwamdѳ kѳtan cha. ¿Na mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguatѳbe chigui indamѳtah?— chiben,
Jacѳbwane trenchibig kѳn: —ѳ pigѳ mamig may tamara ñi neniizhigwan tiusmanda srѳttra cha, kaguende nabe larrѳ muraaraig war— cha. (Inchagurri Edѳm cha wamig kuig kѳn.)
Incha Isaacbe Esaúwan mas undaarabig kѳn, kaguen nѳ chi kemѳra srua arriilan srѳrrig mabig kua. Trune Rebecabe Jacѳbwanrre mas undaarabig kѳn.
Inchen tru srѳsrѳ kal-labzhiibe ke pigѳ isig nabzhig kѳbig kѳn, trurrigu asr ѳrѳba isikuzhikke. Treekkurri Esau munchi pasrig kѳn.
Indig yandѳ kal-lamig ura pubene, nui patsaube mѳg ureezheelѳ par kuin kѳptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen tru pa ureemerabe nui patsautѳ kwayab purrѳben, Rebecabe treeg isubig kѳn: “ѳyeeg kѳbene, ¿chiwein kui ѳsig uñibig unamѳtah?” cha. Incha Jehѳváwan payrrab ibene,
Isaacbe Rebecaba kasharab uras pilamera cuarenta tѳgaig kuig kѳn, tru Rebecabe Betuelwei nimbasr Labanwei nuchag kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Betuelba Labanbabe arameѳsmera Padan-aramsrѳ warabelѳ kuig kѳn.
Incha ismaelitasmerabe Havilasrѳngurri Shur taisrѳngatig waraig kѳbig kѳn, Egiptѳ pinrrѳguewansrѳ, tru Asiriamay ambi maywansrѳ. Inchen nѳbe nunelan, ka kwayam laptѳ, kwayam laptѳ tsubig kѳn cha.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Ismaelwei dѳce nusrkalѳ, tru nѳmui nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmѳrig ashib pѳnrrabelai munchimera. Nѳmui pirѳmeraba nѳm chu kѳrrѳmisra warailѳbabe tru munchimeratѳgatѳwei pѳnsra wamiilѳ.
trugurrimbe Misma kѳben, Duma kѳben, Masa kѳben,

Iilѳ kѳn tru Ismaelwei nusrkalai munchimera, tru kerrigu mayur kal-labigwei wendautѳ trumѳrig kal-lawa amrrubelai. Ismaelwei kerrigu mayur nusrkaimbe Nebayѳt kѳben, trugurrimbe Cedar kѳben, trugurrimbe Adbel kѳben, Mibsan kѳben,
Inchen yandѳ Abraham kwaben, Tiusbe Isaac nui nusrkawane mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai inchen, Isaacbe tru ‘ѳsig Wab, katѳ Nan Ashibig’ taisrѳ pisu puluwan kѳrrѳmisra, tsubig kѳn.
Inchen nui nusrkalѳ Isaacba, Ismaelba misra kusra sѳrabelѳ kѳn, tru Macpela tainug, sѳramig peñayu trab lalig pasrabigu tru Mamre taig pinrrѳguewansrѳ, tru Zѳhar hititai nusrkai Efrónweim pirau.
Abraham ѳsig tsuibe pilamera cientѳ setenta y cincѳ kuig kѳn.
Abrahambe nѳ kerrigu chi tѳgaguilane Isaacwan chishtѳh kѳrrѳmarig kѳn.
Truibe Zimramwan kѳben, Jѳcsánwan kѳben, Medánwan kѳben, Madiánwan kѳben, Isbacwan kѳben, Súajwan kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Abrahambe katѳgan srai tѳgaguig kѳbig kѳn, truigwei munchibe Cetura taig.
Génesis 25
Inchen tru karuig mendig megabiibe nѳ maitѳ marigwan kerriguh Isaacwan waminchibig kѳn.
Inchen Rebecagucha kurraasha, Isaacwan ashabe, camellѳyugurri pinaarrua,
Isaacbe kan maaben wambigwansrѳ lliranrrab webarrin kѳbig kѳn. Incha mѳimbe kurraashene, camellѳsmera pulu lutaurab amrruptinchibelѳ kѳn.

Incha Rebecabe tru nui karub tѳgagui srusralmeraba, yandѳ camellѳsmeran itѳguana, tru Abrahamwei mendig megabigwei tru mendig ambubelѳ kѳn. ѳyamay tru Abrahamwei mendig megabiibe Rebecan pera ibig kѳn, truyugurri.
Incha nѳmbe Rebecan wama, payibelѳ kѳn: —¿I mѳѳba inrraguh?— cha. Inchene nѳbe: —ѳѳ, na lincha inrrur— chibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Trube, ishug unan wamѳnrrab cha, nѳ manchitashchab— cha.
Treeg kuingucha Rebecai nuchaaba, usrimbabe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ishug unѳbe kan pa trattrѳ kwalѳmdѳguen namba ka kѳrrѳmisrtrain cha. Trugurrimbeguendѳ ka ibwei inchun— cha.
Inchen Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiibe ѳyeeg taigwan mѳrѳppe, Jehѳváwei merrab tѳmbѳnsra pirausrѳngatig utsѳbasrѳbig kѳn.
Rebecabe yu wan cha. Ñun karub peragѳbigwei nusrkawei srain kѳnrrai trube pera inrrѳ chibig kѳn, Jehѳvá nѳ maig kѳnrrai isuig, trumay.—

Inchawei nai karub tѳga pasrabigwan ñim yauelѳ kermab pesannameelѳ kѳb, larrѳ tammayelѳ kѳb treelѳ kuabe, nan eshkarray cha. Inchen treeg kѳnrrab kѳmubene, trube, trunungucha eshkarray cha. Trumaybe na mandѳ indamigwan na isumig kѳnrrautan— cha.

Inchen nabe “¿Ñibe mui nimbasr kugu?” cha payene, nѳbe nane trenchibig kѳn: “Nabe Betuelwei nimbasr kur cha, tru Nacѳrweimba Milcaimba nusrkawei.” Inchen nabe nune kan surtigas kimyu mesrѳb, kualmerayu pѳnsraigwan pѳnsrѳb inchibig kur.

Inchen nabe nai umbutѳ Tiusba chab waminchimѳwatѳ, mѳimbe Rebecabe pi mutin kѳtsѳn kildunyu mutaig, arruptindi ashibig kur cha. Incha pisuyu pi wesranrrab kѳrraiben, nabe trenchibig kur cha: “Tiusmanda, nan pi srѳttra” cha.
na mѳi pisu pulu pasrѳben, ѳyeeg purainrrain cha, tru pi wesrawa srua inrrab arrub srusran: ‘Tiusmanda, ñui kѳtsѳyu piwan nan kuchi srѳrrѳbsrumugu’ chiben,
Inchen nai yauelѳ ishug unan tranѳg kѳmuincheneguende ñi nan ¡katѳ! nabe treeg marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun taigwane trube, yandѳ ñibe chi isumikkaig kѳrrѳmisrabguen chibig kѳn.” cha.
Inchene nabe nun trenchibig kur cha: “¿Inchippa ishug-unѳ nai mendig arrumѳnrrab incheneh?” cha.
“Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nai mѳskawei yau misaameraimay ya, nai misagugurri amrrub ishumburmerai utu ishuwan nai nusrkawei srain kѳnrrai larrunrrig” cha.
Inchen, nan karub pera kѳbigwei srai Sarabe, kѳllimbala nui kan nusrkai tѳgamisrig kѳn cha. Inchen nan karub peragѳbiibe nui chi tѳgaguilan kerriguba nui nusrkaweyasig kѳrrѳmaran cha.
Tru Abrahamwei mendig megabiibe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe tru Abrahamwei mendig megab mѳg kur cha.

Inchen tru Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiibe yamay arruben, nѳmbe camellѳsmeran niisrailan chab picha warabe, manrrai pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Incha trugurrimbe pi srua arrubig kѳn, tru Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiiba, tru nui lincha amrrubelѳba nѳmui srѳmmeran kwallchai.

Incha Labanbe trusrѳ pua: —Jehѳvá maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai indi mѳg, amѳ chibig kѳn. ¿Ñibe wambiitѳbe chinchib pasrѳnrragu? cha. Nabe yawane ñuyasig chab tamarar cha, katѳ ñui camellѳsmerain chigucha.—
Inchen tru Rebeca kan nuchag Laban taig tѳgaguibe, truibe tru mѳwan lanrrab pisusrѳngatig lulѳbig kѳn,
Inchen tru srusrѳbe lulѳbig kѳn, tru chi purayaigwan nui yauelan eshkanrrab.
