Katѳ Tiuswan miarrunrrigay, nui wamwan waminchippe, na maig wamindamig kѳben tѳrgandѳ treeg waminchab.
Chu urastѳgucha Tiusba wamindamigwane maikken elachimѳ melѳnrrigay, trunune marѳppe, nѳѳrѳtѳ isub palabinѳ gѳmѳ, tab isua marѳb, Tiuswan ungwa, ungwa chib.
Inchen mѳikkѳben maig maramigwan marmѳtѳ, kalѳ marѳbigwane nui kalѳ marig maig kѳben truburѳ nѳgucha treetѳwei kaigwan utѳnrrun. Kaguende Tiusbe mѳigwane purѳmisrѳb kandarѳtѳ inchimíig kѳn.
Chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, martrab isua maramig kѳn, mѳguelayasig kѳmѳtѳ, Señѳrweyasig lataig marѳb,
Ureemerabe, chiyutѳgucha nѳmui mѳskalane maig chiben mѳramig kѳn. Kaguende ѳyeeg mariibe Señѳrwane truba tabig asѳnan.
Sralѳbe, kelѳ maig chiben treeg mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Señѳr nѳ maig martrai indig kѳben, trumay.
Inchawei chigѳben marѳppe, wamindigu lata, chigѳben mariilѳyu lata, Señѳr Jesúswei munchiyu maray, nѳgurri Tius Mѳskawan ungwa, ungwa chib.

Inchen Cristѳ tru chi isumgaig tab gѳbiibe ñimui manrrau maig maramigwan nѳ garub pasrѳnrrai inday. Kaguende ñim kan asrtѳ gúig kѳben, ѳyeegumay wamig kѳn. Ñimbe mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ gѳnrrigay.
Inchen gѳben iilѳ kerrigu gѳmnetѳ tru balabe, undag kѳbigwan itѳguewa bѳnrramig kѳn, tru undag kѳbiibe mumaytѳgucha kanbalatѳ newan purѳ tabig pѳnrramig kѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn.

Inchawei Tius lawa wesruilѳ, ñim newan tabig chishelѳ, trurrigu undaarailѳbe iigwan kewa lataig bѳnrray: lastima ashibig kѳmigwan gѳben, larrѳ tab inchibelѳ gѳmigwan gѳben, kѳrrѳteelѳ gѳmigwan gѳben, larrѳ tammayig kѳmigwan gѳben, maig kѳben kuingucha tammay megabig kѳmigwan gѳben,
Incha ñimbe tru srѳigwan kewa bѳnrran. Tius nѳ marѳbig maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marigwan, tru srѳibe kerriguwan tab nebua asamnegatig srѳitѳ srѳitѳ yunѳmarѳb arrun.
Ñimgucha merrabsrѳmbe ѳyeelandѳwei marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳbig kѳn.
ѳyeelan marikkurriwei tru mѳrmeelaim bala arrubig kѳn Tiuswei namig kѳbiibe.
Inchen Cristѳ tru ñim ѳsig bѳnrraig kenamisrene, ñimgucha nѳba tѳrguegwalmabigu tѳgatѳ kenamisrtrun.
Kaguende ñimbe yandѳ kwaig latailѳ gua, mѳimbe ñimui ѳsig kѳmibe Cristѳba Tiusweinug sѳra tѳgagúig pѳnrran.
Ñimbe isuppe, srѳmbalasreelan isuy, yu pirauelan gѳmѳtѳ.
Inchen ѳyeeg mariilѳbe kerriguba tru wendѳsrѳ attrabigwan ѳyeeg kѳnrrabig kuitamab asamig, iibe ka treetѳ gѳn. Inchen tru ciertѳn maig kѳnrrabiibe, Cristѳ, nѳ gѳn.
Inchawei chigѳben mamimeran mutsamelan, chigѳben fiesta marin gwalѳmmeran, srѳ bѳl tsumisrin gwalѳmmeran, isrin gwalѳmmeran, ѳyeebe maig marѳbelѳ gѳgue chib ñimun mugucha wamincha ashmѳnrrai maray.

Incha katѳ tru kailѳ nѳm asha garuigwanba, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karuigwanba yandѳ truilane chigucha martrabgailѳ misrtrai kѳrrѳmara, nѳmune mayeelѳ ashig kui ashchai marig kѳn, tru kurusyu kwawa, yandѳ nѳ kanawa basramisra.
tru ѳyeeg tailan: ѳigwane kusrawa ashmѳta tamba: Iigwane mamѳta tamba: Katѳramѳta tamba indiilan?

Tru nam ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg ulѳ gѳn cha kan kilgayu pѳri lataitѳwei kѳbigwanba, katѳ truyutѳwei ѳyeeg maramig kѳn chib pѳri latailѳ pѳnrrabigwanba, Cristѳn tru kurusyu mesrѳben tѳgatѳ mesrѳb lataig mara, Tiusbe chi asamig kaanrrai kerraig kѳn.

Tru ñimui chigurrimbunѳ kaig mariilѳyuba, ñimuinug trendѳ trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchib pasrabigwan kerrab tru asru circuncisiѳnwan marѳb lataitѳwei chi mariimeelѳ ñim kwailѳ srѳ gѳbenbatѳwei, Tiusbe Cristѳba kanbalatѳ ѳsig kѳmigwan ñimune tranig kѳn, namui kaig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ, kerriguwan pesannab.

Ñim ketig utamigwan mugѳben utѳbashmuinab pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳ. Nѳmbe ka isatѳ, purѳ tabzhig misrѳb, ángelesmeran kѳriibala tabig waminchib tѳmbѳnsrѳb, truilѳbe piab lataig kenamisrigu chigѳben aser chib wamindamburab waminchib, nѳmui trendѳ kaig isub turyu ke purab nѳrreelѳ isumuinguenig isubelѳ gѳn,

Katѳ trendѳ trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchib pasrabigwan ñimui asrugurri kerrab ñimbe nuinug mu gúi asiilѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳn, tru mѳguelѳ tasiitѳga asru circuncisiѳn marig tѳgagѳmѳtѳ, tru mu gúi ashchai kѳrrѳmariibe Cristѳinukkurri arrubiitѳga.

Ñimun piu umbu ulsrѳben, Cristѳba kegѳtѳ sѳriilѳ lataig kuig kѳn. Incha tru piu umbu ulsraigugurri kurrappe, ñimbe nѳba kegѳtѳ ѳsiirawa kurrig kѳn, Cristѳn kwailai utugurri kusrubig Tiuswei maramburab marѳbigu ñimui isubigwan truyu pasrikkurri.
Kaguen Tius maya nu nѳ kѳmburab kuibe, Cristѳi asru pasran.

Isua tab ashiptѳ melay, mѳguelѳ nѳrrѳ gusreelѳ chi purugunrrabgailѳ ka kegѳrrѳsrkamitѳ marѳbiitѳga, ñimun srua ambinab melѳnrrab gѳmѳ, tru kusreelѳbe chi purugunrrabgailѳ, ka kegѳrrѳsrkamitѳ marѳbigwan. Truilѳbe misaamera nѳm merrabsrѳngurri trendѳ isub amrruilѳyugurrimba, katѳ chinetѳ yu pirau muba kuimburab mandѳ isua marѳb gѳmig tѳgagúilѳyugurrimba arrubig kѳn, Cristѳinug maig kѳben, treeg kѳmѳtѳ.
Ñim Cristѳ Jesúswan ñimun nѳ asha garub pasrabig kui asha utamma, utig kuibe, nuinug treeg amѳnay,
Nabe ѳyeegwan ѳyeeg chippe, ñimun may wamincha mugucha kegѳrrѳsrkѳmѳnrrai waminchar.
Kaguende chigúi mѳrѳb kusrebig kѳmiba, chigúi nebua asamiba, tru iig purѳ tabiibe kerriguba Cristѳinuutѳ sѳrig bѳnrran.
Pѳs nabe ñimuimburappa, laѳdiceasreelaimburappa, katѳ mayeelѳ nan malaugue nebua ashmeelaimburappa, truba rruba mur tranrrab marѳb megaigwan ñim nebua asimbemab isutan.

Nambe tru Cristѳn eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ guer, mundѳgucha ѳyamay melѳnrrigay chib, kusrenanѳb, maig kuigwan tab chigúi mѳrague, mu misaamerandѳgucha Cristѳ Jesúsweinug newan tabig pѳnrrѳnrrai Tiuswan kenamartrab.
tru manasrѳngurri maya misagwan mungucha Tius kenamariimíig tѳgagúigwan. Inchendѳ truigwane mѳi yasrѳmbe nui misaameran kenamaran.
Na ñimuimburab chine kaig nebuinab megaigwan mѳimbe nane kasrag kѳtan, Cristѳ nui asr, tru iglesiayasig chine kaig nebuinab megaigu tru palabigwan nai asrutѳwei kaig indinab megaitѳga nemarѳb ya.

Treeg kѳbig kuigwan mѳimbe gatѳle ñim nѳba tab gѳrrѳmisrtrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, Nusrkai nui asru kwaitѳga nui merrab tabigweindѳ tarѳmariilѳ, kaig mariitѳga chillig incha gѳmeelѳ, ñimbe ѳyeeg kѳn dainanrrabgailѳ pѳnrramig kѳnrrai martrab.

Incha nui Nusrkaingurri Tiusbe pirau chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan lata, srѳmbalasrѳ chi kѳbigwan lata katѳle nѳba katѳ tab gѳrrѳmisrtrai martrab isuig kѳn, nui Nusrkai kurusyu kwawa ani lusiitѳga ambugurri igurri tab gѳnrrai marѳb.
Inchagucha nѳbe asrwei tru tur gѳn, tru iglesiai. Nusrkaimbe manawei nѳmerrig kѳbig, kwailai utugurri katѳ nѳmerrig ѳsiiraig kѳn, chiyutѳgucha nѳ purab nuig kѳmig kѳnrrai.

Kaguende Tiusbe Nusrkaingurri mara pѳnsraig kѳn tru srѳmbalasrѳ chi kѳbigwan lata, pirau chi kѳbigwan lata, kaptѳga asigwan lata, asiimíigwan lata, reymera purramisra karub purraigwan lata, kerriguwan nѳm merrarrawa garuigwan lata, katѳ nѳm asha garuigwan lata, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karuigwan lata, kerriguba nѳgurri mara pѳnsraig kѳn, trurrigu nuyasig kѳnrrai.
Nѳ nuielѳ gѳnrrai nambe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guer, namui kaig mariilan yandѳ pesannab chi ulѳ bayimeelѳ.
Kaguende nugwaimandzig lѳstiigu nѳ garub pasrabigugurri Tiusbe wesrawa, namune nui undaaraig Nusrkai nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ purѳѳrig kѳn.

Nui mayanguen tabig maramburab marig kerrigu maya tѳgagúig, truitѳga kullaaramѳ, ka melamig kѳnrrai martrai miabelѳ guer, maig pub arrindѳgucha mur isua melaptѳ melamigweyasiiba, maig indindѳgucha tammay melabig melamigweyasiiba.

Incha treekkurri namgucha trunun wammѳrin gwalѳmgurrimbunѳ chu urastѳgucha ñimuyasig elachimѳ, Tiusba waminchib miabelѳ guer, Tius tru nѳ maig martrai palai waigwan ñim nebua asambѳrab nebua ashibelѳ gѳnrrai Tiusweimburabigu, newan nebua asamig kusreitѳgaba, katѳ tab chigúi mѳriitѳgaba.
Epafras maig kusrenanig kѳben, trunun ñim kusreeg kѳn. Truibe namui undaaraig, tru maramelѳyu namba lincha marѳb megabig, Cristѳiwan maizhikken elachimѳ, ñimuyasig tab gѳnrrai marѳb megabig kѳn.
tru ñimuyasig srѳmbalasrѳ esegaig pasrabigwan ñim muniirabelѳ gúikkurri treeg kuigwan. Truigwane Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam newan ciertѳnigwan waminchen, ñimbe mѳrig kѳbig kѳn,
Kaguende ñim ñimui isubigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, katѳ Tiuswei misaameran mayamba ñimbe truba undaguelѳ gúigwanba wammѳrer,

ñim Tiuswei misaamera chu uragucha tarѳmisrmѳ melab nunelѳ Cristѳ Jesúsba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelѳ Cѳlѳsassrѳ warabelan. Namui Mѳskai Tiuswei ka yandѳ tab indiiba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbiiba ñimba gѳnrrai inchar.
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Cristѳ Jesúskurri Tiuswei misaamera mayeelanba ka amѳñigueh chirrunrrig. Katѳ namui nunelѳ naba amѳñibelѳ chigucha ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
Namui Tius Mѳskawan managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.

Inchendѳ nabe chi palabigwan kerriguh uta tѳgagur, unchaguengue. Tru ñim nan keta trana ѳriilѳ Epafrѳditѳ srua arrua traniilѳbabe, ¡gatѳ! chigucha palѳmѳzhig tѳgagur. Tru ñim keta traniibe kan animal gweecha Tiuswan tranig, purѳ may irrabzhig lataig kѳn, Tius truba rruba tabig kui asha utamdiig.
Incha trutѳ gѳmѳtѳ, na Tesalónicasrѳ uñenguen, ñimbe pamayguen purugua ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, nai chi palabelѳyu nan purugunrrab.
Inchendѳgucha na truba isui megaben, ñimgucha treetѳwei lata naimburab isub purugub melaibe mayanguen tabig kѳn.
Cristѳ naba basrѳbene, chiwandѳgucha kaimamѳ maramѳnrrun, kaguende nѳ nan purugub pasraikkurri.
Nabe ѳyeeg chippe, palain basraptѳ rrenchimur. Kaguende nabe nan maig pub arrindѳgucha treegu kasraatѳ purayam gusrewa gur.
Nabe Señѳrweinug truba kasraarar, ñim gatѳle nan isunrrab indin gѳben. Pѳs ñimbe isuppe, isubwei inchendѳ, tru ѳyeeg maramibe pumѳ srѳ gúig kuinrrun.

Trube, mѳimbe yandѳ, ñim nai undaarailѳ, chiyutѳgucha ciertѳnigwanba, chiyutѳgucha maig kѳbash inchimumigwanba, chiyutѳgucha sѳlgandѳ tabigwanba, chiyutѳgucha newan tabig chishigwanba, chiyutѳgucha larrѳ tammayig kѳmigwanba, chiyutѳgucha yeeg tabig kѳnrrab chib wamindigwanba isumig kѳn. Katѳ chigѳben purѳ tabig tѳgagúin gúi, kabe tabig wamindig kѳnrraptiig treeg kѳbene, trunungucha, trube, tѳga isuy.

Ke ka yandѳ chinsraatѳ inchib, ke chab pureb gúi lataig inchimѳtay. Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ, chiyutѳgucha Tiuswei merrab, ѳyeeg palai meler chib, nѳba waminchib, ѳyeeg purugurrunrrig chib miamig kѳn, trurrigu ungwa, ungwa chib.
Ñimbe truba tab inchibelѳ gúigwane mayeelѳ nebua asig kѳnrrai inday. Señѳr arrumibe lutau gѳn.

Katѳ nai maramigu elachimѳ maram burugub megabigwan ñungucha purugurrunrrig chinrrab inchar, tru iig ishumburmeran ñui nuchalan, na Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan waminchib uñen, nѳmbe nai mendig lata tranrrab lincha llirab melaig kѳbig kѳn, katѳ Clemente gѳben, katѳganelѳ naba lincha marѳb melabelѳ gѳbengue. Truilai munchimerabe tru managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳri librѳyu pѳrig pѳnrran.

Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, truba undaarailѳ, na truba asinrrabna gúi inchib isub uniilѳ, ñimgurri na truba kasrag kui indiilѳ, katѳ ñimbe naimbe kan cѳrѳna lataig tѳgagúilѳ, ѳyeetѳ Señѳrweinug tarѳmisrmѳ melabig melѳnrrigay.
Trune tru nam purramibe srѳmbalasrѳn gѳn, tru Kaigyugurri Wesrabig, Señѳr Jesucristѳ, trusrѳngurri tru nѳ arrumigwan nam truba rruba munig melaig nѳ waisrѳ.
Nabe mѳindѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñimune katѳle, gatѳle eshkaig kuig kѳn, mѳimbe kappin gѳrrѳgѳbguen eshkar, Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwan tsaleelѳ ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ truba nu amѳnaimba.
Inchen nam yandѳ nebua tѳga bѳnrramisrigwane truig maig kѳben trunun tarѳmisrmѳ, amѳñibig amѳñigun.
Nam mayeelѳba Tiusweimburabelѳyu newan nѳrrѳrawarbe ѳyamay isumig kѳn. Inchen ñim chigѳben peemay isua gúin gѳbene, trube, Tiusbe ñimune trunungucha tѳrmarѳb kenamartrun.
Nai nunelѳ, kabe nabe iigwan yandѳ nebuaguen basrar chimur. Inchendѳ nabe iigwan marinabig kѳn: yandѳ wendau kѳrrѳmisrѳb arrubigwane pesannawa, nai pumsrѳ pumigwan nebunrrab tranrrab megar.
nagucha mumay gѳben kwailai utugurri ѳsiirawa kurramigwan nebua tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrai.

Nane Cristѳn mas nebua ashib, nѳ kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiranrrai maramburab marѳbigwan nebua ashib indinrrabna gѳtan, katѳ nѳ chine isumdiig puinab megamigu treetѳwei puinab megawa, kwamigugucha nѳ lataitѳwein gѳmig nebuben,

Inchagucha treetѳguen gѳmѳ, Cristѳ Jesús nai Señѳrwan na nebua asiibe, kan chibaguen ѳyeeg kѳn cha, kemesra eshkamgaig purѳ nuig purab tabig kѳben, tru na tѳgagúigwane chigucha gѳmeelѳ mara tѳgagur. Inchawei nѳgurri nabe kerrigu trunune chi asamig kaanrrai, wendѳbasra ѳyeegwane chigucha gѳmíig kan kѳsѳngѳmdѳ shau lataig mara tѳgagur, Cristѳn na nebua tѳga basramisra,

Inchen na maig chull isuigwan ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib maramibe, tru iglesiayuelan kaig maramig naimbe truig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben truigwan na sѳlgandѳ tabig kuigube kalѳ maran chib muguen chi tainamѳ mѳg kѳbig kur.

Kaguende naimburabgucha asru treeg mariitѳga ѳyangurrimbesin chib pasramig tѳgagur. Pѳs asru treeg mariitѳga ѳyangurrimbesin chib mѳg inchib pasrѳnrraptiig mube kѳbwei inditarru gѳben, nabesi katѳguchinguen treeg kur tamig tѳgagur.
Tru wera lataig inchib misaamera, chi tabigwan gѳmѳ, kaigwan marѳb amѳñibelѳ, tru asrwan parѳb mindishibelan ñimbe purѳ ashiptѳ guy.
Kaguende Cristѳi maramelan marѳb megaikkurri nѳbe yandѳ ke patsѳnrraptiig tsuig kuig kѳn, ñim ñimashib trugatig nan purugunrrab gaimailѳyu kwam lab nѳguen burugub.
Señѳrgurri nune truba kasraatѳ utay. Katѳ Epafrѳditѳ lataitѳwei melab mѳguelane truba tab inchib tѳgagѳmig kѳn.

Isa gѳmѳtѳ, yandѳ ke kwamdѳ balabig tsubwei indig kuig kѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe Epafrѳditѳn lastima asig kѳn. Katѳ nundѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nangucha lastima asig kѳn, na yeeg isuig megamne, srѳitѳ srѳitѳ isuig megamig arrumѳnrrai.

Treeg kuindѳgucha namui nuneg Epafrѳditѳn ñimuimay gatѳle ѳramig truba palai ashar, maramigu nan purugub, kan suldau lataitѳwei tru maramigu naba lincha megabig, katѳ ñimuisrѳngurri naimay wam srua arrubig, na chi palai megaben nan ashchai ñim ѳrigwandѳwei.
Inchendѳ nagucha naashib ñimun ashchab peba arrumigwan isua tѳga basrar, Tius naba pasraikkurrimbe.
Kaguende mayeelѳba nѳmuimburab tabig pub attraingѳba labelѳ gѳn, Cristѳimburab tab gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ.
Pѳs katѳgan munguen nѳ lataibe tѳgagѳmur, ñimuimburab tab gѳnrrai inchib, treegwan martrab truba rruba isubig, trurrigu ka isatѳ inchib pasrѳmíig.
Inchawei ñimgucha treetѳwei mayanguen tab gúi mѳrѳb, naba mayanguen kasraaray.

Ñimui isubigwan ñim Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurri marѳb gúibe kan animal gweecha Tiuswan keta tranѳb lataig marѳb tѳgagúig kѳben, trubala na ѳsig kuigwan itѳlusig kѳnrrai tranamig nebuinguen mayanguen tab gúimѳrѳb tranamѳnrrun, ñim mayeelѳba mayanguen kasraarab.

Mugѳben ñimun ñibe ѳyeeg kѳn dainab pѳnrrѳmeelѳ, kѳrrѳteelѳ, misaamera larrѳ minchar, purѳ kaig misaamerai utu, ñimbe Tiuswei ureemera chigucha kaig mara chillig inchar gѳmeelѳ, ñimbe truilai utube yu pirau pala pilab pѳnrrabelѳ latailѳ guy,
Chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, ñimuinetѳ chinetѳ chib mulla mѳrmѳwei, chinetѳ aleguiab pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ maray.

Inchawei ñim nai undaarailѳ, na ñimba pasrѳben, chu uratѳgucha mѳrѳb melabelѳ, na mѳi ñimba pasrѳmubene, katѳguchinguen mѳrѳb melabelѳbe, kaigyugurri wesruigwan ñim tѳga pѳnrraigu nѳrrѳrabig nѳrrѳranrrab marѳb ambay, kѳriibala, purѳ isuptѳ.
Mu misaameratѳgucha Jesucristѳbe Señѳr tru Mayeelaim Bala Nѳ Ashib Pasrabig kѳn chib waminchain gúig kѳn, Tius Mѳskawan maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrrai.
Nѳbe trendѳ Tius kѳbendѳ, nѳ treeg kuagucha, Tiusba lataig kѳnrrab inchimuig kѳn, treeg kurmaptѳ elachimѳnrrab.
yandѳ mѳg lataitѳwei misra pasrѳwabe, nuig kurmab inchimѳtѳ, nѳasiitѳ chigucha gѳmíig lataig misra, maig taigwan mѳrѳbig kѳptѳ, kwamnegatig maig taigwan marig kѳn, trurrigu kurusyu mesraig kwamig.
Cristѳ Jesús maig isubig kѳbig kѳben, ñimgucha treetѳwei isubelѳ gѳmig kѳn:

Chiyutѳgucha ke nѳtѳ gѳnrrab inchimѳwei, purѳ nuig kѳmmѳrѳ inchib marѳb gѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳmig kѳn. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, larrѳ tammayig, katѳganelane ñim lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, katѳguchinguen nѳrreelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagѳmig kѳn.

Inchawei ñim Cristѳinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrraikkurri kuñab purugumig tѳgagѳb, nui undag kѳbig chi isumig kaanrrai marѳbig tѳgagѳb, Espíritu Santѳgurri kanguelarrѳtѳ lincha bѳnrramig tѳgagѳb, ñim larrѳ tab inchibelѳ, trurrigu lastima ashibelѳ gѳmigwan ñim tѳgagѳb indig kѳbene,
Pѳs ñimune Cristѳgurri ѳyeekkatig tabig pѳnrrѳnrrai marѳppe, nun ka kѳrewatѳ bѳnrrѳnrrai marmѳtѳ, nuimburab chinetѳ nebuig melamig kѳnrraingucha marig kuig kѳn.

Jesucristѳi srѳ wam tabig maig kѳben, trumay treeg amѳnamirre mas palan, na ñimun ashchab arri lata, ashchab arrumui lata, ñimbe masken kanbalatѳ ke tab pѳnrramisra, tru isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ tѳga pasra bѳnrramig Tiuswei srѳ wam tabigweimburappe, ñimbe kanbalatѳ mayeelѳba ke kandѳ isub truba rruba marѳb gѳn dai wammѳrinrrabna gѳtan.

Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳnrrab gúi ashabe, chiguen gѳmѳtѳ, ñimba unamuitamab isur, ñim mayeelѳba kѳrrѳmisrtrab, katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nebua asamigwan ñim nebua ashib, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwan kasrag tѳga bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Inchendѳ na ѳsig basramibe gatѳguchinguen tab gѳnrrab gѳn ñimuimburappe.
Inchen na asru ѳsig uniibe, Tiuswei maramelѳyube tsabѳtѳ truba nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramdiig kѳnrrautan. Trube, ¿nabe mѳigwan merrarrawa pasramisrtrab gѳh? Pѳs mandѳguen gѳmѳtan.

Chiyugucha na chi kѳrig misrmѳ purayamuitamab isua basraig, treeg punrrab gúi, masken chi kullag isumѳtѳ, mѳi lata, chu urastѳgucha, Cristѳbe nai asru purѳ nuig marѳb tabig wamindig kѳnrrun, na ѳsig basrai lata, kabe na kwaimbala lata.

¡Inchendѳ chigúin gѳnrrautah! Ka isatѳ inchib Cristѳimburabigwan ka wamincha mѳri lata, kabe ciertѳn wamindi lata, pѳs mumaytѳgucha Cristѳiwan waminchib, kusrenanene, nane kasrag kѳtan. Incha nabe gatѳgucha kasraarabig kasraaramѳnrrun,
Incha iilѳbe Cristѳimburab eshkab waminchippe, undaguelѳ isuar gua waminchibelѳ gѳn, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan waminchib purѳmisrѳb pasrѳnrrai, nan pasrig kui asha.
Inchen nan treeg pasrѳnrrai keerikkurri, nai nunelѳbe, kerrigu lutauba, chigucha kullaaramѳ pѳnrramisra, Tiuswei wamwan chigucha chi kѳrmѳ waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Nai nunelѳ, nan chi pub arrubiibe, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamweimburappe masken purugubguen inchib arrin gúi, ñim wammѳra gѳnrrai inchar.
Chiwan mas tabig kui nebua ashibelѳ misra, kaig marig chigar chishelѳ ñibe ѳyeeg kalѳ mara basran dainab pѳnrramig chigar gѳnrrai, Jesucristѳ gatѳ arrub gwalѳm.
Inchawei Tiusbe asha basran, na ñimun mayeelan pesannamѳ, truba rruba isubig kuigwan Señѳr Jesucristѳi undag kѳbiitѳga.
Nabe iigwan treegwein gѳnrrab gúi asha indig kѳn: ñimuinug tabig marѳb pѳlbasrѳbiibe Jesucristѳ arrum gwalѳmgatig ñimune newanelѳ gѳnrrai tamarѳb pasrѳnrrab gúi.
Na ñimun isuimѳrig nai Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib,
Namui Tius Mѳskaweimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳimba tru ka yandѳ tab indigwanba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwanba ñim tѳgagѳnrrai inder.
Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe tru namui Señѳr Jesucristѳn undaaramigwane managucha patsѳnrraingaig undaarabelѳ mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun.
Tius Mѳskaweinukkurrimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳinukkurrimba tru ambugurri igurri tab gѳbig arrubigwan nunelan trannrrai inchar, undag kѳbig tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwanbañau.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, Tíquicѳ, namui undaaraig nuneg, Señѳrwei maramigu chu uragucha tarѳmisrmѳ, chi maramelan nѳ asha marѳb megabiibe, na maig tsuigwanba, katѳ na chi marѳb megaigwanba, kerriguba ñimun eshkanrrab wam srua inrrun.

Tiuswei Espíritu maig maringaruben, Tiusba waminday, chu urastѳgucha ñim mumay gѳben Tiusba waminchib, miab indiilѳyu. Isua ashiptѳ guy, Tiuswan purugurra cha miab, nui misaamerai mayeelayasig maikkucha pesannab gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.Katѳ naimburabgucha Tiuswan purugurra chib miarrunrrigay, na ke waminchab inchen, tru na maig tamelan nan trannrrai, tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam sѳrig pasrabigwan nebua ashchai chigucha chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳ, wamindamig kѳnrrai.
Katѳ tru kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmig tѳgagúigwane chinchimѳnrrai turyu petsig kan tsandzѳn cascѳn lataig tѳga bѳnrray. Espíritu Santѳi espadane srua bѳnrray, truibe Tiuswei wamwan.
Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wam chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwane waminchab amrrab muniitѳ bѳnrramig, srѳbyu keetigwan lataitѳwei tѳga bѳnrray.

Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳbene, Tius chitѳga kwayanrrai traniilane truigwane kerrigu tѳga bѳnrray, kaig kwalѳm pubene, kullaaramѳ pѳnrramig kѳnrrai, incha yandѳ ѳyeegwan kerrigu chab mara pѳnrramisrikkurrimbe kѳrrѳnrrabgaig mur bѳnrrѳnrrab.

Tius tru chitѳga kwayanrrai kerrigu traniilѳtѳga tamara pѳnrramisray, nugwaimandzig purѳ may guegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab tamara pѳnsra gua kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab inchen, maig kuingucha kѳrmѳ kwayawa, truyu puraambub ambamig kѳnrrai.

Inchen ñim karub pera gѳbelѳbe ñimui karuig mѳrѳb melabelane ñimgurringucha tabig tѳgaguy yeegwane chigѳben martrumѳn chib, chinetѳ chimѳtѳ. Kaguende ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, tru nѳmun ashib karub pasrabig tru Señѳrtѳwei ñimun ashib pasrabiibe srѳmbalasrѳ wabig kui. Kaguende Tiusbe mѳigwane purѳmisrѳb, kandarѳtѳ inchimíig kѳn.
Maramigwane ka palabinѳ inchib, mѳguelayasig marѳb pѳnrrermab isua marmѳtѳ, marѳppe, martrab isua Señѳrweyasig lataig maray.
Ñim, karuindiig melabelѳ, yu pirau ñimun karub pera gѳbelane mѳramig kѳn, kѳriibala, maig kѳbash inchimѳ, manrraugurri tabig isua, Cristѳn mѳrѳb melab lataitѳweingue.
yu pirau purѳ tabig kasraatѳ tsumig kѳnrraimba, ѳsig kѳllirab tsumig kѳnrraimba. (Tru maig maramigwan martrai karua pѳnsrailѳyu iimerrig kѳn, tabig trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan utamibañauibe.)
Ñui usri mѳskawane maig kѳbash kѳmѳ, purѳ tab inchib tѳgagu,
¡ѳyeebe mandѳ gúinguen mѳramgaig purѳ nuig kѳn! Inchendѳ iigwan waminchippe, Cristѳnba, nui iglesianba treeg kѳn cha waminchar.
Inchawei treekkurri mѳѳbe usri mѳskawane elacha, sraimba kandѳ misrtrun. Incha tru pailѳbe kan asrtѳ gѳnrrun.

Kaguende mugucha nui asrwane managuen nѳasiitѳweimbe tsaliinchimѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, asr maig palai inchen mab muchib, maig kѳben gѳnrrain gѳmѳ ashib tѳgagѳn, Cristѳ iglesian ashib tѳgagѳb lataitѳweingue.
tabig nuyasiitѳ tarѳmari misaamera gѳnrrai martrab, tru nui wamdѳga piu umbu ulsraitѳga pillmawa, chish mara,
Kelѳbe nѳmui sralane undaguelѳ gѳmig kѳn. Cristѳma nui iglesian undag kѳptѳ, nui ѳsig kuigwan nѳashib tranig kѳn,
Sralѳbe, kelѳ maig chiben treeg mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Señѳrwan lataitѳweingue.
Ñimbe kanikkurri kanikkurri lata mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Cristѳn kѳriibala tѳgagúikkurri.
Ñimbe salmѳstѳga, himnѳstѳga, Tiusweimburabelan cantailѳtѳga kangurrin gangurri waminday. Ñimui manrraugurri newan isua cantab, Señѳrwan maya nuguen tabig kѳn chib waminchib.
Inchawei ñimbe ke chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳmѳtay. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Señѳr nam chiwan martraim balai watashchab trunun nebua ashchab indamig kѳn.
Chigѳben tabig maramdiig pubene, treegwan ka purainrraindѳ ashatѳ bѳnrrѳmѳtay. Kaguende purѳ gaig kwalѳmmera gѳn.
Inchawei tab isuamѳra amѳnay ñim mandѳ amѳnamigwane. Kan chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ lataig amѳñimѳtѳ, maig amѳnamigwan tab isuamѳra amѳñibelѳ guy.
Inchen tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan tѳryu pѳnsrѳbene, maig kuigwan tѳrgandѳ asamig kenamisran. Pѳs tru chiwandѳgucha maig kuigwan asha gѳmig kѳnrrai tѳrgandѳ kenamarѳbiibe tru tѳr gѳn.
Señѳrwan tab gúi wanrrai maramigwan, mumay maren tab gúi mѳrtashchab treegwan lab melamig kѳn.
Kaguende tru tѳryugurri chi arrubiibe maya nuguen purѳ tab indiiba, sѳlgandѳ tabig mariiba, ciertѳniiba ѳyeeg kѳn.
Inchawei ñimbe treeg marѳbelѳba lincha tѳgatѳ marѳb gѳnrrab gѳmѳ.
Chiweingucha chi purugunrrabgailѳ wamindiilѳtѳga mugѳben kegѳrrѳsrkainab gѳnrrab gѳmѳ, kaguende ѳyeekkurrindѳwei Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbiibe tru mѳrmѳ misaameraim bala arrubig kѳn.

Mѳrѳbguen mѳramgaig wamincha ashib pѳnrrѳmѳwei, chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamincha mѳrmѳwei, trѳmbѳig wamindamgailan wamincha indza mѳrmѳwei indamig kѳn, treeg indamgailan maraashib pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, masken ñimbe Tiuswan ungwa chib gѳmig kѳn.
Amѳñippe, undag kѳbigwane tѳga amѳnay, Cristѳ namun maig undaguig kѳben treetѳwei. Nѳbe nѳashib namuyasig purѳbasramisra kwaig kѳn, kan animal gweecha purѳ may irrabzhig Tiuswan keta tranѳb lataig.

Masken treeg inchibgunrriibe, ñimbe larrѳ tab inchibelѳ, lata lastima asiyabelѳ, Tius ñimun Cristѳgurri kaig marigwan ulѳ baymub pesannab lataitѳwei, kangurrin gangurri ñimgucha ulѳ bayiyab pѳnrrѳmumig kѳn.
Tiuswei Espíritu Santѳn isuim basrѳnrrai marmѳtay, tru kerrigu yandѳ newan kaigyugurri wesram kwalѳmweyasig truitѳga ñimbe Tiusweyelѳ gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai sellailѳ gѳn.
Nilaptiig kѳbiibe yandѳ mas nilѳmѳta. Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ, ñui tasiitѳga chigѳben tabig maramigwan mar, mѳikkѳben chi palai inchene, purugumig tѳgagѳnrrab.
Katѳ nugwaimandzig ñimuinug kelulrrain gѳmѳwein guy.

Ñimbe tru srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan kewa bѳnrray, truibe Tius nѳ maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marig kѳn, ciertѳn sѳlgandiitѳgaba, newan chishchig tabiitѳgaba.Inchawei ѳyeekkurri ñimbe isa wamindamigwane yandѳ elacha, masken ñim mѳitѳgucha ñimui mendaigwane isa gѳmѳ, sѳlwan wamindamig kѳn. Kaguende nambe mayeelѳba kangurrin gangurri kan asrtѳ guer.
Ñimbe tru srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan kewa bѳnrray, truibe Tius nѳ maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marig kѳn, ciertѳn sѳlgandiitѳgaba, newan chishchig tabiitѳgaba.

Tru ñim merrabsrѳ Tiuswan ashmeelѳ gѳb uras marѳb tѳga amѳnaig kѳbigwane wegutsay, tru kѳllig ñim trendѳ kaigwan tѳga gallaig, chi tabig pummѳrѳ chull isubig purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbig trutѳ srua yaig, ñimui umbu kaig pasrabigwan,
Trune ñimbe Cristѳiwan kusreppe, ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳmѳnrrab gusreeg kѳn.
Yandѳ chi kѳrikkengar misrikkurrimbunѳbe, yandѳ kaig maramigwandѳ martrab guebambubelѳ gѳn, chigurrimbunѳ kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig marѳg kѳbig arrubigwan neguen gѳmuig marѳbig marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrab.

Inchawei nabe iig ѳyeegwan ñimun eshkappe, marmѳ gѳmѳ, martrai karunrrab inchar Señѳrwei munchiyu: mѳimbe yandѳ amѳñippe, Tiuswan ashmeelѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳm chiweingucha chi purugunrrabgaig isub amѳnailѳyu ñimgucha amѳñimѳtay cha.
Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru newan ciertѳnigwan undag kѳbiitѳga waminchib, chiyutѳgucha nѳrrѳragun tru tur Cristѳinug nѳba kanbalatѳ.

Tru nam mayeelѳba tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra kanbalatѳ bѳnrramiguba, katѳ Tiuswei Nusrkawan tab nebua asamiguba nam kanbalatѳ bѳnrramigwan nebumnegatig martrab, kan mѳg ne nuraig lataig misrѳb, Cristѳ maig kѳben treeg misramnegatig nebumig kѳnrrai.

Incha truig nѳtѳwei mѳilane nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan truѳrѳ srua llirabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane tru Cristѳn kѳrebelan tab ashib pera pѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, katѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳnrrai ѳyeeg pѳnsraig kѳn,
Tru ѳyeeg: nebyaig kѳn cha trenchippe, ¿tru wallibirѳ umbugatig kѳrrebmerrig kѳrrayaig kѳn cha rrenchimuitarru?
Inchendѳ namune kanun ganun Tiusweyasig chigѳben marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai keta tranig kѳn, Cristѳ pirisha keta tranig maig kѳben, treeg.
Tius kandѳ, trurrigu mayeelai Mѳskai, nѳbe mayeelaim bala nѳ basrabig kѳb, mayeelainug trumѳrig nѳ basrab, mayeelainug pasrabiibe nѳtѳ gѳn.
Señѳr kandѳ gѳb, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra pѳnrramikkucha treetѳwei kandѳ gѳb, piu umbu ulsraikkucha treetѳwei kandѳ gѳb indan.
Espíritu Santѳinug newan kanbalatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrab indamigwan treeg pѳnrrѳnrrab inday, tru kanbalatѳ pѳnrramig ambugurri igurri tab gѳbiitѳga,
Inchawei Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri tru kailan keeri yau na pasrabiibe, ñimun trenchinrrab inchar: Tius ñimun treeg amѳñinrraiwei wamiilѳ gúig kѳppe, maig amѳnamigwan trumay treeg amѳñirrunrrigay cha,

Inchen tru chiwandѳgucha nѳbe marѳppe, tru nam miaigwandѳ gѳmѳwei, kabe nam isuigwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ke uñcha gѳm tѳgagѳnrrai marѳb Tius, tru nui maramburab marѳb pasrabig maig kѳben namuinug treeg marѳb pasrabigwan,

Jesucristѳi undag kѳbig maya nuig kuigwan ñim mayeelѳ nui misaameraba kanbalatѳ pѳnrramisra, tru Cristѳi undag kѳbiibe lendѳmay rreetѳwei, yammay rreetѳwei, palamay rreetѳwei, lendegѳrrab rreetѳwei nuigwan ñim tab chigúi mѳrtrai miar.
Tru nѳ chigurrimbunѳ nui tѳrguegwalmabig chi palѳmíig maya tѳgagúig, truig maig kѳben, truyugurri tru ñimui manrrau chishkandѳ mur basrѳnrrai, nui Espíritugurri maramburab mariitѳga martrai miar,
Inchawei nan ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig isumdiig puig megaigwan, trunun isuptѳ kullaaramѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar. Masken nan ѳyeeg puibe ñimuyasiibe maya nuguen tab gѳnrrain gѳn.
Inchawei nambe chigucha katѳnrraingaig chi isumѳ nѳgurri Tiusweinug kemalamig tѳgaguer namui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurri.

Iigwane tru iglesiagurri kerriguba mѳi ya asig kѳnrrai kenamartrab isua indig kuig kѳn, nui tru muguen nebua isumgaig purѳ nuig kusrebig kuigwan tru srѳmbalasrѳ nѳm asha garubelanba, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karubelanba.

Nabe Tiuswei misaamerai utu tru chigucha gѳmѳ waachawan tru Cristѳi chine chine purѳ tabig, kan ѳyangatiitѳ gѳn damgaig Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb pasramig kѳnrrai pasrig kur, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran,

Iig, tru muguen asiimíig pasrabiibe, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameragucha judíѳs misaameraba tѳgatѳ tru ketigwan utamig tѳgagѳb, tru asryutѳwei pѳnrramig kѳb, katѳ Jesucristѳinug tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan tѳgatѳ utamig tѳgagѳb indamig truig kѳn, tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamgurri.
Iibe tru mu asiimíig pasrabigwan nan ashchai Tius kenamarig truig kѳn, tru na ñimun landѳtiig pѳrѳbguen indig.
Inchawei ñim iig tru pѳrigwan ashabe, muguen asiimíig pasrabig Cristѳiwan, ѳyeeg chigúi mѳramgailan nabe nebua ashibig kuin gúi ñimbe wetѳgѳrrѳnrrabguen.
Pѳs ñimbe manawei wammѳraguen gúinrrun, Tius ka yandѳ purѳ tab inchibig kѳptѳ ñimuyasig tab gѳnrrai nan iigwan martrai pasrigwan.
Inchen tru utu ñimungucha kanbalatѳ kusrub marѳb ambiilѳ gѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri Tius truyu nѳ pasramig kѳnrrai.
Inchen nuinug tru yawan, purѳ may tamara warѳb tabig kusrub marene, tru yabe kurrab ippe, Señѳrweyasiitѳ tarѳmari ya gѳnrrab kurrab yan.

Inchawei yandѳ ñimbe peg birausreelѳ gѳmѳwei, ni pestѳ ka pua buramrraptѳ amrruateelѳ gѳmѳwein gѳn. Mѳimbe treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei misaameraba kanguelarrѳtѳ marѳb tѳgagѳmigwan tѳgar, Tiuswei misaameraba kan yautѳ latailѳ,
Kaguen nѳgurriwei nam lata, nѳm lata, Tius Mѳskawan tru Espíritu Santѳtѳgatѳwei kemalamig tѳga bѳnrrer.

Incha gatѳ Cristѳbe tru pabalѳ gѳbigwan kan asrtѳ lataig mara, Tiusba gatѳle treetѳwei katѳ tab kѳrrѳmisrtrai marig kѳn, tru ashig kѳmui indiyab pѳnrraigwan yandѳ mas treeg kѳmѳnrrai nѳ kurusyu kwaitѳga patsѳga gѳrrѳmarѳb.

Kaguende tru ambugurri igurri chi isumikkaig tab gѳbig namuinug pasrabiibe Jesucristѳ nѳwein gѳn, tru pa sѳtѳ gѳbigwan kan sѳtѳtѳ gѳnrrai marѳbig. Tru ashig kѳmui indiyab waraig kѳbig kan pirѳbanrrig sѳtѳbasrab lataig pasrabigwan pѳtiichippe,

Inchawei ñim tru trendѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerane merrabsrѳmbe tru judíѳsmera nѳmui asru taska circuncidailѳbe ñimune: Circuncidaimѳ misakkѳlleelѳ cha wamab tѳgagúilan isua guy.Ñimbe tru urasrѳmbe Cristѳne chigar, Israel misaamera chitѳ marѳbelѳ gѳben, ñimbe treegwan maramig chigar gѳnrrai tarѳmariilѳ, katѳ Tius nui misagwan ѳyeeg trannrrab kѳrrѳmisri acuerdѳsmera mariilane chi asamig chigar, katѳ chiwan muniirab melamig chigawei, yu pirau ñimbe Tius kaweyelѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende nambe Tius nѳ mariilѳ guer, Cristѳ Jesúskurri srѳig peemayelѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ, tru treegwan marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai Tius manasrѳwei pѳnsrailan.
Kaguende ñimbe Tius ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳn, ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasrikkurri. Iibe ñim chigѳben marikkurrin gѳmѳtѳ, iigwane Tiusbe ka yandѳ keta tranig kѳn.
tru wendѳsrѳ attrabigu nui ka yandѳ tab indig tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagúigwan kenamartrab, nѳ namun purѳ tabig kѳptѳ Cristѳ Jesúskurri.

tru martrai karua pѳnsrailan mѳra marmuilѳyutѳ kwailѳ amѳñibenbatѳsrѳwei, tru ѳsig kѳmigwane Cristѳba kanbalatѳ tѳgagѳnrrai namun tranig kѳbig kѳn. ¡Tius tru ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ ñimbe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳn!

Namgucha merrabsrѳmbe mayeelѳba namun asr maig trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchen nѳmui utu treetѳwei marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳbig ker, namui asr maig srua itanmaptѳ, tru gúindѳ kaig marѳb, kailan isub. Kaigwan nam trendѳ tѳgagúikkurri, Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbigwan utѳnrrabelѳ gѳbig ker, katѳganelѳ mayeelѳ latawei.
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba kѳnrraimab isur.
Na Pablѳ nai taska iigwan pѳrar, ñimun ka amѳñigueh chib. Kilgamera mѳitѳgucha na bѳriilѳbe na bѳrig kѳnmab asamdeelѳ gѳnrrai, ѳyamay pѳrѳbig kur.
Inchendѳ kaig kѳnmab ashiptѳ ashig kѳmui inchib treeg inchib tѳgagѳmѳtѳ, nuneg kui ashabe, ashiptѳ megau cha, ѳyeebe marmumig kѳn chib, eshkab wamindamig kѳn.
Mѳikkѳben tru i kilgayu maig martrain cha trendaigwan mѳrmíigwane ñimbe trunune trendѳ treeg kui yandѳ asha tѳgaguy. Incha truibabe linchibgucha linchimumig kѳn, treenchene kwartrai.
Inchen ñim, namui nunelѳbe, chigѳben tabig maramigwane muraarab melѳnrrab gѳmѳ, maray.
Nambe wammѳra guer, mѳilѳgѳben ñimui utuelѳ ke chigucha chi marmѳ ka amѳñinrrabgѳba inchibelѳ kuin gúi, nѳmuimburab gѳmubendѳ, mendailaisrѳ ke ka neesha mѳrѳb.
Nambe mu mandamgaig maramig chigar guagurri ñimun purugurra chinrrab gaima pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, ñimguen namun asha kusrenrrai isua, ѳyeeg muraara marig kѳbig kѳn.
Pѳs ñimbe yandѳ ashibelѳ gѳn, nam mandѳ waraig kѳbigwan ñimgucha treetѳwei waramig kѳnrrai. Nambe ñimui utu warappe, chi marmѳ ka warѳnrrabgѳba inchimѳwei,
Tiuswei undag kѳbigwanba, maig kuingucha yaandѳ, yaandѳ melamig Cristѳ tѳgagúigwanba, Señѳrbe ñimui manrrѳmeran trunun nebua tѳgagѳnrrai martraimab isur.
Nambe Señѳrtѳgabe treeg kuitamab isua bѳnrrer, martrai nam karua pѳnsraigwan ñim mѳi ya marѳb melaigwan lata, katѳ maramigwan ñimbe marѳbig martrab gúi.
Katѳ trѳmbѳig marѳptѳ yandѳ mindiilѳ, larrѳ gaig mѳguelai tasku nam kegѳrrab melamig kѳmѳnrrai tѳga miarrunrrigay. Kaguende isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwane mayeelѳbabe tѳgagѳmѳn.
ñimui manrrѳmerayu purѳ tab gúi pѳnrrѳnrraimab isub, ñimui chigurrimbunѳ tabig marigu lata, tabig wamindigu lata tabig marig kѳrrѳmisrtrai treeg martrun.
Treeg kѳbene, namui nunelѳ, maig pѳnrrabelѳbe truyutѳ tarѳmisrmѳ melay, namashib pѳnrrѳwa kusrenaniilan lata, kabe kilgayu pѳrigwan kusrenaniilan lata truigwane elatchab gѳmѳ, tab tѳga bѳnrray.

Inchendѳ nambe chu uraskucha Tiuswan ñimuimburab ungwa, ungwa chib gѳmig kѳtan, Señѳr undaaraig nunelѳ. Kaguende srѳsrѳgurri kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmig kѳnrrai Tiusbe ñimune lawa wesraig kѳbig kѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri tabig chishmarikkurrimba, katѳ ñimui isubigwan newan ciertѳnigu pasra tѳgagúikkurrimba.
Inchawei Tiusbe tru pelѳsrkѳb kegѳrrѳsrkѳbigwan maramburab martrai ѳrtrun, isa wamindiilan kѳrenrrai,

Tru larrѳ gaig arrua mariibe, Satanás purugúitѳga marѳb attrun, marѳppe, Satanás maramburab mariilѳtѳgaba, nѳ pasrain gúi ashchai mariilan mariitѳgaba, tabig kѳmíitѳga kwaara asha gѳnrrai marѳb pasrailѳtѳgaba.
Kaguende tru mu asiimíig purѳ gaig pasrabiibe chabguen marѳbguen basran. Inchendѳ tru treeg marmѳnrrai mѳi ya merrarrab sѳtѳ basrabiibe, sѳtѳ gatab pasrabig pasrѳnrrun tru utugurri wesramnegatig.
Tru kaig martrab mѳg treeg maramig puben tru uras kenamisrtrai tru merrarrab sѳtѳ basrabiibe chi sѳtѳ basrain gúi ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn.

Tru mѳѳbe tru chimerandѳgucha tius kѳn chib tѳgagúilanba, katѳ chiwan gѳben kѳriibala tabig waminchib tѳgagúilanba, ashig kѳmui inchib sѳtѳ basramisrѳb, purab nuig misrѳb pasrѳnrrun. Incha treetѳ gѳnrrab gúindѳ, Tiuswei yauguen kebya wamisra, nѳashibguen Tius kur chib wanrrun.

tiusmanda ñim maig isua pѳnrraigwan ke mѳi mѳi peetѳ isub yunѳmarѳb, ke chinsraatѳ inchib pѳnrrѳnrrai kwaarѳsrainab pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳ chinrrab inder. Tru arrum gwalѳmbe yandѳ pun chib, Tius treeg wamindingarutan chib wamindi lata, kabe treeg kѳn chib eshkaig lata, kabe treeg kѳnrrun chib nam guilga bѳrig kѳn chib waminchib gúi lata mѳrmѳnrrigay.

namui Señѳr Jesúswei munchiwan ѳyamaybe ñimgurri maya nuguen tab indig kѳben, ñimbe nѳgurri maya nuguen tab indiilѳ gѳnrrai miabelѳ guer, tru ka yandѳ tab indig namui Tiusweimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳimba maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg.

tru nui misaamera nun maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrrappa, tru mayeelѳ nun kѳrebelѳ yeekkucha gѳnrrabmab kwaara asig kѳnrrappa arrub gwalѳm. Inchen ñimgucha tru utu tѳga bѳnrrѳnrrun, kaguende nam maig eshkab wamindigwan ñim kѳreikkurri.
Tiuswan ashmeelanba, katѳ namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan mѳrѳg kѳmui inchibelanba Tiusbe maig kѳnrrabigwan mѳra melѳnrrai martrab attrun.
Tiusbe sѳlgandѳ tab asha marѳbiibe ñimun kaig nebunrrai marѳbelane, nѳmungucha treetѳwei mѳra melѳnrrai martrun.

Inchawei treekkurri nambe Tiuswei iglesiamerayu ñimuimburab truba tab gúi waminchibelѳ guer, ñim melabig melaigwanba, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra melaigwanba, chine kaig indinab melamig arrubigu, ñim truba isuig puraambub melamig nebuindѳgucha.
Tius Mѳskaweinukkurrimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳinukkurrimba tru ka yandѳ tab indiiba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbiiba ñimba pasrѳnrrun.
Na Pablѳba, Silasba, Timѳteѳba kanbalatѳ misra, Tesalónicasrѳ iglesian i kilgawan pѳrar, namui Tius Mѳskaimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelan,
Ñimbe namui nunelan mayeelan purѳ tab wamab, Tiuswei undag kѳbiitѳga tasig rranѳb ka amѳñigueh chinrrigay.
Namui nunelѳ, namuyasig Tiuswan tѳga miarrunrrigay.
Tru ñimun wamabiibe, nѳbe maig taigwan treeg marѳbig kѳn. Incha nѳbe treegwan martrab gúinrrun.
chigurrimbunѳ kaigwane marmumig kѳn.
chi pub arrindѳgucha, Tiuswane ungwa, ungwa tamig kѳn, kaguende Tiusbe ñim ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳnrraiwei isua gѳn, Cristѳ Jesúskurri.
Espíritu Santѳi marѳb pasraig kan nag lataitѳwei ñimuinug pilab pasrabigwane kwabashmѳtay.
chu urastѳgucha Tiusba wamindamigwane elachimѳ, nѳba waminchib,
Chu urastѳgucha ñimbe kasraatѳ amѳñib,

Katѳ ñim, namui nunelan, trenchinrrab inder, chigѳben marѳg kѳmui inchib pѳilane murba waminchigay cha, katѳ kѳriiteelane treetѳ melѳmѳnrrai waminchib, katѳ chiyugѳben purѳ gullaguelane purugub, mayeelanba larrѳ tammay inchurrunrrigay cha.

Katѳ ñim namui nunelan trenchinrrab inder, ñimui utu marѳb, katѳ karub pѳnrrabelane maig kѳbash inchimѳ, tiusmanda tab inchunrrigay cha, Señѳrweimburabelѳyu tru pera marѳb, maig maramigwan treeg marѳb melamig kѳn chib waminchibelane.
Nѳbe namuyasig purѳbasramisra kwaig kuig kѳn, nam ѳsig amѳnai lata, kabe nam kwaimbala lata nѳba kanbalatѳ purramig kѳnrrai.
Kaguende Tiusbe namune nui purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig namig kѳbigwan utѳnrrai mara bѳnsrѳmѳtѳ, kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan nebua utѳnrrain gúig kѳn, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri.
Kaguende tru kibelѳbe yem guian. Inchen mutsiirabelѳbe yem mutsiiran.
Inchawei treekkurri, nambe gatѳganelѳ lataitѳwei kib lataig amѳñimѳtѳ, pesannamѳ purѳ isuptѳ melѳgun, trurrigu tab isuamѳrague.
Inchendѳ ñim, namui nunelѳbe, lѳstѳyu bѳnrrѳmѳn, tru gwalѳm ñimun kan niliig arrub lataitѳwei, ke chi isumѳ gѳben arrinab pѳnrrѳnrrain gѳmѳ.
Inchen Señѳr chiwei arrumigwanba, katѳ mana arrumigwanbabe ñim, namui nunelan, na chi pѳramig palѳmѳn.
Inchawei kangurrin gangurri ѳyeeg wamindiilѳtѳga waminchib puruguyay
Inchen nam ka ѳsig amѳñibelѳbe tru kwaig warѳwa kiagasrabelѳba kanbalatѳ wañiyu srua ambiilѳ gѳmѳnrrun Señѳrwan palasrѳ katѳnrrab. ѳyamay nambe managatig Señѳrba purramig kѳnrrun.
Señѳr nѳ maig taig, nambe nѳ arrumnegatig nam ka ѳsig amѳñibelѳbe kwabelѳguen ammѳwatѳ nammerrig ambamibe kaanrrun cha trendamѳnrrun.

Ñim, namui nunelan, tru kwawa ka kib lataitѳ warabelaimburabigwan mandѳ inchab gúinguen mѳrmeelѳ kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrai nambe eshkanrrab inder, katѳganelѳ tru isua muniiramigwan chigar lata ke chinsraatѳ isui inchimѳnrrai.
Warappe, ñimuimburab wasrѳndaa tab waramigwan isumig kѳn, mu mendaigweiwan gѳmѳ, ñimuimburabigwan isub, ñimui taska ñimui maramelan marѳb, nam ñimun maig martrain garuig treekke,
Ñim nunelan tru undaguelѳ gѳmigweimburappe undaguelѳ gѳmig kѳn chib, ñimun pѳramibe chi palѳmѳn. Kaguende Tius kusrenanin gѳn, kangurrin gangurri ñim undaguelѳ gѳnrrai.
Inchawei i kusrenaniilan kaashibiibe, mu mѳwan gashmѳtѳ, Tiuswan gaasan, nui Espíritu Santѳn ñimun tranѳbigwan.
Judíѳs kѳmeelѳ Tiuswan ashmѳ misaamera latawei trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbiitѳ ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib, truitѳ srua ambiilѳ bѳnrramig kѳmѳn.
Katѳ ñim mѳitѳgucha ñimui asrwane isua mѳra tѳgagѳm gusremig kѳn, newan tabig, trѳmbѳig marѳb maig kѳbash kѳmѳtѳ.
Ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, Señѳr Jesús treeg martrai karua basriitѳga maytѳ marѳb gѳmigwan nam ñimun eshkaigwan.

Ñimui manrrѳmeran nѳbe tab mur isua bѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrrai martrun tru newan tabigu, ñimun ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳn dainanrrabgailѳ, Tius namui Mѳskawei merrab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai, tru namui Señѳr Jesús nuyasiitѳ tarѳmariilѳ mayeelѳba arrub uras.
Inchawei nam ñimun gatѳle ashchab amrrumig kѳnrrai, namui Mѳskai Tiusba, Señѳr Jesúsba namui maywan kura rrattraimab isuer.
Nambe yem gwalѳm Tiuswan miab melabelѳ guer, katѳle ñimun malaugue ashchab amrrua, ñimui isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigu ñim ke truburab nebuimíig palabigwan nemartrab isua.
Ñim Señѳrweinug tarѳmisrmѳ melan dai wammѳrene, namune ke kan ѳsiirab lataig kѳtan.

Inchendѳ gatѳle Timѳteѳbe ñimuisrѳ uña, puppe, namuyasig tru tab wam wammѳrѳsrkѳnrrab srua arrin gѳn ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra amѳnaigwanba, truba undaguelѳ gúigwanba. Katѳ ñimbe chu uraskucha namune pesannamѳ, tabig isub tѳgagѳbelѳ gúin gѳn chib, namgurri ñimun asinrrabna gúi melab lataitѳwei ñimgucha treeg isub melabelѳ gúin gѳn chib wamindan.
Inchawei nambe ñimba amѳñippatѳwei, ѳyeeg chine isumdiig puig melamig kѳnrrun cha, kanmaytѳ eshkaig kѳbig kѳn, truibe mѳimbe ñimguen ashen treeg purebweindan.

Incha namui nuneg Timѳteѳ Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan larrѳbichib inrrai wamindamelѳyu Tiusweimburabelan marѳb, namba lincha marѳb megabigwan nambe ñimun ashchai ѳrer, tru ñim kѳrrѳnrrabgaig mur isua melѳnrraimba, ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pѳnsra tѳgagúigwan elachimѳ, tѳgagѳbig tѳgagѳnrrab isunrrai martraimba.
Inchawei treeg isuptѳ, treeg isuptѳ melѳmѳnrrab, Atenassrѳmbe trembe namdѳgucha ka gѳrrѳmisrtrab isuer.

Katѳ Señѳrbe nane chine kaig nebunrrab pѳnrrabigugurri chi gѳmѳ, ka purayamig kѳnrrai, chi indiimíig ashib tѳgagѳnrrautan, srѳmbalasrѳ nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ tѳga wamigweyasig. Tѳrguegwalmabiibe Tiuswein gѳnrrun managatig. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Erastѳbe Cѳrintѳsrѳ kѳrrѳmisren, Trófimѳne Miletѳsrѳ kwanrrѳ gѳrrѳmarar.
Priscilanba, Aquilaswanba, ѳnesífѳrѳi yauelanba tab ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrig.
Inchen Tíquicѳne nabe Efesѳ ciudasrѳmay ѳrig kѳn.
Tru mѳwane ñigucha isuatѳ ashiptѳ uñchig. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan nam waminchimѳnrrai truba rruba sѳtѳlulѳb gurrig kѳn.
Alejandrѳ, tru tsandzѳndѳga chigѳben marѳbiibe, nane chinetѳ truba rruba kaig marig kѳn, nѳ maig marigwan Señѳrbe truburѳ maig tranamigwan trannrrab gúinrrun.
Yube ke Lucastѳwei naba kѳrrѳmisran. Marcѳswane lawa, ñi pera attrunrrig. Kaguende nѳbe tru nai maramelѳyu truba nu purugunrrautan.
Timѳteѳ, petѳ nan ashchab attrab inchunrrig.

Inchawei maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ tabig marimburѳ utam cѳrѳna esegaig tѳgagur. Truigwane Señѳr, tru maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbig, tru gwalѳm nan tranrrun. Tranѳbgucha nandѳ rranmѳtѳ, katѳ mayeelѳ tru nѳ arrumigwan truba rruba tab gúi isub muniirabelane, mayeelanba trannrrab gúinrrun.
Kaguende nabe yandѳ naimburappe na ѳsig kuigwan Tiusweyasig keta trannrrab kweetsig kѳmig yandѳ ke lutau basrѳben, yandѳ na kwawa webya yamibe puim basran.
Incha tru newan ciertѳnigwane mѳrѳg kѳmub tarѳmisra, chi treeg kѳmubendѳ nѳmuinetѳ isua wamindiilan mѳrѳb gѳnrrab chab lliranrrun.

Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanrrig. Wamindamdiig kui lata, wamindamdiig kѳmui lata nui wamwane waminchab muniitѳ basrabig kѳnrrig. Katѳ ѳyeeg maramig kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchai waminchib, kalѳ marmѳnrrai wachib, kullaaramѳ tranrrѳnrrai purugub, trurrigu tsag inchimѳ, tammay Tiuswei wamwan kusrenanѳb pasrѳnrrai pasrar, ñune.
Tiuswei mѳѳbe chigurrimbunѳ tabig maramigweyasiibe chigucha palѳmíig newanig kѳnrraingue.
Inchagucha ñibe unѳgurri Tiuswei tru newan tab wam pѳriilan yandѳ ashibig kѳn, truilѳbe ñune kusrebig kѳnrrai martrun, tru isubigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrikkurri kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmig kѳnrrai.

Trune tru larrѳ gaig mѳguelѳba, katѳ tabzhig wamincha kaigyu kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳbabe treetѳguen gѳmѳ, purѳ gailѳguen misrѳb amrrun, nѳmguen may wamincha kegѳrrѳsrkailѳtѳwein gѳbendѳ, may wamincha katѳganelan kegѳrrѳsrkѳb.

Katѳ chine chine nan kaig marinab megaigwan chigucha, purѳ isuig megamig chinetѳ puigwan, Antiѳquíasrѳ Icѳniѳsrѳ, Listrasrѳ nan yeeg trѳmbѳig pui megaigwan. ѳyeeg chine trѳmbѳig puig isuig megaben, kerrigu ѳyeelѳ chine pub arrubigugurri Señѳrbe nan chi gѳmѳ ka purayamig kѳnrrai marig kѳn.

Inchendѳ ke ѳyeetѳ, ѳyeetѳ gúimbe martrab gaimanrrun. Kaguende nѳm chigúinguen mѳrmubendѳrre marѳb gúigwane mayeelai malau tѳrgandѳ tѳrmarig kѳnrrun, tru pailѳ Janeswanba, Jambreswanba maig purayaig treetѳweingue.

Kaguende tru treeg marѳb mѳguelai utuelѳ mѳilѳgѳben kѳn, ishumburmera chiyu gѳben mur isua bѳnrrѳmѳwa, chigurrimbunѳ kaig marѳg kѳbig arrubig srua ambiilѳ, kaig mariitѳ netsailai yamerayu kebamba, tru ishumburmeran kegѳrrѳsrka treetѳ rreetѳ melѳnrrai srua gѳbelѳ.Inchen tru ishumburmerabe chu uraskucha kusreb chib melѳbendѳ, tru newan ciertѳnigwane managuen nebua ashchab gaiman.
Tiusweimburabigu truba tabig amѳñib lataig inchendѳ, tru maramburab marѳbig Tiusweiwane chigucha gѳmíig mara tѳgar gѳn. ѳyeeg misaamerane tarѳmisr.

Ka trendѳ treeg undaguelѳ gѳmigwane chigucha chiga misaamera, namappe, chinchaguen tamaramgaig namabelѳ, wam gusrupteelѳ, trѳmbѳig maramigwane ke treeg maratѳweim buraambubelѳ, nѳmun gѳmѳbashtѳ trѳmbѳig mara betab misaamera, chigurrimbunѳ tabigwane larrѳ tsaleelѳ,
Katѳ ñibe iigwangucha isua asha gѳmig kѳn, srabe gwalѳmmerawane tabguen waramga gwalѳmmera attrab gúi.
Incha gatѳle tab isua mѳra, tru nugwaimandzig chinetѳ mara pѳnsra nѳmun kegѳrrѳsrka, nѳ maig martrain gѳben, treeg marѳb melѳnrrai merrarrawa tѳgagúigugurri wegѳrrѳnrrai.
Kaguende Señѳrweiwan marѳb megabiibe kwayam laptiig kѳmѳtѳ, masken mayeelan larrѳ tab inchibig, trurrigu may gusrenanѳbig, chigѳben pusrkwanrraptiig taingucha namig mѳrmíig kѳmig kѳn.

Matsѳrelѳ chinetѳ kaig marѳg kui indiilѳyugurrimbe ñibe tarѳmisr. Incha tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwanba, isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagѳmigwanba, undag kѳbigwanba, ambugurri igurri tab unamigwanba ñibe tѳga uñ, tru nѳmui manrrѳmeran chishchiitѳga Señѳrwan purugurra chib wamab tabig waminchibelѳba kanbalatѳ.

Kan nu yauma pasumera, kѳtsѳmera pѳnrrappe, ѳrѳtѳga mariilѳtѳ bѳnrrѳmѳwei, andѳga mariilѳtѳ pѳnrrѳmѳwei indan. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tsiitѳga mariilѳ gѳben, pirѳtѳga mariilѳ gѳben bѳnrran. Mѳilѳbe purѳ tabig marѳbyutѳ katѳrab srua gѳmig kѳben, mѳilѳbe ka chi marѳbyu gѳben katѳrab srua gѳmelѳ gѳn.

Pѳs truilѳma tru newan ciertѳnigugurri pella tarѳmisra, tru kwailѳ ѳsiiranrrun daibe yandѳ chab ѳsiirabguen indin gѳn chib, trumay waminchib guebamba, mѳilanma tru nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳga melaigwane yandѳ mumaygucha gѳmuielѳ melѳnrrai mindisha kѳrrѳmarѳb guebambin gѳn.

Ñibe ñuimburappe Tiuswei merrab sѳl marѳbig kui asig basrѳnrrab, purѳ tab asha isuptѳ marѳb meganrrig. Chi maramigwan marѳb pasrabig, chiyugucha kѳriimisra basrѳnrrabgaig tru wam newan ciertѳnigwane, maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ gusrenanѳb pasrabig treeg kѳnrrab.Tiuswane chigucha gѳmíig marѳb wamindiilanba, ke ka wamincha mѳriilanba, treegwan martrab gѳmѳ isua basrѳnrrig. Kaguen treeg waminchibelѳbe nѳmui kaig mariilѳyu mas kegѳrrab ambubelѳ gѳn.

Iilane pesannamѳnrrai isunanѳppatѳ, isunanѳppatѳ meganrrig, ѳyeeg martrigay chib Tiuswei merrab karua basrѳb, ke kan chi wamindamgaigwan treetѳgatѳ ke larrѳbitsamburab larrѳbichib, ambugurri igurri aleguiyab gѳmѳnrrai. Treeg mariibe chi tabig purugumѳtѳ, tru wamindigwan mѳrѳbelane ka trѳmbѳig mindishatѳ kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Maya kaig nebub arringucha, melabig melѳwabe, katѳ nѳ ashib karub waisrѳn chigucha nѳba ashib karub purramig kѳnrrun. Nam nun ashmeelѳ guer chibene, namungucha nѳbe ashmíig kur chinrrun.

Inchawei treekkurri chinetѳ kaig nebub arrubigwan treegwan kerrigu ka pureb megar, Tius nѳ lawa wesrailayasig tab gѳnrrai isua, tru kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmig Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabigwanba, tru managuen patsѳnrrabgaig tѳrguegwalmabigwanba nѳmgucha nebua tѳgagѳnrrai.
Jesucristѳ rey Davidwei misagugurri arrubiibe kwawa, kwailai utugurri gatѳle kurrigwan ñibe pesannamѳ isuagu, tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan na maig eshkab kusrenanig, treegwan.
Inchawei iig na ñun trendailane ñiguen chi chibig kuitashchab tab isu, pѳs Señѳrbe chiwandѳgucha ñi tab chigúi mѳramigwan tranrrun.
Katѳ kan kwallibig chigucha pѳsra, bѳsra gwallabe, ellmarig misrѳbigwane nѳmerrig tulishinrrabigwein gѳn.
Kan suldauma chi maramelan marѳb meganrrab, truyu kebyaikkurrimbe, katѳgan nѳѳrѳ peg maramelѳyube kebya megamѳn, nun suldau gѳnrrai pasrѳbigwan purѳ tab gúi mѳrtrai martrab.
Chine isuig megamig pub arrubigu, ñibe namba treegu pureb meganrrab isu, Cristѳ Jesúswei kan purѳ tab suldau lataig.
Ñi nai nusrkai lataibe, tru ka yandѳ tab indig Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabigu mur isua basrau.
ѳnesífѳrѳi yauelan Tius lastima tѳgagѳnrraimab isur. Kaguende ѳnesífѳrѳbe katѳ gatѳ nan chi isumѳ pishindѳ pasrѳnrrai purugubig kѳn, katѳ nan kailan keeri yau pasranmaptѳ kѳrig kui inchimѳweingue.
Pѳs ñibe asha gúinrrun mayeelѳ Asia birausreelѳma nan chab tarѳmisrigwan, truilai utube Figelѳ gѳben, Hermógenes kѳben tarѳmisrig kѳn.

Tru chi kalѳ gѳmѳ tabig kusrenaniilѳ na wamindigwan ñi mѳrigwane, trunun merrarrawa treetѳwei marѳb yamig tѳgagѳnrrig, isubigwan tru Cristѳinug pasriguba, undag kѳbigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasra tѳgagúiguba.
Inchen nabe truigwan eshkab waminchibig kѳnrraimba, Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig kѳnrraimba, kusrenanѳbig kѳnrraimba wesrawa pasrig kur.

Kaguende namun kaigyugurri wesrawa, newan tabig chishig amѳñinrrai wamabiibe nѳwein gѳn, kabe nam chigѳben mariilѳgurrin gѳmѳtѳ, nѳ trendѳ treeg martrab isuitѳgaba, nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgaba gѳn. Tru iig ka yandѳ tab indigwane Tiusbe Cristѳ Jesúskurri tranig kѳbig kѳn, chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabikken kaabenbatѳsrѳwei.
Kaguende Tiusbe namune kѳriiteelѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, chishkandѳ marѳbig kѳnrrain rranig kѳn, undag kѳbigwan tѳgar gѳnrraimba, asr mumay srua itanmaptѳ pѳnrrѳmeelѳ gѳnrraimba.

Nabe katѳ gatѳ isuinabig kѳn, ñi ka isatѳ inchib gѳmѳ, ñui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug ciertѳn pasra tѳgagúigwan. Truigwane ñui awela Lѳidaba, ñui usri Euniceba truilѳmerrig pѳlbasra tѳgagúig kѳbig kѳn. Incha mѳimbe ñuinukkucha truibe pasrѳmѳ gѳmѳ, pasraitamab isua basrar.

Chu uraskucha pesannab elachimѳtѳ nabe truigwan, yem gwalѳm ñune tѳga tѳga isua miab megappe, Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibig kur, nai isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn cha kebachibig chigaig, na treeg marѳb pasraig Tiuswan, tru merrabsrѳ nai kѳlli misaamera Tiusweyasig maig marѳb melabelѳ gѳben treetѳwei.
Na Pablѳ, Tius nan trendѳ treeg kѳnrrain gúikkurri Jesúscristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, ѳsig kѳmigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan eshkanrrai ѳrig,

¡Au! Timѳteѳ, ñun chi martrai trana basrigwane tabig isua mѳra tѳgagu, Tiuswane chigucha gѳmíig marѳb wamindiilanba, ke ka wamincha mѳriilanba, katѳ tru nѳmui nѳrrѳ nebua ashib kusreb taig chi ciertѳn gѳmíigwanba, treelan mѳrѳb pasrѳnrrab gѳmѳ meganrrig.

Tabigwan marѳbelѳ gѳnrrain garunrrig, truba puarmera misrѳppe, nѳmui chigѳben tabig mariilѳyu puarmera misrtrai. Tѳgagúigwane chigucha merѳ gúi inchimѳ, lata pirishib purugunrrab muniitѳ gѳbelѳ gѳnrrai.

Managuen kwanrrabig kѳmíig, muguen kemalamgaigu tѳrguegwalmabigu wabig, nune mu mѳkkucha asiimíig, katѳ mugucha nune ashchab gaimaig, Tius nѳtѳ gѳn. Treegwan purѳ tab indiiba, managatig mayeelaim bala karub wamibabe nuyasig kѳnrrai inchar. Treeg kѳnrrun.
tru martrai ñun karua basrigwane kaig mariitѳga chillig indig chigaig, katѳ chigѳben kailѳ gѳn dainab pasramig chigaig, treeg tѳgagѳnrrai namui Señѳr Jesucristѳ kenamisramnegatig.

Ñui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwane ñi tѳga basrѳnrrab isua gwayab, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmig tѳgagúigwane pachamѳrtrab gѳmѳ tab tѳga basrau, Tius trunun tѳgagѳnrrai wamѳben, tru ñi truba yamelai merrab, purѳ tabig pasrѳnrrab waminchib pasraig kѳbigwan.

Kaguende chigurrimbunѳ kaig maramig arrubiibe, anwan ¡gatѳ! ke kan chinchimmѳrѳ inchib chull indiilѳyugurri arrubig kѳn. Inchawei mѳilѳgѳbenma an dѳgagug kѳbiitѳ yandѳ pella, nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigugurri tarѳmisra, nѳmasiitѳwei chine chine purѳ isumdiig puig melѳnrrab tѳga bѳnrramisran.
Kaguende nambe yu piraumayma, chigucha chigar yandiig amrruig kѳppe, katѳ treetѳwei chigucha chigar ambamig kѳnrrun.
Inchen nam maig tѳgagúizhiitѳgatѳ kasraatѳ melabelaimbe tru Tiusweimburabelan marѳb tѳgagúiyugurri, chigurrimbunѳ tѳgagѳmig arrubwei inchibig kѳn.

nѳasiitѳ purѳ gusrebig kurmab indan, chigucha chi kusremíig kѳbendѳ. Incha maig kѳ chib payib aleguiyamig, chigѳben wamindiilan kwayam lab wamindamibe, kan kwanrrѳ lataig nigaig kѳn. Incha ѳyeekkurrindѳwei truyugurri arruppe, katѳgan chigѳben tѳgagѳben pusrkwai asamig arrumba, kwayam lamig arrumba, katѳganun trѳmbѳig marѳb tsalѳ wamamig arrumba, chigѳben guemesra trѳmbѳig isub amѳnamig arrumba,

Inchen ñim mѳilѳgѳben, ñimun karub pera gѳbelѳ Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳtѳwein dѳgarbe, Cristѳgurri nunelѳ gѳnmaptѳ, maig kѳben palabinѳtѳ indamig kѳmѳn. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, purѳ tabguen mara rranѳb melamig kѳn, kaguende nѳmui maramelan ñim mara traninabelѳbe Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳ undaaraig nunelѳ gúimba. Iigwane kusrenanѳb, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib waminchig.
Katѳ treetѳwei chigѳben tabig mariilѳgucha tru urastѳ tѳrgandѳ asamdiig kenamisran. Inchen tabig mariilѳ gatѳ mѳi mѳi kenamisrmѳ pѳnrrabikkucha, asiimíig treetѳ gѳrrѳmisrmѳtѳ, kenamisrѳbig kѳn.
Kaig mariilѳ kan utu mѳguelaimbe maig kѳtashchab asamig pumѳwatѳ tѳrgandѳ kenamisrѳbguen indan. Inchen kaig mariilѳ katѳganelaiwane tsѳndatѳsrѳ treeg kuin gúi nebua asiilѳ gѳn.

Chigѳben marѳb pasrѳnrrai wesrawa basrtrab, ke mѳi mѳi tab ashmubendѳbe, mѳigweim bala gѳben, ñui tasiimeran estsarmѳta, nѳmui kaig mariilan ñigucha tѳgatѳ marѳb pasraig webimѳnrraimbe. Chigucha kaig martrab gѳmѳ, tabig chishig basrѳnrrig.
Inchendѳ kaig maramigwan elachimѳ marѳbig marѳbelane ѳyeeg marmumig kѳn cha, mayeelai merrab mur alegamig kѳn, katѳganelѳgucha treegwei marmѳnrrab kѳriimatѳnrrai.

Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Kan wey, tirigun kwattrai itѳbunab megabigwane, mabashig kѳmub pusalgutsamig kѳmѳn cha. Incha gatѳ trenchibig kѳn: Chi maramigwan marѳb megabiibe tru nѳ marѳb megaimburѳ pagar utamigwein gѳn cha.

Kan ishug Jesucristѳn kѳrebig nui yau piudamera tѳgaguabe, purugub nѳ asamig kѳn, iglesia ke tranrraindѳ muniirab gѳmig kѳmѳnrrai. ѳyamaybe tru piudamera kerriguwan mugucha ashchaptiig chigarwan, maig palabigwan ashib tѳgagѳmig chi palѳmѳnrrun.

Inchawei treekkurri piudamera ureeteelѳ nѳmdѳ gѳrrѳmisrarbe nabe ka kasharanrrai inchar. Ureemera tѳgagѳb, katѳ nѳmui yaambu mandѳ burramigwan asam gusreb inchai, Satanás, tru ashig kѳmui inchibig, chinetѳ tainab pѳnrramig chigagѳnrrab.
Inchabe tru Cristѳn srѳtѳ nebua asha tru nѳba pѳnrrѳnrrab misrig kѳbigwan treeg martrab gaima, kaigyu pѳnsrailѳ gѳnrrab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Truibe chigѳben tabig mariilѳyu mu gúi asig kѳmig kѳn: nui uregwan nѳrrѳranѳbig, katѳ mugѳben nui yau pubelan, yaambumay tab wamab wabig, katѳ Tiuswei misaamera yau puben, srѳbmeran kwallibig, katѳ chine kaig nebuilѳ melabelan purugub megabig, katѳ chine tabigwane marѳb megabig treekke.

Pѳs mѳikkѳben nui nѳmmisagwan lata, katѳ nui naachaguelandѳweinguen isua ashmíibe nui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwan wendѳbasraig, katѳganelѳ Tiuswan kѳremeelѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, purab gaikken gѳn.
Trune piuda tru nѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisrѳbig nun maig marѳg kѳbendѳ marѳb pasrabiibe, ѳsig uningucha nѳbe kwaig lataig kѳn.
Inchen piuda tru kerriguwan nѳtѳzhig, yandѳ nѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisraibe, Tiustѳwei purugunrraitamab isua basramisra, yem gwalѳm Tiusba waminchib, purugurrunrrig chib miab megabig megan.
Inchen piudamera kerriguwan nѳmdѳ gѳrrѳmisrar kerrigu mugucha ashchaptiig chigarwane tabig purugunrrig.

Kѳlli misagwane tsakkandѳ namig wamѳmѳtѳ, masken tammaytѳ, wamindamig kѳn, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb megamig kѳn chib, kan mѳskawan lataitѳweingue. Inchen ureeteelane ñui trag nunelѳ gúi lataig indamig kѳn.
Iilandѳ ñiguen tab isub kebya, truigwandѳ martrab pasramisr, Tiusweiwan ñi gatѳguchinguen nebua ashib megaigwan mayeelѳ nebua ashchai.
Na arrumnegatiibe mayeelai merrab, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigwan leb, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melay chib, kusrenanѳb indamig kѳn.

Incha ѳyeekkurriwei nambe i maramigwane ¡gatѳ! martrab isua marѳb, maig kuingucha kullaarab elachimѳ marѳb melabelѳ guer, kaguende nambe ѳsig wab Tiuswan muniirab melabelѳ gúikkurri, tru mayeelan kaigyugurri Wesrabigwan, nun kѳrebelaneguende wesrabwei inchibigwan.
I trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn, mayeelѳ treeg kuitamab isua chi kashmѳ utamig.

Chi treeg kѳmubendѳ, nѳmdѳ isua chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindiilanba, ishumburmera kѳllizheelѳ kagatѳ ka wamincha mѳriilanba, mѳrѳb pasrѳmumig kѳn. Ñibe masken Tiuswei tabigutѳ marѳbig marѳb meganrrab isu.
Kaguende Tiuswei wamgurrimba, Tiusba wamindikkurrimba tabig chishig kѳnrrai marig kѳn.
Kaguende chiwandѳgucha, Tius nѳ mara pѳnsraibe kaig kѳmѳ, tabig kѳn. Inchawei Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib utigwane nambe chiwangucha kashmumig kѳn.

Treeg kusrenaniilѳbe tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig isa waminchibelѳ ka palatѳ tab inchib misaamerainukkurri arrubig kѳn, kѳrig tѳgagѳnrrai tru nѳmui isub kebachib pasrabiibe yandѳ nasrkwailѳ tѳgar, kan tsandzѳn bachibiitѳga parri latailѳ.

Inchawei mu treeg kѳmѳn chib pѳnrramga, nam Tiusweimburabelan marѳb pѳnrraig mu nebua asiimíig pasrabiibe, purѳ nuig kѳn: Cristѳbe kan mѳg lataig asrbaig kenamisrѳb, Espíritu nune chigucha kalѳ marmíig, tabig kui kenamarig kѳb, katѳ nѳbe ángelesmera asig kѳb, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera wammѳra gѳnrrai wamindig kѳb, yu pirau misaamera nune kѳrewa pѳnrramisrig kѳb, katѳ nune srѳmbalasrѳ tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳ utig kѳb gѳn.
Na iigwan ñun pѳrar, petѳ ñun ashchab attrab isua.
Iglesiayu tru diácѳnѳsmerabe kan sraindѳ tѳgar gѳmig kѳn, katѳ nѳmui ureemeran tab asam gusreb, nѳmui yaambu chitѳ maramigwan asam gusreb inchibelѳ.
Tru iglesiayu purugub pѳnrrѳnrrabelane maig kѳtashchab ashibmerrig asiilѳ gѳmig kѳn. Inchen yandѳ chi kѳn damgailѳ gúikkurrimbe, iglesiayu purugunrrab diácѳnѳsmera pѳnrramisrtrun.

Katѳ diácѳnѳsmera, tru iglesiayu purugunrrai wesrawa pѳnsrailѳ chigucha, mugѳben chine cha asinamѳ mѳguelѳ gѳmig kѳn, chigѳben martrab chippe, ka wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, martrab waminchibelѳ, katѳ vinѳn menrra mucha mutsiirapteelѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳweingue, maramgaigwan mara, ke chincha gѳben an nѳrrѳ gatѳramigwangѳba lamѳwei inchibelѳ.

Tru Tiusweimburabelan asha marѳb pasrabiibe, Tiusweiwan ke mѳi srѳ nebua ashib megabigwan pasramig kѳmѳn, ke purab nuig kurmab inchib guebya, inchippa tru nugwaimandzigwan mѳra basrѳnrrai pasrinuutѳwei kebeñib megamѳnrrai.
Kaguende nui yaambuguen mandѳ maramigwan asam gusremíibe, ¿Tiuswei iglesiayuelane kan mandѳ asha marѳb pasraiasamѳ?
vinѳ menrra mucha mutsiiraptiig kѳmѳwei, kwayam lamig larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, treeg kѳmѳtѳ, purѳ tab inchibig, kwayamigwan gѳmѳ, tab gѳmigwangѳba labig, anwan larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, treeg kѳmig kѳn.
Inchawei i trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Mѳikkѳben Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera pasrѳnrrab isubiibe, tabigwan marѳb meganrrab isun.
Kaguende Tiusbe srѳsrѳ marѳppe, Adánwanmerrig marig kѳn, trugurrimbe Evan.
Kaguende nabe kan ishuumisaabe kusrenanmѳnrrai inchar, katѳ mѳwan ke nѳ garunrrain gѳmѳweingue. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nilѳtѳ wamig kѳn.
Ishuumisaabe kusreb wappe, nilѳtѳ wamig kѳn, trurrigu maig kѳbendiig inchimѳ nѳmun mѳrѳb.

Katѳ ishumburmeragucha asru keppe, chull ashchai purab tabig kemumig kѳn, maig kemigwan treetѳgue. Pusrugwangucha tamarѳppe, ke purѳ tabig tamarmѳwei indamig kѳn, ѳrѳtѳga, kabe tab sruuzheelѳtѳga. Katѳ keilѳgucha ke purab nѳrrѳweyelѳ guemѳwei indamig kѳn.

Inchawei ѳyeegweyasig nabe Señѳrwei wamwan waminchib kusrenanrrai wesrawa pasrig, katѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig kur, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwanba, newan ciertѳnigwanba kusrenanrrai. Iigwan nabe isa waminchimur.
Truibe nѳashib maya misagwan kaigyugurri wesranrrab nѳ kwaitѳga pagaraig kѳn. Incha iigwane yandѳ ke treeg maramig buben, eshkab wamindig kѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende ѳyeebe tabig kѳn, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabiibe tab gúinguen asig.

reymerain gѳben, katѳ nѳrreelѳ misagwan ashib karub purrabelain gѳben. Masken chi isumѳ tab waramdiig, ambumay imay chigucha chi kuin gѳmѳ, Tiusweimburabelan tabig marѳb, chiyutѳgucha mu chi tamgaig waramig kѳnrrai.

Tiuswei mayu amѳñibelѳ guer chibendѳ, nѳmui chigѳben marѳb amѳnaitѳgabe chi ashmeelѳ gúi lataitѳweih marѳbelѳ gѳn, ashikken gѳnrrabgaig kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig marѳbelѳ, larrѳ mѳrmѳ misaamera, chigѳben tabig maramigwane martrabga misaamera gѳn.
judíѳsmera ka nѳmdѳ isua wamindiilѳ tѳgagúilan tru gúindѳ mѳrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ tru newan ciertѳnigugurri tarѳmisrar chi maramigwan nѳmdѳ pѳnsrailan tru gúindѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳwei inchai.

Tru Cretasrѳ kan mѳg nѳmui utuig nѳmui tiusmeraiwan waminchibiitѳwei nѳm tѳgagúima trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Cretasrѳ misaamerabe chu uraskucha isa waminchiptѳ warabelѳ, animal lataitѳguen gѳmѳ purab gailѳ, kan mabgucha ¡gatѳ! mamburab mabelѳ, trurrigu pѳgѳlelѳ gѳn cha.

Kaguende nѳm maig martrab chippe, ke purab purab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳben, wamdѳ nigarmera gѳben, katѳ may wamincha ka kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳben truba nѳrrѳ gѳn. Tru treeg inchibelѳbe judíѳsmera tru asru circuncidawarmera, truilѳrre mas inchibelѳ gѳn.

Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, mugѳben nui yau pubelane yaambumay wamѳnrrab muniitѳ wabig kѳmig kѳn. Tabigwane undaguig, maig unamigwan isua mѳra uñibig, sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbig, Tiusweimburabelѳyu newan tabig uñibig, asr mumay srua itanmaptѳ uñmíig kѳmig kѳn.

Tiusweiwan pera marѳb pasrabiibe mugѳben chi kѳn dainanrrabgaig, kan sraindѳ tѳgaig, katѳ ureemeragucha Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳ tѳgaig kѳmig kѳn, nѳmun maig marѳb amѳñig kѳben amѳñibelѳ gѳn chib wamindinabelѳ, kabe mѳrmeelѳ larrѳ gailѳ gѳn chib wamindinabelѳ treeg ureg kѳmѳtѳ.

I kilgawan ñi Titѳn pѳrar, nam pailѳba namui isubigwan kanguelarrѳtѳ Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgaig, ñi nai trag nusrkai lataigwan. Namui Tius Mѳskaimba, Cristѳ Jesús namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabiiba, nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ñun tranrraimab isur.

Na Pablѳ Tiusweiwan marѳb megabig, Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig kur, Tius nѳ lawa wesruilan, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrramigwanba, katѳ tru newan ciertѳnigwan nebua asamigwanba na purugub pasrѳnrrai, tru Tiusweimburab tabig amѳnamigumay amrrai marѳb pasrabigwan.
Ñibe iilan waminchig ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib, ѳyeeg maramibe kalѳ gѳn chib, marmѳtay chib. Waminchippe, mu mandamgaig waminchig, ñun mu kaashib gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳgue.

Kaguen nѳbe nѳashib namuyasig kwaig kѳn, chigurrimbunѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳigugurri wesranrrappa, katѳ kerrigu newan chishelѳ, nui misag sѳtѳmera nuyasiitѳ gѳnrrai martrappa, katѳ tabig maramigwane marmѳ gѳmѳ martrab inchibelѳ gѳnrrai.

Inchen tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe mѳi ya nam ѳsig warain gwalѳm, isua mѳra misaasun amѳnamig kѳnrraimba, maig kѳnrrabigwan tabig sѳlgandѳ maramig kѳnrraimba, Tiuswan maikkucha pesannamѳ tabig amѳnamig kѳnrraimba kusrenanѳbig kѳn, Tiusweimburab trѳmbѳig kaig maramelanba, chigѳben ke trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳtanmaptѳ marmumigwanbabe yandѳ elachar gѳmig kѳnrrai,

katѳ chigѳben tsѳgѳl inchipteelѳ gѳmѳ, masken newan chi isumgaig tabig marѳbelѳ gúi asiilѳ gѳnrraimba, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabigwei tabig kusrenanigwan nѳm chi marigutѳgucha purѳ tab gúi asig kѳrrѳmisrtrai.

katѳ waminchibgucha wamindamgailan waminchimѳwei, mu ѳyeeg kalѳ gѳn damgaig waminchib kusrenanrrig. Tru namun tsalѳ gúin bѳnrrabelѳguen namun mѳigwandѳgucha chi chaguen kaig waminchab gaima, kѳrig misraguen gѳrrѳmisrtrai.
Katѳ matsѳrelan chigucha ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib, isua mѳra amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai waminchig.

Ñi chiyutѳgucha tabig mariilѳyu nѳmguen trunun asha kusrenrrai marѳb kenamar. Incha ñui kusrenanamigu ñibe kusrenanѳppe, maig kusrenanamigwan isa gѳmѳ sѳlwan gusrenanѳb, ka indzab marѳb lataig kѳmѳtѳ tab gusrenanѳb,

tab isua mѳra amѳnamigwan, chi kaig marmѳ chishig amѳnamigwan, nѳmui yaambu chi maramelan asha marѳb purrabelѳ gѳmigwan, tab inchibelѳ gѳmigwan, nѳmui kelѳ maig chiben treeg melamigwan waminchibelѳ gѳnrrai, Tiuswei wamwan chi tabig kѳmѳn chib kaig wamindig kѳmѳnrraingue.
ѳyamay nѳmbe tru kelѳbar ureetѳ ishumburmeran: isua mѳra misaasun amѳnamigwan, nѳmui kelan, nѳmui uregwan undaguelѳ gѳmigwan,

Mѳguelѳ kѳlleelѳbe chigѳben incha ashmѳ, maig pѳnrramigwan bѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrraimba, mugѳben chine cha asinab pѳnrrѳmeelѳ gѳnrraimba, isua mѳra misaasun amѳñibelѳ gѳnrraimba, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwane chi kaiba lindiimíig chishig tabig tѳgagѳnrraimba, undag kѳbigwan tѳgar gѳnrraimba, chine pub arringucha melabig melѳnrraimba waminchig.

Mayeelѳba naba amѳñibelѳbe tab ka amѳñigueh cha wam ѳran. Nam lataitѳwei nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrrѳwa namun undaarabelan ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrig. Tius nui ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun.
Pѳs chigѳben ke purugumdiig pub arruben treegu purugunrrab, namuielѳgucha tabig maramigwane kusreb ambamig kѳn, ke chigucha marmeelѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.
Artemaswan gúi, kabe Tíquicѳn gúi ñuimay na ѳrene, Nicópѳlissrѳmay nan ashchab, petѳ attrab inchunrrig. Kaguende nabe tru pishim bѳlmerawane trusrѳ tsunrrab inrrab isur.

Mѳikkѳben Tiuswei ureemeran nѳѳrѳ gatѳgan sѳtѳ marѳb uñibigwane ѳyeebe maramig kѳmѳn chib kan pamaygatig wama wamincha, wamindigwan mѳrѳg kѳmui inchene, yandѳ treeg mѳwane chi asamig kaanrrai tarѳmisramig kѳn.

I trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Inchawei iigwan waminchippe marmѳ gѳmѳ, treeg martrai waminchig Tiuswan kѳrewa bѳnrrabelѳbe chigѳben tabig maramelangѳba marѳb melѳnrrab inchai. Kaguende tru iig tabig mariilѳbe misagwan truba tabig purugunrrabig kѳn.

Nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳga namune chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmara, ketigwan utѳnrrab ureemera gѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, nam tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua munig melaig truig maig kѳben treeg.
Nѳbe Espíritu Santѳn tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai namuim bala ѳrig kѳn, namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabig Jesucristѳgurri.
Inchen Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabigwei tru ka yandѳ tab indiiba, nui undag kѳbiiba maya misagweyasig yandѳ kenamisren,
mugѳben gatѳganun chi kaig waminchimeelѳ gѳnrraimba, kwayam lapteelѳ gѳmѳtѳ, masken tab inchibelѳ gѳnrraimba, maig kѳbash inchimѳ, mu misaamerandѳgucha tabig marѳbelѳ gѳnrraimba.
tru nam isua munig melaig mayanguen tabigwan muniirab melappe, Jesucristѳ tru namui purѳ nu Tius namun Kaigyugurri Wesrabigwei tѳrguegwalmabig kenamisramigwan muniirab.
Kaguende tru Tiuswei ka yandѳ tab indiibe maya misaamera ashchai kenamisrin gѳn, tru kaigyugurri webambamig kѳnrrai.

Katѳ treetѳwei ishumburmera kѳlleelѳbe, Tiuswei ureemerasun maig amѳnamigwan amѳñibelѳ gѳnrraimba, wam gusrab wamniga llirapteelѳ, vinѳ mutsamigwan larrѳ chullelѳ gѳmѳnnrraimba, tabigwane katѳganelanguen kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳnrraimba waminchig.
Trune ñibe waminchippe, tru chi kalѳ gѳmѳ tabig kusrenanig, truig maig kѳben treegwan waminchig.

Chi trѳmbѳig isumeelѳ chishig tabig isubelaimbe chitѳgucha tabig chishig kѳn. Trune Tiuswan chigucha kѳremeelѳ, larrѳ rrѳmbѳig isubelaimbe chigucha chi tabig chishiibe chi gaagѳn. Kaguende nѳmui turyu isubiiba, isub kebachib pasrabiiba truilѳbaguen larrѳ rrѳmbѳig mindiilѳ tѳgar gѳn.

Truig trencha wamindiibe isa gѳmѳ, sѳlwei wamindig kѳn. Inchawei nѳmune waminchippe mѳrmѳ gѳmѳ, mѳrtrai mur waminchig, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwan chi kaiba lindiimíig chishig tabig tѳgagúigwane,

Inchawei treelane waminchib gѳmѳnrrai mera, nѳmui trigwane kandѳ gasra basramig sѳl gѳn. Kaguende chi maramíig mara an nѳrrѳ tѳgamisrѳg kѳb, ke yaba, yaba yandѳ mandѳgucha gѳmuielѳ melѳnrrai mara gѳrrѳmarѳb amrrun, chi kusrenanamgailan kusrennѳb.

Tiuswei wamwan chi isumgaig ciertѳnigwan maig kusrenanigwane, tindѳga basrabig kѳmig kѳn, chi kalѳ gѳmѳ tabig kusrenaniitѳga katѳganelan maig maramigwan treeg maray chib wamindamiba, katѳ kalѳ maran chibgѳba waminchibelan, nѳmguen galѳ marѳbelѳ gúin gúi nebua ashchai wamindamiba.

Kaguende Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera pasrabiibe ѳyeeg kѳn dainanrrabgaig kѳmig kѳn. Ke nѳ maig taigwandѳ, martrai inchibig kѳmѳwei, kuchigurrindѳ ke chinsraatѳ inchib namabig kѳmѳwei, mutsiiraptiig kѳmѳwei, kwayam lamig larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, ke maramgailan marѳb, an nu gatѳramigwangѳba chullig kѳmѳwein gѳmig kѳn.

Na ñun tru Cretasrѳ kѳrrѳmarѳppe, trusrѳ tru chi maramelѳ lutѳ gѳrrѳmisriilan lutѳgurri tab tamarѳb kerrigu chab patsѳ gѳnrraimba, katѳ pueblѳmѳrig iglesiamerayu Tiusweiwan pera marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrabelѳ wesrawa bѳnsrѳnrrai, ñune trusrѳ treeg kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, na ñun maig martrai karuigwan treeg martrai.
Inchen mѳimbe yandѳ truigwan maram gwalѳmmera pubene, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabig nan martrai karua basren, trunun na eshkab kusrennen, nui wambe yandѳ truyu kenamisran.
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñimba kѳnrraimab isur.
Cristѳ Jesúskurri tru kailan keeri yau naba pasrabig Epafraskucha ñimun tab ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.

Trube, nai nuneg, ñi Señѳrgurri ѳyeeg tabig nayasig marimbe gѳtan, nai manrrau chi isumѳ, tab gúi pasramig kѳnrrai Cristѳinug.Na pѳrѳppe, na maig taigwan mѳra martraitamab isua bѳrar, katѳ na maig taigwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, katѳguchinguen tabig martraitamab isuague.
Inchippa ñun chigѳben kalѳ mara gúin gúi, kabe chigѳben ulѳ misra gúin gѳb chigѳbene, trube, trunun na ashchab, nan ulѳ bayrrunrrig.
Inchawei ñi naba lincha marѳbig kuabe, trube, nune nan utab lataig uta tѳgagѳrrunrrig.
ѳnésimѳ kan maya yanagatig ñun ѳyeeg tarѳmisrѳppe, katѳle managatig ñi nun yandѳ tѳgagѳrrѳmisramig kѳnrrab gua, ѳyeeg tarѳmisrig kuitamab isur.
Incha nabe gatѳle nune ñuimay ѳrar, tru nai manrraugurri undaaraigwan.
ѳnésimѳbe merrappe chigucha gѳmíig kѳbig kuig, mѳimbe ñuyasig lata, nayasig lata, chiyutѳgucha ke nѳ burugub megabig misrin gѳn.
Inchawei nabe Cristѳgurri mu chi chinrraingaig, ñi maig maramigwan treegwan martrai karua basramig tѳgagѳbendѳ,

Kaguende nane truba rruba kasrag kѳb, truba tab gúig kuig kѳn, tru ñui undag kѳbikkurri. Kaguende Tiuswei misaamerai manrrѳmerabe, ñigurri pishindѳ tab gúig kasraatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrai marin gѳn, ñi nai nuneg.
Tiusba waminchippe, chu urastѳgucha ungwa, ungwa chibig kur ñun isub.
Tius namui Mѳskaimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳba nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben, ñimun tranrraimab isur.
Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun.
Ñimun ashib pera bѳnrrabelѳ mayeelanba, katѳ mayeelѳ Tiuswei misaameranba tab ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay. Katѳ italiasreelѳgucha ñimune tab ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
Namui nuneg Timѳteѳbe kailan keeri yaugurri webyain gúi ñim wammѳra gѳnrrai inchar. Incha nѳ petѳ arrubene, nabe nѳba ñimun ashchab arrumѳnrrun.

tru nѳ maig maramig palai waigwan martrai chigurrimbunѳ tabig palabigwan ñimun tranrrun, Tius nѳ purѳ tab gúi ashib wamig kѳnrrai Jesucristѳgurri namuinug nѳ marѳb pasraitѳga. Jesucristѳne managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Nabe ke tiusmanda Tiuswan miab gѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar, na peba ñimuisrѳmay gatѳle arrumig kѳnrrai.
Namuimburab ñim Tiuswan miarrunrrigay. Pѳs nambe namui isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigar bѳnrrab, katѳ chiyutѳgucha nambe tabig marѳb melѳnrrab isua meler.

Inchawei Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri chu urastѳgucha Tiuswan nam animal gweecha lataig tranѳppe, purѳ tabzhig wamindiilѳ trangun, nui munchiwan tabig wamindi wam tru trigugurri webarrubiitѳga.Ñimbe tabig maramigwanba, ñim chi tѳgagúigwan pirishib gѳmigwanbabe pesannanrrab gѳmѳ melay. Kaguende kweecha tranѳb lataitѳwei Tiuswan keta traniilѳ ѳyeeg traniilѳbe nѳ purѳ tab gúi wanrrai marѳbig, treeg kѳn.
Inchawei namgucha nuimay nun katѳnrrab webamgun ciudayugurri wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ, nun maig trѳmbѳig indinab megaigwan namgucha treetѳwei kaig marinab melѳnrrab.
Inchawei treetѳwei Jesúskucha ciuda yaskabyugurri wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ kwaig kѳbig kѳn, nui anindѳga Tiusweindѳ gѳnrrai misaameran chish martrab.
Nambe kan altar tѳgaguer tru Tiuswei carpa ya tabzhigu marѳb pѳnrrab sacerdѳtesmerabe tru altaryuigwane mamig kѳmíig.
Jesucristѳbe merrabsrѳ lata, mѳiyan gwalѳm lata, katѳ managatig nѳbe yunѳmarmíig, treetѳ gѳn.

Tiuswei wamwan ñimun waminchib, ñimun pera marѳb pѳnrrabelane isua gѳmig kѳn. Nѳmui tru tabig amѳnaigu asha kusrenrrai mandѳ tabig kѳrrѳmarig kѳbigwan tab isua asha, tru nѳm isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra mandѳ tѳgagúigwane treetѳweih tѳgaguy.

Ñim amѳñippe, anwane ke chinchimmѳrѳ chull inchib amѳñimѳtѳ, ñim mѳi maig tѳgagúitѳgatѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb kasraatѳ amѳnamig kѳn. Kaguende Tiusbe trendaig kuig kѳn: Managuen ñundѳ elachimѳwei, chinchibgucha tsunrrai managuen ñun tarѳmisrmѳwei indamѳnrrun cha.
Katѳ kailan keeri yau purrabelane ñimbe nѳmba kanbalatѳ keerig purrѳwa lataitѳwei isub, katѳ kaig indinab melabelane ñimun rreeg indi lataig isumig kѳn.
Kaguende namui Tiusbe kan nag lataig kѳn, chigucha kѳrrѳmisrtraingaig barrѳbig.

Inchawei tru nam ashib tѳga burramig tru kѳnѳgagutsamgaigwan nambe utab gúig kѳbene, nambe mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chigun, Tiuswan tab gúi wanrrai marѳppe, nun kѳriibala tabig waminchib, kan yeeg tabig kѳnrrabmab isub.

Tru Mѳisés tsub urassrѳma Tiuswei wamdѳgabe pirѳwane kѳnѳgagutsig kuibe, mѳimbe ѳyamay maramѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn: Nabe gatѳle pirѳwane kѳnѳgagutsamѳnrrun cha, trurrigu pirѳwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, srѳmbalameranbañau.

Katѳ tru srѳ acuerdѳ marigwan misagweimburѳ purѳbasramisrѳbig Jesúswangucha kemalla bѳnrrab, katѳ tru Abelwei ani tru kaig marѳbigwan ñi, Tius, ulѳ bay chib, ani lataikken gѳmѳtѳ, Jesúswei tru ani itѳtsurig mas purѳ tabig tru kaig marѳbigwan ulѳ baymѳ, ñi, Tius, pesannau chib waminchib aniyu kemalla bѳnrran ñimbe.

Ñimbe treegu kemalla bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, mѳimbe ñimuimburappe tru Sión Tun dainug, ѳsig wab Tiuswei ciudasrѳ, srѳmbala Jerusalénsrѳ, muguen mundzamgaig ángelesmera tulundzuna kasrag purraisrѳ, treegu kemalla bѳnrran.
Katѳ ñimbe tru trѳmpeta mur wanrrѳbigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kan wam wamindiilan mѳrtrab kemallmѳwei indig kѳn. Inchen tru wam wamindiilan mѳrѳbelѳma: Tiusmanda yandѳ waminncha chibelѳ gѳn,

Pѳs ñimbe, israelitasmera Sinaí Tunyu kemalla bѳnrrab latawei, kan nu tun katѳramdiigu nagurѳmera naarabig tѳgaigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kabe lѳstiig, tru purѳ rrѳmbѳ lѳstiigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kabe kѳrig kѳmdiig isig ichibigu kemalla gѳmѳwein gѳn.

Mugucha mѳg lata ishug lata trѳmbѳig marѳb uñchab gѳmѳwei, kabe Tiusweimburabigwane chigucha gѳmui lataig inchibig gѳmѳwein guy, tru Esaú latawei. Truima kan mamig nindagweindѳ kan mayѳr nusrkai maig tѳgagѳmigwan yanig kѳn.
Katѳ ñim tab punab ambamig kѳnrrai putur maymeran ѳlmaray, tru ñimui kѳrriindi srѳb wetunshimѳ, tammisrtrai.
Inchawei ñimui kwalmera kullaarailan chishmisrtrai kѳnѳgѳb, ñimui tѳmmera itѳnapteelan gatѳle mur misrtrai maray.

Namui mѳskalѳma nam mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai nѳmbe kan maya yanagatiitѳ namun kusrenanѳb tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn, nѳmun maig maramdiig kѳben, treeg. Trune Tiusbe nam mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai kusrennѳppe namunguen tab gѳnrrai maran, nѳ newan tabig kuigwan namgucha tѳgagѳnrrai.
Inchen tru kanelѳ mayeelѳ mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai kusrenniilѳ latawei ñimun kusrenniimeelѳ gúisruandѳbe, trube, Tiuswei trag nusrkalѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ka menda ureemera gúin gѳnrrun.
Kaguende tru nui undaaraigwane Señѳrbe nune mur basram gusrenrrai kusrennѳb, mundѳgucha nui nusrkain gúitamab isua tѳgagúigwane nѳbe kalѳ marigwan ѳlmartrab murba rranѳbig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.
Pѳs tru kaig mariiba ñim kwayab melaigu, ñimbe gatѳgucha ñimui aniwan lusamnegatiibe mara bѳnrrѳmѳn.

namui kaptѳgabe Jesúswan ashib, tru nѳmerrig treegwan pera marѳb, katѳ tru namui isubigwan nuinug pasra tѳgagúigwan newanig kѳnrrai marѳb inchibigwan. Pѳs Jesúsbe nѳ pumsrѳ kasrag kѳmdiig pasrabigwan asha basraikkurri kurusyu mesraig kweetsig kwamigwan awentawa, tru kѳrig marinab pasramigwan chi trunun isua ashmѳtѳ, truyu puraya, Tius wamisra wainug kusrmaygatѳmay wamisrig kѳn.
Kaguende Tiusbe nѳmui lata gѳmѳ, namuyasiibe purѳ tabig tѳgagúig kua, tru nѳmbe namba kanbalatѳ misratѳwei tru newan tabig kѳnrrai indig kuig kѳn.

ѳyeeg tab misaameran yu pirau misaamera nѳmun tѳgagѳmibe nѳmbe purѳ nu balabelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Nѳmbe mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ, nѳrrѳ tunmerawansrѳ chu bumgúinguen mѳrmeelѳ amѳñibelѳ gѳn, nѳrrѳ srug yaambumerasrѳ, lendegѳrrab pirѳrrabmerasrѳ, ѳyeesrѳ kebamba warab.
Inchen katѳganelѳbe kaig marѳb indza ashib srua gúinab, ichabetinab, cadenastѳga lusrinab, kailan keeri yau merrarrawa keerinab melabelѳ gѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri ishumburmera nѳmui kwabelan katѳle ѳsiiraniilѳ utabelѳ kuig kѳn. Inchen mѳilѳbe kwamnegatig purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb srua gúinabelѳ gѳn, elatchab indingucha, elatchamamѳtѳ, kaguende nѳmbe katѳle ѳsiirawa srѳmbalasrѳ purѳ tabigwan nebunrrab isubelѳ gua.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri katѳganelѳ nѳm ashib karub tѳgagúigwan nѳm kanab, tabig sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, Tius trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriilan nebua utab, leónmerai triimeran kasrѳb indig kѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri tru Rahab, nui asrwan anwei yanѳb ishuuma, tru mѳrmѳ misaameraba kanbalatѳ nѳgucha kwamuig kѳn, kaguende tru pailѳ israelitasmera maisrѳn gѳtashchab nilѳ ashchab amrrubelan tab wamab utikkurri.
Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri israelitasmerabe Mar Rѳjѳyu kan trendѳ puryu lataig larraambig kѳn. Inchen egipciѳsmeragucha larramrrab inchen, pi katѳle itѳgasrѳben, chab gwaig kѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Mѳisésbe Egiptѳ biraugurri webyaig kѳn, rey maya namikkѳlig waingucha. Inchen trunun kѳrmѳtѳ, nѳbe webya inrrab kandѳ isua basraig kѳn, kaguende tru kaptѳgabe nebua asiimѳ Tiuswan yandѳ ke asha lataikken basraig kѳppe.
Mѳisésma isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri yandѳ kѳlig misrabe, tru Faraónwei nimbasrwei nusrkain gѳn cha wamig kѳmigwan kaasig kѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Mѳiséswei mѳskalѳma Mѳiséswane larrѳ tab unѳzhig kui asha, pѳn bѳl ѳrѳba nun sѳra tѳgagúig kѳn, tru Faraón Egiptѳ birau rey tru kwetchai karua basrigwan chi kѳriimatѳmѳtѳ.

Jacѳbma isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri yandѳ kwanrrab wawa, Jѳséwei uregwan kanun ganun mayanguen tabig nebunrrai mara, nui pѳtѳnain tsigwan pѳtѳnawa basramisra, Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibig kѳn.
Kaguende Abrahambe isua basrabig kѳn, Tiusbe kwailai utugurringuen gatѳle kusrumig maramburab marѳbig kui. Pѳs kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiiraig lataig kui mara Isaacwane treeg utig kѳn.
Abrahamwane: Tru ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane Isaackurrin gѳnrrabelѳ gѳn cha, Tiusbe ѳyeeg taig kѳbig kuindѳgucha.

Inchendѳ nѳmbe treeg marmѳtѳ, waramig katѳgan birѳ mas purѳ tabigwan tѳgagѳnrrab isub pѳnrraig kѳn, truibe tru srѳmbalasriigwan. Treekkurri Tiusbe chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳn nѳmui Tius kѳn daig kѳmig, pѳs nѳbe nѳmuyasig kan ciuda tamarig kua.
Inchen ѳyamay waminchibelѳbe tru gatѳgan birѳ nѳmuin gѳnrrabigwan lab ambubelѳ gúi, nѳmbe tѳrgandѳ asamig kenamaran.

Inchen i misaamerabe mayeelѳba isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigutѳ amѳnaig kѳn nѳmui kwam gwalѳmgatig. Tius tru nѳmun trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriilane utѳmuindѳgucha, Tius trannrrab misrig nuisrѳ pѳnrrabelan yabsrѳngurrindѳ ke kan asha lataig kasraarabelѳ gѳn, nambe srѳmbalasreelѳ, peesreelѳ gua, yu piraube ka petѳweindѳ warer chib, tѳrgandѳ trenchib waminchib.

Abrahambe nѳbe yandѳ maya kѳllig kuatѳgucha isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri unѳtiig latawei chish kѳmigwan utig kѳbig kѳn unѳ mѳskain gѳnrrab, (Sarabe ureg tѳgagѳnrrab gaimabig kuindѳgucha), kaguende tru trannrrab misrѳbig Tiusbe tru trannrrab misrigwane tranmѳ gѳmѳ, trannrrab gúi, Abrahambe treeg isua tѳga basraig kua.

Nѳbe isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri nuin gѳnrrai tru trannrrab misrim birau Abrahambe ka peesrѳngurri arruatѳ lataig, kan peg birau lataitѳ tsuig kѳbig kѳn, nun keta tranigwandѳwei utabelѳ tru Isaacba, Jacѳbpa, truilѳ lataitѳwei kan carpa yamerayu.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Nѳéma chi asiimíig attrabigwan isua gѳnrrai Tius eshkabenma, nun truba kѳriitѳga arcan marѳbig kѳn, nui yauelѳ kwamѳ, ѳsig webamrrai. Nѳébe tru ѳyeeg mariitѳga pirau maya misagwan kailѳgurri Tius mѳra pѳnrrѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳbash cha kѳrrѳmara, chi kaig kѳmíig lataig Tius tabig kѳrrѳmarig kѳmigwan nѳbe utig kѳn, tru isubigwan nuinug pasra tѳgagúigugurri arrubigwan.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Enѳcwane yu piraugurri Tius srua iben, nѳbe tru kwab tamigwane maig kѳbig kui mѳrmuig kѳn. Incha nune wetѳrranrrab gaimaig kѳbig kѳn, kaguende Tius srua yaig kua. Pѳs nun srua yaig kѳmѳwatѳ, nѳbe wamindinabig kѳn, Tiuswan tab gúi wanrrai marѳb mѳg kѳn cha.
Pѳs isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri kerrigu chi kѳbigwane Tius nui wamdѳga mara basrig kѳbig kuin gúi wetѳgѳrra bѳnrrer. Inchawei kaptѳga asiibe chi asiimíigugurri mara basrig kѳn.
