Chigѳben namun kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrraptiig pѳnrrѳbene, truwane namun ambashmѳrrunrrig. Masken tru kaigweinukkurrimbe tarѳmartra. Kaguende, tru ashib karub waiba, maramburab mariiba, purѳ nuig, purѳ tabiibabe managatig ñuin gѳn chib.
Kwalѳmmѳrig nam mamig maig palabigwan mѳi tranѳb,
Ñimbe Tiusba waminchib pѳnrrappe, ѳyah chinrrigay: Namui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig, ñui munchibe tabigweindѳ tarѳmara, newan tab indig kѳnrrun.
Ñimbe nѳm latailѳwein gѳmѳtay. Kaguende ñimui Mѳskai Tiusbe ñim miamѳwatѳ ñimui chi palai indigwane chab ashaguen wan.

Trune ñibe Tiusba waminchappe, ñui kwartuyu kebya, yaskabwan kasra, ñui Mѳskai Tiusba waminchi cha, mu asiimíig truyu ñibatѳ pasrabigwan. Inchen ñi mun kenamarmѳtѳ marigwan Tius ñui Mѳskai ashibiibe ñun truburѳ ketamigwan kettrun.
Inchen ñi mun kenamarmѳtѳ mariilan Tius ñui Mѳskai ashibiibe ñun truburѳ ketamigwan kettrun.
Inchen palai inchibelan ñi puruguppe, ñui kusrmay tasig marigwane atsimay tasig asha gѳnrrai marmѳta.
Ñimbe sѳlgandѳ newan tabelѳ guy, ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig newan tabig kѳb lataitѳweingue.
Inchen ñimui nunelandѳ tab wamabiibe, ¿chigúi srѳig peg marig kѳnrrautah? Kaguende ¿Tiuswan ashmeelѳ tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraguen treetѳweimbe marѳbelѳ gѳmuitarru?
Trune nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelane undaaray cha. Inchen ñimun kaig martrabgѳba inchibelaimbe nѳmuyasig Tiusba wamindamig kѳn cha.
Ñimbe katѳ merrabsrѳ trendaigwan mѳrig kuinrrun: Ñui tab linchibigwane isua, undaaramig kѳn chippe. Ñun tsaliigwane ashig kѳmui indamig kѳn, daigwan.
Inchen mѳikkѳben ñun chi miabigwane tranѳ cha. Mѳikkѳben pebrra cha, miabene, ka chimѳ, peb cha.
Mѳikkѳben ñun nama, kan kilómetrѳ chigѳben niguingarubene, trube, pa kilómetrѳ nig cha.

Katѳ ñimbe merrabsrѳ trendaigwan mѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun: Katѳganui kabwan mindishibigwane nuin gabwangucha mindisamig kѳn, daigwan. Katѳganui trugulwan lanchibigwane nuin rrugulwangucha landamig kѳn, daigwan.
Inchen ñimbe martrappe: ѳѳ damig kѳn. Inchen marmѳnrrappe: Ka tamig kѳn. Pѳs yandѳ i trendaigyugurri mas nemarѳb, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun taibe nugwaimandzigweinukkurri arrubig kѳn.

Inchendѳ nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chib mumaygucha ke treeg chimѳtay cha. Srѳmbalawei merrab pasramisra ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chimѳtay cha. Kaguende srѳmbalabe Tius nѳ wamisra waig kѳn cha.
Katѳ ñimbe mѳriinrrun ñimui merrabsreelan ѳyah tailan Señѳrwei merrab, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmisrigwane wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, maramig kѳn daigwan.

Trune nabe trendamѳnrrun: Mu mѳѳtѳgucha nui srai, itѳlulmubendѳ, srawan kucha, tarѳmisrѳbiibe, nui srawane itѳlulѳb uñchai maran cha. Inchen mu mѳѳtѳgucha kan tarѳmisra ishuuba kasharabiibe nѳgucha treetѳwei itѳlulan cha.

Ñui kusrmay tasig kaig maringarua, kaigu ñun kebenѳsrkѳbene, tasigwane para, guchi, chibig kѳn. Trembe ñui asru kanbalѳtѳ palabikken chi gѳmѳnrrun cha, tru mѳra melamnug asr ѳrѳba kegutsig kѳbgunrriibe.
Merrabsrѳ ѳyah taigwan ñimbe mѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun: Mѳikkѳben kasharawaig kѳbendѳ, peg ishuuba itѳlulamig kѳmѳn, daigwan.
Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Truyugurri webinrrappe, maig pagaramigwan chishtѳ pagarawatѳwei webinrrabguen cha.

Mѳikkѳben ñun kejawa, juezweimay merranene, tru kejabiiba mayu ib pasrappatѳ, tammay kѳrrѳmisrkun cha, petѳ wamindam lau, tru juezwei tasku tranmѳnrraimbe. Inchippa juezbe pѳlicíameran tranen, truilѳbe ñun kailan keeri yau kegutsinamѳnrrappe.
Inchawei ñi Tiuswei tranamigwan altaryumay srua arrua, ñui nunewan ñi chigѳben kaig mara tѳgagúigwan ñi isuptinchabe,

Trune nabe trendamѳnrrun: Mѳikkѳben nui nunewan namig kѳrrѳmisrѳbiibe kaigyu pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳnrrun cha. Nunewan tsalѳ wamabigwane tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelѳ asha marig kѳnrrun cha. Inchen mѳikkѳben nunewan trѳmbѳig inchib: Larrѳ gaig chugúi mѳrmíig kѳn chib wamabiibe, tru kwamѳ nagu mѳra melamnug kegutsig kѳmigwan lab pasran cha.

Inchawei nabe ñimune eshkar: Ñimui sѳlgandѳ marigwan tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmeraba marѳb pѳnrrai lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, katѳguchi tabig marmuisruandѳbe, srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳmbe managuen kebamrraamѳn cha.

Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Srѳmbalaba, pirѳba pѳnrrѳbenbatѳbe, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu maya lamѳzhig pѳrig pѳnrrabelѳguen pinappe, purainrraamѳn cha, kerrigu tru pѳrigu maig taig nebumnegatig.
ѳyeetѳwei ñimgucha misaamerai merrab ñimui tѳr pilѳnrrai inday chibig kѳn, ñimui tabig mariilan asha, nѳmbe ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabigwan truba tabig waminchain cha.
Katѳ kan aceite lámparan chigucha pilѳgѳppe, kѳtsѳ umbu basrtrab pilѳgѳmѳn cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, masken pala basrene, mayeelan yau purrabelan pilan chibig kѳn.
Ñimbe yu pirauelayasig tѳr latailѳ gѳn. Kan ciudama tun balasrѳ pasrabiibe trubѳnrrab gaiman cha.

Pѳs truba kasraarab tab gúi mѳray cha. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳmbe truba rruba nuig ketig utamig tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Ñimguen kѳmѳwatѳsrѳwei tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan ѳyeetѳwei kaig marig kѳbig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru Tius mandѳ martrai miaigwan marikkurri kaig martraindinab kaig nebui melabelaimbe. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe nѳmuin gѳn cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru ambugurri igurri tab gѳmigwan lab marѳbelaimbe. Kaguende truilane Tiusbe nai ureg kѳn chinrrun cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan kan parѳgwaig mѳrѳb lataig, pi mulgwaig mѳrѳb lataig inchibelaimbe. Kaguende maig isua palai melaigwan Tiusbe nѳmun nѳrrѳ traniilѳ gѳnrrun cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru truba isuig kishibelaimbe. Kaguende Tiusbe nѳmun chi isui inchimѳnrrai tab gѳbigwan tranrrun cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru Tiusweimburabigwan ke kagѳmѳnrraindѳzhig tѳgaguermab isua palai mѳrѳbelaimbe. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe nѳmuiwein gѳn cha.
Incha Jesúsbe misag truba rruba nuwan ashabe, kan tun bala nebya wamisren, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kemallen,
Inchen misaamera galileasreelѳ gѳben, decapѳlissreelѳ gѳben, jerusalénsreelѳ gѳben, judeasreelѳ gѳben, Jѳrdán bi tru pѳrr gallabgatѳsreelѳ gѳben Jesúswei mendig truba nu ambubelѳ gѳn.

Jesúsbe Galilea birau ѳrѳba llirab ibig kѳn, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamѳrig Tius nѳ ashib karub pasrainuguig tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb. Incha misaameran chi gwanrreelan gѳben, chi busrkwailan gѳben tamarѳbig kѳn.

Incha Jesúsbe katѳguchi mas ambuurѳ yabe, katѳgan pa nunelѳ warai ashibig kѳn, truilѳbe Zebedeѳwei nusrkalѳ, Santiagѳba, Juanba. Nѳmbe nui mѳskaimba barcѳyu atarrayamera kѳlsrailan tamarѳb purrѳbene, Jesúsbe tru nusrkalan wamabig kѳn.
Jesús Galilea nu bisu mendawan ib pasrѳwabe, pa nunelan ashibig kѳn, kane Simón, truigwane katѳ Pedrѳgucha taig, kane Andrés taig. Truilѳbe peskabelѳ gua, nѳmui atarrayameran piyu keguchib warѳben,
Trugurrimbunѳ Jesúsbe eshkab kusrenanѳb trenchibig kѳn: Kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliray cha. Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe lutau basran cha.
misaamera lѳstѳyu warabelѳbe kan truba tѳrig asan chib. Kwamig nѳmuim bala itѳgasraig lataig warabelѳ gѳbelane kan tѳrig kebilin gѳn, chib pѳrig.
Incha Nazaret pueblѳyugurri webyabe, Capernaum pueblѳsrѳ pisu menda, Zabulónwei misag warainuuba, Neftalíwei misag warainuuba tru birau tsunrrab ibig kѳn.
Juan Bautistan kailan keeri yau keerin gѳn daig Jesús wammѳrabe, Galileamay ibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¡Satanás, mѳi mѳi iptsu! cha. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Señѳr ñui Tiuswandѳ kѳriibala tabig waminchib, nuyasiitѳ marѳb megamig kѳn cha.
trenchibig kѳn: Iigwan nabe kerriguba tranrrumѳn cha, ñi nan srala, kѳriibala tabig waminchene
Katѳbe nugwaimandziibe kan truba bala tunsrѳmay srua yabe, yu pirau chutѳgucha nѳrreelѳ tru nѳm ashib karub purrailanba, katѳ nѳmui chigurrimbunѳ tabig tѳrig tѳgagúigwanba kenamarabe
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Katѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube treekkucha chibig kѳn cha: Ñui Señѳr Tiuswane ke chinchibig kѳtashchab lataikkucha maramig kѳmѳn cha.
Incha nugwaimandziibe Jesúswan Jerusalén tru Tiusweindѳ tarѳmari ciudasrѳmay srua ya, tru Tiuswei yau purѳ balasrѳ pasrabe,
Inchen Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Mѳѳbe pirrindѳgatѳ ѳsig tsumѳtѳ, kerrigu Tiuswei wamdѳgagucha tsumig kѳn cha.
Incha Juanbe Jesúswan piu umbu ulsrѳben, piyugurri webibig kѳn. Inchen mѳimbe srѳmbalabe kurѳptinchen, Jesúsbe Tiuswei Espíritu nuim bala kan palѳma lataig kѳrraarri ashibig kѳn.
Inchen srѳmbalasrѳngurri kan wam trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Iibe nai Nusrkai undaaraig kѳn cha. Nabe nuimburab truba tab gúi war cha
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Mѳimbatѳbe ѳyamay ka mar cha. Tius tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maramigwane nambe kutѳgue ѳyamay maramig kѳn cha. Inchen Juanbe ka treeg marѳbig kѳn.
Jesúsbe Galileasrѳngurri Jѳrdán biyumay arrubig kѳn, tru Juan uninuumay nun piu umbu ulsrѳnrrai.

Nѳbe tirigun isig ѳra tarѳmartrab tru kala gutsamig tsig utigwan sruaguen basran cha. Incha truyu tru tirigu chishmari yabalѳwan kerrigu chab chishmarabe, tirigune tirigu esegainug esegappe, shauwane mana kwamѳ nagu pattrun chibig kѳn Juanbe.
Katѳ walѳmbe tusrmeran srѳlba para ѳramig chabguen srѳlyu pasringuen basran cha. Chi tusrwandѳgucha tab mamig niimíigwane para, nagu kegutsan cha.
Incha nѳmui kaig mariilan kaig marig kѳn chib eshkaben, Juanbe truilan Jѳrdán biyu piu umbu ulsrѳbig kѳn.
Jerusalén misaameraba, mayeelѳ Judea birau misaameraba, Jѳrdán bi buluwanelѳba nun mѳrtrab werrubelѳ gѳn.
Juan kewagúibe camellѳ isiitѳga marig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nui pѳrѳnaibe kaluswan marig kѳben, nui mamibe nѳrrѳ chapullba kaambu mielba gѳbig kѳn.
Tru utѳmerawan Juan Bautista Judea birau mu misag warab waraimѳnug
Incha Jѳsébe trusrѳ puabe, Nazaret pueblѳsrѳ tsunrrab ibig kѳn. Iig ѳyeeg nebuppe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkab mѳguelѳ ѳyah taig nebunrrain gúig kѳn: Jesúsbe nazaretsriig cha wamig kѳnrrun daig.
Inchen Jѳsébe kurra, unanba usranba Israel birausrѳmay pera, ibig kѳn.
Inchen yandѳ Herѳdes kwaben, Señѳrwei kan ángel Jѳséwan Egiptѳsrѳ piabyu kenamisra, trenchibig kѳn:
ѳyamay nebuig kѳn Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jeremías ѳyah pѳrig:

Inchen Herѳdes nun tru kusreb mѳguelѳ isin gúi mѳrabe, truba rruba nama, tru kusreb mѳguelѳ tru ureg chu uras kallaigwan eshkaigwan, trunun cuenta mara kallaingurrimbunѳ pa bilagatiguelѳ Belén pѳtѳgatan warabelan kerriguba kwetchain garubig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe kurra, unan usranba pera, yem Egiptѳsrѳmay webya, ya,

Yandѳ tru kusreb mѳguelѳ chab amben, Señѳrwei kan ángel Jѳséwan piabyu kenamisrabe, trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, unan usranba perѳb Egiptѳsrѳmay trubab inrrѳ cha. Incha trusrѳ na eshkamnegatig kѳrrѳmisrtrig cha. Kaguende Herѳdesbe unan kwetchab lanrrab gѳn cha.
tru kusreb mѳguelѳ estrellan ashabe, truba rruba kasraarabelѳ gѳn.
Tru kusrebelѳbe rey ѳyeeg eshkailѳ ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchen estrella tru pѳrr gallabgatѳsrѳ asiibe nѳmui merraptѳ ya, yandѳ tru unѳ tsuim bala pasramisren,
Inchen Herѳdesbe tru srѳmbalasrѳ estrellameran ashib kusrebelan mu ashmѳwatѳ wama, estrellabe tappe chu uras kenamisrigwan payibig kѳn.
Inchen reybe sacerdѳtesmeran karubelanba, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelanba wama, payibig kѳn: ¿Cristѳbe chu gallanrrabig kѳ? cha.
Inchen rey Herѳdesbe trendaigwan mѳrabe, ni mumaygucha gѳmui inchibig kѳn. Inchen katѳ Jerusalén misaamerangucha treetѳweim bubig kѳn.
trenchib payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Judíѳsmerai tru rey kallabiibe chu tsuh? cha. Kaguende nambe nui estrellan webarri asha, kѳriibala nune tabig waminchab amrruer cha.
Incha Jѳsébe Marían nui nusrkawan tѳgagѳmnegatig keeba, sraimba lataig nѳmui asrtѳga chi marmuig kѳn. Incha Jѳsébe unane Jesús munchi basrѳbig kѳn.
Kerrigu ѳyeeg pureppe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabigwan Señѳr truigwan ѳyah taig nebunrrai treeg kuig kѳn

Nѳbe treeg martrab chab isubguen inchen, Señѳrwei kan ángel piabyu kenamisrabe trenchibig kѳn: Jѳsé, ñi Davidwei misagugurri arrubig, Marían ñui srain gѳnrrai utamigwan kѳrig kui inchimѳta cha. Kaguende tru unѳ tѳgagѳmibe Espíritu Santѳin gѳn cha.
Uzíasbe Jѳtamwei mѳskain gѳben, Jѳtambe Acazwei mѳskain gѳben, Acazbe Ezequíaswei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Jesucristѳ kallaibe ѳyeeg kuig kѳn: María nui usrimbe Jѳséba kasharanrrab misra uñen, Jѳsébe kasharanrrab permѳwatѳ Maríabe Espíritu Santѳgurri kwanrriig kenamisrѳptinchibig kѳn.
Jacѳbpe Jѳséwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru Jѳsébe Maríai keg kѳben, tru Maríagurri Jesús kallaig kѳbig kѳn, tru Cristѳ taig.
Ibe Jesucristѳi merrabsrѳ misaamerai munchimera gѳn, tru Davidweinukkurrimba, Abrahamweinukkurrimba amrrub misag:
Inchen Eliudbe Eleazarwei mѳskain gѳben, Eleazarbe Matánwei mѳskain gѳben, Matánbe Jacѳbwei mѳskain gѳben,
Zѳrѳbabelbe Abiudwei mѳskain gѳben, Abiudbe Eliaquimwei mѳskain gѳben, Eliaquimbe Azѳrwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsíasbe Jecѳníasweimba, nunelaimba mѳskain gѳbig kѳn, tru israelitasmeran Babilѳniamay merrarrawa srua ambub uras.
Ezequíasbe Manaséswei mѳskain gѳben, Manasésbe Amѳnwei mѳskain gѳben, Amѳnbe Jѳsíaswei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Salѳmónbe Rѳbѳamwei mѳskain gѳben, Rѳbѳambe Abíaswei mѳskain gѳben, Abíasbe Asaiwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Salmónbe Bѳѳzwei mѳskain gѳben, nui usrimbe Rahab gѳbig kѳn. Bѳѳzbe ѳbedwei mѳskain gѳben, nui usrimbe Rut gѳbig kѳn. ѳbedbe Isaíwei mѳskain gѳben,
Judábe Faresweimba, Zaraimba mѳskain gѳben, tru uregwei usrimbe Tamar gѳbig kѳn. Faresbe Esrѳmwei mѳskain gѳben, Esrѳmbe Aramwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Abrahambe Isaacwei mѳskain gѳben, Isaacbe Jacѳbwei mѳskain gѳben, Jacѳbpe Judába, nui nunelaimba mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.

Met geriѳù zѳ a echu en -au ken e Tѳtѳró hag e Gwambia, evel wau. Tu a vefe neuze da grediñ eѳ ar stummѳù en -awi stummѳù rannyezhel-rik na sellѳnt nemet ѳuzh Tѳtѳró, un emdrѳadur fѳnetek nevez marteze. Padal e kaver implijet e 1852 ur stumm wawi ( pe wawe ), skrivet huahue evit ar ger wau a-vremañ. hag e ѳuzer eѳ bet dastumet ar stumm-se e Kѳkѳnѳukѳ ha neket e Tѳtѳró

amtrѳker
Evit ar gwambiaeg ne sav ket ar skridѳù embannet kѳshañ zѳ en hѳr c-herz pellѳc-h eget un tammig ѳuzhpenn 150 vlѳaz zѳ
D-ar re-se eѳ ret ѳuzhpennañ an nebeud frazennѳù gwambiaek skrivet e 1755 gant ar beleg Eugeniѳ de CASTILLѳ I ѳRѳSCѳ hag embannet e 1877 gant Ezequiel URICѳECHEA
Anat eѳ, war ur prantad ken berr, ha gant diellѳù ken treut a-raѳk ar blѳavezhiѳù 1960, n-haller ket lakaat war wel nemeur a emdrѳaduriѳù er c-hѳrpus skridѳù testeniekaet

Evit gwir ne hañval ket ar gwambiaeg bezañ emdrѳet kalz-kalz e-kerzh ar prantad studiet en ѳberenn-mañ. Kѳulskѳude, bѳdañ mammennѳù disheñvel savet gant aѳzerien liesseurt war ur prantad a 250 vlѳaz a laka war wel un nebeud fedѳù yezh a vѳ talvѳudus ѳ studiañ pellѳc-h
Evel ma vѳ dedennus studiañ pishѳc´h an difѳrc-hiѳù zѳ etre gwambiaeg ar Gwambia ha yezh Tѳtѳró
Da skѳuer, kavet ez eus  bet un difѳrc-himplij rannyezhel e geriѳù zѳ etre ar Gwambiaeg hagan tѳtѳrѳeg
Ar geriѳù a echu en -au (evel lau - plant ѳulhѳuk - pe yau - kig) e ar Gwambiaeg Silvia, a echu en -awi e yezh Tѳtѳró (lawi, yawi)

E Gwambia eѳ testeniekaet ar geriѳù Wampi misamera wam (yezh tud Gwambia), namuy-wam (hѳr yezh) pe wam (yezh) traken
Meur a dermen a ra ar yezherien gantañ evit envel ѳ yezh
Gant se e reer gant tѳtѳró (tѳtѳrѳeg) pe gant lengua de tѳtѳró (yezh Tѳtѳró) evit ѳber anv eus ar yezh pe stumm yezh kѳmzet gant un nebeud tud kѳzh c-hѳazh e kumun Tѳtѳró e su Silvia
nebeutѳc-h eget 100 yezher
An termen(ѳù) implijet ar muiañ e spagnѳleg hiziv evit ѳber anv eus ar yezh eѳ an termen Guambianѳ pe lengua Guambiana (gwambiaeg)
Dilezet eѳ bet an termen mѳguex gant ar yezhѳurien abaѳe eta
An termen-se n-eѳ nemet an anv a ra ar bѳbl indian amezek gantañ, an Nasaed pe paezed, evit envel Gwambiaiz

Tranara keta namui nu ya

kөn pena umpu trөp kuinkөn pөlawane pupөla kөp mѳsrөk kөp wa pөlasrө patsapsrө nepipikpe tapchik kuinkөn, inchen tru umpupe latre nu lentik kuinkөn nam i pөluilөpa kөele kөprainkөn iwanelope yaptө pөntrөpөne kөn kusrөm purөpik pөlawan atrun, namun ashape trөpa intsap atrun  nape isupe namun tasik trantrөp atru chintermap isuinatan tru peña tarewan atrөppe mil pachetap kөn kөmө atraitamap isuinatan.
Namui pөlu pupөne painatan peñipkөn peөmetitrucha inchen pөlө trikmai letappe trenchitan, ne kөta unilөpe purө mai kөmөrөpik kөncha wentө purөp kөesha nui kөta pasrөi kөtsik tampөөwan kөna martan.

Truyu kutri wamappe nai pөlo pasrөpikuan wama tasik tranape lelachimөn. Yaptө mөrikpasrөpөnө trentan: ik yape ñimuy kөntrөpik kөncha pөlukөn ele mөnta pөntrөpөlekucha mөrik pөntran katө trentan, ik yape kөndare chillik pasrөncha tru mөsrөkkuan kucha kualamik kөncha mei mei kualamtik kөn chipөnө kөnөlope awinchi trawa kuallip mөntap tintan incha tru mөsrөk tarewanө mei, mei chish maran. Nai wentө nuchak pisrөm wesrөi kachull teka wekuchip mөntan tru chillik pasrөpik wan, inchen pirau ashenө srөkwan latrө minchik tamarinuk kөn umpupurөp ashenө kөnchamөrayupe chikopik pөntran. Umpupe trutrөpa lentenuk kepөnө yaskappe tatish chik kөn. Tru kusrөm purukupik kepiape trutrөpa ashipөlliran nө metrik kepiape tru yape srөk mitrik sulu kөn ashenө piyau pisu pөlu kepөlataik kөn e malөpa srөku inchenө nape pөla ashchurmap isuinatan umpusrө kepia pasrөwapө wampik wөpatrua tru pөla kutri ashenөmu ya kөntrөp kaikөn.

Tru kusrөm purukupipe katө waman mayaelan pөluwan pөntrөpөlan amtrui-cha. Tru ya umpusrө asөnappe ampe San Andres Insasrө pire umpu ya marilѳ kөmө өyek kөn umpuwane leste kөmө tru pөntrөpөlөte kualem lateik ter ke kualmapөlө pөntran kөtsөmera tampөl nintak mera pura kitsi srөkmera me-trөp kөllele teka kuilө truyupe ke pөn-tran kөn chakmerayu inchen tru kusrөm purөpikpe trentan, ashkeecha nape iklan wetetrawa wesrө pөnsrөntrөp intik kөn-cha mu isa kөmөte yu pөntraimpa weiwaminchipөlө kepik kuin kөncha.

Iwanele waminchippe isa kөmө pasrөimpө wei waminөhipөlө kuin kөncha urөkmeran chikucha asөsrөep kusrөnanik kuitamap isutan misakwan kepera tasik tranөp menta kөnun kөnun yantө eshkap mentan y yawane ñim ashchikai cha y yape yu Tranara keta warөpөlai kөn cha ñimui ñimui urөk wai kөntrөpik kөncha u katөpurөle urөkwai kөntrөpik kөncha y yawane mu chillik inchai kөmө aship kөntraincha churakucha wekuchip pate kөntrikaicha chillik inchen kөn mai katsiku chillik intilө amtrөpөlө kөncha urөkөnөtrik pupөlayu tekөn pөnemera ketruntrikaicha trencha eshkөn aship kөntrikaicha chillik kepөnementrei umpusrө umpusrө putrewape chikөn pөlai kөmө putrentraincha trentan tru kөtsөmerayu nena map pөluwan kөn nemtsik keta purө chish pi puraip tsupik kuin kөn nupa pi une latre chish pichik trunan muchip warөntruncha. Tru pөni tampөl nintakpe mamөntrikaicha yu umpu pөntrөpөlөyu mantrөkaitan pushchap kemechitө ashiptө pөllmantrөkaicha urөk keleele өyu mantrөpөlө kөncha.
kөrөsrөikuane mөramikөn

kөn slurө comadre tөkakuikөn tru chuchape atөwall makui kuikөn srө kuantrө kurraik. Inchen tru chucha pe slurөwan aschap yainkөn. slurө pe compare kuikөn tru chuchapa incha trentainkөn. Nape atөwall nemersrөp intrөp inchar kakөnte nane atөwall tsula makөtan. Inchen tru slurөpe wepia trentan, ñune pe tul yu kemөrisrөande ñune kuechun ñikөn kerik puraimөta. Inchen tru chuchape trencha lөtan uju uju. Trencha pa mai lөtan inchen tru yem tөpө yem atөwall le yu kepiankөn inchen slurө pe kasrөk wai kөn tru chuchape mөrөtө trasan shuu shuu inchene pusrөuai tre trasainkөn. Inchene atөwall puaikpe kөn tsik mutaik wepiape trentan ame nay atөwall wan srөaintrөppe kerirkaiketirru inchen tsik muta ichip wapөne trenchip trasan shuuu shuuu. Katө kualөm slurөpe nui trausrөmai letsөtө wepiayainkөn mapөn yante yamai atrөp pasrөpөn pөlөmtө kurrөp tsuik asha tru slurөpe tratra ashene chucha pe intsapөlatөi kuai wainkөn trekuan ashape trendan: ashku comadre ¿chintimpa tre mөrmөku na ishkaiwan?
Wasrөpa lamө werөpa
kөn wasrөpa kau werөpa tapөlincha amөñipөlөkuinkөn
Inchene wasrөpe nu turs wan lan nui srөkmeran trusrө warsrөp tru kau werөpө nui shus urekuan tri turs umpu tөwei elatsan truwan llirөp warөntrai.
kөn kualөm kau werөpѳ nui mamik lantrөp wepiainkөn wasrөpe parөwaik srөpө utu pөninkөn inchen kau wera urek kuan srөayainkөn inchene nui shush wasrөmerөpa latrө tap mainkөn.

Kau werөpө pua trekuan asha pusrөuaik intan mandөkөn kөmui nui shush wera urek meran pөninkөpөn, ñnөpe mantө inchapkө pirauwantө llirөpikuape pөla intrөp kaimapikuape pasrө inөrөp kөn pөөa ipikuaneө Chintamkөmui trumpөtөwamap yantө tsalө asik өasáөkuan.

Mentra yana kөmautө wasrө wane nun kucha mai marik kuan tre tөkuei nepөn. Tru pөlukuan upisha kuechip kuinkөn, wasrөpe kepeña pөitsik pitikөnak tөtaikuan kuan muta yan nui wasrө urek merai. Mur isik ichen nak pe pөlap tintan tru leyupe wasrө urekpe teka pөlan pөla amptrөp kaimapөlөkuape pirau kөrra chap kuan. Inchene kau werөpe lulөp ya wasrө urekmeran chap man nui usrө así wapnetө.
Mana kualөmkөn trente lincha ameñipөlan wendө pasrөumiөөn trenkөөuisrөande namui srөmpөlasө wapik asha tre tѳwei nepөntrun.

Unөpa tөnkө kөsh?mpa
kөn unan tөnkө patrinkөn. Yamai lulөp ya nui usrөn trentan:
tenkө ketrө pachitan, nape pөlatө katөraikөn.
Incha tre -ñune patrintrun- usrөmpe trentan-, katөwane tѳnkөn katөrөppe, ni kөntө isua kemөrsrөk, pөlatө kөmөtө, inchene ñune latrө nap kusinchik latei kөntrun, incha ñune ketrө kөtrinchimөntrun.
Namikikuane, lөtaptikuane, kaikuane, kөnamaramikөn mu karөpik kөn cha chi kaik wan tөkucha.
chukөpөn kөshөmpөtө pөlawan
Chukөpөn kөshѳmpөtө pөlawan latrө pөlasrө Inchen ni unekөpөn piailan nepөntrөp isuilan Chukөpөn kөshөmpөtө pөlawan pөllik illimera pөla ampөn Inchen ñi piailan nepua asamtik kөntrun

Manakesrө srөmpөlasrө pөlapөlan miamentrun Wañimpөla kiakasrөmtik kөntrai chukөsrөmurtө isuilө pestө pesamantik kөntai, trusrө wetetrantrөntrik Chukөpөn kөshөmpөtө pөlawan pөllik illimera pөla ampөn Inchen piailө pөntrөp kailө latei kөpөn paөnatan ¿chichaө? ¿chincha tre kaimapraө mөinpe?, tursmeran chillka kui ashar, kal u mera pikelө kөn u srөrrөpөn ashchap ñuiasikөpөn naiasinkopөn inchen nainetө isuinatan, naumui nu pirө latrө tapchik kөn inchen asinatan pөllik srөmpөlasrөkөpөn pөlө wañinkөpөn, inchen tөrkualөm chik kөn Yem misrөn tapchik kөn, inchen nainetө isuinatan purө tap muna pirөchik kөn srөmpөlasrө kөshөmpөtө tapchik pisik kөn, misak purampөpөlan nөmui malөyu tretөwei asinatan
Misak tasik tranep asinatan, trenchip katan ¿ka watitru? Trenchipөlөtan un untak ketan
mөrinatan shush urek kөshөn, asinatan nөtrөrөp ampөn, nөmpe nөtrө kusrөpөnөtrөrantrөn nam lataik kөmө

Nemui, Nemui isup pek pek misak, warapele nemte nѳtre isua chiné marépele kuiklan kalѳ kepachimete warámikwan.

-Kampákutre chine tápik marѳp teka amtrupele kuikwanpa, trektewei ik pirau, trénte chi teka kuikle, Pisúmera, netre pikukmera, tunmera, netre parentsikmera, misakpe pishí maráte lliraiklan untaarap tap aship tѳka kѳmikwan.
Maya pek pek misak, Nemui, Nemui wam tekkar chikepen nemúinete isup kuallip, chiné marѳp warapelánkucha kalѳkeme tap warap tasik tranepele kui asik.
Mayá misakweipure chiné marѳp, karup, aship pentrapele, ashipte isúatѳ maramikwan
Mupakucha kan ketѳte puraasiap kѳmik.

Ik kan parikyú pelpasra perík, waminchipmentáppe, chimeráte tѳka kémik, chite marѳp teka kémikwan, isua tamará misak mánte esik warámik, chinchákepen tap linchá warámik, mayaele nupirauele karup kѳpelѳlata, kape nemuy, nemuy misak erésre warapelѳlata tap warámikwan waminchip eyamay pirishá pѳrikle kѳn:

Nupirauele trúyu kal-lawa misak warapele mú manchintrai kaik, mayá misak misrá tul ampa pertrai karuá pensrá, Srempalaikwan puremísrtra cha, mépa pirѳ Kuimpurap mayaele chíkuinkucha mur isua kan palate linchá pishinte esik warentrai, chí marámele teka kѳntrai, kalѳ pupen wachip, chí asielan ilesrketrámame chí isume tap waramikwan, petekatán támara sѳtѳ pѳnsra pѳrikwan, kan ketéte isuiklan purukuyap, chí tѳka kѳmikwan trek kѳntrai tasik traná, muná pirausrenkatik isua purukuyantrap misrá, eyeekwan pete punemetѳ martrai cha.

Misak pirѳm
Nu pirau misakk
Nu pirau, Tѳpirau, Munish pirau mántѳ ashá karuik.
Chíyu kѳpen ashá karup putrѳntrai, wesrua pѳnsraikle, Nu pirѳ ѳrѳsrѳ.
Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik
Mѳkatѳ kucha kѳmѳ, tѳpѳták basrѳná kѳrѳsrѳp wachipik.
Yanámik kѳmѳwei, penámik kѳmѳwei, penap yanámelѳ kѳmѳn.
Purѳ waminchipikk
Chinchá múkucha kietramik kѳmik, ulѳ purѳ kѳn.
Nu pirau nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikpa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpa mántѳ k'aruikwan marámikpa.
Chi kѳpen tѳkakѳmik, tѳkar kѳntrai kѳn.

Trek wesrup maramikwan, isua martrap mentappe, Nu pirau: karnpelepa misakwei purap pure waminchip putrapelepa, Táta merapa tap ¡sua maramik kѳntai ashchún, án peñipik wankuchá trúyu warap misakpe latá asámik kѳntrai.

Kemesraik: Misak pirau: pѳtekatan mepa kuimpurap, piransrel, tsantsenlataik, pirѳ umpúsre chíkepik pentrapelan, pirѳ srelmera, eskéѳ ánkui, kape manákutré miskai pishau yapalѳmerán, serik tulmeran, parentsikmeran, chíkepik pirau kepelan, Nu pirauclѳ án mártrap wesrap-kѳntrappe, trúyu misak mánte cala kuikwan, chiné teka misrep waraikwane, kalé marѳp mintíshime, tap isua ashá wesrap kѳntrai trúyu warapelepe tap aship kemik kѳntrai kѳn.

8-9. Misakmera isup, aship purukup kѳntrai, misak pirѳmeryu pure waminchai, wesrua pensraiklepe, nupirau karupelainuk kui, kape chíkepen kepen, pek pek aship purukupelaimpa pintreké pentramisrtrún, tru trek kѳntrai Nu wamwan pѳrik manchipen ¡sua ashá mártrap.

7. Misak pirѳyu, mumerá kepen, kalѳ marѳp amtrumentrai, mayaelemisra aship kemik kѳntrún, trempeik kuayap kemé, tap waramikkѳntrai, nam misakmeran wenté kalѳ pumentrai, Nu pirau karupele mánte ashá marѳp kѳntráincha períku manchipen.
6. Pek misakmera chíkepen martrap asiklan, trúyu warapelepe tap puntrai, ampemay imay wam purukup, nem mánte isuá martrap intiklan purukúmik kѳntrún.
5. Misak waraik pѳtek'atánsre, trente trek kepelan, ketrakmeran, pimeran, ushameran, chí tiús kepikwan, pinishimé mutekucha tap aship tek'a kѳntrai aship kemik kѳn.
4. Ankui latá, chí kepikwan latá, utápe kalѳ marmeté, latá ashá pirisamik kѳntrún.n
3.-Misak warei pirau chikepikte, mayá misakwei asik, ántek'a maramelan, isua waminchip eshk'ap, chí mártrap intiklan mártrai, pesanname asámik kѳntrún.

2. Misak pirѳmeryu chiné tap kѳntrai, isua ashá marѳp kѳmikwan, memay maramik kѳtasha setemisrá -putrená waminchá kѳmikwan, nupirauele maik martrap ashá kuinuk kutré, namtewei linchá, chiné marѳp kemik tápik tamará perá trattrún..
1. Misak waraik pirѳmeran, mánte aship untaarap teka kemik, kaumeran, pimeran, ketrakmeran, misakmera chú tap waramteik ketaship, mánte tamará pѳrik wammerayu, trek pentrai aship kemik kѳntrún.

Mánte kemik Nu wamwan pѳrik latá, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik yu latá, ampekutré ikutré trenchipik pasrentrún. Aship, karup, pera marѳp kemik, sre tamarik, misak pirѳmerayupe, kellik misakmeratѳwei wamintamlap, isup, asam purukupeleteka, manákutré nem mánte isua karup, chiné marѳp warápelepe, trektewci manákatuk nѳmtewei chiné ashá marѳp kѳntrai kѳn, mú puleele amtrupele karuinámik kermén, inchá eyamay marѳp kemik kѳntrún.

Kemesraik: Inchippa misak pirémera, pa, pen Tepirѳmeran pintre kemerá pentramisrene, misak karupele, Tepirau, ashá karup putrapelepa tasi kepensrep kѳntrap, linchá waminchátewei, tap aship karup kemik nepuntrún.

Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikteka, eyekle aship tasik kepasrep kѳntrai, tamará mayaelan sete pensraikle, pek pek chíkepikte netré kusrennik yamerayu, lincha kѳntrapelepa, mánte waminchip kѳmikwane, térkante isua ashá tamartrún.n
Misak pirѳmerape maya elai kѳn, chinchá mun pureeramik kemewei, yanámik kemewei, pinisamik kemewei, chinchá misakpe pirѳwan taremisramtiik kemuá.

Misakmerá, nemte isua ashá karup perá marѳp kemik, méwante t'amarik ketremisrtrapikwane, Nu pirau aship karupele t'amartrún, tru misakmerai pirѳ támarikwan, tѳká ahip kѳntrai purepensraiklepa, pirѳmeran mánte maramikwan, aship payá kusrewa, t'amártrai wesrua pensraiklepa misra tulampá, maik maramik kѳntrún chipen.

Misak pirѳmera, nem aship karup perá, marѳp kem pirѳmerá tamarѳppe, trek kѳntrai nu wamwan pelinuk kutré, misak mánte kѳmikwan, mánte esik warámikwan, trek kѳntrai kerésrep wachip kemik, sreik kemésra pertrún, mánte tamarámikwan eshkapik, pek pek misakmera, nemui pirѳmerásre, mánte esik puaampѳpele kuikwan, kemesrá pѳlikwan, maik chipik kepen trek martrún.
4. Nu pirau kutre, án wesrua purukuikwan, misak pirauele kucha, latá asamik kѳn

3. Tátamerape, chí kepikwan, chí pentrapikwan tap aship, tap piriship, trúyu warap misakmera, án tránik utámik kepen, mánte utap piriship, marámikwan asámik kѳntrún, chí mártrap isuikle tap puntraimpe..
2. Chí marámik kepelan, nepua ashá, truiklan isua marѳp lliramik.
1. Misak pirѳmeryupe, tátamera nem aship k'arup perá martrún.

Nu pirѳwan tamará pirishá nѳmte aship karup perá marѳp kѳntrai taiklѳpe, misak nem aship isua perá marѳp, karup memai kѳmikwan, trek kѳntrai mú chí taikmiik kѳntrún, inchákutre trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikteka, Nu wam maik chipik kepen trek mará, misakpe eyamay marѳp teka kemik kѳn.

Nam misakmeran karup pera marѳp tátamerape, mepurap misak pirѳ kuimpurapwan, múmantámik kaik chiné marámilcKalS pumentrai wachip, tap warentrai purukup, mekatekuchalatá asamikwan ashá martrún. Nem trénte maik marѳpele kuik keppe, trektewei, ashákarup, kalѳ pupen wachip, purukup, puremisrep, mánte kѳmikwan nu wamwan trekkѳntrai perá kan paláte tamariknukpa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriknukpa, kalé-puntrap kaikKuinuk kutrempe Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe, latá tamará asámik kѳntrun, misak trénte nemui pirau maik marѳp kuikwanpa, Nu pirau chiné kalѳ kѳmѳntrai isua ashá wachip kerésrep asikpa latá maramik puntraii

θyeklѳ pekwei taskú pentrapelan kateyuk puresruntrappe, trek kѳntrai wamwan pelinukmánte intamikwan ashkún. Ichen pek, pek misak warai pirau kelleelai manákutre tapelanesekaiklan, umpúsrenkutre tsallá asikle pentrepene, nemui purapwan mánte incha tap ashipteka kѳntrai tamartrún.

Nu pirau kal lainuk misakmera, manákutré nѳm maik kuikwan, chikepen tápele esekawá tѳka kuikle pentrapelepe, Nu pirau aship karup putrapelai taskú pѳntrán, puremisrep asámik,manásrenkutré kellik misakmerai tápele chí teká kuiklan, umpúsrenkutre tsallá wesruá esekaiklepa kate kallaik Nu pirau, chi né maik kuikwan asenanep kѳna marѳpelekucha nu pirauele kѳn, chinchá pekwan penap, yanep, pure eramik kemewei, chinhá ketramik kemewei, ule purekѳn chinchá purѳ pásrtrap intamik kemewei, chinchá patsekamik kemewei kѳntrún.

Nu pirau aship karup putrapelepe mayá nú kusrémikwan, payá ashá, maik kuikwan chinchá treek kuik kusremikwan, tap marép,lame lame néwan tekákѳmikwan, manakutre trente a Nu pirau kal laiknuk,tápele teká kuikwane eshkap,waminchá merep,latrpitsam usrenantrún

Chiyú maikte pureip kal lap, pup atrikwan ashá kusreikle teka, kal Tai pirau manákutre chí tѳká amtruikpe, kallai pirѳyu srelmerá kѳn. Nu pirau aship karup putrapelepe, treekteweikuik ashákѳn, ik pirau t'ap linchá warapelepe néwan misak t'aiklepe latákuik nepua asiklekѳntrai.

Nu pirau ashá karup putrapelaimpe, marmekeme marámik kѳn, manásrenkutre trénte treek tѳká amtruikwan, Nu pirauelepa, chí maramik latá kѳntrai wachip, marѳp, asenkarumik kѳn. Manatekucha kusrep kuikteka, katѳ maik kuikwan, nu payá ashá chinchá treek kepik Kuik ashá kusrennikteka, purѳ tap selwan marikle teka, chiyutekucha kusrewatewei, nu asikle turyu tekákuá nu pirau maik kuikwan asenanep srelmeran kѳnamartrap..

Misak mayaele nemúikui mera teka kuiklan, tapchik chikepen chull asamteele, trente trek Kkepelan, pek pek misakmerai nem mayá ele misrá kuallip kem pirѳ meran pinishimetѳ aship teka kuik, misak pirѳmeran, kal lai pirau, manakutré ya balѳ umpúmerawan, chi tapik kepelan kellicelѳ tamará esekawa teka kuiklan, kate chi kepikte trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik tѳka kѳntaiklan, treek kutré trúiklane chincha katekanelan yanep, penap, pure eramik kemewei, chinchá múkucha, ulѳ purѳkѳn ketramik kemewei, maná pinisamik kemewei kѳn. Misakpe chi kѳpelѳba pirѳwanpepe taremisramtik kemuá.

7. Mayá elai purap, chikepik marámik pentrapyu meikte kucha teka kѳntrai puremisrámik kѳn, peksrik kepente nu pirau kal laweik kuinkutre latá, netreraninteele latá, nu pirau pintre wareik tekarmerane, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe, mánte maramik wan aship kѳntrai, mánte maramik wan tamará ashchún, ishumpur kucha, mayaelepa mante maramikwan isup, asamik wan waminchip ashchai, aship karup putrapelepe, tasik tranikle kѳn..
6. Mánte marámik wan, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ aship llirap, mánte kѳmikwanpa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriklanpa, puremisrep kemik kѳn.
4. Puré pentrapelan wesrua neera, pentsraikle, chiyu kalѳ márene, katelé isua ashá yunemarámik kѳntrún, maik kemikupa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriknukpa mánte mártrai chipik kepen.

3. Kan paláte tulampá, linchá nemúinete, nú isua ashá wamintámikwan, eyank'atíkte taik mik kѳntrún, tru k'an paláte lintamikupe mú ilesrk'aikmik kѳntrún, chi isua wamintámelan, k'ate mánte chi marámelan kusréwa eshk'amik kѳntrún.

2. Pure basrentrapikwan, wesrua neeram purukup, nu pirau karupikba, nu pirau wesrua pensraikleba, mayá misakwan chí marámikwan, bayá chií kepen mártrap chipen purukup, nu pirau, maik kѳmikwan isua setemisrá waminchip yunemaramik kepen, tamarámik kepen, kan ketete karup, purukup lintámik kѳn,
1. Pure pasrentrapik wesrua neerep, pure pasrent'ai wesrua nerinap kemik.

Múte kucha truyu kal laiknukele né isuaiklemisrep ampá, ketete lincha marameleyu teka kep, chikepik asámeleyu tekakep, isuikleyu aship intamik teka kѳn. Treewan marѳp teká kémik kѳntraimpe eyamai kѳn:

Nupirau mayá misakmera kelatrete wamintikkua puletrik métrap pasrán. 1 pirau trúsrѳ trúsrѳ pek pek misakmerai wamkucha nem waraiknuk kelatrѳtѳ wamintikpe métrapwei pasrán. Treekkutre misakmeran kusrenanep kemikpe manákutre wam srelmera tekakuikwan puleelaiwanlatá, namuiwanlatá tap wamintam kusrentrai kѳn..
Nupirau aship karupelelatá, maya misaklatá, pirau trénte chí kѳpelan, misak chí aship, isup tѳká kuiklan piníshimѳte ampekutre ikutre puremisrámik kѳn.
Pek pek misakmera yú Nupirau kal-lawarmeran nemui maik kuikwan teká warentrai, Nupirau aship karup putrapelepe nám misakteweikui ashá puremisrán

Nupirau ashá karup putrapele isua maramikpe: mayaelan ashá purukup, chi teka kѳmele t'apik isua pelpasrá marѳp kemiku t'apmay t'asik tranik purukup kemik kѳn, kilkayu Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳrik ketremisrikwan ashá, mayaele latá kalѳ marmé esik warentrai, kal-lawa wareinuk, chí tѳkakuiklan, isua wamintiklan, kalѳ pumentrai.

Nu pirѳ, kantelateik tamarikyu mutekucha misak sun waramik chiné teka kemik kѳn, isuaaship, chí misakmerai pirѳ pirisha tamarik mepurap kuimpurap nѳmte isua marámik kep,trúsrѳ trúsrѳ karupelepa chí misakpatekucha tasik pepiyap, kan ketete purukuyamik kep,reѳ maramik kep, pureasamik kep, mayaelaiasik mananakkatik pure punikmiik tap kѳntrai.m

Kan tratratiik kѳn: Múmerate, chikutrénte, métrapsre Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik kepikwan, yunemarámik nepupen, sreik tamará pertrap isup kuikle, mánte pertrap, múmera pertrap isup mayaelan bayá merep kepte, pure waminchá yunemará pѳrtrapele, wesrua neerik, truikle tuleamba mánte kѳmikwan ¡sua, sreik Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik kѳn. Incha Nu wam netewei mánte kѳmikwan, neasikte kucha kalѳ kepen ashá wachip ashchapik kѳn, srape 380 temyu trénchipik kѳn: yante metrapsre 1886weisre Nu wam pѳrik tsupikwan isrentrai esekawa tratrán cha.
Ikupe chikutre, mántekutre, metrapsrѳ Nu wam trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikwan, t'amará yunemará sreik isua peramikwan wamintán.
XIII. METRAP NU WAMWAN TREK KθNTRAI ISUA PθRIKWAN YUNθMARIK

361 Tѳm: Chí purukumik án peñipikwan, Tepirѳmerá Munishpirѳmerayu, aship kѳntrai ámeran ketremaramik kemupene, tru ánwane tulishá esek'awá pasrá, trútek'a erésre purukumik tamará pirishá pasrá, Misak pirѳmera tamará pensraiklai asik, purukup kѳntrún, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik manchipen. Tru án tulisaiktek'ape, chíkepen kepikwan tamartrap, piránsrelmeran tap wesrap kemik, misakmera, puluwan warapelѳ pirnákish itremerákui, k'ape chinchá kepen urek kuantré misrmentrai, chiné me marámik, memarik yamera marѳp, memera penap, aship kemik, chí kuantrѳ k'aik tap esik warentrai purukumik kѳn.

Tap ashá karup kѳntrap, nu pirѳwan pirisaikle, Tepirѳmera, Munishpirѳmerayu chi kepen purѳ pensramkaik pentrapikwan, án martrap wesruinkui, kape truyu nu maymera warepen, trúan nika puraampamik kuinkui, kape piuyámera nika puinukkkui, shush piuyamera nika pumik kui tekarkepen, trúyu esekap púimpurѳѳ, án purukua ketamik kepikkua, trú án penikwane nupirauele ashá trúyu warapelaiasik, pirisaik pirauelei kucha ketremarik utamik kѳntrún.n

Chikepik pure pensramkaiklan wesrua- yanep kѳmikwane Nupirѳwan án tranátewei maramik kѳntrún, kaakѳn truteka mayaelan pirishá purukumik kѳntrún, katepurѳ truikweiasik ketá tranálata kilkámera mará, inchente chikepik wesrap kuiknuk ketremisrepikwan kuchá utentrappe ka miantrún.

360 Tѳm: Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe: pimerá, kaumerá, ushámerá, chikepik chinchá pure pensramkailѳ, pirau chíkepik kepikwan, wesrua yaná án martrapelѳ, mánte wesrua yanep kѳmikwan ashá t'amartrún. Katѳ trektѳwei misakmera nem aship karup perá marѳp kѳntrai, t'amarik pirѳmerá misak pirѳmerayu piránsrelmera pentrepene, wesrua yanep kuiknuk kutre, tepѳ án ut'ap kѳmikwan kuchá ashchai kѳn.

357 Tѳm: Puleele ashá karup kѳntrai pilisaikle,Munish pirѳmera kucha, nu pirѳ kallaik pirau ánpeñipíkwan latá ashchún. Trek latá aship, kѳmikwane,trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳlik teka, Nu pirau karupekleisuikmay mayantekѳn pure ertrún, tru ánmerá tekape,misakwei asik chímerá metlik pete palai ashá, maramikwam kanmaite ashchún.Tru ánwan latá ashipkѳmikwane trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳlikyu, misakpirѳmerai kuchá, puleele asha karup putrapelai latáikKentrapelan mánte marámikwan isua ashchún.

Misak pirѳmerayu kucha umpúte t'ap kѳntrai, chí kepikwan t'amartrapelѳ, wesrua pensramik kѳntrún, kapé trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik mánte martrai chipen. Nu pirѳ erésre kellik misakmera tulampepelepa, misak pirѳmerayu kellik misakmera tulampѳpelepape, kante kѳntrún, trúnuntewel ashá isua martrapele kuik keppe.

Trupalatѳ tulampa, Nu ketraksre putrená, chiné maramikwan wam lap, perep kѳntrapele misakmera wesrua pensraiklane, Nu pirau Nu karupik, nѳ aship ikle kѳntrapele kѳncha putrentrún, nemui nemui isup purukuntrapele kilkáyu munchimeran pure eren ashá chíweinte maram kusrepele ketasha, chité marámik palai ashá trúyu trúyu martai kertrún, meiklane pip piláyu, pip piláyu yunemarѳp kѳntrún, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik manchipen.m

Nupirau isup kellik misakmera, trupaláte tulampa pure waminchip, mayaelan kanteláta aship putrapelan, payá kepasrátѳwei kѳntrún, misakmerapa mánte tamarѳp ampámelan tuluntsuná eshkappa, chíkepik tap puntrai, tap aship teka kѳmikwanpa..

340 Tѳm: Nu pirѳ erѳsrѳwei asik, chiné mayaelai tap kѳntrai isua tamará marámik wane, kellielѳ tulampa waminchip, ashá perép kѳntrai wesraik pasrentrún. Misak pirau tamariklѳyu kutré purepasrikle kepen, chi kepikte tap teka misrep waramiku kutré kepen, tap linchip llirapelai purap kepen, manákutre chiné teká amtruikwan aship kemikwei purapele kepen teka kѳntrún.

Misak pirau, nѳm aship k'arup perá marѳp kemik tamariklepe, nemuikui án pirishá purukuikle kemik kepen, trúnun k'alѳ marmé asháte k'aterantrún. Nu pirau ashá k'arup putrapelepa, linchá waminchátewei, mánte marámikwan ashá martrún, trek kѳntrai Nu wamyu pѳrik mánte chipik kepen.

Parel warayupe: Nupirau án marѳp, esekap intik ya puaik kѳn. Truik ashipik kѳn, Nupirau mayá án pasraikwan, trúyu án mará weerep ketrayainkui nuraninkui, Nupirau umpúte ulemisrinkui, munásh pirѳmerawánsre ulemisrinkui, kaakѳn truyu métrapsre pek, pek kellimisakmera eske anwan chikepikte netré mará pirѳ umpú esekawa pensraiklan trúyu eskawa pasrar kѳn, trupure án mará weerepele kѳn. θikwan ter marѳp pasránm

Trattrѳ warayupe: Nupirau ashá isua k'arup putrapelai kucha, memai chikepen netrѳ marѳp, netrѳ án petap, purѳ netrѳweiele misrarkua, trútriku nutrѳ án patsekѳpelѳ, nemuiasik, pitsipure, nak tsipure, wam tsipure, yapure pure netre petap kemik kѳn cha trúnun ter marѳpik kѳn.

Pip warayupe: Múte chúte ánmeran pirisámik. Nu pirau án peñipikwan, lamete wesrua pasrik kѳn tan, Tepirѳmerayu, munish pirѳmerayu, misak pirѳmerayu, kusrennamikwanpa, me maramikwanpate asamik kѳntrai trúteka..

Pѳn tratrayupe: Chi mártrap métrapte isua án tulisaik. Ikupilamelik chi palepen ashá penámik, án tulisaiklan, misak mayaelai chite palai ashá, trúteka maymera marѳp, kusrenni yamera marѳp, memalik yamera marѳp, kusrenanepelan, me marѳpelan purukuimpure trúteka unkua chip, chikepikte mayá misakwei, ashápurukua marámik ánmera wesrua pensraikle kѳn cha, trúnunashipele kemik kѳntrai ter marѳpik kѳn.

Pa tratrayupe: Nupirauelelata, Memai ashá Tepirauelelata, marѳp ampamikwan. —Munish pirauelelata, misakpirauraelelata, chútekucha, mútekucha isua memai ashá chikepen marѳp ampámelan tap isua perá wará, trúnun ashá chikepen marѳp kemik kѳntrai, k'ate chi palap marinkui, yante né marinkui, selkui selkemui ashippate kemik kѳntrai trúnun ter marѳp pasrán.

Kan tratrayupe: Latrapte mánte marámikwan. Chimeratepenupirauelai kѳn cha, chikepen penap yanep án marѳp kemikpe, mú ilesrk'aimiik kemik kѳntrai, mayá án mará esek'amikkucha, trútek'a k'ate chikepen ashá maramik kѳn cha trúnun eshk'apik pasrán.
Nu wam trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikyu trenchitre, mayaelai nupirau án peñipikwan, chikepikte án tranepik képelan, mánte aship, chúte purukua erep, mánte piriship, latá ashá purukup kѳmikwan eshkap basrán.
XII. NUPIRAU MAYAELAI AN PEÑIPIKWAN MANTθ PIRISHIP ASAMIKn

38 Pete puraintrapik: Nu pirau aship karup wapikpe, lintámikwan tasik kepasrep tamartrún, parel pelyute, misak aship karumik, pirѳwan piliship tamará pensrentrap. Aship, isup, wamincha“merep tap kepasrtraptѳele wesrua pensraikle, tulampa Nu wamwan pѳlikyu, maik kuik ashá, kal laik pirѳwan maik piliship tamalik ketremisrtrapikwan ashá martrún. Trek ashá martrai waminchapele wesraiklepe, tulampa pen piláyupe, chap mará mѳwan kѳntrápiwan, kilkáyu pѳrá warámik kѳntrún. Inchente, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳliktewei, manákutre manákatik tap ashchún, mánte intámikwan eshkap, ashá karup pasrentrún.

Kemesraik: Misak pirau: petekat'an mepa kuimpurap, piransrel, tsantsenlat'aik, pirѳ umpúsre chíkepik pentrapelan, pirѳ srelmera, eské ánkui, kape manákutré miskai pishau yapalemerán, serik tulmeran, parentsikmeran, chíkepik pirau kepelan, Nu pirauele án mártrap wesrap-kѳntrappe, trúyu misak mánte warapele kuikwan, chiné teka misrep waraikwane, kalѳ marѳp mintíshime, t'ap isua ashá wesrap kѳntrai trúyu warapelepe t'ap aship kemik kѳntrai kѳn. Trek wesrup maramikwan, isua matrap ment'appe, Nu pirau karupelepa misakwei purap pure waminchip putrapelѳpa, Tát'a merapa t'ap isua maramik kѳnt'ai ashchún, án peñipik wankuchá trúyu warap misakpe latá asámik kѳntrai.

8-9. Misakmera isup, aship purukup kѳntrai, misak pirѳmeryu pure waminchai, wesrua pensraiklepe, nupirau karupelainuk kui, kape chíkepen kepen, pek pek aship purukupelaimpa pintreké pentramisrtrún, tru trek kѳntrai Nu wamwan pѳrik manchipen isua ashá mártrap..

7. Misak pirѳyu, mumerá kepen, kalѳ marej amtrumentrai, mayaelemisra aship kemik kѳntrún, trѳmpeik kuayap kemѳ, tap waramikkѳntrai, nam misakmeran wenté kalѳ pumentrai, Nu pirau karupelѳ mánte ashá marѳp kѳntráincha períku manchipen..
6. Pek misakmera chíkepen martrap asiklan, trúyu warapelepe tap puntrai, ampemay imay wam purukup, nem mánte isuá martrap intuklan purukúmik kѳntrún.
5. Misak waraik pѳtek'atánsre, trente trek kepelan, kѳtrakmeran, pimeran, ushameran, chí tiús kepikwan, pinishimé mutekucha tap aship tek'a kѳntrai aship kemik kѳn.
4. Ankui latá, chí kepikwan latá, utápe kalѳ marmeté, latá ashá pirisamik kѳntrún.
3. Misak warei pirau chikepikte, mayá misakwei asik, ántek'a maramelan, isua waminchip eshk'ap, chí mártrap intiklan mártrai, pesanname asámik kѳntrún.

2. Misak pirѳmeryu chiné tap kѳntrai, isua ashá marѳp kѳmikwan, memay maramik ketasha setemisrá -putrená waminchá kѳmikwan, nupirauelѳ maik martrap ashá kuinuk kutré, namtewei linchá, chiné marѳp kemik tápik tamará perá trattrún.m
1. Misak waraik pirѳmeran, mánte aship untaarap tѳka kemik, kaumeran, pimeran, ketrakmeran, misakmera chú tap waramteik ketaship, mánte tamará pѳrik wammerayu, trek pentrai aship kemik kѳntrún..

330 Tѳm: Mánte kemik Nu wamwan pѳrik latá, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik yu latá, ampekutré ¡kutré trenchipik pasrentrún. Aship, karup, pera marѳp kemik, sre tamarik, misak pirѳmerayupe, kellik misakmeratѳwei wamintamlap, isup, asam purukupeleteka, manákutré nem mánte isua karup, chiné marѳp warápelepe, trektewei manákatuk nѳmtewei chiné ashá marѳp kѳntrai kѳn, mú puleele amtrupelѳ karuinámik kemén, inchá eyamay marѳp kemik kѳntrún.

56 Pete puraintrapik: Trenkemuppe, Tepirѳ, Misak pirau kementá kantѳ martrap ketremisren, Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳrik 329 tem pelbasrepte manchipik kepen, truyu ashá martrún. K ellikelѳ putrená, 329 temwan trek kѳntrai wamwan isuá tapik tamará perá weeramne katikpe, Nu pirau ashá karupik, misak pirѳmerayu chite marámik balainkui ashá, mánte kѳmikwan nem aship -martrai karuntrún, chí tapik marѳp, purukup, wachip, katekan pek misak meraba linchá ashá waminchip kѳntrai.

Kemesraik: Inchippa misak pirѳmera, pa, pen Tepirѳmeran pintre kemerá pentramisrene, misak karupelѳ, Tepirau, ashá karup putrapelepa, tasi kepensrep kѳntrap, linchá waminchátewei, tap aship karup kemik nepuntrún.

Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikteka, eyekle aship t'asik kepasrep kѳntrai, t'amará mayaelan sete pensraikle, pek pek chíkepikte netré kusrennik yamerayu, lincha kѳntrapelepa, mánte waminchip kѳmikwane, térkante isua ashá t'amartrún.
Misak pirѳmerape maya elai kѳn, chinchá mun pureeramik kemewei, yanámik kemewei, pinisamik kemewei, chinchá misakpe pirѳwan taremisramtiik kemuá.n

329 Tѳm: Misak pirѳmera, nem aship karup perá,mareѳp kem pirѳmerá tamarѳppe, trek kѳntrainu wamwan perinuk kutré, misak mánte kѳmikwan, mánteesik warámikwan, trek kѳntrai kerésrep wachip kemik,srѳik kemésra pertrún, mánte tamarámikwan eshkapik,pek pek misakmera, nemui pirѳmerásre, mánte esikpuaampépele kuikwan, kemesrá pѳrikwan, maik chipikkepen trek martrún. Misakmerá, nemte isua ashá karup perá marѳp kemik, mѳwante tamarik kѳtrѳmisrtrapikwane, Nu pirau aship karupele tamartrún, tru misakmerai pirѳ támarikwan,tѳká ahip kѳntrai purepensraiklepa, pirѳmeran mántemaramikwan, aship payá kusrewa, tamártrai wesruapensraiklѳpa misra tulampá, maik maramik kѳntrúnchipen.k

Sre munchi paslik Tepepirѳmera chap támáliklѳyu kementá linchappe, Munish pirau puleele ashá karup putraikleyu, Tepepirѳ marékui inchipelane, mayá misakwan payá kusréwatѳwei lintamik kѳntrún. Tepirauelepa, Munish piraueelѳpa, tulampá isua ashá, chí marámik ánmeran pilishá pensrepelepe, tru sré tepepirѳmera tamaliklan, chikepikte isua ashá marѳp kѳntrai, ánmeran pilishá purukup kemik kѳntrún.

Kallaik piraukutre Kui, Tepiraukutre kui, kánte látaik tamarik, k'arupik tek'artewei, chikepikte ashá marѳp pentrapeleѳ, tapwan marik ketremisrtraimpe, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpa, puleele ashá k'arup kѳntrai pirisaiklѳ, utepusrik marenk'arupen.

Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe, chí lalѳ kѳntrai kemé mánte maramikwan, tap puntrai asha marѳp kѳmikwan eshkantrún.Méwante, mánte, aship karup perá marѳp kѳmelѳ, sreik pirѳmera tamarik ketremisrtrapelan, truiklante metratrawá, memay aship kemikwam ashchún.

321 Tѳm: Nu pirѳ kantikwan pirisaiklѳ,Tepirѳmera, munishpirѳmera, Misakpirѳmera, karupele tekaikte pirisaikleba, petekatan pentrepene, trubaláte kantiik tamarik pirѳmera ketremisrtrún, memay keѳtásha karup perá marѳp kemik, Tepirѳ latá, Munishpirѳ latá Misak pirѳ latá, mam trubalate misren.

290 Tѳm: Nu pirѳwan, mepurate pirisaik kѳetremísrene, misakmera ashá karup perá marámik, méwantekui peѳtepurap ashippatekua, kilkáyu maik kuikwan pisímpirѳ mera tamará mará, méwan kѳncha mayaelé ashchai weeramik kѳntrún.Tru trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikyumaik martraicha eshkapen martrúnn

Tru pirisaik misak pirau, ashá karup perá marѳp kѳmikpe, misakmera kucha katekuchi nepua ashá kusrewakua, puleelѳ karup putrapelai pintreké putramisramtik kѳntrún, latá wam lap, latá aship, latá karup, ampekutré ¡kutré tasik kepasrep pureasiamik, chí palepen tasik pepep, nanákutre tѳka kuik srelmeran ashá marámik kѳntrún..

288 Tѳm: Nu pirѳwan, mánte t'amará pirisaik kѳtremisren, trek kѳntrai nu wamwan perinuk sreik, nemui nemui kerésraiklan, trek kѳntrai kemesrá perá tѳka kѳmik kѳn. Mayá misak kallawá wareik pirѳpa, tát'amera aship karup perá marám pirѳmerayupa, ampekutre, ikutre pentrená purukuyap aship kѳntrai kѳntrún.
4. Nu pirau kutre, án wesrua purukuikwan, misak pirauelѳ kucha, latá asamik kѳnn

3. Tátamerape, chí kepikwan, chí pentrapikwan tap aship, tap piliship, trúyu warap misakmera, án tránik utámik kepen, mánte utap piliship, marámikwan asámik kѳntrún, chí mártrap isuiklѳ tap puntraimpe.
2. Chí marámik kepelan, nepua ashá, truiklan isua marѳp lliramik.
1. Misak pirѳmeryupe, tátamera nѳm aship karup perá martrún.

287 Tѳm: Nu pirѳwan, t'amará pirishá nѳmte aship karup perá marѳp kѳntrai t'aiklepe, misak nem aship isua perá marѳp, karup memai kѳmikwan, trek kѳntrai mú chí t'aikmiik kѳntrún, inchákutre trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikteka, Nu wam maik chipik kepen trek mará, misakpe eyamay marѳp teka kemik kѳn.

286 Tѳm: Nu pirѳwan, tap aship tek'akѳntrap pirisaiklѳ: Tepirѳ mera kepen, Yastau pirѳmera kepen, truikwan k'ateyuk pirisaiklѳ, Munish pirѳmera, nemui emui ashá k'arupele tek'aiklѳ kepen, Misak pirѳmerá maná kutrekle kѳpele, truikle kuchá nemui nemui, ashá k'arup perá marѳp kem pirѳmerá kѳn. Tepirau, mánte aship k'arup perá maramikwane, Nu wamyu kutre mánte ketremisrtrai taiknuk, trek kѳntrai wam wesrua pera truik mantinuk ketremisrtún.

Pip warayupe: Misak warei pirѳ purapwanpa”. Nu ketraksre, Nu yautu meperap kuimpurapwanpa, wa punѳmaisre nú pisu chak mentámerawan, Yautumera tapik tamariele Munáwansrenkutre misakmera pua k'asrak pirap warentrai isua tamarielan, pure netre pikullimeran seteele aship lincha waram pirѳmerane, pure tap aship tek'a kѳmele kepen, trúnun memai mánte ashá tap k'arup, marѳp kѳmikwan, trúnun waminchip ter marѳpik kѳn.

Pѳn warayupe: Munish pirau. Mánte memay isua aship, karup kemik misakmeran, yastáu karupik neerep, munish pirau ashá chi marámele kѳntrai án ashá wesrapelѳ, án ashá pirishípele kepen, purukup puremisrep putrentrapele chishte ashá wesrua pensrep, chi marámelan, mánte isua ashá marѳp ampámelan, tepirѳmera lincha marinkui, trúnun waminchip ter marѳp pasrán.

Pa tratrayupe:Tepirau. Truyuele nemte isua mánte ashá karup marѳp, tamarѳp kѳmikwan, mánte tepirau karupik wantrai neerep kѳmikwan, karupik chíte marѳp wantrapikwan, misak pirau munishpirau, mánte ashá isua marѳp ampámelan, srapépe nupi chak tepetak pirѳ putrapeleyu ketriku pekmay tap aship karumikwan waminchip ter marѳp pasrán.

Kan tratrayupe: Ketriku pirѳwan mánte tamaramikwan. 285 temyu pelbasrá trenchipik kѳn: Manasrѳkutre nupirѳwan tap ashá karup kѳntrap ¡sua pirisaikle kѳn cha, Truikle kѳmnetѳ, kateyuk tap ashá tamará pirisam nepuntrún cha, mú mentaikle karuik kemte, trúyu warapele némte isua ashá karumik kѳntrai, chí kѳpelankucha nem aship ashchai cha. Trek kutre nѳmte isua ashá karup marѳp kemik, wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua perámik nepuntrun. Truyukutre, chúte múte karup kemik, múbate, mé pirѳmeraba kanketete, trubaláte lincha ashá karup kѳémelan, pirѳ mѳwante Kuikwan, kate banikwan puraaship kemele, pimeran, maymeran, nak tsímeran chúte muúnte balai ashá merѳme mútekucha latá aship teka kѳntrai, Yastáumerayu, yautúmerayu, ashá purewaminchip putrapele neerep kemik. Nemte isua án purertrai, karumik chikepen marámik án peñchai, chikepikte marѳp kѳmikwan, péte balapikwanmetrik ashá marѳp karup, Nupirau ashá karup wapik maik karuikwan trúnun mártrai kѳn cha ter marѳpik kѳn.
Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikpe, Nupirѳwan méwante pirisha, mánte ashá trúsrѳ trúsrѳ karup pera marѳp kѳmikwan waminchipik kѳn. Ikwane pip wara pѳrik, eshkapik kѳn kѳn:

Pa tratrayupe: Nu pirau mayá misakwan puremisrtrapik chí kalé mártan cha eshkapen wam utap, trúnun ashchapelekucha teká kѳntrún cha eshkapik kѳn. Pek pek misakmerai purapkucha kan puremisrtrapik wesrua pasrámik nepuntrún cha, misakmerakucha, tsentátepe misak pirauweiasik, an utá chikepikte ashá marѳp kemik kѳntrapkua, trúnun memay purukup puremisrep kѳntrapik mei mei isupen kѳntrun..

Kan tratrayupe: An ashipelan kap kuchipik, pelpasrep srelmera mánte pentrai ashá trúnun memay marѳp kѳmikwan, misak pirѳmeran sreik támara pensráinuk, mánte, memay ashá karup, purukup, puremisrep, wachip, kerѳsrep, mayaeleѳ kan ketéte waminchip, payá kusrep, kap kuchip kѳmikwan eshkapik pasrán, chiwan kalé marѳp kѳmѳntrai.

Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua perinuk trenchitré, papalѳ-misakmera tulampa aship putrentrún cha, I nupirau mayaelai AN ASHIPELAN KAP KUNTCHAPELθ, mayaelai anmeran mú k'alѳ patsékѳmѳntrai aship meléntrapele, Mayaelai anmeran, mú k'alѳ marѳp kepen ashape eshk'antrap ampámik, truweinteelѳ wesrua putrentrai k'arup pasrán nupirѳ erésre.

Pa tratrayupe: Nupirau mayaelan memay mánte neeram purukupkѳmikwan ashá k'arupele. Nupirau keli misakmera yante né isuarmeran chuik kui, mukui ashchai kilk'a tamará tranepele, k'anuink'atѳte tarѳ ime, tap ashá maik kuikwan, tap ashá tamarѳp,Kilk'a kepusramelan munchip, nilementrai tap aship kѳntrapele lawa keerep kѳmikwan eshk'apik pasrán.

Kan tratrayupe: Muinkate purukup tasik kepiship, múte ketremisri ashchap munchip kemik. Meperap mánte ashá wesrua neerep kѳmikwan, metrapba isua chap támarik atrupen, trúnun ashá purukua, kan métrap basrená purukup, puremisrep, pure waminchai wesrawa kan kualem, múkucha purukumik teka kѳn cha, trúnun ter marѳpik basran.

Maya misakmera misra, nemui nemui asik chiyutekucha purepentrena, pure waminchapele lawa kan kan, trúsrѳ, trúsrѳ, t'ap ashá wesrua neerep kѳmikwan, memay mánte isua kanketete, misakmeran tuluntsunap wam lap pera chincha marѳp kemik, muckucha mantikmiik, mu ilesrkaimiik ashá wesrua neerep kepen, muinkate kepen purukup kѳmikwan eshkapik kѳn. Ikpe Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikyu pakate kѳn:
IX. PURθ PθNTRAPELAN MθMAY MANTθ : WESRA NEERθP KθMIK

246 Tѳm: Nam misakmeran karup pera marѳp tátamerape, mepurap isak pirѳ kuimpurapwan, mú mantámik kaik chiné marámik: Kalé pumentrai wachip, tap warentrai purukup, mekatekucha latá asamikwan ashá martrún. Nem trénte maik marѳpele kuik keppe, trektewei, ashá karup, kalѳ pupen wachip, purukup, puremisrep, mánte kѳmikwan nu wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳrá kan baláte tamariknukba, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriknukba, kalé-puntrap kaik kuinuk kutrempe. Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe, latá tamará asámik kѳntrun, misak trénte nemui pirau maik marѳp kuikwanba, Nu pirau chiné kalѳ kѳmѳntrai isua ashá wachip kerésrep asikba latá maramik puntrai.
Kental warayupe: Nem palásre putrapele nemte mánte ashá, karup, kerѳsrep, wachip, marѳp kѳntrapelekua isua trúnunte ashá waminchipik teka kѳmikwan, eshkapik pasrán..

Parel warayupe: Nupirau chi kalѳ marѳpelan trúnunte nepuaashchapele neere putrunniele 1 pirau mukepen chí kalé marѳpelan, muketaship, tap nepua payá kusrewa, kalѳ marárwane, keriikmísrtrai tsiau wanna kui, kerésrep wachip kѳmikwan, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikle manchipen memay mártrai cha kuaná eshkapen, trúnun ashá mártrai ter marѳpik kѳn..

Trattrѳ warayupe: Nam misakmerai purapwante eshkapik”. Misak pirѳmerayu, pek pek misak waraipurapwane, misakmeratѳwei nem aship, memay mánte kѳmikwan isua ashá karup, kalѳ pupen kerésrep, wachip kemik, mú puleele ashá karuik kemete, nѳmte isua marѳp, trúnun puremisrep kѳmikwan, lincha pishinte esik waramikwan, misakmera tѳrte ashipele kѳntrai trúnun ter marѳpik kѳn..

Pip warayupe: Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik, mánte kémik chúkatik nemarѳp pasraikwan. Yupe, Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikwan memay mánte tap wantretaship, chú kalѳ ketaship, sel ketaship, chite marámikwan isup aship, mepurapte isup kuikle pѳrik waminchipik kepen, trúnun sel isup ketaship, tru Nu wamwan pѳrikwan puremisrep putrapelepa, nu wachip kerésrep putrapelepa latá isup, marѳp ketaship kѳmikwan ter marѳpik kѳn.m

Pѳn tratrayupe: Meperap kuimpurapsre, mante esik waramikwan, isua ashá karup marѳp kemik. Nupirau ashá karup wapikwan ashipele truikle memay mánte ashá isua chiwantekucha t'ap marѳp kѳmikwan ashá wachip, karup putrentrapele kѳn cha trunun ter marѳpik kѳn.

Pa tratrayupe: Pѳtepurap misak kepelan wachip kerésrep asamik. Truikwane, Nupirausrenkutre, nu wachip kerésrep putrapele ashá chutekucha memmay t'aré ámme selwan, t'ap isua marѳp kѳntrai karup kѳntrapik kѳn cha, eshkapik pasrán.

Kan tratrayupe: Mayá misakwan isua erésre chikepikmarámelan Mánte ashá isua karup, kerѳsrep, wachip kѳmikwan,mayá misak né isuaikle misrape, chukatik nepua kusrewa kѳntraitasik tranámikwan, kerésrep wachip putrapele, memay mánte ashákKarup, puremisrep kѳmikwan, Puré nú nepua ashá wachipputrapelan, memay mánte ashá wesrua neerep kѳmikwan. Nupirau, asha karup putrapelan kalѳ maren, ashá kerésrep wachipputrentrápele ashá neeramikwan, Mayá yaná trúyute karupputramikwankucha chishte asamik kѳn cha, truiklan ter marѳp pѳrik kѳn.k

I kualikupe: Kalѳ marielan, kalѳ ameñipelan, kalѳ karupelan: Purekaik pumentrai went'aute aship melewa, Trek Kentrai Wamwanpѳrikleteka, t'ap chi maramtiik kui ashá karup kѳmikwan eskan. Nuwachipele putrѳna, t'ap paya kusrewa, t'ap isua ashá marámik, Nuwamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikwane pinepunámik kemua. 1 parikpekѳnt'al wara pѳrik tekaik kѳn.
VII. AMPθMAY IMAY KθRθSRθP WACHIP KθM KUALIK

Lѳtsѳ warayupe: muná pirѳwansre lincha ketete wam lapkemik” Tru muná pirauwansreelepa lincha k'an ketete tapmay wamlap kѳmikwane, tru Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikyu manchipikkui ashá trúyu srelmeran pelpasrá tamarik pasrapikkua tapmayteampekkutre ikutre linchá nemui, nemui wam lap aship kѳmikwantamarѳpik kѳn.

Kental warayupe: Tsik nikarmerai purap Nupirau, chikeepen asha puremisrep kѳntrai, tsik niksraikle tsureele kui, pillielekui pure murele misra, mayá misakmeran chikepen puremisrep, ashá tapmay tapik marѳp kѳmelan, kalѳ marѳp kepaampen, nemte kuayap kepaampinkui, neere misakmeran, kalѳ marѳp kuinkui, nemte srutrapik tsantsénmera mara múnkepen pureerep kuinkui, pená purerep Kuinkui kalѳ maren, mánte keresrep kalu keetap, weerep aship kѳmikwan waminchipik pasran..

Parel warayupe: Nupirau nu kalѳ puikle pesretecle”. Nupirau, chinchakepen mur kalѳ pua, tap esik waramka pesriik kepen, chinchakepen ellmariele misrmunkui, ushámera, kaumera, pimera chap pininkui, nupirau umpúte tsik nikarmera, nѳmte melampua kuechip Kui kui, muná pirѳwansre kuayap kuinkui, chikepente maya misak warapelai, mur kalѳ pupen memay tap isua karup tamarѳp puremisrep kѳmikwan, waminchipik kѳn.k

Trattrѳ warayupe: Mánte isua ashá karúmikwan. Truyupe mayaelai chikepen marám srelmeran memay mánte karuá purukup, sreik sreik marѳp ampámele palap atrupen, Tepirѳmerayulata, munish pirѳmerayulata, misak pirѳmerayulata, trúnun ashchapele mumerákepen, ashá martrai keereppe nupirau karupiktewei ashá, karua pensrentrapik kѳn cha, trúnun ter marѳp pasrán.n

Pip warayupe: Nupirau ashá karupikwei trakte lincha chi isuiklan karup marѳpelai. Truiklepe nemui, nemui chikepen ashá isua marámele, chukepen chintamik kepen mayá misakwan purukup kemik tapikwan isua tamará pensra truikleyu munkepen tap ashá isua martrapteele, purukuntrápteelan ashá keerep aship kѳmikwan ter mará eshkap basrán.

Pѳn tratrayupe: Nupirau asha karup wantrapiktѳwei. Nupirau ashá karupik chumaykepen wepipen, truiklatawei chiwankucha ashá karup marámele tekaik kѳntrai, ashá kan wesrua neeramik kѳn, purewántrapik, chiwantekucha trektewei ashá isua karup wantrai, trúnun waminchipik pasrán.

Pa tratrayupe: Karup kѳmikwan Ikyupe métrap ashipkѳllimisakmera putrѳná, mѳmay mántѳ trupalate mará trek kѳntraiwammeran pѳriklѳtѳka, chímeran, mѳmay mántѳ ashá karúmkѳt'aship, kalѳ pumѳntrai apemay, imay t'ap isua wachip, kѳrѳsrѳpkѳmelan trupalátѳ t'amará, t'ap isua karup marámelan tѳr marѳppasrán.

Kan tratrayu: Nupirau ashá karup wapikwan. Chi kepikwan nѳ aship ashá marámik, nѳ aship pasrѳná mártrai karumik, mántѳ marѳp kѳmelan kusrennѳp eshkap, kalѳ mármѳntrai, mú tap martraptѳclѳ kѳtásha wesrua pѳnsrѳp, kalѳ marѳpkѳpen ashape isrѳntrai wannikui, maya yanayutѳ lelatsinkui, kape marѳp weinukkutre ketriku weerinkui chí mártrap kepyape trúnuntѳ chúkatik selwan marѳp kѳntrai, chí mártrap pѳlpasrape patsamnekatik leláchimѳ mártrai. Treklan tѳr marѳp waminchipik pasrán..

Nupirau, ashá karup wapikpe turlataik kѳn, mur isua nukarupik, mu manchintrai keme, kánte wamap kánte karup, tap aship purukup puremisrep, chimeran mánte marámelan, ne pera waminchip, wachip, ashá karup, wentauwele trúsrѳ, trúsrѳ mayaelan ashá karup putrapele trektewei asha karup marѳp kѳntrai trúnun wachipik kѳn. I parikyupe, letsé wara pirisha perá pensraikle pѳntrán.n
VII. MANTθ ASHA KARUP KθM KUALIK

Wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳlikpe, ne eré nemará misakmeráinte kilka tamará trattrún, trenchipik, Misakmera kucha trúsrѳ trúsrѳ pateele nemui maikisupelekua, Nu pirau warapelѳpe trektѳwei purѳ waminchip, wamwan trek kѳntrai perépyu, wam lap, chi mártrap pentramisrínuk chi taikmѳelѳ kѳntrai.
176 Tѳm: Wamwan, trek kѳntrai ashá peram purukupele ashá neeramikpe, Tepirimera, mewan kuimpurap misak warapeléѳ ashá lawá wesrua neeramik kѳntrai kѳn.

172 Tѳm: Kellielѳ, trek kѳntrai wanwan perep putrentrapelѳ neeramikpe, nu pirau trúyu kallawá tsupikwan, mepurap kepen chiné ashá sel marѳpikwan, yánte né isuaik kelikwan, pilámera 30 némaraikwan, ashá neeramik kѳn, nu pirau mépa kuimpurap warapelѳpamisrá.
Nu pirau kal lawá misakmera, pek piraúsre warapelѳ latá linchún, mún kepen lawá wesrua neeramikku, chiné tapik marѳp kѳntrai kilkámera tamará pѳrá wártrapele, Kantelataik tamarámiku.
Truikle kémnete, pak'até nam misakmerai purap mayaelai chiné tapik kѳntrai, nemui, nemui wamwan trek kѳntrai ashá pertrapele, lawá wesrua neerikle kѳntrún, nemuinete ne ere kilk'a tamará.

171 Tѳm: Nu pirau, trúsrѳ trúsrѳkutré, Tepiré merik, kelli misak meran k'an 100 elan lawá, setemisrá neeriklѳ kѳn, tap wam wesrua trek kѳntrai, ashá tapik tamará kilk'amerayu perep putrentrai, k'allai pirѳ kui purapwánsre kilká tamarinuk ashá mártrai.

Pip wara pѳlikpe: kellimisak trek kѳntrai wamwan peramik. Truikpe kellimisakmera, trek kѳntrai wamwan perep putrapele nemui, nemui méwante, múmerante isua ashá purukup, karup, puremisrep, teka kѳmikwan, waminchip ter marѳpik kѳn.

Kellimisakmera aship, isup, perep, purѳ waminchip putrentrai wesrua neerikle, nѳmte tulampa putrená, kan métrap perá pasrentrai wesrua pasrik, truik ashá pera marѳp, karup kѳntrapik kѳn cha, trúnun ter marpik kѳn ikpe.

Pѳn wara perinuk: Trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik. Trúnun memay mánte kѳmikwan, wachip, kerésrep t'appa esik pureampamikwan, isua waminchip perá warep kѳmikwan, chikutre TREK KθNTRAI WAMWAN t'amará isuá perep kemik. Periklan selket'aship, kape kalѳ kѳn chip, mántekutre mayaele memay kémikwan, mánte kѳpelѳ kepik kuikwan isua perá warep kѳmik. Tru pѳrikle, múr kalѳ pupene, kaasha manakatikwei será esekamik kucha kѳn.

Pa wara perinuk:Tulampa chite mártrap wamintamikwan. θyeek chippe chinchap tulampa wamintikwan, chú tulampamikwan, mayaelaimpurѳ wamínchap tulampamikwan, tru tepetak mentrá misak tulampen chikepen marámelan, chikepen mártrappe, memay isuá ashá mátrap kánte isumikwan, waminchipelan wam ketep, métrap mishatsikyu aship putrapelaimpurapwanpa ter marѳp asenanepik kѳn.

Kan tratra perinukpe: Maikte kѳntrapikwan, chite marѳp kѳmikwan. Nupirau kellimisakmera tul ampa, treek kѳntrai wam perep kemiku, maya yaná marѳp putramikwan waminchip, nemun lawa wesrua neerepelai malau, chite marѳp kémikwan, mayá misakwei metrap chi kéna marѳp kémikwan kucha, kate chite martrai lelatsiklekua merá, chiwante marmentrai merikwankucha, ashchai tamarik trúnun waminchipik kѳn.
Teshkainukpe parel wara pѳrik tekaik kѳn:

TI kualikyu nui trénte chi marámikupe, tru treek kѳntrai wamwan perá waramik, truik kѳn, eyeekwan marѳpele, tru mayá misakmisra pure waminchip kѳntrai, wesrua neerikle, putrainukkutri maran, truikpe papalé pirisaik kѳn, katekuchi nuik métrap pasrap lataikpa, mayaelemisra neerik incha mayaelan keesha ashchai, tru wentau pasrap lataikpa, tepirѳmerayukutrente neerikle trupurapte isua ashchapele..
VI. TREK KθNTRAI WAMWAN PθRAMIKWAN

Pa wara perinukpe: Tru chikepikte ánwei marѳp kuallipkѳmikwanpa, mayá misakweimpurѳ tasik pepá purukup, chikepiktetap isua marѳp ameñipelan, kalѳ marinkui sel marinkui asháyunemarѳp kѳmikwan, maik kѳntrapikwan ter mará pasrik kѳn. Trúkemnete katekan nupirau erésre, yastaumerayu kan mayámisakmerán múi unekui ashchái munchi marákilkayu perá esekawáwarep, chikepen anwei pirѳkui, yakui pená teka kѳmelan, mui kuiashchai kilka tamará tranep, putrentrapelѳ kѳn cha teka ter marѳpikkѳn.

3. Pure putramisrtrapelan lawa wesrua neeramik, ke trununte isup asam purukuntrapele taremarik tekaik kѳntrapik kep, misak maik basraikwan, maya nu basraikwan, tru wesrua neerep kualemkatik maik putashchap kap kuchip.
2. Nupirѳ eresre chine marámik án wesruiklan k'alѳ mármentrai k'ap kuchipik

1. Nupirau, asha karup wapikwan trak melamisra, misakmera mánte esik waramikwan puremisrtrapele, wesrua pensraikle, pure waminchip aship kemik. Wamintamikwan mayaelaiasik chikepik pentrapikwan puremisramik,

Kan tratrayupe: Tru mayaelan, aship kemikweiasik pen kualik pilishá termarѳp waminchipik kѳn. Wamwan treek kѳntrai pѳra waramikwan. Asha karup kѳmikwan chi piraukucha. Kale kѳmѳntrai mekatekucha keme selwan wachip kerésrep asha maramikwan. Ikle nemui, nemui mántete pek pek tamará chite marѳp kѳmikwan eshkapik kѳn, némte chi marámkui ashá, chinete aship kѳntrai, kate meiktekucha chi pup atlikwan, ashippate kѳntrai kѳn, chiyu palepen latá purukuyap, kate aship karup putramik, chitekucha nѳmte tap kѳntrai tasik tranep intamikwan, tru treek marѳpelepe ikle kѳn:
I eshk'ainukpe, tru aship k'arup putrámik, maik tamarik kuikwan waminchip, k'ate mayaeláimpure mánte marѳp kѳmikwankuchá eshk'apik kѳn.
V, NUPIRAU MANTθ MARAMIKWAN, ASHA KARUP PUTRAMIKWAN WAMINCHIP

Srape pѳn wara pѳrinukpe: Nu karupikpa aship karup putrapele chiyu kalѳ maren, treek kalѳkѳn chip waminchip kutramik teka kѳntrai wamint'an, incha chi kalѳkѳn cha wamintikte kѳmé, mátѳ inchá isua t'amarámikwankucha wamintámik kѳn t'an.
Pa wara perinukpe: Nѳmui, nѳmui k'an setemisra chiné martrapisup llirap srѳiklѳtѳ isup waminchip kutramik tasik tranik kѳn, k'atetruiklepe chiyútѳkucha keepa aship llirantrai kѳn.

I kan tratra pѳrinukpe: Maya misakmisra chiyútekucha lintámikwan waminchipik kѳn. Aship karup putrainuk kutri, tru misakmerá warapele chikepen mártrap isua, memay t'amaramtiik ket'asha t'amártraintѳ, chi marámelan waminchip, t'apik mártrai kusrenanep inchai wamint'an.

1991 wei mántѳ kѳmik, Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai t'amará, perinukpetru aship karup putrainuk, chikѳpik maramelan marѳp lliramikupa,chine martrap isumelѳyupa, kan ketѳtѳ latá purukuyap lint'amikupe,trúpa t'ap srѳl kѳntrapik kѳn,
IV. KAN KETθTθ LATA PURUKUYAP LINCHIP, NθMUI, NθMUI CHIKθPEN MARTRAP ISUP SθTθMERAPA
Nu pirau kal lawá tsupik kuá, katekan pek pirausre yamik nepupen, truslik mislinkucha nui kal-lai pirѳwane trupishintraamen.
Mukucha Nu pirauik yu kal Iweikwane, Nu pirauik kemen tamik, truyu chí márpashmumikpe chikaakѳn.n
Pek, pek misakmera, nu piraupa, katekan pek pirausrempa, mѳwan kѳn taiknuk, trúwasre warapele, ampekutre ikutre tap linchap taik srelmera, maik chipik kepen, trek martrún.

2. Peksrѳelѳ kѳpentѳ, trentѳ yu kallawar lataikle Kentrap, kilká miapen tranielѳ kuik kutre, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriku maik inchai chipik kepen, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriktewei, inchippa chinchá nu pirauik kѳmik kѳncha waminchún, Nuraníntuk lataik kua.
2- Munásreele waramislik kuikutre.

b. Usrí, méskalѳ, yu nu pirauelѳ kuikucha unepe pek pirausre kallapen, kateyuk yu nu pirau, waramisrik kutre.b. Usrí, méskalѳ, yu nu pirauelѳ kuikucha unepe pek pirausre kallapen, kateyuk yu nu pirau, waramisrik kutre.

a. Trente yu Nu pirauele kѳn, inchippa eyeek kuikutre, usrí kui, meskai kui,yu nu pirauelѳ kepen,trenkemuppe pek pirausreele kepente, une tru kal lap kualѳm meik kepen, tru méskalѳ, yu nu pirau tsup tsupik kuik kutré.
96 Tѳm: Nu pirauele kѳn.

Pip warayupe: Pirepe méwante maik kuikwan waminchipik kѳn: Pire keppe mépa, keepa k'a pirѳ kѳna kuimpurapte keme, mayá yap, mayá lentѳ, palamaykucha mayá palá nepua asink'atik, pirѳ umpuwan kepen, nu pisu chakwan kepen chuk'atik asamikwan, nú pisú chakukutri pirѳ we k'al-lapikwan kuteke mará asikwan eshk'apik kѳn.
Pen wara perinukpe: Peeksrѳele yu Nu pirau ketrua ameñipelepe, chi teka kemelan kate chúkatuk chi taikmiik isup marѳp lliramelan ashchai pѳrik kѳn.

Pa tratra pelinukpe: Nu pirauik kemik trupa nu tap kuikwan wamintan, trú pure waminchip kѳntrai lawa wesrua neeram purukup, lawa wesrua neelinap intamik, kate chiyukepen aship karum purukumiku maramik kѳntraikucha chikutre aship karup wantrai neelinuk kutli, kateyuk sreik yunemaramikwan kape yante mármentrai katá pasrapikwan eshkapik kѳn.

Kan tratra perinukpe, mantekutri yu Nu pirauik kѳn cha wamintik kѳmikwan eshkap, chú yatekucha trente truyuik lat'aik kѳmikwan eshkap, kate pek pek misakmerá yu Nu pirѳpa pek pirausrempa méwante kѳn t'aiknuk warapele ampemay imay llirap waramikwam chi t'aikmiik keѳmikwan eshkap pasrán.
Ik pen parikyu temmerape, misakmerá mánte isua tamará waraiknuk,. kate aship karup putramik, maik tamarinuk pakate netre srelmerante waminchipik kѳn:Misak warapelanpa, mepúrap pirѳ teka waraikwanpa..
III. WARAPELθPA MθPA WARAIK PIRθPA

88 Tѳm: Chí kepen mayaelai asik tap esekámteelѳ, tѳkakѳmele, pimerakui, kaumerakui, kusrenni yamera, chikepikte tapik teka kѳmikwan kalé marѳp kepen ashape, mayaelaipure keliná yastaumay ampá pulik mekatekucha kemé, selwan ashá kerѳsrep, wachipikwan eshkawá, mintisaiklan tamartrai ulѳ painkarup, tamarenkarup, mayaelaiwan puremisra purukumik kѳntrai kѳn.

87 Tѳm: Trek kѳntrai pѳrik lame wammera mánte maramikwan sel martrai puremisrepik kѳn. Wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳrik, mánte mártrai karuikwan trek marmupene, mukepen, chú yastau kepen puleele mekatekucha kemé selwan kerѳsrepikweinuk ampá marméѳ karuntrai eshkapik kѳn.

86 Tѳm: Mei mei puremísrtrapik, pure kalѳ marielan ik tѳmyu trentan: Mukepen kanúnte kui, seteelan kui, chiyu kepen netré lalѳpupen, chincha kѳn wepintrap kaimá, memáikѳn kemupen, chinchá múkѳn tamaramtik kemiik, murik pupene kerináte chú kepen puleelѳ mekatѳkucha keme selwan ashá karup wachipikweinuk puremisrtracha wamintámik tѳkar kѳntrain kѳn. Tru puliik wachipikpe, hiwan tamará purukuá puremísrtra chipen, péte trúnun metrik ashá, truné mentrayute memai kepen ashá puremisrá chíntamik Kucha kaik tamártrai kѳn..

72 Tѳm: Nu pirau kal lainuk misakmera, manákutrénѳm maik kuikwan, chikepen tápelѳ esekawá teka kuiklepentrapelѳpe, Nu pirau aship karup putrapelai taskúpѳntrán, puremisrep asámik,manásrenkutré kellikmisakmerai tápele chí teká kuiklan, umpúsrenkutretsallá wesruá esekaikleba kate kallaik Nu pirau, chi némaik kuikwan asenanep kѳna marѳpelekucha nu pirauelekѳn, chinchá pekwan penap, yanep,pure eramikkemewei, chinhá ketramik kemewei, ule purekѳnchinchá purѳ pásrtrapintamik kemewei, chinchábatsѳkamik kѳmѳwei kѳntrún.

70 Tѳm: Nu pirau ashá k'arup putrapelaimpe, marmekeme marámik kѳn, manásrenkutre trénte treek teká amtruikwan, Nu pirauelepa, chí maramik latá kѳntrai wachip, marѳp, asenk'arumik kѳn. Manatekucha kusrep kuiktek'a, k'até maik kuikwan, nu payá ashá chinchá treek kepik kuik ashá kusrenniktek'a, purѳ tap selwan marikle tek'a, chiyutekucha kusrewatewei, nu asikle turyu tѳkákuá nu pirau maik kuikwan asenanep srelmeran kѳnamartrap.

Kilká ashmѳele kaakѳntrei, ásr kuantreelѳ, kape tur kuantrѳelѳ, shú mislielan kusrenanámik kѳn, kate utuiklѳ mánte malik asiknuk, tap marѳp Kusrepelankucha, Nu pirau aship karup putraiknuk kutre purukup asamik kѳn.
Pek pek misak kѳpelѳ, kanbaláte warapele, nem maiklѳ kuikwan, kate trénte manákutre teká amtruikwan katekuchí tap marѳp, kusrémik utap teká kemik kѳn.

Urek meskalѳ shúsh urekwan, maikyu kusrentrei lawá erekepen, lawá erámik teká kѳn. Aship karup putrainuk Kutre, kusrem purukuik yameráyupe mú misak kucha karuikmiik kѳntrun, memay amá wamap, lumerap kѳmikwan kusrensrel.

Tru kusrem purukumikyupe keké tap marѳpele kuik asik, mánte kusrenanámikwan kusrewa ashá marѳpele kuik asikletewai martrún. Treek kѳntrei wam wan pѳrikpe, tru kusrem purukupele katekuchí nepua nu kKusrep, trekwan marѳpelѳtewai nepua asikle kѳntrei tasik tranán.k
Tru teek kѳntrei wam wan pѳliktewei mánte marámikwan, paip lliramikwan eshkantrún.

68 Tѳm: Karup aship putrainuk kutrimpe tasik tranan, ilѳkaikmeele kusrem purukumik, kusremikwan, payá kusremikwan, kate meik chiwan maram kusrewa truikwan maramik,nemtekucha kusrem purukumele yamerá tamará teká kѳntrappe treek mará teká kѳntrún..

Ketrikú Nu piraupa, nemui purapwan aship karup perá marѳp kѳntrap pirisaik, misak piraupape, Kusrenanamikwanpa, aship karup kѳmikwanpa, mayá án purepensraikwanpa, chí maramikwanpape nem ashchún, tru maik kѳmikwane, nu wam wan pѳrikpa, trek kѳntrei wam wan pѳrikpa maik chipik kepenm
Treetewei chí kusrémikwan, múnkucha pinap kusrentrai kemewei, shush urekmeran mánte aship teká kѳmikwan, katѳ chutekucha kusréntrap pelpasreppe treek tѳwei patsekamne katik ashá purukumik kѳntrún.k
Katѳkuchí selwan kusréwa chikepen mártrap isupelѳ, netrѳ nepua aship kusrepele kѳntrai. Trutrikú kuantrѳ kepen me marámik kuchá kѳntrún,chishteele kѳntrai kusrep putrapelѳpe.
Chí kusrénnep ketasamikwan, maik kusréntrap isuik treek pup attasamikwane aship pate kemik kѳntrún.

Kusrémikwne kusrémik kepen, kusrenanik purepe urekwan án wesramik kementrún, kusrennam puruik yamerape Nu pirau kutre, aship, karup, putrapele mariklѳyupe. Meilekepen puleele nemuy purapte kusrenni yamera mará, kusrennimpurѳ án wesrap kepen, trantrapteelepe ka trantrún.

Kusrémik wane mútekucha asámik kѳn, Nu pirau aship karup putrapele latá, mayá misak latá, kan yauelete latá, purukua kusréntrai karúmik kѳn, trattre pilaik mislinkutre, pinsh trattre pilaik misramne katik. shush kutre pelpasrá yante isuar misrá katekuchi sreikte nepua aship Kusrepik misrámne katik: purukup, kusrenanep tѳgákemik kѳntrún.

67 Tѳm: Chikepen isua ashá kusrémikpe mayaelai kѳn. Misakpe chikepen nepua nu asam kusrepik kemik kѳn, Kaakѳnte trútek'awei chi né srѳikte,sreikte asamele, chi maramele, netrѳ kusrepele, chí mará pera weerѳp kepen, trúiklan nepua ashipik kuatewei, chí tѳk'akuiklan, wenteele, warai pirau tap aship tek'a warentrun, chi né nepua ashá kusréwateѳwei. Mutekucha Nu pirau misak taiklѳ misrá, latá pishintѳ tap lincha k'an ketéte purukuyap, kuallip warámik kѳntrún, wamwan latá, kualámelan latá, chi tѳk'a kѳmelan latá, warei pѳtepurap palá k'atan piísh pasrai purap tap isik ichipyu israp, tap isik ichipyu chi né eshekep k'asrakteele kѳntrai, chi né tapikwan aship kusrep, marѳp kemik, k'aik pir nákish isrempula, kuantrѳé chik'aikle warentrai, ketekuchi tamarám purukuntrún.

Trektewei Nu pirau aship karup putrapelepe, chí né tápik nѳtrѳ malielѳ kéna mísrtraimpe, sreikte payá ashá kusrémikwan, kate chúsre chi né nѳtrѳ kusréwa malielѳ kepen, trekwei marámik kutréwa srúa amtrumikwan asenanep eshkamik kѳntrun. Tru ellmalielѳyu Kutre chi né mámikmera tamarámik kѳp, kate chikepikte ellmaliele tapik netré misrep kKentraimpe.

65 Tѳm: Mámik netre mísrtrai chikepen ellarielane, tap untaarap, puremisrep aship kѳntrún, nu pirauaship, k'arup putrapelepe. Trek kѳntraimpe chiyutekucha latá ellmarik tapik misrep kѳntrai isumik kѳntrún, chi né ellmarѳp kualámelankucha, ushá mera tek'a emikwan, pipelem (piyau) ellmarѳp tek'a kѳmikwan, chikepikte netrѳ túsrmera ellkuamikwan, trúyu kutre chi né marѳp wesrup tek'a kemik, maymera, piuntsikmera, yamera latá, ashá marѳp, pirѳmera tranamikwan chikucha ké asamik kѳn.

64 Tѳm: Pirewan kuallip ellmarѳp misak merape,pirѳ tѳkar kѳntrai kѳn, nemuintiik kuik, seteele misrá kuallip asámik kuik. trá marѳp,kuallip, ellmarѳp kѳntrai. Nu pirau aship putrapelepe purukuntrai kѳn, trektѳwei kusrennep kemik wan latá, kuantre kemé chísh kѳmik wan latá, ya tekar waramik wan latá, chikepen eshekep kemik tekar, pesrekuimiik kasrakte warámikwan latá, chi pepámiwan latá. Mú chi ilésrkaikmik waminchip lliramikwan, latá ellmarik t'apik misriélan chútekucha t'ap yanep, penap kѳmik wan latá, chí ellmarielѳ t'ap mamik mísrtrai, kusrepele ashá purukuntrai pensrep, setemisrá chí né marѳp kemik purukumik kѳn. Kaakѳn ashá t'ap purukupentewei ellmarѳp, kuallip, misakmerape chí né t'ap misrielen, t'ap map, t'ap án aship, misaktáiklѳ esik waramik kѳntrai.

63 Tѳm: Misak mayaelѳ nemúikui mera teka kuiklan, t'apchik chikepen chull asamteele, trente trek kepelan, pek pek misakmerai nem mayá ele misrá kuallip kem pirѳ meran pinishimeté aship teka kuik, misak pirѳmeran, kallai pirau, manakutré ya palé

Truik wane yauele kepen, mayá misak kepen, Nu pirau asip karup putrapelepa misra urekwane pure tap aship kemik kѳn, chishtik nѳtrerantrai nѳm mánte kѳntrai wamintielan wentѳwei asik, tap ashaá chiyu kepen purukup marѳpelѳ kѳntrai. θyeklan maikkѳn ashmé, urekwan kalé marѳpelane, Táta karupelan, puleele ahsip karup putrapelankui eshkamik kѳntrun, meik kepen trek kalѳ máren ashape. Kaakѳnte urekwanwei pure tap aship netreranámik kѳn.

44 Tѳm: Shush urekmeran tѳkakuik srelmerape: θsik kal lawa netrerawa ameñintrai, ásr tapik tekar, tap mámik tekar, munchi mariele, chuik kuik asiele, meskai, usrí tѳkarkѳntrai kѳn. Meskalѳ, shush urekwan taremármete tapmai lincha putrap, tapmai wamap, tap aship untaarap, urek nepua maramteѳelantѳ mártrai asha karup, esheebaship, urek wamintiealan kucha tapmai kѳn,kasraktѳelѳ nѳtrerantrai. Mѳskalѳ keppe, urekwan chinchainte petemewei, mentrá trepeik wamap kemerá ichápetemeei, ásrwan maik kepen inchip ketre-ínchimewei, mek unan kuikui, ishuk une kuikui, chikui mermé urekcheelan,. kaik misakmera misrá, kemerá,metrep chip kemewei,ulep chip kѳmewei, urek kuik ashá nemui ásrwan trempeik kalѳ marѳp kemik kemen, mentrá urekbate linchá kasháramentrai aship puremisrep kemik kѳn.

43 Tѳm: Ishuk misak latá, mek misak latá chiyutekucha latáiklѳ kemik kѳn,chí marámikyu, chí tѳkakѳmik wan kucha. Ishuk misak kѳn mapte pure kaik inchip, kutrá áshchakѳn mamé teká kemik kemén. Ishuk misak kuantrik misrá uñen,: kape trawá kuantrѳ wapen, pure tap aship teka kemik kepen, chiteka mannamik kѳn chikarwan, chinchakѳn án mártrap kaimapelanbape nu pirau ashá karup putrapele ashá purukumik kѳntrún.

teѳkarmerane, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrikpe, mánte maramik wan aship kѳntrai, mánte maramik wan tamará ashchún, ishumpur kucha, mayaelepa mante maramikwan isup, asamik wan waminchip ashchai, aship karup putrapelepe, tasik tranikle kѳn..
7. Mayá elai purap, chikepik marámik pentrapyu meikte kucha teka kѳntrai puremisrámik kѳn, peksrik kepente nu pirau kal-laweik kuinkutre netreraninteele latá, nu pirau pintre wareik
6. Mánte marámik wan, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ aship llirap, mánte kѳmikwanpa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriklanpa, puremisrep kemik kѳn.
4. Puré pentrapelan wesrua neera, pentsraikle, chiyu kalѳ márene, katelé isua ashá yunemarámik kѳntrún, maik kemikupa, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriknukpa mánte mártrai chipik kepen.m

3. Kan paláte tulampá, linchá nemúinete, nú isua ashá wamintámikwan, eyankatíkte t'aik mik kѳntrún, tru kan paláte lint'amikupe mú ilesrkaikmik kѳntrún, chi-isua wamintámelan, kate mánte chi marámelan kusréwa eshkamik kѳntrún.

2. Pure pasrentrapikwan, wesrua neeram purukup, nu pirau karupikpa, nu pirau wesrua pensraiklepa, mayá misakwan chí marámikwan, payá chií kepen mártrap chipen purukup, nu pirau, maik kѳmikwan isua sѳtemisrá waminchip yunemaramik kepen, t'amarámik kepen, kan ketete karup, purukup lintámik kѳn.
40 Tѳm: Múte kucha truyu kal-laiknukele né isuaiklѳmisrep ampá, ketete lincha marameleyu teka kep, chikepik asámeleyu tekakep, isuikleyu aship intamik teka kѳn. Treewan marѳp kѳntraimpe eyamai kѳn:k
27 Tѳm: Nu pirau ashá k'arup putrapele tasik tranik kѳn kusrem purukumikwan, kusremikwan, payá asamikwan, mánte ashá eshk'amikwan ilesrk'aikmik kѳntrai tasik tranik kѳn.
25 Tѳm: Múte kucha pirѳ wan kuallá, ellmará, chí marínkui kape chíkepen nepua ashá kusrewaik kuakui chikepen marѳpik kemik kѳn.

24 Tѳm: Múte: kucha, nu pirauikpe trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳriknuk chúkatik kѳntrai chipen, chi ilѳsrkaikmiik llirap unamik tekar kѳn, kallaik pirѳyú mѳwan kepen wepíp, kepatrúp int'amik,inchá nu pirѳyu ketrѳmisrinkui, tsup tsumisrinkui int'amik.
