361 Tѳm: Chí purukumik án peñipikwan, Tepirѳmerá Munishpirѳmerayu, aship kѳntrai ámeran ketremaramik kemupene, tru ánwane tulishá esekawá pasrá, trúteka erésre purukumik tamará pilishá pasrá, Misak pirѳmera tamará pensraiklai asik, purukup kѳntrún, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳlik manchipen. Tru án tulisaiktekape, chíkepen kepikwan tamartrap, piránsrelmeran tap wesrap kemik, misakmera, puluwan warapelѳ pirnákish itremerákui, kape chinchá kepen urek kuantré misrmentrai, chiné me marámik, memalik yamera marѳp, memera penap, aship kemik, chí kuantrѳ kaik tap esik warentrai purukumik kѳn. Misak pirѳmera tamará pensrape, trúyu chimeráte mártrap isuá tamará pelielan, katekuchí palentrapelan metlik tamaliklan marámik kѳntrún, tap puraampep warámik.

Tap ashá karup kѳntrap, nu pirѳwan pirisaikle, Tepirѳmera, Munishpirѳmerayu chi kepen pensramkaik pentrapikwan, án martrap wesruinkui, kape truyu nu maymera warepen, trúan nika puraampamik kuinkui, kape piuyámera nika puinukkkui, shush piuyamera nika pumik kui tekarkepen, trúyu esekap púimpurѳѳ, án purukua ketamik kepikkua, trú án penikwane nupirauele ashá trúyu warapelaiasik, pirisaik pirauelei kucha ketremarik utamik kѳntrún.k
Incha Nu wam netewei mánte kѳmikwan, neasikte kucha kalѳkepen ashá wachip ashchapik kѳn, srape 380 temyu trénchipik kѳn:yante metrapsre 1886weisre Nu wam pѳrik tsupikwan isrentraiesekawa tratrán cha.

19 Tѳm: Srempalaikwan puremísrtracha, ama wamámelan ilesrkaik meelekѳntrai t'asik tranik kѳn, mútekucha ama wamamik wan isumiipe, ilesrkaikmik kemik kѳn, kante kui latá, yam kui latá, wamint'amik kѳn, chi nésia meratѳ kucha latá ilesrkaimeelѳ kѳntrainkѳn, trente trek kѳntrai wam wan pѳriknukpe.

18 Tѳm: Manakutre chí isupik kuikwan, mú purѳmisrimera, isupele kuikwan ilesrk'aikmiik kѳntrai tasik tranik kѳn, chikepen tapik netre isup, marѳp uniklѳkutre múkucha chinéte cha ashmentrún, k'ate chi isupik kuikwan waminchikemui kucha wamintek'aruik kemewei, trek martrap isuikmiikwan marenk'aruik kemewei kemik kѳntrún.
17 Tѳm: isretrakѳnmaméѳ, Misak mártrai wantewei, mentrá metratrawá trempé k'arup, upenanep, mánte kepente, mentrá k'aik inchip tek'a kѳmѳntrai ketriku merik pasrán.

Chinchakepen kuantreté misakmera, ásrwan ketre inchar kui, kape tur pesanteele shú misriele kuinkua, chinchá kuallá mantrap kaymapelѳ, chikucha chikaikle esik waramik nepuiklankucha, Nupirau ashá karup putrapele purukumik kѳn. Kuantreteelan inchippa kaik inchip kalѳ marѳp kepen mukepen ashape kerésrep, wachip puremisrá kalú keetѳntrai kѳn.

Yu Nupirau warapele, kaasik misakmera, mukucha isua asikmeele waachamera warapelan latá kѳmik kѳncha wamintiktѳ kemete, keepa trek kѳntrai aship kemik kѳntrai Nupirau ashá karup putrapele purukua aship kemik kѳn.

13 Tѳm: Trek kѳntrai cha wamwan perínuk mútekucha kal-lapikpe latá kemik kѳn, karupelelatá puremisrep tap wamap chiwántekucha tap tekakumik kѳntrai, ketrikuele ilesrkaikmiik latá isuyap, ishuk mek chí waminchipik kuákucha, pek pek misak kuákucha, chuik kuákucha, srembalaikwan memai isupik kuákucha, chi isua waminchipik kuákucha ilesrkaikmeele kemik kѳn.
12 Tѳm: Múnkucha trantrá kemerá será sruá ampá misakkemuik lateik tsalѳ wamap, ketreínchip, trempeik marѳp kemik kaantrún..
11 Rat Tѳm: θsik kѳmikwane múkucha purepunap, itepuniamewei kѳntrún, kueetsamikpe kaatrún.
Trattre warayupe: Nupirau misakmerá mútekucha mepurap chikepen mánte marámik, mánte linchá amenámikwan setemisrá puremisrep, purukup kѳmikwan eshkapik tekaik kѳn.

Pip warayupe: Chiyukepen kalѳ mariele pentrapelan, meimei puremisra purukua t'amártrai múkucha ashipele IM Es Er Sѳ kѳntrai kѳn. Mukucha chi teká kѳmikwan tekar kѳn, mú kalé marikwan trekte kepashme, t'amará pishinte waramik kѳntrai, nántekui, seteelan kuinkui, mayaelan kuinkui, péte yast'aumerayu puleele ashá kerésrep wachipele meimei purmisra purukuntrai.

Pѳn tratrayupe, seteelai pѳtekatan chikepen kepelan meiktekucha latá palapik kui ashá, tap ashá untaaramikwan pѳrik tekaik kѳn. θyek chine tapik teka kѳmikwan isuik tap puntraimpe aship karup putrapelelata, nupirau kal-lawar misak warapelelatá, ampekutre ikutre isua waminchatewei maramik kѳntrun. Treek kѳntraimpe, misakmera pure nu isua purukup, puremisrep kemik kѳntrún, seteelai kui merá teka kѳn, iklema: Chikepen penapiklata, yanepiklata, selwan tap yanep tap penap selwan marѳp kѳntrai. Chikepik, nemuikatan kepikwan, pirѳmeran, pimeran, kaumeran, isik isrikwan mintishimewei, patsѳkemewei tap teka kémikwan, chikepen marѳp ampeppe, yanaweiasik isua, patsekemúmikwan chi yellwantekucha puremisrep kemik, chikepen keramteelane ashipte kateramik, chikepik mayaele llirap kuiklan tap aship teka kemik kѳntrun.

Trektewei, mánte kѳmikwan, teka kѳmikwan, esik warappe ureklata, kellielelatá, kuallipelelatá, kusrepelelatá, ishukmisaklatá kuantreteelelatá, misakmeralatá, mútekucha tapmay pureasiap esik waramikwan waminchipik kѳn.
Chikepikte teka kѳmikwane t'apkui ashá, t'ap teka kѳntrai, chiwánte misakmeran palentrapkui ashá, teka kѳntrai chipik kѳn.

Pa tratrayupe mayaele linchá kémikwan, chi teka kѳmikwan, manakutré teka kuiklan waminchipik kѳn. θyek tekape mutekucha mánte linchá misaataik warámikwan waminchip lliramikwan, eshkapik kѳn. Ik tratrayupe: Kuallip, chine tap marѳp, mayá misak chí isume tap warámikwan tasik traniap, chine sreik nepua asam kusremikwan, wam purekutsiap tap ellmarѳp teka kѳmikwan waminchipik kѳn.
θsik kemik kepen, misaat'aik chi ilesrkaimiik kѳmik kepen, chiyútekucha mépa kepen latá lint'amik, chí isuiklan waminchip, eshkámik kepen, teka kemelepe.

Kan tratrayu: waminchippe chiné teká kem srelmerá waminchipik kѳn, kaakѳn trek kemupene, lata lincha esik waramikpe kaakѳntrap Kuimpa. θyek chiné teká kem srelmerane mukucha kal-laptѳweikѳn tѳka kal-lawarkѳn, trek kuik keppe áshme, merme kemete mei meinte aship marámik kѳn..

Ikupe 85 temmera kepen, trúyu trátre wará urek pirishá eshk'apik kѳn, máichiktekѳn chi tek'a kѳmikwan, chi isup waminchípele kuikwan, manak'atik trénte treek tapele tek'a amtruikwanpa, tru Kanketete lata puraasiap, purukuyap kѳmikwan termarѳp pentrá
II. CHI TθKAKUIKLAN, CHI MARAMELAN, CHI PURθMISRθP TASIK TRANAMELAN
10 Tѳm: Nupirau aship karupelelatá, maya misaklatá, pirau trénte chí képelan, misak chí aship, isup teká kuiklan piníshimete ampekutre ikutre puremisrámik kѳn.n
8 Tѳm: Nupirau aship k'arupelelatá, maya misaklatá, pirau trénte chí képelan, misak chí aship, isup teká kuiklan piníshimete ampekutre ikutre puremisrámik kѳn.

3 Tѳm: Mu chi tamkaik marѳp teka kumikpe, maya misakmerai kѳn, trúyukutre aship karup maramele netré kal-lan. Misakmerape nem aship marinkui kape wesrua pure pesraiklѳtѳka marenkaruinkui, mánte kemik Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai perínuk manakatikwei maik chipik kepen..

Nupirau ashá karupelepe, mayaele trúyu warapelan purukup, puremisrep misaataiklѳ kѳntrai pensraiklѳ kѳn, esik waramikwan, mú purѳmisrimérá isupelekuikwan, chí kepikte tekakuílan chí ilesrkaimiik kѳntrai, trek mártrai mayaelan aship karup putrapele latá, misakmera nѳѳreelѳ latá trekwan isua martrún.

2 Tѳm: Nupirau ashá karup putrapele isua maramikpe: mayaelan ashá purukup, chi tѳka kѳmele tapik ¡sua pѳlpasrá marѳp kemiku tapmay tasik tranik purukup kemik kѳn, kilkayu Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai pѳrik ketremisrikwan ashá, mayaelѳ latá kalѳ marmé esik warentrai, kal-llawa wareinuk, chí tekakuiklan, ¡sua wamintiklan, kalé pumentrai Ketriku asam purukumik kѳn, mepa pirѳ kuimpurap miskanpa mara latá puremisrep tsentate latá tapmay kuayamete pishínte linchá esik warapele kѳntrai..

1 Tѳm: Nu pirѳ, k'antelateik tamarikyu mutekucha misak sun waramik chiné tek'a kemik kѳn, isua aship, chí misakmerai pirѳ pirisha tamarik mepurap kuimpurap nѳmte isua marámik kep, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ k'arupelepa chí misakpatekucha tasik pepiyap, k'an ketete purukuyamik kep, chikepikte maramik kep, pureasamik kep, mayaelaiasik mananakk'atik pure punikmiik tap kѳntrai.
Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai cha pѳrik pure nuik metrap pasrepen, mu itepunam kaik kuik asamik. θyamay tamarik kѳn.k
Nemui, nemui isup pek pek misak, warapele nemte nѳtre isua chiné marépele kuiklan kalѳ kepachimete warámikwan.

Kampákutre chine tápik marѳp teka amtrupele kuikwanpa, trektewei ik pirau, trénte chi teka kuikle, Pisúmera, netre pikukmera, tunmera, netre parentsikmera, misakpe pishí maráte lliraiklan unt'aarap t'ap aship tѳka kѳmikwan.
Mayá misakweipure chiné marѳp, karup, aship pentrapele, ashipte isúatѳ maramikwan.

Ik kan parikyú pelpasra perík, waminchipmentáppe, chimeráte tѳka kémik, chite marѳp teka kémikwan, isua tamará misak mánte esik warámik, chinchákepen tap linchá warámik, mayaele nupirauele karup kѳpelѳlata, kape nemuy, nemuy misak erésre warapelѳlata tap warámikwan waminchip eyamay pirishá pѳrikle kѳn:

Nupirauele trúyu kal-lawa misak warapele mú manchintrai kaik, mayá misak misrá tul ampa pertrai karuá pensrá, Srempalaikwan puremísrtra cha, mépa pirѳ Kuimpurap mayaele chíkuinkucha mur isua kan palate linchá pishinte esik warentrai, chí marámele teka kѳntrai, kalѳ pupen wachip, chí asielan ilesrketrámame chí isume tap waramikwan, petekatán támara sѳtѳ pѳnsra pѳlikwan, kan ketéte isuiklan purukuyap, chí tѳka kѳmikwan trek kѳntrai tasik traná, muná pirausrenkatik isua purukuyantrap misrá, eyeekwan pete punemetѳ martrai cha.
NU WAMWAN TREK KθNTRAI ISUA PθRIKWAN, MISKAI WANPA MAMTθ NAMTRIKMAI PθRIK
Mayaelan, mayakѳn unkua..

Namuimpe ik pѳrik trupa tapik pun. Tap puppe misakwei kampa wammeran kateyuk iselatra pentramisra tap kѳn, sreik may kureplataik, misak chikui merep, chukui merep, pure nu isuik pentrapikwan isua latrepichip mentuk pasramisran.

Kate nu pirau maya misak warapelai kee pѳrik ketremisrmen, mamelete pera waram nepun, wapurapsre arhuacѳ taikleba, wayumera taikleba, yu ipurapwansre machikmeraba, namisakmeraba, wallipurapsre, sibundѳysreele, ingamera, camétsamera, nu kauumpusreele cubeѳmera misakmerai trente, ikle katekuchi nu waminchip misak nu basrapik kѳncha truik lante perenkarua, kate an kucha nekemecha, mu pertrapteele, misaktewei kusrepele kaakѳncha tru kutre eyante nepua perenkarun. Wente tsentate chincha kepen katekaneleba kucha pera asamik nepuntrap inchap mu trek balai incha isua amtrupene.

Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikwan ketriku pure erik keme basramisran, mamte misak mante kemik, mante tap lincha esik waramik, misakmerai purap mante wamwan, pirѳwan, maik kѳpelѳ kuikwan waminchipikwante pepua pѳrik ketremisran. Trenkepen pip pinsh mentra temmera pure erik ketremisran, tru kutrempe wente maik balѳpen kate peramik, may marik lataik ketremisran.
Truikpe, kusrennepelaikui, kusrep urek weikui wamsrelwan baya kusrepelaikui tap kѳntrap kѳn katekuchi tamarѳp ambamik misakmerai wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik wamwan.
Truk pѳrikwan, puleele maya nu isua lula pѳrikwan ashchai, kateyuk puletrikmai kepente misak isuimai pure era perenkaruik srapekate, mante nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik ik kilkayu kienamisrtrun.

Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik wan misak wammerayu pure ertrap, termartrapele lam nepun, misakmera isuik wamyu, maik kѳpelѳ kuikyu kalѳ keme tap wamtewei puntrai, mana chi nu pera asikme wammran, ka lame mey pertrapn inchiptekua, eyek mey, wammeran baya kusremik nepupen pule trikmay, chi kutre, chincha, chukutre, srelmera pentretasha asha latamara pensrep ambamik pupen, pule trikmay pera wariele kilka merayu lap, puleele wattsan kusrepelan pera baip, aship, isup kepte, chikui mera, misak wammeramai pera pensra, eyeklan ma: chi kepen teka kemik tekar kemik, trek kѳntrai wamwan pѳrik, nu pirau ,karupele, misak truyu kal-laweik, ne isuaik, kan ketete karup kemik. Munawansre manasrekutre, wamsrelmera puleele tekakuiklan. Griegestaikle, latinestaikle, kape mu pekmera chincha kepen balainkutre wammera kal - lanna tekar, peramik balewakui, pishimarѳp kemik balewa kui, srembalaikwan isua waminchip kemik kui, wachip kemik kui, chiwei kepen balai misakmera manakutre wan kal - lanna pentrai kepik kua truyukutre metratrawa pѳrikle kepen. Trunun asha isua pure eramikpe yana lincha waminchip warewa, misakmera maik isup basrapik Kuikwan tap baya asha misakmerai wam srelmerayu latá mara tamara tap puntrai tamarѳp ampik kѳn. Meiklepe nemui yameran ¡sua truyukutre srelmera basrai mera isupen, katekanelepe nemuy asryukutre srelmera pentraimera isua peren, meiklepe nemui srembalawansre isuikyu basraimeren, incha ketriku peren, truikpe kan nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik ketriku sreik tsumiran.

Meilepe chap mara mayaelan eshkapen misak chikui, mante kui mertrap kaimapene, kateyuk pelpasram misran. Pa pelyu papelyu nu ketraksre nampa tulampam misran, setemisra nemuisre, nemui nemui pѳrik kalѳkui sekui, setemisra wamincha tap purukuntrap..

Tru maramikwan karuiklepe, mante isua asha wammera trupielan lap sreikte isua nemarѳp perep ambamikwan, yamele lincha isup perep ampik, kalѳ, kui selkui putrená, chine wam lap keppe, pila mentra lulam nepun.

θyek wan maramikpe, k'ak'a chinchainte k'a pa wam waminchipik kepte wanena maramtik kemete, murik kepen, misak trikmai pure eram purukuntrapele, pule wamwan nu ashipele, incha misakmerai wamwan kucha nu asha purepele lawa pensram misran, k'ante kemete yamele tulampa isua memay mante puntrap kui ashá isua tamara pera pure ertrai. Truiklepe, wamwan tsalla ashipele, kusrenanepele, memarѳpele, k'ape metrap pentrena isum purukupele, mukepen puleelai wamwan nu nepua ashipele, misakwei wamwan kucha nu ashipele chi yu kepen, e peksre misak kusrepele mames taiklѳ, kellielѳ, merepele, taitamera, pishimarѳpele pek pek chikepen nu isupelepamisra martrap isuikѳn

Trek kepen, Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik wan misak wammeramai pure eramikpe, pure nuik keppe pure yap pasramisren, puletrikpa, misak isuiklepa ínchen kepen pure nu kalѳ puntrait'amap, nu isupente, ka mara ashchap purukuntrap kѳtremisrik kѳn.

Marik metrap srape pilawan, 1991 wei Nupirau asha karup wapikwei petekatan asha wachip, keresrep kѳntrai putrenniele. Nu ketraksre, nu kusrennik yau (Universidad de lѳs Andes) pek pek misak merai wamsrelmera maik pasrapikwan isua asha perep kemik kusrentrai purukup aship mekapikpamisra putrѳna isuik kѳn. Misakmera truyu peram kusrenanikle kusrepelan nemui nemui chi wamwan asha kusrewa perep kepelan Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik wan purertrai karua purukuntrai, wesrua pensrentrai chipen, encha ketremisrikkѳn, kuchi kerikepente, kaakѳnte yu kusrewa pѳrep kѳpelѳpe manakѳn puleelai wamwan pѳriklan pure eram kusrenaniele kemete, misakwei wamsrel maik pasraikwan trúnun memai peramte ketaship, misakmera isuik wamwan. Umpúsrekatuk mante kuitashchap, trúnun tsallip, wetepeñipte melapele kepen, kusrep putrapele latá, kusrenanepele latá, wamsrel wante lawá tsalla ashipmelapele latá.
PEK PEK WAMMAI PURθRTRAI, TASIK KEPASRθPIK PθRIKm
Namuy misakmerá, kusrennepelan, perámikyu purukuntrai wesrua pensraiklan kucha, mayakѳn unkua unkua. Nan ker, tulampa isua pѳrѳp sѳtѳ

θyek pѳrikwan nam misakmeran mayaele chull asam kusreimpe ketan, tsentate kucha, kanchik kanchik perep, aship mentappe kilka perielan ashipikte misrtrap mayampá, urekmera mey kutrapteele, misak isuikwan nepua aship kusrepele misrimpe mayakѳn tap kѳntrun wetesrempe nam misak nuik isuikwan ka palapaláte untaarameté purekѳn nu isupele kѳntrap. Namun, aship wapik srempalásrikwan kuchá, unkua chikún, kaakѳn newei eyek, isup waminchip, esik kѳntrai ellmará pensraikle ker..

Katekan purappe namtrikwan katekuchí, nuranep, perep aship intamik isua pѳrik kѳn, kaakѳnte misak wammerpe, mey eyá palásrepe, chap pesannap amtruik pasrepen, kellielai wammerá, yante mú meramkaik lataik pesannaikle kepelan, lawá teka pѳrikle ketremisran, kaakѳnte puletrikwan nampe purѳ nú keera teka waminchipele misrik kua, inchen ik pѳrikpe ketriku namtrikmai marѳp pѳrik kѳn..

Manakutré yu Nupirau kal-lawá warapele kucha, Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikwan nam trik mai lameté pure erá kѳnamartrap, tratre lesrel pilámera batsépensre (500 añѳs despues). Ik pѳriktekape mayaelan namuymai isuik nuik basrapikwan, kerésraikle, waasicele nam mánte kutre tapmai puaampep waraikwan, puleelaiwan perimbalate tamará trubaláte nam chikepikte teka kѳmikwan, chi marámikwam, pera tratrap. Nu pirѳ erésre pek pek misakmera warapeleba tapmai pishinte lincha misaataik esik waramikwan isua.

θyektewei kѳn, chi misakmera tekucha, pekmaiele kep ,isup waminchipele, Nupirau pule misakmera lataiktѳwei chi teka kѳmikwan aship, chi maramikwan kante isupele nemuipurap tѳkar kѳmikwane ashá untaarapele kѳntrai.n

Namui, nemui wamwan pure eriktewei, mánte kutre kuik chi kutre kuikwan ter nepua aship waramtik puntrun, trenkemuisruantepe, katekan kilkameran lat'awei, ka mentá t'aremarik ka trerap ketremisrtrun. Chi chipikkui mermewei ashmewei intik.

Mánte kemik, nu wamwan namuitrikmai perá pure erep, k'atek'anelai wamaikuchá pѳrikpe, trupa nu tap kѳntrun k'aakѳn namui, nemui purapelan nepua aship, k'ate wentѳ tap aship kѳmikwan, tamará tratrá kemik kѳntrún.

Chi kepen eyekle puntraimpe, misakmerá isupelekua, waminchip ameainkutre kѳn, eyekle puikpe isua kemteele kѳn, inchentekuchá nu palan, nam misak maik isuik, tre teka kemikpe latá tap lincha waramikwan purukup, chiné tap teka warámikwan purukup, chi kepik teká kuikwan misak petekatan chikepik tapikwan mintishimé tap teka kѳmikwan purukup indikle kѳntraimpe.m

Tru metrap mánte kemik, Nu wamwan pѳlikpe, kan lametѳ kѳn, pek misakmerai purapwanwaminchimik kepen, meimpé yu nupiraupe pek pek misamerá yauiktewei kѳncha wamintan, truikle kuchá yante nem mánte warapele kuikwan, wamwan, chiwantekacha katekuchí tapte warentrai chip.

θyekle pup mentepen, misakmerá, meikle isupele kepikkua, lincha kante isua, yante kan ishik perel srel perel pinsh kan pila pupen, mánte kemik sreik tamártrap waminchip kutra, sreik malik kѳn, treencha chikepen kalѳ pentrapelan tamarѳp, katekuchí chi isumѳ maramtik kep atrún, yante malikle chitekѳn sreite lataik kѳntrai, metrap pilámerawantaik .

Nu piraupe métrapsrenkutré, ke chinéte, tap kemiik pup atrik kѳn, inchen misakwan kuchá, yante chiyukepente kalѳ pupen, chiyutekucha asik kepen, mayá tamártrap isup kuinkucha, Karup aship putraiknuk kutré yante kaimaik kѳn.

Kan ishik lesrel letsé pinsh parelweisre mánte kemik Nu wamwan pѳrikpe, tru mepurapwante mánte aship kѳmikwan, nemte isua mánte kѳmikwan, karupele kѳmikwan, chiwante kucha né isua, chiyutekucha, kante lataik kѳnamarѳp, karup, marѳp kѳntrap ,isua purukuntrai pѳrik kuik kѳn. Inchente mey eyampe, chitekucha pekmaite yunemarѳp, sreikte katekan misaktaik netrerap amtruiknukpe tru pѳrikpe ke pekmaite pun, tru chikepikte netré aship, netrѳ kusrep, sreikte weteketrap amtruiknuk, muná pirѳmerawánsre Kuchá.

T pirau, mú misaktekucha, kan paláte mepurap llirap warampurapwan, latá lincha warapele, nem mayánkatik nepuá isua tap warampurap, lincha warap chiteká kѳmikwan latá, chi isup teka amtruik wan latá, trente manakutré chi puraip atrupiku, asiknuk terkante kѳnamarik pasran, mante, tap linchá waramikwan, eshkantrápik kan may tamará tratrá kemik palai merepele kuik, kanuinte kuilatá, mayaelai purap kuilatá, nѳm maik isuik maik kѳpelѳkuik trekwan isua..
Misak isuikpa, nupirau mánte kemik Nu wampa.
Guambía, Sre pel kepipte 1993
TATA KARUPIKWEI WAM
Ñimuyasik, i pѳrikpe, wenteweiasik, kan kachull lat'aik kѳn, chí kepen palepen, trúteka mánte kѳmikwan, t'apik isua, marѳp kemik, eyek t'apik pѳrik ñim utáncha kermete trencha tranar.

Trénkutré katekucha trenchintrap, kilkáyu pureera pѳrik ketremisrepikpe Nuwamwan trek kѳntrai isua pertrai sresre karuá putrenniele suik musik latik kѳn, pure mur srel tamarik ketremisran. Mute kucha, Nupirau, misaaktaik esik llirap amenámik latá tekar ker, lentѳyu, pishinte tap llirap linchip ampekutre ikutré pureasiap, wentesre mayaelan pesr latá pilekaik ameñintrap.

Trek kutré, misakmerai wam mai pure erá pѳrikpe, yante kaaka pue erikte kemete, pek pek misakmerai umpú manásrekutré mánte kѳmikwan isuk pentrapikwan, nemará támara pѳrik kѳnamisrtrun, katekuchinkѳn terte nepua meramteik.k

Mayaelai malau, Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳlikwan, misakmerai wammai pѳliklan ñimún tranamikpe kaaka keme pertrapteelan lawá karuikle kѳn, nemui nemui, mur isua, mur lulá, malikle, manásrenkutre ele misak nu kusrepele nu isuikle kѳpelѳ esekaik lataik pasrapikwan, wetetrawá perá purepensraikle ketremisran, namún mayaelai nu purukuntrun, yu Nupiau, kan ketete pishinte linchá, mánte esik tap pure ampep warapele kuikwan seteelepa nepua ashchap.
Trenkatik kalѳ isup, misakmerá kuitamatan, trénchipele, Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳlikwan, misak merá nemuy tlikmai perá pure elikpe, nu wampe kuaik lataik ketremisrtruntan.

Mey kualem yu nupirau, mayaelai chi kepikte, sreik pelpasran. Mayaelai, mantrau pesriik pup puraip pasrapik kuik, meimpe lamé pesre pureerep k'asrakemtik lataik, kuchí ketre isrѳnk'arup, setemisrá pure mur isua, trúnun tamará mártrap pentramisrikkua. I nu pirau mayaelai asik, chi ilesrk'aikmik sreik may kurik tsuntrai, múnkucha wente pasrmente, mayá waacha misakmerá latá, tiuskuik teká misakmerá latá, mur isupele latá, ketrѳteele latá chiwantekucha kekete latá asamik kѳntrai, maik kѳmikwan, sel marѳp llirap kѳntrai, mún pinap kásremete, kétrikuelan latá pinepultrai. Pek pek misak, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ, nem kucha nemuy wammai, nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrikwan, pek pek nemuintrikmai kѳntalele perá kѳna mártrapkѳn.
I Nu pirau, maya misakwan mante kѳmikwan, isua tamará pertrai mayaele misra karua pensraikle, chap perá pure erep kualem trenchar.
Maya misakmera:
NU KARUPIK WAIKNUK KUTRE PθRIKK

Piremerá mѳwantekui aship, karupele chite marѳpelekuik aship, misakmera mántѳte isupkuiklan aship, chikepikte cha perielan namtrikmay ashchap, Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikwan. Treek kѳntrai perielan, kerésraiklan, watsielan, kuteke ashípelekuatewei misaataikle tappa mayaele linchá esik kualmáp, tap mawap puraampamik kѳntrún.

Trúkutre, puleele, trekmay eyek nuik chine períkwan, nam misakmeraipurap waminchipikwantekei namtrikmay balábalátekucha perá purertrap. Kaakѳn meimpe nam misakmerai wamkucha nutriktѳwei kѳn. Urekmeran wamintamik, peramik kusrentrai chipik pѳrik ketremisrik kepen, urekwan mante esik puraambamikwan, mánte kѳmikwan, chi teka kѳmikwan perá asenkarúmik.

θyeek kui kutre maya misak yu nupirau warapelѳ nepua ashá kemik kѳn, mánte kѳmik, mánte esik waramik kѳn cha, netre pera warielan. Kaakѳn tru perieleteka námtewei ashíppate melepen kѳntrún, keepa tápikwan marép kѳmikwane.n

Mánte kѳmikwan pѳrikwane, wenté maik kѳntrapikwan trek kѳntrai cha kateѳyúk perátѳwei t'amarámik kѳntrún, inchen misakmerakucha waráik kuikkeppe truiklekucha eshkap, aship, waminchip, purukúmik kѳntrún. Kaakѳnte mei aship, karup putrámikpe, latá kanketѳtѳ aship kemik t'aik kuikkeppe, trúkutre nammisakmera aship, waminchip, linchip pureasinkui, kape pentramisra isua waminchapele wesrua pensrainkui int'amik kѳn.

Trúikle putrѳna támara yunemará períkkua, mánte kѳmik, trek kѳntrai Nu wamwan pѳrik ketremisreppe, keepa Nu pirau maik kaik puraip pasraik ashá, misak chi palainkui ashá trúnun tamártrap isua mayaelemisra karuik pѳrik ketremisrán.m

Truiklepe, pek pek misakmera, pek pek marѳp lincha llirapele, nemui nemui ashá wesrua pensrán: Kau umpú, tsik nik'a llirapele, yante kuayamete tap lincha warentrap cha, Nu pirau aship k'arup putrapelepa tasik tranar, ashá wesrua pensrep, Misakmera ashá wesrua pensrep, setepa tamártrap isup misakmerate wesrua pensraiklekua nuik isua peramik nepun.

Treek trempeik temallip pasraik kutre, trúsrѳ trúsrѳ waacha misakmera kepen, kusrep putrap, urekte misakmera kepen misra, perá mayaelan waminchip kutrá, trawakuchip trawakuchip purukupen, Nu pirau maya misak warapelepe mú manchintrai kaík kutrá pentramisrá nemun, mayaelan pure waminchapele, metrapsre pѳrik tsupikwan, isua tamará yunemartrapteelan wesrua pensrentrap isuik kѳn. Kaakѳn tru metrapsrenkutre Nu wamwan tѳka amtruikpe yante chiwei purukumiik kepen.k
Trúnne Nu pirau mayá misak warapelane chiyútekucha pure trempeik nepup atrik kѳn .

Treek kutre, katekate metrap treek kѳntrai pѳrik Nu wamwan, nuketraksre tulampa treek kѳntrai wamwan perep putrapelelat'a, kate netre watsam kusrepele tulampa putrapelelat'a, nemte yunemara t'amarép mere inchá chinchakucha kaimaik kѳn.

Múkepen tappaik isupikkua, tamártrap tapmai wam lap, sel isua tápik mártrap waminchip amtrupelane pellák wamap, pinishintrap cha kuarésrep, treek taik wamtekeme, keepapiniship, kueechip kepen. Inchen, mukucha mur pasrená, tapikwan perá martraptiik kaakepen. Nu pirau, karupik nete pasrena, chi kalѳ pentrapelan tamártrap inchá, netré waminchá, perá wará, chinchá kaimapen intan, kaakѳn manakutre kalé marielepe memaykucha tamarámkaik kѳnamisrep atrik kѳn, i “Nu pirau mayaelai kapyu.”

I Nu pirau misakmerá mei eyambalasre ketré murik nepuinap waramik nepupen, chi chakepen kuayam lap, chinéte kalé pup atrupen, netrѳé puleelante tulamba trek kѳntrai wamwan perep putrentrai wesrua putrennielekucha keke chi tap martrap kemete, anmeran kalѳ marѳp, misakwan chi purukup puremisramelan ashmete, ka mayaelan nemuinkatete srua kѳntrap, chine upenanep perkuchipkeba isua marѳp kebaampen.

Mánte kemik Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikpe yanakatukweiasik tamará pѳrik ketremisrik kѳn. Chinchákepen wente sreik tamará yunemarámnekatuk. Trek kepikkua tru ishik lesrel lepinsh parelweisre (1886) mánte kemik, Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳrikma mei eyampalasrenkatuk, puleelai asikte pure waminchipik pѳrik kepik kuik kѳn, kaakѳn métrapsrempe pekmay kepikkua, kate misak kutre puné pekmay kuik kutre, meimpe nupirau mayá misak warapelai asik pѳrik kѳn.

Trúkutre, misakteweimpe katekánelan tap esik llirap kѳmikwan, chi teka kem srelmerankucha pѳrikwane, pinepunamik kaakѳntrun, trek kalѳ marѳp kualempe, tru Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai pѳriktekatewei mur watsamik nepuntrun, kaakѳn nѳtewei múnkucha puremisrep, kalѳ maren wachip inchapik tekaik kua..
Trek chippe Nupirau asha karupele latá, trek kѳntrai tulampa perep putrapele latá, mú mentaik múkucha katekanpe purepunamik, kape kalѳkѳn cha sreik pera martrap chip kѳntrai kemén.n

Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai pѳrikpe, Nu pirau mayaele misak warapele trunun mertrai kѳn, trúnun mermiikwane netewei wachipik kѳn, k'aakѳn mayaelai keppe pure nuik wamincha pѳrik kѳn, pure tap wamwan puleelaiwan mayaelaiasik kѳntrai pѳrik kѳn, inchawei pip temyu trenchipik pasrán Ik Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai pѳrikwane mú itepunemewei, k'atek'an sreik itepasrtrai kemewei kѳn cha.

Nu wamwan treek kѳntrai isua pѳlikpe, misakmera setemisra putrѳna mánte esik lincha warámikwan, mánte kѳmikwan, mánte karup aship kѳmikwan ketlikú isua wamincha ketremalik, trúnun pѳlik kѳn. Nupirau aship karup putrapele chi kalѳ mármentrai aship kѳmikwan, mayaelan tap kѳntrai, kate chikepikte mayaelai purap asamik kepen, tap lliramikwanpa.

Trektewei munáwansre pulemisakmera netre warapele, netre pirѳmera t'amará pensrar, ik nam waraik piaraulat'awei, manakutre mayá misak pasrapikwan nemui munáwansre mánte linchip t'apmay kѳmikwan, kape nemui, nemui karup aship, mayaelan teka kѳmikwan asha tekarkua, treek kutre chiyutekucha mayaele misra t'ap aship, t'ap marѳp purukup kѳmikwan pera tekar kѳn, treek kutre mánte kѳmikwan pѳrikpe, “Nu wamwan trek kѳntrai isua pѳrik” t'aik kѳn
CHIKUTRÉ NU WAMWAN ISUA PθRIK
ba balѳpe pulѳtrikmai
Treetewei chí kusrémikwan, múnkucha pinap kusrentrai kemewei, shush urekmeran mánte aship teká kѳmikwan, katѳ chutekucha kusréntrap pelpasreppe treek tѳwei patsekamne katuk ashá purukumik kѳntrún.

Truik wane yauele kepen, mayá misak kepen, Nu pirau asip karup putrapeleba misra urekwane pure tap aship kemik kѳn, chishtik nѳtrerantrai nѳm mánte kѳntrai wamintielan wentѳwei asik, tap ashaá chiyu kepen purukup marѳpelѳ kѳntrai. ѳyeklan maikkѳn ashmé, urekwan kalé marѳpelane, Táta karupelan, puleele ahsip karup putrapelankui eshkamik kѳntrun, meik kepen trek kalѳ máren ashape. Kaakѳnte urekwanwei pure tap aship netreranámik kѳn.

44 Tѳm: Shush urekmeran tѳkakuik srelmerape: ѳsik kal lawa netrerawa ameñintrai, ásr tapik tekar, tap mámik tekar, munchi maliele, chuik kuik asiele, meskai, usrí tѳkarkѳntrai kѳn. Meskalѳ, shush urekwan taremármete tapmai lincha putrap, tapmai wamap, tap aship untaarap, urek nepua maramteѳelantѳ mártrai asha karup, esheepaship, urek wamintiealan kucha tapmai kѳn,kasraktѳelѳ nѳtrerantrai. Mѳskalѳ keppe, urekwan chinchainte petemewei, mentrá trepeik wamap kemerá ichápetemeei, ásrwan maik kepen inchip ketre-ínchimewei, mek unan kuikui, ishuk une kuikui, chikui mermé urekcheelan,. kaik misakmera misrá, kemerá,metrep chip kemewei,ulep chip kѳmewei, urek kuik ashá nemui ásrwan trempeik kalѳ marѳp kemik kemen, mentrá urekpate linchá kasháramentrai aship puremisrep kemik kѳn.
XIII. METRAP NU WAMWAN TREK KѳNTRAI ISUA PѳRIKWAN YUNѳMARIK
11 Rat Tѳm: ѳsik kѳmikwane múkucha purepunap, itepuniamewei kѳntrún, kueetsamikpe k'aatrún.

Pѳn tratrayupe, seteelai pѳtekatan chikepen kepelan meiktekucha latá palapik kui ashá, tap ashá untaaramikwan pѳlik tekaik kѳn. ѳyek chine tapik teka kѳmikwan isuik tap puntraimpe aship karup putrapelelata, nupirau kal-lawar misak warapelelatá, ampekutre ikutre isua waminchatewei maramik kѳntrun. Treek kѳntraimpe, misakmera pure nu isua purukup, puremisrep kemik kѳntrún, seteelai kui merá teka kѳn, iklema: Chikepen penapiklata, yanepiklata, selwan tap yanep tap penap selwan marѳp kѳntrai. Chikepik, nemuikatan kepikwan, pirѳmeran, pimeran, kaumeran, isik islikwan mintishimewei, patsѳkemewei tap teka kémikwan, chikepen marѳp ampeppe, yanaweiasik isua, patsekemúmikwan chi yellwantekucha puremisrep kemik, chikepen keramteelane ashipte kateramik, chikepik mayaele llirap kuiklan tap aship teka kemik kѳntrun.

Pa tratrayupe mayaele linchá kémikwan, chi teka kѳmikwan, manakutré teka kuiklan waminchipik kѳn. ѳyek tekape mutekucha mánte linchá misaataik warámikwan waminchip lliramikwan, eshkapik kѳn. Ik tratrayupe: Kuallip, chine tap marѳp, mayá misak chí isume tap warámikwan tasik traniap, chine sreik nepua asam kusremikwan, wam purekutsiap tap ellmarѳp teka kѳmikwan waminchipik kѳn.
ѳsik kemik kepen, misaat'aik chi ilesrkaimiik kѳmik kepen, chiyútekucha mépa kepen latá lint'amik, chí isuiklan waminchip, eshkámik kepen, teka kemelepe.

Kan tratrayu: waminchippe chiné teká kem srelmerá waminchipik kѳn, kaakѳn trek kemupene, lata lincha esik waramikpe kaakѳntrap Kuimba. ѳyek chiné teká kem srelmerane mukucha kal-laptѳweikѳn tѳka kal-lawarkѳn, trek kuik keppe áshme, merme kemete mei meinte aship marámik kѳn.
II. CHI TѳKAKUIKLAN, CHI MARAMELAN, CHI PURѳMISRѳP TASIK TRANAMELAN
Nu wamwan Trek kѳntrai cha pѳrik pure nuik metrap pasrepen, mu itepunam kaik kuik asamik. ѳyamay tamarik kѳn..
NU WAMWAN TREK KѳNTRAI ISUA PѳRIKWAN, MISKAI WANPA MAMTѳ NAMTRIKMAI PѳRIK

ѳyek wan maramikpe, kaka chinchainte ka pa wam waminchipik kepte wanena maramtuk kemete, murik kepen, misak trikmai pure eram purukuntrapele, pule wamwan nu ashipele, incha misakmerai wamwan kucha nu asha purepele lawa pensram misran, kante kemete yamele tulampa isua memay mante puntrap kui ashá isua tamara pera pure ertrai. Truiklepe, wamwan tsalla ashipele, kusrenanepele, memarѳpele, kape metrap pentrena isum purukupele, mukepen puleelai wamwan nu nepua ashipele, misakwei wamwan kucha nu ashipele chi yu kepen, e peksre misak kusrepele mames taiklѳ, kellielѳ, merepele, taitamera, pishimarѳpele pek pek chikepen nu isupelepamisra martrap isuikѳn
PEK PEK WAMMAI PURѳRTRAI, TASIK KEPASRѳPIK PѳRIKk

ѳyek pѳrikwan nam misakmeran mayaele chull asam kusreimpe ketan, tsentate kucha, kanchik kanchik perep, aship mentappe kilka perielan ashipikte misrtrap mayampá, urekmera mey kutrapteele, misak isuikwan nepua aship kusrepele misrimpe mayakѳn tap kѳntrun wetesrempe nam misak nuik isuikwan ka palapaláte untaarameté purekѳn nu isupele kѳntrap. Namun, aship wapik srempalásrikwan kuchá, unkua chikún, kaakѳn newei eyek, isup waminchip, esik kѳntrai ellmará pensraikle ker.m

ѳyektewei kѳn, chi misakmera tekucha, pekmaiele kep ,isup waminchipele, Nupirau pule misakmera lataiktѳwei chi teka kѳmikwan aship, chi maramikwan kante isupele nemuipurap tѳkar kѳmikwane ashá untaarapele kѳntrai..

ѳyekle pup mentepen, misakmerá, meikle isupele kepikkua, lincha k'ante isua, yante k'an ishik perel srel perel pinsh k'an pila pupen, mánte kemik sreik tamártrap waminchip kutra, sreik marik kѳn, treencha chikepen k'alѳ pentrapelan tamarѳp, k'atekuchí chi isumѳ maramtik kep atrún, yante marikle chitekѳn sreite lataik kѳntrai, metrap pilámerawantaik .
NU KARUPIK WAIKNUK KUTRE PѳRIK

ѳyeek kui kutre maya misak yu nupirau warapelѳ nepua ashá kemik kѳn, mánte kѳmik, mánte esik waramik kѳn cha, netre pera warielan. Kaakѳn tru perieletek'a námtewei ashíppate melepen kѳntrún, keepa tápikwan marép kѳmikwane.

Pek, pek misakmera ik Nupirau esik warapelepe, munáwansre pulemisakmera warapele latawei, memay mánte tap linchá kualmap, tap lincha mawap, latá pureasiap llirap, ampukutre ikutre purukuyap, chi marámikupe tasik pepiap, mánte maramteik ketaship waminchip, srena trumar chí marámelan latá isup, misak sun waramikwan waminchip manakutre nemui nemui tátamerakucha chi marámelan isup, karup, aship, pera marѳpele tѳkar, mánte misakta puraampep warámikwan wachip, kerésrep mayaelai metrap pasrená, chiyu kalé pumentrai, mánte tamarѳp ampámikwan isupele, manakatik trente treek marѳpesik warentrai kua.n
CHIKUTRÉ NU WAMWAN ISUA PѳRIK

Cristѳ nѳ maig kusrenaniilan unamig
isuin pasramig
kѳrik
srabe kwalѳmmera lutaurab kui asamig kѳnrrai mana asiimíig chigѳben kѳnrrabig
chigѳben nѳrrѳ tѳgagúilѳ
Cristѳn kѳrebelѳ kѳmibe chine tabig truba maramig, katѳ Tiusweinukkurri tabig arrubigwan utamig arrubb
kalѳ marilan yunѳ marikm
Tiuswei wamwan maya misagwei pѳrig
Cristѳn nebua asha srѳig kal lawa basraiba
tru k'aigwan trendѳ tѳga k'al laig kѳllig pasrabiiba
incha kelѳ
Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ ker chibendѳ, isapteelѳѳ
isa peemaytѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ
Cristѳn kan ashibig Tiuswei chi maramelan iglesiayu pera marѳb pasrabig
Cristѳn kѳrebelѳ Tiuswan mѳrmub kalѳ marene mѳrshey waminchip kѳn
Tiuswei wamwane Tius ѳyamay chinrrai isungaruben treeg pѳriilѳ kѳn
chigѳben trѳmbѳig kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig maliilѳ
Tius wami misaamera Clistѳn kѳrebelѳ nui asr kѳb lataig kѳn
kaigwan tѳga kal laig kaig marѳb pasrabig
Tiuswei ureemerak
kelѳ
Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Mѳikkѳben truba nuig kѳmmѳrѳ inchib waminchib pasrag kѳbene, Señѳrweimburappe mѳg inchib waminchib pasrѳbash cha..
mugucha Tiuswei merrab nѳrreelѳ misrѳb mѳg inchib pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai.

Yu pirau chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lataig tѳgagúigwan Tiusbe truigwan wesrawa basrig kѳn, tru purѳ nѳrrѳ kusrebelan kѳrig mara gѳrrѳmartrab. Katѳ yu pirau kwa gaizheelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagúilan Tiusbe truigwan wesrawa basrig kѳn, nѳrreelan kѳrig mara gѳrrѳmartrab..

Kaguende Tiuswei tru chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lataig asѳnabiibe mѳguelѳ purѳ may isua wamindi lataig kѳmѳtѳ, mas purab nuig kѳben, katѳ Tius tru itѳnaptiig lataig kuibe, kan mѳwei fuerzas lataikken gѳmѳtѳ, purab murikken gѳn.
Trune nambe Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ guer. Truibe judíѳsmeraimbe ke ka srurrengwangarubig kѳben, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraimbe ke chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindig, treeg kѳn.

Kaguende Tiusbe, tru nui muguen nebua kusremgaig kusrebig kuigu, yu pirau misaamerabe nѳmui tru purѳ nѳrrѳ kusrewa tѳgagúitѳgabe nun nebua ashmѳnrrai indig kѳn. Pѳs tru chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindig mara tѳgagúigwan eshkab kusrenaniitѳga nun kѳrebelane kaigyugurri wesramig, Tiuswane tabig asѳnaig kѳn..

Kaguende trenchibig pѳrig pasran: Purѳ gusreb mѳguelѳ chigurrimbunѳ nebua kusrewa tѳgagúilane pinisamѳnrrun cha. Kusrebelѳ nѳm chigúi mѳra tѳgagúilane chigucha gѳmíig mara kaasha kѳrrѳmaramѳnrrun chibigg

Kaguende nane Cristѳbe misagwan piu umbu ulsrѳb uñchai ѳrmѳtѳ, Tiuswei tru t'abig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanrrai ѳrig kѳn. Incha nabe waminchibgucha, nѳrrѳ wammeratѳga purѳ may waminchimur, Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwane chigucha gѳmíig kui lat'aig marig kѳmѳnrrai.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿Cristѳbe nuin gúi, nuin gúi misra basra chindah? Kabe ñimuyasig kurusyu kwanrrai mesrѳppe, ¿na Pablѳn mesraig kѳ chindah? Kabe ñimun piu umbu ulsrѳbgucha ¿nai munchiyu piu umbu ulsraig kѳ chindah?
Nai nunelѳ, mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Clѳéwei yauelѳbe nane eshkatan, ñimbe kwayam labrre waran cha.
Tiusbe nѳbe maig martrab chippe, treegwan marѳbig kѳn. Ñimbe nѳgurli wamiilѳ gúig kѳn, nui Nusrkai Jesuclistѳ namui Señѳrba lincha bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Katѳgucha srabegatig ñim kѳrrѳmѳ mur bѳnrrѳnrrai nѳbe tѳga basrѳnrrun, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳ gatѳ arrub gwalѳm chi kaig mariilѳ chigar bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Trumay Cristѳi tru srѳig tabigwan wamindiibe ka wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, ñimuinuube ciertѳn kѳrrѳmisrin gѳn,k
Kaguende chiyutѳgucha ñimbe nuinug purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai traniilѳ gѳn, kerrigu wamindigu lata, kerrigu nebua ashib ambigu lata..
Chu urastѳgucha nabe Tiuswane ñimuimburab ungwa, ungwa chibig kur, Cristѳ Jesúskurri ñimun Tius ka yandѳ tab indigwan tranikkurri..

Cѳrintѳsrѳ iglesiayuelan, Cristѳ Jesúskurri tru Tiusweyasig tarѳmariilѳ, nuyasiitѳ newan tabelѳ gѳnrrai wamiilanba, katѳ tru mayeelѳ chutѳgucha namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchiwan wamabelanba, truibe namuimba, nѳmuimba Señѳrwan..
Indiibe yandѳ pѳn bila puraiben, Jerusalénsrѳ nabe Pedrѳba waminchab ya, trusrѳ nѳba parru kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kur.
nui Nusrkawan na nebua ashchai kenamarig kѳn, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utu nuimburabigwan na eshkab kusrenanamig kѳnrrai. Inchen nabe tru urastѳ mu mѳwan paya mѳrmѳwei

Namui misag utu, naba guetѳtѳ nѳrrѳrawarwei utu mѳilan gѳben nabe k'anab gusrebig kѳbig kur, judíѳsmera Tiusweyasig maig maramelѳyube, k'aguende nabe merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamera maig marѳb amrruigwane maikken purѳbuniimíig kѳnrrai inchibig kѳbig kua.
Iigwan ñim, nai nunelan, wammѳrѳsrkѳnrrab inchar, tru t'abig srѳ wamwan na eshkab kusrenaniibe mѳguelѳ nѳmdѳ isua wesruigwan wamindikkucha gѳmѳn.
Pѳs nabe, kan mѳwan utig kѳmѳwei, katѳ kan mѳg kusrenanig kѳmѳwein gur. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nan Jesuclistѳ ashchai kenamaren, treeg utig kѳbig kѳn.

Namdѳwein gúi lata, kabe kan ángel srѳmbalasriig kui lata, tru tabig srѳ wamwan nam ñimun eshkab kusrenani lataig kѳmѳtѳ, katѳgan peemaytѳ yunѳmara waminchibiibe, managatig trѳmbѳig nebuig pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳbash..
Tabig srѳ wam katѳgan peg kuimba gѳmѳtѳ, mѳilѳgѳben ñimune ke ka ilѳsrkѳb, Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwane ke kan mumaygucha gѳmíig kѳnrrai mindisha bѳnsrѳg kѳb indan..
Truibe nam kaig mariilaimburab nѳashib kwanrrab pasramisrig kѳn, nam warain gwalѳm larrѳ gaig pasrabigugurri namun wesraig kѳnrrai, tru namui Tius Mѳskai maig kѳnrrain gѳben, trumay.
Pѳs ñimwein gѳn tru nam maya nuguen tab gúi mѳrѳb pѳnrramiba, nam k'asrag kui pѳnrramibabe.
Pѳs tru nam tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua munig melamiba, namui kasrag kѳbiiba, katѳ Señѳr Jesucristѳ arruben, nui merrab nam kan cѳrѳna lataig kanawa nam uta, purѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb pѳnrramibe ¿ñimwein gѳmѳtirru?

Namui nunelѳ, nam ñimba maya yana gѳsrѳn tarѳmisra, ashippe, ashmubendѳ, namui manrraube chu uraskucha ñimune pesannamѳ tѳga bѳnrrѳwa, ñimun malaugue ashchab amrrug kѳbiitѳ truba rruba inchib melaig kѳn.

Tru judíѳsmerabe Señѳr Jesúswan kweetsamba, tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kweetsamba, namune nѳmuinukkurri webetamba indig kѳbig kѳn. Incha truilѳbe Tiuswane tab gúi wanrrai marmeelѳ, maya misaameran ashig kѳmuingѳba inchibelѳ gѳn

Inchawei nambe chu urastѳgucha Tiuswan ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ guer. Kaguen tru Tiuswei wamwan nam waminchen ñim mѳrѳb uras, k'a mѳguelѳ wamindig kui lataitѳ mara utѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei wam ciertѳnig kuitamab isua utig kѳn ñimbe. Truibe tru ñim kѳrebelainuube k'a basrѳmѳtѳ, marig misrѳb pasran.
Pѳs ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, nambe ñimun mѳigwandѳgucha kan mѳskai nui uregwan waminchib lataitѳwei,
Tru estrellabe Ajenjѳ munchi gѳbig kѳn. Inchen pimera tru pѳnyu k'anun itѳbenimburappe, larrѳ rrѳmbѳ mѳbgѳlig misren, misaamerabe tru mѳb pimeragurri truba rruba nѳrrѳ gwabelѳ gѳn.
truyu ѳsig purrabelѳbe tѳbѳtag lutau chab gwaben, katѳ tru maryu barcѳmera maya kѳbiibe tѳbѳtag lutau chab pinabig kѳn..
Inchen tru ángel pagatѳ gѳnrrabyuig nui trѳmpetan urrѳbene, kan purѳ nu tun ѳrѳba naarab lataigwan maryu keguchene, marbe tѳbѳtag lutau ani misren,n
Inchen tru ángelesmera sieteelѳ tru siete trѳmpetameran sruarbe urrѳnrrab yandѳ tamara pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru may irrabig patig naguishba, Tiuswei misaamera tru nѳba wamindiilѳbabe Tiuswei merrab nebibig kѳn tru ángelwei tasigugurri.
Inchene ángelesmera sieteelѳ Tiuswei merrab pѳnrrai ashibig kur. Inchen nѳmune siete trѳmpetas tranѳbig kѳn.

Señѳr namui Tius, ñibe maya nuguen tabigwanba, tabig kui asha tab indigwanba, maramburab maramigwanba utambuawei utѳnrrabiibe ñi gѳn chib, kaguende chiwandѳgucha kerrigu ñi marig kuimba, Ñi treeg kѳnrrai isuikkurri treeg mariilѳ, treeg pѳnrran chib.
Tru managatig ѳsig wanrrabig, tru karub wainug wabigwan, tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳ maya nuguen t'ab gѳnrrun chib, t'abig kui asha t'ab inchib, ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru ѳsiguig srѳsriibe k'an león lataig kѳben, tru wendauibe k'an tѳrѳ lataig kѳben, k'atѳ tru wendauibe k'an mѳwei malѳ lataig kѳben, tru pib gѳnrrabyuibe k'an wasrѳ pala uñib lataig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru nѳ wamisra karub wainug truyugurrimbe sre bilabelѳ gѳben, wammera gѳben, palaig rrashibelѳ gѳben webambubig kѳn. Katѳ tru karub waig merrappe lámparamera nag bilabelѳ siete pilab pѳnrrabig kѳn, truilѳbe tru Tiuswei siete espíritumera gѳn..
Inchen truyu wabiibe kan jaspe sruuba, cѳrnalina sruuba lataig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru nѳ waim bѳtѳgatanbe kan kѳshѳmbѳtѳ kan esmeralda srug latazhig pasrabig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ Espíritu nѳ nan tѳga basramisren, srѳmbalasrѳmbe tru karub wamisra wamig kan pasrig pasrai nabe ashibig kur. Inchen truyube kan mugѳsrѳn wabig kѳn..
Truilai utube, Himeneѳba, Alejandrѳba treeg melan. Inchawei nabe truilane Satanás nѳ asha martrai nui tasku pѳnsrar, Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamumum gusrenrrai.k

Timѳteѳ, nai nusrkai lataig, i maramigwan martrunrrig cha na ñun karua basrar. Tru ñi maig kѳnrrabig kuigwan merrabsrѳwei ñuimburab Tius maig karuben eshkailan, truilan isua basramisra, Señѳrweimburabelan elatchab gѳmѳ, may gwayanrrig

Incha Tiusbe treeg kѳptѳwei nane lastima asig kѳn, tru kaig marѳbelai utu na mas larrѳ gaigwan Jesucristѳbe chugatukkucha nѳ nan tammay ka awentab wabig kuin gúi kenamartrab, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrab, tru wendѳsrѳ nun kѳrenrrabelѳ nan ѳyeeg marigwan asha gѳnrrai.
Inchendѳ namui Señѳrwei tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe naim bala purab nuikken arrig kѳn, tru isubigwan nuinuutѳ basra tѳgagѳmiba, undag kѳbiiba kanbalatѳ Cristѳ Jesúsweinug basrabig.
Cristѳ Jesús namui Señѳrwan na mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab, muraaramѳ marѳb megamig kѳnrrai tranѳbigwan, kaguende tru nui maramelѳyu chi isumgaig marѳb meganrraptiig kui asha nan pasrigwan.

mѳguelѳ ishumburba nѳmui asrtѳga trѳmbѳig marѳbelaimba, k'atѳ mѳguelѳbe mѳguelѳasiyaitѳ trѳmbѳig marѳbelaimba, misagwan k'aruindiig melѳnrrai nila yanѳbelaimba, isa waminchipteelaimba: nabe si, isatѳ waminchimur chibendѳ, isapteelaimba, tru tabig sѳlwan gusrenanigwan chigurrimbunѳ k'aitѳga itѳѳra bѳnsrѳbelaimba gѳn,
Pѳs tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe t'abigwein gúi ashibwei inchibelѳ guer, tru chiyuwei maramigwan treegweyasig merrarrawa marene.
Inchawei mѳilѳgѳben truilѳma ѳyeeg kѳmigwan yandѳ pella tarѳmisra, nѳmuimburab ke ka chine wamincha mѳrѳb gúilѳyutѳ chab tarѳmisrin gѳn.

katѳ chi treeg kѳmubendѳ nѳmdѳ isua wamindiilanba, katѳ nѳmbe i misaamerainukkurri amrrubelѳ guer chib, tru munchimera kan managuen patsѳnrrabgaig arrubigwanba, tru gúindѳ mѳrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai ashib pasrѳnrraimba. Treelѳbe ka kwayab waramigweindѳ gѳn, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tru Tiusweimburabelan marѳbig marѳb ambamigwan purugunrrab gѳmѳtѳ.

nui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug basra tѳgaig, tru ciertѳn nai nusrkai lataig ñi Timѳteѳwan i kilgawan pѳrar. Tius Mѳskaimba, Cristѳ Jesús namui Señѳrba nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, lastima asigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ѳrtraimab isua inchar.

katѳ Tius tru kwailai utugurri ѳsiirangaruig tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri nui Nusrkai arrumigwan muniiranrrab pѳnrramisrigwanba, tru Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbig attrab pasrabigwan Jesús namun chi treeg kѳmѳnrrai marѳbigwan.

Tru Señѳrwei wam ñimuinukkurri larrѳbichib ibiibe, Macedѳnia birautѳ gѳmѳwei, Acaya birautѳ gѳmѳwei, chusrѳndѳgucha larrѳbitsin gѳn. Katѳ trutѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñim isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigwan chigucha nebua asig misrin gѳn. Treekkurri namune yandѳ mas chi tamig palѳnrrabga lataig kѳtan.

Ñimbe ñimuimburappe nam lat'aitѳwei, katѳ Señѳr lat'aitѳwei mandѳ amѳnamigwan treeg amѳñibelѳ misrin gѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri Tiuswei wamwan tranigwan truba kasraatѳ ut'ab, chine purѳ rrѳmbѳig isuig melamig nebuingucha.
Namui nunelѳ, Tiuswei undaarailѳ, ñimune Tius lawa wesruilѳ gúin gúi aser.
Inchen truibe Cristѳi asr kѳn, Cristѳ nѳtѳwei tru chigucha chi palѳmíig netsiig pasraig. Cristѳbe treetѳwei chi kѳbigu mumaytѳgucha nѳtѳ netsiig pasrabig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwanguen Cristѳ nѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsra, iglesiaimbe chiyutѳgucha nѳ tur gѳnrrai pasrig kѳn.
Tius tru Cristѳn kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiirangarua, tru srѳmbalasrѳ nѳ wainug nui kusrmay wamisrtrai maramburab mariitѳgatѳwei marѳb pasran..

Katѳ chigúi mѳrѳb nebua asamig ñimui isubigu tѳrgandѳ kebiliilѳ gua, tru ñim tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua muniirab melѳnrrai ñimun wamigwan, ѳyeeg kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba, tru nui misaameran keta trannrrab mislig chigucha palѳmíig purѳ nuig purѳ tabigwan ѳyeeg kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba,
chu urastѳgucha na Tiusba wamindigu tѳgatѳ isub palѳmѳ, ñimuimburab ungwa chibig kur.
Inchawei treekkurri tru ñimui isubigwan Señѳr Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, katѳ Tiuswei misaameran mayeelanba ñim truba undaguelѳ gѳn daig na wammѳrabe,

Katѳ treetѳwei ñimbe nuinug tru wam newan ciertѳnig, tru tabig srѳ wam kaigyugurri wesrabigwan ñim mѳra, nun kѳreben, tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrig Espíritu Santѳtѳga Tiusweyelѳ gúin gúi asiilѳ gѳnrrai ñimbe sellailѳ gúig kѳn.

Cristѳi misaamera kѳppe kanguelarrѳtѳ tabig lincha pѳnrrab
Tiusbe managuen nuyelane elachimíig kѳn
Cristѳi misaamerabe nѳ maig amѳñinrrain kѳben treeg amѳñib

Yu pirau misagwein gabyu larrѳ gaizheelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagúilanba, katѳ kaashib indiilanba, tru chigucha gѳmѳzheelѳ gúi asiilan, Tiusbe truilan lawa wesraig kѳn, tru nѳrreelan chigucha gѳmeelѳ mara gѳrrѳmartrab,

Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, tru ñimun wamab uras ñim mailѳ gѳbelѳ gúigwan isua asamig kѳn. Misaamerain gabyu kusrebelѳbe ñimbe ke k'an gandѳwein gѳben, k'atѳ ashib k'arub purrabelѳ nѳrreelѳbe mamdѳ gѳben, k'atѳ tab misagugurri amrrub misaamerabe mamdѳ gѳn.
Trune Tius tru wamiilayasiibe, judíѳsmerai lata, griegѳsmerai lata, Cristѳbe tru Tiuswei maramburab mariiba katѳ Tiuswei tru muguen nebua kusremgaig kusreiba, truig kѳn.

¿Pѳs, tru purѳ gusrebiiba, k'atѳ kusrennѳbiiba, k'atѳ mѳi i gwalѳm nѳrrѳ kusrewa treeg, rreeg kѳn chibelѳbabe chu bѳnrrah? ¿yu pirau chine purѳ nѳrrѳ kusreegwane chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ marig, Tiusbe treeg mara tѳgagѳmuitarru?

Cristѳ tru kurusyu kwaigweimburab tru eshkab kusrenaniibe yandѳ tru kaigyu kegѳrra pѳnrrabelaimbe chigucha gѳmíig, ke chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lat'aig kѳn. Inchen nam yandѳ kaigyugurri wesrailaimbe tru wamindiibe Tiuswei tru maramburab marig, truig kѳn.
Katѳ Estéfanaswei yauelandѳbe piu umbu ulsrѳbwei indig kѳn. Inchendѳ katѳgan mas mungucha piu umbu ulsraibe nane isumѳtan
Namui Mѳskai Tiusweimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳimba tru ka yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ñim tѳgagѳnrrai inchar.n
Na Pablѳ, Tius nan trendѳ treeg kѳnrrain gѳben, Cristѳ Jesús nѳashib karua ѳrig kѳnrrai wamig, nai nuneg Sóstenesba misra, i kilgawan pѳrar,

katѳ naguen treeg kѳmѳwatѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan payrrab Jerusalénsrѳmay nebimѳwei indig kѳn. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Arabia birausrѳmay ya, trugurrimbe katѳle Damascѳsrѳmay arrig kѳbig kѳn.Indiibe yandѳ pѳn bila puraiben, Jerusalénsrѳ nabe Pedrѳba waminchab ya, trusrѳ nѳba parru kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kur.
katѳ naguen treeg kѳmѳwatѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan payrrab Jerusalénsrѳmay nebimѳwei indig kѳn. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Arabia birausrѳmay ya, trugurrimbe katѳle Damascѳsrѳmay arrig kѳbig kѳn.k
Inchendѳ Tiusbe nane nai usrai patsѳ umbu wabenbatѳsrѳwei nane tarѳmara, nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ nane wamig kѳn. Incha nun tabig asѳnaben

Kaguende ñimbe manawei nane wammѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun, judíѳsmera Tiusweyasig maig maramelѳyu, na trunun marѳb uñib uras na merrabsrѳ maig inchib uñibig kuigwan: kan namig kѳbiitѳ ¡gatѳ! chindinrrabna gúi inchib, Tiuswei iglesian kaig martrab wendautѳ llirab, nѳm tru treeg marѳb tѳgagúigwan kerriguwan pinishinrrab truba rruba inchib unig kѳbigwan..

Nam ñimun eshkaigwan, mѳi katѳle katѳ nabe eshkanrrab inchar: tru ñim uti lataig kѳmѳtѳ, mѳikkѳben tru tabig srѳ wamwan yunѳmara peemaytѳ eshkab kusrenanѳbiibe, managatig trѳmbѳig nebuig pasrѳnrrai paslig kѳbash cha.
Ñimbe ñimashib ashibelѳ gѳben, katѳ Tiuskucha asha basran, nambe chishig newan tabig, sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, katѳ muguen chi tamgaig amѳnaig kѳbigwan, ñim Cristѳn kѳrebelai utu.

Inchen tru ángel pѳn gѳnrrabyuig nui trѳmpetan urrѳbene, kan truba nu estrella srѳmbalasrѳngurri nu nag tulu lataig naarab peñippe, pimera kuimѳrig nѳrrѳ bimeran gѳben, katѳ kѳlѳmѳ bi gallabzheelan gѳben, mayamba pѳngatѳyu partѳ, partѳ ka gѳrrѳmisren, kane itѳbenig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.m
Ubishaunѳ tru siete gѳnrrabyu sellѳn kѳlsra kurene, srѳmbalasrѳmbe kan media ura wasrѳnzhig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Incha trendaimѳrig tru kѳlli misaamera veinticuatrѳelѳbe nui merrab tѳmbѳnsrѳb sralѳptѳ sralѳbelѳ gѳn kѳriibala tabig waminchab tru managatig ѳsig wabigwan. Incha nѳmui cѳrѳnameran tru nѳ k'arub wainug merrab trenchib petabelѳ gѳn:

Inchen tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳbe mѳitѳgucha kwaldzaliimera seisbatѳ tѳgar, truilѳbe wambiimay, umbumay kabmeratѳ netseelѳ, yem gwalѳm ѳyah tamigwane pinѳmѳ, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Newan tabig, newan tabig, newan tabig Señѳr Tius Newan Maramburab Marѳbig, tru kѳbig, mѳi ya wabig, tru attrabig chib.

Inchen tru karub waig merrappe kan mar wabig kѳn, bigriu tѳrguelarrѳzhig lataig. Tru karub wainug pѳtѳgatanbe merrabmayba, wendaumayba, pinrrѳ mendamayba pibgatѳ ѳsiguelѳ pѳnrrabelѳ gѳn, truilѳbe merrabmayba, wendaumayba kabmeratѳ netseelѳ.

Tru wamisra karub waim bѳtѳgatanbe wamisra karub purrailѳ katѳgan veinticuatrѳ pѳnrrai ashibig kur. Truilѳyube kѳlli misaamera veinticuatrѳ purrabelѳ gѳn, pulѳzheelѳ kewar, nѳmui turyube cѳrѳna ѳrѳtѳga mariilѳ petsargue.n

Inchen na iigwan martrai karua basliibe iig kѳn: tru manrrau chishchigugurlimba, isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigaig, tabigugurlimba, katѳ isubigwan Jesuclistѳinuutѳ ka inchib gѳmѳ, ciertѳn basra tѳgagúigugurlimba undag kѳbig arrubiitѳga undaaramig.

Na Macedѳnia birausrѳmay inrrab basramisra, tiusmanda ñune Efesѳ kѳrrѳmisrtra cha eshkaig kѳbig kuig kѳn, tru mѳilѳgѳsrѳn sѳlwan gѳmѳ, ke peemaytѳ gusrenaniilѳtѳga kusrenanѳbelan treegwan kusrenanmѳnrrai merab ashib basrѳnrraimba,
Na Pablѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabiiba, Cristѳ Jesús, tru nam nundѳ isua munig melaig truiba karua basrig,

Inchawei trusreelѳtѳweinguen nam ñimuinug kebamben, mandѳ tab wamab utig kѳbigwan waminchibelѳ gѳn, katѳ tru ѳsig wab Tius ciertѳnigweiwan marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrab, tru taska mari tiusmeran wendѳbasra, Tiusweimay ñim mandѳ lliraigwanba,
ѳyamay ñimbe Macedѳnia birauba, Acaya birauba mayeelѳ Cristѳn kѳrebelaimbe, truilѳguen asha kusremdiig ñimbe treelѳ misrin gѳn.n
katѳ tru nam nun kѳrebelainug maramburab marѳbiibe, purѳ nuig kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchaimba, miabig kur. Inchen tru nui purѳ nuig maramburab marѳb pasrabiibe,

Nabe tru namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi Tius tru tѳrguegwalmab Mѳskawan miabig kur, ñimun Espíritu Santѳgurri ѳyeegwan trannrrai, kusrebelѳ gѳmigwanba, katѳ nebua asiimíigwan tѳrgandѳ tab chigúi nebua ashchaimba, newan nun tab nebua asamig kѳnrrai.

Truibe tru namuimburabig kѳnrrabigwan ketig ut'amig kѳnrrai katsiibasra tranѳbguen indig truig kѳn, tru Tius nuyasig tѳgagѳnrrab wesrailan ke t'ab webamba pѳnrramnegatig, nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan maya nuguen t'abig wamindamig kѳnrrai.

Mayeelaim bala nѳm asha garubelaim bala gѳben, k'atѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig k'arubelaim bala gѳben, k'atѳ maramburab marѳbelaim bala gѳben, k'atѳ maya misagwan nѳm asha garubelaim bala gѳben, nѳrrѳ gusrebelѳ gúikkurri nѳrrѳ munchimera tѳgagѳnrrai traniilaim bala gѳben, kerrigu iilaim bala nun wannig kѳn, mѳi i gwalѳmweindѳ gѳmѳtѳ, k'atѳ wendѳsrѳ attrabiguwein chigucha.

Clistѳn ashibiibe yu pirau nun ashmѳ misaaba mandѳ pasramig

Pѳs nabe trenchinrrab inchar, mѳilѳgѳsrѳn ñimbe trenchibrren gѳn dan cha: Nabe Pablѳingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Apѳlѳsweingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Nabe Cefasweingatiig kur chiben, katѳgane: Clistѳingatiig kur chib. Treeg inchib gѳn dan cha.
Tiusweiwan marѳbelѳ gѳmigwan keta tranig chigucha chi balѳmeelѳ gѳmnegatikke, Jesucristѳ kenamisramigwan ñim munig melappe.

Na Pablѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, mu mѳguelѳ nѳmuimburab karua ѳrig kѳmѳwei, mu katѳgan inrraincha karua basrig kѳmѳwein gur. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Jesucristѳba, katѳ Tius Mѳskai Jesucristѳn kwailai utugurri ѳsiirangarubiiba karua ѳrig kur.m
Incha nambe amrrunrrab inchib melaig kѳn. Na Pablѳbe, katѳ gatѳ attrab inchib megaben, Satanásbe namun chigѳben ilѳsrka bѳnsrѳbig kѳn.

tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrai waminchab inchen, waminchamamѳnrrab namun merab. ѳyamay nѳmui kaig mariilane katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nemarѳb ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ Tiuswei namig kѳbig arruppe, nѳmuim bala purab nuig attrab gѳn..

Kaguende ñim, nai nunelѳ, tru Judea birausrѳ Tiuswei iglesiamera tru Cristѳ Jesúsweinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelѳ lataitѳwei nebuinab melaig kѳn. Ñimungucha ñimuim birau misaameratѳwei truba rruba kaig indinab melamig nebuig kѳn, tru Judea birauelan nѳm judíѳsmera kaig indinab melab lataitѳweingue.m

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwane ke nѳm gusrenanѳbelѳ gѳg kui inchibelѳ gѳn, nѳm wamindigwane nѳmdѳweinguen ni chigúinguen mѳrmѳwei, k'atѳ iibe treeg kѳmѳnrrab gѳmѳ, treeg kѳn chib wamindiilan chigucha chigúinguen mѳrmѳwei inchendѳ.
Tru srѳsrѳ ke nammerrig Cristѳn muniirab melabelѳ gúikkurri, tru nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan namgurri maya nuguen tabig wamindig kѳnrrai.

tru treeg maram gwalѳmmera pubene, trunun treeg maramig basrѳnrrai: tru srѳmbalasrѳ chi pѳnrrabigwan lata, katѳ pirauigwan lata kanbalatѳ mara, maig maramigwan Cristѳ kerriguwan nѳ asha martrai pѳnsrѳnrrab.
Nuinug nambe nui aningurri nuielѳ gѳnrrai kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guer, namui kaig mariilan ulѳ bayimeelѳ, Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indig tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagúig truig maig kѳben treeg.
tru nui ka yandѳ tab indig purѳ nuig purѳ tabigwan maya nuguen tabig wamindamig kѳnrrai, tru nui truba undaaraig Nusrkaingurri namun ke ka yandѳ tab indig tranigwan..

Pѳs Tiusbe tru chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabigwan nѳ mara pѳnsrѳmѳwatѳ manasrѳwei namune Cristѳgurri tarѳmara wesraig kѳbig kѳn, tabigweindѳ tarѳmariilѳ, kaig mariitѳga chillig inchar gѳmeelѳ, nui merrab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai.n

Incha nane kѳrig isut'an na ñimun gatѳ ashchab puben, Tiusbe ñimui merrab nan kѳrig burѳѳren, truba yamelaimburѳ nan kisamig nebunrrait'amab isua, tru merrabwan nѳmui kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig mariilanba, mѳguelѳba, ishumburmeraba trѳmbѳig mariilanba, mu mandiimíig chi marѳg kѳben trѳmbѳig maramitѳ srua ambiilanba isua mѳrmuin gѳben.

Nambe ñimui merrab ka tab wegѳrrag kѳptѳrre inchib pѳnrrabelѳ gúi, ¿ñimbe katѳgucha mѳi ѳyangatig kabe treeg asѳnain bѳnrrѳgueh? Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nambe waminchippe, Cristѳinug pѳnrrabelѳ gúi asamdiig Tiuswei merrab waminchib pѳnrrer. Inchen nam kerrigu mariilѳbe, ñim, nai undaarailѳ, Tiusweimburab ñim nѳrrѳrab amrrain gѳn..
¿Kabe na tru mѳilan gѳsrѳn na ñimuisrѳmay karua ѳriilѳtѳga chi isa gѳben, kabe ñimun chi wesrabraig kѳ chindah?

Pѳs trube, naimburappe ñimbe ashibelѳguen na ñimun trannrrai miamuigwan. Inchendѳ nabe ke chi maramdiig kѳtashib ashib megabig kѳndainabig kuig kѳppe, trube, ¿ke chi isa gѳben kabe ñimun chi wesrabraig kѳppeendi?

¡Au! Nabe katѳguen chab t'amaraguen megar ñimun ashchab attrab, mѳimbabe chabguen pѳnmayguen gѳnrrab gѳben. Treetѳwei katѳ na ñimun mianrrab gѳmѳ arrumѳnrrun. Kaguende nabe ñim chi tѳgagúigwan isua lamѳtѳ, ñimun isur. Pѳs kaguende ureemera mѳskalayasig esegab tulisamig kѳmѳtѳ, uregweyasig esegab tulishib melamibe mѳskalainguen gѳn.

Cristѳ nan nѳashib karua ѳrig kuin gúi asamig, maig kuindѳgucha t'ammay nabe ñimui utu kenamarig kѳn: Tius naba pasrain gúi ashchai mariilѳ marѳb, kwaara asamdeelѳ marѳb, maramburab mariilѳ marѳb, treeg.

Inchawei nabe na truburab gѳmíig kullaguig kuigu lata, nan tsalѳ waminab pasraigu lata, nan chi palabigu lata, Cristѳgurri nan kaig martrabgѳba indinab megaigu lata, nabe truba tab gúi mѳrѳb kasraarar..
Inchen nabe iigwan Señѳrwan pѳnmay tiusmanda kerrarra cha miaben,

ѳyeeg chigѳben purѳ nѳrreelѳ nan kenamarig, truilѳ nan purab nuig kurmab isub pasramig marmѳnrrai, nane nai asru chu uragucha kan kal lataig kebuchib pasrѳnrrai pasrig kѳn, Satanás ѳrig, ni mandѳguen gѳmui pasramig kѳnrrai martrabig, na purab nuig misrѳb pasramig kѳmѳnrrai.m

Pѳs nabe tru mѳweimburappe si mѳg inchib waminchib basrabwei indamѳnrrun, pѳs truibe nawein gúinaben. Inchendѳ nabe naasiitѳ mѳg inchib waminchib basrѳmѳtѳ, na trengatig kѳmíig kullaguig kuinaigube mѳg inchib basramѳnrrun.
tru mѳwane tru srѳbala tius wei purѳ tabzhiirѳmay srua yaiwane nabe asha kur .

Nabe gatѳgucha naasiitѳ mѳg inchib waminchib pasramig kѳtan, treeg mariibe chi purugumíig kuindѳgucha. Nabe piab lataigu na chigѳben asiilanba, Señѳr nuimburabelan nan kenamariilanba, trunun waminchab.
¿Kabe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, ñimui asrbe Espíritu Santѳ nѳ kebya basraig tab ya gúi, ñimuinug pasrabig tru ñim Tiuswan uti Espíritu? Ñimbe ñimdѳwei ñimuyasig kѳmѳn.
Inchen mѳikkѳben Señѳrba kandѳ misriibe, nѳba kan espíritutѳ gѳn.
¿Kabe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, tru treeg k'aig ishuuba k'andѳ misra k'aig mariibe, yandѳ k'an asrtѳ lataig kѳrrѳmisrig kui? Kaguende trenchibig pѳrig basran: Tru pailѳbe k'an asrtѳ gѳnrrun cha.
Pѳs Tiusbe Señѳrwanma katѳle ѳsig kѳnrrai kusraig kѳppe, namungucha gatѳ treetѳwei ѳsig kѳmig kѳnrrai nui maramburab mariitѳga kusranrrun.

Chiwandѳgucha nan meriimíig, na ka maramdiig kѳbendѳ, kerrigubabe chi purugunrrabgailѳ gѳn. Chiwandѳgucha nan meriimíig, na ka maramdiig kѳbendѳ, na treeg marѳb megamig kѳnrrai na ѳyeeg maramelѳyu ni mѳyutѳgucha truig srua yaig pasrѳnrrabgucha gѳmur..
nileelѳba, larrѳ pareelѳba, mutsiirapteelѳba, isa waminchib wam gusrupteelѳba, purѳ may isa an nila wesrapteelѳba, tru Tius nѳ ashib karub waigwan truilѳbe ketig utѳmѳnrrab gúi.m
Treeg inchibelѳ gúi urasbe sѳlwan marmѳ ñimguen galѳ marѳb, isa wamincha nilamba inchibelѳ gѳn, kan trutѳgucha nunelandѳwei.
Inchen kan treeg martrab isui urasbe kan nuneebe katѳgan nuneeba kwayam lawabe, juezmeran t'amara guettra chib, eshkab ambubelѳ gѳn Tiuswan kѳremѳ misaameran.
Inchawei tru kwayam lailѳ yu pirau chigѳben pub arrubigwane iglesiayuelѳ gѳmeelan ¿mandѳgurri truilan asha martrai pѳnsrѳbelѳ gѳh?m

¿Ñimgan ashmeelѳ gѳtirru Tiuswei misaamerabe yu pirau misagwan maig asha maramigwan nѳmguen asha martrabelѳ gúi? ¿Inchen yu pirau misaameran treegwan ñimguen asha martrabelѳ gѳbendѳbe, trube, chigѳben kwayam lailѳ yandѳzhig pub arrubigwane treetѳwei asha martrab gaimabelѳ gѳ chindah?

Kaguende Tiuswei misaamera gѳmeelѳ nѳѳreelane maig kѳnrrabigwan Tius nѳ asha martrab gúinrrun. Inchendѳ: Tru ñimui utu tru larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳbigwane ñimbe wegutsamig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube..
¿Pѳs nagan Tiuswei misaamera gѳmeelѳ nѳѳreelan kabe na asha marѳb pasramig kuitarru? ¿Tru iglesiayuelan asha maramigwane ñim maramig kѳmuitarru??

Inchendѳ nabe iigwan trenchippe, yu pirau tru Tiuswan ashmѳ misaameran truilaimburab waminchimur, tru ishumburmera lata mѳguelѳ lata trѳmbѳig marѳbelan, tru larrѳ pareelan, chi isa gѳben an nila wesrabelan, katѳ chiwangѳben kan tius kui lataig inchibelan. Pѳs treeg misaameraba kerriguwan linchimumig kuimbe, trube, ñimbe yu piraugurrimbe webambam nebubsruinrrun..

Inchawei nambe tru Pascua Fiestan marѳppe, tru kѳlli levadura lataigwan tѳga marѳb gѳmѳgun, tru kaig martrabgѳba isub, chine trѳmbѳig maramigwangѳba isub indi levaduran. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru pirri chi levadura chigaig lataitѳga fiesta margun, tru pirriyu chi lindisaimíig chi sѳrig chigaig, ciertѳngue.
Ñim nѳrreelѳ misrѳb waminchib pѳnrraibe chi tabig kѳmѳn. ¿Ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, harinayu levaduran lamѳtѳ pusriitѳ maya sѳmarigwan larrѳb pulingarubig kui?
tru larrѳ kaig marѳb mѳwane Sat'anás nѳ tѳgagѳnrrai pasrtrigay, nui asrwan pinisaig kѳnrrai, Señѳr arrub gwalѳm nui espíritune kaigyugurri wesraig kѳnrrai.

Pѳs nabe ñimba gѳmѳtѳ, nai asr pasraigube yabsrѳ nѳѳrѳ basraindѳgucha, nai isuigube ñimba basrѳwa, tru treeg k'aig marѳb mѳwane nun maig itѳ attrabigwan treeg kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmara pasrѳbguen inchar, na ñimui utu basrѳwa lataitѳwei.

¡Trune treeg kѳmnebe ñimbe chi gѳmui lataig nѳrreelѳ misrѳb ka mѳg inchippe bѳnrran! ¿Ashene, ѳyeeg bubene, ñimbe isuig kishibguen bѳnrrѳmѳ, chindah? Tru ѳyeeg kaig marѳb mѳwane ñimui utugurlimbe wegutchai inday.
¡Tius tru nѳtѳ kandѳ wabig, tru muguen nebua kusremgaig newan kusrebigwan managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun Jesucristѳgurri! Treeg kѳnrrun.

Inchendѳ mѳimbe Tius tru maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ pѳriilѳgurri tru mu asiimíig pasrabigwane kenamaran judíѳs kѳmeelѳ chu birausrѳ misaamerandѳgucha, Tius tru manasrѳngurri managatig wabig nѳ maig maramigwan martrain basrig, treeg, nѳmui isubigwan Cristѳinug pѳnsra tѳgagúigu maig taigwan mѳra marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai.
Na, Terciѳ, Pablѳi kilga bѳrѳbikkucha ka amѳñigueh cha ѳrar, Señѳrwei munchiyu.
Inchen Tius tru chi isumgaig tab gѳbiibe kan maya yanayutѳ Satanáswane nѳbe tambalѳrtrun ñim itѳbuna bѳnrrѳnrrai. Namui Señѳr Jesúswei ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñimba gѳnrrun.k

Kaguende treeg misaamerabe namui Señѳr Cristѳiwan marmeelѳ gѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, k'a nѳmuimburaptѳ tab gѳnrrai labelѳ gua, waminchibgucha purѳ tabzhig wamincha, mѳrѳptѳ wamdiig tabzhig wamincha, chigucha trunun nebua ashmѳ misaazheelan kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳn.
Katѳ ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrligay Filólѳgѳn gѳben, Julian gѳben, Nereѳwan gѳben, katѳ nui nuchawan gѳben, ѳlimpaswan gѳben, katѳ tru nѳmba warabelѳ mayeelѳ Tiuswei misaameran gѳbengue.
Asínclitѳn gѳben, Flegѳnten gѳben, Hermeswan gѳben, Patrѳbaswan gѳben, Hermaswan gѳben, katѳ nunelѳ nѳmba warabelan gѳben ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrligay.
Señѳrwei maramigu truba marѳb melabelѳ Trifenanba, Trifѳsanba k'a amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay, k'atѳ Pérsida, truba undaaraig, tru Señѳrwei maramigu truba rruba marѳb megabigwanba.
Katѳ Clistѳi maramigu namun lincha marѳb megabig Urbanѳnba, katѳ nai undaaraig Estaquiswanba ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrligay.
Señѳrweimburab nai undaaraig Ampliaswan ka uñgu tan chirrunrrigay.
Katѳ ñimuyasig truba rruba marѳb megabig Maríangucha tab k'a uñgu tan chirrunrrigay.

Katѳ iglesia tru nѳmui yau tulundzunabelangucha ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrligay. Katѳ tru Epenetѳ, nai undaaraig, Asia birausrѳ ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ Clistѳn nѳmerlig kѳrewa pasramisrѳbigwangucha ka uñgu tan chirrunrligay.
Cristѳ Jesúswei maramigu lincha marѳb melabelѳ, Priscilanba, Aquilanba tab k'a amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay.
Clistѳgurli tru namui nuchag Feben tabig ashib tѳgagѳrrunrligay chinrrab inchar, tru Cencrea iglesiayu chi maramigu purugubigwan.

¿Chindimba? Kaguende tru isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigu lamѳtѳ, chigѳben tabig maliitѳga nebunrrab inchibelѳ gѳn. Incha tru srurrengwam srugu srurrengwaig kѳbig kѳn. Tru sruube Clistѳ nѳm kaasig, truig kѳn.

¿ѳyeeg kѳbene, trube, nambe mandѳ chinrrab gѳh? Judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera tru chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig Tiusba tab pѳnrramigwan nebunrrab chi tranrrѳmeelѳguen treeg Tiusba tabig pѳnrramigwan nebuig kѳn, tru isubigwan Clistѳinug pasra tѳgagúikkurli.
kaguende Señѳrbe yu pirau ѳyeeg nebuilѳgucha warѳbash cha, nѳ trencha pasrigwane petѳ kanmaytѳ newanig martrun chib..
Katѳ tru: Ñimbe nai misaamera gѳmѳn chib basrainuutѳwei: Ñimbe: ѳsig Wab Tiuswei nusrkalѳ gѳn chib, wamiilѳ gѳnrrun daig kѳn.
Katѳ ѳseaswei pѳrigu Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai misag sѳtѳ gѳmeelan: Nai misaamera gѳn damѳnrrun cha. Undaaraimíig kѳbigwan: Undaaraig cha, wamamѳnrrun cha.
Inchen tru wamiilѳbe namgucha guer. Pѳs tru nam wamiilѳbe, judíѳsmerai utugurlindѳ wamiilѳ gѳmѳtѳ, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utugurlingucha wamiilѳ guer.

Inchippa Tiusbe nui namig kѳbigwanba, katѳ nui maramburab marigwanba kenamartrab inchib weig kѳppeendi, tru manasrѳwei kaigu pѳnrrѳnrrab amrrai tamariilѳ nun yeeg namig kѳmdѳ misaameran yeeg tammay awentab.
Pѳs ñimui utu mѳibe nane trenchinrraabe: Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿katѳgucha Tiusbe namune chindimbarre kailѳ gѳn dah? cha. Kaguende ¿nѳ martrab indigwane mu gúi treeg marmѳnrrai indiasamѳrra?
Inchawei Tiusbe mun lastima ashig kѳben, truigwan lastima ashib, mѳigwei manrrѳwan gѳben murig marѳg kѳbene, murig marѳb inchibig kѳn.
Kaguen Tiusbe Mѳiséswane trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Nan mun lastima ashig kѳben, truigwan lastima ashib, nan mun tab inchig kѳben, truigwan tab indamѳnrrun cha.
Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿mandѳ chinrrab? ¿Tiusbe sѳlgandѳ t'abig marmíig kѳn, chinrrab gѳ chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳmѳn.
Tru Tiuswei wamwam pѳrigu maig taimbala: Jacѳbwane nabe undaarappe, Esaúwane tsalѳ indig kѳbig kѳn daig.
Katѳ treetѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Rebeca ureg tѳgagúilѳma k'an mѳsk'aindѳ tѳgarmera gѳbig kѳn, tru merrabsrѳ namui mѳsk'ai Isaacwei.
Kaguende Tius tru trannrrab kѳrrѳmisriibe Abramwan ѳyeeg taig kuig kѳn: ѳyan gwalѳmmerawan na arruben, Sarabe kan nusrkai tѳgagѳnrrun cha.

Maya Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera guagucha, mayambagucha nui ureemera gѳmѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiusbe Abrahamwan trendaig kѳn: Ñuinukkurri karrab misaamerai utu Isaackurri larrѳbichib ambubelandѳ Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera cha, wamiilѳ gѳnrrun cha.

Tru merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera nѳrreelѳbe nѳmuin gѳben, katѳ Clistѳ mѳg lataig misra arliibe tru misaamerayugurli arlig kѳben, Clistѳbe, nѳ Tius chigurlimbunѳ kѳbigweim bala pasrabig, ¡managurli managatig mayanguen tab indig kѳn! Treeg kѳnrrun.
tru nai manrraube truba nu isui basrab chu uraskucha nabe pusrkwai isuin basrabig kui.
Na Cristѳinug pasrawa ciertѳn waminchar. Nabe isa waminchimur. Tru nai isub kebachib pasrabiibe Espíritu Santѳgurri isa gѳmѳ, treegwein gúi eshkat'an,
larrѳ chugúi mѳrmeelѳ, chi martrab waminchendѳ k'a wamdѳ waminchibelѳ, manrrѳga latailѳ, mungucha lastima ashmeelѳ, treelѳ gѳn.

Nѳmbe kalѳ marѳb amrruilѳtѳ netsailѳ, purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳbelѳ, pareelѳ, trurrigu yandѳ larrѳ gailѳ, treelѳ gѳn. Nѳmbe chigurrin gѳben pusrkwai asamig kѳben, misagwan kweecha bet'amelѳ gѳben, kwayam lamelѳ gѳben, isatѳ may wamincha kegѳrrѳsrkamelѳ gѳben, katѳganun kaig martrab isumelѳ gѳben, trutѳ netsailѳ gѳn.

Katѳ mѳguelѳbe treetѳwei nѳmui asrtѳga ishumburba trendѳ treeg marigwan elacha, kanikkurri kanikkurri trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbiitѳ kan chinsraatѳ inchib, mѳguelѳbe nѳm mѳguelѳasiyaitѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrikken gѳnrraptiig marѳb guebambig kѳbig kѳn. Nѳm treeg trѳmbѳig marѳb pѳnrraimburѳ nѳmui asrutѳwei nѳm mѳra melamigwan utig kѳbig kѳn.

Nѳmbe Tiuswei tru newan ciertѳnig kѳreigwane lelacha, isa wamindigwan kѳrewa, Tius tru mara pѳnsrailan kѳriibala tabig waminchib, truilayasig marѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn, tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳnrrai Tius mara pѳnsrѳbig, Tius tru managatig mayanguen tabig wamindigwan tabig wamindi urasbe. Treeg kѳnrrun..
Nѳmbe truba rruba kusrebelѳ guermab inchendѳ, chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn.

Kaguende nѳmbe Tiuswan nebua ashippe ashendѳ, Tius kui ashabe, Tiuswan lataig tabig inchib tѳgagѳmѳwei, mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chimѳwei inchibelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nѳmui isubigube chi purugunrrabgailѳ isumguengailan isuben, nѳmui chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ isub manrrѳbe lѳstѳraig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende Tiusweimburabig kui asamigwane nѳmbe tѳrgandѳ ashibelѳ gѳn, pѳs Tiusbe nѳashib trunun nѳmun kenamarig kua.

Kaguende tru tabig srѳ wamyu kenamisran tru chi kaig marmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmisra pѳnrramig Tiusweinukkurri arrubig, truibe isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ basra pѳnrraikkurrimba, katѳ isubigwan nuinuutѳ basra pѳnrramig kѳnrraimba. Tru Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu maig taimbala: Tiusba tru mandѳ basramigwan sѳlgandѳ treeg tabig basrabiibe nui isubigwan Tiusweinug basra tѳgagúitѳgatѳ uñchun daig.
Inchawei treekkurri ñim Rѳmasrѳ warabelangucha nabe Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan truba rruba eshkab kusrenanѳg kuim basrar.
Nabe gliegѳsmeran lata, gliegѳs kѳmѳ misaameran lata, kusreb misaameran lata, chi kusremѳ misaameran lata ulѳ basrar Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanamig.
Kaguende nane ñimun asinrrabna gѳtan, Tiusweimburabelѳyuigwan chitѳguen ñimun pilishinrrab, ñim mas mur pѳnrramig kѳnrrai,
Nabe nai Tiuswan purugurra cha, miabig kur, Tius nan inrrain gѳben, yandѳ na chinchagѳben ñimun ashchab arrumig may gurtrai.
Señѳr Jesuclistѳgurli nai Tiuswanmerlig ungwa, ungwa chinrrab inchar ñim mayeelaimburab. Kaguende ñim ñimui isubigwan Clistѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwane chutѳgucha tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru maig taigwan mѳrѳbelai utu Jesucristѳielѳ gѳnrrai wamiilѳba ñimgucha truyu tѳga bѳnrran.n
tru nui Nusrkaweimburab. Tru Nusrkai nѳ misag kuigweimburappe, nѳbe Davidwei misagugurri arrubig kѳben,
Inchen Pablѳbe tru an bagarawa pebi yau pa bila ѳrѳba kѳrrѳmisra, nun ashchab ambubelane mundѳgucha wamab utab wabig kѳn truyu.
Inchen Pablѳ ѳyeeg chibene, judíѳsmerabe nѳmdѳ truba rruba payiyab waminchib ambubelѳ gѳn..
Pѳs ѳyeeg kѳbene, ñimbe isua guy cha. Judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran tru k'aigyugurri wesrabig Tiusweiwane wammѳrѳsrailѳ gѳben, truilѳbe mѳrtrun chibig kѳn.
I misaameran iigwan waminchab inrrѳ cha: Ñimbe mѳrѳppe, mѳrendѳ, managuen chigúi mѳrmѳnrrun chib. Ashippe ashendѳ, chigúinguen nebua ashchaamѳn chib.n
Inchen kan utuelѳbe Pablѳ wamindigwan treegwein gѳbig kuin gúi isuben, trune kan utuelѳbe kѳremeelѳ gѳn.n
Inchendѳ ñi maig isuigwan wamindi mѳrinrrabna gúin guer cha. Kaguende tru i sѳtѳ Tiusweiwan srѳig peemay kusrenanѳb marigwane chutѳgucha k'aig kѳn chib, wamindi ashibelѳ guer cha.
Inchawei ѳyeeg buikkurri ñimun ashchappa, waminchappa nabe wamig kѳn cha. Nam israelitasmera muniiraigwan muniirabikkurri mѳi yu i cadenastѳga merrarraig pasrar chibig kѳn..
Inchen truilѳbe nan maig kuigwan t'ab ashabe, elatchab inchibelѳ gѳn cha, kwanrrai maramdiig nainug chigucha chi kalѳ marig kaaben.
Incha nam Rѳma chab pubene, Pablѳne trusrѳmbe nuin gúi nѳѳrѳ yau tsubashibig kѳn, kan suldauwan nun ashchai pasra.
Incha trusrѳmbe nunelѳ warabelѳ gúin gúi wetѳrrabelѳ guer. Inchen nѳmbe namun truyu kѳrrѳmisray chiben nambe kan trune lincha gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer. Incha ѳyeeg amba Rѳmasrѳ pubelѳ guer.n
Incha chigѳben truba ketiilѳtѳga namun truba rruba tab incha, nam amrrab barcѳyu nebammѳwatѳ, ambamig chi palѳnrrabigwan nѳmbe chishtѳ rranѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen trugurrimbe katѳgan gwanrreelѳgucha tru pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabigu warabelѳbe Pablѳimay amrrua, tamariilѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn..

Inchen tru warainug trugatanbe Publiѳ taigweim birѳmera gѳbig kѳn, tru pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabigu misagwan ashib karubigwei. Truibe namun truba tab wamab uta, pѳn gwalѳm ѳrѳba truba tab inchib kѳrrѳmisringarubig kѳn..
Inchen Pablѳbe ulwan nagu pabѳrrgѳbene, chigucha inchimíig kѳn.
Inchene Pablѳbe trar mul nu tulisha, nagu kebusrene, mѳimbe kan ul nag bachiiraben truyugurri webarruppe, Pablѳi tasku tsacha megambuben

Inchen yandѳ pa bila buraiben, Félixbe webiben, Pѳrciѳ Festѳ truigwan purѳ wamisrtrab kubenadur kebibig kѳn. Incha Félixbe judíѳsmeraba ka tab gѳrrѳmisrѳg kѳptѳ Pablѳne kailan keeri yau ka wabashippa, webibig kѳn.m
Inchagucha Pablѳ nun elatchai kabe kan maya an tranrrua chinrrait'amabrre muniirabig kѳn Félixbe. Incha treeg isua, Félixbe nuimay Pablѳne katѳ gatѳ wamabig kѳn waminchab.
Mam gwalѳm wendau gѳsrѳn Félixbe nui srai judía Drusilaba gatѳ pua, Pablѳn pertrab ѳrabe, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwan waminchen mѳrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Félixbe tru srѳ maywan tab wammѳraig kuabe: Maya suldaumeran nѳ garubig Lisias arruben, iigwan na maig kѳtashchab gatѳwan ashchab chippa, patsѳgѳbig kѳn.
Kabe katѳ tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab na kemalla pasrab uras nan chi kalѳ marig wetѳrraig kѳbene, trube, truburappe nѳmdѳwei yu tѳrmarbash cha.
Inchawei mѳimbe, truilѳ nѳmwei amrrumig kѳn cha, yu ñui merrab nan ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib nan tsalѳ gѳb chigѳben tamig tѳgaguabe.
Nabe truba yam bila peesrѳ llirab uñabe, ketamig tulisaigwan naim birau misaameran kettrappa, katѳ Tiuswan keta trannrrappa arrubig kur cha..

Nabe Tius mandѳ taigwane treeg kѳnrraitamab isua munig megabig kur cha, tru nѳm muniirab gúigwandѳwei, tru kwabelѳ sѳlgandѳ tabelѳ lata, katѳ tru sѳlgandѳ tabelѳ gѳmeelѳ lata katѳle ѳsiirawa kurramigwan.
Inchawei i misaamerabe mѳi nan ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chibelѳbe ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib gúigwane treeg kѳn chinrrappe gaimanrrun cha.
Ñitѳweinguen asiinrrun cha, na Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswan kѳriibala t'abig waminchab arriibe kwalѳmmera dѳcetѳwei purayan cha.
Inchen judíѳsmera truyu pѳnrrabelѳgucha: Iibe kerliguba isa gѳmѳ, treegwein gѳn chib truba inchibelѳ gѳn.

tru ѳyeeg mara basѳmѳtirru chib srua gѳbelane ñuisrѳmay ambay chib amrrai ѳrѳppa. Trube, ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib gúigwan, ñiashib iigwan kerrigu tab ashabe, maig kuigwan tab ashchabguen chibig kѳn.

Katѳ Tiuswei yawan chigucha, Tiuswei yaambu gѳmui lataig k'aig trѳmbѳig martrab indamba inchen, nambe nun kemѳrig kѳn cha. Incha nambe tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, treeg martrab inchen,
Inchendѳ ñun menrra rrѳmbѳ inchib menrra waminchimѳnrrab, kan petѳzhiitѳ tiusmanda kalu bebѳbsrumugu chinrrab inder cha, ñibe chiwandѳgucha yan dammay mara rranѳb wabig kѳbene.

Inchen yandѳ Pablѳn wamѳben, Tértulѳbe Pablѳne ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib menda, Félixwane trenchibig kѳn: Namui purѳ tab kubenadur Félix, kan nambe ñigurri ambumay imay tab warer cha, ñun mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab inchar cha. Incha ñibe purѳ tab asha marѳbig kuikkurri, nam i birau mayeelѳ warabelayasiibe, srѳitѳ, srѳitѳ yunѳmarѳb tammisrѳb arrun cha.
Kan ñi namui Félix purѳ tabig, chusrѳndѳgucha katѳ chu uratѳgucha, ñune kashmѳ mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ guer cha..
Incha nѳbe ѳyeeg taitѳga misag tru tulya basrabigwane chab tarѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende mѳi ѳyeeg puigwane namune ka kailѳ gѳptѳrre, ѳyeeg martrab gurrig kui inchaptiikken gѳn cha, kan chigurri nambe ѳyeeg inchib gurrig kѳn cha eshkab pѳnrramig chigaabendѳbe.

Inchawei Demetliѳba, katѳ tru nѳba treetѳwei marѳb pѳnrrabelѳba muba gѳben aleguiyaig tѳgaguabe, truweiwei maig kuigwan nѳm asha martrai truyu purѳѳra bѳnsramelѳ bѳnrrab, katѳ maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marѳbelѳ purrab indan cha. Mѳitѳgucha truyube kangurlin gangurli ñimun maig punrrabigwan treeg asha martra tay, chibig kѳn.
Inchawei treeg kѳmubendѳ chib k'an mugucha isan damgaig kѳbene, ñimbe yandѳ wasrѳramdiig kѳn chibig kѳn, chiwandѳgucha ke k'an chinchaptѳ inchib marmѳtѳ.
Inchendѳ judíѳ gúi wetѳgѳrrappe, katѳle sѳtѳbah, sѳtѳbah rrashibelѳ gѳn, kan ba ura burab trenchib: ¡Efesѳsmerai Dianabe purѳ nuig kѳn! chib.

Inchen misaamera truyu tulundzuna basrabiibe ke chindinguen asamgaig inchib gúig kѳppe, kanelѳbe peg chib rrashiben, katѳganelѳbe katѳ peg chib rrashiben, tru mayeelѳ lutau tѳbѳ pasrabiibe chinchab tulundzunin gúinguen mѳrmѳwa gѳbig kѳn.n
Inchen Pablѳbe truyu misagwan waminchab kebinrrab inchen, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe kebibashmeelѳ gѳn.n
Inchen ѳyeeg wamindiilan mѳrabe, purѳ rrѳmbѳig nama, trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡Efesѳsmerai Dianabe purѳ nuig kѳn! chib.m

Katѳ ñimbe ashib, mѳrѳb indiinrrun cha, Efesѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Asia birau kerligu lutau Pablѳbe: Mѳguelѳ taska maliilѳbe tiusmera gѳmѳn chib, ke treeg kuitamab isumne inchib wamincha, misagwan truba nѳrrѳ tarѳmalin gѳn cha.
Tru gwalѳmmerawan tru srѳ mayweimburappe truba namig waminchib kurrabelѳ gѳn.
Incha Macedѳniamaybe nui pagatѳ purugubelan Timѳteѳwanba, Erastѳnba ѳra, nѳbe Asia birau gatѳ kan maya yana gѳsrѳn kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn..
Incha ѳyamay Señѳrwei wambe larrѳbichib nurab, mu chindamgaig kѳrrѳmisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen tru k'aig librѳn kusrewa, kwaimandzigweimburabelan marѳbelѳbe truba yamelѳ truilѳgucha treetѳwei tru nѳmui k'aig librѳmeran srua amrrua, mayeelai merrab chab parrѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchen tru librѳ beni anmeran mayan gѳtashchab ashene, cincuenta mil gѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru ѳyeeg purayaigwane tru Efesѳ warab misaamera mayeelѳba wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn, judíѳsmera lata, griegѳsmera lata. Inchen mayeelѳba truba rruba kѳriimatѳben, Señѳr Jesúswei munchibe masken, masken wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen mѳ judíѳsmera gѳsrѳn kwaimandziimeran tru misaamerainukkurri webusrѳb truѳrѳ, truѳrѳ amѳñibelѳgucha tru treeg maramig Señѳr Jesúswei munchitѳga mara ashchab inchibelѳ gѳn, tru kwaimandziimeran trenchib: ¡Tru Pablѳ eshkab kusrenanig Jesúswei munchiyu, nabe webambay t'amѳnrrun! chib.Inchen tru iigwan marѳbelѳbe kan judíѳ Esceva t'aig, tru sacerdѳtesmeran karubigwei nusrkalѳ siete gѳbig kѳn.

Inchen mѳ judíѳsmera gѳsrѳn kwaimandziimeran tru misaamerainukkurri webusrѳb truѳrѳ, truѳrѳ amѳñibelѳgucha tru treeg maramig Señѳr Jesúswei munchitѳga mara ashchab inchibelѳ gѳn, tru kwaimandziimeran trenchib: ¡Tru Pablѳ eshk'ab kusrenanig Jesúswei munchiyu, nabe webambay tamѳnrrun! chib.
Incha Tiusbe Pablѳi tasikkurli maramburab maliilѳ purѳ nѳrreelѳ marѳbig kѳn.
Treetѳ pa bila ѳrѳba maren, trugurri Asia birau warab misaamerabe mayeelѳba, judíѳsmera lata, griegѳsmera lata Señѳrwei wamwan mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Incha Pablѳbe pѳn bѳl ѳrѳba judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau nѳbe chigucha kѳrmѳ kusrenanѳb ѳyeeg kѳmѳn chib, ѳyamay gѳn chib waminchibig kѳn, maig kuigwan nebua asamne inchib Tius nѳ ashib karub pasraigweimburab.
Truilѳbe kerrigube mѳguelѳ dѳceburab gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe ѳyeegwan mѳrabe, Señѳr Jesúswei munchiyu piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn.k

Inchen Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Juanbe nѳm mas kaig marmѳnrrab isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirain gѳnmab asamig piu umbu nѳmun ulsrailѳ gúig kѳn cha, tru nui wendau attrabig Jesúswan nѳ gúitamab isua, misaamerabe nun kѳreinrrain chib.
Inchabe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ñimbe Cristѳn kѳreb uras Espíritu Santѳn utѳgueh? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Espíritu Santѳ kѳbig kuin gúi nambe wammѳrѳbguen wammѳrmeelѳ guer cha trenchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen ke mumayguen gѳmíig peemaytѳ buptinchen, mѳikkurrindѳgucha tarѳmisra, Bernabébe Marcѳswan pera barcѳyu Chipresrѳmay ibig kѳn..
trune Pablѳbe pera ambamgaig kui ashibig kѳn, kaguende tru srѳsrѳ ambenma Marcѳsbe Panfiliatѳ nѳmun tarѳmisra, nѳmba tru maramigwan martrab imuinukkurri.
Inchen Bernabébe Juanwan, katѳ nundѳwei Marcѳs taigwan, pera inrrab inchen,
Inchen Pablѳba, Bernabébabe Antiѳquíasrѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn, trusreelѳ truba yamelѳba Señѳrwei wamwan kusrennѳb, katѳ trunun wammѳrѳsrѳb.
Inchen Judasba, Silasba nѳmgucha Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳtѳwein gua, tru tabig purugub wam nu wamincha guetiitѳga trusrѳ nunelan kullaaramѳ ambub melamig kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha trunun nѳm lewabe, truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn ѳyeeg purugub wam t'abig wamindigwan mѳra.

tru taska mari tiusmeran animal gweecha pѳnsrai yaumeran mamѳwei, katѳ aniwan mamѳwei, kweetsig kѳmѳtѳ ka melamisratѳ kwaig animalmerai yauwan mamѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ lata ishumbur lata larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marmѳwei indamigwan. Ñim ѳyeelan marѳb pѳnrrѳmuikkurrimbe, sѳl marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrabguen. Trube, ungwa, mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳnrrigay, chib pѳrig kѳn.k
Tru Pablѳba, Bernabébabe Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchigurri ke kwamig nebuinanrraptiikken inchib melѳwar gѳn.
Incha treekkurli nam mayeelѳba kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, namui utuelan mѳ mѳguelan gѳsrѳn lawa wesrua, namui undaaraig nunelѳ Bernabéba, Pablѳba kegѳtѳ nѳmun ñimuimay ѳrtrab inder.

Incha nѳmune ѳrѳppe, kan kilga ѳyeeg chibig pѳra, trana ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn: Nam Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ, nam ñimui nunelѳ ñim judíѳs kѳmeelѳ Antiѳquíasrѳmba, Siriasrѳmba, Ciliciasrѳmba warabelѳ nunelan ka amѳñigueh chinrrab inder.

Kaguende merrab manasrѳngurli Mѳiséswei pѳliilan ciudamѳlig judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayube eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ tѳgagѳben, truilѳbe islin gwalѳmmѳlig tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳligwane lebelѳ gѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchawei nabe, ke treeg maramne inchib pѳnrramgaig kui ashar cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳmui merrabsrѳ marѳb gúilan elacha, Tiusweinug pѳnrrѳnrrab llirawa amrrubelan.
Tru Señѳr iilan marѳbig ѳyeeg t'an daig, tru manasrѳngurri ѳyeeg martrab isua tѳgaguen waig kѳbigwan.
