Pѳs mѳi ѳyeeg pubiibe, tru merrabsrѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ maig pѳriiba ke kandѳ gѳn cha. Tru ѳyeeg pѳrig basraimbala:
Simónbe wamindan cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran srѳtѳgurri nѳmungucha isua basranmab ashchai, truilai utugurri nui ureg sѳtѳmera gѳnrrai mara, nui munchin nѳmuinug tѳgagѳnrrai marigwan.n

Inchen truyu maya misag tulundzuna basrabiibe nilѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisra, mѳrѳb purrabelѳ gѳn, Bernabéba, Pablѳba tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utusrѳ, Tiusbe nѳmba pasrain gúi ashchai nѳmgurli maliilanba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai maliilanba waminchen.
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Señѳr Jesús tru ka yandѳ tab incha ketiitѳgatѳ nambe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guermab kѳrewa bѳnrrer cha, nѳm lataitѳwei.
Tiusbe nѳmun nѳѳrѳ mara namuingatѳtѳ inchib pasrѳmuig kѳn cha, nѳmui isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúitѳgatѳ nѳmui manrrѳmeran chishmarig kѳbig kua.

Inchen purѳ rrѳmbѳig mur aleguiyab gѳmig puben, Pedrѳbe kurra basramisra, trenchibig kѳn: Nai nunelѳ, ñimbe srѳsrѳ gwalѳmmerawangurri ashibelѳ gúinrrun cha, Tiusbe ñimui utugurri nan lawa wesruig kѳn cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera tru tabig srѳ wamwan na waminchen mѳra, kѳrenrrai.

Inchene mѳilѳgѳsrѳn merrappe fariseѳsmeraingateelѳ gѳbelѳ gua, mѳimbe Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Jesucristѳn kѳrebelane tru circuncidamigwan maringarub, katѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriilan maringarumig balan cha.

Inchen tru iglesiayuelѳ tru amrrai karua ѳriilѳbe Fenicia birѳwanba, Samaria birѳwanba puraambub ambubelѳ gѳn, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳmui trendѳ marѳb gúilan elacha, Tiuswei maywan amѳñinrrab nѳm mandѳ pѳnrramisrigwan eshkab. Treekkurri trusrѳ tru mayeelѳ nunelѳbe truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru uras mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Judeagurri Antiѳquíasrѳmay amba, nunelan treeg kusrenanin gѳbig kѳn: Mѳisés kusrennig tru circuncisiѳn maramigwan marmѳwabe, kaigyugurrimbe wesrailѳ gѳnrraamѳn chib.n

Inchen tru urastѳ Señѳrwei kan ángel Herѳdeswane kwanrrѳ benѳsrkѳbig kѳn, kaguende tru maya nuguen tab gѳnrrai indigwan Tiuswein gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, nuyasig kѳnrrai inchib wabenba. Incha nѳbe pѳlѳmmera maig kwabig kѳn..
Inchen misaamerabe trashib mendappe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Iigwan waminchibiibe mѳg kѳmѳtѳ, kan tius kѳn! chib.
Inchen Herѳdesbe kan gwalѳm treeg martrab cha wesrua basra, tru gwalѳmbe Herѳdesbe tru keilѳ purѳ tabelan kewa, tru wamisra ashib karub wainug wamisra chull mѳramdiig purѳ may waminchibig kѳn.

Inchen Herѳdesbe langarua, wetѳrranrrab gaimappe, tru suldau ashib pѳnrrabelan maig purayaigwan nѳmun paya ashib srua guabe, kweetsingaruig kѳbig kѳn. Incha Herѳdesbe Judeagurri webya, Cesareasrѳmay ya, trusrѳ tsubig kѳn.

Inchen nѳbe nilѳtѳ gѳnrray siñal mara, tru kailan keeli yaugurli Señѳr mandѳ wesraigwan eshkawabe, trenchibig kѳn: Jacѳbѳnba, nunelѳ katѳganelanba iigwan wammѳrѳsrkѳnrligay cha. Incha webyabe, peesrѳmay ibig kѳn.
Pedrѳi wam gúi mѳrѳppe, kasrag kѳbiitѳ yaskabwanguen kurmѳtѳ, katѳle umbusrѳ kelula: ¡Pedrѳ yaskabu pasrѳtan! cha, eshkabig kѳn.m
Incha Pedrѳbe yagueta pua, yaskabwan pinrrѳgѳbene, kan srusrѳunѳ truyu mendig mendabig, Rѳde taibe, mu gѳtashchab arruabe,

Inchen Pedrѳbe yandѳ chigúi mѳra trenchibig kѳn: Mѳimbeguende, Señѳr nui ángelwan ѳra, Herѳdeswei taskugurrimba, k'atѳ maya judíѳsmera nan maig martashchab ashig kui inchib pѳnrraigugurrimba wesratan cha.
Inchen webyabe ángelwei wendautѳ ibendѳ, tru ángel ѳyeeg punrraig marigwane ka inditamaptѳ isub, nѳbe tab chigúi nebua ashmíig kѳn, pѳs ѳyeebe nune kan piaig lataitѳ gѳben.

Inchen mѳi mѳi kan Señѳrwei ángel kenamisren, tru kailan keeri yaube kan tѳrguegwalmabig kebilѳben, ángelbe Pedrѳn tѳmbulyu kѳnѳga kasrѳnanabe, trenchibig kѳn: ¡Mallatѳ kurrѳ! cha. Inchen cadenasmerabe Pedrѳi taskugurri kѳrraptinchibig kѳn.
Inchawei Pedrѳbe kailan tru keeri yaugurri webimѳnrrai truba may ashib tѳgagúig waben, iglesiabe nuyasig ¡gatѳ! elachimѳ, Tiusba waminchib miab gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Juanwei nuneg Jacѳbѳne espadatѳga kweetsingarubig kѳn.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan rey Herѳdesbe mѳilan gѳsrѳn iglesiayuelan kemѳrѳbig kѳn, kaig inchib srua gѳnrrab.
Inchawei Antiѳquíasrѳ Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe nѳmun kanun ganun maig tranamdiig kѳben an treeg purugua trana, ѳrtrab chibelѳ gѳn, nunelѳ tru Judeasrѳ warabelayasig.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ Jerusaléngurri Antiѳquíamay kѳrrѳrrubelѳ gѳn.n

Incha nѳmbe trusrѳ pila ѳrѳba iglesiayuelѳba tulundzunab gua, misagwan nѳrrѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn. Tru Antiѳquíasrѳn gúig kѳn, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ pѳlbasra Cristѳielѳ cha munchi basra wamig.k
Inchen Bernabé trusrѳ puabe, Tius ka yandѳ tab indin gua asha, nѳbe truba kasraarawa, Señѳrwei mayu pѳnrrappe nѳmui manrrau tab isua mur bѳnrrѳnrrai mayeelan waminchibig kѳn.
Inchen Jerusalénsrѳ iglesiayuelѳbe trunun wammѳra, nѳmbe Bernabéwane Antiѳquíasrѳngatig ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ nѳmui utuelѳ mѳilѳgѳsrѳn, chipresreelѳba, cirenesreelѳba Antiѳquía ciudayu puabe, griegѳsmerangucha waminchibelѳ gѳn, Señѳr Jesúsweimburab eshkab kusrenanѳb.

Inchen Tiuswei misaamera jerusalénsreelѳ iilan mѳrabe, yandѳ chi chimѳtѳ, Tiuswan truba tabig waminchib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Trube, Tiusbe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerangucha ѳsig kѳmigwan nebua tѳgagѳnrrai kaig marigwan isua mѳra, nuimay lliranrrai marin gѳn chib.
Inchen na pua, truyu waminchib mendѳbene, tru srѳsrѳzhiitѳ Espíritu Santѳ namuim bala kѳrraarrub lataitѳwei nѳmuim bala kѳrraarruptinchibig kѳn cha.n
Truibe ñiba, ñui yauelanba kaigyugurli mandѳ incha ñimun wesrailѳ gѳm wammeran waminchun chitan, chibig kѳn.
Inchen trunetѳ pѳn mѳguelѳ Cesareasrѳngurri nan lanrrab ѳriilѳ nam purrai yau puptinchibelѳ gѳn cha.
Truibe pѳnmay treetѳ rreetѳ incha, katѳ kerriguba srѳmbalasrѳmay nebibig kѳn cha.k
Katѳ kan wamgucha trendai mѳlinabig kѳn cha: Pedrѳ, kurrab kweecha, ma cha.
Inchen umbu chi tѳgaig kѳtashchab na tab ashene, animalmera pib srѳb tѳgailѳ gѳben, namiguelѳ gѳben, pirau srala ambubelѳ gѳben, pala amѳñib illimera gѳben tѳgaig asinabig kѳn cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe lutѳgurri maig purayaigwan eshkab, trenchibig kѳn:
Incha Pedrѳ Jerusalénsrѳ katѳ nebibene, tru asru circuncidawar kѳrewarbe nune ѳyeebe maig marѳb pasrѳgu chib,n
Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, nunelѳ Judeasrѳ warabelѳba tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameragucha Tiuswei wamwan utin gúi wammѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pedrѳbe Jesucristѳi munchiyu nѳmun piu umbu ulsrѳngarubig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe Pedrѳn: Katѳgan mam gwalѳm gѳsrѳn tiusmanda namba kѳrrѳmisr chibelѳ gѳn.k
Kaguende nѳmbe mѳriimíig peg wam wamindi mѳramba, Tiuswan tabig wamindamba indi ashibelѳ gѳn.k
Inchen Pedrѳ ѳyeeg waminchib pasramnetѳ, Espílitu Santѳbe kѳrraarrubig kѳn, tru mayeelѳ Tiuswei wamwan wamindi mѳrѳb pѳnrrabelaim bala.
Incha Tiusbe namune misaameran eshkab kusrenanrrai karuig kѳn cha, tru ѳsiguelan lata, kwabelan lata maig kѳnrrabigwan asha martrai Tius pasriibe nѳ gѳn chib, nam waminchib eshkanrrai..
Inchendѳ Tiusbe pѳn gwalѳmyube gatѳle kusrua, nune kenamisringaruig kѳn cha..

Nabe tru Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsweimburab truigwan waminchar cha, Tiusbe nune Espílitu Santѳtѳgaba, nui maramburab maliitѳgaba itѳlushen, nѳbe tabig marѳb, nugwaimandzig mandѳguen gѳmui melѳnrrai srua gúilan tamarѳb unig kѳbig kѳn cha, Tius nѳba basraikkurli.

Tiusbe Israelweinukkurri amrrub misaameran chi isumѳ tab amѳnamig kѳnrrai marѳbig tabig srѳ wamwan Jesucristѳgurri eshkab kusrenananig kѳn cha. Nѳbe Mayeelaim Bala Nѳ Garub Nѳ Ashib Pasrabig kѳn cha.k
Inchen Pedrѳbe waminchib pѳlbasra, trenchibig kѳn: Mѳimbe ciertѳnwei wetѳbeñar cha, Tiusbe mѳilane ѳrѳmara gatѳganelandѳ tab inchimѳtѳ lata isubig kuin gúi..
trenchitan cha: Cѳrneliѳ, Tiusbe ñi nun wamindiilan mѳrѳb, katѳ chigѳben palai melabelan isua ashib purugub indiilan chigucha, Tiusbe pesannamѳ, isua gѳn cha.m

Inchawei Jѳpe ciudasrѳmay karua ѳr chibig kѳn, Simónwan wamѳnrrab, katѳgan munchibe truigwane Pedrѳgucha taig. Truibe tru Simón kalusmeran tabzhig kullaarana tamarѳbig mar bulu ya basraigweinug ya beba tsun cha.
Inchawei treekkurri nan wamѳben latatѳ, chi chib pasrѳmѳtѳ, arrur cha. Inchawei ñimun payrrab inchar chibig kѳn. ¿Chigurri nan wama ѳrig kuin gúi?
Incha Pedrѳbe Cѳrneliѳba waminchib, waminchib kebyabe, truba nu misag tulundzuna pasrain gúi ashibig kѳn..
trune Pedrѳbe nun trenchib kusrabig kѳn: ¡Kurra, pasramisr! cha. Nagucha ñi lataitѳwei ka mѳѳtѳ gur cha.k
Inchen Pedrѳ yau pubene, Cѳrneliѳbe wamѳnrrab webarrua, nui merrab tѳmbѳnsrѳb, kѳriibala tabig waminchen,
Inchen Pedrѳbe kebera, ya beba gѳrrѳmara, k'atѳ gwalѳmbe nѳbe truilѳba kurra iben, nunelѳ tru Jѳpesrѳ warabelѳgucha Pedrѳn lincha ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tru Cѳrneliѳ ѳri mѳguelan wamѳnrrab ashchab kѳrraarruabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tru ñim lab gúibe, na gur cha. ¿Kan chindamig lataig balai amrrugue? cha.k
Inchabe: Kuaje chabe, payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kan Simón, katѳ nundѳwei Pedrѳgucha t'aig, yu ya beba tsuit'a? cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tru nѳ piab lataig asiibe chi chibig kѳnrrabgѳmab isub, nuinetѳ mumayguen gѳmui wamnetѳ, Cѳrneliѳ ѳlig mѳguelѳbe Simónwei ya chugúin gúi paya, yaskabu chabguen pubguen inchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen kan wam trendai mѳrѳbig kѳn: ¡Pedrѳ kurrab, kweecha, ma! cha.
Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, paare, kan treekkucha mana maramѳ! cha. Kan nabe managuen maimíig mamѳnrrai merigwan ma gѳmѳwei, chish mariimíigwan ma gѳmѳwein gur cha..
Inchen tru llensuyube chi animalgurrimbunѳ tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn, pib srѳppar gѳben, pirau srala amѳñibelѳ gѳben, pala amѳñib illimera gѳben gue.
Srѳmbalabe kurim basrѳben, k'an nu llensu lataig pib tsѳmmerayu litsig piraumay kѳrraarri ashibig kѳn.
Inchen nune truba mag isub parѳgwaben, nuyasig mamig nenѳb gѳmne, kan piab lataig tѳgagѳbig kѳn.
Indiibe k'atѳ gwalѳm Cѳrneliѳ ѳriilѳ maywan ambub gua, yandѳ Jѳpesrѳ pub ambub gѳben, Pedrѳbe kwalѳm dѳbѳtag lutau gѳsrѳn wambig yabala Tiusba waminchab nebibig kѳn.
Truibe gatѳgan Simónwei yau, ya beba tsun cha, Simónbe tru k'alusmeran kullaarana tabzhig tamarѳbig mar bulu ya basraig kѳn cha.
Mѳimbe Jѳpe ciudasrѳmay mѳguelѳ ѳr cha, Simón daigwan wamѳnrrab, katѳ nѳbe Pedrѳgucha munchi gѳn cha..

Truibe Tiuswan truba isua basrabig Tiuswan kѳliibala marѳb megabig kѳbig kѳn, mayeelѳ nui yauelѳba kerligu. Katѳ misaameran chugurlin gѳmuielan isua asha purugub tabig marѳb, katѳ managucha Tiusba wamindamigwane pesannamѳ, marѳb megabig kѳbig kѳn.
Cesarea ciudayu k'an mѳg Cѳrneliѳ taig tsubig kѳn, suldau Sѳtѳwan Italianѳ cha wamig sѳtѳyu, tru suldau cienelan nѳ garub pera basrabig.
Inchen ѳyeeg maligwane Jѳpe ciuda ѳrѳba wammѳra, mѳilѳgѳben Señѳrwan truba nu gѳrebelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tasigu kemѳra, kusrua, Tiuswei misaameranba, tru kelѳ peta gwailanba wama, ѳsiguig nѳmun kenamarѳbig kѳn.

Inchen Pedrѳbe truilѳba kurrab ya, trusrѳ pubene, tru kwabig tsuisrѳmay pera amben, mayeelѳ kelѳ peta gwailѳbe Pedrѳim bulu tulundzuna, tru Dѳrcas ѳsig uña, kewa amѳnamelѳ gѳben, katѳ pala itѳgueelѳ gѳben mariilan eshkab truba rruba kishibelѳ gѳn.
Indiibe tru gwalѳmmerawan Dѳrcasbe kwanrrѳ beñippa, kwaptinchen, yandѳ asrwan chab pirabe, pala k'atѳgan pisѳsrѳ k'an salayu trarrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Eneas ¡Jesucristѳbe ñune t'amaran! cha. Kurrab, ñui tsuigwan kusru cha. Inchen Eneasbe tru urastѳ kurrѳben,
Inchen trusrѳmbe kan mѳg Eneas taig kѳnѳnrrab gaimabig kua, ѳchѳ añѳs ѳrѳba camayu kwanrrѳ tsuben, Pedrѳbe pubig kѳn..

Inchen Judea birau kerrigu, katѳ Galilea birausrѳ, Samaria birausrѳ kerrigu iglesiabe ambumay imay t'ab gѳbigwan tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳn. Incha nѳmbe Tiusweimburabelѳyu nѳrrѳrab, Señѳrwei merrab kѳriibala amѳñib inchibelѳ gѳn. Inchen Espíritu Santѳ purugub waminchib pasraitѳgabe purѳ nѳrrѳ nemisrѳb ibig kѳn.

Inchen Señѳrwei munchiyu chigucha kѳrmѳ, Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb, katѳ judíѳsmera griegѳsmerai wamwan waminchibelѳba waminchib, ѳyeebe maig kѳ chib payib inchen, trune nѳmbe nune kwetchabgѳba larabelѳ gѳn..
ѳyamay Saulѳbe nѳmba Jerusalénsrѳ kebib, katѳ webarrub llirab uñibig kѳn.m
Incha Saulѳbe Jerusalénsrѳ puabe, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba linchab inchen, mayeelѳba kѳrig kui inchibelѳ gѳn. Kaguende nѳmbe kѳremeelѳ gѳn Saulѳbe Jesucristѳn kѳrewa unitamappe.
Inchen yandѳ yam gwalѳmyu judíѳsmera Saulѳn kwetchab wamincha gѳben,

Inchen Saulѳbe kusrenanѳb eshkaimѳrig katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen mur basramisrѳb ya, judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelane, ¡kan paare! ѳyeebe mandѳ gúinguen mѳrmѳwa gѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn, Jesúsbe tru Cristѳ muniirab gúig, tru gѳn chib kenamarѳb.
Incha Saulѳbe maben, katѳle nui asrbe t'ammisrѳbig kѳn. Incha Damascѳsrѳ Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba mam gwalѳm gѳsrѳn tsubig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ Saulѳi kabmerayugurrimbe kalus bitis lat'ailѳ kѳrrѳben, katѳ ashibig misrig kѳn. Incha kurrѳben, Saulѳne piu umbu ulsraig kѳn.
Kaguende nabe nun kenamaramѳnrrun cha, nai munchigurri chugatig kaig nebuig megamigwan.m
Mѳima yusrѳnguen mayeelѳ, ñui munchiwan wamab tѳga bѳnrrabelane merrarranrrab sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳ nun treeg martrai ѳrig arrin gѳn cha.k
Inchene Ananías iigwan mѳrѳppe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, i mѳweimburappe, mugѳben wamindi wammѳra gur cha, ñui misaameran Jerusalénsrѳ chitѳ, chitѳ kaig marѳb uniilan..
Señѳrbe nune trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, ѳlgandѳ cha wamin callewan pureb inrrѳ cha. Incha Judaswei yau puabe: ¿Kan mѳg tarsѳsriig Saulѳ taig wah? cha, bayrrig chibig kѳn, truibe Tiusba waminchib wan cha.
Inchen yandѳ Saulѳne piraugurri kusraben, kabwane kurendѳ, chigucha ashchab gaimabig kѳn. Inchen kwalyu kemѳra, srua Damascѳsrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen mѳguelѳ Saulѳba ambubelѳbe truyutѳ pѳnrrambua, ¡gatѳ! wamguen biniilѳ bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn, mungucha ashmubendѳ, wamindigwan mѳra.
Saulѳbe pirau peña tsua, kan wam trendaig mѳrѳbig kѳn: ¿Saulѳ, Saulѳ chindimbarre nane kaig marѳb lliragu? cha trenchibig..
Incha ib menda yandѳ Damascѳ pub lutausrѳ ibene, ¡gatѳ! mѳi mѳi nuingatanbe srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe kan tѳrgwalmabig arrua, nuin bѳtѳgatan pilѳben

Trune Saulѳbe tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelane kaig maramigwanba, kweecha betamigwanbabe namig kѳbiitѳ ke chinchibmѳrѳ inchib uña, treekkurri maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳten ashchab yaig kѳn.
Incha Felipebe Azѳtѳ ciudasrѳ pasraptindinaben, trusrѳ Jesucristѳi t'abig srѳ wamwan ciudamѳrig eshkab kusrenanѳb pureb ya, Cesarea ciudasrѳ pubig kѳn.
Inchen Felipebe trenchibig kѳn: Ñi ñui manrrau newan kѳrebene, treeg marig kѳnrrun cha: Inchen mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn Jesucristѳbe Tiuswei Nusrk'ain gúi isua basrar cha.
Incha maywan ambub gua kan pi wabnug puabe, tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Yube pi wan cha. ¿Na piu umbu ulsraig kѳbsrut'ah? cha.
Inchen Felipebe tru nѳ Tiuswei wam pѳrigwan leb yaigwan truyugurri pѳlbasra, Jesúswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshk'ab kusrenanѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru eunucѳbe Felipen payibig kѳn: Tiusmanda eshkarra cha, ¿Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig nѳasiitѳwein rrenda chindah, kabe mu gatѳganun rrenda chindah? cha.

Tru Tiuswei wam pѳrigwan nѳ leb arriibe iig kѳbig kѳn: Kan ubishawan latawei kwetchab srua ambig kѳn cha. Inchen isig barѳb gѳmne, kan ubishaunѳ nilѳtѳ tsub lataitѳwei, nѳgucha manchibgucha inchimuig kѳn cha.m
Inchen Espíritu Santѳbe Felipene trenchibig kѳn: Wetѳga ѳ carrѳyu kemalla linchi cha..
trusrѳngurri gatѳle arrub pasrappe, kaullimera sruin carruyu Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Isaíaswei pѳrigwan leb arrub pasrabig kѳn..
Inchen Felipeimburappe kan Señѳrwei ángel Felipene trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Kurra, Jerusaléngurri Gazamay gѳrreb maywan tru pѳrr bineppurab inrrѳ cha. Truibe tru mu misag warab waraimѳ may gѳn.
Inchene Simónbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Señѳrwan nayasig ñim miarray cha. Ñi mѳi ѳyeeg chib pasrailѳbe mѳikken nan treeg nebumѳnrrain cha..
Inchawei iig ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig isuigwan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirau cha. Incha ñui manrrau ѳyeeg isuigwan Tius ñun ulѳ bayiimíig kѳnrrai treeg mara kѳrrѳmartashchab Tiuswan miau chibig kѳn.
Nangucha ѳyeeg maramburab maramigwan trannrra cha, nagucha mѳigweim bala gѳben nai tasigwan estsarene, truibe Espíritu Santѳn utѳnrrain chib.
Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ t'asigwan truilaim bala estsara, Espíritu Santѳn kanelan trani ashabe, Simónbe an bagararruah chibig kѳn:
Inchen nѳmbe trusrѳ puabe, tru kѳrebelѳ Espíritu Santѳn utѳnrrai, Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ Jerusalénsrѳ warabelѳ tru samariasreelѳ Tiuswei wamwan ut'a bѳnrramisrin gѳn dai wammѳrabe, Juanwanba, Pedrѳnba trusrѳmay ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Tius nѳ ashib garub wainuguig tru tabig srѳ wamwanba, Jesucristѳi munchiwanba Felipebe eshkab kusrennen, trunun kѳrewabe, ishumbur lata, mѳguelѳ lata piu umbu ulsrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen nune mu amrrubiitѳgucha, kusrebelѳ lata, chi treeg kѳmeelѳ lata nѳ chi martashchab ke nundѳ ashibelѳ gua, trenchibelѳ gѳn: I mѳѳbeguende Tiuswei tru maramburab malig truig kѳn cha, tru Purѳ Nuig, kui asig.
Trugurri misaabe tru ciudayube truba rruba kasraarabelѳ kѳn.m
Kaguende truba yam misaamerainukkurri trѳmbѳig maringarub kwaimandziimera purѳ rrѳmbѳig trashib webamben, katѳ truba yam kѳnѳnrrab gaima warabelѳ gѳben, cѳjѳsmera gѳben, t'amariilѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru Jerusaléngurri webamba ke kan ѳrѳtѳ chab ambubelѳbe chu ambatѳgucha Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Saulѳbe iglesiayuelan purѳ rrѳmbѳig inchib, pinishinrrab inchib, yamѳrig kebya, ishumburwan lata, mѳguelan lata kemѳra, unchib warambatѳ srua webya, kailan keeri yausrѳ pѳnsrѳbig kѳn..
Inchen mѳ mѳguelѳ gѳsrѳn Tiusweimburabelan maizhikken elachimѳ marѳbelѳ Estebanwan isub truba kishib sѳrabelѳ gѳn.
Incha yandѳ tѳmbѳnsra mur trashib wamab trenchibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, nѳm ѳyeeg kaig maligwan chi treeg marmuig kui lataig kѳrrѳmar! cha. Yandѳ chab rrenchabe, kwaptinchibig kѳn.
Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Asay! cha. ¡Srѳmbalamerabe kurin bѳnrrѳben, Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe Tiuswei kusrmay pasrai ashar! cha.m
Trune Estebanbe Espílitu Santѳtѳ netsaig srѳmbalaneb neeshabe, Tiuswei tѳrguegwalmabigwan ashib, katѳ Jesúswane Tiuswei kusrmaygatѳ pasramisra pasrai ashib inchibig kѳn.
Inchen ѳyeeg tailan mѳrѳppe, nѳmui manrraube ke kan chinchibmѳrѳ inchib purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kuilѳ, ke trugulwandѳ tsacha mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, Estebanwan namig kѳbiitѳ.

¿Ñimui kѳlli misaamerama Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kabe kanundѳguen chi kaig marmeelѳ tabelѳ gѳbig kuitarru? cha. Tru Kerriguwan Sѳlgandiig attrabigweimburab manawei eshkab amrrubelane nѳmbe kweetsig kѳbig kѳn cha. Inchen mѳi truig arrubene, ñimbe kailѳ gѳptѳ tsaleelaingatѳ pѳnrramisra, kweetsan cha.
¿Kerrigu iilane nai tasiitѳga marig kѳmuitarru? cha trendaig..
Tiuswein gabyu Davidbe t'abig kui asig kua, nѳbe Jacѳbwei Tius truyu pasrѳnrrai kan ya tranѳbsrumugu cha, miaig kѳbig kѳn cha.

Merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamerabe mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ amѳñib uras, Tius nѳ pasrai carpa ya tabzhigwan tѳgar gѳbig kѳn cha, Tius tru Mѳiséswan maig karuig kѳben treekke, Mѳisés maig asigwan tru treezhigwei maringaruigwan..

Treeg inchen, Tiusbe nѳmuinukkurri tarѳmisrѳpba, chigѳben srѳmbalasrѳ chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabelan tius kui lataig kѳriibala tabig waminchib warѳnrraindѳ elachiptindig kѳn cha, Tiusbe. Inchawei Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelai pѳriilѳyu maig taigbe treeg kѳn cha: Israel misaamera ¿ñim mu misag warab waraimѳnug cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba ambub gua, animal gweetsiilan tranѳb, katѳ chigѳben nayasig kabe nan rranig kѳ chindah? taig.
Incha Aarónwane trenchibelѳ gѳn cha: Namui merrab amrrabelѳ namuyasig tiusmera mar cha. Kaguende Egiptѳ biraugurri namun wesrabig Mѳiséswane chindinguen mѳrmer cha.
Inchen namui kѳlli misaamerabe mѳrѳg kѳmui inchib, kaasha, nѳmui manrrѳwane ke Egiptѳsrѳndѳ basra gѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn cha.
Mu peg kѳmѳtѳ, iibe tru Mѳiséstѳwein gѳn cha israelitasmeran ѳyah chibig: Tius maig karuigwan kan eshkabig nan gusrub lataitѳwei, Tiusbe ñimui misag utugurrindѳwei kusrunrrun cha trenchibig.
Inchen nѳbe Tius nѳmba basrain gúi ashchai maramburab mariilan marѳb Egiptѳsrѳngurri wesruig kѳbig kѳn cha, mar Rѳjѳyu lata, mu misag warab waraimѳnug lata cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba treeg marѳb.
Inchene Señѳrbe trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Ñui srѳbyu albargatiswan wesru cha. Kaguende ñi basraig pirѳbe Tiusweindѳ tarѳmarig kѳn cha.
Inchen Mѳisés trunun mѳrabe, Madian birausrѳmay trubab ya, trusrѳmbe kan peg birausriig lataig tsubig kѳn. Incha trusrѳ bagatѳ nusrkalѳ tѳgagúig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Mѳisésbe tru treeg kenamisrigwan ashabe, truba kwaara, ashchab gatѳguchi kemallene, Señѳrwei wam trenchib mѳrѳ waminchibig kѳn cha:
Indig truig yandѳ cuarenta añѳs puraiben, Sinaí Tun bulu mu misag warab waraimѳnug Mѳiséswan kan ángel kaldusr naarabigyu kenamisrig kѳn cha.
¿Kabe nangucha marig kwalѳm egipciѳn latawei ñune kweechig kѳtah? cha..

Inchen gatѳ gwalѳmbe pailѳ israelit'asmera kwayab gúin gѳben, Mѳisésbe t'ammay kѳrrѳmartrab isua, trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au ñimbe! ¿Mu peguelѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñimmisaatѳwein gѳn cha, kangurrin gangurri chindimbarre ѳyeeg kaig inchib gѳgue? cha.
Inchen Mѳisésbe tru Egiptѳ misaamera maig kusrebelѳ gѳben, treeg kusrenanig kusreweig kѳbig kѳn cha, trurrigu wamindiilѳyu lata nui chi mariilѳyu lata purѳ nuikke.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan Mѳisés kallabig kѳn cha, tru unѳbe Tiuswein gabyu larrѳ tab unѳzhig. Inchen mѳskalѳbe nѳmui yau pѳn bѳlgatig nurana,m
tru reybe sѳratѳ purѳ mѳg isua, namui misaameratѳga mѳg inchib pasrѳwa, namui kѳlli misaamerane maig kѳbash indig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru nѳmui srѳ gallaig mѳgureezheelan kweetsingarub.
Inchen Egiptѳsrѳmbe kan rey Jѳséwan ashmíig ashib karunrrab pѳlbasra,
Inchen nѳmui asrmerane Siquemsrѳmay srua ambig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru merrabsrѳ Abraham Hamѳrwei nusrkalan sѳramig anwei penig basrabigu, Siquem birausrѳ sѳrѳnrrab.k
Pѳs ѳyamay Jacѳbpe Egiptѳmay yaig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru nѳ lata namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera lata chab gwaisrѳmay.
Incha gatѳ wendѳ ambene, Jѳsébe nui nunelane nѳbe tru nѳmui nuneg kuin gúi asingaruben, ѳyamay tru Egiptѳ rey Faraonbe Jѳséwei misagwane mumera gúi nebua asig kѳbig kѳn cha.n
Inchen tru urassrѳ parѳ arrubig kѳn, purѳ rrѳmbѳig isuig melamig Egiptѳ birau ѳrѳba, k'atѳ Canaan birausrѳn chigucha. Inchen namui kѳlli misaamerabe chigucha mamig k'alawa gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Tru Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳ namui merrabsreelѳbe nѳmui nuneg Jѳséwan pusrkwai ashib tsalѳ gѳptѳ, Egiptѳ birausrѳmay srua amrrai yanѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe Jѳséba basrѳwa,

Inchendѳ Tiusbe: Tru nѳmun karua srua gúindiig melѳnrrai marѳb misaameran nѳmune maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maramѳnrrun cha. Inchen trugurrimbe yandѳ tru birausrѳngurri webamba, nѳmbe i birautѳwei nane kѳriibala tabig waminchib gѳnrrun cha.

Inchendѳ nune i pirѳwan nui srѳb rrarramikken, nuyasiibe keta tranmuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ nune i pirѳwane tranrrumѳn cha gѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn cha, katѳ nuinukkurri karrab misaameraimba. Tru urasbe Abrahambe nusrkainguen chigaig kѳbenbatѳsrѳwein gѳbig kѳn.m
Inchabe trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Ñui pirѳwan elachib, ñui yauelan elachib, na eshkam birѳsrѳmay inrrѳ cha..

Inchen nѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Nai misaamera, nai kѳlli misaamera, nan mѳrtray cha: Tius tѳrguegwalmabiibe namui kѳlli misag Abrahamwan Harán birausrѳ tsunrrab imѳwatѳ, Mesѳpѳtamia birau kenamisrig kѳn cha.
Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrigwei maramigwan uta basramisra martrabiibe mu gúin gúi. Kaguende Judasbe nui yamsrѳmay inrrab, tru maramigugurrimbe tarѳmisra pella, peg maywan yaig kѳn cha.k
Inchabe ѳyeeg chib Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, ñibe mayeelai manrrѳmeran ashibiibe, i pailan ñi mѳnun lawa wesrua tѳga basraigwan eshkarra chib,

tru Juan Jesúswan piu umbu nun ulsraikkurrimbunѳ, katѳ nun namuinukkurri kusraben, nun srѳmbalasrѳ utig kѳmnegatig namba managucha tin lincha amѳñibelѳ yu mѳguelѳ kѳn cha. Incha kan treeg lincha uñibigwan, tru Jesús kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiraigwan treeg kѳn chib waminchib, namba tѳgatѳ basrѳnrrai maramibe ke sѳldѳwein gѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchen Jerusalén mayeelѳ warabelѳ wammѳrabe, tru pirѳwane, Acéldama cha wamabelѳ gѳn, nѳmuin rrikkabe, Ani Lusin Dul chibig.)n
Indiibe tru nѳ kaig marimburѳ an utiitѳga kan tul penig kѳn cha. Inchabe ippa, turmay peñippe, patsѳwan srurram beñen, pѳitsimerabe kerrigu webѳlabig kѳn cha.k
Pѳs Judasbe namui utuitѳwei, k'atѳ namui maramelѳyu maramig tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru gwalѳmmerawan Jesucristѳ kusrenanigwan marѳbelѳ kan cientѳ veinte gѳsrѳn tulundzuna gѳben, Pedrѳbe truilai utu pasramisra trenchibig kѳn::

Jerusalén ciudayu puabe, tru nѳm pui yau, pala pisusrѳ nebambubelѳ gѳn, truyube Pedrѳ gѳben, Juan gѳben, Jacѳbѳ gѳben, Andrés kѳben, Felipe gѳben, Tѳmás kѳben, Bartѳlѳmé gѳben, Mateѳ gѳben, Alfeѳwei nusrkai Jacѳbѳ gѳben, Simón Zelѳte gѳben, Jacѳbѳi nusrkai Judas kѳben, tru iilѳ ya beba warainug.

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Galileasrѳ mѳguelѳ, chindimba srѳmbalaneb neeshib kѳrrѳmisrke? cha. I Jesústѳwei ñimui utugurri srѳmbalasrѳmay srua yainabiibe, ñim maig yai asig k'atѳ nѳbe treetѳweih attrun chibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Jesús iben, nѳm srѳmbalaneb neeshib pѳnrramnetѳ, mѳimbe pagatѳ mѳguelѳ pulѳzheelѳ kewar nѳmuim bulu kenamisrabe,
Incha yandѳ iigwan chab waminchene, nѳm ashib pѳnrramne, Jesúswane pala kusruben, k'an wañi arrua, nun pinѳbulen, yandѳ mas ashchab gaimabelѳ gѳn.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Treeg maramibe mana bunrrabigwanba, Mѳskai nѳashib nui maram burab mariitѳgatѳwei chi gwalѳm treeg punrrai mara kѳrrѳmaramigwanbabe, ñimbe wammѳra gѳmig chi palѳmѳn cha.n
tru ñim nan ѳyah taig mѳrig kѳbigwan. Pѳs Juanbe isa gѳmѳtѳ, pitѳga pinѳbuliilѳ gѳnrrai ulsrain gѳn cha. Trune ñimbe mam gwalѳmyutѳ Espíritu Santѳtѳga pinѳbuliilѳ gѳnrrun chibig kѳn.

Incha nѳbe kwaig tsua, ѳsiirawa, nѳmune ѳsiguig kenamisrѳbig kѳn, nѳ gúin gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai chine marѳb. Incha nѳbe kwalѳmmera cuarent'a nemisramne nѳmun kenamisrѳb uña, Tius nѳ karub waigweimburabigwan waminchibig kѳn.
Inchen kwalѳmmѳrig ke lѳtsѳzhig maya misaamerabe Tiuswei yau nun mѳrtrab pubelѳ gѳn.
Incha Jesúsbe kwalѳmmerawane Tiuswei yau kusrenana, yembe ѳlivѳs taig tunsrѳ kѳrrѳmisrtrab ibig kѳn.m
Kaguen tru gwalѳmbe yu pirau muba kuimburab mayeelaim bala treeg attrun chibig kѳn..
Judea birau warabelѳbe tunmerasrѳmay wegѳrra lulay. Inchen ciudayu warabelѳbe truyugurri webambamig kѳn. Inchen ciudayugurri yabsrѳ warabelѳbe ciudayumay katѳ ammѳtay.m
ѳyeetѳwei ñim iilan purayai ashabe, Tius nѳ ashib karub pasraibe yandѳ lutau gúitamab isua guy cha.k
ishiimera weguchib mendѳbene, ñimbe pachig kwalѳmmera arrumig lutau gúi asan cha.
Ñim chi arringucha melabig melѳwabe, ñimasiitѳwei ñimui mѳsiimerane ѳsiguig wesranrrabguen cha trenchibig kѳn.
Inchendѳ ñimui turyu kan busruuzhikken chi indiimíig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Incha gatѳ ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn cha, kemesra trenchibig kѳn: Higueranma asay cha, katѳ mayan tusrmeranba,m
Katѳ misaamerabe yu pirau maig purainrrabelan isubiibah kѳrig kѳbiibatѳ pesannanrrun, kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ purѳ nѳrreelѳ pѳnrrabelan kѳnѳgѳb sruagutsiilѳ gѳben.
Maya misaabe ñimune nagurrindѳ tsalѳ indiilѳ gѳnrrabguen cha.
Inchen ñimui mѳskalѳ gѳben, nunelѳ gѳben, ñimui ñimmisaamera gѳben, ñimui trendѳ linchibelѳ gѳben, ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelan tranen, ñimun mѳilane kwetchun cha.

Kaguen ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ mayeelѳ, nѳm manchaguen lѳtѳnrrain gѳmѳwei, nѳm ñimun purab waminchib kasrѳnrrain gѳmѳwei, nabe ñimun muguen ѳyeeg waminchimuinrrunig wamindamig tranamѳnrrun chibig kѳn..
Ñimui manrrѳyube ѳyeegwan isua bѳnrrѳnrligay chibig kѳn, mandѳ lѳtamigwan ke kanmaytѳ isua tѳga bѳnrrѳnrrab inchimѳnrrab.
naimburab ñim wamindamig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.m

Inchendѳ ѳyeelѳ arrumѳwatѳ, ñimune kemѳrѳb, larrѳ gaig marѳb inchun cha. Katѳ ñimune judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayumay payib sruagѳnrrab srua ambamba, kailan keeri yau keera pѳnsramba inchun cha. Incha nagurrindѳ reymerai merrab gѳben, karubelai merrab gѳben srua amben,
Kaguende trѳmbѳig mѳra melѳnrrai maram gwalѳmmera kѳnrrun, Tiuswei wamwan pѳligu maig taig kerligu treeg nebunrrai.
Inchabe gatѳ trenchibig kѳn: Peg misaamerabe katѳgan peg misaameraba kwayaben, katѳ rey karumburab ashib karuim birauelѳbe katѳgan reywei misaameraba kwayanrrun cha..

Trune pirѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳnabelѳ arrumba, chu birausrѳn gѳben parѳ amrrumba, kaig kwanrrѳmera amrrumba inchen, kѳrig kѳmdiig chigѳben arrumba, katѳ srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe chigѳben truba nѳrreelѳ kenamisrѳb inchun cha.
Incha Pilatѳbe kurusyu kan pѳrig mesrѳnrrai karubig kѳn: scJESUS NAZARETSRIIG, JUDIѳSMERAI TRU REY GѳNd chibig.
Incha truyu kurusyu mesrѳbelѳ gѳn, katѳ pailan pinrrѳmenda kan gan, Jesúswane tru tѳbѳt'akke.
Inchen yandѳ Pilatѳbe Jesúswan kurusyu mesrѳnrrai nѳmun tranѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe Jesúswan kemѳra, srua amben,
Pascua Fiesta maramig k'an gwalѳmdѳ balѳben, kwalѳm dѳbѳtag kѳsrѳn gѳbig kѳn. Inchen Pilatѳbe judíѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au, ñimui rey yu pasran! cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳt'abig kѳn: Nan ѳyeeg punrrai ñi marѳb wamigwane chigaig kѳbsruinrrun cha, ñun srѳmbalasrѳngurri treeg marѳb wanrrai tranmuig kuimbe. Inchawei tru nan ñui t'asku tranѳbiibe purab gaikken mara basran cha.Trugurrimbe Pilatѳbe Jesúswan mandѳ incha elatsamdiig kѳt'ashchab labig kѳn. Trune judíѳsmerabe trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: Ñi nun elachabe, Rѳma maya misagwan karub wabig Césarweingatiig kѳmѳn kѳn chib. Kaguende mѳikkѳben: Rey gur chib pasrabiibe Rѳma maya misagwan karub wabig Césarweingatiig kѳmѳn chib.
Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Nanguen lѳtѳmѳnrrapteh? cha. Nabe ñun elatsamdiig kѳbene, elachib, kurusyu mesramdiig kѳbene, mesrѳb indamig mu mandamgaig maramigwane na asha marѳbig kui ¿ashmѳtirru? cha.
Inchen Pilatѳbe tru trendaigwan mѳrabe, mas kѳrig kui inchibig kѳn.

Inchen tru sacerdѳtesmeran k'arubelѳba, tru pѳlicíameraba Jesúswan ashippe, trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡Kurusyu mesrѳ! ¡Kurusyu mesrѳ! chib. Inchen Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Treeg kѳbene, trube, ñimdѳwei srua amba, kurusyu mesray cha. Pѳs, nabe naimburappe, nuinuube chigucha chi k'alѳ mariibe wetѳrramur cha.
Inchene Pilatѳbe katѳyug webya, misaamerane trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au! Nun wambiisrѳ pera arrumѳnrrun cha, nuinuube chigucha chi kalѳ marig nabe wetѳrramuin gúi ñim ashchai.
Inchabe nuim bulu kemallabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Judíѳsmerai rey, viva! chib. Incha malѳbѳtѳ pashagutsamba inchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Pilatѳbe Jesúswan merrarrawa, itsingarubig kѳn.m
Jesúsbe truilѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, katѳgan Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳmig mariilѳ truba kenamarѳbig kѳn nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilai merrab. Truilѳbe i kilgamerayube pѳrig kaagѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Tѳmás ¿mѳi ke nan ashagan kѳretirru? cha. Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, ashmѳwagucha, kѳrebelѳbe.

Inchabe Tѳmáswane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Ñui tasigunan yu kegwanѳb, nai tasiimeran ash cha. Incha ñui kwalwan larrѳbicha, yu nai tѳmbulyu tasigwan kegwan cha. Ke truig kѳmuitamaptѳ isub uñmѳtѳ, ñiguen kѳrebig ku cha.

Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kanelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nambe Señѳrwan aser cha. Inchene Tѳmásbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe nui t'asku kѳlabus larrѳѳriilan ashmѳwei, katѳ tru kѳlabus larrѳѳriilѳyu t'asigunan kegwanmѳwei, katѳ tru nui tѳmbulyu nai t'asigwan kegwanmѳwei inchimuppe, nabe kѳremumѳnrrun cha.

Ñim mѳilan gѳben nѳmui kaig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ kagѳbashene, truilai kaig mariilѳbe ulѳ bayamig kѳmíig kѳrrѳmisran cha. Inchen ñim truilai kaig mariilan pesannamѳ ulѳ bayene, nѳmune pesannamѳ ulѳ bayamig kѳnrrun chibig kѳn.n
Incha iigwan chab rrenchabe, Jesúsbe nѳmuim bala urra, trenchibig kѳn: Espílitu Santѳn utay cha.
Incha chab rrenchabe tasiimeranba, nui tѳmbulwanba kenamarene, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe Señѳrwan ashippe, truba rruba k'asraarabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen María Magdalenabe yabe, tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilan: ¡Nabe Señѳrwan ashar! chibig kѳn. Incha Señѳr nun maig tailangucha nѳmun eshkabig kѳn.m
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¡María! cha. Inchene nѳbe keesha ashabe, hebreѳmay: ¡Rabuni! chibig kѳn, (trenchippe, Kusrennѳbig chib.
Iigwan chab rrencha, nѳ keesha ashene, truyu Jesúsbe pasraptinchibig kѳn. Inchendѳ, nѳbe Jesús kuitamappe isumíig kѳn.

pagatѳ ángelesmera puliig kѳrrabig kewar, tru Jesúswei asrwan wayig kѳbigube kane turgabѳryu, kane katsigu purrai ashiptinchibig kѳn.Inchen ángelesmerabe payibelѳ gѳn: Ishug, ¿chindimba guishku? cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Pѳs nai Señѳrwan srua ambin gѳn cha. Incha chu wayig mѳrmur cha..
Incha tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe nѳmui yamay katѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs katѳgucha nѳmbe tru Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu Jesúsbe kwabelai utugurri katѳle ѳsiiramig palѳnrrab gѳn daigwane chigúi mѳrmuin gѳbig kѳn.m
Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera unig tru sѳrinug nѳmerrig merrab pubikkucha, yandѳ umbѳsrѳngatig kebya, ashabe, kѳrebig kѳn.
Inchagucha tru Jesúswei turwan pinѳbulig llensugucha, tru kirri llensumeraba trubalatѳ gѳmѳ, nѳѳrѳ kurisaig trarrig tsubig kѳn.
Inchen nui wendautѳ Simón Pedrѳbe pua, sѳlin rrabyu kebyabe, tru llensumerane truyu warai ashibig kѳn.
Pailѳba kegѳtѳ lulѳb ambendѳ, k'ane Pedrѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, k'atѳguchinguen mur lula, tru sѳriisrѳ nѳmerrig lulѳb pubig kѳn.
Incha tru srѳ rrune pѳlbasrѳb gwalѳm María Magdalenabe lѳtsѳzhig sѳriisrѳmay ullarbatѳ ibene, tru sѳrin rrabyu nu srug kasraibe kusruim basraptindi ashibig kѳn.
Katѳ chigѳben Jesúsbe truba rruba marig kѳbig kѳn. Lutѳgurrih trumѳrig pѳrimbe, tru pѳrig kilgamerabe yu pirau ѳrѳbaguen kemubsruitamab isur.k
Tru kusrenanѳb pera unig trendainabig nѳtѳwei iilane maig kuigwan eshkab wamincha, katѳ nѳtѳwei pѳrѳb indig kѳn. Incha maig kuigwan nѳ eshkab wamindiibe isatѳ gѳmѳ, ciertѳn gúi asha bѳnrrer.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¿Na arrumnegatig nune ka uñchai indingucha, ñuimburappe treegwane chi asamig kaagѳn cha? Ñibe nai mendig amѳ chibig kѳn.
Inchen Pedrѳbe truigwan ashabe, Jesúswan payibig kѳn: Señѳr ¿inchen ѳigwane ñibe mandѳ inchainchigu? cha.
ѳyan chippe, Pedrѳ nѳ mandѳ kwamig nebuben, treeg kwaitѳga Tiuswan maya nuguen tabig indig kѳnrrai martrab gѳn cha, trendaig kѳn Jesúsbe. Inchabe Pedrѳne trenchibig kѳn: Nai mendig amѳ cha.

Pѳnmay gѳnrrabyu katѳle bayibig kѳn: Simón, Juanwei nusrkai, ¿nan undaguig kuguh? cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe kullaarab isui inchibig kѳn, kaguende chabguen pѳnmayguen: ¿Nan undaguig kuguh? chib bayen. Inchen nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, ñibe chiwandѳgucha kerrigu ashibig kѳn cha. Nabe ñun undaguig kui ñibe ashibig kѳn cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai ubishameran mannѳb ashib tѳgagѳrrunrrig cha.

Yandѳ chab mabe, Jesúsbe Simón Pedrѳn payibig kѳn: Simón, Juanwei nusrkai, ¿iilѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, nan mas undaguig kuguh? cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ѳѳ, Señѳr, nabe ñun undaguig kui ñibe ashibig kѳn cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai ubishaureemeran mannѳb ashib tѳgagѳrrunrrig cha.k
Inchene Jesúsbe kemalla, pirriwan nui tasku srua basramisrabe, nѳmun srѳrrѳbig kѳn, katѳ peskauwan chigucha.
Inchen Simón Pedrѳbe barcѳyu nebya, at'arrayan nѳrrѳ peskaumeratѳ cientѳ cincuent'a y tres netsiig tѳgaigwan pi mendagatig keet'ab srua ibig kѳn. Inchen maya nu gúingucha, at'arrayabe kѳlsrѳmíig kѳn.

Inchen tru kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kanelѳbe barcѳn srua bubelѳ gѳn, atarrayan peskautѳ netsiig keetab sruar. Kaguende nѳmbe pi mendagurri cien metrѳs kѳsrѳndѳ waraig kѳbig kѳn.Incha nѳmbe pirau pinaambabe, kan trѳsr nag pasrai ashibelѳ gѳn, tru balabe peskauba, pirrimba warig.

Inchene tru kusrenanѳb pera unig Jesúswei undaaraibe Pedrѳne trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au, Señѳr gѳn! cha. Inchene Pedrѳbe: Señѳr gѳn daig mѳrѳppe, nui pala itѳgueigwan wesrawa tsuig kѳppe, truigwan kewa, pѳrѳnab, piyu pѳrsraptinchibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Au, nai ureezheelѳ, ¿chigucha chi peskau kemѳrtrab gaimatirru? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Kah chibelѳ gѳn.

Incha Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe peskanrrab inrrainchar cha. Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Namgucha ñiba amrrunrrab cha. Incha ambabe, kan barcѳyu nebamba, tru yembe chigucha wesrunrrab gaimabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen treeg chab puraiben, Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan katѳle kenamisrѳbig kѳn Tibelias nu bisu menda. Nѳbe ѳyamay kenamislig kѳn:

Incha kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Tiuswei yau sѳteelѳba tulundzunabelѳ gѳn. Incha mamigwan nѳmui yamѳrig truba rruba kasrag, kanbalatѳ lata pirisha mabelѳ gѳn, tabig isua, ka treeg maranmab ashchaindѳ gѳmѳ,
Incha nѳmui pirѳmeran, yameran, katѳ chi tѳgagúilan gѳben yana, sѳteelan pirishibelѳ gѳn, mѳitѳgucha maig balain gѳben, treetѳ.
Inchen nѳmune mѳnundѳgucha ka nѳs nѳstѳ gѳbig kѳn, tru Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳgurri kwaara asha gѳnrrai marѳb, katѳ Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi asha gѳnrrai truba rruba marѳb inchen..
Inchen tru nѳ wamindigwan mѳra utabelane piu umbu ulsrailѳ kѳrrѳmisren, tru gwalѳmbe Jesucristѳn kѳrewa pѳnrramisrѳbelѳbe kan pѳn mil gѳsrѳn nemisrig kѳbig kѳn..

Kaguende i tranamigwan nѳ trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriibe, ñimuyasig kѳb, ñimui ureemerayasig kѳb, katѳ mayeelѳ chu uras tsѳndatѳsrѳ kѳnrrabelayasig kѳb, katѳ mayeelѳ namui Tius nun mun wamag kѳben wamamelai, truilayasig kѳb gѳn chibig kѳn.n

Incha ѳyeeg t'ailan mѳrѳppe, truba kullaarab isui inchibelѳ gѳn nѳmui manrrau kebachen. Inchabe Pedrѳnba, trugurri Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig katѳganelanba payibelѳ gѳn: Ñim nai misaamera, ¿nambe chi maramig kѳnrrerah? cha.

Kaguende Davidbe srѳmbalasrѳmaybe nebimuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ Davidbe trendaig kѳn cha: Señѳr Tiusbe nai Señѳrwane trendan cha: Nai kusrmaygatѳ wamisr cha, ñun ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ inchibelan ñi ñui srѳbmeran truilaim bala nebuna wamig kѳnrrai na pѳnsramnegatig.

Incha nune Tiusweim bulu kusrmay wanrrab attrai kusraben, Mѳskai trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrig tru Espíritu Santѳn uta, uncha tѳgagѳnrrai trunun tranan chibig kѳn. Inchen ñim mѳi ashib, mѳrѳb inchib gúibe, tru gѳn cha..

Davidbe manawei Clistѳ ѳsiiramigwane chab asha gua, tru Clistѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramigwan trencha wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha kwabelѳ pѳnrrainug truyutѳ pasrѳnrrai kѳrrѳmalig kѳmѳwei, katѳ nui asrbe treraig kѳmѳwein gѳnrrai indig kѳnrrun cha.
Nai misaamera, nabe maig kuigwan tѳrgandѳ kelarrab ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misag Davidbe kwaben, sѳrig kѳn cha. Inchen tru nui sѳriibe mѳin gwalѳmgatig namui utu pasran cha..
Ñibe nan ѳsig kѳm maymeran nebua asingarua, ñi naba waikkurli nane truba rruba kasraarangarunrrautan daig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.
Treekkurli nai manrrѳbe truba kasraaraben, nai nilѳbe truba rruba tabig waminchib kasraaran cha. Inchen nai asrken, chi isumѳ muniiramigwan muniirab isrѳnrrun cha.

Inchen nune kwailai utugurri Tiusbe kusraig kѳn cha, ѳyeeg purѳ rrѳmbѳig indinawa kwaig tsuigugurri. Kaguende tru kwab gwanrrai marѳb pasrabiibe nune chinchagucha nѳ merrarrawa tѳgagѳnrrab gaimaig kѳn cha..

Ñim Israel misaamera, na wamindigwan mѳray chibig kѳn: Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsbe Tius nѳ garua ѳri mѳg kui ashchai, nѳ treeg trani mѳg kѳbig kѳn cha, nѳgurri ñimui merrab maramburab mariitѳgaba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai mariitѳgaba, Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳmig mariilѳtѳgaba. Pѳs ñimdѳweinguen ashibelѳ gѳn cha..
Nѳsiibe larrѳ lѳstiig misren, pѳlbe ani lataig misrtrun cha. Señѳr arrum gwalѳm truba nuig purѳ tab gwalѳm pumѳwatѳ, treeg kѳnrrun cha.
Tru gwalѳmmerawane katѳ ishumbur lata, mѳguelѳ lata, nai karuindiig melabelaim bala nai Espílitun uncha tѳgagѳnrrai tranen, nѳmbe na nѳmun chi eshkaigwan eshkanrrun cha.
treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jѳelgurri Tius tru ѳyeeg taig kѳbig, iibe tru gѳn cha:
Ya lѳtsѳ las nuevetѳ gѳben, i mѳguelan ñimbe mutsiguelѳ gѳnmab isuinrrun cha,
Trune kanelѳbe indzatѳ ashib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Mutsiguelѳrre inchib waran cha.
k'atѳ cretasreelѳ gѳben, arabiasreelѳ gѳben, treeg yam balѳsreelѳ gѳbendѳ, nambe mayeelѳba Tius truba nѳrreelѳ mariilan namuin rriimay, namuin rriimay wamindi mѳrer chibelѳ gѳn.
Yube Partѳ birausreelѳ gѳben, medѳsmera gѳben, elamsreelѳ gѳben, mesѳpѳtamiasreelѳ gѳben, judeasreelѳ gѳben, cabadѳciasreelѳ gѳben, pѳntѳsreelѳ gѳben, Asia birausreelѳ gѳben,
Inchen nѳmbe truba kѳrrѳ kwaariilѳ, kangurrin gangurri ¡paare! kan mandѳ guermab isub, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿I mayamba waminchib pѳnrrabelѳbe Galileasrѳ misaamera gѳmuit'arru? chib.
Inchen Jerusalénsrѳmbe judíѳs misaamera warabelѳ gѳn, Tiusweimburabelan maizhikken elachimѳ marѳbelѳ, chu birausrѳngurringuen palѳmíikke.
Inchene nѳmbe mayeelѳba Espíritu Santѳtѳ netsailѳ gѳrrѳmisra, peg, peg wammera waminchib mendabelѳ gѳn, Espíritu nѳmun maig wamindingaruben.
mѳimbe ¡gatѳ! srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe wanrrabig kan truba mur isig ichibig lataig arrubig kѳn, tru purrainuube ¡gatѳ! ya ѳrѳ tru wanrrabiitѳ kasramgue.

Inchawei Tius nui Marѳb Megabigwan kusrua, trugurri Tiusbe ñimuimaymerrig ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, ñim mѳitѳgucha tru kaigwan marmѳnrrab llirawa bѳnrramisren, mayanguen tab indiilѳ gѳnrrain chibig kѳn, Pedrѳbe.
Kaguende mѳikkѳben Tius maig k'aruigwan tru eshk'abigwan mѳrmíigwane, Israel misaamerainukkurri k'anguen gaagѳm, binisaig kѳnrrun daig kѳn cha.

Inchendѳ nѳbe mѳimbatѳbe srѳmbalasrѳ ka wamig kѳn cha, Tius tru chiwandѳgucha lutѳgurri tamara pѳnsramnegatig, tru Tius nuindѳ tarѳmariilѳ nѳ maig karuigwan eshkabelѳgurri nѳ manasrѳwei maig taig, treeg.

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, nimui kaig maliilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliray chibig kѳn, ñimui tru kaig maliilan chi kaig maliimíig lataig kѳrrѳmisrtraimbe. Trumaybe Señѳrbe chi isumѳ, tabig pishindѳ waram gwalѳmmera ѳrѳb,
Pѳs, trube, mѳimbe ñim nai misaamera, ñimbe chugúi mѳrmѳwa, ѳyeeg marѳb pѳnrrain gúin gúi ashar chibig kѳn, katѳ ñimun ashib karub purrabelѳ chigucha..
Incha tru ѳsig kѳmigwan nѳ tѳga basrabigwane ñimbe kweechen, truigwan Tiusbe kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiirangaruben, nambe tru treeg purayaigwane namashib ashibelѳ guer chibig kѳn.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Abrahamwei, Isaacwei, Jacѳbwei Tius namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerai Tiusbe tru nui marѳb megabig Jesúswane tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrai maran cha. Truigwane tru misagwan ashib karub purrabelan ñimbe kemѳra, tranѳb, katѳ Pilatѳbe nune elatchab inchen, ñimbe elachibashmub indig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru uñchab gaimabig kѳbiibe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba kemѳra basramnebe, misaabe mayamba kwariilѳ lulѳbelѳ gѳn Pedrѳmeraimay, tru Tiuswei yau Salѳmónwei Yaskabumay.
Inchen maya misaamerabe nune uñibig misrin gúi ashib, k'atѳ Tiuswan Tabiibe ñitѳ gѳn chib, truba tabig wamindi ashib inchibelѳ gѳn.

Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Angawei, ѳrѳgawein gur cha. Inchendѳ na tѳgagúigwaneguende tranrrumѳn cha. Nazaretsrѳ Jesucristѳi munchiyu kurrab, inrrѳ chibig kѳn.Incha Pedrѳbe kusrmay tasigu kemѳra kusrabene, tru urastѳ nui srѳbmeraba, nui yetѳlѳmeraba mur misren
nѳmbe nun ashabe, Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Namun ash cha.
Inchen tru uñchab gaimabiibe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba Tiuswei yau kebamrrab inchen ashabe an guettra cha miaben,
Kan gwalѳm Pedrѳba, Juanba, maaben las tres pailѳba kegѳtѳ Tiuswei yaumay nebambubelѳ gѳn, Tiusba wamindam uras kѳbene.k

Inchen k'an levita Jѳsé taig pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabig Chipre birausriig, Cristѳ tru nѳashib k'arua ѳriilѳbe truigwane Bernabé cha wamig (trenchippe, Isui melѳben, isui inchimѳnrrai tabig waminchib nusrk'ain gѳn daig.
Inchawei nѳmui utube chigѳben balai inchibiibe muguen kaabig kѳn. Kaguende mѳilѳgѳben pirѳmera, yamera tѳgarbe yana, maig yanigwan anwane srua amrrua,

Incha tru nu misag sѳtѳmera mayeelѳba tru Jesúswan kѳrebelѳbe mѳitѳgucha lata kan manrrѳtѳ lataig lincha bѳnrrab, kandѳ isubelѳ gѳn. Mѳitѳgucha nѳmui chi tѳgagúigwane nain gѳn chimѳtѳ, chi kѳbigwane kanguelarrѳtѳ tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳn..
ñi Tius manasrѳwei ѳyeelѳ purainrrai maig martrab isua tѳgagúilan treeg nebunrrai, martrab.
Pirau reymerabe yandѳ kwayanrrab lutѳmaytѳ pѳnrramisren, katѳ tru ashib karubelѳgucha wamincha kanbalatѳ misra, Señѳr Tiuswanba, nui Cristѳnba kaig martrab namig kurran cha.

tru lincha amѳñibelѳ nѳm iigwan mѳrabe, sѳteelѳba ke kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, Tiusba trenchib waminchibelѳ gѳn: Ñi mayeelaim bala ñi ashib basrabig srѳmbalawan lata, pirѳwan lata, marwan lata, chigurrimbunѳ truyu chi purrabelan chigucha marѳbig,
Kaguende nam ashib, nam mѳrѳb indigwane nambe elachimѳ, wamindamѳnrrun chibelѳ gѳn.
Trune Pedrѳba, Juanbabe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Ñimguen tab isuy cha, Tiuswei merrab sѳl gѳbig kuitashchab nun mѳrmѳtѳ, ñimun mѳrѳb pѳnrramig..
Inchendѳ tru treeg marigwan misag utu mas mas wam larrѳbichimѳnrraimbe, mѳingurrimbunѳbe mungucha Jesúswei munchiyube waminchimѳnrrai chigѳben ñimune maramѳnrrun chinrrab cha, nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha nѳmune tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelѳ purrainukkurri webambingarua, nѳmdѳ kangurrin gangurri bayiyab waminchib gѳrrѳmisrabe,

Pѳs nam kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmibe mu gatѳgan pegwei munchiyube chi gaagѳn cha, kaguende kaigyugurri wesramigwane yu piraube mungucha treeg martrai tranig kaagѳn chibig kѳn.Inchen tru payibelѳbe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanbabe chigucha chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳ, lѳt'ab pѳnrrai ashib, katѳ mana chu kusreb purrѳmeelѳ, chigucha gѳmeelѳ gúin gúi ashib inchabe, truba kwaara asha, nѳmune Jesúswei mendig amѳñibelѳ gúin gúi nebua ashibelѳ gѳn.
Jesúsbe ñim ya marѳbelѳ tru kaasig srug kѳn cha. Inchendѳ tru katsiisrѳmbe pѳlbasra wayig mas purѳ t'ab srukken misrin gѳn cha.
kan mѳg kwanrriigwan nam tabig marigwan chi wetѳgѳrramdiig kѳtashchapba, i mѳwan mandѳ incha tamarig kuitashchapba, ñim namun bayib srua gúig kѳbene,
Incha Juanwanba, Pedrѳnba nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pѳnsrabe payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Ñimbe iigwane maramburab malig muindѳgarre margue? cha. ¿Iilane mui munchiyurre margue? cha.
Inchendѳ mѳilѳgѳben Tiuswei wamwan wamindi mѳrѳbelѳbe Cristѳn kѳreben, mѳguelandѳ munchen trattrѳ milburab nemisrig kѳbig kѳn.
kaguende Pedrѳba, Juanba misaameran kusrenanѳb, katѳ tru kwabelѳbe katѳyug kwailai utugurri ѳsiiramibe Jesucristѳinug kѳn chib, eshkab kusrennimba.k
Incha nѳmbe kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Tiuswei yau kusrenanѳb, katѳ yamѳrig kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn, tru tabig srѳ wambe, Jesúsbe tru Cristѳ gѳn chib, maikken elachimѳgue.
Gamaliel wamindiibe treegwein gúitamab isua, Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilan wama, ichabetabe, Jesúswei munchiyube mas waminchimѳnrrai mera, yandѳ elachibelѳ gѳn..

Inchawei mѳi ѳyeeg puim basrѳbene, nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun cha: Tru mѳguelane k'agѳbashippa, ñimguen k'a ambasay cha. Kaguende tru nѳm chi martrab isua tѳgagúig nѳm chi marѳb amѳnaibe, k'a mѳguelaindѳ gúisruandѳbe, patsѳnrrun cha.

Ñimguen isuy cha, mana gѳsrѳn kan Teudas taig kan truba nu gusreb mѳg kur chibig kurrѳben, truigwanma mѳguelѳ cuatrѳcientѳs mendig amѳnaig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ nune kweechen, mayeelѳba mendig amѳñibelѳbe chab tarѳmisren, chab pinig kѳn cha.
Inchen iigwan mѳrѳbelѳbe, truba trѳmbѳig nama, kwetchab inchibelѳ gѳn..
Nambe ѳyeeg purayaigwane namashib asha bѳnrrer cha. Inchen nun tru mѳrѳbelan Tius tranig Espíritu Santѳ chigucha asha basrainrrun cha.
Ñim kurusyu mesra kweetsig tru Jesúswandѳwei namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerai Tiusbe katѳ ѳsiirangaruig kѳn cha.n
Inchen Pedrѳba, katѳgan Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba lѳtappe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Namuimbe Tiuswanmerrig mѳramig kѳn cha, mѳguelѳ taigwan gѳmѳtѳ.
Incha merrana amrruabe, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab pѳnsrѳben, maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtebe, trenchib payibig kѳn:m

Inchene Tiuswei yau pѳlicíameran ashib pera basrabiibe, nui pѳlicíameraba ya, Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba katѳ merrana ambendѳ, maig kѳbash tsag inchimѳtѳ merranѳbelѳ gѳn, kaguen misaamera nѳmun srug muta petamigwan kѳliimata.
Trunetѳ mѳikkѳsrѳn trenchib puptinchibig kѳn: Ñim tru merrarrawa keerig mѳguelѳbe Tiuswei yau misagwan kusrenanѳb purran cha.
Inchen iigwan mѳrabe, tru Tiuswei yau pѳlicíameran ashib pera basrabiiba, sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, ¡kan paare! ѳyeebe mandѳ guermab isubelѳ gѳn, kan ѳyeebe chugatig bunrrai indamab isubgue.
Inchen pѳlicíamerabe amba, tru kailan keeri yausrѳmbe muganug bua, katѳle amrruppe, treeg wam srua amrrubelѳ gѳn:

Inchen nѳmbe iigwan mѳrabe, yandѳ tѳrrrabene, Tiuswei yau kebamba, kusrenanѳb mendabelѳ gѳn. Tru inchib gѳmnetѳ tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳteba, truyu nѳba purrabelѳ gatѳganelѳba amba, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelan tulundzuningarubelѳ gѳn, k'atѳ tru maig maramigwan ashibelѳ israelitasmerai kѳlli misaameran mayamba. Inchabe tru k'ailan keeri yau purrabelan nѳmuimay merrana, amrrunrrabelѳ ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Cristѳ nѳ ashib karua ѳriilane merrarrawa tru kailan keeri yau keerѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳteba, saduceѳsmeraingateelѳ truyu nѳba purrabelѳba purѳ busrkwai ashiptѳ namig kurra,k

Inchen Jerusalén ciuda buluwansreelѳ misag truba nѳrrѳ amrrubelѳ gѳn, kwanrreelѳ gѳben, trѳmbѳig maringarub kwaimandziimera tѳgar kan mandѳguen gѳmui inchibelѳ, treelѳ gѳben sruar. Inchen mayeelѳba tamariilѳ gѳbelѳ gѳn..
Inchen misaamera Señѳrwan kѳrebelѳbe mѳguelѳ lata, ishumbur lata k'atѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nemisrѳb ambubelѳ gѳn.

Clistѳ nѳashib karua ѳliilѳbe misaamerai utu chine Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi ashchai maliilan maramba, kwaara asha gѳnrrai maramba inchibelѳ gѳn. Inchen Tiuswei ureemerabe Salѳmónwei Yaskabyu mayeelѳba maig isuppe, treeg kandѳ isua tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru iglesian kerriguelanba, k'atѳ mayeelѳ tru treeg purayaigwan wammѳrѳbelanbabe purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kui indamig arrubig gѳn.

Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¿Ñim pailѳmisra chindimbarre treeg martrab isua bѳnrramisrke? cha, Señѳrwei Espíritun ke maig inchibig kѳt'ashchab ashchab inchib. ¡Ñiguen mѳr! cha, ñui kewan sѳrѳnrrab srua ambubelѳbe chabguen yaskabyuguen amrrut'an cha, mѳimbe ñungucha sѳrѳnrrab srua amrrun cha.
Indiibe pѳn ura wendau gѳsrѳnyu Ananíaswei srai tru treeg purayaigwan chi wammѳrmѳ, kebarrubenba,
Inchen matsѳrelѳbe amrrua, asrwan tamara pula, sѳrѳnrrab srua ambubelѳ gѳn.m
¿Pirѳbe ñuiwein gѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Katѳ yanen, tru angucha ñi asamig kѳmuitarru? cha ¿Ñui manrrau chindimba ѳyeeg martrab isua basramisrku? cha. Ñibe mѳguelan isab pasrѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswan isan chibig kѳn.
Inchabe i mѳѳbe nui sraimba misra, tru anwane tѳbѳtѳ rrannrrab cha, wamincha, tѳbѳwane kѳrrѳmara, Cristѳ tru nѳashib karua ѳriilaimay tѳbѳwandѳ nѳm ashchai trannrrab srua ibig kѳn.
Inchen kan mѳg Ananías taiba, srai Safiraba kan pirѳ tѳgagúigwan yanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Kaguende nambe trendai mѳrer chib: Tru Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsbe i Tiuswei yawane pinishib, Mѳisés namun maig martrai karua gѳrrѳmariilane chishtѳ yunѳmarѳb inchun tan mѳrѳb inder chibelѳ gѳn.

Inchabe truilѳbe misaameran gѳben, k'atѳ misagwan k'arubelѳ kѳlli misaameran gѳben, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrebelan gѳben, ke nѳm isuigwan marѳb gѳnrrai inchen, truilѳbe namig amrrua, kemѳra, tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelaimay srua ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ Esteban kusremburab kusrebig kuigwanba, Espíritu nun wamindingaruitѳga wamindigwanbabe, muguen kanab waminchab gaimabelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Esteban Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indigwanba, katѳ maramburab maramigwanba newan tѳgaig, truibe kwaara asha gѳnrrai maramba, Tius nѳba pasrain gúi ashchai purѳ nѳrreelѳ mariilѳ maramba inchibig kѳn, tru misaamerai utu..
Incha yandѳ tru Cristѳ nѳashib k'arua ѳriilѳ dѳcelaimay pera amrruben, nѳmbe Tiusba wamincha, nѳmui tasiimeran truilaim bala nѳmun tabig kѳnrrai estsarѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nambe namuimburappe Tiusba wamindamigwan elachimѳ marѳb, k'atѳ Tiuswei wamwan eshk'ab kusrenanѳb amѳñibig amѳñinrrab cha trenchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ tru dѳceelѳbe, tru nu misag Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan tulundzuningarua trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nam Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanamigwan elacha, mishatsigu tru mamig birisamigu ashib pѳnrramibe sѳl gѳmѳn cha..
Trube, ñun ѳyeeg puigwane tru ñun ѳyeekkurrin gúig kѳn chibelѳ amrruben, trunun ashchab cha. Inchabe Herѳdeswei purѳ tab yau Pablѳne keera wanna, tab ashib tѳgagѳnrrai karubig kѳn..
Inchen kubenadurbe tru kilga ѳrigwan ashabe, Pablѳne: ¿Chu birausriig kugu? cha payibig kѳn. Incha ciliciasriig kuin gúi ashabe, trenchibig kѳn::
Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳne k'aulli bala ambubelѳtѳ lincha amrrai, suldaumera k'atsikk'ateelѳbe tru nѳm waraig mu chindamga yaumay gatѳle legucha amrrubelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru mѳwan sѳratѳ kaig martrab inchib gѳn daig nane wammѳrѳsrѳben, nabe tru urastѳ ñuisrѳmay ѳrar cha, katѳ tru nun ѳyeeg mara basrѳmѳtirru chib payib srua gѳbelan chigucha chigѳben tamig tѳgaguabe, trube, ñui merrab tѳrgandѳ eshkanrrigay cha, nѳmune trenchar cha nabe..
Incha nabe chi charre payib srua gúitashchab ashchab isua, Pablѳne judíѳsmerai tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab pera gѳrrayar..
Na Claudiѳ Lisias, ñi nai purѳ tab kubenadur Félixwan k'a uñgu chinrrab inchar.
Incha ѳyeeg chibig kilgagucha pѳra trana ѳrѳbig kѳn:

Inchen maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳm garub pera bѳnrrabelan bailan wama, trenchibig kѳn: Yem las nueve webambamig katsikka amrrabelѳ suldau dѳscientѳsba, kaulli balar setentaba, lanza sruar dѳscientѳsba Cesareamay amrrai tamaray cha.
Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru matsinane trenchib ungwa cha, ѳrѳbig kѳn: Ñi nan eshkaigwane nan eshkar cha, mungucha eshkanrrab gѳmѳ cha.

Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe tru matsinan tasku kemѳra srua ya, nѳѳrѳ pera yabe nundѳ mara payibig kѳn: ¿Nan chi eshkamig tѳgagugu? chaInchen matsinѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Judíѳsmerabe Pablѳn srѳna tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelai merrab ke tiusmanda ñun wesrabsrumugu chinrrab, ke kandѳ isua bѳnrramisrin gѳn cha, nuimburab maig kurrin gúitashchab ke tab paya ashchab chibelѳ misrѳb.

Inchen truibe maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigweimay, pera yabe, trenchibig kѳn: Pablѳ kailan keeri yau keerig wabiibe nan wama tiusmanda i matsinan ñuimay pera irra chit'an cha, ñun kan chigѳsrѳn eshkamig tѳgagѳn cha.
Pablѳbe tru suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳm garub pѳnrrabelan kan mѳigwan gѳsrѳn wamabe, trenchibig kѳn: I matsinan maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigweimay pera inrrѳ cha. Kaguende chigѳsrѳn eshkamig tѳgagѳn cha.
Inchen Pablѳi nuchawei nusrkaimbe tru chi isumѳ amrrub gѳben, larab warѳwa, tru kaig martrab inchib gúigwan wamindi, tru suldaumera waraig mugucha chindamga yausrѳ nѳbe kebya, Pablѳn eshkaben,

Incha truilѳbe sacerdѳtesmeran karubelainuumayba, katѳ misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaamerainuumayba ambabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nam martrab taigwan nam marmubene, namundѳwei trѳmbѳig nebubash chib pѳnrramisrer cha. ¡Gatѳ! Pablѳn kweechimuppe, nambe chigucha mamѳnrrab ter cha.k

Katѳ lѳtsѳ judíѳsmerabe kaig martrab nѳmdѳ nilѳ wamincha: Nam treeg martrab taigwan marmubene, namundѳwei trѳmbѳig nebubash chib pѳnrramisra, ¡gatѳ! Pablѳn kweechimuppe, mamѳwei, muchimѳwei inchab chibelѳ gѳn..

Inchen ambumay imay ke nѳmdѳ aleguiyab gurra nѳѳrѳtѳ misren, maya suldaumeran nѳ garub pasrabiibe Pablѳne ke pitis marѳbgunmab isua kѳriimat'a, suldaumeran kѳrraambingarubig kѳn, nѳmui utugurri mallatѳ merrarrawa wesrawa, suldaumera waraig mu chindamga yaumay gatѳ pera amrrai.
Kaguende saduceѳsmerabe tru kwabelѳbe katѳlebe ѳsiiramѳwei, ángelesmera gawei, mѳsiimera gawein gѳn chibelѳ gѳben, trune fariseѳsmerabe treelane kerriguh treeg kѳbig kuitamab isubelѳ gѳbig kѳn.m

Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nai nunelѳ, maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte gѳben, nabe ashmѳ inchibrain gѳn cha. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Ñui misaameran ashib karub wabigwane kaig nebubash chib trѳmbѳig wamamig kѳmѳn cha.
Inchen truyu purrabelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte Tiusweiwan marѳb pasrabigwan, ñigan ѳyeeg tsalѳ wamѳtirru? cha.
Inchene tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte Ananíasbe Pablѳim bulu purrabelane triibѳtѳ Pablѳn pashagutsingarubig kѳn.

Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garub pasrabiibe tru judíѳsmera chigurrinrre ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib gúigwan ke tab ashchab isua, Pablѳn elacha, sacerdѳtesmeran karubelanba, katѳ tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelan mayamba tulundzunѳnrrai karua, yandѳ Pablѳn wesrua, truilai merrab pasrѳbig kѳn..

Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubiibe trenchibig kѳn: Nama kan Rѳma birau kallawei kѳb lataitѳwei misrtrappe, tsabѳtѳ nu an betabe treeg misrar cha. Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe treeg mara gѳmѳtѳ, kallainukkurri trendѳ truig kur cha.n

Inchen truigwan mѳrabe, tru suldau cienwan nѳ garub pera basrabiibe tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigwan trenchib eshkabig kѳn: ¿Ñi chi marѳb pasraigwan ñigan maig kui asha basrѳtirru? cha. ¡Kan! i mѳѳbe Rѳma birauig kuin gѳn cha.n

Inchen maya suldaumeran ashib nѳ garub wabiibe, tru suldaumera waraig muguen chindamga yau Pablѳn keelingarua, ichaguchib maig kuigwan payingarubig kѳn, misaamerabe chindimbagurlinrre nun tsalѳ gѳb ѳyeeg trashib gúigwan ashchab.

Inchen judíѳsmerabe tru iig srabe trendaigwan ke chab rrendamnegatiitѳ mѳrabe, trenchib trashib mendabelѳ gѳn: ¡ѳyeeg mѳwane yu pirau uñmѳnrrai kweetsay! chib. ¡Kaguende ѳyeegwane chinchibguen uñbasamgaig kѳn! chib.

Katѳ ñuimburab maig kuigwan waminchibig Estebanwan kweechib ani lushen, tru uraskucha nabe ka kweetsay chib truyu pasrѳwa, kweechibelѳ nѳmui kewagúilan wesra waren, nabe truilanguen ashib pasrabig kui nѳmbe ashibelѳ gѳn cha.
Incha truyu na Señѳrwan ashen, nѳbe nan trenchibig kѳn cha: Mallatѳ incha, mѳi mѳi Jerusaléngurri webinrrѳ cha. Kaguende yube ñi naimburab maig kuigwan waminchen mѳrtraamѳn cha.
Treeg kѳbene, ¿chi munig tsunrragu? cha. Kurrѳ, chibig kѳn. Incha piu umbu ulsrѳ cha. Katѳ ñibe Señѳrwei munchin wamab ñui kaig mariilan chish misr chibig kѳn nane.

Inchen Ananíasbe nane trenchibig kѳn: Namui merrabsrѳ mѳsk'alai Tiusbe, nѳ maig marѳg kuig waigwan ñi nebua ashchai ñune manasrѳwei k'anmaytѳ wesrawa basrig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru Kerrigu Sѳlgandiigwan nebua ashib, k'atѳ nui triitѳga wamindigwan mѳrѳb inchai.

Inchen truyube kan mѳg Ananías taig, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, Tiuswan purѳ isua marѳb megabig, judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelaimbe nѳbe chiyuguen chi tamga tab uñib mѳg,
Inchen nabe trenchibig kur cha: ¿Señѳr chi maramѳh? cha. Inchen Señѳrbe nane trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, Damascѳsrѳmay inrrѳ cha. Truyube chi maramigwan karua pasligwan kerliguh eshkanrrun cha.
Inchene nabe trencha lѳtabig kur: ¿Señѳr ñibe mu gugu? cha. Incha nѳbe nan lѳtappe: Nabe Nazaretsrѳ Jesús ñi kaig martrabgѳba inchib arrig, truig kur chibig kѳn.
Inchen nabe pirausrѳ peñabe, kan wam trendaig mѳrinabig kѳn: Saulѳ, Saulѳ ¿nane chindimbarre kaig martrabgѳba inchib arrugu? chib.

maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte lata, katѳ mayeelѳ misagwan karubelѳ kѳlli misaamera lata treegwein gúig kѳn chib nѳm eshkanrrab gúinrrun cha. Inchen nѳmbe nane kilga bѳriilѳ tranѳbelѳ gѳn cha, tru nammisag judíѳsmera Damascѳsrѳ warabelan tru na chi martrab isuigwan martrai. Inchen Damascѳsrѳmay ibig kur cha, Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳ trusrѳ warabelan merrarrawa, yu Jerusalénsrѳmay sruattrab, ichabetiilѳ gѳnrrai.

Nabe judíѳ gur cha, Cilicia birau Tarsѳ ciudayu kallaweig. Inchendѳ nurappe, yu Jerusalén nurawa, katѳ nabe kusrebgucha Gamaliel maig kusrenanigwan kusreweig, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriilan merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamera kan maizhikken pinab marmѳ, marѳb tѳgagúigu treegwan kusrenanig kur cha. Tiusweimburabigwan kalѳ marmѳnrrab ñim mѳin gwalѳm mayeelѳ ke chinsraatѳ inchib pѳnrrab lat'aitѳweingue.
Ñim, nai nunelѳ, nai mѳskalѳ, na treeg mara basrѳmuigwan waminchab inchar cha, ¡Mѳrtray! chib..
Inchen Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Isa gѳmѳtѳ, nabe judíѳ gur cha, Cilicia birau Tarsѳ ciudayu kallaweig, chigucha gѳmѳ ciudazhigu gѳmѳtѳ. Tiusmanda misagwan ka waminchibashcha chibig kѳn.

Incha Pablѳn tru suldaumera waraig muguen chindamga yau yandѳ ke kertrab inchen, tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubigwan Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Na chigѳsrѳn chinrrab, waminchibashchunrraguh? cha. Inchen tru nѳ garubiibe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñibe gliegѳ wamwan waminchibig kѳtirru? cha.
Incha tru nebunab nebambiisrѳngatig srua pubene, tru nu misag sѳtѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig inchen, treekkurri yandѳ truyugurrimbe suldaumerabe Pablѳne pala muta ambam nebubig kѳn.n
Inchen tru maya suldaumeran nѳ garubig puabe, Pablѳn merrarrawa, bagatѳ cadenastѳga lusringarubig kѳn. Incha nѳbe mu gúin gúi, chi marѳb unig kuin gúi bayibig kѳn.
Incha yandѳ kwetchab inchib gѳben, Rѳmasrѳ maya suldau sѳtѳmeran ashib karub wabigwan, yu Jerusalén maya misag chindi asamgaig inchib namig kurrin gѳn chib eshkab wam puben,
Nѳm ѳyeeg chib gѳppe, kaguende mana gѳsrѳn Jerusalén ciudayu kan efesѳsriig Trófimѳba lincha uni ashibelѳ gua, trunun Tiuswei yau Pablѳbe kertrab arritamab isuarre inchibelѳ gѳn.
Tru treeg marѳb gúin rrune patsѳnrrab gwalѳmbe, Asia birausrѳ warab judíѳsmerabe Pablѳn Tiuswei yau ashabe, maya misag ke chindi asamgaig namig kurrѳnrrai mara, Pablѳn kemѳrabe,n

Inchendѳ tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Cristѳn kѳrebelaimburappe tru nam isua treeg martrab cha gѳrrѳmisrig, trunundѳ nambe nѳmun pѳrig kuig kѳn cha: tru animal gweecha taska mari tiusmeran pѳnsrai yaumeran mamѳwei, katѳ aniwan mamѳwei, urcawa gweetsi yauwan mamѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ lata, ishumbur lata trѳmbѳig marmѳwei indamig kѳn chib.
Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳbene, nam maig taigwan mar cha. Yu namui utu pibgatѳ mѳguelѳ kѳn cha, Tiuswei merrab maig martrab taigwane treeg martrab kѳrrѳmisrar.k

Pѳs nѳmune ñuimburab treeg wammѳrѳsrkain basran cha, ñibe tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utusrѳ maya judíѳsmera warabelane Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenaniilѳyugurri t'arѳmisrѳb amrrai treeg kusrenana, nѳmui ureemerane asru circuncidamѳt'ay chib, katѳ namui trendѳ marѳb amѳnailan treeg marѳb amѳñimѳt'ay chib kusrenanin gúi.
Inchen Pablѳbe ka lincha warѳgue chabe, lutѳgurrih waminchibig kѳn, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utu nui maramelan marѳb uniilѳtѳga Tius chitѳ mariilan.
Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳbe namba Jacѳbѳn ashchab amben, truyu tru Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳgucha kerligu tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.
Incha yandѳ truyu treeg warѳwa, maig palѳnrrabigwan srua ambamig chab tamarabe, Jerusalénsrѳmay nebamben,
Inchen nambe imѳnrrai maya, maya inchib melѳwa kaimappe, trenchibelѳ guer: Trube, Señѳr maig kѳnrrain gѳben, treeg kѳnrrain cha.
Inchen trunun mѳrabe, nambe truyuelѳba misra, Pablѳn Jerusalénsrѳmay imѳta chib truba inchibelѳ guer.
Nam truyu yam gwalѳm warѳbene, Judeagurri kan mѳg, Agabѳ t'aig, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kѳrraarrubig kѳn.

Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe, truyugurli webamba amba, Cesarea ciudasrѳ puabe, Felipe tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab uñibigwei yau pubelѳ guer. Truibe tru srѳsrѳ siete wesrawa pѳnsrailai utuig kѳbig kѳn. Incha nambe truigwei yau kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer.
Incha nambe kangurlin gangurli ungwa chabe, barcѳyu nebamben, nѳmbe nѳmui yamay katѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha nambe truyu trune kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ guer, Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳ truyu warain gѳben. Inchen nѳmbe Espíritu Santѳgurri eshkailѳ gua, Pablѳne Jerusalénsrѳmay imѳnrrain chibelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pátarabe kan barcѳ Feniciasrѳmay inrrabig pasrain gѳben, truyu nebamba ambubelѳ guer.k
Inchen sѳteelѳba truba rruba isub kishib, Pablѳn irab, muchabelѳ gѳn.
Incha iigwan chab rrenchabe, Pablѳbe tѳmbѳnsra, sѳteelѳbamisra Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Ñimbe ashibelѳ gúinrrun cha, naimburab chi palabelanba, yu purrabelai chi palabigwanba tѳgagѳnrrai, marѳbiibe i nai tasiimera gúi.m

Trube, mѳimbe ѳyeeg kѳbene, Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri nunelѳ, ñimun Tius nѳ ashib tѳgagѳnrraimba, katѳ nui tru ka yandѳ tab indig wamyuba pѳnsrar cha. Truibe tabig nѳrrѳrab amrrai maramburab marѳbig kѳb, katѳ tru keta trannrrab gѳrrѳmisrigwan, nuyasiitѳ tarѳmariilѳ mayamba trunun utamig kѳnrrai marѳb inchibig kѳn cha.k
Inchen ñimui utuelѳtѳweinguen nѳmui kaig kusrenaniilѳtѳga, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan pelѳsrka nѳmui mendig amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai martrabelѳ kurrѳnrrun cha..

Inchawei ñimbe ñimasiitѳwei tab ashiptѳ guy cha, katѳ ñim ashib tѳgagúig Tiuswei iglesia mayeelan chigucha. Truilan ñim Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera bѳnrrѳnrrai Espíritu Santѳ pѳnsraig kѳbene, mayeelѳ Señѳrwei iglesiayuelan maig ashib tѳgagѳmigwan treeg ashib tѳgaguy cha. Kaguende truilѳbe nuyasig nui anindѳga peniilѳ gѳn cha.k
Inchawei mѳimbe kanmaytѳ nabe kelarrab trendamѳnrrun cha: Mayeelai ani naim bala attrain gѳmѳ, naimburappe yandѳ chi isumikkaig chish basrar cha.
Inchawei mayeelѳba mѳimbe ñim Tius nѳ ashib karub pasrainuguigwan na eshkab kusrenanѳb pureb yaisreelѳbe nai malѳwane katѳlebe managuen ashchaamѳn cha.

Ciudamѳlig na yaisrѳmbe nane chi peg bunrrabig bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, ka kailan keeli yau pasramibah, kaig nebuben isuig megamibatѳ treeg nebunrrab gѳn cha. Espílitu Santѳ eshkaigwan trunundѳwei nabe asha basrar chibig kѳn.
Incha mѳimbe nabe Jerusalénsrѳmay inrrab inchar cha, ¡gatѳ! nan trusrѳmay Espíritu ke inrrai inchen, trusrѳ nan chi burainrrab gúinguen mѳrmubendѳ.
Treeg kuingucha, ñimuyasig chigѳben tabig kѳnrrabigwane nabe kѳlig kui inchib sѳrab pasrѳmѳ, maya misagwei merrab lata, truѳrѳ yamѳlig eshkab kusrenanig kѳbig kѳn cha,
Incha amrrubene, trenchibig kѳn: Ñimbe na srѳsrѳ gwalѳm Asiasrѳ puinukkurrimbunѳ, nabe chu urastѳgucha ñimui utu na maig uñibig kuigwan ñimbe tab ashibelѳ gѳn cha.

Incha Pablѳbe Efesѳ ciudasrѳmbe barcѳyu purab inrrab isuig kѳn, kaguende Asia birau menrra yana gѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrab isua. Pѳs treeg nebubene, Pentecѳstés kwalѳmbe Jerusalénsrѳ wanrrab isuig kua, mallatѳ inchib megaig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha Pablѳbe namba Asónsrѳ asiyaben, nambe barcѳyu nun nebera, Mitilene ciudasrѳmay ambubelѳ guer.
Inchen tru matsinane ѳsiguig pera amben, mayeelѳba truba isuin gua, kasrag kuilѳ gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pablѳbe gatѳle balasrѳ nebarrua, tru pirriwan pirisha mab gua, katѳ nѳmui mamigwan chab mabe, tѳrrramnegatig wamincha, yandѳ ibig kѳn.

kan matsinѳ, Euticѳ taig, pendana bala wabigwane yandѳ ki ganab arruben, Pablѳbe ¡gatѳ! waminchibig waminchen, tru matsinѳwane yandѳ ke kigѳbiitѳ kamarig kib wawa, tru pѳn bisusrѳngurri kebinabya, kwabeñen, kwaig kusrabelѳ gѳn..

Incha nambe truaalѳmbe tru pirliwan pilishinrra manrrab tulundzuna gѳben, Pablѳbe waminchab pѳlbasrѳbig kѳn. Kaguende katѳ gwalѳmdѳ nuimbe webyamig kѳben, nui wamindamigwan waminchippe, yem dѳbѳtakkatig waminchibig kѳn.

Incha nѳ trusrѳ pѳn bѳl kѳrrѳmisra, yandѳ gatѳguen Siliamay barcѳyu ke inrrabguen incha, judíѳsmerabe nilѳ trubatѳ nun kaig martrab inchib gúi wammѳrѳbig kѳn. Incha treekkurli katѳyug Macedѳniawandѳwei purainrrab ibig kѳn.

Yandѳ tru ѳyeeg chindinguen asamgaig marѳb gúig wasrѳraben, Pablѳbe Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan wamingarua, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melѳnrrigay chib wamincha, trugurrimbe nѳmun ungwa cha, Macedѳniasrѳmay inrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen Apѳlѳs Acaya birausrѳmay inrrab inchen, nunelѳbe masken ka martrai inchib, trusrѳ tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan kan kilga pѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, Apѳlѳswan nѳm tabig wamab utѳnrrai. Inchen nѳbe Acayasrѳ puben, Tius tru nѳ ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ Tiuswan kѳrebelayasiibe kan maya nuguen tab gѳbig kѳn.

Nѳbe Señѳrwei maywan muba amѳnamigwan kusrenanigwan kusreweig kua, nѳbe ¡gatѳ! treegwan martrab isua marѳb, Jesúsweimburab waminchib kusrennѳppe, maig kuigwan treeg kusrenanѳbig kѳn. Juan tru misaameran piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳmig kusrennigwandѳ nebua ashibig kuagucha.

Incha Cesarea ciudasrѳ puabe, tru iglesian k'a warѳgueh chinrrab nebya, trugurrimbe Antiѳquíamay kѳrraarrubig kѳn.Incha truyu k'an maya yana gѳsrѳn tsuabe, Galacia birauba, Frigia birauba, trusrѳ lutѳgurri llirab inrrab webibig kѳn, mayeelѳba tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan kullaaramѳ, mur bѳnrrѳnrrai purugub waminchib.
nѳbe yandѳ: Ka inrrab inchar cha ungwa chabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tius nan gatѳ yusrѳmay attrain gѳbene, katѳ arrumѳnrrun cha. Incha barcѳyu nebya, Efesѳgurri ibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe katѳguchi nѳmba truyu kѳrrѳmisrtrai tiusmanda chib gúingucha, nѳbe kѳrrѳmisrmѳtѳ,

Inchen gѳben Pablѳbe katѳgucha truyu yam gwalѳm kѳrrѳmisra, nunelan yandѳ ungwa chibig kѳn. Incha yandѳ Siria birausrѳmay barcѳyu iben, Priscilaba, Aquilasba nѳba ambubelѳ gѳn. Incha Cencreasrѳmbe Pablѳbe pusrugwan chishchig parѳbig kѳn, Tiuswan nѳ maig martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrigwan treeg maramѳnrrun chib.
Incha tru maig maramigwan asha marѳb purrainukkurri wambig weguchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchendѳ iibe chi treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ka wamindiilanbah, katѳ tru munchimera chabah, tru ñimui maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wariilѳ chabatѳrre inchib gúig kѳbene, uyube ñim asay cha, ѳyeegwane nabe asha rranrrabgucha wamur chibig kѳn.k
trenchib: Tiuswan kѳriibala t'abig wamindamig tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maringaruimay gѳmѳtѳ, nѳbe misaameran ke peemay maramne inchib unan chib.
Kaguende nabe ñiba basrar cha, ñune mugucha kaig martrab kebatchab gaimanrrun cha. Kaguende i ciudayube nabe misag truba nu tѳga basrar cha.
Inchen Señѳrbe Pablѳn yem kan piab lat'aigu trenchibig kѳn: Kѳrig kui inchimѳt'a cha, waminchibig waminchi cha, ka gѳbashiptinchimѳtѳ.
Incha truyugurri webya, k'an mѳg Titѳ Justѳ taigwei yamay ibig kѳn. Truibe Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nui yabe tru judíѳsmera tulundzuni ya mendatѳweim basrabig kѳn.
Inchen Silasba, Timѳteѳba Macedѳniagurri pubene, Pablѳbe Jesúsweimburab eshkab kusrenanamigutѳ kebya basramisrѳbig kѳn, tru judíѳsmeran: Jesúsbe tru ñim muniirab gúig tru Cristѳ gѳn cha eshkab..
Inchen Aquilasba, Priscilababe Pablѳ nѳ marigwandѳwei tru carpas yaureg marѳb tsushibelѳ gѳbene, nѳmba kѳrrѳmisra tru marѳb warabelѳ gѳn. Pѳs nѳbe carpas yaureg marѳb tsushibiitѳwein gѳbig kua..
Inchen yandѳ Pablѳbe nѳmui utugurri webya ibig kѳn.
Inchen tru mѳrѳbelѳbe, tru kwailѳ gatѳle ѳsiiranrrun daigwan mѳrѳppe, kan utuelѳbe ke ka indzatѳ mѳren, katѳganelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: I wamindigwane katѳwan chi mѳrtrumѳn cha.

Chigucha nebua ashmeelѳ gѳb urassrѳ ѳyeeg waraig kѳbigwane, Tiusbe ka treeg purainrraindѳ kagѳbashippa, mѳi yan gwalѳmmerawane maya misaameran chuelandѳgucha nѳmui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliranrrai karua basran cha.

Kaguende nambe Tiusweinug ѳsig bѳnrrab, nѳgurri llirab amѳñib, nѳgurri misag bѳnrrer cha. Katѳ kan ñimui utuitѳwei, chiwan gѳben purѳ t'abzhig isua waminchibiima trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Nambe Tiusweinukkurri larrѳbicha amrrub misaamera guer cha.

Kan mѳkkurrindѳ truyugurri chi misaatѳ larrѳbichib inrrabigwan nѳbe marig kѳbig kѳn cha, pirѳ muba kuimburab warѳnrrai. Incha merrabsrѳwei nѳm maya yana waramigwanba, chutѳ, chutѳ waramigwanba k'anmaytѳ chab asha bѳnsraig kѳbig kѳn cha.

I Tius kѳn cha, tru pirѳwan marѳbig, katѳ truyu chine kѳbelan chigucha. Inchawei srѳmbalawan lata, pirѳwan lata, nѳwei ashib basrabig kuig kѳppe, nѳbe mѳguelai taska marig tab yamerayu wamíig kѳn cha.

Inchen Pablѳbe Areópagѳ taig tru kusrebelѳ tulundzuninug nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pasramisra, trenchibig kѳn: Atenas misaamera, ñimbe chiyutѳgucha Tiuswan isuer taigu ke maizhikken pinab marmѳnrrab inchibelѳ gúin gúi ashar cha..
Pѳs namui kalumerayube ñibe chigѳben ke ka peesrѳtiitѳ waminndan cha. Inchawei trunun tab chi chibig kui wetѳgѳrrag kuin guer cha..

Inchen nѳrrѳ gusreb mѳguelѳ, tru filósѳfѳs epicúreѳsmera t'ailѳ, nѳmui nѳrrѳ isuigu asrwan ka t'ab gѳnrrai marѳb tѳgagúinuutѳ t'abig kѳn chibelѳba, katѳ tru filósѳfѳs estѳicѳsmera t'ailѳ nѳrrѳ isuigwan kusrebelѳba iibe ѳyeeg kѳn chib, iibe ѳyamay gѳn chib, Pablѳba waminchibelѳ gѳn. Inchabe kan utuelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿I mѳg ya wamdѳ nigaibe namune chi wamincherah? cha. Inchen kanelѳbe: Katѳgan peg birausrѳ tiusmeraiwan eshkab kusrennѳbig kѳb asѳnan chibelѳ gѳn, kaguende Pablѳbe Jesúswei tru t'abig srѳ wamwanba, kwawa gatѳ ѳsiiraigwanba eshkab kusrenanen.
Incha Pablѳbe Silaswanba, Timѳteѳwanba Atenassrѳ muniirab uña, ke t'aska mari tiusmeratѳ netsaig ciuda gúi ashabe, nuinetѳ chiguen t'ab gѳmui inchibig kѳn.
Inchen tru urastѳ nunelѳbe Pablѳne mar bulusrѳnmay ѳren, Silasba, Timѳteѳbatѳ Berea kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchawei treekkurri truilѳbe Cristѳn truba nu kѳreben, kusreb ishumburmera griegasmera gѳben, katѳ mѳguelѳ truba yamelѳba kѳrebelѳ gѳn.n
Inchen nunelѳbe ke pillirabendѳ Pablѳnba, Silaswanbabe Bereasrѳmay webambingaruben, trusrѳ puabe, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau kebambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ Jasónwanba, tru kanelanba elatsamig kѳnrrai truburѳ an utabe, elachibelѳ gѳn..

Inchen Jasónbe nui yau wama pera wain gѳn cha. Iilѳbe tru Rѳma maya misagwan ashib karub wabig César tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wariilane, mѳrѳg kѳmub utsѳbetab ka nѳmuimburaptѳ marѳbelѳ gѳn cha, katѳgan rey kѳn chib, kan Jesús taig.

Inchen judíѳsmerabe truba pusrkwai namig kui asha, larrѳ gaig mѳguelѳ ka lliraptѳ bѳnrrabelan wama, kan nu sѳtѳ trubalatѳmisra, ciudayu misaameran chinetѳ isunrrai trѳmbѳig inchib gurrabelѳ gѳn. Incha Jasónwei yau kegѳrrabelѳ gѳn, Pablѳnba, Silaswanba merrarrawa, misaamerai merrab wesrunrrab.

ѳyeeg kuig kѳn cha, tab eshkab: Tru Cristѳ ñim muniirab gúibe truba kaig indinab megawa, kwawa, katѳ kwailai utugurri kurrab indamig, trendѳ treeg purayamig palѳnrrabig kuig kѳn chib. Incha nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: I Jesús na ñimun eshkab wamindiibe, Cristѳ truitѳwein gѳn cha, tru ñim muniirab gúig.m
Inchen nѳmbe Pablѳnba, Silaswanba kan nambe treeg kѳmui t'amab isua indig kѳn chib amba, kailan keeri yaugurri wesrawabe, ciudayugurri ke tiusmanda amrray chibelѳ gѳn.

Trune Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nam ya Rѳma birausrѳ k'allawar gѳb lataitѳwei k'allawarwan, namun maig kuitashchab payaguen ashmubendѳ, maya misagwei merrab namun ichabeta, namun k'ailan keeri yau kebusra ¿mѳingan mugucha wammѳriimѳzhig namun nilѳ wertrab inditarru? cha. ¡Pѳs chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn! chibig kѳn. Pѳs truilѳtѳwei namun wesrunrrab amrrubash cha.
Indiibe tѳrrrabene, tru maig maramigwan asha marѳb purrabelѳbe tru pѳlicíameran k'arua ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, tru k'ailan keeri yawan ashib pasrabigwan, trenchinrrai: Pablѳnba, Silaswanbabe elatchain cha.
Incha nѳmun ichabeta tru pisrѳ mariilan tru yemdѳwei tre uras pillmawa, tru urastѳ nѳba, nui yauelѳ kerriguelѳba piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe Señѳrwei wamwan nunba, nui yau purrabelѳ sѳtѳelanba waminchibelѳ gѳn.m
Incha wambig pera webyabe, payibig kѳn: ¡Au kasukumera! ¿na kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmibe chi maramig balѳnrrerah? cha.
Inchene tru kailan keeli yawan ashib pasrabiibe kan pela bilѳgaig miawa, umbusrѳ lulѳb guebya, Pablѳimba, Silasweimba merrab itѳnab tѳmbѳnsrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen truyu keeriilan ashib pasrabig kiagasrѳbene, mѳimbe tru k'ailan keeri yau yask'abmerabe kurim bѳnrraptindi ashabe, nui espadan wesrawa, ¡gatѳ! nѳasiitѳ ke yandѳ kwanrrab inchibig gѳn, k'aguende truyu pѳnrrabelѳ chab wegѳrra chab lulitamab isua.
Inchen yem dѳbѳtasrѳmbe Pablѳba, Silasbabe Tiusba waminchib, Tiusweyasig cantab gѳben, katѳganelѳ truyu keerig pѳnrrabelѳbe mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.n
Incha nѳmune truba yam ichabet'a, kailan keeri yau kebusra, truyu ashib pasrabigwane webamrraingaig purѳ may ashib tѳgagungarubelѳ gѳn.
Nѳm waminchib kusrenanѳppe ke peemaytѳ mariilѳ nam uta tѳgagѳmig kѳmѳwei, katѳ treegwan marѳb gѳmig kѳmѳwei inchai namune meriilan kusrenanan cha, nam ya rѳmanѳsmeran.n

Inchen tru karub pera gѳbelѳ tru treeg an marѳb pѳnrramibe yandѳ patsi asha, Pablѳnba, Silaswanba kemѳra, misag tulundzuninuumay ke paluunchib waram srua ambubelѳ gѳn, tru misagwan ashib karubelaisrѳmay.

Incha tru srusrѳbe Pablѳnba, namunba wendautѳ trenchib trashib arrubig kѳn: ¡I mѳguelѳbe Tius Mayeelaim Bala Pasrabigwei karuindiig melabelѳ, kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳm maywan ñimun eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn! chib..

Incha nѳba, nui yauelѳba piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳrrѳmisra, ke tiusmanda chib namune trenchibig kѳn: Na, Señѳrwan ciertѳn kѳrein gúi ashabe, trube, ñim nai yamay amrrua, kѳrrѳmisrtrigay cha. Incha namune ke kѳrrѳmisramne inchibig kѳn.

Inchen kan isrin gwalѳm tru ciudayu nu yaskabu wambiisrѳ webambubelѳ guer kan pi mendasrѳmay, truyube judíѳsmera Tiusba waminchab tulundzuninug kuitamab isua. Incha nambe truyu purramisra, ishumburmera tulaamba purrabelan waminchibelѳ guer.
Indiibe Trѳaskurri barcѳyu nebamba, Samѳtraciasrѳmay k'anmaytѳ ke purab amba, k'atѳ gwalѳmbe Neápѳlissrѳ pua,
Indig trusrѳ Pablѳbe yem kan piab lataig asig tѳgagúig kѳn. Truyube kan mѳg Macedѳnia birausriig pasramisra trenchib miab pasrai ashibig kѳn: Macedѳniasrѳmay larraamѳ cha, namun purugunrrab.m
Misia birѳ buluwan yabwandѳ puraamba, Trѳassrѳ kѳrraambubelѳ gѳn.k
Incha nѳmbe Frigia birѳwanba, Galacia birѳwanbabe ka purab ambubelѳ gѳn, kaguende Asia birausrѳmbe Espíritu Santѳ Tiuswei wamwan waminchibashmuben.

Incha nѳmbe tru pueblѳmerawan puraambub ambimѳrig, Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ tru Jerusalénsrѳ purrabelѳ, maig marѳb gѳnrrai karuilane isua mѳrѳb gѳnrrai eshkab ambubelѳ gѳn trusrѳ Tiuswei ureemeran.
Inchen Timѳteѳbe tru Listrasrѳ, Icѳniѳsrѳ nunelai utu, chigucha tamgaig tabig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha Pablѳba, Bernabéba Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳba truyu truba yana kѳrrѳmisra waraig kѳbig gѳn.
Incha Perge ciudayu Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenana, trugurrimbe Ataliasrѳmay amrrubelѳ gѳn.m

Incha truyugurrimbe barcѳyu nebamba, Siria birau Antiѳquíasrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn. Tru nѳm mѳi ya patsѳga bѳnrraigwan martrab amrrai Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ tab indiitѳga tabig ashib tѳgagúilѳ gѳnrrigay chib, tru nѳmun pѳnsraig kѳbiisrѳmay..
Incha iglesiamѳlig nѳmbe Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ wesrawa bѳnsra, Tiusba waminchib, ayunab guabe, nѳmune tru nѳm kѳrewa bѳnrraig Señѳr nѳ ashchai pѳnsrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Incha Derbesrѳ Jesuclistѳi tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenana, Jesuclistѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳ nѳrrѳ nemisrtrai mara, trugurlimbe Listramayba, Icѳniѳmayba, Antiѳquíamayba katѳ amrruig kѳbig kѳn.
Trune Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe nuin bѳtѳgatan tulundzunѳben, nѳbe kurra, katѳ ciudayu kebibig kѳn. Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳba, Bernabéba Derbesrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳm ѳyeeg chib waminchagucha, nѳmbe misaameran ke trendѳ merѳnrrab gaimabsrubelѳ gѳn, tru nѳmun tiusmera gúi mara tѳrѳmeran kweecha tranmѳnrrai.

Inchen gѳben managucha nuimburabigwane maig kuigwan eshkab wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha, t'abig marѳb. Srѳmbalasrѳngurri srewan ѳrѳb, ellmariilѳ misram bѳlmera pubene, tru gúindѳ, tru gúindѳ misringarunrrun cha, chi palѳmѳ unchaguen mamig tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳb, ñimui manrrѳmeran truba kasraaranѳb.

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Au, yu mayeelѳ pѳnrrabelѳ! ¿Chindimba ѳyeeg martrab inchigue? cha. Nambe ñim latailѳtѳwei ka mѳguelѳtѳ guer cha. Ke ka treeg maranmab ashchaindѳ maliilan elacha, ѳsig wab Tius srѳmbalawan gѳben, tru pirѳwan gѳben, marwan gѳben, chigurlimbunѳ truyu pѳnrrabelan marѳbigweimay llirawa bѳnrramisrtrai, tru tabig srѳ wamwan nambe ñimun waminchab amrruer chib.

Inchen tru tius Zeuswei t'ab ya, tru ciudayu kebambinuutѳ pasrabigu ashib wab sacerdѳtebe, tѳrѳmera gѳben, umera purѳ t'abzheelѳ t'amariilѳ gѳben, tru ciudayu kebambi yaskabmerasrѳ srua arrua, tru tѳrѳmeran kweecha, misaamerabamisra, Pablѳnba, Bernabéwanba, nѳmune tiusmera gúi mara trannrrab mendabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe Pablѳ chi marigwan ashippe, nѳmui Licaѳnia rriimay trenchib trashib mendabelѳ gѳn: ¡Mѳguelѳ lataig, tiusmera namuinug kѳrrѳrruin gѳn! chib.
Inchabe tru mѳѳbe Pablѳ waminchen mѳrѳb wabig kѳn. Inchen Pablѳbe nun ke t'ab asha, ke t'amarig kѳmuit'amab isub wai ashabe,
Incha trusrѳ tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Pablѳba, Bernabébabe trunun wammѳra Licaѳnia birau tru Listraba, Derbeba, pueblѳmerasrѳmayba, katѳ tru buluwan gatѳganbalѳmerasrѳmayba trubab ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru ciudayu misaamerabe kan utuelѳbe judíѳsmeraingatѳ gѳben, mѳilѳbe Clistѳ nѳashib karua ѳliilaingatѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Trune judíѳsmera Jesuclistѳn kѳremeelѳbe tru judíѳs kѳmeelane ke kaig isumne inchibelѳ gѳn tru Pablѳimburappa, Bernabéweimburappa.
Inchen gatѳganelane: Tablamerayu gúi, kabe tru barcѳ nѳѳrѳtiig misra wegѳrriilѳyu gúi ambay chibig kѳn. ѳyeeg inchib melѳwa mayeelѳba pirausrѳ ѳsig pubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen suldaumerabe tru kailan keeri yau bѳnrrabelan srua amrruilan kwetchab isubelѳ gѳn, wegѳrra amba mѳikkucha lulmѳnrrai.

Incha barcѳn imѳnrrai merrarrabig tru kuatsig tsandzѳn piu kegutsigwan piu wamnetѳ tsimeran parѳppa, trugurrimbe tru barcѳn muba inrrai lliskaigwan lusrig pasrabigwan alaaranѳb, tru isig utabig vela taigwan kusrubene, tru barcѳbe pisrum chaasrѳmay ib mendabig kѳn..
Inchen tru barcѳyu nam mayeelѳ amrrubelѳbe dѳscientѳs setenta y seis kѳbelѳ guer.
mayeelѳba ka mamѳtѳmab isua, nѳmgucha mabelѳ gѳn.
Trunun chab waminchabe, Pablѳbe nui tasku pirriwan muta, mayeelai merrab Tiuswan mayanguen pay cha, pirisha, trugurrimbe mab pѳlbasren,
Inchawei nabe tiusmanda ka may tamѳnrrun cha, pѳs ñimui asr tabig chishtѳ gѳnrrai. Kaguende ñimune mѳigwandѳgucha kan pusruutѳguen mindisaig kѳnrraamѳn cha.n
Inchene suldaumerabe tru ѳsig webambam barcѳunan merrarrab tsimeran para, piyu ibashiptinchibelѳ gѳn.k

Inchen tru barcѳ srubelѳ barcѳyugurri wegѳrra amrrab isua, tru merrabmay piu kebusriilѳ tru kuatsig tsandzѳnmeran merrarrab tsimeran yabranѳbelѳ misrѳb, tru kwamѳ ѳsig webambam barcѳunan piu kebenѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳn.
piwan maya umbuig kѳtashchab tsiwan kegucha ashene, treinta y seis metrѳs kѳben, katѳguchi ambuurѳsrѳ katѳ kegucha unaashene, veintisiete metrѳs kѳbig kѳn.

Incha nane tru ángelbe trenchitan cha: Pablѳ, chi kѳrig kui inchimѳta cha. Kaguende ñibe Rѳma maya misagwan karub ashib wabig César purѳ nuigwei merrab pasramig palѳnrrab gúimba, barcѳyu ñiba amrrub gѳbelan Tiusbe mayeelanba ѳsig webambamig kѳnrrai martrun chitan cha.
Treeg kuindѳgucha tru isuptѳ chi kullaaramugun chinrrab inchar cha, kaguende barcѳbe chab pinindѳgucha, ñimbe mѳikkucha kwanrraamѳn cha.
