Inchendѳ mѳimbe tru Mѳisés pѳrig nѳ garub tѳgagúigweimburappe nambe yandѳ kwaikkurri, nambe truigweimburappe chi asamikkar gѳrrѳmisrig kѳn, Espíritu Santѳinug peemay ѳsig kѳmig srѳizhigu nam Tiusweyasig marѳb melamig kѳnrrai, tru maig maramigwan martrai merrabsrѳ kѳllin bѳrigu gѳmѳtѳ.m

Katѳ treetѳwei ñim, nai nunelѳgucha, Cristѳi asruelѳ gúikkurri tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigweimburappe ñimbe yandѳ kwai latailѳ kѳrrѳmisrig kuig kѳn, tru katѳganwei misra pѳnrrѳnrrab, Cristѳ tru kwailai utugurri ѳsiirabigwei, nam ѳyamay Tiusweyasig tabig marѳbelѳ gѳnrrab.

Kaguen kan kasharawa ishuwanma tru maig maramigwan martrai pasliibe keeba nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, kandѳ mara tѳgagѳn keg ѳsig wamnegatiibe. Inchendѳ yandѳ keg kwabene, tru pѳlig nui keeba nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, mara kѳrrѳmalig kѳbigwane nѳbe yandѳ truburappe chi asamikkaig kѳrrѳmisran.
Kaguende kaig mariibe tru kaigwan marimburѳ nѳ tranѳppe, kwamigwane rranan. Trune Tius keta rraniibe managatig ѳsig kѳmig, truig kѳn, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳba kanbalatѳ pѳnrraigu.
¿Inchen tru kaig marigugurrimbe tabiibe chi wesrawa bѳnrrѳgue? Mѳi yambalasrѳmbe ñimune kѳrikken gúim bѳnrramitѳ gѳn. Pѳs truibe srabebe ka kwamitѳwei srua arrubig kѳn..

Inchendѳ Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab. Pѳs ñimbe merrappe tru kaig malig karuindѳ melabelѳ guagucha, tru tabig kusrenanigwan ñim maig utig kѳben, treeg marѳb gѳmigu pѳnrramisra, ñimui manrraugurli newan isua treegwan mѳra malig kѳn.

¿Trube, treeg kѳbene, mandѳ inchab? ¿Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig truig karuig melѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ t'ab indig karuig pѳnrraig kѳppe, kabe kaigwan marѳb gѳnrrab gѳh? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn.

Katѳ ñimui asru tasiimera, srѳbmera, ѳyeelѳ chine tѳgagúilan kaig maramigweyasig trannrrab inchib pѳnrrѳmѳtay. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, masken ñimbe kwailѳ latailѳ gua, katѳle ѳsiirawa latailѳsun Tiusweyasig trannrrab inchib, ñimui asru chi pѳnrrabigwane trurrawa sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳb gѳmigweyasig trannrrab inday..
Pѳs namgucha Cristѳba kanguegѳtѳ kwab lataitѳwei marabe, katѳ nѳba ѳsig burramigwangucha purramig kѳnrrab gúi isua bѳnrrer.n
¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn. Kaguende nam kaig maramigweimburappe yandѳ kwailѳbe tru kaig maramigu gatѳgucha chincha ѳsig bѳnrrѳnrrab.
Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig chigaabenbatѳwei, kaig mariibe yu piraube pasrabguen indig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig kaabene, kaig marigwangucha chi isua asamig kaabig kѳn.
Incha gatѳ iitѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nambe Tiusweinug maya nuguen k'asrag bѳnrrer namui Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri. Pѳs nѳgurri nambe Tiusba tru tammay tabig kѳrrѳmisra pѳnrramigwan mѳimbe utig kuig kѳn.

Mѳimbe yandѳ Señѳr Jesúscristѳi ani lusiitѳga nam chi k'aig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrraig kѳppe, mѳimbeguende Tiuswei trѳmbѳig namig kѳbig namuim bala attrabig pasrabigwan Cristѳgurri treeg pumѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳmѳnrrun.

Inchen nam tru tѳgaguermab isua munig melaibe, treeg kѳmuptincha namun k'a isuindѳ bѳnrramig kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmartrabig kѳmѳn. Kaguende Tiusbe namui manrrѳwan nui undag kѳbiitѳga netsѳgana basrig kѳn, Espíritu Santѳn namun tѳgagѳnrrai tranikkurri.

Incha ѳyeetѳ gѳmѳtѳ, namun chigѳben isumdiig nebuben, katѳ nambe mayanguen tab gúi kasraarabelѳ guer, kaguen tru chigѳben isumdiig nebui pѳnrramig arrubiibe maig kuingucha tammay melam gusremig arruben
Inchawei isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra bѳnrraikkurri chi kailѳ gѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrramig kua, Tiusba chi isumgaig tab pѳnrramigwan tѳgaguer, Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri.m

namuyasikkucha tѳga bѳra baslig kѳn, tru nam chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kui asha Tius utiilѳ gѳnrrabelaimbe, tru namui Señѳr Jesuclistѳn kwailai utugurli katѳle ѳsiirangarub Tiuswan nam kѳrebelaimbe.
Incha nui isubigwan Tiusweinug pasrikkurri Tiusbe Abrahamwane chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig kui asha utig kѳn..

Pѳs kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳriibe Tiuswei trѳmbѳig namig kѳbigwan tѳgaig arrubig kѳn mѳrmeelaim balabe. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wesruig chiganuube, kalѳ marѳb itubunab gѳmikkucha chigagѳn.

Kaguende Tius tru treeg trannrrab cha kѳrrѳmisrigwan Abrahamwanba, nuinukkurri karrab misaameranba pirѳwan ketig utѳnrrun chib urasbe, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳra wesruitѳga tranmѳtѳ, nѳ isubigwan Tiusweinuutѳ basra tѳgagúigu chi kaig kѳmíig lataig nѳ treeg kuigu tranig kѳn.

Kaguende Tiusbe nѳtѳ kandѳ gѳn, isubigwan nuinug paslikkurli judíѳsmera, tru asru circuncidawarmeran chi kailѳ gѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrramig marѳb, katѳ judíѳs kѳmeelѳ, tru asru circuncidawa gѳmeelangucha nѳmui isubigwan nuinug paslikkurli chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrramig marѳb inchibig.

Pѳs nambe ѳyamay gѳn chibrren bѳnrrer, tru chi k'aig kѳmíig lataig tabig pasramibe isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúikkurrin gѳn cha, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigu truilan mariilѳgurrin gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.
Nѳbe ѳyeeg marѳppe, tru mѳi ѳyan gwalѳm nui sѳlgandѳ tabigwan kenamartrab indig kѳn. Katѳ nѳbe isubigwan Jesúsweinug basrѳbigwane chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig kѳrrѳmisrtrai marѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru chi kailѳ gѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrramig keta traniibe Tius ka yandѳ tab indikkurrin gѳn, Cristѳ Jesúskurri Tiusweyelѳ gѳnrrai wesruilѳ gúikkurri.
Nѳmbe Tiuswan kѳrig tѳgagѳmigwane ni managuen isumeelѳ, treelѳ gѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn..
Nѳmui amѳnailѳbe purѳ isumdiig kѳrrѳmisra waramig kѳnrraimba, chugurringuen gѳmuielѳ isuig kѳrrѳmisra waramig kѳnrraimba, treeg marѳbelѳ gѳn cha.
maig kuigwan chi chibig kui mѳrtrabig muguen gawei, Tiuswan isub lanrrabiibe muguen gawein gѳn cha..

Trube, ѳyah chinrrauta (tru mѳilѳgѳsrѳn namuimburab trѳmbѳig waminchib itѳ amrrubelѳma namun ke ѳyeeg chib pѳnrrabelѳ gúi marѳbelѳ gѳn): Kaigwan margun cha, tabig attraimbe. Tru trenchibelane mѳra pѳnrrѳnrrai maramig sѳlwein gѳn.

Inchen tru nam sѳlgandѳ t'abig marmub pѳnrraibe Tius nѳ sѳlgandѳ t'abig kuigwane masken t'ab nebua asig kѳnrrai kenamarene, trube, ¿nambe chi chinrrab gѳh? ¿Tru Tius nui namig kѳbiitѳga namun mѳra melѳnrrai marѳppe, sѳl marmíig kѳptѳ, treeg marig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? (Nabe iigwan trenchippe, mѳguelѳ maig isubelѳ gѳben, trumay isua rrenchar.)
Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿kan judíѳimbe chiyutѳrre mas tabig kerah kan judíѳ gѳmíigwei lata? ¿Katѳ tru circuncisiѳn mariibe chi burugub basrah?

katѳ, chugúi mѳrmeelan maig kuigwan kusrenanѳb, ureg latailan kusrenanѳb inchibig kurmab isuinrrun, kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigube nebua ashib kusreelanba, tru newan ciertѳnigwanba maig kuigwan newan trendailan ñibe tѳgagua.
Tru kaig marѳbelaimbe muim balatѳgucha purѳ rrѳmbѳig chine nebui melamiba, ni mumayguen gѳmíig isui melamiba attrun, judíѳsmeranmerrig, trugurrimbe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran.
Managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tranrrun Tiusbe, tru managuen elachimѳ, tabig marѳbig marѳb melaigu tru maya nuguen tab indigwanba, tabig kui asha tab indigwanba, managuen patsѳnrrabig kѳmíigwanba labelane.n
Timѳteѳ, maramigu nan lincha marѳb megabig, ñimune ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran, katѳ trugurli tru nammisaamera Luciѳ gѳben, Jasón gѳben, Sѳsípater gѳben, truilѳgucha.

Pѳs tru tabig srѳ wam maig taigwan ñim mѳra marѳbelѳ gúigwane mayeelѳba nebua asha gѳn. Treekkurri nane ñimuimburab truba kasrag kѳtan. Inchendѳ ñimbe chigѳben tabigwane purѳ nu gusrebelѳ, kaigwane kan isubguen isumeelѳ gúimbe gѳtan..

Pѳs nabe ñim, nai nunelan, ashiptѳ gѳnrligay chinrrab inchar ñimun nѳѳrѳtѳ misrtrai indamba, Clistѳi maywan sѳtѳbѳnrramisramba inchibelan. Truilѳbe tru ñimun kusrenanigwan ka peemaytѳ bunrrai marѳbelѳ gѳn. Ñimbe truilane tarѳmisray.
Señѳrweinug purѳ tabig kui asig Rufѳnba, nui usranba k'a amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay, pѳs truibe nai usri lataig kuig kѳn.
pѳs Tius treeg kѳnrrain gѳbene, na ñimuisrѳ arruppe, truba rruba kasrag bua, ñimba kanbalatѳ pishindѳ tab wamig kѳnrrai.
Incha i maramigwan nabe yandѳ chab mara, tru kan mamig misrizhig latawei tru an purugúigwan nѳmun purѳѳrabe, Españasrѳmay inrrab arrua, ñimun ashchab arrumѳnrrun.
Kaguende macedѳniasreelѳba, acayasreelѳbabe tru Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswei misaamerai utu waachameran purugumig an tulisamig nѳmune tabig asѳnaig kѳn..
Inchawei ѳyeekkurri nabe katѳ gatѳ ñimun ashchab attrab inchen, arrumѳnrrai marinab pasrabig kur.k

tru na Cristѳ Jesúsweiwan judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerayasig na marѳb meganrrai. Pѳs, na Tiuswei tru t'abig srѳ wamwangѳba eshkab kusrenanѳbig kur, kan sacerdѳte Tiuswan ket'a tranѳb lat'awei tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran na Tiuswan ket'a tranen, nѳ ka ut'amdeelѳ gѳnrrai, nuyasiitѳ t'arѳmariilѳ Espíritu Santѳgurri.

Pѳs, nai nunelѳ, nabe ñimuimburab ѳyeeg kuin gúi asha basrar, tab inchibelѳ gѳmitѳ netsailѳ, chigurrimbunѳ nebua asamig truitѳ netsailѳ, ambugurri igurri maig maramigwan waminchib eshkab pѳnrrѳnrrapteelѳ, ñimbe treelѳ gúi..

Katѳ Isaíaskucha ѳyeeg t'aig kѳn: Isaíweinukkurri arrubig kan tusrwan srѳldѳ basram barig lat'aigugurri srѳig kallab lat'aitѳwei katѳgan srѳig kurra, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran ashib karub pasrѳnrrab pasramisren, truilѳbe nѳm isua muniirab melaigwan ke nuinuutѳ pasra tѳgagѳnrrun cha.
Katѳ katѳganbalѳsrѳ trenchibig kѳn: Ñim, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera, Tiuswei misaameraba truba kasraaray cha.
ñim mayeelѳba kandѳ isua, kan wamdѳ misra namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi Mѳskai Tiuswan truba t'abig wamindamig kѳnrrai.

Kaguende kerligu tru merrabsrѳ Tiuswei wamyu pѳliibe namun kusrenanrrab pѳlig kѳbig kѳn, tru nam tammay melabig melaikkurlimba, tru Tiuswei wam pѳlig namun tabig purugub wamgurlimba, nam Tiuswei tѳrguegwalmabigu nam Clistѳba kanbalatѳ pѳnrramigwan isua muniiramig tѳgagѳnrrai.
Nambe mѳitѳgucha namui nuneg kullaatiigwan tab gúi mѳrtrai maramig kѳn nuimburab tab gѳnrrai, Señѳrweimburabigu nurab inrrai marѳb.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, ambumay imay t'ab gѳnrrai marѳb, ambugurri igurri puruguyab Señѳrweimburab nѳrrѳrab ambamigwan tѳgagѳnrrab inchigun.

Kaguende Tius nѳ ashib k'arub waibe mamimeragurri chi asamig kѳnrrab gѳmѳwei, mutsiilѳgurri chi asamig kѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tius tru nѳ ashib k'arub waibe tabig sѳlgandѳ mariiba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbiiba, k'asrag kѳbiiba, truilѳ gѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri.

Inchen ñi k'an mamigwan maikkurrindѳ ñui nunewan k'a isui uñchaindѳ mariibe, yandѳ ñibe undag kѳbiitѳga marѳb pasrѳmѳn. Ñui mamikkurrindѳ ñui nunewan kerriguwan mindisha kѳrrѳmarmѳta, Cristѳ nuyasig kwaig kѳbigwan.

Pѳs treeg kѳbene, nambe kangurrin gangurri mas ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg kѳn chimugun. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, katѳganelan ka srurrengwangarub, sѳtѳbasramisrѳb nui nunewein gabyu kalѳ gúi asigwane marmѳnrrab isumig kѳn.n
Kaguende nambe mѳitѳgucha nayasiitѳwei ѳsig uñmѳwei, katѳ kwabgucha nayasiitѳwein gwamѳwei indan..

Pѳs mѳibe treeg isun, mѳ gwalѳmbe katѳgan gwalѳm lata gѳmѳ, mas tabig kuitamab. Inchen katѳgane mѳ gwalѳmmeratѳgucha treetѳ gúitamab treeg isun. Pѳs ѳyeeg isuilan ñim mѳitѳgucha maig isua tѳgagúigwane chigurri ѳyan gѳbig kuin gúi ashabe, trube, kanmaytѳ treeg isua gѳmig kѳn.

Inchawei mѳikkѳben chi mamigwandѳgucha lutѳgurri mabiibe tru mѳ mamimerandѳ mabigwane kashmumig kѳn. Inchen tru mѳ mamimerandѳ mabiibe, trube, tru chi mamimerandѳgucha lutѳgurri mabigwane kalѳ gѳn chib chinetѳ cha mѳrmumig kѳn. Kaguen Tiusbe nune kashmѳ, utig kѳn.n

Nambe kan kwalѳmyu amѳñib lataig maig amѳnamigwan sѳlwan amѳñigun, mabgucha mamburab mab, mutsiirab, ishumburmeraba, mѳguelѳba trѳmbѳig marѳb, chugatig trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳben treeg marѳb, kwayam lab, pusrkwai ashib treeg marѳb gѳmѳtѳ.m

Pѳs ñimbe ѳyeegwane maramig kѳn, mѳi yambe maig kwalѳmmera gúi ashabe. Pѳs yandѳ ñim kiagasramig puin gѳn. Kaguen nam kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmibe mѳimbe gatѳguchinguen lutau basran, tru nam Cristѳn srѳtѳ kѳreb uras lataguen gѳmѳ.

Kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailѳ, tru: Itѳlulmѳwei, kweecha betѳmѳwei, nilѳmѳwei, ñui marѳmmѳrѳ inchib chull ashmѳwei indamig kѳn chib, tru katѳgan maramig karua paslig chigucha, tru: Ñui mendaigwan ñiasiitѳ lataitѳwei undaaramig kѳn cha, trencha karua pasligu, truyutѳ chishtѳ tѳga rrendain basran.
Inchawei tru ashib karub purrabelane nѳm maig taigwan mѳramig kѳn, mѳra melѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳmigwan kѳrig isuatѳ gѳmѳtѳ, namui isub kebachib pasrabigu chi isumig kaanrraingue..

Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ: Ñun ashig kѳmui inchibig chugurri mamig kaagúin gѳbene, manrrai tranѳb, pi mulgwai inchene, mutchai pi srѳrrѳb indamig kѳn cha. Treeg marabe, tru ñun kalѳ marimburѳ nune nuba kѳriimarѳb may barra gѳrrѳmartrabguen cha.
Ñimbe kangurrin gangurri trag nunelѳ lataig undaarayay. Nayasig tab gѳnrrain gѳmѳ, katѳganelayasig tab gѳnrrai, ñimbe treeg marѳbelѳ guy, ambugurri igurri maig kѳbash kѳmѳ.
Ñimuimburappe, ñimun mayangatig tabig waramdiig kѳben mu misaamerabatѳgucha ambugurri, igurri tabig warѳnrrab inday.m
Ñimun kaig marѳbelane chigѳben trѳmbѳig nebubash chib, treeg inchimѳtѳ, mayanguen tabig nebunrrun chib, treeg indamig kѳn..

Pѳs tru israelitasmera lawa wesruimeelѳbe tab ѳlivѳ tusryu srarmera latailѳ gua kegѳlsrailѳ latailѳ gѳben, trune ñibe, judíѳ gѳmíig, kan kau umbu ѳlivѳ, nѳtѳ beña gallab tusryu srarunѳ lataigwan, tru tab ѳlivѳ tusryu kallanrrai kemesra basren, ñibe tru ellmarig tab ѳlivѳ srѳlyu tab piwan mѳimbe tѳgatѳ utab pasran..
Nabe mѳimbe ñim judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran waminchar. Pѳs judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai Clistѳ nѳashib nan karua ѳlig kuikkurli, tru na marѳb tѳgagúigwane truba tabig kui asha tѳga basrar.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, nabe payrrab inchar: ¿Judíѳsmera treeg srurrengwawa kѳrrappe, katѳlebe managuen kurrѳnrrabikkaig kѳrrig kѳ chindah? cha. ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn. Tru Tius karua pasrigwan nѳm kalѳ marѳb itѳbunab gúibe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmigweyasig arrin gѳn, judíѳsmera nѳmguen pusrkwai ashib gѳmig kѳnrrai.m

Incha Davidbe nѳmuimburaptѳwei trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Nѳm tulundzuna kasrag warѳnrrab mab, muchib waraibe nѳm truyutѳwei ka ilѳsrka melamibah, kegѳrra waramibah, treegu srurrengwamibah, ѳyeeg marѳb gúimburѳ mѳra melamigweyasiibatѳ misrbash cha.

¿Trube, treebe mandѳ guerah? Tru israelitasmera unchibelѳ Tius tru lawa wesruilѳbeguende Tiusba tab pѳnrramigwan nebua tѳgagѳben, trune tru lawa wesruimeelѳ Tiusba tab pѳnrramigwan ke chinsraatѳ inchib lab melaigwan nѳmbe nebumuig kѳn, nѳmui manrrѳmerabe larrѳ murelѳ misriilѳ gua.
Pѳs treetѳwei mѳin gwalѳmgucha israelitasmera kan tѳbѳ uncha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn, Tius ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ lawa wesruilѳ.
Inchendѳ tru tabig srѳ wamwanma israelitasmera mayeelѳbabe mѳra marmuig kѳn. Kaguende Isaíasbe trendaig kѳn: Señѳr, ¿nam waminchib eshkaigwanma mu kѳreig kuitarru? cha..

Pѳs ñimbe Cristѳimburabigu kusrenanѳbelѳbe diez milburab tѳgagúindѳgucha, kan mѳskai lataibe kandѳ tѳga gѳn. Kaguende Cristѳ Jesúsweinuube Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamgurri nabe ñimuimbe mѳskai misrig kѳn.n

Namune kailѳ gѳnmab ashchai isa waminchen, namgurrimbe maig kѳbash inchimѳ, t'ammay lѳt'abelѳ guer. Nambe mѳi ѳyan gwalѳmgatig yu pirau yandѳ kaasha kѳrrѳmarig chilliirrѳsr kѳrreibig lat'ailѳ guer, mayeelai kaasi shau.

Pѳs nam Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilane yandѳ wendau ke srabesrѳ melab lataig treeg pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrailѳ guer, yandѳ kwanrrai wesrawa pѳnsrailan latawei. Pѳs nambe yu pirau mayeelai merrab misagashib srua gúilѳ gѳmig kѳtan, ángelesmera lata, misaamera lata.

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, treeg maramig pumѳwatѳbe ñibe ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg kuin gѳn chib, treeg kui mara kѳrrѳmarmѳtay. Muniiray Señѳr arrumnegatig. Tru sѳrig pѳnrrabig lѳstѳyuelan nѳbe tѳryu wesrawa, mѳguelѳ nѳmui manrrѳmerayu chi martrab isua tѳgagúilan kuragutchun. Inchen mѳitѳgucha Tius tabig wamindig kѳmigwan utѳnrrun, nѳm maig marig kѳben, treekke.

Incha Jѳsébe wendѳsrѳ nui nunelan trenchibig kѳn: —Nane yandѳ kwamig lutau kѳtan cha. Inchendѳ Tiusbe ñimune ashchab arrua, purugunrrun cha, Abrahamwanba, Isaacwanba Jacѳbwanba, ¡Katѳ! nabe tranmѳ kѳmѳ, tranamѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmisrin pirausrѳmay ñimune i piraugurri pera inrrab kѳn cha.—
Jѳsébe nui mѳskawei yau misaameraba Egiptѳ pirau tsuig kѳbig kѳn. Nѳbe pilamera cientѳ diezkatig ѳsig tsuig kѳbig kѳn.
Ñimbe nane kaig martrab isua maren, trune Tiusbe tru kaig maligwane tabig punrrai yunѳmaran cha, tru mѳi nam ashib pѳnrraigwan martrab, misag nѳrrѳ pasrabigwan ѳsig tѳgagѳnrrab.
Inchen nunelѳgucha Jѳséwei merrab chab pua, utsѳbasrabe, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe ñi k'a k'aruindiig melabelѳ kѳnrrer— cha.
Inchabe Jѳsé waisrѳmay trencha karua ѳrѳbelѳ kѳn: “Ñui mѳskaimbe nѳ kwamѳwatѳ, namune trencha karua pasrig kѳn cha:
Yandѳ mѳskawan chab sѳrabe, Jѳsébe Egiptѳmay katѳ nebarrubig kѳn, nui nunelѳba, katѳ maya misamera sѳrѳnrrab lincha amrrubelѳba.
Inchen Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳbe nѳmun maig martrai nѳ miaigwan treeg marѳbelѳ kѳn.

Inchen truigwan tru Canaán pirau warab misaamera ashabe, tru Atadwei tiligu chish malin tulyu truba truba isuig kishib kui ashabe, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Egipciѳsmera ѳyeekkatig kishib kuibe purѳ nuig kѳrren— cha. Inchagurli tru Jѳrdan pi ambѳgatѳmaysrѳmbe Abel Mizraim cha wamig kѳn. (Trenchippe: “Egipciѳsmera purѳ isui inchib puraambinug kѳn” chib.)
Incha nѳbabe k'aulli sruin k'arretillamerayu suldaumera kѳben, suldaumera k'aulli palar kѳben tsimaytѳ lincha nebambubelѳ kѳn, misag purѳ nѳrrѳgue.
Inchen Jѳsébe mѳskawan sѳrѳnrrab nebiben, Faraѳnwan tru nѳ karub waigu purugub purabelѳ nѳrrѳ kѳlli misaameraba, katѳ Egiptѳ pirau nѳrrѳ kѳlli misaameraba, nune linchibelѳ kѳn.

“Nai mѳskaimbe nѳ kwamѳwatѳ, ѳyeegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, ¡katѳ! nane maramѳnrrun tingaruig kѳn cha: ‘Canaan pirausrѳ sѳramig nѳ ashib tamarig pasrabigu, nun trusrѳ sѳramig kѳnrrai.’ Inchawei nai mѳskawan trusrѳ sѳrѳnrrab ibashcha” tan chinrrigay cha, nabe katѳ arrumѳnrrun— cha.k
Incha Jѳsébe tru mѳ marѳbelѳ nun purugub pѳnrrabelan nui mѳskawei asrwan minchib irrѳramѳnrrai mѳ marѳb tamarѳngarubig kѳn. Inchen tru mѳ marѳbelѳbe treeg marѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe nui mѳsk'awei asrwan ira, kishib muchabig kѳn.
Pѳs tru pirѳwanba tru peña trab lalig pasrabigwanbabe, Hititasmeran penig kuig kѳn.—m
Truyube Abrahamwanba, nui srai Saranba sѳrab, katѳ Isaacwanba nui srai Rebecanba sѳrab indig kѳn. Katѳ nagucha Lean truyu sѳrig kuig kѳn..

Incha katѳ Jacѳbpe ѳya eshkawa pasrѳbig kѳn: —Nabe nai misaameraba tsunrrab yamig yandѳ lut'au kѳt'an cha, nai kѳlli misaameraimbulu sѳrѳrrunrrig chibig cha, tru heteѳ Efrѳnwein pirau peña trab pasrabigu,
Inchen Benjamínbe kan larrѳ namig lѳbѳ lataig kѳn, lѳtsѳbe nui kemѳra mamigwan ma, maabene unchibelan pirishibig.”

Ñui mѳskaimbe tru maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan ñun tranѳppe, nai mѳskalѳ tru maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nan trani lataitѳguen kѳmѳ tranig kѳn, managatig tru pѳnrrab tunmerasrѳngatig. Tru iig mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai traniilѳbe, Jѳséwei turbala kѳnrrain kѳn, nui nunelai utugurri tru lawa wesruigweinug.n

nѳ srua pasrai arcѳne chigucha kullaaramѳ srua pasraig kѳn, tru Jacѳbwei maramburab marѳb kwalmeragurli. ¡Mayanguen ungua ungua tru Jacѳbwei Mugucha Chindamga Tiuswan. Truikkurlin kѳn, tru Ubisha Ashibig, tru Israelwei kan peña lataig.
“Inchen Jѳsébe kan larrѳ may utiguitsin tusr lataig kѳn, may utiguichib pi menda pasrab lataig. Tsiurѳzheelѳ nebib ibiibe tru pirѳbanrrimerasrѳ nebib ib lataig..
Neftalíbe kan ishug panzhig chi ilѳsrkaimíig uñibig lataig kѳn, larrѳ tab pan-ureezheelѳ peraig..
“Aserbe larrѳ may mamiimera mabig kѳnrrun. Incha nѳbe reywei mamiimera lataig manrrai pѳnsrѳnrrun.
“¡Jehѳvá, ñi kaiyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan muniirar!”m
Danbe kan may menda tsub ul lataig kѳn, tsachippe kwetchab tsachib ul may menda tsubig lataig, kaullin chiñimerayu tsacha, itѳguana wabigwan wendѳmay palasig kebinab kutsingarubig.”
Tru muba webya yamga tul-unѳbe larrѳ tabig, pirѳbe larrѳ chull asamdѳ pirѳ kѳb, katѳ pishindѳ tab tsumdiig kѳb kѳben, nѳbe karga niga inrrab lligwan kegucha, ka karuindѳ megabig mislig kѳn.
Inchen Zabulónweinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe mar mendawan warѳnrrabelѳ kѳben, truyube barcѳsmera chi isumgaig pub lliramig kѳnrrabig kѳn. Inchen nui linderѳsmerabe Sidѳnsrѳngatig lulrrabelѳ kѳn.
Judabe nui burrune uvas tusryu lichippe, lluig lamѳ burru unѳzhigwane purѳ tab tusr srѳlyu licha pasran. Nui kewa kuigwane vinѳtѳga tsarѳppe, nui pala itѳ kewa kuigwane uvas anim piyu tsaran.
Inchen ñi, nai nusrkai Judábe, kan matsinѳ leѳn lataig, nѳ kemѳrigwan chab mabe, kan kѳli leѳn lataig pirau purѳ mѳg ashib tsumisrѳptinchibig lataig kѳn. ¿Nune mugui kebacha ashchautah?m

Larrѳ tsag inchib namig kurriiba, nѳmui namikkѳbigu lastimagaig trѳmbѳig mariibabe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuig kѳbash cha.Nabe Jacѳbwei piraugurrimbe ke nuinguindѳ misrtrai mara, Israel pirau ke truѳrѳ amba warѳnrrai maramѳnrrun.
Simeónba Levíbabe nunelѳ kѳben, nѳmui espadamerabe k'a kwayab misag kweechib tѳgagѳmiitѳ kѳn cha.
Ñi, Ruben, nai mayur nusrkai, na unѳtѳ misag larrѳ chishig kua ke srѳtѳ tѳgaguig unѳ, tabig kui asig kѳmiguba, katѳ chi maramig nuig kѳmiguba ñimerrig kѳn cha.n
Kemalay cha, mѳrtrab, Jacѳbwei nusrk'alѳ. Mѳray cha, ñimui mѳsk'ai Israel wamindigwan.
Incha nabe ñui nunelan lat'aguen kѳmѳ, ñibe purab nuig kuikkurri Siquén pirѳwan, amѳrreѳsmeraba na truba truba nai espadatѳgaba, nai arcѳtѳgaba kwayawa tѳgaguim pirѳwan tranar— cha.

Incha tru kwalѳm Jacѳbpe mayanguen tabiitѳ nebuig kѳmigwan ѳyah chib tranѳbig kѳn: —Israel misaamera mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nѳm tranѳppe, ñimui munchiwan wamab tѳga pѳnrrѳnrrun cha: “Efraínwanba, Manaséswanba lataitѳwei, Tius ñimun treeg martrain”— chib. Incha Manaséswan wendau pasra, Efraínwan merrab pasrig kѳn..
Incha Jѳsébe mѳskawane trenchibig kѳn: —ѳyan kѳmѳtѳ cha, iig kѳn cha, mayurbe iigweimbala ñui kusrmay tasigwan estsar— cha.

tru nan chine kaig pubigugurri wesrub Ángel i pagatѳ matsѳreg-ureemeran maya nuguen tabiitѳ nebuig kѳnrrai martrunrrig chib. Incha iilѳgurri nai munchiba, nai mѳskalѳ Abrahamweimba Isaacweimba munchimerabe pѳnrrabig pѳnrrѳnrrun cha. Nѳmbe pirau nѳrrѳ karrab purѳ nѳrrѳ larrѳbitchai.n

Treeg pѳnsraindѳgucha Israelbe nui kwalmeran ambumay imay yunѳmarѳppa nui kusrmay tasigwane Efrainwei turbala estsarѳbig kѳn, wendѳ nusrk'ain kuindѳgucha. Nui atsimay tasigwane Manaseswei turbala estsarѳbig kѳn, truibe mayur nusrk'ain kuindѳgucha.
Inchen Jѳsébe uregwan nui mѳskawei srѳb utѳyugurri tarѳmarѳppa, kappalѳwan pirausrѳ kebatamnegatig utsѳbasrѳbig kѳnm

Israelbe yandѳ purѳ kѳlliizhig kuig kua, yandѳ nui kabzheelѳbe tѳr pilѳmuben, tab ashchab kaimabig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsebe nui ureemeran nui mѳskaweim pulu kemalsrѳben, nѳbe muchab, irab inchibig kѳn.m
Incha Israelbe Jѳséwei nusrkalan ashiptinchabe, payibig kѳn: —¿Iilѳbe mumera kѳh?— cha.
Inchen ñi tru wendau ureemera tѳgagui nusrkalѳbe ñuielѳ kѳnrrun cha. Incha nѳmbe Efraínweimba, Manasesweimba nunelѳ kuig kѳppe, truilai munchiyu pirѳ ketig utѳnrrun chan

ѳyeeg cha kѳrrѳmislig kѳn cha: “Nabe ñune ureg purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai marѳb, misag sѳtѳmera purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Incha nabe ñuinukkurli amrrub misaamerane i pirѳwan tranen, managatig i pirѳbe nѳmuin kѳnrrun” taig kѳn cha.
Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Maramburab Marѳb Tiusbe Canaán pirau Luz ciudayu kenamisra, nane mayanguen tabigwan trana,
Inchen Jacѳbwane eshkabelѳ kѳn: —Ñui nusrkai Jѳsé ñun ashchab pun— cha. Inchen nѳbe ke kaimatѳzhig kѳbendѳ, truba tranrra, camayu kurra, wamisra,

Inchen Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —‘¡Katѳ! Marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun’ chirra— cha. Inchen Jѳsébe: —¡Katѳ! Marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun— chibig kѳn. Inchen Israelbe nui pѳtѳnaig tsig pala utsѳbasrѳptinchibig kѳn..

Israel ѳsig tsum kwalѳmmera yandѳ patsѳnrrab kѳben, nui nusrk'ai Jѳséwan wamѳnrrab ѳrabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Na ñuin k'abyu tabig asѳnaig kuinabene, tiusmanda ñui tasigwan nai srѳptsim umbu estsar cha. Treeg marѳppe na maig miaigwane trunune martrunrrig cha undaatѳga. Incha nan purѳ nu lastima ashib, martrab kѳrrѳmisrigwane martrunrrig chibig kѳn. Tiusmanda nane Egiptѳsrѳmbe sѳrѳmѳrrunrrig chibig kѳn.
ѳyamay israelitasmerabe Egiptѳ pirau warѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisrig kuig kѳn, Gѳsén pirau. Incha nѳmbe truyu pirѳmera merrarrawa waramisra, nѳmbe truyube wereg nѳrrѳ tѳgagua, larrѳ nu misrig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñibe nam ѳsig warѳnrrai martan cha. Nѳ yangucha tab indigwan nambe uta tѳga pѳnrrer cha. Nambe Faraón karuindѳ melabelѳ kѳmѳnrrun— chibelѳ kѳn..
Incha Jѳsébe misaameran trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳimbe ñimba ñimui pirѳmerababe Faraónweyelѳ kѳn cha, nabe nuyasig penig kѳn cha. Ñimbe yu yellmera tѳgagѳn cha, pirѳmeran ellmaray chibig kѳn.
Incha egipciѳsmerabe Egiptѳ pirau muba kuimburab nѳmbe ka karuindeelѳ melѳnrrab melamisrig kѳbig kѳn..

Namui pirѳmerabañau ¿ñigan nam kwanrrai kѳnrraindeh? cha. Ñi namunba, namui pirѳmeranba penѳrray cha, mamiiba yunѳmariilѳ kѳnrrai. Trumaybe nambe namui pirѳmerabañau nambe Faraónwei misra karuindeelѳ melamѳnrrun cha. Inchendѳ yellmera nam mamig kѳben, ellguamelѳ kѳben, trannrra cha, nam ѳsig waramig kѳnrraimbe, katѳ pirѳmeragucha lelatsiilѳ pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai.—

Inchen egipciѳsmerabe nѳmui ushameran srua amrrubelѳ kѳn, kaullimera kѳben, ubishamera kѳben, cabrasmera kѳben, burrumera kѳben, waramera kѳben. Incha tru ushameraba yunѳmara, tru pilawan mamiimera tranѳbig kѳn.

Inchen yandѳ Egiptѳ pirau lata, Canaán pirau lata chigucha anga patsѳben, maya egipciѳmerabe Jѳséweimay amrrua trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Namun ñi mamiimera pѳnsrѳrra cha. ¿Namgan ñui merrab kwamig kuitarru? cha, namun kerrigu an patsinukkurrindѳ.
Yandѳ muba pirѳ kuimburab chigucha mamig chigaaben, trune parѳbe chindamdiig kѳben, Egiptѳ pirau lata, Canaán pirau lata parѳ arrubigu yandѳ misaamerabe kwamitѳ palabig kѳn.

Inchen Jacѳbpe Faraónwan trenchibig kѳn: —Na amburab, iburab llirab uniibe pilamera cientѳ treint'a kѳn cha. Na ѳsig uniibe menrra yam pilamera kѳmѳwei, katѳ murig kuig kѳn cha. Tru nai kѳlli misaamera nѳm llirab amѳnain pilamerababe trugatig nebumum kѳt'an. —cha.
Incha Jacѳbpe Faraónwan mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrig chib, truyugurri ungua cha ibig kѳn.
Trugurri Jѳsébe nui mѳskai Jacѳbwangucha pera ya, Faraónwan, ‘iibe nai mѳskain kѳn’ cha eshkabig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe Faraónwan ‘mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrig’ chibig kѳn.
Inchene Faraonbe Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskaimba, ñui nunelѳba ñiba warѳnrrab amrruin kѳn cha..

Incha k'atѳ trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe i pirau k'an maya yanatѳ warѳnrrab amrruer cha, k'aguende nam ñui k'aruig melabelai ubishameraimbe Canaán pirau nam waraisrѳmbe chi pu k'aagѳn cha. Trusrѳmbe parѳbe ni chindamguchagaig pasran cha. Inchagurri nam ñui k'aruig melabelan tiusmanda Gѳsén pirau namun warѳbashibsrumѳgue chinrrab inder— cha.
Incha Gѳséngurri attraptѳ trattrѳgatѳ nui nunelan lawa wesrua, Faraónwei merrab pera arrubig kѳn, ‘nai nunelѳ kѳn’ cha eshkanrrab.
Inchawei Faraón ñimun wama: “¿Ñimbe chi marѳbelѳ kѳgue?” cha bayene,
Pѳs nѳmbe ubisha ashibelѳ waara karrѳgѳbelѳ treelѳ kѳn chinrrab. Incha nѳmui ubishameran kѳben, waarameran kѳben chigurrimbunѳ nѳm tѳgaguilan kѳben srua amrrun” cha..
Inchen Israelbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳimbe ñun na ashib asha, ñi ѳsig ka wabig kuin kui wetѳrrawabe, nabe chi isumѳ, ka kwamѳnrrun— cha..
Inchen Jѳséwei ureemerabe pagatѳ kuig kѳn, Egiptѳ pirau kal-lawar. Inchawei Jacѳbwei yau misaamerabe Egiptѳsrѳmbe setent'a puig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mayeelѳ Jacѳbpa Egiptѳ pirau nuikkurri amrrub misaamerabe pubelѳbe sesent'a y seis kuig kѳn, nui aniyugurri ureemera nusrkalai sralan munchimuben.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Jacѳbweimba Raquelweinukkurrimba amrrub ureemera kerrigube catѳrcegue.

Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Zilpa Jacѳbwei tѳgagui nusrkalѳ. Tru Zilpabe karuindiig mendig megabig kuig kѳn, tru Laban nui nimbasr Lean ket'a trani ishug. Tru Zilpainukkurri amrrub ureemerabe kerrigube dieciséis kuig kѳn.
Inchen Gadwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Zifión kѳben, Hagui kѳben, Ezbón kѳben, Suni kѳben, Eri kѳben, Arѳdi kѳben, Areli kѳbengue.

Truilѳ kuig kѳn tru Padan-aramsrѳ warab uras Lea Jacѳbwei tѳgagui nusrkalѳ, katѳ tru Dina nui nimbasrba. Inchawei truyugurri amrrub misaamera mѳguelan kѳben, ishumburmeran kѳben munchene kerrigube treint'a y tres kuig kѳn.
Inchen Zabulónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Sered kѳben, Elón kѳben, Jahleel kѳbengue.
Inchen Leviwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Gersón kѳben, Cѳat kѳben, Merari kѳbengue.
Inchen Simeónwei nusrkalѳbe Jemuel kѳben, Jamin kѳben, ѳhad kѳben, Jaquin kѳben, Zѳhar kѳben, katѳ kan Canaánsrѳ ishuwei nusrkai Saúl kѳbengue.
Katѳ trugurri Rubenwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Hanѳc kѳben, Falu kѳben, Hezrón kѳben, Carmí kѳbengue.n
Nui nusrkalѳ kѳben, nui nimbasrmera kѳben, nui awelu ureemera kѳben, nui awela ureemera kѳben mayeelѳ nuinukkurri amrrub misaamera nѳba ambig kѳn.n

Incha yandѳ Jacѳb Beersebagurri webibene, Israelwei nusrkalѳbe nѳmui mѳskai Jacѳbwan kѳben, nѳmui ureemeran kѳben, nѳmui sralan kѳben, tru Faraón amrrunrrai carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilѳ trana ѳriilѳyu amrrab nebambingarubelѳ kѳn.
Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe Tius kur cha, tru ñui mѳskawei. Tius. Egiptѳ pirausrѳmay kѳrrayamig chi kѳrig isumѳta cha. Nabe ñune ñigurri purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha trusrѳ..
Incha Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai Jѳsé katѳgucha ѳsig wabig kuin kui yandѳ tsabѳ ashar cha. Na kwamѳwatѳ nabe ashchab yamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.

Incha trusrѳ puabe, trenchiptinchibelѳ kѳn: —Jѳsébe ka ѳsig wan cha. Egiptѳ pirau muba kuimburab nѳ karub ashib wabig kuin kѳmѳh— cha. Inchen Jacѳbwei manrrѳbe pasram kwarѳptinchibig kѳn, kaguen nѳbe kѳremuig kua..
Inchen nѳmbe Egiptѳ piraugurri nebambub amba, Canaán pirausrѳ pubelѳ kѳn, nѳmui mѳsk'ai Jacѳb waisrѳ.

Incha nui mѳskaweyasiibe iilan trana ѳrѳbig kѳn: Egiptѳ pirau purѳ tabelѳ tѳgaguilan pa trattrѳ burrusmerayu niisra ѳliilѳba, katѳ pa trattrѳ cargas burramerayu tiligu niisra ѳliilѳba, katѳ pirlimera kѳben, mamiimera kѳben niisra ѳrѳbig kѳn, mѳskai maywan mab arrumig.
Inchen Israelwei nusrkalѳbe treeg marѳbelѳ kѳn. Pѳs Faraón maig karuben Jѳsébe carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilan pѳnsrѳb, mayuwei ishiimera tranѳb inchibig kѳn.
Katѳ ñibe nѳmune treeg karunrrig cha: “Yu Egiptѳ pirau carretillas nѳrreelѳ weytѳga sruilan srua ambingaru cha, nѳmui sralan kѳben, ureemeran kѳben ñui mѳskawan kѳben pera amrrumig.
Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nunelan Canaán pirausrѳmay nѳmui ushamerayu niisra amrrai karu cha.
Inchen Faraón nѳ waig yausrѳmbe wam pubig kѳn: “Jѳsewei nunelѳ chab puin kѳn” tan chib. Inchen Faraónba tru nui maramigwan marѳb purrabelѳ nѳrreelѳbabe k'asraarabelѳ kѳn.
Incha Jѳsébe nunelan muchawa, truba truba kishib irabig kѳn. Inchen nunelane wamindamig wam larraibig kѳn.

Nai papáwan eshk'anrrigay cha Egiptѳ pirau kerriguwan ashib na k'arub waigube chigurrimbunѳ kѳn cha k'atѳ ñim kerrigu chi asiilanba. ¡Ñimbe mallatѳ amba!, yusrѳmay nai papáwan pera amrrunrrigay— chibig kѳn.

Nabe ñun truyu ashib tѳgagѳrrumѳn cha, kaguen katѳgucha trattrѳ pila ѳrѳba tru parѳbe arrubig attrab kѳn cha. Trengѳmuisruandѳbe ñiba, ñui ureemeraba, ñui kerligu chi tѳgaguilѳbañau larrѳ lastimailѳ misra kѳrrѳmisrtrabguen’ cha.

Inchawei ñimbe mallatѳ incha, nai mѳskawei yamay amba, trenchinrrigay cha: “Ñui nusrkai Jѳsébe ѳyah tan cha: ‘Tiusbe nane Egiptѳ pirau kerriguba na karub wanrrai wandan’ cha. Incha ‘nan ashchab ‘pebatѳ’ amѳ’ tan chinrrigay cha..
Incha Tiusbe manawei nanmerrig ѳrig kѳbig kѳn cha, ñim pirau ka ѳsig warѳwa, larrѳ tab webamba pѳnrramig puben, trumay misaamera larrѳbichibig larrѳbichib kѳnrrai..

Inchendѳ ñimbe chi kullaarab isui inchimѳtay cha. Ñim nan yusrѳmay yanig kѳbigwan karrengucha ѳyeeg marѳbraitamab isumѳtay cha. Nane Tius ѳlig kѳn cha, manawei nanmerlig inrrai, misaameran kwamѳ ka ѳsig puramrrai martrab.

Incha Jѳsébe nui nunelane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Nabe Jѳsé kur cha. ¿Nai mѳskaingan tab ka wabig kuitarru?— cha. Inchen nunelѳbe larrѳ kѳrrѳ kwaara, ni chigucha lѳtѳnrrab kaimaptinchibelѳ kѳn, nѳmbe nui merrab ni mumayguen kѳmuilѳ pѳnrrѳwa.
Incha nѳbe trasha, trasha kishen, egipciѳsmerabe wammѳren, katѳ Faraónwei yau misaameragucha wammѳren inchibelѳ kѳn..
Inchawei tiusmanda, nabe ñun treeg marѳbsrumu chinrrab cha, matsinaimburѳ na purѳbasramisrtrur cha, na ñui karuindiig meganrrab, matsinѳ-unѳbe nui nunelѳba katѳ inrrai..

Incha na ñui k'aruig megabiibe matsinan na purѳbasramisrѳb na ashchab misrig kѳn cha, nai mѳsk'awei merrab. Incha nabe nai mѳsk'awane trendaig kѳn cha: “Na k'atѳle ñuimay pera arrumuinabene, trube, nagurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, na chu urask'atig nai ѳsig tsuigu” cha.
namui mѳskaimbe nun ashmuppe, kwanrrun cha. Inchen nam kѳmѳnrrun cha, namui mѳskai kѳlli misagwan isubiitѳgatѳ kwamig kѳnrrai marѳbelѳbe.
Katѳ iigwangucha pera amben, katѳ chigѳben kѳptinchene, na kѳllig waachawan isubiitѳgatѳ kwamig kѳnrrai marѳbelѳbe ñim kѳnrrabguen” cha, nane trendaig kѳn cha.
Indig k'ane nainukkurri ya yandѳ pinѳben, k'atѳbe managuen ashmur cha. Namig ushamera pitis marig kuitamab isur tan cha.
Inchen nambe namui mѳskawane trendaig kѳn cha: “Namui wendѳ nuneg arrumuingatiibe nambe chincha ambamgaig kѳn cha. Namun nѳ linchimubene, tru karubigwane asamig kaagѳn” cha.
Inchene nam ñui karuig melabelane ñibe trendaig kѳn cha: “Ñimui wendѳ nuneg ñimba arrumuingatiibe, trube, kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay” cha..
Inchen nambe namui karubigwan yamba trendaig kѳppeh cha: “Matsinѳbe mѳskawane chincha elatchaamѳn cha, kaguende nѳ elachene, mѳskaimbe kwanrrun” cha.
Inchene ñi maig chiben nam treeg pѳnrrabelane ñibe trendaig kѳmѳh cha: “Na ashchab tru wendѳ nunewane pera amrrunrrigay” cha.
Ñi namui karubiibe namune ѳyeeg chib payig kѳbig kѳn cha: “¿Ñimbe katѳgucha mѳskawan ka wannar kѳgueh, kabe katѳgan nuneg kui tѳgar kѳgueh?” chib.

Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Kan nabe treebe mana marѳb pasramѳ cha. Tru cѳpan nuinug wetѳrrainabiitѳh nai karuindiig meganrrab kѳrrѳmisrtrun cha. Ñimbe chi isumѳ, ñimui mѳskaweisrѳmay ka ambay— chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Ñimbe ѳyeebe mumay marѳb pѳnrrѳngue? cha. Kan mѳg chi chippe treegwan kѳnrrai inchibig na lataibe ñim chi kalѳ martrab indigwan kabe wetѳbeñmѳnrraitamagueh— cha.
Inchen nunelѳbe nѳmui kewa pѳnrraigwan larrѳ isuin pѳnrrai ashchai kenamartrab kѳlsrѳptinchibelѳ kѳn. Incha nѳm mѳitѳgucha nѳmui burrumeran katѳ niisra, ciudasrѳmay katѳle chab llirabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe mallazhiitѳ niisraigwan chab pinѳsrua, mѳitѳgucha kustalmeran pirau pѳnsra tsusaigwan pichibelѳ kѳn.
Inchen nam ñui karuig melabelainug mѳigweinug kѳben, tru cѳpan wetѳrrainabiibe, truibe kwamig kѳnrrain cha. Inchen namguen ñui karuindiig melabelѳ kѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisramѳnrrun— chibelѳ kѳn.n
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ kѳn: —¿Tru namun ashib karubiibe namune chindimbarre ѳyeeg chinetѳ tah? cha. ¡Kan! nambe managuen treekkѳliibe mara kѳmer cha.
Inchen tru yau ashib wab mѳѳbe wetѳgabe, Jѳsé maig t'aigwan treetѳweih chibig kѳn.
Nan karub pera pasrabig truyu muchib, chi purainrrabigwan truyu nebua ashib indin cѳpan. Ñimgui purѳ kalѳ marin kѳn”— cha.
Inchen yandѳ ke chab tѳr-rrabendѳ tru mѳguelane Jѳsebe ambasingarubig kѳn, nѳmui burrumeranba.
Incha tru wendѳ nunewei tirigu kustal trigube nai cѳpa andѳga marigwan wayrrig cha tru tiriguburѳ nѳ an pagaraigwanba kanbalatѳ.—Inchen tru yau ashib wabiibe Jѳsé maig karuigwan marѳbig kѳn..

Inchen Jѳséwei nunelѳbe nui merrab purrabelѳ kѳn, Jѳsé maig purramisringaruben, treekke. Kerrigu mayurmerrig, trugurrimbe tru wendauig treetѳ, treetѳ nѳm maya yanailѳ kѳben, trumay treeg purrѳnnѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe truba kwaariilѳ purrabelѳ kѳn, nѳmbe ¡katѳ! kangurri, kangurri asiyab.n
Incha yandѳ awentawa, nui malѳwan kwalla, webarruabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Mamiimera nѳm manrrai pѳnsray— cha.k

Inchen Jѳsébe nuin pѳtѳgat'an ashabe, tru kan mѳskaindѳ, kan usrindѳ kuikkurri nuimbe trag nuneg Benjamín pasrai ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: —¿I tru ñimui wendѳ nuneg kuit'arru cha, tru ñim nan wamindig?—Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: —Tius maya nuguen ñun t'ab indig kѳnrrain cha, nai nusrkai.—
Inchen yandѳ Jѳsé yau pubene, nѳmbe tru ketamelѳ srua amrruilan keta, nѳmbe Jѳséwei merrab pirausrѳngatig malѳwan trarrѳb utsѳbasrѳbelѳ kѳn.n
Inchen nѳmbe ketamelan tamara, Jѳsé israyu pumnegatig muniirabelѳ kѳn, kaguen mamiibe truyu kѳnrrabig kui nѳmbe wammѳra purrѳwa.k
trugurrimbe Jѳsé waisrѳmay pera ya, nѳmui srѳmmeran kwalamig pi tranѳb, burrumeran mannamig pѳnsrѳb inchibig kѳn.
Incha tirigu penamig anbe katѳ srѳig sruamrruer cha. Inchendѳ nambe tru srѳsrѳ srua amrrui anwane kustalmerayu mu kebusri mѳrmer— cha..
trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Tiusmanda, namui karubig, nambe tru srѳtѳ kѳrrѳrruppe tirigu penѳnrraptѳ kѳrrѳrruig kѳn cha.
Incha yandѳ kebambi yaskabu puabe, tru Jѳséwei yawan ashibigwan nѳmbe waminchab kemallabe
Inchen tru mѳѳbe Jѳsé maig taigwan mara, Jѳséwei yamay nѳmune pera ibig kѳn.

Inchen Jѳsébe Benjamín nѳmba arlin kui ashabe, tru nui yau ashibigwane trenchibig kѳn: —I mѳguelan nai yamay pera ya, kan waara kweecha tamaray cha, kaguen i mѳguelѳbe kwalѳm tѳbѳtaabe naba manrrab kѳn— cha.
Incha ñimui wendѳ nunewan pera, tru Egiptѳ pirau nѳ karub wabigweimay katѳ ambay chibig kѳn.

Angucha srua ambuppe, maya srua ambig kѳmnetѳ katѳ treetѳweih srua ambay cha. Ñimui tirigu kustalyu tru anmeran katѳle pusrig kѳbigwane trannrrab katѳle srua ambay cha. Inchippa pella treenchib kuin kѳbgun cha.
Chi kѳmѳnrrai nune na asamѳnrrun cha. Na yumay nun katѳle pera arrumuinabene, trube, nagurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, na chu uraskatig nai ѳsig tsuigu.
Inchene Judábe mѳsk'ai Israelwane trenchibig kѳn: —Matsinane na asamѳnrrun cha. Matsinane naba k'a ingaru cha, nambe yandѳ ambamѳnrrun cha, ñi lata, nam lata, namui ureemera lata kwamѳnrrappe.
Inchene Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimgui nane purѳ trѳmbѳig kalѳ mariitan cha. ¿Tru mѳwane katѳgan nuneg tѳgaguer chabe, chinchabrre eshkainguaasamѳrra?— cha.
Ñí namui nunewan ka pera ambasheneh, trube, nambe ñuyasig mamig penѳnrrab kѳrraambamѳnrrun cha.
Inchene Judábe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru mѳѳbe namune ¡katѳ! ke kandѳ cha pasrig kuig kѳn cha: “Tru ñimui wendѳ nunewan ñim pera amrrumuingatiibe trube, nan kuimbe kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay” cha.

Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkaimbe ñimba inrraamѳn cha. Jѳsé nuneebe yandѳ kwaig mugaaben, mѳimbe nѳtѳwein kѳrrѳmisra megan cha. Mayu chigѳben kaig nebubene, chi martrague cha, trube, ñimgurrindѳ kѳnrrun cha, kѳllig waacha isubigutѳ kuabene.—

Inchene mѳsk'ai Jacѳbpe nѳmune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimbe nane yandѳ chi nusrk'alѳgaig kѳrrѳmarѳb amrrutan cha. Jѳsébe yandѳ pinig mugaaben, Simeóngucha mugaaben, mѳimbe Benjaminwan pera amrrab indan cha. Iibe kerriguba naimbalatѳ pureb attan— cha.

Inchendѳ katѳ amrruppe, wendѳ nunewan pera amrrunrrigay chitan cha. Trumaybe ñim isa kѳmѳ chigѳben kalѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera, ka maig kѳtashchab ashib ka larѳnrraptѳ amrrumuin kui asamѳnrrun cha. Trugurrimbe ñui katѳgan nunewan elachen, ñimbe i pirau mu chi taimíig yanѳb, penab amѳnamig kѳnrrun” chitan— cha.n
Inchen: “Nambe chigѳben kalѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera, managuen maig kѳtashib larab amѳñimeelѳ ker cha, nambe trender cha.
—Tru pirausrѳ karub wab mѳѳbe namune purѳ tsag wamincha, nui pirѳwan maig kѳtashib namune larab amrruig treeg kemesrѳtan cha.
Incha nѳmbe tru kѳrrѳmisra kiamsrѳ puabe, mѳikkѳsrѳn nui burrun tirigu mannrrab kustalwan pichene, mѳimbe nui anbe kustalrrigu k'a wai ashiptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe nѳmui tirigumeran burrumerayu niisra truyugurri ambubelѳ kѳn.m

Incha trugurrimbe Jѳsébe nѳmui kustalmerayu tirigu netsѳganingarua, katѳle tru nѳmui tiriguburѳ pagarai anmerane kanun, kanun tru nѳmui tirigu kustalyu pusringarub, katѳ mayuwei ishin tamara traningarub inchibig kѳn. Inchen treeg marig kѳn.m
Inchen Jѳsébe nѳ wamindi wamwan nui nunelan katѳburѳ lliska waminchabig katѳgan pera pasrabig kѳn. Inchagurli nunelѳbe nѳm chi chib pѳnrrailane Jѳsébe mѳrѳb pasraitamappe isumeelѳ kѳn.

Inchabe kangurri kangurri trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Isa kѳmѳ, nambe namui nuneweimburab larrѳ trѳmbѳig kalѳ marig kѳn cha. Pѳs ѳyeekkatiibe marmѳrrunrrigay chib nѳ namun truba truba trenchib megaben, nambe trendaigwane ni mѳrѳkkuinguen kѳmuin pѳnrraig kѳbig kѳn cha, yeeg lastima isui indi ashatѳgucha. Truburѳ mѳimbe ѳyeeg isuin pѳnrramig namuimbala itѳarrin pѳnrrer— cha.

Ñim isa kѳmѳ, chigѳben k'alѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera kuabe, mѳikkѳben ñimui k'an nunewan keera awannig kѳrrѳmisra wanrrain cha. Inchen k'anelѳbe ñim ñimui yau misaameran parѳ purѳrmѳnrrab mamiimera srua ambay cha.
Incha tru nѳm pa trattreelane Jѳsébe pѳn kwalѳm ѳrѳba keelig purrѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn.

Incha isa kѳmѳ, ñimui wamindig ciertѳ kuitashchab Faraónwei merrab, ¡katѳ! nabe ѳyeeg maramѳnrrun cha, trendamѳnrrun chibig kѳn, ñimui wendѳ nuneg-unan yumay pera amrrumuingatiibe ñimbe yugurrimbe webamrraamѳn cha.n
Inchen Jѳsébe k'atѳle trenchibig kѳn: —Na maig taig ñimbe maisrѳn kѳtashchab nilѳ k'a larѳnrraptѳrre amrrun cha.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Kah cha, ñimbe i pirau kwayanrrab mubѳrab mas may kegѳrramdiig kѳtashib trunun ashchaptѳwei amrruin kѳn— cha.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñi, namui karubig, chi treeg kѳmѳn cha, nam ñui karuig melabelѳbe tirigu penѳnrrab amrruig kѳn cha.n
Inchen Jѳsébe nui nunelѳ kui ashen, nѳmgurrimbe ashmeelѳ kѳn.k

Inchen Jѳsébe tru pirau nѳ ashib karubig kѳbig kѳn, katѳ chu pirausreelan kѳben maya misaameran tirigu yanѳbig. Inchen Jѳséwei nunelѳ trusrѳ puabe, nѳmui kappalѳmeran pirausrѳngatig kebachib utsѳbasrѳbelѳ kѳn.n
Inchen Israelwei nusrkalѳbe mamig penѳnrrab ambubelѳ kѳn, tru katѳganelѳ penѳnrrab ambubelѳba, kaguende Canaán piraube parѳ purѳ trѳmbѳig pasrѳben.
Egiptѳsrѳmbe mamig kѳn tai wammѳrar cha. Trusrѳmay kѳrraamba, namuyasig mamig penay cha, kwamѳ, ѳsig waramig kѳnrraimbe.——
Inchen Jacѳbpe Egiptѳsrѳmbe mamiimera kѳn tai wammѳrabe, nui nusrk'alane trenchibig kѳn: —Mailѳ kѳh cha, k'angurri k'angurri asiyab purrѳnrrappe.
Inchen chu pirausrѳ misaameratѳgucha Jѳséwan tirigu penѳnrrab amrrubelѳ kѳn, kaguen tru parѳ arrubiibe yandѳ munaѳrѳba arrub pasrѳben.

Inchen Egiptѳ pirau kerrigu misaabe barѳ arrub mendi mѳrabe, misaamerabe Faraónwan mamig kaatan cha, miab mendaptinchen, Faraonbe maya egipciѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: —Jѳséweimay amba, nѳ maig taigwan maray— cha.
Inchen tru Egiptѳ pirau mamig larrѳ misrѳb pilamera trattrѳ y par chab puraiben,

Incha mayur nusrk'awane Manasés munchi pasrig kѳn, k'aguende nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: “Nai mѳsk'awei yaugurri webya iben, chine chine nebuinab unig kѳbigwan Tiusbe trunun isubguengaig pishindѳ unamig kѳnrrai martan” cha.

Jѳsébe tirigumera nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ k'an maryu pisrum lataig nѳrrѳ tulishibig kѳn. Tirigu purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ yandѳ mayan kѳn tamgaig kѳben, k'a kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn, nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ ѳyan kѳn chib eshk'ab tѳgagѳmgaig kuikkurri.
Tru trattrѳ y par misrѳb pilamerawane pirѳbe truba truba misren,

Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane munchin yunѳmara Zafenat Panea cha wamababig kѳn. Incha Asenatwan nui srain kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn, truibe ѳn ciudasrѳ sacerdѳte lataig Pѳtifera taigwei nimbasrwan. ѳyamay Jѳsébe Egiptѳ pirѳwan ashchab pasramisrig kѳn.k
Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe ñune Egiptѳ pirau kerriguba ñi asha karub wanrrai neera wannar cha, naimburѳ ashib wanrrai.—
Incha Faraonbe surtigas sellѳbañauigwan nui taskugurli wesrawa, Jѳséwan pasrѳbig kѳn. Incha trugurlimbe keilѳ linѳtѳga malig purѳ tabig kenanѳb, katѳ kan ѳrѳ naashigu ilѳsrѳb inchibig kѳn.
Faraonbe tru nui karuilane trenchibig kѳn: —¿Tiuswei espíritu nuinug arrua pasrainabig, katѳgan ѳyeeg mѳg wetѳrranrraut'ah?— cha.
Inchen tru ѳyeebe Faraónwanba tru nѳ karuigwan marѳbelanbabe truba tabig mѳrѳraben,
Tru mamig misrѳbig larrѳ tab pilamera amrruben, tru Faraón maig chiben trumay tru ellmalig misligwan ashibelѳbe mamigwan kanbalatѳ tulisha, ciudamѳlig esegamig kѳnrrun, misaamerayasig mamig kѳnrrai.
Incha treekkurri ñi Faraonbe kan larrѳ kusreb mѳg, chigui asha tab marѳb mѳg lanrrain cha, Egiptѳ pirau kerrigu chi maramigwan nѳ karub ashib tѳga basramisrtrai.
Pѳs, ñi Faraonbe pamay treetѳ, treetѳ piaig mѳrig kѳn cha, kaguen Tiusbe iigwan ñi asha kѳnrrai ¡katѳ! martrab pasran cha, trurrigu chi srarrѳmѳtѳ.

Inchen katѳ tru wendaube pilamera trattrѳ y par purѳ trѳmbѳig parѳ attrabig kѳn cha, truba truba mamiimera misrig kѳbelanguen chi misrmuig kui lataig pesannawa kѳmgue, kaguende tru parѳ arrubiibe tru Egiptѳ pirѳwane purѳ lastimaig mara kѳrrѳmartrun cha..
Nabe ñi Faraónwan ѳyeeg eshk'ar cha, Tiusbe nѳ maig maramigwan ñune kenamarѳb pasran cha.
Tru truba tab waaramera trattrѳ y par, katѳ tru larrѳ tab tirigu turmera tru trattrѳ y parbabe pilamera trattrѳ y parwan eshkan cha. Tru piaibe trutѳwei kandѳ eshkabig kѳn cha..

Inchen tru larrѳ pѳndѳ tirigube tru larrѳ tab tirigu turmeran kebinab, kebinab piñbashib piabig kѳn cha. Inchen nabe tru magia kusrebelѳ mu mana mariimíigwan marѳbelan payen, muguen truilѳbe tru piaibe ѳyeeg chibig kѳn chabe eshkamѳtan— chibig kѳn..
Inchen tru wendaube tru tsutsigutѳwei katѳgan trattrѳ y par weguchibelѳ kѳn, larrѳ pѳndѳzhig, tru kurag isig arrubig tustam itsiilѳ.n
Inchendѳ truilan mappe, mabendѳ, kan chigucha mamѳwa lataitѳweih pѳnrrabelѳ kѳn cha. Kaguende maig kѳbelѳbe treeg trѳmbѳig kalargѳleetѳweih pѳnrrabelѳ kѳn. Inchen nabe kasraptindinabig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru waaramera larrѳ trѳmbѳgѳleelѳ kalargѳleelѳbe tru srѳtѳ trattrѳ y par tsal waaramera pѳnrrabelan maptinchibelѳ kѳn cha.

Inchene Jѳsébe Faraónwane trenchibig kѳn: —Tru treeg maramibe nainug basrѳmѳn cha. Faraón chi isumѳ pishindѳ tab wanrrai wam tranѳb lѳtѳnrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳn cha.—17 Inchen Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nan piappe, nabe Nilѳ nu pi menda basrѳbene,
Inchene Jѳsébe Faraónwane trenchibig kѳn: —Tru treeg maramibe nainug pasrѳmѳn cha. Faraón chi isumѳ pishindѳ tab wanrrai wam tranѳb lѳtѳnrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳn cha.——
Inchen Faraonbe Jѳsewan attrai wamѳnrrab ѳren, tru urastѳ Jѳséwane kalѳ marѳbelan merrarrawa keeriinukkurri wesraben, Jѳsébe milisigwan mullib, kewaguilan yunѳmarѳb, Faraónweimay arrubig kѳn.

Inchen truyube kan hebreѳ matsinan merrarrawa keerig namba waig kѳbig kѳn cha, tru suldaumeran nѳ karub tѳga pasrabigwei karuig megabig. Inchen nambe namui piailan nun eshkabene, nѳbe namui piailan ѳyeeg kѳnrrabig kѳn cha eshkabig kѳn mѳ piaitѳgucha maig kѳnrrabigwan..

Pѳs yanaguen kѳn cha nam ñui karui melabelan ñi namun nama, nanba tru pirri marѳbelan ashib karub pasrabigwanba, tru suldaumeran nѳ karub ashibigwei yau, nѳ ashib tѳgaguilѳ purrѳnrrai namune keeringaruig kѳbig kѳn cha..

Inchen nѳbe lѳtsѳ kia kasrappe, larrѳ isuig kia kurra, tru Egiptѳsrѳ mayeelѳ magia kusrebelѳ mu mana mariimíigwan marѳbelanba, larrѳ kusrebelanba amrrunrrai wamabe nui piagwan eshkabig kѳn. Inchendѳ truilѳbe tru piaigwane ni mѳikken ‘ѳyeeg kѳn’ cha Faraѳnwane eshkanrrab kaimabelѳ kѳn.k
Incha nѳbe katѳ kibene, katѳgan piaig mѳrѳbig kѳn: Mѳimbe tirigu turmera larrѳ tabelѳ, larrѳ may nigar, kan tsutsiizhigutѳ trattrѳ y par weguchar, treeg nѳrrѳrailѳ pѳnrrѳbashibgue..
tru larrѳ trѳmbѳilѳ, k'alar waaramerabe k'atѳ tru trattrѳ y par larrѳ tab waaramera tsalelane mabashibgue. Inchen tru treeg piab tsuppa, Faraonbe k'asraptindinabig kѳn.
Indig yandѳ katѳle srѳrrѳb pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrai pa ila puraiben, Faraonbe kan piaig tѳgagѳbig kѳn: Nune Nilѳ nu pi menda papsrѳbashib.m
Inchen kѳben, tru cѳpayu srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan ashibiibe Jѳséwane isumѳ, kerrigu pesannaptindig kѳn..
Inchen tru pirri marѳbelan asha karub pasrabigwane Jѳsé maig purainrrun taimbala naashigu tsibasra mesrѳngaruig kѳn..

Indiibe pѳn kwalѳmyu Faraonbe nui tru kal-lain kwalѳmgurri mam pila nemisrigwan trunun isunrrab marѳbig kѳn. Incha nѳ lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelayasig truba truba kasrag waramig mara, truilai merrab tru cѳpasyu vinѳ srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan nѳ karub pasrabigwanba, tru pirri marѳbelan nѳ karub pasrabigwanba tru keera purrѳnninukkurri wesrangarubig kѳn..
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Iibe ѳyeeg cha eshkabig kѳn cha: Pѳngatѳ tasin ureemerabe pѳn kwalѳm kѳn cha.m
Inchen ke pala srabesrѳ pasrab t'asinyube, Faraónweyasig chine larrѳ may pirrimera sulu tѳgaig pasrѳbendѳ, illimera tru nai turbala t'asin pasrabiguigwan mabashib.—
Kaguende nane hebreѳsmerai pirausrѳngurri nane namiimay merrarrawa, srua amrruig kѳn cha. Nabe yu Egiptѳ pirau chigѳben kalѳ mara kѳmur cha, na yu merrarrawa keerig wamig.—
Inchen ñun treeg tab kѳrrѳmarene, trube, nan isurrunrrig chibig kѳn. Tiusmanda nan lastima tѳgagua, Faraónwan waminchunrrig cha, nan yugurri wesranrrai.

Incha truibe ishiizheelѳ wegucha, uzheelѳ niga tru lusrѳmerayube uvasmera srѳnan cha. Inchen nabe Faráѳnwei cѳpan nai tasku muta, tru uvasmerane tru cѳpayu sunna, trugurlimbe natѳwei Faraónwei tasku tranѳb piatan— cha.
srarmera pѳn kwaliimera tѳgaig pasraptindan cha.n

Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe pailѳba piailѳ tѳgagѳbendѳ, muguen kan ѳyeeg kѳn cha eshkanrrabiibe mugaagѳn— cha. Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Piailan ‘ѳyeeg kѳn’ chinrrabiibe Tius nѳ kѳmuitarru? cha. Er eshkarra pѳs— chibig kѳn.n
Inchen Jѳsébe lѳtsѳ nѳmun ashchab ibene, nѳmbe truba truba isuilѳ purraptinchen,n
Inchen Faraónwan chigѳben kѳmѳnrrrai ashib suldaumerai nѳ karubiibe tru pagatѳ nѳrreelan keerilane Jѳsé nѳ asha purugub pasrѳbig kѳn. Inchen truilѳbe kan maya yanagѳsrѳn truyu keeriilѳ purrѳwabe
Inchen Faraonbe tru i pagatѳ nѳrreelan nѳ lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelan namabig kѳn, tru vinѳ srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan nѳ asha karubigwanba, tru pirli marѳbelan nѳ asha karubigwanba.

Inchen tru keerin pѳnrrabelan nѳ karubiibe chi isua asamikken palѳmíig kѳn, Jѳsé nѳ asha marѳb pasraigwane. Kaguende Jehѳvábe Jѳséba pasrѳwa, nѳ chi mariilane merraptѳ, merraptѳ webinrrai marѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru Jѳséwan penabiibe reyweimburab kalѳ marѳbelan kemѳra keeriilѳ purramnug, Jѳséwan truyu keera wannѳbig kѳn..
Tru “ñi karub tѳgagѳmig peniibe nan ѳyeeg mart'an” chib, sraimbe Pѳtifarwan ѳyeeg chib eshkaben, nѳbe truba trѳmbѳig namabig kѳn.
Incha tru ishuube tru Jѳsé kewaguigwane nui keg yau pumnegatig trarra wawa,
na truba mur trasai ashippe, nui kewaguigwan naimbulu tsumnetѳ, lulѳptindan— cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe tru nui kewa pasraigwane nui t'asku kѳrrѳmisrtraindѳ welula yai ashippe,
ishuube nui kewa pasraigu kemѳrѳppa trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Naba waramisrkun— cha. Inchene Jѳsébe tru nui kewa pasraigwane nui tasku srua pasrѳnrraindѳ yaugurri welulѳppa iptinchibig kѳn.n
Inchen ishuube kwalѳmmѳrig, kwalѳmmѳrig Jѳséwane ‘naba waramisrkun’ chib, nuimbulu lincha wanrrai inchib maya, maya treendingucha, Jѳsébe treegwane kandѳ, kandѳ ka chib, webib, webig ibig kѳn.

Inchen nѳbe treegwane marmѳtѳ, tru nun k'arub tѳgagѳbigwei srawane trenchibig kѳn: —Pѳs, nai k'arubiibe yu yau chi kѳbigwane nababe chi isumikk'aig pasrѳwa, treekkurri chi kѳbigwan kerriguba nai tasku ashchai pѳnsraig kѳn cha.

Inchagurri Pѳtifarbe kerriguba Jѳséwei tasku ashchaim pasra, nune chi isumig chigaabig kѳn. Isumig kѳppe, nѳ mab mutsamigwan trunundѳh isumig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsébe larrѳ tab asr tѳgaig trurrigu larrѳ tab mѳg kѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru nun karub pera pasrabiibe Jehѳvá Jѳséwane chi maliilѳyutѳgucha merraptѳ webinrrai mali ashibig kѳn.
Jehѳvábe Jѳséwane tarѳmisrmѳ nѳba pasrѳben, chi mariilѳtѳgucha tabiitѳ, tabiitѳ pub iben, nѳbe tru egipciѳ tru nun penabigwei yau wabig kѳn..
Inchen unѳbe tasiizhigwan k'atѳ kesruben, k'anzhiimerrig k'al-laptinchibig kѳn. Inchen tru patsѳ kѳrrѳѳrѳbiibe trenchibig kѳn: ‘¡Mandѳ incharre puraarruh!’ cha. Inchagurri unane Fares cha wamig kѳn.
Inchen tru yandѳ kal-lanrrab inchen tru parcheelѳyu kane tasiizhiimerrig kal-laptinchen, patsѳ kѳrrѳѳrѳbiibe unai tasiizhigu pigѳ tsizhig lichiptinchibig kѳn trenchib: ‘Iimerrig webarrig kѳn’ chib.m
Indiibe yandѳ Tamarwan unѳ tѳgamisramig puben, mѳimbe parchig tѳgaig kѳbrain kui wetѳbeñibig kѳn.

Inchen yandѳ tru mѳguelѳbe nun pattrab wesranrrab amben, nѳbe nui sueerune trencha ѳrѳbig kѳn: “Nabe kwanrriig misra pasrappe, tru na i srua pasrailan nan tranѳbigwei kwanrriig misra pasrar” cha. Inchabe katѳ trenchibig kѳn: “I sellѳn tru ilintsiwanbañau, i tsigwanba, muin kѳtashchab ash” cha.

Inchen Judábe trenchibig kѳn: —Kerriguba ka tѳga kѳrrѳmisrbashshu cha, namun ke chinetѳ chib indza asiinab pѳnrramig kѳmѳnrraimbe. Inchendѳ tѳr kѳnrrain cha, nabe cabrѳ unane tru ishuwan trana ѳren, tru ishuwane ñibe wetѳrramuigwan— cha.n

Inchen nѳbe truyu warab misaameran trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Peg mѳguelѳba kaig marѳb ishug tru Enaim may menda wabiibe chu wah?— cha Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Peg mѳguelѳba kaig marѳb ishuuma yube mumaganug kѳn— cha..
Incha nѳbe kurra, truyugurri yabe, tru malѳ kasraigwane pinѳsrua, tru keg kaig kѳrrѳmisra kewa unigwan katѳ kebig kѳn..
—Nai ubisha sѳtѳmerayugurri kan cabrѳ-unѳzhig trana ѳramѳnrrun— cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Kan chigѳsrѳn ñuiwan kѳrrѳmartra cha, ñi tru trannrrab misrigwan na utamnegatig.—
Inchen Judá truigwan ashabe, nѳbe k'aig maramig asrwan anwei yanѳb ishug kuitamab isubig kѳn, k'aguen nѳbe malѳwan pinab k'asraig waben.
Inchen Tamarbe tru nui sueeru Timnatsrѳ nui ubishameran isig partrab yan taig wammѳrabe

Indig yandѳ yana puraiben, tru Súai nimbasr tru Judáwei sraimbe kwabig kѳn. Inchen nѳbe yandѳ tru isubig puraiben, Timnat pueblѳsrѳmay ibig kѳn, tru nui ubisha isig parѳbelѳ waraisrѳmay. Inchen tru adulamita Hira taig tru nun linchibiibe nune lincha ibig kѳn.
Inchen Jehѳváwane treebe chigucha tabig asѳnamuben, truigwangucha ѳsig kuigwan kerraptindig kѳn.k
Inchene Judábe tru ѳnánwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneg kwabigwei srawan kasharamѳ kѳmѳ, kasharau cha, ñui nuneg kwabig ñigurri ureg tѳgaig kѳnrrain— cha.
Inchendѳ tru Er Judáwei mayur nusrkaimbe Jehѳváwein kabyu larrѳ kaig kuig kѳn. Inchen Jehѳvábe nui ѳsig unigwan kerraptindig kѳn..
Incha katѳ maya yanayu kѳsrѳn katѳgan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane Sela cha wamig kѳn. Truibe tru unan tѳgagѳb urasbe Kezibsrѳ tsuig kuig kѳn..
Incha katѳ wendѳ kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳgan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane ѳnán cha wamig kѳn.n
Inchen tru ishuube kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, truigwei kan nusrkai tѳgagua, truigwane Er cha wamig kѳn.

Inchen Egiptѳsrѳmbe tru madianitasmerabe tru Jѳsewane Pѳtifarwan yanѳbelѳ kѳn, tru Faraѳn lutѳ tranigwan marѳb pasrabig, tru suldaumera reywan chigѳben kѳmѳnrrai ashib pѳnrrabelan nѳ asha karub pasrabigwan.
Incha Jacѳbpe nui kewa kuigwan kѳlsra, trѳsrkѳlig kewa, nui unѳ pinigwan purѳ yanasrѳngatig isub kѳrrѳmisrig kѳbig kѳn..
Incha nѳmbe kan cabrѳ unѳ kweecha, Jѳsé pala itѳguewa unigwane tru aniyu kebisha,
Incha nunelan trenchinrrab ibig kѳn: —Yandѳ matsinube mugaagѳn cha. ¿Nabe mѳimbe chindamer?— cha.k

Inchen tru madianitasmera chine penab, yanѳb inchibelѳ amrruben, Jѳséwei nunelѳbe tru aljibe trab lalig pasrabigugurri wesrawa, pib tratrѳ an pitiswei yanѳbelѳ kѳn. ѳyamay Jѳséwane Egiptѳsrѳmay srua ambig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Judábe nui nunelan trenchibig kѳn: —Namui nunewan kweechabe, chi mariasamѳ cha, kweecha tre marigwan sѳratѳ tѳgaguabe..

Inchabe yandѳ nѳmbe manrrab purramisrѳbelѳ kѳn. Inchen nѳm ashene, Galaadsrѳngurri kan sѳtѳ ismaelit'asmera amrruptinchibelѳ kѳn, camellѳsmerayu niisrar larrѳ may irrabzheelѳ, balsamѳ kѳben, mirra kѳben tru Egiptѳsrѳmay.
nune kemѳra, tru pi wesramig trab lalig pasrabigu keguchibelѳ kѳn. Inchendѳ tru trab laliibe chi pigaig pur pasrabig kѳn..

Ñimbe ani lushmѳtѳ, mu misag warab waraimѳnug aljibe lalig basrabnug kegutsay chibig kѳn. Inchendѳ ñimui taskabe chi marmѳtay— cha. Rubénbe ѳyeeg chippe, Jѳséwane katѳle wesrawa, mѳskaweisrѳ pegutchab isuig kѳn.
Mѳimbe amrrui chibelѳ kѳn, kweecha, kan aljibe laligu kegutchab cha. Incha: “kan namig usha kweecha, main kѳn chinrrab” cha. Er nui piailѳbe maig indashchab— chibelѳ kѳn.

tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Yugurrimbe chab ambubguen indig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ: “Dѳtánsrѳmay amrrab” taig nabe mѳrig kѳn— cha. Inchen Jѳsébe nunelan lab ya, Dѳtán tru misag sѳtѳmera warainug kѳmѳtѳ, wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ wetѳrrabig kѳn.
Inchene Jѳsébe: —Nabe nai nunelan lab uñar cha. Chu ubisha ashib warai ñibe tiusmanda eshk'absrumuguh— chiben,
Indiibe Jѳsébe trusrѳ pua, truba lab llirab uña, pella pasrѳbene, kan mѳg kat'abe, payibig kѳn: —¿Chi lagu?— cha.
Indiibe yandѳ treeg purayai wendѳ Siquémsrѳ nui nunelѳbe mѳskawei ubishameranba, cabrameranba pu lawa mannrrab amben,
Incha Jѳsébe katѳgan piaig tѳgagua nunelan katѳ treeg eshkabig kѳn: —Mѳimbe katѳ nan piappe, pѳrrba, pѳlba pa trattrѳ y kan kѳnchabiimeraba nan tab inchib utsѳbasrѳb piatan— cha..
kaguen nѳbe trenchib eshkabig kѳn: —Nan piaigwan ñimun eshkanrrab inchar cha, mѳrtray cha::
Indiibe Jѳsébe kan piji kan piaig tѳgagua, nunelan waminchen, trugurrimbe nunelѳbe masken tsalѳ ashibelѳ kѳnm

Incha kerrigu maya nusrkalan lataguen kѳmѳtѳ, tru Israel Jacѳb taig kѳbiibe Jѳséwane truba undaguig kѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳ kѳllimbala tѳgagui unѳ kuimba. Inchagurri pala itѳ kemig larrѳ tab tsurѳzhig maringarubig kѳn.
Jacѳbpe nui mѳskai kѳrrѳmisra tsui pirau truyu kѳrrѳmisra tsuig kѳbig kѳn, tru Canaán pirau.m
Ahѳlibama kѳben, Elá kѳben, Pinón kѳben,
Iilѳ kѳn tru Esaúwei karub pѳnrrab mѳguelai munchimera, mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, trumѳrig truilainukkurri amrrubelѳ, nѳm waraigwan nѳmui munchitѳgatѳwei wamiilѳ: Timná kѳben, Alvá kѳben, Jetet kѳben,
Inchen Saúl kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Acѳbѳrwei nusrkai Baal-Janán karunrrab nebyaig kѳn.
Inchen Samla kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Rejѳbѳtsrѳ Saúl karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, tru Eufrates pi menda.
Inchen Jѳbab kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Jusán karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, Temán pirausriig.
Inchen Bela kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Zerai nusrkai Jѳbab karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, Bѳsra pirausriig..
Beѳrwei nusrkai Belabe Edѳmsrѳ rey kuig kѳn, nѳbe tru Dinába taig ciudayugurri arrubig.
Inchen hѳreѳsmeran nѳm asha karubelѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Lѳtán kѳben, Sѳbal kѳben, Zibeón kѳben, Aná kѳben,
Inchen Disánwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Uzba, Aránba.
Inchen Ezerwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Bilán kѳben, Zaván kѳben, Acán kѳbengue
Inchen Disónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Hemdán kѳben, Esbán kѳben, Itrán kѳben, Kerán kѳbengue.
Inchen Zibeónwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Ayába, Anába. Tru Aná kuig kѳn, tru misag warab waraimѳ pirѳmerasrѳ kuaalab pigammeran wetѳrrabig nui mѳskai Zibeónwei burrumeran ashib uña.
Disón kѳben, Ezer kѳben, Disán kѳbengue. Iig tru Seirweinukkurli amrrub misaamera, Edѳm pirau hѳreѳsmeran nѳm asha karubelѳ nѳrreelѳ kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru hѳreѳ Seirweinukkurri amrrub misaamera tru pirausrѳ warabelѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Lѳtán kѳben, Sѳbal kѳben, Zibeón kѳben, Aná kѳben,
Inchen tru Anai nimbasr tru Esaúwei srai Ahѳlibamai nusrkalѳ nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha karubelѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Jeús kѳben, Jalán kѳben, Cѳré kѳbengue.
Cѳré kѳben, Gatán kѳben, Amalec kѳbengue. Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Edѳm pirau Elifazweinukkurli amrrub misaamera nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha karubelѳ, truilѳbe kerliguba Adai awelumera.
Inchen Reuelwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn: Najat kѳben, Zera kѳben, Sama kѳben, Mizá kѳbengue, truilѳbe tru Esaúwei srai Basematwei awelumera kѳbig kѳn.n
Inchen Timná ka linchatѳ ishug tru Esaúwei nusrkai Elifazwei kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn, tru Amalecwan. Iilѳbe kerriguba Esaúwei srai Adai awelumera kuin kѳn.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Esaúweinukkurri amrrub misaamera: edѳmitasmerai mѳskai tru Seir tunmeragѳba tѳga pirѳmerasrѳ warab misaamera.m
Treekkurri Esaú tru Edѳm t'aibe Seir pirau tunmeragѳba tѳgasrѳ tsunrrab yaig kѳn.
Ahѳlibamababe Jeúswan kѳben, Jalánwan kѳben, Cѳréwan kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn. Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Esaú Canaán pirau tsub uras tѳgagui ureemera.
Esaúbe i ureemeran tѳgaguig kѳn: Adababe Elifazwan Basematbabe Reuelwanm
Katѳ Basematwangucha nui srain kѳnrrai marig kѳn, truibe Ismaelwei nimbasr Nebaiѳtwei nuchawann
Inchen Isaacbe yandѳ larrѳ kѳlliizhig, larrѳ yana ѳsig tsua, yandѳ nui israbig luchen, nui nusrkalѳ Esaúba Jacѳbba misra kusra sѳrѳben, nui kѳlli misaameraba isrѳnrrab tsumisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Leai tru karuig mendig megabig Zilpai nusrkalѳbe: Gadba, Azerba. Iilѳ kѳn tru Jacѳbwei nusrkalѳ Padan Aramsrѳ kal-lawar.
Inchen Raquelwei tru karuig mendig megabig Bilhai nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Danba, Neftaliba.n

Indiibe Israelbe tru pirausrѳ kѳrrѳmisra tsubene, Rubénbe ya, Bilhaba kiain kѳbig kѳn, tru nui mѳsk'awan lincha tsub ishuuba. Inchen Israelbe ѳyeeg marigwan wammѳrѳbig kѳn. Israelwei nusk'alѳbe pa trattrѳ y par kѳbig kѳn.
Tru kwabigwan sѳrimbalabe kan srug nemѳra ѳlneb pasrig kѳn. Incha tru treeg tamara kusrua pasrig kѳbiibe tru Raquelwan sѳrig kѳbig kui ashchai pasran mѳingatig.
Incha Raquelbe ѳyeeg kwamig nebuig kwaben, Efrat'amay amrrab ambi maysrѳ sѳrig kѳn, tru Belén.
Incha Betelgurri amba, k'atѳgucha Efratasrѳ pumibe yab palѳben, mѳimbe Raquelbe unѳzhigwan ke tammisrtrab k'aimabsrua tammisrig kѳn.
Incha Tius tru nun wamindinuube Betel cha wamabig kѳn..
Betelsrѳmay amun cha, tru nan chine kaig nebuinab arrubengurri purugub Tiusweyasig trusrѳ kan alt'ar kusrunrrab cha, tru na chu unindѳgucha nan lincha pasrabigwan.—
Incha Tiusbe nuimbulugurri ibig kѳn, tru nѳba waminchib pasrainukkurri.k
Incha Abrahamwanba, Isaacwanba tranin pirѳwane ñun tranamѳnrrun cha. Incha ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameran tranamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.
Incha Jacѳb Padan Aramsrѳngurri katѳle arrubene, Tiusbe nune katѳle kenamisra, maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai trannrrab misrѳbig kѳn..
Inchen katѳ truyuh kwaig kѳbig kѳn, Debѳra tru Rebeca lamíig kѳben asam purugubig kѳbig. Truigwane kan encina tusr katsiizhigu sѳrig kѳn, Betel pulu. Incha Jacѳbpe truyube Elѳn Bacut cha wamig kѳn.
Incha nѳbe trusrѳ kan altar kusrua, El Betel cha wamig kѳn truyube, kaguende Tius trusrѳ kenamisrig kuig kua, tru nui nunewan trubab welula ib uras.

Inchen nѳm truyugurri webamba ambene, tru puluwan warab misaamerabe mayeelѳba purѳ trѳmbѳig kѳrig kui inchai Tiusbe treeg marѳbig kѳn. Inchagurri Jacѳbwei misaamerane nѳmbe chi kaig martrab inchimeelѳ kѳn..

Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui yaambuelanba, nun lincha amrrubelanba trenchibig kѳn: —Tru katѳgan peg tiusmera ñim tѳgaguilan ñimbe chishtѳ webetab, ñimui kalѳ mariilan chish misrѳb, ñimui kewaguilan yunѳmarѳb inday cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳt'abelѳ kѳn: —¿Nѳ isuppe, kabe namui nuchawane trѳmbѳig martrab nui asrwan anwei yanѳb ishug kui lat'aig mara kutchain kuit'arru?— cha.
Incha yaambumerayu chi kѳbelane chishtѳ wesrawa, katѳ chigurrimbunѳ chi tѳgaguilan kѳben, mѳg-uregwan kѳben, ishumburmeran kѳben merrarrawa, srua ambubelѳ kѳn.

Incha tru Jacѳbwei katѳgan nusrkalѳbe amrrua, kwabelaim balawan itѳbunab puraamba, ciudayu kegѳrra chi kѳbigwan chishtѳ wesrabelѳ kѳn, tru nui nuchawan ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig mara mindisha kѳrrѳmarigwan trunun ulѳ bayib.
Incha Hamѳrwanba nui nusrkai Siquémwanba espadatѳga kweecha peta, Dinane Siquémwei yaugurri wesrawa, pera ambubelѳ kѳn.m

Inchen tru chi maramigwan nѳm ashibelѳ maya mѳguelѳ tru ciudayu kebambi yask'abu tuluntsunabelѳbe tru Hamѳrba, tru nusrk'ai Siquémba treegwan martrab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ kѳn. Incha tru maya mѳguelѳbe circuncidailѳ kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.

Inchendѳ namui utu nѳm kѳrrѳmisra, kan misag sѳtѳtѳ misra waramibe nam ѳyamay kѳnrrab kѳbendѳwein kѳnrrun cha, namui utu mѳguelѳbe mayeelѳba circuncidawar kѳnrrai, nѳm mailѳ kѳben, nam treelѳtѳweingue.
Inchen tru circuncidamigwan ‘ka’ taingatiibe nambe namui nuchawane perѳb, yu ñimui piraugurri ambuptindamѳnrrun— cha.
Trumaybe si namui nimbasrmerabe ñimba kasharab, ñimui nimbasrmerabe namba kasharab, nambe ñimui utu warab, kan sѳtѳ misaameratѳ kѳnrrab cha.
Incha nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nambe namui nuchawane kan mѳg circuncidamíigwane trannrrab kaimamѳnrrun cha. Kaguen namuiwan purѳ trѳmbѳig mindishib kѳrig marinab pѳnrramig kѳn cha.
Tru srusran srain kѳnrai tranamwei maya nu kuindѳgucha, ñim maya miamigwan eshkab, maya ketig tranamelan eshkab inchay chibig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru srusrane naba ka kasharabashchunrrigay— cha.
Trumaybe ñimbe namui utu warѳben, yu nam waraig pirѳbe ñim chu warag kѳben waramig pasrѳnrrun cha. Ñimbe truyu warab, penab, yanѳb, katѳ pirѳmera penab inchigay— cha.n
Inchen Hamѳrbe tru mѳskawanba nusrkalanba trenchib waminchib kѳn: —Nai nusrkai Siquémbe ñui nimbasrwan purѳ chull asan cha, ishug-unѳ nѳba kasharanrrai treegwan isubsrumѳgue chinrrab inchar cha.
Incha pumѳwatѳ, tru Siquémwei mѳskai Hamѳrbe nui nusrkai ba misrtrab isuigwan Jacѳbba waminchab arrubig kѳn.
Incha Siquémbe nui mѳsk'ai Hamѳrwan trenchibig kѳn: —I srusran nai srain kѳnrrai mѳsk'alѳba waminchay— cha.
Incha nѳbe Dinan purѳ chull ashipptѳ, tabzhib waminchibig kѳn, Dina undaaraig kѳnrrab.
truyube kan altar mara, truigwane El Elѳhe Israel cha wamig kѳn.n
Jacѳbpe Padan-Aramsrѳngurri chigucha kѳmѳ, katѳ tab ka pubig kѳn, Canaán pirau Siquén ciudasrѳ. Incha tru ciuda pinrrѳguesrѳ kѳrrѳmisra warѳwa
Incha tru kwalѳm Esaúbe Seirsrѳmay inrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen Esaúbe trenchibig kѳn: —Trube, treeg ka amrrab cha. Inchendѳ tru naba lincha amrrub mѳguelan mѳilan kѳsrѳn ñiba lincha amrrunrrai kѳrrѳmartrab— chibig kѳn. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Truburappe chi isumѳta cha. Ñuin kabyu na tab kui asig kuinaig kѳbene, truig mas purѳ nuig kѳtan— cha..

Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg, ñibe asiinrrabguen cha, nai ureemerabe kullaguelѳ srѳ kѳn cha. Katѳ ubishamera kѳben, waaramera kѳben, ureezheelѳ perartѳ kѳn cha. Na menrra trѳmbѳig malla merranene, nai ubishamerabe kan kwalѳmyutѳ kerriguba chab kwanrrun cha.
Na ñun ketamig srua arrigwan ka utѳrra cha. Tiusbe nane ѳyeeg nѳrrѳ tѳgaig kѳnrrai maren, nabe menrrazhikken tѳgagur— cha. Incha Jacѳbpe utѳnrrai truba inchen, Esaúbe tru ketiilan ka utabig kѳn.n
Inchene Esaúbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg, nabe tsabѳtѳ tѳgaig kur cha. Ñuimbe ñuin kѳnrrain— cha..

Inchen Esaúbe trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Tru na k'atab arrigu ѳyeeg nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ, merrana amrruilѳtѳgabe nan chi chinrrab treenchigu?— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nane k'an chigucha inchimѳ, ñuin k'abyu tab kui asig kѳnrrab ѳyeeg marar— cha.
Trugurrimbe Lea nui ureezheelѳba utsѳbasren, tru wendaube Raquel nui Jѳséba arrua, utsѳbasrѳbig kѳn.

Incha mѳimbe Esaú kurraashabe ishumburmeranba, ureezheelanba ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Iilѳ ñiba pѳnrrabelѳbe ¿mumeragѳh?— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Na, ñi maig chiben marѳb megabigwan, iilѳbe Tius nan trani ureezheelѳ kѳn— cha.
Trune Esaúbe nunewan katѳnrrab lulѳb ya, naashiburab ira, muchabig kѳn. Incha pailѳba kishibelѳ kѳn..
Incha tru nui pagatѳ k'arub tѳgagui ishumburmeran tru nѳmui ureemeran ke merrabsrѳ pѳnsra, tru wendaube Lean tru nui ureemeranba, tru wendaube Raquelwan tru nui Jѳséwanba pѳnsrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳb Penielsrѳngurri puraiben, pѳrrbe neeshib arrubig kѳn. Inchen nui pѳytañig safaig pusrkwaben, Jacѳbpe kebeñiptѳ, kebeñib arrubig kѳn.
Incha Jacѳbpe truyube Peniel cha wamabig kѳn, k'aguen nѳbe trendaig kѳn: “Nabe Tiuswan malaugue ashendѳ, k'atѳgucha k'a ѳsig pasrainatan” cha.

Inchene tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe yandѳ Jacѳb cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳmѳtѳ, Israel cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳn cha. Kaguende ñibe Tiusba, mѳguelѳba truba melambuyab tranrriyaigu, ñibe kullaaramѳn— cha..
Inchen tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Yandѳ chab tѳr-rrab kѳn cha. ¡Elatcha!— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nan maya nuguen tabig nebunrrabigwan tranmubene, nabe lelachimumѳnrrun— cha.m
Incha yandѳ truilan chab larrѳѳrabe, katѳ chine kѳbigwan kerligu larrѳѳrѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru yemdѳwei Jacѳbpe kurra, nui bagatѳ sralanba, nui bagatѳ linchatѳ melab ishumburmeranba, ba trattrѳ y kan tru nui nusrkalanba, Jabѳc taig nu piyu larraambubelѳ kѳn.
Inchen tru keta tranamelѳbe merrab chab amben, Jacѳbpe tru nui misaameraba, nui ushamerabañau kѳrrѳmisra tsuinug kinrrab kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru srѳsriigwei wendau ibigwan lata, pѳn kѳnrrabyu ibigwan lata, tru wendau ambubelan mѳilandѳgucha treetѳ, treetѳ chinrrai karua pasrig kѳn. Esaúwan katabe, ѳyeetѳh chinrrigay cha..

Incha Jacѳbpe tru ke srѳsrѳ merrana ibigwane trencha karua ѳrѳbig kѳn: —Nai nuneg Esaú ñun kata: “¿Ñibe muinukkurriig kugu chib, chumay inrrab arrugu? chib. ¿Ñi merrana yaig ushamerabe muielѳ kѳ?” chib bayene,
Cabramera dѳscientas, pib trattrѳ turmѳg cabramera, ubishamera dѳscientas, turmѳg ubishamera pib trattrѳ,m
Incha tru yembe Jacѳbpe truyu kia, nѳ truyu chi tѳgaguigwan nui nuneg Esaúwan ketamig lawa wesrabig kѳn.
Nai nuneg Esaúwei taskugurli chi kѳmѳnrrai marѳbsrumuguh cha. Nane kѳlig kѳtan cha, inchippa nanba, usralmeranba, ureemeranba kweecha petѳnrraitamab.

Incha Jacѳbpe Tiuswan trenchib miabig kѳn: —Nai mѳskai Abrahamwei Tius, nai mѳskai Isaacwei Tius: “Tru nai pirausrѳmay, nai yau misaameraisrѳmay katѳle nan inrrѳ cha. Ñune truba truba tѳgaig misrѳb inrrai maramѳnrrun” cha, ñi nan trendaig kuig kѳn cha.

Inchen Jacѳb ѳyeeg taigwan mѳrabe, truba kѳrig kui inchib, truba isuin kѳrrѳmisra, nѳbe tru nui misag lincha perayailan pa sѳtѳ pirishibig kѳn, tru ubishameran, cabramera kѳben, waarameran, camellѳmeran chigucha.k

mѳimbe waaramera kѳben, burrumera kѳben, ubishamera kѳben, cabramera kѳben, karuig melabelѳ mѳguelѳ kѳben ishumburmera kѳben, tѳgaig kur’ tan chinrrai. Pѳs ñi nai mayur nunewan nabe ñun ѳyeeg eshkawa ѳrar cha, ñi nan truba tabig utig pasramig kѳnrrai.”—
Incha Jacѳbpe tru Edѳm pirau tru Seirsrѳmay wan sruar merrab amrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn, Esaúwan katѳnrrabelѳ tru nabe punrrab arrumѳnrrun cha, nui nuneg eshkanrrabelѳ.
Incha katѳ lѳtsѳ Labanbe kia kurra, nui awelu ureemeran, nui nimbasrmeran muchawa, trugurrimbe mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrigay cha. Yandѳ nui pirausrѳmay katѳle inrrab ibig kѳn..

Inchen ñui awelu Abrahamwei Tiusba, katѳ ñui awelu Nacѳrwei Tiusba maig maramigwan namun nѳ asha martrain— chibig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui mѳskai Isaac kѳrig tѳga pasraig Tiuswei merrab: “¡Katѳ! marmѳ kѳmѳ, nabe treeg maramѳnrrun” chibig kѳn.
Incha katѳgucha Labanbe Jacѳbwan trenchibig kѳn: —Ash cha, i tru srug tun basrigwanba, katѳ tru srug ѳlneb basrigwanba, na tru naimba, ñuimba tѳbѳtag basrigwan.

Incha k'atѳ Mizpagucha taig kѳbig kѳn, k'aguen Labanbe trendaig kѳbig kѳn: —Nam ñiba k'anikkurri, k'anikkurri yandѳ k'atѳbe asiyamig nebumuben, nam maig inchibelѳ kѳtashchab Jehѳvá nѳ ashib pasrѳnrrain cha.
Inchen Labanbe truyu nuin tliimaybe ‘Jegar Sahaduta’ cha wamѳbene, Jacѳbpe nui tliimaybe ‘Galaad’ cha wamig kѳn.
Inchabe Jacѳbpe k'an nu srugwan malsra, ѳlneb kusrua pasrabe,

Inchen Labanbe Jacѳbwan trenchibig kѳn: —I ishumburmerabe nai nimbasrmera kѳben, nѳm tѳgaguig ureemerabe nai awelumera kѳben, ubishamerabe nai ubishamera kѳben, cabramerabe, nain cabramera kѳben chigurrimbunѳ yu kena kѳbiibe nayelѳ kѳn cha. Treeg kuindѳgucha nabe nai nimbasrmeranba, k'atѳ nѳm tѳgagui nusrk'alanbabe nabe k'atѳle nayelѳ kѳnrraimbe yandѳ chi maramgaig kѳtan chibig kѳn.

Pilamera pib trattrѳh nabe ñui yau megaig kѳn cha. Ñui pa nimbasrmeran nan tranamweimbe pilamera pa trattrѳ y pib pilaba mara tranѳb megaig kѳn cha. Inchen trattrѳ y kanbabe ñui ushameraimburѳ megaig kѳbig kѳn cha. Inchen nan pagaramigwane katѳ, katѳ peemayh, peemayh ñibe yunѳmarѳbig kѳn cha, pa trattrѳ piejes yunѳmarig kѳn cha.k

Nabe managuen kan kaambu namig usha kwabasiilanguen ñune srua arrumíig kur cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, truburѳbe naguen ñun pagaramig kѳbig kѳn cha. Kan trutѳ kѳnrrab kuindѳ ¿kwalѳm niligwan lata, yem niligwan lata ñibe nan, nan ulѳ payibig kѳmѳtirru? cha.k

Ñibe nai chi kѳbelѳyu chishtѳ lawa, ¿ñui yau pѳnrrabelan chi wetѳrragu? cha. Inchawei ñi chi wetѳrrawabe, yu nai yauelai merrappa, ñui yauelai merrappa pѳnsrѳ chibig kѳn, nam pailainug mѳig sѳl pasrai kui nѳm ashchai.k

Raquelbe mѳskawane trenchibig kѳn: —Nai mѳskai, na ñui merrab kurrѳmubene, ñi nan namѳmѳrrunrrig cha, kaguen nabe chillig misraig war cha. Inchen Labanbe tru taska marig tiusmeran wetѳrranrrab kaima lab uñen,

Inchen Labanbe Jacѳbwei carpa yasrѳ kebya, trugurlimbe Leain carpa yasrѳ, katѳ tru pailѳ karui mѳrѳb melab ishumburmeraisrѳ lab kebya, kalawa, tru Leai carpayugurli webarruabe, yandѳ Raquel waisrѳ lab kebig kѳn.
Inchene Jacѳbpe Labanwane trenchibig kѳn: —Kaguen nane kѳrig kuig kѳn cha, inchippa ñi ñui nimbasrmeran nan namiimay kebya kerraptinchaitamab.m
Ñui mѳskawei yauwan truba isub pesrѳgѳben inrrab yabe, trube, ¿nai tiusmerane chinchab nila sruaigu?— chibig kѳn.m
Pѳs nabe ñun chi marѳg kѳben maramigwan tѳga pasrar cha. Inchendѳ ñui mѳskawei Tiusbe mira yem ѳyah chitan cha: “Jacѳbwane isuptѳ mar cha. Chigѳben martrumѳn chib tsag, tsag waminchab kѳmѳ”.
Ñibe nai awelu ureemeran nai nimbasrmeran ungua cha muchanrrainguengaig maritan cha. Ñibe mѳimbe ni kan chuguinguen mѳrmíig lataig marin kѳn cha.
Jacѳbwane trenchibig kѳn: —¿Chi mara basrѳgu? cha. ¿Nane chindimbarre ѳyeeg may kebenѳsrkѳgu? cha. Kan ñigui nai nimbasrmerane kwayabyu kemѳri ishumburmeran kui lataig srua yaitan cha.
Indig Labanbe Galaad tunmerasrѳ wetѳgѳbig kѳn, tru Jacѳb nui yauelѳba kѳrrѳmisriisrѳ. Incha Labangucha trusrѳndѳwei nui nam misaameraba kѳrrѳmisrabe
Indig Labanbe nui nammisaameran lincha pera, Jacѳbwan wetѳgѳnrrab pasreb mendabig kѳn. Indigbe trattrѳ y pa kwalѳm puraiben tru Gaalad pirau tunmerasrѳ chab wetѳgѳb ibig kѳn..
Inchen tru Labanbe nѳѳrѳsrѳ ubisha isig partrab yaig mugaabenbatѳ Raquelbe tru yau yau tѳgagui tiusmeran sѳra wesrain kѳbig kѳn.
Inchawei nѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgaguilan Tius namui mѳskawan kerrawa ñun traniilѳbe, kerriguba namuimba, namui nusrkalaimba kuig kѳbene, mѳimbeTius nѳ maig mar taigwane ñibe kerrigu treeg mar— chibelѳ kѳn.n
¿Pѳs, namune ka mendailѳ kui lat'aig indig kѳmuit'arru? cha. ¿Namune nѳbe yana, truburѳ mara tranѳb megaigwane nѳ chishtѳ maig kѳmuit'arru? cha.

Nabe ñi tru srugwan aceite itѳlusha katѳ ñi ñuinetѳ ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmislinug tru Betelsrѳ kenamisrѳb Tius kur cha. Mѳimbe kurra, i piraugurlimbe webya, ñi kal-lain pirausrѳmay katѳ inrrѳ” cha, nane trenchitan— cha.
Inchen tru piabyube Tiuswei ángelbe nane trenchitan cha: “Jacѳb” cha. Inchen nabe trendainatan cha: “Nabe yu war” cha.
ѳyamay Tiusbe ñimui mѳsk'awei ubishameran lata cabrameran lata nѳrrѳ kerrawa, nan tranig kѳn cha.

Inchen kѳben ñui mѳskaimbe, treeg martrab chib treeg martrab chib marmuig kѳn cha nai pagarwan ke pa tratrѳ piejes yunѳmarѳb. Inchen kѳben Tiusbe na chi tѳgaguigwan Laban kaig marmѳnrrai nan sѳtѳ pasraig kѳn cha.
Inchabe nѳmune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskaimbe nan merrabwan lataig kѳmѳtѳ, malѳbe ke mindindѳ, mindindѳ uni ashar cha. Inchendѳ nai mѳskawei Tiusbe naba pasraig kѳn chibig kѳn..
Inchene Jehѳvábe Jacѳbwane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Merrabsrѳ ñui kѳlli misamerai pirausrѳmay katѳ inrrѳ cha. Ñui nammisaamera waraisrѳmay, nabe ñiba pasramѳnrrun— cha.n
Inchagucha Jacѳb Labanwei malѳwan ashene, malѳbe ke mindiitѳ uñibig kѳn, merrabwan lataig kѳmѳtѳgue.
Inchen tru tre asrka ushamera wambiimisra amrrubene, tru tsiimeran pѳnsrѳmíig kѳn. Inchagurri tru Labanweimbe tre asrkazheelѳ kѳben, tru mas werus asr tѳgarmera larrѳ chishelѳbe Jacѳbwein kѳbig kѳn.

Incha Jacѳbpe tru ubisha-ureemerane nѳrѳmara, Labanwei ubishamerayu rayas tѳgarmeranba yaleelanba Jacѳbpe nui ubisha sѳtѳmerayu keerѳb ibig kѳn. Incha yandѳ nuyasig ubisha sѳtѳmera kѳnrrai marѳb ibig kѳn. Labanweimba k'anbalatѳ kѳmѳtѳ.
Inchabe tru tsig karriilane tru ubishamera pi muchig kemalinug pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Incha ubishamera wambiimisrar tru pi mutsinug pubene,
Incha tru ubisha sѳtѳmerane Jacѳb tsuisrѳngurri pѳn kwalѳm ambiisrѳ srua ambubelѳ kѳn, nѳm waraisrѳ. Trune Jacѳbpe nuimburappe Labanwei katѳgan ubisha sѳtѳmeran ashib tsubig kѳn.n
Inchene Labanbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi trendaig t'ab kѳn— cha. Labanbe treeg kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Pѳs Srѳna trumarsrѳ tru na k'anab megaigwan ñi ashchab arruben, tab marigwan kenamartrabibe truig kѳnrrun cha. Kabe k'an ubisha kui, k'abe k'an cabra-unѳ kui rayas tѳgar kѳmѳwei, tsureelѳ kѳmѳwei, k'abe k'an ubisha-unѳ yalig kѳmѳwei, tru utu ñi treelѳ wetѳrrappe, trube, nabe ñuyelan nilab megaig kѳnrrun— cha.

Inchene Labanbe trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Ñun chi tranamѳ?— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Chigucha tranmѳrrunrrig cha. Na ñun ѳyeeg martra taigwan ñi tregwan martrab misrene si, nabe ñui ubishameran ashibig asamѳnrrun cha.m
Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe ashibig kѳn cha, nabe ñuyasig yeeg marѳb megaigwan. Incha ñui ushameran nabe yeeg tab ashib tѳgaguigwan.
Incha eshkarra chibig kѳn: ñi maya pagar utѳnrrab isuigwan, nabe treegwan pagaramѳnrrun— cha..
Nai sralan trannrra cha, na truilaimburab mara tranѳb megailan, nai nusrk'alanba, nan yandѳ ibashcha chibig kѳn, k'aguende nabe ñuyasig yeeg marѳb megaigwan ñibe asha kѳn— cha.
Yandѳ Raquel Jѳséwan tѳgamisren, Jacѳbpe Labanwan trenchibig kѳn: —Na tsuig kѳbig tru pirausrѳmay inrrab, ibashcha cha.m
Inchendѳ Tiusbe Raquelwan isub tѳga wawa, nѳ miab megaigwan mѳra, ureg kѳnrrai tranig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Leabe kan nimbasr tѳgagua, truigwane Dina munchi pasrig kѳn..
Incha Leabe trenchibig kѳn: “Tiusbe tru na pagaraikkurli nan keta trandan cha, kaguende nabe nai karuig mendig megabigwan nai kewan tranig kua” Incha treekkurli unane Isacar munchi paslig kѳn.
Inchen tru Lea miab megaigwan Tius mѳren, Leabe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, trattrѳgatѳ kѳnrrabyu nusrk'awan Jacѳbwei tѳgaguig kѳn.

Inchene Leabe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: —¿Ñibe nai kewan yeeg kerrawa pasraptѳga ñungan chigucha kѳmui lataig mѳrѳraitarru? cha. ¿Mѳimbe nai nusrkai mandrágѳras srua arliilangucha nan kerranrrab indirru?— cha. Inchene Raquelbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Tru ñui nusrkai mandrágѳras srua arliilan na merrarranrrur cha, truburѳ mѳi yem Jacѳbpa ñi ki pѳs— cha.
Inchen Leai karuig mendig megabig tru Zilpabe Jacѳbwei katѳgan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchen Leabe trenchibig kѳn: “Yangucha tabig pub attrabigwan tѳgaguinatan” cha. Incha treekkurri Gad munchi pasrѳbig kѳn..
Inchen Leagucha yandѳ mas ureg tѳgagѳnrrab kaimappe, nui karuig mendig megabig Zilban pera arrua, Jacѳbwan tranѳbig kѳn, nui srain kѳnrrai.
Incha Raquelbe trenchibig kѳn: “Tius namun ѳyeeg kѳnrrain kuikkurri nabe nai numѳsraimba purѳ murtѳ melambuyab megawa, na kanar” cha. Treekkurri Raquelbe tru unane Neftalí munchi pasrig kѳn.m
ѳyamay Raquelbe tru nui karui megabig Bilhan Jacѳbwan srai lataig kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe tru Bilhaba kibig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳbpe truba nama, trenchibig kѳn: —¿Nagan Tius kuitarru cha, ñun chi ureg chigaig kѳnrrai marѳbiibe?—

Incha katѳle kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳ kan nusrkai tѳgagua trenchibig kѳn: “Mѳimbe nai keebe naba mas trakkandѳ linchaut'an cha, kaguen nabe nune chabguen pѳn nusrkalѳguen tranar” cha. Inchagurri truigwane Leví munchi pasrѳbig kѳn.

Incha Leabe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, kan nusrkai tѳgagua, truigwane Rubén munchi pasrѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: “Na yeekkucha isui megaben, Jehѳvá nan isua ashtan cha. Mѳimbeguende nai keebe nan undaaranrrautan” cha.k
Inchen Jacѳbpe Raquelbagucha kibig kѳn. Incha truigwane Lean lataguen kѳmѳ, masken undaarabig kѳn. Incha Labanweyasig katѳgucha srѳig trattrѳ y pa pila mara tranѳb megaig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳbpe treeg marѳbig kѳn. Incha tru Leaba tru k'asharabyu tabig mab k'asrag waramigwan tru trune neig maramigwan chab nemarene, Labanbe Raquel nui nimbasrwan srain kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Labanbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nam waraim piraube kasharanrrai wendiigwanmerrig tranamig kѳmѳn cha, mayurguen ka tsumnetѳbe..
Inchagucha Labanbe kan karuig mendig megabig Zilba taigwane Lean purugub meganrrai tranѳbig kѳn.
Indiibe yandѳ yem misren Labanbe nui nimbasr Lean pera arrua, Jacѳbwane truigwan tranѳptinchen, Jacѳbpe pera kibig kѳn.n
Inchene Labanbe truyu maya misaameran tulamrrai wama larrѳ tab fiesta marѳbig kѳn.
ѳyamay Jacѳbpe trattrѳ y pabila Raquelwan tranamwei mara tranѳb megabig kѳn. Nѳbe Raquelwane purѳ chull asha, megaig kѳppe, nune ni kan maya yanaguen kѳmub lata inchibig kѳn.
Leabe kammera larrѳ tabzhig ashibig kѳbene, trune Raquelbe larrѳ tab malѳ pasraig, larrѳ tab ishuuzhig kѳbig kѳn..
Inchen tru Labanbe nimbasrmera pagatѳ tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn, mayurbe Lea kѳbene, wendiibe Raquel.
Labanbe nune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi nai yauig kuimburѳtѳ chi pagaraimíig ka mara tranѳptѳ megamig kѳmѳn cha. ¿Mayanzhig pagaramѳ?— cha.
Inchen Labanbe tru nui nuchawei nusrkai Jacѳbweimburab wamindi mѳrѳppe, katѳnrrab lulѳb ya, ira, muchawa, nui yamay pera ibig kѳn. Inchen Jacѳbpe nun chitѳ purayaigwan kerriguh eshkabig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Raquelwan muchawabe, truba truba kishibig kѳn..

Inchen Jacѳbpe tru nui usraimbe nuchag Labanwei nimbasr Raquelwanba, k'atѳ tru Labanwei ubishameraba arri ashabe, kemalla, tru pisuyu srug k'asraig tsubigwan malsra, nui kuchimѳsk'ai Labanwei ubishameran pi mutsѳsrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen truilѳbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Treeg maramgaig kѳn cha, maya ubisha sѳtѳmera kerligu kanbalatѳ misramne, tru ubisha ashibelѳ, tru pisu pala srug trarlig tsubigwan malsramne. Malsrѳbendѳwei ubishameran nambe pi mutsѳsramig kѳn— cha.

Inchen Jacѳbpe: —¿Kwanrrѳ kѳmѳ, t'ab ka tsubig kuit'arru?— cha katѳyug payibig kѳn. Inchen tru ubisha ashibelѳbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Nѳbe t'ab ka tsubig kѳn cha. Au, ñiguen ash cha, mѳskawei ubishameran merrana nimbasr Raquelbe uyu arrun— cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe tru ubisha ashibelan: —¡Nai nunelѳ! ¿Ñimbe chuelѳ kѳgue?— cha bayene: —Nambe Haransreelѳ ker— chiben,

Jacѳbpe nѳ chu yamsrѳmay ib ya, pѳrr kal-labgatѳmaywan misaamerain pirausrѳ pubig kѳn.2 Incha trusrѳ pua ashene, tru wambigwansrѳmbe kan pisu wabig kѳn. Inchen tru pisu pulube ubishamera pѳn sѳtѳ israb warabelѳ kѳn, kaguen truilѳbe tru piwan muchibelѳ kua. Inchen tru pisube larrѳ nu sruutѳga kasraig pasrabig kѳn.
