Inchen i srugwan k'an pilar lataig ѳlgandѳ na kusrua pasriibe, Tiuswei ya kѳnrrun cha. Inchen Tius nan chigurrimbunѳ tranigugurri nabe cienyu diezbatѳ, diezbatѳ nun tranamѳnrrun” chibig kѳn, Jacѳbpe.
katѳ na nai mѳskawei yausrѳ chigucha kѳmѳ, katѳle pishindѳ t'ab ka puinabene, Jehѳvábe nai Tius kѳnrrun cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe lѳtsѳzhig kurrabe, tru nѳ kuña mari srugwan kusrua, kan pilar lataig ѳlneb pasra, truyu ѳyeeg puigwan aschai trubala aceite itѳlushibig kѳn.k
Incha truba kѳrig kui inchabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Yube si, purѳ kѳrig kѳmdiig kѳtan cha. Chi peg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei yaba, srѳmbalasrѳ yaskappa kѳn” cha.n
Inchen Jacѳb tru piab tsuigugurri kiagasrabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Isa kѳmѳ, Jehѳvábe yu pasrѳben, nabe treeg kuit'amappe isumubrain kѳn” cha.

Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ, pirau kan usrѳ tui lataig kѳnrrun cha, pѳrr pinebgatѳmaywansrѳ, pѳrr neeshibgatѳmaywansrѳ, walliguebwansrѳ, waguebwansrѳ, misag larrѳbicha warѳnrrun cha. Ñui yellyugurri pirau muba kuimburab maya misaabe, ñigurri mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun cha..

Inchen truyu nun piappe treeg piabig kѳn: Kan escalera, srѳmbalasrѳngurli pirausrѳ punѳsrkain pasrappe, tru kappe srѳmbalasrѳ kebacha pasrѳben, mѳimbe truwane angelesmera nebambamba, kѳrrѳrrumba inchib kѳben,
Inchen yandѳ kanbalѳ puabe, pѳrr pinaiben, truyu yem kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn. Incha truyu kan srug tsubigwan kuña mara trarra, truyu kinrrab tsumisrѳbig kѳn.n
Incha treekkurri nui mѳskai Isaacbe tru Canaánsrѳ ishumburmerane chigucha tab kѳmui ashibig kuin kui wetѳbeña,k
Inchen Jacѳbpe mѳsk'awanba usranba mѳra, Padan-Aramsrѳmay yai ashibig kѳn Esaúbe.
ѳyamay Isaacbe Jacѳbwan Padan-Aramsrѳmay inrrai ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, tru Betuel arameѳwei nusrkai tru Labanwei yausrѳmay. Truibe Rebecaimbe nuchag kѳbig kѳn, Jacѳbweimba Esaúweimbabe usrin kѳben.
Inchen Maramburab Marѳb Tiusbe ñune mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai mara, ñune ureg larrѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳb, ñuinukkurri purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera nemisramnegatig martrun cha.k

Incha Rebecabe Isaacwan trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe nai ѳsig unigu larrѳ trѳmbѳig kui uñar cha, tru hititas ishumburmeragurrindѳ. Jacѳb yu Canaán pirau hititasmeraba kasharabene, chinchib ѳsig tsumuinguen kѳnrrautan— chibig kѳn.n
Trusrѳ kan maya yana kѳsrѳn tsunrrig cha, ñui nunewan namig kѳbig purayamne..
Inchen Rebecabe tru Esaú ѳyeeg martrab isub unigwan wammѳrabe, Jacѳbwan wamѳnrrab ѳra, trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneg Esaúbe ñun nѳgucha lata martrab ñune kwetchab tan cha.
Ñibe ñui espadatѳga kwayawatѳwei ѳsig tsunrrabguen cha. Incha ñibe ñui nuneg karuindiig megamig nebunrrun cha. Inchendѳ ñun megamgaig misrѳb arruben, ñibe truyugurri welulrrabguen— cha.
Inchene Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe misrѳb pirѳmerasrѳngurri purѳ yabsrѳ tsunrrabguen cha, katѳ srѳmbalasrѳngurri serenu peñibig nebumѳsrѳ.n

Inchen Isaacbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: —Nabe ñune Jacѳb karub tѳgagѳnrrai Tiuswan miar cha. Incha katѳ nui misaamerabe Jacѳb manchiben marѳb melabelѳ kѳnrrai miar cha. Trurrigu nѳbe tirigumera nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳb, vinѳmera tѳgagѳb inchai miar cha. Nai nusrkai, ¡Mѳimbe yandѳ ñuyasiibe chi maramig kaatan!— cha..
Inchen Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nuneebe arrua, nane purѳ may isa, tru mayanguen t'abig nebuig kѳmig ñuin kѳnrrabigwan nѳ ut'a, tѳga, yan— cha.

Isaacbe itѳnab menda, purѳ kѳrrѳ kwaarig, trenchibig kѳn: —¡Paare! ¿Trube muguig kѳh? cha, tru usha kemѳra srua arrubiibe. Pѳs, ñi arrumѳwatѳ, srua arruben, nabe kerrigu chab maig kѳn cha. Incha nabe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nun chab tranig kѳn cha. Pѳs, tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranigwane nѳbe tѳga kѳrrѳmisrtrun— cha.

Incha nѳgucha kan mamig mayzhig tamara, nui mѳskaweimay srua arruabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Nai papá, wamisr cha. Na ñui nusrkai kemѳra srua arligwan manrlig cha, ñi nan mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan nayasig Tius nan trannrrai miarrunrlig— cha.

Tru misag sѳtѳmera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳbe ñun utsѳbasrtrun cha. Inchen ñibe ñui nunelane ñi karubig kѳnrrig cha. Inchen truilѳbe ñui merrab utsѳbasrtrun cha. Ñun ‘trѳmbѳig nebunrrain’ chib pѳnrrabelѳbe, nѳm trѳmbѳig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun cha. Inchen ñun ‘tabig nebunrrain’ chib pѳnrrabelѳbe, nѳm tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrun— chib..

Inchen Jacѳbpe kemalla, muchaben, Isaacbe tru nui nusrkai kewa pasrailan irrѳmѳrabe, mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranѳb trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkaimbe wambigwansrѳ chi kѳbigwan Jehѳvá mayanguen tabig kѳnrrai mali lataig irrabig kѳtan cha.

Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi kemѳra srua arrigwan na manrrab srua attra cha, na ñun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranrrumѳn— cha. Inchen Jacѳbpe mamigwan srua kemallen, Isaacbe mabig kѳn. Incha katѳ vinѳgucha srua arruben, trunungucha muchibig kѳn.n
Pѳs nѳbe mѳig kui mѳrtrab kaimabig kѳn, kaguende tasiimerabe Esaúwei tasiimera lataig isiiteelѳ kѳben. Incha mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan yandѳ ke tranntrab inchabe,
Inchen mѳskai Isaacwan Jacѳbpe kemallen, nѳbe katѳrawabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Wambe Jacѳbwein kѳbendѳ, tasiimerabe Esaúwein kѳbwain inndan— cha..
Inchen Isaacbe nui nusrkawan trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai, ¿Mandѳ incharre malla wetѳrragu?— cha. Inchene Jacѳbpe trenchibig kѳn: —Jehѳvá ñui Tiusbe nan petѳ wetѳrramig purugutan— cha.
trugurrimbe tru may mamiizhig t'amarigwanba, tru pirrin t'amarigwanba Jacѳbwan tranѳbig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe tru usrimbe Jacѳbwane tasiguba, katѳ nukaburab chi isikkayube tru cabrѳ ureezhelai kalusmeratѳga pinѳbula,n
Inchen nѳbe ya srua arrua, usran tranen, uslimbe mѳskai maig chullig kuaasha, treeg tamarѳbig kѳn.

Inchippa nai mѳskaimbe nan katѳrawa, nan mugui mѳrabe, nane isa purѳ may kebenѳsrkѳptiig kui martrautan cha. Trubeguende nane mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai nayasig Tiuswan miai urasbe nane masken larrѳ kaig nebuig pasramigwanguen miawa pasrtrautan— cha.
Inchene Jacѳbpe usli Rebecane trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nuneg Esaúbe ya isiitѳ mѳg kѳben, nabe ya chigucha isikkaibe cha.
Mѳimbe ubishameraba cabrameraba purrabsrѳmay ya, pagatѳ purѳ tab cabrѳ ureemeran sruattra cha. Pѳs, nabe ñui mѳskai maig mabig kui asha truilan larrѳ may mamiizhig tamaramѳnrrun cha..
Inchawei nai nusrkai na mandѳ cha karuben, trunun tab mѳrtra chibig kѳn.n

Inchen Rebecabe nui nusrkai Jacѳbwane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —¡Au! nabe ñui mѳskai Isaacbe ñui nuneg Esaúba: “Kan usha kemѳra larrѳ may mamiizhig tamara, srua attrig” chib ѳyeeg waminchen trunun mѳrar cha.
Trugurrimbe, na maig chullig kuaasha, kan mamig larrѳ mayzhig tamara, srua attra chibig kѳn, na manrrur cha. Trugurrimbe na kwamѳwatѳ mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai ñuyasig na Tiuswan mianrrab— cha.m
Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe yandѳ kѳllig kur cha. Nabe chi kwalѳm kwam kui mѳrmur cha.m
Inchen Isaacweimba, Rebecaimbabe tru i pagatѳ ishumburmerabe larrѳ trѳmbѳig isuindѳ, isuindѳ melѳnrrai marѳbelѳ kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Isaacbe i pisuwane “Seba” cha munchi pasrig kѳn trenchippe: ¡Katѳ! marmѳgѳmѳ maramѳnrrun t'ain pisu cha. Inchawei tru ciudawane mѳin kwalѳmgatig “Beerseba” cha wamig kѳn.

Incha katѳ kwalѳmbe lѳtsѳzhig kurra mѳingurlimbunѳbe ambugurli igurli kwayab kѳmѳnrrab cha nѳmbe treeg kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn, Inchen Isaacbe yandѳ ungua chiben, nѳmbe chi isumѳ, tab webamba ambubelѳ kѳn.

Pѳs ñibe namun chigucha kaig marmumig kѳnrrain cha. Pѳs namma ñune chigucha chi kaig incha ashmѳtѳ, nambe ñune tab tѳgagua, ñune chigucha kѳmѳ tab webya inrrai marig kuig kѳn cha. Pѳs mѳimbe ¡Jehѳvá mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai indiibe ñi kѳn!— chaa
Inchen Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Ñimbe naimaybe chinchab amrrugue? cha. Ñimbe nane tsalѳ kѳptѳ, ñimui piraugurlinguen nan wegucha pѳnrrѳbendѳbe?—

Inchen Isaacbe truyu kan altar kusrua, Jehѳváwei munchiwan wamab tabig waminchibig kѳn. Incha tru nui tsumig carpa yawan truyu tamara, pasrѳbig kѳn. Inchen Isaacwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe katѳ truyu lalla, pi wesrubelѳ kѳn.
Inchen k'atѳgan pisu lalla wesruben, k'atѳ truikkurri treetѳwei mur aleguiyabelѳ kѳn. Incha truigwane “Sitna” (‘Ashig Kѳmui Indiyab Kѳrrѳmisrin Pi’) cha munchi pasrig kѳn.
Indig kan kwalѳm Isaacwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe tru chaasrѳ lallib kuabe, lulѳb pizheelѳ wetѳrrabelѳ kѳn..
Inchen Isaacbe truyugurri ya, Gerar chag pirѳmerasrѳ tsumisrig kѳn.
Incha nui mѳskai Abraham ѳsig wab urassrѳ, Abrahamwei karuig mendig melabelѳbe aljibesmera lalla, pi wesruilan, truilan filisteѳsmerabe pirѳtѳga netsѳ kasra pѳnsrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Incha nѳbe maskken maskken pua misrѳb, larrѳ nui misrѳb ya, muguen treeg tѳgagѳmuinrrunig puaig misrig kѳn.m
Indiibe Isaac tru pirau ellmara, tru pilawan k'an yellzhikkurrindѳ cien menrrabatѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ tulishibig kѳn, k'aguende Jehѳvá nun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai inchen.

Inchene Abimelecbe trenchibig kѳn:—Ñibe namune ¿chindimbarre ѳyeeg margu? cha. Katѳguchimbe namui misagu mѳig kѳben, ñui sraimba kaig marѳb waramisrig kuimasrtѳ cha. Incha treeg kaig mariitѳga kangurrindѳ ñibe namune mayeelan kegѳrrѳsrka pѳnsrѳbsrutan— cha!.k
Incha kan maya yana kѳsrѳn Isaacbe trusrѳ tsuben, tru Abimelec filisteѳsmerai reybe kan pendanayu ashib pasrѳbene, mѳimbe Isaacbe nui srai Rebecane truba tabzhig undaarab pasrai ashiptinchabe.
Incha Isaacbe Gerar pirau kѳrrѳmisra tsuig kѳbig kѳn.

Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane kan srѳmbalasrѳ kѳnchabiimera lataig nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai mara, i pirѳmeran kerriguh tranamѳnrrun. Incha chu pirausrѳn kѳben misaamera nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ warabelѳbe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai marig kѳnrrun cha tru ñui misaamera amrrubelѳyugurri.
Incha truyu Jehѳvábe Isaacwan kenamisra, trenchibig kѳn: —Egiptѳsrѳmaybe imѳta cha. Na chu tsunrrain chiben tru pirau kѳrrѳmisr cha.

Jacѳbpe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Mѳin kwalѳm ¡katѳ! treegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun chirra— cha. Inchen nѳbe: —¡Katѳ! treegwan maramѳnrrun— cha kѳrrѳmisra, nѳ mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguigwan Jacѳbpa yunѳmariyabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Esaube: —Pѳs, nane parѳgwabiitѳ ke kwamdѳ kѳtan cha. ¿Na mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguatѳbe chigui indamѳtah?— chiben,
Jacѳbwane trenchibig kѳn: —ѳ pigѳ mamig may tamara ñi neniizhigwan tiusmanda srѳttra cha, k'aguende nabe larrѳ muraaraig war— cha. (Inchagurri Edѳm cha wamig kuig kѳn.)
Incha Isaacbe Esaúwan mas undaarabig kѳn, k'aguen nѳ chi kemѳra srua arriilan srѳrrig mabig kua. Trune Rebecabe Jacѳbwanrre mas undaarabig kѳn.
Inchen tru srѳsrѳ kal-labzhiibe ke pigѳ isig nabzhig kѳbig kѳn, trurrigu asr ѳrѳba isikuzhikke. Treekkurri Esau munchi pasrig kѳn.
Indig yandѳ kal-lamig ura pubene, nui patsaube mѳg ureezheelѳ par kuin kѳptinchibig kѳn.m
Inchen tru pa ureemerabe nui patsautѳ kwayab purrѳben, Rebecabe treeg isubig kѳn: “ѳyeeg kѳbene, ¿chiwein kui ѳsig uñibig unamѳtah?” cha. Incha Jehѳváwan payrrab ibene
Isaacbe Rebecaba kasharab uras pilamera cuarenta tѳgaig kuig kѳn, tru Rebecabe Betuelwei nimbasr Labanwei nuchag kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Betuelba Labanbabe arameѳsmera Padan-aramsrѳ warabelѳ kuig kѳn.
Incha ismaelit'asmerabe Havilasrѳngurri Shur t'aisrѳngatig waraig kѳbig kѳn, Egiptѳ pinrrѳguewansrѳ, tru Asiriamay ambi maywansrѳ. Inchen nѳbe nunelan, ka kwayam laptѳ, kwayam laptѳ tsubig kѳn cha.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Ismaelwei dѳce nusrk'alѳ, tru nѳmui nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmѳrig ashib pѳnrrabelai munchimera. Nѳmui pirѳmeraba nѳm chu kѳrrѳmisra warailѳbabe tru munchimeratѳgatѳwei pѳnsra wamiilѳ.
trugurrimbe Misma kѳben, Duma kѳben, Masa kѳben

Iilѳ kѳn tru Ismaelwei nusrkalai munchimera, tru kerrigu mayur kal-labigwei wendautѳ trumѳrig kal-lawa amrrubelai. Ismaelwei kerrigu mayur nusrkaimbe Nebayѳt kѳben, trugurrimbe Cedar kѳben, trugurrimbe Adbel kѳben, Mibsan kѳben
Inchen yandѳ Abraham kwaben, Tiusbe Isaac nui nusrkawane mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai inchen, Isaacbe tru ‘ѳsig Wab, katѳ Nan Ashibig’ taisrѳ pisu puluwan kѳrrѳmisra, tsubig kѳn.
Inchen nui nusrkalѳ Isaacba, Ismaelba misra kusra sѳrabelѳ kѳn, tru Macpela t'ainug, sѳramig peñayu trab lalig pasrabigu tru Mamre t'aig pinrrѳguewansrѳ, tru Zѳhar hitit'ai nusrkai Efrónweim pirau.
Abrahambe nѳ kerrigu chi tѳgaguilane Isaacwan chishtѳh kѳrrѳmarig kѳn.
Truibe Zimramwan kѳben, Jѳcsánwan kѳben, Medánwan kѳben, Madiánwan kѳben, Isbacwan kѳben, Súajwan kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchen Rebecagucha kurraasha, Isaacwan ashabe, camellѳyugurri pinaarrua,
Isaacbe kan maaben wambigwansrѳ lliranrrab webarlin kѳbig kѳn. Incha mѳimbe kurraashene, camellѳsmera pulu lutaurab amrruptinchibelѳ kѳn.

Incha Rebecabe tru nui karub tѳgagui srusralmeraba, yandѳ camellѳsmeran itѳguana, tru Abrahamwei mendig megabigwei tru mendig ambubelѳ kѳn. ѳyamay tru Abrahamwei mendig megabiibe Rebecan pera ibig kѳn, truyugurri..
Incha nѳmbe Rebecan wama, payibelѳ kѳn: —¿I mѳѳba inrraguh?— cha. Inchene nѳbe: —ѳѳ, na lincha inrrur— chibig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Trube, ishug unan wamѳnrrab cha, nѳ manchitashchab— cha..
Treeg kuingucha Rebecai nuchaaba, usrimbabe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ishug unѳbe kan pa trattrѳ kwalѳmdѳguen namba ka kѳrrѳmisrtrain cha. Trugurrimbeguendѳ ka ibwei inchun— cha..
Inchen Abrahamwei k'aruig mendig megabiibe ѳyeeg taigwan mѳrѳppe, Jehѳváwei merrab tѳmbѳnsra pirausrѳngatig utsѳbasrѳbig kѳn.
Rebecabe yu wan cha. Ñun karub peragѳbigwei nusrkawei srain kѳnrrai trube pera inrrѳ chibig kѳn, Jehѳvá nѳ maig kѳnrrai isuig, trumay.—

Inchawei nai k'arub tѳga pasrabigwan ñim yauelѳ kermab pesannameelѳ kѳb, larrѳ tammayelѳ kѳb treelѳ kuabe, nan eshk'array cha. Inchen treeg kѳnrrab kѳmubene, trube, trunungucha eshk'array cha. Trumaybe na mandѳ indamigwan na isumig kѳnrrautan— cha.

Inchen nabe “¿Ñibe mui nimbasr kugu?” cha bayene, nѳbe nane trenchibig kѳn: “Nabe Betuelwei nimbasr kur cha, tru Nacѳrweimba Milcaimba nusrkawei.” Inchen nabe nune kan surtigas kimyu mesrѳb, kualmerayu pѳnsraigwan pѳnsrѳb inchibig kur.

Inchen nabe nai umbutѳ Tiusba chab waminchimѳwatѳ, mѳimbe Rebecabe pi mutin kѳtsѳn kildunyu mutaig, arruptindi ashibig kur cha. Incha pisuyu pi wesranrrab kѳrraiben, nabe trenchibig kur cha: “Tiusmanda, nan pi srѳttra” cha.
na mѳi pisu pulu pasrѳben, ѳyeeg purainrrain cha, tru pi wesrawa srua inrrab arrub srusran: ‘Tiusmanda, ñui kѳtsѳyu piwan nan kuchi srѳrrѳbsrumugu’ chiben,m
Inchen nai yauelѳ ishug unan tranѳg kѳmuincheneguende ñi nan ¡katѳ! nabe treeg marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun t'aigwane trube, yandѳ ñibe chi isumikkaig kѳrrѳmisrabguen chibig kѳn.” cha.
Inchene nabe nun trenchibig kur cha: “¿Inchippa ishug-unѳ nai mendig arrumѳnrrab incheneh?” cha.
“Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nai mѳskawei yau misaameraimay ya, nai misagugurri amrrub ishumburmerai utu ishuwan nai nusrkawei srain kѳnrrai larrunrrig” cha.
Inchen, nan karub pera kѳbigwei srai Sarabe, kѳllimbala nui kan nusrkai tѳgamisrig kѳn cha. Inchen nan karub peragѳbiibe nui chi tѳgaguilan kerriguba nui nusrkaweyasig kѳrrѳmaran cha..
Tru Abrahamwei mendig megabiibe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe tru Abrahamwei mendig megab mѳg kur cha.

Inchen tru Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiibe yamay arruben, nѳmbe camellѳsmeran niisrailan chab picha warabe, manrrai pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Incha trugurrimbe pi srua arrubig kѳn, tru Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiiba, tru nui lincha amrrubelѳba nѳmui srѳmmeran kwallchai.

Incha Labanbe trusrѳ pua: —Jehѳvá maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai indi mѳg, amѳ chibig kѳn. ¿Ñibe wambiitѳbe chinchib pasrѳnrragu? cha. Nabe yawane ñuyasig chab tamarar cha, katѳ ñui camellѳsmerain chigucha.——
Inchen tru Rebeca kan nuchag Laban taig tѳgaguibe, truibe tru mѳwan lanrrab pisusrѳngatig lulѳbig kѳn
Inchen tru srusrѳbe lulѳbig kѳn, tru chi purayaigwan nui yauelan eshkanrrab.
Inchen tru mѳѳbe tѳmbѳnsra utsѳbasrabe, Tiuswan trenchib tabig waminchibig kѳn:k
Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe Betelwei nimbasr kur cha, tru Milcaimba, Nacѳrweimba nusrkawei.——

Inchen tru camellѳsmera piwan chab muchen, tru Abrahamwei k'aruig mendig megabiibe k'an ѳrѳ surtigas seis gramѳs tѳgaigwan kimyu mesrѳnrrai tranѳb, k'atѳ kwalmerayu pagatѳ ѳrѳtѳga mariilan treetѳwei pѳnsrѳb inchibig kѳn, kwatsiimaybe cien gramѳs menrraikke. Inchabe trencha payibig kѳn:
Incha: —Ñui camellѳsmeraingucha pi wesranrrab chibig kѳn, mutsamburab mutchai.—
Inchene nѳbe: —Nai kasuku, muchi— chibig kѳn. Incha mallatѳ kѳtsѳn pinѳsrub, kѳtsѳn tasku muta pasramisra srѳrrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru srusrѳbe truba tab ishug kѳbig kѳn, mu mѳѳbagucha kia kѳmíig kѳbig kѳn. Tru srusrѳbe pisuyu kѳrraarrub, nui kѳtsѳn pi netsѳganѳb katѳ inrrab iben,

Incha na tru srusran ѳyah taig truig kѳnrrain cha: “Na lamѳ pi mutsamig kѳnrrai tiusmanda ñui kѳtsѳn pinѳsru” chiben, nѳbe lѳtappe: “Muchi cha. Katѳ ñui camellѳsmeran chigucha na pi mutsѳsramѳnrrun” cha trenchibig, truig kѳnrrain cha, tru ñi lawa wesruig, ñui karuig megabig Isaacweyasig. ѳyamay nabe wetѳbenamѳnrrun cha, ñi nan karub peragѳbigwan purѳ tab indigwan.——

Inchabe trenchib Tiusba waminchibig kѳn: —Nan karub peragѳbig Abrahamwei Tius, mѳin kwalѳm na purѳ tab purayamig kѳnrrai martra cha. Nan karub peragѳbig Abrahamwan ñi purѳ tab indigwan nun kenamar cha.
Incha nѳbe tru nun karub pera kѳbig Abrahamwei pa trattrѳ camellѳsmeran nemѳra, tru nui karub pera kѳbigwei purѳ tabelan chine ketamig srua, Nacѳrwei ciudasrѳmay ibig kѳn, tru Mesѳpѳtamiasrѳmay.

Inchene ishug-unѳ yandѳ arrumubene, trube, tru ¡katѳ! nabe treegwan maramѳnrrun cha, ñi kѳrrѳmisriibe ñuimburappe yandѳ ñibe chi isumikkaig kѳrrѳmisrabguen chibig kѳn. Inchendѳ nai nusrkawanesi trusrѳmayguimbe pera imѳrrunrrig— cha.
Inchen Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkawane chiweinguen trusrѳmaybe pera imѳrrunrrig cha,
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, naim pirausrѳmay nai yau misaameraimay irrunrlig cha, nai nusrkai Isaácweyasig srain kѳnrrabigwan lanrrab.—
Incha kan piji Abrahambe tru nui karuig mendig megabig ke managurri peraguig nui chi kѳbigwan nѳ asha marѳb pasrabigwan wamabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui tasigwan nai srѳptsim umbu estsartra cha..
Yandѳ Abrahambe kѳlliizhig pilameragucha tsabѳtѳ tѳgaig, chiyutѳgucha Jehѳvá mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai tranigwan tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha trugurri Abrahambe nui srai Saran tru Mamre pѳrr neeshibgatѳmay Macpela tain pirau sѳramig tru srug trab lalig pasrabigu sѳrabig kѳn, tru Hebrѳn Canaán pirausrѳ.
Inchawei tru Efrónweim pirѳ tru Mamre taisrѳ pѳrr neeshibgatѳmay Macpela taisrѳ pasrab pirѳbe, tru sѳramig tru srug trab lalig lata, tru pirau pѳnrrab tusrmera lata,
Pirѳbe tsandzѳn an cuatrѳcientѳsweyig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ anwan isumѳtѳ tru kwabigwan ka sѳrѳ— chibig kѳn.
Inchene Efrónbe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nai kѳlli--misag tiusmanda mѳrtra cha.
Inchen Abrahambe tru pirau maya misagwei merrab utsѳbasra,

—Nai kѳlli misag, tiusmanda, pirѳwane ka kettrumѳn cha, katѳ tru sѳramig srug trab lalig tru pirau pasrabigwanba. Nai misaamerabe nѳmbe asha kѳrrѳmisran cha. Na pirѳwane ñune ketig kѳben, ñui srawane ka sѳrѳ— chibig kѳn.

tru Macpela tain pirau linderѳmerayu sѳramig srug trab lalig pasrabigwan nan yanrrai. Mayaweyig kѳnrraptiig kѳben treezhigwan ñim mayeelѳ ashen anwan na wartrab tan chirrunrrigay cha, trumay nai yau misaameran sѳramig tѳgagѳnrrab— cha..
Inchen Abrahambe kurra pasramisra, hititasmerai merrab utsѳbasrѳptinchabe trenchibig kѳn:
Inchen hitit'asmerabe trenchibelѳ kѳn:
Incha Abrahambe tru kwabig tsunukkurri webya ya, truyu hititasmeran trenchib waminchibig kѳn:4 —Nabe ñimui utube ka peesrѳngurri arruatiig kuinaindѳgucha, nai srawan sѳramigweyasig yanrra— chib.
Incha Abrahambe tru kwabig tsunukkurri webya ya, truyu hititasmeran trenchib waminchibig kѳn:m
Sarabe pilamera cientѳveintisiete tѳgaig tsua,
Tru wendau kal-labelѳbe Hazѳ kѳben, Pildas kѳben, Jidlaf kѳben, Betuel kѳbengue.
Incha Abrahambe tru pailѳ nui karui melabelѳ munig kѳrrѳmisrѳbelaisrѳmay katѳ ibig kѳn. Incha trugurrimbe ketѳtѳ lincha Beersebasrѳmay ambubelѳ kѳn. Incha Abrahambe yandѳ trusrѳ tsumisrig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchawei nabe ñune mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai tranamѳnrrun cha. Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha, srѳmbalasrѳ kѳnchabiimera pѳnrrabig lataig, mar menda pisrum lataig kѳnrrai nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ. Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe nѳmun ashig kѳmui inchibelai ciudameran nѳm merrarrawa tѳga pѳnrramisrtrun cha.
Incha Jehѳváwei ángel srѳmbalasrѳngurri Abrahamwan k'atѳle wama,

Incha Abraham ashene, nui wendaube kan carnerѳ srar kwaliimerayu ilѳsrka megaptinchibig kѳn. Inchen Abrahambe tru carnerѳn kemѳra nui nusrkawaimburѳ, kweecha, kerligu parrѳb Tiuswan keta tranѳbig kѳn.
mѳimbe Jehѳváwei kan ángel srѳmbalasrѳngurli wamaptinchibig kѳn: —¡Abraham! ¡Abraham!— chib. Inchen nѳbe: —Yu pasrar— chiben,
Incha Abrahambe nui nusrkawan kwetchab kuchillun srua kwalwan kusrubene,k
Inchene Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkainzhig, tru ket'a tranam ubisha unane Tius nѳ ashchab kuinrrun— cha. Incha pailѳba ambub kѳbelѳ kѳn.
Incha Abrahambe tru kweetsigwan kerrigu parram trarwan tamara, nui nusrkai Isaacwan niisra, nѳbe nagwanba, kuchillunba nemѳra srua, pailѳba ambub mendabelѳ kѳn.n
Incha pѳn kwalѳmyube Abrahambe kurraashabe yabgurrindѳ trusrѳ nebua ashibig kѳn.

Inchen Abrahambe katѳ kwalѳmbe lѳtsѳzhig kurra, nui burrun tsѳlig pasra, trugurrimbe tru kweecha parramigweyasig trar para, nui karuig mendig melabelѳ pailanba nui nusrkai Isaacwanba pera, Tius chumay inrrain taisrѳmay ibig kѳn..
Incha Abrahambe filisteѳsmeraim pirausrѳ purѳ yana tsuig kѳn.
Incha ѳyamay kѳnrrab cha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn tru Beersebasrѳ. Incha Abimelecba k'atѳ tru suldaumeran nѳ asha k'arubig Ficѳlba k'atѳ filisteѳsmerai pirѳsrѳmay k'atѳ ambubelѳ kѳn.

Inchen Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru iig ishug ubisha-ureezheelѳ trattrѳ y par iilan na ñun tranen, ñi utiibe tru pirѳ umbugurri pizhigwane na lalla wesraig kѳbigwan trunun eshk'ab pasrѳnrrabig kѳn— cha.
Inchene Abimelecbe trencha payibig kѳn: —Iig tru ishug ubisha-ureezheelѳ trattrѳ y par tru ñi nuingui tarѳmariilѳbe ¿maig punrrabigwan eshkabig kѳh?— cha.
Inchen Abrahambe ubishamera kѳben waaramera kѳben srua arrua, Abimelecwan tranѳbig kѳn. Incha ambugurri, igurri ѳyamay kѳnrrab cha wamincha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Abimelecbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe ѳyeegwane murreendi mѳrmur cha. Katѳ ñigucha nan wammѳrѳsrѳmѳwei inchene, nabe mѳinguen wammѳrѳb pasrar— cha.
Inchen Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —¡Katѳ! nabe treeg marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun— cha..
Inchen Tiusbe unan lincha basrѳben, unѳbe nurab ya, mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ tsua, nѳbe arcѳtѳga sѳl ѳramibe kan piaig lataig kѳbig kѳn.
Kurra ya, unan tasku kemѳra, srua pasramisr cha, kaguende nabe nuinukkurri misaamera purѳ nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun— cha.m
usrimbe truyugurri kan maya yabgѳsrѳn ashib wanrrab tarѳmisrѳbig kѳn. Kaguende nѳbe treeg isubig kѳn: “Nai unan kwai ashig kѳmѳtan” cha. Inchen usri wamisren, unѳbe trashib kishibig kѳn.

Indig k'atѳ kwalѳmbe Abrahambe lѳtsѳzhig kurra, Agarwane pirrin kѳben, pi niguin k'alusyu pi kѳben trana, kildunyu mutѳsra, Ismaelwane yandѳ ñi ashchig cha nun tranabe, k'a amrrigay chibig kѳn. Inchen nѳbe webya ya, Beerseba tru mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ chu pumikk'aig llirab uñibig kѳn.

Treeg kuindѳgucha Tiusbe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui karuindiig megab ishuweimburab lata unaimburab lata chi isumѳta cha. Sara nѳ maig taigwan kerriguba ka mѳra, trunun treeg ka mar cha, kaguende ñuinukkurri amrrunrrab misaamerabe Isaackurri kѳnrrun cha.

Sarabe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui tru karuindiig megab ishuwane nui nusrkawanba yugurli weguchi cha, kaguende tru ka karuindiig megab ishuwei nusrkaimbe nai nusrkai Isaacbabe chi tѳgaguigwan keta tranamigube tѳgatѳ ashchabig kѳmѳn— cha.
Inchen Sara ashene, mѳimbe tru Egiptѳsrѳ Agarwei nusrkai tru Abrahamba tѳgaguig unѳ Ismaelbe, nui nusrkai Isaacwane ke ka intsatѳ ashen,
Incha Sarabe trenchibig kѳn: “Tiusbe nane ka intsѳg kѳnrrai marig kѳn cha. Mѳikkѳben na unѳ tѳgaguin kui wammѳrѳbelѳbe naba ketѳtѳ intsѳnrrun cha.
Nui nusrk'ai Isaac k'al-laben, Abrahambe pilamera cien tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Sarabe kwanrliig kѳrrѳmisra, Abraham kѳlli misagwei kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn. Tius tru mana tѳgagѳnrrun taig tru uraske.
Nѳ maig taig kѳbigwan trumay martrab Jehѳvábe Saran ashchab arrua, nune tru maig trannrrab kѳrѳmisrigwan treeg marig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Abrahambe Tiusba waminchen, Tiusbe Abimelecwanba, nui srawanba trugurri nui karuig mendig melab ishumburmeranba ureg tѳgagѳnrrai tamarѳbig kѳn.
Incha Abimelecbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai pirѳmerabe kerriguba ñui merrab pasran cha, ñun katѳguchi tab tsumdѳnug, truyu kѳrrѳmisra tsu— cha.

Nai mѳskawei yaugurri nan Tius ka truѳrѳtѳ, truѳrѳtѳ uñchai nan webingarub uras nabe Sarane trendaig kѳn cha: Na ñui keg kuitamab isua ñi tѳga pasrѳwabe trube, ѳyeeg chirrunrrig cha. Nam chu pub ambiisrѳndѳgucha ñibe ѳyah chirrunrrig cha, ‘ñibe nai nuchag kur’”— cha..
Inchen Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe nainetѳ treeg isuig kѳn cha: “Yusrѳmbe Tiuswan kѳrig tѳgar muguen k'aagua, nai srawan nѳmui mara kѳrrѳmarѳkkѳptѳ nane kwetchaitamab”.

Inchen Abimélecbe Abrahamwan wama, trenchibig kѳn: —¿Ñibe namune chi mara pasrѳgu? cha. ¿Pѳs, nabe ñune chiyu k'alѳ marta? cha. Ñibe naimbalaba, na misagwan k'arub tѳga waimbalaba purѳ trѳmbѳig k'alѳ maringarubsrutan cha. Ñibe nane chi maraamíig mara pasrtan cha.—

Inchawei ñi katѳle nui keeba inrrai ibashmuisruandѳbe ñibe isa kѳmѳ, kwanrrabguen cha, ñui yau mutѳ purrabelѳ kѳben truilѳbañau. Kaguendѳ nѳbe Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kѳn cha. Incha ñi ѳsig kѳnrrai ñuimburѳ purѳwaminchun cha—

Yamba Abraham nѳtѳwei ¿ѳyah chimuig kuit'arru? cha: “Naimbe nѳbe nuchag kѳn” cha. Inchen katѳ ishug misakkucha: “Naimbe nuchagwein kѳn” cha trendaig kѳn cha. Nabe nai manrrѳ umbugurri chi kaig isua kѳmѳtѳ, nai t'asiimeran chishig tѳga pasrab, iigwan ѳyeeg marig kѳn— cha.
Inchen tru yem Abimélecbe kan piaig tѳgaguiyu Tiusbe arrua, nune trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe kwanrrabguen cha, kaguende ñi ñui srain kѳnrrai ñi kѳrrѳmali ishuube kasharaweig kѳn— cha.
Incha Abrahambe tru nѳ tsuinukkurri Neguev pirausrѳmay ya, truibe Gadesba tru Shur ciudameraba pѳnrrabnug tru utu kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn. Incha tru Gerarsrѳmbe ka purainrrab arrubig lataitѳ tsuabe
kѳli nimbasrbe kan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane Mѳab munchi pasrig kѳn. Treekkurri truibe mѳi ya mѳabitasmerai mѳskain kѳn.m

Incha k'atѳ kwalѳmbe tru kѳli numѳsraimbe wendѳ numѳsrawane trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe marig yem nai mѳsk'aimba kiaig kѳn cha, k'atѳ mѳi yemgucha mutsiirana, mѳimbe ñi kebya kinrrig cha, trumay nam namui mѳsk'aweinukkurri amrrub misaamera tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrain— cha.
Namui mѳsk'awan vinѳ mutsѳsra mutsiirana, nѳba kigun cha, trumay namui mѳsk'aweinukkurri amrrub misaamera tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrain— cha.
Inchen Lѳtwane Zѳarsrѳ kѳrrѳmisra tsumibe kѳrig kѳben, nui pagatѳ nimbasrmeraba tunmera tѳga pirѳmerasrѳ tsunrrab ya, nѳmbe pѳnelѳba kan peña trab pasrabyu warѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Katѳ kwalѳm Abrahambe lѳtsѳ kurra Jehѳvába tru nѳ waminchib pasraisrѳmay ya,
Inchen Lѳtwei sraimbe mѳimbe wendѳmay keeshenba, nѳbe maig kuimaytiig tre srug misra pasrambuig kѳn.
Inchen yandѳ Jehѳvábe srѳmbalasrѳngurri azufreba, naaba sre pubig ѳrѳbig kѳn Sѳdѳmaimbalaba, Gѳmѳrraimbalaba.
Trube, ѳsig kug kѳbene, mallatѳ trusrѳmay lul chibig kѳn. Kaguende ñi trusrѳ pumuatѳbe, nabe chigucha martrab kaimamѳnrrun— cha. (Inchagurri tru ciudawane Zѳar cha wamig kuig kѳn.)
Yu puluwandѳ kan lamѳ ciudagѳllig kѳn cha, trusrѳmaybe lulamѳnrrun chibig kѳn nabe. Trusrѳmay ibashcha cha, pѳs, truibe lamѳ ciudagѳllig kѳmuitarru cha— truyu na ѳsig kѳmigwan ka tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrai.—
Inchene Lѳtbe trenchibig kѳn:—Kah, cha nai kasuku na ñim maig taigwan megabig tiusmanda, treebe kaimamѳnrrun cha.m

Incha yandѳ ciudayugurri wambiisrѳ wesrawa pasrabe, kane trenchibig kѳn: —¡Ñui ѳsig kuigwan ñi tѳgѳnrrappe, welula inrrѳ! cha, wendѳmay keshmѳwei, i chagu chu pasramisrmѳweingue. Ñui ѳsig kuigwan tѳgagѳnrrab tunsrѳmay lul cha, pinѳmѳnrrappe.—n

Inchen yandѳ tѳr— rrab arruben, ángelesmerabe Lѳtwan mallatѳ indingarub, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —¡Mallatѳ inchi chiben! cha. Ñui srawanba, ñui pagatѳ nimbasrmeranba yu purrabelan pera inrrѳ chibig kѳn, ciudayu trѳmbѳig nebunrrai marigu ñim pinѳmѳnrrappe.—

Kaguende nambe i ciudawan kerrigu pinisamig kѳn cha. Tru katѳgan misaamera yeeg kaig martan chib trashib eshkab melaibe Jehѳvá nѳ waisrѳ puin kѳn cha. Inchagurri Jehѳvábe namune ciudawan pinishinrrai ѳrig kѳn— cha.

Incha tru mѳguelѳbe tru yau yaskabu melambub amrrubelane kammeran ashmeelѳ misrtrai marѳptinchibelѳ kѳn, mas unѳtiigwangurrimbunѳ kѳlliwangatikke. Inchen nѳmbe yaskab lab ke mandѳguen kѳmui inchib kѳbig kѳn.

Inchene nѳmbe trenchib lѳtabelѳ kѳn: —¡Yugurrimbe mendatsu!— cha. Inchabe treekkucha chibelѳ kѳn: —Ya peesriig namui utu k'a tsunrrab arruatiig kѳbendѳ, ¡paare! ¿namune maig maramigwan ke ñi asha k'arunrrab indirru? cha. Mѳimbe truilan lataguen kѳmѳ, ñune purѳ trѳmbѳikken martrumѳn— chibelѳ kѳn. Inchabe Lѳtwan melambua, yask'absrѳ kemalla, yask'abwan wesra kutchab inchibelѳ kѳn.
—Nai misaamera, tiusmanda ѳyeekkatig trѳmbѳgѳliibe martrab inchimѳtay cha..
Incha Lѳtwane trenchib trashibelѳ kѳn: —Tru ñui yau kinrrab amrrub mѳguelѳbe chu purra? chib. ¡Wambig webetay! chib. Nambe nѳmba ishumburmeraba lataitѳwei marѳg kuin pѳnrrer— chib..
Inchen nѳmbe kinrrabguen waramisrmѳwatѳ, tru ciudayu mѳguelѳbe yawan kerligu chab tulsrubelѳ kѳn, maya misag matsѳrelѳgurlimbunѳ kѳlleelѳgatikke.

Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: —Nai k'asukumera, na ñui k'arui megabigwei yausrѳ kѳrrѳmisrtrab amrrurray cha. Incha ñimui k'atsiimeran kwallchigay cha. Incha srѳnabe lѳtsѳ kurra ñimui ambamigwan amrrigay— cha. Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Kah cha, mѳi yembe nambe yu umbu puinuutѳ, k'a kѳrrѳmisrtrab ker— cha.
Incha Jehѳvábe Abrahamba ѳyeegwan chab waminchabe, yandѳ truyugurri iben, Abrahambe nui carba yaumay katѳ arrubig kѳn.
Inchen Abrahambe katѳgucha: —Nabe nai Señѳrwan ke menrra indinatan cha, ¿truyu veinte wetѳrraimbe maig kѳbsruerah?— chiben, —Veinteelan isua, nabe pinishimumѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.
Inchen Abrahambe katѳgucha: —¿Inchippa cuarenta wetѳrrappe?— chiben, Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru cuarenteelan isua, chinchimumѳnrrun— cha..
Inchene Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe nai Señѳrwan ke menrra inchib lata indinatan cha, nabe ka usrѳ tuindѳ kuinabendѳ.
Inchene Jehѳvábe trencha lѳtabig kѳn:—Sѳdѳma ciudayu cincuenta sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ wetѳrrappe, truilan isua, truyube chinchimѳ, kagѳbasamѳnrrun— cha.

Inchippa tru ciudayu sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ cincuenta kѳbene, ¿tru ciudawan k'a pinishinrrapteh? cha, tru ciudayu sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ tru cincuenteelѳgurri ciudawan pinishimѳ, ¿k'a kѳbasamdiig kѳmuitarru? cha.
Inchen tru pailѳ mѳguelѳbe nѳѳrѳ misra, Sѳdѳmaguebsrѳ amben, trune Abrahambe Jehѳvába pasrabig kѳn.

Incha Jehѳvábe Abrahamwan trenchibig kѳn: —Sѳdѳmaimburapba, Gѳmѳrraimburapba, truyu misaamera yeeg kaig martan chib trashib eshkab melaibe masken, masken kѳben, nѳmui kaig mariilѳgucha masken, masken nuraben, purѳ trѳmbѳig mindin kѳn cha.
Nѳbe purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera, trurrigu mu chindamgaig murig, katѳ nѳgurri chi misaameratѳgucha pirѳ muba kuimburab warabelѳbe mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ treeg kѳnrrab kѳben.
Inchen Jehѳvábe nuinѳtѳ treeg isubig kѳn: “¿Na chi martrab indigwan nagan Abrahamwan eshkamѳ maramuitarru? cha.n
Inchen Sarabe kwaarѳppa, trenchib isabig kѳn: —Nabe intsѳmuig kѳn— cha. Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe intsabwei indig kѳn— cha..

¿Kabe Jehѳváweingan kaimamdiig chi kѳbig kuitarru? cha. Inchawei katѳ pila arrubigu tru chu ura treeg kѳnrrun taiguh, na katѳ ashchab arrubene, tru urasbe Sarabe kan nusrkai tѳgaguen wanrrun— chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jehѳvábe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Sarabe trenchib intsan cha, ¿Kan isa kѳmѳ, treeg kѳnrrab kѳ chinder? chib. ‘Na yan kѳllig kѳbendѳ, kan unѳ tѳgagѳmig.’
Inchen Abrahamba Sarababe yandѳ mur kѳllireelѳ, Sarabe yandѳ pabѳguen pinig kѳbig kѳn..
truilѳbe payibelѳ kѳn: —¿Ñui srai Sarabe chu wah?— cha. Inchen Abrahambe: —Yu carpa yau wainrrun— chiben,m
Incha Abrahambe tru waara purrabsrѳmay lulѳb ya, k'an truba tab waara-unѳzhigwanh merrarrawa, nui k'aruig mendig megabigwan tranen, truibe mamigweyasig ¡k'atѳ! petѳzhiitѳ tamarѳbig kѳn.

Na ñi maig chiben purugunrraptѳwei wabigwei yaburab puramrrab amrruig kѳbene, nabe lamѳ mamig manrrai sruaarrumѳnrrun chibig kѳn, ñimui ambamigwan chishtѳ ambamdѳ kѳnrrai.— Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñi maig taigwan mar— cha.
—Nai kasuku, na ñui karui megabigwan ñi nan tab indamdiig kui asѳnaig kѳbene, trube, ib imѳtѳ, lincha kѳrrѳmisrtra cha.
mayeelѳ tru nui yau purrab mѳguelѳ kѳben, katѳ nui yau kal-lawar kui lata, katѳ amrrub misaameran peniilѳ kui lata, mayeelѳbah circuncidaig kuig kѳn.
Inchen nusrkai Ismaelbe tru circuncidab urasbe pilamera pa trattrѳ y pѳn pilaig kѳbig kѳn..
Abraham tru circuncidab urasbe pilamera nѳventa y nueve tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn.k
Incha Tiusbe Abrahamba chab waminchabe, nuinukkurri t'arѳmisra ibig kѳn.

Inchen Ismaelweimburabgucha nabe ñun mѳrar cha, nungucha mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun chibig kѳn. Nѳgucha ureemera larrѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳnrrai marѳb, purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳ larrѳbitchai marѳb indamѳnrrun chibig kѳn. Ismaelbe karub ashib pѳnrrѳnrrabelѳ dѳce nѳrreelai mѳskain kѳnrrun cha.
Inchene Abrahambe Tiuswan trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi treeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrigu Ismael truigwane nѳ tѳga pasrѳnrrai tranѳ— cha.k

Nabe nune mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai maren, nѳbe ñui kan nusrkai tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Nabe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai maren, nѳbe nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ misaamerai usrin kѳnrrabig kѳben, katѳ nuinukkurrimbe misag sѳtѳmerai reymera werrunrrun— chibig kѳn.
Incha katѳ Tiusbe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui sraimbe Sarai cha wamig kѳmѳtѳ, yandѳ Sara cha wamig kѳnrrun cha.

Inchawei ñui yau kal-laweig kui lata, kabe kan anwei penig kui lata nѳmbe circuncidaig kѳnrrabelѳ kѳn cha. Inchen, tru asru siñalbe tru treeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmarigwan managatigwein kѳn cha eshkabig kѳn.
Ñimbe circuncidanrrigay cha, naba, ñimba tru ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmarigwan treeg marigu asamig pasrѳnrrai.k
Incha katѳ Tiusbe Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn: —Tru na ñun ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmaligwane ñibe, maramig kѳn cha, ñiba, ñuinukkurli katѳle srѳig, srѳig kurrab amrrub misaameraba.

Katѳ nabe, ñiba ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameraba ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmaramѳnrrun cha, k'atѳle srѳig, srѳig misag kurrab amrruimѳrig k'atѳ ѳyeeg martrab cha mara pasramѳnrrun chibig kѳn, managatig pasrѳnrrabig, nabe ñuimba, ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameraimba nabe pasrabig pasrѳwa, managatig nѳmuyasig Tius kѳmѳnrrun cha.
—Iig kѳn cha, tru na ñiba ѳyeeg maramѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmariibe, ñibe tru purѳ nѳrrѳ chi misag sѳtѳmeraindѳgucha ñi mѳskain kѳnrrai..
Inchen tru Agar Ismaelwan t'ammisrѳb uras Abrambe pilamera ѳchent'a y seis tѳgaguig kѳbig kѳn.
Indig Agarbe Abramwei kan mѳg-unѳ tammisren, Abrambe Ismael munchi pasrѳbig kѳn, tru unan.
Incha Agarbe Jehѳvába wamindig kѳppe, nѳbe nune trencha wamabig kѳn: —Ñibe tru nan ashib wab Tius kѳn— cha. Kaguen Agarbe trenchibig kѳn: “ѳsig Wab, katѳ Nan Ashibigwan nabe ashar” cha.m
Incha ángelbe katѳ trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe kwanrriig kѳn cha. Ñibe kan nusrkai tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Incha Ismael munchi pasrtrig chibig kѳn, kaguendѳ ñi larrѳ isui miaben, Jehѳvábe mѳrig kѳn cha..
Inchen ángelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui k'arub pera kѳbigweimay k'atѳle llirawa ya, tammay mur kurrashmѳ, nѳ maig chiben nui tasku treeg mѳrѳb megau— cha.
Indig Jehѳváwei ángelbe tru mu misag waraimѳ pirѳmerasrѳ kan pigab menda Agarwane wetѳrrabig kѳn, Shursrѳmay ambi maywansrѳ.

Incha Saraibe Abramwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñigurrindѳ kѳn cha, nan mandѳguen kѳmui isui uñchai marѳbiibe. Ñune ñui srai lataig kѳnrrai nai karuindiig megabigwan na tranig kѳn cha. Incha mѳimbe nѳbe unѳ tѳga kѳnrrab kѳppe, nane namig ashib kebitan cha. Incha Jehѳvá nѳ ashchun chibig kѳn, na kalѳ marig kuin kui, ñi kalѳ marig kuin kui.—
Inchen Saraibe tru karuindiig megabig Egiptѳsrѳ Agarwan pera arrua, Abramwan srai lataig kѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn. Abram Canaán pirau pa trattrѳ pila tsuben, ѳyeeg purayaig kѳn.k
Abramwei srai Saraibe ureg tѳgagѳnrrab kaimabig kuig kѳn. Inchende kan nui karuindiig megabig egipcia ishug Agar taig tѳgaig kua,
amѳrreѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben, cananeѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben, gergeseѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben, jebuseѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳbengue.
ceneѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben, cenezeѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben, cadmѳneѳsmeraim pirѳmeran kѳben,

Inchen yandѳ pѳrr pinaiben, chab pilliraben, kan hѳrnѳ naguish kuchibiiba kan nag tulun pilabiiba kenamisrѳbig kѳn. Incha truilѳbe tru ushameran kweecha tab tѳbѳtag pirisha ambumay, imay wari utѳwan puraambubelѳ kѳn.
Trune ñibe ñui mѳskalѳba pishindѳ tab israb tsumisrtrabguen cha, larrѳ kѳllizhig misra kwaben, sѳrѳben..

Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Isa kѳmѳtѳ, ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe, k'a peguelaim pirautѳ warѳnrrabelѳ kѳn cha, nѳmbe truilѳ k'arub sruaguindeelѳ melѳwa, pilamera cuatrѳcientѳs nebumne larrѳ k'aig indinab melѳnrrabelѳ kѳn cha.
Inchen yau mab illimerabe tru usha kweetsiilѳ warabelaimbalawan kѳrrѳrrub amrruben, Abrambe kwaarѳsrѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Kan ishug waara-unѳzhig pѳn pilaiba, kan cabra pѳn pilaiba, kan carnerѳ pѳn pilaiba, katѳ kan palѳmaba, kan palѳma-unѳzhiiba srua amѳ— cha.
Inchendѳ Abrambe trenchibig kѳn: —Jehѳvá Tius, ¿tru na truigwan nain kѳnrraitamappe nabe mandѳ incha asamerah?— cha.
Inchen Abrambe Jehѳváwan kѳreben, treekkurri nune Tiusbe chi kaig marmíig lataig, tabig treeg asha pasrig kѳn.m
Inchen katѳ Jehѳvaweinukkurri wam trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui chi kѳbigwane truig ashchabig kѳmѳtѳ, truilane ñui nusrkai utѳnrrabig kѳn— cha.

Inchendѳ Abrambe trenchibig kѳn: —Jehѳvá Tius ¿Ñi nan keta traniibe chi puruguimѳliasamѳrra cha, na chi urekkaigwane? Inchen tru na chine tѳgamisliilan merrarranrrabiibe tru Damascѳsrѳ Eliezer kѳmuitarru?— cha.
Tru na pera pasraig mѳguelѳ mab mutsigwandѳ srѳrri maig kѳrrѳmistrain cha. Inchen tru naba amrrub mѳguelѳ Anerba, Escѳlba, Mamreba truilѳbe si, nѳmuimburappe ka utѳnrrun— chibig kѳ n.
Inchene Abrambe tru Sѳdѳmasrѳ reywane trencha lѳtabig kѳn: —Tius Mayeelain Pala Pasrabig Srѳmbalameranba Pirѳwanba Marѳbig Jehѳváwan ¡katѳ! nabe treebe marmumѳnrrun cha, nabe trendaig kuig kѳn cha.m

Tius Mayeelain Pala Pasrabig Purѳ Nuigwan maya nuguen tabig wamindig kѳnrrain cha, tru ñun ashig kѳmui inchibelan ñui tasku tranѳbigwan. Inchen Abrambe chigurrimbunѳ katѳle wetѳrrawa srua arrigwan cienyugurri diezwane wesrawa, Melquisedecwan tranѳbig kѳn..
Abramwan mayanguen t'abig nebuig kѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn, ѳyeeg wammeratѳga: “Tius Mayeelain Pala Pasrabig Srѳmbalameranba, Pirѳwanba Marѳbig
Inchen tru Salemsrѳ rey Melquisedecbe, Tius Mayeelain Pala Pasrabigwei sacerdѳtebe pirrimba, vinѳba wesrua,
Treencha chigurrimbunѳ wesra srua ambiilan katѳle chab kerrab, katѳ nui kasugunѳ Lѳtwan nui chigurrimbunѳ tѳgamisriilanbañau kerriguh chab kerrabig kѳn, katѳ ishumburmeranba, katѳganelanba.
Incha Abrambe tru nui yautѳwei k'al-lawarmeran trescientѳs dieciѳchѳ tru kwayamigweyasig kusrenani mѳguelѳba tulaamba, truilѳba webya, tru pibgatѳ reymeran wetѳgѳnrrab Dansrѳngatig pasra ibig kѳn.

Inchen tru Sidim chaasrѳmbe asfaltѳs pisumera truba, truba tѳganug kuig kѳppe, tru Sѳdѳma reyba Gѳmѳrra reyba tru kwayabyugurri nui suldaumeraba wegѳrra lulen, mѳilѳbe truyu chab kegѳrrѳben, k'an reymerabe tunmerasrѳmay trubab chab lulѳbelѳ kѳn.
Inchen tru pib reymera kanabelѳbe Sѳdѳmaba, Gѳmѳrraba ciudayu chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan, mamiimeran nѳmui mara wesrawabe, yandѳ truyugurri ambubelѳ kѳn.
Tru Quedѳrlaѳmer Elamsrѳ reyba, Tidal Gѳyimsrѳ reyba, Amrafel Sinarsrѳ reyba, Ariѳc Eleasarsrѳ reyba truilѳ nѳm pib reymera tru trattrѳgatѳ reymeraba kwayabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Sѳdѳma rey kѳben, Gѳmѳrra rey kѳben, Adma rey kѳben, Zebѳim rey kѳben, Bela rey kѳben, Zѳarsrѳ rey kѳben werrua, Sidim chaasrѳ tru reymeraba kwayab mendabelѳ kѳn.
Seir tunmerawansrѳmbe hѳreѳsmeran kanawa kѳrrѳmara, tru Paran chaamerasrѳngatig ambubelѳ kѳn, tru misag waraimíig chi misrmѳ pirѳ puluwansrѳ.
Incha tru i trattrѳgatѳ reymerabe nѳmui suldaumeraba tru Sidim chagu kanbalatѳ misrig kѳn kwayanrrab, tru Mar Trebi taisrѳ.
Incha Abrambe tru nui carpa yameran picha kusrua, Manre tainug nѳrrѳ parѳndzig encinas tusrmera pѳnrrabnug tsunrrab ibig kѳn, tru Hebrónsrѳ. Incha truyube Jehѳváweyasig kan altar kusrubig kѳn.
Kurra, tru pirѳ yammay maya yab kuigwanba, lendѳmay mayan kuigwanba llirab inrrѳ chibig kѳn, kaguende nabe ñun tranamig kѳn— cha.
Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ kan pirau usrѳtui lataig kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Usrѳwanma muguen mundamgaig kuig kѳppe, ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameragucha mundamgaig kѳnrrun cha.
pirѳwan muba kuimburab mayamba ñi nebua asigwan ñunba, ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameranba managatigweyasig na ñun tranamѳnrrun cha.
Abrambe Canaán pirau kѳrrѳmisra tsuben, trune Lѳtbe tru Jѳrdan chag pirѳ ciudamerasrѳ tsunrrab ibig kѳn. Incha tru nui carpa yamerane Sѳdѳmasrѳngatig lasrua pѳnsrѳb ibig kѳn.
Incha Lѳtbe kerrigu Jѳrdan chagwan nѳ merrarrawa, Lѳtbe tru pѳrr neeshibguebwansrѳ ibig kѳn. Incha ѳyamay Abramba, Lѳtba nѳѳrѳ misrig kѳn.

Inchen Lѳtbe ashib pasrѳwabe, tru Jѳrdan chaabe kerriguba Zѳarsrѳngatig pizheelѳ purѳ tѳga pirѳmera kui ashibig kѳn. Jehѳváwei ellmarin tul lat'a t'abzhikke, kabe tru Egiptѳ pirѳmera lat'aikke. Tru Jѳrdanbe treeg kuig kѳn, Jehѳvá Sѳdѳma ciudawanba Gѳmѳrra ciudawanba pinishimѳwatѳbe.
Inchen Abrambe Lѳtwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nam pailainug lat'a, katѳ nai ubisha ashibelѳba, ñui ubishameran ashibelѳba truilѳgucha chi kwayab kѳmig chi kaanrrain cha, kaguende nambe nunelѳ ker cha.
Incha pirѳbe kanbalatѳ lincha waramibe truburab tre lendѳ kѳmíig kѳn, kaguende nѳm tѳgaguilѳbe purѳ nѳrrѳ kua, trubalatѳbe waramgaig kѳbig kѳn.

Incha Abrambe Neguevsrѳngurri katѳle arruppe kѳrrѳmisrѳb, kѳrrѳmisrѳb arrub tsubig kѳn tru Betel misag sѳtѳmera waraisrѳngatig, tru merrabwansrѳ nѳ tru carba yawan lasrua tsuig kѳbiisrѳ, tru Betelba, Haiba misaamera warabnug tru tѳbѳtag.
Abrambe ushamera tѳga kuilѳyu lata, an tѳgaguiyu lata, ѳrѳ tѳgaguiyu lata purѳ pua mѳg kѳbig kѳn.
Incha Faraonbe nui karuig pѳnrrab mѳguelan ѳrѳbig kѳn ¡katѳ! webambi ashib pѳnrrѳnrraingue, Abramwanba nui srawanba nui chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwanbañau sruaamrrai.
Chindimba trenchigu cha: “Nai nuchag kѳn” chabe. Nai srain kѳnrrai na treeg marig kuimasr cha. Mѳimbe ñui sraimbe yu pasran cha. ¡Pereptsu!— chibig kѳn.
Inchendѳ tru Abramwei srai Saraigurri Jehѳvábe tru Faraónwanba nui yau misaameranba murba kebatig kѳn, purѳ trѳmbѳ kwanrrѳmeratѳga.k
Indiibe yandѳ Abram Egiptѳsrѳ kebibene, tru egipciѳmerabe tru ishuube larrѳ t'abzhig kui ashibelѳ kѳn.
Egiptѳ misaamera ñun ashippe, trenchinrrun cha: “Ñui srain kѳn” cha. Incha nane kweecha kuchippe, ñune ѳsig kѳnrrai ka uñbashchun cha.
Incha Abrambe ke Egiptѳsrѳ chab pub ib pasrѳwabe, nui srai Saraiwane trenchibig kѳn: —Na ashen ñibe purѳ tab ishug kѳn cha.k
Incha Abrambe truyugurri webya, ibig kѳn, kѳrrѳmisrѳb, kѳrrѳmisrѳb tru Neguev pirausrѳngatig.

Incha trugurlimbe tunmeragѳba tѳga pirѳmerasrѳmay ibig kѳn, tru Betel pѳrr neeshibgatѳmaysrѳ. Incha tru nui carpa yawan truyuh lasrua pasrѳbig kѳn. Inchen Betelbe pѳrr pinebgatѳmay kѳrrѳmisrene, Haibe pѳrr neeshibgatѳmaysrѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn. Incha nѳbe Jehѳváweyasig kan altar kusrua, nui munchiwan isub wamabig kѳn.
Incha Abrambe Canaánsrѳ puabe, tru pirau kerrigu pureb ya, tru Siquénsrѳ pubig kѳn, tru Mѳré Tusr taig pasramnug. Inchen tru urassrѳ tru cananeѳ misaamerabe Canaan pirau warabelѳ kѳbig kѳn..
Inchen Abrambe Jehѳvá maig chiben ibig kѳn. Inchen nѳbabe Lѳtgucha ibig kѳn. Tru Harán piraugurri Abram webib urasbe nѳbe pilamera setenta y cincѳ tѳgaig kuig kѳn.

Nabe ñigurri purѳ nѳrrѳ misag sѳtѳmera kѳnrrai marѳb, k'atѳ mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai mara, ñui munchiwane mayeelѳ nebua asig kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha, ñibe k'atѳganelayasig maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai, ñibe treeg kѳnrrabguen cha.
Inchen tru Téraj ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera dѳscientѳs cincѳ kuig kѳn. Incha Térajbe Harán pirausrѳ kwaig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nui mѳskai Téraj kwamѳwatѳ, tru Haránbe Caldeѳsmeraim pirausrѳ, tru nѳ kal-laim pirau kwaig kѳbig kѳn..
Nacѳrbe Térajwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ pilamera cientѳ diecinueve tѳgagua nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben, tѳgaguig kѳn.
Nacѳrbe pilamera veintinueve tѳgagua Térajwan tѳgaguig kѳn..
Incha Serugbe Nacѳrwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ pilamera dѳscientѳs tѳgaig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha Pelegbe Reuwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ, pilamera dѳscientѳs nueve ѳsig tѳgaig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha Salabe Eberwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ, pilamera cuatrѳcientѳs tres ѳsig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Arfaxadbe pilamera treinta y cincѳ tѳgagua, Salan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha Sembe tru Arfaxadwan tѳgaguikkurrimbunѳ pilamera quinientѳs ѳsig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Semweinukkurri amrrub misaamera: Sembe pilamera cien tѳgaig kua, Arfaxadwan tѳgaguig kѳn, tru pirau pi pulab arrubig purayaig ba pila kѳben.
Incha ѳyamay Jehѳvábe pirѳ muba kuimburab tru ѳrѳ larrѳbichib amrrai maren, yandѳ tru ciudawan marmѳtѳ, yandѳ lelachibelѳ kѳn.
Incha Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: “I misaamerabe kandѳ kѳb, wamgucha kandѳ waminchib, katѳ tru maramigwangucha yandѳ martrab pѳlbasra kѳn cha, trurrigu nѳm martrab indigwane muguin katiasamѳrra cha..

Incha trugurrimbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: “Kan ciuda margun cha, kan purѳ balaig marig tѳgaig, truibe bala batsabsrѳmbe srѳmbalasrѳngatig kachibikke. Treekkurrimbe mugui nebua asiilѳ nѳrreelѳ misra, pirѳ muba kuimburab ke tru ѳrѳtѳ amba waramig kaanrrun” cha.
Tru urassrѳmbe misaamerabe pirѳ muba kuimburab kan wamdѳ waminchibelѳ kѳbig kѳn.

Iilѳ kѳn tru Nѳéwei nusrkalainukkurri mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, yau misaamera mumeratѳ kѳbig kuig, katѳ mѳigweinukkurri amrrub misaamera kѳbig kuig, misag nѳrrѳ sѳtѳmera mѳyuelѳ kѳbig kuig, treekke. Inchawei tru pi pulabig chab pinisha puraiben, truilѳbe ambuurab, iburab larrѳbichib amba, yu pirѳ muba kuimburab misaamera nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ misrig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru nѳm waraig pirѳmerabe Mesagurli ibiibe, Sefarburabsrѳ puraya, trugurlimbe tru nѳrrѳ tunmera tѳga pirѳmera tru pѳrr neeshibgatѳwansrѳngatig ibig kѳn,
Semwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Elam kѳben, Asur kѳben, Arfaxad kѳben, Lud kѳben, Aram kѳbengue.
Inchen tru Sem Jafetwei mayur nuneg truikkucha nusrkalѳ tѳgaguig kѳn. Semweinukkurri amrrub misaamera kuig kѳn tru Heberwei maya nusrkalѳbe.
arvadeѳsmera kѳben, zemareѳsmera kѳben, hamateѳsmera kѳben kѳbig kѳn..
heveѳsmera kѳben, araceѳsmera kѳben, sineѳsmera kѳben,
Inchen Canaánbe tru nui mayur nusrk'ai Sidѳnweimba, Hetweimba mѳsk'ain kѳbig kѳn.
Trugurrimbe tru Niniveba tru Calaba tru i pa ciudamerai tѳbѳt'ag pasrabig tru Resen purѳ nu ciudawan mara pasrig kѳn.
Incha Sinargurrimbe Nimrѳdbe Asursrѳmay webya, truyube Ninive ciudameran mara pѳnsrѳbig kѳn, tru Rehѳbѳt ciudawanba, Cala ciudawanba..

Truibe Jehѳváwei merrab kaambu ushameran basraarѳb kemѳramibe ke piaig lataig kѳbig kѳn. Inchawei misaabe treeg taig tѳgar kѳbig kѳn: “Jehѳváwei merrab kaambu ushameran basraarѳb kemѳramigwan larrѳ may kemѳrammaybe, Nimrѳd lataig kѳn” cha.
Inchen Cuswei nusrkalѳbe: Seba kѳben, Havila kѳben, Sabta kѳben, Raama kѳben, Sabteca kѳbengue. Inchen tru Raamawei nusrkalѳbe: Sebaba, Dedánba kuig kѳn.

Inchen Javanwei nusrkalѳbe: Elisa kѳben, Tarsis kѳben, Kitim kѳben, Rѳdanim kѳbengue.5 Inchen truilainukkurri amrrub misaamerabe mar puluwan pirѳmerawansrѳ warabelѳ kuig kѳn. Truilѳbe misag nѳrrѳ sѳtѳmeramѳrig, katѳ mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, yau misaamera trumѳrig nѳmuin kui, nѳmuin kui pirѳmera waramig tѳgartѳ kѳbig kѳn, katѳ nѳmbe trumѳrig nѳmuin trigwan waminchibelѳgue.
Inchen Javanwei nusrkalѳbe: Elisa kѳben, Tarsis kѳben, Kitim kѳben, Rѳdanim kѳbengue.
Iilѳbe tru Nѳéwei nusrkalѳ Semweimba, Camweimba, Jafetweimba truilѳ nѳm tѳgagui nusrkalѳ kѳn, tru pirau pimera pulabig arrua puraiben tѳgaguilѳ.
Incha katѳ trenchibig kѳn: “Jehѳvá, Semwei Tiuswane maya nuguen t'ab indig kѳnrrain cha. Inchen Canaánbe Sem manchiben, ka karuindiig megabig kѳnrrain cha.
trenchibig kѳn: Canaánbe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuinanrrabig kѳnrrun cha. “Nunelѳ ka karuindiig megabig mas chigucha kѳmíig kѳbash” cha.
Indiibe kan piji Nѳébe vinѳ mucha mutsiirawa, tru nui carpa yau kebya, peña tsumisrѳppe, kѳsaatiig tsuben,k
Incha Nѳébe pirau kwallib menda kan uvas ellguain tra marѳbig kѳn.k
I tru pѳngatѳbe Nѳéwei nusrkalѳ kuig kѳn. I tru pѳnelainukkurri amrrub misaamerayugurri pirau muba kuimburab misag netsaig kѳn..
Incha Nѳéwan trendaig kѳn: —Maya misaameraba, pirau chigѳben ѳsig kѳbelѳba tru na ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha pasrigwan treeg kuitamab asamiibe, iig kѳn— cha.n
Inchawei wañiwan na pirau pibѳndѳzhiibaig arlingarubene, tru kѳshѳmbѳtѳbe wañiyu kenamisrtrun cha.
Nai kѳshѳmbѳtѳn nabe wañiyu pasrar cha, iibe pirѳba na ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha pasrigwan treeg kuitamab ashib kѳmig kѳnrrai pasrѳnrrabig.m

Nabe ñimba ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha pasramѳnrrun cha, nabe kerrigu ѳsig warabelan pi pulab arrubiitѳgabe k'atѳlebe chishtѳ pinishinrrab kѳmur cha. Ni k'atѳ pirѳwan pinishinrrab pi pulab attrabig k'atѳlebe chigaanrrabig kѳn— cha.
—Nabe ñimba, katѳ ñuikkurri amrrub misaameraba ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha kѳrrѳmaramѳnrrun cha,n
Incha Tiusbe Nѳéwanba nui nusrkalanba katѳ treekkucha taig kѳn:
Trune ñimbe ureg nѳrrѳ tѳgagѳb, larrѳ nѳrrѳ larrѳbitsay chibig kѳn, pirau purѳ nѳrrѳ misag karrab, pirau netsѳganѳb.—k

Inchawei nabe tru ñimui ѳsig kui aniwane nabe ulѳ payamѳnrrun chibig kѳn. Ushamera pinisaig kui lata, k'abe mѳguelai tasku pinisaig kui lata truigwane ulѳ payamѳnrrun cha. Nui mendaigwei ѳsig kuigwan pinishibigwane mu mѳwandѳgucha ulѳ payamѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Inchendѳ yau animbaigwan aniwan lusѳskaimíigwane mamѳnrrigay cha, kaguende ѳsig kѳmibe aniyuweim basran cha.

Pirau chi ushameratѳgucha ñimune larrѳ kѳrig kuinchib kwartrun cha. Pala illimeran lata, pirau chigurrimbunѳ ѳsig warabelan lata, maryu piyaumeran lata, ñim ashib tѳgagѳnrrai nabe ñimui tasku pѳnsrar cha.

Inchen larrѳ mayzhig irrabig nuinug puben, Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: “Misakkurrindѳ pirѳwane managuen katѳlebe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuim basrѳnrrai marmumѳnrrun cha, kaguende mѳwei manrrѳbe shushkurrimbunѳ kaigwandѳ, kaigwandѳ martrab isubelѳ kѳn cha. Katѳ chigurrimbunѳ ѳsig kѳbigwane katѳlebe kerriguba pinishimumѳnrrun cha, mѳi lataibe.
Inchen kerrigu ushamera kѳben, srala amѳñib ushamera kѳben, illimera kѳben, pirau chimera kѳben ѳsig kѳbelѳbe trumѳrig, trumѳrig arcayugurri webambubelѳ kѳn.
Inchen Nѳébe nui nusrk'alѳba, nui sraimba, nusrk'alai sralѳba webarrubig kѳn.
—Arcayugurri ñiba, ñui sraimba, ñui nusrkalѳba ñui nusrkalai sralѳba webambay cha.
Inchen Tiusbe Nѳéwane trenchibig kѳn:n
Inchen katѳ tru wendѳ pѳlyu tru veintisiete kwalѳmyube pirѳbe yandѳ kerrigu pur kѳbig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbunѳ katѳgan trune muniirawa, katѳ palѳman ѳriibe, yandѳ katѳle truibe nuimay arrumѳtѳ, pinab pinabig kѳn.
Incha k'atѳ k'an palѳmangucha inrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn pirau pimera kѳliitashchab ashchab.
Inchen pimerabe pa trattrѳ pѳlgatig kѳrreibig kѳrreb arruben, tru pa trattrѳ pѳl ke srѳsrѳ kwalѳmyuh tru nѳrrѳ tunmerain pala yuumerabe kenamisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen trattrѳ y pa pѳl misren, diecisiete kwalѳmh arcabe Ararat tunmerasrѳ pasramisrѳbig kѳn.
Pimera pirѳ umbusrѳngurri wesrurrabelѳbe kasrѳben, tru srѳmbalasrѳ pimeran katab pѳnrrabelan kuriilѳgucha kasrѳben, srѳmbalasrѳngurri sre arrubiibe yandѳ mas pumѳben inchibig kѳn..
Inchen pimerabe tru pirѳ palawan kwalѳmmera cientѳ cincuenta nemisramnegatig pi netsaig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.
Inchen chitѳgucha kimrrabmay israbig ѳsiguelѳ pirau warabelѳbe mayambah chishtѳ kwaig kѳn.
Inchen tru purѳ pala tunmerawan pimera chab pinѳgasrainukkurri katѳgucha pimerabe palabunѳ siete metrѳs purab neguchib pulabig kѳn.k
Inchen pirau tru pi pulab arrubiibe kwalѳmmera cuarent'a nemisramnegatig pulab iben, pimera pulab menda, tru pimerabe arcane piraugurri pala kusruig kѳn.
Inchen tru kebambubelѳbe trumѳrig ishuuba, mѳѳba kebambig kѳn, Tius maig k'aruig, treekke. Inchen Jehѳvábe yask'abwan yandѳ k'asrѳbig kѳn.

Incha nѳmba kebambubelѳ kѳn, tru kau umbu namig usahamera trumѳrig, kusreeg ushamera trumѳrig, pirau srala ambub ushamera trumѳrig, katѳ illimera trumѳrikke, katѳ kwaldzariibarmera kѳbendѳ pala ammeelѳ kѳbengue.
Indig tru trattrѳ y pa kwalѳmyu tru pi pulab arrubiibe pirau chishtѳ k'asrѳb netsab arrub mendabig kѳn.
Inchen Nѳébe nui srain kѳben, nusrkalѳ kѳben, yernamera kѳben arcayu kebibig kѳn, tru pi pulab arrubigugurri kwamѳ, ѳsig webinrrab.
Tru uras Nѳébe pilamera seiscientѳs tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn, tru pi pulab arrubig pirѳwan chishtѳ kasrѳb arrub uras.
Inchen Nѳébe Jehѳvá maig karuigwan kerriguh treeg marѳbig kѳn.
Katѳ treetѳwei bala illimerangucha, trattrѳ y bagatѳbatѳ kertrig cha, mѳѳba, ishuuba, pirau tru illimeran piniimíig tѳgagѳnrrab.
Incha Jehѳvábe Nѳéwan trenchibig kѳn: —Ñiba ñui yauelѳba arcayu kebinrrѳ cha, k'aguendѳ nai merrab ñundѳwei sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbig kui ashar cha, mѳi misaamerai utu.
Inchen Nѳébe Tius maig karuigwan kerriguh treeg marѳbig kѳn..
Chi illimerandѳgucha, chi ushamerandѳgucha, sralѳb amѳñibelangucha trumѳrig parbatѳ ѳsig kѳnrrab ñiba kebamrrun cha.
Inchendѳ nabe ñune ѳyamay pasramѳnrrun cha, ñibe ñui sraimba, ñui nѳsrkalѳba ñui nusrkalai sralѳba tru arcayu kebamrrigay cha..
Incha arcane pѳn itѳniisraig mara, pala patsabsrѳngurri pinag cincuenta centimetrѳsyuh pendanarrab pasrtrig cha. Incha mumay malѳmay kѳben k'an yask'ab pasrtrig cha.
Incha marѳppe, ѳyeeg martlig chibig kѳn: Yammaybe cientѳ cuarenta metrѳsig, lendѳmaybe veintitrés metrѳs tѳgaig kѳben, palamaybe catѳrce metrѳs tѳgaikke.
Inchen Tiusbe Nѳéwane trenchibig kѳn: —Maya misagwan ѳyandѳ kѳnrrai nabe treeg isur cha. Kaguende nѳmgurrindѳ pirѳbe larrѳ trѳmbѳitѳ netsaim pasran cha. Incha nѳmune pirѳwanbañau pinishinrrab cha.
Nѳébe pѳngatѳ nusrkalѳ tѳgaguig kѳn: Semwanba, Camwanba, Jafetwanba.

Iig kѳn, Nѳéwan maig pureb arrigwan waminchibig: Nѳébe sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, nѳbaguetѳtѳ nѳrrѳrawarmerai utu nѳbe sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, katѳ Nѳébe Tiusba maig unamig kѳben treeg uñibig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen kѳben Nѳébe Jehѳváwein kabyu nѳbe tabig kui asig kuig kѳn..
Inchen Jehѳvábe yeekkucha kuitamab isubig kѳn, pirau misagwan tsunrrai marigwan. Nui manrraube purѳ kѳrrѳ isub pusrkwabig kѳn.

Tru kwalѳmmerawane purѳ nѳrrѳ mѳguelѳ warabig kѳn, larrѳ nѳrreelѳ. Inchen katѳ tru Tiuswei nusrkalѳbe tru mѳguelai nimbasrmeraba kasharawa, ureg tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchen tru i mѳguelѳbe chish mѳguelѳ chiyugucha kѳrmeelѳ kѳbig kѳn, truilѳbe merrabsrѳngurri mumera kuilan nebua asi misaamera..
Inchen yandѳ mѳguelѳ pirau truѳrѳ larrѳbichib menda, nѳmbe nimbasrmera tѳgagѳb mendig kѳn.
Nѳébe pilamera quinientѳs tѳgaig kua, pѳngatѳ nusrkalѳ tѳgaguig kѳn: Semwanba, Camwanba, Jafetwanba..
Inchawei Lamec kerligu ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera setecientѳs setenta y siete kѳben, yandѳ kwaig kѳn.

Incha truigwane Nѳé cha wamig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: “Jehѳvá pirѳwan larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebunrrai mara pasrim pirau, nam chi mariilѳyu purѳ trѳmbѳig murig pui melaigugurri namun i unѳbe chairannrrun” chib.k
Matusalénbe pilamera cientѳ ѳchenta y siete ѳsig tsua, nusrkai Lamecwan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Matusalénwan tѳgaguinukkurlimbunѳ Enѳcbe Tiusba maig unamig kѳben, treeg uñibig kuig kѳn, pilamera trescientѳs tѳgaig. Incha nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Enѳcbe pilamera sesenta y cincѳ tѳgaig kua, nusrkai Matusalénwan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Jaredbe pilamera cientѳ sesent'a y dѳs tѳgaig kua, nusrkai Enócwan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchawei Mahalaleelbe kerrigu ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera ѳchѳcientѳs nѳventa y cincѳ kѳben, yandѳ kwaig kѳn.
Inchawei Cainán kerrigu ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera nѳvecientѳs diez kѳben, yandѳ kwaig kѳn.
Cainánbe pilamera setenta tѳgaig kua, nusrkai Mahalaleelwan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchawei kerrigu Enós ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera nѳvecientѳs cincѳ kѳben, yandѳ kwaig kѳn.
Enósbe pilamera nѳventa tѳgaig kua, k'an nusrk'ai tѳgaguig kѳn, Cainán taig.
Setbe pilamera cientѳ cincѳ tѳgagua, nusrkai Enóswan tѳgaguig kѳn.
Inchawei Adanbe pilamera nѳvecientѳs treint'a tѳgagua, yandѳ kwaig kѳn.
Adanbe Setwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ pilamera ѳchѳcientѳs tѳgaig kua, nusrk'alѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha mѳѳba ishuuba kѳnrrai Tiusbe treeg mara pѳnsra, katѳ mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrai mara, tru nѳ mara pѳnsrѳb kwalѳm “Adan” cha wamig kѳn.k
Incha Setgucha kan nusrkai tѳgagua, truigwane Enós munchi pasrig kѳn. Indig truyugurrimbunѳ yandѳ mѳguelѳbe Jehѳváwei munchiwan wamab miabelѳ kѳn..
Cainwanma siete pijisken purab trѳmbѳig nebunrrai pasrig kuibe, Lamecbe sietebatѳ setenta pijisken treetѳ treetѳ purab trѳmbѳig nebuin pasrѳnrrun” cha.k
Inchen Zilagucha Tubal-Cainwan tѳgaguig kѳn. Truibe chigurrimbunѳ brѳnce tsandzѳntѳgaba, hierrѳ tsandzѳntѳgaba larrѳ tabelѳ marѳbig kuig kѳn. Katѳ Tubal-Cainwei nuchaabe Naama kѳbig kѳn.
Adabe kan unѳ tѳgamisrig kѳn, tru Jabalwan. Tru merrabsrѳ kѳlli misag Jabalweinukkurri pѳlbasra amrrub mendig kuig kѳn, carpa lasrua pѳnsraiIѳyu warab, katѳ nѳmbe ushamera karrѳgѳb inchibelѳ.
Incha Enѳcbe kan nusrkai Irad taig tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchen tru Iradbe Mehujaelwei mѳskain kѳben, Mehujaelbe Metusaelwei mѳskain kѳben, Metusaelbe Lamecwei mѳskain kuig kѳn.
Incha Cainbe Jehѳváwei merrabgurri yandѳ tarѳmisra ya, Nѳd tain pirau Edén pѳrr kalabgatѳmaysrѳ tsubig kѳn..

Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳikkѳben Cainwan kweechibiibe siete pijisken purab trѳmbѳig nebuin pasrѳnrrun— cha. Incha Jehѳvábe Cainwane kan siñal asamdiig tѳgaig kѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn, mugѳben ashagucha, nune kweechimѳnrrai..
Inchene Cainbe Jehѳváwan trenchibig kѳn: —Nan ѳyeeg mѳra pasrѳnrrai mariibe purѳ nuig kѳtan cha, pasramguengaikke.
Ñibe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuinanrrabig kѳrrѳmisrѳb, tru ñui nuneg Abelwan ñi kweechen ani lusigwan muchib piraugurri ñune webya inrrai wegutsig kѳrrѳmisrѳb inchabguen cha.
Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Chi margu? cha. Ñui nunewei animbe piraugurri trashib nan wamѳtan cha.k
Cainbe nui nuneg Abelwane trenchibig kѳn: —Chugѳben lliranrrab amun— cha. Indig yandѳ tru llirab amѳnaisrѳmbe Cainbe nui nuneg Abelwan namappe, kweechibig kѳn.
Treenchene, Cainwane Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Chindimbarre namѳgu? cha. ¿Chindimbarre ñui malѳbe ke peg misrѳptinnda? cha.
Inchen kan maya yana kѳsrѳn puraiben, Cainbe Jehѳváwan ketamig nui kwaliilѳyugurri srua arrubig kѳn.
Incha katѳ wendѳbe Cainwei nuneg Abelwan tѳgamislig kѳn. Abelbe ubisha ashibig kѳben, Cainbe pirѳwan kwallibig kuig kѳn.

Incha Jehѳvá Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Mѳѳbe mѳimbe kan mѳig kѳben nam lat'aitѳwei misra pasramisrin kѳn cha, t'abigwanba, kaigwanba nebua ashibig. Pѳs, nui t'asigwan larrѳbitchain kѳmѳn, chibig kѳn, tru ѳsig kѳm tusryu mamigwangucha nemѳra, truigwan ma, managatig ѳsig kѳnrrab.”
Jehѳvá Tiusbe mѳweimba, nui sraweimba kemelѳ ushamerai kalusmeran mara, kennѳbig kѳn.
Ñibe pѳsra, pѳsra mara mamig tѳgagѳnrrig cha, ñi katѳle pirѳtѳwei misramnegatikke, kaguendѳ ñibe pirѳtѳga mara pasrig kѳn cha. Ñibe pirѳ usrѳ kuig kѳppe, katѳ ñibe usrѳtѳwei misrtrabig kѳn— cha.

Incha mѳwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi ñui srawei wamwan manchitanmaptѳ mѳrѳb basrѳwa, na mamѳnrrig tain tusryu mamigwan ñibe main kѳn cha. Ñigurrindѳ pirѳbe larrѳ trѳmbѳig nebuig basrѳnrrun cha. Ñi chugatig ѳsig tsumnegatiibe ñibe ¡katѳ! isua mѳra marѳb megawabe, truyugurri manrrabguen cha.

Incha ishuuba ñibabe larrѳ ashig kѳmuindiyabelѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha, ñuinukkurli amrrubelѳba, katѳ ishuweinukkurli amrrubelѳba. Incha tru ishug misagweinukkurli srѳig srѳig kurrab arrubiguig ñune turwan pusѳbunѳben, ñibe nune talunyu tsatchun— cha.
Inchen mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Tru ñi nan lincha pera uñchai trani ishug tru tusryu mamigwan nan srѳrren, nabe mar— cha.
Inchene Tiusbe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ñune kѳsaatiig kѳn chabe, mu eshk'ata? cha. ¿Na mamѳnrrain taig tusryu mamigwan ñibe mappeendi?— cha.
Treendingucha Jehѳvá Tiusbe mѳwan wamabe, bayibig kѳn: ¿Ñibe chu basrѳgu?— cha
Inchen mѳimbe tru pailanba, ¡katѳ! chinetѳ nebua asamigwan nѳmui isubiibe kurѳptinchen, nѳmbe kѳsaateelѳ kѳbrain kui wetѳgѳrra, nѳmbe higuera ishiimeran tsusha, sѳtѳgasrailѳ marѳbelѳ kѳn.
Tiusbe asha kѳn cha, ñim tru tusryuigwan mab kwalѳmbe, ¡katѳ! chinetѳ nebua asamigwan ñimui isubig kuren, ñimbe Tius lataitѳwein kѳnrrabguen cha, kaigwanba, tabigwanba nebua ashibelѳ.——
Inchene ulbe ishuwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimbe kwamѳnrrabguen cha.
Inchen ishuube ulwane trenchibig kѳn: “Tulyu pѳnrrab tusryu mamiimerane ka manrrigay” t'aig kѳn cha.
Mѳѳba, ishuubabe pailѳba kѳsaateelѳ kѳbig kѳn. Inchendѳ chi kѳrig kui inchimeelѳgue.
Treekkurri mѳѳbe mѳskawan, usran tarѳmisra, sraimba kandѳ misra, kan asrtѳ kѳnrrun.

Inchen mѳѳbe maya ushamera namiguelan, pala amѳñibelѳ maya illimeran, k'atѳ tru kusreeg ushameran mayamba munchi pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Inchen kѳben mѳwan nѳ maig palain kѳben, treegwan purugunrrabiibe mugaabig kѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Jehѳvá Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: —Mѳg nѳtѳ unamiibe chi tab kѳmѳn cha, nun purugunrrabig nѳ maig palain kѳben, treegwan martrab— cha.
Incha Jehѳvá Tiusbe mѳwan pera arrua, tru Edén ellmarin tulyu kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn, pirѳwan kwallib ashib tsunrrai.
Inchen tru wendau pibe Kihón taig, truibe tru Cus pirѳ muba kuimburab pureb ibig kѳn.n
(Incha pirѳ muba kuimburab tru pirau ѳrѳbe larrѳ tabig kѳbig kѳn, katѳ truyube mayzhig irrabig bedeliѳ kѳben, ónice kѳben tѳgaikke.)
Inchen tru Edenyugurrimbe pi webarrubig kѳn tru tulwan sѳmarѳb lulrrabig. Incha truyugurrimbe katѳ pippalѳh pirisha webibig kѳn..
Incha Jehѳvá Tiusbe Eden t'aisrѳ kan ellmarin tul mara pasrѳbig kѳn, tru pѳrr neeshibgatѳmaysrѳ. Incha tru nѳ mari mѳwan truyu kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jehѳvá Tiusbe pirѳyu usrѳtѳga mѳg misag mara, trugurrimbe ѳsiguig kѳnrrai kimyu urrѳben, mѳѳbe ѳsiguig misrig kѳn.
Pibe piraugurli webarrub, pirѳ palawan kerligu sѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Srѳmbalawan kѳben, pirѳwan kѳben mara pѳnsrailan ѳyeeg kѳbig kѳn cha wamindig iig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe tru trattrѳ y pa kwalѳm kѳnrrabyuigwane mayanguen t'abig kѳnrrai mara, nuyasig kѳnrrai t'arѳmara pasrѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳ chigurrimbunѳ mara pѳnsra tru kwalѳmbe nѳ isrig kua.
Incha kerrigu Tius nѳ mariilan ashabe, truba truba tabig kui ashibig kѳn. Inchen maaben misra, lѳtsѳgualmaben, trattrѳ y kan kwalѳm kѳbig kѳn.

Incha Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Asay cha, nabe ñimune pirau mamig nigab kauzheelѳ yellmera tѳgartѳ kѳnrrai tranar cha. Katѳ maya tusrmera mamig nigabelѳ, yell tѳgarmera tranar cha, iibe kerriguba ñim mab kѳmig kѳnrrai.”
Incha Tiusbe mѳwan marѳppe nѳ maig kѳben ke tre lataitѳwein kѳnrrai marig kѳn. Pѳs nѳbe tre lataitѳwein kѳnrrai marig kѳn. Mѳg misag, ishug misag treeg marig kѳn.
Inchen maaben misra, lѳtsѳgualmaben, truibe trattrѳ kwalѳm kѳbig kѳn.

Incha Tiusbe piyu ushamera kwaaramdѳ nѳrreelѳ marig kѳn. Chigurrimbunѳ ѳsiguelѳ kѳnab purrѳnrrabelanba, chitѳgucha nѳm chimera kѳppe, treelѳ kѳnrrai pimerabe treeg misringaruig kѳn, katѳ chigurrimbunѳ kwaldzariimera tѳgargucha nѳm chi kѳppe, treelѳtѳwein kѳnrrai. Incha Tiusbe tabig kui asig kѳn.
Inchen maaben misra, lѳtsѳgualmaben pib kwalѳm kѳbig kѳn.
Tiusbe tru srѳmbalamera larrѳ lendiig chiguchagaigu iilan pѳnsrѳppe, pirѳwan pilѳnrrai pѳnsraig kѳn.
Incha truilѳbe srѳmbalasrѳ larrѳ lendiig chiguchagaigu pilabelѳ kѳnrrain cha, pirѳwan pilѳnrrabelѳ.” Inchen treeg kuig kѳn.m
Inchen maaben misra, lѳtsѳgualmaben, pѳn kwalѳm kѳbig kѳn.n

Incha Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Pirѳbe misringarubash cha, pilli puzheelѳ chi kaumera kѳppe, treeg yellzheelѳ tѳgar, mamig nigab tusrmera, chi tusr kѳppe, treeg yell truyu tѳgar pirau treeg kѳnrrai. Inchen treeg kuig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe tru larrѳ lendiig chiguchagaigwane “srѳmbala” cha wamabig kѳn. Inchen maabenba, lѳtsѳba kѳben, pa kwalѳm kѳbig kѳn..
Incha Tiusbe tѳrwane tab kui asha, tѳrwane lѳstѳyugurri nuingui mendamarѳbig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe tru larrѳ lendiig chiguchagaigwan marѳbig kѳn, tru pimeran tarѳmarѳbigwan. Tru pimera pala kѳbelanba, umbu kѳbelanba nuingui tarѳmarig kѳrrѳmisrtrai..
Tiusbe tѳrwane “kwalѳm” cha wamappe, lѳstiigwane “yem” cha wamabig kѳn. Inchen maabenba lѳtsѳba kѳbig kѳn, tru srѳsrѳ kwalѳm.
Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Tѳr kѳnrrain” cha. Inchen tѳrbe misrѳbig kѳn.
Ke srѳtѳ pѳlbasreptѳ, Tiusbe srѳmbalameranba, pirѳwanba marig kѳn.
Pirѳbe mumay kuinguen asamgaig chiguchagaig pasrѳben, pimerabe purѳ trѳmbѳ lѳstiig pinѳgasraig pasrabig kѳn. Inchen Tiuswei Espíritube pi palawan llirabig kѳn.m
Namui nu pirѳwai purap isuá, tru namui nu usri, nui musikwan nu ut'ak tѳka
nui mántrѳ pishiyu kutri tapchik kѳntrai kasrak isup wan
