Incha Jѳsébe kwaig kѳn pilamera cientѳ diez nemisren. Inchen nui asrwane minchib irrѳmѳnrrai mѳ marѳb tamara, kan taulyu wayig kѳn Egiptѳ pirau..
Incha Jѳsébe Efrainwei katѳburѳ awelu ureemeranguen nebua ashib, katѳ Manaséswei nusrkai tru Maquirwei ureemeranguen nai ureemeratѳwein misran chib, srѳbchagu mut'ab indig kuig kѳn.

Incha Jѳsébe Israelwei nusrkalan, ‘¡Katѳ! nambe treeg maramѳnrrun’ tingarubig kѳn. Incha Jѳsébe nѳmun trenchibig kѳn: —Isa kѳmѳ, Tiusbe ñimun ashchab arrua, purugunrrun cha. Treeg pubene, ñimbe nai tsutsiimerane yugurri srua ambamig kѳn— cha.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Chi kѳrig kui inchimѳtay cha. ¿Nagan Tius nѳ marigwan na pasramisra marѳb pasramuitarru? cha.

‘Ñimbe Jѳséwan ѳyeeg chinrrigay cha: Ñui nunelѳ yeeg kaig marѳb, ñun kalѳ marigwan Tiusmanda ulѳ paymѳ pesannarrunrrig cha’ Inchawei mѳimbe tiusmanda, nam ñui mѳskawei Tius karuigwan marѳb melabelѳtѳwein kuinaig kѳbene tru trѳmbѳig kalѳ mariilane pesannarrunrrig” cha. Inchen ѳyeeg wamindigwan mѳrabe, Jѳsébe kishibig kѳn..

Inchen Jѳséwei nunelѳbe mѳskai kwaig yandѳ mugaabene, trunun isub mendabe, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —¿Jѳsébe namune katѳgucha namig isub srѳ unin kѳnrrab kѳ chinderah cha, nam nun ѳyeeg kalѳ marigwan trunun isua?—

Nui nusrkalѳbe Canaán pirausrѳmay srua amba, Macpela pirau peñayu trab lalig pasrabigu sѳrabelѳ kѳn, tru Efrѳn hitit'an Abraham pirѳwanbañau peninug, nui yau misaameran sѳrab tѳgagѳmig, tru Mamre pulusrѳ.
Inchene Faraonbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskai ѳyeegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, ¡Katѳ! Martrurrunrrig cha trendaigwan ñi treeg martrab misrig kѳbene, trube, sѳrѳnrrab inrrѳ— cha.

Inchen yandѳ tru isub kisam kwalѳmmera batsѳben, Jѳsébe Faraѳn karub wainug purrab misaameran trenchibig kѳn: —Ñim truyu purrabelai merrab ñim nan tab indamdiig kuinabene, tiusmanda Faráѳnwan trenchirrunrrigay cha:

¡Mayanguen ungua ungua ñui mѳskawei Tius ñun purugubigwan! ¡Mayanguen ungua ungua Maramburab Marѳb Tius ñun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai marѳbigwan! ¡Mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai Srѳmbalasrѳngurli arrubiitѳga! ¡Mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai maryu purѳ umbusrѳngurli arrubiitѳga! Pitsѳ mutsѳsrѳb tѳgagѳb katѳ usrai patsau tѳgagѳb indingurli mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai arrubiitѳgaba.
Gadwane kaig marѳb misag sѳtѳmera amrrua melambub kwayaindѳgucha, nѳbe wendautѳ pasraѳrѳb ya, kwayanrrun..
Inchen Danbe nui misaameran maig kѳnrrabigwan asha martrabig kѳn. Israelwei tru dѳce nusrkalai misag sѳtѳmerayu kan mѳikkѳsrѳn lataitѳwei.
Isacarbe kan burru larrѳ murig lat'aig kѳn, kan muba webya yamga tul— unѳyu keerig pigaya tsub lat'aig.

Ñibe kan pimera kѳramdiig latѳgushib amrrubig lataig, mѳimbe yandѳ ñi mayurbe maskucha nuibe kѳmѳnrrabguen cha. Kaguende nai kamayu nai sraimba trѳmbѳig mara, ñui trag mѳskawei kamawan, kaig kuig lataig mara kѳrrѳmalig kѳn cha.
Incha trugurri Israelbe Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe yandѳ kwanrrainchar cha. Inchendѳ Tiusbe ñimba pasrѳwa, nѳbe ñimune ñimui mѳsk'alai pirѳmerasrѳmay k'atѳle amrrai martrun chibig kѳn.

Inchen mѳskaimbe treeg marmѳnrrab trenchibig kѳn: —Ashar cha, nai nusrkai, ashar cha. Manaseskucha misag nѳrrѳ larrѳbitchabiitѳwein kѳn cha, katѳ nѳgucha larrѳ nuitѳwein kѳnrrabig kua. Inchendѳ wendѳ nuneebe nѳ lataikken sѳtѳmera kѳnrrun— cha..

Inchen Jѳsebe nui mѳskaimbe nui kusrmay tasigwan Efraínwei turbala estsari ashabe, tab kѳmui inchibig kѳn. Incha mѳskawei tasigwan Efraínwei turbalagurrimba Manaseswei turbalagurrimba yunѳmara, estsartrai inchibig kѳn.n

Incha Jѳséwane i wammeratѳga maya nuguen tabiitѳ, tabiitѳ nebuig kѳnrrai ѳyeeg chib tranѳbig kѳn: —Nai mѳskalѳ Abrahamba, Isaacba nui merrab amѳnai Tius, tru nan kal-lainukkurri mѳingatig nan chi kѳmѳnrrai ashib tѳga basrab, katѳ na muba yamigwan eshkab basrab Tius,

Incha Jѳsébe nui pa nusrkalan Efraínwane nui kusrmay t'asiitѳga, Manaseswane nui atsitѳga kemѳra mѳskawei pulu pѳnsrѳbig kѳn. Tru ѳyamay Efraínbe Israelwei atsimaygatѳmay pasramisren, Manasesbe kusrmaygatѳmay pasramisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchabe Israelbe Jѳséwan trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe ñun asamuitamappe isumuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ Tiusbe nane ñui ureemeranbaguen asamig kѳnrrai martan— cha.
Inchene Jѳsebe trenchibig kѳn: —Iilѳbe nai nusrkalѳ kѳn cha, nan yu Egiptѳ pirau Tius keta traniilѳ.—Inchen Israelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Naimay kemalingaru cha, na purѳ tab indigwan trannrrab— cha.
Nabe Padan Aramgurri k'atѳle arrub megaben, ñui usri Raquelbe kwaig kѳbig kѳn cha, Efrata ciudayu pumig ke lamѳtѳ palѳben. Inchen nabe Efrata may menda sѳrig kѳn cha. Truibe tru Belén kuinrre.—
Na ñiba tsunrrab arrumѳwatѳ, ñui pagatѳ nusrkalѳ yu Egiptѳ pirau kal-lawa ureemera tru Efraínba, Manasesbabe nai ureemera misran cha, Rubénba, Simeónba naielѳ kѳb lataitѳwei.m
Incha na nai mѳskalѳba israb tsumisrene, Egiptѳgurrimbe srua ya, nѳmun esegawa wariinuutѳwei wairrunrrig— chibig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi maig taigwan nabe treeg maramѳnrrun— cha.
Incha Jacѳbpe Egiptѳ pirau pilamera diecisiete tsuig kѳn. Inchen kerrigu Jacѳb nѳ ѳsig tsuin kwalѳmmerabe pilamera cientѳ cuarenta y siete kuig kѳn.

Incha Jѳsebe ѳyeeg marѳb kѳmig wesrawa pasrig kѳn, ellmarigu misriilan tru cien cargasyugurri veintebatѳ wesruigwane Faráѳnwein kѳnrrai treeg marig kѳn, tru mѳi kwalѳmgaatig. Inchen Sacerdѳtesmerai pirѳmeratѳh Faraónwei kѳrrѳmisrmuig kѳbig kѳn.n

Incha yandѳ ellmarig tulisamig pubene, tru cienyugurri veinte tarѳmarѳb tulisaigwane Faraónwan tranrrigay cha. Inchen truyugurri kѳrrѳmisrѳbigwane tramerayu tsuramiba, katѳ ñimba, ñimui ureemeraba, ñimui yau misaameraba, katѳ mayeelѳ ñimba warabelѳba mab kѳmig kѳnrrain— cha.

Inchen pirѳmera peniimeelѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳppe, sacerdѳtemeraindѳh peniimeelѳ, ka kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn, kaguende nѳmbe Faraónweinukkurri mamig traniilѳ ut'abelѳ kuig kua. Inchagurri nѳmbe nѳmui pirѳmeran yanmuig kѳbig kѳn, nѳmbe Faraón pѳnsraigwan mabelѳ kua.

Inchen Jѳsébe Egiptѳ pirѳmeran kerrigu Faraónweyasig penabig kѳn, k'aguende egipciѳmerabe tru parѳ arrubikkurri nѳmui pirѳmeran yanen. Inchagurri pirѳmerabe kerriguba Faraónwei tasku purayaig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru pila puraiben, wendѳ pilayu nѳmbe amrruabe, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Namune an patsѳben, namune ni chinchaguen sѳramgaatan cha, kѳrrѳmisrmѳtѳ, an patsѳtan cha, ñun eshk'aig kѳn cha. Yandѳ namui ushameragucha ñuindѳ misren, nambe chigѳben tranamibe chigar misrer cha, namui pirѳmerabah, k'atѳ nambe k'a pѳnrraiteelѳ pѳnrrer cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimun an chab patsѳbene, ñimui ushameran tranay cha. Nabe tru ushameraba yunѳmarѳb ñimune tirigu tranamѳnrrun cha.n
Inchen Jѳsébe tru Egiptѳ pirau misaameraba, Canaánsreelѳba tirigu penab bagarai anmeran kerrigu tulisha, tru anwane Faraónwei tab yau esegabig kѳn.
Incha katѳ Jѳsébe nui mѳskawanba, nui nunelanba, nui mѳskawei yau misaameranba nui karuig peraguilanba mamiimera mab kѳmig pѳnsrѳbig kѳn, nѳmun kanun, kanun maig palѳben, treekke..
Inchen Faraonbe Jacѳbwan trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Mam pila tѳgaig kugu?— cha.

Egiptѳ pirѳbe ñi asha maramig ñuin tasku pasran cha. Mas purѳ tab pirau warѳnrrai war chibig kѳn, tru Gѳsén pirau. Egiptѳ pirau truibe purѳ tab pirѳ kѳn cha. Truyu warѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisrtrain cha. Truilai utu purѳ tab asha martraptѳ mѳguelѳ kѳbene, truilan nai ushameran nѳm ashib tѳgagѳnrrai nѳmun pѳnsrѳ— chibig kѳn.
Incha Jacѳbpe Judámerrig Jѳséweisrѳ merrab punrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn, Jѳséwan eshkaben Gѳsénsrѳ nun katѳnrrab attrai. Incha Gѳsén pirausrѳ chab pubelѳ kѳn.k
Inchen Aserwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Imna kѳben, Isva kѳben, Isvi kѳben, Beria kѳben, katѳ nѳmui nuchag Sera taikkuchague. Inchen tru Beriai nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Heber kѳben, Malquiel kѳbengue..

Inchen Judáwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Er kѳben, ѳnán kѳben, Sela kѳben, Fares kѳben, Zera kѳbengue. (Inchendѳ Erbaba ѳnánbabe Canaán pirausrѳndѳ kwaig kѳbig kѳn). Inchen Fareswei nusrkalѳbe Ezrónba Hamulba kuig kѳn.k
Tru israelitasmera Egiptѳ pirau kebambubelai munchimerabe iilѳ kѳn, tru Jacѳb nuinukkurri amrrub misameraba: Rubén Jacѳbwei mayur nusrk'ai.
Incha katѳ Canaán pirau tѳgamisriilѳ nѳmui ushameran kѳben, chine kѳbelan kѳben, tѳga srua ambig kѳbig kѳn. ѳyamay Jacѳb kerrigu nui yauelѳba Egiptѳ pirausrѳmay yaig kѳn.n
Nabe ñiba Egiptѳsrѳmay kѳrraarrua, katѳ natѳwei Egiptѳgurli werrunrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Incha ñi kwabene, Jѳsebe nѳashib nui taska ñui kammeran kasrѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.
Inchen Tiusbe yem kan piab lataigu Israelwane trenchib waminchibig kѳn: —Jacѳb, Jacѳb— cha —Inchene nѳbe: —Yu pasrar— chiben
Incha yandѳ amrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn. Incha yandѳ webamba ambene, Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Mayube chinetѳ, chinetѳ tiyab, kwayab amrrab kѳmѳ— cha.m
Incha nѳmun kanun, kanun kemelѳ srѳizhig kan, kan keta trana, Benjamínwane tsantsѳn anmera trescientѳsba, katѳ yunѳmarѳb kemelѳ trattrѳgatѳba keta tranѳbig kѳn.
Incha nѳmui chi tѳgaguilan lelacha, amrrumig chi isumѳnrray cha, k'aguende yu Egiptѳ pirau purѳ tabiibe nѳmuin kѳnrrun”— cha.
Incha Jѳsébe nui nuneg Benjamínwan ira basramisra, kishen, katѳ Benjamíngucha treetѳwei nuneg Jѳséwan ira basramisra, kishibig kѳn.
Inchagucha ñim lata, nai nuneg Benjamin lata, ñimashib asha pѳnrran’ cha, waminchippe na waminchib pasrai.
‘Ñibe nai puluwandѳ Gѳsén pirau tsunrrig tan cha, ñui nusrkalѳba, ñui awelu ureemeraba, katѳ ñui ubishamera kѳben, cabrasmera kѳben, ñui waaramera kѳben, katѳ ñui chigurrimbunѳ tѳgaguilѳbañau.

Inchawei nane yusrѳmay ѳrѳppe, Tius nѳ ѳrig kѳn cha, ñim kѳmѳtѳ.Tru Faraónwan chi maramigu na isum purugubig kѳnrraimba, nui yau kerriguwan na ashib tѳga wanrraimba, k'atѳ kerrigu Egiptѳ pirau na k'arub wamig kѳnrraimba nѳ pasrig kѳn cha.
Kaguende pirau pa pilaguen parѳ arrub pasrѳben, k'atѳgucha trattrѳ pila palan cha, tru pilamerawane ellmartrab aramelѳ kѳnrrab kѳmѳwei, ellmarig tulisamig kѳnrrab kѳmѳwein kѳnrrabig kѳn cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe: —Naimay kemalay— chiben, nѳmbe kemallen, nѳbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Nabe tru ñimui nuneg Jѳsé kur cha, tru ñim nan Egiptѳsrѳmay yana ѳrig kѳbig.
¿Nabe mandѳ yamѳ cha, matsinѳ-unѳ naba arrumubene? Trube, nane nai mѳskawane larrѳ lastimazhig isui indi ashig kѳmѳtan— chibig kѳn.
Nai mѳsk'aimbe matsinѳ-unѳbabe purѳ trag pѳnrrabelѳ kuig kѳppe, nambe k'atѳle amben, matsinѳ-unѳ namba arrumubene,
Incha nambe namui mѳskai tru ñi maig chiben marѳbigwei yausrѳ puabe, ñi namui karubig ñi maig taigwan nambe kerrigu eshkabelѳ ker cha.
Inchene nam ñui karuig melabelane ñibe trendaig kѳn cha: “Ñimui wendѳ nuneg ñimba arrumuingatiibe, trube, kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay” cha.

Inchen tru mѳguelѳbe tru ciudayugurlimbe ke tre yab ammѳ, srѳ kѳben, Jѳsébe nui yau ashib wab mѳwane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Tru mѳguelan wetѳgѳnrrab mѳi mѳi malla inrrѳ cha. Incha wetѳgabe, trenchinrlig cha: “Namgurlimbe yeeg tab inchen, ñimbe chindimbarre kaig mara amgue? cha. ¿Andѳga malin cѳpan chindimbarre nila srua amgue? cha.
Inchen nui nunewan ashene, kishig kѳbiibe yandѳ pasramgaig kѳben, Jѳsébe mallatѳ webya, nui kwartuyu kebya, kisamburab kishibig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe payibig kѳn: —¿Maig melѳgue? cha, ¿Tru ñim wamindig ñimui mѳsk'ai kѳlli misaazhikk'an k'atѳgucha k'a ѳsig wabig kuitarru?— cha.

Inchen nѳmbe Jѳséwei yausrѳmay pera ambi mѳrabe, kѳrrѳ kѳriimat'a trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Marig merrabwan namui kust'almerayu tru anwan katѳle pusrikkurri namune pera ambiinrrun cha. Mѳimbe namune merrarrawa, chigѳben maramba, namune ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg mara pѳnrran t'amba, katѳ namune nѳmui karua srua kuilѳ kѳnrrai maramba inchaut'an cha, namui burrumeranbañau.—

Maramburab Marѳb Tiusbe tru mѳg ñimun lastima tѳgagѳnrrai martrain cha. Inchen ñimui katѳgan nunewan lelachen, Benjamíngucha katѳ ñimba attrain cha. Inchen nan nai nusrkalan trubisamig nebubene, chinchibig kui ¡ka treeg nebunrraita!— cha.
Inchawei namun ѳya srarrѳbashmuig kuinguen, k'atѳguen amba pubsruinrrun— cha.

Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Kaguende tru mѳѳbe namuimburappa, namui yauelaimburappa ke chine tab, tab payibig kѳn cha. Inchabe trenchibig kѳn cha: “¿Ñimui mѳskaimbe ka ѳsig wabig kѳh? cha ¿Ñimbe katѳgan nuneg tѳgagѳgueh?” cha. Pѳs nambe, nѳ mancha payiilan ka lѳtamiitѳwein kuig kѳn cha. “Ñimui nunewan pera amrrunrrigay” chinrraitamappe, ¿kan nambe mu isua pѳnrraig kѳtah?— cha.

Inchen ñi namun nun pera ambashmubene, trube, nambe ambamig kѳmѳnrrun cha. Kaguende tru mѳѳbe namune trendaig kuig kѳn cha: “Ñimui nunewan ñim pera amrrumuingatiibe trube, kenamisrmѳrrunrrigay”— cha.m

Inchen nѳbe nui nunelan trenchibig kѳn: —Nai anwane nane katѳle pusrin kѳmѳh cha. Yu nai kustalyu ka purran— cha. Inchene nѳmbe larrѳ kѳrrѳ kwariilѳ, nѳmui manrrѳbe ke webѳrsrab lata inchen, kangurri, kangurri trendiyabelѳ kѳn: —¿Namun ѳyeeg nebuinab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai kabe Tius treeg mara chinderah?— cha..

Ñim mѳigwan kѳben ѳray chibig kѳn, tru ñimui wendѳ nunewan pera attrai. Inchen katѳganelane keera purrѳnniilѳ purrѳnrrain cha, trumaybe asamdiig kѳnrrun cha ñim sѳlwan waminchibelѳ kuin kui. Inchen ka isatѳ indin kuisruandѳbe, ñimbe maisrѳngѳt'ashchab ka larѳnrraptѳrre amrruar kѳn cha, nabe Faraónwei munchiyu trendamѳnrrun— cha.
Inchendѳ Jacѳbpe tru Jѳséwei nuneg Benjaminwane ѳrmíig kѳn, tru nui nunelѳba: “Inchippa mayu chigѳbendѳ nebubgun” cha.
Inchen tru Jѳséwei nunelѳ tru pa trattrѳelѳbe Egiptѳsrѳ mamig penѳnrrab kѳrraambubelѳ kѳn.

Incha trugurrimbe tru Faraónwei wendau k'atѳgan tru ashib k'arub wabig unin k'arruyu Jѳséwane nebingarua misagwan ѳyah chib trashinrrai k'arubig kѳn: “¡Tѳmbѳnsray! ¡Tѳmbѳnsray!” chib. ѳyamay Jѳsébe Egiptѳ pirau kerriguwan nѳ k'arub wanrrab nebyaig kѳn.
Incha Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñi lataig kusrebig chigui asha tab martrabiibe mugucha katѳgane kaagѳn cha. Kaguende Tiusbe ñune kerrigu iigwan nebua asingaruin kѳn cha.
Pilamera trattrѳ y par Egiptѳ pirau muba kuimburab mamig purѳ misrѳb pilamera kѳnrrab kѳn cha.

Inchen tru waaramera larrѳ trѳmbѳgѳleelѳ k'alargѳleelѳ tru tab waaramerai wendau nerrubelѳba, k'atѳ tru tirigu turmera larrѳ pѳndѳzhig tru kurag isig arrubig tustam itsiilѳba, truilѳbe pilamera trattrѳ y par kѳn cha. Inchendѳ truibe pilamera trattrѳ y par larrѳ trѳmbѳig parѳ attrabigwan eshk'abig kѳn cha.
Inchen Jѳsébe Faraónwane trenchibig kѳn: —Faraónwei tru pagatѳ piailѳbe parba trunundѳwei eshk'abig kѳn cha. Tiusbe nѳ maig martrab pasraigwan tru piabyu kenamarin kѳn cha.
Inchen Faraonbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nan piappe, nabe Nilѳ nu pi menda pasrѳbene,
tru piugurrimbe waaramera trattrѳ y par larrѳ tabelѳ, tsalelѳ werruptincha, tru juncѳs utu pu mab kѳben
Inchen tru wendaube tru tsutsigutѳwei katѳgan trattrѳ y par weguchibelѳ kѳn, larrѳ pѳndѳzhig, tru kurag isig arrubig tustam itsiilѳ.m
Inchen mѳimbe katѳ tru wendaube trattrѳ y par treetѳwei waaramera larrѳ trѳmbѳilѳ, kalargѳleelѳ piugurri werruabe, Nilѳ pi menda tru srѳsrѳ werrub waarameraim pulu pѳnrramisrѳptincha
Mѳimbe tru piugurrimbe trattrѳ y parba larrѳ t'abelѳ, tsal waaramera werruptincha, juncѳ utuwan pu mab mendabelѳ kѳn.
Inchen tru cѳpayu srѳrrѳb pѳnrrabelan asha karub pasrabigwane katѳle nui lutѳwan tѳga pasrѳnrrai tranen, nѳbe srѳsrѳ maig marѳbig kuig katѳ treetѳwei cѳpan Faraónwan mutchai yuulѳb pasrabig kѳn.n
Inchen pѳn kwalѳmyube Faraonbe ñui turwan paringarua, k'an tusryu mesringaruben, ñui asrwane illimera amrrua, ñune manrrun— cha.

Inchen tru pirri marѳbelan asha karub basrabiibe tru piaigwan ke chi isumgaig tabig ѳya kѳnrrun chib eshkain kui ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Naimburappe nane treeg piatan cha: Nai turbalabe pѳngatѳ tasin-ureemera chi pirrimera kѳben tѳgar pѳnrrѳbashib.
Inchene Jѳsébe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru pѳngatѳ srarmerabe pѳn kwalѳm kѳben,
Jehѳvábe Jѳséba pasrѳwa, nui lastima asigwane kenamarѳbig kenamara, tru keerin pѳnrrabelan ashib pasrabikken nune chi isumgaig larrѳ tabikkui ashchai, Jehѳvábe treeg marѳbig kѳn..
Inchen nabe truba mur trashiben, nui kewaguigwan naimbulu tsumnetѳ welulѳptindan— cha..

Inchagurli Pѳtifarbe kerliguba Jѳséwei tasku ashchaim pasra, nune chi isumig chigaabig kѳn. Isumig kѳppe, nѳ mab mutsamigwan trunundѳh isumig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen Jѳsébe larrѳ tab asr tѳgaig trurligu larrѳ tab mѳg kѳbig kѳn.

ѳyamay tru Pѳtifarbe Jѳséwane chi isumgaig larrѳ tabikkui asha, Putifar nѳ chi palai waben trunun ashib pasrѳnrraimba, katѳ nui yau chigurrimbunѳ tѳgaguilan nѳ ashib pasrѳnrraimba treeg kѳrrѳmara pasra, nѳ chigurrimbunѳ tѳgaguilan kerriguba nѳ asha martrai kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn.

Inchen Judábe tru nui yerna Tamarwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui mѳskawei yau kasharamѳ, ka tsunrrig cha, nai nusrkai Sela kѳlig misramne.— Inchendѳ Judabe treeg isubig kѳn: ‘Inchippa Selagucha nuneg kwabelѳ lataitѳwei kwanrraitamab.’ Incha treekkurri Tamarbe nui mѳskawei yausrѳ tsunrrab ibig kѳn.

Inchen ѳnánbe tru ureg kal-labelѳbe nuin kuent'ailѳ kѳmѳnrrab kui asha kua, nui nuneg kwabigwei sraimba kib waramisri mѳrig, kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrai pirautѳ, pirautѳ lushibig kѳn, nuneg kwabigweyasig chi ureg kaanrrai.
Incha trusrѳmbe kan cananeѳ Súa t'aigwei nimbasrwan srain kѳnrrai kabgucha, truigwan nui srain mara, pailѳ kibelѳ kѳn.
tru Jѳséwei kewaguig tab tsurѳzhigwane mѳskaweimay trana ѳrѳppe, ѳyeeg cha ѳrѳbelѳ kѳn: —Nambe ѳyeeg wetѳrrer cha, ñui nusrkawein kui, ñui nusrkawein kѳmui muingѳtashchab tab ashchig— cha.
Indig yanayu Rubénbe tru aljibe trabsrѳmay arrubene, mѳimbe Jѳsébe yandѳ mugaagѳptinchen, nѳbe isuptѳ nui kewa pasraigwan kѳlsrѳptinchibig kѳn.
Trembe ismaelit'asmeran yangun chibelѳ kѳn. Namui t'askabe chi kaig marmѳnrrab cha, kaguendѳ nѳbe namui yaundѳwei namui nuneg kѳn— cha. Inchen nunelѳbe trumay kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn.
nune kemѳra, tru pi wesramig trab lalig pasrabigu keguchibelѳ kѳn. Inchendѳ tru trab laliibe chi pigaig pur pasrabig kѳn.n
Incha kangurri kangurri trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñimguen asay cha, tru piainabiibe ѳsrѳ arrun cha.
Inchen nѳmbe yabsrѳ arri ashabe, nѳmuimbulu pumѳwatѳ, nѳmbe kwetchab waminchibelѳ kѳn..
Israelbe Jѳséwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui nunelѳbe Siquémsrѳ ubisha ashib waran cha. Amѳ cha, trusrѳmay inrrig— cha. Inchen Jѳsébe: —ѳѳ, inrrur— chibig kѳn.k

Incha mѳskawanba, nunelanba treeg eshkabene, mѳskaimbe ѳyeebe chisun waminchab arrugu trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —¿Tru ñi ѳyeeg piaig tѳgaguitѳgabe namune manchibrre inchigu? cha. ¿Ñui usrimba, ñui nunelѳba, naba, kabe ñun piraugatig utsѳbasrtrain kѳnrrab kѳ chindah?— cha.k

Inchene nunelѳbe trencha kusrua lѳtabelѳ kѳn: —¿Treekkan namui rey misra, namune ke ñi karub tѳga pasrѳnrrab inchib pasrѳtirru?— cha. Incha masken ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ kѳn, tru piailan, nѳ waminchen.
Kenaz kѳben, Temán kѳben, Mibzar kѳben,

Inchen Acbѳrwei nusrkai Baal-Janán kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe nusrkai Hadad karunrrab nebyaig kѳn, tru nѳ tsuig ciudabe Pau t'aig kѳben. Inchen tru Hadadwei sraimbe Mehit'abel t'aig kѳbig kѳn, Matredwei nimbasr, Mezabweimbe awela.
Inchen Hadad kwabene, tru nuimburѳbe Masreca misag sѳtѳmera waraisriig Samla karub wanrrab nebyaig kѳn..
Israelitasmera rey tѳgagѳmѳwatѳ, tru Edѳm pirau reymera nebamba karub purrabelѳbe iilѳ kuig kѳn:k
Disón kѳben, Ezer kѳben, Disán kѳbengue. Truilѳbe nѳm mѳitѳgucha nѳmui nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ misaameran nѳm ashib karubelѳ treelѳ kѳbig kѳn..
Iilѳ kuig kѳn tru Esaúweinukkurri amrrub misaamera, nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha karubelѳ, tru Esaúwei mayur nusrkai Elifazwei nusrkalѳ: Temán kѳben, ѳmar kѳben, Zefѳ kѳben, Kenaz kѳben,
Inchen tru nui nusrkalai munchimerabe iilѳ kѳn: Esaúwei srai Adai nusrkai Elifaz kѳben Esaúwei srai Basematwei nusrkai Reuel kѳbengue.k
Jacѳbpa Esaúbabe purѳ nѳrrѳ tѳgamisrѳptѳ, pailѳba kanbalatѳbe waramgaig kѳbig kѳn. Inchagucha tru nѳm waraig pirѳbe ushameran mannamig truburab tranmíig kѳn..
Iilѳ kѳn tru Esaúweinukkurri amrrub misaamera, tru Edѳmwei.
Inchen nѳbe yandѳ ke kwanrrab inchib ke srabe israb megawa, unѳzhigwane Ben-ѳni cha wamabig kѳn. Inchendѳ mѳskai Jacѳbpe Benjamin munchi basrig kѳn.

Incha Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñibe Jacѳb munchi kѳn cha. Inchendѳ mѳimbe Jacѳb cha wamig kѳmѳtѳ, ñui munchibe Israel cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳn— cha. Incha Israel cha wamig kѳn.—Ñibe Jacѳb munchi kѳn cha. Inchendѳ mѳimbe Jacѳb cha wamig kѳmѳtѳ, ñui munchibe Israel cha wamig kѳnrrabig kѳn— cha. Incha Israel cha wamig kѳn..
Incha Jacѳbpe maya misaameraba Luz cha wamiisrѳ pubig kѳn, tru Betelsrѳ Canaán pirau.k

Inchen nѳmbe tru taska marig peg tiusmera nѳm tѳgaguilan kerriguba Jacѳbwan tranѳbelѳ kѳn, katѳ kaluyu kandunga melsraguilan chigucha. Inchen Jacѳbpe kan encina tusr keta truilan sѳrabig kѳn, tru Siquém pulu.

Indiibe pѳn kwalѳmyu tru circuncidailѳbe pusrkwailѳ purrѳbenh, Jacѳbwei pagatѳ nusrkalѳ tru Dinai nuchalѳbe Simeónba, Levíba nѳmbe espadan srua ambubelѳ kѳn, tru ciudayumay, truilѳbe ni chigucha chi isumѳ kѳben, maya mѳguelan chishtѳ kweecha petabelѳ kѳn..
Inchen tru heveѳ truyu ashib karubig Hamѳrwei nusrkai Siquém ashabe, Dinane kemѳra, kaig mara mindisha kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn.
kan tul penabig kѳn, tru Hamѳrwei nusrkalan. Incha truibe Siquénwei mѳskawan, tsantsѳn andѳga mari mѳnedasmera sulu cien pagaraig kѳn. Incha truyu nui carpa yawan lasrua tsumisra,

Inchene Jacѳbpe trencha payibig kѳn: —¿Ñibe chi munchi kugu?— cha. Inchene tru mѳѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —¿Nai munchiwane nane chinchab paygu?— cha. Inchen tru mѳѳbe truyutѳwei tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrabigwan nune tranѳbig kѳn.
Inchene tru mѳѳbe: —¿Ñibe chi munchi kugu?— cha payen, Nѳbe: —Jacѳb munchi kur— chibig kѳn.
Inchen tru mѳѳbe Jacѳbwane chinchaguen kullaaranamgaig kui ashabe, srѳptsim merrarrab srѳlwan kebachen safabig kѳn, tru kemѳriyab tranrriyabyu.
Incha Jacѳbpe tru misaameraba, nui ushameraba kѳrrѳmisra tsuinug nѳtѳ kѳrrѳmisra, kan mѳѳba tѳr-rramnegatig kwayab tranrriyabelѳ kѳn.
Camellasmera ureg perarcheelѳ treinta, waaramera cuarenta, tѳrѳ-ureemera ba trattrѳ, asnasmera pib trattrѳ, ba trattrѳ burrusmera.
Ñitѳwei nane trendaig kѳn cha: “Nane maya nuguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai mara, nainukkurli amrrub misaamerabe purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ, mar menda kan pisrum lataig kѳnrrun cha, mundamguengaikke.”—

Na ñi k'aruigwan marѳb megabiibe ñi larrѳ tab indigwanba, ñi trendѳ treeg tabig kѳppe treeg mariilanba na truigwan utab pasramibe nabe trengatig truburab kѳmuinatan cha. Pѳs, nabe i Jѳrdan nu piyu larreb urasbe i pѳtѳnain tsiizhiitѳ srua pasraig kѳben, trune mѳimbe nuingui, nuingui pa sѳtѳ tarѳmara pasramig tѳga pasrar cha.
Pѳs nѳbe treeg isubig kѳn: “Inchippa Esaú kan sѳtѳwan kwayanrrab megambuingucha, katѳgan sѳtѳbe lulrrain” cha.
Inchen tru wam srua ambubelѳbe Jacѳbweimay katѳle amrrua, trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñui nuneg Esaú waisrѳ ashchab amber cha. Nѳgucha ñun katѳnrrab arrun cha, mѳguelѳ cuatrѳcientѳs lincha peraig.—
Jacѳbpe truilan ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Yube Tius nui angeles sѳtѳmeraba kѳrrѳmisra basrainug kѳn” cha. Incha treekkurri truyube Mahanaim cha wamabig kѳn.
Inchen tru yem tru Laban arameѳwane Tiusbe kan piabyu kenamisra, trenchibig kѳn: “Isuptѳ mar cha. Chigѳben martrumѳn chib tsag, tsag waminchab kѳmѳ.”
Incha Jacѳbpe nѳ kerrigu chi tѳgaguilan srua, ashmѳwatѳ welula ya, Eufrates nu piyu chab larrayabe, trugurrimbe Galaad tun ureemeragѳba pirѳmerawansrѳ inrrab ibig kѳn.
Inchen Jacѳbpe tamarѳb menda, nui nusrk'alanba, nui sralanba camellѳsmerayu itѳguanѳsra,
ѳyamay Tiusbe ñimui mѳsk'awei ubishameran lata cabrameran lata nѳrrѳ kerrawa, nan tranig kѳn cha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe Raquelwanba, Leanba wamabig kѳn, tru nѳ ubishameran ashib tsuisrѳmay amrrunrrai.

Nan mѳi ñui maya ubisha sѳtѳ utuwan pureb arruben, tsurѳ ubishameranba, rayas tѳga ubishameranba, yalѳ ubisha— ureemeranba, katѳ maya cabra— ureezheelѳ tsureelanba rayas tѳgarmeranba, ñi tarѳmarѳmarѳb inrlig cha, Nai pagarbe truilѳ kѳnrrun cha.

Kaguendѳ na yu marѳb meganrrab arrumѳwatѳbe ñibe trengatig nѳrrѳ tѳga kѳmuig kѳbig, mѳimbe yeeg nѳrrѳ nemisran cha, na yu puikkurri Jehѳvábe ñune mayanguen tabiitѳ nebuig kѳnrrai maran cha. ¿Inchendѳ nai ureemeraimbe nabe mana marѳb pѳlbasramѳ?— cha.
Incha treekkurri trunune Jѳsé munchi basrabe, trenchibig kѳn: “Jehѳvá nan katѳgan nusrkai trannrra chimubraita” cha.
Incha nѳbe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, tru srѳsrѳ nusrkawan tѳgamisrabe trenchibig kѳn: “Na chi urekkaig tsalѳbala indinab unig kѳbigwan trunun mѳimbe kerratan” cha.
Incha Leabe k'atѳ kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, Jacѳbwei k'atѳgan nusrk'ai tѳgaguig kѳn, truibe tru trattrѳ y k'anba kѳnrrabyu nusrk'awan.
Incha katѳ Leabe trenchibig kѳn: “Nane larrѳ kasrag kѳtan cha. Ishumburmerabe: ¡kan yangucha tabgui unamigwan tѳgaguita!” chinrrautan cha. Treekkurri tru unane Aser munchi pasrig kѳn.
Tru Bilha Raquel karui mѳrѳb megabiibe, katѳ kwanrliig kѳrrѳmisra, Jacѳbwei katѳgan nusrkai tѳgamislig kѳn.

Incha Leabe katѳ kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳ kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: “Mѳi iyube Jehѳváwan mayanguen t'abig wamindamѳnrrun” cha. Inchagurri truigwane Judá munchi pasrѳbig kѳn. Incha trugurrimbe yandѳ kan maya yana kѳsrѳn mas ureg chigaa guig kѳn.

Incha katѳle kwanrliig kѳrrѳmisra, katѳ kan mѳg unѳ tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchabe trenchibig kѳn: “Jehѳvábe mѳlin kѳn cha, nan ѳyeeg undaaramuinab megaigwan. Inchagurli i nusrkawangucha nan trandan” cha. Treekkurli truigwane Simeón munchi paslig kѳn.
Jehѳvábe Leane Jacѳbpe ke balabinѳ indi ashabe, truigwane ureg tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳbig kѳn. Trune Raquelbe urekkaig kѳnrrabig kѳbig kѳn.

Leaba tru kasharabyu t'abig mab kasrag waramigwan trune neigwan patsѳgѳ chibig kѳn Labanbe. Trugurrimbe Raquelwangucha tranrrumѳn cha, trattrѳ y pa pila ñi nayasig katѳle srѳig marѳb meganrrab kѳbene.—

Indiibe lѳtsѳbe, Jacѳppe Leaba kib tsuptinchibrain kui ashibig kѳn. Incha Jacѳbpe Labanwane trenchibig kѳn: —¿ѳyeebe nane ñibe chi margu? cha. ¿Yamba Raquelwan tranamwei nabe ñuyasig marѳb megaig kѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Nane chindimbarre ѳyeeg isa kebenѳsrkugu?— cha.
Yandѳ Jacѳbpe pilamera trattrѳ y par nemisrene, Labanwane trenchibig kѳn: —Maya yana mara tranѳb meganrrain taigwan yandѳ nemaran cha. Mѳimbe nai srai kѳnrrai trannrra— cha..
Inchene Labanbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Asiimíigwan tranѳbgunrriibe ñi yauigwan tranrrumѳn cha. Trube, naba kѳrrѳmisr— cha.
Inchen tru ubisha sѳtѳmera truyu mayamba tuluntsunѳbene, ubishameran pi mutsѳsrѳnrrab tru srugwan malsra, katѳ chab muchene, srugwan katѳle kemalsra pisuwan kasrѳbelѳ kѳn..
Jacѳbpe nѳ chu yamsrѳmay ib ya, pѳrr kal-labgatѳmaywan misaamerain pirausrѳ pubig kѳn..
Incha Jacѳbpe nuinetѳ ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn: “Tius naba lincha pasrab, na mѳi ѳyeeg inrrab yaigu nan chigucha kѳmѳnrrai ashib, nan mamig, mutsamig tranѳb, pula pasramig tranѳb,
Incha truyube Betel cha wamabig kѳn, merrabsrѳmbe tru ciudawane Luz cha wamig kѳbig kuindѳgucha.
Inchen Jacѳbpe Beersebagurri webya, Haran pirausrѳmay ibig kѳn.k
Kurra, Padan-Aram pirausrѳmay inrrѳ cha, tru Betuel ñui usrai mѳskai waisrѳmay. Incha ñui kuchimѳskai Labanwei kan nimbasrwan ñui srain kѳnrrai lanrrig cha.
Inchawei nai nusrkai na maig taigwan mѳra mar cha. Nai nuchag Laban Haran pirau tsuisrѳmay trubab inrrѳ chibig kѳn.

Inchen Esaúbe mѳskawan trenchibig kѳn: —Nai mѳskai, tru mayanguen t'abig nebuig kѳmigwan tranamiibe kabe ke kanzhiitѳ kuig kuit'arru cha. Nai mѳskai, nangucha tru t'abig nebuig kѳmigwan trannrra— cha. Incha srawa, srawaa kishibig kѳn.

Inchene Esaube trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Nune Jacѳb cha wamappe, trendambuawei trendaig kuin kѳn cha. Pamayguen kѳn cha, nan ѳyeeg isa kebenѳsrkѳb arlig, srѳtѳbe na mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ na uta tѳgagѳmigwan nѳ kerraig kѳn cha. Mѳimbe tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmig naiwan katѳ nѳtѳwei uta tѳga yain kѳn— cha. Inchabe katѳ trenchibig kѳn: —¿Nayasikkan tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan tranamig maitѳguen tѳgagѳmѳtirru?— cha.

Inchen Esaúbe mѳskai trendaig wamwan mѳrabe, truba mur wamab trashib, purѳ kѳrrѳ isui inchib ¡karren kѳnrrab! chib kishibig kѳn, trenchib: —Nai mѳskai, tiusmanda nangucha tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan trannrra— cha.
Inchene Isaac mѳskaimbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —¿Trube, ñibe mugugu?— cha. Inchen nѳbe: —Nabe tru Esaú ñui mayur nusrkain kur— chiben,m
Inchen Isaac tru mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳmigwan Jacѳbwan chab tranen, Jacѳbpe mѳskaweinukkurri webiben latatѳ, nuneg Esaúbe wambigwansrѳ usha kemѳrѳb uña puptinchibig kѳn..
Tiusbe tru ellmariilѳyu srѳmbalasrѳngurri serenu peñibzhigwan tranrrun cha. Inchen pirѳbe misramburab misren, tirigumera misrѳb, vinѳmeragucha nѳrrѳ weguchib inchun cha.m
Inchen Jacѳbpe mѳskaweimbulu puabe, trenchibig kѳn: —¡Nai Papá!— cha. Inchene Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe yu war cha, nai nusrkai. ¿Ñibe mѳ nusrkain kugu?— cha.
Incha trugurlimbe tru uslimbe Jacѳbwane tasiguba, katѳ nukaburab chi isikkayube tru cabrѳ ureezhelai kalusmeratѳga pinѳbula,
Incha trugurrimbe usrimbe mayur nusrkai Esaú kewa uniilѳ purѳ t'abig yau purrabelan Jacѳb wendѳ nusrkawan kenanѳbig kѳn.
Inchene usrimbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Nai nusrkai, ñun trѳmbѳig nebunrrabiibe nan nebunrrain cha. Na maig taigwan mѳrѳptѳ mѳra, srua amѳ— chibig kѳn.
Trugurrimbe, na maig chullig kuaasha, kan mamig larrѳ mayzhig tamara, srua attra chibig kѳn, na manrrur cha. Trugurrimbe na kwamѳwatѳ mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai ñuyasig na Tiuswan mianrrab— cha.k
Pѳs, ñibe tru ñui usha kemѳrѳb srua uniilan: tru ñui arcѳnba ñui flechaswanba nemѳra srua, wambigwansrѳ kan usha ѳrtrab inrrѳ chibig kѳn.
Inchen tru kwalѳmdѳwei Isaacwei mendig melabelѳbe tru nѳm pi wesranrrab lallib kuigwan: —¡Nambe pi wetѳrrer!— chib eshkab amrruptinchibelѳ kѳn..
Inchen Isaacbe truilayasig truba truba tab mamiimera tamaren, nѳmbe mab, muchib inchibelѳ kѳn.

Inchen Esaube: —Pѳs, nane parѳgwabiitѳ ke kwamdѳ kѳtan cha. ¿Na mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguatѳbe chigui indamѳtah?— chiben,33 Jacѳbpe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: —Mѳin kwalѳm ¡katѳ! treegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun chirra— cha. Inchen nѳbe: —¡Katѳ! treegwan maramѳnrrun— cha kѳrrѳmisra, nѳ mayur nusrkain kuimburѳ uta tѳgaguigwan Jacѳbpa yunѳmariyabelѳ kѳn..
Indiibe kan kwalѳm Jacѳbpe pigѳ mamig may tamariizhig nenѳb wabene, Esaube wabigwansrѳ llirab uña, larrѳ muraaraig puabe,

Inchen ureemerabe nѳrrѳrab amba, Esaube ushameran pasraara kemѳramiibe ke kan kaisab lat'aig inchibig kѳbig kѳn, kaambumerawansrѳ unamig chull mѳg kua. Trune Jacѳbpe treeg maramigwane chi isumѳ ka nuimburab uñibig kѳn, carpa yau kѳrrѳmisra chigѳben maramigwan chullig.

Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui batsaube misaamera purѳ nѳrrѳbatѳ ba sѳtѳ kѳn cha. Misagwan ashib karub pѳnrrѳnrrabelѳ bailѳ nѳrreelѳ ñui batsau purraisrѳngurri nѳѳrѳmisrѳbguen purran cha. Kane katѳgan lataguen kѳmѳ, mu chindamgaig kѳnrrabig kѳn cha. Inchen mayur kal-labiibe wendiig nѳ karuig meganrrabig kѳn— cha.
Iig kѳn tru Isaacweimburab chi pureb arrigwan wamindig, tru Abrahamwei nusrkawan.
Inchen Ismaelwei ѳsig kuin pilamerabe cientѳ treinta y siete kuig kѳn. Inchen nui israbig luchen, yandѳ kwaig kѳn. Incha nui kѳlli misaameraba tsunrrab yaig kѳn..
Abrahamwei nusrkai Ismaelweinukkurli amrrub misaamerabe iilѳ kѳn, tru Sarai karuindiig megab ishug egipcia tru Agar Abrahamba tѳgagui unai.
Inchen nui linchatѳ ishumburmeraba tѳgagui ureemerane chigѳben ketiilѳ trana, incha nѳ ѳsig wappatѳ nusrkai Isaacweinukkurli tarѳmara, truilane pѳrr neeshibgatѳmay pirѳmerasrѳ warѳnrrai ѳlig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳcsanbe Sebanba, Dedánwanba tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchen tru Dedánweinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe: asureѳsmera kѳben, letuseѳsmera kѳben, leѳmeusmera kѳben kuig kѳn.
Inchen Isaacbe tru “ѳsig Wab, katѳ Nan Ashibig” cha wamim pisuyugurri katѳ arrin kѳbig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe Néguev pirau tsubig kua.k

Incha Rebecane mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai nѳmbe ѳyeeg chibelѳ kѳn: —Ñi, namui nuchag, misaamera purѳ nѳrrѳ katѳyug katѳyug amrrubelai usrin kѳnrrai isuer cha. Tru ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerabe nѳmun ashig kѳmuinchibelai ciudameran nѳm merrarrawa tѳga pѳnrramisrtrun— cha..
Incha tabzheelѳ ѳrѳtѳga mariilѳ kѳben, andѳga mariilѳ kѳben, kemelѳ kѳben, wesrawa Rebecan ketѳbig kѳn, Incha nuchawanba usranba truilangucha, chigѳben ketѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Labánba, Betuelbabe trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Pѳs, ѳyeebe chiguen kѳmѳtѳ, Jehѳváweinukkurri arriinrrun cha. Nambe sѳl kѳn cha lѳtamig kѳmѳwei, kabe kalѳ kѳn cha lѳtamig kѳmѳwein kѳtan cha.n

Incha nabe Jehѳváwan tabig waminchab tѳmbѳnsrѳbig kur. Jehѳváwan mayanguen, tabig kѳn chib, nan karub tѳga pasrabig Abrahamwei Tiuswan, nan tru muba arrum maywan pera arrimburѳ, tru nѳ nan karub peragѳbig Abrahamwei nusrkawan nui trag yau misagwan srain kѳnrrai tranen.m
Inchen nѳbe tru urastѳ kѳtsѳn pinѳsrub, nan “muchi” cha srѳrrѳb, “katѳ ñui camellѳsmerangucha pi mutsѳsrѳnrrur” chiptinchibig kѳn cha. Na muchib pasramne nѳbe camellѳsmeran pi mutsѳsrѳbig kѳn cha..

nan ѳyah cha lѳtabig truig kѳnrrain cha: nan ‘muchi’ cha srѳrrѳb, ‘katѳ ñui camellѳsmeraingucha pi wesrunrrur’ chibig, truig kѳnrrain cha, tru nan karub peragѳbigwei nusrkawei srain kѳnrrai Jehѳvá lawa wesruig ishug unѳ.””
Inchen na mѳi pisuyu puabe, nabe Jehѳváwan ѳyah chib miaig kѳn cha: “Nan karub pera tѳgagѳbig Abrahamwei ñi Tius, ñi na arrigwan nan tab webyamig kѳnrrain kuabe trube,

Inchen nѳbe nane trenchibig kѳn cha: “Jehѳva maig chiben nabe trumay uninabig kѳben, truig ñune nui ángelwan ñiba inrrai ѳrtrun cha, ñi webya yaibe mayanguen tab punrrai, tru nai yau misaamerai yau ishug-unan nai nusrkawei srain kѳnrai lanrrai, tru nai mѳskawei yauelainug..

Nane nan karub peragѳbiibe, ¡katѳ! nane ѳyeegwan marmѳ kѳmѳ, maramѳnrrun tingaru tan cha, ѳyah chib: “Nai nusrkaweimbe yu Canaán pirau tru na tsuinug ishumburmerai utu ishuwan srai lanrrain kѳmѳn” cha.

Nan karub peragѳbig Abrahamwane Jehѳvábe mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai marig kѳn cha. Nѳbe larrѳ pua mѳg kѳn cha. Nune ubishamera kѳben, waaramera kѳben, an kѳben, ѳrѳ kѳben, karuindiig melab mѳguelѳ kѳben, ishumburmera kѳben, camellѳsmera kѳben, burrusmera kѳben tranig, treeg tѳgagѳn cha..

Incha manrrai mamiimera pѳnsrѳben, Abrahamwei mendig megabiibe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe na chi wamindamigwan wammѳrѳsrѳmѳwatѳbe uta manrrab kaimamѳnrrun— cha. Inchen Labanbe: —Trube, wammѳrѳsrѳrra— chibene
Incha katѳ trenchibig kѳn: —Namui yaube ñim kѳrrѳmisra kiamiitѳ kѳmѳ, katѳ camellѳsmerai pu kѳben, para kebusriilѳ menrraguen tѳgaguer cha, katѳ ñimuyasig chigucha.——
—¿Ñibe mui nimbasr kugu? cha. Tiusmanda eshkarra cha. Katѳ ¿ñui mѳskawei yaube naba, nan lincha amrrub mѳguelѳba chu kѳrrѳmisramdiig kѳ chinderah?— cha.
Incha mallazhiitѳ tru kѳtsѳyu piwan tru pi kwarainug kwara treetѳ, treetѳ yambiji pi wesrawa, mam camellѳs kuimba mutsamne kwarѳbig kѳn..
tru Abrahamwei karuig mendig megabiibe truigweimay lulabe, trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui kѳtsѳyu piwan kuchi srѳrrѳbsrumuguh— cha.
Inchen tru Efrón hititabe nui misag utu wawabe, truilѳ mѳrѳb, katѳ tru nui ciudayu yaskabwan mayeelѳ kebambubelѳ mѳrѳb inchai Abrahamwane trenchibig kѳn:n
—Nai kwabigwan na yu sѳrѳnrrai ñimun tabig asѳnabene, Zѳharwei nusrkai Efrónwan tiusmanda naimburѳ wamincha kettray cha
Incha Tius tru chu t'aisrѳ puabe, Abrahambe kan alt'ar kusrua, tru pala trarwan t'amara wara, nui nusrkawan lusra, tru pala trarrѳbig kѳn.

Inchabe Isaacbe nui mѳskai Abrahamwane: —Papá— chiben, mѳskaimbe: —Nai nusrkai ¿chi chinrrab inchigu?— chiben, Isaacbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nambe nagwanba, trarwanbabe tѳgaguer cha. Inchendѳ tru kweecha ket'a tranam ubisha unѳbe ¿chu pasrah?— cha.
Inchabe tru nui karub pera kuilane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñimbe yutѳ burrun srua muniiranrligay cha. Nabe unѳbatѳ trusrѳngatig amba, Tiuswan tabig waminchib kua, katѳle ñimuimay amrrumѳnrrun— cha.

Incha treekkurri trusrѳmbe Beerseba cha wamig kѳn, kaguende tru pa mѳguelѳ truyu ambugurri, igurri ѳyamay kѳnrrab cha wamincha kѳrrѳmisrig kua.32 Incha ѳyamay kѳnrrab cha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn tru Beersebasrѳ. Incha Abimelecba katѳ tru suldaumeran nѳ asha karubig Ficѳlba katѳ filisteѳsmerai pirѳsrѳmay katѳ ambubelѳ kѳn.k
Inchen Abrahambe nui ubisha sѳtѳmerayugurri ishug ubisha-ureezheelѳ trattrѳ y par, nuingui tarѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Tru kwalѳmmerawandѳwei Abimelecba k'atѳ tru nui suldaumeran nѳ asha k'arubig Ficѳlba Abrahamwan trenchibelѳ kѳn: —Ñi chi marѳb arrigutѳgucha Tiusbe ñiba pasran cha.

¿Abrahamwane mugui trenchinrrautah cha, Sara ureg mutsѳsrѳnrrun? chabe. Inchen kѳben, Abraham ya kѳllig kѳben nabe kan nusrkai tranar” chibig kѳn.8 Inchen Isaacbe nurab iben, yandѳ pitsѳ kuchen, tru pitsѳ kuchib kwalѳmbe Abrahambe larrѳ tab mamiimera tamarѳbig kѳn..
¿Abrahamwane mugui trenchinrrautah cha, Sara ureg mutsѳsrѳnrrun? chabe. Inchen kѳben, Abraham ya kѳllig kѳben nabe kan nusrkai tranar” chibig kѳn.
Incha Abrahambe tru nui nusrkai Isaacwan trattrѳ y pѳn kwalѳmyu circuncidaig kѳn, Tius maig karuig kѳben, treekke.
Inchen tru Sara tѳgaguig unѳ tru mѳg-unѳ kal-labigwane Abrahambe Isaac munchi paslig kѳn.
Kaguende Jehѳvábe Abrahamwei srai tru Saran ѳyeeg puraiben Abimelecwei yauelane ureg chigaanrrai mayeelai matrizwan k'asraig kua.

Incha Sarane trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe ñui nuchawane tsantsѳn anmera mil tranar cha, tru anbe ѳyeeg purayaigwan truburѳ trani an kѳn cha, truibe ñi chi kalѳ marmíig kuin kui ashchai maya misagwei malau kenamarig kѳnrrain cha. Trumaybe ñune mugucha kaig waminchippe kѳnrraamѳn— cha.
Inchen Abimelecbe Abrahamwane ubishamera kѳben, waaramera kѳben, katѳ nui karuig mendig melab mѳguelan kѳben, ishumburmeran kѳben tranѳbig kѳn. Incha katѳle nui srai Sarangucha tranѳbig kѳn.n
Inchendѳ chiwei isamѳ chibig kѳn: “nѳbe naimbe nuchagwein kѳn” cha. Nai mѳskaweimbe nѳbe nimbasrwein kѳn cha, usrimbe katѳgan usrin kuindѳgucha. Inchagurri nabe nune nai srain kѳnrrai marig kѳn cha.
kѳli nimbasrbe kan nusrkai tѳgamisra, truigwane Mѳab munchi paslig kѳn. Treekkurli truibe mѳi ya mѳabitasmerai mѳskain kѳn.

Indiibe kan kwalѳm kѳli nimbasrbe tru wendѳ numѳsrawane trenchibig kѳn: —Namui mѳskaimbe yandѳ kѳlliizhig kѳben, yu nam warainuube namba kasharanrrabelѳ muguen mѳguelѳbe kaagѳn cha, yu piraube mutѳgucha trendѳ treeg kasharamig kѳbig kѳbene.32 Namui mѳskawan vinѳ mutsѳsra mutsiirana, nѳba kigun cha, trumay namui mѳskaweinukkurri amrrub misaamera tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrain— cha.
Incha tru ciudameranba, katѳ truyu warab misaameranba, tru chaameranba, katѳ tru pirau chi kal-lawa pѳnrrabelanbañau chishtѳh pinisaig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Lѳtbe ke peguen inchimuben, tru pagatѳ mѳguelѳbe nunba, nui srawanba, nui pagatѳ nimbasrmeranba tasku kemѳra, nѳmune ciudayugurli wambiisrѳ wesrubelѳ kѳn, Jehѳváwei lastima asiitѳga.

Inchen Lѳtbe tru nui yernѳ kѳnrrabelѳba waminchab webibig kѳn, tru nui nimbasrmeran kasharanrrab misrarmera kѳbelѳba. Incha trenchibig kѳn: —¡Mallatѳ webambay! cha, kaguen Jehѳvábe i ciudawan pinishinrrab kѳn— cha. Trune nui yernѳ kѳnrrabelѳbe ka intsab trendaitamaptѳh isubelѳ kѳn..
Incha tru mѳguelѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳbe Lѳtwan trenchibelѳ kѳn:—¿Ñigan ñui yauelѳ mas tѳgagѳtirru? cha. Ñui yernѳmeran kѳben, ñui nusrkalan kѳben, ñui nimbasrmeran kѳben, yugurri wesru chibig kѳn..
Inchen tru pailѳ mѳguelѳbe yaambugurri taska kemѳrѳppa Lѳtwane yaambumay kesrub, trugurrimbe yaskabwan kasrѳptinchibelѳ kѳn.

Nabe pagatѳ nimbasrmera tѳgaig kur cha, managuen kan mu mѳѳba kimeelѳ. Nabe truilane wertrur chibig kѳn, ñim truilan maig marѳg kѳben martrigay cha. I mѳguelane chigucha treebe marmѳrrunrrigay chibig kѳn. Kaguende truilѳbe nai yaambu mugѳben kaig martrab inchib kѳnrrain kѳmѳtѳ, na ashib tѳgaguilѳ purran— cha.

Incha katѳle Abrahambe trenchibig kѳn:—¡Nai Señѳr, nan namѳmѳrrunrrig cha, i piejindѳh na ñun katѳlѳ trenchibashibsrumuguh cha: ¿Inchippa truyu pa trattrѳ wetѳrraimbeh?— cha. Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Tru pa trattrѳn isuptѳ, pinishimumѳnrrun— cha.
Inchen Abrahambe katѳgucha payibig kѳn: —Nai Señѳr, na ѳyeeg chiben namѳmѳrrunrlig cha. ¿Inchippa truyu treinta wetѳrrabeneh?— cha. —Tru treinteelan isua, kagѳbasamѳnrrun— chibig kѳn Jehѳvábe.

Inchen cuarenta y cincѳtѳ kѳbene, trube cincuenta kѳmuikkurrindѳ ciudawan kerrigu pinishinrrapteh?— cha. Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: —Pinishimumѳnrrun cha, truyu na cuarenta y cincѳ sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ wetѳrrappe.—n
Incha tru mѳguelѳbe kurra, Sѳdѳmaguebsrѳ ashabe yandѳ truguebsrѳ ambub mendѳben, Abrahambe ungua chinrrab nѳmba lincha ibig kѳn.
Inchawei tru kwalѳmdѳ Abraham kѳben, nui nusrk'ai Ismael kѳben,
Inchendѳ na tru ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmarigwane Isaacba kѳnrrai mara pasramѳnrrun cha, tru Sara katѳ pila ѳyan kwalѳmmerawan tru tѳgagѳnrrab kui unѳyu.—n

Inchene Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: —Isa kѳmѳ, Sara ñui sraimbe kan nusrkai tѳgagѳnrrab kѳn cha, truigwane Isaac munchi pasrtlig cha. Nabe tru ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmaligwan Isaacweinukkucha katѳle treetѳwei malig kѳrrѳmisrtrai indamѳnrrun cha. Inchawei na treeg maligwane wendѳ nuinukkurli amrrub misaameraba managatig tѳga pasramѳnrrun chibig kѳn.

Inchen Abrahambe nui malѳwan pirau kebat'amne utsѳbasrabe, nui manrrѳ umbutѳ intsab trenchibig kѳn: “¿Kan mѳg pilamera cien tѳgaig kua, unѳ tѳga kѳnrraut'ah? cha. ¿Katѳ Saragucha pilamera nѳvent'a tѳgaig kua, unѳ tѳgagѳmdѳ kѳnrraut'ah?” cha.
Ñibe mas Abram munchi kѳmѳtѳ, ñibe Abraham cha wamig kѳnrrun cha. Kaguende nabe ñune tru purѳ nѳrrѳ chi misag sѳtѳmeraindѳgucha ñibe nѳmui mѳskain kѳnrrai pasrar cha.
Nabe ñiba ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha kѳrrѳmarѳb, katѳ ñui misaamera larrѳ nѳrrѳ larrѳbitchai marѳb indamѳnrrun— cha.
Incha Agarbe Jehѳvába wamindig kѳppe, nѳbe nune trencha wamabig kѳn: —Ñibe tru nan ashib wab Tius kѳn— cha. Kaguen Agarbe trenchibig kѳn: “ѳsig Wab, katѳ Nan Ashibigwan nabe ashar” cha.
Incha katѳ ángelbe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameran purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha, purѳ nѳrrѳ kѳptѳ mundamguengaikke.—

Inchabe payibig kѳn: —Agar, Saraiwei ka karuindiig megabig, ¿Chugurri arrugu? cha. ¿Chumay inrrab inchigu?— cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nan karub pera kѳbig Saraiwan nabe trubab welula arrur— cha.

Inchen Abrambe Saraiwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñui ka karuindiig megabiibe ñuin tasku kѳn cha. Ñun maig marѳg kѳben, treeg mar— chibig kѳn. Inchen Saraibe kaig inchib mendѳben, Agarbe welula yam nebuig kѳn.
Inchen Abrambe tru Agarba kib waramisren, tru ishuube kwanrriig misra, yandѳ unѳ tѳgamisrarmab isua, nun karub pera kѳbig Saraiwane namig ashib kebibig kѳn..

Saraibe Abramwane trenchibig kѳn: —Nane Jehѳvábe ureg chigaig kѳnrrai treeg martan cha. Inchendѳ tiusmanda tru namui k'aruindiig megabig tru Agarwan pera, ki chibig kѳn. Inchippa truikkurri na ureg tѳgaguinabgun— cha. Inchen Abrambe Sarai taigwan mѳrѳbig kѳn.
Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: —Nabe Jehѳvá kur cha, caldeѳsmeraim pirau tru Ur taisrѳngurri wesrabig i Canáan pirѳwan na ñun keta trannrab.—
Inchen tru Abramwei nunewei nusrkai Lѳtgucha sѳdѳmasrѳ tsubig kuig kѳppe, nungucha merrarrawa, tѳga srua ambuptinchibelѳ kѳn, nui chi tѳgamisligwanbañaungue.

Incha truilѳbe kwayabrren kѳbig kѳn, Sѳdѳmasrѳ rey Beraba kѳben, Gѳmѳrrasrѳ rey Birsaba kѳben, Admasrѳ rey Sinabpa kѳben, Zebѳimsrѳ rey Semeberba kѳben, katѳ tru Belasrѳ reyba kѳbengue, truibe Zѳargucha taig.
Inchen tru Sѳdѳma warab misaamerabe larrѳ kailѳ kua, larrѳ trѳmbѳgѳlig marѳbelѳ kѳbig kѳn, Jehѳváwan kalѳ marѳb.
¿Pirѳbe asimburab kerriguba ñui merrab pasrѳmuit'arru? cha. Tiusmanda nainukkurri t'arѳmisrtra cha, ñi atsimay ibene, nabe kursmay yamѳnrrun cha, ñi kusrmay ibene, nabe atsimay inrrur— cha.
Inchawei tiusmanda ñibe naimbe nuchag kur chinrrig cha, ñigurri nan chigucha kѳmѳ, tab kѳnrraimba, katѳ nan kweechimѳnrraimba.——

Inchen Jehѳvábe Abramwan kenamisrabe trenchibig kѳn: —Ñuinukkurri amrrub misaameran nabe truilan i pirѳwan trananmѳnrrun— cha. Inchen Abrambe kan alt'ar kusrabig kѳn tru Jehѳvá nun kenamisrѳbigweyasig.

Incha Abrambe nui srai Saraiwan kѳben, nui nunewei nusrkai Lѳtwan kѳben pera ibig kѳn, katѳ chigurrimbunѳ nѳ chi tѳgaguilan kѳben, katѳ tru Harán pirau nui karuig mendig melab misaameran kѳbengue. Nѳbe Canaán pirausrѳ truilѳba pubig kѳn.

Nabe ñun mayanguen tabig nebuig kѳnrrai marѳbelane, nѳmungucha mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Ñun trѳmbѳig nebunrrai marѳbelane, nѳmungucha trѳmbѳig nebuilѳ kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha. Incha pirau chi misaamera kѳben pirѳ muba kuimburab warabelѳbe ñuinug mayanguen tabig nebuilѳ kѳnrrai mariilѳ kѳnrrun— chibig kѳn.
Jehѳvábe Abramwane trenchibig kѳn: —Ñuim piraugurrimba, ñui yau misaamerainukkurrimba, trugurri ñui mѳskawei yaugurrimba inrrѳ cha, na ñun eshkam pirausrѳmay..

Inchen tru Tarébe tru nui nusrkai Abramwanba, katѳ Haránwei nusrkai nui awelu Lѳtwanba, nui yerna tru Abramwei srai Saraiwanba, pera webibig kѳn, caldeѳsmerai pirau Ur tainukkurri tru Canaán pirausrѳmay inrrab. Inchendѳ tru Harán taig pirausrѳ puabe, truyu kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ kѳn.
Iilѳ kѳn tru Térajweinukkurri amrrub misaamera: Térajbe Abramwan kѳben, Nacѳrwan kѳben, Haránwan kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn. Inchen Haránbe tru Lѳtwan tѳgaguig kѳn..
Inchen Reube Serugwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ pilamera dѳscientѳs siete ѳsig tsua, nusrk'alѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha Eberbe Pelegwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ pilamera cuatrѳcientѳs treinta tѳgaig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.
Incha Salabe Eberwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ, pilamera cuatrѳcientѳs tres ѳsig tsua, nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.

Iilѳ kuig kѳn, tru Semweinukkurri amrrub misaamera, truilѳbe misag nѳrrѳ sѳtѳmeramѳrig, katѳ mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, yau misaamera trumѳrig nѳmuin kui, nѳmuin kui pirѳmera waramig tѳgartѳ, katѳ nѳmbe trumѳrig nѳmuin trigwan waminchibelѳ.
Inchen Jѳctánbe Almѳdadwan kѳben, Shelefwan kѳben, Hazarmavetwan kѳben, Jeran kѳben

Iilѳ kuig kѳn, tru Camweinukkurri amrrub misaamera, truilѳbe misag nѳrrѳ sѳtѳmeramѳrig, katѳ mu mѳskalѳ kѳben, yau misaamera trumѳrig nѳmuin kui, nѳmuin kui pirѳmera waramig tѳgartѳ, katѳ nѳmbe trumѳrig nѳmuin trigwane waminchibelѳgue.m
Inchen Mizraimweinukkurrimbe ludeѳs misaamera kѳben, anameѳs kѳben, lehabitasmera kѳben, naftuhitasmera kѳben,k
Inchen nѳ karub tѳgagui ciudamera mas nѳrreelѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Babel kѳben, Erec kѳben, Acad kѳben, Calne kѳbengue, tru Sinar pirau.
Inchen Cusbe Nimrѳdwei mѳskain kuig kѳn. Tru Nimrѳdbe pirau mugucha chinchaingaig ke nѳ karub pѳlbasrig kѳn, yu pirau ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ.
Inchen tru Gѳmerwei nusrkalѳbe iilѳ kѳn: Askenaz kѳben, Rifat kѳben, Tѳgarma kѳbengue.
Génesis 101 Iilѳbe tru Nѳéwei nusrk'alѳ Semweimba, Camweimba, Jafetweimba truilѳ nѳm tѳgagui nusrk'alѳ kѳn, tru pirau pimera pulabig arrua puraiben tѳgaguilѳ.
Inchen Jafetwane purѳ nuig kѳnrrai Tius kusrua paslig kѳnrrain cha. Incha Jafetbe Semwei carpa yamerayu tsubig kѳnrrain cha. Inchen Canaánbe Jafet manchiben, ka karuindiig megabig kѳbash” cha.
Incha Nѳébe tru mutsiguig kib tsua kiagasra, tru mas unѳ nusrkai treeg indigwan wammѳrabe,
tru Canaánwei mѳskai Cambe, mѳskai kѳsaatiig tsui ashabe, nui pa nunelan wambiisrѳ eshkanrrab webyain kѳbig kѳn.
Nѳéwei nusrk'alѳ arcayugurri webambubelѳbe Semba, Camba, Jafetba kѳn. Inchen Cambe Canaánwei mѳsk'ain kuig kѳn.
Inchen nabe ñimba katѳ chigurrimbunѳ ѳsig kѳbelѳba tru na ѳyamay kѳnrrai martrab cha pasrigwan isumѳnrrun cha. Chigѳben ѳsig kѳbelan pinishinrrabig pi pulab arrubiibe katѳlebe kaanrrun cha.

Pirѳbe ka basraingatiibe ellmariilѳ kѳb, ellmariilan tulisamelѳ kѳb, chu urastѳgucha bachig kѳbig kѳb, pishin kѳbig kѳb inchun cha. Chu urastѳgucha sre pѳlmera kѳb, kwarѳ pѳlmera kѳb, katѳ yemmera kѳb, kwalѳmmera kѳb inchun” cha, trenchibig kѳn.

Incha trugurrimbe Nѳébe Jehѳváweyasig kan altar mara, tabig chish ushameran mѳigwanguen palab kѳmѳ, kerriguba, katѳ chish illimeran mѳigwanguen palab kѳmѳ, kerriguba, altarbala chishtѳ parrѳb Jehѳváwan keta tranѳbig kѳn..

Nѳé ѳsig tsuin pilamerabe seiscientѳsba kan pilaba kѳben, tru srѳsrѳ pѳlyu ke pѳlbasrѳb kwalѳmyuh pimerabe pirau chishtѳ chab kѳlabig kѳn. Inchen Nѳébe tru arcayu pala kasraigwan kusrua ashene, mѳimbe pirѳbe yandѳ pur kѳptinchibig kѳn.
Indig tru palѳmabe maaben misrѳb kѳben arruppe, k'an ѳlivѳ ishiizhig kimtsigu mutaig arruptinchen, Nѳébe pimera pirau yandѳ chab kѳlin kui wetѳbeñibig kѳn.
k'an yalѳ illiwan ѳren, truibe yaitѳ, arriitѳ inchib uñibig kѳn pimera pirau kѳlamnegatig.
Inchen pimerabe pirau lamѳh, lamѳ kѳrreb ib mendѳben, kwalѳmmera cientѳ cincuenta puraiben pimerabe chab lamѳrabig kѳn.m

ѳyamay chimeratѳgucha pirau ѳsiguig warabelѳbe chab pinisailѳ kuig kѳn. Misag lata, ushamera lata, batsѳtѳga srala ambubelѳ lata, katѳ bala amѳñib illimera lata pinisaig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn. ѳsig kѳrrѳmisrѳppe, Nѳébah tru arcayu tru nѳba kebambubelѳtѳwei ѳsig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.
Inchen chigurrimbunѳ pirau ѳsig warabelѳbe kerriguh chab kwabig kѳn, illimera lat'a, ushamera kusreeg ushamera lat'a, namig ushamera patsѳtѳga srala ambubelѳ lat'a, trugurri maya misaamera lat'a.
Inchen pimerabe pirau nurabig nurab arruben, arcabe pi palawan uñibig kѳn.n
ѳyeeg kebambig kѳn arcayu Nѳéba, chigurrimbunѳ ѳsig kѳbelѳbe parbatѳ, parbatѳgue.
Nѳéba arcayu kebambubelѳ kѳn, parbatѳ, parbatѳ, mѳѳba ishuuba, mѳѳba ishuuba, Nѳéwan Tius mandѳ karuig, treekke.
Inchen chi ushameratѳgucha tabig chishelѳ lata, chishig kѳmeelѳ lata, pala amѳñib illimera lata, k'atѳ pirau srala amѳñibelѳ lata
Inchen piraube larrѳ trѳmbѳig minchib, katѳ melambuyab kalѳ marig truitѳ netsain pasrabig kѳn Tiuswei merrab..

Incha Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: “Misagwan mara pѳnsrailan chigucha kaanrrai patsѳgѳnrrab cha, misagwan lata, ushameran lata, srala amѳñibelan lata, pala amѳñib illimeran lata. Karrenguitamab isur cha, ѳsig kѳnrrai na mariilan.””
Inchen Jehѳvábe ashibig kѳn pirau misaamera larrѳ trѳmbѳig marѳb amrruibe chi lamѳtiig kѳmѳ, purѳ nuig kui, nѳmui manrraube chu uragucha kerrigu chi isuilѳbe kaigwandѳ, kaigwandѳ isubelѳ kuikkurri..

Inchene Jehѳvábe trenchibig kѳn: “Nai Espiritube misag ѳsig kѳnrrai nuinuube managatikkucha pasrѳnrraamѳn cha, kaguende mѳѳbe patsѳnrrabig ka treetѳ kѳn cha. Inchawei nѳbe ѳsig tsumibe pilamera cientѳ veintebe tѳgagѳnrrun” cha..
Génesis 66
Lamecbe pilamera cientѳ ѳchenta y dѳs ѳsig tsua, kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn..
Enѳcbe Tiusba maig unamigwan unig kѳn. Incha chindinguen asiimíig pinaptindig kuig kѳn, k'aguende Tius nune ѳsiibatѳ pera iben.
Matusalénwan tѳgaguinukkurrimbunѳ Enѳcbe Tiusba maig unamig kѳben, treeg uñibig kuig kѳn, pilamera trescientѳs tѳgaig. Incha nusrkalѳ kѳben, nimbasrmera kѳben tѳgaguig kѳn.k
Cainánbe pilamera setenta tѳgaig kua, nusrkai Mahalaleelwan tѳgaguig kѳn..
Adanbe pilamera cientѳ treinta tѳgagua kan nusrkai tѳgaguig kѳn chiyutѳgucha nѳ lataitѳwei, treeg unѳ. Incha truigwane Set munchi basrig kѳn.
Iig kѳn tru Adánweinukkurri amrrub misaameran munchin merrarrailѳ, Tius mѳwan nѳ mara pasrѳb kwalѳmbe, mѳwane Tius lataitѳwein kѳnrrai marig kѳn.

Adánbe nui sraimba unѳ tѳgagѳnrrab pailѳba waramisrѳbelѳ kѳn.Incha Evabe kan nusrkai tѳgagua, trunune Set munchi pasrig kѳn. “Tiusbe nane katѳgan nusrkai trandan cha, Cain Abelwan kweetsig kѳbene truburѳ tѳgagѳnrrai.”

Kan piji Lamecbe nui sralan trenchibig kѳn: —Adaba, Zilaba, nai wamwan mѳrtray cha. Lamecwei sralѳ, nai wamwan t'ab mѳrtray cha. Nan kѳrriinchen, nabe kan mѳwan kweechib, nan mur kebachen, nabe kan matsinan kweechar cha.
Jabalbe kan nuneg Jubal taig tѳgaig kѳben, tru merrabsrѳ kѳlli misag Jubalweinukkurri pѳlbasra amrrub mendig kuig kѳn, mayeelѳ arpa kѳnabelѳba, lus urrabelѳba.k
Incha Lamecbe nuyasig pagatѳ ishumburmera tѳgaguig kѳn. Kan ishuwei munchibe Ada kѳbene, katѳgan ishuwei munchibe Zila kѳbig kѳn.

Cainbe nui sraimba unѳ tѳgagѳnrrab bailѳba waramisrѳbelѳ kѳn. Inchen sraimbe kwanrriig kѳrrѳmisra, unѳ tѳgamisrig kѳn, tru Enѳcwan. Incha Cainbe kan ciuda mara basrabe, truigwane tru nui nusrkai Enѳcwei munchin basrѳbig kѳn.
Pirѳwan kwallib megaingucha, yandѳ mamig misrmѳnrrabig kѳn cha. Inchen ñibe piraube punѳ panrrѳ, punѳ panrrѳ k'a lliraitѳ, lliraitѳ chuguen tsub tsumibe chigaig kѳnrrabguen— cha.
Trune Cainwane tab kui ashmuig kѳn, tru nѳ keta tranigwan chigucha. Inchen Cainbe truba trѳmbѳig namuben, nui malѳbe ke minchiptinchibig kѳn.
Inchen kan maya yana kѳsrѳn puraiben, Cainbe Jehѳváwan ketamig nui kwaliilѳyugurli srua arrubig kѳn.
Incha Jehѳvábe tru Edén tulyugurli nѳmun webusrѳbig kѳn. Incha pirѳwan kwallchain paslig kѳn, tru nun mara paslin pirѳwan.
Inchen Adánbe nui srawane Eva munchi pasrѳbig kѳn, kaguende Evabe maya misagwei usrin kѳnrrabig kuimba.
Inchen pirѳbe tsѳshambah, kaldusrmerabatѳ misren, mappe, kau umbu tusrmerandѳ manrrigay cha.
Inchene Jehѳvá Tiusbe ishuwane trenchibig kѳn: —¿ѳyeebe chi margu?— cha —Tru ul nan purѳ may wamincha isѳben, nabe mar cha— trenchibig kѳn..
Inchen Jehѳvá Tiusbe mѳwan purѳ mur kingarua, nѳ kib tsumnebe kan tѳmbul tsutsigwan wesrawa, tru tsutsig wesrub kuligwane katѳle treetѳweih kasrѳbig kѳn.

Incha Jehѳvá Tiusbe maya ushameranba, illimeranba pirѳwandѳwei mara pѳnsra, mѳwei merrab pѳnsrѳbig kѳn, chi munchi pѳnsramigwan nѳ asha pѳnsrѳnrrai. Inchen mѳg tru ѳsiguelan treeg munchi pѳnsra wamiilѳbe tru munchin tѳgar kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.m
Inchendѳ tru tabigwanba, kaigwanba nebua asamburab asam tusryu mamigwane manrrab kѳmѳ cha, kaguende tru tusryuigwan ñi mab kwalѳmbe isa kѳmѳ, ñibe kwanrrabguen— cha.
Inchen tru pѳn kѳnrrabyu pibe Tigris t'aig kѳn, Asiria pirau pѳrr neeshibgatѳwansrѳ pureb ibig. Inchen tru pib kѳnrrabyu pibe Eufrates kѳn.
piraube ka nѳtѳ kal-lab tusrmera chigucha kawei, chigucha kaumera kal-laig kawein kѳbig kѳn, kaguende Jehѳvá Tiusbe piraumay srewan pungarumѳ srѳ kѳben. Inchagucha kwallchabig mu mѳg mugawein kѳben.m
Kwalѳmwan lata, yemwan lata pilamburab pilabelѳbe nѳm pѳnrrѳnrrai marig kѳn, tѳrwanba, lѳstiigwanba tarѳmartrabelѳ. Incha Tiusbe tabig kui asig kѳn.m

Incha Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Pirѳbe mislingarubash cha, pilli puzheelѳ chi kaumera kѳppe, treeg yellzheelѳ tѳgar, mamig nigab tusrmera, chi tusr kѳppe, treeg yell truyu tѳgar pirau treeg kѳnrrai. Inchen treeg kuig kѳn.12 Inchen pirѳbe pilli puzheelѳ chi kaumera kѳppe, treeg yellzhig nigar, mamig nigab tusrmera yellzheelѳ truyu nigar misrѳbig kѳn, nѳ chi tusr kѳppe, treekke. Inchen Tiusbe tabig kui asig kѳn.
Katѳ Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Srѳmbalamerai umbu pimera kѳbelѳbe kanbalatѳ misrtrain cha, pur kenamisrtrai.” Inchen treeg kuig kѳn.
Katѳ Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: “Larrѳ lendiig chiguchagaig kѳnrrain cha, tru pimeran nuingui, nuingui tarѳmartrabig tѳbѳtag pasrѳnrrai.”

Nai nunelѳ, Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchiyu maig maramigwan tiusmanda ѳyeeg marѳb melѳrrunrrigay chib waminchab inchar. Peg peg isub gѳmѳtѳ, kandѳ isuy cha, ñimui utu mas nѳѳrѳtѳ inchib t'arѳmisramig kaanrrai. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, newan kanbalatѳ lincha kandѳ isub, maig maramelѳyu kandѳ isub inchigay cha.
ѳyeeg marѳb melamig kѳn chib, chigúingucha ka melѳgun chib, Tius wamabigwei ureesun amѳnay chib, Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳmayba nui tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳmayba ñimun nѳ wamab wan..

Inchen tru srѳsrѳ ángel nui trѳmpet'an urrѳbene, sre srug naaba, animba lindisaig arruben, pirau trunun kѳrrѳbetig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen truѳrѳ pirѳbe muba kuimburab tѳbѳt'ag lut'au pachen, katѳ tusrmera treetѳwei pirѳ muba kuimburab tѳbѳt'ag lut'au pachen, katѳ mayam bumera pillizheelѳ chigucha chishtѳ bachibig kѳn.

Inchen tru ángelbe tru may irrabzhig pusrigwan mut'a, tru alt'aryugurri trѳsr naarrѳsrwan netsѳgana, pirausrѳ pinѳguchene, palaig rrasamba, chi wanrringuen mѳramgaig wanrramba, sre bilamba, pirѳ gѳnamba inchibig kѳn.

Inchen gatѳgan ángel arruabe, tru altar gueta pasramisrѳbig kѳn, truibe may irrabzheelѳ pusramig, ѳrѳtѳga marigwan mutaig. Inchen nune may irrabzheelѳ truba nu rranѳbig kѳn, tru mayeelѳ Tiuswei misaamera Tiusba wamindiilan tru may irrabzhiibamara, tru wamisra karub waigwei merrab tru altar ѳrѳtѳga marig pasrabiibala trannrrai.m

ѳyeelѳ chab puraiben, na ashene, kan yaskab srѳmbalasrѳ kulig pasraptinchibig kѳn. Inchen kan wam trѳmpeta wanrrѳb lataig srѳtѳ tru na mѳliibe nan ѳyah waminchib trenchibig kѳn: Yusrѳ nebamѳ cha, iilai wendau purainrrabigwan na ñun kenamartrumѳn cha.

isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigaig kѳmigwanbabe tindѳgague. Pѳs mѳilѳma nѳmui isub kebachib pasrabigu kalѳ gѳn chib kebati mѳrendѳgucha mѳrmѳwa, tru nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwane kan nubi itѳgasrai lat'aig kѳrrѳmisra, yandѳ trubisan.

Inchawei managurri managatig mayeelaim bala nѳ ashib wabigwan, managatig ѳsig wabigwan, kaptѳgabe asiimíigwan, Tius nѳ kandѳ wabigwan managatig nun purѳ tab indig kѳnrraimba, maya nuguen tabig kѳnrraimba inchar. Treeg kѳnrrun.k

Inchawei i trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn, mayeelѳba chi kashmѳ, ka utamig: Clistѳ Jesúsbe piraumay arruppe, kaig marѳbelan kaigyugurli wesranrrab arlig kѳben, tru truilai utu purab gaibe na gur.

Nabe merrabsrѳmbe nun purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamaptiig, k'atѳ Tiuswei ureemeran k'aig maramigwangѳba lab, larrѳ namiguig maig kѳbash inchiptiig kѳbig kuingucha, nane lastima asig kѳn, k'aguende nabe chigúinguen ashmíig kѳremíig kua, ѳyeeg marig kuikkurri.
Tius mayanguen tabigwei tru tѳrbilabig tabig srѳ wam maig kѳben treetѳwei kusrenanigwan. Truigwane na waminchib tѳga basrѳnrrai Tius nan tranig kѳn.

Inchawei tru maig maramigwan pѳra warѳppe, tru tabig sѳlwan marѳbelain gѳmѳtѳ bѳra warig kui nambe ashibelѳ guer. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru larrѳ gailaimba, mѳrmeelaimba, chigucha Tiuska misaameraimba, kaig marѳbelaimba, kaig maramigwane chi kѳrikkengaig marѳb misaameraimba, Tiusweimburabelane ke ka kaigwan lataig inchibelaimba, usri mѳskalan kweechibelaimba, ka kweecha betaptѳ amѳñibelaimba,

Pѳs tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam ñimuinug pub urasma k'a wamindiitѳ gѳmѳtѳ, maramburab mariitѳgaba, Espíritu Santѳtѳgaba puig kѳbig kѳn. Katѳ tru wamindiibe treeg kѳmѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, nambe treeg kui ashawei wamindig kѳbig kѳn. Ñimuyasiitѳwei tab gѳnrrai, ñimui utu nam amѳnammay amѳnaig kѳbigwan ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn.

Chu uraskucha nambe Tius namui Mѳskawei merrab maikken pesannamѳ isubelѳ guer, tru ñimui isubigwan Jesuclistѳinug pasra tѳgagúikkurli chigѳben maligwanba, tru undag kѳbigwan tѳga bѳnrraikkurli maligwanba, katѳ namui Señѳr Jesuclistѳinug muniiraikkurli maikken elachimѳ, melabig melaigwanba.

Pablѳba, Silasba, Timѳteѳba kanbalatѳ misra, Tesalónicasrѳ iglesian i kilgawan pѳrar, Tius Mѳskaimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelan. Tius nui ka yandѳ tab indiiba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbiiba ñimba pasrѳnrrun..
Na Pablѳ, Tius trendѳ ѳyeeg kѳnrrain gúikkurri Cristѳ Jesús nѳashib karua ѳrig, Tiuswei misaamera, Cristѳ Jesúswan tarѳmisrmѳ pѳnrrabelѳ, Efesѳsrѳ warabelan, truilayasig i kilgawan pѳrar.

Pѳs nane kѳristѳ gѳt'an na ñimuisrѳ puben, na ñimun mailѳ gѳnrrai isua pasraig ñim treelѳ gѳmѳwei, katѳ ñimgurri nan maig kѳnrrai isua pѳnrraig treeg kѳmѳwein gѳptinchen tsaatѳ indinab pѳnrrainabgunmab. Nane kѳristѳ gѳt'an ñimui utu aleguiam lailѳ, mѳikkѳben chi tѳgagѳben pusrkwai asiilѳ, purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kui indiilѳ, nѳѳrѳ katѳgan sѳtѳmisrѳb t'arѳmisrѳb ambiilѳ, katѳganuimburab wam gusrub wamindiilѳ, isa wamincha mѳriilѳ, purѳ nѳrreelѳ misrѳb pѳnrrailѳ, mumaygucha gѳmíig mara pѳnsrailѳ, treeg kѳnrrait'amab.

Nabe Titѳne: Tiusmanda ashchab irrunrrig cha, Cristѳgurri namui gatѳgan nunewanba nun lincha inrrai ѳrig kuig kѳn. ¿Kabe Titѳbe ñimune chi isa gѳben chi wesraig kѳppeendi? ¿Nambe yamba pailѳba treetѳwei k'andѳ isua marѳb, k'atѳ pailѳba yamba tru maywandѳwei pѳnrrammѳrgѳppeh?

Nabe k'an mѳg ashibig kur, Cristѳn kѳrewa pasrabigwan, mѳi ya catѳrce añѳsken gѳn. Truigwane tru pѳn srѳmbalasrѳngatig srua yaig kѳbig kѳn. Nune asrbañau srua yaig kѳh, k'abe asrbañaun gѳmѳ, srua yaig kѳh, chindindѳ, truigwane maig kui mѳrmur. Trunune Tiustѳwei asan.tru mѳwane tru srѳbala tius wei purѳ tabzhiirѳmay srua yaiwane nabe asha kur .

¿Ñimgan ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, ñimui asrmerabe Cristѳi asrutѳwei pѳnrrabelѳ gúi? ¿Inchen nabe Cristѳi asru pѳnrrabelan wesrawa, kan kaig ishug nui asrwan anwei yanѳbigweinug kandѳ misrtrai mara, truyu pѳnsrѳnrraitamaguh? ¡Managuen treebe kѳmѳnrrun!

Mamibe patsauweyasig kѳben, patsѳbe mamigweyasig kѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe mѳnundѳgucha i pabalѳwanba chigaanrrai pinishinrrab gѳn. Asrbe ishumburmeraba, mѳguelѳba trѳmbѳig marѳb tѳgagѳmigweyasig kѳmѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, asrbe Señѳrwein gѳben, Señѳrbe asrweyasig kѳn.

Ñimgucha mѳilѳbe merrappe ѳyeelѳwei inchibelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Inchendѳ mѳimbe yandѳ chishtѳ pillmailѳ, ñimbe Tiusweyasiitѳ tarѳmariilѳ, chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmariilѳ gѳn, Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchiyuba, namui Tiuswei Espíritugurrimba.

¿Tius nѳ ashib karub waigwan tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marmeelѳbe tru ketig utamigwan utѳmѳnrrabelѳ gúi ashmeelѳ gѳ chindah? Ñimguen ñimdѳwei kegѳrrab pѳnrrѳmѳtay: mѳguelѳ lata, ishumburmera lata trѳmbѳig marѳbelѳba, chiwangѳben kan tius kui lataig inchibelѳba, itѳlulѳpteelѳba, mѳkkѳlig kѳbendѳ ishug lataig inchibelѳba, mѳguelѳbe mѳguelѳasiyaitѳ, ishumburmerabe ishumburasiyaitѳ trѳmbѳig marѳbelѳba,

Ñimbe ñimuimburappe chiguen gѳmѳ, yandѳ newan kegѳrra bѳnrran, ñimui ututѳwei ѳyeeg kwayam lab pѳnrraikkurri. ¿Trembe ñimun sѳlwan marmѳ kalѳ marindѳgucha, treegu ka puraambub melamdiig kѳmѳ, chindah? ¿Ñimun isa wamincha nilindѳgucha, trembe ka awentamdiig kѳmѳ, chindah?
Nabe ñimune kѳrig burѳrtrab rrenchar, tru nunelai utu kwayam lailan maig kuigwan baya ashib martrabig chigúi mѳrѳb isum gusrebig ñimui utube, ¡baare! ¿ni kandѳguen mu gaagѳ chindah?

Pѳs nabe ñimun pѳrѳppe, ñimui nuneg kur chib pasrѳbendѳ, menda ishumburba trѳmbѳig marѳptiig, larrѳ pariig, k'atѳ chiwan gѳben k'an tius kui lataig inchibig, k'abe isa waminchib wam gusruptiig, mutsiiraptiig, purѳ may isa nila wesraptiiba, ѳyeelѳba lindamig kѳmѳn cha bѳrar. Treeg inchibiibabe mabguen lincha mamumig kѳn.
Nabe ñimun kilgayu pѳrѳppe, asrtѳga trѳmbѳig marѳb ishumburmeraba, trѳmbѳig marѳb mѳguelѳba linchimѳtay cha bѳrig kѳn.m

Tru kѳlli levadura lataig tѳgagúigwan wegutsay, harina sѳmarig chi levadura larriimíig latawei ñim chishelѳ gѳnrrab, ñimbe yandѳ chabguen treelѳ gúig kѳppe. Kaguende Cristѳn, tru namui Pascua Fiestayu Ubishaunѳ gweetsamig kѳbigwane namuimburѳ kweetsig kѳbig kѳn.
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi munchiyu ñim tulundzunѳben, na maig isubig kuigube ñimba basrѳben, Señѳr Jesúswei maramburab maramig truyu basrѳben,

Mѳimbe Tiuswan maya nuguen tabig waminchigun, Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan na wamindiiba, Jesucristѳimburab na eshkab kusrenaniiba iilѳ maig kѳben treegu mur bѳnrrѳnrrai marѳbigwan. I tru tabig srѳ wambe tru manasrѳngurri mu asiimíig basrabig Tius nѳ maramigwan nuinetѳ tѳgagúigwan tru kenamarig maig kѳben, treeg kѳn.

Gayѳgucha ñimun ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran, tru nan truyu tsumig ya bebѳb, katѳ iglesia mayeelanba pebѳb inchibig. Inchen gatѳ Erastѳ tru ciudayu an asamigwan nѳ ashibiiba, katѳ trugurli namui nuneg Cuartѳgucha ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.

Andrónicѳnba, Juníaswanba, nai misaameran ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay, kailan pѳnsraig yau merrarrawa keeriilѳ naba lincha bѳnrrabelѳ gѳbelan. Truilѳbe Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ nѳmune tabelѳ mumera gúi asiilѳ, katѳ nѳmbe Cristѳn naguen kѳremѳwatѳ, nѳmmerrig kѳrewa pѳnrrabelѳ, treelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs kabe Tiusbe nui tѳrguegwalmabigu chine nѳrrѳ kѳbigwan tru nѳ lastima asiilan kenamartrab indig kѳppeendi, manasrѳwei nѳ tamariilan tru tѳrguegwalmabigweyasig.
¿Chilliitѳga chigѳben marѳbiima tru chilliitѳgatѳwei kan gѳtsѳne tabigutѳ katѳrab srua gѳmig marѳppe, katѳgan gѳtsѳne chiyugѳben katѳrab srua gѳmig nun maig maramdiig kѳben treeg maramig kѳmuitarru?

Pѳs Tiuswei wamwan pѳligube Faraónwanma Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: ѳyeeg martrab ñune rey gѳnrrai kusraig kѳn cha, ñi ѳyeeg inchib pasraigu tru nai maramburab maliilan kenamartrappa, katѳ nai munchiwan pirѳ muba kuimburab nan mu gúi nebua asig kѳnrrai martrappa.
kabe chigѳben tabig maragurrin gѳmѳtѳ, Tius tru lawa wesrua wamikkurrin gѳnrrai. Pѳs Tiusbe Rebecane trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Tru srѳsrѳ gallabiibe wendau gallabigweyasig karuig marѳb meganrrabig kѳn cha.

Pѳs nai misag israelit'asmera, nai nunelѳ nammisamera, nѳm Cristѳn yeeg kaashene, nѳm kaigyugurri webamrrai nane Cristѳinukkurri t'arѳmisra, Tius trѳmbѳig nebunrrai pasrigu naasiitѳweinguen truyu pasrѳnrrab indamdiig kuimbe, treeg maramdiig kѳt'an.

Tru ѳyeeg marѳbelѳbe kwamig kѳnrrai Tius treeg nebunrrai mara pasrigwan nѳmbe ashibelѳ gѳbendѳ, katѳgucha nѳmbe treegwan ka mariitѳ gѳnrrab gúindѳ, katѳganelѳ treeg marene, ѳyambe sѳldѳwei maran chibelѳ gѳn.k

Katѳganuimburab chine wamincha mѳrѳbelѳ, wam gusrupteelѳ, Tiuswane larrѳ tsaleelѳ, mѳramguenga trѳmbѳig wamabelѳ, purab nѳrreelѳ mѳrѳrai inchibelѳ, nѳmasiitѳ purab nѳrreelѳ misrѳb waminchibelѳ, chigurrimbunѳ kaig maramigwane srѳitѳ, srѳitѳ isua wesrubelѳ, usri mѳskalan chigucha mѳrmeelѳ
Inchagucha nѳmbe Tiuswane ni Tius kuitamabguen isug kѳmui inchen, Tiusbe elachiptindig kѳbig kѳn, nѳmui isubigwane larrѳ kaig mindiilѳ tѳgagѳbashchab chi maramgaigwan marbashib.

Inchawei ѳyeekkurli nѳmune purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳlikken gѳnrraptiig marѳb gѳnrrai Tiusbe elatsig kѳbig kѳn, ishumburmerabe nѳmui asrwan mѳguelan rranamig kѳbigwan treeg marmѳtѳ, ishumburmeraasiyaitѳ trѳmbѳig marѳb guebamben.

Tius managuen pinѳnrrabig kѳmíigwei tru tѳrguegwalmabigwane mѳg kwawa pinѳnrrabigwei asrwan tre lataitѳwei maramba, illimera latailѳ maramba, pib srѳptѳga animalmera latailѳ maramba, pirau srala ambub animalmera latailѳ maramba inchib, ѳyeelѳtѳga yunѳmarѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn.Inchawei treekkurri nѳmui manrrau mѳguelѳba, ishumburmeraba trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbig arrubigu trѳmbѳig marѳb chinchibgucha warѳnrrai Tiusbe elatsig kѳn, nѳmui asrmeran nѳmasiyaitѳ larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb gѳnrrai.

Kaguende tru chigurrimbunѳ pirѳwan mara basrѳb uraskurri Tiusweimburabigwan tru kaptѳga nebua asiimeelѳ, tru managurri managatig nui maramburab marѳb basrabiiba, nѳ trendѳ Tius kѳppe, treeg kuibabe tѳrgandѳ chigúi nebua asamdiig kenamisran tru nѳ chi mariilѳyu. Inchawei treekkurriwei chi guemesra gѳben ashmeelѳ guer chib pѳnrramibe chigagѳn.

Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbiibe srѳmbalasrѳngurri kenamisrѳb arrun, tru mѳguelѳ larrѳ rrѳmbѳig mariilaim balaba, tru sѳlgandѳ tabig kѳmíigwan mariilaim balaba, tru treeg sѳlgandѳ tabig kѳmíigwan mariilѳtѳga tru newan ciertѳn tabigwan sѳtѳgatab pѳnrrabelan.

Pѳs Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamweimburappe nabe chi kѳrig kui inchib pasrѳmur, k'aguende truibe Tiuswei maramburab marѳbig kѳn k'aigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrai mutѳgucha Jesucristѳn kѳrebigweimbe, judíѳsmeramerrig, trugurrimbe gatѳ griegѳsmeragucha.
masken tru ñim lat'a, na lat'a namui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug kanguelarrѳtѳ tѳga pѳnrraitѳga nam ambugurri, igurri kuñab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai.

tru Espílitu Newan Tabigweimburappe, tru maramburab maliitѳga nune Tiuswei Nusrkain gѳn cha eshkawa paslig. Treeg kѳn, tru kwabelai utugurli nѳ gatѳle ѳsiirawa kurlig kuikkurli, truibe Jesuclistѳ, tru namui Señѳr.
Tius nѳ ashib karub wainuguigwan waminchib, Señѳr Jesuclistѳimburabigwan eshkab kusrenanѳb inchibig kѳn, mui malautѳgucha trurligu chi sѳtѳ luliimíikke.
Incha yandѳ sѳtѳba ѳsig webambabe, tru pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabiibe, Malta cha wamim birѳ gúin gúi nebua ashibelѳ guer.

Incha nabe tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳlig maig chibig kѳben, Tiuswei yau tru chish misrtrab maligwan chab mara basrѳben, mѳilѳgѳsrѳn judíѳsmera Asia birausreelѳ pubelѳ gѳn, na misagwan namishib pera gurra gѳmѳwei, kabe chindinguen asiimíig malingarub pera gurra gѳmѳwein basrѳben.
Inchawei treekkurri nabe Tiuswei merrab lata, mѳguelai merrab lata chigѳben kalѳ mara treegwan nai isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigaig kѳnrrab inchib megabig kur cha, chu urastѳgucha.

Inchendѳ nabe maig kuigwan kelarrab, trendamѳnrrun cha: Nabe merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamerai Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibig kur cha, tru nѳm Tiusweiwan peemaytѳ marѳbelѳ cha wamig, tru srѳ may maig kѳben treekke. Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriilan lata, katѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ pѳriilan lata isa gѳmѳ, kerrigu treegwein gúitamab kѳrer cha.

Pѳs Nane Tiuswei yau muba gѳben aleguiyab basrai ashmѳwei, namishib misag sѳtѳ peragurri ashmѳwei, katѳ judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayu treeg marѳb basrai ashmѳwei, kabe chugѳben ciudasrѳ treeg marѳb basrai ashmѳwei indig kѳn cha.

Inchen tru kubenadurbe Pablѳn waminchai señas maren, Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñi ya yam bila i birau maig maramigwan asha marѳb wabig kui ashabe, kalѳ mara basrѳmuigwan nabe chi kѳrmѳ eshkanrrab inchar cha..

Kaguende k'an mѳg, Demetriѳ taig, andѳga chigѳben marѳbiibe, tiusa Dianai yaureemera andѳga mariilѳ tabzheelѳ marѳbig kua, tru gatѳganelѳ treelѳwei marѳbelane tru yaniilѳtѳga purѳ gѳrrѳ anmera maringarubig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen ѳyeelѳ chab puraiben, Pablѳbe Macedѳnia birauwan gѳben, Acaya birauwan gѳben llirab yabe, nuinetѳ Jerusalénsrѳmay inrrab isua, trenchibig kѳn: Jerusalénsrѳmay yabe, Rѳmasrѳmaygucha yamig tab punrrautan cha.
Inchendѳ nѳm treeg maren, tru kwaimandziibe nѳmune trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Jesúswane mu gúi ashib, katѳ Pablѳngucha mu gúi ashib inchibig kur cha. ¿Inchen ñimbe mumera guermah? cha.

Inchen kan utuelѳbe nѳmui manrrѳmeran mur marѳb, trunun treeg kѳmuit'amab isub kaashib, maya misagwei merrab trѳmbѳig wamabelѳ gѳn tru srѳ maywan. Inchen Pablѳbe nѳmun t'arѳmisra, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan nѳѳrѳ pera ya, kan Tiranѳ t'aigwei kusrenani yau kwalѳmmѳrig iibe ѳyamay gѳn chib eshkab waminchibig kѳn.
Incha Pablѳ tasigwan nѳmuim bala estsarene, nѳmuim balabe Espíritu Santѳ kѳrraarruben, mѳriimѳ wammera waminchib menda, Tius maig karuigwan nѳmbe waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha Pablѳbe nuimburappe Silaswan lawa wesrawa, tru nunelѳ: Señѳrwei ka yandѳ tab indiitѳga tabig ashib tѳgagúilѳ gѳnrrigay cha ѳriilѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.n
Yandѳ mam gwalѳmyu gѳsrѳnbe Pablѳbe Bernabéwan trenchibig kѳn: Ciudamѳrig nam Señѳrwei wamwan eshk'ab kusrenaniisrѳ nunelan maig inchib melѳtashchab k'atѳ ashchab amun cha.
Inchen Silasbe trusrѳ nѳ kѳrrѳmisramig t'ab punrrab gúi isubig kѳn.
Incha truyu maya yana gѳsrѳn nѳmbe kѳrrѳmisra warѳben, nunelѳbe chi isumgaig tab gúilѳ gѳnrrigay chib, nѳmun karua ѳrѳbelaisrѳmay ungwa cha, katѳle ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Incha nambe Judaswanba, Silaswanba ñimuimay ѳrer. Truilѳbe nam pѳrigwan, nѳmashib trunundѳwei waminchun.
Mѳilѳgѳsrѳn yu namui utuelѳ amba, namma chigucha treebe marѳb gѳnrrai karumubendѳ, chinetѳ cha, ñimune ¡gatѳ! kan ѳrѳba mandѳgucha gѳmuielѳ melѳnrrai malin gѳn.

Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳba, katѳ iglesia mayeelѳba tru nѳmui utugurri lawa wesrawa, ѳramig tabig asѳnai inchibelѳ gѳn, Antiѳquíasrѳmay Pablѳba, Bernabéba amrrai. Incha Judas, katѳ nundѳwei Barsabás taigwanba, Silaswanba amrrai wesrubelѳ gѳn, nunelai utu tru mas nѳrreelѳ gúi asi mѳguelan.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, taska mari tiusmera tѳgagúilan pѳnsraig mamimeran mamѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ lata ishumbur lata larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb gѳmigwan marmѳwei, kweetsig kѳmѳtѳ, ka melamisratѳ kwaig animalmerai yauwan mamѳwei, katѳ aniwan mamѳwei indamig kѳn chibig, treegwan eshkawa, pѳramitѳ balan cha.
Maya misaamera gatѳganelѳ uncha bѳnrrabelѳ Señѳrwan lanrrain cha, mayeelѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerainug nai munchiwan nѳmuinug pasra wamig kѳnrrun cha.

¡Ñim gúi! ¿Ke Tiuswane chinchibig kѳt'ashchab inchib pѳnrrѳtirru? cha, tru nam lat'a, namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera lat'a, ѳyeeg maramigwan marѳb gѳnrrab gaimaigwane tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelan, trunun nѳm niga amrrai mѳimbe nѳmun neguanѳb.
Trune Tiuswei wambe trurѳ larrѳbichib nurab ibig kѳn  .k

Herѳdesbe Tirѳba, Sidónba warab misagwan larrѳ namig tsuben, trusreelѳbe sѳteelѳba maig maramigwan lat'a ke kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, tru rey Herѳdeswei yau ke nѳashib trag megabig Blastѳ t'aigwan nѳmuingatѳ misrtrai ubѳnanѳb wamincha, truikkurri ambugurri, igurri lat'a t'ab warѳnrrab cha miabelѳ gѳn. Kaguende Tirѳba, Sidónbabe tru reyweim biraugurri mamig weerigwan purѳsrubelѳ gѳbig kua.
Inchen yandѳ tѳrrraben, suldaumerabe ¡gatѳ! mamdѳguen gѳmuilѳ truba rruba waminchib gѳbig kѳn, Pedrѳne ni chindinguen mѳrmѳwa.
Trune Pedrѳbe katѳgucha yaskabwan pinrrѳgѳbig, binrrѳgѳben, kura ashabe, truba kwaarѳbelѳ gѳn.k
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Paare! ñibe lѳca asѳnan cha. Inchen nѳbe: ¡Truigwein gѳtan! chiben, nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Pedrѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nui mѳsig kuinrrun cha.n
Incha Pedrѳbe yandѳ iigwan maig kui ashabe, Maríai yamay ibig kѳn, tru Juanwan katѳ Marcѳskucha taigwei usraimay. Inchen truyube truba yamelѳ tulundzuna, Tiusba waminchib gѳbelѳ gѳn.m

Incha suldaumera ashib pѳnrrainug srѳtiigu puraamba, trugurrimbe k'atѳganbalѳ puraamba, trugurri yandѳ wambig callegatѳmaysrѳ tsandzѳn yask'abyu pubene, tru yask'appe nѳtѳ kurѳptinchibig kѳn. Inchen webamba, k'an yabgatig ambene, tru ángelbe nѳtѳ inrrai tarѳmisrѳptinchibig kѳn.
Inchabe ángelbe trenchibig kѳn: Tamara pѳrѳnab, ñui alpargatiswan keet'ab inchi cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe treeg marene, ángelbe trenchibig kѳn: Pala itѳguewagúigwan keb, nai mendig amѳ cha.

Herѳdes Pedrѳn misagwei merrab lѳtsѳ wesramig kѳben tru gwalmab yem, Pedrѳbe pagatѳ suldaumerai tѳbѳtag pa cadenatѳga merrarraig, kib tsuben, katѳgan suldaumerabe yaskabu tru kailan keeri yawan ashib pѳnrrabelѳ gѳn..

Treeg marigwane judíѳsmerane truba tabig asѳnain gѳben, Herѳdesbe Pedrѳngucha merrarrangarubig kѳn. Truibe tru Pirri Levaduragaig Maig Fiesta gwalѳmmerawan burayaig kѳn.Incha Pedrѳn merrarrawabe, Herѳdesbe kailan keeri yau keerѳbig kѳn, suldaumera pib sѳtѳ ashib pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsra kan sѳtѳyu pib suldaubatѳ. Herѳdesbe tru Pascua Fiesta puraiben, Pedrѳne misagwei merrab wesranrrab isua rreeg inchibig kѳn.
Incha treeg mara, Judeasrѳ Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelan trannrrai, Bernabéwanba, Saulѳnba tru ketamig tulisaigwan trana ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen k'an tru ambubelai utuig Agabѳ taibe, Espíritu Santѳ nun maig tamigwan isunrrai inchen, trenchibig kѳn: Pirau ѳrѳba parѳ truba nuig attrab gѳn cha. Indiibe treeg kѳnrrun daibe Claudiѳ k'arubig kѳben treeg purayaig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha yandѳ Bernabébe Saulѳn lanrrab Tarsѳsrѳmay ya, yandѳ wetѳrrawabe, Antiѳquíasrѳmay pera ibig kѳn.
Inchen Señѳrwei tasiibe nѳmba basrѳben, misaabe truba nu kѳrewa, Señѳrweimay llirabelѳ gѳn.n

Inchen tru Estebanwan kweechen isumdiig kaig pub mendѳben trugurri, ke kan ѳrѳtѳmisra chab ambubelѳbe, Feniciasrѳn gѳben, Chipresrѳn gѳben, Antiѳquíasrѳn gѳben ѳyasrѳngatig ambig kѳbig kѳn, mungucha mendailane Tiuswei wamwan waminchimѳtѳ, judíѳsmerandѳ waminchib.
Nam judíѳsmera Señѳr Jesucristѳn kѳrebelan Tius ket'a tranigwan nѳm judíѳs kѳmeelangucha trunundѳwei ket'a tranene, ¿Tiuswan treeg marmѳt'a chib pasrѳnrrappe, nabe mu gѳbrai kѳh? chibig kѳn.

Inchen Espíritu Santѳbe nane: Mandѳ inchab gѳmab isuptѳ basrѳmѳtѳ, nѳmba inrrѳ chiben, katѳ i seiselѳ nunelѳgucha naba lincha amrruig kѳbig kѳn cha. Incha nambe sѳtѳba Cѳrneliѳi yausrѳ kebambubelѳ guer cha.k
Inchene nabe trenchibig kur cha: ¡Señѳr, paare, k'an treekkucha mana maramѳ! cha. Kan nabe managuen nai trigube mamѳnrrai merigwanba, chish mariimíigwanbabe mugabguen muga gѳmur cha.
trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Kan ñibe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera tru circuncidameelai yau kebya, truilѳba lincha main gѳn! cha.
Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿I misaameran piu umbu ulsrailѳ gѳmѳnrrai k'abe mu gѳbgan merѳnrraitarru? cha, nam latatѳwei Espíritu Santѳn nѳm utѳben.

Inchen Pedrѳba amrrubelѳ tru circuncidawar kѳrewarmerabe, truba kwaariilѳ gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerangucha Espíritu Santѳn keta nѳmuim bala itѳlushib uncha tѳgagѳnrrai trana gѳrrѳmaren.
Katѳ mayeelѳba Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ Jesúsweimburab waminchippe, tru mayeelѳba nun kѳrebelѳbe Jesúswei munchiyu kaig maliilan ulѳ bayamig kѳmíig pesannaig kѳrrѳmisrtrun daig kѳn cha.

Ke maya misagwangucha kenamisrmѳtѳ, tru maig kuigwan nѳmashib ashib pѳnrrabelan Tius tru manasrѳwei nѳ lawa wesruilandѳ kenamislig kѳn cha, Jesús tru kwaig tsua, katѳle kwailai utugurli kurra, tru namba lincha nѳba mab muchibelan.
Misaamera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabig chu birausreelѳtѳgucha nun kѳriibala marѳb, sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbigwane Tiusbe kashmíig kѳn cha..
Inchen nabe tru urastѳ ñuimay ѳriibe, manguen arrin gѳn cha. Mѳimbe mayeelѳba nambe Tiuswei merrab purrer chibig kѳn, Señѳr ñun chitѳ wamindingaruigwan nam kerrigu mѳrtrab.
Inchen Pedrѳbe tru nѳ piab lataig asigwan maig kermab isubsrѳ wamnetѳ, Espíritu Santѳbe nun trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au! ñune pѳngatѳ mѳguelѳ lab gѳn cha..

Treetѳ rreetѳ pѳnmay guenamisren, tru llensune ¡gatѳ! mѳi mѳi srѳmbalasrѳmay kusruptindig kѳbig kѳn.Inchen Pedrѳbe tru nѳ piab lataig asiibe chi chibig kѳnrrabgѳmab isub, nuinetѳ mumayguen gѳmui wamnetѳ, Cѳrneliѳ ѳrig mѳguelѳbe Simónwei ya chugúin gúi paya, yaskabu chabguen pubguen inchibelѳ gѳn..
Incha maig kuigwan nѳmun kerrigu eshkawabe, Jѳpemay amrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn..
Inchen tru ángel nun waminchibig iben latatѳ, Cѳrneliѳbe bagatѳ nui karuindiig melabelanba, katѳ kan suldau nui trendѳ trag melabelai utuig Tiuswan truba isua basrabigwanba wamabig kѳn.
Indiibe kan maaben las tres kѳsrѳn kan piab lataigu Tiuswei ángel tѳrgandѳ kenamisri ashibig kѳn, nѳ wainug kebarrua trenchibig: ¡Cѳrneliѳ! cha..
Inchen Pedrѳbe yam gwalѳm tru Jѳpe ciudayu kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn, kan mѳg Simón daig tru kalusmeran kullaarana, tabzhig tamarѳbigwei yausrѳ.n

Inchen Pedrѳbe mayeelan wambig webambingarua, tѳmbѳnsra, Tiusba wamincha, tru kwaig tsubigwan keesha ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tabita ¡Kurrѳ! cha. Inchen nѳbe larraashippa, Pedrѳn ashabe, kurra, wamisrѳptinchibig kѳn.

Inchen tru Lida ciudabe, Jѳpe bulutѳ gѳbene, Pedrѳbe Lidasrѳ unan dai wammѳrabe, tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe pailѳ mѳguelan trenchinrrai ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn: Ke tiusmanda yu nam warainukkatig peba attra tan chinrrai.m

Tru urassrѳ Jupe ciudayu kan ishug Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb megabig Tabit'a t'aig, griegѳmaybe Dѳrcas cha wamig, tsubig kѳn. Tru ishuube chigѳben t'abig maramelangѳba marѳb, katѳ chugurrin gѳmui melabelane purugub inchibig kѳbig kѳn.
Pedrѳbe truѳrѳ llirab uñabe, katѳ Tiuswei misaameran Lidasrѳ warabelangucha ashchab ibig kѳn.
Inchen nunelѳ trunun wammѳrabe, Saulѳn Cesareasrѳngatig lincha amba, truyugurrimbe Tarsѳsrѳmay ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn..
Inchen nui kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳbe Saulѳne yem pera amrrua, tru ciuda bѳtѳgatan sruubirѳbanrrig balaig marinug kan nu tasinyu waya, kѳrrѳѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Saulѳbe wammѳrin gѳbig kѳn. Incha nѳmbe yem, gwalѳm ciudayu yaskabmerayubaguen larab, kwetchab muniirabelѳ gѳn.n
Incha tru urastѳ Saulѳbe judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayu Jesúsweimburab eshkab waminchib pѳlbasrѳbig kѳn: I Jesúsbe Tiuswei Nusrkain gѳn chib..

Inchene Ananíasbe tru Saulѳ tsui yamay yabe, kebya, tasigwan nuim bala estsarabe, trenchibig kѳn: Cristѳgurri nai nuneg Saulѳ, Señѳr Jesús mayu arrub pasrѳben kenamisrѳbiibe ñi gatѳle ashibig misrѳb, katѳ Espíritu Santѳtѳ netsaig kѳrrѳmisrѳb inchaimba nan ѳrtan cha.

Inchene Señѳrbe trenchibig kѳn: Inrrѳ cha. Kaguende i mѳѳbe na ѳyeeg marѳb tѳgagѳnrrab na lawa wesruig mѳg kѳn cha, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran gѳben, reymeran gѳben, Israelwei misaameran gѳben nai munchiwan asingarunrrabig..
Truyube pѳn gwalѳm ѳrѳba ashchab gaimabwei, manrrab gaimabwei mutchab gaimabwei inchibig kѳn.
Kurrab, Damascѳ ciudayu kebinrrѳ chibig kѳn. Truyube ñi chi maramigwan ñune eshkanrrun cha.n
Inchene Saulѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Señѳr, ñibe mu gugu? cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe Jesús tru ñi nan kaig marѳb unig, truig kur cha.

Trune Saulѳbe tru Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelane kaig maramigwanba, kweecha bet'amigwanbabe namig kѳbiitѳ ke chinchibmѳrѳ inchib uña, treekkurri maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳten ashchab yaig kѳn.
Inchen Felipebe lulѳb ya, wetѳgabe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Isaías pѳrigwan leb arri mѳrѳbig kѳn. Inchabe Felipebe trenchibig kѳn ¿Ñi leb arrigwan chi taig mѳrtirru? cha..

Inchene Felipebe kurrab ibene, mayube kan Etiѳpía birausrѳ kan mѳg eunucѳ katabig kѳn. Truibe, Etiѳpíasrѳ reina Candacei kan mѳg karubig nui reinai anwan kerliguba nѳ esegabig kѳbig kѳn. Nѳbe Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswan kѳliibala tabig waminchab ya,

Incha nѳmbe maig kѳbigwan eshkab, katѳ Tiuswei wamwan eshkab waminchib guabe, Jerusalénmay katѳ amrrubelѳ gѳn tru Clistѳ nѳashib karua ѳliilѳbe. Incha Samaliasrѳ truba yambalѳ misaamera tsitsѳ warabsrѳ, tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳn.
Ñibe namui utube chi asamig kawei, chi marѳb unamig kawein gѳn cha. Kaguende ñui manrrѳbe Tiuswein gabyube chi sѳlgandѳ tabig kѳmѳn cha.
Incha Pedrѳba, Juanba truilaim bala tasigwan estsaren, Espíritu Santѳn utabelѳ gѳn..

Inchen Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ Jerusalénsrѳ warabelѳ tru samariasreelѳ Tiuswei wamwan uta bѳnrramisrin gѳn dai wammѳrabe, Juanwanba, Pedrѳnba trusrѳmay ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.Inchen nѳmbe trusrѳ puabe, tru kѳrebelѳ Espíritu Santѳn utѳnrrai, Tiusba waminchibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru Simóndѳweinguen trunun kѳreb, piu umbu ulsraig kѳb incha, Felipeba lincha, uñibig kѳn. Tius nѳba pasrain gúi ashchai Felipe mariilanba, katѳ nѳ maramburab truba nѳrreelѳ mariilanba ashabe, Simónbe truba kwaarѳb uñibig kѳn.
Incha nune ke chi martashchab ashib melabelѳ gѳn, kaguende tru nѳ magia gusrewa maliilѳtѳga manasrѳngurli nѳmune keerѳba, kwaara ashib gѳnrrai mara srua gѳben.

Inchen manasrѳngurri kan mѳg Simón daig tru ciudayube tsubig kѳn, kaig librѳn gusrewa, kwaimandzigweimburabigwan marѳbig. Samaria misaameran chine mariilѳtѳga chull asѳskѳb, nѳbe purѳ nuig misrѳb tsubig kѳn.
Inchen tru utuig Felipe Samaria ciudasrѳmay ya, trusrѳ Cristѳimburabigwan eshkab kusrennѳbig kѳn..
Inchen nѳmbe nѳmui kalumeran kasrѳb truba mur trashib, ¡gatѳ! mayamba Estebanweim balatѳ itѳ ambubelѳ gѳn.k
