purѳ lѳstѳyu warabelanba, katѳ kwamitѳ itѳgasraig warabelanba kebilѳnrrab. Incha ambumay imay tabig amѳnam maywan ambamig kѳnrrai martrab.
Namui Tius purѳ nu lastima asikkurri, kan srѳ gwalѳm pѳrr tѳrguegwalmabig neeshibig lataig kallanrrun cha
tru namui kѳlli misag Abrahamwan treeg marmѳ gѳmѳ ¡gatѳ! treeg marig kѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmarig kѳbigwan.
Merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaameran truba lastima asigwanba, katѳ Tius tru misaaba ѳyeeg martrab cha, tru newan t'abig nuinukkurri nѳ lat'a kandѳ isua martrab pasrigwan isumig kѳnrraimba,
Israelwei Señѳr Tiusbe mayanguen t'abig wamindig kѳnrrain cha. Kaguende namun ashchab arrua, nui misagwane gatѳle nuielѳ gѳnrrai wesrun cha.
Inchen mayeelѳ wammѳrѳbelѳbe nѳmui manrrautѳ esegab trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿I unѳbe chi maig kѳnrrabig kerah? cha. Kaguende Señѳrwei t'asiibe nѳba basrѳben.
Inchen tru urastѳ Zacaríaswane nilѳ kemendikkucha kurrѳben, wam larraiben, Tiuswan tabig waminchib mendabig kѳn.
Mѳskaimbe pѳramig kan tablaunѳ miawabe: Nui munchibe Juan gѳn chib, pѳrѳbig kѳn.
Incha mѳskawan: ¿Chi munchi basrtrab? cha, señas maratѳ payene,k
Indiibe ke trune gwalѳmyube unan circuncidanrrab srua amba, unane munchi basrѳppe, mѳskawei munchi Zacarías basrtrab inchen,
Inchen nui ya buluelѳba, nui yauelѳba Señѳr nun truba lastima asin gúi ashabe, nѳmbe Elisabetba truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn..
tru merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misag Abrahamwanba, nuinukkurli karrab misaameranba maig wamindig managatig treeg kѳnrrai.
Nui task'a chigѳben purѳ nѳrreelѳ mara, tru nѳrreelѳ truba mѳg inchib, chigѳben martrab isuilane chindinguen mѳriimíig k'a isuitѳ burainrrai kѳrrѳmarin gѳn cha.
Inchen nui lastima asiibe, nun kѳliibala melabelaimbe, srѳig srѳig misag kurrab arlimѳlig truilain gѳnrrun cha.
Kaguende Tius maramburab marѳbiibe nan purѳ nѳrriig tabelѳ marin gѳn cha, nui munchibe newan tabig kѳben.m
Inchen Maríabe trenchibig kѳn: Nai mѳsiibe Señѳrwan maya nuguen tabig wamindan cha.m
Kѳrebigweimbe mayanguen tab kѳn cha. Kaguende Señѳr maig kѳnrrun cha, chi taibe, nѳbe treeg nebunrrai martrun chibig kѳn.
¿Nan ѳyeeg lastima asiibe chugurri arrerah? cha, ¿Nai Señѳrwei usri nan ashchab punrraimbe?
Tru gwalѳmmerawan Maríabe t'amara, Judea birau tunmeragѳba tѳga birѳmerasrѳ kan pueblѳyumay petѳ ya,
Katѳ ñimui Elisabetgucha ya kѳllim balasrѳ k'an nusrk'ai tѳgagѳnrrab gѳn cha. Chi ureg tѳgagѳnrrab gaimabig kѳn daikken seis mesesken kwanrriig kѳn cha.
Inchen nѳbe Jacѳbwei misaameran managatig ashib karub wanrrun cha. Inchen tru nѳ ashib karub wamibe managuen patsѳnrraamѳn chibig kѳn.
Nѳbe purѳ nuig, Tius Mayeelaim Bala Pasrabigwei Nusrkain cha wamig kѳnrrun cha. Inchen Señѳr Tiusbe tru mѳskai David wamisra ashib karub waigwan tranrrun cha.
Inchen ángelbe trenchibig kѳn: María kѳrig kui inchimѳt'a cha. Kaguende ñibe Tiuswei merrab mayanguen t'abig asѳnaig kѳn cha.
Inchen Maríabe ángel wamindiilan mѳrabe, k'an ѳyeeg chib tab wamibe maig kermab isubig kѳn. Katѳ ángel ѳyeeg chib tab wamibe chi chibig kermab isubig kѳn.
Indiibe tѳbѳ bilayu ángel Gabrielwan Galilea, kan pueblѳ Nazaret tainuumay Tiusbe ѳrѳbig kѳn,n
Inchen Zacaríasbe Tiuswei yau Tiusweiwan maram gwalѳmmera chab patsѳben, nѳbe nui yamay iben,
Zacarías webarruppe, waminchab gaimabig webarruptinchen, Tiuswei yau chitѳ kenamisren, asiitamab isubelѳ gѳn. Inchen nѳbe wamgaig kѳrrѳmisra, nѳmune ka señas maratѳ eshkabig kѳn.
Incha mѳimbe tru treeg nebum gwalѳmgatig ñibe wamgaig, chigucha waminchab gaimabig kѳrrѳmisrtrabguen cha, na maig taigwan kѳremikkurri. Tru na trendailѳbe treeg pum gwalѳm punrrun cha.
Inchen Zacaríasbe ángelwan payippe: ¿Iigwane mandѳ incha treeg kѳnrraitamab isumѳ? cha, trencha bayibig kѳn. Kaguende nabe yandѳ kѳllig kѳben, nai sraingucha treetѳwein gѳn cha.
mѳilan gѳben, Israelwei misaameran nѳmui Señѳr Tiusweimay truba nu llirangarunrrun cha.
Kaguende ñui nusrkaimbe Tiuswei merrab truba nuig kѳnrrun cha, managuen vinѳ muchimѳwei, mutsiiranrraptiig kѳrap pi muchimѳwei inchabig. Incha usrai patsau wappatѳwei Espíritu Santѳtѳ netsaig kua,
Zacaríasbe ángelwan ashabe, ¡gatѳ! mandѳguen gѳmuptinchen, ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib kѳlig kui inchibig kѳn.
Inchen mѳimbe inciensѳ barri altar bulu kusrmaygatѳmay Señѳrwei ángel Zacaríaswan kenamisrѳptinchen
Indiibe kan gwalѳm Zacaríaswei sacerdѳtes sѳtѳwan Tiuswei merrab Tiusweiwan maramig nѳmun nebuben,
Inchendѳ chi urekk'ar gѳbig kѳn, k'aguende Elisabetbe trendѳ ureg chigaig, pailѳba yandѳ kѳlleelѳ gua.
Herѳdes Judea rey gѳben, judíѳsmerai kan sacerdѳte Zacarías t'aig merrabsrѳ Abíaswei sacerdѳtesmerai utuig tsubig kѳn. Sraimbe Aarónwei misagugurri arrubig kѳbig kѳn, Elizabet t'aig.
Inchen nagucha kerriguba chitѳ burayailѳ maig kuigwan srѳsrѳgurriigwan tab nebua ashene, nangucha tabig asѳnaben, lutѳgurri tamara ñun pѳrtrab inchar, ñi nai purѳ tab Teófilѳn,n
Tru srѳsrѳgurri nѳmui kaptѳga nѳmashib ashibelѳ, katѳ Tiuswei wamwan nѳm waminchib pѳnrrabelѳ namun maig eshkaig kѳben, treeg.m
Pѳs mѳilѳgѳben maig purayaigwan eshkabig kan pѳlig tamara kѳrrѳmartrab indig kѳbig kѳn lutѳgurli, namui utu isa gѳmѳtѳ, ciertѳn treeg purayeelan.
Inchene mayeelѳba trencha payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Trube, ñibe Tiuswei Nusrkain gѳtirru? cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Ñimdѳweinguen nabe truigwein gѳn cha chab rrendan cha..
katѳ na chigѳben payene, ñimbe lѳtѳmѳwei inchaut'an cha.
nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Ñi Cristѳ gѳtirru? cha. Namun eshkarra cha. Inchen nѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Na ñimun: Truig kur cha, trenchibene, ñimbe kѳremѳwei,n
kabwan lusra, malѳbѳtѳ pashabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Mu gurragutsin gúi? Namun kelarrab eshkau bѳs cha.
Inchen tru mѳguelѳ Jesúswan ashib srua gѳbelѳbe nun indza ashib, kurrѳb incha,
Inchabe Pedrѳbe webya, truba rruba isuig kishibig kѳn.
Katѳ k'an ura wendau gѳsrѳn k'atѳgan trenchibig trenchig kѳn: Isa gѳmѳ, i mѳkkucha Jesúsba uñibigwein gѳrreh cha. Kaguende nѳbe galileasriitѳwein gѳn cha.
Inchen yanazhigutѳ Pedrѳn katѳgan ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Ñigucha truilai utuigwein gѳrreh cha. Inchene Pedrѳbe: ¡Paare mѳѳbe! nagan truig kuitarru chibig kѳn.
kan srusrѳ mendig megabiibe naabilabig tѳryu Pedrѳn wai ashabe, ashib pasraptѳ, ashib pasraptѳ trenchibig kѳn: I mѳkkucha Jesúsba uñibiitѳwein gѳn cha.
Incha tru yawambigu nag urra, tru bѳtѳgatan purramisren, Pedrѳgucha nѳmui utu wamisren,
Nabe ñimba kwalѳmmѳrig Tiuswei yau waben, kemѳrmuig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ yandѳ mѳimbe tru kaig maringarubig tru lѳstѳyuig nѳ merrarrawa nѳ garub pasramisren, ñimuimburab ñim maramig ura puin gѳn cha.
Inchen nѳmui utu mѳikkѳsrѳn tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtei karuindiig megabigwan kusrmay kaluwan kelarrab lutiichiptinchibig kѳn..
Inchen Jesúsba pѳnrrabelѳbe tru treeg purainrrabigwan ashabe, nune bayibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, ¿nam esbadatѳga kѳrriincha betamѳh? cha.
¿Chindimba kib gѳgue? cha. Kurra, Tiusba waminchib purray cha, chiyugѳben kaigyu kegѳrrab pѳnrrѳmѳnrrappe.m
Incha kurra, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan ashchab yabe, isubiitѳ kamariilѳ, kib purrain gúi wetѳrrawabe, Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn:
Inchen srѳmbalasriig kan ángel Jesúswan mas kullaaramѳnrrai purugunrrab kenamisrѳbig kѳn.m
Incha truyu puabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tiusba waminchib purray cha, chiyugѳben kaigyu kegѳrrab pѳnrrѳmѳnrrappe.n
Incha Jesúsbe nѳ trendѳ treeg marѳbig kuig kѳppe, ѳlivѳs Tunsrѳmay iben, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳgucha mendig ambubelѳ gѳn.m

Kaguende nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun cha: Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu naimburab iig ѳyeeg chibig pasrabiibe treeg nebunrrain gѳn cha: Larrѳ k'ailai utu treeg kui lataitѳwei asha tѳgagúig kѳn daig. Kaguen naimburab chi nebunrrai pѳrig basrabiibe kerriguh treeg nebunrrabig kѳn cha.
Incha Jesúsbe trencha bayibig kѳn: Na ñimun wasrkaig, katѳ an busramig chigaig, albargatiskaig ѳrenma, ¿ñimun chi balappuig kѳh? cha. Inchen nѳmbe: Chigucha chi balappumuig kѳn cha lѳtabelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Simónbe: Señѳr, ñun kailan keeli yau keeren, nabe ñiba truyu pasrѳnrrab treetѳ attrab pasrѳmѳtѳ, nagucha ñiba tѳga kwanrrab attrab pasrar cha, trencha lѳtabig kѳn.
Incha Señѳrbe katѳ trenchibig kѳn: Au, Simón, Simón cha, Satanásbe ñimun miain gѳn cha, kan tirigu rrulmeran latawei kѳnishib sruagutchab.
Incha nai Mѳskai tru ashib karub waigwan nan rranѳb lataitѳwei, nabe ñimun tranamѳnrrun chibig kѳn
Ñim gѳn chu uragucha nan elachimѳ, chigѳben murig pub arringucha treegu wendautѳ lincha melabelѳbe.

Trune ñimbe ѳyamay gѳmѳtѳ gѳmig kѳn chibig kѳn. Masken ñimui utu tru mas nuibe matsinѳunѳ lataitѳ misramig kѳn cha. Inchen tru chi maramigwan nѳ ashibiibe kan karuig marѳb megabig lataitѳ misramig kѳn cha.n
Inchabe nѳmbe nѳmui utu mѳig mas nuig kѳnrraptiig kerah cha, payib aleguiyab gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳmasiyaitѳ: ¿Treeg martrabiibe mu guerah? cha payiyab mendabelѳ gѳn.
Inchendѳ asay chibig kѳn. Nan ashig kѳmui inchibelan trannrrabigwei t'asiibe i mishatsigutѳwei nain dasiiba trubalatѳ trarra wan cha.
Kaguende ñimun trendamѳnrrun cha: Mѳingurrimbunѳbe uvas piwane mas muchimumѳnrrun cha, nai Mѳskai nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ katѳyug ñimba mutsam gwalѳmgatig.
Incha cѳpan muta Tiuswan mayanguen pay chabe, trenchibig kѳn: Cha iigwan, larrabelѳ mutsay cha..
Incha yandѳ ura puben, Jesúsbe nui karua ѳriilѳba mishatsigu wamisrabe,
Inchen nѳmbe amba, Jesús maig taig treeg wetѳrrawa, tru Pascuan tamarѳbelѳ gѳn.n
Inchen nѳmbe: ¿Nambe chu t'amaramѳ? cha payen,
Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñim ciudayu kebambene, kan mѳg pigѳtsѳ mutaig ñimun katѳben, truigwei wendautѳ amrligay cha, nѳ kebyam yaugatig.
Yandѳ Pirri Levaduragaig main gwalѳm puben, tru Pascua ubishaunan kweecha tranamig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nѳbe treeg martrab misra, misag tre nu gaaben Jesúswan mandѳ incha tranamigwan yandѳ lab mendabig kѳn.
nѳmbe truba kasraarawa, an rrannrrab misrѳbelѳ gѳn..
Inchen Jesús tru dѳce kusrenanѳb pera uniilai utuig, Judas, tru Iscariѳte cha wamigwan, Satanásbe kebiben,n
sacerdѳtesmeran k'arubelѳba, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳbabe Jesúswan mandѳ gweetsamigwan labendѳ, misagwan kѳriimatabelѳ gѳn.
nѳmbe chu uragucha Tiuswei yau Tiuswan tabzhig waminchib gѳbelѳ gѳn..
Inchen nѳmbe Señѳrweimburab truba tabig wamincha, Jerusalénmay katѳ truba rruba kasrag amba
Incha trenchib pasraimaytѳ nѳmuim bulugurri tarѳmisren, nune srѳmbalasrѳmay srua yaig kѳn.m

Au, nai Mѳskai trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisligwane nabe ѳramѳnrrun cha, ñimuim bala. Inchendѳ ñimbe yu Jerusalén ciudayutѳ ka gѳrrѳmisray cha, maramburab marѳbig srѳmbalasrѳngurli arrua, ñimun pinѳbulamnegatig.
mas kaig marmѳnrrab isua mѳramigwanba, nѳmui kaig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ pesannailѳ gѳmigwanba nui munchiyu eshkab kusrenanamig kѳnrrai Jerusalénsrѳngurri pѳlbasra, chu birausreelandѳgucha kerriguba.
Incha nѳmune Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigwan tѳrgandѳ ѳyeeg kuitamab isunrrai nѳmui isubigwan kura
nѳbe uta, nѳmui malau mabig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe nun peskau biti tsirigwan srѳrren,
Incha iigwan chab rrenchabe, tasiimeran srѳbmeran eshkab kenamaren,
Nai t'asiimeranba, srѳbmeranba asay cha. Peg kѳmѳ, natѳwein gur cha. Nan katѳrab ashib inday chibig kѳn. Kan mѳsiibe yaungawei, ni tsutsikkawayig kѳn cha, ñim nan asi lat'aig kѳmѳ.
Inchen nѳm tru waminchib purramnetѳ, Jesúsbe nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pasramisrѳb: Ñimun chi isumgaig, tab gѳn chibig kѳn..
Inchen tru pailѳ pubelѳbe maysrѳ maig purayaigwan kerrigu eshkabelѳ gѳn, katѳ Jesús pirriwan pirishiben, yandѳ nѳ gúi nebua ashiptindigwanba..

Inchen nѳmbe tru urastѳ Jerusalénmay katѳ amba, trusrѳmbe tru ѳnce Jesús kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳba, truyu nѳmba lincha purrabelѳba tulaamba purrabyuh pubelѳ gѳn. Inchen truyu purrabelѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn::
Inchen nѳmbe Jesús kui nebua ashiptindinaben, Jesúsbe waitѳ kenamuptinchibig kѳn.n
nѳmba mishatsigu wawabe, pirriwan muta, Tius Mѳsk'awan mayanguen pay cha, pirishabe, nѳmun srѳrrѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru Emaús pueblѳsrѳ pub ambabe, Jesúsbe nui maywan ke merrabmisra, ib inrrab lataig inchen,
Inchen mѳilѳgѳsrѳn namui lincha amѳñibelѳ sѳriinuumay amba, ishumburmera maig eshkaig treeg wetѳrrabwei inchendѳ, Jesúswane ashmuin gѳn chibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¡Ñim gúi, chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ! cha. ¡Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ chi wamindiilan kѳrenrraptѳgucha ke yaandѳ, yaandѳ amѳñibelѳ gѳn! cha.
Inchagucha namui utu ishumburmerabe namune kwaarѳsrѳtan cha, tru ullarbatѳ sѳriisrѳ ashchab ambubelѳbe.
Nam isuppe, Israel maya misagwan k'aigyugurri wesranrrabiibe nѳwein gѳnrraitamab isua muniiraig kѳbig kѳn cha. Mѳimbe yandѳ kweetsig pѳn gwalѳmguen burayan cha.

Inchen Jesúsbe: ¿Chi burayah? cha payen, nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nazaretsrѳ Jesúsweimburab waminder cha. Truibe Tius maig karuigwan kan eshkabig, nui mariilѳyu, nui wamindiilѳyu maramburab marѳbig kѳbig kѳn cha, Tiuswei merrab lat'a, katѳ maya misagwei merrab lat'a.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ambub pѳnrrappe, ñimbe chiwan waminchibrre amgue? cha. Inchen nѳmbe pѳnrramisrѳppe, isubiitѳ ke malѳguen mindiilѳ gѳbig kѳn.
tru purayailan nѳmdѳ kerriguh waminchib.
Inchen tru gwalѳmdѳwei pailѳ Jesúswan lincha amѳñibelѳ gѳbelѳbe Emaús taig pueblѳsrѳmay ambubelѳ gѳn, Jerusaléngurri ѳnce kilómetrѳsburab ambiisrѳ,
Inchen nѳmune tru ishumburmera wamindiibe ke k'a indzѳkken gѳnrraptiig mѳrѳraben, nѳmbe kѳremeelѳ gѳn.
Inchen ishumburmerabe Jesús chi wamindiilan isua,
tru nѳ ѳyeeg taigwan: Na, Mѳg Misra Arrubigwane k'aig marѳbelai tasku tranig kѳmig nebuben, kurusyu mesrѳben, pѳn gwalѳmyube k'atѳ ѳsiiranrrun daigwan.
Yube mu gaagѳn cha. Katѳ ѳsiiraig kѳn cha. Nѳ Galileasrѳ uñib urassrѳwei ñimun maig wamindiilan isuy chibelѳ gѳn,
nѳmbe kebambabe, Señѳr Jesúswei asrwane kalaptinchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha nѳm truyu pua, ashene, tru sѳrinug kasraig sruube yandѳ truyu gѳmѳ, malsrain tsuptinchen,
Kaguende Tius k'arua ѳriibe Tiuswei wamwan wamindan, pѳs Tiusbe nui Espíritun tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳbig kua.
Nѳbe purѳ nuig misrѳb yamigwein gѳben, trune nabe chigucha gѳmíig misrѳb yamig kѳn cha.
Na ѳyeeg taigwane pѳs ñimdѳweinguen mѳrar gѳn: Nabe Cristѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nui merrab attrai k'arua ѳrig kur taigwan.

Inchabe Juanweimay amrruabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Kusrennѳbig, tru mѳg Jѳrdán bi ambѳgatѳmaysrѳ ñiba uñibig, tru ñi namun wamindi mѳѳbe, mѳimbe misaameran piu umbu ulsrѳb uñen, mayeelѳba nuimaygѳba amban cha.
Inchen mѳikkѳben tru ciertѳnig maig kѳben, treeg uñibiibe tѳryumay kemalan cha, nui mariilѳbe Tius maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg mariilѳ gúin gúi tѳrgandѳ kenamisrtrai.

Inchen tru kaigyu pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrѳppe, treekkurrin gѳn cha: tru tѳrbe piraumay arruben, misaamerabe tѳrwan gѳmѳ, lѳstiigwangѳba undaarabelѳ gѳn cha, kaguen nѳmui mariilѳbe tabig kѳmѳ, kailѳ gúikkurri.

Tiusbe yu pirau misagwan truba rruba isua undag kѳptѳ, nui kandѳ Nusrkawanguen tranig kѳn cha, mѳikkѳben nun kѳrebiibe kaigyu kebeña pinab pinѳmѳtѳ, masken managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrain cha.Kaguende Tiusbe nui Nusrkawan yu piraumay ѳrѳppe, yu pirau misagwan kaigyu pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, masken nѳgurri yu pirau misaameran kaigyugurri wesranrrai ѳrig kѳn cha.k
Mutѳgucha nun kѳrebiibe tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrai.
Mѳisésma mu misag warab waraimѳnug tsandzѳn ulwan tsigu mesra kusruibe, ѳyeetѳwei tru Mѳg Misra Arrubigwangucha mesra kusraig kѳmig palѳnrrab gѳn cha.
Srѳmbalasrѳmaybe mugucha nebimuben, tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri kѳrraarrubig, tru Mѳg Misra Arrubiitѳwei nebyan cha..
Nabe ñune isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Nambe maig kui asha waminchib, katѳ namashib namui kaptѳga asigwan waminchen, nam eshkaigwan ñim utѳmѳn cha.
Inchene Nicѳdemѳbe katѳyug payibig kѳn: ¿Treebe maig kѳnrrab gѳh? cha.
Mayeelѳ katѳyug srѳig kallamig kѳn cha, na trendaigwan, kan treebe maig kermab isub kwaara ashmѳta chibig kѳn.n
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe ñun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Pigurlimba, Espílitu Santѳgurlimba kallamíibe Tius nѳ ashib karub wainug kebinrrab gaimanrrun cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe lѳtappe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe ñun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Katѳyug srѳig kallamíibe Tius nѳ ashib karub waisliigwan ashchab gaimanrrun cha.
Katѳ misagweimburab ѳyeelѳ gѳn cha, mu eshkam balaim basrѳmíig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe nѳashib misaamera maig isubelѳ gúigwan tѳrguelarrab asha basraig kua..
Jesús Jerusalén ciudasrѳ Pascua Fiestayu wabene, mѳilѳgѳben, truba nu, nui munchiyu kѳrebelѳ gѳn, Tius nѳba basrain gúi asamig nѳrreelѳ nѳ mariilan ashabe.
Inchawei Jesús katѳyug ѳsiirabene, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe tru nѳ trendaigwan isua, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigwanba, Jesús nѳ maig wamindigwanba kѳrebelѳ gѳn.k
Inchene judíѳsmerabe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Tiuswei yawane marѳb melѳwa cuarenta y seis añѳsyu chab marig kѳbig kѳn cha. ¿Ñigan pѳn gwalѳmyutѳ kusranrrurmab isutirru? cha.m
Inchene Jesúsbe kusrub lѳt'appe trenchibig kѳn: I Tiuswei yawan pѳtiitsay cha. Inchen nabe pѳn gwalѳmyutѳ katѳyug mara pasramѳnrrun cha.
Inchene nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu trenchibigwan isuptinchibelѳ gѳn: Ñui yabe ñuindѳ gѳnrraimab isuptѳ, nane ke chindamdѳ gѳtan chibigwan.

Incha trunun ashippe, Jesúsbe ichabetamig kan latigѳ mara, mayeelanba tru Tiuswei yaugurri webetabig kѳn, tru nѳmui ubishameranba waarameranbañau. Incha tru an yunѳmarѳbelai anwane pirau wiita, mishatsiimeran utsѳbetabig kѳn..
Yandѳ tru judíѳsmerai Pascua Fiestan maramig pub lutau gѳben, Jesúsbe Jerusalén ciudasrѳmay ibig kѳn.

Iig, tru srѳsrѳzhiitѳ Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳnrrai Jesús pѳlbasra mariibe Galilea birau Caná pueblѳsrѳ marig kuig kѳn. Tru treeg mariitѳga nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan ashchai kenamaren, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe nun kѳrebelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru ashib basrabiibe tru pibe vinѳ misrigwan mucha mѳrendѳ, chugurri srua amrruimbe ashmíig kѳn. Truyu purugub pѳnrrabelѳ truilѳbe asha gѳbig kѳn, piwane nѳm wesraig kua. Inchen truyu ashib basrabiibe tru nѳviѳn wama,
Inchen Jesúsbe tru pirishibelan trenchibig kѳn: I kѳtsѳmeran pi netsѳganay cha. Inchen netsѳzheelѳ netsѳganen
Truyube srug kѳtsѳmera seis pѳnrrabig kѳn, judíѳsmera tru nѳm kaig maligwan chish misramigweyasig pi usrѳb tѳgagúilѳ. Tru kѳtsѳmerabe setenta, kabe cincuenta litrѳs kebelѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen vinѳbe batsaptinchen, Jesúswei usrimbe trenchibig kѳn: Vinѳne chab batsѳgain gѳn cha.
Inchen Jesúswanba, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilanba, truilangucha kasharab yaumay linchab amrrunrrai eshkaig kѳbig kѳn..

Incha katѳ Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Pѳs nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Srѳmbalabe kurim basrѳben, Tiuswei ángelesmerabe Mѳg Misra Arrubigweinukkurri nebambub, katѳ nuimay kѳrrѳrrub, inchib gѳben ñimbe ashchabguen cha.k
Inchen Natanaelbe trenchibig kѳn: Kusrennѳbig, ñibe Tiuswei Nusrkai, Israel misagwei Rey gѳn cha.m
Inchen Jesúsbe Natanael kemallib arri ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: ѳibe si, isa gѳmѳ, israelita gúi asamdiig kѳn cha. Nuinuube treeg kѳnmab ashchaindѳ indiibe chigaig kѳn cha.n

Inchen Felipebe Natanaelwan lanrrab yabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriguba, k'atѳ Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ pѳriguba, truilѳyu nuimburab pѳrig pasrab mѳwan nambe wetѳrrer cha. Truibe Nazaret pueblѳyu Jѳséwei nusrk'ai, Jesús kѳn cha.
Tru Felipebe Betsaida pueblѳsliig kѳbig kѳn, tru Andrésba, Pedrѳba waraisliig.

Incha Andrésbe Simónwan Jesúsweisrѳmay pera iben, Jesúsbe Simónwan ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Ñibe Simón gѳn cha, Juanwei nusrkai. Inchendѳ mѳimbe yandѳ Cefas taig kѳnrrun cha, (trenchippe, Pedrѳ cha wamig)..
Tru pailѳ Juan wamindigwan mѳrѳbelѳ Jesúswei mendig ambubelѳbe, kane Simón Pedrѳi nuneg Andrés kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jesúsbe keesha asha, nui mendig amrrui ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: ¿Chi lague? cha. Inchen nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kusrennѳbig, chu wabig kugu? cha.
Jesús pureb pasrai ashabe, Juanbe trenchibig kѳn: Au, asay cha, ѳibe Tiuswei tru Ubishaunѳ gѳn cha.
Katѳ gwalѳm Juanbe tru nui mendig amѳñibelѳ barba gatѳle truyu basrѳwabe,

Inchen nabe katѳgucha nune mu gúi ashmuig kѳn cha. Inchen misaameran pitѳga binѳbulrrai piu ulsrѳnrrai nan Karua ѳrѳbiibe trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Tru ñi ashen Espíritu Santѳ nuim bala kѳrraarrua, pasramisrinabig, truig kѳnrrun cha, Espíritu Santѳtѳga pinѳbulrrabiibe.
Iig kѳn, chibig kѳn, tru na ѳyah taig: Nai wendau attrab mѳѳbe na lataguen gѳmѳ, mas nuig kѳn cha. Kaguende naguen kѳmѳwatѳ, nѳbe manawei kѳbig kuig kѳn cha.
Indiibe gatѳ gwalѳm Juanbe Jesús nuim bulumay pub arri ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Asay cha, iibe Tiuswei tru Ubishaunѳ pirauelѳ kaig mariilan kerranrrabig kѳn cha.
tru nai wendau attrabig. Nabe trunune nui albargatisyu tsiwanguen pichib basramig truburab gѳmuinatan cha.
Inchene Juanbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Nabe pitѳga pi binѳbulrrai ulsrѳbig kur cha. Inchendѳ ñimui utube, ñim asiimíig, kan mugѳsrѳn pasran cha,
Inchen tru Juanwan payrrai karua ѳrѳbelѳbe fariseѳsmera gѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen: Trube, ¿mu gugu? chibelѳ gѳn. Kaguende nambe tru namun karua ѳrѳbelan eshkamig kѳn cha. Trube, ¿ñuimburappe, ñibe mu gur chinrragu? cha.
Inchen Juanbe sѳrѳmѳ, maig kuigwan eshkab, masken maig kuigwan kelarrab eshkaig kѳn. Nabe Cristѳ gѳmur chib.
Tiuswane mugucha managuen ashmuinrrun. Inchendѳ nui Kandѳ Nusrkai Tius, managucha Mѳskaweim bulu trag lincha basrabig, truig namun kenamaran, Tiuswan ashibelѳ gѳnrrai.

Tru Wambe kan mѳg misra, namui utu unig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nambe tru nui tѳrguegwalmabigwan tab asig kѳbig kѳn, tru Mѳskaweinukkurri arrubig Kandѳ Nusrkawei ka yandѳ tab indiiba, ciertѳniibatѳ netsigwan.Juan truigweimburab maig kuigwan eshkappe, trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Iig kѳn cha, tru na ѳyah taig kѳbiibe, nai wendau arrubiibe, na lataguen gѳmѳ, nѳbe purѳ nuig kѳn cha, kaguende naguen kѳmѳwatѳ, nѳmerrig kѳbig kua..
Truilѳbe yu pirau maig k'allabelѳ gѳben treeg k'allawar gѳmѳwei, ureg tѳgagug kѳben tѳgagúig ureg latailѳ gѳmѳwei, k'atѳ mѳwei isuig maig kѳben, trumay gѳmѳtѳ, Tiusweinug k'allawar gѳn.
Trune mutѳgucha nun kashmѳ, utab, nui munchiyu kѳrebelane Tiuswei ureg misra pѳnrramig kѳnrrai tranig kѳn.
Tru tѳr ciertѳnig maya misagwan pilabiibe yu pirau kebarrub arrubig kѳn.
Juanbe nѳashib tru tѳr gѳmѳtѳ, tru tѳrweimburab maig kuigwan ka waminchaptѳ arrig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru tѳrbe lѳstѳyu pilѳben, tru tѳrwane lѳstiibe chinchaguen k'asrѳnrrab gaimaig kѳn.
Tru Wambe srѳsrѳgurri Tiusba basrabig kѳbig kѳn.k
Chigucha gaabenbatѳ tru Wambe manawei pasrabguen inchibig kѳn. Tru Wambe Tiusba basrѳben, katѳ tru Wambe Tius kѳbig kѳn..
ѳyah chippe, Simón Iscariѳtei nusrk'ai, Judaswan waminchibig kѳn. Kaguende tru dѳceelai utuig kuatѳgucha, tru Jesúswan ashig kѳmui inchibelan nѳ trannrrab pasrѳben.
nambe ñun kѳreb, katѳ tru Tiuswei Newan Tabiibe ñi gúi ashib inder cha.k
Inchen Simón Pedrѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¿Señѳr, nambe muimay gúi ambamѳ? cha. Tru managatig ѳsig kѳm wamwane ñitѳwein dѳgaig kѳben
Inchen Jesúsbe nui dѳceelan trenchibig kѳn: ¿Kabe ñimgucha treetѳwei llirawa ambug kѳtah? cha.
Incha katѳ Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Inchawei treekkurri nabe ñimune trenchar cha: Mugucha naimaybe amrrunrraamѳn cha, nai Mѳskai amrrunrrai inchimubene.
Tru Mѳg Misra Arrubig tru nѳ srѳsrѳ waisrѳndѳwei katѳle nebiben asimbe, trube, ¿maig kѳbsruerah? cha.
Inchen Jesúsbe nѳmdѳ chigѳben chib mullib gúi ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñimun ѳyeeg chibene pusrkwatah? cha.
Jesús ѳyeelan kusrenanѳppe, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau Capernaumsrѳ kusrenanig kѳn.
Nai asrwan mab, nai aniwan muchib inchibiibe nainug pasrabig basrѳben, katѳ nagurlingucha nuinug pasramѳnrrun cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Tru Mѳg Misra Arrubigwei asrwan mab, katѳ nui aniwan muchib inchimeelѳbe srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan ñimuinug tѳgagѳnrraamѳn cha.

Tru srѳmbalasrѳngurli ѳsig kѳm birlimbe na gur cha. Mѳikkѳben i birliwan mabiibe managatig ѳsig wanrrun cha. Inchen yu pirau tru maya misagwan srѳig ѳsig kѳnrrai tru na tranam birlimbe nai asrtѳwein gѳn chibig kѳn, Jesúsbe.
Tru ѳsig kѳm birrimbe na gur cha.Ñimui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerabe mu misag warab waraimѳnug tru maná taigwan mabendѳ, kwaig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Tru ѳsig kѳm birrimbe na gur cha.k
Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Nan kѳrebiibe managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳn cha.

Tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ pѳligube treeg chibig pѳlig basran cha: Mayeelanba Tius nѳ gusrenaniilѳ gѳnrrun chibig. Inchawei mayeelѳba Mѳskawan mѳrѳb, nuiwan kusreb inchibelѳbe naimay amrrunrrun cha.
Mugucha naimaybe attraamѳn cha, Mѳskai nan karua ѳrѳbig naimay attrai inchimubene. Inchen naimay arrubigwane nabe srabe gwalѳm gatѳ ѳsiirangarumѳnrrun cha.n

Incha trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿ѳibe tru Jesús Jѳséwei nusrkain gѳmuit'arru? cha. Nambe usri mѳskawan ashibelѳ guer cha. ¿Mѳimbe mandѳgurri nѳbe ѳyeeg t'ah cha: Nabe srѳmbalasrѳngurri kѳrraarrig kѳn cha, trenchippe?
Nai Mѳskai martrai isuibe ѳyeeg kѳn cha: mutѳgucha Nusrkawan nebua asha, nun kѳrebiibe managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrain gѳn cha. Inchen nabe srabe gwalѳm nun katѳyug ѳsiirangarunrrain gѳn cha.m
Inchen nan karua ѳrѳbig martrai isuibe iig kѳn cha: Nѳ nan traniilane ni kanguen trubishimѳ, srabe gwalѳm katѳyug na nѳmun ѳsiirangarunrrain gѳn cha.n
Mѳitѳgucha Mѳskai nan traniibe naimay attrun cha. Inchen naimay arrubigwane nabe managuen wambig weguchimumѳnrrun cha..
Inchendѳ na ñimun trendaim bala ñimbe nan ashippe, ashendѳ, nane kѳremѳn cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, chu uragucha tru birriwan srѳttra cha.
Kaguende Tiuswei pirrimbe tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri yu piraumay kѳrraarrua, katѳ misaameran srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrai tranѳbig, truig kѳn cha.
Namui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamerabe mu misag warab waraimѳnug maná taigwan maig kѳbig kѳn cha, Tiuswei wam maig pѳrigu trendaim bala: Nѳbe nѳmune srѳmbalasrѳ pirriwan manrrai tranig kѳn cha..
Inchene nѳmbe trencha payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Tius ñiba pasrain gúi nam ashib, ñun kѳreb inchaimbe, chi martragu? cha. Trube, ¿chi marѳbig kugu? cha.m
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Tiuswei maramelan marѳb pѳlbasrtrappe, nambe chi maramig balerah? cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Ñimbe nane lappe, Tius naba pasrain gúi asha gѳnrrai mariilan asha gѳmѳtѳ, tru pirrimeran ѳska mamne maig kua, trugurrinrre lan cha.
Incha tru nu misaabe Jesús truyu mu gawei, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ mu gawein gúi ashippe, tru barcѳmerayu kebamba, Capernaumsrѳ Jesúswan lanrrab chab ambubelѳ gѳn.
Katѳ gwalѳm tru nu misag sѳtѳ tru pisu igatѳmay kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳbe truyu barcѳ kandѳzhiitѳ pasrabigu Jesúswei kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe tru barcѳyu amben, Jesúsbe nѳmba tѳga imuin gúi ashibelѳ gѳn.
¡Na gur cha. Kѳrmѳtay! chibig kѳn..
Yandѳ pillirab arruben Jesúswei kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe pisuyu kѳrrѳrruabe,
Inchen Jesúsbe misaamera nun rey martrab ke merrarrawa sruamrrab amrrunrrab gúi wetѳbeñippe, nѳbe katѳyug tunbalasrѳmay inrrab nѳtѳ tarѳmisrѳptinchibig kѳn.k
Inchen tru trattrѳgatѳ cebada birri pirisaigwan maben, yandѳ tru undailan tulishiben, t'asinmera dѳce netsabig kѳn.
Inchen yandѳ ѳska maben, Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan trenchibig kѳn: Pitis unchibelane pirau ka petig warѳmѳnrrai, pitiswane tulisay cha..
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Mayeelanba purramisringaruy cha. Truyube pu truba tsitsig kѳben, mѳguelѳ trattrѳ milburab purramisrѳbelѳ gѳn.n
Inchen kusrenanѳb pera uniilai utuig Andrés, Simón Pedrѳi nuneebe trenchibig kѳn:
Inchene Felipebe trenchibig kѳn: Ni kan mѳg dѳscientѳs días ѳrѳba marѳb megawa an bagaraig utiitѳga pirrim bena, piti biti srѳrramikken nebunrraamѳn cha.
Inchen yandѳ judíѳsmerai Pascua Fiestabe lutau gѳbig kѳn..
Treekkurri nѳmbe Jesúswan sruutѳga petѳnrrab srug kusruben, nѳbe trubabig kѳn. Incha Tiuswei yaugurri webya, ibig kѳn.n
Inchene Jesúsbe lѳtappe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Abrahamguen kѳmѳwatѳ, Na Gur cha.
Merrabsrѳ ñimui mѳskai Abrahambe nain gwalѳm punrrabigwan asha, truba kasraaraig kѳn cha. Incha ashabe, truba kasrag kui indig kѳn cha.

Inchen Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Na naasiitѳwei maya nuguen tab inchib pasraibe, trembe chi marmuinguenig kѳn cha. Nan maya nuguen tab gѳnrrai marѳbiibe nai Mѳskain gѳn cha, tru ñim ñimui Tius kѳn daig, truig..

Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Na maig taigwan mѳra marѳbiibe managuen kwamigwan ashchaamѳn cha.Inchene judíѳsmerabe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Mѳimbe si, aser cha, ñibe k'an kwaimandzig tѳgaig kui. Abraham lata, Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ lata chab gwaben, trune ñibe: Na maig taigwan mѳra marѳbiibe managuen kwanrraamѳn dan cha.
Nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Na maig taigwan mѳra marѳbiibe managuen kwamigwan ashchaamѳn cha.n
Inchene judíѳsmerabe Jesúswan trenchibelѳ gѳn: Ñibe samaritanѳ k'an kwaimandzig tѳgaig kѳn chippe, nambe sѳlwein chibrain gѳn cha.
Kaguende Tiuswei unѳbe, Tius wamindiilan mѳran cha. Trune ñimbe Tiusweyelѳ gѳmѳwa, treekkurri Tius wamindigwane mѳrmeelѳ gѳn cha..
Trune nabe ñimun tru newan ciertѳn waminchene, ñimbe nane kѳremѳn cha.
Ñimbe na wamindigwane ¿chindimbarre chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳh cha? Na wamindigwan ñimbe mѳrmeelѳ guarre treendan cha.
Ñimbe ñimui mѳskai mariilan marѳbelѳ gѳn cha, trenchiben, nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Nambe mu mendaigwei tѳgamisri ureemeragucha gѳmer cha. Nambe mѳskaimbe kandѳ tѳgar guer cha, truibe Tius.
Inchen nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Namui mѳsk'aimbe Abraham gѳn cha. Inchen Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñim Abrahamwei nusrk'alѳ gúimbe, trube ñimgucha, Abraham mari lataigwei marѳbsruinrrun cha.
Inchawei Tiuswei Nusrkai ñimun kaig marѳb melaigugurri elachene, ñimbe isa gѳmѳ, newan elatsiilѳ gѳnrrabguen cha.
Kan karuindiig megabiima yaube managatig kѳrrѳmisrmuben, trune kan nusrkaimbe si, managatig truyu kѳrrѳmisran cha.

Inchen nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Nambe Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera guer cha. Nambe managuen mu karua srua gúindiig melѳmѳ misaamera guer cha. Ñibe ѳyeebe ¿mandѳ chigu? cha, namun elatsiilѳ gѳnrrun chinrrappe.m
Incha ñimbe tru newan ciertѳnigwan nebua ashene, tru ciertѳniibe ñimune ilѳsrkѳbelѳyugurri elatsiilѳ gѳnrrai martrun cha.
Kaguende nan karua ѳrѳbiibe naba basrab, katѳ nѳbe nandѳ elachimѳwei indig kѳn cha. Pѳs nabe managucha marѳppe, nѳ tab gúi wanrrai treegwandѳ marѳbig kur cha, trenchibig kѳn..
Inchen Jesúsbe nui Mѳskawan waminchen, nѳmbe ni chiwan wamindinguen wetѳgѳrrѳmeelѳ gѳn.

Nabe ñimun chigѳben wamindamig truba tѳgagur cha, ñimbe ѳyeelѳ gѳn damig. Inchen nan k'arua ѳrѳbiibe isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn waminchibig kѳn cha. Inchen na yu pirauelan wamindiibe na nun wamindi mѳrigwan, trunun waminchar cha.
Inchawei treekkurri nabe ñimun trendaig kѳn cha: Ñimbe kaig marѳb amѳnailѳyutѳ kwanrrun cha. Kaguende ñim nan na gúitamab isua kѳreimuikkurrimbe, ñimui kaig marѳb amѳnailѳyutѳ ñimbe kwanrrun cha.
Inchene judíѳsmerabe nѳmdѳ trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kabe nѳasiitѳ kwanrrainchippeendi? cha: Na yamsrѳmay iben, ñimbe amrrunrrab gaimanrrun chinrrappe.
Iilan waminchib pasrappe, Jesúsbe tru Tiuswei yau Tiusweyasig an busrim bulu kusrenanѳb pasrѳwa, trendaig kѳn. Inchen mugucha kemѳrtrab inchimeelѳ gѳn, kaguende nun treeg maramig pumѳ srѳ gѳben.n
Pѳs naimburabigwan maig kuigwan eshkabiibe natѳwein gѳben, katѳ nai Mѳskai nan karua ѳrѳbikkucha naimburabigwan maig kuigwan eshkan cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.
Inchen tru maig maramigwan na asha maringuen, truibe maig maramigwan sѳlgandѳ asha marig isa gѳmѳ, treeg kѳn cha. Kaguende nabe natѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nai Mѳsk'ai nan k'arua ѳrѳbiiba misra marar cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Maig kuigwan na naimburaptѳ wamindinguen, na wamindiibe isa wamindig kѳmѳn cha. Kaguende nabe na chugurli arligwan ashib, katѳ chumay yamigwan ashib inchar cha. Trune ñimbe na chugurli arligwan ashmѳwei, ni chumay yainguen ashmѳwei indan cha.
Jesúsbe katѳ fariseѳsmeran trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Nabe yu pirau misagwei tѳr gur cha. Inchen nai mendig uñibiibe managuen lѳstѳyu uñmѳtѳ, tru ѳsig kѳmig tѳrwan tѳgagѳnrrun cha.k
Inchen Jesúsbe kurraashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Au, ishug ¿kanelѳbe chu ambah? cha. ¿Mugucha ñune mѳra meganrrai chi marmuitarru? cha.n
Inchen nѳmbe tru nѳ trendaigwan mѳrabe, mas kѳlleelѳmerrig kan gan pera pѳlbasra, webamba ambub mendabelѳ gѳn, Jesúsba tru ishug truyu pasrabiibatѳ gѳrrѳmisram.m
Nѳmbe ѳyamay payippe, mandѳ inchibig kѳtasha, chigѳben chi kѳptѳrre trencha mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchene Jesúsbe utsѳbasra, tasigunѳtѳga pirau pѳrѳb mendabig kѳn.m
Trube, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe ѳyeeg ishumburmerane sruutѳga peta, kweetsingarubig kѳn cha. Treeg kѳbene, trube, ¿ñibe manchinrragu? cha..
Inchen tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmerababe kan kasharawa ishug kaig marѳb tsuin gѳben merrarrawa, Jesúsweimay srua amrrua, truyu purrabelai tѳbѳtag pasrabe
Inchen Jesúsbe ѳlivѳs Tunsrѳmay ya,
Inchen sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, fariseѳsmerababe karuin gѳbig kѳn, mѳikkѳben Jesúswan chu wai ashibiibe, eshkanrrain cha, Jesúswan kemѳrtrab.m
Inchen tru judíѳsmerai Pascua Fiesta pumig yandѳ lamѳ balѳben, wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳngurri misaamerabe Jerusalénsrѳmay truba nebambubelѳ gѳn, kaig marigwan chish misrtrab, tru Pascua Fiesta pumѳwatѳ..
Tru gwalѳmgurri judíѳsmeran karubelѳbe Jesúswane kwetchab cha waminchibelѳ gѳn.k

Incha Caifásbe trenchippe, ka nѳ trenchig kѳptѳ trenchimuig kѳn. Kaguende tru bilawan nѳbe tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte kuig kѳppe, Tius trenchinrrai isungaruben trendaig kѳn, maya judíѳsmerayasig Jesúsbe kwanrrab gѳn cha.
Maya misagwan ѳrѳba pinisailѳ gѳbgunrriibe, nam maya misagweyasig k'an mѳѳtѳ kwamikken sѳl gúi, treegwandѳguen ashmeelѳ gѳ chindah cha.
ѳyeetѳ martrai nam elachene, mayeelѳba nun kѳreben, Rѳmasrѳ karubelѳbe amrrua, namui Tiuswei yawanba, namui maya misagwanba chab pinishinrrun cha..
Inchen truyu mѳilѳgѳsrѳn fariseѳsmeraisrѳmay ambabe Jesús chi marigwan nѳmun waminchen,k
Inchen judíѳsmera truba nu tru Marían ashchab amrrubelѳbe, Jesús treeg marigwan asha, Jesúswan kѳrebelѳ gѳn.
Ñibe chu uraskucha nane mѳrѳbig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ nabe ѳyeeg chippe, misaamera yu pѳtѳgatan pѳnrraikkurri trenchar cha, nane ñi garua ѳrig kui kѳrenrrai.n
Inchen yandѳ srugwan mendamaren, Jesúsbe srѳmbalaneb neeshabe trenchibig kѳn: Nai Mѳskai, mayanguen ungwa, ungwa cha, kaguen nan mѳrtan cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Srugwan kusruy cha. Inchen Marta tru kwabigwei nuchaabe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, yandѳ irrѳraig kuinrrun cha. Kaguende kwaibe chabguen pib gwalѳmguen gѳn cha.m
Inchen Jesúsbe katѳle nuinetѳ truba rruba isuim basrѳwa, tru sѳrinug kemallibig kѳn. Truibe kan nu rrab gѳbig kѳn, kebambinuube kan nu sruutѳga kasraikke..
Jesúsbe kishibig kѳn.
Incha nѳmun trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Chu sѳrѳgue? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Señѳr ashchab amѳ chiben
Inchen Jesúsbe Maríaba, katѳ tru lincha amrrubelѳ judíѳsmeragucha kisi ashabe, nuinetѳ truba rruba isui inchibig, kan mandѳguen gѳmui inchib kѳn.
Inchen María truba mallatѳ kurra, webyai ashippe, judíѳsmera tru yau nun menrra isui inchimѳnrrai lincha purrabelѳbe wendautѳ ambubelѳ gѳn, sѳrin dulsrѳ kishchab yaitamab isua.
Truigwan chab rrenchabe, Martabe numѳsrai Marían wamѳnrrab ya, nundѳ nilѳ trenchibig kѳn: Kusrennѳbiibe yu pua, ñun waman cha.m
Inchen mutѳgucha ѳsig uñibig nan kѳrebiibe managucha kwanrraamѳn chibig kѳn. ¿Iigwan kѳretirru? chibig kѳn.n
Inchene Jesúsbe nune trenchibig kѳn: Katѳle ѳsiiramiba, ѳsig kѳmibabe na gur cha. Nan kѳrebiibe kwawagucha, ѳsig kѳnrrun cha.
Inchendѳ mѳingucha Tiuswan ñi chi miabendѳ, trannrrab gúi ashar cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe Martane trenchibig kѳn: Ñui nuchaabe katѳle ѳsiiranrrun cha.k
Inchabe Mart'abe Jesúswan trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, ñi yu tsuig kuinguen nai nuchag kwamumba cha.
Inchen judíѳsmerabe Martanba, Maríanba nuchag kwain gѳben menrra isui inchimѳnrrai, lincha burrѳnrrab truba yam amrruin gѳbig gѳn.
Betaniabe Jerusalén bulutѳ gѳbig kѳn, truyugurri kan pѳn kilómetrѳ gѳsrѳnsrѳ.
Nane ñimuimburappe t'abguen gѳt'an chibig kѳn, truyu na mu gaagúikkurri, kaguende trumaybe ñim nan kѳrenrrain cha. Trube, nun ashchab amun chibig kѳn.
Inchabe Jesúsbe tѳrgandѳ trenchibig kѳn: Lázarѳbe kwabguen indan cha.
Inchabe gatѳ Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Lázarѳ namui trendѳ asiibe kiain gѳn cha. Inchendѳ nabe nun kasrѳnanrrab inrrab cha.
Trune kan yem uñibiibe srurrengwanrrun cha, kaguende yembe tѳr chigaig lѳstiig kua..
Incha nѳbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan trenchibig kѳn: Judeasrѳmay k'atѳ amun cha.
tru Lázarѳbe kwanrrѳ tsun daingucha, tru nѳ tsuinug katѳgucha Jesúsbe pa gwalѳm srarrabig kѳn.k

Inchen Jesúsbe trunun mѳrabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tru kwanrrѳbe kwam gwanrrѳ gѳmѳtѳ gѳn cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei maya nuguen tabigwan kenamaramigweyasig kѳn cha, treeg mariitѳga Tiuswei Nusrkawan maya nuguen tabig marig kѳnrrai.
Tru Maríabe, Señѳrwei srѳb pala tru purѳ may irrabzhigwan lusha, nui srѳbwan pusruutѳga pinѳmѳrѳbig kѳbig, truig kѳben, tru Lázarѳ kwanrrѳ tsubiibe nui nuchag kѳbig kѳn..
Incha tru nѳ martrai karua pasriibe managatig ѳsig kѳmig, treeg kui, nabe ashar cha. Inchawei na waminchippe, nai Mѳskai nan maig wamindingaruigwan nabe treeg waminchar cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.

Inchen mѳikkѳben nan k'aashib, na wamindigwan mѳrmub inchibiibe, maig kѳnrrabigwan asha kѳrrѳmartrabig chabguen nѳbe tѳgaguen basran cha. Tru na nun wamindi wamdѳwei tru srabe gwalѳmbe nun maig kѳnrrabigwan asha mara kѳrrѳmartrun cha.
Inchen nan ashibiibe, nan karua ѳrѳbigwan asan cha.n
Inchen Jesúsbe truba mur waminchib trenchibig kѳn: Mѳikkѳben nan kѳrebiibe nan gѳremѳtѳ, nai Mѳskai nan karua ѳrѳbigwan gѳren cha.

Treeg kuingucha tru utu ashib karubelѳguen nun truba nu kѳrebelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ nѳmbe fariseѳsmeran kѳrig kѳptѳ nѳm kѳrewa bѳnrrain gúi ashchai mayeelai merrappe chi kenamarmeelѳ gѳn, tru judíѳsmera tulundzuni yaugurri webusriilѳ gѳmѳnrrab.

Tiusbe nѳmun kabmeran ashmeelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, katѳ nѳmui manrrѳmeran murelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb indig kѳn cha, kaptѳga chigúi ashmѳwei, nѳmui manrrѳtѳga chigúinguen mѳrmѳwei inchain cha, nѳm nuimay llirawa amrruben, tamariilѳ gѳmѳnrrain chib..

Kaguende Isaías, tru Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'ab mѳg ѳyah chib pѳrig nebunrrain gúig kѳn: Señѳr Tius, ¿namui eshk'aigwane mu kѳreitarru? cha. ¿Señѳr Tiusbe nui maramburab maramigwan mun guenamarah? cha.
Yeeg nѳrreelѳ chigѳben Tius nѳba pasrain gúi asha gѳmig mariilѳ nѳmui merrab Jesúsbe kenamaringucha, nune kѳremeelѳ gѳn.

Inchene Jesúsbe nѳmun trenchibig kѳn: Katѳgucha kan maya yanatѳ tѳrbe ñimui utu basrѳnrrun cha. Tѳr tѳgagѳpbatѳ tѳryu amѳnay cha, lѳstiig ñimun ke ka inchib latatѳ merrarramѳnrraimbe, kaguende lѳstѳyu uñibiibe chumay ib basrarmabguen ashmѳn cha.
ѳyamay Jesúsbe mandѳ kwamigwan eshkabig kѳn..
Mѳin gѳn chibig kѳn, yu pirau maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maramig. Katѳ mѳin gѳn, chibig kѳn, yu pirau nѳ garub pasrabig, Satanáswan wambig wegutsamig.
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: I wam mѳrѳ wamindiibe, nayasig kѳmѳtѳ, ñimuyasig kѳn cha.

Nai Mѳskai, ñui munchiwan maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai mar cha, trenchibig kѳn. Inchene srѳmbalasrѳngurri kan wam mѳrѳ, trenchibig kѳn: Nabe nai munchiwan yandѳ maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai marar cha. Katѳyukken maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai maramѳnrrun cha..

Inchen mѳikkѳben naiwan marѳb megabiibe, nai mendig arrumig kѳn cha. Incha na chu basrѳben, nai mendig megabikkucha truyutѳwei pasrѳnrrun cha. Mѳikkѳben naiwan marѳb megabigwane nai Mѳskaimbe nune truba t'ab inchun chibig kѳn.
Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Mѳg Misra Arrubigweyasig purѳ nuig, purѳ t'abigwan kenamaramig yandѳ ut'a pun cha.
Inchen Felipebe ya, Andréswan eshkaben, nѳmbe pailѳba Jesúswan eshkanrrab ambene,
Inchene fariseѳsmerabe k'angurrin gangurri trenchibelѳ gѳn: Au, chiguen maramgaig kѳn cha. Ñimguen asay cha. Maya misaabe kerriguba nui wendautѳ chab amban cha.
Inchagurri tru nu misag sѳtѳgucha Tius nѳba basrain gúi asamig i tru marigwan wammѳrabe, Jesúswan katѳnrrab webambubelѳ gѳn.

Srѳbatѳbe Jesúswei kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe ѳyeeg mariilane chi chibig kuinguen ashmeelѳ gѳn. Inchen yandѳ Jesúswan purѳ nuig, purѳ tabig mara kusruben, truyu wetѳgѳrrabelѳ gѳn, tru ѳyeeg pѳrig pѳnrrabiibe, nuimburab pѳrig pѳnrrѳwa, nun tru ѳyeeg mariilan eshkabig kuin gúi..
Jesúsbe kan burrѳunѳzhig pasrain gѳben, trunun itѳguana ibig kѳn, Tiuswei wamyu maig pѳrig kѳben treekke:k
kaguende Lázarѳgurlindѳ judíѳsmerabe truba nu tarѳmisra, Jesúswan kѳreben.
Inchene sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳbe Lázarѳngucha kwetchab wamincha gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn,
Waachamerane chu uragucha ñimui utube tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Trune nane ñimui utube ñimbe chu uragucha tѳgagѳnrraamѳn cha.
Inchendѳ Judasbe waachameran isubig kua gѳmѳtѳ, niliig kua, trendaig kѳn. Katѳgucha nѳmui anwane nѳ esegab srua uñibig kua, truyu pusligwan wesrubrre inchibig kѳn.
¿Waachameran purugumig i may irrabzhigwan kan trescientѳs denariѳswei yanamdiig kѳmѳ, chindah? cha.

Inchene Maríabe purѳ may irrabzhig nardѳtѳzhig malig libraburab srua arrubig kѳn, truibe truba nuweyig. Incha nѳbe Jesúswei katsig tambalyu itѳlushabe, nui pusruutѳga pinѳmѳrѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru may irrabzhiitѳ ya ѳrѳ kebig kѳn.
Truyube Jesúswan t'ab inchab kan mamig t'amara nena, Mart'abe pirishiben, Jesúsba mishatsigu purrabelai utu Lázarѳgucha wabig kѳn.
Pѳs ѳyeeg pureppe, tru maig maramigwan martrai nѳmui pѳliilѳyu maig pѳlig pasrabig treeg nebunrrain gúig kѳn cha: Chigucha gѳmubendѳ, nan ka tsalѳ indan daig.
Nan tsalѳ inchibiibe nai Mѳskawangucha tsalѳ indan cha.

Na arrumѳwei, katѳ na nѳmun waminchimѳwei indig kuimbe, chi kaig mara bѳnrrѳmubsruinrrun cha. Inchendѳ mѳimbe nѳmui kaig marѳb pѳnrraigwane chigѳben guemesratѳ, ѳyeekkurrin gѳn chib puraambamig kaanrrun cha..

Na ñimun ѳyah taig kѳbigwan isua gúi chibig kѳn: Kan mendig megabiibe nui k'arubigwan purab nuig kѳmѳn cha, trendaigwan. Inchawei nanguen k'aig martrabgѳba, k'aig martrabgѳba indiibe ñimungucha treetѳwei k'aig martrabgѳba inchun cha. Na wamindiilan ñim mѳra marѳbelѳ gúisruandѳbe, ñim wamindiilangucha mѳra martrun cha.
Ñimun yu pirauelѳ tsaliinchene, nanmerrig tsalѳ indig kѳbigwan isunrrigay cha.
Nabe ñimun martrai karua basrѳppe, iigwan karua basrar cha: kangurrin gangurri undaarayanrrai..

Nabe ñimune yandѳ ka karuindiig melabelѳ cha wamѳmur cha. Kaguende kan karuindiig megabiibe nui karub pera wabiibe ni chi marѳb uninguen mѳrmѳn cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nabe ñimune masken nai trendѳ tab lincha amѳñibelѳ cha wamar chibig kѳn, kaguende nabe nai Mѳskawan na chi mѳriilane ñimune kerriguh eshkab kenamarikkurri.
Martrai tru na karua bѳnsrailan marabe, ñimbe nai trendѳ tab lincha amѳñibelѳ gѳn cha.
Inchen na maig maramigwan martrai pasriibe iig kѳn cha, ñim kangurrin gangurri undaguelѳ gѳnrrai, na ñimun undaarab lataitѳwei..
Nabe ѳyeelan ñimun waminchippe, nai kasrag kѳbiibe ñimuinug pasrѳben, tru ñimui kasrag kѳbiibe ka palabinѳtiig kѳmѳ, newanig kѳnrrai inchar cha.
Nai Mѳskai nan undaguig kѳb lat'aitѳwei, nagucha ñimun undaaraig kѳn cha, nai undag kѳbig tѳgagúigu truyu pѳnrrabig pѳnrray cha.
Ñimbe naba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabig pѳnrrѳben, katѳ na wamindiilѳ ñimuinug pѳnrrabig pѳnrrѳbene, ñimun chi miag kѳbendѳ, miay chibig kѳn, ñimune tranig kѳnrrun cha..
Nainug naba kanbalatѳ pasrabig pasrѳmíigwane srarwan latawei wambig weguchen, mullan cha. Incha treeg srarmerane tulisha, nagu parriilѳ gѳn cha..
Ñimbe yandѳ chishelѳ gѳn cha, tru na ñimun wamindig tru wamgurri..
Nѳbe nainug srarmera uvas niimeelane lutiicha, petappe, trune tru uvas nigabelane katѳguchinguen may niirrai tamara barѳb chishmarѳbig kѳn cha.

ѳyeelan nabe ñimun waminchar cha, naba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrѳwabe, chi isumѳ purѳ tab pѳnrramigwan tѳgagѳnrrai. Yu piraube chigѳben isumdiig puig melѳnrrabguen cha. Treeg kuindѳgucha kullaaramѳ, mur isua bѳnrrѳnrrigay cha. Nama yu pirau chine kaigwan kanawa basrar cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.m
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¿Mѳimbesi kѳregueh? cha.
Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Mѳimbeguende ñibe chigѳben iibe ѳyeeg latailѳ gѳn chib, ka kemesratѳ waminchimѳtѳ, tѳrgandѳ kelarrab wamindan cha.
Nabe nai Mѳskaweinukkurri webarrua, yu piraumay arrig kѳn cha. Incha mѳimbe katѳle yu piraugurri, nai Mѳskaweimay yamѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Tru gwalѳmbe ñimbe nai munchiyu Tiuswan mianrrigay cha, pѳs nabe ñimuyasig Mѳskawan miamѳnrrun chimur.
Mѳingatig ñimbe nai Mѳsk'awan nai munchiyube chigucha miamuig kѳn cha. Miay, chibig kѳn, utѳnrrabguen cha, ñimui k'asrag kѳbigwan chigucha palѳmíig newanig kѳnrraimbe.
Inchawei ñimgucha mѳimbe ѳyeetѳwei isub kullaaran cha. Inchendѳ katѳle na ñimun ashene, ñimui manrrѳbe truba rruba kasraaranrrun cha, kasrag kѳbigwan kan muguen kerramgaikke.

Pѳs nabe ñimun isa gѳmѳ, ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Ñimbe isuig wamamѳra kishib gѳmnebe, yu pirauelѳbe kasraaranrrun cha. Ñimbe truba isuig kullaaraig melѳnrrun cha. Inchendѳ tru isuig kullaaraig melaibe katѳlebe kasrag kѳbig misrtrun cha.n
Maya yanayutѳ chippe, ¿mandѳ chibrreendah? cha. Nѳbe ni chi waminchib pasrainguen mѳrmer chibelѳ gѳn.
Maya yanayutѳ ñimbe nane yandѳ ashchaamѳn cha. Inchendѳ katѳ yana gѳmѳwatѳ ñimbe nane gatѳ ashchun cha. Kaguende nabe nai Mѳskai waisrѳmay inrrainchar cha.
Nѳbe nane maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai martrun cha. Kaguende nѳbe naiwan uta, ñimun maig kuigwan asha gѳnrrai kenamartrun cha.m
Nabe ñimune chigѳben eshkamig katѳgucha truba rruba tѳgagѳbendѳ, ñimbe mѳimbatѳbe trengatig nebua chigúi mѳrtrab gaimanrrun cha.
natѳwei kaig mara basraigwan tru chu basrig kѳmigwan kenamariibe, tru Satanás, yu pirau nѳ garubigwan, nune chu basramigwan pasrѳnrrai kѳrrѳmara pasrabguen indikkurrin gѳn cha.
Tru kaig marigwan kenamarѳppe, nan kѳremuikkurrin gѳben,

Inchen nѳ arruppe, yu pirau misaamerane tru kaig maliibe chi gѳbig kuin gúi ashchai tѳrgandѳ kenamarѳb, misagwan Tiusba sѳlgandѳ mandѳ pѳnrramigwan kenamarѳb, natѳwei kaig mara basraibe chu baslig kѳmigwan kenamarѳb inchun chibig kѳn:
Na iilan ñimun trenchib eshkabene, ñimui manrrѳbe purѳ isui indan cha.
Incha mѳimbe nan karua ѳrѳbigweisrѳmay na inrraindingucha, ñimbe mѳikkucha nane paymѳtan cha: ¿Chumay inrrainchigu? cha.
Ñimun ѳyeeg marѳppe, Mѳskawan lata, nan lata ashmeelѳ guarre, treeg martrun cha.k
Nabe ñimun iilan waminchippe, ñimui isubigwan nainuutѳ pasra bѳnrraigwan ni chindinguen mѳrmѳwa bѳnrrѳmѳnrrai waminchar cha.

Nai Mѳskai, ñi nan traniilѳbe, na chu waben nѳmgucha truyutѳwei naba purrѳnrrai inchar cha, tru tѳrguegwalmabig ñi nan tranig kѳbigwan nѳm ashchain cha, tru chiwanguen marmѳwatѳsrѳwei ñi nan undaguig kua, tranigwan.Nai Mѳskai sѳlgandѳ tabig, yu pirauelѳbe ñune mu gúi ashmuindѳgucha, nabe, ñun ashibig kur cha. Inchen iilѳgucha yandѳ nane ñi garua ѳrig kuin gúi ashibelѳ gѳn cha.

Nabe nѳmuinug basrѳben, ñibe nainug basrѳben, trumaybe newan ke kanbalatѳ pѳnrramigwan nebua tѳgagѳnrrain cha. Pirau misaabe ñi nan karua ѳrig kѳbig kuin gúi ashib, katѳ ñibe nan undaarab lat'aitѳwei nѳmungucha undaguig kuin gúi ashib inchai.

mayeelѳba nѳmgucha kandѳ lataig kѳnrrai, ñi nai Mѳskai, naba, ñiba kandѳ gѳb lataitѳweingue. Katѳ nѳmgucha namuinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrai miar cha, pirau misaabe nane ñi garua ѳrѳbwei indig kui kѳrenrrai.k
Tru newan ciertѳniitѳga ñuyasiitѳ tarѳmariilѳ gѳnrrai martra chibig kѳn. Ñui wambe tru newan ciertѳnig kѳn cha.
Na i pirauig kѳmub latawei, nѳmgucha i pirauelѳ gѳmѳn cha.
Incha mѳimbe yandѳ nabe ñi waisrѳmay katѳ attrainchar cha. Incha na yu pirau pasrappatѳ iilan waminchar cha, nai kasrag kѳbigwan nѳmgucha nѳmuinug newan tѳgagѳnrrai.k

Yandѳ nabe naimburappe yu pirau uñmuben, trune nѳmbe yu pirau amѳñibig amѳñinrrun cha, nabe ñuimay arruben. Nai Mѳskai Newan Tabig, ñi nan traniilane ñui munchi maramburab marѳbiitѳga chi nebumѳnrrai ashib tѳgagѳrra cha, naba, ñiba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrab lataitѳwei nѳmgucha mayamba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrain cha.
Nabe nѳmuyasig ñun miar chibig kѳn. Nabe yu pirauelaimburab miamѳtѳ, ñi nan traniilayasig miar chibig kѳn, kaguende ñuielѳ gúimba.
Mѳimbe nѳmbe ashibelѳ gѳn chibig kѳn, chigurrimbunѳ ñi nan traniibe ñuinukkurri arrubig kuin gúi.
Trube mѳimbe, nai Mѳsk'ai, ñui merrab nan tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrai martra cha, tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan marig k'aabenbatѳ manasrѳwei ñui merrab tru tѳrguegwalmabigwan na tѳga waig kѳbiitѳgatѳwei.
Nabe yu pirau ñune maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai marar cha, tru ñi nan martrai karua pasligwan na chab patsѳgѳb.
Tru maya misagweim bala nѳ garub basrѳnrrai ñi trana, tru mayeelan ñi nun traniilane managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tranrraima tranig kuig kѳppe.
Inchene nѳmbe mayeelѳba katѳ trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡ѳigwan gѳmѳtѳ, Barrabáswan elachi! chib. Tru Barrabásbe niliig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchene Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Tru newan ciertѳniibe, chi gѳh? cha. Iigwan chab rrenchabe, Pilatѳbe katѳle webya, judíѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: Nabe tru mѳweinuube chigucha chi kalѳ mariibe wetѳrramur cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Na ashib k'arub tѳgagúig naimbe yu pirauig kѳmѳn cha. Tru na ashib k'arub tѳgagúig yu pirauig kuimbe, trube, nai mendig melabelѳbe nan judíѳsmerai tasku tranig kѳmѳnrrai kwayabsruinrrun cha. Pѳs na k'arumburab ashib k'arub tѳgagúig naimbe yu pirauig kѳmѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Iigwangan ka ñiasiitѳ rrenchitirru? Kabe ¿katѳganelѳ naimburab ñun mu trendaimba rrenchitirru? cha.n
Inchen Pilatѳbe katѳyug tru balaciѳyu kebya, Jesúswan wamabe, bayibig kѳn: ¿Ñigan tru judíѳsmerai rey gѳtirru? cha.

Inchene Pilatѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñim srua ambay cha. Tru maig maramigwan martrai ñimui pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, treeg asha maray cha. Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nam judíѳsmerane ka namuimburaptѳbe mungucha kweechib pѳnrrѳmѳnrrai merig kѳn cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Larrѳ gaig kѳmuimbe, ñui merrab nam mana srua amrrubsru cha.

Inchen yandѳ tѳrrram lut'auguen gѳben Caifáswei yaugurrimbe tru Pilatѳ waig palaciѳsrѳmay Jesúswane srua ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ judíѳsmerabe tru yaube kebammeelѳ gѳn, trѳmbѳig marig chillig indi lat'aig kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrab, nѳm kebammuikkurrimbe tru pascua mamigwan chi gѳmѳ ka mamig kѳnrrai.

Inchene tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtei kan karuindiig megabig, tru Pedrѳ kaluwan lutiitsinab mѳwei nѳmmisaabe, Pedrѳne trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¿Nabe ñune tru ѳlivѳs ellguain dulyu Jesúsba pasrѳben ashib mѳrgѳppeh? cha.
Inchen Anásbe Jesúswan lusrimbatiig tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte Caifásweisrѳmay ѳrѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Trube, na chigѳben kaig taig kѳbene, chiyu galѳ tain gúi eshkau bѳs cha. Inchen tru na trendaig chi kalѳ gѳmubene, trube, nane ¿chindimba bashku? cha.
¿Nane chindimba paygu? cha. Tru na maig tailan wamindi mѳrѳbelan bay, chibig kѳn. Truilѳbe na maig tailan ashibelѳ gѳn cha..
Inchen maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtebe Jesúswan payibig kѳn tru nui mendig amѳñibelaimburab maitѳ gúigwanba, kusrenanѳppe, chitѳ gusrenaniilanba, truilan.
Inchene tru srusrѳbe Pedrѳn trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ñigucha tru ѳ mѳwei mendig uñibig kѳmmѳrgѳppeh? cha. Inchene Pedrѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Kah, nabe tru gѳmur cha.
Simón Pedrѳba, katѳgan Jesús kusrenanѳb pera uniiba Jesúswei wendautѳ ambubelѳ gѳn. Tru kane maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳtei asig kuig kѳppe, Jesúsba truigwei ya wambiisrѳngatig kebiben,
Inchen tru Rѳma suldau sѳtѳmeraba, nѳmun nѳ garub pera basrabiiba, katѳ Tiuswei yau pѳnrrabelѳ judíѳ pѳlicíameraba Jesúswan merrarrawa, lusrѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Jesúsbe Pedrѳn trenchibig kѳn: ¡Espadane painayu way! cha. Tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig punrrabig nai Mѳskai mutchai tranin cѳpan, ¿nagan muchimumuitarru? cha.n
ѳyeeg buppe, Jesús nѳtѳwei ѳyah taig truig nebunrrain gúig kѳn: Nai Mѳskai, ñi nan tranielane mѳigwangucha kanguen trubishimur taig.
Jesúsbe k'atѳle trenchibig kѳn: Yamba nabe, truibe na gur, chimmѳrgѳppeh cha. Nan lab amrruabe, trube iilane ambasay cha.
Inchene katѳle nѳbe payibig kѳn: ¿Mun lague? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Nazaretsrѳ Jesúswan ler cha, trenchiben,

Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Nazaretsrѳ Jesúswan ler cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Truibe na gur cha. Inchen Judas, tru Jesúswan ashig kѳmui inchibelaingatѳ pasramisrѳbiibe, truyu nѳmba pasrabig kѳn..

Incha Judasbe kan sѳtѳ Rѳma misaamerai suldaumeraba, pѳlicíameraba pubig kѳn, sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, faliseѳsmeraba misra karua ѳliilѳ, espadamera gѳben, lámparamera gѳben sruar, nag bilѳga mutar.
Jesús iilan Tiusba chab waminchabe, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳba webya ibig kѳn, Cedrón bi ambѳgatѳsrѳ larramrrab. Tru pi ambѳgatѳmaysrѳmbe kan ѳlivѳs tul basrѳben, Jesúsbe nѳmba truyu kebibig kѳn.
Inchen Jesúswan kurusyu mesraim bulube kan tul ellmarig pasrabig kѳn. Tru tulyube sѳramig kan trab srѳig mungucha wayiimíig, ka basrabig kѳn.
Inchen tru Nicѳdemѳ, tru merrabsrѳ Jesúswan yem waminchab ibikkucha, k'an treinta kilѳsburab may irrabzhig mirraba, álѳesba lindisaig srua arrubig kѳn.
Katѳganbalѳsrѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigugucha gatѳ trenchibig kѳn: Misaamerabe tru lanzatѳga kwaninabigwan ashchun cha.
Inchen nui kaptѳga ashibiibe maig kuigwan wamindan. Inchen maig kuigwan tru nѳ wamindiibe ciertѳn wamindig kѳn. Nѳbe ka isatѳ waminchib pasrѳmurmab isua basran, ñimgucha Jesúswan kѳrenrrai.
Inchen suldaumerabe amba, kanunmerrig srѳmmeran landiicha, trugurrimbe Jesúsba kurusyu mesraig megabigwan kanungucha landiichibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Jesúsbe tru vinѳn yuulen, chab webishabe, trenchibig kѳn: Yandѳ chab marig kѳrrѳmisran cha. Incha turwan utsѳbasra, yandѳ nui espíritun tranѳbig kѳn.
Inchen truyu kan kѳtsѳyu kѳchiibi netsiig tѳgaig pasrѳben, kan ñab espunjan tru piyu kebisha, kan hisѳpѳ srarchigu pucha, mutchai Jesúswei triisrѳ yuulѳbelѳ gѳn.
Inchabe katѳ tru nui kusrenanѳb pera unigwan trenchibig kѳn: Ñui usri lataigwane uyu ñibe pera basran cha. Indig tru uraskurrimbunѳ tru kusrenanѳb pera unig kѳbiibe nui yau pera gѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jesúsbe nui usran ashib, katѳ nui undaaraig kusrenanѳb pera uniibe nui usraim bulu pasrai ashib inchabe, usrane trenchibig kѳn: Au, ñui nusrkai lataigwan uyu ñi pera basran cha.

Suldaumerabe kangurrin gangurri trenchibelѳ gѳn: Kѳlsrѳmugun cha. Trembe tru kewagúigwan muin gѳrrѳmisrtashchab suerte gucha ashkun cha. ѳyeeg maren, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu ѳyah chibig truig nebuig kѳn: Nai kewagúilan nѳmdѳ pirisha, tru nai bala itѳgueigwane muin gѳrrѳmisrtashchab suerte gucha asan daig. Suldaumerabe ѳyeeg marig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Pilatѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Na pѳriibe, bѳrig megabasay cha.k
Incha katѳle palaciѳyu kebya, Jesúswan payibig kѳn: ¿Ñibe chuig kugu? cha. Inchen Jesúsbe nilѳtѳ basrѳben,m

Inchen nѳbe lulѳb ibig kѳn tru Simón Pedrѳba, katѳgan kusrenanѳb pera unig, tru Jesús undaaraig kѳbiiba, truilѳ purrainuumay. Inchabe Maríabe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Sѳlinukkurli Señѳrwei asrwane srua ambin gѳn cha. Nambe chu srua amba wayig mѳrmer cha.

Indiibe tru trendaigwane nunelai utube treeg wam larrѳbitsig kѳbig kѳn, tru kusrenanѳb pera unig, truibe kwamѳnrrab gѳn dan cha. Inchen Jesús trenchippe: Truibe kwamѳnrrab, gѳn cha gѳmѳtѳ, trenchippe, ka: Na arrumnegatig nune ka uñchai indingucha, ñuimburappe treegwane ñibe chi asamig kaagѳn cha, treebe taig kѳbig kѳn.

treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jѳelgurli Tius tru ѳyeeg taig kѳbig, iibe tru gѳn cha:Srabe gwalѳmmerawane treeg pub attrun cha, Tiusbe trendan chib, mu misagweim balatѳgucha nai Espílitun uncha tѳgagѳnrrai ѳramѳnrrun cha. Ñimui nusrkalѳ, ñimui nimbasrmerabe Tius nѳmun chi eshkaigwan eshkaben, ñimui matsѳrelѳbe kan piab lataigu chigѳben ashen, ñimui kѳlleelѳbe piailѳ tѳgagѳnrrun cha.

Trune kanelѳbe indzatѳ ashib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Mutsiguelѳrre inchib waran cha.Inchen Pedrѳbe Cristѳ tru ѳnce karua ѳriilѳba kurra basramisra, nѳbe mur waminchib trenchibig kѳn: Judea mѳguelѳ gѳben, katѳ mayeelѳ yu Jerusalén warab misaamera gѳben, iigwan ñim chigúi nebua ashchain gѳn cha. Na wamindamigwan t'ab mѳrtrai chibig kѳn.

Inchen tru misag sѳtѳbe tru wanrrabigwan mѳrabe, tulundzunabelѳ gѳn. Inchabe ¡paare! kan ѳyeebe chi mandѳ guermab isubelѳ gѳn, kaguende nѳm mѳrene, tru Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳbe mѳitѳgucha peg wam peg wam tru nѳm mѳrѳb pѳnrrabelai wamwan, trunun, rrunun waminchiptinchene.
tru uñchab gaimabiibe ¡gatѳ! kan bѳrsrappe pasrambua, ib menda, Tiuswan Tabiibe ñitѳ gѳn chib, trashib, pѳrsrab Tiuswei yau Pedrѳba, Juanba kebibig kѳn.

Inchendѳ tru treeg marigwan misag utu mas mas wam larrѳbichimѳnrraimbe, mѳingurrimbunѳbe mungucha Jesúswei munchiyube waminchimѳnrrai chigѳben ñimune maramѳnrrun chinrrab cha, nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn.Incha Pedrѳnba, Juanwanba katѳ wamabe, chiweingucha Jesúswei munchiyube waminchimѳwei, kusrenanmѳwei inchai, ¡gatѳ! kandѳ mera basrѳbelѳ gѳn.k

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Mѳguelane nambe chi martrab? cha. Kaguende Jerusalén mayeelѳ warab misaameraimbe Tius nѳmba pasrain gúi asamig marig kan truba nuig kenagѳn cha, nѳmgurri marig. Inchawei nambe chinchagucha chi treeg kѳmѳn dambegaig kѳn cha.

Inchen tru payibelѳbe Pedrѳnba, Juanwanbabe chigucha chi kѳlig kuin gѳmѳ, lѳtab pѳnrrai ashib, katѳ mana chu kusreb purrѳmeelѳ, chigucha gѳmeelѳ gúin gúi ashib inchabe, truba kwaara asha, nѳmune Jesúswei mendig amѳñibelѳ gúin gúi nebua ashibelѳ gѳn.
Truyube maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte tru Anás kѳben, Caifás kѳben, Juan gѳben, Alejandrѳ gѳben, maya sacerdѳtesmeran karubigwei yauelѳ gѳben mayamba, truyu purrabelѳ gѳn.
Truyube mugucha chindamgaig k'asraig pasrѳben, wegѳrrѳmѳnrrai, ashibelѳgucha yask'abmerayu pѳnrrѳbendѳ, yask'abmeran nam kurene, umbusrѳmbe mugucha gaagѳptindig kѳn cha.
Incha kwanrreelanguen tru puraambub lliraig calleswan camamerayu, tsigalmerayu srua amrrua pѳnsrѳbelѳ gѳn, Pedrѳ puraiben, nui pѳrr mѳsiitѳguen mѳigwan gѳben kwanrreelaim bala kasrѳnrrai..
Incha Cesareasrѳ pua, kubenadurwan tru kilga bѳra ѳrigwan tranabe, Pablѳngucha nui merrab pera kemallibelѳ gѳn..

Incha Pablѳbe tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelѳ, tѳbѳbe fariseѳsmera gѳben, tѳbѳbe saduceѳsmera gúi ashabe, tru Setenteelan truba mur trashib trenchibig kѳn: Nai nunelѳ, nabe fariseѳ gѳb, fariseѳwei nusrk'ain gѳb gur cha. Katѳ kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramigwan muniirabig kuikkurri, ѳyeeg indinab payib sruagúinab pasrar cha.
Kaguende truyu tru nu misag sѳtѳbe mayeelѳba wendautѳ trenchib trashib amrrubelѳ gѳn: ¡Kweechi! chib.

Incha gatѳ gwalѳmbe Pablѳbe namba Jacѳbѳn ashchab amben, truyu tru Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelѳgucha kerrigu tulundzunabelѳ gѳn.Inchen Pablѳbe ka lincha warѳgue chabe, lutѳgurrih waminchibig kѳn, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerai utu nui maramelan marѳb uniilѳtѳga Tius chitѳ mariilan.

k'atѳ mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Jesucristѳi kusrenanigwan marѳb melabelѳ cesareasreelѳgucha namba amrrubelѳ gѳn, k'an chipresriig Mnasun taigwan perar. Tru Mnasunbe manasrѳwei Cristѳimburabelan marѳbig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nambe truigwei yausrѳ pua, kiamig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Chinchabrre kishib gѳgue cha, nai manrrѳwan kullaaranѳb ke nan ka isui inchai inchib? Pѳs nabe ka lusriitѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, kwamig nebubene, Jerusalénsrѳ ka kwanrraptѳ basrar cha, Señѳr Jesúswei munchigurri.

Incha namuinug puabe, Pablѳi pѳrѳnaigwan kusrua, nѳasiitѳwei katsigwanba, tasigwanba lusrabe, trenchibig kѳn: Espíritu Santѳbe trendan cha: Jerusalénsrѳmbe judíѳsmerabe i pѳrѳnaig buaigwane ѳyeeg lusra, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran tranrrun cha.n
Incha truba isui kishib waminchibelѳ gѳn, kaguende Pablѳbe nune yandѳ mas ashmѳnrrautan chib wamindikkurri. Incha barcѳsrѳngatig lincha ambubelѳ gѳn.

Chiyutѳgucha nabe ѳyeeg mariilѳtѳga, truburab gѳmeelan kuñab purugunrrab, ѳyamay gѳmig kѳbig kuitamab asha gѳnrrai marѳb ñimun kenamarig kѳbig kѳn cha. Señѳr Jesús ѳyah tailane nai turyube ke tindѳgague: Tranamibe, utamig lataguen gѳmѳ, mayanguen tab gúig kѳn cha, tru trendaigwan.
Nabe anwan lata, ѳrѳn lata, asru keelan lata, muiwangucha naimarѳmmѳrѳ inchib chull incha gѳmur cha..

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, pesannamѳ tab ashiptѳ, katѳ isua guy cha, tru na pѳn bila ѳrѳba yem, gwalѳm ñimun mѳigwandѳgucha maig melamigwan ke isuppatѳ melѳnrrai, ñimun chu uraskucha kanun ganun na kappin gѳrrѳgѳb wamindig kѳbig kѳn cha.
Ñimui utu Señѳrweimburabelan maig kѳben inchimѳ, tammay marѳb, truba kappin gѳrrѳgѳb, judíѳsmera nan chinetѳ kaig martrab gurrѳben, treelѳyu pureb arligwan.
Pablѳbe Miletѳsrѳngurri wamѳnrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn, tru Efesѳ iglesiasrѳ tru Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelan.
Incha truyugurli webamba, katѳ gwalѳmbe Quíѳ ciuda binrrѳguesrѳ pubelѳ guer. Incha wendѳ gwalѳmbe Samѳs ciudasrѳ pua, katѳ gwalѳmsrѳmbe Miletѳ ciudasrѳ pubelѳ guer.

Inchen bereasriig Pirrѳi nusrkai Sѳpater gѳben, tesalónicasreelѳ Aristarcѳ gѳben, Segundѳ gѳben, Derbe birausreelѳ Gayѳ gѳben, Timѳteѳ gѳben, Asia birausreelѳ Tíquicѳ gѳben, Trófimѳ gѳben Pablѳn linchibelѳ gѳn.
Incha tru birau truѳrѳ llirab uña, Tiuswei ureemeran maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melѳnrrigay chib truba nu wamincha guetabe, Greciasrѳmay ibig kѳn.

Kaguende judíѳsmera tru nѳm treeg kѳmѳn chib amrruigwane mayeelai merrab Apѳlѳsbe mu mandamgaig treeg kѳn chib waminchibig kѳn. Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu treeg chibig kѳn cha eshk'ab: Jesúsbe tru Cristѳ ñim muniirab gúig, truig kѳn chib.

Incha Apѳlѳsbe judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau mungucha kѳrmѳ waminchib kusrennѳb pѳlbasren, Priscilaba, Aquilasba tru wamindigwan mѳrabe, Apѳlѳswane nѳѳrѳ pera amba, Tiuswei maywan gatѳguchinguen tab nebua asingarub maig kuigwan eshkabelѳ gѳn..
Inchen tru uras k'an judíѳ alejandríasriig, Apѳlѳs taig, purѳ may waminchib mѳg Tiuswei wam pѳrigwangucha treetѳwei purѳ nu nebua ashibig, Efesѳ pubig kѳn.

Inchen Pablѳbe ke waminchabguen inchen, Galiónbe judíѳsmeran trenchibig kѳn: ¡Au, ñim judíѳsmera! Kan chigѳben truba nu galѳ marig kui, kabe purѳ rrѳmbѳig marig treeg chigúimbe, trube na ñimun treegwan mѳrѳb wabsrubrainrrun cha.

Kaguende nambe Tiusweinug ѳsig bѳnrrab, nѳgurri llirab amѳñib, nѳgurri misag bѳnrrer cha. Katѳ kan ñimui utuitѳwei, chiwan gѳben purѳ tabzhig isua waminchibiima trendaig kѳbig kѳn cha: Nambe Tiusweinukkurri larrѳbicha amrrub misaamera guer cha.Pѳs trube, nam Tiuswei ureemera gúig gѳppe, Tius nѳ trendѳ maig kuigwane kabe ѳrѳn, kabe anwan, kabe srugwan mѳguelai isuitѳga taska purѳ tabzhig mari lataig kuitamab isumgaig kѳn.

Katѳ misag nѳmui taska maliilѳtѳga tab inchaim balai wamíig kѳn cha, chi palai wamíig kuabe. Kaguende nѳ gѳn cha, mayeelan ѳsig kѳmigwan tranѳb, israb amѳnamig kѳnrrai tranѳb, katѳ chigurlimbunѳ tranѳb inchibiibe.

Kaguende mayeelѳba Atenas warab misaameraba, katѳ tru petѳ ka amrruatѳ warabelѳba ¡gatѳ! chi peg isumѳtѳ, chigѳben ke srѳig isuigwandѳ waminchib gua, nѳmbe truigwangѳba wamindi mѳrѳg kui inchib gѳbig kѳn.

Incha treekkurri judíѳsmera kusrenani yau judíѳsmeraba, gatѳganelѳ Tiuswan truba isua melabelѳba iibe ѳyeeg kѳn chib, iibe ѳyamay gѳn chib ambugurri igurri waminchibelѳ gѳn, katѳ mayeelѳ misaamera tulundzuninug kwalѳmmѳrig truyu amrrubelѳba chigucha.
Inchen Tesalónicasrѳ judíѳsmerabe, Tiuswei wamwan Bereasrѳngucha Pablѳ eshkab kusrenanѳb unan daig wammѳrѳppe, trusrѳ misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabigwan namig kui inchib gurrѳnrrai martrab ambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha trugurrimbe Pablѳnba, Silaswanba nui yamay pera ya, manna, nѳba, nui yauelѳbañau Tiuswan kѳreikkurri truba kasraarabelѳ gѳn.
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr Jesucristѳn kѳreu cha. Incha ñiba, ñui yauelѳbañau kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrabguen cha.
Inchen misaabe mayamba kanbalatѳ misra namig kurrѳben, maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marѳb purrabelѳbe, Pablѳmera kewagúilan tsakkandѳ wesrawabeta, tsiitѳga itchai karubelѳ gѳn..

Inchen Antiѳquíagurrimba, Icѳniѳgurrimba mѳilѳgѳsrѳn judíѳsmera puabe, misag purѳ nu pasrabigwan ke kaig maramne inchai wamincha, Pablѳn kwetchab srug mut'a pet'a, ciudayugurri wambiisrѳmay ke paluunchib megam srua webambubelѳ gѳn, yandѳ kwaig kѳnmab.
Inchen misaamerabe Pablѳ chi marigwan ashippe, nѳmui Licaѳnia rriimay trenchib trashib mendabelѳ gѳn: ¡Mѳguelѳ lataig, tiusmera namuinug kѳrrѳrruin gѳn! chib.
Inchen Listrasrѳmbe kan mѳg kallainukkurri managuen uñchab gaimabig srѳbmera tuluntsunig wabig kѳn.m
Inchen Pablѳbe suldau sѳtѳ cienwan nѳ garub pera basrabigwanba, suldaumeranba trenchib eshkabig kѳn: Iilѳ yu barcѳyu ka burrѳmѳtѳ wegѳrra ambisruandѳbe, ñimbe ѳsig webamrraamѳn cha.
Inchen nѳrrѳ sruumerayu melambumuitamab kѳrig kѳben, barcѳn imѳnrrai merrarrabig pibgatѳ wendaumay kuatsiguelѳ piu kebusriilan kebeta, ke kan petѳ tѳrrraimbemab isub munig melabelѳ gѳn..

Inchen amrrub gúig yandѳ yanaguen misrѳb arruben, yandѳ tru barcѳyu ambamikkucha purѳ gѳrig kѳnrraptiig misrѳb arrubig kѳn. Kaguende tru ayunain gwalѳm puraibwei inchen, yandѳ tru sre bѳl kebinrrab gѳbig kѳn. Incha Pablѳbe ѳyeeg maramdiig kѳn chib waminchibig kѳn:

Incha tsѳndatѳ truba yam gwalѳm ambub melѳwa, isig ichibig namun merrammaygѳba megambub ichen, ke trendѳ pumubsruatѳ Gnidѳ pinrrѳguesrѳ pubelѳ guer. Incha Salmón pinrrѳguesrѳ Creta isig srѳrrѳ guetawan puraambub ambubelѳ guer.
Incha yandѳ tru nu bi tѳbѳtaasrѳ Cilicia birauba, Panfilia birauba pinrrѳguesrѳ misrѳb ambabe, yandѳ Licia birau Mira ciudayu pubelѳ guer.
nѳmdѳ nѳѳrѳsrѳ ambabe, kangurlin gangurli trenchib waminchibelѳ gѳn: I mѳѳbe chiburѳ kwanrrai maramdiig kѳmѳwei, katѳ kailan keeli yau keera tѳgagѳmdiig kѳmѳwei marѳbig kuin gѳn cha.

Inchene Pablѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Yandiitѳgatѳ gúi lata, kabe nu wamindiitѳga gúi lata, ñitѳ gѳmѳtѳ, mѳi yu mѳrѳb purrabelan chigucha kerriguelѳba na latailѳwei misra pѳnrraimbemab isutan chibig kѳn, inchendѳ nan lata cadenatѳga ѳyeeg merrarraimeelѳ..

Pѳs rey Agripabe, iilane kerrigu ashibig kuimba, nui merrab chigucha chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳ waminchar cha. Kaguende nѳbe iilane ashmíig kѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, nebua ashibig kuit'amab isua basrar cha. Kaguende iilane kan turiumbu mu sѳratѳ marikkucha gѳmѳn cha.
Pablѳbe kaig mara basrѳmur chib, waminchib basramnetѳ, Festѳbe ѳyah chib trashibig kѳn: ¡Pablѳ ñibe chugúi mѳrmíig misriasѳna! chib. ¡Menrra gusreptѳ chugúinguen mѳrmíig misrin gѳn! chib.

Inchendѳ mѳin gwalѳmgatig Tius nan purugúitѳga nabe yu basrar cha, kusrebelan lata, kusremeelan lata maig kuigwan na waminchib. Nabe waminchippe, ka nѳѳrѳtѳ peetѳ waminchimѳtѳ, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ maig purainrrun daigwanbah, katѳ Mѳisés maig purainrrun cha eshkaigwan, truigwanbatѳ waminchar chibig kѳn:

Damascѳsrѳ warabelaisrѳmaymerrig ibig kur cha. Incha trugurrimbe Jerusalénsrѳmay, trugurrimbe Judea birau kerrigu truѳrѳ ya, katѳ trugurrimbe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraisrѳmay ya, nѳmui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirawa, yandѳ tru kaig marmѳnrrab isua mѳrin gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai t'abig marѳb inday chib eshkab waminchibig kur cha nabe.

nebua ashchai ñi nѳmui kabmeran kuren, lѳstѳyu amѳñibelѳ gѳbig kuig, tѳryumay werrub, katѳ Satanás maramburab mariilѳ gua, Tiusweimay purѳrrunrrai. Tru nѳmui kaig mariilan ulѳ bayiimíig pesannaig kѳmigwan uta, tru nѳmui isubigwan nainug pasrikkurri tru Tiusweyasig tarѳmariilѳba tѳgatѳ, tru keta tranamig tѳgagúigwan utamig kѳnrrain chibig kѳn.m

Inchendѳ kurra, pasramisr chibig kѳn. Kaguende nabe ñun kenamisrѳppe, naiwan marѳb megabig kѳnrrai wesrawa basrtrappa, katѳ mѳi naimburab ñui kaptѳga ñi asigwan waminchibig kѳnrraimba, katѳ wendѳsrѳ naimburab maig kuigwan kenamaramigwan eshkabig kѳnrraimba treeg martrab kenamisrar cha.

¡Nai tab rey! mayu kwalѳm dѳbѳtaabe srѳmbalasrѳngurri kan tѳrbilabig pѳrr lataguen gѳmѳ, purѳ tѳrig naingatanba, tru naba ambubelaingatanba pilѳben,nambe pirausrѳ sѳtѳba kѳrrinabig kѳn cha. Inchen kan wam hebreѳmay trenchib wamindi mѳrѳptindinabig kѳn cha: Saulѳ, Saulѳ cha, ¿Chindimbarre nane kaig martrabgѳba inchigucha? cha. Ñibe kan wey kѳlabus tsѳb pѳnsrailѳyu sѳl yatab lataitѳwei incha, ñibe ka ñiasiitѳ gѳrriindan cha..

Jerusalénsrѳma treeg marѳbig kur cha. Sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳ nan treegwan martrai karuigwan uta, Tiuswei misaameran kailan keeri yau pѳnsrѳb, katѳ kweecha betѳbene, nabe truilaingatѳtѳ inchib pasrabig kѳbig kur cha.m

Inchen tru trendѳ kaig kuinaigu isub pasraibe Tiuswan t'arѳmisra, kwaig lat'aig pasraig, treeg kѳben, trune Espíritu Santѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben treegwan isub pasraibe srѳig ѳsig kѳmiba, Tiusba chi isumgaig t'ab gѳmiba, treeg kѳn.

tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳligu sѳlgandѳ maig marѳb gѳmigwan karuilѳ namuinug malig kѳrrѳmisrtrai, tru namui trendѳ kaig kuinaigu marѳb amѳnainug kѳmѳtѳ, tru Espílitu Santѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben marѳb amѳñibelainug.

Kaguende Espíritu tru martrai karua pasrig ѳsig kѳmig Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabiibe, tru kaig marѳbig kѳnrrai indamba, kwamig kѳnrrai indamba tru martrai karua pasrig treeg inchibigugurri nane wesruig kѳn.
Inchawei tru na marmuinrrabna indigwan na maliibe, narre malig kѳmѳtѳ, nainug kaig martrai inchib pasrabig, truirre marѳb pasran.
Inchawei tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳliibe newan tabig kѳben, katѳ tru martrai karua pasliibe newan tabig, sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳbig, tabig kѳn.

Nabe waminchippe, misaamera wamindimay waminchar, kaguen ñim misaamera gúig kѳppe, isuigu kullaguelѳ gúimba. Pѳs tru merrabwanma ñimui asru tasiimera, srѳbmera ѳyeelѳ chine tѳgagúilan kѳsѳngѳnrraptiigweyasig treegwandѳ, treegwandѳ gatѳguchinguen, gatѳguchinguen trѳmbѳig marѳb gѳmima gúibe. Mѳimbe treetѳwei ñimui asru chine pѳnrrabigwan tru sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳb gѳmigweyasig treegwandѳ marѳb gѳmig trannrrab inday, ñimuyasiitѳwei Tiusweindѳ tarѳmarig pѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Cristѳbe kwappe, tru kaig marigweimburab kan bijitѳ managatigweyasig kwawa, katѳ mѳi ѳsig wappe, Tiusweyasig ѳsig wan.n

Inchawei tru kaig maliibe misagwan Tiusweinukkurli tarѳmara, kwamigumay srua ib truig kerliguwan nѳ garub pasrab lataitѳwei, tru ka yandѳ tab indikkucha tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maliitѳga kerliguwan nѳ garub pasrѳnrrain gúig kѳn, managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgaig Jesuclistѳ namui Señѳrgurli.

Kaguende k'an mѳѳtѳ maig k'aruigwan mѳra marmuikkurrindѳ misaamera truba nѳrrѳ k'aig marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai mara kѳrrѳmariibe, k'atѳ treetѳwei k'an mѳѳtѳ tru maig k'aruigwan mѳra mariibe truba nѳrrѳ chigucha chi k'aig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmariilѳ gѳnrrun.

Pѳs Tius tru karua basrigwan kan mѳg, nѳtѳ kaig marѳb itѳbunikkurrindѳ maya misagweim bala tru kwamig nѳ garub pasrѳnrraima, tru kan mѳѳtѳ ѳyeeg mariibe, treetѳguen gѳmѳtѳ, tru Jesucristѳ, nѳ kan mѳkkurrindѳ nѳm ѳsig kuigube chigurrimbunѳ arrubigwan nѳm kanawa puraambub amrrun, tru Tiuswei nѳrrѳ ka yandѳ tab indigwanba, tru chi kaig kѳmíig lataig kѳmig ketigwanba Tius tranig utabelѳ.m

Inchendѳ Tius nѳ keta traniiba, tru k'arua pasrigwan Adán k'aig marѳb itѳbuniibabe treetѳwein gѳmѳtѳ, peg kѳn. Kaguende Tius k'arua basrigwan k'an mѳg k'alѳ marѳb itѳbunikkurrindѳ misag truba nѳrrѳ kwamima gúibe, treetѳguen gѳmѳ, Tiuswei tru k'a yandѳ tab indiibe misag nѳrrѳ bѳnrrabelaim bala arrumburab arrig kѳn, tru Jesucristѳ k'an mѳweinukkurrindѳ k'a yandѳ keta tranig arrubig.

Pѳs kaig mariima kan mѳkkurrindѳ yu pirau kebarruben, kwamibe tru kaig marikkurri arrig kѳbene, ѳyeetѳwei tru kwamibe maya misagwan puraarrub arrig kѳn, kaguende mayeelѳba kaig marig kua.Tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig chigaabenbatѳwei, kaig mariibe yu piraube pasrabguen indig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig kaabene, kaig marigwangucha chi isua asamig kaabig kѳn.m

Mѳimbe yandѳ Señѳr Jesúsclistѳi ani lusiitѳga nam chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig pѳnrraig kѳppe, mѳimbeguende Tiuswei trѳmbѳig namig kѳbig namuim bala attrabig pasrabigwan Clistѳgurli treeg pumѳnrrai maliilѳ gѳmѳnrrun.

Tabig sѳlgandѳ uñib mѳweimburѳ kan mugѳben nѳ purѳbasramisra kwanrrab indamibe purѳ murig kѳn, ke kan larrѳ tabig marѳb mѳweimburѳgan pѳs kan mube nѳ purѳbasramisra kwanrrab pasramisrѳbwei inchibsruitarru gѳben.

ѳyeeg kѳben Tius tru treeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisligwane Abrahambe treeg kѳmuptinchaitamab isumuig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nui isubigwan nѳ Tiusweinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúibe masken mur basrѳnrrai malig pasrѳwa, Tiusweyasig maya nuguen tabig marѳbig kѳn.

Chi treeg kѳnrraitamab isua muniiramig chigagúingucha, Abrahambe kѳrewa, muniirab megaig kѳn. Treekkurri truba yambalѳ peesrѳn, beesrѳ warѳnrrab misaamerai mѳskai misrig kѳn, Tius ѳyah taimbala: Ñuinukkurri karrab misaabe ѳyeeg nѳrrѳ gѳnrrun daig.
Inchen Tiusba tab pѳnrrѳnrrab chi marmuindѳgucha, tru kaigwan chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig kѳrrѳmarѳb Tiuswan kѳrebene, tru nui isubigwan nuinug pasrigwane Tiusbe sѳlgandѳ tabig kui asan.
¿Tiuswei wamwan pѳligube mandѳ chibig kѳh?: Abrahambe Tiuswan kѳreben, treekkurli nune Tiusbe chi kaig kѳmíig lataig, tabig treeg asha paslig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿nam judíѳsmerabe katѳguchi t'abelѳ gѳbra chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳmѳn. Kaguende: Judíѳsmeran lat'a, judíѳs kѳmeelan lat'a, kaibe mayeelanba nѳ garub tѳga basran cha. Yandѳ nambe: Treeg kѳn cha chab rrendaig kuig kѳn.
Inchen tru nai isa wamindiibe Tiuswei newan ciertѳnigwane masken maya nuguen tabikken gѳnrrai marendѳbe, trube ¿nane katѳgucha chindimbarre kaig marѳptiig kuig mara gѳrrѳmarah?k
Pѳs nѳm mѳilѳgѳben Tiusba maig pѳnrramigwan treeg pѳnrrѳmuingucha, tru nѳm Tiusba treeg pѳnrrѳmuikkurrindѳ, Tius nѳ maig tabig kuigwane treeg kѳmѳnrrai mana rreeg martrab gѳ.
katѳ ñibe Tius maig martrai palai waigwan nebua ashib, katѳ tru purѳ tabigwane ñibe tabigwein gѳn chib, pasrab inchibig kѳn, kaguende ñibe tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanig kua..

Inchen ѳyeebe tru mѳguelѳ nѳmui manrrau mu asiimíig nѳmuinetѳ tѳgagúilan Cristѳ Jesúskurri Tius maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marѳb gwalѳm treeg kѳnrrun, Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan na wamindig maig kѳben..

Pѳs tru judíѳsmera gѳmeelѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig chigarguen tru pѳrig maig martrain chibigwan nѳmbe k'a trendѳ treeg marѳb amѳñippe, nѳmbe tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigwane chigarmerabe gѳbendѳ, nѳmui mariilѳyu tru maig martrai k'aruigwane pѳri latailѳ gѳbig kѳn nѳmashib.

Inchawei maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwan chigarmera gua, mutѳgucha kaig marѳbelѳbe tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigu asha mariilѳ gѳmuingucha, pinab pinamnuumay amben, katѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwan tѳgarmera gua, kaig marѳbelѳbe, trube, tru nѳmui pѳrig tѳgagúitѳwei maig kѳnrrabigwan asha mariilѳ gѳnrrun.k

Inchendѳ ñibe ke ñi isuigwandѳ martrab inchibikkurrimba, mas kaig marmѳnrrab ñui manrrau ñi isua mѳrmuikkurrimba, ñibe Tiuswei namig kѳbigwan nui sѳlgandѳ maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maram gwalѳmwei ñuyasiitѳwei tunbasrѳb yan, Tiuswei tru maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ asha marig kenamisram gwalѳmweyasig..

Au, ñi tru katѳganelѳ treeg marѳbelan ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳn chib pasraptѳga, ñigucha treetѳwei marѳb pasrѳbendѳ, ñi isuppe, ¿Tius tru maig kѳnrrabigwan treeg kѳnrrai mara pasrigugurri chi indiimíig ñigan welulrrurmatirru?

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, au, ñibe chi guemesra gѳben ashmíig kur tamibe chigagѳn, ni mu gúingucha, ñi katѳganun ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib basrabiibe. Kaguende ñi katѳganun ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn chib basrappe, ñibe ñiasiitѳwei kebeñib basran. Pѳs katѳganun ñi ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbig kѳn, chib basraptѳga ñigucha treetѳwei marѳb basran.
Nai misag Herѳdiónwanba, Narcisѳi yauelѳ Señѳrwan kѳrewa pѳnrrabelanba ka amѳñigueh t'an chirrunrrigay.

Españasrѳmay na inrrab arrua, pua burainrrab inchar. Kaguende nabe ñimun asha burainrrab isur, tru petѳ purainrrab arrua, kan maya yana ñimba lindigu truba kasraatѳ buraya, na trusrѳmay yamigwan ñim nan purugunrrai.n

Pѳs nabe Cristѳn tru mana wamindi mѳriimѳsrѳ, treegu tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb basramigwan mas isua martrab inchibig kur, Cristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan mѳikkѳben eshkab kusrennѳbig pѳlbasra marinug srѳig itѳ marѳb guebimѳnrrab.

Pѳs nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Clistѳbe judíѳsmera, tru circuncidawarmeran purugub meganrrab arlig kѳn cha, tru Tiuswan mѳrѳbelѳ merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaameran nѳ maig martrab kѳrrѳmislig kѳbigwan treeg malig kѳrrѳmisrtrai, ѳyamay Clistѳbe kenamartrab indig kѳn, Tiusbe nѳ maig martrab taigwane treeg marѳbig kui ashchai.

Trune tru k'alѳ gѳnrraitamabgѳba isubendѳ mabiibe, maikkurrindѳ k'aig mara basramisran. Kaguende nui isubigwan Cristѳinug tѳgagѳmubendѳ maran. Inchawei chitѳgucha isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigugurrin gѳmѳtѳ arrubiibe, k'aig kѳn.
Pѳs trembe yau mamѳwei, vinѳ muchimѳwei, katѳ ñui nunewan penѳsrkѳnrrabig chigѳben marmѳwei indikken, sѳl gѳn.
Kaguende Tiuswei wamyube trenchibig pѳrig basran: Señѳrbe trendan cha: Na ѳsig wamma waibe, treetѳwei nai merrappe mayeelѳba tѳmbѳnsrѳben, katѳ mui nilѳtѳgucha Tiuswan tabig kѳn chib, waminchun  cha.
Kaguende Cristѳbe ѳyeeg kѳnrraiwei kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiraig kѳn, kwabelai lat'a, ѳsiguelai lat'a mayeelaim bala nѳ Ashib Karub Pasrabig kѳnrrab.

Pѳs mѳnundѳgucha ñim maig pagaramigwan trunun treeg bagaramig kѳn: chi tѳgagúimburѳ chi pagaramigwane trunun bagarab, yanѳb, penab indimburѳ pagaramigwane treeburѳ pagaramig kѳn. Inchen tab inchib tѳgagѳmelane tab inchib, maig kѳbash inchimumelane tab inday.

Kaguende tru ashib karub purrabelѳbe tru tabig marѳbelan truba kwaarѳsra tѳgagѳnrrab purrѳmѳtѳ, kaig marѳbelane nѳmbe treeg martrab purran. ¿Ashib karub wabigwan chi kѳrig isumѳ, ñune treeg uñig kѳtah? Pѳs, trube, tabigwan mar, trumaybe nѳ tabig wamindig kѳnrrabguen..

Misagwan ashib karub purrѳnrrai purrѳnniilane nѳm maig chiben mayeelѳba truilan mѳramig kѳn. Kaguende ashib karub purrѳnrrai purrѳnniilѳbe Tiuskurrin gѳmíibe purrѳmѳn. Inchen treeg purrabelѳbe nѳ treeg kѳnrrai mariilѳgurrim burran.k
Ambugurri, igurri lata tabig lincha warab, truba nѳrreelѳ gѳmmѳrѳ inchimѳtѳ, chigucha gѳmѳ misaazheelѳba chi pesriig kui mѳrmѳ linchibelѳ gѳmig kѳn. Ñim ñimuinetѳ truba kusrebelѳ guermab isumѳtay..

Katѳganelan ѳyamay maramdiig kѳn chib waminchibig kѳmigwan ut'a tѳgaibe, ѳyamay maramdiig kѳn chib waminchi. Chigѳben palai melabelan tranѳbiibe, merѳbala gѳmѳ, treeg rranѳb, chi maramigwan nѳ bera marѳb pasramigwan ut'a tѳgaibe, trunun martrab isua pera marѳb, lastima ashibig kѳmigwan ut'a tѳgaibe, larrѳ t'ab gúi kasraatѳ marѳb, treeg maramig kѳn.

Tiusbe namun chigѳben peg peg marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai keta tranѳppe, nui ka yandѳ tab indig maig kѳben, treeg tranig kѳn. Pѳs trube, Tius maig eshkangaruigwan wamindamigwan ketig uta tѳgaibe nui isubigwan Cristѳinug maya basra tѳgagúig maig kѳben, treetѳ waminchi.
Pѳs nambe mѳitѳgucha asrbe kandѳ gѳbendѳ, namui asrube chine pѳnrran. Inchendѳ truilѳbe chi maramigwan mayambabe truigwandѳwei marѳbelѳ gѳmѳn..

Mѳin gwalѳm pirau maig pub arrubigu ñimgucha trumay ambub pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ bѳnrray. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Cristѳgurri ñimui srѳig peemay isuitѳga ñimui amѳnamigwan yunѳmariilѳ guy. Treeg marabe, Tiuswei isuigube ñim maramig nѳ mѳigwan maramig balaiwein gúi ñimbe nebua ashchabguen, tru purѳ tabigwanba, nuinug truba tab gúi asigwanba, newan tabigwanba.
Kaguende chitѳgucha kѳbiibe Tiusweinukkurri arrubig kѳb, katѳ nѳgurrim bѳnrrab, katѳ nuyasig kѳn. Tiuswane managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Inchen ñim judíѳs kѳmeelѳgucha treetѳwei merrabwansrѳmbe Tiuswan larrѳ mѳrmeelѳ gѳbig kuig, mѳimbe Tiuswei lastima asigwan nebua tѳgagѳn, judíѳsmera mѳrmeelѳ gúikkurri..

Pѳs judíѳsmerabe Cristѳi t'abig srѳ wamwan kaasikkurri, truburappe Tiusbe tsalѳ indiilѳwein gѳbig kѳn, tru ñim judíѳs kѳmeelaimburab t'abguen gѳnrrai. Inchendѳ nѳmun Tius lawa wesruikkurri, truburappe tru nѳmui merrabsrѳ Tiuswan mѳrѳbelѳ kѳlli misaameragurri nѳmbe Tius undaarailѳ gѳn.

Inchen ѳyeeg nebubene, israelitasmerabe mayamba kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrun, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu maig taimbala: Tru Kaigyugurri Wesrawa Pѳnsrѳnrrabiibe Jerusalén Sión Tunsrѳngurri arrua, Jacѳbweinukkurri amrrub misaamerane nѳmui kaigwan kerranrrun cha.

Pѳs ñi, judíѳ gѳmíig, tru ñi k'au umbu k'a trendѳ nѳtѳ beña gallab ѳlivѳ lataigwan para, mana treeg mariimíigwan tru ellmari tab ѳlivѳ tusryu nuranrrai truigwanma kemesra basriibe, k'an mas tru ellmari tab ѳlivѳ tusryu srarmera kegѳlsrailѳ gѳbelane k'atѳle tru tusryutѳwei nѳrrѳranrrai kemesrailѳ gѳmѳnrraitarru, tru judíѳsmeran.

Pѳs isua ash, Tius nѳ yeeg tammayig kuigwanba, nѳ chi chippe, kandѳ wamabig kuigwanba, tru kѳrra pѳnrrabelaimbe nѳbe kandѳ gandѳ wamabig kѳbendѳ, trune ñune tammay indan. Inchendѳgucha tru nѳ tammay indigu ñi truyu pasrabig basrѳbene gѳnrrun. Treeg kѳmuisruandѳbe, ñigucha kegѳlsraig kѳnrrabguen..

Pѳs treebe treegwein gѳn. Judíѳsmerabe chigucha chi kѳrenrrab inchimuben, treekkurri kegѳlsrailѳ gѳbwei indig kѳn. Inchen ñibe isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri truyu pasran. Pѳs inchawei purѳ nuig kѳmmѳrѳ inchib pasrѳmѳtѳ, ñibe kѳriibala isuatѳ basrau.
Señѳr, ñi maig karuigwan eshkabelan kweetsamba, ñui altarmeran pѳtiitsamba inchen, nabe natѳzhiitѳ ѳsig kѳrrѳmisra basrѳben, nangucha kwetchab inchib gѳtan chib, trendaigwan.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, nabe payrrab: Pѳs, ¿Tiusbe nui misag sѳtѳmera israelitasmeran kaasig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳmѳn. Kaguende nama natѳweinguen israelita tru Abrahamwei misagugurli arrubig, Benjaminwei misag karrabigugurli arrubig kur.
Katѳ Isaíaskucha tsakk'andѳ kelarrab trendaig kѳn: Nan Tiuswan lameelѳ israelitasmera gѳmeelѳguen nan wetѳrraben, truilѳ nan paymeelanguen nabe kenamisrig kѳn cha.

Inchendѳ nabe bayrrab: Trube ¿nѳmbe mѳrmuig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? cha. ¡Nѳmbe mѳrѳbwei indig kѳn! Pѳs Tiuswei wamwan pѳriguma trenchibig kѳn: Tiuswei wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳbelai wambe pirau truѳrѳ wamindi mѳrig kѳben, katѳ nѳmui wamindiilѳbe yu pirau maya yabsrѳngatikken puig kѳn cha.
Inchendѳ tru tabig srѳ wamwanma israelitasmera mayeelѳbabe mѳra marmuig kѳn. Kaguende Isaíasbe trendaig kѳn: Señѳr, ¿nam waminchib eshkaigwanma mu kѳreig kuitarru? cha.
