¿Inchendѳ nѳmbe mandѳ chib wamiasamѳ nun kѳremubendѳbe? ¿Katѳ tru nuimburabigwan wamindi mѳra gѳmѳwabe, kѳrebgucha mandѳ incha kѳreasamѳ? ¿Katѳ nuimburabigwan mu eshk'ab kusrenanmubene, mѳrѳbgucha chincha mѳriasamѳ?

Kaguende judíѳsmera lata, judíѳs kѳmeelѳ lata, mѳitѳgucha chi peg kѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, treetѳ gѳn. Pѳs tru Señѳrtѳwei mayeelaim bala nѳ ashib karub pasrabig kua, mayeelѳ nun wamab waminchibelane truba rruba tab inchibig kѳn.

Kaguende tru chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig kѳrrѳmalig kѳmigwan nebua tѳgagѳmibe, manrrau kѳreitѳga gѳben, katѳ kaigyugurli wesraig kѳmigwan nebua tѳgagѳmibe, tliitѳga: Jesúsbe Mayeelaim Bala Nѳ Garub Pasrabig kѳn daigu gѳn.

Trune tru isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Tiusba tab gѳrrѳmisra pѳnrramigwan waminchibiibe Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu ѳyeeg chibig kѳn: Ñui manrraube ѳyeeg cha, mѳrmѳta cha: ¿Srѳmbalasrѳmaybe mu nebinrrerah? cha, Cristѳn kѳrrattrai inchib lataig.
Kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigwan ѳyangatiitѳ gѳnrrai mara basrѳbiibe, Cristѳ, nѳ gѳn, mutѳgucha isubigwan nuinug pasrѳbigwane Tiusba tabig kѳrrѳmisra pѳnrramig kѳnrrai.
Pѳs nabe nѳmuimburappe, treeg kѳn cha, tѳrmarѳb wamindamѳnrrun. Nѳmbe Tiusweiwane truba rruba marѳb melѳbendѳ, Tius nѳ maig martrain gúigwane chigúi mѳra marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳn.k
Inchendѳ nan Señѳr inrrain gѳbene, peba ñimun ashchab arrua, nѳm truba rruba nѳrreelѳ misrѳb wamindiilan ashmѳtѳ, tru nѳmui marѳb gúigwan asamѳnrrun..

Inchawei nabe Timѳteѳwan ñimuimay ѳrig kѳn, nai undaaraig nusrkai lat'aig Señѳrwan maikkucha t'arѳmisrmѳ megabigwan. Nѳbe na Cristѳ Jesúsweimburab maig marѳb uñibig kuigwan ñimun isunanrrun, na chutѳgucha iglesiamѳrig maig kusrenanѳb yailan.
na Pablѳ lat'a, Apѳlѳs lat'a, Pedrѳ lat'a, iig waraig pirѳ lat'a, ѳsig kѳmig lat'a, kwamig lat'a, mѳin gwalѳm lat'a, katѳ wendѳ attrabig lat'a, pѳs ñimuiwein gѳn kerriguba.
Katѳ treekkucha chibig kѳn: Señѳrbe ashibig kѳn cha, tru nѳrrѳ gusrebelai isuilѳbe chi isumuinguenig isuilѳ gúi.

Kusrebelѳ guermab ñimasiitѳ kegѳrrab pѳnrrѳmѳtay. Ñimui utu mѳikkѳben misaamera mѳin gwalѳm yu pirau isuigu truba rruba nu gusrebig kurmab isubiibe, chi nebua ashmíig lataig misramig kѳn, ciertѳn kusrebig kѳnrrappe.
¿Ñimbe ashmeelѳ gѳtirru? yamba ñimdѳweinguen Tiusweimbe tab ya gѳben, Tiuswei Espíritube ñimuinug basrabig kuin gúi..
Inchen mѳikkѳben tru yawan niga basrѳnrrabigwan marim bala nѳ marѳb kusrab yaig chi gѳmѳ, nagu ka buraibene, truburѳ nѳbe tru ut'amigwan utѳnrrun.

Inchen tru yawan niga basrѳnrrai pѳlbasra marim balabe: ѳrѳtѳga marin gúi, andѳga marin gúi, kabe purѳ tab sruuzheelѳtѳga marin gúi, tsiitѳga marin gúi, putѳga marin gúi, kabe ka shautѳgatѳ marin gúi inchun.n

Tius nui k'a yandѳ tab indigwan nan maya traniitѳga, k'an mѳg yawan purѳ may maram gusrebig lataitѳwei yawan niga basrѳnrrabigwan nabe pѳlbasra basren, k'atѳgane tru na pѳlsrugwan mara pasrim bala, kusrub yan. Inchendѳ mѳitѳgucha marѳb ambuppe, mandѳ marѳb yainatashchab asha maramig kѳn.
Ellguabig lata, pi guchibig lata, mѳibe kabe peg kѳnrrab gúindѳ trunundѳwei marѳb gѳn. Inchendѳ nѳm mѳitѳgucha nѳmui maramigwan maig marig kѳben, Tiusbe tru marimburѳ pagaraben, utѳnrrab gúinrrun..
Inchawei ellguabig lat'a, pi guchibig lat'a chigucha gѳmeelѳ gѳben, kallawa nuranrrai marѳbiibe Tius, nѳ gѳn.

¿Trube, treeg kѳbene, na Pablѳba, Apѳlѳsbabe chimera gѳbrah? Pѳs nambe ka marѳb melabelѳtѳ gѳben, ñimbe namgurriwei kѳrewa bѳnrran, namun mѳigwandѳgucha Señѳr maig martrai karua pѳnsraig kѳben, treegwan marѳbelѳ.

katѳgucha ñimbe ñimui asr maig marѳg kui inchen treegwan marѳbelѳ srѳ gѳn. Pѳs ñimui utube pusrkwai ashib gѳmig, aleguiam lab treeg inchib pѳnrraibe, ¿ñimui asr maig marѳg kui inchen treegwan marѳb, maig kѳbash amѳñibelѳ lataig marѳb amѳñimѳtirru?

Inchawei nai nunelan, nabe Tiuswei Espílitu maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg isubelan lataig waminchab gaimaig kuig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru maig amѳñig kѳben amѳñibelan lataig, trumay wamindig kѳn, Clistѳimburabigube kan shush ureezheelѳ latailan.
Inchen Tiuswei Espíritun tѳgaibe chiwandѳgucha ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg kѳbig kuin gúi nebua isumig tѳgaig kѳn. Inchen nungurrimbe mugucha ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg kѳn chinrrab gaimanrrun..

Inchawei nam iigwan waminchippe, mѳguelѳ yu pirau kusremburab kusrebelѳ kusrenani wamdѳga waminchimer. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Espíritu Santѳ kusrenaniitѳga Tiusweimburabelan ѳyeeg kѳn chib waminchippe, Espíritu Santѳn tѳgarmeran waminchibelѳ guer.

Pѳs ¿kan mѳwanma nui manrrau umbusrѳngue chi isub pasraigwan nebua ashibiibe nui espíritutѳweimbe nebua ashmuitarru? ѳyeetѳwei Tius nѳ purѳ umbusrѳ tѳgagúilane mugucha nebua ashmuben, Tiuswei Espíritutѳwei nebua asan..

Inchendѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu taimbala: Mugucha kaptѳgabe nebua ashmѳwei, muguen kalutѳgabe nebua mѳrmѳwei, ni muguen ѳyeeg kuitamappe isubguen isumѳwei indigwan, Tiusbe nun undaguelayasiibe trunun tѳgagѳnrrai tamara pѳnsrain gѳn cha.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nambe waminchippe, Tiuswei tru muguen nebua kusremgaig mu asiimíig, sѳrig pasrabigwan wamindig kѳn, tru chi pѳnrrabikken k'aabenbatѳsrѳwei namuyasig maya nuguen tab gѳnrrai k'anmaytѳ manasrѳwei Tius treeg martrab isua tѳgagúigwan.
tru ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ basriibe mѳguelѳ purѳ nѳrrѳ kusreegu basrig kѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei maramburab maramigu basrig kѳnrrai.
Incha nabe ñimui utu uñib urasbe trubѳrab chish kѳmѳwei, trurrigu kѳrig kuig ¡gatѳ! itѳnab pasraig kѳbig kѳn.
Pѳs nabe ñimui utube katѳgan chi pegwan isub pasrѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, Jesucristѳnba, nun kurusyu mesra kweetsigwanba, trunundѳ isua basrѳnrrab isuig kѳn.
Inchen nane tru ciudayu pѳtѳgatan srug birѳbanrlig maligugurli kan pendanayu kѳrrѳѳrѳbelѳ gѳn, kan tasinyu waya. ѳyamay nabe truigwei taskugurli welula, ibig kur.
Rey Aretas karuigwan marѳb wabig, tru Damascѳ ciudayu kubenadurbe tru damacenѳsmerai ciuda bѳtѳgatan lalingaruin gѳbig kѳn, nan kemѳrtrab.
Na mѳg inchib waminchib pasramig nebubene, na truburab gѳmíig kullaguig kuigu, truyube mѳg inchib waminchib pasramѳnrrun.
Mѳikkѳben kullaarain basrѳbene, nan gullaaraig kui lataig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen mѳikkѳben kaigu srurrengwangaruinab megabene, nan pusrkwabig kѳn.

Maramelѳgucha purѳ mulig, trurligu ni mandѳguen gѳmui megamig, treeg nebubig kѳn. Katѳ gatѳ kibguen kimѳwei, katѳ parѳgwai mѳrѳb, pi mulgwai mѳrѳb, katѳ gatѳ chigucha mamíig megamig nebub, kѳrrag kui megamig nebub, asru kemig chigagúinab megamig nebub inchibig kѳn.

Katѳ pѳnmay tsiitѳga ichib srua gúinab, katѳ kan bijibe kwetchab sruutѳga petinab, katѳ pѳnmay barcѳ pitis misrѳb chab mincha, piu asentaben, kan bijibe kwalma y mawa nane mar tѳbѳtaasrѳ pi srua yaig megamig nebubig kѳn.

¿Nѳmbe Cristѳiwan marѳb melabelѳ gѳ chindah? (Pѳs chugúi mѳrmíig lat'aitѳwei waminchar) Nabe nѳm lat'aitѳguen gѳmѳ, masken marѳb, maramelѳyugucha mas mur marѳb, kailan keeri yau nѳmun lat'aitѳ gѳmѳ, katѳ gatѳ merrarrawa keeriinab, ichaguchibgucha, mam ichagutsamigwan nѳmun lat'aitѳ gѳmѳ, ichagutsamburab ichagutsinab, katѳ gatѳ ke yandѳ ѳsig kѳmurmab isui megamig pub,

Pѳs nambe ѳyeeg kenamarѳb pѳnrramibe yangucha kullaguelѳ gѳbrain gѳn damig, nane kѳrikken gѳtan. Kanelѳma ke nѳmasiitѳ chinetѳ mѳg inchib wamincha mѳrene, treetѳwei nagucha martrab, treeg wamindamibe na chugúi mѳrmѳgѳlig lataig wamindig kuindѳgucha.
Ñimbe ya kusrebelѳ gѳbendѳ, chugúinguen mѳrmeelane, trube, ñimbe ke mѳrѳguen isrѳmѳzhig melabelѳ gѳn.m
Tru na naasiitѳ truba t'ab gúi mѳrѳb mѳg inchib waminchib pasraibe, nan Señѳr wamindingaruben wamindig kѳmѳtѳ, chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindi lat'aig, treeg kѳn.

Inchawei ѳyeebe kwaaramdiikkucha gѳmѳn, pѳs tru Satanás karuigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelѳgucha tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbelѳ misrѳb pѳnrrѳben. Pѳs nѳmui kaig marimburѳ maig utamig kѳben, treegutѳweim batsѳnrrun.
Kaguende tru treeg inchibelѳbe, Cristѳ ciertѳn nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ gѳmѳn. Tru marѳbelѳbe ka may wamincha isatѳ marѳbelѳ, Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳri latailѳ misrѳb treeg inchibelѳ gѳn.k
¿Chindimbagurri? ¿Pѳs k'abe na ñimun undaguig kѳmubra chindah? ¡Pѳs Tiusbe asha basran, nabe ñimun undaguig kui!
Clistѳi newan ciertѳnig nainug pasrai mѳra lataitѳwei, na chi an purugúig utѳmѳ, tru mѳg inchib tab gúi mѳrѳb waminchib pasraigwane Acaya birausrѳngucha nane muguen waminchimѳnrrai katѳnrraamѳn.
Na ñimun purugub pasrѳnrrab, nabe gatѳgan iglesiameranguen kerrab lat'aig ut'amig nebubig kѳn, nai chi palab arrubigwan tѳgagѳnrrab.
Ñim nѳrreelѳ misrtrai, nabe naasiitѳ chigucha gѳmíig misrѳb, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan truburѳ chi utѳmѳ eshkab kusrenanѳb basrappe, ¿kabe nabe kaig marѳb basrabraig kѳ chindah?
Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ misrѳb, tru purab nѳrreelѳ chib pѳnrrabelai merrab chiyugucha lamíig kѳmur nagucha.

Inchendѳ nane kѳrig isutan, tru ul purѳ may kebenѳsrkamig tѳgagúitѳga tru Evan kebenѳsrkѳb lataitѳwei ñimungucha mumay gѳben ñimui isubigu pelѳsrkѳngarunrraitamab tru ñim isa gѳmѳ pѳnrraigwanba, tabig chishchig Cristѳinug pѳnrraigwanba.k
Ke na chugúi mѳrmíig lat'aig na mayandѳ wamincha mѳrtrab ñim trunun ka awent'aimbe gѳt'an. Pѳs na treeg indingucha ñimun ka awent'array chinrrab inchar.
Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan ñim cѳrintѳelainukkurri mas yabsrѳnguen eshkab kusrenanig kѳnrrai, peenug katѳganelѳ kebamba marinug trusrѳ nam kebuna mѳg inchib waminchib pѳnrrѳmѳnrrab..

Kabe gatѳganelѳ nѳѳreelѳ marigu kebamba, purab mѳg inchib waminchibgucha bѳnrrѳmer, namuinukkurri webambub. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug basra tѳgagúigu katѳguchi nѳrrѳrab amrraimab isua muniirab meler, namui maramig ñimui utube nѳrrѳ larrѳbichib inrrai,
Inchen nambe mѳg inchib ke purabgucha waminchib pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, Tius namun mayangatig martrai pѳnsraigwan nambe treegwandѳ marѳb pѳnrrer, katѳ ñimuisrѳngatikken pumig kѳnrrai tranigwan marѳb.k
Pѳs tru treeg chibelѳbe, trube, iigwan isua gѳmig kѳn: nam yabsrѳm bѳnrrѳwa, kilga pѳrigu mandѳ chib pѳrѳbelѳbe, ñimui utu amrrua, marѳbgucha treetѳwei martrab gúi.
Pѳs na kilgamera pѳra, ñimun truilѳtѳga ke kwaarѳsrѳg kѳb lataikkucha indig kѳmѳnrrai inchar.

Maig maramigwan nam karub tѳga pѳnrrѳnrrai Señѳr namun trana pѳnsraigwan, iigwan na purѳ mѳg inchib waminchib pasrab lataig indinaindѳgucha, nabe chi kѳrig misrabe pasrѳmumѳnrrun. Pѳs tru maig maramigwan karub pѳnrrѳnrrai Señѳr namun trana pѳnsrѳppe, ñimun mindishaguen gѳrrѳmartrain gѳmѳtѳ, Tiusweimburabigu nѳrrѳram purugunrrainguen tranig kuig kѳn.m
Incha ñim newan mѳrѳbelѳ misra pѳnrramisrene, tru maig taigwan mѳrmeelane nambe mѳra melѳnrrai mara kѳrrѳmartrab pѳnrrer.
Kaguende tru chitѳga kwayamig nam tѳgagúibe, mѳguelain gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, truibe Tiusweinug maramburab marѳbig, treeg kѳn, ni mumaygucha chindamga murelѳ nugwaimandzig pѳnsraig pѳnrrabelan pѳtiitsamig.m
¡Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab, wamindiitѳgabe kan mandѳguen tamgaig purѳ nuig tabig keta tranigwan!!
Katѳ nѳm tru ñim purugúigwan utabelѳbe ñimuyasig Tiusba waminchippe, ñimuimburab truba nu undaatѳga martrun, Tius nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai ñimun tranikkurri.

Inchen tru ñim ѳyeeg purugúigu ñimbe mumera gúi asiilѳ gѳn. Katѳ nѳmbe Tiuswan truba tabig waminchun, Clistѳi tabig srѳ wamyu pѳnrrѳwa, truig maig taigwan ñim mѳra, truigwan kenamalikkurlimba, katѳ ñimbe nѳmun merѳbala gѳmѳ purugub, gatѳganelѳ mayeelan treetѳwei purugub indikkurlimba.

Trumaybe ñimbe chiyutѳgucha chi palѳmíig tѳgagѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳnrrun, chiyutѳgucha purugumigu merѳbala gѳmѳ, tranamburab tranѳbelѳ gѳnrrai. Inchen ñim tru purugúigwan nam nѳmun tranen, nѳmbe Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib gѳmig kѳnrrun.k
Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Larrѳbitchai tsurѳb, waachameran tranѳb indig kѳn cha. Inchen nui tru t'abig sѳlgandѳ maramibe managatig pasrabig pasran cha

Ñim mѳitѳgucha tranamigwan tranѳppe, ñui manrrau maig trannrrab isua tѳgagúig kѳben, treeg rranamig kѳn, ke tranmuinrrabna gѳbendѳ, tranmѳwei, kabe ke treeg tranamig kuikkurrindѳ tranmѳweingue. Kaguende Tiusbe kasraatѳ rranѳbigwane undaguig kѳn.m

Inchawei ѳyeekkurri, i nunelan ñimuisrѳmay merrab ashchab amrrai ѳramig nabe palai asig kuig kѳn tru purugumburab purugunrrab misrig kѳbigwan tulisam burugua yandѳ ke chab t'amara munig kѳnrrai. Trumay tru ñim purugumig tulisaibe merѳbala gѳmѳ, rranig kui asamdiig kѳnrrai, ke trannrrai inchendѳ, rranig kѳmѳtѳ.

ѳyeeg kuindѳgucha tru ñimuimburab nam ѳyeegu truba tab gúi mѳrѳb waminchib pѳnrraibe, ka wamindiitѳ pureptinchibgunmab isua, i nunelan ѳrar, tru ñimuimburab na maig waminchib arlig, masken tamara gѳnrrai,
Inchen tru Tiuswei misaameran purugumig tru an tulisamigweimburappe ñimune chi pѳramikken palѳmѳtan..

Pѳs Titѳbe, naimbe nan lincha megabig, katѳ ñimui utu chi maramigu purugub megabig, treeg kѳn. Inchen tru gatѳgan lincha ambub nunelѳbe, tru iglesiamera karua ѳliilѳ, Clistѳyasiibe maya nuguen tabig kѳnrrai pѳnrrabelѳ, nѳmbe treelѳ gѳn.
Kaguende nambe chiwandѳgucha maig maramigwan sѳlwan martrab inchib melabelѳ guer, Señѳrwei merraptѳ gѳmѳ, misaamerai merrabgucha treetѳweingue.n

Incha gatѳ treetѳ gѳmѳtѳ, tru iglesiameragucha nun lawa wesraig kuig kѳn, tru jerusalénsreelai tab indig purugúigwan nam srua amben, nѳ namun lincha attrai. Nambe Señѳrwan maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrraimba, nam purugug kui pѳnrraigwan katѳganelan kenamartrappa, tru an tulisaigwane nam asha marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ guer.n
Pѳs na nun Cѳrintѳsrѳmay ya, ѳyeeg maramdiig kѳn cha, na wamindigwan ka mѳriitѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nѳbe maramigwane ke marѳg kuindѳ megaig kuig kѳppe, nѳashib treeg martrab isua, ñimuisrѳmay yan.
Namui Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab, ñimuimburab na isui lataitѳwei Titѳi manrraugucha isunrrai pasligwan.

mumaytѳgucha lata gѳnrrai inchar. Mѳin gwalѳm ñim chigucha chi palѳmíig uncha tѳgagúibe nѳmun purugumig kѳben, katѳwan ñim palai melѳbene, tru nѳm uncha tѳgagúibe ñimun purugumig kѳnrrai. Trumaybe mumaytѳgucha lata gѳnrrun.
Kaguende mѳikkѳben ke trannrrab isua, mayanzhig tranamdiig kѳben treeg tranigwane Tiusbe chi kashmѳ utabig kѳn, ke chugurrin gѳmuingucha trannrrai inchimѳtѳ..
Incha iigube nabe ñimun ѳyeeg maramdiig kѳn chinrrab inchar: tru purugunrrab tulisamigwan ñimbe marig bilawei tranamigwan ñimmerrig tranѳb, katѳ trutѳ gѳmѳtѳ, maramigwan ñimwei isuig kuig kѳbene

Maig martrain chippe, ke kandѳ chibig lat'aig nabe treeg karua basrmur, treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ñim undag kѳbigwan ciertѳn tѳgagúit'ashchab ashchab inchar, katѳganelѳma treeg t'ab marѳbelѳ gѳn cha trunun eshkab.

Inchawei nambe Titѳne ѳyeegwan martrunrrig cha waminchibelѳ guer: Iig truba tab indigwan ñi maig marѳb pѳlbasriibe, katѳ treetѳwei tru cѳrintiѳsmera jerusalénsreelayasig tranigwane tabig marѳb patsѳgѳrrunrrig cha.
Pѳs namune truba rrugabelѳ gѳn: Tru Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswei misaameran namgucha truilan tѳga purugúig kѳnrrai treeg marbashibsrumѳgue chib.
Trube, mѳimbe ñim nai nunelѳ, wammѳra gѳnrrai inder, tru Macedѳnia birausrѳ iglesiameran Tius nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan ѳyeeg tranigwan..
Chiyutѳgucha ñimbe chi isumgailѳ gúimba mayanguen nane t'ab gѳt'an.

Pѳs ñim cѳrintiѳsmeraimburab truba t'ab gúim basrar chib Titѳn na waminchib pasraigwan, chi kѳriimisra kѳrrѳmisrmur. Nam ñimun kerriguba chigѳben wamindiima chi isa wamindig kѳmuig kѳppe, ñimuimburab truba t'ab gúi mѳrѳb Titѳn nam waminchib pѳnrraikkucha treetѳwei isa gѳmѳ wamindig webyan.

Inchawei tru kilgawan pѳrѳppe, tru sѳlwan marmѳ k'aig marѳbigwan isua, truikkurrim bѳrmѳwei, k'abe tru k'alѳ marinabigwan isua, truikkurrim bѳrmѳwei indig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru ñim namuimburab truba isubelѳ gúigwan ñimui utu Tiuswei merrab nebua asig kѳnrrai indig kuig kѳn.

Tius maig balain gѳben nam trumay isui inchib pѳnrraibe ñimui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliranrrai marѳbig kѳn, kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmigweyasig trembe kaabashmѳtѳmab isumig chigaikke. Trune isui inchib pѳnrramig arrubig yu pirauibe, kwamibe tѳgaig arrubig kѳn.

Pѳs na ñimun tru kilga pѳra ѳriitѳga ñimun truba isuilѳ kѳrrѳmisrtrai marig kѳbigwane nane chi isumѳtan. Pѳs tru urasbe nane isubwei indig kѳn, kaguende tru na kilga bѳra ѳriibe kan maya yanagatiitѳbe ñimun isui melѳnrrai marѳbwei inchen.k

Nabe ñimune chi isumgailѳ gúi isua basrab, chiburѳ gѳben ñimgurri na truba tab gúi mѳrѳb pasramigwan tѳgagѳb inchar. Nan truba tab gѳnrrai mari basrar, chine isui pѳnrramig puindѳgucha, kasrag kѳbigwan tѳgagѳmburab tѳga..

Namun ñimui manrraugurli isua utѳrray chinrrab inchar. Nambe mѳigwangucha ñimun sѳlwan marmѳ kalѳ mara bѳnrrѳmѳwei, kaig marѳb ñimun mѳigwangucha mindisha kѳrrѳmarmѳwei, kabe nam ñimgurli nam tѳgamisrmѳwei indig kѳn.
Incha nabe ñimuimbe mѳskai misren, ñimgurrimbe naimbe nai nusrkalѳ, nai nimbasrmera misrtrabguen cha, Tius Newan Maramburab Marѳbiibe trendan..

¿Katѳ Tiuswei yaba, task'a mari tiusmerababe chincha trubalatѳ gѳnrrab gѳ? Kaguende nambe tru managuen kwamѳ ѳsig wab Tiuswei ya guer. Pѳs nѳbe trendaig kѳn: Nabe yandѳ nѳmuinug pasrabig basrab, nѳmui utu uñib indamѳnrrun cha. Nabe nѳmui Tius kѳben nѳmgurrimbe nai misaamera gѳnrrun cha.

Ñim Tiuswan kѳrebelѳbe Tiuswan lata kѳremeelѳbabe lincha maramgaigube chi lincha maramig kѳmѳn. ¿Kaguende tru tabig sѳlgandѳ maramiba, sѳlgandѳ gѳmѳ mariibabe chincha kandѳ gѳnrrab gѳ? ¿Katѳ lѳstiiba, tѳrbabe chincha trubalatѳ gѳnrrab gѳ??
Ñimuimburab nam isumibe chugatikkucha kurin basrѳben, ñimweinrre kasrѳb tѳgagѳn namuimburab.n
Nambe, ñim cѳrintѳsreelan, maig wamindamigwan tѳrgandѳ treeg waminder. Nam ñimuimburab isumibe namui manrrѳmerabe ke kurindѳ basran.

nambe mumera gúi nebua asiilѳ gúinabendѳ, asiimeelѳ gúi lataig tѳgagúinab, yandѳ kwawa pinanmab asha tѳgagúindѳgucha, ѳsig amѳñibig amѳñibelѳ, trѳmbѳig ichabetiilѳ gúinabendѳ, kwamѳ ka ѳsig amѳñibelѳ,

ciertѳn wamindamigwan treeg waminchibelѳ guer. Tiuswei maramburab marѳbiitѳga marѳb, tru chigurlimbunѳ tabig sѳlgandѳ marѳb pѳnrraitѳgabe nambe kusrmayba, atsimayba srua kwayab pѳnrrer, kan suldau kwayab tuliamig kusrmaybe espadan atsimaybe escudѳn srua kwayab pasrab lataitѳweingue.

ichagutsiilѳ gѳmig nebui lata, kailan pѳnsrai yau keerig pѳnrramig nebui lata, kanbalatѳmisra kaig martrab namig kurrѳben treegu melamig nebui lata, maramga murelan marѳb melamig nebui lata, kibguen kimѳ melamig nebui lata, chigucha mameelѳ puraambub melamig nebui lata,
Mugѳben Tiuswei t'abig srѳ wamwan kaashib, nam marѳb pѳnrraigwan kaig kѳn chib wamindig kѳmѳnrraimbe, nambe kaig marѳb mungucha srurrengwangarub pѳnrrѳmer.
Nam Tiusba marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ gúig kѳppe, ñimune ѳyeeg marѳb gѳrrunrrigay chinrrab, Tiuswei tru k'a yandѳ tab indigwane ke chi martraamѳbendѳ uta tѳgagѳmѳtay cha.

Nambe Cristѳi munchiyu, misag utu Cristѳ nѳ waminchib pasrab lataitѳwei nui wamwan waminchib pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrailѳ guer. Namgurri Tius nѳashib treeg maray chib pasrab lataitѳwei, nambe Cristѳi munchiyu ñimun tiusmanda ѳyeeg martrunrrigay tamѳnrrun: ¡Tiusba tab gѳrrѳmisramigwan maray! cha.n

Inchen kerriguba ѳyeeg arrubiibe Tiusweinukkurrin gѳn. Pѳs nam kailѳ gua nѳbatѳwei tab gѳrrѳmisramigwan Cristѳ Jesúskurri treeg kѳnrrai mara, kailѳ gua, Tiusba tru tab gѳrrѳmisram wamwan nam marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrai, nѳ tranig kѳn.

Inchawei nambe yandѳ mѳingurrimbunѳbe mundѳgucha yu pirauelѳ isuimay ka treetѳ isua ashib pѳnrrѳmeelѳ guer. Pѳs nambe merrappe Cristѳne yu pirauelѳ isua asimay ashibelѳ guatѳgucha, mѳimbe yandѳ treetѳ nebua asha tѳga bѳnrrѳmer.
Kaguende Cristѳi undag kѳbiibe namune martrai trawaguchibig kѳn. Pѳs iigwan nam isua ashene: Cristѳma kwappe, mayeelaimburѳ kwaig kѳbene, treekkurri mayeelѳba kwaig kѳn.n

Kabe nambe namasiitѳ katѳguen ñimui merrab truba tabelѳ guer chib pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, ñim namgurri tab gúi mѳrѳb kasrag bѳnrramigwan tѳgagѳnrrai treeg isua inchib pѳnrrer, ñim tru mandѳ lѳtamigwan tѳgagѳnrrai, tru manrraugurri isua gѳmѳtѳ, ka balatѳ treeg maranmab ashchaindѳ mѳg inchib chib pѳnrrabelan.
Kaguende nambe tru maig maramigwan Cristѳ asha marѳb wainug mayeelѳba kemalamig kѳn, namui asru amѳña tabig marig kuin gúi, kaig marig kuin gúi maig marigwan nam mѳitѳgucha truburѳ utѳnrrab..
Kaguende nambe amѳñippe, namui isubigwan Cristѳinug pasriitѳgatѳ amѳner, namui kabrrawa nebua ashagurrin gѳmѳtѳ.n
Inchawei nambe chu urastѳgucha chi isumѳ bѳnrrer, tru namui asru ѳsig amѳñippatѳbe, Señѳrweim bulu gѳmѳtѳ, nambe yabsrѳndѳ pѳnrrabelѳ gúi nebua asha.

Inchawei i asr k'an carpa ya lataigu nam ѳsig bѳnrrabelѳbe larrѳ tab gѳmui, truba rruba nuisrab isuig melabelѳ guer. Pѳs namune kwamuinrrabna gѳtan nam tѳga bѳnrraig asrwan trubalatѳ srѳig itѳguenniilѳ gѳmѳwatѳbe, tru yandѳ pinab patsѳnrrabigwane tru srѳig ѳsig kѳmibe yandѳ nѳtѳ kerriguwan pinabgasra basramisrtrai.
Treebe namune srѳ asrtѳga kenanen, nambe yandeelѳ asr chigar gѳmѳ, tѳgar gѳmѳnrrun.

Pѳs nambe yandѳ ashibelѳ guer, yu pirau nam ѳsig bѳnrraig tru namui asr ka petѳweindiig kan ranchѳunѳ mara basrindѳ lataig, yandѳ minchib patsindѳgucha, katѳgan srѳ asr purѳ tab ya lataig, mu mѳguelѳ taska mari ya gѳmѳtѳ, srѳmbalasrѳ managuen patsѳnrrabig kѳmíig Tius tranig tѳgagѳmigwan..

Pѳs nam chigѳben puinab melamig ka petѳ pureb arrubig, kan yangucha murig kѳtanmab isub mur gúi melaibe managuen patsѳnrrabgaig kan tѳrguegwalmabig maya nuibaguen ѳyeeg lataig kѳn cha, kemesra trendamgaig tabigwan tѳgaig arrubig kѳn.k

Pѳs kerrigu ѳyeeg pub arrubiibe ñimuyasig tab gѳnrrain gѳn, tru ka yandѳ tab indig misagwan katѳguchinguen, gatѳguchinguen nebub ibene, ungwa, ungwa tamelѳgucha nuramburab nuranrrai, Tiusweyasig maya nuguen tab gѳnrrai.
Tiuswei wamwan pѳriguma trenchibig kѳn: Kѳrewa, treekkurri waminchar cha. Pѳs namgucha namui isubigwane Cristѳinug treetѳwei pasra bѳnrrѳwa, treekkurri nambe kѳrewa, Tiuswei wamwan waminder.m
Kaguende nam ѳsig bѳnrrabelѳbe Jesuclistѳgurli chu urastѳgucha ke kwaitѳ, kwaitѳ melamig nebutan, namui ka pinѳnrrab asru Jesuclistѳi ѳsig basraikkucha kenamisrtrai.
Inchawei nambe chu ambuptѳgucha, namui asru Jesucristѳ kwaigwane tѳga amѳner, katѳ Jesucristѳ ѳsig waikkucha namui asru kenamisrtrai.
Chiyutѳgucha chine chine pui melamig nebuingucha, ke truyutѳ tambal ambagucha warѳmer. Ke k'an chindamermab isumig pui melѳbendѳ, yandѳ ke k'aimamuitamappe isuilѳgucha melѳmer.
Inchendѳ nambe iig tru purѳ tabigwane namui asr kan pirѳ gѳtsѳ lataigutѳ tѳgaguer, tru iig maramburab marѳbig purѳ nuig tabiibe namuin gѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswein gúi kenamartrab.

Kaguende nambe namuimburabigwandѳwei eshk'ab kusrenanmѳtѳ, Cristѳ Jesúsbe mayeelaim bala nѳ ashib k'arub pasrabig kѳn cha eshk'ab kusrenanѳbelѳ guer. Katѳ nambe Jesucristѳyasig ñimuimbe k'a k'aruindѳ melabelѳ guer.
Inchen tru t'abig srѳ wamwan nam eshkab kusrenanig katѳgucha pinѳgasraig lat'aig chugúi mѳriimíig kѳrrѳmisrѳppe, tru yandѳ pinab pinamnuumay amrrabelaimbe pinѳgasraig lat'aig kѳrrѳmisran.
Inchawei nambe Tius namun lastima asiitѳga i tru marѳb pѳnrramigwan tѳga bѳnrraig kѳppe, nambe chi kullaarab melѳmer.
Kaguende Señѳrbe tru Espíritu gua, Señѳrwei Espíritu chu basrѳbene, Tiuswei merrab kemalamig truyube chigucha ilѳsrkѳnrrabiibe chi gaagѳn.
Inchendѳ mѳikkѳben Señѳrweimay llirawa pasramisrene, tru pinѳgasrѳbig lat'aig pasrabiibe nuinukkurrimbe kerraig kѳnrrun.

Inchendѳ nѳmui turmerayube yandѳ chi wamindikken kebyainameelѳ murig misriilѳ gua, mѳin gwalѳmgatig tru merrabsrѳ Tius acuerdѳn marig kѳbigwan leben, chi tainguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳn, tru malѳ binѳgasrѳb pasrabiitѳwei pasrabig pasraikkurri. Kaguende tru pinѳgasrѳbigwane Cristѳtѳwei kerranrrun.
Inchawei tru tѳgagѳnrrurmab isuigwan nam tѳgaguen pѳnrraig kѳppe, nambe chi kѳrmѳ maig tamigwan tѳrgandѳ waminchibelѳ guer.
Inchawei tru tѳrguegwalmabig kwab ibikken kan treeg tѳrguegwalmabig tѳgaig arriibe, tru mana pinѳmѳ pasrabig basrѳnrrabiibe ¡mas maig tѳrguegwalmabig kuaasamѳrra!n

Inchen tru maig maramigwan marѳptѳga bѳnrraig misagwan kaigyu pѳnrrѳnrrai kѳrrѳmara pasrѳbikken treeg tѳrguegwalmabig kuibe, tru marѳptѳga bѳnrraig misagwan Tiuswei merrab chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lat'aig t'abig kѳnrrai marѳbiibe, ¡kan treetѳguen gѳnrrab gѳmѳ, mas purѳ tѳrig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳn!

Inchen tru maig maramigu marѳptѳga bѳnrraig kwamigwan srua arrubig, srug tambalmerayu pѳrikken tѳrguegwalmabig kѳptѳ, Israel misaamerabe Mѳiséswan malauguen ashchab gaimaig kѳbig kѳn, nui malѳ tѳrguegwalmabig kѳben, tru tѳrguegwalmabiibe kwab yaindѳgucha.

Kabe nam namashib ѳyeegwan martrapteelѳ namdѳ tsabѳ marѳbelѳ gua, chi arrubiibe namuinukkurri arrubig kui lataig inchib pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, nam ѳyangatig tsabѳtѳ marѳb pѳnrramig arrubiibe Tiusweinukkurri arrubig kѳn..
Nambe iigwane Cristѳgurri Tiuswei merrab treeg kuitamab isua bѳnrrer.

Nam mailѳ gúigwan treeg asѳnanrrabelѳ tru namuyasig kilga bѳrig latailѳbe ñimwein gѳn, tru ñim purѳ tabig amѳnaig, tru namui manrrѳmerayu pѳrig basrabig, mu misaameratѳgucha ñimun mumera gѳtashib, mailѳ gѳtashib ashib tѳgagúilѳ.

Katѳganelѳ misaamera truba nѳrrѳ tru Tiuswei wamwan kan chigucha gѳmíig kui lat'aig an marѳb srua llirabelѳ lat'awei, nambe treetѳwei marѳb pѳnrrѳmeelѳ guer. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei merrab waminchippe, maig wamindamigwan sѳra gѳmѳ, sѳlwan waminchib, Tius ѳriilѳ guermab isua, Cristѳgurri waminchibelѳ guer.
Kaguende Tiusweimbe nambe Cristѳi tru purѳ may irrabzhig latailѳ guer, kaigyugurri wesraig pѳnrrabelai lata, tru managatig pinab pinamsrѳmay amrrab pѳnrrabelai lata..
nai nuneg Titѳ trusrѳ mu gaagѳptinchene, nane nai isubigube ni mumayguen gѳmuben, nabe trusrѳngurri nѳmun ungwa chippa, Macedѳniasrѳmay ibig kur..
Na Trѳas ciudasrѳ, Cristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanrrab pubene, Señѳrweimburabelan maramig yaskappe tabig kurѳppe kurendѳ,

Inchawei chigѳben k'alѳ marѳbigwan ñim chi ulѳ baymѳ pesannanrrab isua kѳrrѳmarene, nagucha nune treetѳwei ulѳ baymѳ kѳrrѳmisramѳnrrun. Pѳs chi k'alѳ marigwan na ulѳ baymѳ, pesannappe, (ulѳ baymumig chi pѳnrraig kuig kѳh chindindѳbe gѳben) ñimgurri treegwan marig kѳn, Señѳr Jesucristѳi merrab,
Inchawei nabe ñimun tru mѳweimburab ñimui undag kѳbigwan gatѳle tiusmanda kenamaray tamѳnrrun, ñim undaguelѳ gúi nѳ ashchai.n
Truigwane yandѳ ulѳ bayib gѳmѳ, pesannab, masken kuñab purugumig kѳn, isubiitѳ yandѳ kerriguwan mandѳguen gѳmui inchimѳnrrai.
Inchawei tru mѳwan ñim mayeelѳ lutauelѳ misra, nui k'alѳ marigwan ѳl martrab ñim asha mariibe yandѳ tsabѳ gѳn.

Kaguende nabe ñimun pѳrѳppe, truba rruba isui pѳrig kuig kѳn, nai manrraube purѳ tab gѳmui, truba kappin gѳrrѳgѳb. Kabe na ñimun truba rruba isui inchai martrab gѳmѳtѳ, nabe ñimun truba rruba undaguig kui ashchai indig kѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende na ñimun isui inchai marene, trube, ¿nane mu gasraaraniasamѳ? ¿Tru na isui inchai mariilѳtѳwei kasraaranmѳnrraitarru?n
Inchawei na gatѳle ñimuisrѳmay arruppe, nabe ñimun truba rruba isui inchain gѳmѳtѳ, attrab isuig kuig kѳn.n
Pѳs nabe Tiusken ashen trendamѳnrrun: Na Cѳrintѳsrѳmay gatѳgucha arrumuppe, na ñimun kalugueetѳmѳnrrab lastima ashiptѳ arrumuig kѳbig kѳn cha..
Inchen Tius nѳtѳwein gѳn Cristѳinug mur bѳnrramig kѳnrrai marѳbiibe namun lata, ñimun lata. Incha namune nuindѳ gѳnrrai tarѳmara bѳnsra

Kaguende ñimui utu na gѳben, Silvanѳ gѳben, Timѳteѳ gѳben, nambe Tiuswei Nusrkai Jesuclistѳimburab eshkab kusrenanig kѳn: ѳn tantѳ: Ka tantѳ indig kѳmѳtѳ, nuinuube chu uraskucha: ѳn daig. Nѳbe truig kѳn.

Tru na ѳyeegwan martrab isuibe, ¿kabe nabe ke mѳi mѳi martrab gurrig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? ¿Kabe tru na ѳyeeg martrab indiibe, nai isuigu Tiuswan ashmѳ misaamera lataig martrab inchibig kua, mѳindѳ ke: Martrab taitѳ, katѳ: Marmѳnrrab taitѳ inchab inditamagueh?
Inchawei nabe iigwan treeg kѳnrraitamab isua, ñimuisrѳmaymerrig attrab isuig kѳn, ñim srѳsrѳ truba tab gúi nan utig kѳmnetѳ gatѳle nan tab gúi utamig kѳnrrai.
Pѳs nam ñimun kilga bѳrѳppe, chi peg waminchibikkucha gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, ñim chi leb gúigwan ñim chigúi nebua mѳrѳb gúigwan truigwan newan chigúi mѳrtraimab isua pѳrer..

ñim Tiuswan namuyasig purugurra chib miab melѳbene. ѳyamay truba yamelѳ namuimburab Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib gѳnrrun, pѳs truba yamelѳ misra Tiuswan namuimburab miaben lѳtigwan nam truba nu purugúig utukkurri.

Pѳs nambe ke yandѳ kwamigu puermaptѳwei isub melabelѳ guer. Pѳs ѳyeeg puppe, nam namasiitѳ namdѳ tsabѳ guermab isubelѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, Tius tru kwailanguen gatѳle ѳsiirangarub kusrubigwan isua bѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrrain gúig kѳn

Inchawei nam ñimuimburab ѳyah kѳnrrunmab isuibe treeg kѳnrrab gѳn. Pѳs nam chine kaig nebuinab melaiguma treetѳwei ñimgucha pѳnrrabelѳ gúig kѳppe, nam chi isumѳ tab gúi pѳnrraigugucha, ñimbe treetѳwei tab gúi pѳnrrѳnrrab gúi asha bѳnrrer.m
Cristѳn tru chine, chine kaig nebuilѳ namuinug treetѳwei itѳmaytѳ nebub arrubene, katѳ treetѳwei tru isui inchimѳnrrai purugúikkucha tru gúindѳ, tru gúindѳ Cristѳinukkurrindѳwei arrubig kѳn.
Truibe nam chine puig melѳben, namun tab gúi mѳrtrai purugubig kѳn, katѳganelѳ chiyugѳben treetѳwei isui melѳben, Tius namun isui inchimѳnrrai purugúitѳgatѳwei namgucha purugubelѳ gѳmig kѳnrrai.
Señѳr Jesúswei tru ka yandѳ t'ab indiibe ñimba pasrѳnrrai inchar.
Mѳikkѳben Señѳrwan undaguig kѳmíigwane Tiuswei namig kѳbig nuim bala gѳbash. ¡Namui Señѳr Jesuclistѳ amѳ!
I ka amѳñigueh t'aigwan na Pablѳ ñimun naashib nai t'aska pѳrar.

Tru Asia birausrѳ iglesiamera ñim cѳrintѳsreelan k'a amѳñigueh cha ѳran. Aquilaba, Priscilaba, k'atѳ iglesia nѳmui yau tulundzunabelѳ, truilѳ chigucha Señѳrwei munchiyu mayanguen tab k'a amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
pѳs truilѳbe nai isubigu lat'a, ñimui isubigu lat'a chi isumikkaig, t'ab gѳnrrai marig kѳn. ѳyeeg mѳguelѳbe mayanguen t'ab indig kѳnrrabelѳ gѳn.
Nai nunelѳ, ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn tru Acaya birausrѳ Estéfanaswei yauelѳbe ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ nѳmmerrig Tiuswan nebua ashibelѳ misra, Tiuswei misaameran nѳmbe purugunrrab pѳnrramisrigwan..
Incha chiwandѳgucha ñim marѳppe, undag kѳbiitѳga maramig kѳn.

Inchen namui nuneg Apѳlѳsweimburappe, tru nunelѳ ñimuisrѳmay amrrabelѳba nungucha na tiusmanda maya lincha irra taingucha, mѳimbatѳbe nѳbe chi inrrab inchimѳn. Inchendѳ nun chu uras yamig pubene, inrrab gúinrrun.
Kaguende yube kan yaskab purѳ nuig nayasig kurin gѳn, Tiusweiwan wamindig nu larrѳbichaptiikke. Inchendѳ marmѳnrrai nan sѳtѳlulrrabelѳ truba rruba kѳn.
Inchippa kan maya yanagatig kѳrrѳmisrisruandѳbe, ñimba ka kѳrrѳmisramѳnrrun, kabe tru pishim bѳlmera chab purayamnegatukken, nan chumay yamig nebuben, nai yamigu ñim purugumig kѳnrrai.

Incha ñim mѳilan karua ѳramdeelѳ gúi asha kѳrrѳmariilan, na trusrѳ puabe, tru Jerusalénsrѳmay trana ѳramig ñim an guetigwan nѳmun trana ѳrѳppe, kan kilga pѳra, tѳga rrana ѳramѳnrrun, tru i karua ѳriilѳbe chi isumga mѳguelѳ gúi nѳm ashchai.
Tru Jerusalénsrѳ Tiuswei misaamerayasig an purugúig utamigweimburappe, tru Galacia birausrѳ iglesiameran na mandѳ martrai karua bѳnsraig kѳben, ñimgucha treetѳwei martrigay.
Inchendѳ Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chinrrab, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri nam kerriguwan kanawa pѳnrramig kѳnrrai tranigwan.

Inchen tru treranrrabigwane yandѳ tru managuen trerab minchabgaitѳga pinѳbulig kѳb, k'atѳ iig tru patsѳnrrabigwane tru managuen patsѳnrrabgaitѳga pinѳbulig kѳrrѳmisrѳb inchene, iig tru ѳyeeg cha pѳra basriibe yandѳ treeg nebunrrun: Tru kwamigwane yandѳ k'anawa kenaguen gѳmíig, pinisan daig.

¡gatѳ! mѳi mѳi, kan kab gasrѳb lataitѳgue, tru trѳmpeta srabe urrig wanrrѳben. Kaguende trѳmpeta wanrrѳbene, kwabelѳbe ѳsiirangaruilѳ gѳnrrun katѳbe managuen treranrrabelѳ gѳmíikke. Inchen nambe mayeelѳba yandѳ kerriguwan peemayelѳ gѳnrrai yunѳmariilѳ gѳmig kѳnrrun.
Yu pirau mѳg maig kѳben, nam treelѳ gѳmigwanma tѳgagúibe, katѳ tru srѳmbalasrѳ mѳg maig kѳben, nambe truig lataitѳwei kѳmigwangucha tѳgagѳmѳnrrun..
Inchawei tru pirѳtѳga mari mѳg maig kѳbig kѳben, yu pirauelѳbe treelѳtѳwein gѳn. Inchen tru srѳmbalasrѳ mѳg maig kѳben, tru srѳmbalasreelѳbe truig lataitѳwein gѳn.

Katѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigugucha treeg chibig kѳn: Tru srѳsrѳ mѳg Adánbe kan misag ѳsiguig misrig kѳn cha. Inchen Adán tru Srabe Arrubig, Jesucristѳbe, espíritu gѳn, nѳbe ѳsig kѳmigwan tranѳbig.Inchawei espírituimburabiimerrig arrumѳtѳ, asr trendѳ maig kѳnrrabig truimerrig arruben, trugurrimbe yandѳ espírituimburabig arrig kѳn.k
Trendѳ yu pirau tѳga basrai asrwan sѳrig, k'atѳle ѳsiirawa kurrappe, asr espíritu gurrѳnrrun. Asr yu pirauig kѳb, k'atѳ asr espíritugucha gѳn.
Inchawei ѳyeetѳwein gѳn tru kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramikkucha. Tru asrwan sѳriibe treranrrabig kѳben, katѳle truig ѳsiirabiibe yandѳ managuen treranrrabig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn.

Inchen gatѳ treetѳwei srѳmbala bѳnrrabelan maig kѳnrrabelan treeg mariilѳ kѳb, katѳ pirauelan maig kѳnrrabelan treeg mariilѳ kѳb indan. Inchendѳ tru srѳmbala pѳnrrabelai tabzhig tѳr bilabiibe katѳgan gѳben, yu pirau pѳnrrabelai tabzhig tѳr bilabiibe katѳgan peemayig kѳn.
Chi asrmeratѳgucha lata treeg asrmeratѳ gѳmѳn, kane misag asr kѳben, kane animalmerai asr kѳben, kane illimerai asr kѳben, kane peskaumerai asr kѳn.

Kan ñi gúi chugúinguen mѳrmíig, kan yellwanma ñi ellguabene, kwamѳwabe, ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrraamѳn.Tru ñi ellguappe, tru tusr maig kѳnrrabigwan ellguamѳtѳ, trulzhigwandѳ ellguan, tirigu gúi lat'a, kabe gatѳgan chi peg yell gúi lat'a.
Kan ñi gúi chugúinguen mѳrmíig, kan yellwanma ñi ellguabene, kwamѳwabe, ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrraamѳn.k

Ñimbe gatѳle t'ab chugúi mѳra sѳlgandѳ pѳnrrѳnrrab inday, mas kaig marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ. Kaguende mѳilѳbe Tiusweimburabigwane ni maig kuinguen ashmeelѳ gѳn. Iigwan na trenchippe, ñimun kwaarѳsrѳb kѳrig burѳrtrab rrenchar.

Pѳs mѳg kuinawa, ka treekkurrindѳ tru Efesѳsrѳma larrѳ namig animal lat'aig inchib misaameraba namig aleguiyab, na treeg marѳb megaibe chi marmui lat'aitѳwei webinrraut'an. Pѳs tru kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiiranrrab gѳmubene, mugѳsrѳn chibgunrrig, trube: ¡Mab, muchib inchab gѳh, pѳs srѳnatѳ kwamig kѳbashtѳ!
Inchen ¿nambe chu urastѳgucha chindimbarre kwam lab pѳnrrabrah??
Pѳs trube, ¿tru kwabelayasig piu umbu ulsrailѳbe chi martrerah? Tru kwabelѳ kerriguwan ѳsiiramѳnrrab gѳbene, trube, ¿chinchabrre tru kwabelaimburab isua piu umbu ulsrѳbelѳ gѳh?

Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan kerriguba nui srѳb umbu nѳ maig chiben treeg pѳnrrѳnrrai Tius pѳnsraig kѳn cha. Pѳs: Chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan, nui srѳb umbu pѳnsraig kѳn chippe, Tiuswangucha truyu tѳga basrig kѳn cha trenchimuig kui tѳrgandѳ asamdiig kѳn. Kaguende Tius nѳwein gѳn tru chiwandѳgucha kerriguba Cristѳ maig chiben treeg pѳnrrѳnrrai marѳbiibe.
Inchen tru ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ inchibig srabeig pasrabigwan pinisaig kѳnrrabiibe, tru kwamig kѳn.n

Trugurrimbe yandѳ tru srabe gwalѳm punrrabig kѳn, Cristѳ tru nѳrreelѳ nѳm asha garub purrabelan gѳben, mugucha manchinrraingaig nѳm garubelan gѳben, nѳrreelѳ maramburab marѳb purrabelan gѳben, yandѳ truilan kerriguwan chigucha martrabgailѳ kѳrrѳmara, tru Cristѳ ashib karub waigwan yandѳ Tius Mѳskawan nѳ ashchai purѳѳren..
Pѳs kwamima kan mѳkkurrindѳ arrig kѳbene, katѳ kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiirawa kurramikkucha kan mѳkkurrindѳ arrig kѳn.
Inchendѳ treeg kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Cristѳbeguende kwabelai utugurri katѳle ѳsiirabwei indig kѳn, tru kwabelai utugurri ke srѳsrѳzhiitѳ ke nѳmerrig pѳlbasra ѳsiirab.m
Trube, treeg kѳbene, Cristѳn tru kѳrewa kwabelѳgucha pinab pinamsrѳ pѳnrrѳnrrab amban.
Inchen Cristѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramuig kѳbene, trube, ñimui isubigwan nuinug tѳga bѳnrraikkucha, tѳgagѳmuinguenig tѳgagúig puraiben, trube, ñimbe gatѳgucha kaig marѳb srѳ amѳnan.k

Katѳgucha treetѳ gѳmѳ, nambe Tiusweiwan ka isatѳ waminchib pѳnrrabelѳ gúig, treeg webinrrun. Kaguende nambe Tiusbe Cristѳne katѳle ѳsiirangaruig kѳn chib pѳnrraig kuig kѳn. Inchen kwailѳ ѳsiiramѳnrrab gúi ciertѳn webibene, trube, Tiusbe katѳle Cristѳn ѳsiirangarumuig, treeg kѳn..
Pѳs, tru kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiirawa kurrѳmuig kѳbene, trube, Cristѳgucha gatѳle ѳsiirawa, kurrѳmuig kѳn.

Pѳs nabe Cristѳ nѳashib k'arua ѳriilai utube truburab gѳmíig, purѳ lamíig kur. Trurrigu Cristѳ nѳashib k'arua ѳrig kѳn cha trenchaguen wamig kѳnrrabgaikke, k'aguende nabe Tiuswei iglesian larrѳ k'aig marѳbig kѳbig kur.
trugurrimbe albiji nunelѳ quinientѳs menrrawan kenamisrig kѳbigwan. Tru ashibelѳbe mayeelѳ lutau ka ѳsig amѳnan, kan gandѳwei yandѳ kwaig mu gaaben..
Nabe ñimun kusrenanѳppe, tru nan mas nuig purѳ tabig kusrenanig utig kѳbigwan ñimun kusrenanig kѳn, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu maig chibig kѳben, namui kaig mariilѳgurri Cristѳbe treeg kwawa,
Inchendѳ chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, tabig sѳlwan marammay maramig kѳn, ambumay, imay ke chi maringuen asamgaig martrab gѳmѳtѳ.k
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, nai nunelѳ, Tius maig karuigwan eshkamigwan martrab inchib melay. Katѳ tru peg wammera mѳriimíig wamindamigwangucha merѳmѳtay..

Pѳs mѳikkѳben Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abig treeg kurmab isub, k'abe Tiusweimburabigwan maramig keta tranig tѳgaig kurmab isub inchabe, trube, tru iig na ñimun pѳrigwane Señѳr nѳ garua basrѳbwei indig kui, treeg isua asamig kѳn.
Nѳm chiwan gѳben nebua kusremig palѳbene, nѳmui kelan nѳmui yau bayamig kѳn. Kaguende kan ishug iglesiayu waminchab indamibe chi sѳl gѳmѳn.n
Inchagucha Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelai espíritumerabe nѳm maig kѳnrrain gѳben, treegwan martrab pѳnrran..
Kaguende ñimbe mayeelѳba Tius tru maig karuigwan eshkappe, kan gan wamindamig kѳn, mayeelѳba kusreb, katѳ mayeelѳba tab melamigwan utab inchai.
Inchen gatѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳgucha pailѳ gúi, pѳnelѳ gúi treetѳ wamindamig kѳn. Inchen kanelѳbe tru wamindigwan Tiuswein gѳh, kabe Tiuswein gѳmѳ chinderamab isub purramig kѳn..
Inchen tru peg wamwan wamindigwan i wamindiibe ѳyeeg t'an cha eshkanrrabig mu gaabene, trube, iglesiayube truigwane esegappa, nuinetѳ waminchib katѳ Tiusbatѳ wamindamig kѳn.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, nai nunelѳ, ¿mandѳ chinrrab gѳh? Pѳs ñim tulundzunappe, mѳitѳgucha kane cantamig tѳga gúin gúi, kabe mѳibe kusrennamig tѳga gúin gúi, kabe mѳibe Tius nun kenamarigwan wamindamig tѳga gúin gúi, mѳibe peg wam mѳriimíig wamindamig tѳga gúin gúi, kabe mѳibe tru peg wam wamindigwan i wamindiibe ѳyeeg chibig kѳn cha, eshkamig tѳga gúin gúi, ñimbe treeg burrabelѳ gѳn. Trube, truigwan marѳppe, chiwandѳgucha iglesiane Tiusweimburabigu mas nѳrrѳrab ambamig kѳnrrai maramig kѳn..

Trune ñim mayeelѳba Tius maig karuigwan trunun eshkabene, Tiuswan kѳremíig kui, kabe mѳikkѳben Tiusweimburabigwan kusremíig kui kebya basrabiibe, mayeelѳ wamindiitѳga nѳbe kaig marѳbigwein gѳbrairrenmab isunrrai marѳb, mayeelѳ wamindiitѳga nune kaig marѳbig kuin gúi asha kѳrrѳmarѳb inchun.

Inchawei tru peg wammera mѳriimíig wamindiilѳbe Tiuswan kѳrebelayasig kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswan kѳremѳ misaamerain gѳn, Tius truyu pasrain gúi asamig kѳnrrai. Trune tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkaibe Tiuswan kѳremѳ misaamerain gѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswan kѳrebelayasig kѳn..
Nai nunelѳ, ñim maig isumigube ureezheelѳ latailѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, chigѳben kaig maramigwan isua asamigube shushcheelѳ latailѳ gѳmig kѳn. Inchen maig isumigube yandѳ kѳleelѳsun isubelѳ gѳmig kѳn.n
Nabe Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa char, kaguende nabe peg wammera mas yamguen waminchibig kur, ñim mayeelѳ lataitѳguen gѳmѳ.
Pѳs ñibe Tiuswan mayangucha tabig ungwa taingucha, treeg mariibe kanune Tiusweimburabigu nuramig chi purugumѳn..
Kaguende na peg wamdѳga Tiusba waminchib pasrѳbene, nai espíritube Tiusba wamindingucha, nai turyu isubigube chigucha chi kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrun.
Inchawei mѳikkѳben kan peg wam mѳriimíig waminchibiibe, trube, tru peg wam wamindigwan ѳyan dan cha katѳburѳ eshkabig kѳnrrab, Tiuswan trunun trannrra cha miamig kѳn.n

Inchawei nama mѳikkѳben peg wam wamindigwan ni chi tainguen mѳrtrab gaima basrappe, nabe tru waminchibigweimbe nuim birauig kѳmѳtѳ, peesriig lataig kѳmѳnrrun. Inchen nѳgurringucha naimbe peg birausriig lataig kѳnrrun.n

Inchawei ñimgucha treetѳwein gѳn. Ñim tru peg wamwan wamindigu chi tai mѳramdiig treeg waminchimubene, ¿ñim waminchib pѳnrraigwane mandiincha chi tai mѳriasamѳ? Ñimui wamindiibe isig ichibigu wamindi lataitѳ burainrrun.

Kan chimera gѳben ѳsiguig kѳmeelanguen, luswan lata, arpan lata chiwan urramigwan chi wanrri mѳrtrain gѳnѳmubene ¿trube, tru lus urrigwan chi urri mѳramgawei, arpa gѳnigwan chiwan gѳni mѳramgawei gѳmѳnrraitarru?

Pѳs nane ñim mayeelѳba peg wammera waminchibelѳ gúimbemab isutan. Inchendѳ Tius maig karuigwan ñim trunun eshkabelѳ gúimbe gѳtan. Kaguende treegwan waminchibiibe mas nuikken gѳn. Inchendѳ peg wam wamindikkucha tabiitѳwein gѳn, tru peg wam wamindigwan mѳikkѳben ѳyeeg tan cha eshkabene, iglesiabe Tiusweimburabigu nѳrrѳranrrai.

Trune Tius tru maig karuigwan eshkabiibe misagwan wamindan, Tiusweimburab mas nѳrrѳrab ambamigweyasiiba, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melѳnrrai wamindamigweyasiiba, chigúindѳgucha ka puraambub melѳnrrai purugumigweyasiiba.
Kaguende peg wam mѳriimíig waminchibiibe mѳguelan gѳmѳtѳ, Tiusba waminchen, mugucha ni chi tainguen mѳrmѳn, pѳs Espíritu Santѳgurri chinchaguen wetѳgѳrramgailѳ waminchen..
Inchen mѳi yambe pѳngatѳ pѳnrrabig bѳnrran: isubigwan Jesuclistѳinuutѳ pasliiba, katѳ isua munig melaiba, trugurli tru undag kѳbiiba. Inchendѳ tru i pѳngatѳyu purab nuibe tru undag kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Señѳrwein gwalѳm tru newanig tabig pubene, tru newanig kѳmíig mayandѳwein gѳbiibe yandѳ pinѳnrrun.
Kaguende nambe newan gѳmѳ, mayandѳwei nebua asha gѳben, k'atѳ Tius maig k'aruben nam eshk'ailѳgucha newan gѳmѳ, mayandѳwei nebua eshk'ailѳ gѳn.
Undag kѳbiibe chigѳben sѳlgandѳ tabig mariimeelѳyu tab gúi mѳrѳb kasrag basramig kѳmѳtѳ, isa gѳmíig, sѳligube tab gúi mѳrѳb kasrag basramig, treeg kѳn.m

Undag kѳbiibe chi buindѳgucha tammay ka megabig kѳmig, larrѳ tab inchibig kѳmig, treeg kѳn. Undag kѳbiibe katѳgan chigѳben tѳgagѳben pusrkwai ashib pasrѳmíig kѳmig, katѳ purѳ mѳg inchib chib waminchimíig kѳmig, katѳ undag kѳbiibe purab nuig misrѳb pasrѳmíig kѳmig, treeg kѳn.

Tius maig karuben na trunun eshkab pasramig keta tranig tѳgaig kѳb, katѳ mu nebua asiimíig sѳrig pѳnrrabigwan kerriguba chigúi mѳrѳb, katѳ nebua asamburab kerriguwan nebua ashibig kѳb, katѳ nai isubigwan kerriguba Jesucristѳinuutѳ na tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagúikkurri nѳrrѳ tunmeranguen nѳѳrѳsrѳ puraamba pѳnrrѳnrrai marѳbig, na treeg tѳgagѳb indinaindѳgucha, undag kѳbigwan chigaig kuinaisruandѳbe, nabe chigucha gѳmur.k
Inchendѳ ñimbe tru ket'a traniilan mas t'abigwan nebua ke tѳgagѳnrrab isua lab melamig kѳn. Inchen nabe treetѳguen gѳmѳ, kan may mas t'abigwan eshkanrrab inchar, truwan ambamig.

¿Kabe mayeelѳba Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳtѳ gúitarru? ¿Kabe mayeelѳba Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳtѳ gúitarru? ¿Kabe mutѳgucha kusrennѳbelѳtѳ gúitarru? ¿Kabe mayamba maramburab mariilan marѳbelѳtѳ gúitarru?
Pѳs inchawei ñimbe Cristѳi asr kua, ñimbe mѳitѳgucha kan gan nui asruelѳ gѳn.
ѳyamay mѳibe nѳѳrѳ, nѳѳrѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, masken asru pѳnrrabelѳbe mѳitѳgucha ambugurli, igurli lata isunrrain gѳn.
Pѳs namui asru chi kѳlig isumgaig tѳgagúilѳbe tre isua asamig palain gѳmѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe namui asrwan ѳyamay pѳnsrѳb tamaran, tru trengatig tab inchib tѳgagúimeelane mas tab inchab.
Inchawei treeg kѳmѳtѳ, asru murguen guebatamgailѳbe masken balabig kѳn.
Pѳs kappe tasigwane ѳyeeg chinrraamѳn: Ñune chi balѳmѳtan cha. Katѳ tur chigucha srѳmmeran ѳyeeg chinrraamѳn: Ñimune chi balѳmѳtan cha.
Inchawei nuin gúi, nuin gúi truba yambalѳ gѳbendѳ, asrbe kandѳ gѳn..
Inchen asr ѳrѳba kaptѳ gúimbe ¿trube, mandѳ incha mѳrѳbsruerah? Inchen kerriguba kalutѳ gúimbe ¿trube, mandѳ incha irrѳmѳrѳbsruerah?
Inchen kalugucha ѳyeeg t'aimbeh: Nabe kab gѳmuikkurri asruig kѳmur cha. ¿Treekkurri, trube, asruig kѳmѳtѳ, nѳѳriig kѳnrraut'ah?
Inchawei asrbe kanbalѳtiig kѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, chine, chine pѳnsraig tѳgaig kѳn.
Asrma kandѳ gѳbendѳ, tru asrube chine tѳgaig kѳn. Inchen tru asru pѳnrrabelѳbe truba nu gѳbendѳ, kan asrtѳ gѳn. Inchawei Cristѳgucha treetѳwein gѳn.
Inchen iilan kerrigu ѳyeeg marѳb pasrabiibe, nѳtѳ kandѳ, tru Espíritu Santѳtѳwein gѳn, mѳigwandѳgucha nun maig tranamdiig kѳben, treeg tranѳbig.
Inchen tru Espílitu Santѳtѳwei katѳganune nui isubigwan Jesuclistѳinug tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai tranen, katѳganune kwanrreelan tamarѳbig kѳmigwan tru Espílitu Santѳtѳwei tranan.
Inchendѳ Espíritu Santѳ nѳ mѳigweinuutѳgucha ѳyamay marѳb kena basrabig kѳn, mayeelan kelarrappa t'ab gѳnrrai.
Katѳ chi maramelѳgucha peemay, peemay maramig kѳbendѳ, tru maramelѳyu chiwandѳgucha trumѳrig mayeelainug marѳb basrabiibe, tru Tiustѳwein gѳn.
Katѳ chi purugub maramelѳgucha, peemay, peemay maramig kuindѳgucha, Señѳrbe kandѳ gѳn.

Inchawei nabe ñimun eshkanrrab inchar, Tiuswei Espíritu trendingaruben waminchibiibe, mugucha ѳyeeg chinrraamѳn cha: Jesúswane kaig nebubash chib. Katѳ Espíritu Santѳ trendingarumubene, mugucha ѳyeeg chinrraamѳn cha: Jesúsbe tru Señѳr gѳn cha.
Nai nunelѳ, Tiusweimburabelѳyu iglesiayasig marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai Espíritu Santѳ keta tranigweimburappe, chigúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrai inchar.k
Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, ñim tru mamigwan manrrab tulundzunabe, kangurrin gangurri muniiramig kѳn.m
Inchawei ѳyeekkurli ñimui utube kwanrreelѳ, kullaarailѳ truba nѳrrѳ gѳben, mѳilѳbe kwaig, mu gaagѳn.
Kaguende mѳikkѳben Señѳrwei asrwane ni kan maig kerahmabguen isua ashmѳtѳ, tru mab, muchib indiibe nuyasiitѳwei lab pasran trѳmbѳig nebui pasramig kѳnrrai.m
Inchawei mѳikkѳben maig kѳbash inchendѳ, Señѳrwei pirriwanba, cѳpayuigwanba mab, muchib inchibiibe, Señѳrwei asrwanba, aniwanba nuinug trѳmbѳig marѳb pasran..

Incha tru mamigwan chab mabe, katѳ cѳpangucha mutabe, trendaig kѳn: I cѳpabe tru nai anindѳga Tius tru srѳ acuerdѳ mara basrig, truig kѳn cha. Iigwan mutsimѳrig, chu uraskucha nan isub gѳnrrab martrigay cha.k
yandѳ mayanguen bay cha, pirishabe, trendaig kѳn: Iibe nai asr kѳn cha, tru ñimuyasig kwanrrai tranig. Iigwan ѳyeeg marѳppe, nan isub gѳnrrab martrigay cha.

mѳitѳgucha ñimui mamigwanmerrig manrrab tulundzunabelѳ gѳn, katѳganelan munugumѳtѳ, kane barѳgwaig wamnebe, kane mutsiguikken wanrrab.¿Kabe ñimbe yamera chigargѳtirru mab, muchib purramig? ¿Kabe Tiuswei iglesiane kaashib, chigar burrabelane kѳrig burѳrtrab inchigueh? ¿Nabe ñimune mandѳ chinrrab gѳh? ¿Kabe, ¡waachaalleelѳ, yangucha tabig marin gѳn! chinrrab gѳ chindah? ¡ѳyeeg marigwane kan waachaalleelѳ truba tabig marin gѳn! chinrrab basrѳmur.
Pѳs ñim kanbalatѳ linchib tulundzunappe, Señѳrwei mamigwan manrrab tulundzunѳmѳtѳ
Pѳs ѳyeeg nѳmuin gúi nѳѳrѳ misrѳb ñim treeg inchib waramig palabwei indan, ñimui utu mѳilѳ sѳlwan isua marѳbelѳ gúit'ashchab truyu asamig kѳnrrai.

Na ѳyamay maramig kѳn chib yu wamindamigube, ¡k'an waachaalleelѳ! yangucha tabig marѳb melain gѳn chinrrab inchimur. Ñim tulundzunappe, k'a trѳmbѳig martrab tulundzunabelѳ gúin gѳn, chi tabig martrab gѳmѳtѳ.
Trune ishuwane pusrugwan yabig wanѳsrkamibe nuimbe truba tabig kѳn, kaguende ishuwane turyu nebetsig lataitѳwei pusrugwan tranig kua.k
¿Inchen k'an mѳwane pusrugwan yabig wanѳsrkѳb tѳgagѳmibe trѳmbѳtiig kѳrikken gѳnrraptiig kѳbig kui, tru trendѳ treeg kѳnrrai chine mara pѳnsrailѳtѳweinguen kusrennѳbig kѳmuitarru?
Inchendѳ Señѳrweinuube mѳѳmisag ka nuimburaptѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳwei, ishuumisag ka nuimburaptѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳn.
Inchawei treekkurri ishuube mѳg maig chiben treeg megabig kui ashchai, ángelesmeragurri nui turwane nebetsaig kѳmig kѳn.n
Inchagucha tru srѳsrѳ Tius mѳwan marѳppe, ishuumisagweyasig marmѳtѳ, ishuwanguen mѳѳmisagweyasig marig kѳn.n
Kaguende mѳѳbe ishuumisagweinukkurri arrubig kѳmѳtѳ, ishukken mѳweinukkurri arrubig kѳn.n

Inchen mu ishuutѳgucha chi nebetsѳmѳ, turtiig Tiusba waminchib, kabe Tius maig karuigwan eshkab waminchib, treeg basrabiibe, mѳѳmisag, tru turwane chigucha gѳmíig kuig lataig marѳb pasran. Kaguende pusrugwan mulla, barig lataitѳwein gѳn.Inchen ishug nebetsѳmíibe, trube, pusrugwan mulla, baramig kѳn. Inchen ishuwan pusrugwan mulla, bariibe kѳrig kѳnrraptiig kѳbene, trube, turwan nebetsaig kѳmig kѳn.
Nabe ñimune tabig malin gѳn chib mayanguen tabig waminchar, kaguende ñimbe chiyutѳgucha nane isua melab, na ñimun maig waminchib kusrenniilane ñimbe elachimѳ, tѳga bѳnrraimba.
Na maig marѳbig kѳben, ñimbe trunun asha marѳb melѳnrrigay, Cristѳ maig marѳbig kѳben, na trunun asha marѳb megab lat'aitѳweingue.
Inchawei mabyu lata, muchibyu lata, k'abe chi peg marѳbyu lata, chi marigutѳgucha Tiuswan maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrrai maramig kѳn ñimbe.
Mamigwan na Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa cha maben, trube, ¿nane chindimbarre kalѳ marѳptiig kѳn dah, tru na ungwa taig mamigwan maikkurri?m

Inchen ñimun mѳikkѳben: I yaumbe tru task'a mari tiusmerai kweetsi yaun gѳn cha, trenchibene, trube, mamumig kѳn, tru treeg yaun gѳn cha eshk'abigwan mindisha kѳrrѳmarmѳnrrappa, k'atѳ trugurri isub kebachib pasrabigu k'alѳ gѳn chibig tѳgagѳmѳnrraimba.
Yau yanѳbyu maig yau yanbashtѳ ka pena may, ñimui isub kebachib pasrabikkurri chi paya mѳrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ..
Mutѳgucha ñuimburabigwandѳ tab gѳnrrai lamѳtѳ, k'atѳganelaimburab tab gѳnrrai lamig kѳn.
¿Kabe nambe peg tiuswan keesha bѳnrramisrѳb Señѳrwane ke larrѳ namishinrrab inchab gѳ? ¿Kabe nambe nѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, purab martrapteelѳ gѳbra chindah?
Ñimbe Señѳrwei cѳpayuigwan mutsamba, kwaimandziimerai cѳpayuigwan mutsamba inchimumig kѳn. Katѳ Señѳrwei mishatsigúigwan mamba, kwaimandziimerai mishatsigúigwan mamba inchimumig kѳn.m
Tru israelitasmeranma ñimguen isua asay: Tru kweecha tranig animalmerai yauwan mabelѳ, treeg marѳppe, ka yauwandѳ mamѳtѳ, ¿altarweimburabigwangucha tѳga marѳb pѳnrrѳmuitarru?
Kaguende pirrima kandѳ gúig kѳppe, namgucha truba nu gѳbendѳ, nambe kan asrtѳ guer, pѳs mayeelѳba kan birriwandѳ mabelѳgurri..
Nabe ñimun waminchippe, yandѳ tab chigúi mѳrѳbelan lataig waminchar. Na wamindigwane sѳl gѳtashchab isub purray.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, nai undaarailѳ, tru taska mali tiusmeraimburabigwane kerliguwan tarѳmisray.
Inchawei mѳikkѳben Tiusweinug yandѳ ke t'ab pasrarmab isua basrabiibe, trube, peñchab gѳmѳ, purѳ t'ab isua basrau.
Nilѳ waminchib ñimuinetѳ namig, Tiuswan mulla mѳrmѳtay, tru mѳilѳgѳben truilѳ treeg marѳbelѳ lataitѳwei. Truilanma tru kweechib ángel arrua, nѳmune pinisaig kѳn.

Katѳ nambe menda mѳguelѳba, menda ishumburmeraba namui asrtѳga trѳmbѳig marѳbelѳ gѳmumig kѳn, tru mѳilѳgѳben truilѳ treeg marѳb latawei. Incha treekkurri kan gwalѳmyutѳ misaamera 23.000 kwaig kѳbig kѳn..
ѳyeeg pureppe, nam trunundѳguen asha kusremig kѳnrrain gúig kѳn, nam ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib chigѳben kailan isub pѳnrramig kѳmѳnrrai, israelitasmera ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib isub pѳnrrab lataitѳwei..
Incha gatѳ treetѳwei mayeelѳba Tiusweimburab mamigwandѳwei mab,
Incha nѳmbe mayeelѳba tru wañimba, marba pinѳgasrѳb pinѳbuliilѳ gúikkurri Mѳisésba kanbalatѳ bѳnrran.

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nabe naasiitѳwei nai asrwane purѳ murigu purayam gusrenrrai kusrenanѳb ke treegwan kѳnrrai inchibig kur. Inchipba na katѳganelan eshkab kusrenanѳb pera basrѳwa, natѳweinguen kaiman dainab megamѳnrrappe.

Inchawei mѳikkѳben treeg lulamelѳyu kebya basramisrѳbiibe, chiyutѳgucha nui asr maig marѳg kѳtanmaptѳ marѳb megamѳn. Pѳs truilѳbe kan cѳrѳna ka petѳ minchib pinѳnrrabigwan utѳnrraptѳ treeg maren, trune nambe cѳrѳna managuen minchib pinѳnrrabig kѳmíigwan utѳnrrab Tiusweiwan marѳb meler.
Iigwan na kerrigu ѳyeeg marѳppe, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamgurri ѳyeeg marѳbig kur, truyugurri purѳ tabig tѳgaig arrubigwan nagucha trunun tѳgatѳ utѳnrrab..

Inchen Mѳisés pѳrigwan tѳgagѳmeelai utube, treetѳwei nagucha chigaig lataitѳwei uñibig kur, tru maig maramigwan pѳrig chigaig melabelan Cristѳn nebua ashchai martrab. (Tius maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigwan na chi asamig chigaig kѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ, Cristѳ maig martrai karuigwan trunun nabe marѳb megabig kur.))
Nabe mu karuig megamíig kuagucha, nabe natѳwei mayeelѳ karuindiig meganrrab pasramisrar, maya nebuingatig Cristѳyasig misag nѳrrѳ nebua tѳgagѳnrrab.

Inchawei maramigwan na naashib martrab isua marabe, truburѳ utamigwane utamѳnrrun. Inchen treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ke nan trunun martrai inchendѳ malinaisruandѳbe, trube, tru karua basligwan ka marmѳn chimѳnrraindѳ malig kѳrrѳmisrtrun.

Inchendѳ ѳyeeg maramdeelѳ gúindѳgucha, nabe managuen trunune marmuig kѳn. Katѳ iigwan na pѳrѳbgucha, nan treeg martraimab isua bѳrmur. Pѳs na chi treeg marmѳwagurri na ѳyeeg purѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb mѳg inchib waminchib pasraigwan nan mugѳben kerramѳwatѳ, kwamikken sѳl gѳnrrautan.
¿Ashmeelѳ gѳtirru, Tiuswei yau marѳb melabelѳma truyuigwan maben, k'atѳ Tiuswei altaryu marѳb pѳnrrabelѳbe truyuigwan mabelѳ gúi?
Inchawei nama ñimuinug Tiusweimburabelan ellmarig kѳbene, trube, ¿ñim chigѳben tѳgagúigwan maitѳguen nam utamig menrra indig kѳnrrab gѳ chinderah?n

Kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriguma ѳyeeg chibig pѳrig basran: Kan wey tirigun kwattrai itѳbunab megabigwane mabashig kѳmub pusalgutsamig kѳmѳn cha. ¿Kabe Tiusbe weymeran isua trendaig kѳ chindah?

¿Kan suldauma maig kuaasamѳ nѳ suldau basraptѳga, chi palabigwan nui andѳgatѳwei penabiibe? ¿Kan mu guaasamѳ uvas tusrmera ellguawa, uvas misren, truigwanguen mamíibe? ¿Kan mu guaasamѳ kabramerane ashib tѳgagѳbendѳ, pitsѳn sunna muchimíibe??
¿Kabe nam gѳbgan Tiuswan ashibigwan srai mara, pera bѳnrramig kѳmuitarru? cha, tru gatѳganelѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, katѳ tru Señѳrwei trag nunelѳba, katѳ tru Pedrѳba, truilѳ lataitѳweingue.
¿Kabe nam gѳbgan mab, muchib indamig kѳmuitarru? cha..
Nan mѳilѳgѳben ѳyeeg marin gѳn chib, payibelane ѳyan gѳn chib, kusra lѳtamѳnrrun..
Inchawei mamibe nai nunewan kebenѳsrkamitѳ gѳnrrab gѳbene, managuen nabe yauwane mamumѳnrrun, nai nunewan ka srurrengwangarumѳnrrappe.
Inchawei ѳyamay tru nunelan kaig marѳb, nѳmui isub kebachib basrabigu kullaguigwan kѳrriincha kѳrrѳmarѳb pѳnrrappe, ñimbe Cristѳn kaig marѳb pѳnrran.

Kaguen mѳikkѳben nui isub kebachib pasrabigu kullaatiig tѳgaig, ñi tru maig kuigwan yandѳ tab nebua ashib kusrebig, tru taska mari tiusmerai tab yausrѳ ñun mab wai ashabe, ¿nѳgucha tru taska mari tiusmeran trani mamimeran ka manrrurmab isumѳnrrab gѳh??
Pѳs mamibe Tiusweinug nam katѳguchi kemalla pѳnrramig kѳnrrai marmѳwei, katѳ nam tru mamuikkurli mas kailѳ misrtrab gѳmѳwei, kabe nam truigwan maikkurli mas tabelѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳn.

Treeg kuingucha, namuimbe Tiusbe kandѳ nѳtѳ gѳn, tru Mѳskai. Tru chigurrimbunѳ arrubiibe nuinukkurrindѳ arruben, katѳ nambe nuyasig ѳsig amѳner. Katѳ Señѳr Jesucristѳ kandѳ gѳben, chitѳgucha kѳbiibe nѳgurriwei pѳnrrѳben, namgucha nѳgurriwei ѳsig amѳñibelѳ guer..
Trube, tru taska mari tiusmeran pѳnsraig yaumeran maigweimburappe ¿mandѳ chinrrab? Pѳs tru taska mari tiusmerabe yu piraube chigucha gѳmeelѳ gúi nambe ashibelѳ guer, katѳ Tiusbe nѳtѳ kandѳ gúi..

Animalmera kweecha tru yauwan task'a mari tiusmeran trana pѳnsraigweimburappe nambe mayeelѳba nebua ashibelѳ guer. Pѳs tru nebua ashib kusreibe k'a nѳrreelѳ misrѳb pѳnrrѳnrrai maren, trune tru undag kѳbig Tiusweinukkurri arrubiibe Tiusweimburabigu nѳrrѳram burugubig kѳn.
Pѳs na isuibe ѳyeeg kѳn: katѳle kasharamѳ, nѳtѳ kѳrrѳmisrikken, mayanguen t'ab gѳnrrab gúi. Nagucha Tiuswei Espíritun tѳgagurmab isua, trenchib pasrar.
Inchawei tru kasharanrrab misri srusrѳba kasharaig sѳldѳwein gѳben, katѳ kasharamuibe mas tabguen gѳn.

Inchen kan mѳg nui manrrau nѳ maig isuigwane treeg martrab kandѳ isua basrabig, katѳ nui asru maig marѳg kѳbig arruben, truig mumaygucha srua irramamѳ, tru nѳ maig isua tѳgagúigwan isua mѳra tѳga basrѳwa, tru srusrѳba kasharamѳnrrab nѳ treeg isua basrabiibe, kasharamuig sѳl gѳn.

Iigwan na kerrigu ñimun trenchippe, ñimundѳwei tab gѳnrrai trenchar. Kabe ñimun ke truyutѳ ilѳsrka melѳnrraingucha inchimѳtѳ, masken mumay amѳnamigwan treeg marѳb amѳña, Señѳrweimburabigwan tab chi ilѳsrkaimíig marѳb melamig kѳnrrai inchar..
Nane ñim chigucha chi isumikk'aig treeg amѳnaimbemab gѳtan. Kaguende k'an k'asharamíig nѳtiibe Señѳrweimburabigwan k'atѳguchinguen isun, Señѳr tab gúi wanrrai maramigwan.

Inchen truba isui kishib melabelѳbe isuig kishib pѳnrrѳmѳwa lataig bѳnrrѳben, truba kasrag bѳnrrabelѳbe chi kasrag bѳnrrѳmѳwa lataig bѳnrrѳben, chigѳben penabelѳbe chigucha penѳmѳwa lataig bѳnrrѳben,n

Inchendѳ ñi kasharaikkucha, chi kaig marig kѳmѳwein gѳben, katѳ kan srusrѳ kasharaikkucha, chi kaig marig kѳmѳwein gѳn. Inchen gѳben tru kasharabelѳbe chinetѳ nebuig pѳnrramig arruben, isui melamig kѳnrrab gѳn. Pѳs nane ñim treeg nebuig melai ashmuinrrabna gѳtan.
Inchen ñi srain dѳgaig kuabe, trube, tarѳmisrtrab inchimѳta. Kabe chi sraingaig, ñitiig kuabe, trube, srai tѳgagѳnrrab lamѳta.

Inchen tru kasharameelѳ nѳmdeelaimburappe, Señѳr nѳ garua basriibe chigagur. Inchendѳ Señѳr nan lastima asigwan nebua tѳgagúikkurri, na maig taigwan ñim treeg kuitamab isumdiig kuinawa, naimburab ñimun ѳyamay maramdiig kѳn chinrrab inchar.
Kaguende ñimbe Tius nuwei peniilѳ gúig gѳppe, mѳguelѳ karuindiig melabelѳ gѳmѳtѳ guy.

Inchen karuindiig megaben Señѳr waminabiibe, Señѳrweimburappe yandѳ webya basran. Inchen gatѳ treetѳwei ka karuptѳ srua gúig megabig kѳmѳtѳ, nuimburab uñen waminabiibe, Cristѳ karuindiig meganrrabig kѳn.k
Tius ñimun wamab uras mѳitѳgucha ñim mailѳ gѳben, treeg wamiilѳbe, trumaytѳ ka gѳrrѳmisramig kѳn.k
Kaguende circuncidaweig kui chi kѳnrrab gѳmѳwei, circuncidamíig kui chi kѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳn. Tius maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailan mѳra marig, truibe tabig kѳn.

Inchendѳ ñim mѳigwandѳgucha ñimun Señѳr maig uñchai marig kѳben, treegutѳ unamig kѳn, tru ñi Tiuswan nebua ashib uras maig kѳbig kuibe, trumaytѳ ka unamig kѳn. Chu iglesiamerayuelandѳgucha iigwan ѳyamay marѳb gѳnrrai nabe treeg karua basrar.

Inchendѳ mѳikkѳben tru pailѳyu Tiuswan kѳremíig tarѳmisra ibene, ka ibasamig kѳn. Pѳs ѳyeegube, kan srai lata, kan keg lata Tiuswan kѳrebelѳbe imѳnrrai inchib ke treegutѳ melѳnrraingucha pѳnsrailѳ gѳmѳn. Kaguende Tiusbe ñimun wamappe, chi isumѳ pishindѳ tab waramig kѳnrrai wamig kѳn.
Inchen kan srai, keebe Tiuswan kѳremíig tѳgagua, nѳ ka lincha uñchab inchene, sraimbe tarѳmisrѳb kutsamig kѳmѳn cha.
Inchen kasharawarmerane iigwan karua basrar, na garua baslig kѳmѳtѳ, Señѳr nѳ garua baslig kѳn: Sraimbe kewane kuchimumig kѳn cha.
Inchendѳ kaig marmѳ uñibig uñchab gaimabiibe, kaig marѳg kѳbiitѳ ke chinsraatѳ inchib uñibgunrriibe kasharaikken sѳl gѳnrrun cha..

Pѳs maya mѳguelѳba na lataitѳwei nѳmdeelѳ gúimbemab isur. Inchendѳ mѳitѳgucha tru nѳm trendѳ treeg kѳmigwan keta tranig uta tѳgar gѳn Tiusweinukkurri arrubigwan, mѳibe ѳyamayig kѳbene, katѳ mѳibe peemayikke.

Inchawei tru ñim Tiusba wamindamigutѳ kebamrrab, kan maya yanagatig ñim pailѳ lata tru treegwan marmѳnrrab wamincha gѳmѳwabe, kanikkurri kanikkurri asrwan tranmѳnrrab inchimumig kѳn. Tiusba wamindamigwan chab wamincha, trugurrimbe ñimui asrwane gatѳ treetѳwei tranamig kѳn, tru treegwan marmuikkurrindѳ Satanás ñimun kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab chigѳben mara ashmѳnrrai..
Pѳs keebe srawei asrwan tab gѳnrrai maramig kѳben, sraimbe nui kewei asrwan tab gѳnrrai maramig kѳn..
Inchendѳ ishumburmeraba, mѳguelѳba purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳbelѳ gúikkurri, mѳguelѳbe mѳitѳgucha nui srain dѳgaig kѳmig kѳben, ishumburmerabe mѳitѳgucha nui keg tѳgaig kѳmig kѳn..
Namui Señѳr Jesuclistѳi ka yandѳ tab indiibe, nai nunelѳ, ñimba pasrѳnrraimab isur. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Mѳingurrimbunѳbe mugucha nan chinetѳ pui basramig kѳnrrai marmѳrrunrrigay. Kaguende nabe nai asru Jesucristѳgurri kaig indinab kѳrriindiilan nai asru asamdiig tѳga basrar.
Asru circuncidaweig kui chi kѳnrrab gѳmѳwei, circuncidamíig kui chi kѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳn, treeg kѳmѳtѳ, kerrigu srѳig peemay amѳnamig truibeguende t'abig kѳbwei indan.

Pѳs tru circuncidawar gѳbenguen, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig maig karuben trunun marmeelѳ gѳbendѳrre inchibelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ nѳmbe ñimune asrwan circuncidanrrai indan, nѳmbe ñimui asru truba tab gúi mѳrѳb, ka mѳg inchib pѳnrramig kѳnrraindѳ.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, chigѳben maramdiig kѳbenbatѳ, mayeelanba tabig margun. Inchen mas Tiuswei misag, tru isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgarmerane gatѳguchinguen tabig maramig kѳn.
Tabig maramigwane muraaramѳ marѳbig marѳb melѳgun. Kaguende tru treeg marigwan utamig yandѳ pubene, treeg marigwan utamig kѳnrrun, nam kullaaramѳ marѳb melѳwabe.
Chigѳben kѳmѳnrraitamab ñimguen ñimasiitѳ treeg isumѳtay, Tiusbe nun maig kѳbash inchib k'a indzatѳ mѳrtraingucha gѳmѳtѳ gѳn, k'an mѳg nѳ maig ellmara kѳrrѳmariibe k'atѳburѳ trunundѳwei tulishinrrun.
Kaguende mѳitѳgucha nui chi maramigwane mu mendaig kѳmѳtѳ, nѳashib srua yamig kѳn.

Inchawei ñim mѳitѳgucha chi marigwan ñuimburabigwan sѳl gѳtashchab tab isua asamig kѳn, trumaybe ñibe ñiasiitѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb pasramig kѳnrrun, na marigwanba, k'atѳgan marigwanba, maig kѳtashchab ashib pasramig kѳmѳtѳ.
Chinetѳ puig melѳben kangurrin gangurri lata kuñam buruguyamig kѳn. Treeg marabe, Cristѳ maig martrai karua basrigwan ñimbe marѳb gѳnrrabguen.
Purѳ nѳrreelѳ misrѳb ka isaba inchibelѳ gѳmugun, kangurrin gangurri namisiyab, kanikkurri kanikkurri chigurrin gѳben ka pusrkwai asiyab.
Inchen mѳimbe nam Espíritu Santѳgurri ѳsig amѳñibelѳbe, trube, Espíritu Santѳ namun maig amѳñinrrain gѳben treegwan amѳñigun.m

Kaguende Clistѳ Jesúsweyelѳbe tru trendѳ kaigwan tѳga gallaig asrwane chine kaig marѳg kѳbig arrubigwanba, katѳ treetѳ rreetѳ kaig marѳg kѳbigwanbañau marmѳnrrab elachar gѳn, tru kurusyu tѳgatѳ mesrѳb lataig.

Trune tru Espíritu Santѳinukkurri arrubiibe ѳyeeg kѳn: undag kѳbig tѳgagѳmig, kasraatѳ unamig, chi isumѳ t'ab unamig, chine arringucha t'ammay ka megamig, maig kѳbash inchimѳ purѳ t'ammayig kѳmig, larrѳ t'ab inchibig kѳmig, maikkucha t'arѳmisrmѳ megamig,

chiwan gѳben kan tius kui lataig mara tѳgagúilѳ, misag burrѳnna kwaimandzigweimburabelan mariilѳ, ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ asiiyailѳ, kwayam lailѳ, naiwan katѳgan kerranrraitamab isub pusrkwai asiilѳ, namig kѳbiitѳ ke kan chinchimmѳrѳ indiilѳ, chiyutѳgucha ke na basrainrrabna gúi isub indiilѳ, nѳѳrѳ katѳgan sѳtѳmisrѳb tarѳmisrѳb ambiilѳ, kanuingatѳtѳ inchib trugatѳ misrѳb ambiilѳ,m
Trune tru Espíritu Santѳ maig martrai isunanen treegwan marѳb melѳwabe, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig truig karuig kѳmѳtѳ marѳb melѳnrrun..
Inchawei nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Espílitu Santѳ maig martrain gѳben trunun marѳb amѳnay cha, trumaybe ñimui asr maig marѳg kui inchen, treegwan marmeelѳ gѳnrrabguen.
Inchen ñim namig kѳbiitѳ kanikkurri kanikkurri lasruyab ke chab mab lataig inchib amѳñabe, ñimbe kangurrin gangurri yandѳ chab pinammay inchib amѳñinrrun.

Nai nunelan, ñimun wamappe, ñimbe chiyugucha ilѳsrka melѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ wamig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru ñim chigucha chi ilѳsrkaimeelѳ gѳmig tѳgagúigwane, treelѳ guer chiptѳ tru guemesra, ñimui asr maig marѳg kui inchen trѳmbѳig maramigweyasig tѳgagѳmumig kѳn. Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ, undag kѳbiitѳga kanikkurri kanikkurri mara tranay.

Nai nunelѳ, naimburamma na katѳgucha circuncidamig kѳn chib eshkab kusrennѳb unimbe, ¿trube, nane kaig martrab lliramubsruinrrun? Pѳs na treeg inchib uñibig kuimbe, trube, tru Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwan wamindiibe nѳmune yandѳ chi ilѳsrkѳb namishimubsruinrrun.
ѳyeeg maramne inchib basrabiibe, tru ñimun wamabigweinukkurri arrumíig kѳn.
Ñimbe yamba tsabѳtѳ tab ambub melaigwan, ¿tru newan ciertѳnig maig taigwan ñim mѳrѳb melѳmѳnrraimbe, ñimune murre ilѳsrkѳb sѳtѳ bѳnrramisrta?
Kaguende nambe isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ pasra truba muniirab meler, Espíritu Santѳgurri chi kaig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmariilѳ gѳmigwan muniirab..
Nabe gatѳle maig tamigwan katѳ trendamѳnrrun: Mѳikkѳben circuncidarramabiibe, trube, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig karuigwan kanguen pinab marmѳ, kerriguwan martrai indig kѳnrrun cha.

Clistѳ namun chigucha ilѳsrkaimeelѳ gѳnrrai mara, treegu pѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsraigugurli mur bѳnrray. Katѳ tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳlig, truig maig karuben trunun martrab guebamba, truyutѳ srua gúindiig melѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.

Inchendѳ tru urassrѳma mutѳgucha maig tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳben treeg kallab unѳbe Espíritu Santѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg kallab unane ashig kѳmui inchib kaig martrabgѳba inchibig kѳn. Mѳingucha treetѳwein gѳn..
Trube, mѳimbe nai nunelѳ, Isaac latawei ñimgucha Tius treeg tranrrumѳn cha kѳrrѳmisrig tru ureemera gѳn.
Trune tru Jerusalén srѳmbalasliig tru namui uslimbe, mu karua srua gúig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn.
Kaguende Agarbe Arabia birausrѳ Sinaí Tunyu maig purayaigwan eshkabig kua, tru mѳin gwalѳm Jerusalénwan eshkabig kѳn, truibe truyu nui ureebañau karua srua gúindiig megabigwan.

Inchen tru karuindiig megabigwei unѳbe, mutѳgucha maig tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳben treeg kallaig tѳgagúig unѳ gѳben, trune tru mu karuimíig megabig tru srawei unѳbe, Tius treeg tranrrumѳn cha kѳrrѳmislig kѳbig kua treeg kallaig kѳbig kѳn.
Kan mѳiwei nane ñimui utu pasrammѳrѳ gѳtan, ѳyeeg murtѳ waminchimѳtѳ, peemay waminchab. Pѳs nane ñimuimburab ni chi isumgúinguen mѳramgaig kѳtan.k
Nai ureezheelѳ, kan ishuumisag unѳ tammisrtrab pusrkwai inchib lataitѳwei, katѳle pusrkwai isuim basrar, Cristѳ ñimuinug ke newan tab basramisramnegatig.

Tru kusrenanѳbelѳ katѳganelѳbe ñimune nѳmui marѳg kѳb ke chinsraatѳ inchibelѳ gѳn, chi tabig isua gѳmѳtѳ. Masken ñimune namuinukkurli nѳѳrѳ misrtrai inchib gѳn, ñim nѳmuingatѳ misra nѳmun ke chinsraatѳ inchib pѳnrrѳnrai isua.

¿Tru ñim treeg tabig kasrag kѳbig tѳgagúig kѳbigwane, mѳimbe chu chincha bѳnrrѳgue? Pѳs nabe ñimuimburab treeg tamig tѳgagur: ke ñimbe ñimui kabmeranguen wesrua, nan tranamdiig kuimbe tranѳmmѳrѳ inchibelѳ gѳbig kuig kѳn cha.m
Pѳs ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, na srѳsrѳwan Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan ñimun eshkab kusrenanѳb uras nai asru kwanrrѳbe Tiuswei wamwan wamindig kѳnrrai treeg puig kѳbigwan.
Nai nunelѳ, tiusmanda na lataitѳwein gѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar, nama ñim lataitѳwein gѳnrrab pasramisrig kѳbene. Pѳs ñimbe nane chigucha chi kaibe marmuig kѳn.

Ñimbe k'atѳgucha mѳ gwalѳmmerawane ѳyeeg marmumig kѳn chib, i bѳlmerawane iigwan maramig kѳn chib, ѳyeeg bѳlmera arrubene, ѳyeelan maramig kѳbig kѳn chib, i bilamera pubene, iilan maramig kѳn chib, ñimbe treeg inchibelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs ñimbe Tiuswan nebua ashmeelѳ gѳb uras merrabsrѳmbe chi ciertѳn tiusmera gѳmeelan karuindiig melabelѳ gѳbig kѳn.n
Incha yandѳ mѳimbe Tiuswei ureemera gúig kѳbene, Tiusbe nui Nusrkawei Espíritun namui manrrѳmerayu pasrѳnrrai ѳrig kѳn. Inchen tru Espíritu Santѳbe truba rruba miabig kѳn: Abba, nai Mѳskain chib.
Inchen ke yandѳ treeg maramig pubene, Tiusbe nui Nusrkawan ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, ishug misagweinug kallaweig, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig chibig kѳben treegwan marѳb megabig..

Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru unѳbe nѳm mѳilѳ ashib pera gѳnrrab kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳba, katѳ tru unaimburab chi kѳbigwan nѳm ashib gѳnrrab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳba truilѳ ashib pera gúindiig kѳn, mѳskai tru maya yanagatig treeg kѳnrrain cha basrig truig nebumnegatikke.
Incha ñimbe Cristѳielѳ gúikkurrimbe, yandѳ ñimbe tru Abrahamweinukkurri amrrub misaamera gѳn, Tius tru keta trannrrab misrig truig maig kѳben treeg ketig utѳnrrabelѳ..
Inchawei isubigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug basra tѳgagúikkurrimbe ñimbe mayeelѳba Tiuswei ureemera gѳn.
Trune mѳimbe yandѳ tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagѳmig puikkurrimbe peguchib pera lliraindeelѳ melѳmer.m

Inchen tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmig arrumѳwatѳbe, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳriibe namune nѳ merrarrawa tѳga basrabig kѳn, isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrramigwan ashchai kenamariilѳ gѳmnegatig wegѳnѳmѳ bѳnrrѳnrrai.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳliibe, Tius tru treeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisliilane treeg marmuig kuig lataig, kabe sѳtѳ basramisrѳb nѳѳrѳtѳ gutchab inda chindah? ¡Mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn! Pѳs maig maramigwan martrai tѳgagúig, tru ѳsig kѳmigwan trannrraptiig kuig kuimbe, trube, tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maliibe tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳlikkurlin gѳbsruinrrun.

Trube, treeg kѳbene ¿tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe chindamigweyasig kerah? Pѳs trunune tranѳppe, tru kalѳ marigwan chigúi nebua ashchai treekkurri tranig kѳbig kѳn, tru tranrrumѳn cha kѳrrѳmisrig, tru Abrahamweinukkurri arrubig arrumnegatig truigwan marѳb gѳmig kѳnrrai. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrigwane Tiusbe ángelesmeragurri kan mѳg katѳganelayasig purѳwaminchabigwan trannrrai tranig kѳn.k

Inchawei nabe trenchinrrab inchar: Tius Abrahamwan manasrѳwei tru nuinukkurri acuerdѳn treeg martrab cha k'andѳ isua nѳ kѳrrѳmisrigwane, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig 430 añѳs puraiben wendau arrubiibe, treeg marig kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrai martrab gaimanrrun cha, Tius tru ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrigwan treeg marmuig kui lataig mara gѳrrѳmartrab.

Nai nunelѳ, mѳimbe misag maig waminchibelѳ gѳben nabe trumay isua waminchab inchar: ѳyeeg marig kѳrrѳmisrtrai treeg martrab cha, kan mѳg wamindigwan gѳbenguen yandѳ treeg marig kѳrrѳmisrtrai pѳra kѳrrѳmarigwane, utsѳgutsamig kѳmѳwei, kabe srѳitѳ nemaramig kѳmѳwein gѳn..

Cristѳbe nѳ namun pena, kaigyugurri wesruig kѳn, tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig namun trѳmbѳig nebuig pѳnrrѳnrrai indigugurri, tru nѳ namuimburab nѳashib larrѳ rrѳmbѳig nebuig pasramisra. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳriibe trenchibig kѳn: Mutѳgucha kan tusryu mesra kweetsinabiibe larrѳ gaig kui asig kѳnrrun cha.m

Inchawei tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳrig maig chibig kѳben, treeg mara, Tiuswei merrappe, chi k'aig kѳmeelѳ lataig muguen tabig kѳrrѳmisrmuig kuin gúi tѳrgandѳ asamdiig kѳn. Kaguende: Sѳlgandѳ tabig uñibiibe isubigwan Tiusweinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurri ѳsig uñchun.
Inchawei kѳrebelѳbe tru Abraham Tiuswan kѳreb mѳѳba kanbalatѳ mayanguen tab indiilѳ gѳn..
Inchawei isua asamig kѳn, isubigwan Tiusweinug pѳnsrѳbelѳbe si, Abrahamwei ureemera gúin gúi.
Abrahamma Tiuswan ѳyeetѳwei kѳreben, nune chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig kѳrrѳmarig kѳbig kѳn..
¿Ñim chinetѳ chinetѳ maig kuig mѳrѳb puraambiibe, trube, chiweingucha chi purugumuig kѳnrrab gѳ chindah? Pѳs purugubwei indig kuinrrun.m

Nabe ñimuimburab chi mas kѳmѳtѳ, iigwandѳh wammѳlinrrabna gѳtan: ¿Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳlig maig chibig kѳben treegwan mara, Espílitu Santѳn utig kѳh, kabe isubigwan Clistѳinuutѳ pasra, tru tabig srѳ wamwan mѳlikkurlin gѳ chindah? cha.

Nabe Tiuswei ka yandѳ tab indigwane kashmur. Kaguende tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig taigwan treeg mariitѳga, chi kaig kѳmíig lataig tabig basrѳnrrab indamig kuig kuimbe, trube, Cristѳ kwaibe ka kwag kѳptѳ gwaig lataig webibsruinrrun..
Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳliibe yandѳ nane chi martrabgaikkurli truigweimburappe yandѳ nabe kwaig lataig kur, na Tiusweyasig ѳsig basrѳnrrab.

Pѳs nambe Cristѳgurri chigucha chi kaig marmѳwa lataig kѳnrrab inchib melѳben, trube, mѳi Cristѳinuube gatѳ nambe kaig marѳbelѳ gúin gúi treeg buptinchene, trube, ¿Cristѳbe kaig martrainguen inchib pasrabig kѳn da chindah? ¡Kah! mumaygucha chi treeg kѳnrraamѳn.k
Nambe kallainukkurri trendѳ judíѳs misaamera guer, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera kaig marѳbelѳ gѳmѳtѳ.

Inchen Jesucristѳn kѳrewa pѳnrrabelѳ katѳgan judíѳsmeragucha, Pedrѳ tru kalѳ marѳb pasraigutѳwei marѳb guebamben, tru nѳmguen treeg marmubendѳ, treeg marѳbelѳ misrѳb pѳnrraigu Bernabéguen tѳga guebeña basrabig kѳn.
Inchendѳ wendѳ Antiѳquía ciudasrѳ Pedrѳ puben, nabe nun malaugue ѳyeebe maig margu chib truba mur namabig kur, kaguende nѳ treeg mariibe, pella marѳb pasraig kѳben.

Nan ѳyeeg kѳnrrai tranig kuin gúi nebua ashabe, Jacѳbѳba, Pedrѳba, Juanba tru tabelѳ gúi asiilѳ, kan pilarmera latailѳ gúi asha tѳgagúilѳbe, nanba, Bernabéwanba kusrmay tasigwan tranѳbelѳ gѳn, yandѳ mѳimbe lata lincha marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrab cha, treeg kenamarѳb, nambe judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraisrѳmay amben, nѳmbe judíѳsmera circuncidailaimay ambamig kѳnrrai.

Masken treeg inchibgunrriibe Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera, tru circuncidameelan na eshkab waminchib unamig kѳnrrai, nan trana basrig kuin gúi ashibelѳ gѳn, judíѳsmera circuncidawarwan kusrenanѳb waminchib uñchai Pedrѳn pasrig kѳb lataitѳweingue.m
Inchen nambe nѳm chi tailan ni kan petѳzhiitѳguen alrranmeelѳ guer, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam newan ciertѳniibe ñimui utu maig kѳbiibe treetѳ pasrabig basrѳnrrai.k
Inchendѳ na pera yaig Titѳn gѳbenguen griegѳ gúingucha, nune circuncidaweig kѳnrrai inchimuig kѳn.
Indiibe yandѳ catѳrce añѳs misren, katѳ Jerusalénmay Bernabéba ibig kur, katѳ Titѳngucha tѳgatѳ pera.n
Iig ka amѳñigueh chib pѳriibe, na Pablѳ nai t'aska bѳrig kѳn. Ñimbe pesannamѳ, isua guy nabe kailan keeri yau pasrar. Tiuswei ka yandѳ t'ab indiibe ñimba pasrѳnrrun.
Katѳ namui nunelѳ Laѳdiceasrѳ warabelan chigucha ka warѳgue t'an chirrunrrigay, Nimfaswanba, katѳ tru iglesia nui yau tulundzunabelanba.
Lucas, tru mѳ marѳbig undaaraig, truikkucha ka amѳñigueh tan, katѳ Demaskucha.m

Katѳ Epafraskucha ñimun ka amѳñigueh tan, tru ñimui utuig Cristѳi marѳb megabig. Nѳbe chu uraskucha ñimuyasig Tiuswan truba rruba miab megabig kѳn, ñim kѳrrѳnrrabgaig tabig melabelѳ, Tiusweimburabelѳyu newan nѳrrѳrawar, Tius kerriguwan maig palai waben, chiyutѳgucha palѳmíig, newanelѳ gѳnrrai..

Alistarcѳ, tru kailan keeli yau naba lincha pasrabikkucha, ñimun tab ka amѳñigueh tan, katѳ Marcѳs Bernabéwei lenunekkucha. (Marcѳsweimburab na maig martrai eshkaigwan ñimbe wammѳra gúinrrun, ñimuisrѳmay ibene, tab utѳnrligay.)
Nabe nune ñimuisrѳmay ѳrѳppe, treeg isua ѳrar: namuimburab maitѳ pub arrigwan ñimun wammѳrѳsrkѳnrraimba, katѳ ñimui manrrѳmeran chi isumѳ t'ab gѳnrrai martraimba.
Tíquicѳ, namui undaaraig nuneg, Tiusweiwan maizhikken elachimѳ marѳbig, Señѳrwei maramelѳyu naba lincha marѳb megabig, naimburab chitѳ wamindamelane nѳ waminchun.
Tiuswan ashmѳ misaamerai utube purѳ t'ab isua purѳ ashiptѳ amѳnamig kѳn, t'abigwan maramdiig pubene, treegwan ka burainrraindѳ ashatѳ bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ.
Katѳ Tiuswan miarrunrrigay, nui wamwan waminchippe, na maig wamindamig kѳben tѳrgandѳ treeg waminchab.
Chu urastѳgucha Tiusba wamindamigwane maikken elachimѳ melѳnrrigay, trunune marѳppe, nѳѳrѳtѳ isub balabinѳ gѳmѳ, tab isua marѳb, Tiuswan ungwa, ungwa chib.
Inchen mѳikkѳben maig maramigwan marmѳtѳ, kalѳ marѳbigwane nui kalѳ malig maig kѳben truburѳ nѳgucha treetѳwei kaigwan utѳnrrun. Kaguende Tiusbe mѳigwane purѳmisrѳb kandarѳtѳ inchimíig kѳn.
Chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, martrab isua maramig kѳn, mѳguelayasig kѳmѳtѳ, Señѳrweyasig lataig marѳb,
Ureemerabe, chiyutѳgucha nѳmui mѳskalane maig chiben mѳramig kѳn. Kaguende ѳyeeg maliibe Señѳrwane truba tabig asѳnan.
Sralѳbe, kelѳ maig chiben treeg mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Señѳr nѳ maig martrai indig kѳben, trumay.
Inchawei chigѳben marѳppe, wamindigu lata, chigѳben maliilѳyu lata, Señѳr Jesúswei munchiyu maray, nѳgurli Tius Mѳskawan ungwa, ungwa chib.

Inchen Cristѳ tru chi isumgaig tab gѳbiibe ñimui manrrau maig maramigwan nѳ garub pasrѳnrrai inday. Kaguende ñim k'an asrtѳ gúig kѳben, ѳyeegumay wamig kѳn. Ñimbe mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibelѳ gѳnrrigay.
Inchen gѳben iilѳ kerrigu gѳmnetѳ tru balabe, undag kѳbigwan itѳguewa bѳnrramig kѳn, tru undag kѳbiibe mumaytѳgucha kanbalatѳ newan purѳ t'abig pѳnrramig kѳnrrai marѳbig kѳn.

Inchawei Tius lawa wesruilѳ, ñim newan tabig chishelѳ, trurligu undaarailѳbe iigwan kewa lataig bѳnrray: lastima ashibig kѳmigwan gѳben, larrѳ tab inchibelѳ gѳmigwan gѳben, kѳrrѳteelѳ gѳmigwan gѳben, larrѳ tammayig kѳmigwan gѳben, maig kѳben kuingucha tammay megabig kѳmigwan gѳben,
Incha ñimbe tru srѳigwan kewa bѳnrran. Tius nѳ marѳbig maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marigwan, tru srѳibe kerriguwan t'ab nebua asamnegatig srѳitѳ srѳitѳ yunѳmarѳb arrun.
Ñimgucha merrabsrѳmbe ѳyeelandѳwei marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳbig kѳn.m
ѳyeelan marikkurriwei tru mѳrmeelaim bala arrubig kѳn Tiuswei namig kѳbiibe.
Inchen Cristѳ tru ñim ѳsig bѳnrraig kenamisrene, ñimgucha nѳba tѳrguegwalmabigu tѳgatѳ kenamisrtrun.
Kaguende ñimbe yandѳ kwaig lat'ailѳ gua, mѳimbe ñimui ѳsig kѳmibe Cristѳba Tiusweinug sѳra tѳgagúig pѳnrran.
Ñimbe isuppe, srѳmbalasreelan isuy, yu pirauelan gѳmѳtѳ.
Inchen ѳyeeg mariilѳbe kerriguba tru wendѳsrѳ attrabigwan ѳyeeg kѳnrrabig kuitamab asamig, iibe k'a treetѳ gѳn. Inchen tru ciertѳn maig kѳnrrabiibe, Cristѳ, nѳ gѳn.
Inchawei chigѳben mamimeran mutsamelan, chigѳben fiesta marin gwalѳmmeran, srѳ bѳl tsumisrin gwalѳmmeran, isrin gwalѳmmeran, ѳyeebe maig marѳbelѳ gѳgue chib ñimun mugucha wamincha ashmѳnrrai maray.

Incha katѳ tru kailѳ nѳm asha garuigwanba, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karuigwanba yandѳ truilane chigucha martrabgailѳ misrtrai kѳrrѳmara, nѳmune mayeelѳ ashig kui ashchai marig kѳn, tru kurusyu kwawa, yandѳ nѳ kanawa basramisra.
tru ѳyeeg t'ailan: ѳigwane kusrawa ashmѳt'a t'amba: Iigwane mamѳt'a t'amba: Katѳramѳt'a t'amba indiilan?

Tru nam ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg ulѳ gѳn cha kan kilgayu pѳri lataitѳwei kѳbigwanba, katѳ truyutѳwei ѳyeeg maramig kѳn chib pѳri latailѳ pѳnrrabigwanba, Cristѳn tru kurusyu mesrѳben tѳgatѳ mesrѳb lataig mara, Tiusbe chi asamig kaanrrai kerraig kѳn..

Tru ñimui chigurrimbunѳ kaig mariilѳyuba, ñimuinug trendѳ trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchib pasrabigwan kerrab tru asru circuncisiѳnwan marѳb lat'aitѳwei chi mariimeelѳ ñim kwailѳ srѳ gѳbenbatѳwei, Tiusbe Cristѳba kanbalatѳ ѳsig kѳmigwan ñimune tranig kѳn, namui kaig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ, kerriguwan pesannab.

Ñim ketig utamigwan mugѳben utѳbashmuinab pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳ. Nѳmbe ka isatѳ, purѳ tabzhig misrѳb, ángelesmeran kѳriibala tabig waminchib tѳmbѳnsrѳb, truilѳbe piab lataig kenamisrigu chigѳben aser chib wamindamburab waminchib, nѳmui trendѳ kaig isub turyu ke purab nѳrreelѳ isumuinguenig isubelѳ gѳn,n

Katѳ trendѳ trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchib pasrabigwan ñimui asrugurri kerrab ñimbe nuinug mu gúi asiilѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳn, tru mѳguelѳ tasiitѳga asru circuncisiѳn marig tѳgagѳmѳtѳ, tru mu gúi ashchai kѳrrѳmariibe Cristѳinukkurri arrubiitѳga.

Ñimun piu umbu ulsrѳben, Cristѳba kegѳtѳ sѳriilѳ lataig kuig kѳn. Incha tru piu umbu ulsraigugurri kurrappe, ñimbe nѳba kegѳtѳ ѳsiirawa kurrig kѳn, Cristѳn kwailai utugurri kusrubig Tiuswei maramburab marѳbigu ñimui isubigwan truyu pasrikkurri.k

Isua t'ab ashiptѳ melay, mѳguelѳ nѳrrѳ gusreelѳ chi purugunrrabgailѳ ka kegѳrrѳsrkamitѳ marѳbiitѳga, ñimun srua ambinab melѳnrrab gѳmѳ, tru kusreelѳbe chi purugunrrabgailѳ, ka kegѳrrѳsrkamitѳ marѳbigwan. Truilѳbe misaamera nѳm merrabsrѳngurri trendѳ isub amrruilѳyugurrimba, katѳ chinetѳ yu pirau muba kuimburab mandѳ isua marѳb gѳmig tѳgagúilѳyugurrimba arrubig kѳn, Cristѳinug maig kѳben, treeg kѳmѳtѳ.
Ñim Cristѳ Jesúswan ñimun nѳ asha garub pasrabig kui asha ut'amma, utig kuibe, nuinug treeg amѳnay,
Nabe ѳyeegwan ѳyeeg chippe, ñimun may wamincha mugucha kegѳrrѳsrkѳmѳnrrai waminchar.n
Kaguende chigúi mѳrѳb kusrebig kѳmiba, chigúi nebua asamiba, tru iig purѳ tabiibe kerliguba Clistѳinuutѳ sѳlig bѳnrran.
Pѳs nabe ñimuimburappa, laѳdiceasreelaimburappa, katѳ mayeelѳ nan malaugue nebua ashmeelaimburappa, truba rruba mur tranrrab marѳb megaigwan ñim nebua asimbemab isutan.

Nambe tru Cristѳn eshkab kusrenanѳbelѳ guer, mundѳgucha ѳyamay melѳnrrigay chib, kusrenanѳb, maig kuigwan tab chigúi mѳrague, mu misaamerandѳgucha Cristѳ Jesúsweinug newan tabig pѳnrrѳnrrai Tiuswan kenamartrab.k
tru manasrѳngurri maya misagwan mungucha Tius kenamariimíig tѳgagúigwan. Inchendѳ truigwane mѳi yasrѳmbe nui misaameran kenamaran..
Na ñimuimburab chine kaig nebuinab megaigwan mѳimbe nane kasrag kѳtan, Cristѳ nui asr, tru iglesiayasig chine kaig nebuinab megaigu tru palabigwan nai asrutѳwei kaig indinab megaitѳga nemarѳb ya..

Treeg kѳbig kuigwan mѳimbe gatѳle ñim nѳba tab gѳrrѳmisrtrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, Nusrkai nui asru kwaitѳga nui merrab tabigweindѳ tarѳmariilѳ, kaig mariitѳga chillig incha gѳmeelѳ, ñimbe ѳyeeg kѳn dainanrrabgailѳ pѳnrramig kѳnrrai martrab.

Incha nui Nusrkaingurri Tiusbe pirau chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan lat'a, srѳmbalasrѳ chi kѳbigwan lat'a katѳle nѳba katѳ t'ab gѳrrѳmisrtrai martrab isuig kѳn, nui Nusrkai kurusyu kwawa ani lusiitѳga ambugurri igurri t'ab gѳnrrai marѳb.
Inchagucha nѳbe asrwei tru tur gѳn, tru iglesiai. Nusrkaimbe manawei nѳmerrig kѳbig, kwailai utugurri katѳ nѳmerrig ѳsiiraig kѳn, chiyutѳgucha nѳ purab nuig kѳmig kѳnrrai.

Kaguende Tiusbe Nusrkaingurri mara pѳnsraig kѳn tru srѳmbalasrѳ chi kѳbigwan lata, pirau chi kѳbigwan lata, kaptѳga asigwan lata, asiimíigwan lata, reymera purramisra karub purraigwan lata, kerriguwan nѳm merrarrawa garuigwan lata, katѳ nѳm asha garuigwan lata, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karuigwan lata, kerriguba nѳgurri mara pѳnsraig kѳn, trurrigu nuyasig kѳnrrai..
Nѳ nuielѳ gѳnrrai nambe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ guer, namui kaig mariilan yandѳ pesannab chi ulѳ bayimeelѳ.
Kaguende nugwaimandzig lѳstiigu nѳ garub pasrabigugurri Tiusbe wesrawa, namune nui undaaraig Nusrkai nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ purѳѳrig kѳn.

Nui mayanguen tabig maramburab malig kerligu maya tѳgagúig, truitѳga kullaaramѳ, ka melamig kѳnrrai martrai miabelѳ guer, maig pub arlindѳgucha mur isua melaptѳ melamigweyasiiba, maig indindѳgucha tammay melabig melamigweyasiiba.

Incha treekkurri namgucha trunun wammѳrin gwalѳmgurrimbunѳ chu urastѳgucha ñimuyasig elachimѳ, Tiusba waminchib miabelѳ guer, Tius tru nѳ maig martrai palai waigwan ñim nebua asambѳrab nebua ashibelѳ gѳnrrai Tiusweimburabigu, newan nebua asamig kusreitѳgaba, k'atѳ tab chigúi mѳriitѳgaba.
Epafras maig kusrenanig kѳben, trunun ñim kusreeg kѳn. Truibe namui undaaraig, tru maramelѳyu namba lincha marѳb megabig, Cristѳiwan maizhikken elachimѳ, ñimuyasig tab gѳnrrai marѳb megabig kѳn.
tru ñimuyasig srѳmbalasrѳ esegaig pasrabigwan ñim muniirabelѳ gúikkurri treeg kuigwan. Truigwane Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam newan ciertѳnigwan waminchen, ñimbe mѳrig kѳbig kѳn
Kaguende ñim ñimui isubigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, katѳ Tiuswei misaameran mayamba ñimbe truba undaguelѳ gúigwanba wammѳrer,
