ñim Tiuswei misaamera chu uragucha tarѳmisrmѳ melab nunelѳ Cristѳ Jesúsba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelѳ Cѳlѳsassrѳ warabelan. Namui Mѳskai Tiuswei ka yandѳ tab indiiba, chi isumgaig tab gѳbiiba ñimba gѳnrrai inchar.m
Cristѳ Jesúskurri Tiuswei misaamera mayeelanba ka amѳñigueh chirrunrrig. Katѳ namui nunelѳ naba amѳñibelѳ chigucha ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
Namui Tius Mѳskawan managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.k

Inchendѳ nabe chi palabigwan kerliguh uta tѳgagur, unchaguengue. Tru ñim nan keta trana ѳliilѳ Epafrѳditѳ srua arrua traniilѳbabe, ¡gatѳ! chigucha palѳmѳzhig tѳgagur. Tru ñim keta traniibe kan animal gweecha Tiuswan tranig, purѳ may irrabzhig lataig kѳn, Tius truba rruba tabig kui asha utamdiig.
Incha trutѳ gѳmѳtѳ, na Tesalónicasrѳ uñenguen, ñimbe pamayguen purugua ѳrig kѳbig kѳn, nai chi palabelѳyu nan purugunrrab..
Inchendѳgucha na truba isui megaben, ñimgucha treetѳwei lata naimburab isub purugub melaibe mayanguen tabig kѳn.
Cristѳ naba basrѳbene, chiwandѳgucha kaimamѳ maramѳnrrun, kaguende nѳ nan purugub pasraikkurri..
Nabe ѳyeeg chippe, balain basraptѳ rrenchimur. Kaguende nabe nan maig pub arrindѳgucha treegu kasraatѳ purayam gusrewa gur.
Nabe Señѳrweinug truba kasraarar, ñim gatѳle nan isunrrab indin gѳben. Pѳs ñimbe isuppe, isubwei inchendѳ, tru ѳyeeg maramibe pumѳ srѳ gúig kuinrrun.

Trube, mѳimbe yandѳ, ñim nai undaarailѳ, chiyutѳgucha ciertѳnigwanba, chiyutѳgucha maig kѳbash inchimumigwanba, chiyutѳgucha sѳlgandѳ tabigwanba, chiyutѳgucha newan tabig chishigwanba, chiyutѳgucha larrѳ tammayig kѳmigwanba, chiyutѳgucha yeeg tabig kѳnrrab chib wamindigwanba isumig kѳn. Katѳ chigѳben purѳ tabig tѳgagúin gúi, kabe tabig wamindig kѳnrraptiig treeg kѳbene, trunungucha, trube, tѳga isuy.

Ke k'a yandѳ chinsraatѳ inchib, ke chab pureb gúi lataig inchimѳtay. Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ, chiyutѳgucha Tiuswei merrab, ѳyeeg palai meler chib, nѳba waminchib, ѳyeeg purugurrunrrig chib miamig kѳn, trurrigu ungwa, ungwa chib.
Ñimbe truba t'ab inchibelѳ gúigwane mayeelѳ nebua asig kѳnrrai inday. Señѳr arrumibe lut'au gѳn.

Katѳ nai maramigu elachimѳ maram burugub megabigwan ñungucha purugurrunrrig chinrrab inchar, tru iig ishumburmeran ñui nuchalan, na Tiuswei t'abig srѳ wamwan waminchib uñen, nѳmbe nai mendig lat'a tranrrab lincha llirab melaig kѳbig kѳn, katѳ Clemente gѳben, katѳganelѳ naba lincha marѳb melabelѳ gѳbengue. Truilai munchimerabe tru managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳri librѳyu pѳrig pѳnrran.

Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, truba undaarailѳ, na truba asinrrabna gúi inchib isub uniilѳ, ñimgurri na truba kasrag kui indiilѳ, katѳ ñimbe naimbe kan cѳrѳna lataig tѳgagúilѳ, ѳyeetѳ Señѳrweinug tarѳmisrmѳ melabig melѳnrrigay..
Trune tru nam purramibe srѳmbalasrѳn gѳn, tru Kaigyugurri Wesrabig, Señѳr Jesucristѳ, trusrѳngurri tru nѳ arrumigwan nam truba rruba munig melaig nѳ waisrѳ.
Nabe mѳindѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñimune katѳle, gatѳle eshkaig kuig kѳn, mѳimbe kappin gѳrrѳgѳbguen eshkar, Cristѳ kurusyu kwaigwan tsaleelѳ ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ truba nu amѳnaimba.
Inchen nam yandѳ nebua tѳga bѳnrramisrigwane truig maig kѳben trunun tarѳmisrmѳ, amѳñibig amѳñigun.
Nam mayeelѳba Tiusweimburabelѳyu newan nѳrrѳrawarbe ѳyamay isumig kѳn. Inchen ñim chigѳben peemay isua gúin gѳbene, trube, Tiusbe ñimune trunungucha tѳrmarѳb kenamartrun..
Nai nunelѳ, k'abe nabe iigwan yandѳ nebuaguen basrar chimur. Inchendѳ nabe iigwan marinabig kѳn: yandѳ wendau kѳrrѳmisrѳb arrubigwane pesannawa, nai pumsrѳ pumigwan nebunrrab tranrrab megar.

Nane Clistѳn mas nebua ashib, nѳ kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiranrrai maramburab marѳbigwan nebua ashib indinrrabna gѳtan, katѳ nѳ chine isumdiig puinab megamigu treetѳwei puinab megawa, kwamigugucha nѳ lataitѳwein gѳmig nebuben,

Inchagucha treetѳguen gѳmѳ, Cristѳ Jesús nai Señѳrwan na nebua asiibe, kan chibaguen ѳyeeg kѳn cha, kemesra eshkamgaig purѳ nuig purab tabig kѳben, tru na tѳgagúigwane chigucha gѳmeelѳ mara tѳgagur. Inchawei nѳgurri nabe kerrigu trunune chi asamig kaanrrai, wendѳbasra ѳyeegwane chigucha gѳmíig kan kѳsѳngѳmdѳ shau lataig mara tѳgagur, Cristѳn na nebua tѳga basramisra

Inchen na maig chull isuigwan ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib maramibe, tru iglesiayuelan kaig maramig naimbe truig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳlig maig chibig kѳben truigwan na sѳlgandѳ tabig kuigube kalѳ maran chib muguen chi tainamѳ mѳg kѳbig kur.

Kaguende naimburabgucha asru treeg mariitѳga ѳyangurrimbesin chib pasramig tѳgagur. Pѳs asru treeg mariitѳga ѳyangurrimbesin chib mѳg inchib pasrѳnrraptiig mube kѳbwei inditarru gѳben, nabesi katѳguchinguen treeg kur tamig tѳgagur..
Tru wera lataig inchib misaamera, chi tabigwan gѳmѳ, kaigwan marѳb amѳñibelѳ, tru asrwan barѳb mindishibelan ñimbe purѳ ashiptѳ guy.
Kaguende Cristѳi maramelan marѳb megaikkurri nѳbe yandѳ ke patsѳnrraptiig tsuig kuig kѳn, ñim ñimashib trugatig nan purugunrrab gaimailѳyu kwam lab nѳguen burugub.
Señѳrgurri nune truba kasraatѳ utay. Katѳ Epafrѳditѳ lataitѳwei melab mѳguelane truba tab inchib tѳgagѳmig kѳn.k

Isa gѳmѳtѳ, yandѳ ke kwamdѳ balabig tsubwei indig kuig kѳn. Inchendѳ Tiusbe Epafrѳditѳn lastima asig kѳn. Katѳ nundѳ gѳmѳtѳ, nangucha lastima asig kѳn, na yeeg isuig megamne, srѳitѳ srѳitѳ isuig megamig arrumѳnrrai.

Treeg kuindѳgucha namui nuneg Epafrѳditѳn ñimuimay gatѳle ѳramig truba palai ashar, maramigu nan purugub, kan suldau lataitѳwei tru maramigu naba lincha megabig, katѳ ñimuisrѳngurri naimay wam srua arrubig, na chi palai megaben nan ashchai ñim ѳrigwandѳwei.n
Inchendѳ nagucha naashib ñimun ashchab peba arrumigwan isua tѳga basrar, Tius naba pasraikkurrimbe.
Pѳs katѳgan munguen nѳ lataibe tѳgagѳmur, ñimuimburab tab gѳnrrai inchib, treegwan martrab truba rruba isubig, trurrigu ka isatѳ inchib pasrѳmíig..
Inchawei ñimgucha treetѳwei mayanguen tab gúi mѳrѳb, naba mayanguen kasraaray.m

Ñimui isubigwan ñim Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurri marѳb gúibe kan animal gweecha Tiuswan keta tranѳb lataig marѳb tѳgagúig kѳben, trubala na ѳsig kuigwan itѳlusig kѳnrrai tranamig nebuinguen mayanguen tab gúimѳrѳb tranamѳnrrun, ñim mayeelѳba mayanguen kasraarab..

Mugѳben ñimun ñibe ѳyeeg kѳn dainab pѳnrrѳmeelѳ, kѳrrѳteelѳ, misaamera larrѳ minchar, purѳ kaig misaamerai utu, ñimbe Tiuswei ureemera chigucha kaig mara chillig inchar gѳmeelѳ, ñimbe truilai utube yu pirau pala pilab pѳnrrabelѳ latailѳ guy,k
Chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, ñimuinetѳ chinetѳ chib mulla mѳrmѳwei, chinetѳ aleguiab pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ maray.

Inchawei ñim nai undaarailѳ, na ñimba pasrѳben, chu uratѳgucha mѳrѳb melabelѳ, na mѳi ñimba pasrѳmubene, katѳguchinguen mѳrѳb melabelѳbe, kaigyugurri wesruigwan ñim tѳga pѳnrraigu nѳrrѳrabig nѳrrѳranrrab marѳb ambay, kѳriibala, purѳ isuptѳ.n
Mu misaameratѳgucha Jesucristѳbe Señѳr tru Mayeelaim Bala Nѳ Ashib Pasrabig kѳn chib waminchain gúig kѳn, Tius Mѳskawan maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrrai.
Nѳbe trendѳ Tius kѳbendѳ, nѳ treeg kuagucha, Tiusba lataig kѳnrrab inchimuig kѳn, treeg kurmaptѳ elachimѳnrrab.
yandѳ mѳg lataitѳwei misra pasrѳwabe, nuig kurmab inchimѳtѳ, nѳasiitѳ chigucha gѳmíig lataig misra, maig taigwan mѳrѳbig kѳptѳ, kwamnegatig maig taigwan malig kѳn, trurligu kurusyu mesraig kwamig.
Cristѳ Jesús maig isubig kѳbig kѳben, ñimgucha treetѳwei isubelѳ gѳmig kѳn:m

Chiyutѳgucha ke nѳtѳ gѳnrrab inchimѳwei, purѳ nuig kѳmmѳrѳ inchib marѳb gѳnrrab gѳmѳwein gѳmig kѳn. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, larrѳ t'ammayig, katѳganelane ñim lat'aitѳguen gѳmѳ, katѳguchinguen nѳrreelѳ gѳnmab asha tѳgagѳmig kѳn.

Inchawei ñim Cristѳinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrraikkurri kuñab purugumig tѳgagѳb, nui undag kѳbig chi isumig kaanrrai marѳbig tѳgagѳb, Espíritu Santѳgurri kanguelarrѳtѳ lincha bѳnrramig tѳgagѳb, ñim larrѳ tab inchibelѳ, trurrigu lastima ashibelѳ gѳmigwan ñim tѳgagѳb indig kѳbene
Pѳs ñimune Cristѳgurri ѳyeekkatig tabig pѳnrrѳnrrai marѳppe, nun ka kѳrewatѳ bѳnrrѳnrrai marmѳtѳ, nuimburab chinetѳ nebuig melamig kѳnrraingucha marig kuig kѳn.m

Jesucristѳi srѳ wam tabig maig kѳben, trumay treeg amѳnamirre mas palan, na ñimun ashchab arri lata, ashchab arrumui lata, ñimbe masken kanbalatѳ ke tab pѳnrramisra, tru isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ tѳga pasra bѳnrramig Tiuswei srѳ wam tabigweimburappe, ñimbe kanbalatѳ mayeelѳba ke kandѳ isub truba rruba marѳb gѳn dai wammѳrinrrabna gѳtan.

Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳnrrab gúi ashabe, chiguen gѳmѳtѳ, ñimba unamuitamab isur, ñim mayeelѳba kѳrrѳmisrtrab, katѳguchinguen gatѳguchinguen nebua asamigwan ñim nebua ashib, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwan kasrag tѳga bѳnrramig kѳnrrai.n
Inchendѳ na ѳsig basramibe gatѳguchinguen tab gѳnrrab gѳn ñimuimburappe.
Inchen na asru ѳsig uniibe, Tiuswei maramelѳyube tsabѳtѳ truba nѳrrѳ kѳnrrai maramdiig kѳnrrautan. Trube, ¿nabe mѳigwan merrarrawa pasramisrtrab gѳh? Pѳs mandѳguen gѳmѳtan.m

Chiyugucha na chi kѳrig misrmѳ purayamuit'amab isua basraig, treeg punrrab gúi, masken chi kullag isumѳtѳ, mѳi lat'a, chu urastѳgucha, Cristѳbe nai asru purѳ nuig marѳb t'abig wamindig kѳnrrun, na ѳsig basrai lat'a, kabe na kwaimbala lat'a.

¡Inchendѳ chigúin gѳnrrautah! Ka isatѳ inchib Cristѳimburabigwan ka wamincha mѳri lata, kabe ciertѳn wamindi lata, pѳs mumaytѳgucha Cristѳiwan waminchib, kusrenanene, nane kasrag kѳtan. Incha nabe gatѳgucha kasraarabig kasraaramѳnrrun,
Incha iilѳbe Cristѳimburab eshkab waminchippe, undaguelѳ isuar gua waminchibelѳ gѳn, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan waminchib purѳmisrѳb pasrѳnrrai, nan pasrig kui asha..
Inchen nan treeg pasrѳnrrai keerikkurri, nai nunelѳbe, kerrigu lutauba, chigucha kullaaramѳ pѳnrramisra, Tiuswei wamwan chigucha chi kѳrmѳ waminchibelѳ gѳn.n
Nai nunelѳ, nan chi pub arrubiibe, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamweimburappe masken purugubguen inchib arrin gúi, ñim wammѳra gѳnrrai inchar.k
Chiwan mas tabig kui nebua ashibelѳ misra, kaig marig chigar chishelѳ ñibe ѳyeeg kalѳ mara basran dainab pѳnrramig chigar gѳnrrai, Jesucristѳ gatѳ arrub gwalѳm.
Inchawei Tiusbe asha basran, na ñimun mayeelan pesannamѳ, truba rruba isubig kuigwan Señѳr Jesucristѳi undag kѳbiitѳga.
Nabe iigwan treegwein gѳnrrab gúi asha indig kѳn: ñimuinug tabig marѳb pѳlbasrѳbiibe Jesucristѳ arrum gwalѳmgatig ñimune newanelѳ gѳnrrai tamarѳb pasrѳnrrab gúi.
Na ñimun isuimѳlig nai Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib,
Tiuswei tru ka yandѳ t'ab indiibe tru namui Señѳr Jesucristѳn undaaramigwane managucha patsѳnrraingaig undaarabelѳ mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun.
Tius Mѳskaweinukkurrimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳinukkurrimba tru ambugurri igurri tab gѳbig arrubigwan nunelan trannrrai inchar, undag kѳbig tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ basra tѳgagúigwanbañau.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, Tíquicѳ, namui undaaraig nuneg, Señѳrwei maramigu chu uragucha tarѳmisrmѳ, chi maramelan nѳ asha marѳb megabiibe, na maig tsuigwanba, katѳ na chi marѳb megaigwanba, kerriguba ñimun eshkanrrab wam srua inrrun..

Tiuswei Espíritu maig maringaruben, Tiusba waminday, chu urastѳgucha ñim mumay gѳben Tiusba waminchib, miab indiilѳyu. Isua ashiptѳ guy, Tiuswan purugurra cha miab, nui misaamerai mayeelayasig maikkucha pesannab gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.Katѳ naimburabgucha Tiuswan purugurra chib miarrunrrigay, na ke waminchab inchen, tru na maig t'amelan nan trannrrai, tru Tiuswei t'abig srѳ wam sѳrig pasrabigwan nebua ashchai chigucha chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳ, wamindamig kѳnrrai.
Katѳ tru kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmig tѳgagúigwane chinchimѳnrrai turyu petsig kan tsandzѳn cascѳn lataig tѳga bѳnrray. Espíritu Santѳi espadane srua bѳnrray, truibe Tiuswei wamwan.k
Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wam chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwane waminchab amrrab muniitѳ bѳnrramig, srѳbyu keetigwan lataitѳwei tѳga bѳnrray.

Inchawei ѳyeeg kѳbene, Tius chitѳga kwayanrrai traniilane truigwane kerligu tѳga bѳnrray, kaig kwalѳm pubene, kullaaramѳ pѳnrramig kѳnrrai, incha yandѳ ѳyeegwan kerligu chab mara pѳnrramislikkurlimbe kѳrrѳnrrabgaig mur bѳnrrѳnrrab.

Tius tru chitѳga kwayanrrai kerligu traniilѳtѳga tamara pѳnrramisray, nugwaimandzig purѳ may guegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab tamara pѳnsra gua kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab inchen, maig kuingucha kѳrmѳ kwayawa, truyu puraambub ambamig kѳnrrai.

Inchen ñim karub pera gѳbelѳbe ñimui karuig mѳrѳb melabelane ñimgurringucha tabig tѳgaguy yeegwane chigѳben martrumѳn chib, chinetѳ chimѳtѳ. Kaguende ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, tru nѳmun ashib karub pasrabig tru Señѳrtѳwei ñimun ashib pasrabiibe srѳmbalasrѳ wabig kui. Kaguende Tiusbe mѳigwane purѳmisrѳb, kandarѳtѳ inchimíig kѳn..
Maramigwane ka palabinѳ inchib, mѳguelayasig marѳb pѳnrrermab isua marmѳtѳ, marѳppe, martrab isua Señѳrweyasig lataig maray.k
Ñim, karuindiig melabelѳ, yu pirau ñimun karub pera gѳbelane mѳramig kѳn, kѳriibala, maig kѳbash inchimѳ, manrraugurri tabig isua, Cristѳn mѳrѳb melab lataitѳweingue.
¡ѳyeebe mandѳ gúinguen mѳramgaig purѳ nuig kѳn! Inchendѳ iigwan waminchippe, Cristѳnba, nui iglesianba treeg kѳn cha waminchar.
Inchawei treekkurri mѳѳbe usri mѳsk'awane elacha, sraimba k'andѳ misrtrun. Incha tru pailѳbe k'an asrtѳ gѳnrrun.

Kaguende mugucha nui asrwane managuen nѳasiitѳweimbe tsaliinchimѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, asr maig palai inchen mab muchib, maig kѳben gѳnrrain gѳmѳ ashib tѳgagѳn, Clistѳ iglesian ashib tѳgagѳb lataitѳweingue.
tabig nuyasiitѳ tarѳmari misaamera gѳnrrai martrab, tru nui wamdѳga piu umbu ulsraitѳga pillmawa, chish mara,
Kelѳbe nѳmui sralane undaguelѳ gѳmig kѳn. Cristѳma nui iglesian undag kѳptѳ, nui ѳsig kuigwan nѳashib tranig kѳn,
Sralѳbe, kelѳ maig chiben treeg mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Señѳrwan lataitѳweingue..
Ñimbe kanikkurri kanikkurri lata mѳrѳb melamig kѳn, Cristѳn kѳriibala tѳgagúikkurri.
Ñimbe salmѳstѳga, himnѳstѳga, Tiusweimburabelan cant'ailѳtѳga kangurrin gangurri waminday. Ñimui manrraugurri newan isua cant'ab, Señѳrwan maya nuguen t'abig kѳn chib waminchib.
Inchawei ñimbe ke chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ gѳmѳtay. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, Señѳr nam chiwan martraim balai watashchab trunun nebua ashchab indamig kѳn..
Chigѳben tabig maramdiig pubene, treegwan ka purainrraindѳ ashatѳ bѳnrrѳmѳtay. Kaguende purѳ gaig kwalѳmmera gѳn.m
Inchawei tab isuamѳra amѳnay ñim mandѳ amѳnamigwane. Kan chugúinguen mѳrmeelѳ lataig amѳñimѳtѳ, maig amѳnamigwan tab isuamѳra amѳñibelѳ guy.
Inchen tru chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwan tѳryu pѳnsrѳbene, maig kuigwan tѳrgandѳ asamig kenamisran. Pѳs tru chiwandѳgucha maig kuigwan asha gѳmig kѳnrrai tѳrgandѳ kenamarѳbiibe tru tѳr gѳn.
Señѳrwan tab gúi wanrrai maramigwan, mumay maren tab gúi mѳrtashchab treegwan lab melamig kѳn.
Kaguende tru tѳryugurri chi arrubiibe maya nuguen purѳ tab indiiba, sѳlgandѳ tabig mariiba, ciertѳniiba ѳyeeg kѳn.
Inchawei ñimbe treeg marѳbelѳba lincha tѳgatѳ marѳb gѳnrrab gѳmѳ.
Chiweingucha chi purugunrrabgailѳ wamindiilѳtѳga mugѳben kegѳrrѳsrkainab gѳnrrab gѳmѳ, kaguende ѳyeekkurrindѳwei Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbiibe tru mѳrmѳ misaameraim bala arrubig kѳn..

Mѳrѳbguen mѳramgaig wamincha ashib pѳnrrѳmѳwei, chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamincha mѳrmѳwei, trѳmbѳig wamindamgailan wamincha indza mѳrmѳwei indamig kѳn, treeg indamgailan maraashib pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, masken ñimbe Tiuswan ungwa chib gѳmig kѳn.
Amѳñippe, undag kѳbigwane tѳga amѳnay, Cristѳ namun maig undaguig kѳben treetѳwei. Nѳbe nѳashib namuyasig purѳbasramisra kwaig kѳn, k'an animal gweecha purѳ may irrabzhig Tiuswan keta tranѳb lataig.

Masken treeg inchibgunrliibe, ñimbe larrѳ tab inchibelѳ, lata lastima asiyabelѳ, Tius ñimun Clistѳgurli kaig maligwan ulѳ baymub pesannab lataitѳwei, kangurlin gangurli ñimgucha ulѳ bayiyab pѳnrrѳmumig kѳn.
Tiuswei Espíritu Santѳn isuim basrѳnrrai marmѳtay, tru kerrigu yandѳ newan kaigyugurri wesram kwalѳmweyasig truitѳga ñimbe Tiusweyelѳ gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai sellailѳ gѳn.n
Nilaptiig kѳbiibe yandѳ mas nilѳmѳta. Masken treeg inchimѳtѳ, ñui tasiitѳga chigѳben tabig maramigwan mar, mѳikkѳben chi palai inchene, purugumig tѳgagѳnrrab.
Katѳ nugwaimandzig ñimuinug kelulrrain gѳmѳwein guy.

Ñimbe tru srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan kewa bѳnrray, truibe Tius nѳ maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marig kѳn, ciertѳn sѳlgandiitѳgaba, newan chishchig tabiitѳgaba.Inchawei ѳyeekkurri ñimbe isa wamindamigwane yandѳ elacha, masken ñim mѳitѳgucha ñimui mendaigwane isa gѳmѳ, sѳlwan wamindamig kѳn. Kaguende nambe mayeelѳba k'angurrin gangurri k'an asrtѳ guer.
Ñimbe tru srѳig ѳsig kѳmigwan kewa bѳnrray, truibe Tius nѳ maig kѳben treetѳwein gѳnrrai marig kѳn, ciertѳn sѳlgandiitѳgaba, newan chishchig tabiitѳgaba.

Tru ñim merrabsrѳ Tiuswan ashmeelѳ gѳb uras marѳb tѳga amѳnaig kѳbigwane wegutsay, tru kѳllig ñim trendѳ kaigwan tѳga gallaig, chi tabig pummѳrѳ chull isubig purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbig trutѳ srua yaig, ñimui umbu kaig pasrabigwan
Trune ñimbe Cristѳiwan kusreppe, ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳmѳnrrab gusreeg kѳn.
Yandѳ chi kѳrikkengar misrikkurrimbunѳbe, yandѳ kaig maramigwandѳ martrab guebambubelѳ gѳn, chigurrimbunѳ kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig marѳg kѳbig arrubigwan neguen gѳmuig marѳbig marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrab.k

Inchawei nabe iig ѳyeegwan ñimun eshk'appe, marmѳ gѳmѳ, martrai k'arunrrab inchar Señѳrwei munchiyu: mѳimbe yandѳ amѳñippe, Tiuswan ashmeelѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera nѳm chiweingucha chi purugunrrabgaig isub amѳnailѳyu ñimgucha amѳñimѳtay cha.

Incha truig nѳtѳwei mѳilane nѳashib karua ѳriilѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan truѳrѳ srua llirabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, mѳilane tru Cristѳn kѳrebelan tab ashib pera pѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrrai marѳb, katѳ kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳnrrai ѳyeeg pѳnsraig kѳn,
Tru ѳyeeg: nebyaig kѳn cha trenchippe, ¿tru wallibirѳ umbugatig kѳrrebmerrig kѳrrayaig kѳn cha rrenchimuitarru?
Inchendѳ namune kanun ganun Tiusweyasig chigѳben marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai keta tranig kѳn, Cristѳ pirisha keta tranig maig kѳben, treeg..
Tius kandѳ, trurrigu mayeelai Mѳskai, nѳbe mayeelaim bala nѳ basrabig kѳb, mayeelainug trumѳrig nѳ basrab, mayeelainug pasrabiibe nѳtѳ gѳn..
Señѳr kandѳ gѳb, tru isubigwan Jesuclistѳinug pasra pѳnrramikkucha treetѳwei kandѳ gѳb, piu umbu ulsraikkucha treetѳwei kandѳ gѳb indan.
Espílitu Santѳinug newan kanbalatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrab indamigwan treeg pѳnrrѳnrrab inday, tru kanbalatѳ pѳnrramig ambugurli igurli tab gѳbiitѳga,
Inchawei Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri tru kailan keeri yau na pasrabiibe, ñimun trenchinrrab inchar: Tius ñimun treeg amѳñinrraiwei wamiilѳ gúig kѳppe, maig amѳnamigwan trumay treeg amѳñirrunrrigay cha,

Inchen tru chiwandѳgucha nѳbe marѳppe, tru nam miaigwandѳ gѳmѳwei, kabe nam isuigwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ke uñcha gѳm tѳgagѳnrrai marѳb Tius, tru nui maramburab marѳb basrabig maig kѳben namuinug treeg marѳb basrabigwan,

Jesucristѳi undag kѳbig maya nuig kuigwan ñim mayeelѳ nui misaameraba kanbalatѳ pѳnrramisra, tru Cristѳi undag kѳbiibe lendѳmay rreetѳwei, yammay rreetѳwei, palamay rreetѳwei, lendegѳrrab rreetѳwei nuigwan ñim tab chigúi mѳrtrai miar.
Tru nѳ chigurrimbunѳ nui tѳrguegwalmabig chi palѳmíig maya tѳgagúig, truig maig kѳben, truyugurri tru ñimui manrrau chishkandѳ mur basrѳnrrai, nui Espíritugurri maramburab mariitѳga martrai miar,
Inchawei nan ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig isumdiig puig megaigwan, trunun isuptѳ kullaaramѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar. Masken nan ѳyeeg puibe ñimuyasiibe maya nuguen tab gѳnrrain gѳn.
Inchawei nambe chigucha katѳnrraingaig chi isumѳ nѳgurri Tiusweinug kemalamig tѳgaguer namui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ basra tѳgagúikkurri.

Iigwane tru iglesiagurri kerriguba mѳi ya asig kѳnrrai kenamartrab isua indig kuig kѳn, nui tru muguen nebua isumgaig purѳ nuig kusrebig kuigwan tru srѳmbalasrѳ nѳm asha garubelanba, katѳ mugucha manchinrraingaig karubelanba.

Nabe Tiuswei misaamerai utu tru chigucha gѳmѳ waachawan tru Cristѳi chine chine purѳ tabig, kan ѳyangatiitѳ gѳn damgaig Tiuswei tru tabig srѳ wamwan eshkab kusrenanѳb pasramig kѳnrrai pasrig kur, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran

Iig, tru muguen asiimíig pasrabiibe, tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameragucha judíѳs misaameraba tѳgatѳ tru ketigwan ut'amig tѳgagѳb, tru asryutѳwei pѳnrramig kѳb, katѳ Jesucristѳinug tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan tѳgatѳ ut'amig tѳgagѳb indamig truig kѳn, tru Tiuswei t'abig srѳ wamgurri.
Iibe tru mu asiimíig pasrabigwan nan ashchai Tius kenamarig truig kѳn, tru na ñimun landѳtiig pѳrѳbguen indig.k
Inchawei ñim iig tru pѳrigwan ashabe, muguen asiimíig pasrabig Cristѳiwan, ѳyeeg chigúi mѳramgailan nabe nebua ashibig kuin gúi ñimbe wetѳgѳrrѳnrrabguen.
Pѳs ñimbe manawei wammѳraguen gúinrrun, Tius ka yandѳ purѳ t'ab inchibig kѳptѳ ñimuyasig t'ab gѳnrrai nan iigwan martrai pasrigwan.
Inchen tru utu ñimungucha kanbalatѳ kusrub marѳb ambiilѳ gѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri Tius truyu nѳ pasramig kѳnrrai.
Inchen nuinug tru yawan, purѳ may tamara warѳb tabig kusrub marene, tru yabe kurrab ippe, Señѳrweyasiitѳ tarѳmari ya gѳnrrab kurrab yan.m

Inchawei yandѳ ñimbe peg birausreelѳ gѳmѳwei, ni pestѳ ka pua buramrraptѳ amrruateelѳ gѳmѳwein gѳn. Mѳimbe treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei misaameraba kanguelarrѳtѳ marѳb tѳgagѳmigwan tѳgar, Tiuswei misaameraba kan yautѳ latailѳ,
Kaguen nѳgurriwei nam lata, nѳm lata, Tius Mѳskawan tru Espíritu Santѳtѳgatѳwei kemalamig tѳga bѳnrrer.

Incha gatѳ Cristѳbe tru pabalѳ gѳbigwan kan asrtѳ lataig mara, Tiusba gatѳle treetѳwei katѳ tab kѳrrѳmisrtrai marig kѳn, tru ashig kѳmui indiyab pѳnrraigwan yandѳ mas treeg kѳmѳnrrai nѳ kurusyu kwaitѳga patsѳga gѳrrѳmarѳb..

Kaguende tru ambugurri igurri chi isumikkaig tab gѳbig namuinug pasrabiibe Jesucristѳ nѳwein gѳn, tru pa sѳtѳ gѳbigwan kan sѳtѳtѳ gѳnrrai marѳbig. Tru ashig kѳmui indiyab waraig kѳbig kan pirѳbanrrig sѳtѳbasrab lataig pasrabigwan pѳtiichippe

Inchawei ñim tru trendѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerane merrabsrѳmbe tru judíѳsmera nѳmui asru t'aska circuncidailѳbe ñimune: Circuncidaimѳ misakkѳlleelѳ cha wamab tѳgagúilan isua guy.Ñimbe tru urasrѳmbe Cristѳne chigar, Israel misaamera chitѳ marѳbelѳ gѳben, ñimbe treegwan maramig chigar gѳnrrai t'arѳmariilѳ, katѳ Tius nui misagwan ѳyeeg trannrrab kѳrrѳmisri acuerdѳsmera mariilane chi asamig chigar, katѳ chiwan muniirab melamig chigawei, yu pirau ñimbe Tius kaweyelѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende nambe Tius nѳ mariilѳ guer, Cristѳ Jesúskurri srѳig peemayelѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ t'abigwan marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai mariilѳ, tru treegwan marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai Tius manasrѳwei pѳnsrailan.
Kaguende ñimbe Tius k'a yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ k'aigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳn, ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasrikkurri. Iibe ñim chigѳben marikkurrin gѳmѳtѳ, iigwane Tiusbe k'a yandѳ keta tranig kѳn.
tru wendѳsrѳ attrabigu nui ka yandѳ tab indig tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagúigwan kenamartrab, nѳ namun purѳ tabig kѳptѳ Cristѳ Jesúskurri.

tru martrai karua pѳnsrailan mѳra marmuilѳyutѳ kwailѳ amѳñibenbatѳsrѳwei, tru ѳsig kѳmigwane Cristѳba kanbalatѳ tѳgagѳnrrai namun tranig kѳbig kѳn. ¡Tius tru ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgatѳ ñimbe kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳn!

Namgucha merrabsrѳmbe mayeelѳba namun asr maig trѳmbѳig marѳg kui inchen nѳmui utu treetѳwei marѳb amѳñibelѳ gѳbig ker, namui asr maig srua itanmaptѳ, tru gúindѳ kaig marѳb, kailan isub. Kaigwan nam trendѳ tѳgagúikkurri, Tiuswei purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbigwan utѳnrrabelѳ gѳbig ker, katѳganelѳ mayeelѳ latawei.
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi k'a yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba kѳnrraimab isur.
Na Pablѳ nai task'a iigwan pѳrar, ñimun k'a amѳñigueh chib. Kilgamera mѳitѳgucha na bѳriilѳbe na bѳrig kѳnmab asamdeelѳ gѳnrrai, ѳyamay pѳrѳbig kur.
Inchendѳ kaig kѳnmab ashiptѳ ashig kѳmui inchib treeg inchib tѳgagѳmѳtѳ, nuneg kui ashabe, ashiptѳ megau cha, ѳyeebe marmumig kѳn chib, eshkab wamindamig kѳn..
Mѳikkѳben tru i kilgayu maig martrain cha trendaigwan mѳrmíigwane ñimbe trunune trendѳ treeg kui yandѳ asha tѳgaguy. Incha truibabe linchibgucha linchimumig kѳn, treenchene kwartrai.
Inchen ñim, namui nunelѳbe, chigѳben tabig maramigwane muraarab melѳnrrab gѳmѳ, maray.m
Nambe wammѳra guer, mѳilѳgѳben ñimui utuelѳ ke chigucha chi marmѳ ka amѳñinrrabgѳba inchibelѳ kuin gúi, nѳmuimburab gѳmubendѳ, mendailaisrѳ ke ka neesha mѳrѳb.
Nambe mu mandamgaig maramig chigar guagurri ñimun purugurra chinrrab gaima pѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, ñimguen namun asha kusrenrrai isua, ѳyeeg muraara marig kѳbig kѳn.
Pѳs ñimbe yandѳ ashibelѳ gѳn, nam mandѳ waraig kѳbigwan ñimgucha treetѳwei waramig kѳnrrai. Nambe ñimui utu warappe, chi marmѳ ka warѳnrrabgѳba inchimѳwei,
Tiuswei undag kѳbigwanba, maig kuingucha yaandѳ, yaandѳ melamig Cristѳ tѳgagúigwanba, Señѳrbe ñimui manrrѳmeran trunun nebua tѳgagѳnrrai martraimab isur.k
Nambe Señѳrtѳgabe treeg kuitamab isua bѳnrrer, martrai nam karua pѳnsraigwan ñim mѳi ya marѳb melaigwan lata, katѳ maramigwan ñimbe marѳbig martrab gúi.
Katѳ trѳmbѳig marѳptѳ yandѳ mindiilѳ, larrѳ gaig mѳguelai tasku nam kegѳrrab melamig kѳmѳnrrai tѳga miarrunrrigay. Kaguende isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwane mayeelѳbabe tѳgagѳmѳn.
ñimui manrrѳmerayu purѳ tab gúi pѳnrrѳnrraimab isub, ñimui chigurlimbunѳ tabig maligu lata, tabig wamindigu lata tabig malig kѳrrѳmisrtrai treeg martrun.
Treeg kѳbene, namui nunelѳ, maig pѳnrrabelѳbe truyutѳ tarѳmisrmѳ melay, namashib pѳnrrѳwa kusrenaniilan lata, kabe kilgayu pѳligwan kusrenaniilan lata truigwane elatchab gѳmѳ, tab tѳga bѳnrray.

Inchendѳ nambe chu uraskucha Tiuswan ñimuimburab ungwa, ungwa chib gѳmig kѳtan, Señѳr undaaraig nunelѳ. Kaguende srѳsrѳgurri kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmig kѳnrrai Tiusbe ñimune lawa wesraig kѳbig kѳn, Espíritu Santѳgurri tabig chishmarikkurrimba, katѳ ñimui isubigwan newan ciertѳnigu pasra tѳgagúikkurrimba..
Inchawei Tiusbe tru pelѳsrkѳb kegѳrrѳsrkѳbigwan maramburab martrai ѳrtrun, isa wamindiilan kѳrenrrai,

Tru larrѳ gaig arrua maliibe, Satanás purugúitѳga marѳb attrun, marѳppe, Satanás maramburab maliilѳtѳgaba, nѳ pasrain gúi ashchai maliilan maliitѳgaba, tabig kѳmíitѳga kwaara asha gѳnrrai marѳb pasrailѳtѳgaba.
Kaguende tru mu asiimíig purѳ gaig basrabiibe chabguen marѳbguen basran. Inchendѳ tru treeg marmѳnrrai mѳi ya merrarrab sѳtѳ basrabiibe, sѳtѳ gatab basrabig basrѳnrrun tru utugurri wesramnegatig.
Tru kaig martrab mѳg treeg maramig puben tru uras kenamisrtrai tru merrarrab sѳtѳ basrabiibe chi sѳtѳ basrain gúi ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn.

Tru mѳѳbe tru chimerandѳgucha tius kѳn chib tѳgagúilanba, katѳ chiwan gѳben kѳriibala tabig waminchib tѳgagúilanba, ashig kѳmui inchib sѳtѳ basramisrѳb, purab nuig misrѳb pasrѳnrrun. Incha treetѳ gѳnrrab gúindѳ, Tiuswei yauguen kebya wamisra, nѳashibguen Tius kur chib wanrrun..

tiusmanda ñim maig isua pѳnrraigwan ke mѳi mѳi peetѳ isub yunѳmarѳb, ke chinsraatѳ inchib pѳnrrѳnrrai kwaarѳsrainab pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳ chinrrab inder. Tru arrum gwalѳmbe yandѳ pun chib, Tius treeg wamindingarut'an chib wamindi lat'a, kabe treeg kѳn chib eshkaig lat'a, kabe treeg kѳnrrun chib nam guilga bѳrig kѳn chib waminchib gúi lat'a mѳrmѳnrrigay.

namui Señѳr Jesúswei munchiwan ѳyamaybe ñimgurri maya nuguen tab indig kѳben, ñimbe nѳgurri maya nuguen tab indiilѳ gѳnrrai miabelѳ guer, tru ka yandѳ tab indig namui Tiusweimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳimba maig kѳnrrain gѳben treeg.

tru nui misaamera nun maya nuguen tab indig kѳnrrappa, tru mayeelѳ nun kѳrebelѳ yeekkucha gѳnrrabmab kwaara asig kѳnrrappa arrub gwalѳm. Inchen ñimgucha tru utu tѳga bѳnrrѳnrrun, kaguende nam maig eshkab wamindigwan ñim kѳreikkurri.k
Tiuswan ashmeelanba, katѳ namui Señѳr Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan mѳrѳg kѳmui inchibelanba Tiusbe maig kѳnrrabigwan mѳra melѳnrrai martrab attrun.
Tiusbe sѳlgandѳ t'ab asha marѳbiibe ñimun kaig nebunrrai marѳbelane, nѳmungucha treetѳwei mѳra melѳnrrai martrun.

Inchawei treekkurli nambe Tiuswei iglesiamerayu ñimuimburab truba tab gúi waminchibelѳ guer, ñim melabig melaigwanba, isubigwan Jesuclistѳinug pasra melaigwanba, chine kaig indinab melamig arrubigu, ñim truba isuig puraambub melamig nebuindѳgucha.
Na Pablѳba, Silasba, Timѳteѳba kanbalatѳ misra, Tesalónicasrѳ iglesian i kilgawan pѳrar, namui Tius Mѳskaimba, Señѳr Jesucristѳba kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabelan
Ñimbe namui nunelan mayeelan purѳ t'ab wamab, Tiuswei undag kѳbiitѳga t'asig rranѳb ka amѳñigueh chinrrigay.
Namui nunelѳ, namuyasig Tiuswan tѳga miarrunrrigay..
chigurrimbunѳ kaigwane marmumig kѳn.
chi pub arlindѳgucha, Tiuswane ungwa, ungwa tamig kѳn, kaguende Tiusbe ñim ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳnrraiwei isua gѳn, Clistѳ Jesúskurli.
chu urastѳgucha Tiusba wamindamigwane elachimѳ, nѳba waminchib,
Chu urastѳgucha ñimbe kasraatѳ amѳñib,

Katѳ ñim, namui nunelan, trenchinrrab inder, chigѳben marѳg kѳmui inchib pѳilane murba waminchigay cha, katѳ kѳriiteelane treetѳ melѳmѳnrrai waminchib, katѳ chiyugѳben purѳ gullaguelane purugub, mayeelanba larrѳ tammay inchurrunrrigay cha.

Katѳ ñim namui nunelan trenchinrrab inder, ñimui utu marѳb, katѳ karub pѳnrrabelane maig kѳbash inchimѳ, tiusmanda tab inchunrrigay cha, Señѳrweimburabelѳyu tru pera marѳb, maig maramigwan treeg marѳb melamig kѳn chib waminchibelane.k
Nѳbe namuyasig purѳbasramisra kwaig kuig kѳn, nam ѳsig amѳnai lata, kabe nam kwaimbala lata nѳba kanbalatѳ purramig kѳnrrai..
Kaguende Tiusbe namune nui purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig namig kѳbigwan utѳnrrai mara bѳnsrѳmѳtѳ, kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan nebua utѳnrrain gúig kѳn, namui Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri..
Kaguende tru kibelѳbe yem guian. Inchen mutsiirabelѳbe yem mutsiiran..
Inchawei treekkurri, nambe gatѳganelѳ lataitѳwei kib lataig amѳñimѳtѳ, pesannamѳ purѳ isuptѳ melѳgun, trurrigu tab isuamѳrague..
Inchendѳ ñim, namui nunelѳbe, lѳstѳyu bѳnrrѳmѳn, tru gwalѳm ñimun kan niliig arrub lataitѳwei, ke chi isumѳ gѳben arrinab pѳnrrѳnrrain gѳmѳ.
Inchen Señѳr chiwei arrumigwanba, katѳ mana arrumigwanbabe ñim, namui nunelan, na chi pѳramig palѳmѳn.m
Inchawei kangurrin gangurri ѳyeeg wamindiilѳtѳga waminchib puruguyay
Inchen nam ka ѳsig amѳñibelѳbe tru kwaig warѳwa kiagasrabelѳba kanbalatѳ wañiyu srua ambiilѳ gѳmѳnrrun Señѳrwan palasrѳ katѳnrrab. ѳyamay nambe managatig Señѳrba purramig kѳnrrun.
Señѳr nѳ maig taig, nambe nѳ arrumnegatig nam ka ѳsig amѳñibelѳbe kwabelѳguen ammѳwatѳ nammerrig ambamibe kaanrrun cha trendamѳnrrun..

Ñim, namui nunelan, tru kwawa ka kib lataitѳ warabelaimburabigwan mandѳ inchab gúinguen mѳrmeelѳ kѳrrѳmisrmѳnrrai nambe eshkanrrab inder, katѳganelѳ tru isua muniiramigwan chigar lata ke chinsraatѳ isui inchimѳnrrai..
Warappe, ñimuimburab wasrѳndaa tab waramigwan isumig kѳn, mu mendaigweiwan gѳmѳ, ñimuimburabigwan isub, ñimui task'a ñimui maramelan marѳb, nam ñimun maig martrain garuig treekke,
Inchawei i kusrenaniilan kaashibiibe, mu mѳwan gashmѳtѳ, Tiuswan gaasan, nui Espíritu Santѳn ñimun tranѳbigwan..
Judíѳs kѳmeelѳ Tiuswan ashmѳ misaamera latawei trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbiitѳ ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib, truitѳ srua ambiilѳ bѳnrramig kѳmѳn.
Katѳ ñim mѳitѳgucha ñimui asrwane isua mѳra tѳgagѳm gusremig kѳn, newan tabig, trѳmbѳig marѳb maig kѳbash kѳmѳtѳ.
Ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, Señѳr Jesús treeg martrai karua basriitѳga maytѳ marѳb gѳmigwan nam ñimun eshkaigwan.

Ñimui manrrѳmeran nѳbe tab mur isua bѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrrai martrun tru newan tabigu, ñimun ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳn dainanrrabgailѳ, Tius namui Mѳskawei merrab pѳnrramig kѳnrrai, tru namui Señѳr Jesús nuyasiitѳ tarѳmaliilѳ mayeelѳba arrub uras.
Inchawei nam ñimun gatѳle ashchab amrrumig kѳnrrai, namui Mѳskai Tiusba, Señѳr Jesúsba namui maywan kura rrattraimab isuer.
Nambe yem gwalѳm Tiuswan miab melabelѳ guer, katѳle ñimun malaugue ashchab amrrua, ñimui isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigu ñim ke truburab nebuimíig palabigwan nemartrab isua.n
Ñim Señѳrweinug tarѳmisrmѳ melan dai wammѳrene, namune ke kan ѳsiirab lataig kѳtan.

Inchendѳ gatѳle Timѳteѳbe ñimuisrѳ uña, puppe, namuyasig tru tab wam wammѳrѳsrkѳnrrab srua arrin gѳn ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra amѳnaigwanba, truba undaguelѳ gúigwanba. Katѳ ñimbe chu uraskucha namune pesannamѳ, tabig isub tѳgagѳbelѳ gúin gѳn chib, namgurri ñimun asinrrabna gúi melab lataitѳwei ñimgucha treeg isub melabelѳ gúin gѳn chib wamindan.
Inchawei nambe ñimba amѳñippatѳwei, ѳyeeg chine isumdiig puig melamig kѳnrrun cha, kanmaytѳ eshkaig kѳbig kѳn, truibe mѳimbe ñimguen ashen treeg purebweindan.

Incha namui nuneg Timѳteѳ Jesucristѳi tabig srѳ wamwan larrѳbichib inrrai wamindamelѳyu Tiusweimburabelan marѳb, namba lincha marѳb megabigwan nambe ñimun ashchai ѳrer, tru ñim kѳrrѳnrrabgaig mur isua melѳnrraimba, ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pѳnsra tѳgagúigwan elachimѳ, tѳgagѳbig tѳgagѳnrrab isunrrai martraimba.
Inchawei treeg isuptѳ, treeg isuptѳ melѳmѳnrrab, Atenassrѳmbe trembe namdѳgucha ka gѳrrѳmisrtrab isuer.

Katѳ Señѳrbe nane chine kaig nebunrrab pѳnrrabigugurri chi gѳmѳ, ka purayamig kѳnrrai, chi indiimíig ashib tѳgagѳnrraut'an, srѳmbalasrѳ nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ tѳga wamigweyasig. Tѳrguegwalmabiibe Tiuswein gѳnrrun managatig. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Erastѳbe Cѳrintѳsrѳ kѳrrѳmisren, Trófimѳne Miletѳsrѳ kwanrrѳ gѳrrѳmarar.n
Pliscilanba, Aquilaswanba, ѳnesífѳrѳi yauelanba tab ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrlig.
Inchen Tíquicѳne nabe Efesѳ ciudasrѳmay ѳrig kѳn.n
Tru mѳwane ñigucha isuatѳ ashiptѳ uñchig. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan nam waminchimѳnrrai truba rruba sѳtѳlulѳb gurrig kѳn.k
Alejandrѳ, tru tsandzѳndѳga chigѳben marѳbiibe, nane chinetѳ truba rruba kaig malig kѳn, nѳ maig maligwan Señѳrbe truburѳ maig tranamigwan trannrrab gúinrrun.
Yube ke Lucastѳwei naba kѳrrѳmisran. Marcѳswane lawa, ñi pera attrunrrig. Kaguende nѳbe tru nai maramelѳyu truba nu purugunrrautan.n
Timѳteѳ, petѳ nan ashchab attrab inchunrrig.

Inchawei maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ tabig malimburѳ utam cѳrѳna esegaig tѳgagur. Truigwane Señѳr, tru maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbig, tru gwalѳm nan tranrrun. Tranѳbgucha nandѳ rranmѳtѳ, katѳ mayeelѳ tru nѳ arrumigwan truba rruba tab gúi isub muniirabelane, mayeelanba trannrrab gúinrrun.
Kaguende nabe yandѳ naimburappe na ѳsig kuigwan Tiusweyasig keta trannrrab kweetsig kѳmig yandѳ ke lutau basrѳben, yandѳ na kwawa webya yamibe puim basran.
Incha tru newan ciertѳnigwane mѳrѳg kѳmub tarѳmisra, chi treeg kѳmubendѳ nѳmuinetѳ isua wamindiilan mѳrѳb gѳnrrab chab lliranrrun.

Tiuswei wamwan eshk'ab kusrenanrrig. Wamindamdiig kui lata, wamindamdiig kѳmui lata nui wamwane waminchab muniitѳ basrabig kѳnrrig. Katѳ ѳyeeg maramig kѳbig kuin gúi nebua ashchai waminchib, k'alѳ marmѳnrrai wachib, kullaaramѳ tranrrѳnrrai purugub, trurrigu tsag inchimѳ, tammay Tiuswei wamwan kusrenanѳb pasrѳnrrai pasrar, ñune.
Tiuswei mѳѳbe chigurrimbunѳ tabig maramigweyasiibe chigucha palѳmíig newanig kѳnrraingue..
Inchagucha ñibe unѳgurri Tiuswei tru newan tab wam pѳriilan yandѳ ashibig kѳn, truilѳbe ñune kusrebig kѳnrrai martrun, tru isubigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrikkurri kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmig kѳnrrai..

Trune tru larrѳ gaig mѳguelѳba, katѳ tabzhig wamincha kaigyu kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳbabe treetѳguen gѳmѳ, purѳ gailѳguen misrѳb amrrun, nѳmguen may wamincha kegѳrrѳsrkailѳtѳwein gѳbendѳ, may wamincha katѳganelan kegѳrrѳsrkѳb.

Katѳ chine chine nan kaig marinab megaigwan chigucha, purѳ isuig megamig chinetѳ puigwan, Antiѳquíasrѳ Icѳniѳsrѳ, Listrasrѳ nan yeeg trѳmbѳig pui megaigwan. ѳyeeg chine trѳmbѳig puig isuig megaben, kerrigu ѳyeelѳ chine pub arrubigugurri Señѳrbe nan chi gѳmѳ ka purayamig kѳnrrai marig kѳn..

Inchendѳ ke ѳyeetѳ, ѳyeetѳ gúimbe martrab gaimanrrun. Kaguende nѳm chigúinguen mѳrmubendѳrre marѳb gúigwane mayeelai malau tѳrgandѳ tѳrmarig kѳnrrun, tru pailѳ Janeswanba, Jambreswanba maig purayaig treetѳweingue.

Kaguende tru treeg marѳb mѳguelai utuelѳ mѳilѳgѳben kѳn, ishumburmera chiyu gѳben mur isua bѳnrrѳmѳwa, chigurrimbunѳ k'aig marѳg kѳbig arrubig srua ambiilѳ, k'aig mariitѳ netsailai yamerayu kebamba, tru ishumburmeran kegѳrrѳsrk'a treetѳ rreetѳ melѳnrrai srua gѳbelѳ.Inchen tru ishumburmerabe chu uraskucha kusreb chib melѳbendѳ, tru newan ciertѳnigwane managuen nebua ashchab gaiman.
Tiusweimburabigu truba tabig amѳñib lataig inchendѳ, tru maramburab marѳbig Tiusweiwane chigucha gѳmíig mara tѳgar gѳn. ѳyeeg misaamerane tarѳmisr.m

Ka trendѳ treeg undaguelѳ gѳmigwane chigucha chiga misaamera, namappe, chinchaguen tamaramgaig namabelѳ, wam gusrupteelѳ, trѳmbѳig maramigwane ke treeg maratѳweim buraambubelѳ, nѳmun gѳmѳbashtѳ trѳmbѳig mara betab misaamera, chigurrimbunѳ tabigwane larrѳ tsaleelѳ
Katѳ ñibe iigwangucha isua asha gѳmig kѳn, srabe gwalѳmmerawane tabguen waramga gwalѳmmera attrab gúi.
Incha gatѳle tab isua mѳra, tru nugwaimandzig chinetѳ mara pѳnsra nѳmun kegѳrrѳsrka, nѳ maig martrain gѳben, treeg marѳb melѳnrrai merrarrawa tѳgagúigugurri wegѳrrѳnrrai.
Kaguende Señѳrweiwan marѳb megabiibe kwayam laptiig kѳmѳtѳ, masken mayeelan larrѳ tab inchibig, trurligu may gusrenanѳbig, chigѳben pusrkwanrraptiig taingucha namig mѳrmíig kѳmig kѳn.

Matsѳrelѳ chinetѳ kaig marѳg kui indiilѳyugurlimbe ñibe tarѳmisr. Incha tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwanba, isubigwan Clistѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagѳmigwanba, undag kѳbigwanba, ambugurli igurli tab unamigwanba ñibe tѳga uñ, tru nѳmui manrrѳmeran chishchiitѳga Señѳrwan purugurra chib wamab tabig waminchibelѳba kanbalatѳ.

Kan nu yauma pasumera, kѳtsѳmera pѳnrrappe, ѳrѳtѳga maliilѳtѳ bѳnrrѳmѳwei, andѳga maliilѳtѳ pѳnrrѳmѳwei indan. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tsiitѳga maliilѳ gѳben, pirѳtѳga maliilѳ gѳben bѳnrran. Mѳilѳbe purѳ tabig marѳbyutѳ katѳrab srua gѳmig kѳben, mѳilѳbe ka chi marѳbyu gѳben katѳrab srua gѳmelѳ gѳn.

Pѳs truilѳma tru newan ciertѳnigugurri pella tarѳmisra, tru kwailѳ ѳsiiranrrun daibe yandѳ chab ѳsiirabguen indin gѳn chib, trumay waminchib guebamba, mѳilanma tru nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳga melaigwane yandѳ mumaygucha gѳmuielѳ melѳnrrai mindisha kѳrrѳmarѳb guebambin gѳn.

Ñibe ñuimburappe Tiuswei merrab sѳl marѳbig kui asig basrѳnrrab, purѳ tab asha isuptѳ marѳb meganrrig. Chi maramigwan marѳb pasrabig, chiyugucha kѳriimisra basrѳnrrabgaig tru wam newan ciertѳnigwane, maig kѳnrrabigwan sѳlgandѳ gusrenanѳb pasrabig treeg kѳnrrab.Tiuswane chigucha gѳmíig marѳb wamindiilanba, ke ka wamincha mѳriilanba, treegwan martrab gѳmѳ isua basrѳnrrig. Kaguen treeg waminchibelѳbe nѳmui kaig mariilѳyu mas kegѳrrab ambubelѳ gѳn.

Iilane pesannamѳnrrai isunanѳpbatѳ, isunanѳpbatѳ meganrrig, ѳyeeg martrigay chib Tiuswei merrab karua basrѳb, ke kan chi wamindamgaigwan treetѳgatѳ ke larrѳbitsamburab larrѳbichib, ambugurri igurri aleguiyab gѳmѳnrrai. Treeg mariibe chi tabig purugumѳtѳ, tru wamindigwan mѳrѳbelane ka trѳmbѳig mindishatѳ kѳrrѳmarѳbig kѳn.
Maya kaig nebub arringucha, melabig melѳwabe, katѳ nѳ ashib karub waisrѳn chigucha nѳba ashib karub purramig kѳnrrun. Nam nun ashmeelѳ guer chibene, namungucha nѳbe ashmíig kur chinrrun.

Inchawei treekkurri chinetѳ kaig nebub arrubigwan treegwan kerrigu ka pureb megar, Tius nѳ lawa wesrailayasig t'ab gѳnrrai isua, tru kaigyugurri wesrailѳ gѳmig Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabigwanba, tru managuen patsѳnrrabgaig tѳrguegwalmabigwanba nѳmgucha nebua tѳgagѳnrrai.
Jesucristѳ rey Davidwei misagugurri arrubiibe kwawa, kwailai utugurri gatѳle kurrigwan ñibe pesannamѳ isuagu, tru Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan na maig eshkab kusrenanig, treegwan.m
Inchawei iig na ñun trendailane ñiguen chi chibig kuitashchab tab isu, pѳs Señѳrbe chiwandѳgucha ñi tab chigúi mѳramigwan tranrrun.m
Kan suldauma chi maramelan marѳb meganrrab, truyu kebyaikkurrimbe, k'atѳgan nѳѳrѳ peg maramelѳyube kebya megamѳn, nun suldau gѳnrrai pasrѳbigwan purѳ tab gúi mѳrtrai martrab.
Chine isuig megamig pub arrubigu, ñibe namba treegu pureb meganrrab isu, Clistѳ Jesúswei kan purѳ tab suldau lataig.
Ñi nai nusrkai lat'aibe, tru ka yandѳ t'ab indig Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasrabigu mur isua basrau.
ѳnesífѳrѳi yauelan Tius lastima tѳgagѳnrraimab isur. Kaguende ѳnesífѳrѳbe katѳ gatѳ nan chi isumѳ pishindѳ pasrѳnrrai purugubig kѳn, katѳ nan kailan keeri yau pasranmaptѳ kѳrig kui inchimѳweingue.
Pѳs ñibe asha gúinrrun mayeelѳ Asia birausreelѳma nan chab tarѳmisrigwan, truilai utube Figelѳ gѳben, Hermógenes kѳben tarѳmisrig kѳn.

Tru chi kalѳ gѳmѳ t'abig kusrenaniilѳ na wamindigwan ñi mѳrigwane, trunun merrarrawa treetѳwei marѳb yamig tѳgagѳnrrig, isubigwan tru Cristѳinug pasriguba, undag kѳbigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug pasra tѳgagúiguba.

Kaguende namun kaigyugurli wesrawa, newan tabig chishig amѳñinrrai wamabiibe nѳwein gѳn, kabe nam chigѳben maliilѳgurlin gѳmѳtѳ, nѳ trendѳ treeg martrab isuitѳgaba, nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgaba gѳn. Tru iig ka yandѳ tab indigwane Tiusbe Clistѳ Jesúskurli tranig kѳbig kѳn, chigurlimbunѳ pѳnrrabikken kaabenbatѳsrѳwei.
Kaguende Tiusbe namune kѳliiteelѳ gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, chishkandѳ marѳbig kѳnrrain rranig kѳn, undag kѳbigwan tѳgar gѳnrraimba, asr mumay srua itanmaptѳ pѳnrrѳmeelѳ gѳnrraimba.

Nabe katѳ gatѳ isuinabig kѳn, ñi ka isatѳ inchib gѳmѳ, ñui isubigwan Jesucristѳinug ciertѳn pasra tѳgagúigwan. Truigwane ñui awela Lѳidaba, ñui usri Euniceba truilѳmerrig pѳlbasra tѳgagúig kѳbig kѳn. Incha mѳimbe ñuinukkucha truibe pasrѳmѳ gѳmѳ, pasraitamab isua basrar.

Chu uraskucha pesannab elachimѳtѳ nabe truigwan, yem gwalѳm ñune tѳga tѳga isua miab megappe, Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chibig kur, nai isub kebachib basrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn cha kebachibig chigaig, na treeg marѳb basraig Tiuswan, tru merrabsrѳ nai kѳlli misaamera Tiusweyasig maig marѳb melabelѳ gѳben treetѳwei.
Na Pablѳ, Tius nan trendѳ treeg kѳnrrain gúikkurri Jesúscristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig, ѳsig kѳmigwan Cristѳ Jesúsweinug trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrigwan eshkanrrai ѳrig,m

¡Au! Timѳteѳ, ñun chi martrai trana basrigwane tabig isua mѳra tѳgagu, Tiuswane chigucha gѳmíig marѳb wamindiilanba, ke ka wamincha mѳriilanba, katѳ tru nѳmui nѳrrѳ nebua ashib kusreb taig chi ciertѳn gѳmíigwanba, treelan mѳrѳb pasrѳnrrab gѳmѳ meganrrig.

Tabigwan marѳbelѳ gѳnrrain garunrrig, truba puarmera misrѳppe, nѳmui chigѳben tabig mariilѳyu puarmera misrtrai. Tѳgagúigwane chigucha merѳ gúi inchimѳ, lata pirishib purugunrrab muniitѳ gѳbelѳ gѳnrrai.

Managuen kwanrrabig kѳmíig, muguen kemalamgaigu tѳrguegwalmabigu wabig, nune mu mѳkkucha asiimíig, katѳ mugucha nune ashchab gaimaig, Tius nѳtѳ gѳn. Treegwan purѳ tab indiiba, managatig mayeelaim bala karub wamibabe nuyasig kѳnrrai inchar. Treeg kѳnrrun.
tru martrai ñun karua basrigwane kaig mariitѳga chillig indig chigaig, katѳ chigѳben kailѳ gѳn dainab pasramig chigaig, treeg tѳgagѳnrrai namui Señѳr Jesucristѳ kenamisramnegatig.

Ñui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwane ñi tѳga basrѳnrrab isua gwayab, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmig tѳgagúigwane pachamѳrtrab gѳmѳ tab tѳga basrau, Tius trunun tѳgagѳnrrai wamѳben, tru ñi truba yamelai merrab, purѳ tabig pasrѳnrrab waminchib pasraig kѳbigwan.

Kaguende chigurrimbunѳ kaig maramig arrubiibe, anwan ¡gatѳ! ke kan chinchimmѳrѳ inchib chull indiilѳyugurri arrubig kѳn. Inchawei mѳilѳgѳbenma an dѳgagug kѳbiitѳ yandѳ pella, nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigugurri tarѳmisra, nѳmasiitѳwei chine chine purѳ isumdiig puig melѳnrrab tѳga bѳnrramisran.
Kaguende nambe yu piraumayma, chigucha chigar yandiig amrruig kѳppe, katѳ treetѳwei chigucha chigar ambamig kѳnrrun.
Inchen nam maig tѳgagúizhiitѳgatѳ k'asraatѳ melabelaimbe tru Tiusweimburabelan marѳb tѳgagúiyugurri, chigurrimbunѳ tѳgagѳmig arrubwei inchibig kѳn.

nѳasiitѳ purѳ gusrebig kurmab indan, chigucha chi kusremíig kѳbendѳ. Incha maig kѳ chib payib aleguiyamig, chigѳben wamindiilan kwayam lab wamindamibe, kan kwanrrѳ lat'aig nigaig kѳn. Incha ѳyeekkurrindѳwei truyugurri arruppe, katѳgan chigѳben tѳgagѳben pusrkwai asamig arrumba, kwayam lamig arrumba, katѳganun trѳmbѳig marѳb tsalѳ wamamig arrumba, chigѳben guemesra trѳmbѳig isub amѳnamig arrumba,

Inchen ñim mѳilѳgѳben, ñimun karub pera gѳbelѳ Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳtѳwein dѳgarbe, Cristѳgurri nunelѳ gѳnmaptѳ, maig kѳben palabinѳtѳ indamig kѳmѳn. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, purѳ t'abguen mara rranѳb melamig kѳn, kaguende nѳmui maramelan ñim mara traninabelѳbe Jesucristѳn kѳrebelѳ undaaraig nunelѳ gúimba. Iigwane kusrenanѳb, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib waminchig.
Katѳ treetѳwei chigѳben tabig mariilѳgucha tru urastѳ tѳrgandѳ asamdiig kenamisran. Inchen tabig mariilѳ gatѳ mѳi mѳi kenamisrmѳ pѳnrrabikkucha, asiimíig treetѳ gѳrrѳmisrmѳtѳ, kenamisrѳbig kѳn.
Kaig mariilѳ kan utu mѳguelaimbe maig kѳtashchab asamig pumѳwatѳ tѳrgandѳ kenamisrѳbguen indan. Inchen kaig mariilѳ katѳganelaiwane tsѳndatѳsrѳ treeg kuin gúi nebua asiilѳ gѳn..

Chigѳben marѳb pasrѳnrrai wesrawa basrtrab, ke mѳi mѳi tab ashmubendѳbe, mѳigweim bala gѳben, ñui tasiimeran estsarmѳta, nѳmui kaig mariilan ñigucha tѳgatѳ marѳb pasraig webimѳnrraimbe. Chigucha kaig martrab gѳmѳ, tabig chishig basrѳnrrig.
Inchendѳ kaig maramigwan elachimѳ marѳbig marѳbelane ѳyeeg marmumig kѳn cha, mayeelai merrab mur alegamig kѳn, katѳganelѳgucha treegwei marmѳnrrab kѳriimatѳnrrai.

Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Kan wey, tirigun kwattrai itѳbunab megabigwane, mabashig kѳmub pusalgutsamig kѳmѳn cha. Incha gatѳ trenchibig kѳn: Chi maramigwan marѳb megabiibe tru nѳ marѳb megaimburѳ pagar utamigwein gѳn cha.n

Kan ishug Jesucristѳn kѳrebig nui yau piudamera tѳgaguabe, purugub nѳ asamig kѳn, iglesia ke tranrraindѳ muniirab gѳmig kѳmѳnrrai. ѳyamaybe tru piudamera kerriguwan mugucha ashchaptiig chigarwan, maig palabigwan ashib tѳgagѳmig chi palѳmѳnrrun..
Inchabe tru Cristѳn srѳtѳ nebua asha tru nѳba pѳnrrѳnrrab misrig kѳbigwan treeg martrab gaima, k'aigyu pѳnsrailѳ gѳnrrab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Truibe chigѳben t'abig mariilѳyu mu gúi asig kѳmig kѳn: nui uregwan nѳrrѳranѳbig, katѳ mugѳben nui yau pubelan, yaambumay t'ab wamab wabig, katѳ Tiuswei misaamera yau puben, srѳbmeran kwallibig, katѳ chine kaig nebuilѳ melabelan purugub megabig, katѳ chine t'abigwane marѳb megabig treekke.

Pѳs mѳikkѳben nui nѳmmisagwan lata, katѳ nui naachaguelandѳweinguen isua ashmíibe nui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwan wendѳbasraig, katѳganelѳ Tiuswan kѳremeelѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, purab gaikken gѳn.
Trune piuda tru nѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisrѳbig nun maig marѳg kѳbendѳ marѳb pasrabiibe, ѳsig uningucha nѳbe kwaig lataig kѳn..
Inchen piuda tru kerriguwan nѳtѳzhig, yandѳ nѳtѳ gѳrrѳmisraibe, Tiustѳwei purugunrraitamab isua basramisra, yem gwalѳm Tiusba waminchib, purugurrunrrig chib miab megabig megan.
Inchen piudamera kerriguwan nѳmdѳ gѳrrѳmisrar kerrigu mugucha ashchaptiig chigarwane tabig purugunrrig.

Kѳlli misagwane tsakkandѳ namig wamѳmѳtѳ, masken tammaytѳ, wamindamig kѳn, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb megamig kѳn chib, kan mѳskawan lataitѳweingue. Inchen ureeteelane ñui trag nunelѳ gúi lataig indamig kѳn.
Iilandѳ ñiguen tab isub kebya, truigwandѳ martrab pasramisr, Tiusweiwan ñi gatѳguchinguen nebua ashib megaigwan mayeelѳ nebua ashchai.
Na arrumnegatiibe mayeelai merrab, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigwan leb, maig melamigwan treeg marѳb melay chib, kusrenanѳb indamig kѳn.

Incha ѳyeekkurriwei nambe i maramigwane ¡gatѳ! martrab isua marѳb, maig kuingucha kullaarab elachimѳ marѳb melabelѳ guer, kaguende nambe ѳsig wab Tiuswan muniirab melabelѳ gúikkurri, tru mayeelan kaigyugurri Wesrabigwan, nun kѳrebelaneguende wesrabwei inchibigwan.
I trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn, mayeelѳ treeg kuitamab isua chi kashmѳ utamig.

Chi treeg kѳmubendѳ, nѳmdѳ isua chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ wamindiilanba, ishumburmera kѳllizheelѳ kagatѳ ka wamincha mѳriilanba, mѳrѳb pasrѳmumig kѳn. Ñibe masken Tiuswei tabigutѳ marѳbig marѳb meganrrab isu.
Kaguende Tiuswei wamgurrimba, Tiusba wamindikkurrimba tabig chishig kѳnrrai marig kѳn..
Kaguende chiwandѳgucha, Tius nѳ mara pѳnsraibe k'aig kѳmѳ, tabig kѳn. Inchawei Tiuswan mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chib utigwane nambe chiwangucha k'ashmumig kѳn.

Treeg kusrenaniilѳbe tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig isa waminchibelѳ k'a palatѳ tab inchib misaamerainukkurri arrubig kѳn, kѳrig tѳgagѳnrrai tru nѳmui isub kebachib pasrabiibe yandѳ nasrkwailѳ tѳgar, k'an tsandzѳn bachibiitѳga parri latailѳ.

Inchawei mu treeg kѳmѳn chib pѳnrramga, nam Tiusweimburabelan marѳb pѳnrraig mu nebua asiimíig pasrabiibe, purѳ nuig kѳn: Cristѳbe kan mѳg lataig asrbaig kenamisrѳb, Espíritu nune chigucha kalѳ marmíig, tabig kui kenamarig kѳb, katѳ nѳbe ángelesmera asig kѳb, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera wammѳra gѳnrrai wamindig kѳb, yu pirau misaamera nune kѳrewa pѳnrramisrig kѳb, katѳ nune srѳmbalasrѳ tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳ utig kѳb gѳn.n
Na iigwan ñun pѳrar, petѳ ñun ashchab attrab isua..
Iglesiayu tru diácѳnѳsmerabe kan sraindѳ tѳgar gѳmig kѳn, katѳ nѳmui ureemeran tab asam gusreb, nѳmui yaambu chitѳ maramigwan asam gusreb inchibelѳ.m
Tru iglesiayu purugub pѳnrrѳnrrabelane maig kѳtashchab ashibmerrig asiilѳ gѳmig kѳn. Inchen yandѳ chi kѳn damgailѳ gúikkurrimbe, iglesiayu purugunrrab diácѳnѳsmera pѳnrramisrtrun.k

Katѳ diácѳnѳsmera, tru iglesiayu purugunrrai wesrawa pѳnsrailѳ chigucha, mugѳben chine cha asinamѳ mѳguelѳ gѳmig kѳn, chigѳben martrab chippe, ka wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, martrab waminchibelѳ, katѳ vinѳn menrra mucha mutsiirapteelѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳweingue, maramgaigwan mara, ke chincha gѳben an nѳrrѳ gatѳramigwangѳba lamѳwei inchibelѳ.

Tru Tiusweimburabelan asha marѳb pasrabiibe, Tiusweiwan ke mѳi srѳ nebua ashib megabigwan pasramig kѳmѳn, ke purab nuig kurmab inchib guebya, inchippa tru nugwaimandzigwan mѳra basrѳnrrai pasrinuutѳwei kebeñib megamѳnrrai.
Kaguende nui yaambuguen mandѳ maramigwan asam gusremíibe, ¿Tiuswei iglesiayuelane kan mandѳ asha marѳb pasraiasamѳ?
vinѳ menrra mucha mutsiiraptiig kѳmѳwei, kwayam lamig larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, treeg kѳmѳtѳ, purѳ tab inchibig, kwayamigwan gѳmѳ, tab gѳmigwangѳba labig, anwan larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, treeg kѳmig kѳn.
Inchawei i trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Mѳikkѳben Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera pasrѳnrrab isubiibe, t'abigwan marѳb meganrrab isun.
Kaguende Tiusbe srѳsrѳ marѳppe, Adánwanmerrig marig kѳn, trugurrimbe Evan.
Kaguende nabe kan ishuumisaabe kusrenanmѳnrrai inchar, katѳ mѳwan ke nѳ garunrrain gѳmѳweingue. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nilѳtѳ wamig kѳn.
Ishuumisaabe kusreb wappe, nilѳtѳ wamig kѳn, trurrigu maig kѳbendiig inchimѳ nѳmun mѳrѳb..

Katѳ ishumburmeragucha asru keppe, chull ashchai purab tabig kemumig kѳn, maig kemigwan treetѳgue. Pusrugwangucha tamarѳppe, ke purѳ tabig tamarmѳwei indamig kѳn, ѳrѳtѳga, kabe tab sruuzheelѳtѳga. Katѳ keilѳgucha ke purab nѳrrѳweyelѳ guemѳwei indamig kѳn.

Inchawei ѳyeegweyasig nabe Señѳrwei wamwan waminchib kusrenanrrai wesrawa pasrig, katѳ Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig kur, judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameran tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgagѳmigwanba, newan ciertѳnigwanba kusrenanrrai. Iigwan nabe isa waminchimur.
Truibe nѳashib maya misagwan k'aigyugurri wesranrrab nѳ kwaitѳga pagaraig kѳn. Incha iigwane yandѳ ke treeg maramig buben, eshk'ab wamindig kѳbig kѳn.

reymerain gѳben, katѳ nѳrreelѳ misagwan ashib karub purrabelain gѳben. Masken chi isumѳ tab waramdiig, ambumay imay chigucha chi kuin gѳmѳ, Tiusweimburabelan tabig marѳb, chiyutѳgucha mu chi tamgaig waramig kѳnrrai.

Tiuswei mayu amѳñibelѳ guer chibendѳ, nѳmui chigѳben marѳb amѳnaitѳgabe chi ashmeelѳ gúi lataitѳweih marѳbelѳ gѳn, ashikken gѳnrrabgaig kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig marѳbelѳ, larrѳ mѳrmѳ misaamera, chigѳben tabig maramigwane martrabga misaamera gѳn.
judíѳsmera ka nѳmdѳ isua wamindiilѳ tѳgagúilan tru gúindѳ mѳrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳwei, katѳ mѳguelѳ tru newan ciertѳnigugurri tarѳmisrar chi maramigwan nѳmdѳ pѳnsrailan tru gúindѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmѳwei inchai.

Tru Cretasrѳ kan mѳg nѳmui utuig nѳmui tiusmeraiwan waminchibiitѳwei nѳm tѳgagúima trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Cretasrѳ misaamerabe chu uraskucha isa waminchiptѳ warabelѳ, animal lataitѳguen gѳmѳ purab gailѳ, kan mabgucha ¡gatѳ! mamburab mabelѳ, trurrigu pѳgѳlelѳ gѳn cha.

Kaguende nѳm maig martrab chippe, ke purab purab pѳnrramisrѳbelѳ gѳben, wamdѳ nigarmera gѳben, katѳ may wamincha ka kegѳrrѳsrkѳbelѳ gѳben truba nѳrrѳ gѳn. Tru treeg inchibelѳbe judíѳsmera tru asru circuncidawarmera, truilѳrre mas inchibelѳ gѳn.

Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, mugѳben nui yau pubelane yaambumay wamѳnrrab muniitѳ wabig kѳmig kѳn. Tabigwane undaguig, maig unamigwan isua mѳra uñibig, sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbig, Tiusweimburabelѳyu newan tabig uñibig, asr mumay srua itanmaptѳ uñmíig kѳmig kѳn.

Tiusweiwan pera marѳb pasrabiibe mugѳben chi kѳn dainanrrabgaig, kan sraindѳ tѳgaig, katѳ ureemeragucha Jesuclistѳn kѳrebelѳ tѳgaig kѳmig kѳn, nѳmun maig marѳb amѳñig kѳben amѳñibelѳ gѳn chib wamindinabelѳ, kabe mѳrmeelѳ larrѳ gailѳ gѳn chib wamindinabelѳ treeg ureg kѳmѳtѳ.

I kilgawan ñi Titѳn pѳrar, nam pailѳba namui isubigwan k'anguelarrѳtѳ Jesucristѳinug pasra tѳgaig, ñi nai trag nusrk'ai lataigwan. Namui Tius Mѳsk'aimba, Cristѳ Jesús namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabiiba, nui k'a yandѳ tab indigwan gѳben, chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan gѳben ñun tranrraimab isur.

Na Pablѳ Tiusweiwan marѳb megabig, Jesucristѳ nѳashib karua ѳrig kur, Tius nѳ lawa wesruilan, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrramigwanba, katѳ tru newan ciertѳnigwan nebua asamigwanba na purugub pasrѳnrrai, tru Tiusweimburab t'abig amѳnamigumay amrrai marѳb pasrabigwan.
Ñibe iilan waminchig ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib, ѳyeeg maramibe kalѳ gѳn chib, marmѳtay chib. Waminchippe, mu mandamgaig waminchig, ñun mu kaashib gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳgue.

Kaguen nѳbe nѳashib namuyasig kwaig kѳn, chigurrimbunѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳigugurri wesranrrappa, k'atѳ kerrigu newan chishelѳ, nui misag sѳtѳmera nuyasiitѳ gѳnrrai martrappa, k'atѳ tabig maramigwane marmѳ gѳmѳ martrab inchibelѳ gѳnrrai.

Inchen tru ka yandѳ tab indiibe mѳi ya nam ѳsig warain gwalѳm, isua mѳra misaasun amѳnamig kѳnrraimba, maig kѳnrrabigwan tabig sѳlgandѳ maramig kѳnrraimba, Tiuswan maikkucha pesannamѳ tabig amѳnamig kѳnrraimba kusrenanѳbig kѳn, Tiusweimburab trѳmbѳig kaig maramelanba, chigѳben ke trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳtanmaptѳ marmumigwanbabe yandѳ elachar gѳmig kѳnrrai

katѳ chigѳben tsѳgѳl inchipteelѳ gѳmѳ, masken newan chi isumgaig tabig marѳbelѳ gúi asiilѳ gѳnrraimba, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabigwei tabig kusrenanigwan nѳm chi marigutѳgucha purѳ tab gúi asig kѳrrѳmisrtrai..

katѳ waminchibgucha wamindamgailan waminchimѳwei, mu ѳyeeg kalѳ gѳn damgaig waminchib kusrenanrrig. Tru namun tsalѳ gúin bѳnrrabelѳguen namun mѳigwandѳgucha chi chaguen kaig waminchab gaima, kѳrig misraguen gѳrrѳmisrtrai.
Katѳ matsѳrelan chigucha ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳb gѳmig kѳn chib, isua mѳra amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai waminchig.

Ñi chiyutѳgucha t'abig mariilѳyu nѳmguen trunun asha kusrenrrai marѳb kenamar. Incha ñui kusrenanamigu ñibe kusrenanѳppe, maig kusrenanamigwan isa gѳmѳ sѳlwan gusrenanѳb, ka indzab marѳb lat'aig kѳmѳtѳ t'ab gusrenanѳb,

tab isua mѳra amѳnamigwan, chi kaig marmѳ chishig amѳnamigwan, nѳmui yaambu chi maramelan asha marѳb purrabelѳ gѳmigwan, tab inchibelѳ gѳmigwan, nѳmui kelѳ maig chiben treeg melamigwan waminchibelѳ gѳnrrai, Tiuswei wamwan chi tabig kѳmѳn chib kaig wamindig kѳmѳnrraingue..
ѳyamay nѳmbe tru kelѳbar ureetѳ ishumburmeran: isua mѳra misaasun amѳnamigwan, nѳmui kelan, nѳmui uregwan undaguelѳ gѳmigwan,

Mѳguelѳ kѳlleelѳbe chigѳben incha ashmѳ, maig pѳnrramigwan bѳnrrabelѳ gѳnrraimba, mugѳben chine cha asinab pѳnrrѳmeelѳ gѳnrraimba, isua mѳra misaasun amѳñibelѳ gѳnrraimba, isubigwan Jesucristѳinug basra tѳgagúigwane chi kaiba lindiimíig chishig tabig tѳgagѳnrraimba, undag kѳbigwan tѳgar gѳnrraimba, chine pub arringucha melabig melѳnrraimba waminchig.

Mayeelѳba naba amѳñibelѳbe tab ka amѳñigueh cha wam ѳran. Nam lataitѳwei nѳmui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrrѳwa namun undaarabelan ka amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrig. Tius nui ka yandѳ tab indiibe ñim mayeelѳba pasrѳnrrun.m
Pѳs chigѳben ke purugumdiig pub arruben treegu purugunrrab, namuielѳgucha tabig maramigwane kusreb ambamig kѳn, ke chigucha marmeelѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ.n
Artemaswan gúi, kabe Tíquicѳn gúi ñuimay na ѳrene, Nicópѳlissrѳmay nan ashchab, petѳ attrab inchunrrig. Kaguende nabe tru pishim bѳlmerawane trusrѳ tsunrrab inrrab isur.

Mѳikkѳben Tiuswei ureemeran nѳѳrѳ gatѳgan sѳtѳ marѳb uñibigwane ѳyeebe maramig kѳmѳn chib kan pamaygatig wama wamincha, wamindigwan mѳrѳg kѳmui inchene, yandѳ treeg mѳwane chi asamig kaanrrai tarѳmisramig kѳn.

I trendaibe chi isumgaig isig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Inchawei iigwan waminchippe marmѳ gѳmѳ, treeg martrai waminchig Tiuswan kѳrewa bѳnrrabelѳbe chigѳben tabig maramelangѳba marѳb melѳnrrab inchai. Kaguende tru iig tabig maliilѳbe misagwan truba tabig purugunrrabig kѳn.

Nui k'a yandѳ tab indiitѳga namune chi k'aig kѳmeelѳ lataig tabig kѳrrѳmara, ketigwan utѳnrrab ureemera gѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, nam tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrurmab isua munig melaig truig maig kѳben treeg.
Nѳbe Espíritu Santѳn tѳgagѳmburab tѳgagѳnrrai namuim bala ѳrig kѳn, namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabig Jesucristѳgurri.
mugѳben gatѳganun chi kaig waminchimeelѳ gѳnrraimba, kwayam lapteelѳ gѳmѳtѳ, masken tab inchibelѳ gѳnrraimba, maig kѳbash inchimѳ, mu misaamerandѳgucha tabig marѳbelѳ gѳnrraimba..
tru nam isua munig melaig mayanguen tabigwan muniirab melappe, Jesucristѳ tru namui purѳ nu Tius namun Kaigyugurri Wesrabigwei tѳrguegwalmabig kenamisramigwan muniirab..
Kaguende tru Tiuswei ka yandѳ tab indiibe maya misaamera ashchai kenamislin gѳn, tru kaigyugurli webambamig kѳnrrai.

Katѳ treetѳwei ishumburmera kѳlleelѳbe, Tiuswei ureemerasun maig amѳnamigwan amѳñibelѳ gѳnrraimba, wam gusrab wamniga llirapteelѳ, vinѳ mutsamigwan larrѳ chullelѳ gѳmѳnnrraimba, tabigwane katѳganelanguen kusrenanѳbelѳ gѳnrraimba waminchig.m
Trune ñibe waminchippe, tru chi kalѳ gѳmѳ tabig kusrenanig, truig maig kѳben treegwan waminchig..

Chi trѳmbѳig isumeelѳ chishig tabig isubelaimbe chitѳgucha tabig chishig kѳn. Trune Tiuswan chigucha kѳremeelѳ, larrѳ rrѳmbѳig isubelaimbe chigucha chi tabig chishiibe chi gaagѳn. Kaguende nѳmui turyu isubiiba, isub kebachib basrabiiba truilѳbaguen larrѳ rrѳmbѳig mindiilѳ tѳgar gѳn.

Truig trencha wamindiibe isa gѳmѳ, sѳlwei wamindig kѳn. Inchawei nѳmune waminchippe mѳrmѳ gѳmѳ, mѳrtrai mur waminchig, tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinug basra tѳgagѳmigwan chi kaiba lindiimíig chishig tabig tѳgagúigwane,

Inchawei treelane waminchib gѳmѳnrrai mera, nѳmui trigwane kandѳ gasra basramig sѳl gѳn. Kaguende chi maramíig mara an nѳrrѳ tѳgamisrѳg kѳb, ke yaba, yaba yandѳ mandѳgucha gѳmuielѳ melѳnrrai mara gѳrrѳmarѳb amrrun, chi kusrenanamgailan kusrennѳb.k

Tiuswei wamwan chi isumgaig ciertѳnigwan maig kusrenanigwane, tindѳga basrabig kѳmig kѳn, chi kalѳ gѳmѳ tabig kusrenaniitѳga katѳganelan maig maramigwan treeg maray chib wamindamiba, katѳ kalѳ maran chibgѳba waminchibelan, nѳmguen galѳ marѳbelѳ gúin gúi nebua ashchai wamindamiba..

Kaguende Tiusweimburabelan ashib pera pasrabiibe ѳyeeg kѳn dainanrrabgaig kѳmig kѳn. Ke nѳ maig taigwandѳ, martrai inchibig kѳmѳwei, kuchigurrindѳ ke chinsraatѳ inchib namabig kѳmѳwei, mutsiiraptiig kѳmѳwei, kwayam lamig larrѳ chullig kѳmѳwei, ke maramgailan marѳb, an nu gatѳramigwangѳba chullig kѳmѳwein gѳmig kѳn.

Na ñun tru Cretasrѳ kѳrrѳmarѳppe, trusrѳ tru chi maramelѳ lutѳ gѳrrѳmisriilan lutѳgurri tab tamarѳb kerrigu chab patsѳ gѳnrraimba, katѳ pueblѳmѳrig iglesiamerayu Tiusweiwan pera marѳb pѳnrrѳnrrabelѳ wesrawa bѳnsrѳnrrai, ñune trusrѳ treeg kѳrrѳmarig kѳn, na ñun maig martrai karuigwan treeg martrai.m
Inchen mѳimbe yandѳ truigwan maram gwalѳmmera pubene, Tius namui Kaigyugurri Wesrabig nan martrai karua basren, trunun na eshkab kusrennen, nui wambe yandѳ truyu kenamisran..
Clistѳ Jesúskurli tru kailan keeli yau naba pasrabig Epafraskucha ñimun tab ka amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
Inchippa ñun chigѳben kalѳ mara gúin gúi, kabe chigѳben ulѳ misra gúin gѳb chigѳbene, trube, trunun na ashchab, nan ulѳ bayrrunrlig.
Inchawei ñi naba lincha marѳbig kuabe, trube, nune nan utab lataig uta tѳgagѳrrunrrig.
ѳnésimѳ kan maya yanagatig ñun ѳyeeg tarѳmisrѳppe, katѳle managatig ñi nun yandѳ tѳgagѳrrѳmisramig kѳnrrab gua, ѳyeeg tarѳmislig kuitamab isur.
Incha nabe gatѳle nune ñuimay ѳrar, tru nai manrraugurri undaaraigwan.
ѳnésimѳbe merrappe chigucha gѳmíig kѳbig kuig, mѳimbe ñuyasig lata, nayasig lata, chiyutѳgucha ke nѳ burugub megabig misrin gѳn.
Inchawei nabe Cristѳgurri mu chi chinrraingaig, ñi maig maramigwan treegwan martrai k'arua basramig tѳgagѳbendѳ,

Kaguende nane truba rruba kasrag kѳb, truba tab gúig kuig kѳn, tru ñui undag kѳbikkurri. Kaguende Tiuswei misaamerai manrrѳmerabe, ñigurri pishindѳ tab gúig kasraatѳ pѳnrrѳnrrai marin gѳn, ñi nai nuneg.
Tiusba waminchippe, chu urastѳgucha ungwa, ungwa chibig kur ñun isub.
Ñimun ashib pera bѳnrrabelѳ mayeelanba, k'atѳ mayeelѳ Tiuswei misaameranba tab k'a amѳñigueh tan chirrunrrigay. Katѳ italiasreelѳgucha ñimune tab k'a amѳñigueh cha ѳran.
Namui nuneg Timѳteѳbe kailan keeri yaugurri webyain gúi ñim wammѳra gѳnrrai inchar. Incha nѳ petѳ arrubene, nabe nѳba ñimun ashchab arrumѳnrrun..

tru nѳ maig maramig balai waigwan martrai chigurrimbunѳ tabig balabigwan ñimun tranrrun, Tius nѳ purѳ tab gúi ashib wamig kѳnrrai Jesucristѳgurri namuinug nѳ marѳb basraitѳga. Jesucristѳne managatig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrun. Treeg kѳnrrun.
Nabe ke tiusmanda Tiuswan miab gѳrrunrrigay chinrrab inchar, na peba ñimuisrѳmay gatѳle arrumig kѳnrrai..
Namuimburab ñim Tiuswan miarrunrrigay. Pѳs nambe namui isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigar bѳnrrab, katѳ chiyutѳgucha nambe t'abig marѳb melѳnrrab isua meler.

Inchawei Señѳr Jesucristѳgurri chu urastѳgucha Tiuswan nam animal gweecha lataig tranѳppe, purѳ tabzhig wamindiilѳ trangun, nui munchiwan tabig wamindi wam tru trigugurri webarrubiitѳga.Ñimbe tabig maramigwanba, ñim chi tѳgagúigwan pirishib gѳmigwanbabe pesannanrrab gѳmѳ melay. Kaguende kweecha tranѳb lataitѳwei Tiuswan keta traniilѳ ѳyeeg traniilѳbe nѳ purѳ tab gúi wanrrai marѳbig, treeg kѳn..
Inchawei namgucha nuimay nun katѳnrrab webamgun ciudayugurri wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ, nun maig trѳmbѳig indinab megaigwan namgucha treetѳwei kaig marinab melѳnrrab.k
Inchawei treetѳwei Jesúskucha ciuda yaskabyugurli wambig nѳѳrѳsrѳ kwaig kѳbig kѳn, nui anindѳga Tiusweindѳ gѳnrrai misaameran chish martrab.
Nambe kan altar tѳgaguer tru Tiuswei carpa ya tabzhigu marѳb pѳnrrab sacerdѳtesmerabe tru altaryuigwane mamig kѳmíig..

Tiuswei wamwan ñimun waminchib, ñimun pera marѳb pѳnrrabelane isua gѳmig kѳn. Nѳmui tru tabig amѳnaigu asha kusrenrrai mandѳ tabig kѳrrѳmalig kѳbigwan tab isua asha, tru nѳm isubigwan Jesuclistѳinug pasra mandѳ tѳgagúigwane treetѳweih tѳgaguy.

Ñim amѳñippe, anwane ke chinchimmѳrѳ chull inchib amѳñimѳtѳ, ñim mѳi maig tѳgagúitѳgatѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb kasraatѳ amѳnamig kѳn. Kaguende Tiusbe trendaig kuig kѳn: Managuen ñundѳ elachimѳwei, chinchibgucha tsunrrai managuen ñun tarѳmisrmѳwei indamѳnrrun cha.
Katѳ kailan keeri yau purrabelane ñimbe nѳmba kanbalatѳ keerig purrѳwa lataitѳwei isub, katѳ kaig indinab melabelane ñimun rreeg indi lataig isumig kѳn.
Kaguende namui Tiusbe kan nag lat'aig kѳn, chigucha kѳrrѳmisrtraingaig barrѳbig.

Inchawei tru nam ashib tѳga burramig tru kѳnѳgagutsamgaigwan nambe utab gúig kѳbene, nambe mayanguen ungwa, ungwa chigun, Tiuswan tab gúi wanrrai marѳppe, nun kѳriibala tabig waminchib, kan yeeg tabig kѳnrrabmab isub.n

Tru Mѳisés tsub urassrѳma Tiuswei wamdѳgabe pirѳwane kѳnѳgagutsig kuibe, mѳimbe ѳyamay maramѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn: Nabe gatѳle pirѳwane kѳnѳgagutsamѳnrrun cha, trurrigu pirѳwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, srѳmbalameranbañau.

Katѳ tru srѳ acuerdѳ marigwan misagweimburѳ purѳbasramisrѳbig Jesúswangucha kemalla bѳnrrab, katѳ tru Abelwei ani tru kaig marѳbigwan ñi, Tius, ulѳ bay chib, ani lat'aikken gѳmѳtѳ, Jesúswei tru ani itѳtsurig mas purѳ t'abig tru kaig marѳbigwan ulѳ baymѳ, ñi, Tius, pesannau chib waminchib aniyu kemalla bѳnrran ñimbe.

Ñimbe treegu kemalla bѳnrrѳmѳtѳ, mѳimbe ñimuimburappe tru Sión Tun dainug, ѳsig wab Tiuswei ciudasrѳ, srѳmbala Jerusalénsrѳ, muguen mundzamgaig ángelesmera tulundzuna kasrag purraisrѳ, treegu kemalla bѳnrran.
Katѳ ñimbe tru trѳmpeta mur wanrrѳbigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kan wam wamindiilan mѳrtrab kemallmѳwei indig kѳn. Inchen tru wam wamindiilan mѳrѳbelѳma: Tiusmanda yandѳ waminncha chibelѳ gѳn,

Pѳs ñimbe, israelitasmera Sinaí Tunyu kemalla bѳnrrab latawei, kan nu tun katѳramdiigu nagurѳmera naarabig tѳgaigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kabe lѳstiig, tru purѳ rrѳmbѳ lѳstiigu kemalla gѳmѳwei, kabe kѳrig kѳmdiig isig ichibigu kemalla gѳmѳwein gѳn.

Mugucha mѳg lata ishug lata trѳmbѳig marѳb uñchab gѳmѳwei, kabe Tiusweimburabigwane chigucha gѳmui lataig inchibig gѳmѳwein guy, tru Esaú latawei. Truima kan mamig nindagweindѳ kan mayѳr nusrkai maig tѳgagѳmigwan yanig kѳn.
Katѳ ñim tab punab ambamig kѳnrrai putur maymeran ѳlmaray, tru ñimui kѳrriindi srѳb wetunshimѳ, tammisrtrai.
Inchawei ñimui kwalmera kullaarailan chishmisrtrai kѳnѳgѳb, ñimui tѳmmera itѳnapteelan gatѳle mur misrtrai maray.

Namui mѳskalѳma nam mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai nѳmbe kan maya yanagatiitѳ namun kusrenanѳb tѳgagѳbelѳ gѳbig kѳn, nѳmun maig maramdiig kѳben, treeg. Trune Tiusbe nam mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai kusrennѳppe namunguen t'ab gѳnrrai maran, nѳ newan t'abig kuigwan namgucha tѳgagѳnrrai.
Inchen tru kanelѳ mayeelѳ mur bѳnrram gusrenrrai kusrenniilѳ latawei ñimun kusrenniimeelѳ gúisruandѳbe, trube, Tiuswei trag nusrkalѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ka menda ureemera gúin gѳnrrun..
Kaguende tru nui undaaraigwane Señѳrbe nune mur basram gusrenrrai kusrennѳb, mundѳgucha nui nusrkain gúitamab isua tѳgagúigwane nѳbe kalѳ marigwan ѳlmartrab murba rranѳbig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn..
Pѳs tru kaig mariiba ñim kwayab melaigu, ñimbe gatѳgucha ñimui aniwan lusamnegatiibe mara bѳnrrѳmѳn..

namui kaptѳgabe Jesúswan ashib, tru nѳmerrig treegwan pera marѳb, katѳ tru namui isubigwan nuinug pasra tѳgagúigwan newanig kѳnrrai marѳb inchibigwan. Pѳs Jesúsbe nѳ pumsrѳ kasrag kѳmdiig pasrabigwan asha basraikkurri kurusyu mesraig kweetsig kwamigwan awent'awa, tru kѳrig marinab pasramigwan chi trunun isua ashmѳtѳ, truyu puraya, Tius wamisra wainug kusrmaygatѳmay wamisrig kѳn.
Kaguende Tiusbe nѳmui lata gѳmѳ, namuyasiibe purѳ tabig tѳgagúig kua, tru nѳmbe namba k'anbalatѳ misratѳwei tru newan tabig kѳnrrai indig kuig kѳn.

ѳyeeg tab misaameran yu pirau misaamera nѳmun tѳgagѳmibe nѳmbe purѳ nu balabelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Nѳmbe mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ, nѳrrѳ tunmerawansrѳ chu bumgúinguen mѳrmeelѳ amѳñibelѳ gѳn, nѳrrѳ srug yaambumerasrѳ, lendegѳrrab pirѳrrabmerasrѳ, ѳyeesrѳ kebamba warab.
Inchen katѳganelѳbe kaig marѳb indza ashib srua gúinab, ichabetinab, cadenastѳga luslinab, kailan keeli yau merrarrawa keelinab melabelѳ gѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri ishumburmera nѳmui kwabelan k'atѳle ѳsiiraniilѳ utabelѳ kuig kѳn. Inchen mѳilѳbe kwamnegatig purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb srua gúinabelѳ gѳn, elatchab indingucha, elatchamamѳtѳ, k'aguende nѳmbe k'atѳle ѳsiirawa srѳmbalasrѳ purѳ tabigwan nebunrrab isubelѳ gua.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri katѳganelѳ nѳm ashib karub tѳgagúigwan nѳm kanab, tabig sѳlgandѳ maig maramigwan marѳb, Tius trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriilan nebua utab, leónmerai triimeran kasrѳb indig kѳn..

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurli tru Rahab, nui asrwan anwei yanѳb ishuuma, tru mѳrmѳ misaameraba kanbalatѳ nѳgucha kwamuig kѳn, kaguende tru pailѳ israelitasmera maisrѳn gѳtashchab nilѳ ashchab amrrubelan tab wamab utikkurli.
Isubigwan Tiusweinug basra tѳgagúikkurri israelitasmerabe Mar Rѳjѳyu kan trendѳ puryu lataig larraambig kѳn. Inchen egipciѳsmeragucha larramrrab inchen, pi katѳle itѳgasrѳben, chab gwaig kѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Mѳisésbe Egiptѳ biraugurri webyaig kѳn, rey maya namikkѳlig waingucha. Inchen trunun kѳrmѳtѳ, nѳbe webya inrrab kandѳ isua basraig kѳn, kaguende tru kaptѳgabe nebua asiimѳ Tiuswan yandѳ ke asha lat'aikken basraig kѳppe.
Mѳisésma isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri yandѳ kѳlig misrabe, tru Faraónwei nimbasrwei nusrkain gѳn cha wamig kѳmigwan kaasig kѳn.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug basra tѳgagúikkurri Mѳiséswei mѳskalѳma Mѳiséswane larrѳ tab unѳzhig kui asha, pѳn bѳl ѳrѳba nun sѳra tѳgagúig kѳn, tru Faraón Egiptѳ birau rey tru kwetchai karua basrigwan chi kѳriimatѳmѳtѳ.

Jacѳbma isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri yandѳ kwanrrab wawa, Jѳséwei uregwan kanun ganun mayanguen tabig nebunrrai mara, nui pѳtѳnain tsigwan pѳtѳnawa basramisra, Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibig kѳn..
Kaguende Abrahambe isua basrabig kѳn, Tiusbe kwailai utugurringuen gatѳle kusrumig maramburab marѳbig kui. Pѳs kwailai utugurri gatѳle ѳsiiraig lataig kui mara Isaacwane treeg utig kѳn..
Abrahamwane: Tru ñuinukkurri amrrub misaamerane Isaackurrin gѳnrrabelѳ gѳn cha, Tiusbe ѳyeeg t'aig kѳbig kuindѳgucha.

Inchendѳ nѳmbe treeg marmѳtѳ, waramig katѳgan birѳ mas purѳ tabigwan tѳgagѳnrrab isub pѳnrraig kѳn, truibe tru srѳmbalasriigwan. Treekkurri Tiusbe chi kѳrig kuin gѳmѳn nѳmui Tius kѳn daig kѳmig, pѳs nѳbe nѳmuyasig kan ciuda tamarig kua..
Inchen ѳyamay waminchibelѳbe tru gatѳgan birѳ nѳmuin gѳnrrabigwan lab ambubelѳ gúi, nѳmbe tѳrgandѳ asamig kenamaran.

Inchen i misaamerabe mayeelѳba isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúigutѳ amѳnaig kѳn nѳmui kwam gwalѳmgatig. Tius tru nѳmun trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriilane utѳmuindѳgucha, Tius trannrrab misrig nuisrѳ pѳnrrabelan yabsrѳngurrindѳ ke kan asha lataig kasraarabelѳ gѳn, nambe srѳmbalasreelѳ, peesreelѳ gua, yu piraube ka petѳweindѳ warer chib, tѳrgandѳ trenchib waminchib.k

Abrahambe nѳbe yandѳ maya kѳllig kuatѳgucha isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri unѳtiig latawei chish kѳmigwan utig kѳbig kѳn unѳ mѳskain gѳnrrab, (Sarabe ureg tѳgagѳnrrab gaimabig kuindѳgucha), kaguende tru trannrrab misrѳbig Tiusbe tru trannrrab misrigwane tranmѳ gѳmѳ, trannrrab gúi, Abrahambe treeg isua tѳga basraig kua.n

Nѳbe isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri nuin gѳnrrai tru trannrrab misrim birau Abrahambe ka peesrѳngurri arruatѳ lat'aig, kan peg birau lat'aitѳ tsuig kѳbig kѳn, nun ket'a tranigwandѳwei ut'abelѳ tru Isaacba, Jacѳbpa, truilѳ lat'aitѳwei kan carpa yamerayu.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Nѳéma chi asiimíig attrabigwan isua gѳnrrai Tius eshkabenma, nun truba kѳriitѳga arcan marѳbig kѳn, nui yauelѳ kwamѳ, ѳsig webamrrai. Nѳébe tru ѳyeeg mariitѳga pirau maya misagwan kailѳgurri Tius mѳra pѳnrrѳnrrai mariilѳ gѳbash cha kѳrrѳmara, chi kaig kѳmíig lat'aig Tius t'abig kѳrrѳmarig kѳmigwan nѳbe utig kѳn, tru isubigwan nuinug pasra tѳgagúigugurri arrubigwan.

Isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurri Enѳcwane yu piraugurri Tius srua iben, nѳbe tru kwab tamigwane maig kѳbig kui mѳrmuig kѳn. Incha nune wetѳrranrrab gaimaig kѳbig kѳn, k'aguende Tius srua yaig kua. Pѳs nun srua yaig kѳmѳwatѳ, nѳbe wamindinabig kѳn, Tiuswan tab gúi wanrrai marѳb mѳg kѳn cha.
Pѳs isubigwan Tiusweinug pasra tѳgagúikkurli kerligu chi kѳbigwane Tius nui wamdѳga mara baslig kѳbig kuin gúi wetѳgѳrra bѳnrrer. Inchawei kaptѳga asiibe chi asiimíigugurli mara baslig kѳn.
Inchendѳ nambe tru pinisailѳ gѳnrrab kѳriimat'a tru wendѳmay ambupteelѳgucha gѳmѳtѳ, isubigwan Cristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgarmera kaigyugurri wesrailѳ, truilѳ guer.
Inchendѳ tru sѳlgandѳ tabig naimbe nui isubigwan nainuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurli ѳsig uñchun cha. Inchen nѳ kѳliimata wendѳmay yabe, trube, nѳbe nane tab gúi wanrrai martraamѳn cha.
Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn, pѳs kan maya yanazhigutѳ, tru attrabiibe attrun cha. Chi srarrѳnrraamѳn cha.n
Inchawei ñim ke Tiusweinuutѳ kemenda pѳnrraigwane elachippa amrrab gѳmѳ, kaguende truibe purѳ nuig tabig utamig kѳnrrabigwan tѳgaig kѳn.m
Ñimune kanmaymerawane maya misaamerai merrab indza asamig chine marinab, kaig indinab, katѳganelan gatѳ ѳyeetѳwei marѳb srua gѳben, ñimgucha treegutѳwei tѳga buraambub lincha bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn.
ѳsig wab Tiuswei tasku kebenamibe si, ¡purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig kѳn!

Kaguende nambe ѳyeeg chib Tiuswan ashibelѳ guer: Kaig marѳbigwan mѳra meganrrai maramigwane na maramig kѳben, truburѳ pagarwane na bagaramѳnrrun chibigwan. Katѳ treekkucha taig kѳn: Nui misagwan maig maramigwan asha gѳrrѳmarѳppe, Señѳr nѳ asha gѳrrѳmartrun cha.k
Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés karua basligwan mѳrmѳ, kaashibigwanma pailѳ gúi, pѳneelѳ gúi kalѳ maran chibelѳ werrubene, chigucha lastima asiimíig truibe kwamig kѳbig kѳn.

Nambe kanbalatѳ linchib Tiusweiwan marѳb tulundzunamigwane elachimugun, tru mѳilѳgѳben amrrug kѳmub elachib guebambubelѳ latawei. Treeg inchimѳtѳ, kangurrin gangurri ѳyamay melѳgun chib puruguyagun tru Cristѳ Arrum gwalѳm yandѳ pub arri ashabe, masken rraatѳ melab..
Inchawei k'anikkurri k'anikkurri puruguyamigwan isua asiyagun, undag kѳbigwan tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrai martrappa, chigѳben tabig maramig kѳnrrai martrappa.

nambe namui manrraube chi sѳra gѳmѳ k'andѳ isub Tiuswan kemallgun, isubigwan Cristѳinug pasrigwan chi kѳrmѳ tѳga, k'aig isub kebachib pasrabig tѳga manrrѳmeran chishmartrab anindѳga itѳtsura, chish bizhiitѳga namui asrwan chish marague.
Inchawei, nai nunelѳ, santuariѳ marinug srѳmbalasrѳ Señѳr Jesúswei aningurri chigucha chi kѳrig isumѳ kebambamig tѳgaguer,
Inchawei iilan yandѳ chi ulѳ bayamig kѳmíig kѳrrѳmarene, tru ka i mariilaimburѳbe keta tranamig yandѳ chi palѳmѳn..
Katѳ Espíritu Santѳgucha treeg kѳn cha namun truigweimburab eshkawabe, ѳyeemerrig chibig kѳn:
Trune Jesucristѳbe kaig mariilaimburѳ nѳ kwawa, kan bijitѳ managatigweyasig nui asrwan trana, Tiuswei kusrmaygatѳmay wamisrig kѳn.
Tius tru maig kѳnrrain gѳben treegu nambe nuindѳ gѳnrrai t'arѳmariilѳ guer, Jesucristѳ nui asrwan ket'a trana, treeg marikkurri, tru kan bijitѳ managatigweyasig kwaitѳga.

Tru srѳtѳ yu wendau chibgunrrig: Ñibe kweecha traniilan lat'a, ketig traniilan lat'a, parra ket'a traniilan lat'a, kaig mariilaimburѳ traniilan lat'a ut'ag kѳmui inchib, ñune chigucha chi t'abig asѳnamuig kѳn cha, (tru ѳyeelan traniilѳbe tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrig maig kѳben treeg traniilѳ gúingucha).
Inchen nabe ñun trendaig kѳn cha: Nabe yu pasrar cha, nai Tius, ñi maig maramig palai waben, na trunun martrab, tru librѳyu naimburab maig pѳrig basrѳben, treeg.n
Kaguende tѳrѳureemerai animba, mѳg cabramerai animbabe tru kaig mariilan chi kerranrrab gaimabig kѳn.
Inchendѳ tru animalmera gweecha pilayu bilayu tranѳb gúilѳbe kaig maligwan gatѳgucha tѳgar guermab isungarubig kѳn.

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳliibe tru wendѳsrѳ ciertѳnig attrabigwan ѳyeeg kuitamab asamig ka tre lataig asѳnabiitѳ gúig kѳn, ke truilѳbe gѳmuindѳgucha. Incha ѳyeekkurli chu urastѳgucha gatѳ pilamѳlig, pilamѳlig animal gweecha traniilѳ trutѳ rrutѳ marѳb melaitѳgabe newan tabelѳ gѳnrraimbe managuen treeg martrab gaimabig kѳn, tru Tiuswan tabig waminchib ѳyamay maliilѳtѳga kemallibelane.
Misaamerane kan bijitѳ kwamig kѳnrrai mara basrig kѳn. Inchen tru wendaube yandѳ maig kѳnrrabigwan asha gѳrrѳmarig kѳmig, truig attrun.

Incha Cristѳ tru sacerdѳtesmera lataitѳwei maramig kui kuimbe, tru pirѳwan mara pasrinukkurrimbunѳ k'atѳ gatѳ kwamig nebubsruig kuinrrun. Incha mѳi ya kerriguwan srabe gwalѳmmerawan nѳbe k'an bijitѳ managatigwei kenamisrin gѳn, tru nѳashib kwaitѳga k'aig mariilan patsѳga basrtrab.

Kaguende Cristѳbe tru santuariѳ ciertѳnig maig kѳben mѳguelѳ ka tre lataig asѳnabig mara basrinuutѳ guebimѳtѳ, nѳbe srѳmbalasrѳngue kebyaig kѳn, mѳi ya namuyasig Tiuswei merrab purѳwaminchib wanrrab..
Incha gatѳ treetѳwei tru carpa yawan lata, Tiusweimburab marѳb pѳnrraigu nѳm chigѳben marѳb lutѳgurli srua bѳnrrailan lata, tru anindѳga itѳ tsurѳbig kѳn.
trenchibig kѳn: I anin gѳn cha, tru acuerdѳ marigwan yandѳ treeg marig kѳrrѳmisrtrai marѳbiibe, ñim martrai Tius nѳ karua basrig..
Inchawei yandѳ tru testamentѳ mara kѳrrѳmaliibe trunun mara kѳrrѳmarѳbig kwabendѳwei tru pѳliibe maig taig treeg pub attrun, tru kwamѳwatѳ gѳmѳtѳ.
Pѳs mѳikkѳben kan test'amentѳ marigweimburabma, truigwan marѳbig kwan cha kilgamerayu yandѳ treeg eshkabendѳwei truyu pѳriibe maig t'aig treeg pub attrun.

treetѳguen gѳmѳtѳ ¡tru Espílitu Santѳ managatig pasrabig, truikkurli Clistѳ Tiuswei merrab newan chishchig nѳashib tranѳbigwei animbe namui isub kebachib pasrabigu kaig maliilѳ kwamyumay srua ibig pѳnrrabigwan chishmarmѳnrraitarru, nam ѳsig Wab Tiusweyasig marѳb pѳnrramig kѳnrrai!

Nѳbe tru Kerriguwan Tiusweindiig Kѳnrrain cha marin gwartuyu kebippe, kan bijitѳ managatigweyasig kebyaig kѳn, mѳg cabramerai aniwan srua gѳmѳwei, tѳrѳureemerai aniwan srua gѳmѳweingue. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nui anindѳgatѳwei kebya, ѳyamay nuielѳ gѳnrrai misagwan managatig kaigyugurri wesrabig kѳn.m

Inchen tru chinetѳ purѳ tabig pѳnrrabigwei Cristѳ, tru Maya Sacerdѳtesmeran Nѳ Garub Sacerdѳte arruppe, tru merrab carpa ya lata gѳmѳ, purѳ nuig, trurrigu newan tabigu kebyaig kѳn, mu task'a marig, yu pirauig kѳmíigu.

Iig ѳyeeg marig pasrabiibe tru mѳi ѳyan gwalѳmwei ѳyan gѳnrrabig kѳn cha eshkanrrabig kuig kѳn, Tiuswan tru keta tranѳb, katѳ animal gweecha Tiuswan tranѳb, ѳyamay nun kѳriibala tabig waminchib marѳbelane nѳmui isub kebachib pasrabigwan newan chish martrab kaimabig kuin gúi ashchai.

Trune tru umbusrѳ tru Kerliguwan Tiusweindiig Kѳnrrain cha malin gwartuyube pilayutѳ kebyamig kѳn, tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte nѳtѳ aningaig kѳmѳtѳ, ani srua, trutѳga nuyasiitѳwei tranamiba, katѳ chugúi mѳrmѳwa misaamera kaig maliilaimburѳ tranamibague.

Inchen tru caja balabe querubinmera Tiuswei tru tѳrguegwalmabig pasrai asamig treeg bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn, tru israelitasmera kaig mariilan Tius nѳ ulѳ bayiimíig kѳnrrai marinug nѳmui kwaldzariimeran trubalawan larrѳbicha. Kerrigu ѳyeelane mѳimbe lutѳgurrimbe wamindamgaig kѳn.
Inchen tru gatѳgan tab llensuzhig mesraig wendau trusrѳmbe, tru Kerriguwan Tiusweindiig Kѳnrrain dain gwartu wamig, truig basrabig kѳn..
Tru carpa yabe ѳyeeg marig kѳbig kѳn: tru umbu kebibyutѳ, tru Tiusweindiig Kѳnrrain dain gwartuyube, candilerѳba, mishatsiiba, Tiusweyasiitѳ tarѳmarim birrimeraba tѳgaig..
Kaguende nabe nѳm sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳb amrrumuilan lastima tѳgagѳb, katѳ nѳmui kaig mariilan gatѳle isua wanrrab gѳmѳwein gur cha.n
Mugucha chi kusrenanamig palѳmѳnrrun nui mendaigwan lata, nui nunewan lata: Señѳrwan nebua ash chib, k'aguende mutѳgucha nane nebua ashchun, chigucha gѳmѳzhikkurrimbunѳ mas nuikk'atikke.

Pѳs na Israelwei misaameraba acuerdѳ maramibe iig kѳn cha, tru gwalѳmmerawangurrimbunѳbe, Señѳrbe trendan cha. Na maig martrai karua bѳnsrailane nѳmui isuilѳyu na pѳnsrѳb, na nѳmui manrrѳmerayu pѳrѳb inchen, nagurri nѳmuimbe Tius kѳben, nѳmgurrimbe naimbe nai misaamera gѳnrrun cha..

Tru Egiptѳ biraugurri nѳmun kwalyu guemѳra wesrunrrab gwalѳm, tru na nѳmui mѳsk'alѳba acuerdѳ marig lataig kѳmѳtѳ maramѳnrrun cha. Kaguende truilѳma na acuerdѳ marigu pѳnrrѳmuikkurri, nabe nѳmune isua ashmuptindig kѳn cha, Señѳrbe trendaig kѳn.
Pѳs tru srѳsrѳ acuerdѳ Tius marig chi maramigwan newan martraptiig kuig kuimbe, truigwan kѳrrѳmara, gatѳgan srѳig mara tѳgagѳmig palѳmubsruinrrun.m

Inchen Jesúsbe sacerdѳtesmera marѳb amrruig mas purѳ tabigwan nebuin gѳn. Kaguende tru purab nuig trannrrab misriilѳ purab nѳrreelѳyugurri wesrawa, pѳnsrai tru srѳ acuerdѳn Jesúsbe misaamerai nѳ basramisra marѳb pasran.
Nѳ yu pirau unimbe, sacerdѳteguen gѳmubsruinrrun. Kaguende Tiuswan ketamelan tru maig maramigwan Mѳisés pѳrigu maig tailan treeg marѳb sacerdѳtesmerabe kѳbguen indan.
tru santuariѳ, tru ciertѳnig mu mѳg kusrua basrig carpa ya gѳmѳtѳ, Tius nѳ kusrua basrigu marѳb pasrabigwan.
Tru nam mѳi waminchib amrruppe, ѳyeeg chibrre amrruer: Maya Sacerdѳtesmeran Nѳ Garub Sacerdѳten nambe tѳgaguer cha, tru srѳmbalasrѳ Tѳrbilabig Tius Purѳ Nuig wainug kusrmaygatѳ wamisrѳbigwan,

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe tru maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳm garub sacerdѳtesmerane mѳguelѳ newan tabig kѳmeelan neera purrѳnniilѳ gѳben, trune tru Mѳisés pѳrigwei wendau arrubig, Tius ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daig wambe, newan tabig kѳnrrai kѳrrѳmari Nusrkawan managatigweyasig neera wannig kѳn..

Tru katѳganelѳ maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳm garub sacerdѳtesmera pѳnrrabelѳbe mѳitѳgucha nѳmui kaig mariilaimburabigwanmerrig trana, trugurrimbe tru maya misagweyasig kaig marimburѳ kwalѳmmѳrig animalmera gweecha, Tiuswan tranѳb pasramig, nѳm lata Cristѳbe treeg maramig palain gѳmѳn, kaguende nѳbe nѳasiitѳwei tranѳppe, kan bijitѳ managatigweyasig rranig kѳn.
Inchawei treekkurri gatѳ nѳgurri Tiusweimay kemallibelane nѳbe managatigwei kaigyugurri wesrabig kѳn, kaguende nѳbe nѳmuimburab purѳwaminchib managatig ѳsig wabikkurri.
Pѳs tru merrab katѳgan sacerdѳtesmerabe nѳrrѳ nemisrѳb ambubig kѳn, kaguende nѳmuimbe tru nѳm marѳb amrruigwan chu uraskatig marѳbig marѳb purrѳmѳtѳ kwamig kuikkurri.

Trune Jesúswane sacerdѳte gѳnrrai neera wannѳppe, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daitѳga treeg mara wannig kѳn, tru ѳyeeg chib uras: Señѳr Tiusbe ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun cha, Tius nѳ treeg isuigwane yunѳmarig kѳnrraamѳn cha: Ñibe managatigwei sacerdѳte gѳn  chib.n
Pѳs tru maig maramigwan martrai baslig merrabsliibe misaameran tabelѳ gѳnrrai chi martrabgawei, chi purugunrrabgaweyig kѳben, yandѳ menda mara basrѳppa, kagѳbashiptindig kѳn,
Kaguende nuimburappe Tiuswei wamyu ѳyeegwein chibig kѳn: Ñibe managatig sacerdѳte gѳn cha, Melquisedec maig kѳben, treetѳweingue..
Kaguende tru sacerdѳtesmera truyugurri amrrubelan yunѳmarene, trube, tru maig maramigwan martrai karuigwangucha srѳig katѳgan peemaytѳ yunѳmaramig kѳn.
Pѳs tru Tiuswei wamyu Cristѳ ѳyeelan wamindinabiibe tru Levíwei misag sѳtѳmerayugurrin gѳmѳtѳ, katѳgan misag sѳtѳyuig kѳben, tru misagugurrimbe muguen trunune tru altaryube marѳb pasrѳmuig kѳn.n
