Inchawei misaamera Tiusba newan t'abelѳ gѳmigwan tru levit'as sacerdѳtesmera Tiusweimburabigu marѳb pѳnrraitѳga nebua tѳgagѳmig kѳnrrai marig kuig kuimbe, trube, chiwei sacerdѳte gatѳgan, tru Melquisedec maig kѳben, treeg tѳgagѳmig srѳig palѳmubsruinrrun, tru Aaróngurri amrrub sacerdѳtesmerayugurri arruaig kѳmíig. (Pѳs tru israelit'asmerayasig maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibe tru levit'asmera Tiusweiwan marѳb pѳnrraigugurri arrubig kѳbig kuindѳgucha).

Tru Levíweinukkurri amrrub sacerdѳtesmeraimburappe, tru cienyu diez wesruigwan ut'abelѳbe mѳguelѳ ka pinѳnrrabelѳtѳ gѳben, trune tru ut'abig Melquisedecweimburappe, Tiuswei wamyube ka ѳsig wabig kui lat'aig, treeg waminchibig kѳn.
Pѳs kan muguen treeg kѳmѳn damgaig kѳn, tru mayanguen t'ab gѳnrrun cha, trenchibiibe, tru mayanguen t'ab gѳnrrun dainabig lat'a gѳmѳ, mas nuig kui.

Pѳs tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳliibe treeg kѳnrrain gѳbig kѳn, tru Levíwei misagugurli amrrubelѳ sacerdѳtes kѳmigwan utabelaimbe tru cienyu diez wesraigwan israelitasmeran utamig, tru nѳmui nunelandѳwei, truilѳbe Abrahamwei misagugurlindѳwei amrrubelѳ gúindѳgucha.

Melquisedecbe mѳskai usringawei, kѳlli misaamerai munchi bѳra wariilѳyu pѳrig kawei, nѳ kallaigwan wamindig kawei, katѳ kwaigwan wamindig kawayig kѳn. Kan managatigwei sacerdѳte kѳbig kѳnrrabig kua, nѳbe Tiuswei Nusrkai maig kѳben, treeg lataitѳwein gѳn.k

Iig tru Melquisedecbe tru Salem ciudayu rey gѳb, Tius Mayeelaim Bala Pasrabigwei sacerdѳte gúig kѳn. Incha Abraham tru kwayabyu reymeran nѳ k'anawa arruben, truibe k'atѳnrrab webya, Abrahamwan mayanguen tab gѳnrrun chibig kѳn.

Iig tru tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳ purramigwan isub munig melaibe kan ancla piumbu ellgwawa barcѳn merrarrab pasrabig lataitѳwei namui mѳsiizhigwan yandѳ chi isumikkaig treeg basrѳnrrai merrarrabigwan tѳgaguer. Tru muniirab melaibe, tru Kerriguba Tiusweindiig Kѳnrrain cha pasrinug tru tab llensuzhig kelarrab megai wendausrѳngatig kebya basran,

Pѳs mѳguelѳbe nѳm lataguen gѳmѳ, mas nuigwei merrab pѳnrramisrabe, martrai indigwan ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chib pѳnrrabelѳ gѳn. Inchen tru nuigwei merrab nѳm trenchib pѳnrraigwane nѳm trenchib pѳnrraitѳwei treeg marig kѳrrѳmisrtrai marѳbig kѳn, yandѳ mas wamindamikkaikke.
Inchen Abrahambe tammay muniirabig muniirab megawa, Tius tru trannrrab misligwan utig kѳbig kѳn.

Kaguende Tius tru Abrahamwan ѳyeeg martrab cha kѳrrѳmisrѳb urasma, katѳgan mas nuigwei merrab ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun cha, trendamdiig mu gatѳgan kaabene, pѳs Tiusbe nѳasiitѳwei pasramisra,m
Ñim mѳitѳgucha maig marѳb melaigwan srabegatig treetѳ rreetѳ kenamarѳb melaimbemab isuer, tru ñim Cristѳba tѳrguegwalmabigu purrѳnrrab isua munig melaigwan ke treeg kѳmnegatikke.
Pѳs nambe ѳyamay wamindindѳgucha, nai undaarailѳ, ñimuimburappe mas tabig munig basrain gúi nambe asha bѳnrrer, tru kaigyugurri wesraig pѳnrrabigugurri arrubig.k
Inchen kal dusrmerabah, ka kaig kaubatѳ misrѳb pirѳ tru ellmalig chi misrmíibe, ke kaig puindѳ mѳrtrabig kѳn. Incha yandѳ srabebe parlig kѳnrrun.

Cristѳn kerriguwan wendѳbasra gatѳle kѳrrѳbene, nѳmune katѳyuube nѳmui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliranrrai indamibe kaimamdiig kѳn, kaguende nѳmdѳwei Tiuswei Nusrkawan gatѳle kurusyu mesrѳb lataig maramba, misaamera nune kan chigucha gѳmíig kui lataig inchib ka indzatѳ mѳrtrai maramba inchibelѳ gua.m
katѳ Tiuswei wamyu t'abigwanba, tru wendѳsrѳ attrabigu maramburab marѳbelѳ truilanba nѳmbe purѳ t'ab gúi mѳrѳb inchibelѳ gѳbendѳ,

katѳ pitѳga chishmarѳb gѳmelan kusrenanigwanba, Tiuswei ureemeraim bala tasiimeran estsaramigwanba, kwabelѳ gatѳle ѳsiiramigwanba, kaig marimburѳ tru managatig maig kѳnrrabigwan kѳrrѳmaramigwanba, katѳle truilandѳweih, truilandѳwei waminchib.n

Inchawei ke ne nѳrrѳramnegatig ambubig amgun, tru Cristѳimburabig ke srѳsrѳ bѳlbasra kusrenanig kѳbelane nѳѳrѳ wemalsrѳpba bѳnsra. Incha tru pѳlbasra kusrenaniilѳ: tru kaig marmѳnrrab isua mѳramigwanba, kwamigumay srua inrrabig kaig mariilan elachib amrruigwanba, isubigwan Tiusweinug basra tѳgagúigwanba, treeg kusrenanigutѳ gatѳle truigwandѳwein gusreptѳ warѳmugun,
Inchen mѳitѳgucha pitsѳtѳ muchibiibe katѳgucha tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maram wamwane ni mandѳ gúinguen mѳrtrab gaimabig kѳn, katѳgucha unѳzhig lataig srѳ gua.
Pѳs ѳyeegweimburab wamindamibe truba rruba nu tѳgaguer. Inchendѳ ñimun ni kan mandѳ chaguen ѳyeeg kѳn damgailѳ gѳn, pѳs ñim chi taig mѳramigwane purѳ tsѳndailѳ gúikkurli.
Incha kerrigu newanig misrabe, tru mayeelѳ nun mѳrѳbelaimbe managatigwei kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmigwane nѳgurrin gѳnrrai, treeg misra basramisrig kѳn..
Cristѳ ya Tiuswei Nusrkain gѳbenguen, chine, chine nebuinab purayaigu maig karuigwan mѳramig kѳbig kuin gúi treegwan kusreeg kѳn.m
Katѳ gatѳganbalѳsrѳngucha Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu nѳbe Cristѳn trendaig kѳn: Ñibeguende managatigwei sacerdѳte gѳn cha, Melquisedec maig kѳben, treetѳweingue.k

Katѳ treetѳwei Cristѳgucha tru Maya Sacerdѳtesmeran Nѳ Garub Sacerdѳte gѳnrrab nѳasiitѳ purѳ nuig misrmѳtѳ, nѳbe Tius ѳyeeg chibigweinukkurringuen utig kѳn: Ñibe nai Nusrkain gѳben, mѳin gwalѳm nabe ñui Mѳskai misrar chibigwan.
Incha nѳgucha treetѳwei kullaguig kuikkurri animal gweecha Tiuswan tranamig kѳbig kѳn, misaamerai k'aig mariilaimburѳtѳ gѳmѳtѳ, tru k'aig mariilѳ nuimburabigweiwan chigucha.

Mѳ sacerdѳtetѳgucha maya sacerdѳtesmeran nѳ garub sacerdѳte yu pirauigwane mѳguelai utugurri wesrawa basrig kѳn, Tiusweimburabelѳyu misagweimburѳ nѳ marѳb pasrѳnrrai, Tiuswan keta tranѳb, katѳ misaamerai kaig mariilaimburѳ animal gweecha tranѳb, treeg martrai.

Pѳs namui tru Maya Sacerdѳtesmeran Nѳ Garub Sacerdѳtebe nam kullaguelѳ gúigwan namun lastima ashibig kѳn. Kaguende namun lataitѳwei chiyugѳben kebenѳsrkѳnrrab indinab megaig kѳbig kua. Inchendѳ nѳbe managuen k'aig marmuig kѳn.

Chigurrimbunѳ kerrigu mara pѳnsrailѳ pѳnrrabiibe Tiuswei merrappe chigucha sѳriibe pѳnrrѳmѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, tru nam chigѳben mariilan eshkab pѳnrramig Tiuswein gabyube chitѳgucha kuragutsiilѳ tѳrguelarrѳ kena bѳnrran.m
Kaguende isramig Tius nѳ tѳgagúinug mѳitѳgucha kebibiibe nui chi maramelan israb wamisran, Tius nui chi maramelan chab mara israb wamisrѳb lataitѳwei.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, tru kwalѳmmera siete nemisren, Tius tru isrin gwalѳm lataitѳwei isramig nui misaameraimbe katѳgucha truibe ka basran.

Kaguende Jѳsué tru israelit'asmeran Canaan birausrѳ pera guebya, Tiuswei tru isramigwan tranig kѳbig kuig kuimbe, trube, Tiusbe Jѳsué uñib uras mas wendѳsrѳ tru isramig Tius tѳga waig katѳgan gwalѳmigwan waminchimubsruig kuinrrun.
Inchen truilѳ gѳmѳtѳ, katѳganelѳbe katѳgucha isramig tru nѳ tѳgagúinug kebambamig palab melan. Tru t'ab wamwan tru srѳsrѳ nѳmunmerrig wammѳrѳsrkainabelѳbe mѳra marmeelѳ gúikkurri kebammuig kѳn.
Pѳs Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu kanbalѳsrѳ tru kwalѳmmera siete nemisrѳbigweimburab trendaig kѳn: Nui chi maramelan chab mara, kwalѳmmera siete nemisren Tiusbe isrig kѳn cha..

Inchendѳ tru nam kѳrebelaimbeguende tru isramig Tius nѳ tѳgagúinug kebambubwei indamѳnrrun. Incha gua, Tiusbe trendaig kѳn: Nabe namig kѳben, ¡gatѳ! treeg kѳnrrun cha, trendaig kuig kѳn cha: Isramig na tѳgagúinuube nѳmbe managuen kebamrraamѳn  cha, nui chi maramelѳbe pirѳwan chi kѳbigwanbañau chab mara, tru isramigwane tru urasrѳngurri basrig kuindѳgucha.

Pѳs treeg kѳbene, tru isramig Tius nѳ tѳgagúinug nam kebambamigwan tѳgagѳnrrun cha trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisrig pasrѳbenbatѳ, trunune purѳ isuptѳ tѳga amѳnamig kѳn, inchippa ñim mѳikkѳben kebammubgunmab.
Inchawei nѳmbe kebamrrab gaimaig kuin gúi aser, kaguende kѳrenrrab inchimeelѳ gúikkurri.
¿Inchen tru cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba Tiusbe mumeranrre tab gѳmui waig kѳh? ¿Tru kaig marѳbelѳ mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳ kwabelѳ, truilѳrre namisaig kѳmuitarru?
Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳriguma trendan: Ñim mѳin gwalѳm Tiuswei wamwan mѳrabe, ñimui manrrѳmeran mur marmѳtay cha, Tius maig taigwan mѳrѳg kѳmub itѳbunab uras lataitѳwei.

Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, kangurrin gangurri ѳyamay melѳgun chib kwalѳmmѳrig puruguyay, Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu tru Mѳin Gwalѳm gѳn daig truig pasrѳbenbatѳ, pѳs kaig maramibe ñimun truba tabig asѳnaben, ñim mѳitѳgucha larrѳ mѳrmíig misra pasrѳmѳnrrappe.
Inchawei nabe nѳmun namig kѳben, ¡gatѳ! treeg kѳnrrun cha, trendaig kuig kѳn: Isramig na tѳgagúinug nѳmbe managuen kebamrraamѳn  cha.
tru ñimui merrabsrѳ kѳlli misaamera nan truyu ke chinchibig kѳtashchab lataig inchib namisainug, tru cuarenta añѳs ѳrѳba na yeeg chigѳben mariilan ashatѳgucha.
Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu Espíritu Santѳbe ѳyeeg taig kѳn: Ñim mѳin gwalѳm Tius maig taigwan mѳrabe

Pѳs Mѳisésbe maramigu marѳb megabig kѳppe, israelitasmera Tiuswei misagweimburab kerriguba chi maramelan elachimѳ, marѳb pasraig kѳbig kѳn. Incha wendѳsrѳ Tius wamindig kѳnrrabigwan nѳbe kenamarѳbig kѳn..
Inchendѳ Jesúsbe purabguen tab indig kѳn, Mѳisés lataguen gѳmѳ, k'an ya marѳbigwan mas tab indig kѳn, tru yawan lataguen gѳmѳ.
Pѳs Jesúsbe nun wesra basrѳbig Tiuswan kerriguba maig t'aigwan mѳra marig kѳn, Tiuswei misag israelit'asweimburab Mѳisés kerriguba chi maramelan elachimѳ, marѳb pasrab lat'aitѳweingue.
Pѳs chiyugѳben kebenѳsrkѳnrrab indinab nѳtѳweinguen yeeg chine kaig indinab megabikkurri, chiyugѳben kegѳrrѳnrrai indinab melabelan purugumig nѳbe maramburab marѳbig kѳn.
k'atѳ nѳmui ѳsig amѳnaigu chu urastѳgucha tru kwamigwan kѳrig kuindѳ, kѳrig kuindѳ melabelan truyugurri wesrailѳ gѳnrrai marѳb inchab.
Pѳs ureemerama asr tѳgar, animbar gúig kѳbene, Jesucristѳgucha treeg asrtѳwei tѳgaig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn, nѳ kwaitѳga tru kwamig kѳnrrai nugwaimandzig mu chindamgaig marѳb basrabigwan pinishib,

Kaguende Cristѳ tru Tiusweindѳ gѳnrrai tarѳmarѳbig lata, katѳ Tiusweindѳ gѳnrrai tarѳmariilѳ lata, mayeelѳba kan Mѳskaweyelѳtѳ gѳn. Inchawei treekkurri Jesúsbe nѳmune, nai nunelѳ cha, wamamig chi kѳrig kuim basrѳmѳn.m

Pѳs tru chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabigwan marѳb, katѳ truilan nuyasiitѳwei pѳnrrѳnrrai marѳb inchib Tiusbe nui ureemeran truba nѳrrѳwan nui tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳmay pera ippe, Tiusbe tru Jesucristѳ nѳmerrig nѳmun kaigyugurri pera webibigwan tru chine kaig indinab pureb megaitѳga chi palѳmíig newanig kѳnrrai maramig, Tiusbe sѳl gúi asig kѳn.

Incha kerriguba nui srѳb umbu pѳnsraig kѳn cha. Incha kerriguba nui srѳb umbu pѳnsrѳppe, Tiusbe chiwan kѳrrѳmara gѳmѳtѳ, kerriguba nѳ ashchai pѳnsraig kѳn. Treeg kuingucha, mѳi yambatѳbe kerrigubabe mѳg nѳ ashib tѳgagѳmuin gúi aser.m

Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, kanbalѳsrѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳriguma mѳikkѳsrѳn Tiuswan trencha bayig kѳn: ¿Misaabe ñuimbe chi gѳnrrab gѳh cha, ñi ya isunrraimbe? ¿Ka mѳwandѳ ñi truba isua ashib attraimbe, nѳbe chi gѳh cha?
Nam mѳi tru waminchib amrruigwan, waramig gatѳgan tru wendѳsrѳ srѳig attrabigwane ángelesmera nѳm garub tѳgagѳnrrai, Tiusbe treeg marig kѳmѳn.

¿Namun kaigyugurri wesraig yeeg nuig tѳga bѳnrraigwan nam chinchaindѳ elacha, amѳñabe, trube, nambe tru mѳra melamigugurrimbe, mandѳ incha wegѳrrѳnrrab? Kaguende kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmig purѳ nuigwane Señѳr Jesús nѳashib nѳmerrig eshkaben, trugurrimbe tru nѳ wamindigwan mѳrѳbelѳ, truigwane ѳyeeg kѳn cha, namun eshkaig kѳbig kѳn.

Kaguende Tius ángelesmeragurri wamindikken maig chippe, treeg kѳnrrain gúig kua, tru maig taigwan mѳrѳg kѳmub itѳbunabelanba, mѳra marmeelanba truburѳ mѳra melamigwan maig utamigwan utѳnrrai pѳnsraig kѳbig kѳn.
¿Angelesmerabe mayamba espíritumera, Tius karuigwan marѳb pѳnrrabelѳ, kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan ketig uta tѳgagѳnrrabelan purugub pѳnrrѳnrrai karua ѳriilѳ treelѳ gѳmuitarru?n

Ñibe tru srѳmbalamerane k'an pala itѳ tsinigwan welan guitishib lataitѳwei kirra, kewagúilan lataitѳwei gatѳle peemay srѳig yunѳmartrun cha. Trune ñibe chu uraskucha yunѳmarmѳ, treetѳ rreetѳ gѳben, ñi ѳsig wamig pilamerabe managuen patsѳnrraamѳn cha.

Sѳlgandѳ tabigwane ñibe undaarawa, kaigwane ashig kѳmui indig kѳn cha. Incha treekkurri Tius, tru ñui Tiusbe, tru ñui linchibelan lataguen gѳmѳ, purab nuig kѳnrrai mara, ñune aceite srѳlig kѳn cha maya nuguen kasraaranrrai.Katѳ Tiusbe Nusrkawan trenchibig kѳn: Ñi Señѳrbe srѳsrѳzhiitѳ pirѳwane ñi mara basrig kѳben, srѳmbalamerabe kerriguba ñui tasiitѳga mara bѳnsrailѳ gѳn cha.
Inchen tru ángelesmeraimburappe Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: Nui ángelesmerane k'an isig ichibig latailѳ gѳnrrai maran cha, k'atѳ nuiwan marѳb melabelane nag bilabelѳ latailѳ gѳnrraingue.
Incha Tiusbe nui kandѳ Nusrkawan yu pirau kebattrai ѳrѳb urasma katѳ trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Tiuswei ángelesmerabe mayeelѳba nun kѳriibala tabig wamindamig kѳn cha.

Nusrk'aimbe Tius maig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳben, treetѳwei tѳrig tѳrguegwalmabig kѳn, chiyutѳgucha Tius maig kѳben nѳ treetѳweingue. Katѳ nѳbe tru chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabigwane nui maramburab mari wamdѳga trunun nѳ ashib tѳga basran. Incha nѳbe misaamerai k'aig mariilan chab chishmarabe, yandѳ srѳmbalasrѳ Tѳrbilabig Purѳ Nu Tiuswei kusrmaygatѳ wanrrab wamisrig kѳn.Pѳs ѳyamay Nusrk'aimbe ángelesmera lataguen gѳmѳ, purab nuig misrig kѳn, Tiuswei Nusrk'ain cha, wami munchin nѳ uta tѳgagúibe, ángeles cha wami munchi lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, purab nuig utig kѳb lataitѳwei.

Incha mѳi i srabe gwalѳmmerawane nui Nusrkaingurri namun wamindan. Tru pirѳwanba, katѳ srѳmbalasrѳ kerrigu chigurrimbunѳ kѳbigwanbañau Tiusbe nѳgurri mara basrѳb, katѳ nundѳwei tru chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabigwan kerrigu keta, nѳ ashib tѳgagѳnrrai kѳrrѳmarig kѳbig kѳn.
Merrabsrѳmbe Tiusbe namui kѳlli misaamerane Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳgurri, mumay gѳben, k'atѳ gatѳ wamindig kѳbig kѳn.

Ñim mѳikkѳben, Tius martrai karua bѳnsrailѳyu maizhikken purѳ bunѳmѳ marѳbig kurmab isubendѳ, nui nilѳtѳgabe maig kurrѳbashtѳ waminchibiibe nѳasiitѳ kebeñib pasran. Inchen tru nѳ Tiusweiwan maizhikken purѳ bunѳmѳ marѳb pasrab taibe chi marmui lataitѳwei webyan.
nui malѳ maig kuigwan asha, katѳ llirawa, ippe, pesannab lataitѳweingue.
Pѳs Tiuswei wamwane maig martrain daigwan ñimbe marѳbelѳ gѳmig kѳn, k'a mѳratѳ, mѳratѳ gѳnrrab gѳmѳtѳ. Trengѳmuisruandѳbe, chi mѳrmui lataitѳwei ñimasiitѳ k'a kegѳrrab pѳnrraig webinrrun.
Kaguende kan mѳg namig kѳtanmaptѳ mariibe Tiuswei sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marmѳn.k
Nai undaaraig nunelѳ, iigwan isuy: ñim mayeelѳba mѳramigwane muniitѳ burramig kѳn. Inchen wamindamigwanba, namamigwanbabe tsѳndatѳ isuptѳ maramig kѳn.

chitѳgucha tabig ketiiba, k'atѳ chigѳben tabig newan marѳbelѳ gѳnrrai ketiibabe srѳmbalasrѳngurri arrubig kѳn, tru srѳmbalasrѳ chine pilab pѳnrrabigwan marѳbig Tiusweinukkurri. Nѳbe nѳ maig kѳppe, manatѳgucha treetѳ gua, nuinuube lѳstѳrab lata inchib, tѳrmisrѳb lata inchib, inchibiibe chigagѳn.
Nai undaaraig nunelѳ, ñimguen pella peemaytѳ isub pѳnrrѳmѳtay
Inchen tru trѳmbѳig isuilѳ yandѳ umbu kebya, pasramisrikkurrimbe, kaig maramig kallan. Inchen tru kaibe yandѳ ne nurappe, kwamigwan kallanrrai mara basran.

Mѳigwan gѳben chiyugѳben kaigyu kebenamdiig mѳrѳrabene, Tius treeg isunandan chimѳta. Kaguende Tiusbe mana kaigu kebenamdiig kuig mѳrѳrai wamѳwei, ni gatѳ mun kaigu kebenѳsrkѳnrrab inchimѳwei inchibig kѳn.
Pѳs pѳrr webarrua, purѳ mur bachene, k'aube mullaben, ube peñen, tru tabzhiibe yandѳ pinan. ѳyeetѳwei puaikkucha nui chigѳben penab, yanѳb uniilѳyu pinѳnrrun.
Mѳikkѳben treebe Señѳrwan chigѳben utamuitamappe isumѳta.
Inchendѳ ñim tru treeg tammay kullaaramѳ, ka melaibe, newanig kѳnrrai inday, chiyugucha neilѳ, chi isumgaig newan bѳnrrabelѳ, yandѳ chiyugucha balѳmѳ newanelѳ.
kaguende ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwan maig kѳt'ashchab marigugurrimbe masken t'ammay melamig arrubig kui ñim ashibelѳbe.
katѳ kalѳ marѳbigwan nui pella yainukkurri lliskѳbiibe nui mѳsig yandѳ kwanrrab pasraigwan truyugurri wesrub, katѳ truba nѳrrѳ kaig mariilan kasrѳb inchun.
Nai nunelѳ, ñimui utu ñim mѳikkѳben Tiuswei newan ciertѳnigugurri pella, tarѳmisra iben,

Tru Elías, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabiima, kan mѳg ka nam lataitѳwein gѳbig kѳn, tru sre bumѳnrraima, Tiuswan sre bumѳnrrai martrunrlig chib nѳba wamindiibe, pѳn bila y tѳbѳ bilaba srebe pirau pumuig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mѳikkѳben kwanrrѳ tsuabe, iglesiayu Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelan wamѳ, Señѳrwei munchiyu aceite srѳla, nuyasig Tiuswan purugurra chib mianrrai.
Mѳikkѳben ñimui utu chigѳben puben, isuig megawabe, Tiusba waminchi. Inchen mѳikkѳben tab kasraatѳ wappe, Tiuswan tabig waminchib cantau.m

Pѳs nambe mayanguen tab gúilѳ gúi aser chigѳben isumdiig puingucha, tru kullaaramѳ melaptѳ melabelane. Jѳbwanma chigѳben yeeg isumdiig nebuingucha, tammay ka megaptѳ megaigwan ñimbe wammѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun, katѳ srabebe Señѳrbe Jѳbwane maig indigwan chigucha. Kaguende Señѳrbe lastima ashib, trurrigu tammay purugub inchibig kѳn.k

Nai nunelѳ, kangurlin gangurli chigѳben ѳyan gѳtan chib, treeg inndan chib, waminchimѳtay, ñimun maligwan asha, kaigyu kѳrrѳmara pѳnsrainab pѳnrrѳmѳnrrappe. ¡Au! Tru ñimun maig maramigwan asha martrabiibe yandѳ yaskabuguen basran.

Trune ñim nunelѳbe namui Señѳr arrumnegatig tammay muniirab melamig kѳn. Kan ellmarѳb kwallibiima ellmarabe, tru srѳ sre attrabzhigwanba, srabe sre attrabzhigwanba yaandѳ, yaandѳ, munig megan, tru pirau ellmalig mislizhigwan tulishinrrappe.
Ñimbe yu piraube purѳ tabig warab, asr maig palai inchen, ñimuimbe treeg marѳb waramig tѳga, ñimbe waarameran lataig tsallana gѳn ñimui manrrѳmeran, kweetsam gwalѳmbe yandѳ punrrabguen gѳn.
Ñimui chigurrimbunѳ pua misrѳb tѳgagúilѳbe trerailѳ gѳben, ñimui keilane pullilla mailѳ gѳn.
¡Au, ñim puarmera, iigwan mѳray! Chigѳben yeeg trѳmbѳig ñimun nebub attrab pasrѳben, kishib, trashib inday.
Ñimbe srѳna rrumar ñimui ѳsig amѳnamigu ni chi bunrrab gúinguen mѳrmubendѳ rreendan. Ñimbe ka wañi lataitѳ gѳn, mѳindѳ kenagúitѳ, katѳ yanayube kenamuptinchibig latailѳgue.k

Inchawei mu gatѳgane kaaben, Tius nѳtѳ gѳn tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳriilan tranѳb, katѳ nѳtѳwei maig maramigwan sѳlgandѳ asha marѳb inchibiibe. Truibe nѳ kaigyugurri wesruin gúi, kabe kaigyu pasrin gúi nѳ ashchabig kѳn. ¿Ñibe chigugu, katѳganun ѳyeeg sѳl marmíig kѳn chib marѳb pasrѳnrrappe?m
Ñim Tiuswei merrab utsѳbasrene, nѳbe ñimune nѳrreelѳ gѳnrrai martrun.
¡Ñimbe truba isui inchib, chindimbarre nambe ѳyeeg kailѳ guermab truba isub, katѳ kishib inday! Ñimbe indzabgunrriibe kishib, kasraarabgunrriibe truba isui inday.
Ñimbe Tius maig chiben nune tru gúindѳ mѳray. Trune nugwaimandzigwane mѳrmѳnrrab mur isua bѳnrrai, treeg bѳnrrѳbene, ñimuinukkurrimbe lulrrun.

Inchen Tiusbe nui ka yandѳ tab indiitѳgabe namune gatѳguchinguen tranѳbig kѳn. Incha nui wambe trenchibig kѳn: Nuinetѳ nuig mѳrѳrai inchibelane Tiusbe sѳtѳbasramisrѳb gurrappe, trune chigucha gѳmeelѳ tammayelane nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan Tiusbe tranѳbig kѳn cha.k

¡Ñim, Tiuswan itѳlulѳptѳ misaamera! ¿I pirauigwan tab inchib chull inchibiibe Tiuswane ashig kѳmui inchibelѳ gúi ashmeelѳ gѳtirru? Inchawei mѳikkѳben i pirauigwangѳba tab gúi mѳrѳb llirabiibe, Tiuswane ashig kѳmui inchibig misran.

Trѳmbѳig kwayam lailѳba, namishib chinetѳ cha mѳriilѳbabe ñimui utube ¿chugurrinrre arrubig kѳh? ¿Ñimui umbu trѳmbѳig kaig isubelѳ ni kan mandѳguen gѳmíig pѳnrraptѳ bѳnrrѳwa, truyugurrinrre arrubig kѳmuitarru??
Inchen ambumay imay tab gѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrab tru ambumay imay tab gѳbiitѳga ellmarѳbelѳbe, sѳlgandѳ tabig ellmariilѳ tulishinrrun.k

Kaguende ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib pusrkwai asiibah, chiyutѳgucha mѳig kanab marѳbig kѳtashchab indiibatѳ pѳnrrabnuube, ambumay imay ke mumay gѳbashtiibah, katѳ chigurrimbunѳ ka trѳmbѳig mariilѳbatѳ bѳnrran.

Inchen treeg kѳmѳtѳ, k'atѳganweimburab ñimui manrrau ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib pusrkwai asiibah, chiyutѳgucha ke nѳmerrig kѳnrrab indiibatѳ tѳga bѳnrrѳwabe, ñimbe truba nѳrreelѳ kusrebelѳ guermab inchimѳwei, tru newan ciertѳnigwan isab pѳnrrѳmѳwei inday.
¿Kan bigabyugurlindѳwei chish bi webarrumba, kaig bi webarrumba inchautah?
Tru rrigugurrindѳwei mayanguen t'abig kѳnrrai wamindamba, trѳmbѳig nebunrrain chib wamamba indan. Nai nunelѳ ѳyeebe maramig kѳmѳn.
Inchendѳ nilѳwan gúimbe mugucha kusrenanrrab gaiman. Purѳ gaig kua, chinchaguen treeg marmѳnrrai merrarrawa tѳgagѳnrrab gaimaig, kweechib larrѳ rrѳmbѳ mѳtѳ netsaig kѳn.

Inchawei nilѳbe kan nag lataig kѳn, namui asru kaitѳ netsaig, asr ѳrѳba trѳmbѳig marѳb mindishibig pasrig tru nilѳbe. Tru mѳra melamnug naarab pasrabiitѳgatѳwei pilѳga basrig kѳn. Incha nam ѳsig kuingurrimbunѳ kwamnegatig pilab pasrabig basrѳnrrun..
Katѳ barcѳmeran chigucha asay. Yeeg nѳrreelѳ purѳ mur isig ichibig srua ambiilѳ gúingucha, barcѳn muba inrrai inchib pasrabig kan lamѳtiitѳgatѳ truyu purrabelѳbe nѳm muwan ambug kѳben truwan ѳran.m

Kaguende nambe mayeelѳba chiyugѳben kalѳ marѳb pellibelѳ guer. Inchen mѳikkѳben nui wamindigu pellmíibe, t'abigwan newan sѳlgandѳ marѳb mѳg kѳn. Treebe nui asrwangucha kerriguba maig kѳbash kѳmѳnrrab isua mѳra tѳgagѳn.
Katѳ tru martrai Tius nѳ k'arua basrig iigwan tѳgaguer: Tiuswan undaguibe k'atѳ nui nunewangucha undaarau taigwan.
Nambe undaarabelѳ guer, kaguende Tius nѳmerrig namun undaaraig kua.

Inchawei undag kѳbig basrѳbene, kѳrig kѳbiibe chigagѳn. Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, undag kѳbig kerrigu newan tabiibe kѳrig kѳbigwane kerrigu tarѳmaran. Kaguende kѳrig kѳbiibe tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig attrabigwan utam gѳnrrab gúimba kѳriiran. Mѳikkѳben kѳrig kѳbigwan tѳgaibe katѳgucha tru undag kѳbigwan kerrigu newan tѳgagѳmѳ, balab basran.

Tius nui undag kѳbigwan namuimburab tѳga basraigwan nambe nebua ashib, kѳreb inder. Tiusbe tru undag kѳbig kѳn. Inchen mѳikkѳben undag kѳbigwan tѳga basrabiibe Tiusweinug basrѳben, katѳ Tiusbe nuinug basran..
Mѳikkѳben Jesúsbe Tiuswei Nusrkain gѳn chibiibe Tiusweinuutѳ basrabig basrѳben, katѳ Tiusbe nuinug basrabig basran.
Nai undaarailѳ, Tiusma namune ѳyamay undaaraig kѳbene, namgucha treetѳwei k'angurrin gangurri undaarayamig kѳn.
Mugucha Tiuswane managuen asiibe kaagѳn. Inchendѳ nam kangurrin gangurri undaarayabene, Tiusbe namuinug basrabig basrѳben, nui undag kѳbiibe namuinug kerrigu newan tabig basramisrin gѳn.
Tru undag kѳbiibe ѳyeeg marigu basran: Tiuswan nam undaguelѳ gúig kuimba gѳmѳtѳ, nѳ namun undaarawa, nui Nusrkawan nam kaig mariilaimburѳ Tiuswei namig kѳbigwan nѳ utab namuyasig kwanrrai ѳrigu.
Nai undaarailѳ, kangurrin gangurri undaarayagun. Kaguende undag kѳbiibe Tiusweinukkurri arrubig kѳn. Inchen mutѳgucha undaguibe Tiusweinug kallaweig kѳb, katѳ Tiuswan nebua ashib inchibig kѳn.

Inchen chi espíritutѳgucha Jesucristѳbe mѳg misra arrumuig kѳn chibiibe, truibe Tiusweinukkurri arrubig kѳmѳtѳ gѳn. Truibe tru Jesucristѳn ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ inchibigwei espíritu gѳn, tru attrab gѳn daigwan ñim wammѳra gúig. Incha mѳimbe yandѳ chabguen yu pirau pasrabguen indan..

Nai undaarailѳ nambe Tiuswei Espíritutѳga waminchibelѳ guer chibelan mundѳgucha ke chi tain gúindѳ kѳreb pѳnrrѳmѳtay. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nѳm espíritu tѳgagúigwan maig kѳtashchab ashibmerrig asamig kѳn, Tiuswei Espíritu gúin gúi, k'abe peg espíritu gúin gúi. Kaguende yu piraube webambin gѳn k'a isatѳ Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ guer chibelѳ.
Namui manrrѳguen namun chiwan gѳben kalѳ gѳn chib kebachib basrѳbene, Tiusbe namui manrrѳ lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, purѳ nuig kui kѳppe, nѳbe chiwandѳgucha kerrigu ashibig kѳn.
Nam ѳyamay marѳb pѳnrrѳwabe, newan ciertѳnigweimburabelѳyu pѳnrrabelѳ gѳbrain gúi mѳra, yandѳ namui manrrѳmeran Tiuswei merrab chi isumѳ tѳga bѳnrramig kѳnrrun.
Inchen mѳikkѳben yu pirau chi palѳmíig tѳgaig kѳbendѳ, nui nuneebe palaig megamne trunun ashatѳgucha merѳ gúi inchib, purugumubene, trube ¿Tiuswei undag kѳbiibe nuinuube chincha basrѳnrrab gѳ?
Mutѳgucha nui nunewan ashig kѳmui inchibgѳba uñibiibe kweechiptiig kѳn. Ñimbe ashibelѳ gúinrrun kan kweechiptiibe tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwane chigaig kui.

Caín lataitѳwein gѳmugun. Truima tru kwaimandzig, larrѳ gaigwein gua, nui nunewan kweetsig kѳn. ¿Nѳbe chigurrin gweetsig kѳh? Kaguende Caín nѳ mariilѳbe k'aig mariilѳ gѳben, nuneg mariilѳbe sѳlgandѳ tabig mariilѳgurrin gúig kѳn.
Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan srѳsrѳgurri ñim wamindi mѳriibe iig kѳn: nam k'angurrin gangurri undaarayamig.

Mutѳgucha Tiusweinug kallabiibe kaigwane marѳb uñmѳn, kaguende tru ѳsig kѳmig Tiusweinug pasrabig nuinug pasrѳben. Treekkurri kaigwane marѳbig martrab gaiman, kaguende nѳbe Tiusweinug kallaweig kuikkurri.k
Ureezheelѳ, mugѳben ñimun pelѳsrkainab pѳnrrѳnrrab gѳmѳ. Sѳlgandѳ marѳb uñibiibe, sѳlgandѳ tabig kѳn, Clistѳ nѳ newan sѳlgandѳ tabig kѳb lataitѳwei.
Mutѳgucha nuinuutѳ pasrabig pasrabiibe k'aigwan marѳbig marmuben, k'atѳ mutѳgucha k'aigwan marѳb uñibiibe nune ashmѳwei, k'atѳ mu gúi nebua ashmíig kѳn.
Ñimbe yandѳ ashibelѳ gѳn, Jesucristѳbe yu piraumay arruppe, namui kaig mariilan kerranrrab arrig kui. Katѳ nuinuube chigucha chi kaig mariibe kaagѳn.
Mutѳgucha k'aig marѳbiibe tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwane k'alѳ marѳb itѳbunan. Kaguende tru k'aig mariibe tru pѳrigwane itѳbunig, treeg kѳn.

Nai undaarailѳ, yandѳ nambe Tiuswei ureemera guer. Incha namune mѳimbatѳbe tru wendѳsrѳ nam maig kѳmigwane kenamarmѳ srѳ gúindѳgucha, yandѳ Jesucristѳ kenamisrene, nѳ lataitѳwein gѳmig kѳnrrab gúi nambe asha guer. Kaguende nѳ maig kuigwan yandѳ truyube nam nebua asam gѳnrrab gѳn.n
Jesucristѳbe sѳlgandѳ tabig kui ñim ashibelѳ guabe, trube, mutѳgucha sѳlgandѳ marѳbelane Cristѳinug kallawar gúin gúi asamig kѳn..
Inchawei ureezheelѳ, mѳimbe nuinug kanbalatѳ pѳnrrabig pѳnrray, nѳ kenamisren, chi isumѳ, nui merrab pѳnrrab, katѳ, nѳ arruben, nui merrab kѳrig misra kѳrrѳmisramig kaanrrai.
Na ñimun iigwan pѳrѳppe, isatѳ may wamincha ñimun kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab inchibelaimburab pѳrar.n
Inchen Jesucristѳ tru namun trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisriibe iig kѳn, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmig.
Mutѳgucha Nusrkawan ashmíig kur chibiibe Mѳskawangucha chigaig kѳn. Inchen mѳikkѳben Nusrkaweimburab nѳbe mu gúi ashig kur chibiibe, truibe Mѳskawangucha treetѳwei tѳga basran.
Nabe ñimun pѳrѳppe, newan ciertѳnigwan ashmeelѳ gúimba gѳmѳtѳ, ñim ashibelѳ gúimba bѳrar. Katѳ ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, chitѳgucha isatѳ indiibe tru newan ciertѳnigugurri arrumíig kuin gúi.
Inchendѳ ñimbe Espíritu Santѳiwan itѳlusig tѳgar gua, treekkurri ñimbe chiwandѳgucha ashibelѳ gѳn.

Ureezheelѳ, yandѳ srabe gwalѳmmera puin gѳn. Tru Clistѳn ashig kѳmui inchibig attrab gúi ñimbe wammѳrѳbelѳ gѳn. Inchawei mѳi yangucha tru Clistѳ guer chibelѳ truba rruba amrruin gѳn. Treekkurli nambe yandѳ srabe gwalѳmmera gúi aser.

Na ñim mѳskalan pѳrar, kaguende nun srѳsrѳgurri manawei basrabigwan ñim nebua ashibelѳ gúimba. Na ñim matsѳrelan pѳrig kѳn, kaguende ñimbe kѳrrѳmѳ, mur pѳnrrabelѳ gúikkurri, gatѳ Tiuswei wam ñimui manrrau basrѳben, Satanás, tru larrѳ gaigwan kanaig kuimba.
Inchen nui nunewan ashig kѳmui inchibiibe lѳstѳyu basrab, katѳ lѳstѳyu unan. Incha nѳtѳwei chumay ib pasrarmabguen ashmѳn, kaguende lѳstiibe nui kabmeran ashmѳnrrai kasrѳben.n
Inchen nui nunewan undaarabiibe tѳryu basran. Incha nuinuube srurrengwangarubiibe chigagѳn.
Inchen gѳben nabe ñimun martrai karua basrig ñimun srѳig pѳrar, nuinug lata, ñimuinug lata ciertѳnig. Kaguende tru lѳstiibe yandѳ pureb iben, tru tѳr newan ciertѳniibe yandѳ pilabguen basran.
Mѳikkѳben Tiusba kanbalatѳ lincha basrar chibiibe, Jesucristѳ nѳ maig uñibig kѳben, treetѳwei unamig kѳn.k
Inchen mѳikkѳben: Nabe Tiuswan ashibig kur chibendѳ, nѳ maig maramig martrai karuilan mѳra marmubene, truibe isaptiig kui webiben, tru newan ciertѳniibe nuinuube pasrѳmѳn..
Namui kaig mariilѳgurri Tiuswei namig kѳbigwan nѳ uta basramisra namuyasig nѳ kwaig kѳn, trurrigu namuiwandѳ gѳmѳtѳ, yu pirau maya misaamerai kerriguelaimba.
Inchen nam chigucha kaig mara gѳmeelѳ guer chib pѳnrrѳwabe, trube, nambe Tiuswane ka isaptiig kui mara tѳgagѳben, nui wambe namuinug basrѳmѳn.

Nam chigѳben k'aig mariilan treeg marѳbwei inchar cha Tiuswan eshk'abene, nѳbe namui k'aig mariilan ulѳ baymѳ pesannab, chigurrimbunѳ namui k'aigwan chish marѳb indamig nѳbe chi isumgaig sѳlgandѳ marѳbig kѳn.
Jesucristѳ namun wammѳrѳsrkѳb kusrenanigwan mѳi ñimun nam eshkaibe iig kѳn: Tiusbe tѳr gѳben, nuinuube chigucha lѳstiibe kaagѳn cha trendaig.
Tru ѳsig kѳmibe yandѳ ashchai kenamisren, nambe trunun asig kѳn. Incha nambe trunun ѳyeeg chib wammѳrѳsrkѳb eshker, tru managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan. Truibe Mѳskaimba pasrѳwa, namun kenamisrig kѳn..
Inchawei nai undaarailѳ, iigwan yandѳ kanmaytѳ chab wammѳrarbe, tab asha amѳnay, tru larrѳ gailѳ may wamindiitѳga ñimun pelѳsrka, ñim tabig mur pѳnrrainukkurri kѳrrѳsrkainab pѳnrrѳmѳnrrappe.

Nui pѳriilѳyu trumѳrig iilan nѳbe ñimun wamindan, truilѳyu k'anbalѳmerabe tab chigúinguen mѳramgailѳ gѳben, truburab nebua ashmeelѳba, tab pѳnrrѳmeelѳbabe Pablѳi pѳriilan ke k'a k'alѳ marѳb, peemaytѳ gusrenanan, Tiuswei wam pѳriilan k'atѳganbalѳmerasrѳ lataitѳwei. Nѳm treeg marѳppe, nѳmdѳwei pinisailѳ gѳmigwan lab pѳnrran.
Tius tru trannrrab misra kѳrrѳmisligwan nambe munig meler, tru srѳmbala srѳigwanba, srѳ birѳwanba truilѳyube tru sѳlgandѳ tabig malig tѳgaigwan.
Tius tru arrum gwalѳmwan muniirab, ke petѳ punrraimab inday. Tru gwalѳmbe srѳmbalamerabe naarawa, chab pinѳben, chigѳben truyu pѳnrrabiibe tru naarabigu chab piranrrun.

Pѳs tru Señѳr arrum gwalѳmbe kan niliig arrub lataitѳwei chi isumѳ gѳben attrun. Inchen srѳmbalamerabe purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig wanrrѳb nѳѳrѳtѳ misren, katѳ truyu chine pѳnrrabelѳbe naarab pillllanrrun. Inchen pirѳba, truyu chigurrimbunѳ pѳnrrabelane kerrigu parra, pinisaig kѳnrrun.k
Katѳgucha iigwan isua guy, nai undaarailѳ: Señѳrweimbe kan gwalѳmdѳ mil añѳs lataig kѳben, mil añѳsbe kan gwalѳmdѳ lataig kѳn.m
Inchawei tru urassrѳ pirѳwanma sre bua pi bulingarua, chab pinisaig kѳbig kѳn.m

Inchabe trenchinrrun: Clistѳ tru gatѳ attrab cha kѳrrѳmisliibe ¿mandiindah? cha. Chima tru merrabsrѳ namui kѳlli misaamera kwaikkurlimbunѳ, katѳ srѳsrѳ pirѳwan malikkurlimbunѳ maig kѳbiibe trubatѳ kagѳn cha.
Incha iigwanmerrig isua guy: srabe gwalѳmmerawane misaamera Tiusweimburabigwane ka indzatѳ ashib, chigѳben cha mѳrѳbelѳ treeg inchib amrrunrrun, nѳmui asr maig palai inchen treeg marѳbelѳ.
Nai undaarailѳ, na ñimun srѳsrѳ pѳrig kѳmnetѳ k'atѳgan na ñimun pѳrtrab inchar. Srѳsrѳ bѳrigu lata, mѳim bѳrigu lata, ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg melѳnrrigay chib watchab inchar, ñimui tabig chishchig isuilѳyu.

Kaguende namui Señѳr Jesuclistѳ tru Kaigyugurli Wesrabigwan nebua asha, i pirau kѳsѳngѳmdiig maramigugurli yandѳ wegѳrra, katѳyug ѳyeeg kaig maliilѳyutѳwei ilѳsrka, truitѳ srua irramabelѳbe, katѳbe srѳsrѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, purѳ gailѳguen gѳrrѳmisran.

Nѳmbe katѳganelan chi ilѳsrkaimíig elatsiilѳ gѳnrrai martrumѳn chibelѳ gѳn, nѳmdѳweinguen trѳmbѳig asamguengaig kѳsѳngѳnrraptiig mariilѳyu truitѳ srua ambiilѳ gѳbendѳ. Kaguende mѳitѳgucha nѳ chi marѳb pasrailѳ kanarramabiibe, yandѳ truitѳ srua yaim basran..
Tru treeg misaamerabe kan kѳlѳmѳ piguumera chi bigaig, purgѳlig latailѳ gѳn, kan wañimera mur isig icha srua ambi latailѳ. Truilane purѳ rrѳmbѳ lѳstѳyu bѳnrrѳnrrai pѳnsrailѳ gѳn.
Sѳlgandѳ tabig amѳnaig mayugurri tarѳmisra, tru Beѳrwei nusrk'ai Balaam daig maig marѳb unigwan merrarrawa amba pelig kѳn. Tru Balaamma k'aig mara an bagaraig utamigwan undaaraben,

Nѳmbe sѳlgandѳ tabig marmuimburѳbe nѳmbe sѳlgandѳ tabig mariimíitѳwei utѳnrrun. Kaguende nѳmbe kwalѳmguen nѳmui asr maig miaben, kaig maramelane, purѳ tabig mѳrѳrai inchib, kasrag marѳbelѳ gѳn. Truilѳbe kѳsѳngѳnrrapteelѳ, chillig inchib mindishibelѳ treelѳ gѳn. Nѳm ñimba lincha mab warainug, kaig kegѳrrѳsrkѳbigu purѳ tab gúi mѳrѳb nѳmbe warabelѳ gѳn.m

Trune ángelesmera murelѳ gúigu lata, nѳmui maramburab maramig tѳgagúigu lata, tru mѳguelѳ lataguen gѳmѳ, mas nѳrreelѳ gѳbenguen truilѳbe, tru srѳmbalasrѳ nѳrreelѳ karubelan Señѳrwei merrab tsalѳ wamѳmeelѳ gѳn, kaig nebuig mѳra bѳnrrѳbash chib.m

Inchawei Señѳrbe nuyasiitѳ gѳnrrab pѳnrramisra bѳnrrabelane, maig inchibig kѳtashchab asamig puin bѳnrrѳben, truyugurri wesrappe, sѳlgandѳ tabig marmeelane esegappa bѳnsrѳbig kѳn, tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha marѳb gwalѳm mѳra melѳnrrai maramig.
Inchendѳ Lѳtwan, tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwane wesraig kѳn. Tru Lѳtbe chu uragucha larrѳ gaig misaamera ashikken gѳnrrabgaig trѳmbѳig marѳb amѳñiben asha, truba isui inchib tab gѳmui megabig kѳn..

Katѳ merrabsrѳ yu pirau misaameran chigucha Tiusbe k'aig marigwan treetѳ kѳrrѳmisrtrain gѳmѳ, ulѳ bayig kѳbig kѳn. Inchendѳ tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan eshk'ab waminchibig Nѳéwanba, k'atѳgan sieteelanbatѳ chinchimuig kѳbig kѳn, yu pirau k'aig misaameraim bala pi bulabigwan arringarub uras.

An bareelѳ gѳptѳ, nѳmdѳ isua, purѳ may isa wamincha, ñimune an wesrab srua gѳnrrun. Inchendѳ nѳmun kaigyu pѳnrrѳnrrai manasrѳwei pѳnsraibe mu katamgaig petѳ punrrun, kaguende nѳmune pinisailѳ gѳnrrai pѳnsrailѳ gua..

israelita misaamerai utuma Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ guer chibelѳ isapteelѳ kuig kѳn. Katѳ ñimui utugucha treetѳwei isatѳ peemaytѳ gusrenanѳbelѳ kѳnrrun, llisk'a nѳmui isuitѳga kusrenaniilѳ pinishinrrabigwan mu ashmѳwatѳ treeg kusrenaniilѳ keera bѳnsrѳnrrabelѳ. Katѳ treetѳ gѳmѳtѳ, Señѳr tru nѳmun k'aigyugurri wesranrrab penabigwanguen chigucha gѳmíig kui lataig mara gѳrrѳmaran, nѳmuyasiitѳwei mѳi mѳi pinisaig kѳmigwan lab.
Trurligu iigwane purѳ tab isua tѳgagѳmig kѳn: Tius maig karuigwan eshkanrrai Tiuswei wam pѳligu pѳnrrabelane ni mѳnundѳgucha mugѳben ka nuinetѳ isua, ѳyamay gѳn chib pasramig kѳmíig kuin gúi.
nambe mѳrѳbelѳ guer tru wam srѳmbalasrѳngurri nun ѳyeeg waminchen, Tius tru nuindѳ tarѳmara basrin dunsrѳ Señѳrba nam pѳnrrѳwa..

Kaguende Tius Mѳskai nun truba tab indigwanba, tѳrguegwalmabigwanba utѳben, tru Purѳ Nuig Tѳrguegwalmabiisrѳngurrimbe kan wam arruppe: Iibe nai undaaraig Nusrkain gѳn cha. Nabe nѳgurri truba kasrag war cha, trenchiben,
Katѳ nabe mumaytѳgucha ñimuyasig maramdiigwane martrab inchar, na kwaimbala ñim chu uragucha iilan isub marѳb gѳnrrai.m
Namui Señѳr Jesucristѳ nane tѳrgandѳ eshkaben, nabe petѳ kwam gúi mѳrar..
Na pirau ѳsig uñipbatѳbe ѳyeelѳ wamindiitѳga isuptѳ melѳnrrai kuñapbatѳ megamig sѳl gúitamab isur.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, nai nunelѳ, ñimun Tius wamigwanba, lawa wesrub indigwanbabe, ñimuinug t'ab pasrѳnrrai gatѳguchinguen gѳnrrab inday, kaguende iilan marabe, managuen srurrengwamѳnrrabguen.
Inchen iilan chigaibe kan kabgaig lataig, kabe kan yab nebua ashchab gaimabig lataig kѳn, merrabsrѳ nui kaig mariilan chish marigwane yandѳ chab pesannaweig.

Tiuswan nebua asigwane asr maig miaben tru gúindѳ marmuitѳga nemaray. Asr maig miaben tru gúindѳ marmuigwane chigúingucha tammay yandѳ, yandѳ melamitѳga nemaray. Tru tammay yandѳ, yandѳ melaigwane Tiuswan maikken tarѳmisrmѳ tabig amѳnaitѳga nemaray.n

Inchawei treeg kѳbene, iilan tѳgagѳnrrab truba tranrramig kѳn: Tru isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra tѳgagúigwane iigwan nemaramig kѳn, maig kѳben inchimѳ, tabig amѳnaitѳga. Tru tabig amѳnaigwane Tiuswan nebua asiitѳga nemaray.

Tius nui maramburab mariitѳga namun ѳsig waramigweyasig lutѳgurri chi palabigwanba, nuyasiitѳ tabig amѳnamig kѳnrraimba namun tranig kѳn, nѳ trendѳ tѳrguegwalmabig kuitѳgaba, nѳ purѳ tab indiitѳgaba nѳ namun nebua asingarua..
Katѳ k'angurrin gangurri undag kѳbiitѳga muchab manguen k'a amѳñigueh tay. Ñim Jesucristѳielѳbe mayeelѳba chi isumgaig tab gѳbigwan tѳgagѳnrraimab isur.
Tru iglesia Babilѳniasrѳ ñimun latawei lawa wesruig pasrabiibe ñimun ka warѳgueh cha ѳran, katѳ Marcѳs nai nusrkai lataikkucha.

Mumaygucha srua irramamѳ isuamѳra amѳñib, chu uragucha pesannamѳ, isuatѳ amѳnay, kaguende ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibig, tru nugwaimandziibe kan león pѳtѳgatanwan namig mullib uñib lataig unan, mѳigwan gѳben manrrab lab.n
Ñim chigѳben truba isub tѳga bѳnrrailane Tiuswandѳ pѳnsray. Kaguende nѳbe ñimuimburab tab gѳnrrai isua martrab wabig kѳn.

Katѳ treetѳwei ñim matsѳrelѳgucha tru Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pѳnrrabelane maig chiben trunun mѳray. Sѳteelѳba kangurlin gangurli maig kѳben inchimѳtѳ, tru tammayig kѳnrrai marѳbiitѳga truitѳ pinѳgasrailѳ amѳnay. Kaguende: Nuinetѳ nuig mѳrѳrai inchibelane Tiusbe sѳtѳbasramisrѳb gurrappe, trune chigucha gѳmeelѳ tammayelane nui ka yandѳ tab indigwan Tiusbe tranѳbig kѳn cha.
Tiuswei maramburab marѳb tasig umbu nѳrreelѳ misrѳb pѳnrrѳmѳ, utsѳbasray, yandѳ nѳ treeg maramig puben, ñimun nѳrreelѳ martraimbe.
Ñim ashib tѳgagѳnrrai ñimun traniilane ñimuielѳ gúi lata, ke ñim garua srua gѳmѳtѳ, ñim mandѳ amѳnaitѳga nѳmguen asha kusrenrrai maray.

Tius nui ubishameran ñim ashib tѳgagѳnrrai nѳ ñimun traniilane t'ab ashib tѳgaguy, ke martrai inchendѳ gѳmѳtѳ, ñimashib treeg martrab isua marѳb, Tius maig palain gѳben, treeg. Katѳ ke anwandѳ chull inchimѳ, ñimui maramigwan marѳppe, palabinѳ gѳmѳ, t'ab maramig kѳn.

Inchawei Tius maig kѳnrrain gѳben kaigyu puraambub melabelѳbe sѳlgandѳ tabigwan marѳbig marѳb melamig kѳn, nѳmui mѳsiimeran Tius tru Chiwandѳgucha Marѳbigwei tasku pѳnsrѳb. Pѳs nѳbe managucha elachimíig kѳn.k
Inchen, Sѳlgandѳ t'abig pasrab mѳwanguen kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmibe truba murig kuibe, ¿Tiuswan kѳriibala pѳnrrѳmeelaimba, kaig marѳbelaimbabe mas maig kѳnrrerah?
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, mѳikkѳben Cristѳin gua kaig nebuig megawabe, kѳrig kui inchimѳta. Cristѳi munchiwan ñimun pasra wamikkurri masken Tiuswan truba tabig wamindamig kѳn.k
Ñim mѳikkѳben kweecha gúi, kabe nila gúi, kabe larrѳ gaig kua gúi, kabe nuimburab gѳmubendѳ, marѳb kegala gúi, treekkurri kaig nebuinab megabgun..
Ñimbe mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn, ñimun Cristѳgurrindѳ mugѳben tsalѳ wamѳbene. Kaguende tѳrguegwalmab Espíritu, tru Tiuswei Espíritube ñimuim bala basran.n
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, masken Cristѳimburab nѳba treetѳwei kaig nebuinab puraambub ambamig tѳgaguabe, kasraaray, Cristѳ tѳrguegwalmabig kenamisren, ñim truba kasraaramig kѳnrraimbe.
Nai undaarailѳ, kan maig inchibig kѳtashchab purѳ murig nag lataigu ñimun puraambamig nebubene, chindimbarre ѳyeeg kermab isumѳwei, katѳ kan managuen treeg bumíig kui lataig isumѳwei inday..
Kangurrin gangurri ya bebay, chigѳben cha mѳrmѳtѳ.
Ñimui utube undag kѳbigwanmerrig masken dѳgagѳmig kѳn. Kaguende undag kѳbiibe purѳ nѳrrѳ kalѳ mariilan chishtѳ gasrѳbig kѳn..
Chitѳgucha yandѳ patsѳnrrabig pumibe lutaurab arrun. Inchawei ke tab asha, tab isua bѳnrray, Tiusba tab wamindamig kѳnrraimbe.k
Inchawei nѳmune mѳimbe pesriig asѳnan yandѳ nѳmun ñim treetѳwei nѳm trѳmbѳig marѳb llirab pѳnrrainug lincha marѳb pѳnrrѳmubene. Incha treekkurri ñimune trѳmbѳig waminchibelѳ gѳn.

Tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Tiuswan ashmeelѳ maig marѳbelѳ gѳben, merrabsrѳ ñim treegwei marѳb amѳnaibe yandѳ trutѳ tsabѳ gѳn. Pѳs trѳmbѳig kaig indiilѳyu amѳñib, trѳmbѳig kailѳ martrab isub, mutsiirab, kaig fiestamerayu amѳñib, katѳ tulundzuna mutsiiramburab mutsiirab, katѳ chiwangѳben kan tius kui lataig inchibelѳ larrѳ gailѳ gѳn, nѳmbe..
Incha nѳbe mѳimbe srѳmbalasrѳmay ya, Tius Mѳskawei kusrmay waben, katѳ ángelesmera lat'a, nѳm ashib karub pѳnrrabelѳ lat'a, maramburab marѳbelѳ lat'a nѳ maig chiben mѳrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen tru pibe tru mѳi ya piu umbu ulsra kaigyugurli wesrailѳ gѳmigwan eshkabig kuig kѳn, Jesuclistѳ kwawa, katѳle ѳsiiraikkurli. Tru piu umbu ulsraibe asrwan chillig kѳmѳnrrai chishmarѳbig kѳn cha eshkabig kѳmѳtѳ, Tiusweimburab namui isub kebachib pasrabigu chi kalѳ gѳn chibig chigaig mѳingurlimbe nѳbatѳ pasramigwan eshkabig kuig kѳn.
Incha nѳbe espíritu gúig kѳppe, tru espíritumera merrarrawa, keeriilѳ pѳnrrabelan Tiusweimburabigwan eshkab kusrenanig kѳn.
Tius trendѳ treeg kѳnrrain gѳbene, sѳlgandѳ marѳb megawa, k'aig indinab megamikken sѳl gѳn, k'aig mara gѳmѳtѳ.

Masken treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Cristѳne ñimui manrraube nѳ ashib karub pasrabig mara tѳga bѳnrray. Tru ñim Tiusweimburabigwan muniirab melaigwan mugѳben: ¿Treebe maig kѳ? cha ñimun payene, mandѳ lѳtamigwan chu urastѳgucha isua busra amѳnay. Inchendѳ treeg marѳppe, nѳmune maig kѳbash inchimѳtѳ, kwa tammay maray.
Kaguende Señѳr Tiuswei kabmerabe sѳlgandѳ tabelaim bala ashib pasrѳben, nui kalumerabe nѳba wamindiilan mѳrtrab muniitѳ basrabig kѳn. Trune Señѳr Tiusbe kaig marѳbelane nѳmuingatѳ basrѳmѳn.m
Kaigyugurri wemallib, tabig sѳlwan maramig kѳn. Ambugurri igurri tab gѳnrrabigwan lab, truwan unamig kѳn.

Mugѳben chigѳben kaig marene, lata treetѳwei marmѳwei, tsalѳ wamѳbene, lata treetѳwei lѳtѳmѳwei inday ñimbe. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ñimgurrimbe mayanguen tabig kѳnrrun chinrrigay. Kaguende Tius wamappe, ñimun tabigwan utѳnrrai wamig kѳn.
Trube, mѳimbe ñim mayeelѳba kandѳ lat'aig isua lincha bѳnrray. Chigѳben kanelan nebubene, nan gúi lat'aig isub, nunelѳ lat'aig undaarab, t'ab inchibelѳ gѳb, kѳramgailѳ t'ammayelѳ guy.
Pѳs merrabsrѳngucha ѳyeegwein gѳbig kѳn, ishumburmera Tiusweyasig tarѳmariilѳ tru tabzhig nѳm tѳgagúibe. Nѳmbe Tiuswandѳ muniirabelѳ gua, nѳmui kelѳ maig chiben treeg melabelѳ gѳbig kѳn.
Ñimui tabzhiibe asru pala tamalikkurlin gѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ guy, pusrugwan purѳ tabig tamarѳb, ѳrѳmera tabzheelѳ pѳnsrѳb, purѳ nѳrrѳweyelѳ keb indiilѳyu.
tru ñim chishig tabig amѳnaigwanba, kѳriibala melaigwanba nѳm nebua asha.k

Inchawei treetѳwei ñim sralѳgucha ñimui kelan maig chiben tammay mѳrѳb melay. Kelѳ mѳilѳgѳben Tiuswei wamwan kѳremeelѳguen, kan rliitѳguen wamindamig palain gѳmѳ, ñim maig kѳbash kѳmѳ, mandѳ tab melaigwan ashatѳ, Tiuswei mayu punrrai,
Kaguende ñimbe merrabsrѳmbe kan ubishamera pella, nѳѳrѳtѳ amѳñib latailѳ gúig, mѳimbe gatѳle Ubisha Ashibigweimay amrruin gѳn, tru ñimui mѳsiimeran chu uragucha chinchimѳnrrai Ashibigweimay.
Nѳma chigucha chi kaig marmѳwei, ni mana gwalѳm mungucha may wamincha isѳmѳwei inchibig kѳn.

Tiusbe ñimun wamappe, ѳyeeg nebunrraiwei wamig kѳn. Kaguende Cristѳgucha ñimuyasig truba kaig indinab megaig kѳbig kѳn. Nѳma maig uñibig kѳben, ñim treetѳwei asha kusrenrrain gúig kѳn, ñim truwandѳwei amѳñibelѳ gѳnrrai.
Kaguende ѳyeebe tabig kѳn, mѳigwan gѳben isumdiig arruben treegu ka awentab, chi kaig marmubendѳ, maig kѳbash puinab megamig kuindѳgucha Tiuswan isua basrabig kuikkurri.

Ñimbe amѳñippe, chi ilѳsrkѳbig chigaig ñimuimburab amѳñibelѳsun amѳnay. Inchendѳ chi ilѳsrkaimíig namuimburab amѳñibelѳ guer chiptѳ, trunune kaig maramigweyasig merrarrawa, marѳb gѳmumig kѳn. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, Tiuswei maramigu marѳb melabelѳ latailѳ tab isua amѳnay.
Kaguende Tiusbe ñimune sѳlgandѳ martraiwei isun. Trumay marene, tru chugúinguen mѳrmubendѳ waminchibelѳ chinetѳ wamindiilane ñimbe mu mandamgaig kasra bѳnsrѳnrrun.
katѳ kubenadurmeran lata, kaguen truilѳbe kailane mѳrѳsrkѳb, katѳ sѳlgandѳ marѳbelane nѳmdѳwei tabig waminchai Tius ѳriilѳ gúimba, treetѳwei nѳmune mѳramig kѳn.

Judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamera Tiuswan ashmeelai utube nѳmguen ñimun asha kusrenrrai amѳnay, ñimune ke larrѳ gailѳ gúi lataig wamindindѳgucha, ñim tabig mariilan ashabe, mayeelan maig mariilan Tius bayib gwalѳm truilѳbe Tiuswan truba tabig waminchai.
Ñimbe merrappe Tiuswei misaamera gѳmuig kѳn. Trune mѳimbe si, nui misaamera gѳn. Merrappe ñimbe Tiuswei lastima asigwan utѳnrrab gaima gúig, mѳimbe lastima asigwan yandѳ ñimbe nebua uta bѳnrran..

Ñim nundѳ kѳrebelaimbe tru sruube purѳ nuig tabig kѳn. Inchen tru nundѳ kѳremeelaimburappe Tiuswei wamwan pѳriilѳyu ѳyah taibe nebun: Tru ya marѳbelѳ kaasig sruube niga basrѳnrrai katsigu pѳlbasrtrab wayig srukken misrig kѳn daig.m

Inchawei Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn: Siѳnsrѳ kan srug trarrar cha. Truibe katsigu pѳlbasrtrab wayi srug, lawa wesruig, purѳ tabzhig kѳn cha. Trunundѳ isua basramisrѳbiibe kѳriimisra gѳrrѳmisrtraamѳn cha.
Ñimbe Señѳrwan kemalay, tru ѳsig Srugwan. Truigwane misaamera kaashippe, kaasig kѳbendѳ, Tiusweimbe lawa wesruig, purѳ tab sruuzhig kѳn.
Kaguende ñimbe yandѳ Señѳrwane purѳ tabig kuin gúi tsabѳ ashibelѳ gѳn.

Kan srѳ gallaig ureezheelѳ pitsѳ muchig kuinchib lataitѳwei, tru Tiusweimburabig pitsѳ chi peeba lindisaimíig lataigwan ñimbe ke chindamdѳ gúi inchib lay, truikkurri nѳrrѳrawa, k'aigyugurri wesraig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳnrrab.
Trune Señѳrwei wambe managatig kѳnrrabig kѳn cha. Inchawei i tru wam ñimun eshkaibe tru tabig srѳ wam truig kѳn.m

Incha mѳimbe, tru newan ciertѳnigwan ñimbe mѳra marikkurri ñimui mѳsiimeran chish marin gѳn, nunelan k'a undaaranmab ashchaindѳ gѳmѳtѳ, undaaranrrab isua, undaarabelѳ gѳnrrab. Inchawei k'angurrin gangurri manrraugurri newan isua undaaramburab undaaray.

Inchawei ñimbe nѳgurri Tiuswan kѳrewa bѳnrramisran, tru Cristѳn kwailai utugurri ѳsiirangarua, katѳ nune tѳrguegwalmabig kѳnrrai marѳbigwan. Inchawei treeg kѳbene, ñimui isubigwan Cristѳinug pasra tѳgagúigwanba, truba rruba munig melamigwanba Tiusweinuutѳ pѳnsra gѳnrrain gѳn..

Mѳigwandѳgucha atsi marmѳtѳ, nѳm maig mariilan maig kѳnrrabigwan marѳb Tiuswan ñim: Namui Mѳskain cha, wamabelѳbe, chu urastѳgucha yu pirau managatig kѳmѳ, ka petѳ warabelѳbe, nune kѳriibala amѳnamig kѳn.n
Inchawei nui wamwan pѳriilѳyuma Tiusbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñimbe newan t'abelѳ guy cha, nama newan t'abig kur cha.
Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, kaiba lindiimíig chishig newan tabig amѳnay. Kaguende Tius nѳ wamabiima newan tabig kѳn.
Inchawei treeg kѳbene, chi maramigwane kanmaytѳ tab isua, tab asha maray, tru Jesuclistѳ kenamisrѳb gwalѳm Tius ka yandѳ tab indigwan keta tranamigwane ¡gatѳ! truigwandѳ muniirab.

Inchen tru nѳm eshk'ab wamindigwane nѳmuyasig kѳnrrain gѳmѳtѳ, ñimuin gѳnrrai, Tiusbe nѳmun kenamarig kѳn. Tru srѳmbalasrѳngurri Espíritu Santѳn ѳrig treeg maringaruitѳga tru mѳin gwalѳm srѳig purѳ tabigwan ñimun eshk'abelѳ kusrenaniibe, tru merrabsrѳ Tiuswei tabig srѳ wamwan waminchibelѳ wamindigwandѳwei ñimune eshk'an. Pѳs tru ѳyeelane ángelesmeratѳweinguen nebua asinrrabna gúi indan.

I kaigyugurri wesraig kѳmigweimburappe Tius tru maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ Tius tru ka yandѳ tab indigwan ñimuin gѳnrrai nѳm waminchibelѳbe manasrѳwei maig kѳtashchab ashchab, truba rruba tab ashib, bayib laig kѳbig kѳn.
Ñimbe Jesucristѳne ashmuindѳgucha, undaarabelѳ gѳn. Katѳ mѳimbe nun kaptѳga ashippe, ashmubendѳ, nun kѳrewa, purѳ nuig purѳ tabig kui mѳra, truba kasraaran, tab gѳbiitѳ ni manchaguen chi tamgaikke,k

Kaguende isubigwan ñim Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra bѳnrraibe kan ѳrѳ lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, purѳ tabig kѳn. Tru ѳrѳnma managatig kѳnrrabig kѳmíigwanguen maig kѳtashchab ashchappe, nagu parramig kѳn. Inchawei ñimui isubigwan Jesucristѳinuutѳ pasra pѳnrraigwan maig kѳtashchab asha kѳrrѳmarikkurrimbe Jesucristѳ kenamisrѳb gwalѳmbe ñimune sѳl marig kui asamba, maya nuguen tabig indamba, katѳ tabig kui asha tab indamba indiilѳ gѳnrrun.m

Tru batsѳnrrab kѳmíig Tius namun keta tranamig tѳgagúibe pinѳnrrabig kѳmѳwei, chigѳben kaiba linchabig kѳmѳwei, merguranrrabig kѳmѳwein gѳn, tru ñim tѳgagѳnrrai srѳmbalasrѳ ñimuyasig esegaig basrabig.

Na Pedrѳ Jesucristѳ nan nѳashib karua ѳrig i kilgawan pѳrar misag nѳmuim birau gѳmѳtѳ, peesrѳ tru ѳrѳ amba warabelan, Pѳntѳ birausrѳn gѳben, Galacia birausrѳn gѳben, Cabadѳcia birausrѳn gѳben, Asia birausrѳn gѳben, Bitinia birausrѳn gѳben,
Nai ureezheelѳ, tru taska mari tiusmerane mendamisray.
Mutѳgucha Tiusweinug kallawaibe kaig maramigwan marѳbig marѳb uñmuin gúi aser. Kaguende tru Tiuswei Nusrkai nune ashib tѳga basrѳben, tru kwaimandzig, larrѳ gaibe nune chinchab gaiman.
Chigurrimbunѳ sѳlgandѳ tabig mariimíibe kaig marig kѳrrѳmisran. Inchendѳgucha tru kaig mariilѳ mѳilѳbe tru managatig mѳra basramsrѳmay srua inrrabgailѳ gѳn.
Inchawei nambe Tiuswane chi kѳrmѳ kemalla miamdiig kui aser, kaguende nam nun chigѳben miappe, nѳ maig kѳnrrain gѳben nam trumay miabene, nѳbe namune mѳrѳbig kuimba.

Inchawei Nusrk'awan tѳgaibe tru ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳben, Tiuswei Nusrk'awan chigaibe tru ѳsig kѳmigwan chigaig kѳn.Ñim Tiuswei Nusrk'awei munchiyu kѳrewa bѳnrrabelan nabe ñimun iigwan pѳrar, managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan ñim tѳgar gúi ashchai.
Inchawei Nusrkawan tѳgaibe tru ѳsig kѳmigwan tѳgagѳben, Tiuswei Nusrkawan chigaibe tru ѳsig kѳmigwan chigaig kѳn.

Mѳguelѳ treeg kѳn cha, eshkaigwanguen nam ka utiibe, Tius namun treeg kѳn cha, eshkawa pasliibe treetѳguen gѳmѳ, purѳ nuikken gѳn. Kaguende Tius treeg kѳn cha, nѳ eshkawa pasrѳppe, nui Nusrkaweimburab wamindig kѳn.
Tru pitѳgaba, anindѳgaba arrubiibe, tru i Jesucristѳ gѳn, pitѳgatѳ gѳmѳtѳ, pitѳgaba, anindѳgaba arrubig. Tru treeg arrigwane Espíritu Santѳ eshkan, kaguende tru Espíritube tru newan ciertѳnig kua.n
Tiuswan nam undaaraibe nui tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailan nam mѳra marig, truig kѳn. Inchen tru martrai nѳ k'arua pѳnsrailѳbe ke martrab gaimamdiibe gѳmѳn.
Nambe ѳyamay tru Tiuswei ureemeran undaguelѳ guermab wetѳgѳrrer, Tiuswan nam undaaraikkurrimba, katѳ nui tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailan mѳra marikkurrimba.
Mutѳgucha Jesúsbe Cristѳ gúit'amab kѳrebiibe Tiusweinug kallaweig kѳn. Incha mutѳgucha Mѳskawan undaarabiibe katѳ truigwei uregwangucha undaaran.
Kaguende manguen arrin gѳn chibiibe tru nѳ kaig mariilѳyu nѳgucha tѳgatѳ marѳb basran.
Mѳikkѳben ñimuinug arrua, tru treeg kusrenanigwan gѳmѳ gusrenanene, ñimui yau amѳ cha, kebermѳwei, ni gatѳ manguen arrin gѳn damig kѳmѳwein gѳn.
Ñimasiitѳwei tab asha melay, ñim chigѳben tabig marѳb melailan kaptѳasha bѳnrrѳmѳnrrappe. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, ñimui utamigwan kerrigu newan utamig kѳnrrai melay..

Iig kѳn nam tru undag kѳbigwan tѳga bѳnrramibe, Tius tru maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailan trunun mѳra marѳb amѳnamig. Inchen tru martrai karua basrigwan ñim srѳsrѳgurri mѳriibe undag kѳbigu amѳñinrrain daig, truig kuig kѳn..
Nabe truba rruba kasraarar ñimui ureemerai utu mѳilѳgѳben Tiuswei newan ciertѳnigu amѳnain gúimba, Tius Mѳskai namun maig karua basrig kѳben, treekke.
Nambe ñimun undaarappe, tru newan ciertѳnig namui manrrau pasraikkurrin gѳn. Inchen tru ciertѳniibe namba managatig pasrѳnrrun.
Chi isumgaig tab gѳbiibe ñiba basrѳnrrai isur. Tru tab lincha amѳñibelѳbe ñune ka uñgu tan. Katѳ ñigucha namui asiilan kanun ganun nѳmunashib treetѳweih chirrunrrig.
Nabe maya yanayutѳ ñun ashchab attrab isur malaugue waminchab.
Nabe ñun eshkamig truba rruba tѳgagѳbendѳ kilgayu tint'atѳga bѳrѳg kѳmѳt'an.
Nai undaaraig, kaig maliilan asha marmѳtѳ, tabigwan asha mar. Tabig marѳbiibe Tiuswein gѳn. Inchen kaig marѳbiibe Tiuswane ashmíig kѳn.
Nabe iglesian kan kilga pѳlig kuig kѳn. Inchendѳ Diótrefesbe na karuilan mѳrmíig kѳn, kaguende nѳmui utu chiyutѳgucha ke nѳ garub pasrѳnrrab inchibig kua.
Inchawei treekkurri nambe treeg marѳb mѳguelane purugub asamig nebunrrun, Tiuswei tru newan ciertѳnigweimburab namgucha purugúig kѳrrѳmisrtrai..
Kaguende nѳmbe Jesucristѳi munchin undag kѳb webambamig kѳn, Tiuswan ashmѳ misaamerane chigucha chi purugúig utѳmѳ.

Nai undaaraig, namui nunelan ñi tabig purugub pasraibe, ñi purѳ tabig marig kѳn, ñuimbe asiimeelѳ gúingucha gatѳguchinguen tabig marѳb.Truilѳbe iglesiayuelai merrab ñi treeg undaguig kѳn cha wamindan. Ñi nѳmui ambamigwan ambub amrrai puruguabe, Tiuswan k'asrag kѳmdiig kѳnrrai, tabig martrabguen.
Nabe truba rruba kasraarar mѳilѳgѳsrѳn namui nunelѳ amrrua, tru newan ciertѳnig maig kѳben ñibe truyutѳ pasrab, katѳ treegutѳ ñi maig unigwan nan eshkaben..
Na, Tiusweimburabelan pera marѳb pasrabig, nai tab linchibig Gayѳn pѳrar, newan ciertѳnigu na undaaraigwan..

Katѳ mѳikkѳben i librѳyu maig pub attrabigwan wamindiilan kerrabigwane tru ѳsig kѳmigwan tranѳb tusrwanba, tru Tius nuindѳ t'arѳmari ciudawanba, Tiusbe nungucha kerranrrun, i librѳyu truilaimburab chi pѳrig pѳnrrabigwan.

Maig pub attrabigwan i librѳyu pѳrigwan wamindi mѳrѳbelane mundѳgucha, isuptѳ martrai, nabe eshkar: Mѳikkѳben iilan ka yandѳ nemarѳbigwane chine kaig nebub amrrunrrabigwan nune Tiusbe nemartrun tru i librѳyu pѳrig pѳnrrabelan.m

Inchen Espíritu Santѳba, Ubishaunai Sraimbabe: ¡Amѳ! tan. Iigwan mѳrѳbikkucha: ¡Amѳ! chi. Inchen mѳikkѳben pimulgwaibe, amѳ. Katѳ mѳikkѳben mutchappe, tru ѳsig kѳmig tranѳb piwan, ka yandѳ ketig, muchi..
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn, nѳmui keilan tsarѳbelѳbe, tru ѳsig kѳmig tranѳb tusryuigwan mu merѳnrraingaig mamig tѳgagѳb, tru ciudayu yaskabmerawan kebambub indamig.
Au, na, Jesúsbe, petѳ arrumѳnrrun cha, nѳm mѳitѳgucha maig marig kѳben, truburѳ na tranamig tѳgagúigwan trannrrab srua..

Sѳlgandѳ tabig marmíibe, trube, katѳgucha treegwan ka marѳb uñ cha. Trѳmbѳig ashikken gѳnrrabgaig marѳbiibe, trube, katѳgucha treeg ka marѳb uñ cha. Inchen sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbig kuabe, trube, katѳgucha treeg marѳbig marѳb uñ cha. Inchen Tiusweyasiitѳ tarѳmarig kuabe, treetѳ pasrabig basrau cha..

nѳbe nane trenchiptinchibig kѳn: ¡ѳyeeg marmѳta! cha. Nagucha Tiuswei marѳb megabiitѳwein gur cha, ñiba, ñui nunelѳ, tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳba, katѳ mayeelѳ i librѳyu wamindiilan mѳra marѳbelѳba, truilѳ lataitѳweingue. ¡Tiuswane kѳriibala tabig waminchi! chibig kѳn..
Iigwan ashib, mѳrѳb inchibiibe, Juan, na gur. Incha yandѳ tru chab ashib, chab mѳrabe, tru ángel nan kenamarѳbigwei merrab nun kѳriibala tabig waminchab tѳmbѳnsrѳb sralene,

Truyube yandѳ yem misrtrabig kawei, truyube tѳr gѳnrrai pilѳgamig palain gѳmѳwei, nѳsig pilam balain gѳmѳweim burrѳnrrun. Kaguende Tius Señѳrbe nѳmune nѳ bilѳnrrun. Inchen nѳmbe managatig ashib karub purrѳnrrun.
Malaugue nun ashib, nui munchiwan nѳmui kappalѳmerayu pѳrig tѳgagѳb inchun..

Tru ciuda tѳbѳtagwan mas lendiig llirainuube, tru nu bi mendabe ѳsig kѳmigwan tranѳb tusr ambumay imay pinѳgasrѳbig basrabig kѳn, truibe mamimera peg, peezhig dѳce nigabig kѳn, pѳlmѳrig, pѳlmѳrig lurramig. Inchen tru tusryu ishiimerabe misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelai kwanrrѳmeran tamaramigweyasig kѳbig kѳn.

Truyube chishig kѳmíig kaiba, katѳ ashikken gѳnrrabgaig marѳbelѳba, katѳ isapteelѳbabe managuen kebamrraamѳn. Truyu kebambuppe, tru Ubishaunai librѳyu managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳrig tѳgartѳwei kebamrrun..
Inchen misaamera purѳ nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳ tru kaigyugurri wesrailѳbe tru ciudawei tѳryu amѳñiben, pirau reymerabe nѳmui chigurrimbunѳ purѳ tabzheelѳ tѳgagúilane srua amba, tranrrun.n
Tru ciudabe tѳr gѳnrrai pѳrr bilamig balain gѳmѳwei, pѳl bilamig balain gѳmѳwein gѳn, kaguende Tiuswei tѳrguegwalmabiibe tru ciudawan kebilѳben, tru ciudayu pilab basrabiibe Ubishaunѳ gѳn.

Tru dѳce yaskabmerabe dѳce perlas kѳbig kѳn, yaskabmѳlig kan perlatѳgatѳ malig kandiig kemesraimѳzhikke. Inchen tru ciudayu mas lendiig llirainuube ѳrѳtѳgatѳ malig kѳbig kѳn, ¡gatѳ! kan bigliu tѳrguelarrѳzhig lataikke.
Tru pѳtѳburab palaig kusrub mariibe jaspe sruutѳga marig kѳben, ciudabe ѳrѳtѳgatѳ marig kan bigriu tѳrguelarrѳzhig lataig kѳbig kѳn..
Incha tru pѳtѳburab palaig marigwan palamay mayan gѳtashchab unaashene, 75 metrѳsig kѳbig kѳn, tru ángel misag unaasimay unaashen.
Incha tru naba waminchibiibe ciudawan gѳben, truyu yaskabmeran gѳben, tru sruutѳga pusrig palaig marigwan gѳben unaasamig kan ѳrѳ caña tsig sruaig kѳbig kѳn.
Ciudayu tru yaskabmerabe pѳrr gallabgatѳmay pѳn, kandarѳgatѳmay pѳn, katѳgandarѳgatѳmaysrѳ pѳn, pѳrr binebgatѳmay pѳn gѳbig kѳn..
Tru ciudabe Tiuswei tѳrguegwalmabigwan tѳgaig tѳrbilabig kѳrraarrubig kѳn, kan purѳ tab sruuzhig, kan jaspe srug tѳrbilabzhig lataig, kabe kan bigliu tѳrguelarrѳzhig lataikke.

Inchen Espílitu nѳ nan tѳga basramisren ángelbe kan truba nu tun trurligu pala tunsrѳmay pera ya, nane Jerusalén, tru ciuda Tiusweindѳ tarѳmaligwan kenamarѳbig kѳn, srѳmbalasrѳngurli, Tiusweinukkurli kѳrraarrubigwan.

Inchen chigѳben kaig puben kѳrab llirawa ambubelѳba, chiweingucha kѳremeelѳba, ashikken gѳnrrabgaig trѳmbѳig marѳbelѳba, kweechipteelѳba, mѳguelѳ ishumburba trѳmbѳig marѳbelѳba, kwaimandzigweimburabelan marѳb, trѳmbѳ marѳb piimabelѳba, chiwangѳben kan tius kui lat'aig inchibelѳba, mayeelѳ isapteelѳba, mayamba iilѳbe nѳmuimburappe tru nag pisu lat'aig azufreba naarabigumay ambamig kѳnrrun cha. Truibe tru srѳsrѳ kwaig kѳmnetѳ tru katѳyug kwamig truig kѳn cha.

Inchen tru wamisra karub wainug wabiibe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe chiwangurlimbunѳ srѳitѳ maramѳnrrun cha. Inchabe katѳ nane trenchibig kѳn: Pѳr cha. Kaguende i wambe maig taibe treeg kѳb, katѳ ciertѳnig kѳb gѳn cha.
Incha nѳbe nѳmui kappimeran kerrigu pinѳmѳrtrun cha. Inchen yandѳ kwamig kawei, kisamig kawei, wamab trasamig kawei, pusrkwabig kawein gѳnrrun chib. Kaguende merrab chi kѳbiibe chab purayan cha.

Inchen nabe tru ciuda Tiusweindѳ tarѳmalig, tru Jerusalén srѳigwane srѳmbalasrѳngurli kѳrraarli ashibig kur, Tiuswei merrabgurli. Tru ciudabe kan srai misrtrabig tabzhig keweig tamara pasrab lataig pasrabig kѳn nui keg kѳnrrabigweyasig.
Incha gatѳ kan srѳmbala srѳiba, srѳ birѳba ashibig kur. Kaguende yandѳ srѳmbalaba, pirѳba srѳteelѳ gѳbelѳbe yandѳ chab pinѳben, yandѳ mar chigucha pinin gѳbig kѳn..
Inchen tru managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳli librѳyu nѳmui munchimeran truyu wetѳrramuinabelѳbe mutѳgucha tru nag pisu lataigu kebetiilѳ gѳbig kѳn.

Inchen marbe tru piyu kwaig purrabelѳ gѳbelan tranen, katѳ tru kwangarubig taiba, tru kwabelѳ pѳnrraig Hades taiba, truilѳ chigucha nѳmuinug tru kwabelѳ pѳnrrabelan tranen, nѳmune mѳigwandѳgucha maig maramigwan treeg asha mariilѳ gѳbig kѳn, nѳm maig mariilѳ gѳben treekke..

Inchen k'an wamisra k'arub waig puliig purѳ nuig pasrai ashibig kur, truyu wabigwanba. Inchen nui merrabgurrimbe pirѳba, srѳmbalababe yandѳ kerrigu trubab chab lulen, nѳmuimbe chuguen pѳnrramig k'aabig kѳn.

nѳbe pirau misaamera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelan kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrrab webinrrun, yu pirau walligurri, wagurri, ambugurri, igurri misag warabelan tru Gѳg t'aigwanba, Magѳg t'aigwanba kwayamig tulundzunѳnrrab. Inchen tru kwayanrrabelѳbe nu gѳptѳ mar mendawan kan pisrum lat'aig kѳbig kѳn.
Incha yandѳ tru mil añѳs nebuben, tru Satanáswane tru merrarrawa keera wanninukkurri elachen,
Inchen tru kwabelѳ gatѳganelѳbe tru mil añѳs purayamnegatig ѳsiirameelѳ gѳn. Iig kѳn, tru kwawa katѳyug srѳsrѳ ѳsiiraibe.

Katѳ purramisra karub purrailѳ ashibig kur. Inchen truyube maig maramigwan asha marѳb purramigwan utabelѳbe purramisrѳbelѳ gѳn. Katѳ Jesúsweimburabigwan eshkaikkurrimba, Tiuswei wamgurrimba nѳmui turmeran pariilѳ gѳbelai mѳsiimerangucha ashibig kur. Truilѳbe tru trѳmbѳgѳligwanba, tru nun treetѳwei asha marigwanba kѳriibala tabig waminchimѳwei, katѳ kappalѳyu lata, tasigu lata, marcarramamѳwei inchar gѳbig kѳn. Incha truilѳbe katѳle ѳsiirawa, Cristѳba mil añѳs ashib karub purrabelѳ gѳn.
Incha tru ángelbe tru dragѳn trѳmbѳgѳlig, tru ul merrabsriig, tru nugwaimandzig, Satanás taigwane cadenatѳga mil añѳswei merrarrawa, lusra basrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen kan ángel tru purѳ rrѳmbѳ umbu trabyu llaviwanba, truba nu cadenanba tasku sruaig srѳmbalasrѳngurli kѳrraarli ashibig kur.

Inchen tru animal trѳmbѳgѳligwane merrarraig kѳbig kѳn, tru isatѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshabig kur chibigwanbañau. Truibe tru trѳmbѳgѳligwei merrab tru maramburab mariilan asha gѳnrrai marѳbig kѳbig kѳn. Tru treeg mariitѳga pelѳsrka chab guegѳrrѳsrkaig kѳbig kѳn, tru trѳmbѳgѳligwei marcatѳga marcarramabelanba, katѳ tru trѳmbѳgѳligwan treezhigwei asha marigwan kѳriibala tabig waminchibelanba. Inchen tru animal trѳmbѳgѳligwanba, tru Tiusweinukkurri arrubig lataig marendѳ, peemaytѳ marѳbgѳligwanba tru nag pisu lataig azufreba, naarabigu ѳsiiba kebusriilѳ gѳbig kѳn..

Reymerai yauwan gѳben, maya suldaumeran ashib pѳnrrabelai yauwan gѳben, chiwangucha kѳrmѳ gwayam mѳguelai yauwan gѳben, kaullimerai yauwan gѳben, tru itѳgwanabelai yauwan gѳben, mayeelai yauwan, tru karuindiig melabelai yauwan gѳben, karuindiig melѳmeelai yauwan gѳben, kusreb mѳguelai yauwan gѳben, katѳ treeg kѳmeelaiwan gѳbengue.
Incha nui kewagúiguba, srѳptsimburappa ѳyeeg munchi pѳrig tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn: Maya Reymeraim Bala Nѳ Rey, Maya Misagwan Ashib Karub Pѳnrrabelaim Bala Nѳ Garub Ashib Pasrabig, chibig.
Inchen tru nѳrrѳ sѳtѳ srѳmbalasreelѳ mayamba pasrabiibe linѳ llensuzheelѳ pulѳzhig chishcheelѳ kewar, pulѳ gaulli itѳgwanar nui wendautѳ amrrubelѳ gѳn.
Nui kewagúibe anindѳga pisig keweig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nui munchibe Tiuswei Wam cha wamig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen srѳmbalabe kurig basrai ashiptindinaben, truyube kan kaulli puliig kenamisrѳbig kѳn. Inchen truyu tru itѳgwana wabigwane trencha wamig kѳbig kѳn: Nѳ maig kѳppe, Managucha Treetѳ Tabig, katѳ Newan Ciertѳnig cha, treeg wamig, kaguende nѳbe sѳlgandѳ tabig mariitѳga maig maramigwan asha marѳb, katѳ kwayab inchibig kѳn..

Inchen ángelbe nan trenchibig kѳn: Iigwan pѳr cha: Tru Ubishaunai kasharab yaumay manrrab linchab amrrunrrai eshkailѳbe mayanguen t'ab gúilѳ gѳn cha. Inchabe nane treekkucha chibig kѳn: Iilѳbe Tius nѳ newan ciertѳn wamindiilѳ gѳn chib.
Kasraarab, katѳ truba tab gúi mѳrѳb, katѳ nune maya nuguen tabig waminchigun chib. Kaguende mѳimbe Ubishaunѳ kasharab kasraaramig pun cha. Nui srain gѳnrrabiibe tamara basran cha.

Inchen tru wamisra karub wainukkurlimbe kan wam mѳrѳ trenchibig kѳn: ¡Ñim Tiusweiwan marѳb melabelѳ mayeelѳba, katѳ Tiuswan kѳliibala pѳnrrabelѳba, tru nѳrreelѳ kusrebelѳ gѳben, katѳ treeg kѳmeelѳ gѳben, namui Tiuswane purѳ tabig waminday! chib.
Incha gatѳyug trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Kan ѳyeebe maya nuguen tab gѳn! chib. Tru ishuwei parrig naguishbe managatig nebib pasrabig pasrѳnrrun chib.

Kaguende maig maramigwan nѳ asha mariibe, ciertѳnig, sѳlgandѳ tabig mariilѳ gѳn chib. Kaguen nѳbe tru mѳguelѳba purѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb ishug tru nui trѳmbѳig mariilѳtѳga pirau mindishibigwan mѳra basrѳnrrai pasrin gѳn chib. Katѳ Tiuswei karuindiig melabelan nѳ ani lusingaruigwan nungucha ulѳ bayib treetѳwei maran chib..
Babilѳnia ciudayube Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kweetsiilai aniwanba, Tiuswei misaameran kweetsiilai aniwanba, katѳ yu pirau mayeelan kweetsiilai aniwanba wetѳrraig kѳn.

Yandѳ ñuinuube arbas kѳnabelѳ kѳnѳben mѳramig kawei, chigѳben kѳnabelan tabzhig kѳni mѳramig kawei, lus urrabelѳ urri mѳramig kawei, trѳmpetas urrabelѳ urri mѳramig kawei, katѳ taska chigѳben tabzhig marѳbelѳ mu gawei, tirigu guichib srug tirigun kichen katѳbe managuen wanrri mѳramig kawein gѳnrrun chib.

¡Inchen ñi, srѳmbalabe, tru ciuda ѳyeeg pinѳben kasraarau! chib. ¡Ñim Tiuswei misaameraba, katѳ Cristѳ nѳashib karua ѳriilѳba, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳba kasraaray! chib. Kaguende Tiusbe ciudawan ѳyeeg nebunrrai marѳppe, ñimgurri ѳyeeg maramigwan asha mara basrin gѳn.
Incha tru Babilѳnia ciuda parrig naguishwan ashabe, trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn cha: ¡ѳyeeg nu ciudatѳweimbe katѳgane chuguen kaagúig kѳn! chib.m

¡Ke kagѳpba, kan urayutѳ chigurrimbunѳ nѳrrѳ kѳbig yeekkucha chab pinita! chib. Inchen mayeelѳ tru barcѳmeran srubelѳba, mayeelѳ maryu amburab iburab misag llirabelѳba, barcѳn ashib truyu purugub llirabelѳba, tru maryu llirab an marѳbelѳba, truilѳ kerriguelѳ yabsrѳndѳѳ bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn cha.

Incha ciudawane trenchinrrun cha: ¡Ñi purѳ chull inchib lurra maig mamimerabe ñuyasiibe k'aanrrai chab pinѳben, k'atѳ ñi chull inchib mailѳ mayzheelѳ trurrigu tabzheelѳbe ñuyasiibe k'aanrrai chab pinin gѳn chib, yandѳ managuen k'atѳbe asamikk'aikke!

canela gѳben, chigѳben may irrabzheelѳ gѳben, inciensѳ gѳben, mirra gѳben, asru srѳliilѳ may irrabzheelѳ gѳben, vinѳ gѳben, aceite gѳben, purѳ tab harina gѳben, tirigu gѳben, niisrai animalmera gѳben, ubishamera gѳben, kaullimera gѳben, kaulli sruig carrѳmera gѳben, karuindiig melabelan gѳben, misaameran gѳben, ѳyeelan yandѳ mu penѳnrrabig kaaben.n

Nun ѳyeekkatig nebui meganrrai maren, nѳmbe trunun kѳrig kѳb yabsrѳndѳѳ bѳnrrabelѳ gѳn trenchib: ¡Karrengucha gúita! ¡Karrengucha gúita! ¡Babilѳnia, kan yeeg purѳ nu ciuda, chigѳben nѳrriig marѳbig! ¡Ke kagѳppa, ke kan urayutѳ ñune ѳyeeg pinisainab pasramig nebuita! chib.k
Inchen pirau reymera tru ishuuba larrѳ rrѳmbѳig marѳb, chull gѳt'anmaptѳ chine palѳmíig purѳ t'abigu nѳba warabelѳbe nun isub, truba rruba wamab kishchun nun tru parrig naguishwan ashippe.
Nѳ kanelan maig tranig, nungucha truburѳ treetѳwei pamay rranay chib. Mutsamig nѳ gatѳganelai t'amarin cѳpayutѳwei nuimbe pamay mutsamigwan kandiig lindisha t'amaray chib.

Inchen srѳmbalasrѳngurri k'atѳgan wam trendaig mѳrѳbig kur: Ñim nai misaamerabe tru ciudayugurri webambay cha, nѳ k'aig mariilѳyu ñimgucha treetѳwei tѳgatѳ marѳb melѳmѳwei, k'atѳ chine k'aig nebunrrai marѳb arrubig nebumѳwei inchain chib.

Kaguende misaamera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳ mayamba, nѳ ke chinchimmѳrѳ inchib, mѳguelѳba trѳmbѳig maringarub vinѳn mucha, mutsiirain gѳn cha. Inchen pirau reymerabe tru ishuuba trѳmbѳig maren, pirau yanѳb, penab inchibelѳbe puarmera misrin gѳn cha, tru nun maig marѳg kѳben trѳmbѳig marѳb pasrai anmeratѳga..
Tru ishug ñi asiibe tru purѳ nu ciuda gѳn cha, pirau reymeran nѳ merrarrawa karumburab karub tѳga basrabig..

Kaguende Tiusbe nѳ maig martrab isuigwan trunun nѳm isua martrai nѳmui manrrѳmerayu pasrin gѳn cha. Treeg punrraimbe nѳmbe kandѳ isua bѳnrramisra, tru animal trѳmbѳgѳligwan nѳmui ashib karub purraigwan tranѳb inchai, Tius nѳ mandѳ wamindig treeg nebumnegatig..

Katѳ ángelbe nane trenchibig kѳn: Mѳguelѳba kaig marѳptѳ tsub ishug wamisra wainug, tru pimera ñi asiibe, tru chi misaamera gѳben, misaamera purѳ nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳ gѳben, misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabig gѳben, peg peg wam waminchibelѳ gѳben, truilѳ gѳn cha.

Inchen nѳmbe Ubishaunѳba kwayaben, Ubishaunѳbe nѳmune kananrrun. Kaguende nѳbe Maya Misagwan Karub Ashib Pѳnrrabelaim Bala Nѳ Garub Ashib Pasrabig, katѳ Maya Reymerai Nѳ Rey gua. Inchen nѳba pѳnrrabelѳbe Tius wamiilѳ, lawa wesruilѳ, nun elachimѳ melabelѳ gѳbig kѳn cha.m

Tru diez kigulmera ñi asiibe ashib k'arub purramigwan utѳmѳ srѳ bѳnrrab reymera gѳn cha. Inchendѳ tru animal trѳmbѳgѳliiba kegѳtѳ, truilѳbe reymera lataitѳwei mugucha manchinrraingaig k'arumigwan k'an uratѳ tѳgagѳmig utѳnrrun cha.

Tru siete reymerai utu trattrѳgatѳbe chab gѳrrabguen inchen, kan mѳikkѳsrѳn truilѳyuibe mѳin gwalѳm ashib karub pasrѳben, kane katѳgucha arrumѳ, srѳ gѳn cha. Inchendѳ yandѳ truig arruabe, nune maya yanatѳ kѳrrѳmisramig nebunrrun..

Tru animal trѳmbѳgѳlig ñi asiibe merrabsrѳmbe ѳsig kѳbig yandѳ treeg kѳmѳn cha. Inchendѳ tru purѳ rrѳmbѳ umbu rrabyugurri nebattrun cha, tru managatig mѳra basramnuumay inrrab. Inchen chiwangurrimbunѳ marѳb urassrѳwei yu pirau warab misaamera nѳmui munchimeran tru managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai pѳrig librѳyu pѳrig chigarbe, tru animal trѳmbѳgѳligwan ke kwaara ashchun cha, srѳtѳbe ѳsig kua, mѳi yambe pinig mu gaagua, katѳyug attrabig kui ashippe..
Tru ishuwane mutsiguig wai ashibig kur, Tiuswei misaamera kweetsiilai aniwanba, katѳ Jesúsweimburab waminchibelan kweetsiilai aniwanba mucha. Inchen nabe ashippe, truba gѳrrѳ gwaarig kѳrrѳmisrinaben

Tru ishuube piguiiba, yalѳ biguiiba keweig kѳbig kѳn, ѳrѳtѳgagѳben, tab sruuzheelѳtѳgagѳben, perlastѳgagѳben tabzhig tamaraig. Tasigube k'an ѳrѳ cѳpa mutaig kѳbig kѳn, tru mѳguelѳba trѳmbѳig marѳptѳ kѳsѳngѳmdiig mariiba, ashikken gѳnrrabgaig mariibatѳ netsiigwan.

Inchen Espíritu nѳ nan tѳga basramisren, tru ángelbe mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳmay nan srua iben, trusrѳmbe kan ishug kan animal piguiig trѳmbѳgѳligu itѳgwana wai ashibig kur. Tru animalbe Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamabig munchimera pѳriitѳ netsaig, truibe turmera siete, kigulmera diez tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn.

Inchen tru siete ángelesmera tru cѳbas siete srua pѳnrrabelai utuig kan ángel arruabe, nan trenchibig kѳn: Amѳ cha. Tru nѳrrѳ bi balamerawan wabig tru nui asrwan mѳguelan anwei yanѳb ishuwan nun chu basrѳnrrai basramigwan eshkarrumѳn cha.
Inchen tru pirѳ pi tѳbѳtag bѳnrrabelѳbe mayamba trubab chab lulen, katѳ nѳrrѳ tunmera chigucha chab rrubabelѳ gѳn.k

Inchen tru purѳ nu ciudabe pѳnbaliig misrѳb lanrra, pirisaig kѳrrѳmisren, yu pirau ciudamera pѳnrrabelѳbe kerrigu tuin bitis kegѳrrabelѳ gѳn. Inchen Tiusbe tru Babilѳnia purѳ nu ciudawan isua, tru nui cѳpayu purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbig tѳgaigwan mutsѳsrѳbig kѳn.
Incha truilѳbe tru reymeran tru hebreѳmaybe Armagedón dainug tulundzuningarubelѳ gѳn..

Au, nabe kan niliig lat'aig arrumѳnrrun. Mayanguen t'ab gúig kѳn pesannamѳ, ashiptѳ megabigweimbe, nui keigwan t'ab asha tѳgagѳb, katѳ ñi kѳsaatiig uñen, ñui kѳsagwan misagasinab, kѳrig buraimѳnrrappe.

Inchen dragѳnwei tligugurlimba, tru animal trѳmbѳgѳligwei tligugurlimba, tru ka isatѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kur chibigwei tligugurlimba pѳngatѳ trѳmbѳig marѳb kwaimandziimera urututuumera lataig asѳnabelѳ werrubelѳ gѳn.

Incha tru srѳmbalasrѳ wab Tiuswan tsalѳ wamabelѳ gѳn, tru chine nѳmun pusrkwabelѳgurrimba, katѳ trѳmbѳig pillllab pisrѳmeragurrimba. Treeg indingucha, nѳmui kaig mariilan isua mѳra Tiusweimay llirameelѳ gѳn.

Inchen misaamerabe tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig pachibiitѳga parrig kѳrrѳmisra, Tiuswei munchiwan tsalѳ wamabelѳ gѳn, tru ѳyeeg chine kaig nebub attrai arringarub maram burab marѳbigwan. Treeg kuindѳgucha nѳmbe isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirameelѳ gѳn, nun truba t'abig waminchab.

Pѳs tru pirau misaamerabe tru ñui misaameranba, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelanba kweecha aniwan lusikkurli, mѳimbe nѳmungucha ñibe ani mutsѳsrain gѳn cha. Kaguende nѳmune ѳyeeg maramigweim balaig kuig kѳn cha.

Inchen tru pimeran ani misrtrai marѳb pasrab ángelbe trendaig mѳrѳbig kur: Ñi, Señѳr, t'abig sѳlgandѳ marѳbig, mѳi ya kѳb, katѳ manasrѳngurri kѳbig, Tius Newan Tabig ñibe treeg kѳn cha. Kaguende ñibe iilan maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maran cha.
Inchen tru ángel pѳn gѳnrrabyuig nui cѳpan nѳrrѳ bimerayuba, pigabmerayuba lushene, kerriguba anindѳ misrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru ángel par gѳnrrabyuig nui cѳpan mar bala lushene, maryu pibe kan kwaigwei ani lataig misrѳbig kѳn. Inchen maryu chine ѳsiguig purrabelѳbe mayamba chab gwabig kѳn..

Inchen k'an wam truba mur wamindi mѳrѳbig kur, Tiuswei purѳ tab yaugurri tru siete ángelesmeran trenchib: Ambay cha. Incha tru siete cѳpas Tiusweinukkurri purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig namig kѳbig tѳgaig arrubigwan pirau lushchigay cha.
Inchen mѳikkѳsrѳn tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelai utuibe tru siete ángelesmeran ѳrѳ cѳpamera siete tranѳbig kѳn, Tius tru managatig ѳsig wabig, nui namig kѳbigwan truyu netsѳganiilan.
ѳyeelѳ chab puraiben, na ashene, srѳmbalasrѳ Tiuswei yaambusrѳ tru Tius nѳ basramig nuyasiitѳ tarѳmarig basrabiibe kuri ashibig kur.

Nѳmbe tru Mѳisés Tiuswei marѳb megabig cantaigwanba, katѳ Ubishaunѳ cantaigwanba trenchib cantabelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, purѳ nѳrreelѳ ñi chigѳben mariilѳbe, kwaara asamdeelѳ mariilѳ gѳn chib, Señѳr Tius Newan Maramburab Marѳbig. Ñui maymerabe tabig sѳlgandeelѳ, newan ciertѳnelѳ gѳn chib. ¡Chusrѳn gѳben misag purѳ nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelai ñi Rey gѳn! chib..
Inchen gatѳgan ángel srѳmbalasrѳ Tiuswei yaugurri webarruppe, truikkucha kan uses truba trѳsrig sruaig kѳbig kѳn.k

Srѳmbalasrѳmbe katѳgan chigѳben kѳnrrab gúitamab asha gѳmig truba nuig ashibig kur kwaara asamdiig, siete ángelesmera siete chine kaig nebunrrai marѳb amrrunrrabelѳ yandѳ srabeelan tѳgar. Truilѳtѳga yandѳ tru Tiuswei namig kѳbiibe truyu yandѳ newan patsѳgaig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen gatѳgan ángel webarrubig kѳn, altaryugurri truibe nag bilѳgamigwan nѳ ashibig. Incha tru trѳsr uses sruaigwane truba mur trenchib wamabig kѳn: Ñui trѳsr useswan srua, pirau uvas tramerayu, uvas lusrѳmeran parѳb tulishi cha. Kaguende uvasmerabe yandѳ srѳnѳ gѳn cha.
Trenchibene, tru wañim bala wabiibe pirau ellmarigu nui usestѳga barѳb puraibene, tru pirau ellmariibe tulisaig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen, na ashene, k'an pulѳ wañi kenamisren, tru wañim balabe Mѳg Misra Arrubig lataig wamisra wabig kѳn, turyube ѳrѳtѳga marig k'an cѳrѳna betsaig, tasigube k'an uses purѳ rrѳsrig sruaig.

Inchen gatѳgan ángel Tiuswei yaugurri webarrua, truba mur trashib, tru wañim bala wabigwane trenchibig kѳn: Ñui usestѳga parѳb tulishi cha. Kaguende piraube paramig yandѳ srѳnѳ gѳben, parѳb tulisamig nebun cha.

Inchen nabe srѳmbalasrѳngurri k'an wam trendaig mѳrѳbig kur: Iigwan pѳr cha: Mѳingurrimbunѳbe mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, Señѳrwan kѳrewa kwabelaimbe. ѳѳ, treegwein gѳn dan, Espíritu Santѳbe. Nѳmbe nѳmui muraara, muraara marѳb melailѳyugurri isrѳnrrun. Kaguende nѳmui mariilѳbe nѳmba lincha pasrabig basrѳnrrun cha.

Tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig kui melѳnrrai marѳb naguishbe managatig nebarrub pasrѳben, nѳmuimbe yem gwalѳm pishindѳ tab purramibe managuen k'aagѳn, tru trѳmbѳgѳligwanba, k'atѳ nundѳwei asha treezhigwei marigwanba kѳriibala tabig waminchibelaimba, k'atѳ tru nui munchitѳga marcarramabelaimba.

Inchen tru wendau katѳgan ángel tru pѳn gѳnrrabyuibe truba mur ѳyah trenchib ibig kѳn: Mѳikkѳben tru trѳmbѳgѳligwanba, tru nѳ maig kuig treetѳwei asha marigwanba kѳriibala tabig waminchib, katѳ nui marcan kappalѳyu gúi, tasku gúi utab inchibiibe

Inchen gatѳgan ángel tru wendau ѳyah chib, ibig kѳn: ¡Babilѳnia truba rruba nuibe yandѳ penan, yandѳ penan! chib, truѳrѳ tru misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelan kerriguba nui trѳmbѳig marѳg kѳbiitѳ keerѳba chinchimmѳrѳ indi vinѳn mutsamne incha, mutsiiranѳbig..

Inchabe truba mur waminchib ѳyah chibig kѳn: Tiuswane kѳriibala marѳb, truba rruba tabig wamindamig kѳn chib. Kaguende tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maramig yandѳ pun chib. Srѳmbalawanba, pirѳwanba, marwanba, kѳlѳmѳ bimeranba marѳbigwane kѳriibala tabig waminday chib.

Inchen gatѳgan ángel srѳmbalawan pala arli ashibig kur, Tiuswei tabig srѳ wam mana patsѳmíigwan pirau warabelan eshkanrrab: chu birausrѳn gѳben misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelanba, chi misag sѳtѳmera gѳben warabelanba, peg peg waminchib misaameranba, kanbalatѳ warabelѳ chi misaameran gѳben truilanba.
Nѳmui trigube chigucha isa wamindiibe chigar gѳbig kѳn, mu mandamgaig chishelѳ.

Incha tru wamisra karub waigwei merrappa, tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelai merrappa, kѳlli misaamerai merrappa tru 144.000elѳbe kerrigu srѳig mana mѳriimѳzhig cant'abelѳ gѳn. Tru cant'aigwane mugucha cant'am gusrenrrab gaimaben, pirau tru misaamerai utugurri 144.000 tru Tiuswein gѳnrrai wesruilѳtѳwei cant'abelѳ gѳn, trunune.

Inchen srѳmbalasrѳngurrimbe kan wanrrѳbig mѳrѳbig kur, kan truba rruba nu bi wanrrѳb lataig, kabe kan palaig mur trashib mullib lataig, truba yamelѳ arpas kѳnabelѳ kѳnѳben wanrrѳb lataig wanrrѳbig kѳn, truibe.n
Yubesi chigúi ashchappe, purѳ nu isumig basran. Tab chigúi mѳrѳbiibe, tru trѳmbѳgѳligwei numerѳn maya rrandashchab ash. Kaguende kan mѳwei numerѳ gѳn. Tru numerѳbe 666 kѳn.
tru trѳmbѳgѳligwei munchin gúi, numerѳn gúi marcaig chigaibe mugucha yanmѳwei, penѳmѳwei inchai.
Incha tru trѳmbѳgѳlig srѳtiigwan treetѳwei mara pasrigwane ѳsig kѳmigwan nѳbe tranѳbig kѳn, tru mara pasriibe waminchibig misra, nun kѳriibala tabig waminchimeelane mayeelan kwanrrai martrai.
Incha gatѳ nѳgucha misaamera nui maramburab marigwan asha gѳnrrai chigѳben truba nѳrreelѳ marѳbig kѳn, misaamera ashen srѳmbalasrѳngurringuen piraumay nag kѳrraarringarub.
Inchen gatѳgan animal trѳmbѳgѳlig piraugurri nebarri ashar. Truibe bagatѳ kigulmera ubishaunai lataig asѳnabig tѳgaig kѳbendѳ, waminchippe, dragѳn lataig waminchibig kѳn.
Mѳikkѳben kalubaibe mѳr.
Inchen tru animal trѳmbѳgѳliibe nui tligwan kurѳbig kѳn, Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig waminchab. Incha Tiuswei munchiwanba, nѳ pasraigwanba, srѳmbalasrѳ purrabelanba purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamabig kѳn.

Incha misaamerabe tru dragѳnwan kѳriibala tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn, kaguende dragѳnbe tru trѳmbѳgѳligwan nui karumburab karumigwan martrai tranikkurri. Katѳ tru trѳmbѳgѳligwangucha treetѳwei kѳriibala tabig waminchib trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kan i trѳmbѳgѳlig lataibe katѳgane mu gúin gѳnrrab gѳ? chib. ¿Kan nѳbabe mu gúin gwayam lanrrautah? chib.

Treenchene, dragѳnbe ishuwan purѳ rrѳmbѳig namaptѳ, tru ishuweinukkurri katѳburѳ amrrub misaameraba kwayam lanrrab ibig kѳn, Tius tru maig maramigwan martrai karuigwan mѳra marѳbelѳ, Jesucristѳimburabigwan tabigwan elachimѳ marѳb tѳga pѳnrrabig bѳnrrabelѳba.k
Incha tru dragѳnbe tru mar menda pisrumyu pasramisrѳbig kѳn.k
Inchendѳ pirѳbe tru dragѳn trigugurri nu bi wegutsigwane anchippa kerrigu piñiptinchibig kѳn, tru ishuwan purugunrrab.
Inchen ulbe ishuwan pasraarѳb ya, nui triimay pi weguchibig kѳn, k'an nu biiburabig, tru ishuwan pi srua yaig kѳnrrai.
Inchen dragѳn nune pirausrѳ pinѳgutsi mѳrabe, tru ishug mѳgunѳ tѳgagѳbigwane pasraarѳb mendѳben

Inchawei treekkurri, srѳmbalameraba, gatѳ kerrigu truyu pѳnrrabelѳ chigucha truba k'asraaray cha. Inchendѳ ¡nusiamus, pirau chi ѳsig kѳbelѳ lata, marmerayu lata ѳsiguelѳbe chincher! cha. Kaguende nugwaimandzig ñimuimay ke ne namig kuin gѳrrayan cha, nui llirab unamibe yana unamig kѳmѳnrrab gúimba.

Inchen nabe srѳmbalasrѳ kan wam truba mur trendaig mѳrѳbig kur: Mѳimbe yandѳ kaigyugurri wesraiba, katѳ maramburab maramiba, namui Tius nѳ ashib karub wamiba, katѳ nui Cristѳ mu mandamgaig karub marѳb wamiba puin gѳn cha. Kaguende Sat'anás Tiuswei merrab yem, gwalѳm namui nunelan yeeg kailѳ gѳn chib, ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳn chib pasrabigwane pinѳgutsin gѳn cha.
chinchaguen kanab gwayanrrab gaimaben, yandѳ trugurri srѳmbalasrѳmbe nѳmuimbe yandѳ chu pѳnrramikkaig patsabig kѳn.m
Inchen trugurrimbe srѳmbalasrѳmbe Miguel nui ángelesmeraba purѳ rrѳmbѳig kwayabelѳ gѳn tru dragѳnba. Inchen dragѳnbe nui kaig ángelesmeraba kwayabendѳ,

Inchen tru ishuube kan mѳgunѳ tammisren, truibe misag nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelan chuelandѳgucha ashib karuppe, kan tsandzѳn bѳrѳtsigwan srua basramisra mu kurraasamgaig karub martrabig kѳbig kѳn. Inchendѳ nui nusrkawane kerrappa, Tiusweimayba, nѳ wamisra karub wainuumayba nune srua yaig kѳn.

Inchene srѳmbalasrѳmbe gatѳgan chigѳben kѳnrrab gúit'amab asha gѳmig kenamisrѳbig kѳn. Kan dragѳn piguiig purѳ nuig, turmerabe siete tѳgaig, katѳ kigulmera diez tѳgaig, turmѳrig t'abzheelѳ petsartѳ gѳbig kѳn.

Inchene srѳmbalasrѳmbe kan truba nuig chigѳben kѳnrrab gúitamab asha gѳmig kenamisrѳbig kѳn. Kan ishug nui asrwan pѳsrtѳga pinѳbuli lataig, srѳb umbube pѳlwan tѳgaig, turyu cѳrѳna estrellamera dѳce tѳgaig petsaig kѳbig kѳn.k

Misaamera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳbe truba rruba namig kurrig kѳn cha. Inchendѳ ñui purѳ rrѳmbѳig namig kѳbig pub, katѳ tru kwabelan maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maramikkucha yandѳ pub indin gѳn cha. Inchen ñui marѳb melabelѳ tru ñi maig karuigwan eshkabelanba, katѳ tru ñui misaameranba, ñui munchiwan kaig kui lataig maramigwan kѳriguelanba, nѳrrѳ gusrebelanba, treeg kѳmeelanba, truilan truburѳ ketamikkucha puin gѳn cha. Trugurri pirѳwan mindishib pinishibelangucha pinisamig puin gѳn cha, trenchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru kѳlli misaamera veinticuatrѳelѳ tru nѳm karub purrainug Tiuswei merrab purrabelѳbe pirau tѳmbѳnsrѳb srala, Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchib,
Srѳsriigwei wendauig trѳmbѳig chab puraibendѳ, tru kѳrig kѳmdiig pѳn gѳnrrabyuibe petѳ attrun.

Inchen treeg puraibendѳ, kan truba mur pirѳ gѳnabig arruben, tru pirѳ gѳnabikkurri ciudayu yamerabe milmѳrig cienbatѳ kegѳrrabig kѳn. Inchen treegu misaamera siete mil gwabelѳ gѳn. Inchen kwamѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳbe truba rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kuilѳ, Tius srѳmbalasrѳ wabigwan truba rruba tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn.k

Indiibe pѳn gwalѳm menrrayube ѳsig kѳmig Tiusweinukkurri arrubig nѳmuinug kebiben ѳsiiranrrai Tius nѳmun urrѳben, k'atѳ kurra, pѳnrramisrѳptinchen, mayeelѳ ashibelane purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳbig arrubig kѳn.

Inchen misaamera pirau warabelѳbe tru kwaig warabelaimburab truba rruba kasraarawa, kasrag kѳbiitѳ kangurrin gangurri ketiilѳ ѳrtrun, kaguende tru pailѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳbe tru nѳmune mumaygucha gѳmíig ¡gatѳ! isua mѳra melѳnrrai marѳbelѳ gúikkurri..
Inchen kwailai asrmerabe ciudayu mayeelѳ llirai mayu waramisrtrun tru nѳmui Señѳrwan kurusyu mesraig nu ciudayu, truibe Sѳdѳmaba, Egiptѳba lataig asѳnabig kѳn cha waminug.

Tru Tiusweimburabigwan eshkabelѳbe srѳmbalawan kasramig maramburab martrabelѳ gѳn, nѳm Tiusweimburabigwan eshkab amѳñib gwalѳmmerawan sre bumѳnrrai. Katѳ treetѳwei pimerangucha anim bimera misrtrai marѳg kѳbene, anim bimera martrabelѳ gѳn. Katѳ pirѳwangucha kaig nebunrrai, kaig kwanrrѳmera gѳben, kaig bѳlѳmmera mindishinrrabelѳ ѳrtrun, nѳmun mammay mindishig kѳben mindishinrrai..

Inchen nabe pailѳ naimburab maig kuigwan waminchibelan ѳramѳnrrun cha, eshkanrrab amrrai. Truilѳbe yaliig trѳsrkѳleelѳ kewar kwalѳmmera mil dѳscientѳs sesenta nemisramne naimburab eshkab waminchun cha.
Incha nane kan caña, unaasin tsig lataig tranabe, trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, Tiuswei yawanba, tru altarwanba unaasha, katѳ truyu Tiuswan kѳriibala tabig waminchibelan munchi cha.
Inchen nabe tru librѳunan ángelwan uta, mabene, nai trigube k'an miel lataig kuizhig kѳbendѳ, na chab mabene, nai patsaube larrѳ mѳbgѳlig misrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nabe ángelweimay ya, tru librѳunan trannrra chibene: ¡Cha! chibig kѳn. Inchabe, ¡Ma! chibig kѳn. Ñui tligube kuizhig miel lataig kua, ñui patsaube mѳbig misrtrun cha.

Pѳs tru ángel siete gѳnrrabyuig trѳmpet'an urram gwalѳmmera puben, urrab pѳlbasrene, Tiuswei chigѳben maramig sѳriilѳ pѳnrrabelѳbe yandѳ marig kѳrrѳmistrun cha, tru nui marѳb melabelѳ tru nѳ maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ maig eshkaig, treeg.

Inchen tru siete palaig rrashibelѳ chab waminchen, nabe pѳrtrab inchene, srѳmbalasrѳngurri nane kan wam treeg mѳrѳ waminchibig kѳn: Tru siete palaig rrashibelѳ wamindigwane pѳrmѳtѳ, ñuinetѳ esegau cha.
Inchabe truba mur trashibig kѳn, kan león rrashib lataikke. Inchen tru trashibene, siete palaig rrashibelѳbe tru trasaigwan treetѳweih trashib lѳtabelѳ gѳn.
Taskube k'an librѳunan kura sruaig basrabig kѳn. Incha kusrmay srѳbwane mar bala bunappe, atsimay srѳbwane pirau buna basramisrѳbig kѳn.
Katѳ kweetsamigwan lat'a, misag wanna trѳmbѳ maramelan lat'a, mѳguelѳba, ishumburmeraba trѳmbѳig maramigwan lat'a, nilamigwan lat'a treeg marmѳnrrab isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirameelѳ gѳn.
