Inchen misaamera tru i ѳyeeg trѳmbѳig chab puraiben, kwamѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳbe ѳyeeg puraibenguen nѳmui task'a mariilan treeg marmѳnrrab isua mѳrѳb elachimeelѳ gѳn, tru kwaimandziimeran kѳriibala tabig wamindamigwan lata, nѳmui task'a mari tiusmeran lata, tru nѳm ѳrѳtѳga mariilan lata, tsandzѳn andѳga mariilan lata, brѳncetѳga mariilan lata, sruutѳga mariilan lata, tsiitѳga mariilan lata, truilan elachig kѳmub, truilѳbe ashmѳwei, mѳrmѳwei, ammѳwei inchibelan.
Inchen pirau muba kuimburab misaamera pѳn millѳnyube millѳnbatѳ gwaben, pѳn milyube milbatѳ kwabig gѳn, tru i pѳngatѳ trѳmbѳig naaba, naguishba, azufreba kaullimerai trigugurri webarruben.m
Inchen tru suldaumera kaulli balartѳ dѳscientѳs millѳnes kѳn daig mѳrѳbig kur.m
Inchen tru ángel seis kѳnrrabyuig nui trѳmpetan urrabig kѳn. Inchen Tiuswei merrab pasrabig ѳrѳtѳga mari altaryu, tru pibgatѳ kigulmerayugurrimbe kan wam webarri mѳrѳbig kur,k
Tru i trѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig srѳsriibe chab puraiben, katѳgucha trѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig attrabig bar balabig kѳn.
Inchen tru mѳrrmerabe kan alacránwei lataig kѳben, katѳ kalmera kwanѳbig tѳgar gѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmui mѳrrmerayube misaameran trattrѳ bѳl ѳrѳba maramburab marѳb mindisamig tѳgar gѳbig kѳn..
Inchen nѳmui pusruube ishuwei lataig kѳben, nѳmui trugulmerabe kan leónwein rrugul lataig tѳgar gѳbig kѳn.k
Tru chapullmerabe kaullimera guerrayu kwayamig tamariilѳ lataig asѳnabelѳ gѳbig kѳn. Nѳmui turyube ѳrѳtѳga marig latailѳ cѳrѳna betsar gѳbig kѳn. Inchen nѳmui malѳbe kan misag malѳ latailѳgue..
Inchendѳ kweechippe, kweechimѳtѳ, trattrѳ bѳl ѳrѳba purѳ rrѳmbѳig pusrkwaig melѳnrrain gѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru pusrkwabiibe misagwan kan alacrán gwanen busrkwabig lataig kѳbig kѳn.
Inchen tru naguishyugurrimbe chapullmera piraumay werruben, truilane pirau alacránmera lataitѳwei mu chindamgaig martrai tranig kѳn.

Kaguende tru wamisra karub wain dѳbѳt'ag Ubishaunѳ pasrabiibe nѳmune kan ubishameran lat'aig ashib pera basrѳwa, tru ѳsig kѳmigwan tranѳb pigabmerasrѳmay pera inrrun cha. Inchen Tiusbe nѳmui kabmerayu kappiwan pinѳmѳrtrun cha, trenchibig kѳn.

Treekkurri nѳmbe Tius tru wamisra karub wainug merrab pѳnrran cha. Yem, gwalѳm nui tab yau nuyasig marѳb pѳnrran cha. Inchen tru karub wainug wabiibe, nѳmuim bala nѳ sѳtѳ basraitѳga nѳmun chinchimѳnrrai ashchun cha..

Inchene nabe: Nai Señѳr, ñibe asha basrainrrabguen chibene, nѳbe nan trenchibig kѳn: Iilѳbe tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig isumdiigugurri purѳrruwar gѳn cha. Nѳmbe nѳmui keilan tsarar, Ubishaunai anindѳga pulѳzhig marar gѳn cha.m

trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Treeg kѳnrrun! cha. Purѳ tabig wamindiiba, tѳrguegwalmabiiba, muguen nebua kusremgaiba, maya nuguen ungwa, ungwa taiba, tabig kui asha tab indiiba, maramburab mariiba, mugucha chindamgaiba, iilѳbe managatig namui Tiuswein gѳnrrain chibelѳ gѳn. Treeg kѳnrrun.
mayeelѳba trenchib mur trashibelѳ gѳn: Kaigyugurli wesraibe namui Tius, tru wamisra karub wainug wabigweinukkurlimba, tru Ubishaunainukkurlimba arrubig kѳn chib.
Simeónweinukkurri karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben, Levíweinukkurri karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben, Isacarweinukkurri karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben,
Judáweinukkurli karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben, Rubénweinukkurli karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben, Gadweinukkurli karrab misaamera 12.000 gѳben,
Pirѳwan lata, marwan lata, tusrmeran lata mindishimѳtay cha, namui Tius tru marѳb melabelan nuielѳ gúi asamdiig kѳnrrai nѳmui kappalѳmerayu chab marcamnegatig.

Inchen gatѳgan ángel, pѳrr gallabgatѳsrѳngurri nebarri ashibig kur. Truibe ѳsig Wab Tiuswei marcan sruaig tru pibgatѳ ángelesmera pirѳwanba, marwanba mindishinrrab maramburab maramigwan utabelan mur trashib trenchibig kѳn:
Kaguende tru purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳrig kѳmdiig nѳ namig wam gwalѳm puin gѳn cha. ¿Kan treegube mu gúim basramisra pasramdiig kѳnrrab gѳ? chibelѳ gѳn.

Inchen srѳmbalabe kan kilga guirrѳb lataitѳ pinѳben, nѳrrѳ tunmeraba, katѳ pi tѳbѳtag pѳnrrab pirѳmeraba truilѳbe mayamba nѳm pѳnrrainukkurri nѳѳrѳsrѳ malsrailѳ gѳbig kѳn.Inchen pirau reymera gѳben, nѳrrѳ gusreb mѳguelѳ gѳben, maya suldaumeraim bala ashib karub pѳnrrabelѳ gѳben, puarmera gѳben, mas nѳrriig marѳbelѳ gѳben, karuindiig melabelѳ gѳben, karuindiig melѳmeelѳ gѳben, sѳteelѳba pirѳ rrabmerayuba, nѳrrѳ tunmerayu tru nѳrrѳ srug utuwanba trubabelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Ubishaunѳ tru seis kѳnrrabyu sellѳn kѳlsra kuren, na ashene, purѳ rrѳmbѳig mur pirѳ gѳnѳben, pѳrrbe ¡gatѳ! yaliig misrѳbig kѳn, kan yalѳ llensu lataikke. Inchen pѳlbe kerriguba ani lataig misrѳbig kѳn.
Inchen nѳmune kanun ganun kemig pulѳzheelѳ tranabe: Maya yanatѳ gatѳguchi ka israb munuguy chibig kѳn, ñimui nunelѳ Cristѳiwan ñim lataitѳwei marѳb melabelan treetѳwei kweetsiilѳ nemisramnegatig.

Inchen truilѳbe mur trashib trenchibelѳ gѳn: Señѳr, Mayeelaim Bala Pasrabig, newan tabig, newan ciertѳnig, ¿tru pirau warab misaameran maig maramigwan asha marѳb, namui ani lusigwan ulѳ bayib indamigwane, chu uraskatig munugunrrab? cha.

Inchen na ashene, kan pulѳ ѳskѳ gaulli pasraptinchibig kѳn. Inchen truyu itѳgwana wabiibe, Kwamig cha wamig kѳben, tru wendaube, tru kwabelѳ pѳnrraig, Hades cha wamig, truig arrubig kѳn. Inchen tru i parwane maramburab marѳb kweechib martrai traniilѳ gѳbig kѳn espadatѳga gѳben, parѳtѳga gѳben, kaig kwanrrѳmeratѳga gѳben, kau umbu namig animalmeratѳga gѳben pirѳ muba kuimburab pib millѳnesyube millѳnbatѳ, pib milyube milbatѳ, kwetchai.k

Inchene tru ѳsiguelai utube kan wam ѳyah taig nabe mѳrѳbig kur: Mawa, mawa marѳb megaig anbe tirigu pa libra benam netѳ gѳben, katѳ mawa, mawa marѳb megaig anbe cebada seis libras penam netѳ gѳnrrun cha. Inchendѳ aceitenba, vinѳnbabe mindishinrrab gѳmѳ cha.n

Inchen gatѳgan gaulli webiptinchibig kѳn, piguiig. Inchen truyu itѳgwana wabigwane pirau muba kuimburab ambumay, imay tab waramigwan kerranrrai nune mu katѳnrraingaig treegwan martrai tranig kѳn, kangurrin gangurri kwetchai. Katѳ nune kan truba nu esbadagucha tranig kѳn.
Inchen tru srѳsrѳ sellѳn Ubishaunѳ kѳlsra, kuren, na ashene, tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelai utuig, mѳikkѳsrѳn kan wam palaig rrashib lataig truba mur trendaig mѳrѳbig kur: ¡Amѳ! chib.k

Incha gatѳ tru srѳmbalasrѳ lata, pirau lata, pirѳ umbu lata, maryu lata tru chigurrimbunѳ Tius marig ѳsiguig pѳnrrabelѳbe ѳyah taig mѳrѳbig kur: Tru wamisra karub wainug wabigwanba, katѳ tru Ubishaunanbabe, tru purѳ tabig wamindiiba, tabig kui asha tab indiiba, tѳrbilabiiba, maramburab maramibabe, managatig patsѳmíig nuin kѳnrrain chib.k

Incha gatѳ na ashene, tru karub waim bѳtѳgatanbe ángelesmera truba nѳrrѳ pasrabigwei wamwanba, tru ѳsiguelai wamwanba, tru kѳlli misaamerai wamwanba mѳrѳbig kur. Truilѳbe purѳ nѳrrѳ gѳptѳ, milliѳnes y milliѳnes kѳbig kѳn.

Katѳ k'an cantaig srѳig ѳyeeg cantabelѳ gѳn trenchib: Librѳn uta, sellѳmeran kѳlsrѳb inchabiibe ñitѳwein gѳn chib. Kaguende ñibe kweetsig kua, ñui anindѳga namune Tiusweyasig ñi penig kѳn chib, chi misaamerandѳgucha, chi wam waminchibelandѳgucha, chi misag sѳtѳmerandѳgucha, misaamera nѳrrѳ pѳnrrabelѳ chu birausreelandѳgucha.
Inchen nѳbe arrua, tru karub wainug wabigwei kusrmay taskugurri librѳn utabig kѳn.m

Inchen tru k'arub wainuube k'an ubishaunѳ kweetsig kѳbig lataig asѳnabendѳ, k'atѳle kurra pasrai ashibig kur, tru pibgatѳ ѳsiguelaimba, kѳlli misaameraimba tѳbѳtaabe. Tru Ubishaunѳbe siete kigulmeraba, siete k'abmeraba tѳgaig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru k'abmerabe tru Tiuswei siete espíritumera gѳbig kѳn, tru pirau ѳrѳba truѳrѳ ѳriilѳ.
Inchendѳ ni srѳmbalasrѳ lata, pirau lata, pirѳ umbu lata tru librѳn kurtraptiibe mu gawei, k'atѳ tru umbu pѳrigwan maig kѳtashchab trawashchaptiibe mu gawein gѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru wamisra karub wainug wabigwei kusrmay taskube kan librѳ palamay umbumay pѳrigwan nabe srua wai ashibig kur, truibe siete sellѳstѳga melsra kasraig..
Kalubaibe mѳr Espíritu iglesiameran wamindigwan.
Au, nabe yaskabu wamab pasrar. Mѳikkѳben nai wamwan mѳra, yaskabwan kurene, nuinug kebya, nabe nѳba maben, nѳbe naba manrrun.

Ñibe trendan: Nabe puaig, truba tѳga misraig, chigucha yandѳ palaimíig kur cha. Inchendѳ ñibe uñmuinguen uñib waacha, ñiguen ѳyeezhig mislin gѳnmab asamdiig, katѳ waacha chiguchagaig, ashchab gaimabig, kѳsatiig, ѳyeeg kѳbendѳ, ñibe ashmѳn.
Katѳ Laѳdicea iglesiai ángelwan iigwan pѳr: Tru Amen, tru treeg kѳppe treeg, tru newan ciertѳnigwan eshkabig, tru Tius chiwandѳgucha pѳlbasra maren, nѳmerlig trendѳ pasrabiibe iilan ѳyah tan cha:
Nabe petѳ arrumѳnrrun. Ñi t'abig tѳgagúigwane elachimѳt'a, ñui cѳrѳnan mu katѳgan merrarramѳnrraimbe.

Kaguende na karuilan tammay marѳbig marѳb megaikkurri nagucha ñun asamѳnrrun chi kѳmѳnrrai pirau muba kuimburab warab misaameran maig inchibelѳ gѳtashchab asamig pirau ѳrѳba yandѳ purѳ rrѳmbѳig puben.n

Ñi chi mariilan kerrigu nabe ashar cha. Au, nabe ñui merrab k'an yask'ab kura pasrar, truigwane mugucha k'asramgaig. Ke trengatig nebua marѳppe, marmubendѳ, nai wamwan mѳra marѳb, ñibe nai munchiwan ashmíig kur chib isѳmѳn.

Maig kuindѳgucha truyu pureb ibiibe pulѳzheelѳ kenanig kѳnrrun. Incha nabe managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳrig librѳyugurri nui munchiwan kerramumѳnrrun. Incha nabe nai Mѳskawei merrappa, nui ángelesmerai merrappa, ѳibe nain gѳn cha, nui munchiwan eshkamѳnrrun.Kalubaibe mѳr Espíritu iglesiameran wamindigwan..

Maig kuindѳgucha truyu pureb ibiibe pulѳzheelѳ kenanig kѳnrrun. Incha nabe managatig ѳsig purrѳnrrabelai munchimeran pѳrig librѳyugurri nui munchiwan kerramumѳnrrun. Incha nabe nai Mѳskawei merrappa, nui ángelesmerai merrappa, ѳibe nain gѳn cha, nui munchiwan eshkamѳnrrun.

Inchawei kusrenaniilan ñi mѳra utigwane mѳra marѳb, ñui kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay llirab inchi. Ñi kiagasrѳmuisruandѳbe, kan niliig lataig nabe ñuimay arrumѳnrrun, ñi chu ura attrab gúinguen mѳrmѳwatѳ.

Katѳ Sardis iglesiai ángelwan iigwan pѳr: Tru Tiuswei siete espíritumeranba, siete estrellameranba tѳgaibe ѳyah t'an cha: Nabe ñui mariilan ashar cha. Ñibe ѳsiguig kѳn chib waminabig kѳbendѳ, kwaig kѳn.
Inchawei ñi chi asigwane pѳr chibig kѳn, mѳi ya maig kuigwanba, katѳ wendѳsrѳ maig kѳnrrabigwanba.
tru ѳsig Wabig kur cha, kwain tsubig kua. Inchendѳ ash, chibig kѳn, ѳsiguig war cha, managatig. Nabe kwamigwei llavimeranba, k'atѳ tru kwabelѳ pѳnrrainug llavimeranba tѳgagur cha.
nui srѳbmerabe brѳncen nagu pillllanen tѳrbilabig lataig pilabig kѳben, nui wambe kan nu bi mullib wanrrѳb lataig kѳbig kѳn.m
Turyu pusruube kan pulѳ isig lataig, wañi lataig pulѳzhig, nui kabmerabe kan nagurѳ lataig kѳben
Inchen tru wam nan waminchibiibe muin gѳtashchab keesha ashene, truyube ѳrѳ gandilerumera siete nѳrreelѳ pѳnrraptinchibig kѳn.
Ñi chi asigwan k'an kilgayu pѳra, tru siete iglesiameran ѳr cha, Efesѳmayba, Esmirnamayba, Pergamѳmayba, Tiatiramayba, Sardismayba, Filadelfiamayba, k'atѳ Laѳdiceamayba.

Na Juan, ñimui nuneg, chigѳben purѳ rrѳmbѳig puben isumdiigu lata, katѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub wainug lata, chigúindѳgucha ñimba, Jesucristѳba kanbalatѳ pasrabig basrabig kur. Nan kan pi tѳbѳtag pirѳ basrabig, Patmѳs tainug wanrrai kegutsig wabig kur, Tiuswei wamgurrimba, katѳ Jesucristѳimburabigwan eshkaikkurrimba..
¡Au! Cristѳbe wañiyu arrun. Inchen mayeelѳ ashen, katѳ nun tru kelarrab kwanѳbelѳguen ashchun. Inchen pirau maya misaamerabe truba rruba isui inchib kishchun nun ashippe. ѳѳ, ѳyeeg kѳnrrun.k

katѳ Jesuclistѳinukkurlimba arrubigwan. Nѳbe waminchippe, maig kuigwan eshkabig kѳb, katѳ tru maya kwabelai utu nѳmerlig ѳsiirabig kѳb, katѳ nѳbe pirau maya reymeraim bala nѳ garub pasrabig kѳb indan. Truibe namune undaarab, nambe kaig maliilѳyu lusli latailѳ gúigwan nui anindѳga elatsѳsrka,
Inchen Juanbe nѳ maig asigwan kerligu isa gѳmѳ, maig kuigwan wamindan, Tiuswei wamwanba, Jesuclistѳ maig eshkaigwanba.
Iibe Jesuclistѳn Tius tѳrgandѳ kenamalig kѳn, nѳ nui karuig melabelan kenamartrai, tru maya yanayutѳ purainrrabigwan. Jesuclistѳbe nui marѳb megabig Juanwan kan ángelwan ѳra, kenamalig kѳn.
Au, ñim waraig yamerabe elatsig muguchagaig kѳrrѳmisrtrun cha.
Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Kerrigu ѳyeeg marikkurri Tiusbe mѳi ya misagwan ulѳ bayrrun cha.

Inchawei asay chibig kѳn. Nabe Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ gѳben, nѳrrѳ gusrebelѳ gѳben, Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrennѳbelѳ gѳben ñimuimay ѳren, mѳilan gѳben ñimbe truilane kweechib, kurusyu melsrѳb inchun cha. Katѳ judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayu maig kѳbash marѳb ichabetab, pueblѳsmѳrig chu amben, chu amben, ñimbe pasraѳrѳb wendautѳ amrrun cha.
Pѳs ѳyeeg taikkurri ñimbe Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelan kweechibelainukkurri amrrub misaamera guer cha ñimdѳweinguen wamindan cha.
Inchabe ñimbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Namui merrabsreelѳ warab uras nam warabelѳ gúig kuimbe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelan kweechib ani lushib nѳmba tѳgatѳ marѳb pѳnrrѳmubsrubrainrrun cha.

Ñimbe ѳyeeg lat'ailѳ gѳn: Misaamerai merrappe sѳlgandѳ t'abelѳ lat'aig asѳnabendѳ, wambiimay maig kѳben treegwein gѳmѳtѳ, umbumaybe isatѳ t'abig lat'aig indiilѳbah, larrѳ gaibatѳ netsailѳ gѳn cha ñimbe.

¡Ay, ñim waachamera Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmeraba, palatѳ tabelѳ! Pasunba, platillѳnba wambiimaybe pillmabendѳ, ñimui umbube ñimbe misagwan kwaarѳsra kerranrrab isuilѳba, chigurrimbunѳ tѳgagѳnrrab parѳ isuilѳba, trutѳ netsailѳ gѳn cha.
¡Ñim chigúinguen ashmeelѳ gѳbendѳ, katѳganelan pera ambubelѳ! Pѳlѳmunѳzhigwane tѳga muchimѳnrrab larruusra muchendѳ, camellѳne kebinab pinan cha.
Inchen srѳmbalawei munchiyu ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chibiibe, purѳ tabzhig Tius wamisra waigwanba, katѳ tru tabzhigu wamisra wabigwanba tѳga rrencha basran chibig kѳn..
Altar merrab pasramisra, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chibiibe, altarwandѳ ke treeg maramѳnrrun chimѳtѳ, tru bala chi pѳnrrabigwangucha kerliguba treeg maramѳnrrun cha, tѳga rrendan cha.

Katѳ ñimbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Mѳikkѳben, chigѳben martrab cha altarwei merrab pasramisra, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daigwan, marmuingucha, chigѳnrraamѳn cha. Inchendѳ tru altar bala Tiusweyasig trana pasrigwan truigwei merrab pasramisra, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daigwane, nune maramitѳwei nebunrrun cha, trenchibelѳ gѳn.

¡Ay, ñim waachamera chigúinguen ashmeelѳ gѳbendѳ, k'atѳganelan pera ambubelѳ! Mѳikkѳben Tiuswei yawei merrab pasramisra, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daigwan treeg marmuingucha, ñimbe chigucha gѳmѳn chibelѳ gѳn. Inchendѳ tru Tiuswei yau ѳrѳ basrabigwei merrab pasramisra, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun daigwan trenchibig, trube, martrab taigwane nune maramig nebunrrun cha, trenchibelѳ gѳn, ñimbe.

¡Ay, ñim waachamera Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmeraba, palatѳ tabelѳ! Pѳs ñimbe piudasmeran nѳmui yameran kerrawabe, tabelѳ misrѳb ke k'a yandѳ truba yana Tiuswan waminchibelѳ gѳn cha. ѳyeekkurri ñimbe mѳra melamig mas nuigwan utanrrun chibig kѳn.
Kaguende nѳasiitѳ nuig kurmab isubigwane, ka kѳrig martrun cha. Inchen chigucha gѳmíig nuig kurmab isumíigwane i mѳѳbe si, nuig kѳn daig kѳnrrun, chibig kѳn..
Katѳ ñimune Kusrennѳbig cha, wamѳnrrain gѳmѳwein gúi, kaguende ñimuimbe ashibig mas nuibe Cristѳ, nѳtѳ gѳn.n
Katѳ ñimbe yu piraube mungucha, Mѳskain chimѳtay. Kaguende ñimbe Mѳskaimbe kandѳ tѳgar gѳn, truibe srѳmbalasrѳ wabig.
Incha misaamerabe penab yanѳb indinug nѳmune purѳ t'abzhig wamѳnrrai inchibelѳ gѳn cha, trurrigu nѳmune Kusrennѳbig cha, wamѳnrraingue.

Chiwandѳgucha marѳppe, misaamera k'a ashchaindѳ marѳbelѳ gѳn, cha. Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigwan k'appalѳyu gѳben, kwalmerayu gѳben nѳrriig kena melsra amѳnamig tab gúi inchibelѳ gѳn cha, k'atѳ u tulurmera yab srѳlmera melsra amѳnamiba.
ѳyeelѳ chab puraiben, Jesúsbe misaameranba, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilanba trenchibig kѳn:
muguen mancha kusrua lѳtѳnrrab gaimabelѳ gѳn. Incha tru gwalѳmgurri mugucha chigѳben mas payrrab inchimeelѳ gѳn..
Señѳr Tiusbe tru nai Señѳrwane trendan cha: Nai kusrmaygatѳ wamisr cha, ñui ashig kѳmui inchib tsalѳ inchibelan ñi itѳbunѳnrrai ñui srѳb umbu na pѳnsramnegatig.k

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu kerrigu pѳnrrabig lata, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ kerrigu kusrenaniilѳ lata i pagatѳ maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailѳyugurri pѳlbasra amrrubig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.

Tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu kerrigu pѳnrrabig lata, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳ kerrigu kusrenaniilѳ lata i pagatѳ maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailѳyugurri pѳlbasra amrrubig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.Inchen fariseѳsmera tulaamba srѳ burramnetѳ,
kan mѳikkѳsrѳn tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbiibe Jesús kalѳ lѳtѳbene kebenѳsrkѳnrrab isua, trencha payibig kѳn:
Kusrennѳbig, ¿maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu karua pѳnsrailѳ, mas nuibe mѳig kѳh? cha.n
Inchen misag truba nu basrabiibe iigwan mѳrabe, Jesús kusrenanigwan ke kwaara asha gѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn.k
Fariseѳsmera tru saduceѳsmeran Jesús nilѳtѳ bѳnrram wamindin gúi wammѳrabe, tulundzuna,
Nabe Abrahamwei Tius, Isaacwei Tius, Jacѳbwei Tius kur cha, trendaigwan. Inchawei Tiusbe kwailai Tius kѳmѳtѳ, ѳsiguelai Tius kѳn chibig kѳn.
¿Pѳs treeg kѳbene, tru kwabelѳ katѳ ѳsiirabene, tru maya nunelѳ tru ishuwan kasharaig kuig kѳppe, nѳbe sieteelai utu mѳigwei srain gѳnrrerah? chibelѳ gѳn.
Yandѳ srabebe tru ishukkucha kwan cha.
Katѳ tru wendѳ nunewan treetѳweim buraiben, katѳ tru wendau nunewan treetѳweim buraiben, sieteelanba treetѳ rreetѳ buraibig kѳn cha.
Kusrennѳbig, Mѳisésbe trendaig kѳn cha: Mѳikkѳben kan mѳg urekkaig kwabene, nuneebe tru piudan kasharam nebunrrun cha, tru nuneg kwabigweimburab ureg kѳrrѳmartrab.k
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Tru Césarwein gѳn cha. Inchene Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Inchawei Césarwein gѳbene, Césarwan tranay cha. Inchen Tiuswein gѳbene, Tiuswan tranay cha.
Jesúsbe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿I anyu malѳba, i munchi pѳriibabe muin gѳh? cha..
Tru pagaram anwan eshk'arra chibig kѳn. Inchen nѳmbe k'an an srua amrruben,
Inchen Jesúsbe nѳmun ka kaig martraptѳ isua inchib pѳnrrain gúi ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Ñim balatѳ tabelѳ, ¿nane chindimbarre kebenѳsrkѳnrrab inchigue? cha.

Inchabe mѳilan gѳsrѳn nѳmui mendig amѳñibelanba, Herѳdesweingateelanba ѳyah chinrrai ѳrѳbelѳ gѳn: Kusrennѳbig, ñibe ciertѳnigwan waminchib mѳg, Tius maig amѳñinrrai karuigwan, isa gѳmѳ, trunun treeg kusrenanѳb, katѳ misag maig chitanmaptѳ mѳrѳb basrѳmíig kui ashibelѳ guer cha. Kaguende ñibe mundѳgucha nѳmun mailѳ gѳtasha kandarѳtѳ imѳwei inchibig kѳn cha.
Kaguende wamiilѳbe truba nu gѳben, lawa wesruilѳbe mamdѳ gѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchen reybe tru mishatsigu ashib pѳnrrabelane trenchiptindan cha: Srѳbwanba, tasiimeranba lusra, wambig purѳ rrѳmbѳ lѳstѳyu wegutsay cha. Truyube kishib, trugulmeran tsatsamig kѳnrrun cha.

Incha mas nѳrrѳ callesmerawan amba, mun wetѳrrabashtѳ nѳviѳs yaumay linchab amrrunrrai eshk'anrrigay tan cha.Inchen tru k'aruindiig melabelѳbe callesmerawan webamba, mun wetѳrrabashtѳ tulundzunabelѳ gѳn, tabelan gѳben, k'ailan gѳbengue. Inchen k'asharabelѳ purrai salayube ¡gatѳ! misaatѳ netsaptinchibig kѳn.
Incha mas nѳrrѳ callesmerawan amba, mun wetѳrrabashtѳ nѳviѳs yaumay linchab amrrunrrai eshk'anrrigay tan cha.
Inchen katѳganelѳbe tru reywei karua ѳriilan merrarrawa, truba kaig marѳb kurrabet'ab gѳptѳ kweechibelѳ gѳn cha.
Trune tru linchai eshkailѳbe cuentaguen marmѳ, mѳikkѳsrѳnbe nui trausrѳmay iben, katѳgane penab, yanѳb inchab ibig kѳn cha.k

Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe ѳyeeg lataig kѳn cha. Kan rey nui nusrkai kasharaben fiesta marѳbig lataikke.Incha nui karuindiig melabelan nѳviѳs yaumay linchunrligay cha eshkailan wamѳnrrab ѳliibe, tru linchab amrrunrrai eshkailѳbe amrrug kѳmui indin gѳn cha.
Inchen tru sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, faliseѳsmeraba tru ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn chib Jesús eshkab wamindiilan mѳrabe, nѳmun guemesra wamindin gúi wetѳgѳrrabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen mѳikkѳben tru srug bala beñippe, pitis misrtrun cha. Inchen tru srug muim bala gѳben peñippe, nune usrѳ tuindѳ martrun chibig kѳn.

Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñimgan Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigu ѳyeeg chibigwan managuen lemeelѳ gѳtirru? cha: Ya marѳbelѳ k'aasig sruube k'atsiisrѳ pѳlbasra wayamig mas purѳ tab srukken misrin gѳn daigwan. Señѳr Tius ѳyeeg marene, namuin gabyube truba tabig asѳnatan cha.
Incha merrarrawa, uvas traugurri wegucha, nune kweechibelѳ gѳn cha.
Incha yandѳ trugurrimbe nui trag nusrkawan ѳrѳbig kѳn cha, treeg isub: Nai nusrkawane chinchimѳnrrun cha.n
tru kwallibelѳbe karua ѳriilan merrarrawa, kanune kurraguchib, kanune kweechib, kanune sruutѳga petab inchibelѳ gѳn cha.
Incha yandѳ tru mamig misrigwan lurramig lut'auraben, mѳilan gѳsrѳn nui karuindiig melabelan tru nuimburabigwan tru kwallchab ut'abelan mianrrab ѳriibe,

Kaguende Juan Bautistabe sѳlgandѳ tabig mandѳ amѳnamigwan kusrenanrrab arruben, ñimbe kѳremuig kѳn cha. Trune tru an utabelѳba, tru ishumbur an bagarwei trѳmbѳig marѳptѳ warabelѳba, truilѳguen kѳreig kѳn cha. Trune ñimbe iilan kerrigu ashendѳ, kѳrenrrab isua mѳrmuig kѳn chibig kѳn.

Trube, tru i pa nusrkalѳyu mѳskai maig maringaruigwan ¿mѳig marerah? chiben, nѳmbe: Tru srѳsrѳ garuinab nusrkai chibelѳ gѳn. Inchen Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Rѳmasreelayasig an utabelѳba, ishumburmera asrwan anwei yanѳbelѳba Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳmbe nѳmmerrikken kebamrrun cha, ñimguen kebammѳwatѳ.k
Inchene nѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn cha: Ig kѳmѳtan cha. Inchendѳ nѳbe yanayube treeg marmѳnrrurmab isua mѳra, ka yan cha.
Jesúsbe payibig kѳn: ¿Ñimbe iigwan maig isugue? cha. Kan mѳg pagatѳ nusrkalѳ tѳgagua, kanunmerrig trendan cha: Nai nusrkai, nai uvas ellgwain rrau mѳi kwallchab inrrѳ cha.
Katѳ: Mѳguelѳgurrin gúig kѳn, damgawein gѳn cha. Kaguende misagwan namune kѳrig kѳtan cha. Kaguen ya mayeelѳba Juanbe Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kѳbig kui asha tѳgar gѳn cha.
Inchen Jesúsbe lѳtappe, trenchibig kѳn: Nagucha ñimun kan chigѳsrѳn payrrab inchar cha. Ñim iigwan lѳtѳbene, trube, nagucha eshkarrumѳn chibig kѳn, iilan mu garuitѳga marar cha.k
Inchawei ñim Tiusba waminchib miappe, chiwandѳgucha nѳ martraitamab kѳrewa, miawabe, ñimbe utѳnrrun chibig kѳn.
Inchen tru chi purayaigwan nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe ashabe, truba kwaarѳb, Jesúswan trenchib payibelѳ gѳn: Higuerabe mѳi mѳi mullanrrappe ¿mandѳ indah? cha.

Incha kan higuera tusr may bulu pasrai asha, kemallabe, tru higuera tusrbe ka ishiitѳ tѳgaig kui ashabe, Jesúsbe tru higuerane trenchibig kѳn: ¡Mѳingurrimbe yandѳ managucha mas mamig niimubash! cha. Inchen tru urastѳ higuerabe mullaptinchibig kѳn.
Incha lѳtsѳ katѳ ciudayumay arruabe, Jesúsbe parѳgwai mѳrѳbig kѳn..
Incha nѳmun pѳnrramnetѳ, ciudayugurri webya, Bet'aniasrѳmay yabe, trusrѳ kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.

Inchen sacerdѳtesmeran karubelѳba, Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba Jesúswei tru purѳ nѳrreelѳ mariilan ashib katѳ Tiuswei yau shush ureemera: ¡Rey Davidwei Nusrkai Hѳsanna! chib trasai mѳrabe, truba namabelѳ gѳn.
Incha trenchibig kѳn: Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Nai tab yabe Tiuswan wamindi ya gѳn cha, trencha wamig kѳnrrun cha. Trune ñimbe nileelѳ warain rrab marin gѳn cha..
Inchen tru nu misag sѳtѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Iibe Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jesús Galilea birau nazaretsriig kѳn cha..
Jesús Jerusalénsrѳ kebibene, maya misaamera ke chi indi asamgaig inchib, mѳilѳgѳben trenchib payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Iibe mu gѳh? chib.

Inchen merrab amrrubelѳ lata, wendau amrrubelѳ lata, ѳyah chib trashib amrrubelѳ gѳn: ¡Rey Davidwei Nusrkai Hѳsanna! chib. ¡Señѳr Tiuswei munchiyu nѳ ѳrig arrubiibe mayanguen tab gúig kѳn! chib. ¡Srѳmbalasrѳmbe Hѳsanna! chib.n
Inchen misag truba nu basrabiibe mѳilѳbe nѳmui kewagúilandѳwei maywan k'ayen, mѳilѳbe kullag srarcheelѳ lutiicha k'ayibelѳ gѳn.
burran unanbañau srua amrrua, nѳmbe nѳmui kewagúilan burranba, unanba k'ayen, Jesúsbe itѳguanabig kѳn.
Inchippa mѳikkѳben chigѳben chibene, ѳyah chinrrigay chibig kѳn: Señѳr palai indan cha. Inchen truibe pebrrun cha.
Yandѳ Jerusalénsrѳ chab pub amba, Betfagé pueblѳ tru ѳlivѳs Tunsrѳ chab puabe, Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ bailan
Inchen Jesúsbe nѳmun lastima asha, nѳmui kabmeran katѳrabene, tru urastѳ kabgailѳbe ashibelѳ misra, Jesúswei mendig ambubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen misaamerabe nilѳtѳ burrѳnrrai namingucha, nѳmbe mas mur trashib trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Señѳr, namun lastima ashcha chib, Davidwei Nusrkai!n
Inchen pailѳ k'abgailѳ may menda purrѳwabe, Jesús purayai mѳrѳppe, trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: ¡Namun lastima ashcha chib, merrabsrѳ Davidwei Nusrk'ai!
Inchen ñimui utu mѳikkѳben ñimmerrig melag kѳbene, katѳganelѳ karuindiig megamig kѳn cha..
Trune ñimui utube ñimbe ѳyeelѳ gѳmumig kѳn cha. Treeg kѳbgunrriibe, ñimui utu mas nuikkug kѳbene, katѳganelѳ karuindiig megamig kѳn cha..
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Ñimbe chi miab pѳnrrermabguen mѳrmѳn cha. ¿Na tru cѳpayu mutsam biwan, kabe ñim muchibsrugueh? cha. Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ѳѳ, mutsamѳnrrun cha.
Zebedeѳwei nusrk'alai usrimbe nui nusrk'alѳba Jesúswei merrab chigѳsrѳn mianrrab, nѳbe tѳmbasrѳbig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe payibig kѳn: ¿Chi balѳt'a? cha. Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñi ashib karub wainug nai nusrkalan, kanun kusrmay, kanun ñui atsimay purramisringarurra cha.
Au, nambe Jerusalénmay nebambub amber cha. Trusrѳmbe Mѳg Misra Arrubigwane sacerdѳtesmeran karubelanba, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelanba tranen, truilѳbe nune kwanrrai basrtrun cha.
Jesús yandѳ Jerusalénsrѳmay nebib yabe, nui dѳce kusrenanѳb pera uniilan nѳѳrѳ wama, trenchibig kѳn:
¿Nan maig maramdiig kѳben, naiwane nabe na asha maramig kѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Kabe na merѳgѳmíig menrra tabig kui ashiptѳ ñibe pusrkwai ashkuh? cha.
Inchawei mѳi ya srabe melabelѳbe nѳmmerrig bѳnrrѳben, mѳi ya nѳmmerrig bѳnrrabelѳbe srabe melѳnrrun cha.k
tru puaigwane trenchibelѳ gѳn: I tru srabe guerrubelѳ kan urazhiitѳ marendѳ, ñibe truilangucha nam pѳrryu mawa mawa marѳb melabelan lataitѳwei lata bagaran cha..
Incha tru marѳb melaimburѳ anwan ut'abe, tru ellmarig buaigwane nѳmdѳ truba namig waminchib mendabe,
Inchen yandѳ merrab kebambubelѳbe mas utamuitamab isua melѳbenba, nѳm mѳitѳgucha mawa ѳrѳba marѳb melaigwandѳwei utabelѳ gѳn..

Inchen yandѳ yem misren, tru ellmarig buaibe nui kwallibelan ashibigwane trenchibig kѳn: Kwallib melabelan wama, pagarau cha. Tru srabe guerrubelanmerrig pѳlbasra, srѳsrѳ guerrubelane srabe bagaranrrig cha..
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Namune muguen chi maramig tranmѳtan cha. Inchen nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñimgucha ambay cha, nai uvas ellgwainug kwallchab.
Incha puaibe katѳyug kwalѳm dѳbѳtag webya, katѳ maaben las treskucha webya, treetѳwei marѳbig kѳn.m
trenchibig kѳn cha: Ñimgucha nai uvas ellgwainug kwallchab ambay cha, maig pagaramigwan treeg bagararrumѳn cha. Inchen nѳmbe ambubelѳ gѳn.
Incha tru lѳtsѳ las nueve katѳyug webarruabe, katѳganelѳ plazayu chi maramikkar purrai ashabe,n
Inchen mayeelѳba yameran, nunelan, nuchalan, usri mѳskawan, uregwan, pirѳmeran nai munchigurrindѳ elachibelѳbe cien biejes menrraguen utab, katѳ managatig ѳsig kѳmigwangucha Tius tranig utѳnrrun cha.
Inchen Jesúsbe nѳmun ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Mѳguelѳbe iigwan martrab gaimanrrun cha. Trune Tiusweimbe si, chitѳgucha maramdiitѳ gѳn cha..
Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe iigwan mѳrabe, truba kwaarѳb trenchibelѳ gѳn: Treeg kѳbene, ¿kaigyugurrimbe mu gúi wesraig kѳnrraut'ah? cha.
Incha Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan: Nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun cha: Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub wainug kan puaig kebyamibe truba murig kѳn cha.
Inchene matsinѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Nabe iilane kerriguh marѳbig kur cha. Masbe ¿chitѳ balerah? chiben
usri mѳskawan maig kѳbash inchimѳ, tab inchib, katѳ ñima ñiasiitѳwei maig undaguig kѳppe, ñui mendaigwangucha treetѳwei undaarab inchi chibig kѳn..
Kan mѳg Jesúswan ashchab yabe, trencha payibig kѳn: Kusrennѳbig, managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan na tѳgagѳnrrappe, ¿chigѳben tabiibe chi maramѳ? cha.n
Incha t'asigwan uregweim bala estsarabe, nѳbe truyugurri ibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Uregwane merѳmѳ, naimay ka amrrubasay cha. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe nѳm latailaiwein gѳn cha.m
Inchen Jesúsweimay ureemeran srua amrrubelѳ gѳn, nѳmuim bala tasigwan estsara, nѳmuimburab Tiuswan mianrrai. Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe tru srua amrrubelan namaptinchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Kasharamѳnrrab tamibe mayeelain gѳmѳn cha. Tius truburab gѳnrrai traniilaindѳwein gѳn cha..
Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Srawanba, kewanba ѳyeeg pubig kѳbene, trembe kasharamuinguen cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha bayibelѳ gѳn: ¿Trube treeg kѳbene, Mѳisésbe chindimba kilga mara, purѳrtrain garuig kѳh? cha, srawan tarѳmisrtrab cha eshkabig.
Inchawei yandѳ pailѳ gѳmѳ, kan asrtѳ gѳn. Inchawei treeg kѳbene, Tius kandѳ mara lindisaigwane mѳѳbe t'arѳmaramig kѳmѳn chibig kѳn.
Incha Tiusbe trendaig kѳn: ѳyeekkurri mѳѳbe mѳskawanba, usranba elatchun cha, nui sraimba kandѳ gѳnrrab. Incha tru pailѳbe kan asrtѳ gѳnrrun cha..
Inchen faliseѳsmera Jesúswan kemallabe, chincha gѳben kebenѳsrkѳnrrab isua, trencha payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Ka chigurlin gѳben srawan kutsamig chi merѳmíig kѳ chindah? cha.
Inchen misag truba nu mendig amben, truyu kwanrreelan tamarѳbig kѳn.
Incha reybe truba namaptѳ, maya ulѳ gúigwan kerrigu anwan waramnegatig kaigyu mѳra meganrrai marѳbelan tranѳbig kѳn cha.
Pѳs ñigucha tru karuindiig ñui lincha megabigwane maindi lastima asambala chibig kѳn, na ñun lastima ashib lataitѳwei.
Inchen kane kagѳbashig kѳmuptѳ, kailan keeri yau keeringarubig kѳn nui ulѳwan tranamnegatikke.
Inchene tru nѳba lincha karuindiig megabiibe nui merrab tѳmbasra trenchibig kѳn: Tiusmanda, nan lastima ashcha chib. Ulѳwan tranrrumѳn cha.
Inchene reybe waachawan yeeg nebuitamab isua, nui ulѳ misrigwan paymѳnrrab kaabasha, ka inrrai, ka elachibig kѳn.k
Incha truigwan ashib mendѳbene, kan truba rruba nu an ulѳ misraigwan pera amrrubelѳ gѳn.
Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe kan rey nui karuindiig melabelѳ nѳmui ulѳ misriilan mayambatѳ ulѳ gѳtashchab ashchab wamisrѳb lataig kѳn..
Inchen Pedrѳbe Jesúswan kemalla, trencha payibig kѳn: Señѳr, nai nuneg nan chigѳben k'aig marѳbig marene, nabe ¿mam biejegatig pesannab ulѳ baymumig kѳnrrab gѳ? cha. ¿Kabe sietegatiitѳteh? cha.

Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Ñim yu pirau lusrѳb lataig marene, srѳmbalasrѳngucha lusrѳb lataitѳwei martrun cha. Inchen ñim yu pirau pichib lataig marene, srѳmbalasrѳngucha pichib lataitѳwei martrun cha.
Inchen ñundѳ mѳrѳg kѳmui inchene, trube, kandѳ gúi, pagatѳ gúi wamѳ, chi bub arrubigwandѳgucha pailѳ gúi, pѳnelѳ gúi maig kuigwan nѳm wamindigu treeg kѳrrѳmalig kѳnrrai.

Inchawei ñui nuneg ñun chigѳben k'aig marene, ya, ñibe nundѳ mara, waminchi. Incha nui k'alѳ marigwan k'alѳ marig kui ashchai nebua isungaru. Inchen ñun mѳrene, ñibe ñui nunewane tab gѳrrѳmisrtrai kusrawa basran.
Incha nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Wetѳrrappe, tru trubabigweimburab mas purѳ k'asraaranrrun cha, tru nѳventa y nueve k'a amѳñibelaimburab lataguen gѳmѳ.
Kaguende Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe tru trubig kѳbigwan kaigyugurri wesranrrab arrig kѳn cha..

Inchen ñui kab kaig maringarua kaigu ñun kebenѳsrkѳbene, wesrua, kuchi chibig kѳn, managatig ѳsig wamsrѳ kan gaptѳ tѳgaig kebyamikken sѳl gѳnrrun cha, pa gab pusraig mѳra melamnug kwamѳ nagu kegutsig kѳbgunrriibe.
Yu nam waraig pirѳwaimburappe kan yeekkucha gúita, chine pѳnrrabelѳ misagwan kaig martrai inchib pѳnrrѳben, trune kaigwan nѳ bera mara kebenѳsrkѳb mѳwaimbe ¿maig kѳnrrerah?
Inchen mѳikkѳben kan i unѳ lataigwan nai munchiyu tab wamab utabiibe, nan utan chibig kѳn.
Nѳasiitѳ nuig kurmab isumíig, i unѳ lataig misrѳbiibe, srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waigu mas nuig kѳn chak
Inchene Jesúsbe kan unan wama, nѳmuin dѳbѳtag pasrabe

Treeg kuingucha, nambe mungucha namishimѳnrrab, nu bisuyumay ya, anzuelun ke keguchendѳ, megamisrѳb peskauwan wesrunrrig, chibig kѳn. Incha peskauwei trigwan kurabe, kan an wetѳrranrrabguen cha, maya tranamigwan neikke. Incha naimburѳba, ñuimburѳba srua ya, pagarau chibig kѳn.

Inchen Pedrѳbe: ѳѳ, pagarabwei inchibig kѳn cha lѳtabig kѳn. Incha Pedrѳ yau kebibene, Jesúsbe ѳyeemerrig trenchib waminchibig kѳn: ¿Simón, ñibe maig isuguh? cha. ¿Yu pirau reymerabe trendѳ pagaramigwan pagaraig utappe, mumeran utah? cha: ¿Nѳmui misaamerandѳweindeh? Kabe: ¿Peesrѳngurri amrrub misaamerandeh? cha.n
Inchen kweechen, pѳn gwalѳmyube gatѳ ѳsiirawa kurrѳnrrun cha. Iigwan wammѳrabe, nѳmbe truba isui inchibelѳ gѳn..
Kaguende ѳyeeg kwaimandziibe Tiuswan purugurra chib miaitѳgaba, ayunab indiitѳgaba treeg marendѳwei webibig kѳn cha.
Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe nѳmdѳ nѳѳrѳ Jesúswan kemalla, trencha payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Nambe kwaimandzigwan wambig weguchappe, chindimba kaimah? cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¡Kan ñim mѳi misaamera kѳrenrrab inchimeelѳ larrѳ gailѳ! cha, ¿nabe managatig ñimba unamig kѳnrrerah? cha. ¿Kan ѳyeeg ashiptѳ managatig ñimba unamerah? cha. Unan yusrѳ naimay srua amrruy chibig kѳn.
Au, nai nusrkawan lastima ashcha cha. Kaguende pesannabig tѳgaig kua, truba trѳmbѳig nebuinab megabig kѳn cha. Katѳ gatѳ nagu kebeñib, piyu kebeñib inchibig kѳn cha.k
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Elíasbe arrubwei inchun cha. Incha nѳbe kerrigu katѳyug tamara pѳnsrѳnrrun cha..
Incha tru tunsrѳngurri kѳrrѳrrub amrruabe, Jesúsbe trenchib karubig kѳn: Mungucha waminchib gѳnrrab gѳmѳ cha, tru asigwan, tru Mѳg Misra Arrubig kwailai utugurri ѳsiirawa katѳ kurramnegatig.
Inchen iigwan mѳrѳppe, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe truba rruba kѳrig kuilѳ, malѳwan pirau kebatamnegatig utsѳbasrѳbelѳ gѳn.

Inchen Pedrѳ waminchib pasramnetѳ, k'an wañi tѳrbilabig nѳmun pinѳbulen, wañi umbugurri k'an wam trenchibig kѳn: Iibe nai Nusrk'ai undaaraig kѳn cha. Nabe nuimburab truba tab gúi war cha. Nune mѳray chibig kѳn.
Inchene mѳimbe Mѳisésba, Elíasba, Jesúsba waminchib pѳnrrai ashiptinchibelѳ gѳn.
ѳyeeg taig yandѳ trunewei kan gwalѳmdѳ balѳben, Jesúsbe Pedrѳnba, Santiagѳnba, nui nuneg Juanwanba nѳѳrѳ kan pala tunsrѳmay pera ibig kѳn.m
Kaguende tru Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe Mѳskawei purѳ nuig tѳrguegwalmabigu nui ángelesmeraba arrua, mѳilandѳgucha nѳm maig marig kѳben treeg tranrrun cha.
Inchen mѳikkѳben ѳsig kѳmigwangѳba isubiibe yandѳ pinab pinamig nebunrrun cha. Inchen nagurrindѳ kwabiibe managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan wetѳrrawa, tѳgagѳnrrun cha.

Inchen Jesúsbe keeshabe Pedrѳne trenchibig kѳn: Satanás, nainukkurri tarѳmisr cha. Ñibe nane peñchai ke k'a srurrengwangarub attan cha. Kaguende ñibe isuppe, Tius lataig isumѳtѳ, mѳguelѳ isuimay isun cha.
Inchen Pedrѳbe nun nѳѳrѳsrѳ pera ya, murtѳ waminchib mendabig kѳn: Tius ashib wawa, Señѳr, ñun ѳyeeg puraimuimbe cha.
Incha Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan mungѳben eshkab gѳnrrain gѳmѳ garua basrѳbig kѳn, nѳbe tru Cristѳ gúi.

Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub wainug llavimeran ñun tranamѳnrrun cha. Ñi yu pirau lusrѳb lataig marene, srѳmbalasrѳngucha lusrѳb lataitѳwei martrun cha. Ñi yu pirau pichib lataig marene, srѳmbalasrѳngucha pichib lataitѳwei martrun cha.n

Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Ñibe mayanguen t'ab gúig kѳn cha, Simón Jѳnáswei nusrkai. Kaguende ñune iigwane yaumbaig, animbaig, ka mѳg kenamarѳb eshkamѳtѳ, nai Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig eshkan cha.
Inchene nѳbe trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Trune ñimbe nane mu gѳn chinrrague? cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trencha lѳtabelѳ gѳn: Mѳilѳbe Juan Bautista gѳn chiben, mѳilѳbe Elías kѳn chiben, mѳilѳbe Jeremías kuinrrun dan cha, kabe mѳikkѳben Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig kui.
Inchen nѳmune tru pirriyu pusri levaduran ashiptѳ gѳnrrigay chimѳtѳ, tru fariseѳsmeraba, saduceѳsmeraba kusrenaniilan ashiptѳ gѳnrrigay tain gúi yandѳ wetѳgѳrrabelѳ gѳn nѳmbe.
Katѳ tru siete pirriwan tru pib milwan pirishiben, ¿tru unchibigwan mam tasin tulisaigwan isumeelѳ gѳ chindah? cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe nѳm trenchib purrai ashabe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Chindimbarre kangurrin gangurri pirringar guer chib purrѳgue? cha. Ñim gúi ñimui isubigwan nainug ke kagѳmѳnrraindѳzhig basra tѳgar cha.
Nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ pisu ambѳgatѳsrѳ chab larraambabe, pirli srua amrrumigwan pesan amrrubrain gúi isuptinchibelѳ gѳn.

Mѳin gwalѳm kaig misaamera, kan kasharawar peeba itѳlulѳpteelѳ lat'aitѳwei Tiusbatѳ bѳnrrѳmѳ misaamera kailѳ, Tius naba pasrain gúi ashchab marig miat'an cha. Inchendѳ asha gѳnrrai katѳgan chigѳben peg kenamara tranmѳtѳ, tru Jѳnásweiwandѳ eshkamѳnrrun cha. Incha nѳmune pѳnrramnetѳ, iptinchibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Yandѳ maaben misrene, ñimbe ѳyah chibelѳ gѳn cha: Tab gwalѳm gѳnrrab asѳnan cha. Kaguende srѳmbalabe ke pigѳzhig basran cha.
Inchen tru mabelѳbe ishumburwan, uregwan munchimuben, mѳguelѳtѳ pib mil gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mayeelѳba ѳska ma kѳrrѳmisren, katѳgucha tru pirisaig undailan tasinmerayu siete netsѳbateelѳ tulishibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳbe misagwan pirau purramisringarua,
Inchene Jesúsbe payibig kѳn: ¿Ñimbe pirri mam dѳgagѳgue? cha. Inchene nѳmbe: Pirri sietebah, katѳ mamdѳ peskauureebatѳ tѳgaguer chibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Ya nu misagweimbe ¿nambe chincha mamig wetѳrrayasamѳ? cha, ya yu mu misag warab warѳmѳsrѳmbe.n

Treekkurri tru nu misaabe ashippe, ke kwaara asha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn, waminchab gaimabelѳbe wamindamba, asru chiyu gѳben kesruilѳbe tabig kѳrrѳmisramba, cѳjѳsmerabe ambamba, kabgailѳbe asamba indi ashabe, nѳmbe Israel misaamerai Tiuswan truba tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn..
Jesús truyugurri webya, Galilea pisu buluwan purayabe, kan tunbalasrѳ nebya, truyu wamisrѳbig kѳn..
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Pirriwan uregwan kerrawa, weraureezheelan kebusramibe sѳl gѳmѳn cha.
Inchene tru ishuube nui merrab arrua, tѳmbѳnsrѳb trenchibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, purugurra! cha.

Inchen kan ishug canaansriig tru birau tsubiibe arrua, Jesúswan trenchib wamab kemallibig kѳn: Señѳr, merrabsrѳ Davidwei Nusrkai, nan lastima ashcha chib. Nai nimbasrbe kan kwaimandzig ni mumayguen t'ab uñchaingaig indinab megan cha.
Incha Jesúsbe truyugurri tarѳmisra, Tirѳba, Sidónba tru ciudamera pѳnrrab piraumay ibig kѳn.

Kaguende mѳwei manrrѳ umbugurrimbe kaig isuilѳ gѳben, kweetsamelѳ gѳben, kasharawarmera itѳlulamig kѳben, kasharameelѳ gѳbendѳ ishumburba, mѳguelѳba trѳmbѳig maramelѳ gѳben, nilamelѳ gѳben, isa wamindiilѳ gѳben, tsalѳ wamiilѳ gѳben, ѳyeelѳ kerriguh werrun cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñimgucha chigúinguen mѳrmѳwa bѳnrrѳtirru cha?
Inchene Pedrѳbe Jesúswan trenchibig kѳn: Tru ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn cha, kemesra wamindigwan namun tab eshkarra cha.
Inchene nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe Jesúswan kemallabe trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿Ñi ѳyeeg tailan faliseѳsmera mѳrabe, namig mѳligwan ashtirru? cha.
Mѳwan trigu kebibiibe nune chi kaig trѳmbѳig marmѳn cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, mѳwan kaig trѳmbѳig marѳbiibe trigugurri webibig, truibe si, nune trѳmbѳig maran chibig kѳn..
I misaamerabe nan k'a triitѳgatѳ tab inndan cha. Inchendѳ nѳmui manrrѳbe nainukkurrimbe yab pѳnrran cha.
¡Palatѳ t'abelѳ! Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Isaías ñimuimburab sѳlwein dain gѳn ѳyah chippe:
Trune ñimbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Kan mѳѳbe mѳskawan gúi, kabe usran gúi trenchinrrun cha: Na ñimun purugumig tѳgagúigwan Tiuswan tranar cha. Ñimune purugunrrab gaimamѳnrrun chinrrun cha..
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha payibig kѳn: Trube, ¿ñimgucha Tius maig maramigwan martrai pѳnsrailane chindimbarre marmeelѳ gѳgue cha, ñim ñimuimburab trendѳ treeg maligwan marѳg kѳbiitѳ?
Ñi pala itѳguewa gúig urѳzhigwan namun katѳrabashcha chib, rrugabelѳ gѳn. Incha mayeelѳba katѳrabelѳbe tabig kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn..
Incha yandѳ tru pisuyu chab larraamba, Genesaret birausrѳ pubene,
Incha barcѳyu nebamben latatѳ, isiibe wasrѳngandѳ pasramisrѳptinchen,
Incha tru mur isig ichibigwan tab ashippe, kѳliimataptinchibig kѳn. Inchen nune asentab mendaptinchen trashibig kѳn: ¡Señѳr, wesrurra! chib.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Amѳ bѳs cha. Inchen Pedrѳbe barcѳyugurri pinaya, pi balawan Jesúsweimay ib mendabig kѳn.
nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ pi balawan arri ashippe, truba kwaarѳb kѳrig kѳbiitѳ trenchib trashibelѳ gѳn: Kan mѳsig kѳn cha.
Inchen lѳtsѳzhig yemdѳ Jesús pi balawan katsikka nѳmuimay kemallib ibene,
Incha yandѳ Jesúsbe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan pisu ambѳgatѳsrѳmay merrab amrrai barcѳyu nebambingarubig kѳn, tru nu misagwan ungwa chib pasrappatѳ.
Inchen tru mabelѳbe ishumburwan, uregwan munchimuben, mѳguelѳtѳ trattrѳ mil gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen mayeelѳba ѳska ma kѳrrѳmisren, katѳgucha pitis undailan t'asinmerayu netsѳbatѳ dѳce tulishibelѳ gѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Yu srua amrrurray cha.
Inchene nѳmbe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nambe trattrѳgatѳ pirrimbah, pagatѳ peskaubatѳ tѳgaguer cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Chi ambamibe palѳmѳn cha. Manrrai ñim mannay cha.
Inchen Jesús barcѳyugurri pinaya, truba nu misag basrai ashabe, nѳmun lastima gѳben, nѳmui utu kwanrreelan t'amarѳbig kѳn.

Inchen Jesús Juanwan kweetsin gúi wammѳrabe, truyugurri nѳtѳ kan barcѳyu nѳѳrѳ mu misag warab waraimѳsrѳmay ibig kѳn. Inchen misaamerabe truba nu wammѳrѳppe, pueblѳmerayugurri webamba, nuimay katsikkatѳ ambub mendabelѳ gѳn..
Incha Juanbe kailan keeri yau waben, Herѳdesbe turwan paringarubig kѳn.
Inchen reybe truba isui inchendѳ, tru mayeelѳ lincha purrabelai malau, treeg tranrrumѳn cha, trannrrab misrig kѳppe, traningarubig kѳn.
¡Gatѳ, tranmѳ gѳmѳ! chi miabendѳ tranrrumѳn chibig kѳn..
Herѳdesbe Juanwan kwetchab inchendѳ, misagwan kѳriimatabig kѳn, k'aguende mayeelѳba Juanbe Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abig kui kѳrewa gѳben.
Kaguende Juan Bautist'abe Herѳdeswane trendaig kѳbig kѳn: Tru Herѳdíaswan ñui srai mara tѳgagѳmibe merig basran cha,
Kaguende Herѳdesbe tru Juanwan kemѳringarua, lusra, kailan keeri yaumay kertrai srua ambingaruig kѳbig kѳn, tru nui nuneg Felipei srai Herѳdíaskurrindѳ.
Tru gwalѳmmerawan Galilea birau karubig Herѳdesbe Jesúsweimburabgѳba wamindi mѳrabe,
Incha truyube maramburab mariilѳ tre marmíig kѳn, k'aguende truyu misaamerabe nѳmui isubigwan nuinug pasrmuikkurri.
¿Yamba nui nuchalѳgucha kerriguba namui ututѳwei warabelѳ gѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Trube, kerrigu iigwane i mѳѳbe chugurrinrre ѳyeelѳ tѳgaguerah? cha.
¿Iibe tru tsiimeratѳga chine marѳbigwei nusrkai, katѳ nui usrimbe María taig kѳmuitarru? cha. ¿Santiagѳin gѳben, Jѳséwein gѳben, Simónwein gѳben, Judaswein gѳben nuneg kѳmuitarru? cha..
Yandѳ Jesús tru ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn chib iilan eshkab chab waminchabe, truyugurri webya ibig kѳn..
Incha k'ailane nu nag naarabigu kebetѳnrrun cha, truyube kishib, trugulmeran tsatsamig kѳnrrun cha.
Srabe gwalѳm patsab uraskucha ѳyeetѳweih purainrrun, chibig kѳn. Inchen ángelesmera webamrrun cha, kailanba, sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳbelanba nѳѳrѳ tarѳmartrab..
Katѳ tru srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub wainuguibe kan atarrayan maryu keguchen, chi beskaugurrimbunѳ kemѳrѳb lataig kѳn cha.
PilaPrisrѳ
Katѳ tru srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib k'arub wainuguibe k'an tѳrbilab sruuzheelan lawa, penab, yanѳb inchibig lataig kѳn cha.

Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub wainuguibe kan chigѳben truba tabzhigwan pirѳ umbu sѳra basrig lataig kѳn. Kan mѳg tru tabig sѳrig pasrabigwan wetѳrrawa, katѳle truyutѳwei sѳra basran. Incha truba kasrag ya, nui chi tѳgagúilan kerrigu yanabe, tru pirѳwan penaptindan..
Tru Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe tru katѳganelan kaig maringarub pѳnrrabelanba, ke kaigwandѳ marѳb pѳnrrabelanba nѳ ashib karub wainukkurri truilane mayamba nui ángelesmeran tulishinrrai ѳrtrun cha..
Tru kaig kauwan tulisha, nagu pattrai kebet'ab lat'aitѳwei srabe gwalѳm patsab uraskucha ѳyeeg punrrun chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Tru tab yellwan ellmarѳbiibe Mѳg Misra Arrubigwan eshkabig kѳn cha.

ѳyeeg nebuppe, tru Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig maig taig nebunrrain gúig kѳn, tru ѳyah taig: Waminchib kusrenanѳppe, ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn chibgѳba eshkab wamindamѳnrrun cha. Tius pirѳwan marѳb uraskurri sѳrig pѳnrrabelan tѳrgandѳ eshkab wamindamѳnrrun cha.

Maya yellmerai utu purѳ lamѳ yellzhig kѳbendѳ, nurappe, tru ellmarig shush tusrmerai utu mas nuibe murtasa gѳn cha. Yandѳ kan tusrburabig misren, nuig kѳptѳ, illimera pala amѳñibelѳguen amrrua, tru srarmerayu le marѳbelѳ gѳn chibig kѳn.
Jesús katѳgan ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn cha, kemesra waminchibig kѳn: Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe kan murtasa yell lataig kѳn cha, kan mѳg nui trau tsurig..
Inchene nѳbe trenchibig kѳn: Kagѳbasay cha. Inchippa kaig kauwan kitѳnrrab incha, tirigungucha tѳga kit'abgun cha.
Inchene tru ellmarig puaibe trenchibig kѳn: Mutѳ tsaliig ѳyeeg mariinrrun cha. Inchen truyu marѳb melabelѳbe trencha payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Kabe tru kaig kauwan nam kitѳnrrab ambamѳh? cha.
Inchen sѳteelѳba kib waramne nun kan ashig kѳmui inchibig arrua, tirigu tsuri utu kaig yellwan wiitapba, yan cha.
Incha Jesús katѳgan ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn cha eshkawa pasrѳb trenchibig kѳn: Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe kan mѳg nui trau tab yellwan tsuri lataig kѳn cha.

Inchen tsuren, tru kal shau utu gѳrrab yellbe ѳyeeg misagwan eshkabig kѳn: Tiuswei wamwan mѳrѳppe, mѳrendѳ, i birau chine kѳbigwan menrra isubiibah, nѳmui chine palѳmѳ tѳgagúilѳ purѳ tabig lataig asѳnaikkurrimbatѳ, tru Tiuswei wamwan mѳrigwane kerrigu truitѳ kasrѳben, chigucha nѳmbe ellmarig misrmѳn cha.n
Inchendѳ srѳl tre umbu keetiimíig kua, maya yanaguen amѳñimѳn. Incha tru Tiuswei wamgurrindѳ chigѳben puben, katѳ chigѳben kaig nebub arruben, mѳi mѳin gѳrran.
Inchen tru sruurrѳldѳ birau pirѳ tre chiganug kѳrrab yellbe tru misag Tiuswei wamwan tru urastѳbe truba t'ab gúi mѳrѳb ut'abelan trunun eshkabig kѳn.

Inchawei nabe ñimun ciertѳn trenchar: Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelѳ gѳben, sѳlgandѳ tabig marѳb misaamera gѳben, truilѳ truba nu, i ñim asigwan asinrrabna gúi inchendѳ, ashmuig kѳn cha. I ñim mѳrigwan mѳrinrrabna gúi inchendѳ, mѳrmuig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn.
Trune ñimbe mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn, kaguende ñimui kabmera Tiusweimburabigwan ashib, kalumera nuimburabigwan chigúi mѳrѳb inchibelѳ tѳgarbe.k
Inchawei nѳmune ѳyeeg kѳben, Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abig Isaías ѳyah wamindig ciertѳnwei nebun cha: Maya, maya mѳrendѳ, ni chi tainguen mѳrmѳnrrun cha. Ashippe, ashendѳ, chigúi ashmѳnrrun cha.

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Srѳmbalasrѳ Tiusbe nѳ ashib k'arub wainug mu asiimíig tѳgagúilan ñimun ashchai tranan cha. Trune k'atѳganelane treeg kѳmѳn cha.Kaguende tѳgaigwane masken rranen, uñchaguen tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Trune chigaigwane nui lamѳtiig tѳgagúigwanguen kerranrrun cha.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Srѳmbalasrѳ Tiusbe nѳ ashib k'arub wainug mu asiimíig tѳgagúilan ñimun ashchai tranan cha. Trune k'atѳganelane treeg kѳmѳn cha.
Inchen katѳganbalѳ tab pirau gѳrrabiibe si, tabig ellmarig misra, mѳilѳbe kan yellgurrindѳ mamig rrulzheelѳ cien niguen, mѳilѳbe sesenta niguen, katѳganelѳbe kan rrulzhikkurrindѳ treinta nigan cha.
Katѳganbalѳ yellbe kal shau utu gѳrrѳben, kalmera nѳrrѳrab mendappe, chab gasrѳb tsibisan cha.
pѳsr webarruabe, mergurangaruben, srѳl tre chigaig kua, mullaptindan cha.
Incha tsurѳb ibene, kanbalѳ yellbe mayu gѳrrѳben, illimera amrrua, man cha.
Inchen nѳbe waminchib pѳlbasrѳbig kѳn ѳyeeg lataitѳwein gѳn chib wamindiilѳtѳga chineh kemesra kusrenanѳb. Incha trenchibig kѳn: Kan kwallibiima tsurѳb kwallchab webyan cha..
Tru gwalѳmdѳwei Jesús yaugurri webya, nu bisu menda wamisrѳbig kѳn.
Kaguende mѳikkѳben nai Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig maig martrai karuben, treeg marѳbig, truibe sí, nai nuneg, nai nuchag, nai usrin gѳn cha.
Inchabe nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan kwaneshkab trenchibig kѳn: Nai usri, nai nunelѳbe iilѳ gѳn cha.n
Inchen mѳikkѳsrѳn Jesúswan eshk'abig kѳn: Ñui usrimba, ñui nunelѳba wambig pѳnrran cha, ñiba waminchab ñun payib.
Jesús misaameran waminchib srѳ basramne nui usrimba, nui nunelѳba pua, nѳba waminchig kui wambiitѳ pѳnrrabelѳ gѳn.n
Katѳ nai yamay inrrab cha, na chugurri webarrua arrinuumaytѳwei. Incha katѳ arruabe, tru mѳwane kan yawan chiguchagaig chishtѳ paluuncha t'amara basrig lat'aig wetѳrranrrun cha.

Tru ambѳ umbu birausrѳ reinagucha Tiuswei tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maram gwalѳmbe kurrѳnrrun cha. Incha nѳbe tru mѳin gwalѳm misaamera ñimun mѳra melѳnrrai maringarunrrun. Kaguende nѳma purѳ yabsrѳngurringuen pirau arrig kѳbig kѳn, Salѳmón, tru purѳ gusrebig wamindigwan mѳrtrab. Inchen yu pasrabiibe Salѳmón lataitѳ gѳmѳ, mas nuikken gur chibig kѳn.
Inchen mѳilѳgѳsrѳn Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmeraba Jesúswan trenchibelѳ gѳn: Kusrennѳbig, Tius ñiba pasrain gúi nam asha gѳnrrab mar cha.
Tru Jѳnás truba nu peskau umbu pѳn gwalѳm, pѳn yem wab lataitѳwei Mѳg Misra Arrubikkucha pѳn gwalѳm, pѳn yem pirѳ umbu wanrrab gѳn cha.n
Pѳs ñui wamindiitѳgatѳwei tabig kѳn dain gúi, k'abe k'aig kѳn dain gúi Tius treeg marig kѳrrѳmisrtrabguen.
¡Ul lataig inchib misaamera! ¿Ñim chincha tabig waminchague, trendѳ kailѳbe? Kaguende nui manrrau chine isua tѳgagúilѳ pinѳguchen, nui triibe treeg wamindan.k
Pѳs kan tab tusrbe, tab mamitѳwei niirrun. Inchen kan kaig tusrbe kaig mamitѳwei niirrun. Kaguende kan tusrwane mamig niguinug asan.

Inchawei nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Misaamera kaig mariilan lata, chigѳben Tiuswan purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamab wamindiilan lata Tiusbe kerriguh pesannawa ulѳ baymѳnrrun cha. Trune Espíritu Santѳn purѳ rrѳmbѳig wamab wamindiilane si, Tiusbe pesannamѳ, ulѳ bayrrun chibig kѳn..
Naingatѳ basrѳmíibe, nan tsaleelaingatѳ maran. Inchen naba tulishimíibe truѳrѳtѳ wiitan.k
Trune na Tiuswei Espíritutѳga kwaimandziimeran webetѳbene, Tius nѳ ashib karub pasraibe ñimui utube puaguen basran cha..
ѳyeetѳwei Satanáskucha Satanáswandѳwei weguchabe, nѳasiitѳ nѳѳrѳtѳ misran cha. Inchen nѳ ashib k'arub waibe, trube, ¿chincha pasrabig basrѳnrrab gѳ? cha.
Inchen faliseѳsmera iigwan mѳrabe, trenchibelѳ gѳn: Nugwaimandzig, Beelzebú, tru kwaimandziimeran ke nѳasha garubig treeg martrai tranig kua, truikkurli kwaimandziimeran weeran cha.
Kan caña kegurisaigwan nѳbe kebinab lanchimѳwei, katѳ mecha ke chab gwab pilab pasrabigwan kweechimѳwei inchun taig, tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan kerrigu kanawa wesrawa basramnegatig..
Incha nune mu gѳn cha, mun gѳben misaameran mѳrѳ waminchimѳnrrain garubig kѳn.
Inchen Jesús iigwan wammѳrabe, truyugurri iben, misag truba nu mendig ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchen Jesúsbe mayan gwanrreelan t'amarѳbig kѳn.
Incha tru mѳwane trenchibig kѳn: Kwalwan larrѳbichi cha. Inchen nѳbe larrѳbichene, kandarѳ gwal latawei tabig kѳrrѳmisrѳptinchibig kѳn.k
Pѳs kan mѳѳbe kan ubisha lat'aitѳguen gѳmѳ, purab nuikken gѳn cha. Inchawei treeg kѳbene, isrin gwalѳmmerawangucha t'abig maramigwane merѳmѳ, ka marbasamig kѳn chibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Ñimma mѳikkѳben kan ubisha tѳgagua, isrin gwalѳm trabyu kebeñene, ya, kemѳra, wesramѳnrraguh? cha.
Incha Jesúsbe truyugurri ya, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yau kebibene
Inchawei na, Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe isrin gwalѳm nan nѳ garunrrain gѳmѳtѳ, maramdiigwane marѳb, maramgaigwane marmub, nabe na asha garubig kur chibig kѳn, Jesúsbe..
Inchen gѳben nabe ñimune trenchar: Tiuswei ya lataitѳguen gѳmѳtѳ, mas purѳ nuikken gur cha, na yu basrabiibe.
Inchene nѳbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¿Ñimgan lemeelѳ gѳtirru cha, mana gѳsrѳn Davidwanba nui linchibelanba parѳgwaben mandѳ indigwan?n
Inchen fariseѳsmerabe asha, Jesúswan trenchibelѳ gѳn: Au, ñui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe isrin gwalѳm chigѳben marmѳnrrai merigwan marѳb gѳn cha..

Arau merrarrabig tru nai nukabala trarligwan kashmѳ, uta, naba latatѳ srua amun chibig kѳn. Incha na maig kѳben nan treeg asha kusrey cha. Nama purѳ tammayig, manrraugurli newan tabig chish inchimíig, nabe treeg kur cha. ѳyamaybe ñimui mѳsiimerayasig isramig wetѳrranrrun cha.
Ñim mayeelѳba ñimui amѳnailѳyu chine chine nebuig truba muraarailѳ, trurrigu kwatsig nigarbe naimay amrruy, nabe ñimun isramig tranrrumѳn.k

Tru uras Jesús trenchibig kѳn: Nai Mѳskai, srѳmbalawanba, pirѳwanba ashib karubig, ñun tabig waminchar cha, kaguende ñibe kusrebelѳ chigúi mѳrѳbelan ashmѳnrrai tru sѳrig pѳnrrabelane tru chigucha gѳmeelѳ kusremeelan kenamarikkurri.n
Inchawei nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Tiuswei tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maram gwalѳm attrabiibe tru Sѳdѳma pirausrѳ misaamerai lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, ñimuimbe mas purѳ rrѳmbѳig kѳnrrun cha.
Pѳs nabe trendamѳnrrun: Tiuswei tru maig kѳnrrabigwan asha maram gwalѳmbe Tirѳba, Sidónba misaamera lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, ñimbe mas purѳ rrѳmbѳigwan utѳnrrun cha.

Incha Jesúsbe maramburab maliilan nѳ truba mali pueblѳmerasrѳ namig waminchibig kѳn, kaguende tru pueblѳmerayu warab misaamerabe nѳmui kaig maliilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliramuikkurli. Incha Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn:
Pѳs Juan mamѳwei, muchimѳwei inchibig arrubene, nѳmbe: Kwaimandzig tѳgaig kѳn chibelѳ gѳn cha.
Ñim iigwan kѳrewa utѳnrrappe, Juanbe Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Elías attrabig kѳbig, truigwein gѳn.
Mayeelѳ Tius maig karuigwan eshkabelѳba, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳriibabe Juan arrumnegatig Tius maig karuigwan eshkaig kѳbig kѳn.k
Juan Bautista marѳb pѳlbasrѳb uraskurri mѳingatig srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib k'arub waibe truba k'aig indinab pasran. Inchen tru treeg k'aig marѳbelѳbe treeg mara, trunun nѳm k'anammѳrѳ indan.

Trube, treeg kѳbene, ¿chi ashchab webambig kѳ? Kabe, ¿Tius maig karuigwan kan eshkabigwandeh? ѳѳ, nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun cha: Treegwanwei ashchab webambig kѳn cha, katѳ treetѳguen gѳmѳ, trurrigu Tius maig karuigwan eshkabigwan lat'aguen gѳmѳ, mas purѳ nuigwan.
Trube, ¿chi ashchab webamgue? cha. Kabe, ¿kan mѳg truba tabig keweigwandeh? cha. Ñimbe ashibelѳ gѳn, truba tabig kebelѳbe reymerai yau purrabelѳ gúi.
Mayanguen tab gúig kѳn chibig kѳn, nan peg kuitamab isumѳtѳ, na gúitamab isubigweimbe..
¿Tru Cristѳ attrabig kѳbiibe ñi gúin gúi, k'abe nambe k'atѳganun muniiramѳh? chinrrai.
Juan Bautista kailan keeri yau keerig pasrѳwa, Cristѳ chi marѳb uniilan wammѳrѳbig kѳn. Inchabe mѳilan gѳsrѳn nui mendig amѳñibelan Jesúswan trencha payrrai ѳrѳbig kѳn:
Inchen mѳikkѳben nai mendig amѳñibelѳ gúi ashiptѳ trengatig kѳmѳzheelan kan pi bishi basuzhiitѳguen srѳrrѳbiibe, truburѳ nui ketig utamigwane utѳmѳ gѳmѳ, utѳnrrun cha, ñimun trendamѳnrrun.
Mѳikkѳben ñimun t'ab wamab ut'abiibe nan ut'an. Inchen nan ut'abiibe nan karua ѳrѳbigwan ut'an.
Inchen mѳikkѳben ѳsig kѳmigwan wetѳrrabiibe yandѳ pinab pinamig nebunrrun cha. Inchen nagurrindѳ kwabiibe managatig ѳsig kѳmigwan wetѳrrawa tѳgagѳnrrun cha.
Inchawei mѳigwandѳgucha ashig kѳmui inchibelѳbe yauelѳtѳwein gѳnrrun.
Nabe arruppe, mѳѳbe mѳskaimba namig kurrѳben, nimbasrbe usrimba namig kurrѳben, yernabe sueeraba namig kurrѳnrrai martrab arrur..
Nabe piraumay arruppe, ambumay imay tab gѳbigwan srua arritamab isumѳtay. Nabe truigwan srua arrumѳtѳ, kwayab gѳmigwan srua arrur cha.m
Inchawei ñimbe chi kѳlig kui inchimѳtay. Truba yam illimera lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, ñimbe mas purѳ nuweyelѳ gѳn.
Pѳs, ñimuimburappe ñimui turyu pusruumeranguen kan gan mundziizheelѳ gѳn.

Asrwandѳ kweechibelane kѳrig kui inchimѳtay. Kaguende ñui mѳsigwane kwetchab gaimanrrun. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, asrwanba, mѳsigwanba managatig tru mѳra melamnug pinishinrrabigwan, tru Tiuswane si, kѳrig tѳgaguy, chibig kѳn.
Inchawei misaameran kѳrig kui inchimѳt'ay. Pѳs chitѳgucha sѳriibe sѳriitѳ kѳrrѳmisrmѳ, kenamisrtrun. Katѳ kan sѳratѳ tѳgagúibe sѳratѳ kѳrrѳmarig kѳmѳ, wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrtrun.
Kan kusreb mendig megabiibe nui kusrenanѳbigwan purab nuig kѳmѳn. Katѳ kan karuindiig megabiibe nui ya buaigwan purab nuig kѳmѳn.n
Inchen nuneebe nѳmui nunewandѳwei kwetchai tranen, mѳskaimbe nusrkawan rranen, ureemerabe mѳskalan namig kurra, kwetchai tranrrun cha.
Kaguende ñim waminchain gѳmѳtѳ, Tius ñimui Mѳskawei Espíritu ñimgurri waminchun.n
Ashiptѳ gѳnrligay misaameran. Kaguende nѳmbe ñimune karubelai tasku tranѳb, katѳ judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamerayu ñimune ichabetab inchun.
Au, nabe ñim ubishamera latailan lѳbѳsmerai utu ѳrar. Chiyugѳben kegѳrrѳmѳnrrab ñimbe ul latailѳ guy. Inchen chi kaig inchimeelѳmaybe palѳmamera latailѳ gѳmig kѳn.
Inchen ñimun wamѳmѳwei, ñim wamindigwan mѳrmѳwei inchene, nѳmui yaugurrin gúi, nѳmui pueblѳyugurrin gúi webambuppe, srѳbyu usrѳwan chishtѳ gѳrrѳga webamrrigay chibig kѳn.
Ñim kan pueblѳyu gúi, ya tsitsѳ bѳnrrabyu gúi puabe, kan misag chi isumgaig t'abigwan lawa, truigwei yau kѳrrѳmisrtrigay ñim truyugurri ambamnegatig.

katѳ mayuwei murral ila ammѳwei, turingucha yunѳmaramiba gѳmѳtѳ, kandѳ tѳga, alpargatiskucha keeta gѳmѳwei, ni pѳtѳnain tsikkucha srua ammѳwei inday cha. Kaguende chigѳben marѳbiibe nui marimburѳbe mu chi chinrrainga mamigwane utamig kѳn cha..
ѳrѳ gѳben, an gѳben, cѳbre gѳben ñimui pѳrѳnailѳyu pusra ammѳwei,m
Trusrѳ ambabe, srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe lutau basran chib eshkab kusrenanrrigay cha.n
Trembe tru Israel misaamerai utu tru ubisha rrubiilѳ latailaimaytѳ amrrigay cha.
Felipe gѳben, Bartѳlѳmé gѳben, Tѳmás gѳben, Mateѳ tru rѳmasreelayasig an utabig kѳben, Alfeѳwei nusrkai Santiagѳ gѳben, Tadeѳ gѳben,n
Iilѳ gѳn tru dѳce nѳashib karua ѳriilai munchimera: Srѳsriibe Simón truigwane katѳ Pedrѳgucha taig, nui nuneg Andrésba, Zebedeѳwei nusrkai Santiagѳba, nui nuneg Juanba,
Incha nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilan trenchibig kѳn: Ellmarig tulisamibe truba nѳrrѳ gѳben, trune tulishinrrabelѳbe mamdѳ gѳn cha.
Incha truba nu sѳtѳ misagwan ashabe, lastima isui inchibig kѳn. Kaguende nѳmbe truba isuilѳ, chinchabguen gaimar, kan ubishamera mu ashchabig chigar latailѳ gѳben.
Inchen faliseѳsmerabe trenchibelѳ gѳn: Kwaimandziimeran ke nѳasha garub pasrabikkurli kwaimandziimeran nѳbe webusrѳbig kѳn cha.
Trendaingucha nѳmbe webambuptѳ, Jesús nѳ chi marigwan tru birau mayeelan waminchibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳmui kabmerabe ashibelѳ misren, Jesúsbe trenchib karubig kѳn: Mun gѳben eshkab gѳnrrab gѳmѳ cha, i marigwan.
Inchene Jesúsbe nѳmui kabmeran katѳrawabe, trenchibig kѳn: Ñim ñimui isubigwan nainug maig tѳgagúig treeg kѳnrrain cha.
Jesús truyugurli webya ibene, pailѳ kabgailѳ trenchib trashib wendautѳ amrrubelѳ gѳn: ¡Namun lastima ashcha chib, merrabsrѳ Davidwei Nusrkai!
Inchen tru biraube muba kuimburab treeg purayaigwan wammѳrig kѳrrѳmisrѳbig kѳn.
Incha nѳmun webambingaruben, Jesúsbe kebya, ishugunan tasigu kemѳrene, unѳbe kurraptinchibig kѳn.

Inchen Jesúsbe keesha asha, tru ishuwan ashabe, trenchibig kѳn: Chi isumѳt'a cha. Nimbasr, ñui isubigwan nainuutѳ pasra tѳgagúikkurri t'amarig kѳrrѳmisran cha. Indiibe tru uraskurri yandѳ t'ammisrig kѳrrѳmisrig kѳn.
Kaguende nѳbe treeg isubig kѳn: Nui kewagúigwan ka katѳraitѳ t'ammisrig kѳrrѳmisramѳnrrun cha.
Inchen Jesúsbe kurra iben, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ nun lincha amben, nѳbe tru mѳѳba ibig kѳn.

Katѳ srѳ vinѳnma kѳllin galusmerayu usrmѳwei inchibelѳ gѳn cha. Kaguende treeg marene, k'alusmerabe srurrѳben, vinѳbe lushen, yandѳ k'alusmerabe k'a pinѳnrrun cha. Inchawei srѳ vinѳne srѳ galusmeran marigu usramig kѳn cha. Trumaybe mѳigwandѳgucha chi mindisaig kѳmѳnrrun chibig kѳn Jesúsbe.

Inchene Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: ¿Kan nѳviѳs yaumay linchai eshkailanma nѳviѳ nѳmba wabengan isuin burrѳnrraitarru? cha. Inchendѳ yandѳ nѳviѳn srua ambam gwalѳmmera punrrun cha. Inchen ayunabwei inchun cha..

Juan Bautist'ai mendig amѳñibelѳ Jesúswan kemallabe, trencha payibelѳ gѳn: Namba, fariseѳsmerababe ayunamigwan katѳ gatѳ marer cha. ¿Inchen ñui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe chindimbarre trunun marmeelѳ gѳh? cha.
Inchene Jesús trunun mѳrabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tabelѳ kwanrrѳgarbe mѳ marѳbig palain gѳmѳn cha. Kwanrreelѳbeguende palain gѳn cha.

Indiibe Jesúsbe tru Mateѳwei yau mab wabene, truba yamelѳ rѳmasreelayasig an utabelѳ gѳben, k'atѳganelѳ k'aig marѳb misaamera gѳben puabe, Jesúsba, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳba mishatsigu trubalatѳ purrѳben,
Inchen misaamera iigwan ashabe, truba kѳrig kui inchibelѳ gѳn, Tiusbe mѳguelan ѳyeeg mu mandamgaig maramig tranitamab isua. Incha ѳyeeg marikkurri Tiuswan truba tabig waminchibelѳ gѳn..
Inchen kwanrriibe kurra, nui yamay ibig kѳn.
¿Mѳigwan mas kѳrmѳ trendamdiig kѳbsruerah? cha. Kabe: Ñui kaig mariilan ulѳ bayamig kѳmíig pesannaig kѳrrѳmisran, ¿tamiteh? Kabe: Kurrab, inrrѳ, ¿tamiteh? cha.m
Inchen Jesúsbe nѳm chi isub gúilan ashabe, trencha payibig kѳn: ¿Ñimbe ñimui manrraube chindimbarre ѳyeeg kaig isub gѳgue? cha..
Inchen mѳilѳgѳsrѳn tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳbe treeg isubelѳ gѳn: Nѳbe Tiusweimburab purѳ trѳmbѳig waman chib.
Inchen pueblѳyu maya misaabe Jesúswan katѳnrrab webamba, nun ashabe, tru biraugurri irra cha, truba rrugabelѳ gѳn.m
Inchen tru kuchi ashibelѳbe chab lula, pueblѳsrѳ puabe, tru kwaimandzig tѳgar gѳbelan maig purayaigwan kerriguh waminchib mendabelѳ gѳn.
Inchen tru kwaimandziimerabe Jesúswan trenchib rrugabelѳ gѳn: Namun webetappe, trube, tru kuchimerayu kebambingarurrunrrig cha..
Truyugurri maya yab gѳsrѳn kuchimera truba nu lawa mab amѳñibelѳ gѳn.
Inchen nѳmbe kwaara asha gѳrrѳmisra, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¿ѳyeebe chi mѳg kerah? cha. ¡Isig ichibig lata, mar lata, iilѳguen nun mѳrtrappe!
Inchen nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe kasrѳnanrrab amba, trenchibelѳ gѳn: ¡Señѳr, namun wesrurra chib, chab asentab meler! cha.
Inchene mѳimbe maryube truba trѳmbѳig mur isig ichib kurra, pi welarmera barcѳyu mas, mas negutsingucha, Jesúsbe kib tsubig kѳn.
Jesús yandѳ barcѳyu nebiben, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳbe nun lincha ambubelѳ gѳn.n

Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: Zѳrramerabe waramig trab tѳgagѳben, katѳ pala amѳñib illimeragucha nѳmui lemera tѳgar gѳn cha. Trune na, Mѳg Misra Arrubiibe ni nai turwan chu nerrarramikken chigaig kur cha.
Inchen tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳligwan kan kusrenanѳbig kemallabe trenchibig kѳn: Kusrennѳbig, ñi chu ibendѳ, nabe mendig arrumѳnrrun cha.
Yandѳ yem misren Jesúsweimay truba yamelan kwaimandzig tѳgarwan misaabe srua amrruben, kan wamitѳgatѳ tru kwaimandziimeran webet'ab, katѳ chi gwanrrѳ gѳben tѳgarwan mayeelan t'amarѳbig kѳn.
Incha Jesúsbe tru ishuwei tasigwan katѳrabene, pachiibe weetaptinchen, nѳbe kurra, tru pubelayasig chi maramigwan marѳb mendabig kѳn.
Jesús Pedrѳi yamay arrua, kebyabe, Pedrѳi sueerabe camayu pachiiba tsui ashibig kѳn.k
Trune Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳ purrѳnrrab ureemerabe wambig purѳ rrѳmbѳ lѳstѳyu webusriilѳ gѳnrrun cha. Truyube kishib, trugulmeran tsatsamig kѳnrrun cha..

Kaguende nagucha mas nѳrreelѳ k'aruig kur cha. Katѳ treeg kѳben na k'arub tѳgagúilѳ suldaumera tѳgagur cha. Truilanma na mѳigwan gѳben: Inrrѳ chibene, ib, k'atѳ na mѳigwan gѳben: Amѳ chibene, arrub, k'atѳ nai k'aruindiig megabigwan chigѳben: Mar chibene, marѳb inchibig kѳn cha.
Inchen tru centuriѳnbe trenchibig kѳn: Señѳr, ñi nai yau kebattraimbe, nabe trengatig kѳmuinat'an cha. Tammisr cha, treetѳ chirra cha. Nai karuindiig megabiibe t'ammisrtrun cha.
Yandѳ Jesús Capernaumsrѳ kebibene, rѳmanѳsmerai suldau cienelan ashibig, kan centuriѳn daig, nuimay arruabe, nun purugurra chib
Inchen Jesúsbe tasigwan larrѳbicha estsarabe, trenchibig kѳn: Tamarѳg kѳtan cha. Tamalig kѳrrѳmisr cha. Inchen tru urastѳ nui trerab gwanrrѳbe chishig kѳrrѳmisren,
Sre buben, pimera nuraben, yawan isig megambub ichen, yabe peña, purѳ isumdiig mindisaig kѳrrѳmisran cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.
Yandѳ Jesús tun balasrѳngurri kѳrraarruben, misag truba nu mendig amrrubelѳ gѳn.
Inchen Jesús iilan kerrigu chab waminchen, maya misaaba kwaara asha kѳrrѳmisrѳbelѳ gѳn ѳyeeg kusrenaniilan.
Inchen nan mѳrѳppe, mѳrendѳ, na maig t'aigwan marmíigwane, kan mѳg t'ab isua marmíig lat'aig kѳn damѳnrrun cha, nui yawan pisrum balatѳ marѳbig lat'aikke.
Sre bub, pimera nurab, yawan isig megambub itsingucha, yabe peñmѳn cha, kaguen srug bala marig basrѳwa.m
Mѳikkѳben na wamindigwan mѳrѳb, na maig taigwan mѳra marѳbigwane kan mѳg tab isua marѳbig lataig kѳn chinrrab. Nui yawan srug bala marѳbig lataikke.
Nan: Señѳr, Señѳr chibelѳ srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳmbe mayeelѳba gѳmѳtѳ guebamrrun. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, nai Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig maig maringaruben, trunun marѳbelѳtѳwei kebamrrun.
Inchawei nѳmui mariilѳyu ñimbe ashchabguen chibig kѳn..
Inchawei chi tusrwandѳgucha tab mamig niimíigwane para, nagu kegutsan..
Inchawei kan tab tusrbe tab mamig niguen. Trune kan kaig tusrbe kaig mamitѳwei nigan cha.n
Trune ñimbe nѳmui maig maliilѳyutѳguen tsabѳ ashchun, tusryu mamig niguigwan latawei. Kaguende kal dusryugurlima uvas lurrmѳwei, katѳ kaldѳ misrѳb tusryugurli yashig lurrmѳwei indan.
Inchen tru trag yaskapba, trag mayba managuen batsѳmѳ ѳsig purramsrѳmay pera ibiibe, truilѳbe traguelѳ, trurrigu murelѳ gѳben, trunun wetѳrrabelѳbe mamdѳ gѳn chibig kѳn.
Kabe kan peskau miabene, ¿kan ulwan rranѳbsruguh?n
Kabe ñimma mѳikkѳben ñui nusrkai pirri miabene, kabe, ¿kan pillisrugwan rranѳbsruguh?
Kaguende mugucha miabiibe utѳben, labiibe wetѳrraben, yaskabu wamabigwane kurtrun.m

Chigѳben Tiusweindѳ tarѳmarigwane werameran tranmѳtay. Katѳ ñimui perlasmerane kuchimeran kebusrmѳtay, inchippa truilan itѳlula, llirawa, amrrua, kurmillustѳga kwanaguchib ñimun pitis marinamѳnrrappe.
Inchawei ñitѳweinguen ñuin gabyu nu tsigwan ashmubendѳbe, ñui nunewane chincha ѳyeeg chinrragu: Nai nuneg, ¿ñuin gabyu shauzhig wabigwan wesrarruah? cha..
¿Chindimbarre ñui nunewan kabyu shauzhig wabigwangѳba ashku cha, tru ñuin gabyu nu tsig wabigwanguen ashmubendѳbe?
Ñimbe katѳganelan ѳyeeg, ѳyeeg marѳbelѳ gѳn chib waminchimѳtay, ñimungucha ѳyeelѳ gѳn tainamѳnrrappe.
Kaguende tru Tiuswan ashmeelѳ judíѳs kѳmѳ misaamerabe iigwandѳ isub labelѳ gѳn. Inchen ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabiibe ñimui chi palabelan ashaguen wabig kѳn.k
Inchawei ѳyeeg chib chi isumѳtay chibig kѳn: ¿Chi mamer? chib, ¿Chi mutsamer? chib, ¿Chi guemer? chib.
Inchendѳ nabe trendamѳnrrun: Rey Salѳmónguen nui chine purѳ tabzhig tѳgagua, umera lata tabzhiibe kemuig kѳn cha..

Pala amѳñibelѳ illimeran asay chibig kѳn. Ellguamѳwei, ellmalig tulishimѳwei, ellmalig tulisaigwan esegainug esegamѳwei inchibelanguen, truilanma ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabiibe manrrai mannѳbig kѳn cha. ¿Ñimbe illimera lataguen gѳmѳ, maselѳ gѳmѳtirru? chibig kѳn.

Inchawei nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: ѳsig amѳnamig, ñim mamigwanba, mutsamigwanba, asru chi guemermab isumigwanba menrra isumѳtay cha. ѳsig amѳnamikkan kan mamig lataitѳ gúitarru cha. Kabe asrkan kan asru keelѳ lataitѳ gúitarru cha.
Asru kappe kan lámpara gѳn cha. Inchawei ñui kab tabig kѳbene, ñui asrube kerriguba tѳrsulu gѳnrrun.k
Trembe srѳmbalasrѳwei tѳgamisrѳb tulisay, pullilla mamѳwei, trerawa pinѳmѳwei, nileelѳ nilѳnrrab kebammѳwei indinug.
Yu pirau chine, chine tulishimѳtay, pullillamera mab, trerawa pinab, nileelѳ kebamba nilab indinug.
Inchen ñibe ayunappe, malѳwan kwalla, pusrugwan tabig tamar cha,
Kaguende katѳganelѳ ñimun kaig maren, truilan ñim ulѳ baymѳ, ñim pesannabene, ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabikkucha ñimun ulѳ bayamigwan paymѳnrrun cha.

Chigѳben namun kegѳrrѳsrkѳnrraptiig pѳnrrѳbene, truwane namun ambashmѳrrunrrig. Masken tru kaigweinukkurrimbe tarѳmartra. Kaguende, tru ashib karub waiba, maramburab mariiba, purѳ nuig, purѳ tabiibabe managatig ñuin gѳn chib..
Ñimbe Tiusba waminchib pѳnrrappe, ѳyah chinrrigay: Namui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig, ñui munchibe t'abigweindѳ t'arѳmara, newan t'ab indig kѳnrrun.
Ñimbe nѳm latailѳwein gѳmѳtay. Kaguende ñimui Mѳskai Tiusbe ñim miamѳwatѳ ñimui chi palai indigwane chab ashaguen wan.n

Trune ñibe Tiusba waminchappe, ñui kwartuyu kebya, yask'abwan k'asra, ñui Mѳsk'ai Tiusba waminchi cha, mu asiimíig truyu ñibatѳ pasrabigwan. Inchen ñi mun kenamarmѳtѳ marigwan Tius ñui Mѳsk'ai ashibiibe ñun truburѳ ketamigwan kettrun.
Inchen ñi mun kenamarmѳtѳ mariilan Tius ñui Mѳskai ashibiibe ñun truburѳ ketamigwan kettrun.
Inchen palai inchibelan ñi puruguppe, ñui kusrmay tasig marigwane atsimay tasig asha gѳnrrai marmѳta.n
Ñimbe sѳlgandѳ newan tabelѳ guy, ñimui Mѳskai srѳmbalasrѳ wabig newan tabig kѳb lataitѳweingue.
Inchen ñimui nunelandѳ tab wamabiibe, ¿chigúi srѳig peg marig kѳnrrautah? Kaguende ¿Tiuswan ashmeelѳ tru judíѳs kѳmѳ misaameraguen treetѳweimbe marѳbelѳ gѳmuitarru?k
Trune nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: Ñimun ashig kѳmui inchibelane undaaray cha. Inchen ñimun kaig martrabgѳba inchibelaimbe nѳmuyasig Tiusba wamindamig kѳn cha.
Ñimbe katѳ merrabsrѳ trendaigwan mѳrig kuinrrun: Ñui tab linchibigwane isua, undaaramig kѳn chippe. Ñun tsaliigwane ashig kѳmui indamig kѳn, daigwan.
Inchen mѳikkѳben ñun chi miabigwane tranѳ cha. Mѳikkѳben pebrra cha, miabene, ka chimѳ, peb cha.
Mѳikkѳben ñun nama, kan kilómetrѳ chigѳben niguingarubene, trube, pa kilómetrѳ nig cha.m

Katѳ ñimbe merrabsrѳ trendaigwan mѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun: Katѳganui kabwan mindishibigwane nuin gabwangucha mindisamig kѳn, daigwan. Katѳganui trugulwan lanchibigwane nuin rrugulwangucha landamig kѳn, daigwan.
Inchen ñimbe martrappe: ѳѳ damig kѳn. Inchen marmѳnrrappe: Ka tamig kѳn. Pѳs yandѳ i trendaigyugurri mas nemarѳb, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun taibe nugwaimandzigweinukkurri arrubig kѳn.

Inchendѳ nabe ñimun trendamѳnrrun: ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chib mumaygucha ke treeg chimѳtay cha. Srѳmbalawei merrab pasramisra ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun chimѳtay cha. Kaguende srѳmbalabe Tius nѳ wamisra waig kѳn cha.
Katѳ ñimbe mѳriinrrun ñimui merrabsreelan ѳyah t'ailan Señѳrwei merrab, ¡gatѳ! marmѳ gѳmѳ, nabe maramѳnrrun cha kѳrrѳmisrigwane wamindiitѳ gѳmѳ, maramig kѳn daigwan.

Trune nabe trendamѳnrrun: Mu mѳѳtѳgucha nui srai, itѳlulmubendѳ, srawan kucha, tarѳmisrѳbiibe, nui srawane itѳlulѳb uñchai maran cha. Inchen mu mѳѳtѳgucha kan tarѳmisra ishuuba kasharabiibe nѳgucha treetѳwei itѳlulan cha.k

Ñui kusrmay tasig kaig maringarua, kaigu ñun kebenѳsrkѳbene, tasigwane bara, guchi, chibig kѳn. Trembe ñui asru kanbalѳtѳ balabikken chi gѳmѳnrrun cha, tru mѳra melamnug asr ѳrѳba kegutsig kѳbgunrriibe.
Merrabsrѳ ѳyah taigwan ñimbe mѳrѳbelѳ gúinrrun: Mѳikkѳben kasharawaig kѳbendѳ, peg ishuuba itѳlulamig kѳmѳn, daigwan.
Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Truyugurri webinrrappe, maig pagaramigwan chishtѳ pagarawatѳwei webinrrabguen cha.

Mѳikkѳben ñun kejawa, juezweimay merranene, tru kejabiiba mayu ib basrapbatѳ, tammay kѳrrѳmisrkun cha, petѳ wamindam lau, tru juezwei tasku tranmѳnrraimbe. Inchipba juezbe pѳlicíameran tranen, truilѳbe ñun kailan keeri yau kegutsinamѳnrrappe.
Inchawei ñi Tiuswei tranamigwan alt'aryumay srua arrua, ñui nunewan ñi chigѳben kaig mara tѳgagúigwan ñi isuptinchabe,

Trune nabe trendamѳnrrun: Mѳikkѳben nui nunewan namig kѳrrѳmisrѳbiibe kaigyu pasrѳnrrai paslig kѳnrrun cha. Nunewan tsalѳ wamabigwane tru Setenteelѳ maig maramigwan asha marѳbelѳ asha malig kѳnrrun cha. Inchen mѳikkѳben nunewan trѳmbѳig inchib: Larrѳ gaig chugúi mѳrmíig kѳn chib wamabiibe, tru kwamѳ nagu mѳra melamnug kegutsig kѳmigwan lab pasran cha.

Inchawei nabe ñimune eshkar: Ñimui sѳlgandѳ marigwan tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelѳba, fariseѳsmeraba marѳb pѳnrrai lataitѳguen gѳmѳ, katѳguchi tabig marmuisruandѳbe, srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waisrѳmbe managuen kebamrraamѳn cha.

Pѳs nabe ñimun ciertѳn trendamѳnrrun: Srѳmbalaba, pirѳba pѳnrrѳbenbatѳbe, tru maig maramigwan martrai Mѳisés pѳrigu maya lamѳzhig pѳrig pѳnrrabelѳguen pinappe, purainrraamѳn cha, kerrigu tru pѳrigu maig taig nebumnegatig.
ѳyeetѳwei ñimgucha misaamerai merrab ñimui tѳr pilѳnrrai inday chibig kѳn, ñimui tabig mariilan asha, nѳmbe ñimui Mѳsk'ai srѳmbalasrѳ wabigwan truba tabig waminchain cha.
Katѳ kan aceite lámparan chigucha pilѳgѳppe, kѳtsѳ umbu basrtrab pilѳgѳmѳn cha. Treeg kѳmѳtѳ, masken pala basrene, mayeelan yau purrabelan pilan chibig kѳn.
Ñimbe yu pirauelayasig tѳr latailѳ gѳn. Kan ciudama tun balasrѳ pasrabiibe trubѳnrrab gaiman cha..

Pѳs truba k'asraarab tab gúi mѳray cha. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳmbe truba rruba nuig ketig utamig tѳgagѳnrrun cha. Ñimguen kѳmѳwatѳsrѳwei tru Tius maig k'aruigwan eshk'abelan ѳyeetѳwei k'aig marig kѳbig kѳn cha, trenchibig kѳn Jesúsbe.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru Tius mandѳ martrai miaigwan marikkurri kaig martraindinab kaig nebui melabelaimbe. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe nѳmuin gѳn cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru ambugurri igurri tab gѳmigwan lab marѳbelaimbe. Kaguende truilane Tiusbe nai ureg kѳn chinrrun cha.n
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru sѳlgandѳ tabigwan kan parѳgwaig mѳrѳb lataig, pi mulgwaig mѳrѳb lataig inchibelaimbe. Kaguende maig isua palai melaigwan Tiusbe nѳmun nѳrrѳ traniilѳ gѳnrrun cha.
Mayanguen tab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru truba isuig kishibelaimbe. Kaguende Tiusbe nѳmun chi isui inchimѳnrrai tab gѳbigwan tranrrun cha..
Mayanguen t'ab gúilѳ gѳn cha, tru Tiusweimburabigwan ke kagѳmѳnrraindѳzhig tѳgaguermab isua palai mѳrѳbelaimbe. Kaguende srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe nѳmuiwein gѳn cha.
Incha Jesúsbe misag truba rruba nuwan ashabe, kan tun bala nebya wamisren, nui kusrenanѳb pera uniilѳ kemallen,
Inchen misaamera galileasreelѳ gѳben, decapѳlissreelѳ gѳben, jerusalénsreelѳ gѳben, judeasreelѳ gѳben, Jѳrdán bi tru pѳrr gallabgatѳsreelѳ gѳben Jesúswei mendig truba nu ambubelѳ gѳn.m

Jesúsbe Galilea birau ѳrѳba llirab ibig kѳn, judíѳsmera tulundzuni yamѳrig Tius nѳ ashib k'arub pasrainuguig tabig srѳ wamwan eshk'ab kusrenanѳb. Incha misaameran chi gwanrreelan gѳben, chi busrkwailan gѳben tamarѳbig kѳn.

Incha Jesúsbe katѳguchi mas ambuurѳ yabe, katѳgan ba nunelѳ warai ashibig kѳn, truilѳbe Zebedeѳwei nusrkalѳ, Santiagѳba, Juanba. Nѳmbe nui mѳskaimba barcѳyu atarrayamera kѳlsrailan tamarѳb purrѳbene, Jesúsbe tru nusrkalan wamabig kѳn.
Jesús Galilea nu bisu mendawan ib pasrѳwabe, pa nunelan ashibig kѳn, kane Simón, truigwane katѳ Pedrѳgucha taig, kane Andrés taig. Truilѳbe peskabelѳ gua, nѳmui atarrayameran piyu keguchib warѳben,
Trugurrimbunѳ Jesúsbe eshkab kusrenanѳb trenchibig kѳn: Kaig mariilan isua mѳra, Tiusweimay lliray cha. Srѳmbalasrѳ Tius nѳ ashib karub waibe lutau basran cha.m
misaamera lѳstѳyu warabelѳbe kan truba tѳrig asan chib. Kwamig nѳmuim bala itѳgasraig lataig warabelѳ gѳbelane kan tѳrig kebilin gѳn, chib pѳrig.
Incha Nazaret pueblѳyugurri webyabe, Capernaum pueblѳsrѳ pisu menda, Zabulónwei misag warainuuba, Neft'alíwei misag warainuuba tru birau tsunrrab ibig kѳn.
Juan Bautistan k'ailan keeri yau keerin gѳn daig Jesús wammѳrabe, Galileamay ibig kѳn.
Inchene Jesúsbe trencha lѳtabig kѳn: ¡Satanás, mѳi mѳi iptsu! cha. Kaguende Tiuswei wamwan pѳligube trenchibig kѳn cha: Señѳr ñui Tiuswandѳ kѳliibala tabig waminchib, nuyasiitѳ marѳb megamig kѳn cha.
trenchibig kѳn: Iigwan nabe kerriguba tranrrumѳn cha, ñi nan srala, kѳriibala t'abig waminchene
Katѳbe nugwaimandziibe kan truba bala tunsrѳmay srua yabe, yu pirau chutѳgucha nѳrreelѳ tru nѳm ashib karub purrailanba, katѳ nѳmui chigurrimbunѳ tabig tѳrig tѳgagúigwanba kenamarabe
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchibig kѳn: Katѳ Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube treekkucha chibig kѳn cha: Ñui Señѳr Tiuswane ke chinchibig kѳtashchab lataikkucha maramig kѳmѳn cha.
Incha nugwaimandziibe Jesúswan Jerusalén tru Tiusweindѳ tarѳmari ciudasrѳmay srua ya, tru Tiuswei yau purѳ balasrѳ pasrabe,
Inchen Jesúsbe trencha lѳt'abig kѳn: Tiuswei wamwan pѳrigube trenchibig kѳn cha: Mѳѳbe pirrindѳgatѳ ѳsig tsumѳtѳ, kerrigu Tiuswei wamdѳgagucha tsumig kѳn cha.
Incha Juanbe Jesúswan piu umbu ulsrѳben, piyugurri webibig kѳn. Inchen mѳimbe srѳmbalabe kurѳptinchen, Jesúsbe Tiuswei Espíritu nuim bala kan palѳma lat'aig kѳrraarri ashibig kѳn.
Inchen srѳmbalasrѳngurri kan wam trenchib waminchibig kѳn: Iibe nai Nusrkai undaaraig kѳn cha. Nabe nuimburab truba tab gúi war chaa
Inchen Jesúsbe trenchiptinchibig kѳn: Mѳimbatѳbe ѳyamay ka mar cha. Tius tru sѳlgandѳ tabig maramigwane nambe kutѳgue ѳyamay maramig kѳn cha. Inchen Juanbe ka treeg marѳbig kѳn.
Jesúsbe Galileasrѳngurri Jѳrdán biyumay arrubig kѳn, tru Juan uninuumay nun piu umbu ulsrѳnrrai.k

Nѳbe tirigun isig ѳra tarѳmartrab tru k'ala gutsamig tsig utigwan sruaguen basran cha. Incha truyu tru tirigu chishmari yabalѳwan kerrigu chab chishmarabe, tirigune tirigu esegainug esegappe, shauwane mana kwamѳ nagu pattrun chibig kѳn Juanbe.
Katѳ walѳmbe tusrmeran srѳlba para ѳramig chabguen srѳlyu pasringuen basran cha. Chi tusrwandѳgucha tab mamig niimíigwane para, nagu kegutsan cha.
Incha nѳmui kaig mariilan kaig marig kѳn chib eshkaben, Juanbe truilan Jѳrdán biyu piu umbu ulsrѳbig kѳn.
Jerusalén misaameraba, mayeelѳ Judea birau misaameraba, Jѳrdán bi buluwanelѳba nun mѳrtrab werrubelѳ gѳn.
Juan kewagúibe camellѳ isiitѳga marig kѳbig kѳn. Inchen nui pѳrѳnaibe kaluswan marig kѳben, nui mamibe nѳrrѳ chapullba kaambu mielba gѳbig kѳn.
Tru utѳmerawan Juan Bautista Judea birau mu misag warab waraimѳnugg
Incha Jѳsébe trusrѳ puabe, Nazaret pueblѳsrѳ tsunrrab ibig kѳn. Iig ѳyeeg nebuppe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkab mѳguelѳ ѳyah taig nebunrrain gúig kѳn: Jesúsbe nazaretsriig cha wamig kѳnrrun daig.
Inchen yandѳ Herѳdes kwaben, Señѳrwei kan ángel Jѳséwan Egiptѳsrѳ piabyu kenamisra, trenchibig kѳn:
ѳyamay nebuig kѳn Tius maig karuigwan eshkabig Jeremías ѳyah pѳrig::

Inchen Herѳdes nun tru kusreb mѳguelѳ isin gúi mѳrabe, truba rruba nama, tru kusreb mѳguelѳ tru ureg chu uras kallaigwan eshkaigwan, trunun cuenta mara kallaingurlimbunѳ pa bilagatiguelѳ Belén pѳtѳgatan warabelan kerliguba kwetchain garubig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsébe kurra, unan usranba pera, yem Egiptѳsrѳmay webya, ya,

Yandѳ tru kusreb mѳguelѳ chab amben, Señѳrwei kan ángel Jѳséwan piabyu kenamisrabe, trenchibig kѳn: Kurra, unan usranba perѳb Egiptѳsrѳmay trubab inrrѳ cha. Incha trusrѳ na eshkamnegatig kѳrrѳmisrtrig cha. Kaguende Herѳdesbe unan kwetchab lanrrab gѳn cha..
tru kusreb mѳguelѳ estrellan ashabe, truba rruba kasraarabelѳ gѳn..
Tru kusrebelѳbe rey ѳyeeg eshkailѳ ambubelѳ gѳn. Inchen estrella tru pѳrr gallabgatѳsrѳ asiibe nѳmui merraptѳ ya, yandѳ tru unѳ tsuim bala pasramisren,m
Inchen Herѳdesbe tru srѳmbalasrѳ estrellameran ashib kusrebelan mu ashmѳwatѳ wama, estrellabe tappe chu uras kenamisrigwan payibig kѳn.
Inchen reybe sacerdѳtesmeran k'arubelanba, tru Mѳisés pѳrigwan kusrenanѳbelanba wama, payibig kѳn: ¿Cristѳbe chu gallanrrabig kѳ? cha.
Inchen rey Herѳdesbe trendaigwan mѳrabe, ni mumaygucha gѳmui inchibig kѳn. Inchen katѳ Jerusalén misaamerangucha treetѳweim bubig kѳn.
trenchib payibelѳ gѳn: ¿Judíѳsmerai tru rey kallabiibe chu tsuh? cha. Kaguende nambe nui estrellan webarri asha, kѳriibala nune tabig waminchab amrruer cha..
Incha Jѳsébe Marían nui nusrkawan tѳgagѳmnegatig keeba, sraimba lat'aig nѳmui asrtѳga chi marmuig kѳn. Incha Jѳsébe unane Jesús munchi basrѳbig kѳn.
Kerrigu ѳyeeg pureppe, Tius maig karuigwan eshkabigwan Señѳr truigwan ѳyah taig nebunrrai treeg kuig kѳnn

Nѳbe treeg martrab chab isubguen inchen, Señѳrwei kan ángel piabyu kenamisrabe trenchibig kѳn: Jѳsé, ñi Davidwei misagugurri arrubig, Marían ñui srain gѳnrrai utamigwan kѳrig kui inchimѳta cha. Kaguende tru unѳ tѳgagѳmibe Espíritu Santѳin gѳn cha..
Uzíasbe Jѳtamwei mѳskain gѳben, Jѳtambe Acazwei mѳskain gѳben, Acazbe Ezequíaswei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Jesucristѳ kallaibe ѳyeeg kuig kѳn: María nui usrimbe Jѳséba kasharanrrab misra uñen, Jѳsébe kasharanrrab permѳwatѳ Maríabe Espíritu Santѳgurri kwanrriig kenamisrѳptinchibig kѳn.k
Jacѳbpe Jѳséwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn. Inchen tru Jѳsébe Maríai keg kѳben, tru Maríagurri Jesús kallaig kѳbig kѳn, tru Cristѳ taig.
Ibe Jesuclistѳi merrabsrѳ misaamerai munchimera gѳn, tru Davidweinukkurlimba, Abrahamweinukkurlimba amrrub misag:
Inchen Eliudbe Eleazarwei mѳskain gѳben, Eleazarbe Matánwei mѳskain gѳben, Matánbe Jacѳbwei mѳskain gѳben,
Zѳrѳbabelbe Abiudwei mѳskain gѳben, Abiudbe Eliaquimwei mѳskain gѳben, Eliaquimbe Azѳrwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Inchen Jѳsíasbe Jecѳníasweimba, nunelaimba mѳskain gѳbig kѳn, tru israelit'asmeran Babilѳniamay merrarrawa srua ambub uras.
Ezequíasbe Manaséswei mѳskain gѳben, Manasésbe Amѳnwei mѳskain gѳben, Amѳnbe Jѳsíaswei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Salѳmónbe Rѳbѳamwei mѳskain gѳben, Rѳbѳambe Abíaswei mѳskain gѳben, Abíasbe Asaiwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn..
Salmónbe Bѳѳzwei mѳskain gѳben, nui usrimbe Rahab gѳbig kѳn. Bѳѳzbe ѳbedwei mѳskain gѳben, nui usrimbe Rut gѳbig kѳn. ѳbedbe Isaíwei mѳskain gѳben,
Judábe Faresweimba, Zaraimba mѳskain gѳben, tru uregwei usrimbe Tamar gѳbig kѳn. Faresbe Esrѳmwei mѳskain gѳben, Esrѳmbe Aramwei mѳskain gѳbig kѳn.
Abrahambe Isaacwei mѳskain gѳben, Isaacbe Jacѳbwei mѳskain gѳben, Jacѳbpe Judába, nui nunelaimba mѳskain gѳbig kѳn..

Met geriѳù zѳ a echu en -au ken e Tѳtѳró hag e Gwambia, evel wau. Tu a vefe neuze da grediñ eѳ ar stummѳù en -awi stummѳù rannyezhel-rik na sellѳnt nemet ѳuzh Tѳtѳró, un emdrѳadur fѳnetek nevez marteze. Padal e kaver implijet e 1852 ur stumm wawi ( pe wawe ), skrivet huahue evit ar ger wau a-vremañ. hag e ѳuzer eѳ bet dastumet ar stumm-se e Kѳkѳnѳukѳ ha neket e Tѳtѳróó
